40001001	Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe Igara David ɔwa tɛtɛ, fiɛ David ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖe Abraham ɔwa ɔɣekparɛ i ngbe ne.
40001002	Abraham ɔɣe Isak, Isak ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣe Yakob gɔ loɣe Yuda ku ɔ̃ manyiibi.
40001003	Yuda gu ɔ̃ ɔre Tamai ɔɣe Perez gu Zera, fiɛ Perez ɔɣe Hezron, Hezron ɔɣe Aram,
40001004	Aram ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣe Aminadab, Aminadab ɔɣe Naheson, Naheson ɔɣe Salmon.
40001005	Salmon gu ɔ̃ ɔre Rahab ɔɣe Boaz fiɛ Boaz gu ɔ̃ ɔre Rut ɔɣe Obed, Obed ɔɣe Isai,
40001006	Isai ɔɣe Igara David. Ita i Igara David iso isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ mamɔɛ̃ Israel mabi makɛlɛgu sisande ame i Babilonia karɔ̃ iso ne, mawa ma nto maba i ngbe lowe ne, David gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔfɔ i Urea kɔrɛ ɔɣe Salomo.
40001007	Salomo ɔɣe Rehoboam, Rehoboam ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣe Abiya, Abiya ɔɣe Asa.
40001008	Asa ɔɣe Yosafat, Yosafat ɔɣe Yoram, fiɛ Yoram ɔɣe Uzia.
40001009	Uzia ɔɣe Yotam fiɛ Yotam ɔɣe Ahaz, Ahaz ɔɣe Hezekia,
40001010	fiɛ Hezekia ɔɣe Manase gɔ loɣe Amon, Amon ɔɣe Yosia.
40001011	Yosia ɔɣe Yekoniya gu ɔ̃ manyiibi ku ɔwi gɔ makɛlɛ sisande ame i Babilonia.
40001012	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i sisande ame i Babilonia maba kama ne, Yekoniya ɔɣe Sealtiel fiɛ Sealtiel ɔɣe Zerubabel.
40001013	Zerubabel ɔɣe Abihud, Abihud ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣe Elyakim fiɛ Elyakim ɔɣe Azur,
40001014	Azur ɔɣe Zadok, Zadok ɔɣe Akim, Akim ɔɣe Elihud,
40001015	Elihud ɔɣe Eleazar, Eleazar ɔɣe Matan, fiɛ Matan ɔɣe Yakob,
40001016	Yakob ɔɣe Yosef gɔ loyiri Maria, Maria gɔ loɣe Yesu gɔ marɔ sɔ Kristo.
40001017	Ne ɔso ita i Abraham iso isɛ iabo David iso ne, mawa iweo-ina maɣe masiaidzo. Ita i David iso isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Israel mabi ɔkɛlɛ sisande ame i Babilonia karɔ̃ iso ana ne, mawa iweo-ina maɣe masiaidzo. Ana ne, ita i ɔwi gɔ mase i sisande ame maba isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ maɣe Kristo ne, mawa iweo-ina maɣe masiaidzo.
40001018	Kumɛgɔ isɛ karɔ̃ fiɛ maɣe Yesu i ngbe ne. Makarɛ Maria matã Yosef, ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃akɔ wũ lɛ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, manya sɔ Maria ka ɔto kayiri iki i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame.
40001019	Yosef ɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ, ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃apia Maria kunuarɛ ɔso ne, ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anyua ɔrɔ̃go i iwɛrɛ ame.
40001020	Ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔbara adzuni wagbe i ɔ̃ iti ame ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte wũ i kurɛ ame ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Yosef, Igara David ɔwa tɛtɛ, daanigã sɔ aakɔ fɔ ɔre Maria abɔ so i kɔrɛ, ala kayiri ga ɔto ne, Siwarã Bielea kɔrɛ kabɔrɛ.
40001021	Ɔto ɔ̃aɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ, tã wũ iyere sɔ Yesu, alasɔ ɔ̃ loaɖi ɔ̃ maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame ne.”
40001022	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba sɔ si nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔkigu i ɔ̃ kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ iso aaba i ne ame sɔ,
40001023	“Ɔbitɛ gɔ loiɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ to ɔ̃ala kayiri ɔɣe ɔbi birɛrɛĩ. Maatã wũ iyere sɔ Imanuel,” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ɣaa piagu bo.
40001024	Ne ɔso gɔ Yosef ɔta ne, ɔyiri Maria lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere wũ awe.
40001025	Ɣɛɛ ne, Yosef iirɛgu wũ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ Maria ɔɣe ɔ̃ ɔbi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nɖe ɔbi birɛrɛĩ, fiɛ Yosef ɔtã wũ iyere sɔ Yesu.
40002001	Maɣe Yesu i Betlehem ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Yudea ku ɔwi gɔ ame i Herodes to ɔɖe sigara. Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, manɔgbadze ma nɣe ara i awãmi iso ɔbɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ maba Yerusalem Ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
40002002	Gɔ maba ne, makarɛ sɔ, “Lɛ maɣe ɔbi gɔ loaɖe ma Yudase igara? Bonya ɔ̃ iwãmi i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔso boba sɔ si boba boasumu wũ.”
40002003	Gɔ Igara Herodes ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, itidza ɔ̃ gu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Yerusalem gbaã.
40002004	Ne ɔso ɔkpere masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔɖuɖu gu mmara matedze ɔsirakanya ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Lɛ maaɣe Kristo?”
40002005	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Maɣɛ sɔ maaɣe wũ i Betlehem ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Yudea ala Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ sɔ,
40002006	‘Fɔ Betlehem ne, maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ kosoi aɖe i Yudea karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe! Alasɔ fɔ ame i tɔ̃ɖedze siare gɔ loakɔ wũ kaɖe Israel aabɔrɛ.’ ”
40002007	Ne kama ne, Herodes ɔkpere mafɔ ma lobɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔkɛlɛgu kawɛrɛkɔ̃ sɔ si ɔtsue ɔwi gɔ tutuutu manya iwãmi nɛmɔ.
40002008	Ɔɖi ma ɔri sɔ makɛlɛ Betlehem ku atɔ̃me wagbe sɔ, “Misɛ mianyɔnyɔ ɔbi gɔgbe kukaakɔ, si minya wũ ne, mikpese miba miaɣere me sɔ mme wũ loasɛ loasumu wũ.”
40002009	-
40002010	Ne ɔso mafɔ magbe ɔrui maɣo ɔri. I ɔri ne, iwãmi nɛ manya i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔledza ibɔrɛ. Gɔ manya ne ne, mana isoɣɔ gbaã. Iɖe ma katɔ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ isɛ iatui i ngbegɔ i ɔbi ɣɛtɛ rɛ.
40002011	Gɔ mabo i iyo ame fiɛ manya ɔbi gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi Maria ne, mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ masumu wũ. Gɔ mabusi ma akpo ne, maɖi karatã sɛɛ ga nɖe sikãrɛtɛa, korobo gu ɔlufui matã wũ.
40002012	Ne kama gɔ makpese ne, Ɣaa ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma i kurɛ ame sɔ madaasɛ maaki i Herodes kɔrɛ. Ne ɔso maki ɔri mama marui makɛlɛ ma aɖe.
40002013	Gɔ mafɔ mamɔ ɔɔrui kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte Yosef i kurɛ ame ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Herodes to ɔ̃abie ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki ɔ̃aɖoe ɔbi, ne ɔso ta si akɔ wũ gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi si ateregu ma akɛlɛgu Egipte. Miwe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loaɣere mi sɔ mikpese miba.”
40002014	Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ame ame ne, Yosef ɔta ɔkɔ ɔbi gu ɔnyi marui matere makɛlɛ Egipte.
40002015	Mawe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ Herodes ɔkpi. Iba ngbɔ sɔ si nnɛ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ aaba i ne ame sɔ, “Ta Egipte lokpere wũ Ɔbi lobɔrɛgu.”
40002016	Gɔ Herodes ɔnya sɔ manɔgbadze ma lobɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔsɔsɔla wũ ne, sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ gbaã. Ɔpia makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ maɖoe mabi birɛrɛĩ ɔɖuɖu ma i Betlehem gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ loki silɔ ame. Mma ɔɖuɖu loɔfɔ ita i akɔ anyɔ iba karɔ̃ si ikategu ɔwi gɔ i mmamɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ manya iwãmi kanya.
40002017	Mabi iɖoe nɛgbe ɔba sɔ si nnɛ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Yeremia ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ aaba i ne ame sɔ,
40002018	“Kulu kuwɛ̃ to i Rama. Kaku gu isoma kulu kuɖe! Rahel nto ɔbiɛ ɔ̃ mabi, fiɛ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ malora wũ, ala sɔ ɔ̃ mabi ɔkpi.”
40002019	Gɔ Herodes ɔkpi ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte Yosef i kurɛ ame i Egipte.
40002020	Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si akɔ ɔbi gu ɔnyi si mikɛlɛ Israel karɔ̃ iso alasɔ mma lobie sɔ maaɖoe ɔbi ɔɔkpi.”
40002021	Ne ɔso Yosef ɔta ɔkɔ ɔbi gu ɔnyi marui makɛlɛ Israel karɔ̃ iso.
40002022	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yosef ɔnɔ sɔ Arkelao masɛra sigara i ɔ̃ ɔse kanya i Yudea ne, ɔnigã mmɔ ikɛlɛ, ne ɔso i kurɛ ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ Galilea karɔ̃ iso.
40002023	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃awe i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Nasaret ame sɔ itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ aba i ne ame sɔ, “Maakpere wũ sɔ ɔ Nasaretse,” aaba i ne ame.
40003001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔba Yudea fafuĩ ame ɔba ɔ̃atsɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ
40003002	sɔ, “Mifiniki i mi situ ame ala Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔɣo.”
40003003	Yohanes gɔgbe nɖe ngɔ iso i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ, “Ɔwɛ̃ to ɔla kulu teteree i fafuĩ ame sɔ, ‘Miledza ɔri mitã Bosate iba. Mibara ɔ̃ ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃asɛ tɔrɔrɔ.’ ”
40003004	Awu wa i Yohanes ɔpia ne, kapuipɔngɔ siwɛrɛ̃ masu mawe ala, fiɛ ɔsu bɔi ɔko kafiami ɔtɔ so ɔsɔ. Maɣendu gu kugbadzedzei loɖe ɔ̃ aɖera.
40003005	Maturi ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem gu Yudea ɔɖuɖu gu Yordan ɔwore kama abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
40003006	Gɔ maɖi ma akpi maɣɛ ne, Yohanes ɔpie ma Ɣaa ndu i Yordan ɔwore ame.
40003007	Gɔ Yohanes ɔnya ma Farisise gu ma Zadukise gbodzoo ma loba sɔ ɔpie ma Ɣaa ndu ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ma lonyanyarĩ lɛ maɣɛ! Midaasɔsɔla so iki i Ɣaa itupie ifɔ ame sɔ miawo ɔtere i Ɣaa sikpã dzɛ nto siba i kayiiso kanya!
40003008	Mite i mi nsɛgbai ame sɔ miɔfiniki mibɔrɛ i mi akpi ame.
40003009	Midaabu sɔ gɔ Abraham mawa miɖe ɔso ne, Ɣaa iibakpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue. Nto loɣere mi sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo mawa ɔbara ɔɖi i ata wa nfere i ngbe ame ɔtã Abraham.
40003010	“Minyɔ! Maɔkarã kaɣɛ i adziri iso koko sɔ maatu wã ta siɖu ame. Kudziri biara gɔ loisɛ kuɣɔ̃ abi sɛɛ ne, maaɖaɛ kɔ̃ mapɛyu matsuedza.”
40003011	“Mme ne, ndu losu nto lopie mi si ite sɔ miɔfiniki mibɔrɛ i mi akpi ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsiai me i kama ɔto ɔba ne, Ɣaa Siwarã gu ɔtɔ ɔ̃asu ɔpie mi ndu. Ɔmɔ ɔɖo me sɔ loikote sɔ loaɖe ɔ̃ ɔɖabo kɔra.
40003012	Ɔto ɔ̃ ifɛra nɛ ɔ̃afɛ ala simɔɣo ɔɖi i kamɔ ame. Ɔ̃asu aɖera ɔfere i kawu ame, ɣɛɛ simɔɣo ne, ɔ̃atsuedza sɛ̃ ku ɔtɔ gɔ loisɛ ɔnyi!”
40003013	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Galilea ɔba Yohanes kɔrɛ i Yordan ɔkpokpo sɔ Yohanes si ɔpie wũ Ɣaa ndu.
40003014	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yohanes to ɔbie sɔ ɔfinikira ɔ̃ adzuni ɔso ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme ikote sɔ loaba fɔ kɔrɛ apie me Ɣaa ndu ne iiɖe fɔ loaba wũ kɔrɛ!”
40003015	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Tã ise ngbɔ si boawo ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ bobara ɔbara.” Ne Yohanes ɔnɔ karɔ̃ ne.
40003016	Gɔ ɔpie Yesu ndu ɔro fiɛ ɔto ɔbɔrɛ i ɔwore ame ne, kuɖokpo ɔbusi kutã wũ. Ɔnya Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso lɛ ilɔpɔ siba siasia wũ iso.
40003017	Ne manɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kato siɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi gɔ loisɛ lopia kuɣɛ i ngbe ne, ɔbo me anɔ gbaã.”
40004001	Siwarã Bielea ɔkɔ Yesu sikɛlɛgu fafuĩ ame sɔ Tsirise si ɔsɛ ɔ̃ala wũ ɔnyɔ.
40004002	Gɔ ɔnyi kanya akpɛnɛ sina kasɛ̃ sina ne, kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ.
40004003	Mmɔ i Tsirise ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi ne, ɣere ata wagbe sɔ akpese aɖera.”
40004004	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Iiɖe aɖera ɔnɔwɛ̃ iso i ɔturi aasɛ ngbã, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me atsue ikã ɔso bowũ.’ ”
40004005	Tsirise ɔkɔ Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu Yerusalem, Ɔmagɛ̃ Sekelea ame, ma Yudase kasɔrɛkɔ̃ kakɔlɛkɔ̃ pelepele.
40004006	Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si Ɣaa Ɔbi aɖe ne, nyua so sɛ aawuĩ i karɔ̃. Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃apia ɔ̃ makpabo mamɔɛ̃-ɔ i nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ aibasu fɔ kukpa awuĩ i ita kuiwɛ̃ iso.’ ”
40004007	Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, ‘Daala Bosate Ɣaa anyɔ.’ ”
40004008	Tsirise ɔledza Yesu ikɔ ikɛlɛgu kube kɔlɛa kuwɛ̃ itititɛ̃. Ɔte wũ kayiiso sigarakuɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ku kɔ̃ sile.
40004009	Ne ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Si aapɛ agɛgɛ̃ atã me asɔrɛ me ne, loasu ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu lotã-ɔ.”
40004010	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Satana, rui me i kɔrɛ! Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Bosate Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ lokote sɔ maapɛ agɛgɛ̃ matã masɔrɛ.’ ”
40004011	Ne Tsirise ɔrui i Yesu kɔrɛ, fiɛ Ɣaa makpabo ɔba maabuai wũ ne.
40004012	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ sɔ maɔmɔɛ̃ Yohanes mapia i iyo ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Galilea.
40004013	Ɔ̃iwe i Nasaret, ɣɛɛ ɔkɛlɛ Kapernaum, ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nse i Galilea itubu kanya i Zebulon gu Naftali karɔ̃ iso.
40004014	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃awe i mmɔ, ne ɔso nnɛ i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔɣɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ,
40004015	-
40004016	“Zebulon gu Naftali maturi ma nsi i idududu ame i itubu ɔri iso i Yordan ɔkpokpo i Galilea ngbegɔ i maturi ma loiɖe ma Yudase si ne, maanya ikpawaĩ siare. Fiɛ mma nsi i karɔ̃ ga iso i kukpi to kuɖe sigara ne, ikpawaĩ aafiɛ ifere ma.”
40004017	Ita i ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ imomo ipɛ iɣɛ sɔ, “Mifiniki i mi situ ame ala Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔbore ɔbo.”
40004018	Gɔ Yesu to ɔkila i Galilea ibu kɔrɛ ne, ɔnya manyiibi inyɔ, Simon gɔ marɔ Petro gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Andrea to mapia asabu ala makpɛɖidze maɖe.
40004019	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miba miasiai me si loakpesera mi maturi maɖidze mitã Ɣaa.”
40004020	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, manyua ma asabu masɛ marui masiai wũ.
40004021	Gɔ ɔrui i mmɔ ɔsɛ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔnya manyiibi inyɔ mama, Yakobo gu Yohanes. Ma gu ma ɔse Zebedeo si i ɔkolo ame mato maledza ma asabu fiɛ Yesu ɔkpere ma.
40004022	Ɔluwɛ̃ marui manyua ɔkolo gu ma ɔse masɛ masiai wũ.
40004023	Yesu ɔwe ɔki i Galilea abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame ɔto ɔte Ɣaa itɔ̃me i ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃, ɔɣɛ Sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso Itɔ̃me Bielea, ɔsa mma ɔɖuɖu nto manyɛ sinyɛ agbãagbã.
40004024	Ɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me ɔki ikã i Siria karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso, ne ɔso maturi ɔsore mma ɔɖuɖu nto manyɛ sinyɛ agbãagbã, mma i so to sibo, mma i siwarã lalaa to siɖaa, mma nto manyɛ kakpebubu gu mma lofɛfɛ̃ marɛ ɔɖuɖu ne, Yesu ɔsa ma ɔɖuɖu.
40004025	Maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai wũ. Ma mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Galilea gu Simagɛ̃ Iweo gu Yerusalem gu Yudea gu nrɔ̃ mɛ mpia i Yordan ɔwore kama isɛ ame.
40005001	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya maturi gbodzoo ma nsiai wũ ne, ɔya ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i kabemi iso fiɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba maasɛ wũ i kɔrɛ.
40005002	Ne ɔte ma ara ɔɣɛ sɔ,
40005003	“So si siɣɔ mma nɣe sɔ mawɛrɛba maɖe i Ɣaa itsue ame. Alasɔ ma ɔkpɛ nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
40005004	So si siɣɔ mma nto mamararã so ala ma i Ɣaa aatui kɔrɔ̃ i kagbegbe ne.
40005005	So si siɣɔ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃, alasɔ ma loaɖe kayiiso ara ne.
40005006	So si siɣɔ mma anɔ lorɛtɛ i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ibara iso, ala Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ma kuɖɔɛ ɔtã ma.
40005007	So si siɣɔ mma nsɛ manyɔ maturi nnya, ala ma i Ɣaa aanyɔ nnya ne.
40005008	So si siɣɔ mma situ ame lokpa, ala ma loanya Ɣaa ne.
40005009	So si siɣɔ mma nsɛ maledza manyii ndɛ̃, ala ma i Ɣaa aakpere sɔ ɔ̃ mabi ne.
40005010	So si siɣɔ mma kama i maturi sɛ mati ala Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ibara ɔso, ala ma ɔkpɛ nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ne.
40005011	“So si siɣɔ mi si maturi to matia mi, mati mi kama maɣɛ ara nyanyarĩa wa nɖe mila i mi iso alasɔ miɖe wũ masiaidze ɔso.
40005012	So si siɣɔ mi, mina isoɣɔ alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mi kuso siare i kato. Ngbɔ makpɛ̃gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma loɖe mi katɔ̃ ne.
40005013	“Mi nse lɛ mma mitã maturi ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ si mma ɔyu me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ne, maisibawo ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso ɔki ɔpia me ɔmɛrɛ̃. Misiina kusia kukuwɛ̃ iɖo sɔ maasu me mawiri maturi ɔsɛ me iso.
40005014	“Mi nɖe ikpawaĩ mitã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ matsue masia i kube iso ne, ɔ̃ibawo ɔwɛrɛ.
40005015	Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtsue ɔkaniɛ ɔsu kapoi ɔfu iso, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃atara ɔsia i kakɔlɛkɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃asa ɔtã ɔbiara.
40005016	Ngbɔ ame i mi sikaniɛ si sisa sitã maturi sɔ maanya mi kurabarara sɛɛ fiɛ maale mi Ɔse gɔ i kato ne.
40005017	“Loiba lotindza Mose mmara gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara ite ɖuɖuuɖu, ɣɛɛ loba sɔ si wã ibiara aba i ne ame.
40005018	Gbagbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ i kato gu karɔ̃ se ne, mmara katotoi ɣee kakpoi kukawɛ̃ iibakpase kabɔrɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ibiara ɔba i ne ame.
40005019	Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ loatu mmara kosoi tsɔra fiɛ ɔ̃ate mamama sɔ mabara ngbɔ ne, maakpere wũ ɔtsɔra i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Ngbɔ ame i ɔbiara gɔ loabara i mmara mɛgbe iso fiɛ ɔ̃ate maturi mama sɔ mabara i me iso ne, maakpere wũ sɔ ɔsiare i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
40005020	Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ miibawo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ɔbo si mi Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ iso ibara iikɔlɛ iɖo mmara matedze gu ma Farisise ɔkpɛ.
40005021	“Ɔwiɔ ne, minɔ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Daaɖoe ɔturi.’ Ngɔ loɖoe ɔturi ne, ɔkote ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛgu.
40005022	Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ lonagu ɔ̃ ɔnyii sikpã ne, ɔkote ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛgu. Ngɔ loaɣere ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi sɔ, ‘Ailɛ atã kuira’ ne, makpakpa aaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me. Fiɛ ngɔ loakpere ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi sɔ, ‘Bɔi aɖe’ ne, ɔkote ɔtã Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ itɔkpe ame ikɛlɛ.
40005023	Ne ɔso si asu karatã ato abɔ Ɣaa isɔrɛkasege iso fiɛ anyigi i mmɔ sɔ irere pia i fɔ ɔnyii ɔtu ame i fɔ iso ne,
40005024	nyua fɔ karatã sɛ i isɔrɛkasegetɔ̃ si akpese akɛlɛ mi gu fɔ ɔnyii si misɛ miafere kanya ndu fiɛ aaba aasu fɔ karatã atã Ɣaa.
40005025	“Si atsue sɔ fɔ ɔnyii to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara-ɔ itɔ̃me ne, nyɔ sɔ miaɣɛ mirara so fiɛ miabo atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, fɔ gu ngɔ lona itɔ̃me to ɔ̃aɖi-ɔ ɔtã atɔ̃meɣɛdze fiɛ atɔ̃meɣɛdze ana aasu-ɔ ɔtã madzuɛ̃se mapia-ɔ i iyo.
40005026	Gbaã nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ ato aawe i iyo karɛkɔ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ atã kuso gɔ ato kapɛrɛ tsɔra aro.
40005027	“Misɛ minɔ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Marã gu mare si madaaɖe asɔrɔ̃.’
40005028	Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ si anyɔ ɔrɔ̃go fiɛ ɔkpɛ̃-ɔ ɔkã sɔ aasiai wũ ne, ɔɔsiai wũ koko i fɔ ɔtu ame.
40005029	Ne ɔso si fɔ kuɖearɔ̃ inɔmi sɛ itã abara ikpi ne, were ne ɖi pɛyu. Alasɔ si fɔ sosina kakɔi kawɛ̃ ɔkpɛti ne, ilɛ iɖo sɔ Ɣaa asu fɔ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame.
40005030	Fiɛ si fɔ kuɖearɔ̃ nsɛ kutã abara ikpi ne, tu kɔ̃ pɛyu. Ilɛ iɖo sɔ fɔ iso kakɔi kawɛ̃ aakpɛti iɖo sɔ Ɣaa asu fɔ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ɔfuĩdza ɔpia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame.
40005031	“Masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ losɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre si ɔtã wũ ɔko gɔ loate sɔ ɔ̃ɔsɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre.’
40005032	Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔrere gɔ loasɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ iiɖe kama i ɔrɔ̃go ɔfe wũ ne, ɔtã ɔrɔ̃go ɔbara asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ikpi si ɔyiri ɔrɛrɛ̃ mama, fiɛ ngɔ loayiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔ masɛ̃ mmɔ ana ɔbara asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ikpi.
40005033	“Ɔwiɔ ne minɔ masɛ maɣɛ ana sɔ, ‘Daatu ndamu, Ɣɛɛ bara i nnɛ aɣɛ sɔ aabara atã Ɣaa iso.’
40005034	Ɣɛɛ mme nto loɣere mi kiniɔ sɔ daatarĩgu kuira ɖuɖuuɖu si ato akã ndamu. Daatarĩgu kato ala mmɔ nɖe Ɣaa sigaraiyara ne.
40005035	Daatarĩgu karɔ̃ ala mmɔ nɖe Ɣaa ngba kasiakɔ̃ ne. Daatarĩgu Yerusalem ana ala Magara ɔɖuɖu Igara Ɔmagɛ̃ ɔɖe.
40005036	Daatarĩgu fɔ iti ala aibawo fɔ ɔwɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔbara kpinakpina ɣee futututu.
40005037	Si nnɛ mato maɣɛ pia i ne ame ne, tɔrã kere sɔ aĩ, fiɛ si ina i ne ame ne, ɣɛ kere sɔ ooɣo. Si irere ka ibua i nnɛgbe iso ne, Tsirise kɔrɛ ibɔrɛ.
40005038	“Minɔ masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Si abiɛ fɔ ɔlaa inɔmi ne, maabiɛ fɔ ire, fiɛ si akpa fɔ ɔlaa inyɛ ne, maakpa fɔ ire fɔ wũ.’
40005039	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ, daabara fɔ ɔlaa ikpi nɛ ɔbara-ɔ atikuso. Si ɔrere ɔpɛ-ɔ ɔrɔ̃ta i kuɖearɔ̃ kutsueti ne, finikira kunyɔare tã wũ si ɔpɛ.
40005040	Si ɔrere ɔbara-ɔ itɔ̃me sɔ si ɔfɔ fɔ awu wa apia asɛ karɔ̃ ne, ɖi nwa apia asia kato ana tã wũ.
40005041	Ngbɔ ame si kpakpɛ̃dze ɔmɔɛ̃-ɔ sikitii sɔ soregu wũ ɔ̃ ato si asɛ igu iwɛ̃ ne, sɛgu wũ agu anyɔ.
40005042	Si ɔturi ɔkarɛ-ɔ ira ne, tã wũ, fiɛ si ɔrere ɔba sɔ ɔba ɔnyɛ ira i fɔ kɔrɛ ne, nyɛ tã wũ.
40005043	“Misɛ minɔ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɖɔɛ mma nto maɖɔɛ-ɔ si atsiri mma lotsiri-ɔ.’
40005044	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ miɖɔɛ mma lotsiri mi si mikparama kayi i mma nto mati mi kama iti
40005045	si miakpese mi Ɔse gɔ i kato mabi. Alasɔ ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔtã kuɣɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ kutã maturi sɛɛ gu malalaa ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã kado ɔpɛ ɔtã maturi bɔlɔlɔa gu maturi nyanyarĩa.
40005046	Si misɛ miɖɔɛ mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ ne, be kuso miafɔ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ? Ma lampofɔdze ma wũ masɛ mabara ngbɔ.
40005047	Fiɛ si fɔ malaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ asɛ aya ne, mme siba ipɛ aba gɔ mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ma wũ masɛ mabara ngbɔ?
40005048	Ne ɔso milɛ miwiri lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi Ɔse gɔ i kato lɛ ɔwiri.
40006001	“Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ miibabara mi kasumu kubarara i ɔgbami sɔ maturi aanya. Alasɔ si mibara ngbɔ ne, mi Ɔse Ɣaa gɔ i kato siina kukuso ɔ̃atã mi.
40006002	Ne ɔso si atã wɛrɛba ira ne, daapɛ ne imomo sɔ maturi aanɔ. Ngbɔ i mma nsɛ mabara ara si mabo maturi anɔ sɛ mabara i kasɔrɛkɔ̃ gu kuɣa ame sɔ maturi aanya fiɛ maale ma ne. Lobie sɔ lotã mi itsue sɔ maɔfɔ ma kuso koko!
40006003	Ne ɔso si abuai wɛrɛba ne, daatã nane fɔ ɔlaa gɔ lomatã-ɔ si ɔtsue nnɛ abara,
40006004	iɖe iwɛrɛra, iyɔ mi Ɔse Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔnya awɛrɛra ɔɖuɖu wa i maturi sɛ mabara to ɔ̃atã-ɔ kuso.
40006005	“Fiɛ si mito mikparama kayi ne, midaase lɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara si mabo maturi anɔ. Masɛ mabie sɔ maata maya makparama kayi i kasɔrɛkɔ̃ gu kuɣa ame sɔ maturi si manya ma. Lobie sɔ lotã mi itsue sɔ ma kuso ame maɔfɔ mmɔ ne.
40006006	Ɣɛɛ fɔ si ato akparama kayi ne, kɛlɛ fɔ iyo kame si asɛ̃ iyo apia so fiɛ aakpere fɔ Ɔse gɔ maisɛ manya ala anɔmi, iyɔ gɔ ɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔnya ta awɛrɛra ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã-ɔ kuso.
40006007	“Fiɛ si ato akparama kayi ne, daaɣɛ atɔ̃me gbodzoo wa nna karɔ̃ ala ngbɔ i maɣɔsɔrɛdze sɛ mabara ku adzuni sɔ mmɔ i ma aɣɔ aakã ma atsue ne.
40006008	Midaase lɛ ma, ala mi Ɔse ka ɔɣe ara wa lonya mi koko fiɛ miakarɛ wũ.
40006009	Ne ɔso si mito mikparama kayi ne, miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Bo Ɔse gɔ i kato, tã marɔ fɔ iyere sɛɛ.
40006010	Fɔ sigara iɖe si siba i bo ndɛ̃. Maabara fɔ kuɖɔɛ i kayiiso lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabara i kato.
40006011	Tã bo nɔme ikpɛnɛ aɖera.
40006012	Su bo akpi tsɛ bo lɛ kumɛgɔ bosɛ bosu botsɛ mma loɣɛrɛ bo.
40006013	Daatã sɔ boabo i kalakanyɔ ame, ɣɛɛ ɖi bo bɔrɛgu i ikpi ame. Ala fɔ ɔkpɛ nɖe sigara iɖe gu ɔle gu ikpawaĩ ɔwi ɔɖuɖu ame.’
40006014	“Si misu maturi akpi mitsɛ ma ne, mi Ɔse gɔ i kato ana to ɔ̃asu mi are ɔtsɛ mi.
40006015	Ɣɛɛ si miisu maturi akpi mitsɛ ma ne, mi Ɔse ana iibasu mi are ɔtsɛ mi.”
40006016	Yesu ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Si mito minyi kanya ne, midaanyi katɔ̃ mila lɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara si mabo maturi anɔ awe. Ala masɛ manyi katɔ̃ mala sɔ maturi si matsue sɔ mato manyi kanya, fiɛ gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ maɔfɔ ma kuso koko.
40006017	Si mito minyi kanya ne, mifore anɔmi si mitara mi ati kukaakɔ miledza so.
40006018	Ne loatã sɔ maturi iibatsue sɔ ato anyi kanya, ɣɛɛ fɔ Ɔse gɔ maisɛ manya, fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔnya ara wɛrɛa aatã-ɔ kuso.
40006019	“Midaakɔla karana mitã so i kayi gagbe ame ala ngbe ne, makorokpɛ to maanina kã ɣee kapɛ matɔ, fiɛ mayukukpe ana to maawo kukui ɔbiɛ mabo iyo mayu kã.
40006020	Ɣɛɛ ne, mikɔla karana misɛ so i kato. Ala mmɔ ne, makorokpɛ iisɛ manina ara, kaisɛ kapɛ matɔ fiɛ mayukukpe ana iisɛ mabo i mmɔ mayu ara.
40006021	Alasɔ ngbegɔ i fɔ karana se ne, mmɔ i fɔ ɔtu ana aawe ne.
40006022	“Anɔmi se lɛ ɔkaniɛ atã kuturidziri. Si fɔ anɔmi ɔkpa ne, Fɔ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ame to kuakpa waĩ.
40006023	Ɣɛɛ si fɔ anɔmi iikpa ne, fɔ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu to kuase guduu. Ne ɔso si fɔ ikpawaĩ ɔgudu ne, fɔ idududu ɔwodoro gbaã!
40006024	“Kuwɛ̃ iibawo makɔse inyɔ ɔsumu. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖɔɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔtsiri ɔwɛ̃. Ɣee ɔ̃awarɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔta ɔya ɔwɛ̃ iso. Miibawo Ɣaa gu karana ɔsɔrɛ.
40006025	Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ midaamararã so i mi ngbã, nnɛ miaɖe gu nnɛ mianɛ, ɣee mi sosina gu nnɛ miapia iso. Ɛɛbɛrɛ ngbã iifɔ kuɣa miɖo aɖera fiɛ kuturidziri iifɔ kuɣa kuɖo arapia?
40006026	Minyɔ kato kurodzai gɔ loisɛ kukpɛ̃ fiɛ kuisɛ kusɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui, kuna siwu ɣɛɛ mi Ɔse gɔ i kato sɛ ɔkararã kɔ̃! Miifɔ kuɣa miɖo kurodzai?
40006027	Mi nna loawo ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔbua i ɔ̃ agbanayi iso iki i imararãso ame?
40006028	“Be ɔso mito mimararã so i nnɛ miapia iso? Minyɔ ipo ame adziri kumɛgɔ asɛ amɔ. Aisɛ ata ɖɔti ɣee awe sikati.
40006029	Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ Igara Salomo kɔra si ɔkɛrɛ so ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔlɛ ɔnyɔ lɛ kudziri gɔ lofere aɣɔ̃la.
40006030	Ɣaa nsɛ ɔkɛrɛ sikua ngbɔ. Sikua dzɛ mpia nɔme kɔrãkaɖe maɔkpɛ̃ sɛ̃ mafere i ɔtɔ ame matsuedza. Si Ɣaa to ɔnyɔ sikua iso ngbɔ ne, ɔ̃ibabara ɔtã mi ma loɖo sikua? Be ɔso i mi kafɔkaɖe ɔfoforo ngbɔ?
40006031	“Ne ɔso midaasɛ mimararã so sɔ ‘Be boaɖe? Be boanɛ? Be boapia?’
40006032	Ara wagbe i maɣɔsɔrɛdze sɛ mabie ne, ɣɛɛ mi Ɔse gɔ i kato ɣe sɔ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔnya mi.
40006033	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ iso i mi anɔ si arɛtɛ nɖe sɔ Ɣaa si ɔɖe sigara i mi iso gu si mibara sibɔlɔlɔ ara iyɔ ɔto ɔ̃asu ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔtã mi.
40006034	Ne ɔso midaamararã so i kɔrãkaɖe ga loisɛ̃ iso. Kɔrãkaɖe amɔrɛ̃ si ase ise ala nɔme are ɔɔfe isi.
40007001	“Midaaɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me si Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me.
40007002	Alasɔ ɔri gɔ iso aɣɛgu fɔ ɔlaa atɔ̃me akigu ne, ɔ̃ ame iso i Ɣaa aɣɛgu-ɔ ne. Kaboũsuai ga igbã ako ala ara atã fɔ ɔlaa ne, kã ame igbã maasu mako matã-ɔ ne.
40007003	“Nda ato abara fiɛ ato anya iku nɛ mpia i fɔ ɔlaa inɔmi fiɛ aito abara kuira i idzirikpo nɛ mpia fɔ mɔmɔ inɔmi iso?
40007004	Nda aabara fiɛ aaɣere fɔ ɔlaa sɔ, ‘Tã loɖi-ɔ iku i inɔmi.’ ku ɔwi gɔ i idzirikpo pia-ɔ i inɔmi
40007005	Ladze! Ɖe katɔ̃ ɖi idzirikpo nɛ mpia i fɔ mɔmɔ inɔmi tɔtɔ fiɛ aanya kukaakɔ aɖi iku i fɔ ɔlaa inɔmi.
40007006	“Midaasu ara wa nse sekelee misa mifere maturi ma nse lɛ makpɛkpɛ alasɔ mato maafiniki mabo mi iso maɖoɖo mi. Ngbɔ ame si midaasu anyi wa lofɔ kuɣa mifuĩdza misɛ makparako ne. Si misu misɛ ma ne, ɔnene kere maanene mapia i iba ame.
40007007	“Mikarɛ ara si maatã mi ara, mibie ara si miana, mipɛ kukui kɔrɔ̃ si maasese mi iyo.
40007008	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkarɛ ira sɛ ɔfɔ. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbie ira sɛ ɔna ne, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkpura kukui kɔrɔ̃ ne, masɛ masese matã wũ.
40007009	“Ɣese ɔwɛ̃ aasu ita ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔbi gɔ lokarɛ wũ aɖera?
40007010	Ɣee ɔsu aɣɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔbi si ɔkarɛ wũ ikpɛ?
40007011	Si mi ma nɖe makpibaradze kɔra ɣe kumɛgɔ miatã mi mabi ara sɛɛ ne, iyɔ mi Ɔse gɔ i kato to ɔ̃atã mma nto makarɛ wũ ara sɛɛ ɔɖo.
40007012	Ne ɔso ira biara nɛ miabie sɔ maturi si mabara matã mi ne, mi wũ mibara wã mitã ma. Nnɛgbe ame kere i Mose mmara gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara wa matsɛrɛ masɛ to ate ne.
40007013	“Miki i kayogodɔ̃ ga lomɔmɔrĩ ame, alasɔ kayogodɔ̃ ga nkpa Ɔbosam itɔkpe ame ne, kabɛ, kã ɔri ana iso isɛ se pɔkɔsɔɔ fiɛ maturi gbodzoo nsɛ i ɔri gɔmɔ iso.
40007014	Ɣɛɛ kayogodɔ̃ ga nkpa ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ame ne, kase mɔmɔrĩ, kã ɔri ana iso isɛ ba ɔle fiɛ maturi kɛkɛĩ pɛ nsɛ i ɔ̃ iso.
40007015	“Minyɔ so i mila Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma nsɛ maba mi kɔrɛ iso. I anɔmi ame ne, manyɔ lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃, ɣɛɛ aketeke maɖe.
40007016	Ma nsɛgbai miasu minya ma miɖi ite. Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtɔtɔrɛ figi abi i miyu kudziri iso, fiɛ maisɛ matɔtɔrɛ adziribi ɖea i itongbã iso.
40007017	Ne ɔso ne, kudziri sɛɛ ne, abi sɛɛ kusɛ kuɣɔ̃ fiɛ kudziri lalaa ana ne, abi lalaa kusɛ kuɣɔ̃.
40007018	Kudziri sɛɛ iibawo abi lalaa ɔɣɔ̃, fiɛ ngbɔ ame i kudziri lalaa iibawo abi sɛɛ ɔɣɔ̃ ne.
40007019	Kudziri biara gɔ loisɛ kuɣɔ̃ abi sɛɛ ne, masɛ matu kɔ̃ mapɛyu matsuedza.
40007020	Ne ɔso mila kanyamaɖidze ne, ma nsɛgbai miasu minya ma miɖi ite.
40007021	“Iiɖe ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Bosate, Bosate,’ loakɛlɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ mma nto mabara wũ Ɔse gɔ i kato kuɖɔɛ loasɛ mmɔ.
40007022	Atɔ̃me iɣɛyi iso ne, maturi gbodzoo to maaɣere me sɔ, ‘Bosate! Boɣɛ fɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ bosa siwarã lalaa i fɔ iyere ame. Bobara awawãra i fɔ iyere ame.’
40007023	Mmɔ loaɣere ma sɔ, ‘Loiɣe mi kukakɔi! Mi ara lalaa mabaradze, mirui me i kɔrɛ.’
40007024	“Ne ɔso ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ wũ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara i ne iso ne, ɔse lɛ nɔgbadze gɔ lotsue ɔ̃ iyo ɔsia i ita iso.
40007025	Kado ɔpɛ, siwore ɔyi, awɛ ɔkpɛ̃ teteree ɣɛɛ iyo iirɔ̃ ala mapia ne karɔ̃ ame kukaakɔ.
40007026	Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ wũ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ne iso ne, ɔse lɛ dzimifɔ gɔ lotsue ɔ̃ iyo ɔsia i iwarĩ iso.
40007027	Kado ɔpɛ, siwore ɔyi, awɛ ɔkpɛ̃ amɔɛ̃ iyo fiɛ irɔ̃ teteree ibiɛbiɛ.”
40007028	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔ̃ ara ite ɔbara maturi gbodzoo mamɔ ɣii.
40007029	Alasɔ ɔte ara lɛ ngɔ mba ɔle fiɛ iiɖe lɛ ma mmara matedze awe.
40008001	Gɔ Yesu ɔso i kabemi iso ɔba ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai wũ.
40008002	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔnyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate! Si aɖɔɛ ne, aawo me ɔsa lose sekelee.”
40008003	Yesu ɔɖi kɔrɔ̃ ɔpɛgu wũ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loɖɔɛ, se sekelee.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔsarɛ, ɔse sekelee.
40008004	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ kukaakɔ, daaɣere kuwɛ̃ kuira, ɣɛɛ kɛlɛ aasu so te Ɣaa sɔrɛdze si atã ara wa i Mose mmara ɔkarɛ si ite sɔ ka ase sekelee.”
40008005	Ne kama gɔ Yesu ɔbo i Kapernaum ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, Roma kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃atu wũ ɔtã wũ iti sɔ,
40008006	“Bosate! Wũ ɔɖabo rɛ ɔto ɔnyɛ, ɔ̃ito ɔwo ɔta gɔ so to sibo wũ kukaakɔ.”
40008007	Yesu Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loaba loasa wũ.”
40008008	Ɣɛɛ kpakpɛ̃dze gɔgbe ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo! Bosate, loikote sɔ aaba wũ iyo, fɔ ɣɛ itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ kere ne wũ ɔɖabo to ɔ̃asarɛ.
40008009	Alasɔ mme wũ ɔkpakpa loɖe i makpakpa mama kayirinɔ. Loba makpakpɛ̃dze mama i wũ kayirinɔ. Nsɛ loɣere ngɔ sɔ, ‘Kɛlɛ ngbe,’ ɔkɛlɛ fiɛ nsɛ loɣere ɔmama ana sɔ, ‘Ba ngbe’ ɔba. Nsɛ loɣere wũ ɔɖabo sɔ, ‘Bara lɛ ngbe’ ɔbara.”
40008010	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ibara wũ ɣaa, ne ɔɣere mma nsiai wũ sɔ, “I ɔnukuare ame ne, loinya kafɔkaɖe siare gagbe igbã lonya i Israel karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso.
40008011	Nto loɣere mi sɔ maturi gbodzoo to maabɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ gu kɔ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ maba maasɛ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ maɖe ara ku Abraham gu Isak gu Yakob i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
40008012	Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe sigarakaɖekɔ̃ mabi ne, maafuĩdza ma mapia i idududu nɛ mpia i kayoma ame. Mmɔ i kaku gu inyɛwe aawe ne.”
40008013	Ne Yesu ɔɣere kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa gɔmɔ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ! Iaba itã-ɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ afɔ aɖe awe.” Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ame i iyo ne, ɔɖabo ɔna isosarɛ.
40008014	Gɔ Yesu ɔsɛ Petro iyo ne, ɔnya sɔ Petro masɔrɔ̃go rɛ, ɔbe ɔtɔ ɔto ɔnyɛ.
40008015	Yesu ɔpɛgu wũ kɔrɔ̃, ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔsarɛ ɔta ɔwa aɖera ɔtã wũ.
40008016	Ne kutsuɛ ne, makɔ maturi gbodzoo ma i siwarã lalaa si i iso mabɔ Yesu. Ɔsu itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i ma ame fiɛ ɔsa mma ɔɖuɖu nto manyɛ.
40008017	Nnɛ ɔbara ngbe ɔtã sɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, “Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔɖu iti i bo isobo kayirinɔ, fiɛ ɔsa bo sinyɛ ɔɖuɖu.”
40008018	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya maturi gbodzoo ma nɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ mmɔ ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ matã mawara ibu makɛlɛ ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ isɛ.
40008019	Mmaratedze ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃atu wũ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, loasiai-ɔ kakɔi biara ga aakɛlɛ.”
40008020	Ne Yesu to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mabɔi lalaa ba awo wa ame masɛ mawɛrɛ fiɛ kurodzai ana ba ayo, ɣɛɛ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, na iti kasiakɔ̃.”
40008021	Rasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, loasiai-ɔ, ɣɛɛ ɖi me ɔri si nsɛ loabiara tete tɔtɔ.”
40008022	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Siai me si atã mma nse lɛ makpise si mabiara ma makpise.”
40008023	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbo i ɔkolo ɔwɛ̃ ame marui.
40008024	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, awɛ siare awɛ̃ ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ i itubu iso gɔ itã ndu to mita mibo i ɔkolo ame, ɣɛɛ Yesu rɛ ɔto ɔrɛ sirɛ.
40008025	Marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ matara wũ sɔ, “Bosate, ɖi bo ne ɔkpi boto!”
40008026	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Kafɔkaɖe tɛgɛlɛa maturi, midaanigã!” Ne ɔta ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia awɛ fiɛ anyua ɔkpɛ̃, ndu ana ɔlo kananana ne!
40008027	Ibara ma ɔɖuɖu ɣaa, ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Mme ɔturi igbã ɔɖe ngbe fiɛ ta awɛ gu ndu to makã wũ atsue?”
40008028	Gɔ Yesu ɔwara itubu ɔbo i Gadara ibuiti ame ne, maturi inyɔ ma ame i siwarã lalaa si i iso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkpolo gɔ ame masɛ mabiara maturi maba maasarɛgu wũ. Maba silalaa sɔ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔki i ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔfe.
40008029	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, mala kulu maɣɛ sɔ, “Fɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi, be mpia i bo gu-ɔ ndɛ̃? Ɔba ɔɔba sɔ aba aakpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue aɖegu ɔwi gɔ masɛ katɔ̃?”
40008030	Makparako ikuri iwɛ̃ ɣɛ i ndɛ̃ mɛmɔ isɛ mato maɖe ara.
40008031	Siwarã lalaa ɔtã Yesu iti sɔ, “Si aasa bo ne, tã bosɛ boabo i makparako ikuri nɛ nɣɛ i mmɔ ame.”
40008032	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ ma ame.” Ne ɔso sibɔrɛ sisɛ siabo i ma ame. Makparako ikuri ɔɖuɖu ɔtere kpitikpitikpiti maso kabemi mabo i itubu ame makpi.
40008033	Mma nto manyɔ makparako iso ɔtere makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame masɛ maaɣere ma magɛ̃se nnɛ ɔɖuɖu loba gu nnɛ loba i mma iso i siwarã lalaa si iso.
40008034	Ne ɔso kaɖe ɔɖuɖu ɔba maasakanya sɔ si manyɔ Yesu. Gɔ manya wũ ne, matã wũ iti sɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ma karɔ̃ iso.
40009001	Yesu ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔkpese ɔwara itubu ɔkɛlɛ ma aɖe.
40009002	Mawɛ̃ ɔsu ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lofɛfɛ̃ ɔrɛ i ɔkala iso mabɔ wũ. Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ma kafɔkaɖe ne, ɔɣere nyɛse sɔ, “Na ɔtu wũ ɔbi, losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ.”
40009003	Ne mmara matedze mawɛ̃ mmɔ to maɣere so sɔ, “Ngɔgbe to ɔɣɛ imusuora!”
40009004	Yesu ɔtsue nnɛ mpia i ma adzuni ame ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito misusu adzuni nyanyarĩa wagbe i mi situ ame?
40009005	Be iɣɛ nse pɔkɔsɔɔ iɖo sɔ ‘Losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ,’ ɛɛbɛrɛ sɔ, ‘Ta ya si asɛ’?
40009006	Loate mi sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ba ɔle i kayi gagbe ame sɔ loasu akpi lotsɛ.” Ne ɔso ɔɣere ngɔ lofɛfɛ̃ ɔrɛ sɔ, “Ta ya si asu fɔ ɔkala si akɛlɛ iyo.”
40009007	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔta ɔya ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ iyo.
40009008	Gɔ maturi ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, manigã, matsɛ Ɣaa ile sɔ ɔsu ɔle gɔgbe igbã ɔtã maturi.
40009009	Gɔ Yesu ɔrui i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔnya lampofɔdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Mateo si i ɔ̃ karabara kabarakɔ̃. Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ba siai me.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Mateo ɔta ɔsiai wũ.
40009010	Gɔ Yesu si ɔto ɔɖe ara i Mateo iyo ne, ma lampofɔdze gbodzoo gu makpibaradze ɔba maasɛgu wũ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iti gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze.
40009011	Gɔ ma Farisise ɔnya nnɛgbe ne, makarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Be ɔso i mi ratedze to ɔɖe ara ku mmagbe igbã?”
40009012	Yesu ɔnɔ nnɛ mato maɣɛ, ne ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Manyɛse i kuabaradze ɔnya ne iiɖe mma nsarɛ.
40009013	Misɛ mianyɔnyɔ itɔ̃me nɛ mpia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Nnyainyɔ nto lobie ne iiɖe mabɔi isu ifɛ̃ ara itã’ karɔ̃. Alasɔ loiba lokpere mma nsɛ mabu so maturi sɛɛ sɔ mafiniki, ɣɛɛ makpibaradze loba lokpere.”
40009014	Nwagbe kama ne, Ndupiedze Yohanes marasuãdze ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maba maakarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso i bo gu ma Farisise sɛ bonyi kanya ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ fɔ marasuãdze iisɛ manyi?”
40009015	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mibu sɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze malaa aamararã so ayi kumɛgɔ i ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze pia i ma kɔrɛ? Ikpa sekelee sɔ maibabara ngbɔ! Ɣɛɛ iyi to iba gɔ mato maakɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze maruigu i ma kɔrɛ. Ɔwi gɔmɔ mato maanyi kanya ne.
40009016	“Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔta ɔkati kuere ala kakatisɛi ɣɛtɛ, alasɔ si abara ngbɔ ne, kakatisɛi ɣɛtɛ gamɔ to kaakarĩ karui iyoi nɛ loabɛ iɖo iɖeakatɔ̃.
40009017	“Ngbɔ ame i kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔsu ndã ɣɛtɛ ɔfere i bɔi ɔko akpo kuere ame ne. Si abara ngbɔ fiɛ ndã ɣɛtɛ ɔtsɛ ifu ne, miatã sɔ akpo kuere aabiɛ gɔ ndã gu bɔi ɔko akpo ɔɖuɖu aanina. Ne ɔso ndã ɣɛtɛ ne, bɔi ɔko akpo ɣɛtɛ ame masɛ mafere me sɔ wã anyɔ aase kukaakɔ.”
40009018	Gɔ Yesu togu ma ika iɖe ne, ma Yudase tɔ̃ɖedze ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔkpi kiniɔkiniɔ ɣɛɛ ba sia wũ kɔrɔ̃ iso si arɛgɛ̃ra wũ.”
40009019	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔta ɔsiai wũ ku ɔ̃ marasuãdze.
40009020	Gɔ Yesu to ɔkɛlɛ ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i ara to afere akɔ aweo-anyɔ ɔki i Yesu kama isɛ ɔpɛgu ɔ̃ awu kutsueti.
40009021	Ɔbara ngbɔ ala ɔɣere so sɔ, “Si lopɛgu ɔ̃ awu kutsueti ne, loto loana isosarɛ.”
40009022	Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ, ne ɔnya ɔrɔ̃go ne. Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Na ɔtu, wũ ɔbi, fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔɔsa-ɔ.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔna isosarɛ.
40009023	Ne Yesu ɔkɛlɛ tɔ̃ɖedze gɔmɔ iyo ne. Gɔ ɔnya kudadã mafɛ̃dze gu mma nto mabiɛ kaku gu kulu titiiti ne,
40009024	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mibɔrɛ ne ɔbi iikpi, sirɛ kere ɔto ɔrɛ.” Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, mama wũ.
40009025	Gɔ masa ɔbiara maɖi ne, Yesu ɔbo iyo ame i ɔbi kɔrɛ. Ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃ ɔtara wũ ɔɣedza gbanadze.
40009026	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔki ikã i karɔ̃ ndɛ̃ mɛmɔ ɔɖuɖu iso.
40009027	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔto ɔfe ne, manɔbiɛdze inyɔ ɔsiai wũ mato mala kulu teteree sɔ, “Igara David Ɔbi, nyɔ bo nnya!”
40009028	Gɔ Yesu ɔbo iyo ame ne, maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ne ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mifɔ miɖe sɔ loawo mi ɔsa?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate!”
40009029	Ne Yesu ɔpɛgu ma anɔmi ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iba itã mi lɛ kumɛgɔ mifɔ miɖe.”
40009030	Ma anɔmi ɔbusi. Ne Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma teteree sɔ, “Midaaɣere kuwɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe.”
40009031	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mabɔrɛ i mmɔ ne, mapɛ ne imomo i Yesu iso i karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔɖuɖu iso.
40009032	Gɔ mmagbe ɔrui mato makɛlɛ ne, mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ ɔmumu ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia mabɔ Yesu kɔrɛ.
40009033	Ne gɔ Yesu ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i ɔ̃ ame ne, ɔtsɛ ika iɖe. Ibara maturi gbodzoo mamɔ ɣii, ne mato maɣere so sɔ, “Boinya nnɛgbe igbã bonya i Israel karɔ̃ iso.”
40009034	Ɣɛɛ ma Farisise ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa igara lotã wũ ɔle ɔto ɔsu ɔsa siwarã lalaa.”
40009035	Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃awe ɔki i simagɛ̃ gu nsɛkɔ̃ ame ɔte ara i ma kusarɛkɔ̃, ɔɣɛ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso Itɔ̃me Bielea, fiɛ ɔsa sinyɛ agbãagbã gu isobo igbã biara.
40009036	Gɔ ɔnya maturi gbodzoo magbe ne, ma ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri alasɔ so ɔɔtu ma fiɛ maɔre nrɔɔ̃ lɛ masɛrɛ ma nna kɔdze.
40009037	Ne Ɔso ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ɔraɖui gɔ maasɔrɛ̃ ɔsi, ɣɛɛ marabaradze iisi.
40009038	Ne ɔso mitã kakpɛkɔ̃ Sate iti sɔ ɔsese marabaradze ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.”
40010001	Yesu ɔrɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔsirakanya ɔtã ma ɔle sɔ masa siwarã lalaa maɖi i maturi ame, masa sinyɛ agbãagbã gu isobo igbã biara.
40010002	Katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ mamɔ ayere ngbe ne. Simon gɔ masɛ marɔ ana sɔ Petro gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Andrea gu Yakobo gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Yohanes ma nɖe Zebedeo mabi
40010003	gu Filipo gu Bartolomeo gu Toma gu lampofɔdze Mateo gu Yakobo gɔ nɖe Alfeo ɔbi gu Tadeo
40010004	gu Simon gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ kaɖe gu Yuda Iskariot gɔ loaɖi Yesu ɔtã.
40010005	Yesu ɔpia marɛrɛ̃ iweo-inyɔ magbe ɔtã ma mmara sɔ, “Midaasɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase karɔ̃ iso gu ma Samariase simagɛ̃ ame.
40010006	Ɣɛɛ mikɛlɛ Israel mabi ma nse lɛ masɛrɛ ma loyu ɔri kɔrɛ.
40010007	Si misɛ ne, mipɛ imomo miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔɣo!’
40010008	Misa manyɛse si mitara makpise. Mitã mma nto manyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa iso si ikpa, misa siwarã lalaa miɖi i maturi ame. Miitã kuso kukuwɛ̃ i ɔle gɔ mifɔ iti, ne ɔso mi wũ midaafɔ kuwɛ̃ kuso.
40010009	Midaasu sikã kusiwɛ̃ mipia i mi sikoto ame.
40010010	Midaasu marawãnyidze akpo, awu pia aka anyɔ, ndokota ɣee ɔsɛdziri i mi irisɛ ame. Ikote sɔ maatã rabaradze ɔ̃ aɖera.
40010011	“Si mibo ɔmagɛ̃ ɣee kasɛkɔ̃ biara ame ne, mibie ngɔ lonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃afɔ mi. Mibo i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ si miwe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miarui.
40010012	Si mibo iyo irere ame ne, miya ma miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Isobuɛ itã mi.’
40010013	Si iyo ame maturi ɔfɔ mi ne, mi isobuɛ mibie mitã ma si iba itã ma, ɣɛɛ si maifɔ mi ne, mi isobuɛ mibie mitã ma si ikpese iba mi kɔrɛ.
40010014	Ɣɛɛ si iyo irere, ɣee kaɖe karere maturi iifɔ mi ɣee maikã mi atsue ne, mikpakpa mi ngba iso sise mifere si mito mirui.
40010015	Nto losia ita lotã mi sɔ iase pɔkɔsɔɔ itã Sodom gu Gomora maturi ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi iɖo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ maturi.
40010016	“Minyɔ! Nto lopia mi lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃ i magidi ndɛ̃. Ne ɔso mikpa anɔ lɛ maɣɛ, ɣɛɛ miɣɔ lɛ alɔpɔ.
40010017	Minyɔ so kukaakɔ i maturi iso alasɔ mato maaɖi mi matã mamɔɛ̃ makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃, mato maapɛ mi i ma kusarɛkɔ̃.
40010018	Wũ ɔso ne, mato maamɔɛ̃ mi makɛlɛgu matɔ̃ɖedze gu magara katɔ̃ sɔ maɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ miɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mma loiɖe ma Yudase katɔ̃.
40010019	Si makɔ mi makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ne, midaamararã so sɔ be miasɛ miaɣɛ ɣee nda miaɣɛ mikigu. Ɣɛɛ si ɔwi ɔɔɣo ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mi nnɛ miaɣɛ.
40010020	Alasɔ iiɖe mi loaɖe ika, ɣɛɛ mi Ɔse Siwarã loaɖe ika sikigu i mi iso.
40010021	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, maturi to maaɖi ma manyii matã sɔ maɖoe fiɛ mase ana to maaɖi ma mabi matã. Mabi to maata maya ma maɣese iso maɖi ma matã maɖoe.
40010022	Ɔbiara to ɔ̃atsiri mi ala wũ ɔso, ɣɛɛ ngɔ loaya teteree i kafɔkaɖe ame isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã wũ ngbã.
40010023	Si makpɛ̃gu mi i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, mitere mikɛlɛ ɔmama ame. Lobie sɔ lotã mi itsue sɔ miibaro karabara ɔbara i Israel simagɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ame fiɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aakpese ɔba.
40010024	“Rasuãdze kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ratedze, fiɛ ɔɖabo kuwɛ̃ ana iisɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ɔkɔse.
40010025	Ne ɔso ikote sɔ iawe rasuãdze ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃akotegu ɔ̃ ratedze, fiɛ ɔɖabo ɔ̃ wũ ne, iawe wũ ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃akotegu ɔ̃ ɔkɔse. Si mato makpere iyo ɔse sɔ Siwarã lalaa igara ne, mme iyere igbã maibakpere iyo maturi?
40010026	“Ne ɔso midaanigã maturi alasɔ ira biara nɛ mafu ara ne, mato maabusi ne. Fiɛ ira biara nɛ mabara i iwɛrɛ ame to iare kayi.
40010027	Ara wa ɔɖuɖu loɣere mi i idududu ame ne, miɣɛ wã ku anɔwã fiɛ nwa nto loɣere mi i siwɔwɔi ame ne, mipɛ wã imomo.
40010028	Midaanigã mma loaɖoe siturina, ɣɛɛ maibawo ɔkala ɔɖoe. Ɣɛɛ minigã Ɣaa gɔ loawo siturina gu ɔkala ɔɖuɖu ɔwɔra i itɔkpe ame.
40010029	Kapɛrɛ kere masɛ marɔdɛ̃ kunagini kunyɔ, ɣɛɛ maisɛ maɖoe kukawɛ̃ si mi Ɔse gɔ i Kato iitɔrã.
40010030	Ɣɛɛ ta mi siwɛrɛ̃ dzɛ i mi ati iso ne, Ɣaa ɣe sɛ̃ kukame.
40010031	Ne ɔso midaanigã alasɔ mifɔ kuɣa miɖo kunagini.
40010032	“Ngɔ loibakpɛ̃ kunuarɛ i wũ iso fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ i maturi katɔ̃ sɔ wũ ɔre ɔɖe ne, mme wũ loaɣɛ i wũ Ɔse gɔ i Kato kɔrɛ sɔ wũ ɔre ɔɖe.
40010033	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loasɛ̃ me i maturi katɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃iɣe me ne, mme wũ loasɛ̃ wũ i wũ Ɔse gɔ i Kato kɔrɛ.
40010034	“Midaabu sɔ isobuɛ iɖe losu lobɔ kayiiso. Ooɣo! Iɣɛɣɛso iɖe lobɔ.
40010035	Mabirɛrɛĩ to maata maya ma mase iso, fiɛ mabirɔ̃gomi ana to maata maya ma manyi iso. Mabi mare to maata maya i ma marã manyi iso.
40010036	Ɔturi mɔmɔ iyo maturi loaɖe ɔ̃ matsirise.
40010037	“Ɔbiara gɔ loaɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔse ɣee ɔ̃ ɔnyi ɔɖo me iibawo wũ rasuãdze ɔɖe. Ngbɔ ame ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔbi birɛrɛĩ ɣee ɔ̃ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔɖo me iibawo wũ rasuãdze ɔɖe ne.
40010038	Ngɔ loisore ɔ̃ inyɛwe ɔnyigbã ɔsiai wũ nsɛgbai ne, ɔ̃ibawo wũ rasuãdze ɔɖe.
40010039	Ɔbiara gɔ loabie sɔ ɔ̃akɔkɔ ɔ̃ ngbã to ɔ̃ayura me, ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loasu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã ala wũ ɔso to ɔ̃ana ngbã.
40010040	“Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ mi ne, mme iɖe ɔfɔ fiɛ ngɔ lofɔ me ne, ɔfɔ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
40010041	Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana kaɖekɔ̃ i kanyaɖidze kuso ame. Ngɔ lofɔ ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ala ɔ̃ sibɔlɔlɔ ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɔ sibɔlɔlɔ kuso.
40010042	Mitã ikpa mi sekelee sɔ ɔrere gɔ loatã wũ masiaidze koso magbe ndu yululua ikɔi ala wũ ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɔ ne kuso kokooko.”
40011001	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔɔro ɔ̃ marasuãdze katɔ̃me ɔpia ne, ɔrui i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃ate ara ɔɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me i simagɛ̃ dzɛ mpia i mmɔ ame.
40011002	Gɔ ndupiedze Yohanes gɔ mamɔɛ̃ marara i iyo ɔnɔ ara wa i Kristo to ɔbara ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ marasuãdze mawɛ̃ Yesu kɔrɛ.
40011003	Masɛ maakarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ngɔ maɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɛɛbɛrɛ bonyɔ ɔmama ɔri?”
40011004	Ne Yesu to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mikpese miaɣere Yohanes ara wa minya gu nwa minɔ.
40011005	Manɔbiɛdze to manya, mabafã to masɛ, mma nto manyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa iso to isekele, makpise to mata, fiɛ mato maɣere mawɛrɛba ana Itɔ̃me Bielea.
40011006	So aaɣɔ mma i wũ kurabarara iita kuya iso.”
40011007	Ɔwi gɔ mma i Yohanes ɔpia katɔ̃me ɔɔkpese mato makɛlɛ ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ ika iɖe i ɔ̃ iso iɣere mma losakanya i mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ mibɔrɛ mikɛlɛ Yohanes kɔrɛ i fafuĩ ame ne, be iɖe minyɔ ɔri sɔ mianya? Iyata nɛ i ɔwiri to ɔtidza?
40011008	Be mibɔrɛ misɛ mianyɔ? Ngɔ mpia ɔgo awu? Mma mpia ɔgo awu ne, magara ayo mapia.
40011009	Mibua miɣere me nnɛ misɛ mianyɔ. Ɣaa kanyaɖidze? Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔɖo Ɣaa kanyaɖidze.
40011010	Alasɔ ɔ̃ iso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loasese kpabo ɔɖe-ɔ katɔ̃, sɔ ɔ̃aledza maturi ɔtã fɔ iba.’
40011011	Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ Yohanes ɔɖo ɔturi igbã biara gɔ maɣe i kayi gagbe ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lokoso ɔɖo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɖo wũ.
40011012	Ita i ɔwi gɔ i Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔtsɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iɣɛ ipɛ i nɔme ne, maturi to makpɛ̃gu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃, ɣɛɛ mma i anɔ ɔrɛtɛ mato mabie Ɣaa sigara iɖe kotoo loabo i mmɔ.
40011013	Mose mmara gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ika i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso iba iabo Yohanes ɔwi iso.
40011014	Fiɛ si mibie sɔ miafɔ ma miɖe ne, minɔ sɔ Yohanes nɖe Eliya gɔ maɣɛ masɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba.
40011015	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ loto loɣɛ.
40011016	“Kiniɔ ne, be loasu nɔme maturi lokateragu? Mase lɛ mabiɛtɛ ma nto maɣa kaɣa i kuɣa ame. Ma malaa to maɣere ma sɔ,
40011017	‘Boka isoɣɔ aka botã mi, miitɔ, boɖi sikubiɛnɔ ana botã mi, mmɔ ana miibiɛ kaku.’
40011018	Gɔ Yohanes ɔba ɔ̃ito ɔɖe ara ɔnɛ ndã mɛ loamɔɛ̃ ne, maturi sɔ siwarã lalaa mpia i ɔ̃ ame.
40011019	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ɔba fiɛ loto loɖe ara lonɛ ndã ne, maturi to maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Minyɔ ɖeɖei gu tarɛ̃dze gɔgbe! Ɔɖe ma lampofɔdze gu makpibaradze ɔlaa.’ Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa iwola sɛ ite so i ɔturi nsɛgbai ame.”
40011020	Simagɛ̃ dzɛ ame i Yesu ɔbara awawãra gbodzoo maturi iifiniki, ne ɔso ɔbiɛ ma ɔɣɛ sɔ,
40011021	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi Korazin maturi! Ndzo miɖe mitã mi Betsaida maturi! Alasɔ si awawãra wa igbã lobara i mi ame iɖe lobara i Tiro gu Sidon simagɛ̃ ame ne, tee maakpase masɛ i ndɔ̃ ame mapia ara wa loate sɔ maɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i ma akpi ame.
40011022	Nto loɣere mi gbagbaã sɔ i atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃anyɔ Tiro gu Sidon simagɛ̃ nnya ɔɖo mi.
40011023	Mi Kapernaum maturi ne, i mi adzuni ame ne, mito mibie sɔ miakɔlɛ so kato misɛ miabo kato, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ mi karɔ̃ mikɛlɛ ta ikpibiɔ. Alasɔ si awawãra wa lobara i fɔ ame mabara i Sodom ne, tee ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ se ipɛ i nɔme.
40011024	Nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃anyɔ Sodom nnya ɔɖo-ɔ ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ɔɖo mi.”
40011025	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, Kato gu Karɔ̃ Sate, nto lole-ɔ sɔ ara wa lowɛrɛ manɔgbadze gu makotsuese ne, aɖi wã ate mabiɛtɛ.
40011026	Alasɔ gbaã ne Tete, ngbɔ ikote-ɔ ne.
40011027	“Tete ɔsu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame. Kuwɛ̃kuwɛ̃ iiɣe Ɔbi iɖo Ɔse fiɛ kuwɛ̃ ana iiɣe Ɔse iɖo Ɔbi gu mma i Ɔbi ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ Ɔse ɔte.
40011028	“Mibore miba wũ kɔrɛ mi ma ɔɖuɖu nsore ato fiɛ iɔɖa mi si loatã mi iwarã.
40011029	Misu wũ ɔnyigbã misia so iso si misuã ara mibɔrɛgu i wũ kɔrɛ si miana iwarã alasɔ wũ kayiri ɔɣɔ fiɛ lobɔ so karɔ̃.
40011030	Wũ ɔnyigbã se pɔkɔsɔɔ ku isore fiɛ wũ ato wa loasorera mi ana se foforoo.”
40012001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ kama ne, gɔ Yesu sɛ ɔto ɔfe i kakpɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ame ku Iwarãyi ne, kukã ɔkpɛ̃ ɔ̃ marasuãdze, ne ɔso mabɛse atita matsɛ iwe.
40012002	Gɔ ma Farisise ɔnya ne, maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Nyɔ, fɔ marasuãdze to mabara nnɛ i mmara iitã ɔri sɔ maabara ku Iwarãyi.”
40012003	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame nnɛ i David ɔbara ɔwi gɔ i kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ gu ɔ̃ maturi?
40012004	Ɔbo i Ɣaa iyo ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃asu aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa maɖe gɔ iikote sɔ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ maturi aaɖe iɖo Ɣaa masɔrɛdze ɔnɔwɛ̃.
40012005	Ɛɛbɛrɛ miika i mmara ame sɔ masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ mabara karabara i isɔrɛyo sɛ matu Iwarãyi mmara ku Iwarãyi biara ɣɛɛ maiɖe ipɔ?
40012006	Nto loɣere mi sɔ nnɛ loɖo Ɣaa isɔrɛyo pia i mi ndɛ̃ ngbe.
40012007	Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Nnyainyɔ nto lobie ne iiɖe mabɔi ma mafɛ̃ ala ara matã me.’ Si ɔnɔ minɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe karɔ̃ kukaakɔ ne, tee mma loiɖe ipɔ ne, miibatã ma ipɔ.
40012008	Alasɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi nɖe Iwarãyi Sate.”
40012009	Gɔ Yesu ɔrui i mmɔ ne, ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃.
40012010	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ kɔrɔ̃ lokarĩ ɔwe i mmɔ. Mawɛ̃ ma nto mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maaɖaɛ Yesu kanya ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Mmara ɔtã ɔri sɔ maasa ɔturi ku Iwarãyi?”
40012011	Ne Yesu ana ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mi ndɛ̃ nna sɛrɛrerɔ̃ loakpase ɔbo i iwo ame ku Iwarãyi fiɛ ɔ̃ibaso ɔbo ɔɖi wũ?
40012012	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔturi ɔfɔ kuɣa ɔɖo sɛrɛrerɔ̃, ne ɔso mmara ɔtã ɔri sɔ ɔturi aabara isɛɛ ku Iwarãyi.”
40012013	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ngɔ kɔrɔ̃ lokarĩ sɔ, “Nabarã fɔ kɔrɔ̃.” Ɔnabarã kɔ̃, ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ilɛ wũ kɔrɔ̃ karĩa ɔse lɛ ngɔ nsarɛ.
40012014	Ma Farisise ɔrui i mmɔ masɛ maasɛ iti ame sɔ maaɖoe Yesu.
40012015	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ sɔ maɔbara adzuni sɔ maaɖoe wũ ne, ɔrui i mmɔ. Maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai wũ fiɛ ɔsa manyɛse ɔɖuɖu.
40012016	Ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ madaaɖi wũ mate ngɔ ɔɖe.
40012017	Ɔbara ngbɔ, ne ɔso Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ maɣɛ i Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔko ame aaba i ne ame gbaã sɔ,
40012018	“Wũ ɔɖabo gɔ loɖi lotã so i ngbe ne. Ɔmɔɛ̃ me ɔtu fiɛ loipia wũ kuɣɛ. Loafedza wũ Siwarã lofere wũ iso sɔ ɔ̃apɛ wũ atɔ̃me iɣɛgu imomo ɔtã abuiti ɔɖuɖu.
40012019	Ɔ̃ibakpadzɛ̃gu kuwɛ̃ atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃ibafafã kuwɛ̃ ana. Kuwɛ̃ iibanɔ wũ silɔ i ɔgbami.
40012020	Ɔto ɔ̃aɣara so ɔtã mma nna ɔle. Ɔto ɔ̃awe kayiribielea ɔtã mma i kayi ɔɔtɔrɛ. Ɔto ɔ̃akɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ngbɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ atɔ̃me iɣɛ tɔrɔrɔ aaɖe iso.
40012021	Abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi to maasu ma ɔriinyɔ mapia i ɔ̃ ame.”
40012022	Mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia fiɛ ɔɖe nɔbiɛdze gu ɔmumu mabɔ Yesu kɔrɛ. Yesu Ɔsa wũ ne ɔso ɔtsɛ ika iɖe fiɛ ɔtsɛ ara inya ana.
40012023	Nnɛgbe ɔbara iturikuri nɛmɔ ɔɖuɖu ɣii, ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Iiɖe Igara David Ɔwa gɔ maɣɛ masɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔɖe ngbe ɣɛɛ?”
40012024	Gɔ ma Farisise ɔnɔ nnɛgbe ne, ma wũ maɣɛ sɔ, “Si iiɖe siwarã lalaa igara Beelzebul ɔɖe lotã wũ ɔle ne, tee ɔ̃ibawo siwarã lalaa ɔsa ɔɖi i maturi ame.”
40012025	Yesu ɣe ma adzuni, ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Karɔ̃ biara ga maturi loɣɛɣɛ so fiɛ mata maɣɛ so iso aakpese ikpakpi. Ngbɔ ame i ɔmagɛ̃ ɣee iyo biara nɛ maturi loɣɛɣɛ so fiɛ mata maɣɛ so iso iibawo ɔya ne.
40012026	Ne ɔso si Ɔbosam sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔta siɣɛ so iso ne, nda ɔ̃abara fiɛ ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ aaya?
40012027	Si mi sɔ Beelzebul lotã me ɔle fiɛ nto losa siwarã lalaa ne, iyɔ nna ɔle iso i mi masiaidze to maki mato masa sɛ̃? Nnɛ i mi masiaidze to mabara loatã mi ipɔ.
40012028	Ɣɛɛ si Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle ame nto losa siwarã lalaa ne, mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔba ɔ̃abo mi ndɛ̃.
40012029	“Kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle iyo ɔbo ɔmala ɔ̃ ara iɖo sɔ ɔ̃aɖe katɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ, ɔnyi wũ tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃abo i ɔ̃ iyo ɔmala ɔ̃ ara.
40012030	“Ngɔ loiɣɛ me i kama ne, ɔta ɔɣɛ me iso, fiɛ ngɔ loito ɔsagu me ara kanya ne, ara ɔto ɔsamarã.
40012031	Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ikpi igbã biara ku inyakpi igbã biara nɛ i maturi ɔɣɛ ɔtsɛ ma, ɣɛɛ ngɔ loaɣɛ inyakpi i Siwarã Bielea iso ne, Ɣaa iibasu ɔtsɛ wũ ɔnya.
40012032	Ɔbiara gɔ loaɣɛ inyakpi i mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ɔtsɛ wũ, ɣɛɛ ngɔ loaɣɛ inyakpi i Siwarã Bielea iso ne, Ɣaa iibasu ɔtsɛ, kiniɔ ɣee ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba i katɔ̃ ame.
40012033	“Si kudziri lɛ ne, kɔ̃ abi ana sɛ alɛ, ngbɔ ame si kudziri iilɛ ne, kɔ̃ abi ana iisɛ alɛ. Abi wa i kudziri ɔɣɔ̃ nsɛ iɖi ite kudziri gɔ igbã kuɖe.
40012034	Mi ma lonyanyarĩ lɛ maɣɛ! Nda miabara fiɛ miawo ara sɛɛ ɔɣɛ gɔ miɖe maturi lalaa? Alasɔ nnɛ loyi ɔturi ɔtu ame i kanya sɛ kaɣɛ.
40012035	Ɔturi sɛɛ ne, ara sɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ kakɔlakɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔturi lalaa ana ne, ara lalaa ɔsɛ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ ara lalaa kakɔlakɔ̃ ga i ɔ̃ ame.
40012036	Nto lotã mi itsue sɔ ɔbiara to ɔ̃atã itsuɛpɛ̃ biara nɛ ɔtua ɔsɛ kere kuso ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi iso.
40012037	Alasɔ fɔ mɔmɔ kanya ame atɔ̃me maasu matã-ɔ ibɛ ɣee ipɔ.”
40012038	Mmara matedze mawɛ̃ gu ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, boto bobie sɔ bara iwawãra irere si bofɔ-ɔ boɖe.”
40012039	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Minyɔ kumɛgɔ i kiniɔgbe maturi ba ɔtile fiɛ maisɛ manigã Ɣaa. Mato mabie iwawãra sɔ maanya, ɣɛɛ miibanya kuiwɛ̃ iɖo Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Yona ire igbã.
40012040	Kumɛgɔ ame i Yona ɔwe i ikpɛ iyiri ame akpɛnɛ atɛ kasɛ̃ aka atɛ ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ana aawe i karɔ̃ ame akpɛnɛ atɛ kasɛ̃ aka atɛ ne.
40012041	I atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, Niniwe maturi to maatã mi ipɔ alasɔ mafiniki gɔ Yona ɔɣere ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me. Ɣɛɛ lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ ngɔ loɖo Yona pia i mi ndɛ̃ ngbe.
40012042	Atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, Igararɔ̃go gɔ lobɔrɛ i bo karɔ̃ kala isɛ to ɔ̃ata ɔya ɔtã mi kiniɔgbe maturi ipɔ alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔri dzoroo ɔbɔrɛ i kayi iti tsɔra ɔba ɔ̃akã Salomo atɔ̃me wa ame i inɔgba pia atsue. Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ inɔgba loɖo Salomo ire pia i mi ndɛ̃ ngbe.
40012043	“Si masa siwarã lalaa maɖi i ɔturi ame ne, sisɛ sikɛlɛ siawe siki sibie kawekɔ̃ i kakorekɔ̃. Si siina kukakɔi ne,
40012044	sisɛ siɣere so sɔ, ‘Loakpese lokɛlɛ iyo nɛ ame masa me maɖi.’ Siaba sianya sɔ mmɔ se ikunu, maɔfiɛ iyo ame, maledza ira biara isɛ kukaakɔ.
40012045	Iyɔ siakpese sikɛlɛ siakɔ siwarã lalaa aka akɔdzɛ mama dzɛ lonyanyarĩ siɖo sɛ̃ sibua so iso. Maabo i ngɔmɔ ame mawe, ne ɔso ɔ̃ kawirikɔ̃ to kaanyanyarĩ kaɖo ɔ̃ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Ngbɔ tutuutu iase itã nɔme maturi ma lonyanyarĩ ngbe ne.”
40012046	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu to ɔɣɛ nwagbe ne, ɔ̃ ɔnyi gu manyiibi ɔba maɣɛ i inyamɔ mato mabie sɔ maɖegu wũ ika.
40012047	Ne ɔso mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ, fɔ ɔnyi gu manyiibi ɣɛ i inyamɔ mato mabie sɔ manya-ɔ.”
40012048	Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Nna nɖe wũ ɔnyi gu manyiibi?”
40012049	Ne ɔsɔ̃ ɔ̃ marasuãdze kɔrɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ wũ ɔnyi gu manyiibi!
40012050	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara Tete gɔ i Kato kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔ̃ nɖe wũ ɔnyiibi rɛrɛ̃ gu ɔnyiiko gu wũ ɔnyi ne.”
40013001	Iyi nɛmɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i ɔpo kanya ɔtsɛ ara ite.
40013002	Gɔ mma loki malɔ wũ ɔsi ɔso ne, ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ame i ndu iso fiɛ maturi ka maɣɛ i ɔkpokpo.
40013003	Ɔte ma ara gbodzoo i agbã ame. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Kpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔraɖui kasakɔ̃.
40013004	Gɔ ɔto ɔsa ne, ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i ɔri kuruɛ, ne kurodzai ɔrɛrɛ kuɖe ne.
40013005	Ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i ata iso ngbegɔ i sise iisi, ne ɔso ɔre mala.
40013006	Gɔ kuɣɛ̃ ɔsia kere ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔkpi alasɔ ɔ̃ siɖu iibo karɔ̃.
40013007	Ɔraɖui ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣo i kuposɛ̃ ame, ne ɔso gɔ ɔre ne, kuɣa kufu wũ iso.
40013008	Ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣo i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso, ne ɔso ɔbara kukaakɔ. Ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɔ̃ abi kulafa, ɔwɛ̃ abi sikuɔ, ɔwɛ̃ ana abi sitɛ.”
40013009	Ne Yesu ɔwirigu ma sɔ, “Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ.”
40013010	Ne marasuãdze ɔba maakarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ asɛ asu agbã ate maturi ara?”
40013011	Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mi ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ awɛrɛra karɔ̃ ɔte mi, ɔ̃iɖi ɔte matsɔra.
40013012	Alasɔ ngɔ mba ara ne, maatã wũ ara ɔ̃ ara ɔsi abua, ɣɛɛ ngɔ ina ne, kɛkɛĩ gɔ ame ɔba ne, maamɔɛ̃ mafɔ wũ iso.
40013013	Nnɛ ɔso nto lote ma ara i agbã ame nɖe sɔ, mato manya ara, ɣɛɛ maito manya maɖi ite, mato makã atsue, ɣɛɛ maito manɔ fiɛ maaba maanɔ karɔ̃.
40013014	Itã sɔ Kanyaɖidze Yesaya itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, ‘Mmagbe to maanɔ ara, manɔ ara, ɣɛɛ maibanɔ karɔ̃! Mato maanyɔ ara, manyɔ ara, ɣɛ maibanya maɖi ite.
40013015	Alasɔ ma adzuni ɔrɛ sirɛ fiɛ matɛ̃ra atsue sɔ maibanɔ mama anɔmi ana sɔ ma anɔmi iibanya. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, tee maanya ala anɔmi fiɛ ma atsue aanɔ sɔ maanɔ karɔ̃ fiɛ maafiniki maba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ loasa ma!’
40013016	Ɣɛɛ mi ne, iti ɔbua ilɛ mi sɔ mi anɔmi to anya ara fiɛ mi atsue ana to anɔ ara.
40013017	Nto loɣere mi sɔ ne, Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo gu maturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔbie teteree sɔ si manya ara wa mito minya, ɣɛɛ mainya, ɣee si manɔ ara wa mito minɔ, ɣɛɛ mainɔ.”
40013018	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikã atsue si loɖi ɔraɖuisadze igbã karɔ̃ lote mi.
40013019	Ngɔ nto lonɔ Sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃ito ɔnɔ karɔ̃ se lɛ ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i ɔri kuruɛ. Tsirise sɛ ɔba ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔnɔ ɔɖi i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame.
40013020	Ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i ata karɔ̃ iso se lɛ ngɔ lonɔ fiɛ ɔfɔ ne ku isoɣɔ ɔluwɛ̃.
40013021	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔ̃ siɖu iibo karɔ̃ kukaakɔ ɔso ne, si kutsuɛ iɖaa gu kama iti ɔba ala itɔ̃me iti ne, ɔsɛ ɔkpese kama.
40013022	Ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i kuposɛ̃ ame nɖe ngɔ lonɔ itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ imararãso gu karana itere isiai sɛ iɣa ifu itɔ̃me sɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔwo abi ɔɣɔ̃.
40013023	Ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso nɖe ngɔ lonɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔnɔ ne karɔ̃. Ɔsɛ ɔɣɔ̃ abi, mawɛ̃ abi kulafa, mma sikuɔ fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana abi sitɛ.”
40013024	Yesu ɔpɛ ma igbã mama ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui sɛɛ i ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.
40013025	Kasɛ̃ gɔ maturi ka marɛ ne, ɔ̃ tsirise ɔsɛ ɔ̃asa sikua abi i ɔraɖui ame ɔledza ibɔrɛ malaa.
40013026	Ɔwi gɔ i kamɔ ɔmɔ fiɛ kaatsɛ iɣe ne, sikua dzɛ i tsirise ɔsa ana ɔre.
40013027	“Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ maɖabo ɔba maatu wũ maɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Bokɔse, iiɖe kamɔ sɛɛ kaɖe ako i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame? Lɛ i sikua dzɛgbe ɔse i kamɔ ame?’
40013028	“Ne kakpɛkɔ̃ sate to ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Tsirise ɔɖe lobara karabara gagbe.’ “Ne maɖabo to makarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Ato abie sɔ borurui sɛ̃ boɖi?’
40013029	“Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, ‘Ooɣo. Si misɛ miatsɛ sikua irurui ne, mito miarurui kamɔ ana mibua i sɛ̃ iso.
40013030	Mitã sikua gu kamɔ ɔɖuɖu si maya isɛ iabo kamɔ ɔruiwi si loatã marabaradze ɔɖe katɔ̃ maruɛ sikua matsuedza tɔtɔ fiɛ maarui kamɔ masɛ maafere i kawu ame.’ ”
40013031	Yesu Ɔledza ma igbã mama ipɛ iɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ idziribi kosoi iwɛ̃ nɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛ i ɔ̃ ayo ame kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.
40013032	Idziribi nɛgbe ɔkoso iɖo atsɔra ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ si imɔ ne, isɛ imɔ iɖo ayo ame kakpɛkɔ̃ ame siraɖui ɔɖuɖu ikpese kadzirimi ga akpa ame i kurodzai aabara ayo kuwe.”
40013033	Yesu ɔledza ma igbã ipɛ iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ inyagɛ̃ kua gɔ i ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔpia i mmɔre mɛ losi ame, ɔkpɔkɔtɔ ɔsakanya gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃.”
40013034	Yesu ɔki i agbã ame ɔte iturikuri nɛgbe ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔɖe ma ika si iiɖe igbã ɔto ɔpɛ ma.
40013035	Ɔbara ngbɔ gɔ itã sɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, “Loaɖe ma ika i igbã ame. Fiɛ loaɖi ara wɛrɛa wa mpia ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ lote ma.”
40013036	Gɔ Yesu ɔɔɖi iturikuri nɛmɔ ɔri fiɛ ɔba iyo ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ maba maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɖi igbã nɛ apɛ i sikua dzɛ mpia i ɔraɖui ame mmɔ karɔ̃ tã bo.”
40013037	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ nto ɔpɛ ɔraɖui nɖe mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi.
40013038	Kakpɛkɔ̃ nɖe kayiiso. Mma nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ maturi nɖe ɔraɖui gɔ mapɛ i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame. Tsirise masiaidze nɖe sikua.
40013039	Tsirise gɔ losa sikua nɖe Ɔbosam. Ɔraɖui ɔsɔrɛ̃wi nɖe kayi kawirikɔ̃, fiɛ mma loasɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui nɖe Ɣaa makpabo.
40013040	“Kumɛgɔ masa sikua kanya fiɛ matsuedza sɛ̃ ne, ngbɔ ame iase ku kayi kawirikɔ̃ ne.
40013041	Mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, to loapia wũ makpabo sɔ masa mma ɔɖuɖu lokɔ maturi mapia i ikpi ame gu mma lobara ara lalaa kanya.
40013042	Mato maasu ma mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe nɛ nto itsue ame ngbegɔ maabiɛ kaku maɖo arɔĩ makpa.
40013043	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa maturi to maafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃ i ma Ɔse sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame. Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ!
40013044	“Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ karana ga makɔla i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔnya ɔsu ɔledza isu ikɔla. Ɔna isoɣɔ gbaã, ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ira biara ɔrɔdɛ̃ ɔsu sikã ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣa kakpɛkɔ̃ gamɔ.”
40013045	Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ kuɣaɖese ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔbie anyi wa lofɔ kuɣa.
40013046	Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya kuwɛ̃ gɔ lobua kufɔ kuɣa ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ira biara nɛ ɔba ɔrɔdɛ̃ ɔsu sikã ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣa kɔ̃.
40013047	“Ana ne, Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔre asabu wa mapia i ɔpo ame fiɛ maɖi akpɛ agbãagbã.
40013048	Gɔ asabu ɔyi ne, makpadzɛ̃ wã mabɔ ɔkpokpo fiɛ marɛrɛ akpɛ ame, maɖi nwa masɛ maɖe mafere i kusɛsɛi ame. Nwa maiɖe ana ne, mabodza wã mawiri.
40013049	Ngbɔ ame iase ku kayi kawirikɔ̃ ne. Ɣaa makpabo to maabɔrɛ makɛlɛ maarɛrɛ maturi sɛɛ maɖi i malalaa ndɛ̃.
40013050	Mato maasu maturi lalaa mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe ame ngbegɔ maabiɛ kaku maɖo arɔĩ makpa.”
40013051	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Minɔ ara wa loɣere mi i ngbe karɔ̃?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ, bonɔ.”
40013052	Ne ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Mmaratedze biara gɔ lokpese Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ rasuãdze ne, ɔse lɛ iyosate gɔ nsɛ ɔɖi ara kuere gu aɣɛtɛ ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ iyo ame ɔte.”
40013053	Gɔ Yesu ɔpɛ agbã wagbe ɔro ne, ɔrui i mmɔ.
40013054	Ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ma aɖe fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate ara i ma kasarɛkɔ̃ gɔ ibara mma lonɔ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ɣaa mato makarɛ sɔ, “Lɛ i ngɔgbe ɔsuã inɔgba nɛgbe ɔbɔrɛgu? Fiɛ lɛ ɔbɔrɛgu awawãra wagbe igbã?
40013055	Iiɖe rawedze ɔbi ɔɖe ngbe ɣɛɛ? Iiɖe Maria ɔbi ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ manyiibi nɖe Yakobo gu Yosef gu Simon gu Yuda ma mpia i bo ndɛ̃?
40013056	Ɔ̃ manyiiko ana pia i bo ndɛ̃ ni! Lɛ kowũ ɔna ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛgu?”
40013057	Ɔ̃ ara ɔtsue ma anɔ, ne ɔso maifɔ wũ. Ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ba kuwarɛ i kakɔi biara iɖo ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔmagɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ maturi kɔrɛ.”
40013058	Gɔ maifɔ wũ maɖe ɔso ne, ɔ̃iwo awawãra gbodzoo ɔbara i ma ndɛ̃.
40014001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, Herodes gɔ nto ɔɖe sigara i Galilea ɔnɔ Yesu iso itɔ̃me.
40014002	Ne ɔto ɔɣere ɔ̃ marabaradze sɔ, “Ndupiedze Yohanes loɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã! Ne ɔso ɔba ɔle ɔto ɔbara awawãra ɔbara ngbɔ ne.”
40014003	Tɔtɔ ne, Herodes ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ Yohanes manyi wũ marara i iyo. Ɔbara ngbɔ ala Herodia gɔ nɖe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Filipo ɔre ɔso.
40014004	Alasɔ Yohanes ɔɣere Herodes sɔ, “Mmara iitã ɔri sɔ aayiri fɔ ɔnyiibi ɔre Herodia.”
40014005	Ne ɔso Herodes ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔnigã ma Yudase alasɔ masɛ mabu Yohanes lɛ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze.
40014006	Iyi nɛ i Herodes ɔɖe ɔ̃ iɣeyi ne, Herodia ɔbi bitɛ ɔba ɔ̃atɔ ɔte maturi ma loba mmɔ gɔ ibua ipia Herodes isoɣɔ.
40014007	Ne ɔkã ndamu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loatã-ɔ ira biara nɛ aakarɛ me.”
40014008	Ɔbirɔ̃gomi ɔnyi ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔkarɛ Ndupiedze Yohanes iti. Ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere igara sɔ, “Tã me Ndupiedze Yohanes iti i kategelei iso ngbe kiniɔ.”
40014009	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔbo Herodes so, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkã ndamu i makpakpa ma nsigu wũ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iti katɔ̃ ɔso ne, ɔpia sɔ masɛ maatu Yohanes iti mabɔ ɔbirɔ̃gomi.
40014010	Ne ɔso ɔpia masɛ maatu Yohanes iti i ngbegɔ ɔrɛ i iyo.
40014011	Masu ituriti masia i kategelei iso masu mabɔ ɔbirɔ̃gomi fiɛ ka ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃ ɔnyi.
40014012	Gɔ Yohanes marasuãdze ɔnɔ ne, masɛ maasu wũ masɛ maabiara fiɛ ka masɛ maaɣere Yesu.
40014013	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ nnɛ loba Yohanes iso ne, ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔwara ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ i maturi na. Ɣɛɛ gɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔtsue ne, masɛ ngba mabɔrɛ i ma simagɛ̃ ame makɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
40014014	Gɔ Yesu ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ɔnya maturi gbodzoo ma loba ne, ma ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri fiɛ ɔsa mma nto manyɛ.
40014015	Kutsuɛ ɔwi ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Kaɖe ɔɔro, fiɛ ngbe ɔdzorogu ayo ame ne ɔso ɖi ma ɔri si makɛlɛ ngorowase maabie aɖera maɣa maɖe.”
40014016	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Iinya sɔ maakɛlɛ ne mi mɔmɔ mitã ma irere maɖe.”
40014017	Ne marasuãdze ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Abolo abo aru gu akpɛ fɛ̃a anyɔ kere nɖe aɖera wa boba.”
40014018	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misu mibɔ me i ngbe.”
40014019	Ɔɣere maturi sɔ masɛ i karɔ̃ i sikua iso fiɛ ka ɔsu abolo abo aru gu akpɛ fɛ̃a anyɔ, ɔnyɔ kato ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba. Ɔbɛbɛse ɔsu ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ masu maɣɛɣɛ maturi.
40014020	Gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ara mami fiɛ marasuãdze ɔsa nwa lobuburi kanya ne, ayi kusɛsɛi kuweo-kunyɔ.
40014021	Mma loɖe aɖera wamɔ aaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ kukpi kuru gɔ maika marɔ̃go gu mabiɛtɛ.
40014022	Ɔluwɛ̃ Yesu ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔya mabo i ɔkolo ame sɔ mawara makɛlɛ si ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖi maturi tsɔra ɔri.
40014023	Gɔ ɔ̃ɔɖi ma ɔri ɔro ne, ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kabemi iso ɔsɛ ɔ̃akparama kayi. Si iabara kutsuɛ buɛɛ ne, Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ loɔkuti ɔɣɛ i mmɔ.
40014024	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, ɔkolo ka ɔsia i itubu ndɛ̃, awɛ to akpɛ̃ fiɛ ndu to misɛgu ɔkolo mikpesegu.
40014025	Ɔɖesɛrã ne, Yesu ɔsɛ i ndu iso ɔba ɔ̃atu ɔ̃ marasuãdze.
40014026	Gɔ manya wũ ɔsɛ i ndu iso ne, ɔtu ɔkpa ma maɣɛ sɔ, “Kpise ɔɖe!” Mala kulu i ifɔ̃ ame.
40014027	Ɣɛɛ ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mina ɔtu! Midaanigã. Mme loɖe!”
40014028	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, si fɔ mɔmɔ aɖe ne, kpere me sɔ losɛ i ndu iso loba fɔ kɔrɛ.”
40014029	Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ba!” Ne ɔso Petro ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame ɔtsɛ isɛ i ndu iso ikɛlɛ Yesu kɔrɛ.
40014030	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔnya kumɛgɔ i ɔwiri to ɔkpɛ̃ teteree ne, ɔnigã ɔtsɛ ndu iwã. Ne ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Bosate, ɖi me!”
40014031	Ɔluwɛ̃ Yesu ɔɖi kɔrɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔtɛgɛlɛ, be ɔso fiɛ ato awararã?”
40014032	Ma inyɔɔ ɔya mabo i ɔkolo ame kere ne ɔwiri ɔnyua ɔkpɛ̃ ne.
40014033	Ne ɔso marasuãdze ma i ɔkolo ame ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ matã Yesu maɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ne, Ɣaa Ɔbi aɖe!”
40014034	Gɔ mawara itubu ne, maba maabo ɔkpokpo gɔ i Genezaret karɔ̃ iso.
40014035	Maturi ɔnya Yesu maɖi ite, ne ɔso masɛ maakɔ manyɛse ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i abuiti wamɔ ame ɔɖuɖu mabɔ wũ.
40014036	Mapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔtã manyɛse si mapɛgu bidɛ ɔ̃ awu kutsueti. Mma ɔɖuɖu lopɛgu wũ ɔna isosarɛ.
40015001	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ gu ma Yudase mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem maba Yesu kɔrɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ,
40015002	“Be ɔso fiɛ fɔ marasuãdze iisɛ mabara i bo mawa kubarara iso? Masɛ̃ maisɛ mafore nrɔɔ̃ i bo mmara kanya fiɛ masɛ maɖe aɖera.”
40015003	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mi wũ ne, be ɔso fiɛ miisɛ mibara i Ɣaa mmara iso fiɛ mi mawa mire iso misɛ mibara?
40015004	Ɣaa sɔ, ‘Warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi. Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ inyakpi i ɔ̃ ɣese iso ne, ɔkote ɔtã kukpi ipɔ.’
40015005	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ mito mite sɔ si ɔrere ba ira nɛ ikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔbuai ɔ̃ maɣese fiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nnɛ loasu lotã-ɔ loɔsu lotã Ɣaa.’ ne, iisinya sɔ ɔturi aawarɛ ɔ̃ ɔse ɣee ɔ̃ ɔnyi.
40015006	Ne ɔso iki i mi kurabarara iso ne, miɔsɛ̃ Ɣaa mmara, mimɔɛ̃ mi mawa mire mito.
40015007	Mi ma nsɛ mibara ara sɔ si mibo maturi anɔ! Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔkpɛ ɔya gɔ ɔɣɛ i mi iso sɔ,
40015008	‘Mmagbe ne, kanyakanya kere masu mato male me gɔ iibɔrɛ i ma situ ame.
40015009	Siefe kere mato mabara wũ karabara. Mato mate maturi mmara i wũ mire kanya.’ ”
40015010	Ne Yesu ɔkpere maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikã atsue si minɔ ara karɔ̃.
40015011	Nnɛ i ɔturi ɔɖe iibawo wũ ɔpukutura, ɣɛɛ nnɛ nsɛ ibɔrɛ i ɔturi kanya ame nsɛ ipukutura wũ.”
40015012	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Aɣe sɔ nnɛ aɣɛ mmɔ ɔta iya ma Farisise iso?”
40015013	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Kudziri biara gɔ iiɖe Tete gɔ i kato lopia ne, maarui kɔ̃ mapɛyu.
40015014	Ne ɔso minyua ma. Manɔbiɛdze maɖe fiɛ mato makɔ manɔbiɛdze. Si nɔbiɛdze to ɔkɔ nɔbiɛdze ne, iwo ame i ma inyɔɔ aakpase mabo.”
40015015	Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɖi aɖera ɔturi iɣɛra igbã nɛmɔ karɔ̃ te bo.”
40015016	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miinɔ itɔ̃me nɛ ana karɔ̃?
40015017	Minɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ira biara nɛ nsɛ ibo i ɔturi kanya ame ne, isɛ ikɛlɛ ɔ̃ iyiri ame, kama ne, ɔ̃anyi ne ɔpɛyu lɛ ɔdziriiso awe.
40015018	Ɣɛɛ atɔ̃me wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i ɔturi kanya ame ne, ɔ̃ ɔtu ame abɔrɛ fiɛ asɛ apukutura wũ.
40015019	Alasɔ ɔturi ɔtu ame i adzuni nyanyarĩa wa nsɛgu ituriɖoe, maturire isiai gu marã irɔ, asɔrɔ̃ iɖe, kayu, mila aɖansiɛ iɖe, anyakpi iɣɛ i maturi iso sɛ ibɔrɛ.
40015020	Nwagbe nsɛ aɣɛra ɔturi ne. Iiɖe nrɔɔ̃ mɛ maifore fiɛ maɖe ara nsɛ iɣɛra ɔturi.”
40015021	Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ Tiro gu Sidon awo ame.
40015022	Mmɔ i ɔ Kananse rɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lobɔrɛ ndɛ̃ mɛmɔ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ ku kulu teteree ɔba ɔ̃atã wũ iti sɔ, “Wũ Sate David ɔwa, nyɔ me nnya! Wũ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi to ɔwe inyɛ gbaã i siwarã lalaa nrɔɔ̃ ame.”
40015023	Ɣɛɛ Yesu iiɣɛ kuira. Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Sa wũ si ɔnyua kulu ɔla ɔtɛ̃ra bo atsue!”
40015024	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Israel maturi ma nse lɛ masɛrɛ ma loyu kɔrɛ kere i Ɣaa ɔpia me.”
40015025	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, “Wũ Sate, buai me!”
40015026	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Iilɛ sɔ maasu mabiɛtɛ aɖera matã makpɛkpɛ.”
40015027	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Wũ Sate gbaã iɖe, ɣɛɛ makpɛkpɛ sɛ marɛrɛ aɖera wa lokpakpase i makɔse ɔpɔrɔ̃ iso afere i karɔ̃ maɖe.”
40015028	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔmɔ gbaã! Nnɛ ato akarɛ si iba itã-ɔ.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ko losarɛ.
40015029	Yesu ɔrui i mmɔ ɔsɛ Galilea itubu kuruɛkuruɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya kabemi kawɛ̃ ɔkpase ɔsɛ i karɔ̃.
40015030	Maturi gbodzoo ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Gɔ mato maba ne, masɛgu mma lofɛfɛ̃ mafu, manɔbiɛdze, mabafã, mamumu gu manyɛse agbãagbã. Makɔ ma mabɔ Yesu katɔ̃.
40015031	Gɔ maturi ɔnya sɔ mamumu to maɖe aka, mabafã ɔta masɛ, mma lofɛfɛ̃ mafu ɔna ɔle fiɛ manɔbiɛdze to manya ara ne, male Israel Ɣaa.
40015032	Yesu ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mmagbe ara to akpɛ̃ me nnya, alasɔ maɔwe i wũ kɔrɛ akpɛnɛ atɛ fiɛ mana kuira nɛ maaɖe. Loito lobie sɔ makɛlɛ ayo ku kukã, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, mato maasɛ maafɛ̃ i ɔri.”
40015033	Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fafuĩ gɔgbe ame ne, lɛ boana aɖera botã maturi gbodzoo magbe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maaɖe mami?”
40015034	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Abolo kuboi kurɛ̃ mito?” Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Abolo kuboi kukɔdzɛ gu kufarai wiriwiria kurɛ̃saã.”
40015035	Ne Yesu ɔɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ masɛ i karɔ̃ ne.
40015036	Ɔsu abolo kuboi kukɔdzɛ gu kufarai ne ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti ne. Ɔbɛbɛse ɔsu ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze fiɛ masu maɣɛɣɛ maturi.
40015037	Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ara mami, ne gɔ marasuãdze ɔsa akutia kanya ne, mana kusɛsɛi kukɔdzɛ.
40015038	Marɛrɛ̃ kerekere kukpi kuna loɖe aɖera gɔ maika marɔ̃go gu mabiɛtɛ.
40015039	Yesu ɔɖi maturi ɔri fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ka ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔwara ɔkɛlɛ Magadan karɔ̃ iso.
40016001	Ma Farisise gu ma Zadukise mawɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maba maala wũ manyɔ sɔ ɔbara iwawãra ɔte sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
40016002	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Si kuɣɛ̃ to kusɛ kuabo iyo fiɛ kuɖokpo ɔrɛtɛ ne, misɛ miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Kayi to kaakpa kɔrãkaɖe.’
40016003	Ngbɔ ame si mita ku kaya fiɛ kuɖokpo ɔrɛtɛ, kayi ɔnyɔ guduu ne, misɛ miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Kado to ɔ̃apɛ nɔme.’ Misɛ miwo kuɖokpo ɔnyɔ ɔɣɛ kumɛgɔ i kayi aase ɣɛɛ miito miwo ɔwi gɔ ame mipia ɔnya ɔɖi ite!
40016004	Kiniɔgbe maturi ma mba ɔtile fiɛ maisɛ manigã Ɣaa, mato mabie awawãra sɔ maanya, ɣɛɛ maibanya kuiwɛ̃ iɖo Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Yona ire igbã.” Gɔ ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ne, ɔrui ɔnyua ma.
40016005	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔwara itubu makɛlɛ kama isɛ ne, maɣara maito abolo kuawɛ̃.
40016006	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so i ma Farisise gu ma Zadukise inyagɛ̃ kua iso.”
40016007	Ne matsɛ so ikarɛ sɔ, “Kumɛgɔ boito abolo ɔso fiɛ ɔto ɔɣere bo ngbɔ?”
40016008	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɣe nnɛ mato maɣɛ, ne ɔso ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mito mikarɛ so atɔ̃me i aɖera wa miito iso? Mi kafɔkaɖe ɔtɛgɛlɛ gbaã.
40016009	Miito minya ara miɖi ite? Miito minyigi ɔwi gɔ losu abolo aru lotã marɛrɛ̃ kukpi kuru ɔɖe? Kusɛsɛi kurɛ̃ i akutia ɔyi?
40016010	Fiɛ ɔwi gɔ i maturi kukpi kuna ɔɖe abolo kuboi kukɔdzɛ ne, kusɛsɛi kurɛ̃ i akutia ɔyi?
40016011	Nda ɔso fiɛ miito minɔ karɔ̃ sɔ iiɖe abolo iso loto loɖe ika? Midzuɛ̃ so i ma Farisise gu ma Zadukise inyagɛ̃ kua iso!”
40016012	Mmɔ ikpa marasuãdze sɔ iiɖe inyagɛ̃ kua gɔ masɛ masu mabara abolo iso ɔto ɔɖe ika ne, ma Farisise gu ma Zadukise ara ite ɔto.
40016013	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea Filipi ɔmagɛ̃ kɔrɛ. Mmɔ iɖe ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Nna i maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ mme Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɖe?”
40016014	Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mawɛ̃ sɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes, mawɛ̃ ana sɔ Eliya, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɔ Yeremia ɣee Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔ aɖe.”
40016015	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ne mi ɣɛɛ? Nna mibu sɔ loɖe?”
40016016	Simon Petro ɔtara kanya sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Kristo gɔmɔ, Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã Ɔbi.”
40016017	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “So si siɣɔ-ɔ Simon, Yona ɔbi, alasɔ iiɖe ɔturi awune loɖi ɔnukuare gɔgbe ɔte-ɔ, ɣɛɛ wũ Ɔse gɔ i kato ɔɖe.
40016018	Ne ɔso nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ fɔ nɖe Petro, gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe ita siare, fiɛ ita siare nɛgbe iso loatsue wũ mafɔɖedze ikuri losia gɔ kukpi kɔra iibawo ma iso ɔɖe.
40016019	Fiɛ nto loasu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ sibɔi lotã-ɔ sɔ nnɛ asɛ̃ i karɔ̃ iso ne, maasɛ̃ ne i kato fiɛ nnɛ asese i karɔ̃ iso ne, maasese ne i kato.”
40016020	Ne Yesu ka ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ madaaɣere kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo ne.
40016021	Ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze iɣere iɖi sɔ, “Nto loakɛlɛ Yerusalem fiɛ loawe inyɛ gbaã i makpakpa, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze nrɔɔ̃ ame. Mato maaɖoe me, ɣɛɛ ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara me lowe ngbã.”
40016022	Petro ɔkɔ wũ ɔɣedza i kuruɛ ɔtã wũ itai ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Kuiyikuiyi daasiɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe! Iibaba-ɔ iso ngbɔ!”
40016023	Yesu ɔfiniki ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Re me kama, Satana! Ato abie sɔ akpesera so ɔri itɛ̃ra atã me alasɔ adzuni wagbe iibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔturi kɔrɛ abɔrɛ.”
40016024	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Si mi ɔrere ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asiai me ne, ɔsɛ̃ so si ɔsu ɔ̃ inyɛwe ɔnyigbã si ɔ̃awo me ɔsiai.
40016025	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loakpɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ngbã iti ne, ɔto ɔ̃ayura me, ɣɛɛ ngɔ loayura ɔ̃ ngbã ala wũ ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana ngbã.
40016026	Mme kusia i ɔturi aana si kayiiso ɔɖuɖu karana ɔkpese ɔ̃ kare fiɛ ɔ̃ayura ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ngbã? Ɣee ira iwɛ̃ pia gɔ ɔturi aasu ɔnyuarã ala ɔ̃ ngbã?
40016027	Alasɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi to ɔ̃aba i ɔ̃ Ɔse ikpawaĩ ame gu ɔ̃ makpabo fiɛ ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso i ɔ̃ karabara kanya.
40016028	Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ i ngbe iibakpi fiɛ maanya Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi to ɔba lɛ Igara awe.”
40017001	Ayi akuɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔkɔ Petro gu Yakobo gu Yohanes makɛlɛ kube kɔlɛa kuwɛ̃ iso ma ɔnɔwɛ̃.
40017002	Gɔ mato manyɔ kere ne, Yesu kumiamia ɔkpaki, ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to kafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ arapia ana to afiɛ atsue anɔmi.
40017003	Ne marasuãdze itɛ magbe ɔnya Mose gu Eliya to maɖegu Yesu ika ne.
40017004	Ne Petro ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, bo ngbe iba ɔbua ilɛ gbaã! Si abie ne, tã bopɛ akpayo atɛ i ngbe. Iwɛ̃ itã-ɔ, iwɛ̃ itã Mose fiɛ iwɛ̃ ana itã Eliya.”
40017005	Gɔ ɔtogu ika iɖe ne, idɔdɔ fiɛa iwɛ̃ ɔso iba iafu ma iso fiɛ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika sibɔrɛgu i idɔdɔ ame siɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi mɔmɔ gɔ loipia kuɣɛ i ngbe ne, mikã wũ atsue.”
40017006	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔnɔ silɔ dzɛgbe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma sɔ makɔlɛ mafu i karɔ̃.
40017007	Yesu ɔba ma kɔrɛ, ɔpɛgu ma ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mita miya ne midaanigã.”
40017008	Gɔ matara anɔ kato ne, mainya kuwɛ̃ i mmɔ, iɖo Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃.
40017009	Gɔ maso i kube iso mato maba ne, Yesu ɔsi ma mmara sɔ, “Midaaɣere kuwɛ̃ kaɖikate ga maɖi mate mi i ngbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame.”
40017010	Ne marasuãdze to makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mmara matedze sɛ maɣɛ sɔ Eliya aaɖe katɔ̃ ɔba tɔtɔ?”
40017011	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe sɔ Eliya aaɖe katɔ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aledza ira biara ɔsɛ.
40017012	Ɣɛɛ ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ Eliya ɔɔba koko, maturi iinya wũ maɖi ite. Mabara wũ nnɛ mabie fiɛ ngbɔ ame mato maabara Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔtile ana ne.”
40017013	Mmɔ i marasuãdze ɔtsue sɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔto ɔɣɛ ala ne.
40017014	Gɔ makpese maba iturikuri kɔrɛ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu kɔrɛ.
40017015	Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, nyɔ wũ ɔbi nnya! Kakpebubu ɔnyɛ to ɔɖaa wũ gɔ isɛ inyɛdɛ̃ wũ teteree itã ɔpɛ ɔbo i ɔtɔ ɣee ndu ame.
40017016	Lokɔ wũ lobɔ fɔ marasuãdze sɔ masa wũ ɣɛɛ maiwo.”
40017017	Ne Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Mi kiniɔgbe maturi ma loifɔ maɖe fiɛ manyanyarĩ, ayi sirɛ̃ loawe i mi kɔrɛ isɛ iabo? Kɔ ɔbi bɔ me i ngbe!”
40017018	Yesu ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã fiɛ sibɔrɛ i ɔbi ame. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔbi ɔsarɛ.
40017019	Ne marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ makarɛ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ boiwo siwarã lalaa ɔsa ɔɖi?”
40017020	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mi kafɔkaɖe ɔfe ikoso ɔso. Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ si mi kafɔkaɖe ɔmɔ lɛ susuruba ibi ne, miaɣere kabemi gagbe sɔ, ‘Rui i ngbe kɛlɛ mmɔ,’ fiɛ iaba ngbɔ ana. Kuira ibara iibaɖo mi!
40017021	Ɣɛɛ si iiɖe kanya inyi gu kayi ikparama ame ne, aibawo siwarã dzɛgbe igbã ɔsa.”
40017022	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔɖuɖu ɔba maasakanya i Galilea ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mato maba maaɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã maturi,
40017023	maɖoe, ɣɛɛ ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, loto loaledza ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame.” Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɖaa marasuãdze gbaã.
40017024	Gɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba Kapernaum ne, mma nsɛ mafɔ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ toto ɔba maakarɛ Petro sɔ, “Mi ratedze ne, ɔsɛ ɔtã kasɔrɛkɔ̃ toto?”
40017025	Ne Petro ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ɔsɛ ɔtã!” Gɔ Petro ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo iyo ne, Yesu loɖe katɔ̃ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Simon, be nɖe fɔ adzuni i nnɛ nto loba lokarɛ-ɔ iso? Kayiiso magara lampo ne, mabe nsɛ matã? Karɔ̃ ga iso i igara to ɔɖe maturi ɛɛbɛrɛ mafɔ ma mpia i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso?”
40017026	Ne Petro ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Mafɔ.” Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ iso maturi iisɛ matã lampo gɔmɔ ne.
40017027	Ɣɛɛ si boibata boya i mmagbe iso ne, kɛlɛ itubu kanya si apia ɖaɖiwa. Ikpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ aaɖi ne, pia kɔrɔ̃ i ne kanya ame ne ato aanya sikã dzɛ loawo atã bo gu-ɔ isɔrɛyo lampo si asu atã ma.”
40018001	Ɔwi kama ne, marasuãdze ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nna ɔɖe loɖo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃?”
40018002	Ne Yesu ɔkpere ɔbiɛtɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɣedza ma i katɔ̃ ne.
40018003	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ si miifiniki miibara so lɛ mabiɛtɛ awe ne, miito miakɛlɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame minya.
40018004	Ngɔ lonya ɔɖo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ lobɔ so karɔ̃ ɔkpesera so lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ gɔgbe awe.
40018005	“Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ ɔbiɛtɛ gɔgbe i wũ iyere ame ne, mme iɖe ɔfɔ.
40018006	“Ɔrere gɔ loatã ɔbiɛtɛ gɔ mba kafɔkaɖe i wũ ame ɔfiniki i kafɔkaɖe kama ne, si masu ɔwɛ̃ manyi kukɔtɛ siare masarã wũ i ɔme mafuĩdza wũ mapia i ɔpo ame ne, ialɛgu wũ iɖo.
40018007	“Ndzo miɖe mitã kayiiso ala ara wa loatã maturi ɔbo i kalakanyɔ ame pia, fiɛ ato aaba kokooko, ɣɛɛ ndzo miɖe mitã ngɔ iso i ara wamɔ aaki fiɛ aaba maturi iso!
40018008	Ne ɔso si fɔ kɔrɔ̃ ɣee kukpa sɛ kukɔ-ɔ kupia i ikpi ame ne, tu kɔ̃ pɛyu! Ilɛ iɖo sɔ aabo i ngbã ame sɔ ana kɔrɔ̃ ɣee kukpa iɖo sɔ aawe nrɔɔ̃ minyɔ ngba minyɔ mafuĩdza-ɔ mapia i itɔkpe nɛ loibanyi inya ame.
40018009	Si fɔ inɔmi ana nsɛ itã abo i ikpi ame ne, were ne ɖi pɛyu! Ilɛ iɖo sɔ aawe inɔmi iwɛ̃ abo i ngbã ame iɖo sɔ aawe anɔmi anyɔ mafuĩdza-ɔ mapia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame.
40018010	“Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ miibanyɔ makosoi magbe kuwɛ̃ pupurii. Nto loɣere mi sɔ ma Ɣaa makpabo i kato ɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ɔwi biara i ma kanya.
40018011	Alasɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔba sɔ ɔ̃afɔ mma loyu ɔtã ma ngbã.
40018012	“Si ɔturi ba masɛrɛ kulafa fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔyu ne, be ɔ̃abara? Ɔ̃ibanyua kasiwɛ̃-kaiwɛ̃ ɔɣedza i kube ɔkparuɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃anyɔnyɔ ngɔ nto ɔyu?
40018013	Fiɛ si ɔnya wũ ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔ̃ana isoɣɔ i ɔwɛ̃ gɔ loyu ngbe iso ɔɖo kasiwɛ̃-kaiwɛ̃ ma loiyu.
40018014	Ngbɔ ame i mi ɔse gɔ i kato iibabie sɔ makosoi magbe kuwɛ̃ si ɔyu ne.
40018015	“Si fɔ ɔnyii ɔɣɛrɛ-ɔ ne, kɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ si asɛ aaɖi ate wũ i mi gu wũ inyɔ ndɛ̃ kere. Si ɔkã-ɔ atsue ne, mi sinyii to siakɛlɛ i katɔ̃.
40018016	Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ikã-ɔ atsue ne, kɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ɣee inyɔ si misɛ ala Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maɖansiɛ inyɔ ɣee itɛ kanya ame itɔ̃me iso maasia itɔ̃me biara ita.’
40018017	Si mmɔ ana ɔ̃ikã ma atsue ne, ɣere mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ikã ma atsue ana ne, ɖi wũ atsue lɛ ngɔ loifɔ ɔɖe ɣee lampofɔdze.
40018018	“Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi ɔɖuɖu sɔ, nnɛ misɛ̃ i kayiiso ngbe ne, Ɣaa aasɛ̃ ne i kato, fiɛ nnɛ miɖi ɔri i karɔ̃ iso ngbe ne, Ɣaa aasia kɔrɔ̃ i ne iso i kato ana.
40018019	“Nto loledza mi iɣere sɔ ira biara nɛ i mi maturi inyɔ aatɔrã misia ita i kayi gagbe iso i kayi ikparama ame ne, wũ Ɔse gɔ i kato to ɔ̃abara ne ɔtã mi.
40018020	Alasɔ ngbegɔ i maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ɔsarɛ i wũ iɣere ame ne, lopia i ma ndɛ̃.”
40018021	Petro ɔbore ɔbo Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, ikpɛ irɛ̃ loasu lotsɛ wũ ɔnyii gɔ nto ɔɣɛrɛ me? Ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ?”
40018022	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Iiɖe ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ kere! Ɣɛɛ ikpɛ sikɔdzɛ aka akɔdzɛ si asu atsɛ wũ.
40018023	“Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ ngbe. Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, igara ɔwɛ̃ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aki i ɔ̃ maɖabo siko ame ɔnyɔ kumɛgɔ mato mabara ɔ̃ karabara.
40018024	Ku ɔ̃ isɛ karɔ̃ kere ne, makɔ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto wũ kuso titiiti mabɔ.
40018025	Gɔ ɔɖabo gɔmɔ na sikã ɔ̃atã kuso ɔso ne, igara ɔtã sɔ marɔdɛ̃ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔre gu mabi lɛ masande gu ira biara nɛ ɔba si masu matã kuso.
40018026	“Ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i igara katɔ̃ ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, ‘Na ɔtu tã me ne nto loatã-ɔ kuso ɔɖuɖu gɔ loto-ɔ!’
40018027	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ara ɔɖo igara kayiri ne ɔso ɔsu kuso ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ wũ ɔnyua wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ.
40018028	“Gɔ ɔrui ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃atu ɔ̃ ɔɖabo laa gɔ nto wũ kuso kɛkɛĩ. Ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔlaa gɔgbe i ɔme gɔ ɔle ɔtsɛ wũ iro. Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tã me kuso gɔ ato me!’
40018029	“Ɔ̃ malaa ɔtã wũ iti sɔ ‘Na ɔtu tã wũ ne ɔto ɔ̃tã-ɔ kuso ɔɖuɖu gɔ ɔto-ɔ!’
40018030	“Ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ̃, ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ wũ mapia i iyo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃atã wũ kuso gɔ ɔto.
40018031	Gɔ ɔ̃ maɖabo laa ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, ibua iɖaa ma, ne masɛ maaɣere igara ira biara nɛ loba ne.
40018032	“Ne ɔso igara ɔpia makpere ɔɖabo mabɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ɔɖabo lalaa aɖe! Losu fɔ kuso gɔ ato me ɔɖuɖu lotsɛ-ɔ alasɔ atã me iti.
40018033	Ikote sɔ fɔ wũ aanyɔ fɔ ɔlaa nnya lɛ kumɛgɔ lonyɔ-ɔ nnya.’
40018034	Sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ igara gbaã ne ɔsu ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔsese mapia wũ i iyo sɔ ɔwe mmɔ makpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃atã kuso gɔ ɔto wũ ɔro.”
40018035	Ne Yesu ɔwiri sɔ, “Ngbɔ i wũ Ɔse gɔ i kato aabara mi ɔbiara si miisu mi manyii akpi mitsɛ ma ta mi situ ame ɔɖuɖu ne.”
40019001	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔrui i Galilea ɔkɛlɛ Yudea awo ame i Yordan Ɔwore kama isɛ.
40019002	Maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai wũ fiɛ ɔsa ma i mmɔ.
40019003	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ mala wũ manyɔ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bo mmara ɔtã ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃awo ɔ̃ ɔre ɔsɛ̃ i katɔ̃mei biara iso?”
40019004	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, ɔrã gu ɔre i Ɣaa ɔbara?
40019005	Fiɛ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nnɛgbe ɔso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ aarui i ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔnyi kɔrɛ ɔpɛ ɔmatã i ɔ̃ ɔre iso fiɛ ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃ ne.’
40019006	Ne ɔso maisiɖe maturi inyɔ ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃. Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabɛse nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔmatãra so iso.”
40019007	Ne ma Farisise ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Iyɔ be ɔso i Mose ɔɖi ɔri sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aatã ɔ̃ ɔre isɛ̃so ɔko iyɔ ɔ̃ɔɖi wũ ɔri?”
40019008	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mose ɔtã mi ɔri sɔ misɛ̃ mi mare ala mi atsuele ɔso, ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ngbɔ ise ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
40019009	Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara gɔ loasɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ iiɖe kama iɖe i ɔrɔ̃go ɔfe wũ ne, ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃ si ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go mama.”
40019010	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze to maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Si ngbɔ ise i ɔrã gu ɔre ndɛ̃ ne, iyɔ ilɛ iɖo si miiyiri so kɔra.”
40019011	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔturi biara loanɔ ara wagbe karɔ̃, mma i Ɣaa ɔtã kotoo loanɔ karɔ̃.
40019012	Alasɔ ara agbãagbã ɔso i marɛrɛ̃ iisɛ mayiri marɔ̃go. Mawɛ̃ ne, ngbɔ maɣe ma ne, mawɛ̃ ana ne, maturi lobara ma ngbɔ, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana iisɛ mayiri marɔ̃go ala Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔso. Ngɔ loawo ara ite nɛgbe ɔfɔ si ɔfɔ ne.”
40019013	Mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ mabiɛtɛ mabɔ Yesu sɔ ɔsia ma kɔrɔ̃ iso si ɔkparama kayi ɔtã ma, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnyagalagu mmamɔ.
40019014	Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mitã mabiɛtɛ si maba wũ kɔrɛ ne midaatɛ̃ ma ɔri, alasɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se sitã ma igbã.”
40019015	Yesu ɔsia ma nrɔɔ̃ iso, ɔtã ma kusɛkusɛ fiɛ ka ɔrui.
40019016	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, be nɖe ira sɛɛ nɛ loabara fiɛ loana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro?”
40019017	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Be ɔso ato akarɛ me itɔ̃me i ira sɛɛ iso? Ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ saã pɛ nɖe ɔsɛɛ, fiɛ si ato abie ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ne, mɔɛ̃ Ɣaa mmara ɔɖuɖu la.”
40019018	Ne ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Mme mmara?” Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Daaɖoe ɔturi, daaɖe asɔrɔ̃, daayu kayu, daaɖaɛ fɔ ɔlaa kanya.
40019019	Warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi si aɖɔɛ fɔ ɔnyii lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
40019020	Ne ɔporoporoi gɔmɔ ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Loɔbara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu, be loɔkuti loabara?”
40019021	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si ato abie sɔ aayi pɛpɛɛpɛ ne, kɛlɛ aasu fɔ ira biara rɔdɛ̃ si asu sikã atsɛ mawɛrɛba, si aana kusia siare i kato. Si ɔɔro ne, kpese ba siai me.”
40019022	Gɔ ɔporoporoi gɔgbe ɔnɔ nnɛgbe ne, ɔruigu isoma alasɔ ɔba karana gbaã.
40019023	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ ito iabua iɖa fiɛ ranase aabo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame.
40019024	Nto loledza mi iɣere sɔ, ma mmɔ ibo ba ɔle iɖo kumɛgɔ i kapuipɔngɔ aaki kafe i ɔdzirikaãra iyoi ame.”
40019025	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔnɔ ara wagbe ne, ibara ma ɣii ne mato makarɛ sɔ, “Iyɔ nna loabua ɔna iɖi?”
40019026	Yesu ɔnyɔ ma i katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔbara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa aawo ibiara ɔbara.”
40019027	Ne Petro to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nyɔ, iyɔ bo ma lonyua bo ira biara bosɛ fiɛ bosiai-ɔ ne, mme kusia boana?”
40019028	Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi i ɔnukuare ame sɔ, ɔwi gɔ i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aasɛ i ɔ̃ ifiɛ sigaraiyara iso i Kayi Ɣɛtɛ ga nto kaba ame ne, mi ma nɖe wũ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ne, mito miasɛ i sigara ayara iso miɖe sigara i Israel nlɛ aka aweo-anyɔ iso.
40019029	Ɔbiara gɔ lonyua ayo, manyiibi rɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go, ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔnyi, kukpɛkɔ̃ ɔsɛ ala wũ ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɔ ne ikpɛ kulafa fiɛ ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ana.
40019030	Ɣɛɛ gbodzoo ma nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ kiniɔ to maakpese matsɔra fiɛ mawɛ̃ ma nɖe matsɔra kiniɔ to maakpese maɖeakatɔ̃.
40020001	“Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lota kaya tutuutu ɔsɛ ɔ̃abie marabaradze sɔ masɛ maabara karabara i ɔ̃ adziribi kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.
40020002	Ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃atã ma ikpɛnɛ kuso lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ matã fiɛ ɔsese ma sia.
40020003	“Lɛ iɖɔwũ kaiwɛ̃ ne, ɔledza kuɣa ame isɛ, ne ɔnya gɔ mawɛ̃ ɣɛ mmɔ maito mabara kuira.
40020004	Ne ɔɣere ma ma wũ sɔ, ‘Mikɛlɛ wũ kakpɛkɔ̃ miabara karabara ne nto loatã mi ikpɛnɛ kuso.’
40020005	Ne ɔso marui makɛlɛ. “Iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ gu iɖɔwũ itɛ ame ne, ɔledza ibara ngbɔ ame.
40020006	Ito ikɛlɛ iɖɔwũ iru ame ana gɔ ɔsɛ kuɣa ame ne, ɔledza marɛrɛ̃ mawɛ̃ inya gɔ maɣɛ i mmɔ. Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, ‘Be ɔso mito miwɔra ikpɛnɛ siefe sɔ miito mibara kuira?’
40020007	“Ne matã mmuai sɔ, ‘Kuwɛ̃ iisu bo sɔ bosɛ boabara ɔ̃ karabara.’ “Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Mi wũ mikɛlɛ wũ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame miabara karabara.’
40020008	“Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, kakpɛkɔ̃sate ɔɣere ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ marabaradze iso sɔ, ‘Kpere marabaradze bɔ si atã ma ma kuso. Sɛ karɔ̃ i mma lotsɔra sia ɔkɛlɛ iso si awirigu mma loɖe katɔ̃ makɛlɛ iso.’
