40020009	“Marabaradze ma lokɛlɛ ku iɖɔwũ iru ame ne, matã ma ɔbiara ikpɛnɛ kuso.
40020010	Ne ɔso gɔ marabaradze ma loɖe katɔ̃ makɛlɛ ɔba mafɔ ma kuso ne, mabu sɔ maatã ma iɖo ngbɔ, ɣɛɛ ma wũ ikpɛnɛ kuso matã ma ɔɖuɖu.
40020011	Gɔ mafɔ sikã ne, matsɛ kakpɛkɔ̃ sate iɣɛtɛ sɔ,
40020012	‘Mma lotsɔra sia ɔba ne, ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ pɛ mabara karabara atoa sɔ bo ne, bobara karabara ikpɛnɛ ɔɖuɖu i kuɣɛ̃ ame, ɣɛɛ kuso kuwɛ̃ ɔtã bo!’
40020013	“Ne kakpɛkɔ̃ sate ɔtã ma ɔwɛ̃ mmuai sɔ, ‘Ɔrɛrɛĩ, loiɖe mi amumu alasɔ kuso gɔ boɣɛ bosia ita kuɖe lotã mi.
40020014	Ne ɔso su fɔ sikã si akɛlɛ iyo. Mme mɔmɔ me lobie sɔ loatã mma lotsɔra ɔba lɛ kumɛgɔ lotã mi.
40020015	Fiɛ loba ɔri sɔ lobara wũ sikã karabara kumɛgɔ loɖɔɛ, ne ɔso anɔ si adaarɛtɛ-ɔ i wũ ara itsɛ iso.’ ”
40020016	Ne Yesu ɔwirigu ma sɔ, “Ne ɔso mma nɖe matsɔra to maakpese maɖeakatɔ̃ fiɛ mma nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ to maakpese matsɔra.”
40020017	Gɔ Yesu to ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem ne, ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔɣedza i kuruɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ,
40020018	“Mikã atsue, boto bokɛlɛ Yerusalem ngbegɔ mato maaɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze matã me kukpi ipɔ.
40020019	Maaɖi me matã mma loiɖe ma Yudase mabara me aɣiãra, mapɛ me, fiɛ maapɛ me mamatãra i kudziri iso, ɣɛɛ ikpɛnɛ tɛare iso ne, nto loaledza ita iwe ngbã.”
40020020	Zebedeo ɔre ɔkɔ ɔ̃ mabi inyɔ maba Yesu kɔrɛ, mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ makarɛ wũ sɔ ɔbuai ma.
40020021	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be mito mibie?” Ne ma ɔnyi ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Tã sɔ wũ mabi inyɔ magbe aasɛ i fɔ kuɖearɔ̃ gu fɔ kubena iso ku ɔwi gɔ aaɖe sigara.”
40020022	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miiɣe nnɛ mito mikarɛ. Miawo inyɛwe gu kukpi gɔ ame loaki ɔki?” Ne matã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ, boto boawo.”
40020023	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe sɔ mito miawo. Ɣɛɛ ne, lona ɔri sɔ loaɖi mma loasɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ gu kubena iso. Kusɛkɔ̃ gɔmɔ ne, mma i wũ Ɔse ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔkpɛ ɔɖe.”
40020024	Gɔ marasuãdze iweo tsɔra ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, managu manyiibi inyɔ magbe sikpã.
40020025	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔkpere ma ɔɖuɖu ɔsirakanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miɣe sɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase magara sɛ mate so mapia mma mato maɖe iso, fiɛ ma matɔ̃ɖedze ana sɛ maɖe ma iso ku ɔle ɔɖuɖu.
40020026	Ɣɛɛ ne, idaawe i mi ame ngbɔ, si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere to ɔbie sikpakpa ne, ɔbara so sumudze ɔtã matsɔra.
40020027	Fiɛ si mi ɔrere to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ne, ɔbara so ɔɖabo ɔtã matsɔra.
40020028	Mme Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi kɔra ne, loiba sɔ masumu me, ɣɛɛ sɔ loasumu losu wũ ngbã lotã ala maturi gbodzoo iɖi ɔso.”
40020029	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze to mabɔrɛ i Yeriko ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai ma.
40020030	Manɔbiɛdze inyɔ ma nsi i ɔri kuruɛ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu to ɔfe, ne ɔso matsɛ kulu teteree sɔ, “Yesu, Igara David Ɔbi, nyɔ bo nnya!”
40020031	Maturi ɔnyagalagu ma sɔ malo, ɣɛɛ makɔlɛ ma silɔ mabua sɔ, “Igara David Ɔbi nyɔ bo nnya soo!”
40020032	Yesu ɔtui ɔya ne ɔkpere ma ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be mito mibie sɔ lobara lotã mi?”
40020033	Matã mmuai sɔ, “Tete, boto bobie sɔ boanya ara!”
40020034	Ma ara ɔɖo Yesu kayiri, ne ɔpɛgu ma anɔmi matsɛ inya fiɛ marui masiai wũ ne.
40021001	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɔbore mabo Yerusalem ne, maba maabo Betfage i kube gɔ marɔ sɔ Oliva adziri Kube iso. Mmɔ ɔpia ɔ̃ marasuãdze inyɔ ɔɖegu katɔ̃
40021002	ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ akorowa wa mpia i katɔ̃, si mibo ne, mito mianya ɔfirimu gɔ makɔra maɣedza, ɔ̃ ibi ɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ. Mikurisi wũ mibɔ me.
40021003	Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ ira irere ne, miɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate nto ɔbie ma’ iyɔ ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖi ma arɔĩ.”
40021004	Iba ngbɔ gɔ itã sɔ nnɛ i kanyaɖidze ɔɣɛ aaba i ne ame sɔ,
40021005	“Miɣere Zion kaɖe sɔ, ‘Nyɔ, fɔ igara to ɔba fɔ kɔrɛ! Ɔsi i ɔfirimu gu ɔ̃ ibi iso i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame ɔto ɔba.’ ”
40021006	Ne ɔso marasuãdze ɔrui masɛ maabara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔpia ma.
40021007	Makɔ ɔfirimu gu ɔ̃ ibi mabɔ, maɖi ma sikati masia i mabɔi iso fiɛ Yesu ɔta ɔsɛ i ma iso.
40021008	Maturi gbodzoo ɔɖi ma awu masɛ i ɔri fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔɖaɛ kudzirikpai mafere i ɔri iso.
40021009	Maturi gbodzoo ma nɖe Yesu katɔ̃ gu mma ngbikama to mafa kayiɖu teteree sɔ, “Boale David Ɔbi, fiɛ Ɣaa aafere ngɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame kusɛkusɛ. Boale Ɣaa!”
40021010	Gɔ Yesu ɔbo Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, kulu ko nto ɣee, ne maturi to makarɛ sɔ, “Ne nna ɔɖe ngbe?”
40021011	Ne mawɛ̃ to matã mmuai sɔ, “Ɔ̃ nɖe Kanyaɖidze Yesu gɔ lobɔrɛ i Nasaret i Galilea ne.”
40021012	Yesu ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃asa mma ɔɖuɖu nto maɣa ara gu mma nto marɔdɛ̃ ara ɔɖi i mmɔ. Ɔli mma nto manyuarã sikã sipɔrɔ̃ gu mma nto marɔdɛ̃ abɔrɔnuma ayara ɔpɛyu.
40021013	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maarɔ wũ iyo sɔ kayi kakparamakɔ̃,’ ɣɛɛ miɔsu ne mibara mayukukpe kawɛrɛkɔ̃!”
40021014	Manɔbiɛdze gu mabafã ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i kasɔrɛkɔ̃ mmɔ fiɛ ɔsa ma.
40021015	Ɣɛɛ gɔ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze ɔnya awawãra wa ɔto ɔbara gu kumɛgɔ i mabiɛtɛ to mala kulu i isɔrɛyo ame sɔ, “Maale David Ɔbi!” ne, ikpɛ̃ ma sikpã.
40021016	Ne mato makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Ato anɔ nnɛ mato maɣɛ i ngbe?” Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Nto lonɔ. Miika itɔ̃me nɛgbe minya i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Akararã mabiɛtɛ sɔ ma kanya ame i ile nɛ loyi sɛ ibɔrɛ.’ ”
40021017	Ne kama ne, Yesu ɔrui ɔnyua ma ɔkɛlɛ Betania ɔmagɛ̃ ame ngbegɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃arɛ.
40021018	Kaɖesɛ̃a kaya tututu gɔ ɔ̃ɔkpese ɔto ɔba ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ.
40021019	I ɔri kuruɛ ne, ɔnya figi kudziri gɔ kuɣɛ ne ɔso ɔkɛlɛ kɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔsɛ ne, ɔ̃inya ibi kuiwɛ̃ iɖo aɣata. Ne ɔɣere kudziri sɔ, “Ita i nɔme ne, aisibaɣɔ̃ abi anya.” Ɔluwɛ̃ kudziri ko loɣɔ.
40021020	Gɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnya nnɛ loba ne ibara ma ɣii, ne mato makarɛ sɔ, “Nda i kuɖedziri ɔɣɔ ɔluwɛ̃ ngbɔ?”
40021021	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ si mifɔ miɖe fiɛ miiwararã ne, mito miawo nnɛ lobara kudziri gɔgbe ɔbara. Fiɛ iiɖe ne kere, ɣɛɛ mito miaɣere kube gɔgbe sɔ, ‘Kɛlɛ aafuĩdza so apia i ɔpo ame,’ fiɛ iaba ngbɔ.
40021022	Si mifɔ Ɣaa miɖe ne, ira biara nɛ miakarɛ wũ i kayi ikparama ame ne, mito miafɔ ne.”
40021023	Yesu ɔkpese ɔba isɔrɛyo ame ne gɔ ɔto ɔte ara ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu makpakpa ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Lɛ ana ɔle gɔ ato abara ala ara wagbe fiɛ nna lotã-ɔ ɔle gɔmɔ?”
40021024	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mitã lokarɛ mi itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ lonɔ, si mitã me mmuai ne, nto loaɣere mi ɔle gɔ loto lobara ala ara wagbe.
40021025	Yohanes ne, nna lotã wũ ɔle fiɛ ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu? Ɣaa ɛɛbɛrɛ maturi lotã wũ?” Ne matsɛgu so iwararã sɔ, “Be boaɣɛ? Si boɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ɔto ɔ̃akarɛ bo sɔ ‘Be ɔso miifɔ Yohanes miɖe?’
40021026	Ɣɛɛ si boɣɛ ana sɔ ‘Maturi kɔrɛ’ ne, boto bonigã maturi alasɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ maɖe sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe.”
40021027	Ne ɔso maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Boiɣe ngbegɔ i ɔ̃ ɔle ɔbɔrɛ.” Ne Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme wũ loibaɣere mi ngbegɔ i wũ ɔle gɔ loto lobara ala karabara gagbe ɔbɔrɛ.”
40021028	“Nda minya itɔ̃me nɛgbe? Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ ɔba mabirɛrɛĩ inyɔ. Ɔɣere kpakpare sɔ, ‘Ɔbi, sɛ aabara karabara i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame nɔme.’
40021029	“Ɔbi ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔse sɔ, ‘Loibasɛ,’ ɣɛɛ ne kama ne, ɔfinikira ɔ̃ adzuni ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ sia.
40021030	“Ɔse ɔkpere ɔbi nyɔare ɔpia wũ katɔ̃me gagbe ame. Ɔtɔrã i ɔ̃ ɔse katɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃asɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃isɛ.
40021031	“Mabi inyɔ magbe ne, ma ɔmele lobara ɔ̃ ɔse kuɖɔɛ?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Kpakpare.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ, ma lampofɔdze gu asɔrɔ̃ maɖedze ɔɔɖe mi katɔ̃ makpa Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
40021032	Alasɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔba ɔ̃ate mi sibɔlɔlɔ ɔri, ɣɛɛ miifɔ wũ miɖe, ɣɛɛ ma lampofɔdze gu asɔrɔ̃maɖedze ɔfɔ wũ maɖe. Atoa sɔ minya nwagbe ne, miifinikira mi adzuni mifɔ wũ miɖe.”
40021033	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minɔ igbã mama ana. Kpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe ku ɔwi gɔ lofe gɔ ɔkpɛ̃ adziribi wa masɛ masu mabara ala ndã kakpɛkɔ̃. Ɔtɛ̃ ɔkpã ɔki ɔlɔ kakpɛkɔ̃, ɔɖi itawo nɛ ame maakã ndã, fiɛ ka ɔtsue iyo kɔlɛa ngbegɔ i ngɔ loadzuɛ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ aaya. Ɔsu kakpɛkɔ̃ ɔpia i marabaradze nrɔɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔkɛlɛ ɔri.
40021034	Gɔ adziribi ɔsɔrɛ̃wi ɔɣo ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ maɖabo sɔ masɛ maafɔ ɔ̃ kaɖekɔ̃ mabɔ wũ i marabaradze kɔrɛ.
40021035	“Marabaradze ɔmɔɛ̃ maɖabo magbe, mapɛ ɔwɛ̃, maɖoe ɔwɛ̃, fiɛ mapɛ ɔwɛ̃ ata.
40021036	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔledza maɖabo mama isese iɖo maɖeakatɔ̃. Ma wũ ne, marabaradze ɔbara ma lɛ maɖeakatɔ̃.
40021037	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔsese ɔ̃ ɔbi ala ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Loɣe sɔ mato maawarɛ wũ ɔbi.’
40021038	“Ɣɛɛ gɔ marabaradze ɔnya ɔbi ne, maɣere so sɔ, ‘Kakpɛkɔ̃ sate ɔbi gɔ loaɖe ɔ̃ ara i ngbe ne. Mitã boɖoe wũ si boaɖe ɔ̃ ara.’
40021039	Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ wũ mafuĩdza i ɔkpã kama fiɛ maɖoe wũ.”
40021040	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be mifɔ miɖe sɔ kakpɛkɔ̃ sate aabara marabaradze magbe si ɔba?”
40021041	Matã mmuai sɔ, “Ɔto ɔ̃aɖoe marabaradze lalaa magbe ɔsu kakpɛkɔ̃ ɔtã marabaradze mama ma loasu ɔ̃ kaɖekɔ̃ mabɔ wũ i ɔwi iso si masɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui.”
40021042	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Ita nɛ i mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ sɔ iilɛ ne, ne loba iakpese ita nɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖo ata ɔɖuɖu pelepele ne. Bosate lobara ira siare nɛgbe fiɛ ibo bo anɔ gbaã!’ ”
40021043	Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ sɔ, “Ɣaa to ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔfɔ mi iso ɔsu ɔtã mma loaɣɔ̃ abi sɛɛ.
40021044	Ngɔ loakpase i itã nɛgbe iso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɛfɛ̃ ɖukuɖuku, fiɛ ngɔ i ita nɛgbe aakpase iwuĩ ne, ito iakɔtɛ wũ ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ.”
40021045	Gɔ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Farisise ɔnɔ agbã wa i Yesu ɔpɛ ne, matsue sɔ ma ɔto.
40021046	Ne ɔso mabie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ wũ, ɣɛɛ manigã maturi gbodzoo ma mpia i mmɔ ala masɛ mabu Yesu lɛ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze awe.
40022001	Yesu ɔledza agbã isu ite ma ara sɔ,
40022002	“Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ ngbe. Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, igara ɔwɛ̃ ɔkɔ ɔrɔ̃go ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔbi.
40022003	Ɔpia ɔ̃ maɖabo sɔ masɛ maakpere mma matã itsue sɔ maba iyi kaɖekɔ̃ sɔ ka maba, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maito maba.
40022004	“Ne ɔso ɔpia maɖabo mama sɔ maɣere ma sɔ, ‘Lotã maɖoe mabɔi gu ma nantsuĩ ma mba iɖa, mawa aɖera masɛ, ira biara ɔɔkote, ne ɔso ka miba wũ ɔpɔrɔ̃ gɔ lotu lotã irɔ̃gokɔ katɔ̃!’
40022005	“Ɣɛɛ maturi ma makpere iipia wũ kanya. Makɛlɛ ma kurabara iso, ɔwɛ̃ ɔkɛlɛ sia, ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔkɛlɛ kuɣa kaɖekɔ̃.
40022006	Mawɛ̃ ana ɔmɔɛ̃ maɖabo mamɔ mapɛ ma, maɖoe mma.
40022007	Sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ igara gɔmɔ gbaã, ne ɔso ɔpia ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze masɛ maaɖoe maturiɖoese mamɔ, matsuedza ma ɔmagɛ̃.
40022008	“Ne ɔkpere ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔrɔ̃go ikɔ aɖera wa mawa ka ase, ɣɛɛ mma lokpere sɔ maba maaɖe ara iikote.
40022009	Ne ɔso mikɛlɛ siri iso si mikpere ɔbiara gɔ mianya mibɔ.’
40022010	Ne maɖabo ɔrui makɛlɛ itiri gu siri iso masɛ maakpere maturi ɔɖuɖu ma manya, masɛɛ gu malalaa, itã sɔ iyo nɛ ame matu ɔpɔrɔ̃ ɔyi gu maturi.
40022011	“Gɔ igara ɔba ɔ̃anyɔ mma loba aɖera kaɖekɔ̃ ne, ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ loipia awu wa masɛ mapia i ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃.
40022012	Ne igara ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔlaa, nda abara fiɛ abo i ngbe gɔ aipia irɔ̃gokɔ awu?’ Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iinya kuira ɔɣɛ.
40022013	“Ne igara ɔɣere ɔ̃ maɖabo sɔ, ‘Minyi wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba si mifuĩdza wũ i kayoma i idududu ame. Mmɔ i kaku gu inyɛwe pia ne.’ ”
40022014	Ne Yesu ka ɔwirigu ma sɔ, “Maturi gbodzoo i Ɣaa ɔkpere, ɣɛɛ kɛkɛĩ kere ɔ̃aɖi i ma ndɛ̃.”
40022015	Ma Farisise ɔsɛ maabara adzuni sɔ maamɔɛ̃ Yesu i ma atɔ̃me ikarɛ ame.
40022016	Ne ɔso mapia ma marasuãdze gu Herodes masiaidze mawɛ̃ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, boɣe sɔ asɛ aɣɛ ɔnukuare, asɛ ate maturi nnɛ nɖe Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ gɔ aisɛ akã siruɛ atsue alasɔ aisɛ anyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃.
40022017	Ne ɔso ɣere bo fɔ adzuni. Lɛ sɔ boatã Roma Igarakpakpa lampo ɛɛbɛrɛ ita iya i bo mmara iso?”
40022018	Yesu ɣe ma adzuni ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ma nsɛ mibie sɔ mibo maturi anɔ! Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miala me minyɔ?
40022019	Mitã me sikã dzɛ misɛ mitã ala lampo lonyɔ.” Ne masu mabɔ wũ ne.
40022020	Ne ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna katɔ̃ gu iyere iɖe nsia i sɛ̃ iso?”
40022021	Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Roma Igarakpakpa ire iɖe.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misu nnɛ nɖe Kaisaro ire mitã wũ si misu nnɛ nɖe Ɣaa ire ana mitã Ɣaa.”
40022022	Gɔ manɔ nnɛgbe ne, ibara ma ɣii, ne marui maɣɛ wũ ne.
40022023	Iyi nɛmɔ ame ne, ma Zadukise ma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ makpise iisibata ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maba maaɣere wũ sɔ,
40022024	“Ratedze, Mose ɔɣɛ sɔ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ maiɣe ɔbi ne, ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi si ɔsu ɔrɔ̃go ɔyiri si maɣe mabi. Maanyɔ mabi ma maaɣe mmɔ lɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi gɔ lokpi mabi.
40022025	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, manyiibi rɛrɛ̃ ikɔdzɛ mawɛ̃ ɔwe i ngbe. Kpakpare ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go ɣɛɛ ɔ̃iɣe ɔbi fiɛ ɔkpi ɔnyua ɔ̃ ɔre ɔsɛ ɔ̃ ɔkpeama.
40022026	Ngbɔ ame ibara ɔbirɛrɛĩ nyɔare ɔtɛare gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ isɛ iabo ɔkɔdzɛva ne.
40022027	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃akpi.
40022028	Kiniɔ ne, ma nna ɔre i ɔrɔ̃go aaɖe ku iyi nɛ i makpise aaledza ita gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɔyiri wũ manya.”
40022029	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mmɔ miɣɛrɛ ne, alasɔ miiɣe Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me fiɛ miiɣe Ɣaa ɔle ana.
40022030	Alasɔ si makpise ɔta ne, maase lɛ Ɣaa makpabo ma i kato fiɛ maibayiri so.
40022031	Ɣɛɛ i makpise ita iso ne, miika nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere mi? Ɔɣɛ sɔ,
40022032	‘Mme nɖe Abraham Ɣaa gu Isak Ɣaa gu Yakob Ɣaa ne.’ Magbanadze Ɣaa ɔɖe ne iiɖe makpise ɔre ɔɖe.”
40022033	Gɔ maturi gbodzoo ma mpia mmɔ ɔnɔ ara wagbe ne, ɔ̃ ara ite ɔbara ma ɣii.
40022034	Gɔ ma Farisise ɔnɔ kumɛgɔ i Yesu mmuai ɔpia ma Zadukise ibɔra i kanya ne, maba maasakanya.
40022035	Ne ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe mmaratedze ɔkarɛ Yesu itɔ̃me sɔ si ɔla wũ ɔnyɔ ne.
40022036	Ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, mme mmara lomɔ miɖo?”
40022037	Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ Bosate Ɣaa ku fɔ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu gu fɔ ɔkala ɔɖuɖu gu fɔ adzuni ɔɖuɖu
40022038	Mmɛgbe nɖe mmara ɖeakatɔ̃ gu mmɛ lonya miɖo pelepele ne.
40022039	Minyɔare mɛ ka lonya se lɛ miɖeakatɔ̃, ‘Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔnyii lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.’
40022040	Mmara aka anyɔ wagbe iso matsue Mose mmara ɔɖuɖu gu Kanyamaɖidze ara ite masia ne.”
40022041	Gɔ ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔsakanya ne, Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ,
40022042	“Nna mibu sɔ Kristo ɖe? Nna ɔbi ɔɖe?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Igara David Ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɖe.”
40022043	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Si igara David ɔbi ɔɖe ne, lɛ ise ɔso i David ɔki i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle ame ɔkpere wũ sɔ Bosate? David ɔɣɛ sɔ,
40022044	‘Ɣaa ɔɣere Bosate sɔ, “Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loatã asu ngba asia i fɔ matsirise iso.” ’
40022045	Si igara David ɔkpere wũ Bosate ne, nda i Kristo aaɖe ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔɣɛ?”
40022046	Ma kuwɛ̃ iiwo Yesu mmuai ɔtã, ne ɔso ita iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, ma kuwɛ̃ iisikarɛ wũ kuira.
40023001	Ne Yesu ɔɖegu maturi gbodzoo gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ika ne.
40023002	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mmara matedze gu ma Farisise nɖe mma maɖi ɔri sɔ mate Mose mmara.
40023003	Ne ɔso mikã ma atsue si mibara ibiara nɛ maɣere mi sɔ mibara, ɣɛɛ ne, midaasiai ma kurabarara, alasɔ maisɛ mabara i nnɛ masɛ mate iso.
40023004	Masɛ manyi ato wa mba ɔrɔrã fiɛ asɛ aɖa isore masorera maturi, ɣɛɛ maisɛ mabie sɔ maapiagu ma kɔrɔ̃ si mabuai ma masore.
40023005	“Masɛ mabara ira biara sɔ maturi aanyɔ ma. Minyɔ Ɣaa atɔ̃me siare wa matsɛrɛ i ɔkati iso masu manyi so iti gu nrɔɔ̃ si minyɔ kumɛgɔ i ma awu atsueti amɔ fiɛ akarã!
40023006	Si makpere ma i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃ ne, masɛ maɖɔɛ kusɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa. Masɛ maɖɔɛ masɛ i kusɛkɔ̃ sɛɛ gu kusɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa i ma kusarɛkɔ̃ ana.
40023007	Masɛ maɖɔɛ sɔ maturi si maya ma ku ibu i kuɣa ame si makpere ma ratedze.
40023008	“Madaakpere mi sɔ ratedze, alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ne, manyii miɖe fiɛ ratedze ɔwɛ̃ saã miba.
40023009	Midaakpere kuwɛ̃ i karɔ̃ iso ngbe sɔ Tete alasɔ ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã miba gɔ mpia i kato.
40023010	Madaakpere mi sɔ Tɔ̃ɖedze alasɔ mi tɔ̃ɖedze ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ miba nɖe Kristo.
40023011	Ngɔ nto ɔbie iyere i mi ndɛ̃ si ɔkpese mi ɔɖabo
40023012	Ɔbiara gɔ lokɔlɛ so kato ne, maabɔ wũ karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lobɔ so karɔ̃ ne, makɔlɛ wũ kato.
40023013	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Miɖɔɛ Ɣaa i anɔmi anɔmi ame kere! Misɛ misɛ̃ Ɣaa sigara kaɖekɔ̃ kayogodɔ̃ sɔ maturi si madaabo ku ɔwi gɔ i mi mɔmɔ ana ɔsɛ̃ sɔ miito mibo fiɛ misɛ̃ sɔ mma nto mabie sɔ maabo ana sɔ madaabo!
40023014	Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Miɖɔɛ Ɣaa i anɔmi anɔmi ame kere! Alasɔ misɛ miɖe makpise mare amumu, fiɛ misɛ mikparama kayi dzoroo i iteso ame. Nwagbe ɔso ne, mi kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ to iamɔ!
40023015	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Miɖɔɛ Ɣaa i anɔmi anɔmi ame kere! Alasɔ misɛ miwara ɔpo misɛ nrɔ̃ agbãagbã iso misɛ miaɖi ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ mitã Ɣaa, ɣɛɛ si mibara ngbɔ miro ne, misɛ mibara wũ ngɔ lonyanyarĩ ɔɖo mi i itɔkpe ame ikɛlɛ ame!
40023016	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma nto mikɔ maturi ɣɛɛ manɔbiɛdze miɖe! Misɛ mite sɔ, ‘Si ɔturi ɔtarĩgu Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ne, mmara iinyi wũ, ɣɛɛ si ɔtarĩgu sikã dzɛ nse i isɔrɛyo ne, ɔ̃ i mmara ɔnyi ne.’
40023017	Manɔbiɛdze dzimifɔ! Imele lonya iɖo? Sikã ɛɛbɛrɛ isɔrɛyo nɛ losekelera sikã?
40023018	Misɛ mite ana sɔ, ‘Si ɔturi ɔtarĩgu isɔrɛkasege ga iso masɛ mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa ne, mmara iinyi wũ, ɣɛɛ si ɔtarĩgu karatã ga nsia i isɔrɛkasege iso ɣɛɛ ne, mmara ɔnyi wũ.’
40023019	Anɔmi ɔbiɛ mi gbaã! Imele lonya iɖo? Karatã ɛɛbɛrɛ isɔrɛkasege ga losekelera karatã?
40023020	Ne ɔso si ɔturi ɔtarĩgu isɔrɛkasege ne, ta ara wa nsia i isɔrɛkasege iso ɔɖuɖu iɖe ɔtarĩgu.
40023021	Fiɛ si ɔturi ɔtarĩgu Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ne, ɔtarĩgu ta Ɣaa gɔ nsi i mmɔ.
40023022	Fiɛ si ɔrere ɔtarĩgu Kato ne, ɔtarĩgu Ɣaa sigaraiyara gu ngɔ nsi iso.
40023023	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Mi ma nsɛ mibara ara sɔ si mibo maturi anɔ! Misɛ miɖi mi araɖea ika weova ta aposarɛbi, ibura sikɔma agbãagbã mitã Ɣaa. Ɣɛɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miibabara ara wa lonya aɖo i mmara ame wa nɖe nnyainyɔ, atɔ̃me iɣɛ i ɔri iso gu ɔnukuare ame. Ara wagbe ikote sɔ miasu mibua i nwa mimɔɛ̃ mito iso ne. Ɣɛɛ miibanyua kuiwɛ̃ misɛ.
40023024	Matɔ̃ɖedze nɔbiɛdze! Misɛ mitua ɔnidzɔ gɔ lobo i mi ndã ame ɣɛɛ misɛ mimɛ kapuipɔngɔ!
40023025	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Mi ma nsɛ mibara ara sɔ si mibo maturi anɔ! Misɛ mifore mi akɔi gu arɔi kama, ɣɛɛ wã kame ɔyi ku ara wa miɖe maturi amumu mifɔ ku so ɔle.
40023026	Farisise nɔbiɛdze, fore ikɔi ame tɔtɔ, iyɔ kama ka ito iare sekelee!
40023027	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Mi ma nsɛ mibara ara sɔ si mibo maturi anɔ! Mise lɛ maturi akpibiɔ wa matsue makua kukaakɔ, ɣɛɛ wã ame ɔyi ku makpise buria ku akui.
40023028	Ngbɔ ame i maturi ɔɖuɖu anɔmi ame ne, mire maturi sɛɛ, ɣɛɛ mi ame ɔyi ku mila gu akpi.
40023029	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze gu ma Farisise! Mi ma nsɛ mibara ara sɔ si mibo maturi anɔ! Misɛ mitsue akpibiɔ mitã Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze fiɛ misɛ miledza mma losɛ ngbã sɛɛ akpibiɔ kukaakɔ.
40023030	Misɛ miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Si bo nsi ngbã ku bo mawa ɔwi ne, tee boiɖoe kanyamaɖidze mamɔ lɛ bo mawa awe.’
40023031	Ne ɔso mito misia ita sɔ mma loɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze mawa miɖe.
40023032	Mikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ si mibara ara wa i mi mawa ɔsɛ karɔ̃ miwiri.
40023033	“Maturi lalaa! Mise lɛ maɣɛ gu ma mabi. Mifɔ miɖe sɔ miawo ɔtere i itɔkpe kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ nto iba kanya?
40023034	Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ nto loasese mi kanyamaɖidze gu manɔgbadze gu mmara matedze. Mito miaɖoe mawɛ̃, mipɛ mawɛ̃ mimatãra i kudziri iso, mipɛ mawɛ̃ i mi kusarɛkɔ̃, mitere misa ma ita i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame ikpa ɔmama ame.
40023035	Ne ɔso ne, maturi sɛɛ ma ɔɖuɖu maɔɖoe ita i Abel bɔlɔlɔa iso isɛ iabo Zakaria gɔ nɖe Berakia ɔbi gɔ miɖoe i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ku Isɔrɛkasege ndɛ̃ kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ to iaba mi iso.
40023036	Nto losia ita lotã mi sɔ ituriɖoe nɛgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ne kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ to iaba kiniɔgbe maturi iso!
40023037	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem, asɛ aɖoe kanyamaɖidze ma i Ɣaa sɛ ɔpia fɔ kɔrɛ, fiɛ asɛ apɛ Ɣaa maɖabo ma ɔsɛ ɔpia-ɔ ata. Loɔkpɛ̃ sɔ si losu nrɔɔ̃ lofu-ɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i kɔkɔ ɔnyi sɛ ɔwarɛ abue ɔfu akɔkɔibi, ɣɛɛ asɛ̃ me.
40023038	Ne ɔso fɔ Isɔrɛyo to iakpese iyoku.
40023039	Ita i kiniɔ ne, aisibanya me gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miaɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa kusɛkusɛ si kuwegu ngɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame.’ ”
40024001	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba maakarɛ wũ si ɔkarã inɔ i kumɛgɔ matsue ne ayo iso.
40024002	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ. Alasɔ gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ mato maabiɛbiɛ wã ɔɖuɖu gɔ ita kuiwɛ̃ iibakuti isia i ne ɔlaa iso sɔ maibasisi mapɛyu.”
40024003	Gɔ Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba maakarɛ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ, “Ɣere bo ɔwi gɔ i ara wagbe aaba, ɔwi gɔ aakpese aba gu nnɛ loate sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔɣo.”
40024004	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibasɔsɔla mi.
40024005	Alasɔ maturi gbodzoo to maasu wũ iyere maba maaɣere mi sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Kristo,’ fiɛ maasɔsɔla maturi gbodzoo.
40024006	Mito mianɔ kakpã gu kakpã iso atɔ̃me i mi kɔrɛ gu kadzorokɔ̃ ɣɛɛ midaamararã so, ara wagbe igbã to aaba ɣɛɛ iite sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔɣo.
40024007	Karɔ̃ kawɛ̃ iso maturi to maakpɛ̃gu karɔ̃ mama iso maturi, sigarakaɖekɔ̃ to siakpɛ̃gu sigarakaɖekɔ̃, kukã gu karɔ̃ iti to iaba i karɔ̃ agbãagbã iso.
40024008	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu se lɛ kuɣe iɖoɖo ibo ɖeakatɔ̃.
40024009	“Mato maamɔɛ̃ mi matã makpadzɛ̃ kutsue fiɛ maaɖoe mi. Nrɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso maturi to maatsiri mi ala wũ ɔso.
40024010	Maturi gbodzoo to maasɛ̃ ma kafɔkaɖe ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame fiɛ maaɖi ma malaa matã, matsiri so.
40024011	Mila kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo to maabɔrɛ masɔsɔla maturi gbodzoo.
40024012	Ara lalaa ibara to iakɔlɛ kato sɔ maturi gbodzoo iisibaɖɔɛ so.
40024013	Ɣɛɛ mma loaya teteree isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃ to maana iɖi.
40024014	Mato maaɣɛ Sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu sɔ iaɖe ikparĩ itã nrɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso maturi, ne kama ne, kawirikɔ̃ aaba.
40024015	“Mito mianya Ɣaa itsirira ɔba iaya i kasekelekɔ̃, ngbegɔ iikote sɔ iaya lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Daniel ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ. Ngɔ nto ɔka ɔko gɔgbe si ɔpia kubɛ sɔ ɔ̃anɔ karɔ̃.
40024016	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, mma mpia i Yudea si matere makɛlɛ abe iso.
40024017	Ngɔ nsia i ɔ̃ iyo isã si ɔdaaso ɔba iyo ame sɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ara.
40024018	Ngɔ mpia i sia ana si ɔdaakɛlɛ ayo ame sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ awu.
40024019	Ndzo miɖe mitã mayirise gu matalɛpo ma nto mabi ɣɛtɛ ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame!
40024020	Mitã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔwi gɔ miatere iibaɖe ɔyu ɔwi ɣee iwarãyi iso.
40024021	Alasɔ inyɛwe siare nɛ loaba ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, ne igbã iiba inya ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iba iabo nɔme, fiɛ ne igbã iisibaba inya ana.
40024022	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtu ayi wamɔ koko alasɔ si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, kuwɛ̃ iibana iɖi, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ so ɔso ne, ɔ̃abɛrɛkɛ i ayi wamɔ iso.
40024023	Ne ɔso si ɔrere ɔba ɔ̃aɣere mi sɔ, ‘Nyɔ, ɔɔnya Kristo i ngbe,’ ɣee ɔrere ɔɣere mi sɔ, ‘Ɔpia i mmɔ’ ne, midaafɔ miɖe.
40024024	Alasɔ mila ma Kristo gu kanyamaɖidze to maaba. Mato maabara awawãra siare gu ara wa loabara maturi ɣii sɔ si masu masɔsɔla ta mma nɖe Ɣaa maturi si maawo.
40024025	Mikã me atsue! Alasɔ loɔɣere mi loɖegu katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔwi gɔmɔ aaɣo.
40024026	“Si maɣere mi sɔ, ‘Ɔpia i fafuĩ ame’ ne, midaakɛlɛ sɔ mianyɔ. Si maɣere mi sɔ, ‘Ɔwɛrɛ i iyo kame i ngbe’ ne, midaafɔ miɖe.
40024027	Alasɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ne, nto loaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i kado sɛ ɔma i kuɖokpo ɔbɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ isɛ iabo kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃.
40024028	Ngbegɔ i ira kpia se ne, mmɔ i akolomo sɛ asakanya ne.
40024029	“Si inyɛwe ɔwi gɔmɔ ɔfe ɔro kere ne, kuɣɛ̃ to kuagudu, ɔgbaworeti iisibafiɛ, awãmi to aakpakpase abɔrɛ i kato fiɛ kato sile to siati sibɔrɛ i sɛ̃ kawekɔ̃.
40024030	“Iyɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ikparĩ to iabɔrɛ i kato fiɛ kayiiso maturi aapɛ kaku kumɛgɔ manya wũ to ɔba i ɔle gu ifiɛ siare ame.
40024031	Kadadã siare to kaare fiɛ ɔ̃apia ɔ̃ makpabo kayi akpakpai wã ana ɔɖuɖu sɔ masa ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ kanya ita i kayi iti nɛ isɛ iabo nnɛgbe.
40024032	“Mitã kuɖedziri si kute mi ara. Si kuɔtsɛ akpa ɣɛtɛ itsue fiɛ ka kuto kuɖi aɣata ɣɛtɛ ne, mitsue sɔ kado ɔwi ɔɔbore ɔbo.
40024033	Ngbɔ ame si minya sɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ka ato aba ne, mitsue sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ka kaba kaasɛ karɔ̃.
40024034	Mitsue sɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aaba fiɛ maturi ma nsi ku kiniɔ aakpi maro.
40024035	Kato gu karɔ̃ to kaafe, ɣɛɛ wũ atɔ̃me iibafe anya.
40024036	“Kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iyi ɣee ɔwi gɔ i nwagbe aaba. Ɣaa makpabo ma i kato, ɣee Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi kɔra iiɣe iɖo wũ Ɔse ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɣe.
40024037	Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi iba to iase lɛ kumɛgɔ i Noa ɔwi ɔse awe.
40024038	Si kado aaba ɔ̃apɛ ndu ayi minina kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne, maturi ɔla maɔɖe ara maɔnɛ ndã, marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go to mayiri so gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iyi nɛ i Noa ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ame.
40024039	Ɣɛɛ maitsue nnɛ nto iba gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ndu ɔyi miba miasore ma ɔɖuɖu miruigu. Ngbɔ ame i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔbawi ana aase ne.
40024040	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ to maaya i kakpɛkɔ̃, Ɣaa aasu ɔwɛ̃ ɔruigu ɔnyua ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣedza.
40024041	Marɔ̃go inyɔ to maaya i kukɔtɛ katɔ̃ mala maɔkɔtɛ ara, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ɔwɛ̃ ɔruigu ɔnyua ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ.
40024042	“Ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so alasɔ miiɣe iyi nɛ i Bosate aaba.
40024043	Si iyosate ɣe iyi nɛ i yukukpe aaba ɔ̃ayu wũ ne, tee ɔ̃ibarɛ sirɛ, ɔ̃asɛ ɔdzuɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ibatã yukukpe ɔbiɛ ɔ̃ iyo ɔbo ɔyu ara.
40024044	Ne ɔso mi wũ midzuɛ̃ so alasɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi to ɔ̃aba ku ɔwi gɔ miito minyɔ wũ ɔri ame.
40024045	“Kiniɔ ne, nna nɖe ɔɖabo nukuarese gu nɔgbadze? Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ si makɔse ɔsu maɖabo tsɔra ɔpia i ɔ̃ kayirinɔ ne, ɔ̃atã ma aɖera i ɔwi sɛɛ iso.
40024046	So aaɣɔ ɔɖabo gɔmɔ si makɔse ɔkpese ɔba ɔ̃anya sɔ ɔto ɔbara ngbɔ.
40024047	Nto losia ita lotã mi sɔ makɔse to ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ karana ɔɖuɖu ɔpia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ ɔnyɔ iso.
40024048	Ɣɛɛ si ɔɖabo lalaa ɔɖe ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɣere so sɔ, ‘Bokɔse to ɔ̃ana ɔpã fiɛ ɔ̃aba!’
40024049	Ne ɔso ɔto ɔ̃atsɛ ɔ̃ maɖabo laa ipɛ, itsɛ aɖera iɖe, inɛ ndã ku matarɛ̃dze.
40024050	Ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔ̃aba ku iyi nɛ ɔ̃ito ɔnyɔ wũ ɔri ku ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃iɣe.
40024051	Makɔse to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue gbaã fiɛ ɔ̃ inyɛwe to iakotegu mma nsɛ mabie sɔ mabo maturi anɔ ɔkpɛ i ngbegɔ i kaku gu inyɛwe pia!
40025001	“I ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ aase lɛ ngbe. Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, mabitɛ iweo mawɛ̃ ɔsu ma sikaniɛ sɔ maasarɛgu ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔkɔ ɔrɔ̃go.
40025002	Mabitɛ iweo magbe ame ne, iru ɖe madzimifɔ fiɛ iru ana ɖe manɔgbadze.
40025003	Madzimifɔ ɔsu ma sikaniɛ, ɣɛɛ maisu nnɔĩ mabua i sikaniɛ iso.
40025004	Manɔgbadze ɣɛɛ ne, mato nnɔĩ i abui ame mabua i mmɛ mpia i ɔkaniɛ ame iso.
40025005	Gɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze ɔgbikama ku iba ɔso ne, mabitɛ ɔtsɛ sirɛ itua kere ne marɛ sirɛ ne.
40025006	“Lɛ kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ne, kulu ɔsia sɔ, ‘Ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze ɔɔba ɔ̃abo ne miba miasarɛgu wũ!’
40025007	“Mabitɛ iweo ɔɖuɖu ɔta, ne mayara ma sikaniɛ ne.
40025008	Ne madzimifɔ to maɣere manɔgbadze sɔ, ‘Mitã bo mi nnɔĩ kɛkɛĩ alasɔ bo sikaniɛ ka sinyi.’
40025009	“Ne manɔgbadze ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Ooɣo! Bo nnɔĩ iibaɣo bo gu mi inyɔ ne mikɛlɛ mma nto marɔdɛ̃ kɔrɛ miaɣa.’
40025010	“Ku marui kere ne, ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze ɔba ɔ̃abo. Mabitɛ iru ma nɣɛ masia wũ ɔsiai wũ makɛlɛ ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃ kere ne masɛ̃ kayogodɔ̃ ne.
40025011	“Ne kama ne, mabitɛ dzimifɔ iru mamɔ ɔba maabo, ne makpere sɔ, ‘Tete! Tete! Sese bo!’
40025012	“Ne ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, ‘Ooɣo! Loiɣe mi!’ ”
40025013	Ne Yesu ɔwirigu ma igbã sɔ, “Ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so alasɔ miiɣe iyi ɣee ɔwi gɔ ame loaba.
40025014	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ aase lɛ ngbe. Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔkɛlɛ ɔri dzoroa, ne ɔso ɔkpere ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔsu ɔ̃ karana ɔpia ma i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
40025015	Ɔtã ma ɔbiara i ma ɔle kanya. Ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔtã wũ sikã sikoto iru, ɔwɛ̃ ana ikoto inyɔ fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔkoto ɔwɛ̃ fiɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔri.
40025016	Ɔɖabo gɔ lofɔ ikoto iru ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃afinikira nrɔɔ̃ i ɔ̃ sikã iso ɔna ikoto iru mama ɔsia i iso.
40025017	Ngbɔ ame ngɔ lofɔ ikoto inyɔ ana ɔsɛ ɔ̃ana ikoto inyɔ ɔbua ne.
40025018	Ɣɛɛ ɔɖabo gɔ lofɔ ɔkoto ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akuri iwo ɔsu makɔse sikã ɔkɔla.
40025019	“Ayi gbodzoo kama ne, makɔse ɔba sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃akigu ma i siko ame ɔnyɔ nnɛ maɔna masia.
40025020	Ɔɖabo gɔ lofɔ sikã ikoto iru ɔsu sikoto iru nɛ ɔna ɔsia i iso ɔbɔ. Ɔɣere makɔse sɔ, ‘Tete, sikã ikoto iru atã me ɣɛɛ loɔna ikoto iru mama lobua iso.’
40025021	“Makɔse ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ɖafe, ɔɖabo sɛɛ gu nukuarese aɖe! Gɔ aɖe ɔnukuare i ara kosoi ame ɔso ne, loasu ara siare lopia i fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ba nagu me isoɣɔ!’
40025022	“Ɔɖabo gɔ matã sikã ikoto inyɔ ana ɔba ɔ̃abo, ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete, sikã ikoto inyɔ iɖe atã me, ɣɛɛ ne, nyɔ, loɔna ikoto inyɔ losia i iso.’
40025023	“Makɔse ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ɖafe, ɔɖabo sɛɛ gu nukuarese aɖe. Kumɛgɔ aɖe ɔnukuare i ara kosoi ame ɔso ne, loasu ara siare lopia-ɔ i nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ba nagu me isoɣɔ!’
40025024	“Ne ɔɖabo gɔ matã sikã ɔkoto ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔba ɔ̃abo ne. Ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete, loɣe sɔ ɔturi gɔ itɔ̃me mba ɔle aɖe. Asɛ asu aɖera i ngbegɔ aikpɛ̃, fiɛ asɛ asa ɔraɖui kanya i ngbegɔ aisa ɔraɖui.
40025025	Ne ɔso gɔ loto lonigã-ɔ ɔso ne, lokuri karɔ̃ losu fɔ sikã lobiara. Nya fɔ sikã i ngbe!’
40025026	“Ne makɔse ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, ‘Ɔɖabo lalaa gu dãdze aɖe. Aɣe sɔ nsɛ losu aɖera i ngbegɔ loikpɛ̃ fiɛ nsɛ losa ɔraɖui kanya i ngbegɔ loisa ɔraɖui?
40025027	Iyɔ be ɔso fiɛ aisu wũ sikã asɛ aasɛ i sikã kakɔlakɔ̃ sɔ si loba ne, loasɛ loafɔ sɛ̃ ku kusia?’
40025028	“Ne ɔ̃ ɔkɔse ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mimɔɛ̃ sikã mifɔ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ misu mitã ngɔ mba ikoto iweo.’
40025029	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ mba ira ne, maatã wũ mabua ɔna isi gbodzoo, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nna kuira ne, kɛkɛĩ gɔ ame ɔba ne, maamɔɛ̃ mafɔ wũ iso.
40025030	Ɔɖabo gɔ nna kusia kukuwɛ̃ i ngbe ɣɛɛ ne, mifuĩdza wũ mipia i idududu ame ngbegɔ i kaku gu arɔĩ iɖo ikpa pia.
40025031	“Ɔwi gɔ i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aaba lɛ igara gu ɔ̃ makpabo ne, ɔto ɔ̃asɛ i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso.
40025032	Fiɛ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu aaya i ɔ̃ katɔ̃. Mmɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ ma ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i ngɔ nto ɔɣedza masɛrɛ sɛ ɔɣɛ kutepuĩ gu masɛrɛrerɔ̃ ame ne.
40025033	Ɔto ɔ̃atã maturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔya i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso fiɛ malalaa ana aaya i ɔ̃ kubena iso.
40025034	“Ne igara aaɣere mma nɣɛ wũ i kuɖearɔ̃ iso sɔ, ‘Miba, mi ma i Tete ɔtã isobuɛ, miba miabo i sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga maledza masɛ mi ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ame.
40025035	Alasɔ kukã ɔkpɛ̃ me, mitã me aɖera, ɔme ɔkore me, mitã me ndu lonɛ, loɖe ɔfɔ lobo mi, mifɔ me.
40025036	Minya me losɛ isɔ̃, mitã me arapia, gɔ lonyɛ ne, minyɔ me iso fiɛ gɔ mamɔɛ̃ me marara i iyo ne, miba minyɔ me.’
40025037	“Mmɔ i maturi bɔlɔlɔa aakarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, ku mme ɔwi bonya-ɔ sɔ kukã to-ɔ botã-ɔ aɖera ɣee ɔme ɔkore-ɔ botã-ɔ ndu?
40025038	Ku mme ɔwi bonya-ɔ aɖe ɔfɔ aba bo kɔrɛ fiɛ bofɔ-ɔ ɣee asɛ isɔ̃ botã-ɔ arapia?
40025039	Ku mme ɔwi bonɔ sɔ ato anyɛ boba boaya-ɔ ɣee mamɔɛ̃-ɔ marara i iyo boba boaya-ɔ?’
40025040	“Mmɔ i igara aatã ma mmuai sɔ, ‘Ira biara nɛ miabara mitã manyii ma loire kuira i ngbe ne, mme mibara mitã.’
40025041	“Ne ka ɔ̃aɣere mma i ɔ̃ kubena iso sɔ, ‘Mirui me i kɔrɛ mi ma i Ɣaa ɔgbarĩ. Mikɛlɛ itɔkpe nɛ mapia masɛ Ɔbosam gu ɔ̃ makpabo fiɛ iisɛ inyi ame!
40025042	Alasɔ kukã ɔkpɛ̃ me, miitã me aɖera, ɔme ɔkore me, miitã me ndu.
40025043	Loba loabo mi lɛ ɔfɔ, ɣɛɛ miifɔ me, losɛ isɔ̃ miitã me arapia. Nto lonyɛ, miinyɔ me iso mamɔɛ̃ me marara i iyo miiba mianyɔ me.’
40025044	“Mmɔ maakarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, ku mme ɔwi bonya sɔ kukã ɣee ɔme ɔkore-ɔ ɣee aɖe ɔfɔ ɣee asɛ isɔ̃ ɣee ato anyɛ ɣee arɛ i iyo fiɛ boibuai-ɔ?’
40025045	“Ne igara aatã ma mmuai sɔ, ‘Nto loɣere mi sɔ ira biara nɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miito mibara mitã manyii ma loire kuira i ngbe ne, mme miibara mitã!’
40025046	“Mmagbe ne, maakɛlɛ ngbegɔ inyɛwe iibaro inya fiɛ maturi sɛɛ ne, maakɛlɛ isoɣɔ nɛ loibaro inya ame.”
40026001	Gɔ Yesu ɔɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔro ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ,
40026002	“Miɣe sɔ iɔkuti ayi anyɔ gɔ maaɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi fiɛ maaɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã mapɛ me mamatãra i kudziri iso.”
40026003	Masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔsarɛ i Kayafa gɔ nɖe masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele iyo.
40026004	Ne masɛ iti ame sɔ maamɔɛ̃ Yesu i iwɛrɛ ame maaɖoe.
40026005	Ɣɛɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Boiba bara ne ku iyi ɔɖewi, si iiɖe ngbɔ kulu to kuaba.”
40026006	Gɔ Yesu ɔsɛ Betania ne, ɔsɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Simon, fiɛ ɔnyɛ ɔnyɛrɛtɛa ɔnya iyo.
40026007	Gɔ Yesu si ɔto ɔɖe ara ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔ nnɔĩ mɛ nsɛ mifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ fiɛ mipia i ita inɔĩbui ame ɔba ɔ̃afere wũ iti.
40026008	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔnya nnɛgbe ne, ikpɛ̃ ma sikpã. Ne mato makarɛ sɔ, “Be nɖe karanina gagbe?
40026009	Tee maawo nnɔĩ mɛgbe ɔrɔdɛ̃ ku kuɣa siare masu sikã matã mawɛrɛba!”
40026010	Yesu ɣe nnɛ mato maɣɛ, ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito miɖaa wũ? Ira sɛɛ iɖe ɔbara ɔtã me.
40026011	Mawɛrɛba to maawe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loito loawe i mi kɔrɛ ɖaa.
40026012	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe nnɔĩ mɛ ɔsɔla me ngbe ne, ɔ̃ɔledza me ɔtã ibiara.
40026013	Ne ɔso nto losia ita lotã mi sɔ, kakɔi biara ga maaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ne, maasu nnɛ ɔbara ɔtã me ngbe manyigi wũ ala.”
40026014	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yuda Iskariot ɔkɛlɛ masɔrɛdze makpakpa kɔrɛ,
40026015	ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ ma sɔ, “Be miatã me si loɖi Yesu lotã mi?” Ne ɔso maka sikãfudza abi sitɛ matã wũ.
40026016	Ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yuda ɔtsɛ ɔri sɛɛ gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi Yesu ɔtã ma ibie.
40026017	I iyi ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ iso masɛ maɖe Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iyi ne, marasuãdze ɔba maakarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Lɛ ato abie sɔ bowa Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo iyi aɖera botã-ɔ?”
40026018	Ne ɔpia ma ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ kɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ratedze sɔ, “Wũ ɔwi ɔɔɣo, gu wũ marasuãdze aaɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera i fɔ iyo.” ’ ”
40026019	Marasuãdze ɔbara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔɣere ma, ne mawa Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera ne.
40026020	Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ matsɛ aɖera iɖe.
40026021	Ɔwi gɔ mato maɖe ara ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔ̃aɖi me ɔtã.”
40026022	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɖaa marasuãdze, ne mato makarɛ wũ isia isia sɔ, “Bosate, loɣe sɔ iiɖe mme ato. Bɛrɛ mme ɔɖe?”
40026023	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ nto ɔpiagu me kɔrɔ̃ i irɔi ame ɔɖe loaɖi me ɔtã.
40026024	Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi to ɔ̃akpi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ, ɣɛɛ ndzo miɖe mitã ngɔ loaɖi wũ ɔtã. Si maiɣe ɔnyiiɔ kɔra ne, ilɛ wũ iɖo!”
40026025	Ne Yuda gɔ loɖi wũ ɔtã ɔtara kanya ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Ratedze, loɣe sɔ iiɖe mme ato lo?” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nto aɣɛ.”
40026026	Ɔwi gɔ masi mato maɖe ara ne, Yesu ɔsu boɖoboɖo, ne gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i ɔ̃ iti ne, ɔsu ɔtã ma ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mifɔ miɖe, wũ sosina i ngbe ne.”
40026027	Ne ɔsu ndã ikɔi ne, gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i ne iti ne, ɔsu ɔtã ma, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mifɔ minɛ.
40026028	Wũ ima nɛ nto isia ita i Ɣaa ndamu ɣɛtɛ iso ne, ima nɛ mafere i karɔ̃ itã maturi gbodzoo akpi isu itsɛ.
40026029	Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ loisibanɛ ndã gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iyi nɛ loanɛgu mi miɣɛtɛ i wũ Ɔse sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
40026030	Ne gɔ maka kuka male Ɣaa ne, mabɔrɛ makɛlɛ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso.
40026031	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Kasɛ̃ gagbe ne, mi ɔɖuɖu to miatere minyua me, ikuti wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃, alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖoe masɛrɛkɔdze fiɛ ɔ̃ masɛrɛ aasame.’
40026032	Ɣɛɛ si loɔta lobɔrɛ i makpise ame ne, nto loaɖe mi katɔ̃ lokɛlɛ Galilea.”
40026033	Petro ɔtara kanya sɔ, “Si matsɔra ɔɖuɖu aatere maɣɛ-ɔ kɔra ne, mme loibatere loɣɛ-ɔ lonya ɖa!”
40026034	Ne Yesu ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Si makɔkɔ aaɖi kanya nɔme ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.”
40026035	Petro ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Si inya sɔ loakpigu-ɔ kɔra ne, loibasɛ̃-ɔ lonya ɖa.” Marasuãdze tsɔra ana ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ame.
40026036	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔrui makɛlɛ ngbegɔ marɔ sɔ Getsemane, ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misɛ i ngbe si lokɛlɛ mmɔ loakparama kayi.”
40026037	Ɔkɔ Petro gu Zebedeo mabi inyɔ, ne ɔtsɛ so imararã iti ikpakpa ne.
40026038	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “So to sima me ta wũ ɔtu ame gɔ loɔro ɔfɛ̃, misɛ i ngbe si midzuɛ̃gu me.”
40026039	Ne gɔ ɔkɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔkɔlɛ ɔfu i karɔ̃ ɔkparama kayi ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, si ialɛ ne, tã inyɛwe ɔwi gɔgbe si ɔta ɔwara me! Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe wũ kuɖɔɛ, nnɛ i fɔ aɖɔɛ si abara.”
40026040	Gɔ ɔkpese ɔba marasuãdze itɛ mamɔ kɔrɛ ne, ɔnya sɔ maɔrɛ sirɛ, ne ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Ne ɔso miibawo me ɔsɛ ɔdzuɛ̃gu bidɛ ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃?
40026041	Misɛ mila miɔdzuɛ̃ si mikparama kayi si miibabo i ilainyɔ ame. Siwarã ɣɛ teteree, ɣɛɛ siturina ɔɔfɛ̃.”
40026042	Yesu ɔledza ikɛlɛ isɛ iakparama kayi iɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, si aibasɛnɛkɛ̃ra ikɔi nɛgbe aɖi me iso iɖo sɔ loanɛ ne, bara fɔ kuɖɔɛ, ne iiɖe wũ kure.”
40026043	Gɔ ɔkpese ɔba ne, ɔnya sɔ marasuãdze ɔɔrɛ sirɛ, ala sirɛ to si mɔɛ̃ ma.
40026044	Yesu ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aledza kayi ikparama iɣɛ atɔ̃me wamɔ ame.
40026045	Ɔkpese ɔba marasuãdze kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikpese mirɛ mito miwarã? Minyɔ ɔwi ɔɔɣo, maɔɖi Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi mapia makpibaradze i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
40026046	Mita si borui! Minyɔ, miɔnya ngɔ nto ɔɖi me ɔtã.”
40026047	Yesu ɣɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ara wagbe fiɛ Yuda gɔ nɖe marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃abo. Ɔsɛgu maturi gbodzoo ma i masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔpia fiɛ mato atekpe gu kudziriku.
40026048	Ngɔ loɖi wũ ɔtã ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ minya sɔ loya fiɛ lofiɔ̃ irɛkpo ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖe ne, mimɔɛ̃ wũ!”
40026049	Yuda ɔsɛ tiĩ ɔkɛlɛ Yesu kɔrɛ, ne ɔya wũ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã-ɔ, ratedze.” Ne ɔfiɔ̃ wũ irɛkpo ne.
40026050	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ ɔlaa nnɛ ɔso aba ne, tã ipɛ-ɔ siwa si abara ne!” Ne mma i Yuda sɛgu ɔbore mabo Yesu fiɛ mamɔɛ̃ wũ teteree ne.
40026051	Mma nsiai Yesu mmɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi ɔ̃ itekpe ɔtu masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele ɔɖabo kutsue.
40026052	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Pia fɔ itekpe i ɔyuɛ ame ala mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ masu atekpe i maturi iso ne, atekpe kanya maakpi.
40026053	Bɛrɛ miiɣe sɔ loawo wũ Ɔse ɔbiɛ ɔkpere ɔluwɛ̃ ɔsese me Ɣaa makpabo kpakpɛ̃dze akuri aweo-anyɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i kato?
40026054	Ɣɛɛ si iiba ngbɔ ne, nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame iibaba i ne ame.”
40026055	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ maturi gbodzoo mamɔ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ miaba miamɔɛ̃ me ku apɛmi gu kudziriku lɛ yukukpe loɖe? Gɔ iyi biara lopia i isɔrɛyo nto lote ara ne, be ɔso miimɔɛ̃ me?
40026056	Ɣɛɛ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba i ne ame sɔ nnɛ i kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame aaba i ne ame.” Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɖuɖu ɔrui matere maɣɛ wũ ne.
40026057	Mma lomɔɛ̃ Yesu ɔkɔ wũ makɛlɛgu Kayafa iyo ngbegɔ i mmara matedze gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔsakanya.
40026058	Petro ɔsiai ma kamakama ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele kakpataku ame. Ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i madzuɛ̃se kɔrɛ sɔ si ɔnyɔ kumɛgɔ i ira biara aakɛlɛ i katɔ̃.
40026059	Masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɖuɖu ɔbie itɔ̃me nɛ maanyi masia Yesu iso fiɛ maaɖoe wũ.
40026060	Ɣɛɛ maina kuiwɛ̃ atoa sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔba maala mila masia wũ iso. Kama ne, marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ mawɛ̃ ɔba,
40026061	ne maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loabiɛ Ɣaa isɔrɛyo loledza ne itsue i ayi atɛ ame.’ ”
40026062	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔta ɔya ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Nwa ɔɖuɖu mato maɣɛ ne, ana kuira aaɣɛ i wã iso?”
40026063	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔma kanya kpa. Ne sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “I Ɣaa iyere ame ne, nto lokã ndamu lotã-ɔ sɔ, ɣere bo si fɔ nɖe Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi.”
40026064	Ne Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ, ngbɔ iɖe ne. Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ ita i kiniɔ ne, mito mianya Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi gɔ ɔsi i Ɔlesate kuɖearɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔto ɔba i adɔdɔ ame!”
40026065	Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔkɛ ɔ̃ awu ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mmusuo! Maɖansiɛ kumawɛ̃ iisinya bo. Mi ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ mmusuo itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ!
40026066	Nda minya?” Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ikote sɔ ɔ̃akpi!”
40026067	Matua minyatu mafere wũ i katɔ̃, mapɛ wũ, fiɛ mma lopɛ wũ sirɔ̃ta
40026068	to maɣere wũ sɔ, “Gɔ fɔ nɖe Kristo ne, ɣere bo ngɔ lopɛ-ɔ!”
40026069	Gɔ Petro si i kakpataku ame mmɔ ne, sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔɖaborɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ wũ asiai Yesu gɔ lobɔrɛ i Galilea karɔ̃ iso.”
40026070	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔsɛ̃ i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ sɔ, “Loiɣe nnɛ ato aɣɛ i ngbe.”
40026071	Ne ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya i kayogodɔ̃ ne. Ɔɖaborɔ̃go mama ɔnya wũ gɔ ɔɣɛ, ne ɔɣere marɛrɛ̃ ma nɣɛ i mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ wũ ɔsiai Yesu Nasaretse.”
40026072	Mmɔ ana Petro ɔsɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lokã sɔ loiɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ!”
40026073	Iidzoro fiɛ marɛrɛ̃ ma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Fɔ wũ ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ aɖe ala fɔ ikaɖe ɔɖi-ɔ itã!”
40026074	Ne Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lokã sɔ ɔnukuare nto loɣɛ! Ɣaa si ɔkpadzɛ̃ me kutsue si iiɖe gbaã iɖe sɔ loiɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kɔkɔ ɔɖi kanya.
40026075	Ne Petro ɔnyigi nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si kɔkɔ aaɖi kanya ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.” Ne ɔso Petro ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ inyamɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abiɛ kaku teteree.
40027001	Kaya tutuutu ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔbara adzuni sɔ maaɖoe Yesu.
40027002	Manyi wũ fiɛ masu wũ masɛ maapia i Roma Abã ɔkpakpa Pilato nrɔɔ̃ ame.
40027003	Gɔ Yuda gɔ loɖi Yesu ɔtã ɔnɔ sɔ maɔtã Yesu kukpi ipɔ ne, ibo wũ so, ne ɔso ɔkpesegu sikãfudza abi sitɛ wa ɔfɔ ɔkɛlɛgu masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa.
40027004	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Lobara ikpi, alasɔ loɖi ɔturi gɔ loibara ikpi lotã sɔ maɖoe.” Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Fɔ itɔ̃me iɖe ne iisu bo kuira i mmɔ.”
40027005	Ne Yuda ɔsa sikã ɔfere i isɔrɛyo fiɛ ɔrui ɔsɛ ɔ̃asa so ɔɖoe ne.
40027006	Ne masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔsu sikã fiɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Ima sikã siɖe i ngbe fiɛ bo mmara iitã ɔri sɔ boasu sɛ̃ bopia i isɔrɛyo sikã ame.”
40027007	Gɔ maɣɛ manɔgu so karɔ̃ ne, masu sɛ̃ masɛ maaɣa karɔ̃ ga masɛ marɔ sɔ, “Rapɔdze Karɔ̃” sɔ maala ma ɔbiara mafɔ i mmɔ.
40027008	Ne ɔso fiɛ ipɛ i nɔme ne, masɛ marɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ sɔ Ima Karɔ̃ ne.
40027009	Ne ɔso nnɛ i kanyaɖidze Yeremia ɔɣɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, “Masu sikãfudza abi sitɛ wa i Israel maturi ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ maatã i ɔ̃ iti,
40027010	masɛ maaɣa rapɔdze karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔɣere me.”
40027011	Yesu ɔya i Roma Abã Ɔkpakpa Pilato katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ma Yudase Igara?” Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ. Nnɛ ato aɣɛ pia i ne ame.”
40027012	Ɣɛɛ nwa ɔɖuɖu i masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔɣɛ ne, ɔ̃itã mmuai.
40027013	Ne Pilato to ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ato anɔ nwa ɔɖuɖu mato maɣɛ i fɔ iso?”
40027014	Ibara abã ɔkpakpa ɣaa gbaã kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔtã ku itɔ̃me mmuai.
40027015	Ikɔ biara si ma Yudase to maɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ne, Roma abã ɔkpakpa sɛ ɔnyua yorɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i kaɖe ɔkarɛ ɔtã ma.
40027016	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, yorɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ iyere loɔre i ara lalaa ibara ame fiɛ marɔ wũ sɔ Baraba ɔwe.
40027017	Ne ɔso gɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔsakanya ne, Pilato ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna mito mibie sɔ lonyua lotã mi? Baraba ɛɛbɛrɛ Yesu gɔ mato makpere sɔ Kristo?”
40027018	Ɔbara ngbɔ alasɔ ɔnya sɔ ma Yudase makpakpa ne, sirerɛ ɔso kere maɖi wũ matã.
40027019	Gɔ Pilato si ɔ̃ atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ iyo ame ne, ɔ̃ ɔre ɔpia wũ ɔturi ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Daapia kanya i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ itɔ̃me ame alasɔ ɔ̃ibara kuira nɛ loatã maɖoe wũ. Losɛ̃ arɛ nyanyarĩa i ɔ̃ iti i kasɛ̃ ame.”
40027020	Masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔɣɛ mapia maturi sɔ makarɛ Pilato sɔ ɔnyua Baraba ɔtã ma si ɔɖoe Yesu.
40027021	Ne ɔso gɔ Pilato ɔkarɛ iturikuri sɔ, “Nna mito mibie sɔ lonyua lotã mi?” ne, matã mmuai sɔ, “Baraba!”
40027022	Ne Pilato to ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be si lobara Yesu gɔ marɔ sɔ Kristo?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso!”
40027023	Pilato ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mme ikpi iɖe ɔbara.” Ne masiagu kulu teteree sɔ, “Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso!”
40027024	Gɔ Pilato ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ibawo ma adzuni ɔfinikira ne kulu to kuaba ne, ɔsu ndu ɔfore nrɔɔ̃ i iturikuri katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ kɔrɔ̃ gu kukpa na i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe kukpi ame. Mi itɔ̃me iɖe.”
40027025	Ne iturikuri to matã mmuai sɔ, “Ɔ̃ kukpi ato si aba i bo gu bo mabi iti iso!”
40027026	Pilato ɔnyua Baraba ɔtã ma, ne gɔ ɔtã mapɛ Yesu ala iporoibi ne, ɔnyua wũ ɔtã ma sɔ masɛ maapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso.
40027027	Ne Pilato makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ Yesu mapia i Abã ɔkpakpa iyo ame fiɛ makpakpɛ̃dze ikuri ɔɖuɖu ɔki malɔ wũ ne.
40027028	Maɖi wũ ɔ̃ arapia fiɛ masu ɔgo rɛtɛa awu mapia wũ.
40027029	Masu miyu mabara ala igarakoto matɔ̃medza wũ fiɛ masu ɔdziri matã wũ. Mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃, fiɛ ka mato mabara wũ aɣiãra sɔ, “Ii iɖuu! Ma Yudase Igara si ɔsɛ ngbã dzoroo.”
40027030	Matua minyatu mafere wũ fiɛ masu ɔdziri maɖeɖe wũ iti.
40027031	Gɔ maɔbara wũ aɣiãra maro ne, maɖi wũ ɔgo rɛtɛa awu wa mapia wũ fiɛ makpesegu ɔ̃ are mapia wũ fiɛ maɣo ɔri sɔ maapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso.
40027032	Gɔ mato mabɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, manya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Kirene fiɛ marɔ wũ sɔ Simon. Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔya wũ iso sɔ ɔfɔgu Yesu ɔnyigbã gɔ ɔsore.
40027033	Masɛ maabo ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Golgata gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ɔturi Itikui.
40027034	Matã Yesu ndã mɛ masakanya ku kua gɔ mba ɔɖo sɔ ɔnɛ, ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔti ɔnyɔ ne, ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnɛ.
40027035	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔpɛ wũ mamatara i kudziri iso fiɛ ka mapɛ sibɔ ala atalebi i ɔ̃ awu iti si matsue ɔbiara nwa loaɣo wũ.
40027036	Ne kama ne, masɛ i mmɔ mato madzuɛ̃ wũ.
40027037	I ɔ̃ sitikpe ne, matsɛrɛ masia i kakoloi kawɛ̃ iso nnɛ ɔso maɖoe wũ. Matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Yesu, ma Yudase Igara ngbe ne.”
40027038	Mapɛ mayukukpe inyɔ ana mamatãra ku wũ, ɔwɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana i ɔ̃ kubena iso.
40027039	Mma nto mafe to matidza ma ati fiɛ mato matia Yesu.
40027040	Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ gɔ fɔ sɔ aabiɛ Ɣaa iyo aledza ne itsue i ayi atɛ ame! Si Ɣaa Ɔbi aɖe ne, bɛse so i kudziri iso si aɖi so.”
40027041	Ngbɔ ame i masɔrɛdze makpakpa, mmara matedze gu kaɖe makpakpa ana ɔma wũ maɣɛ sɔ,
40027042	“Ɔbuai mamama, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iito ɔwo so ɔɖi. Iiɖe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Israel igara? Si ɔbɛse so i kudziri iso kiniɔ ne, boto boafɔ wũ boɖe!
40027043	Ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe fiɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi mɔmɔ, mitã bonyɔ si Ɣaa aaso ɔba ɔ̃aɖi wũ!”
40027044	Ta mayukukpe ma mapɛ mamatãra ku wũ ana ɔtia wũ ngbɔ.
40027045	Kakɔme iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ ame ne, kayi ɔsɛ̃ guduu ifɔ iɖɔwũ itɛ.
40027046	Lɛ kakɔme iɖɔwũ itɛ ame ne, Yesu ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, “Wũ Ɣaa, wũ Ɣaa, be ɔso fiɛ anyua me asɛ ngbɔ?”
40027047	Mma nɣɛ i mmɔ fiɛ manɔ wũ ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔto ɔkpere Eliya!”
40027048	Ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔtere ɔsu ɖɔti pukupukua ɔpia i ndã bea ame ɔsu ɔɖu i ɔdziri iso ɔtara ɔtã wũ sɔ ɔnɛ.
40027049	Ɣɛɛ matsɔra ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Miya! Mitã bonyɔ si Eliya aaba ɔ̃aɖi wũ i kudziri iso.”
40027050	Yesu ɔledza kulu ila teteree kere ne ka ɔsɔra ne.
40027051	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame tutuutu ne ɔkati kpikpirikpi gɔ nsa i Kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔkɛ aka anyɔ ita i kato iba karɔ̃. Karɔ̃ ɔti fiɛ ata ɔbiɛbiɛ,
40027052	akpibiɔ ɔbusi, fiɛ maturi sekelea gbodzoo ma loɔkpi mafegu ɔta mabɔrɛ i makpise ame.
40027053	Mabɔrɛ i ma akpibiɔ ame fiɛ ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ne, makɛlɛ Ɔmagɛ̃ Sekelea ame fiɛ maturi gbodzoo ɔnya ma.
40027054	Gɔ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gu makpakpɛ̃dze ma nɣɛ mato madzuɛ̃ Yesu ɔnya karɔ̃ iti gu ira biara nɛ loba ne, maɣɛ i ifɔ̃ ame sɔ, “Gbaã ne, Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe i ngbe!”
40027055	Marɔ̃go gbodzoo ɔya dzoroo mala maɔnyɔ nnɛ nto ikɛlɛ i katɔ̃. Marɔ̃go magbe losiai wũ mabɔrɛ i Galilea fiɛ mala maɔbuai wũ ne.
40027056	Ma nɖe Maria Magdalase gu Maria Yakobo gu Yosef mɛrɛ̃ ɔnyi gu Zebedeo ɔre.
40027057	Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, ranase ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yosef fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Arimatea ɔba. Ɔ̃ wũ ne, Yesu rasuãdze ɔɖe.
40027058	Ɔsɛ Pilato kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ sɔ ɔsu Yesu kpise ɔtã wũ, ne Pilato ɔɖi ɔri sɔ masu matã wũ ne.
40027059	Ne ɔso Yosef ɔsu kpise ɔmini i ɔkati ɣɛtɛ ame,
40027060	Ɔsu ɔrara i ɔ̃ ikpibiɔ nɛ ɔɖi ɔsɛ so i ita ame, ne ka ɔli ita siare ɔtɛ̃ i kanya fiɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne.
40027061	Maria Magdalase gu Maria nyɔare si mato manyɔ ikpibiɔ katɔ̃.
40027062	Kaɖesɛ̃a ga nɖe Iwarãyi ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Farisise ɔsarɛgu Pilato.
40027063	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔbea, boto bonyigi sɔ gɔ ladze gɔmɔ si ngbã ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nto loaledza ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame ku iyi tɛare si lokpi.’
40027064	Ne ɔso boto bobie sɔ tã ɔle si madzuɛ̃ ɔ̃ ikpibiɔ kukaakɔ sɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze iibasɛ maayu ɔ̃ kpise mafiniki maɣere maturi sɔ ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame. Sila tsɔra dzɛgbe to sianyanyarĩ siɖo siɖeakatɔ̃.”
40027065	Ne Pilato ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɔ makpakpɛ̃dze mikɛlɛgu si mitã madzuɛ̃ ikpibiɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ miɖɔɛ.”
40027066	Ne ɔso marui masɛ maasɛ̃ ikpibiɔ kukaakɔ, masɛ ne ikparĩ fiɛ ka matã makpakpɛ̃dze ɣɛ mato madzuɛ̃.
40028001	Iwarãyi kama, ku Kɔsiɖa ɔɖesɛrã ne, Maria Magdalase gu Maria nyɔare ɔkɛlɛ sɔ maanyɔ Yesu ikpibiɔ.
40028002	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, karɔ̃ ɔti teteree, Ɣaa kpabo ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔli ita nɛ masɛ̃ i ikpibiɔ kanya ɔsɛ i kuruɛ fiɛ ɔkpase ɔsɛ ne iso.
40028003	Ɔnyɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i kado sɛ ɔma fiɛ ɔ̃ arapia ɔfudza lɛ atumagɛrɛĩ.
40028004	Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze mati makpakpa, makpese lɛ makpise.
40028005	Ne kpabo gɔmɔ ɔɣere marɔ̃go sɔ, “Midaanigã, loɣe sɔ Yesu gɔ mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso mito mibie.
40028006	Ɔna i ngbe. Ɔ̃ɔta ɔpia ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣere mi ɔsɛ. Miba mianyɔ ngbegɔ marara wũ.
40028007	Mikɛlɛ mala miaɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ɔta ɔpia ngbã ne ɔɖe mi katɔ̃ ɔkpa Galilea. Mmɔ mianya wũ ne.’ Minyigi nnɛ loɣere mi.”
40028008	Ne ɔso marui i ikpibiɔ kɔrɛ mmɔ ku ifɔ̃, ɣɛɛ ku isoɣɔ matere makɛlɛ masɛ maaɣere Yesu marasuãdze.
40028009	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ ɔya i ma katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã mi.” Mabore mabo wũ mamɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ ngba masɔrɛ wũ.
40028010	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaanigã, mikɛlɛ miaɣere wũ manyiibi sɔ makɛlɛ Galilea ne mmɔ maasarɛgu me ne.”
40028011	Gɔ marɔ̃go ɔrui mato makɛlɛ ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ma wũ marui makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame masɛ maaɣere masɔrɛdze makpakpa ara wa ɔɖuɖu manya.
40028012	Masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔsarɛgu kaɖe makpakpa fiɛ mabara adzuni, matã makpakpɛ̃dze sikã titiiti.
40028013	Ne maɣere ma sɔ, “Miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Gɔ borɛ ku kasɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba maayu ɔ̃ kpise maruigu.’
40028014	Si Roma abã ɔkpakpa ɔnɔ fiɛ ikpese itɔ̃me ne, boto boaɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ bote wũ sɔ miibana itɔ̃me.”
40028015	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔfɔ sikã fiɛ mabara lɛ kumɛgɔ maɣere ma sɔ mabara, ne ɔso itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔki ikã i ma Yudase ndɛ̃ iba iapɛ i nɔme.
40028016	Ne kama ne, marasuãdze iweo-ɔwɛ̃ ɔkɛlɛ kabemi kawɛ̃ ga i Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ makɛlɛ iso i Galilea.
40028017	Gɔ manya wũ ne, masɔrɛ wũ, atoa sɔ mawɛ̃ ɔwararã.
40028018	Yesu ɔbore ɔbo ma ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔsu ɔle ɔɖuɖu gɔ i kato gu karɔ̃ ɔtã me.
40028019	Ne ɔso mikɛlɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu kɔrɛ i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu si mibara ma sɔ maakpese wũ marasuãdze. Mipie ma Ɣaa ndu i Ɔse gu Ɔbi gu Siwarã Bielea iyere ame.
40028020	Si mite ma sɔ mabara ira biara nɛ loɣere mi. Fiɛ minɔ! Lopiagu mi ɔwi biara isɛ iabo kayi kawirikɔ̃.”
41001001	Itɔ̃me Bielea ise i Yesu Kristo, Ɣaa Ɔbi iso ngbe ne.
41001002	Koko ɔwi ne, Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso sɔ, “Loasese kpabo ɔɖe-ɔ katɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃aledza maturi ɔtã fɔ iba.
41001003	Mito mianɔ ɔ̃ isãya gɔ ɔto ɔki i fafuĩ karɔ̃ ame sɔ, ‘Miledza ɔri mitã Bosate iba. Mikpɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔri sekelee!’ ”
41001004	Kpabo gɔgbe nɖe Yohanes gɔ lowe i fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ ɔpie maturi ndu i ɔwore ame lɛ ma Yudase sɛ mabara awe ne. Ɔɣere ma sɔ mafiniki i ma situ ame manyua akpi ɔbara si mafɔ ndu ipie kubarara si Ɣaa aasu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma.
41001005	Maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔrɛ i Yudea karɔ̃ iso gu ma ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ nɖe Yerusalem makɛlɛ fafuĩ ame sɔ maakã Yohanes itɔ̃me atsue. Gɔ maɖi ma ara lalaa maɣɛ ne, Yohanes ɔpie ma ndu i Yordan ɔwore ame.
41001006	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Yohanes awu wa ɔpia ne, kapuipɔngɔ siwɛrɛ̃ masu mawe, fiɛ ɔsu bɔi ɔko kafiami ɔtɔ so ɔsɔ. Aɖera wa ɔla ɔ̃ɔɖe nɖe maɣendu gu kugbadzedzei.
41001007	Ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔla iɣɛ nɖe sɔ, “Ɔturi gɔ loaba i wũ kama ne, ɔɖo me fafaafã, ngɔ ndokota iikote sɔ loabɔdzo loɖi.
41001008	Mme ne, ndu losu lopie mi. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔto ɔ̃asu Siwarã Bielea ɔpie mi.”
41001009	Ayi wamɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Nasaret i Galilea karɔ̃ iso, ɔba ɔ̃ɔfɔ Yohanes itupie kubarara i Yordan ɔwere ame.
41001010	Gɔ Yesu to ɔbɔrɛ i ndu ame ne, ɔnya kato ɔbusi, Siwarã Bielea ɔso sisia wũ iso lɛ ilɔpɔ.
41001011	Manɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kato sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe wũ Ɔbi gɔ loipia kuɣɛ, fiɛ abo me anɔ ne.”
41001012	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔkɔ wũ sikɛlɛgu fafuĩ ame.
41001013	Ɔwe i mmɔ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ ayi sina, ne Ɔbosam ɔba ɔ̃ala wũ ɔnyɔ ne. Ɔwe i mmɔ ku mabɔi lalaa. Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Ɣaa makpabo ɔso maba maabuai wũ mapia wũ ɔle.
41001014	Gɔ mamɔɛ̃ Yohanes mapia i iyo kama ne, Yesu ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Galilea karɔ̃ iso ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea.
41001015	Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔwi sɛɛ gɔmɔ ɔɔɣo. Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔbore ɔbo. Mifiniki si mifɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe miɖe.”
41001016	Gɔ Yesu to ɔkila i Galilea ibu kɔrɛ ne, ɔnya asabu mapiadze inyɔ ma nɖe Simon gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Andrea mato mapia asabu mamɔɛ̃ akpɛ.
41001017	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miba miasiai me si loakpesera mi maturi maɖidze mitã Ɣaa.”
41001018	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, manyua ma asabu masɛ marui masiai wũ.
41001019	Ɔsɛ kɛkɛĩ kere ne ɔnya manyiibi inyɔ ma nɖe Zebedeo mabi Yakobo gu Yohanes. Masi i ɔkolo ame mato maledza ma asabu.
41001020	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ma ne, ɔkpere ma sɔ masiai wũ. Ma wũ mata ɔluwɛ̃, marui i ma ɔse Zebedeo gu ɔ̃ marabaradze kɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame masiai Yesu.
41001021	Yesu gu ɔ̃ masiaidze magbe ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Kapernaum. Ma Yudase Iwarãyi ne, Yesu ɔsɛ ma kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate Ɣaa Itɔ̃me.
41001022	Ibara mma lokã wũ atsue ɣii, alasɔ ɔte ara lɛ ngɔ mba ɔle, iiɖe lɛ ma Yudase mmara matedze awe.
41001023	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i siwarã lalaa si iso fiɛ ɔwe i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ
41001024	ɔsiagu kulu teteree sɔ, “Yesu Nasaretse, be mpia i bo gu-ɔ ndɛ̃? Ɔba ɔɔba sɔ si aba aawɔra bo? Nɣe ɔturi gɔ igbã aɖe. Fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔsesea Sekelea ne.”
41001025	Yesu ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã sɔ, “Lo kutsuɛ si abɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame.”
41001026	Siwarã ɔtidza ɔrɛrɛ̃ ku ɔle, sitã ɔla kulu fiɛ sibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame sife.
41001027	Ibara mma lowe i mmɔ ɣaa, ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Be igbã iɖe ngbe ne? Mme ara ite igbã ka iɖe ngbe? Ngɔgbe ba ɔle ɔto ɔɖegu siwarã lalaa ika fiɛ sito sinɔ sibara i iso!”
41001028	Ne ɔso Yesu iyere ɔre i Galilea karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso.
41001029	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ne, ɔ̃ gu Yakobo gu Yohanes ɔkɛlɛ Simon gu Andrea iyo.
41001030	Gɔ mabo ne, mawɛ̃ ɔɣere Yesu sɔ Simon masɔrɔ̃go rɛ ɔto ɔnyɛ ɔbe ɔtɔ.
41001031	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔbore ɔbo wũ, ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃ ɔtara wũ ɔɣedza. Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔsarɛ ɔta ɔwa aɖera ɔtã ma.
41001032	Gɔ kuɣɛ̃ ɔbo iyo ne, maturi ɔsore manyɛse gu mma i siwarã lalaa si iso gbodzoo mabɔ Yesu kɔrɛ.
41001033	Ne ɔso ɔmagɛ̃ ame maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ maba maɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃ mato manyɔ.
41001034	Yesu ɔsa manyɛse ma nto manyɛ sinyɛ agbãagbã fiɛ ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i mma ame sipia. Ɔ̃itã siɖe ika alasɔ siɣe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo.
41001035	Ɔɖesɛrã si kaɖe aaɖaɛ ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ i kuwɛ̃ na ɔsɛ ɔ̃akparama kayi.
41001036	Ɔwi kama ne, Simon gu ɔ̃ malaa ɔbie Yesu.
41001037	Gɔ manya wũ ne, maɣere wũ sɔ, “Maturi fu i mmɔ mato mabie-ɔ!”
41001038	Ɣɛɛ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã bokɛlɛ simagɛ̃ dzɛ loki silɔ ame. Ma wũ inya sɔ loaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea, ala ne ɔso loba kayi ne.”
41001039	Ne ɔso ɔki i Galilea karɔ̃ iso. Ɔkiki ngbegɔ masɛ masarɛ ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea fiɛ ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i maturi ame.
41001040	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔnyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa ɔsɛ Yesu kɔrɛ. Ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔtã wũ iti ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si aɖɔɛ ne, aawo me ɔsa lose sekelee.”
41001041	Ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔɖo Yesu kayiri, ne ɔso ɔɖi kɔrɔ̃ ɔpɛgu wũ. Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loɖɔɛ, se sekelee!”
41001042	Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔsarɛ, ɔ̃ iso ɔse sekelee.
41001043	Mmɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ. Ɔsi wũ mmara sɔ,
41001044	“Daaɣere kuwɛ̃ nnɛ loba. Ɣɛɛ ne, kɛlɛ aasu so te Ɣaa sɔrɛdze si atã ara wa i Mose mmara ɔkarɛ si ite maturi sɔ ka ase sekelee.”
41001045	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔrui ne, ɔtsɛ ɔtsɛ itɔ̃me ikararã kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔsa wũ ɔnyɛ. Ne ɔso Yesu iisiwo ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔbo kpawee. Ne ɔso ɔwe i fafuĩ ame fiɛ maturi ɔbɔrɛ i ngɔi gbodzoo maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
41002001	Ayi arɛ̃saã kama gɔ Yesu ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Kapernaum ne, iifɔ ɔwi fiɛ maturi ɔnɔ sɔ ɔ̃ɔba ɔ̃abo ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
41002002	Maturi gbodzoo ɔba mmɔ gɔ kukpa kanɛkɔ̃ iisiwe i iyo nɛ kame mapia gu kayogodɔ̃. Ne ɔsɛ i mmɔ ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea ne.
41002003	Marɛrɛ̃ ina mawɛ̃ ɔsore nyɛse gɔ lofɛfɛ̃ mato mabɔ wũ.
41002004	Maina ɔri mabo i iyo alasɔ maturi ɔɣede. Ne ɔso ne, masɛ maabusi isã makigu nyɛse masora wũ i ɔkala ame masɛ i Yesu katɔ̃.
41002005	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ma kafɔkaɖe ne, ɔɣere nyɛse sɔ, “Ɔbi, losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ.”
41002006	Ma Yudase mmara matedze ma losɛ i ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔbu i ma situ ame sɔ,
41002007	“Be ɔso ɔto ɔɖe aka ngbɔ? Imusuora iɖe ɔɣɛ i Ɣaa iso ngbe. Ɣaa kotoo loawo akpi ɔsu ɔtsɛ.”
41002008	Yesu ɔtsue ma adzuni, ne ɔso ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito misusu ara wagbe i mi situ ame?
41002009	Be iɣɛ nse pɔkɔsɔɔ iɖo? Sɔ aaɣere nyɛse gɔ lofɛfɛ̃ sɔ, ‘Losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ’ ɛɛbɛrɛ, ‘Ta, su fɔ ɔkala si asɛ’?
41002010	“Loaɖi lote mi sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ba ɔle i kayi gagbe iso sɔ loasu akpi lotsɛ, ne ɔso minyɔ!” Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ nyɛse, ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ,
41002011	“Ta si asu fɔ ɔkala si akɛlɛ iyo!”
41002012	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔta ɔluwɛ̃, ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔkala, ne ɔbɔrɛ i maturi ndɛ̃ ne. Nnɛgbe ɔbara ma ɣii, ne ɔso matsɛ Ɣaa ile. Maɣɛ sɔ mainya ara wagbe igbã manya.
41002013	Yesu ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Galilea ibu kɔrɛ. Maturi gbodzoo ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔtsɛ ma Itɔ̃me Bielea ite.
41002014	Gɔ ɔsɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya Levi gɔ nɖe Alfeo ɔbi gɔ ɔsi i ɔ̃ karabara kabarakɔ̃ ɔto ɔfɔ lampo. Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ba siai me.” Ɔluwɛ̃ Levi ɔta ɔsiai wũ.
41002015	Kama ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze gu iturikuri nɛ nsiai wũ ɔba Levi iyo ame sɔ maaɖegu wũ aɖera. Ma lampofɔdze gu makpibaradze pia i mma nsiai wũ ndɛ̃.
41002016	Ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ mmara matedze ma nɖe ma Farisise ɔnya sɔ Yesu si ɔto ɔɖegu makpibaradze gu ma lampofɔdze aɖera ne, makarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Nda ɔso fiɛ mi ɔkɔse gu mmagbe igbã nsi maɖe ara?”
41002017	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ nnɛ mato maɣɛ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyɛse i kuabaradze ɔnya ɔtã, iiɖe mma nsarɛ. Loiba sɔ loaɣere mma nsɛ mabu sɔ ma sekele sɔ mafiniki, ɣɛɛ loba lotã maturi lalaa gu makpibaradze.”
41002018	Ɔwi gɔmɔ gɔ Yohanes gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze gu ma Farisise sɛ manyi kanya ɔso ne, mawɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ fɔ marasuãdze iisɛ manyi kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yohanes gu ma Farisise mare sɛ mabara?”
41002019	Yesu ɔtã mmuai i igbã ame sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go yiridze malaa sɛ manyi kanya i ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃? Ayi kumɛgɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ piagu ma ne, maibawo.
41002020	Ɣɛɛ ne, iyi iwɛ̃ mato maakɔ wũ maruigu i ma kɔrɛ, iyɔ ɔ̃ malaa ka maanyi kanya.
41002021	“Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔta ɔkati kuere ala kakatisɛi ɣɛtɛ. Si abara ngbɔ ne, kakatisɛi ɣɛtɛ gamɔ to kaakarĩ karui iyoi nɛ loabɛ iɖo iɖeakatɔ̃.
41002022	Ne ɔso ana ne, maisu ndã ɣɛtɛ mafere i bɔi ɔko akpo kuere ame. Si ndã ɣɛtɛ ɔtsɛ ifu ne, miatã sɔ ɔko kuere aabiɛ gɔ ndã gu bɔi ɔko akpo ɔɖuɖu aanina. Ne ɔso ndã ɣɛtɛ ne, akpo ɣɛtɛ ame masɛ mafere me.”
41002023	Iwarãyi iwɛ̃ gɔ Yesu sɛ ɔto ɔfe i kakpɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ame gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ne, marasuãdze ɔtsɛ atita ibɛbɛse iwe.
41002024	Ne ma Farisise ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso i fɔ marasuãdze to mabara nnɛ i bo mmara iitã ɔri sɔ maabara ku Iwarãyi.”
41002025	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame nnɛ i David ɔbara ɔwi gɔ i kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ gu ɔ̃ maturi? David ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ i
41002026	Abiata ɖe masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa. Ɔbo i Ɣaa iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃asu aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa ɔɖe, ɔkuti ɔtã ɔ̃ masiaidze ɔɖe gɔ mmara iitã ɔri iɖo Ɣaa masɔrɛdze ɔnɔwɛ̃.”
41002027	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔbara Iwarãyi ɔtã ɔturi isɛɛ, ɔ̃ibara ɔturi ɔtã Iwarãyi.
41002028	Ne ɔso Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi nɖe Iwarãyi Sate.”
41003001	Ɔwi mama ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ku Iwarãyi. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ kɔrɔ̃ lokarĩ ɔwe i mmɔ.
41003002	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, Yesu matsirise mawɛ̃ ma nto mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maaɖaɛ wũ kanya sɔ ɔɣɛrɛ ma mmara ɔkarã anɔ sɔ maanya si ɔ̃asa sinyɛ ku Iwarãyi.
41003003	Yesu ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ kɔrɔ̃ lokarĩ sɔ ɔta ɔya i ma katɔ̃.
41003004	Ne ɔki ɔnyɔ ma fiɛ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be i mmara ɔte? Sɔ ɔturi aabara isɛɛ, ɛɛbɛrɛ ilalaa ku Iwarãyi? Ɣee ilɛ sɔ aabuai ɔturi ɛɛbɛrɛ aanina ngbã?” Ɣɛɛ ne, ma kuwɛ̃ iiɣɛ kuira.
41003005	Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ ma ku sikpã, ana ne, iɖo wũ kayiri ala ma situ gbogboroa iti. Ne ɔɣere nyɛse sɔ, “Nabarã fɔ kɔrɔ̃.” Ɔnabarã kɔ̃. Ɔluwɛ̃ kere, ilɛ wũ.
41003006	Ne ma Farisise ɔrui masɛ maatu Herodes masiaidze mawɛ̃ sɔ si mabie ɔri matã ɔ̃ iɖoe ne.
41003007	-
41003008	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkɛlɛ Galilea ibu katɔ̃. Maturi akuri wa lobɔrɛ i mmɔ abuiti gu Yudea gu Yerusalem gu Idumia gu mma lobɔrɛ i Yordan ɔwore kama gu mma lose i Tiro gu Sidon simagɛ̃ ame ana ɔsiai ma. Ɔ̃ awawãra wa ɔto ɔbara ɔɔkɛlɛ dzoroo, fiɛ maturi ɔbie sɔ maanya wũ ku ma anɔmi.
41003009	Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ mabie ɔkolo masɛ i ibu kuruɛ si ɔ̃abo ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ ame alasɔ maturi ɔɣede.
41003010	Kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔsi ɔso ne, manyɛse to malili so sɔ maabore mabo wũ mapɛgu wũ fiɛ maasarɛ.
41003011	Mma i siwarã lalaa si iso ne, si manya Yesu ne, masɛ marɔ̃ marɛ i ɔ̃ ngbatɔ̃ ku kulu sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi ne!”
41003012	Ɣɛɛ ne, Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ madaaɖi wũ mate ngɔ ɔɖe.
41003013	Ara wagbe kama ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ kabemi iso. Mmɔ ɔkpere mma ɔto ɔbie sɔ mawegu wũ ɔbɔ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne.
41003014	Ma ndɛ̃ ɔɖi iweo-inyɔ fiɛ ɔtã ma iyere sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ne. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loɖi mi sɔ si miawegu me, fiɛ loasese mi misɛ miaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea.
41003015	Lotã mi ɔle sɔ misa siwarã lalaa miɖi i maturi ame.”
41003016	Ma iweo-inyɔ ma ɔɖi mmɔ nɖe Simon gɔ i Yesu ɔtã iyere sɔ Petro
41003017	gu Yakobo gu ɔ̃ kpeama Yohanes mma nɖe Zebedeo mabi ma i Yesu ɔtã iyere sɔ Boanerges gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Kado Kaɣɛ Mabi.
41003018	Matsɔra nɖe Andrea gu Filipo gu Bartolomeo gu Mateo gu Toma gu Yakobo gɔ nɖe Alfeo ɔbi gu Tadeo gu Simon gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ aɖe kaɖe
41003019	gu Yuda Iskariot gɔ loɖi Yesu ɔtã.
41003020	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔba ma kɔrɛ ana. Ne ɔso ne, iwe ɔle gbaã sɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze aana ɔwi maɖe ara.
41003021	Gɔ ɔ̃ manyii ɔnɔ ngbɔ ne, makɛlɛ sɔ maakɔ wũ mabɔ iyo, alasɔ maturi to maɣɛ sɔ, “Iti ame ka inina wũ iso!”
41003022	Mmara matedze ma lobɔrɛ i Yerusalem ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa igara lotã wũ ɔle ɔso ɔto ɔwo siwarã lalaa ɔsa ɔɖi i maturi ame.”
41003023	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔkpere maturi ɔɖe ma ika i igbã ame sɔ, “Nda iawo ɔba fiɛ Ɔbosam aasa so ɔɖi i ɔturi ame?
41003024	Si iba sɔ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɣɛɣɛ so mato makpɛ̃gu so ne, sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gamɔ iibawo ɔya.
41003025	Si iyo maturi ɔɣɛ so, mata maɣɛ so iso ne, iyo nɛmɔ iibawo ɔya.
41003026	Ne ɔso si Ɔbosam sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔta siɣɛ so iso fiɛ siɣɛɣɛ so ne, ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gamɔ iibawo ɔya, siɔba kawirikɔ̃.
41003027	“Kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle iyo ɔbo ɔmala ɔ̃ ara iɖo sɔ ɔ̃aɖe katɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔnyi wũ tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃abo ɔ̃ iyo ɔmala ɔ̃ ara.
41003028	“Loto losia ita lotã mi sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ara lalaa wa i ɔturi ɔbara gu anyakpi i Ɣaa iso ɔtsɛ.
41003029	Ɣɛɛ ne, imusuora biara nɛ i ɔturi aaɣɛ i Siwarã Bielea iso ne, Ɣaa iibasu ɔtsɛ wũ kuiyikuiyi. Maibasu, aɣɛrɛ wagbe matsɛ manya.”
41003030	Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ mato maɣɛ sɔ siwarã lalaa mpia i ɔ̃ ame.
41003031	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, Yesu ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ manyiibi ɔba maaya i inyamɔ mapia wũ ɔturi sɔ mato mabie wũ.
41003032	Ne mma lomini wũ i mmɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ, fɔ ɔnyi gu manyiibi ɣɛ i inyamɔ mato makpere-ɔ!”
41003033	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Loate mi ngɔ nɖe wũ ɔnyi mɔmɔ gu wũ manyiibi mɔmɔ.”
41003034	Ne ɔki ɔnyɔ mma nsi maki malɔ wũ i mmɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ, mmagbe nɖe wũ ɔnyi gu wũ manyiibi ne!
41003035	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔ̃ nɖe wũ ɔnyiibi gu wũ ɔnyi ne.”
41004001	Gɔ Yesu ɔkɛlɛ Galilea ibu kɔrɛ ana ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate Itɔ̃me Bielea. Gɔ mma loki malɔ wũ ɔsi ɔso ne, ɔya ɔbo ɔsɛ i ɔkolo ame i ndu iso. Ne maturi ka maɣɛ i ɔkpokpo fiɛ Yesu to ɔɖegu ma ika ne.
41004002	Ɔte ma ara gbodzoo i agbã ame. Ara wa ɔte ma i ngbe ne.
41004003	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Kpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔraɖui kasakɔ̃.
41004004	Gɔ ɔto ɔsa ne, ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i ɔri kuruɛ, ne kurodzai ɔrɛrɛ kuɖe ne.
41004005	Ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i ata iso ngbegɔ i sise iisi, ne ɔso ɔre mala.
41004006	Gɔ kuɣɛ̃ ɔsia kere ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔkpi, alasɔ ɔ̃ siɖu iibo karɔ̃.
41004007	Ɔraɖui ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i kuposɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ne ɔso gɔ ɔre ne, kuɣa kufu wũ sɔ ɔ̃iwo ɔmɔ fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɔ̃ abi.
41004008	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣo i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso. Gɔ ɔre ne, ɔbara kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔɣɔ̃, ɔwɛ̃ abi sitɛ, ɔwɛ̃ abi sikuɔ, fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana kulafa.”
41004009	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ.”
41004010	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ ka ɔsi ne, mma nsɛ masiai wũ ɔwi biara gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔba maakarɛ wũ sɔ ɔɖi igbã karɔ̃ ɔte ma.
41004011	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ awɛrɛra karɔ̃ ɔte mi. Fiɛ mma i siruɛ ɣɛɛ ne, agbã lokote sɔ maanɔ.
41004012	Matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Mato maanya, ɣɛɛ maibanya maɖi ite. Mato maanɔ, ɣɛɛ maibanɔ karɔ̃, sɔ si maibafiniki fiɛ Ɣaa aasu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma.’ ”
41004013	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ɔnɔ miinɔ igbã nɛ karɔ̃? Nda miabara fiɛ mianɔ agbã tsɔra ɔɖuɖu karɔ̃?
41004014	Ɔraɖui sadze gɔgbe to ɔsa Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
41004015	Maturi mawɛ̃ se lɛ ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i ɔri kuruɛ. Gɔ manɔ ne Ɔbosam ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔɖi i ma iti ame ɔluwɛ̃.
41004016	Mamama ana se lɛ ɔraɖui gɔ losia i ata karɔ̃ iso. Gɔ manɔ itɔ̃me ne, mafɔ ne ku isoɣɔ.
41004017	Ɣɛɛ ne, itɔ̃me siɖu iibo karɔ̃ kukaakɔ. Mafɔ maɖe ɔwi kurukutu kere, ɣɛɛ si iɖaa gu kama iti ɔba ala Itɔ̃me Bielea iti ne, mato maafiniki makpese kama.
41004018	“Fiɛ maturi mawɛ̃ ana se lɛ ɔraɖui gɔ lobo i kuposɛ̃ ame. Gɔ manɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea ne,
41004019	kayi gagbe imararãso gu karana itere isiai gu sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ ɔyi ma i situ ame. Ara wagbe ɔnyi itɔ̃me ito sɔ iibaɣɔ̃ abi.
41004020	“Mawɛ̃ ana ɔnɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me lɛ ɔraɖui gɔ losia i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso. Ma ne, mafɔ itɔ̃me ku ɔtu. Ne maɣɔ̃ abi lɛ ɔraɖui, mawɛ̃ abi sitɛ, mawɛ̃ sikuɔ, mawɛ̃ kulafa.”
41004021	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma ana sɔ, “Ɔturi sɛ ɔtsue ɔkaniɛ ɔsu ɔpia i kapoi ame ɣee karɛkɔ̃ kayirinɔ? Iiɖe kasiakɔ̃ masɛ masia ɔkaniɛ fiɛ ɔ̃asa?
41004022	Ira biara nɛ lowɛrɛ to iabɔrɛ kayi fiɛ mato maabusi ibiara nɛ mafu ara.
41004023	Ne ɔso si miba atsue ne, si minɔ kukaakɔ!”
41004024	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikã atsue kukaakɔ nwa mito minɔ lo! Alasɔ ikerera nɛ misu mikere mitã maturi mama ne, ne ame maasu makere matã mi makuti mafa mi ne!
41004025	Alasɔ ngɔ mba ara ne, maatã wũ mabua, ɣɛɛ ngɔ mba ara kɛkɛĩ ne, kɛkɛĩ gɔ ame ɔba ne, maamɔɛ̃ mafɔ wũ iso.”
41004026	Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se lɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lopɛ ara i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.
41004027	Ɔsɛ ɔrɛ ɔta, iyi biara, ɔraɖui ɔre, fiɛ amɔ, fiɛ ɔ̃iɣe kumɛgɔ ibara fiɛ ara se lɛ ngbe.
41004028	Karɔ̃ ga iso mapɛ ara mɔmɔ lonyɔ ɔraɖui iso ngbɔ. Iɖeakatɔ̃ ne, ɔsɛ ɔre, ɔɖi aɣata, ɔfere aɣɔ̃la, ɔɣɔ̃ abi gbodzoo.
41004029	Si abi ɔrɛtɛ ne, kpɛ̃dze to ɔ̃asɔrɛ̃, alasɔ ɔraɖui ɔsɔrɛ̃wi ɔɔɣo.”
41004030	Yesu ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be boasu bokateragu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃? Iɖe igbã nɛ loasu lokparara ne?
41004031	Ise lɛ idziribi kosoi iwɛ̃ nɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛ.
41004032	Isɛ ire ibɔrɛ, imɔ ibara kadzirimi ga lomɔ kaɖo i ayo ame kakpɛkɔ̃ ga matɛ̃ ɔkpã mapia ame, kata akpa katã ɔyu sɔ kato kurodzai aabara ayo i kã ame.”
41004033	Yesu ɔɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea i agbã wagbe ame sɔ si maawo karɔ̃ ɔnɔ.
41004034	Ɔ̃isɛ ɔɖe ma ika si iiɖe igbã ɔto ɔpɛ ma. Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ka masi ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖi wã karɔ̃ ɔte ma.
41004035	Iyi nɛmɔ kutsuɛ ame ne, Yesu ɔkpere marasuãdze ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã bowara ibu bokɛlɛ ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ isɛ.”
41004036	Ne marui i iturikuri kɔrɛ mmɔ mabo i ɔkolo ame ku Yesu sɔ maakɛlɛ ibu kama isɛ. Sikolo mama ana se i mmɔ.
41004037	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, awɛ ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃, gɔ ato apɛ ndu apia i ɔkolo ame sɔ miɔro ɔyi fiɛ ɔ̃awã.
41004038	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu rɛ i ɔkolo kama, ɔsu iti ɔsia i isumuɛ iso ɔto ɔrɛ sirɛ. Ne matara wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, bo kukpi iisu-ɔ kuira i mmɔ?”
41004039	Yesu ɔta ɔya ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia awɛ ku silɔ teteree sɔ, “Awɛ, nyua ɔkpɛ̃! Ndu, sɛ kpoo!” Ɔluwɛ̃ awɛ ɔɣɔ kananana, fiɛ ndu iso ana ɔlo kpoo.
41004040	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Be ɔso miba ifɔ̃ ngbɔ? Miifɔ me miɖe?”
41004041	Ifɔ̃ siare ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ne, mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Mme ɔturi igbã ɔɖe ngbe? Ndu gu ɔwiri to makã wũ atsue!”
41005001	Nwagbe kama ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔsɛ Gadara ibuiti ame i Galilea ibu kama.
41005002	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia ɔsarɛgu wũ.
41005003	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe kawekɔ̃ nɖe maturi kabiarakɔ̃. Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔwo wũ ɔnyi ku ala nane ngɔsɔngɔsɔn.
41005004	Ɔwi gbodzoo si mawo wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba ɔnyi ne, ɔsɛ ɔtu ngɔsɔngɔsɔn gu kugbagɔrɔĩ ɔɖi so. Ɔwe ɔle gɔ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔwo wũ ɔmɔɛ̃.
41005005	Kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu gu anɔwã ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe ɔki i kabiarakɔ̃ gu kubemi iso, ɔla kulu, ɔsu ata ɔtutu so.
41005006	Gɔ ɔnya Yesu dzoroo ne, ɔtere ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
41005007	Ne ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Yesu, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔlesate Ɔbi! Be mpia i bo gu-ɔ inyɔ ndɛ̃? Loto-ɔ i kukpa i Ɣaa iyere ame sɔ daakpadzɛ̃ me kutsue!”
41005008	Ɔɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ɔnɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa, bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame!”
41005009	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Nda marɔ-ɔ?” Ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Mme marɔ Isɛguri ne, alasɔ bo ma mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔsi.”
41005010	Ɔpɛ Yesu nrɔɔ̃ teteree sɔ ɔdaasa ma ɔɖi i karɔ̃ gamɔ ame.
41005011	Makparako gbodzoo ɣɛ mato maɖe ara i kabemi kawɛ̃ kuruɛ i mmɔ.
41005012	Siwarã lalaa ɔtã Yesu iti sɔ, “Sa bo pia i makparako ma nɣɛ i mmɔ ame.”
41005013	Ne ɔtã ɔri fiɛ siwarã lalaa ɔbɔrɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ame sibo i makparako ame ne. Makparako ma losi lɛ kukpi kunyɔ ɔtere kpitikpitikpiti maso kabemi mabo i itubu ame makpi.
41005014	Mma nto manyɔ makparako iso ɔtere makɛlɛ miya gu simagɛ̃ tsɔra ame, masɛ maaɣɛ nwa loba. Ne ɔso maturi ɔtere masɛ sɔ maanyɔ.
41005015	Gɔ maba Yesu kɔrɛ ne, manya ngɔ ame i siwarã lalaa ɔwe sɔ ɔsi i karɔ̃, ɔpia awu, iti ame ɔɔkpa wũ waĩ. Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ɔɖuɖu gbaã.
41005016	Mma lonya nnɛ loba ɔɣere maturi nwa loba i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ gu makparako iso.
41005017	Ne ɔso mapɛ Yesu nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ma karɔ̃ iso.
41005018	Gɔ Yesu ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa ɔwe ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ, “Tã me losiai-ɔ.”
41005019	Yesu iitɔrãgu wũ. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kpese kɛlɛ fɔ mɔmɔ maturi kɔrɛ sɛ aaɣere ma kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔbuai-ɔ fiɛ ɔnyɔ-ɔ nnya.”
41005020	Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔrui ɔkila simagɛ̃ iweo dzɛmɔ ame, ɔɣere ma ibiara nɛ i Yesu ɔbara ɔtã wũ gɔ ibara mma lonɔ ɣii.
41005021	Yesu ɔkpese ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ ibu ibesɛ nɛ i kama. Gɔ ɔbo mmɔ ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔsarɛgu wũ.
41005022	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yairo fiɛ ɔɖe ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔkpakpa ɔba mmɔ. Gɔ ɔnya Yesu ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
41005023	Ne ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi to ɔnyɛ gbaã, ne ɔso ba sia wũ fɔ kɔrɔ̃ iso si ɔna isosarɛ!”
41005024	Yesu ɔta ɔsiai wũ. Gɔ maturi ma nsiai wũ ɔsi ɔso ne, mamini wũ fiɛ masɛ.
41005025	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i ara to afere akɔ aweo-anyɔ buu ɔwe i maturi ndɛ̃.
41005026	Atoa sɔ sinyɛ masadze to matã wũ awa ne, ɔwe i ibo ame. Ɔ̃ɔnina ɔ̃ sikã ɔɖuɖu ɔsa ɔnyɛ gɔgbe, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ito ɔsarɛ. Ɣɛɛ ɔnyagɛ̃ kere i ɔnyɛ togu.
41005027	Ɔnɔ Yesu iyere, ne ɔso ɔbo i maturi ndɛ̃, ɔki i Yesu kama isɛ ɔpɛgu ɔ̃ awu kutsueti.
41005028	Ala ɔɣere so sɔ, “Si loana ɔ̃ awu kere lopɛgu ne, loto loasarɛ.”
41005029	Ne ɔso gɔ ɔpɛgu Yesu awu kere ne, ara wa nto afere wũ ko loɖaɛ! Ne ɔtsue i ɔ̃ ame sɔ ɔ̃ɔna isosarɛ ne.
41005030	Ɔluwɛ̃ Yesu ɔtsue sɔ ɔle ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame. Ne ɔso ɔtui ɔfiniki ɔkarɛ mma nsiai wũ sɔ, “Nna ɔɖe lopɛgu me awu?”
41005031	Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔki malɔ bo. Be ɔso fiɛ ato akarɛ sɔ nna lopɛgu-ɔ?”
41005032	Yesu ɣɛ ɔto ɔpiapia anɔmi sɔ ɔ̃anya ngɔ lopɛgu wũ.
41005033	Ɔrɔ̃go ana ɔtsue kumɛgɔ ka ise wũ. Ne ɔso i ifɔ̃ ame ne, ɔsɛ ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu ngbatɔ̃. Ne ɔɖi ɔte wũ kumɛgɔ iba ne.
41005034	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi, fɔ kafɔkaɖe losa-ɔ. Rui kɛlɛ i isoɣɔ ame. Fɔ ɔnyɛ ɔɔlɛ-ɔ.”
41005035	Gɔ Yesu togu ika iɖe ne, maturi ɔbɔrɛ i Yario iyo maba maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔɔkpi. Be ɔso akpese ato aɖaa Ratedze?”
41005036	Yesu iifɔ itɔ̃me ne maɣɛ mmɔ. Ne ɔɣere Yairo sɔ, “Daanigã, fɔɖe kere!”
41005037	Yesu iibie sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔsiai wũ, ne ɔso ɔkɔ Petro gu Yakobo gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Yohanes marui makɛlɛ Yairo iyo.
41005038	Gɔ mabo iyo fiɛ Yesu ɔnya sikpabo, kulu gu kaku ga mato mabiɛ ne,
41005039	ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃, ne ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be nsɛgu kulu gɔgbe? Be fiɛ mito mibiɛ? Ɔbi iikpi, sirɛ kere ɔto ɔrɛ!”
41005040	Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔtsɛ wũ ima. Ne Yesu ɔɖi ma ɔɖuɖu i iyo ne, ɔtã ɔbi ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔbi ɔ̃ ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbo iyo ngbegɔ i ɔbi kpise rɛ.
41005041	Yesu ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ i kɔrɔ̃, ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Talita Kumi.” Ne karɔ̃ i ma aɖe siɖe ame nɖe sɔ, “Ɔbirɔ̃gomi, ta!”
41005042	Ɔluwɛ̃ kabirɔ̃gomi ga loɔfɔ akɔ aweo-anyɔ kere lota katsɛ isɛ iki. Nnɛgbe ɔbara ma ɔɖuɖu ɣaa gbaã!
41005043	Yesu ɔsi ma mmara sɔ madaaɣere kuwɛ̃ ɖuɖuuɖu. Ne ka ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã wũ aɖera ɔɖe.”
41006001	Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ ma aɖe ku ɔ̃ marasuãdze.
41006002	Gɔ Iwarãyi ɔɣo ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate ara ɔsegu i Itɔ̃me Bielea iso i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃. Ibara mma lonɔ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ɣaa. Makarɛ so sɔ, “Lɛ ɔsegu ara wagbe. Mme inɔgba igbã matã wũ fiɛ ɔto ɔwo awawãra wagbe ɔbara?
41006003	Ɛɛbɛrɛ iɖe ɔ̃ nɖe Maria ɔbi gɔ nɖe rawedze? Yakobo gu Yose gu Yuda gu Simon mɛrɛ̃ ɔnyiibi? Fiɛ ɔ̃ manyiiko ana pia i bo ndɛ̃ ngbe.” Ne ɔso maifɔ wũ.
41006004	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ba kuwarɛ i kakɔi biara iɖo ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔmagɛ̃, ɔ̃ maturi gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi anɔmi ame.”
41006005	Ɔ̃iwo awawãra gbodzoo ɔbara iɖo nrɔɔ̃ mɛ ɔsia manyɛse irɛ̃saã iti fiɛ masarɛ.
41006006	Ɔmagɛ̃ ame maturi idaafɔ iɖe ɔbara wũ ɣaa. Nwagbe kama ne, Yesu ɔkila simagɛ̃ kosoi tsɔra i mmɔ ɔte Itɔ̃me Bielea.
41006007	Ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔsirakanya, ne ɔsese ma inyɔ-inyɔ ne. Ɔtã ma ɔle sɔ masa siwarã lalaa.
41006008	Ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ, “Midaasu kuira mila i mi irisɛ ame iɖo ɔsɛdziri. Midaasu aɖera ɣee akpo. Midaapia sikã i mi kukotoi ame.
41006009	Mipia ndokota, ɣɛɛ midaasu awu mama iɖo nwa mipia.”
41006010	Ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Kakɔi biara ga maafɔ mi ne, miwe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miarui.
41006011	Ɣɛɛ kakɔi biara ga maturi loifɔ mi ɣee maikã mi atsue ne, mikpakpa mi ngba iso sise mifere lɛ Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loaba ikparĩ.”
41006012	Marasuãdze ɔsame mabo mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ maturi si mafiniki i ma ara lalaa kama si mabara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ.
41006013	Masa siwarã lalaa gbodzoo maɖi i maturi ame, masɔla manyɛse kasɛ siare nnɔĩ fiɛ mana iso ɔsarɛ.
41006014	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Igara Herodes ka ɔto ɔnɔ ara wagbe, alasɔ Yesu iyere ɔɔpɛ ibiɛ. Mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Ndupiedze Yohanes loɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã! Ne ɔso ɔba ɔle ɔto ɔbara awawãra ne!”
41006015	Mawɛ̃ ana sɔ, “Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Eliya ɔɖe.” Mamama ana sɔ, “Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe lɛ makuere ɔwi.”
41006016	Ɔwi gɔ i Herodes ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Yohanes gɔ lotã matu iti ɔɖe loɔta ɔba ngbã ana!”
41006017	Tɔtɔ ne, Herodes ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ Yohanes, manyi wũ marara i iyo ala Herodia gɔ nɖe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Filipo ɔre gɔ ɔfɔ ɔyiri iti.
41006018	Gɔ Yohanes ɔɣere Herodes sɔ, “Iilɛ sɔ aafɔ fɔ ɔnyiibi ɔ̃ ɔre” ɔso ne,
41006019	ɔ̃ itɔ̃me to Herodia sikpã, ne ɔso ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃iwo.
41006020	Herodes ɔla ɔ̃ɔnigã Yohanes, alasɔ ɔɣe sɔ ɔnukuarese gu ɔturi sekelea ɔɖe. Ne ɔso ɔto ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ. Ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃akã ɔ̃ itɔ̃me atsue ɔwi ku ɔwi ame atoa sɔ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me sɛ ɔtsue wũ ɔtu si ɔnɔ.
41006021	Katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, Herodia ɔna ɔri gɔ Herodes ɔɖe ɔ̃ iɣeyi. Herodes ɔkpere magarakpakpa i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gu makpãrɛrɛĩ, katɔ̃maɖedze gu Galilea karɔ̃ katɔ̃maɖedze ɔsirakanya itã ɔpɔrɔ̃ itu.
41006022	Herodia ɔbi bitɛ ana ɔba ɔ̃atɔ ɔte Herodes gu ɔ̃ malaa ɔpia ma isoɣɔ i aɖera kaɖekɔ̃ mmɔ. Ne ɔso Igara Herodes ɔkarɛ ɔbitɛ gɔgbe sɔ, “Be aɖɔɛ sɔ lotã-ɔ?”
41006023	Ne ka ɔɣɛ ɔsia sɔ, “Lotarĩgu wũ sigaraiyara sɔ loatã-ɔ ira biara nɛ aakarɛ me, isɛ iatui i wũ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ kasɛ kawɛ̃!”
41006024	Ne ɔso, ɔbitɛ gɔgbe ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyi sɔ, “Be si lokarɛ?” Ne ɔ̃ ɔnyi ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Karɛ wũ Ndupiedze Yohanes iti.”
41006025	Ɔbitɛ ɔpɛ siwa ɔkɛlɛ igara kɔrɛ ɔɣere Herodes sɔ, “Lobie sɔ loafɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes iti i kategelei iso ngbe kiniɔ!”
41006026	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔbo Herodes so kukaakɔ, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkã ndamu i makpakpa ma nsigu wũ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iti katɔ̃ ɔso ne, ɔ̃isɛ̃ nnɛ i ɔbi ɔkarɛ.
41006027	Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔpia ɔ̃ kaɖaɛsime sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃atu Yohanes iti ɔbɔ. Ne ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ i Yohanes rɛ i iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃atu wũ iti ne.
41006028	Ɔsu ne ɔsia i kategelei iso, ɔsu ɔba ɔ̃atã ɔbitɛ gɔgbe. Ne ɔfɔ, ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃ ɔnyi ne.
41006029	Gɔ Yohanes marasuãdze ɔnɔ ne, masɛ maasu wũ masɛ maabiara.
41006030	Katɔ̃memasɛdze ma i Yesu ɔsese sɔ masɛ maaki maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔkpese maba maaɣere wũ nwa ɔɖuɖu mabara gu nwa masɛ maate i ma irisɛ ame.
41006031	Maturi ma nto maba ma kɔrɛ ɔfe iɣede sɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze siina ɔwi sɔ maaɖe nane aɖera. Ne ɔso Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã bo ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã si bokɛlɛ ngbegɔ i kuwɛ̃ na si bosɛ boawarã kɛkɛĩ.”
41006032	Mata mabo i ɔkolo ame sɔ masɛ ngbegɔ i maturi na.
41006033	Ɔwi gɔ marui ne, maturi ɔnya maɖi ite, ne masɛ ngba mabɔrɛ i ma simagɛ̃ ame ɔɖuɖu maɖe ma katɔ̃ masɛ maabo fiɛ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze kɔra ɔbo mmɔ.
41006034	Gɔ Yesu ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ɔnya maturi gbodzoo ma loba ne, ma ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri, alasɔ mase lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃ ma nna kɔdze. Ne ɔso ɔtsɛ ma ara gbodzoo ite.
41006035	Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Kaɖe ɔɔro fiɛ ngbe ɔdzorogu ayo ame.
41006036	Ɖi ma ɔri si makɛlɛ simagɛ̃ kosoi gu miya mɛ lobore mibo ngbe si masɛ maaɣa aɖera maɖe.”
41006037	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi mɔmɔ mitã ma irere maɖe.” Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Nnɛmɔ to iafɔ lɛ ɔturi awa farafana kuso. Ato abie sɔ bonina ngbɔ itã ma aɖera?”
41006038	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Abolo arɛ̃ miba i mi ara ame? Misɛ mianyɔ.” Gɔ masɛ maanyɔ ne, maɣere wũ sɔ, “Abolo abo aru gu kufarai kunyɔ lokuti.”
41006039	Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ matã maturi si masɛ i karɔ̃ akuri ame i sikua iso.
41006040	Ne ɔso masɛ i karɔ̃ i akuri ame lɛ kulafa kulafa gu siru siru kusime.
41006041	Yesu ɔsu abolo gu afara anyɔ wamɔ, ɔnyɔ kato. Gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti ne, ɔbɛbɛse ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ maɣɛɣɛ mmamɔ. Ɔkpɛkpɛti kufarai kunyɔ ana ɔtã ma.
41006042	Gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ara mami,
41006043	fiɛ marasuãdze ɔsa nwa lobuburi kanya ne, mana kusɛsɛi kuweo-kunyɔ.
41006044	Mma loɖe aɖera wamɔ ne, marɛrɛ̃ kerekere ɔsi mabo kukpi kuru.
41006045	Ɔluwɛ̃ Yesu ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔya mabo i ɔkolo ame sɔ mawara makɛlɛ Betsaida. Ne ɔ̃ wũ ka ɔɖi iturikuri ɔri ne.
41006046	Gɔ ɔ̃ɔɖi ma ɔri ɔro ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ kube iso sɔ ɔ̃akparama kayi.
41006047	Si kutsuɛ aaɣo ne, ɔkolo ka ɔsɛ i ibu ndɛ̃, Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ ana ɣɛ i ibu katɔ̃.
41006048	Ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ maturi ba imɔrɛ̃ i ɔkolo iwa ame, alasɔ ɔwiri to ɔli ma. Ne ɔso si iapɛ kaya iɖɔwũ iru ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ isɛ ikɛlɛ ma kɔrɛ i ibu iso, ɔbie sɔ si ɔfe ma,
41006049	mala kulu i ifɔ̃ ame sɔ, “Iɣii! Kpise ɔɖe!”
41006050	Manigã gbaã sɔ manya wũ i ndu iso. Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaanigã! Mme loɖe. Mina ɔtu.”
41006051	Ne ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ɔwiri ɔnyua ikpɛ̃ ne. Ibara ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɣaa gbaã!
41006052	Alasɔ maitsue kumɛgɔ ibara fiɛ ɔtã maturi kukpi kuru aɖera maɖe mami. Mainɔ karɔ̃, ne ɔso maifɔ maɖe.
41006053	Gɔ mawara itubu ne, maba maabo Genezaret karɔ̃ iso, ne ɔso mapɛ ma ɔkolo ikpo i ibu katɔ̃.
41006054	Gɔ maya mabɔrɛ ɔkolo ame kere ne, maturi ɔnya Yesu maɖi ite.
41006055	Ne ɔso matere maɣere matsɔra. Kakɔi biara ga i Yesu ɔbo ne, masore manyɛse mabɔ wũ i ma sikala iso.
41006056	Ne ɔso ngɔi mɛ pelepele i Yesu ɔki, simagɛ̃ ame o-o, nsɛkɔ̃ o-o ne, maturi ɔsore manyɛse mabɔ kuɣakaɖekɔ̃ fiɛ mapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔtã mapɛgu bidɛ ɔ̃ awu kutsueti kere. Mma ɔɖuɖu lopɛgu wũ ne, mana isosare.
41007001	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ gu ma Yudase mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem maba Yesu kɔrɛ.
41007002	Manya sɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze mawɛ̃ si mato maɖe ara ku nrɔɔ̃ ɣɛa mɛ maifore i mmara kanya.
41007003	Ma Farisise gu ma Yudase tsɔra siai ma mawa kubarara gɔ manyua masɛ ma. Ne ɔso ngbɛsi mafore nrɔɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ mate ma fiɛ maaɖe ara.
41007004	Si mase i kuɣa ame fiɛ maipie ndu ne, maibaɖe ara. Mamɔɛ̃ ma kubarara mama mato i akɔi gu awabui gu ndu abui ifore iso.
41007005	Ne ɔso ma Farisise gu mmara matedze magbe ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ fɔ marasuãdze iisɛ mabara i bo mawa kubarara iso? Mato maɖe ara gɔ maifore nrɔɔ̃ i kubarara kanya.”
41007006	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mi ne, maladze miɖe! Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔkpɛ ɔya gɔ ɔɣɛ i mi iso sɔ, ‘Mmagbe ne, kanya kunu kere masu mato male me gɔ iibɔrɛ i ma situ ame.
41007007	Siefe kere mato mabara wũ karabara. Mato mate maturi mmara i wũ mire kanya.’
41007008	Ite sɔ misu wũ mmara mibiara fiɛ misu ɔturi awune mire mito mite.”
41007009	Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Misɛ̃ Ɣaa mmara sɔ si miawo mi mawa kubarara ɔla.
41007010	Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ sɔ, ‘Warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi. Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ inyakpi i ɔ̃ ɣese iso ne, ɔkote ɔtã kukpi ipɔ.’
41007011	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ mito mite sɔ si ɔrere ba ira nɛ ikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔbuai ɔ̃ maɣese fiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nnɛ loasu lotã-ɔ loɔsu lotã Ɣaa’ ne.
41007012	Miitã ɔri sɔ ɔ̃asu karatã gagbe ɔbuai ɔ̃ maɣese.
41007013	Ɔri gɔgbe iso misu mi mawa kubarara mito minina Ɣaa mmara fiɛ mito mibara ara mama lɛ ngbe ana ne.”
41007014	Mmɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔkpere maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ.
41007015	Nnɛ i ɔturi ɔɖe iibawo wũ ɔpukutura,
41007016	ɣɛɛ nnɛ nsɛ ibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame nsɛ ipukutura wũ.”
41007017	Kama gɔ ɔrui i iturikuri kɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ ɔɖi ara wamɔ karɔ̃ ɔte ma.
41007018	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Miinɔ itɔ̃me nɛ ana karɔ̃? Iikpa sɔ ira nɛ ɔturi ɔɖe ne, iibatã sɔ ɔ̃ibase sekelee?
41007019	Alasɔ iibo i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ̃ iyiri ame ibo fiɛ ibɔrɛ ife ɔturi ame lɛ ɔdziriiso awe.” Ne ɔso Yesu to ɔɣɛ sɔ aɖera ɔɖuɖu lɛ atã iɖe.
41007020	Ne ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ sɔ, “Atɔ̃me wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i ɔturi kanya ame nsɛ ipukutura wũ.
41007021	Alasɔ ɔturi ɔtu ame i adzuni nyanyarĩa sɛ abɔrɛ lɛ fɔ ɔre ɣee ɔrã kama ife, kayu, ituriɖoe, asɔrɔ̃ra,
41007022	amumu, ɔtile, mila gu sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ gɔ nsɛgu kunuarɛ, anɔ ibɛbɛ i ɔturi ira iso, ɔturi iyere inina, iteso lalaa, ɔɖegbodzo, adzimira, gu ituridaawarɛ.
41007023	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ i ɔturi ame gɔ atã wũ sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ.”
41007024	Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ Tiro awo ame. Ɔkɛlɛ iyo iwɛ̃ ame si madaatsue sɔ ɔbo mmɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃iwɛrɛ.
41007025	Gɔ ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi iso i siwarã lalaa si ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu pia i mmɔ ne, ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
41007026	Ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i ɔ̃ ɔbi ame. Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ne, ɔ Helase ɔɖe. Maɣe wũ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Foinike i Siria karɔ̃ iso.
41007027	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Tã mabiɛtɛ si maɖe ara mami tɔtɔ. Iilɛ sɔ maasu mabiɛtɛ aɖera matã makpɛkpɛ.”
41007028	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Aĩ, Tete, makpɛkpɛ ma mpia i ɔpɔrɔ̃ kayirinɔ sɛ maɖe aɖera wa i mabiɛtɛ ɔɖe fiɛ akpakpase.”
41007029	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ mmuai mɛ atã ɔso ne, rui kɛlɛ iyo. Ato aasɛ aanya sɔ siwarã dzɛmɔ ɔɔta i ɔbi iso.”
