41007030	Gɔ ɔrɔ̃go ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya sɔ ɔ̃ ɔbi rɛ ɔto ɔwarã fiɛ siwarã lalaa ɔɔta wũ iso.
41007031	Gɔ Yesu ɔrui i Tiro awo ame mmɔ ne, ɔki i Sidon, ɔkɛlɛ Galilea Ibu kɔrɛ ngbegɔ i simagɛ̃ iweo siwɛ̃ pia.
41007032	Mabɔ wũ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ i atsue ɔtɛ̃ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtoto siɖe ana. Ne mapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔsia wũ kɔrɔ̃ iso si ɔsa wũ.
41007033	Yesu ɔkɔ wũ ɔsɛgu kuruɛ, ne ɔpia wũ arɔĩ i atsue ame ne. Ɔti sinyatu ɔsu ɔpɛgu wũ ɔnyagɛmi.
41007034	Ne Yesu ɔnyɔ kato, ɔwarã ɔkuti, ne ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ sɔ, “Hefata!” gɔ karɔ̃ i ma siɖe ame nɖe sɔ, “Busi!”
41007035	Ɔluwɛ̃ atsue ɔbusi wũ, ɔ̃ ɔnyagɛmi ɔkurisi, fiɛ ɔtsɛ aka iɖe kukaakɔ.
41007036	Yesu ɔsi ma mmara sɔ madaaɣere kuwɛ̃ ara wa manya. Ɣɛɛ ne, ita iso kere ɔfere ndu, alasɔ ma kanya ɔla teteree.
41007037	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ nwagbe ne, ibara ma ɣaa gbaã! Ne mato maɣere so sɔ, “Ɔbara ibiara i ɔri iso. Ɔtã ɔmumu ɔɖe aka, fiɛ matsuetɛ̃se ana ɔnɔ ara.”
41008001	Ayi wamɔ ame ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔba maasakanya. Gɔ kuira iikuti gɔ maaɖe ɔso ne, Yesu ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ,
41008002	“Mmagbe ara to akpɛ̃ me nnya alasɔ maɔwe i wũ kɔrɛ akpɛnɛ atɛ i ngbe ne. Kiniɔ ne, mana kuira nɛ maaɖe.
41008003	Si loɖi ma ɔri sɔ marui ne, mato maafɛ̃ i ɔri, alasɔ ma mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i ngɔi dzoroa.”
41008004	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fafuĩ gɔgbe ame ne, lɛ boana aɖera botã mmagbe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maaɖe mami?”
41008005	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Abolo kuboi kurɛ̃ mito?” Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Abolo kuboi kukɔdzɛ boba.”
41008006	Yesu ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ masɛ i karɔ̃. Ɔsu abolo akɔdzɛ, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba fiɛ ɔbiɛbiɛ wã ɔsu ɔtã marasuãdze sɔ maɣɛ matã ɔbiara kɛkɛ.
41008007	Maba kufarai kurɛ̃ saã ana, ne Yesu ɔsu, ɔpɛ siba i kɔ̃ iti fiɛ ɔsu ɔtã marasuãdze maɣɛɣɛ ma ne.
41008008	Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe mami pɔpɔɔpɔ ne gɔ marasuãdze ɔsa akutia kanya ne, mana kusɛsɛi kukɔdzɛ.
41008009	Marɛrɛ̃ kerekere kukpi kuna loɖe ara. Ne gɔ Yesu ɔɔɖi ma ɔri ne,
41008010	ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔya mabo i ɔkolo ame mawara makɛlɛ Dalmanuta awo ame.
41008011	Ma Farisise ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maakarɛ atɔ̃me sɔ si mala wũ manyɔ. Ne maɣere wũ sɔ ɔbara iwawãra ɔte sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
41008012	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔwarã ɔkuti ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nda ɔso fiɛ kiniɔgbe maturi to mabie awawãra sɔ maanya? Ooɣo! Loiba sɔ loabara awawãra lote mi lɛ kumɛgɔ mito mibie!”
41008013	Ne ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔkɛlɛ ibu kama isɛ ne.
41008014	Gɔ mato mawara ibu ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɣara sɔ maabɔ abolo. Kaboi kawɛ̃ kere mato i ɔkolo ame.
41008015	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikã me atsue si midzuɛ̃ so kukaakɔ i Igara Herodes gu ma Farisise inyagɛ̃ kua iso.”
41008016	Ne ma wũ matsɛ so ikarɛ sɔ, “Kumɛgɔ boito abolo ɔso fiɛ ɔto ɔɣere bo ngbɔ?”
41008017	Gɔ Yesu ɔtsue nnɛ mato maɣɛ ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito miɖe aka i abolo idaawe iso? Ikã kiniɔ ne, miito minya fiɛ mianɔ karɔ̃? Mi situ ba ɔle!
41008018	Miba anɔmi, ɣɛɛ miito minya! Miba atsue, ɣɛɛ miito minɔ! Miito minyigi,
41008019	ɔwi gɔ loɣɛ abolo aru lotã maturi kukpi kuru ɔɖe? Kusɛsɛi kurɛ̃ i aɖera kutia ɔyi?” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Kɔ̃ kuweo-kunyɔ.”
41008020	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma ana sɔ, “Ne ɔwi gɔ loɣɛ abolo akɔdzɛ lotã maturi kukpi kuna ne, asɛsɛ arɛ̃ i akutia ɔyi?” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Wã akɔdzɛ.”
41008021	Ne ka ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ikã kiniɔ ne, miitsue ɔturi gɔ loɖe?”
41008022	Gɔ mabo Betsaida ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ nɔbiɛdze mabɔ, ne mapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔpɛgu wũ.
41008023	Yesu ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃ ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Gɔ ɔfɛ̃ sinyatu ɔfere ɔrɛrɛ̃ anɔmi ne, ɔsia wũ kɔrɔ̃ iso, ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ato anya ira iwɛ̃?”
41008024	Gɔ ɔtara anɔmi ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, nto lonya maturi mase kere lɛ adziri wa nsɛ.”
41008025	Gɔ Yesu ɔledza wũ anɔmi ipɛgu ne, ɔkɛ anɔmi teteree, ne abusi waĩ, ɔnya ara kukaakɔ ne!
41008026	Gɔ Yesu ɔtã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Daakpese aki i ɔmagɛ̃ ame mmɔ!”
41008027	Ne kama ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkɛlɛ kusɛkɔ̃ gɔ i Kaisarea Filipi kɔrɛ. Gɔ masɛ i ɔri ne, Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna i maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ loɖe?”
41008028	Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Mawɛ̃ sɔ fɔ nɖe Ndupiedze Yohanes mawɛ̃ ana sɔ fɔ nɖe Eliya fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔ aɖe.”
41008029	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ne mi ɣɛɛ? Nna mibu sɔ loɖe?” Petro ɔtara kanya sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Kristo ne.”
41008030	Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ madaaɣɛ ngɔ maɣe sɔ ɔɖe.
41008031	Ne Yesu ɔtsɛ ara ite ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ikote sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, aawe inyɛ gbodzoo i ma Yudase makpakpa gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze nrɔɔ̃ ame, mato maaɖoe me. Ɣɛɛ ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara me lowe ngbã ana.”
41008032	Ɔɣere ma nnɛgbe ɔɖi waĩ, fiɛ manɔ wũ karɔ̃ ana. Ne Petro ɔkɔ wũ ɔɣedza i kuruɛ ɔtã wũ itai sɔ kuiyikuiyi ɔdaasiɣɛ ngbɔ.
41008033	Gɔ Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ne, ɔsɛ̃ Petro teteree sɔ, “Re me kama, Satana!” Ne ɔto ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Ato abie sɔ akpesera so ɔri itɛ̃ra atã me adzuni wagbe iibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔturi kɔrɛ abɔrɛ.”
41008034	Yesu ɔkpere maturi gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbɔ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔte ma ara sɔ, “Si ɔrere ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asiai me ne, ɔsɛ̃ so, si ɔsu ɔ̃ inyɛwe ɔnyigbã si ɔ̃awo me ɔsiai.
41008035	Alasɔ ngɔ loakpɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ngbã iti ne, ɔto ɔ̃ayura me ɣɛɛ ngɔ loayura ɔ̃ ngbã ala mme gu wũ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
41008036	Mme kusia i ɔturi aana si kayiiso ɔɖuɖu karana ɔkpese ɔ̃ kare fiɛ ɔ̃ina ngbã mɛ loiɛ miro?
41008037	Ɣee be i ɔturi aasu ɔnyuarã fiɛ ɔ̃ana ngbã mɔmɔ?
41008038	Si mme gu wũ ara ite aakpɛ̃ ɔrere kunuarɛ i ɔkparɛ lalaa gɔgbe ame ne, mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, mme wũ ɔnyiiɔ akpɛ̃ me kunuarɛ i ɔwi gɔ ame loaba gu Ɣaa makpabo sekelea ku Ɣaa ikpawaĩ ɔɖuɖu.”
41009001	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ i ngbe iibakpi fiɛ Ɣaa sigara iɖe aaba ku ɔle.”
41009002	Ayi akuɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔkɔ Petro gu Yakobo gu Yohanes masɛ kube kɔlɛa kuwɛ̃ iso ma ɔnɔwɛ̃. Gɔ marasuãdze to manyɔ kere ne, Yesu kumiamia ɔkpaki!
41009003	Ɔ̃ awu ɔbara futututu atsɛ ifiɛ gelegelegele iɖo kumɛgɔ i ɔturi awune aawo ira ɔbara ifudza.
41009004	Ne manya sɔ Mose gu Eliya ɔte so mato maɖegu Yesu ika ne.
41009005	Ne Petro ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, bo ngbe iba ɔbua ilɛ gbaã! Tã bopɛ akpayo atɛ. Iwɛ̃ itã-ɔ, iwɛ̃ itã Mose, fiɛ iwɛ̃ ana itã Eliya.”
41009006	Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ Petro gu matsɔra gbaã sɔ ɔ̃isiɣe nwa ɔto ɔɣɛ.
41009007	Idɔdɔ ɔso ifu ma iso, ne silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i idɔdɔ ame sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi gɔ loipia kuɣɛ i ngbe ne, mikã wũ atsue!”
41009008	Ɔluwɛ̃ mabusi anɔmi, ɣɛɛ maisinya kuwɛ̃ iɖo Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ kere nɣɛ i ma kɔrɛ.
41009009	Gɔ maso i kube iso mato maba ne, Yesu ɔsi ma mmara sɔ, “Midaaɣere kuwɛ̃ nwa minya ngbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, loata lobɔrɛ i makpise ame.”
41009010	Mabara masia i atɔ̃me wagbe iso, ɣɛɛ si ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ si ne, masɛ makarɛ so sɔ, “Be i ita i makpise ame ɔbua iɖe?”
41009011	Ne mato makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mmara matedze sɛ maɣɛ sɔ Eliya aaɖe katɔ̃ ɔba tɔtɔ?”
41009012	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe sɔ Eliya aaɖe katɔ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aledza ira biara ɔsɛ. Fiɛ be ɔso matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ana ame sɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aawe anyɛ fiɛ maasopara wũ?
41009013	Nto loɣere mi sɔ Eliya ɔɔba koko. Ɣɛɛ ne, maturi iinya wũ maɖi ite. Mabara wũ kumɛgɔ maɖɔɛ fiɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i ɔ̃ iso.”
41009014	Gɔ makpese maba marasuãdze tsɔra kɔrɛ ne, manya sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔki malɔ ma fiɛ ma gu mmara matedze to makpadzɛ̃ itɔ̃me.
41009015	Gɔ maturi ɔnya sɔ Yesu ka ɔba ne, ibara ma ɣii, ne matere masarɛgu wũ fiɛ matofora wũ ne.
41009016	Yesu ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Be kakpadzɛ̃ i mi gu ma to?”
41009017	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ i ma ndɛ̃ ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, lokɔ wũ ɔbi lobɔ-ɔ, alasɔ siwarã lalaa si wũ iso fiɛ sikpesera wũ ɔmumu.
41009018	Ɔwi biara si sito sikpɛ̃gu wũ ne, sisɛ sitara wũ siwuĩ i karɔ̃, minyatu sɛ mibɔrɛ wũ i kanya kpɔɔ, fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔwewe kanya, ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔtɔ gogori. Ne ɔso lokɔ wũ lobɔ fɔ marasuãdze sɔ masa wũ, fiɛ maiwo ne.”
41009019	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi kiniɔgbe maturi ma loifɔ maɖe fiɛ manyanyarĩ, ayi sirɛ̃ loawe i mi kɔrɛ isɛ iabo? Kɔ ɔbi bɔ me i ngbe!”
41009020	Makɔ wũ mabɔ Yesu kɔrɛ. Ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ siwarã lalaa dzɛgbe ɔnya Yesu ne, sikpɛ̃gu ɔbi sitara wũ siwuĩ i karɔ̃, ɔto ɔmɛrɛ̃ fiɛ minyatu kpɔɔ sɛ wũ i kanya.
41009021	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ ɔse sɔ, “Gɔ isɛ wũ karɔ̃ ne, iɔfɔ ɔwi?” Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Itsɛ ta ɔ̃ sibiɛtɛ ame.
41009022	Ɔwi gbodzoo ne, siwarã dzɛgbe sɛ sibie sɔ siaɖoe wũ. Si iba ngbɔ ne, ɔsɛ ɔta sɔ si ɔbo i ɔtɔ ɣee ndu ame. Loto-ɔ i kukpa, nyɔ bo nnya si abuai bo, si iɖe ira ne aawo ɔbara!”
41009023	Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣere me sɔ si loawo? Kuira na ngɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ɔle.”
41009024	Ɔbi ɔse ɔsiagu kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mba kafɔkaɖe, ɔmɔ kere kaimɔ. Buai me si lona kafɔkaɖe lobua!”
41009025	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya sɔ maturi to malili so sɔ maabore mabo ma ne, ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã dzɛgbe sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa dzɛ lotɛ̃ra ɔbi atsue fiɛ atã sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔwo ika ɔɖe, nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame, fiɛ daasikpese abo i ɔ̃ ame kuiyikuiyi ana!”
41009026	Siwarã ɔsia kulu titiiti, si tidza ɔbi i karɔ̃ fiɛ sibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔbi rɛ i mmɔ lɛ ɔkpi ɔkpi. Ne mma nɣɛ i mmɔ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔkpi!”
41009027	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃ ɔtara ɔɣedza.
41009028	Kama gɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbo iyo iwɛ̃ ame ne, makarɛ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ boiwo siwarã dzɛgbe ɔsa ɔɖi i ɔbi ame?”
41009029	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngbɛsi ɔturi ɔsu kayi ikparama gu kanya inyi fiɛ ɔ̃awo siwarã dzɛgbe igbã ɔsa.”
41009030	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔrui i mmɔ masɛ maaki i Galilea awo ame. Yesu iibie sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔtsue ngbegɔ ɔpia,
41009031	alasɔ ɔto ɔte ma ara sɔ, “Mato maaɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã maturi maɖoe, ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, loata lowe ngbã.”
41009032	Ɣɛɛ mainɔ nnɛ ɔɣere ma karɔ̃, fiɛ manigã sɔ maakarɛ wũ ana.
41009033	Gɔ masɛ maabo Kapernaum ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, makɛlɛ iyo iwɛ̃, mmɔ i Yesu ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Be itɔ̃me mito mikpadzɛ̃ gɔ bosɛ i ɔri boto boba?”
41009034	Maiwo wũ ɔɣere alasɔ gɔ masɛ i ɔri mato maba ne, mato makpadzɛ̃ so sɔ nna loɖo i ma ndɛ̃ pelepele.
41009035	Ne Yesu ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere gɔ lobie sɔ mawarɛ wũ ne, ɔbara so ɔtsɔra i mi ndɛ̃ si ɔsumu mamama.”
41009036	Ɔkpere ɔbiɛtɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɣedza ma i katɔ̃. Ne ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔsia so i ngba fiɛ ka ɔɣere ma sɔ,
41009037	“Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ ɔbiɛtɛ gɔgbe i wũ iyere ame ne, mme iɖe ɔfɔ. Fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ne, iiɖe mme kere ɔfɔ. Ɔfɔ Tete gɔ losese me ana.”
41009038	Rasuãdze gɔ marɔ sɔ Yohanes ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, bonya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔto ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i maturi ame i fɔ iyere ame. Ne boɣere wũ sɔ ɔnyua, alasɔ ɔ̃iɖe bo ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃.”
41009039	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaatɛ̃ wũ ɔri, alasɔ ngɔ loabara awawãra i wũ iyere ame ne, ɔ̃ibawo pɛ ɔfiniki mala ɔɣɛ wũ ilalaa.
41009040	Ngɔ loita ɔɣɛ bo iso ne, mawɛ̃ boɖe.
41009041	“Lotã mi itsue gbaã sɔ ɔbiara gɔ loatã mi ndu minɛ alasɔ miɖe wũ mare ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɔ ne kuso kokooko.
41009042	“Ngɔ loatã ɔbiɛtɛ gɔ mba kafɔkaɖe i wũ ame afiniki i kafɔkaɖe kama ne, si masu ɔwɛ̃ manyi kukɔtɛ siare masarã wũ i ɔme mafuĩdza wũ mapia i ɔpo ame ne, ialɛgu wũ iɖo.
41009043	-
41009044	“Ne ɔso si fɔ kɔrɔ̃ kuwɛ̃ to kukpɔkpɔtɔra fɔ kafɔkaɖe ne, tu kɔ̃ ɖi. Ilɛ sɔ aawe kɔrɔ̃ kuwɛ̃ asɛ ngbã mɛ loibaro iɖo sɔ aba nrɔɔ̃ minyɔ ne, aakɛlɛ itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame.
41009045	-
41009046	Si fɔ kukpa nto kukpɔkpɔtɔra fɔ kafɔkaɖe ne, tu kɔ̃ ɖi. Ilɛ iɖo sɔ aawe kukpa kuwɛ̃ ana ngbã iɖo sɔ aawe ngba minyɔ maapɛ-ɔ mapia i ɔtɔ ame.
41009047	Si fɔ inɔmi ana nsɛ itã abo i ikpi ame ne, were ne ɖi. Ilɛ sɔ aasu inɔmi iwɛ̃ abo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame iɖo sɔ aba anɔmi anyɔ ne, mapɛ-ɔ mapia i
41009048	itɔkpe ame lɛ kumɛgɔ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Arɔrɛ̃ wa nsɛ anina ara i mmɔ ne, aibakpi! Fiɛ ɔtɔ gɔ nto ɔtsue mmɔ ne, ɔ̃ibanyi.’
41009049	Alasɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mapia mma i aɖera ame masekelera wã matã Ɣaa ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa aatã sɔ ɔbiara aaki i inyɛwe ɔtɔ gɔmɔ ame ne.
41009050	“Mma lɛ, ɣɛɛ si miyura me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ne, maibawo me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ɔpia. Ne ɔso mitã mma karabara sɛɛ si kawe i mi ame si misɛgu mi malaa i isobuɛ ame.”
41010001	Yesu ka ɔrui i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ Yudea karɔ̃ iso gu Yordan ɔwore kama. Maturi gbodzoo ɔba maasakanya i mmɔ ana, ne ɔte ma Itɔ̃me Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ ame ɔsɛ ɔbara awe ne.
41010002	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ si mala wũ manyɔ. Makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Ɣaa mmara ɔtã ɔri sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aasɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre?”
41010003	Ne Yesu ɔtã mmuai ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nda i Mose mmara ɔte mi?”
41010004	Matã mmuai sɔ, “Mose ɔtã ɔri sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, ɔ̃atã wũ kusɛ̃so ɔko iyɔ ɔ̃ɔɖi wũ ɔri.”
41010005	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ngbɔ ala mi atsuele ɔso.
41010006	Ta kayiiso karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, ɔrã gu ɔre i Ɣaa ɔbara.
41010007	‘Nnɛgbe ɔso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ aarui i ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi kɔrɛ ɔpɛ ɔmatã ɔ̃ ɔre iso,
41010008	fiɛ ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃ ne.’ Ne ɔso maisiɖe maturi inyɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃!
41010009	Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabɛse nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔmatãra so iso.”
41010010	Kama gɔ makɛlɛ iyo ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ itɔ̃me nɛmɔ iso ara.
41010011	Yesu ɔɖi karɔ̃ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara gɔ losɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ ɔyiri ɔmama ne, ɔfe ɔ̃ ɔre kama fiɛ ɔɣɛrɛ wũ.
41010012	Ngbɔ ame i ɔrɔ̃go gɔ losɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔrã fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ayiri kurã ɣɛtɛ ne, ɔfe ɔ̃ ɔrã kama fiɛ ɔɣɛrɛ wũ.”
41010013	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ mabiɛtɛ mabɔ Yesu sɔ ɔsia ma kɔrɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnyagalagu ma.
41010014	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ne, ɔnagu ma sikpã, ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã mabiɛtɛ si maba wũ kɔrɛ ne midaatɛ̃ ma ɔri, alasɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se sitã ma igbã.
41010015	Gbagbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ awe ne, ɔ̃ibawo sɛ̃ ame ɔkɛlɛ ɖa.”
41010016	Ɔsira mabiɛtɛ ma nɣɛ i mmɔ kanya ɔsia ma nrɔɔ̃ iso fiɛ ka ɔtã ma kusɛkusɛ.
41010017	Gɔ Yesu ɔta ɔɣo ɔri ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔtere ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze bielea, be loabara fiɛ loana ngbã mɛ nna katui?”
41010018	Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ ato akpere me Ɔbielea? Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iiɖe ɔbielea iɖo Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃.
41010019	Aɣe Ɣaa mmara. Daaɖoe ɔturi, daaɖe asɔrɔ̃, daayu kayu, daaɖaɛ fɔ ɔlaa kanya, daasɔsɔla fɔ ɔnyii afɔ ɔ̃ ara, warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi.”
41010020	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, ita i wũ sibiɛtɛ ame ne, loɔɖe mmara mɛ ɔɖuɖu iso.”
41010021	Yesu ɔnyɔ wũ ku kuɖɔɛ ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ikuti-ɔ ira ka iwɛ̃ aabara. Kɛlɛ aasu fɔ ira biara rɔdɛ̃ si asu sikã atsɛ mawɛrɛba, si aana kusia siare i kato. Si ɔɔro ne, kpese ba siai me!”
41010022	Gɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔnɔ nwagbe ne, ɔtu ɔbiɛ wũ, ne ɔruigu isoma alasɔ ɔba karana gbaã.
41010023	Yesu ɔki ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze, ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ito iabua iɖa fiɛ ranase aabo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
41010024	Itɔ̃me nɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɣaa. Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Wũ mabi, ito iabua iɖa fiɛ ranase aabo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃!
41010025	Ma mmɔ ibo ba ɔle iɖo kumɛgɔ i kapuipɔngɔ aaki kafe i ɔdzirikaãra iyoi ame!”
41010026	Gɔ ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ne, ikpɔkpɔtɔra ma ibua! Ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Iyɔ nna loabua ɔna iɖi?”
41010027	Ne Yesu ɔnyɔ ma totoroo fiɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔbara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa aawo ibiara ɔbara.”
41010028	Ne Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nyɔ, iyɔ bo ma lonyua bo ira biara bosɛ fiɛ bosiai-ɔ ɣɛɛ?”
41010029	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi gbagbaã sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lonyua ɔ̃ iyo, ɣee manyiirɛrɛĩ gu manyiiko, ɣee ɔnyi, ɣee ɔse, ɣee ɔ̃ mabi, ɣee aputu ɔsɛ, fiɛ ɔsiai me sɔ si Itɔ̃me Bielea si isɛ katɔ̃ ne,
41010030	ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ana ara ikpɛ kulafa ɔsia i ngbã mɛ ngbe ame. Ɔ̃ana ayo gu manyiirɛrɛĩ gu manyiiko gu manyi gu mabi gu aputu gu kama iti. Fiɛ kama ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ nna katui i kayi ɣɛtɛ ga loaba ame.
41010031	Ɣɛɛ ne, gbodzoo ma nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ aakpese matsɔra, fiɛ matsɔra aakpese maɖeakatɔ̃.”
41010032	Ɔwi gɔ masɛ i ɔri mato makɛlɛ Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, Yesu ɖe katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze siai wũ. Ifɔ̃ ɔyu ɔtidza marasuãdze, fiɛ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi ma nsiai ma ana. Yesu ɔkpere marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔpia so fiɛ ɔɣere ma ara wa loabɔrɛ wũ iso.
41010033	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minɔ! Bosɛ Yerusalem, kakɔi ga mato maasu Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi mapia ma Yudase masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze nrɔɔ̃ ame. Mato maatã me kukpi ipɔ fiɛ maatara me matã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
41010034	Mato maasopara me, matua minyatu mafere me, mapɛ me fiɛ maaɖoe me, ɣɛɛ iyi tɛare ne, nto loata ana.”
41010035	Ne kama ne, Zebedeo mabi ma nɖe Yakobo gu Yohanes ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ, ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, ira ika iwɛ̃ pia aabara atã bo.”
41010036	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be iɖe?”
41010037	Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Si akɛlɛ fɔ isekele sigaraiyara iso ne, tã sɔ bo ɔwɛ̃ aasɛ i fɔ kuɖearɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana aasɛ i fɔ kubena iso.”
41010038	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miiɣe nnɛ mito mikarɛ! Miawo inyɛwe gu kukpi gɔ ame loaki ɔki? Fiɛ miawo Ɣaa itupie kubarara gɔ loafɔ i kayi ame ɔfɔ?”
41010039	Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Boawo.” Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Aĩ, mito mianɛ ndu i ikɔi nɛ loanɛ ame, fiɛ miafɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara gɔ loafɔ.
41010040	Ɣɛɛ ne, lona ɔri sɔ loaɖi mma loasɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ gu wũ kubena iso. Maturi ma i Ɣaa ɔledza mmɔ ɔsɛ mba mmɔ.”
41010041	Gɔ marasuãdze iweo tsɔra ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛ ne, mana sikpã i Yakobo gu Yohanes iso.
41010042	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔkpere ma ɔɖuɖu ɔsirakanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ kayiiso magara ma loiɖe ma Yudase sɛ mate so mapia mma mato maɖe iso fiɛ maba ɔle ɔɖuɖu i ma iso.
41010043	Ɣɛɛ ne, idaawe i mi ame. Si mi ɔrere to ɔbie sikpakpa ne, ɔbara so sumudze ɔtã matsɔra.
41010044	Fiɛ si mi ɔrere to ɔbie iyere ne, ɔbara so ɔturi gɔ nna kayakpa i mi ndɛ̃.
41010045	Alasɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, kɔra iiba kayi gagbe ame sɔ masumu me. Ɣɛɛ ne, loba sɔ si loasumu maturi gu si loasu so losɔrɛ lotã maturi gbodzoo akpi iti sɔ si loafɔ ma.”
41010046	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔba Yeriko ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Ne gɔ mato marui ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔsiai ma. Nɔbiɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Bartimeo gɔ nɖe Timeo ɔbi si ɔto ɔwanyi ara i ɔri kuruɛ.
41010047	Gɔ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu Nasaretse nto ɔfe ne, ɔsiagu kulu sɔ, “Yesu! Igara David Ɔbi! Nyɔ me nnya!”
41010048	Maturi gbodzoo ɔsi wũ kanya iso sɔ ɔlo kulu. Ɣɛɛ ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ silɔ ɔbua ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Igara David Ɔbi! Nyɔ me nnya soo!”
41010049	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ ne, ɔtui ɔya ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikpere wũ mitã me.” Ne makpere nɔbiɛdze sɔ, “Na ɔtu! Ta mala, alasɔ ɔto ɔkpere-ɔ.”
41010050	Ɔpɛyu ɔ̃ kato awu siare wa ɔpia, ɔkɔlɛ ɔɣo ne ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ ne.
41010051	Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ato abie sɔ lobara lotã-ɔ?” Nɔbiɛdze ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ Sate, tã wũ anɔmi si abusi si loledza ara inya.”
41010052	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Rui kɛlɛ. Fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔsa-ɔ.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔ̃ anɔmi ɔbusi ɔtsɛ ara inya. Ne ka ɔsiai Yesu gu matsɔra makɛlɛ ɔri ne.
41011001	Ɔwi gɔ ame mabore mabo Yerusalem fiɛ mabo Betfage gu Betania simagɛ̃ kɔrɛ gu kube gɔ marɔ sɔ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso ne, Yesu ɔsese ɔ̃ marasuãdze inyɔ sɔ maɖe katɔ̃.
41011002	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mibo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ i mi katɔ̃ ame ne, mito mianya sɔ makɔra ɔfirimu ibi maɣedza i mmɔ gɔ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ne iso ɔnya. Miɖi ne i ɔwɛ̃ ame mibɔ me.
41011003	Si ɔrere ɔkarɛ mi sɔ, ‘Be ɔso mito miɖi ne ne?’ ne miɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Sate nto ɔbie, ɔto ɔ̃akpesera wũ ɔbɔ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.’ ”
41011004	Ne ɔso makɛlɛ masɛ maanya sɔ makɔra ɔfirimu ibi maɣedza i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ kayogodɔ̃ i ɔri kuruɛ. Ne ɔwi gɔ maɖi wũ i ɔwɛ̃ ame ne,
41011005	mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be mito mikurisi wũ mibaragu?”
41011006	Maɣɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔɣere ma kere ne matã ɔri ne.
41011007	Gɔ makɔ bɔi gɔgbe mabɔ Yesu ne, maɖi ma sikati masia wũ i imatɛ̃, ne Yesu ɔta ɔsɛ wũ iso ne.
41011008	Maturi gbodzoo ana ɔwarɛ ma sikati masɛ i ɔri iso fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔfɛfɛ̃ kudzirikpai mafere i ɔri iso sɔ Yesu ɔfirimu si ɔsɛ iso ɔfe.
41011009	Mma nɖe katɔ̃ gu mma ngbikama to mafa kayiɖu sɔ, “Hosiana! Boto bole ngɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame!
41011010	Mile bo ɔwa David sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛ nto siba! Hosiana itã Ɣaa i kato dzoroo!”
41011011	Gɔ ɔbo Yerusalem ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo. Ɔnyɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmɔ ɔkidza. Gɔ kaɖe ɔɔro ɔso ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Betania gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ.
41011012	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ maarui i Betania ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, kukã ɔkpɛ̃ Yesu.
41011013	Ɔnya ɔsese sɔ kuɖedziri kuwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ figi ɣɛgu aɣata wiawia. Ne ɔso ne, ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃anyɔ si ɔ̃anya abi. Gɔ ɔbore ɔbo kɔ̃ ne, ɔnya sɔ lɛ ibi na iso. Aɣata aɣata kere aɖe. Kɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ kuaɣɔ̃ ana iiɣo.
41011014	Ne Yesu ɔɣere kudziri sɔ, “Kuwɛ̃ iisibasu fɔ ibi ɔpia i kanya ɔnya!” Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnɔ sɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ.
41011015	Gɔ mabo Yerusalem ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ isɔrɛyo ame, ne ɔtsɛ mma nto maɖe kuɣa isa iɖi ne. Ɔli sikã manyuarãdze sipɔrɔ̃ ɔwiri gu maturi ma nto marɔdɛ̃ abɔrɔnuma ana ayara ɔpɛyu.
41011016	Ɔ̃itã ma ɔri sɔ maasu kuira makigu isɔrɛyo sɔ maarɔdɛ̃.
41011017	Ne ka ɔte ma ara sɔ, “Maitsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Maakpere wũ iyo sɔ iyo nɛ ame i kayi iso maturi ɔɖuɖu aakpere Ɣaa?’ Ɣɛɛ ne, miɔsu ne mikpesera mayukukpe kawɛrɛkɔ̃!”
41011018	Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Yudase mmara matedze ma lowe i mmɔ ɔnɔ ara wa i Yesu ɔɣɛ. Ne ɔso ne, mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ mana wũ maɖoe. Ɣɛɛ mato manigã wũ alasɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu to maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ara ite gbaã.
41011019	Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
41011020	Kaɖesɛ̃a kaya tutuutu gɔ masɛ mato maba ne, manya sɔ kuɖedziri gɔmɔ ɔɔkpi kuta i kɔ̃ siɖu ame.
41011021	Petro ɔnyigi nnɛ loba ne ɔto ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, nyɔ! Kudziri gɔ agbarĩ ɔɔkpi!”
41011022	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mifɔ Ɣaa miɖe.
41011023	Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔrere gɔ loaɣere kube gɔgbe sɔ kuta si kukɛlɛ ɔpo ame, fiɛ ɔ̃iwararã i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame fiɛ ɔba kafɔkaɖe ne, ito iaba itã wũ.
41011024	Ne ɔso ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ ibiara nɛ miakarɛ Ɣaa i kayi ikparama ame ne, mifɔ miɖe sɔ mina ne, iyɔ iaba itã mi ngbɔ.
41011025	Si mito mitɔ̃me mitã Ɣaa, fiɛ minya sɔ ɔrere ɔɣɛrɛ-mi ne, misu mitsɛ wũ si mi Ɔse i kato ana aasu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.
41011026	Ɣɛɛ si miisu mitsɛ ne, mi ɔse gɔ mpia i kato iibasu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.”
41011027	Gɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbo Yerusalem fiɛ ɔsɛ i isɔrɛyo ame ne, ma Yudase kasɔrɛkɔ̃ makpakpa gu mmara matedze gu mabea mawɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
41011028	Ne makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nna ɔle ame ato abara ara wagbe. Fiɛ nna tutuutu lobua ɔtã-ɔ ɔri?”
41011029	Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Tɔtɔ ne, loakarɛ mi itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ pɛ. Si mitã me mmuai ne, loaɣere mi ngɔ ɔle ame nto lobara nwagbe.
41011030	Miɣere me ngbegɔ i Yohanes ɔna ɔle ɔbɔrɛ gu fiɛ ɔpie maturi ndu i katu ame? Ɔle gɔmɔ ne, Ɣaa ame ɔse ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔturi lotã wũ? Mitã me mmuai!”
41011031	Matsɛ kakpadzɛ̃ i ma kerekere ndɛ̃ mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Be boaɣɛ? Si boɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa ɔle ɔɖe ne, ɔto ɔ̃akarɛ sɔ, ‘Si ngbɔ iɖe ne, be ɔso fiɛ miifɔ Yohanes miɖe?’
41011032	Si boɣɛ sɔ ɔturi lotã wũ ana ne, ne iilɛ!” Alasɔ ɔbiara ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe.
41011033	Ne ɔso ne, maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Boiɣe.” Ne Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme wũ loibaɣere mi ɔle gɔ nto lobara ala ara wagbe!”
41012001	Ne Yesu ɔpɛ igbã sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ̃ adziribi awɛ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃. Ɔtɛ̃ ɔkpã ɔki ɔlɔ. Ne ɔɖi itawo i kakpɛkɔ̃ ndɛ̃ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃afɔ adziribi ndu ɔfere maakã masirakanya. Ɔtsue kakɔi kɔlɛa ɔɣedza sɔ maaya iso madzuɛ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃. Ɔsu kakpɛkɔ̃ ɔtã marabaradze mawɛ̃ sɔ madzuɛ̃. Ne ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔri ne.
41012002	Gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ maasɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔsese ma ɔ̃ ɔɖabo sɔ masu ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ matã mabɔ wũ.
41012003	Ɣɛɛ marabaradze mamɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ mapɛ, masa wũ, ne ɔruigu nrɔɔ̃ kunu ne.
41012004	Kakpɛkɔ̃ sate ɔsese ɔɖabo mama. Gɔ ɔsɛ ne, marabaradze ɔpɛ wũ, maɖi wũ igbɛ i iti, masopara wũ gbaã.
41012005	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ ɔsese ɔɖabo mama, ɔ̃ ne, maɖoe wũ. Ɔpia mamama ana, mapɛ mawɛ̃ fiɛ maɖoe matsɔra.
41012006	“Ɔturi gɔ kotoo loɔkuti sɔ ɔ̃apia katɔ̃me nɖe ɔ̃ ɔbi gɔ ɔ̃ipia kuɣɛ. Katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ ɔbi gɔgbe. Ne ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Lofɔ loɖe sɔ mato maawarɛ wũ ɔbi.’
41012007	“Ɣɛɛ ne, marabaradze mamɔ ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Bo ɔkɔse ɔbi ngbe ne, ɔ̃ nɖe biarase ne. Mitã boɖoe wũ si kaɖekɔ̃ aaɣo bo!’
41012008	Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ ɔbi. Ne gɔ maɖoe wũ ne, masu wũ mafuĩdza masɛ i ɔkpã kama.”
41012009	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ mma i mmɔ sɔ, “Be mifɔ miɖe sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe aabara? Loɣere mi! Ɔto ɔ̃akɛlɛ ɔ̃aɖoe marabaradze ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔ̃asu kakpɛkɔ̃ ɔpia maturi mama i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
41012010	Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame ngbegɔ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ita nɛ i mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ sɔ iilɛ ne, ikpese ita nyaa gu nnɛ lofɔ ma kuɣa iɖo atsɔra?
41012011	Ɣaa lobara ira siare nɛ. Ibo bo anɔ, fiɛ ibara bo ɣaa ana.’ ”
41012012	Gɔ manɔ nwagbe ne, ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔbie sɔ si maamɔɛ̃ Yesu. Alasɔ matsue sɔ ma iso ɔpɛ igbã. Ɣɛɛ ne, manigã maturi ma loya i mmɔ. Ne ɔso marui maɣɛ wũ.
41012013	Ɔwi kama ne, masese ma Farisise gu Herodes masiaidze sɔ masɛ Yesu kɔrɛ mabie ɔ̃ kanya ame itɔ̃me fiɛ maana ɔ̃ kamɔɛ̃kɔ̃ ɔri.
41012014	Gɔ mabore mabo wũ ne, maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, boɣe sɔ asɛ aɖe ika sɛɛ ɔwi gbodzoo. Aisɛ afinikira fɔ itɔ̃me, fiɛ aisɛ anyɔ maturi i katɔ̃. Asɛ ate ɔbiara Ɣaa ɔri sɛɛ. Ne ɔso ne, ɣere bo si ɔri pia sɔ boatã Kaisaro lampo.
41012015	Botã wũ, ɛɛbɛrɛ bodaatã?” Yesu ɔtsue sɔ ɔnyɔnyɔ kere maba manyɔnyɔ wũ, ne ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be fiɛ mito migbere me ibuɛ? Mitã me kapɛrɛ si lonyɔ.”
41012016	Masu mabɔ wũ. Ne ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna iti gu iyere nsia iso?” Matã mmuai sɔ, “Kaisaro ire iɖe.”
41012017	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ne ɔso ne, misu Kaisaro ira mitã wũ. Si misu Ɣaa ire ana mitã Ɣaa.” Kumɛgɔ ɔtã mmuai ɔso ne, mawa nnya mato, alasɔ ibara ma ɣaa.
41012018	Ma Zadukise ma nsɛ mate sɔ si ɔturi ɔkpi ne, ɔ̃isibata mawɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ, ne makarɛ wũ sɔ,
41012019	“Ratedze, Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ bo sɔ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi ɔnyua ɔrɔ̃go maiɣe mabi ne, ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi aasu wũ ɔyiri sɔ si maɣe ɔbi ne, maabu wũ lɛ ɔrã ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔbi awe.
41012020	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, manyiibirɛrɛ̃ ikɔdzɛ ɔwe. Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go maiɣe ɔbi fiɛ ɔkpi.
41012021	Ne ɔnyɔare ɔsu ɔrɔ̃go ne, maiɣe ɔbi kuwɛ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔkpi. Ɔtɛare ɔsu ɔrɔ̃go ngbɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔkpi ɔnyua ɔrɔ̃go ɔbi idaaɣe ku wũ.
41012022	Manyi mabi ikɔdzɛ magbe ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe makã ku ɔbi idaaɣe fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go ana ɔba ɔ̃akpi i katsɔrakɔ̃.
41012023	Ɔwi gɔ i makpise ɔɖuɖu aata masɛ ngbã ne, ma nna loayiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe gɔ ma ikɔdzɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔyiri wũ makã?”
41012024	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mmɔ miɣɛrɛ ne. Lonya sɔ miinɔ itɔ̃me karɔ̃, alasɔ miiɣe Ɔko Sekelea ame itɔ̃me gu Ɣaa ɔle.
41012025	Ɔwi gɔ i makpise aata ne, maase lɛ Ɣaa makpabo ma i kato, gɔ maibayiri so.
41012026	Fiɛ makpise ita itɔ̃me ne, Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ira ɔpia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ɔwi gɔ ɔnya kudzirimi to kutsue. Mmɔ ɔtsɛrɛ sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Abraham Ɣaa gu Isak Ɣaa gu Yakob Ɣaa.’
41012027	Ne ɔso gɔ Ɣaa to ɔnyɔ makpise lɛ manyɔdze ɔso ne, magbanadze Ɣaa ɔɖe, ɔ̃iɖe makpise Ɣaa. Mi ne, miyu ɔri gbaã!”
41012028	Ne mmaratedze gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ fiɛ ɔnɔ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu ɔtã mmuai kukaakɔ ɔbore ɔbo Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Iɖe Ɣaa mmara mɛ nɖe misiare miɖo?”
41012029	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mmara mɛ loɖo me ɔɖuɖu nɖe sɔ, ‘Israel mabi, minɔ kukaakɔ! Bosate Ɣaa ne, ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã mpia.
41012030	Ne ɔso ne, ikote sɔ aaɖɔɛ Bosate gɔ nɖe Ɣaa gu fɔ ɔtu gu fɔ siwarã gu fɔ kasusu gu fɔ ɔle ɔɖuɖu.’
41012031	Fiɛ mmɛ nsiai mmɛgbe kama nɖe sɔ, ‘Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔnyii lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.’ Mmara kumiwɛ̃ siina miɖo mmɛgbe.”
41012032	Mmaratedze gɔmɔ ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ratedze, aɖe ika gbaã! Titiriu kumɛgɔ aɣɛ sɔ Bosate pɛ nɖe Ɣaa, fiɛ ɔmama kuwɛ̃ siina iɖo wũ.
41012033	Ne ɔso ne, ɔturi aaɖɔɛ Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu, gu ɔ̃ kasusu ɔɖuɖu gu ɔ̃ so ɔle ɔɖuɖu, sɔ ɔ̃aɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ so. Fiɛ ilɛ iɖo sɔ ɔturi aasiai mmara mɛgbe ɔɖo sɔ ɔ̃asu mabɔi gu ara mama ɔfɛ̃ ɔtã Ɣaa.”
41012034	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya kumɛgɔ ɔtã mmuai gu inɔgba ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ne, aidzorogu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.” Nnɛgbe kama ne, kuwɛ̃ iisibara kagbegbe sɔ ɔ̃akarɛ Yesu kuira kuira.
41012035	Gɔ Yesu to ɔte ara i Ɣaa iyo ame ne, ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Nda ɔso fiɛ mmara matedze sɛ maɣɛ sɔ Kristo ne, Igara David ɔbi ɔɖe?
41012036	Alasɔ Siwarã Bielea ɔki i David mɔmɔ iso ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ Sate sɔ, “Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loabɔ fɔ matsirise karɔ̃ lopia i fɔ ngbatata kayirinɔ.” ’
41012037	Ngbe ne, si David mɔmɔ to ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔ̃ Sate ne, nda iba sɔ Kristo aaɖe David ɔwa?” Maturi gbodzoo ɔya ku isoɣɔ manɔ ara wa i Yesu to ɔɣɛ ku ɔmɛrɛ̃.
41012038	Gɔ Yesu togu ara ite ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so i mmara matedze iso. Masɛ mapia ara siare fiɛ masɛ mawe maki sɔ maturi si maya ma ku ibu i kuɣa ame.
41012039	Masɛ mabie sɔ maasɛ i kakɔlɛkɔ̃ i kusarɛkɔ̃ gu sipɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃.
41012040	Masɛ maɖe makpise mare amumu mafɔ ma ara maɖe. Ɣɛɛ masɛ matɛ̃ra maturi atsue i kayi ikparama ame, alasɔ masɛ maɖe aka tagbaraa i iteso ame. Ma kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔmɔ iɖo maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu.”
41012041	Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i karɔ̃ i kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ngbegɔ mato matã sikã, ɔsi ɔto ɔnyɔ kumɛgɔ i maturi to matã ara. Maranase ɔtã sikã siare.
41012042	Ɣɛɛ kuɛdze wɛrɛba ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ɔpia kupɛrɛ kunyɔ.
41012043	Ne Yesu ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔsirakanya fiɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ i Ɣaa anɔmi ame ne, kuɛdze wɛrɛba gɔgbe ɔtã ɔɖo maturi tsɔra.
41012044	Gbaã ne, mmagbe ara wa maɖe makuti masu maba maatã sɔ si mate so. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ne, bidɛ sɔ wɛrɛba ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ iyo gu kayi ɔsu ɔtã. Ira nɛ ɔ̃asu ɔɣa aɖera ɔɖe ɔsu ɔba ɔ̃atã ngbe ne.”
41013001	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i ma Yudase isɔrɛyo mmɔ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, nyɔ ata gu kulɛ wa masu matsue iyo siare nɛ gu kumɛgɔ matsue ne ana makigu. Ito ilɛ ɔnyɔ lo!”
41013002	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ iyo siare nɛgbe kukaakɔ, alasɔ ita kuiwɛ̃ iibakuti isia i ne ɔlaa iso, nɛ maibali mapɛyu!”
41013003	Yesu ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso ɔto ɔnyɔ isɔrɛyo isɛ. Petro gu Yakobo gu Yohanes gu Andrea mɛrɛ̃ ɔba maakarɛ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ,
41013004	“Bosate, iɖe ɔwi gɔ i ara wagbe aaba? Ɣere bo ara wa loaba fiɛ boatsue sɔ ɔwi ɔɔkote sɔ ara wagbe aaba.”
41013005	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so sɔ miibatã kuwɛ̃ aasɔsɔla mi.
41013006	Maturi gbodzoo to maaba i wũ iyere ame, maɣere mi sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Kristo!’ Fiɛ maasu wũ iyere masɔsɔla maturi gbodzoo.
41013007	Sitsue si sidaabɔrɛ mi si minɔ sɔ kakpã to i mi kɔrɛ ɣee kadzorokɔ̃. Ito iaba sɔ ara wagbe igbã aaba, ɣɛɛ iite sɔ kayi karokɔ̃ ɔɔwo.
41013008	Abuiti aakpɛ̃ gu abuiti. Fiɛ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ to siata siya sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso. Karɔ̃ to kaati i ngɔi, fiɛ kukã to kuabo. Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu nɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ i kuɣe sɛ kusɛ karɔ̃ ku iɖoɖo ne.
41013009	“Mi ne, midzuɛ̃ so kukaakɔ. Mato maamɔɛ̃ mi masɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃. Mato maapɛ mi i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ala wũ ɔso, mito miaya i matɔ̃ɖedze gu magara anɔ miɣere ma wũ iso itɔ̃me, si iɖe ikparĩ itã ma.
41013010	Si kawirikɔ̃ aaba ne, ito iaba sɔ maɣere nɖebi ɔɖuɖu Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea.
41013011	Si maamɔɛ̃ mi fiɛ makɛlɛgu mi atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ne, midaamararã so sɔ be miaɣɛ. Si ɔwi ɔɣo ne, miɣɛ nnɛ i Siwarã Bielea aatã mi. Alasɔ iiɖe mi mɔmɔ ati ame atɔ̃me miaɣɛ, ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa Siwarã loatã sɔ miaɣɛ ɔ̃ adzuni.
41013012	“Maturi to maaɖi ma manyii matã sɔ maɖoe. Fiɛ mase to maaɖi ma mabi matã. Mabi to maata maya maɣese iso maɖi ma matã sɔ maɖoe.
41013013	Ɔbiara to ɔ̃atsiri mi, ala wũ ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbiara gɔ loaya teteree ɔbo kawirikɔ̃ to ɔ̃ana iɖi.
41013014	“Kiniɔ ne, mikã atsue kukaakɔ si minɔ karɔ̃. Si minya imusuora nɛ nsɛ iwɔra maturi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtsiri sɔ iba iaya i ngbegɔ loikote ne, mma mpia i Yudea si matere teteree makɛlɛ abe iso maawɛrɛ.
41013015	Ngɔ loya ɔsia i isã si ɔdaanina ɔwi sɔ ɔso ɔba iyo sɔ ɔ̃asu kuira i iyo kame.
41013016	Ngɔ mpia i sia si ɔdaaɣɛ sɔ ɔsɛ kaa sɔ ɔ̃asu awu.
41013017	Ɔwi gɔmɔ to ɔ̃awe ɔle gbaã ɔtã mayirise gu matalɛpo ɣɛtɛ.
41013018	Mitã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ si ɔdaaba ku kulele ɔwi.
41013019	Alasɔ ibo gu ibɛbɛrɛ nɛ loaba ne, ito iaɖo ibiara nɛ i kayi gagbe ɔnya kanya ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iba iabo nɔme. Fiɛ inyɛwe nɛgbe igbã iisibaba kuiyikuiyi.
41013020	Ɣɛɛ ne, si Bo Ɔse Ɣaa iitu ayi wagbe ne, ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibakuti. Ɣɛɛ mma ɔ̃ɔɖi ɔtã so ɔso ne, ɔ̃abɛrɛkɛ ayi wagbe.
41013021	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame si ɔrere ɔɣere-ɔ sɔ, ‘Nyɔ! Nya Kristo ngbe!’ ɣee, ‘Nya wũ mmɔ ne!’ daafɔ wũ aɖe!
41013022	Alasɔ mila ma Kristo gu mila kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo to maabara akparĩ gu awawãra gbodzoo, sɔ si maawo kɔra ne, maasɔsɔla kuta Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ kokooko.
41013023	Ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so! Loɔɣere mi losɛ fiɛ ɔwi aaɣo.
41013024	“Ayi wa ka loasiai inyɛwe ɔwi ne, ‘kuɣɛ̃ to kuanyi, fiɛ ɔgbaworeti ana iibare.
41013025	Awãmi to aakpase abɔrɛ i kato, fiɛ kato sile ɔɖuɖu to siati kpukpukpu sibɔrɛ i sɛ̃ kawekɔ̃.’
41013026	“Ne maturi aanya Ɔturi awune Ɔbi gɔ ɔto ɔso i adɔdɔ ame ɔba i ɔle siare gu ifiɛ ame.
41013027	Fiɛ ɔ̃asese ɔ̃ kato makpabo kayi abesɛ ana ɔɖuɖu sɔ ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ ita i kayi iti nɛ, ikɛlɛ iti nɛmɔ ne, masira ma kanya.
41013028	“Misuã ara i kuɖedziri iso. Si minya sɔ kudziri gɔmɔ to kuɖi ayata ɣɛtɛ ne, mitsue sɔ kado ɔpɛwi ka ɔba.
41013029	Ne ɔso si miɔtsɛ ara wa loɣere mi ngbe inya ne, mitsue sɔ, wũ iba ɔɔbore ibo iɣɛ i fɔ kayogodɔ̃!
41013030	Nto loɣere mi sɔ ara wagbe aaba fiɛ mi kiniɔgbe maturi aakpi maro.
41013031	Kato gu karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu to kaafe, ɣɛɛ ne, wũ itɔ̃me iibafe kuiyikuiyi.
41013032	“Fiɛ ɣɛɛ ne, kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iyi ɣee ɔɖɔwũ gɔ ame iaba, nane Ɣaa makpabo gu mme Ɣaa Ɔbi kɔra iiɣe, isu iɖo wũ Ɔse ɔnɔwɛ̃.
41013033	Midzuɛ̃ so si mila so, alasɔ miiɣe iyi nɛ i ɔwi gɔmɔ aaba.
41013034	Wũ iba to iase lɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lota sɔ ɔsɛ ɔri, fiɛ ɔrui ɔnyua ɔ̃ marabaradze ɔpia iyo. Ɔtã ɔbiara ɔ̃ karabara sɔ ɔbara. Ne kama ne, ɔɣere iyodzuɛ̃se sɔ ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ iba ɔri kukaakɔ.
41013035	“Ne ɔso mi wũ midzuɛ̃ so. Alasɔ miiɣe ɔwi gɔ tutuutu i Bosate aaba ɔ̃abo. Ito iawo ɔba ku kutsuɛ ɣee kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ɣee ɔɖesɛrã siare, marodza silɔ ɔɖi ɔwi, ɣee kaya tutuutu.
41013036	Si ɔba ɔ̃ɔbɔrɛ mi iso ngbɔ ne, idaaba sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃anya mi sɔ mito mirɛ sirɛ.
41013037	Ira nɛ loɣere mi ngbe ne, ne ame nto loɣere matsɔra ne. Ne ɔso minyɔ ɔ̃ iba ɔri.”
41014001	Ikuti ayi anyɔ fiɛ ma Yudase aaɖe ma iyi sekelea nɛ masɛ masu manyigi ma sisande ame ibɔrɛ i Egipte, iyi nɛ mato marɔ sɔ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo gu Abolo Ɣɛtɛ Wa Loita Iɖe Iyi. Kasɔrɛkɔ̃ matɔ̃ɖedze gu mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ɔnyɔnyɔ ɔri gɔ maaki fiɛ maamɔɛ̃ Yesu maɖoe.
41014002	Maɣere so sɔ, “Iito ialɛ sɔ boabara ngbɔ ku iyi iɖe ayi wagbe ame. Alasɔ si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, kulu to kuapɛ.”
41014003	Yesu ɔwe i Betania ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Simon gɔ lonyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa iyo. Gɔ Yesu si i aɖera kaɖekɔ̃ ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔba mmɔ ku ita inɔĩbui sɔlɔsɔlɔa nɛ ame i nnɔĩ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔyi pɔpɔɔpɔ fiɛ mifɔ kuya gbaã. Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔfɛ̃ inɔĩbui kanya, ne ɔfedza me ɔfere Yesu iti ne.
41014004	Nnɛgbe ɔɖaa mma nɣɛ mmɔ mawɛ̃ fiɛ ibo ma so sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ ɔnina nnɔĩ mɛgbe?
41014005	Tee ɔsu ɔrɔdɛ̃ ɔfɔ ɔturi ikɔ buu kuwakuso gɔ ɔ̃asu ɔtã mawɛrɛba.” Ne ɔso ne, manyagalagu wũ, managu wũ sikpã.
41014006	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyua wũ! Be ɔso fiɛ miibatã wũ ɔwarã? Ɔbara me ira sɛɛ.
41014007	Mawɛrɛba pia i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi biara. Fiɛ ɔwi biara miɖɔɛ ne, miawo ma ɔbuai. Mme ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ɔwi biara nto loawe i mi kɔrɛ.
41014008	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ne, ɔbara nnɛ ɔ̃awo ɔbara. Ɔsu nnɔĩ mɛ ɔfere me iso ɔledza me ɔtã wũ ibiara.
41014009	Fiɛ nto losia ita sɔ kakɔi biara ga maaɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me i kayi gagbe ame ne, maaɣɛ nnɛ i ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔbara.”
41014010	Yuda Iskariot gɔ nɖe Yesu katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ makpakpa kɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi Yesu ɔtã ma sɔ maɖoe.
41014011	Mana isoɣɔ gbaã, ne ɔso maɣɛ sɔ maatã wũ sikã. Ne ɔso ɔtsɛ ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi wũ ɔtã ma mamɔɛ̃ inyɔnyɔ.
41014012	I Abolo Ɣɛtɛ Wa Loita Iɖe Iyi ikpɛnɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ iso masɛ maɖoe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo sɛrɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase kubarara se ne, Yesu marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Lɛ abie sɔ boledza bosɛ botã bo iyi aɖera kaɖekɔ̃?”
41014013	Ne Yesu ɔɖi ma inyɔ mawɛ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame, mito mianya ɔwɛ̃ sore ndu kabui. Misiai wũ si minyɔ iyo nɛ ame ɔ̃abo.
41014014	Miɣere iyosate sɔ, ‘Ratedze sɔ te bo iyo nɛ ame i ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze aaba maatu Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ɔpɔrɔ̃.’
41014015	Ɔto ɔ̃ate mi iyo siare iwɛ̃ nɛ matsue masia ame ngbegɔ maledza masɛ. Miwa ikpɛnɛ bielea nɛgbe aɖera misɛ i mmɔ.”
41014016	Marasuãdze magbe ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame, ne manya sɔ ibiara nɛ i Yesu ɔɣɛ ɔba ngbɔ. Ne mawa Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi aɖera masɛ ne.
41014017	Gɔ kutsuɛ ɔɣo ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔsɛ maabo mmɔ.
41014018	Ne gɔ masɛ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ mato maɖe ara ne, Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔwɛ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ bo gu wũ nsi ngbe boto boɖe ara to ɔ̃aɖi me ɔtã.”
41014019	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɖaa ma, ne matsɛ wũ ikarɛ isia isia sɔ, “Loɣe sɔ iiɖe mme ato, ɛɛbɛrɛ mme loɖe?”
41014020	Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Mi iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i bo gu wũ inyɔ to bopia kɔrɔ̃ i irɔi iwɛ̃ ame ngbe ɔɖe.
41014021	Mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, to ɔsɛ ɔ̃akpi lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɔko Sekelea ɔte. Ɣɛɛ iito iase ngɔ loaɖi wũ ɔtã pɔkɔsɔɔ. Si maiɣe wũ kɔra ne, ialɛgu wũ iɖo!”
41014022	Gɔ mato maɖe ara ne, Yesu ɔsu abolo. Ne gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti ne, ɔkpɛkpɛti ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mifɔ si miɖe. Wũ siturina i ngbe ne.”
41014023	Ne ɔsu ndã ikɔi ne, gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i ne iti ne, ɔsu ɔtã ma, ne manɛ ne.
41014024	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ ima nɛ loasu lofere i karɔ̃ i maturi gbodzoo iti fiɛ iɖe ndamu ɣɛtɛ i maturi awune gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ i ngbe ne.
41014025	Gbaã ne, loisibanɛ ndã kumiwɛ̃, gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loanɛ miɣɛtɛ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
41014026	Gɔ maɖe ara maro ne, maka kuka male Ɣaa fiɛ makɛlɛ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso.
41014027	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere marasuãdze sɔ, “Mi ɔɖuɖu to miatere miɣɛ me. Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Loaɖoe masɛrɛkɔdze, fiɛ ɔ̃ masɛrɛ aasame.’
41014028	Ɔwi gɔ loata lobɔrɛ i makpise ndɛ̃ ne, loaɖe mi katɔ̃ lokɛlɛ Galilea karɔ̃ iso.”
41014029	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme loibatere loɣɛ-ɔ, si ɔbiara ɔnyua-ɔ ɔsɛ.”
41014030	Yesu ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Nto loɣere-ɔ gbagbaã sɔ, kasɛ̃ gagbe si rodza aaɖi kanya ɔkpɛ nyɔa ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.”
41014031	Petro ɔledza ita isia ɔɖo iɖeakatɔ̃ sɔ, “Si loakpigu-ɔ kɔra ne, loibaɣɛ sɔ loiɣe-ɔ.” Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɖuɖu ana ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne.
41014032	Gɔ masɛ maabo ngbegɔ marɔ Getsemane ne, Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Misɛ i ngbe si nsɛ loakparama kayi.”
41014033	Ne ɔkɔ Petro gu Yakobo gu Yohanes ɔruigu, ɔtsɛ so imararã iti ikpakpa ne.
41014034	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto lona ibo ta wũ ame gbaã, lɛ kukpi lomɔɛ̃ me kuto. Miya i ngbe si midzuɛ̃gu me.”
41014035	Gɔ ɔkɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔkɔlɛ ɔfu i karɔ̃ ɔpɛ ɔ̃ ɔse nrɔɔ̃ sɔ, “Si ialɛ ne, tã inyɛwe ɔwi gɔgbe si ɔta ɔwara me.”
41014036	Ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete! Aawo ibiara ɔbara. Si atɔrã ne, aawo inyɛwe ikɔi nɛgbe sɛnɛkɛ̃ra ɔrera me kama, ɣɛɛ daabara wũ kuɖɔɛ, bara fɔ kuɖɔɛ.”
41014037	Gɔ ɔkpese ɔba marasuãdze itɛ kɔrɛ ne, ɔnya sɔ mato marɛ sirɛ. Ne ɔɣere Simon Petro sɔ, “Simon, sirɛ ato arɛ? Aibawo ɔsɛ ɔdzuɛ̃ iɣo ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ pɛ kere?”
41014038	Ne ka ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misɛ midzuɛ̃, si mikparama kayi si miibabo i ilainyɔ ame. Siwarã to sibie, ɣɛɛ siturina ɔɔfɛ̃.”
41014039	Ne ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akparama kayi ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me wamɔ ame ana ne.
41014040	Gɔ ɔkpese ɔba ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze to marɛ sirɛ ana. Makpi sirɛ, ne ɔso maiɣe kumɛgɔ maaɖi so kanya.
41014041	Gɔ ɔkpese ɔba ɔkpɛ tɛare ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mitogu sirɛ? Mitogu iwarã? Ka ilɛ! Ɔwi ɔɔɣo! Maɔɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã maturi lalaa! Minyɔ ka masɛ i ɔri.
41014042	Mita si borui. Minyɔ, ngɔ loɖi me ɔtã nɖegu ma katɔ̃.”
41014043	Gɔ Yesu togu ma ika iɖe ne, Yuda gɔ nɖe marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃abo. Maturi ikuri nɛ i ma Yudase kasɔrɛkɔ̃ makpakpa gu mmara matedze gu ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa ɔpia siai wũ maba. Mato apɛ gu kudziriku.
41014044	Ngɔ loɖi wũ ɔtã ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ minya sɔ loya fiɛ lofiɔ̃ irɛkpo ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖe ne, mimɔɛ̃ wũ teteree mikɛlɛgu!”
41014045	Ne ɔso gɔ Yuda ɔbore ɔbo Yesu ne, ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze!” Ɔmini wũ ɔpia wũ kɔrɔ̃.
41014046	Mamɔɛ̃ Yesu mapɔrɛ wũ teteree.
41014047	Mma nɣɛgu Yesu mmɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi itekpe, ɔtu kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔkpakpa pelepele ɔɖabo kutsue.
41014048	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ miala akpo gu apɛ sɔ miba miamɔɛ̃ me lɛ yukukpe?
41014049	Ikpɛnɛ biara bo gu mi mpia i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo, fiɛ lowe i mmɔ lote Itɔ̃me Bielea, miimɔɛ̃ me. Ɣɛɛ ne, iba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ maɣɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame aayi.”
41014050	Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɖuɖu ɔtere maɣɛ wũ.
41014051	Ɔwi gɔgbe ne, ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nfu so ɔkati fudza siai Yesu i kama fiɛ ɔnya nwagbe ɔɖuɖu. Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔkpɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ ma iso. Ɔ̃ ɔkati kere mana.
41014052	Ɔbɔrɛ ma i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔrui ɔtere isɔ̃isɔ̃.
41014053	Makɔ Yesu makɛlɛgu ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele iyo. Mmɔ i Ɣaa iyo masɔrɛdze gu ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa gu mmara matedze ɔsarɛ ne.
41014054	Petro ɔsiai ma kama dzoroo ɔba ɔ̃abo mmɔ, ne ɔsɛ i ikpata ame i madzuɛ̃se kɔrɛ ɔto ɔwa ɔtɔ ne.
41014055	Ɣaa masɔrɛdze gu atɔ̃memaɣɛdze ma ɔɖuɖu nsi ne, mato manyɔnyɔ itɔ̃me nɛ maasu matã Yesu ipɔ fiɛ mana wũ maɖoe. Ɣɛɛ mainya kuira lalaa kuiwɛ̃.
41014056	Maturi gbodzoo ɔɖe aka maɖaɛ wũ kanya, ɣɛɛ ne, ma atɔ̃me ɔta aya so iso.
41014057	Ne mawɛ̃ ɔta maya maɖaɛ wũ kanya sɔ,
41014058	“Bonɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loabiɛ Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo nɛ masu nrɔɔ̃ matsue i ngbe. Fiɛ ayi atɛ kama ne, loatsue imama nɛ iiɖe maturi lotsue.’ ”
41014059	Ɣɛɛ ma wũ ma atɔ̃me ana iikategu ma malaa are.
41014060	Ɣaa sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔta ɔya i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Anɔ itɔ̃me nɛ mato maɣɛ? Be aba aaɣɛ?”
41014061	Ɣɛɛ ne, Yesu ɔma kanya kpa, ɔ̃iɣɛ kuira. Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔkarɛ wũ ana sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Kristo gɔ nɖe Bosate Sekelea mɔmɔ Ɔbi?”
41014062	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme mmɔ ne. Mi ɔɖuɖu to mianya Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi sɔ ɔsi i Ɣaa Ɔlesate kuɖearɔ̃ iso. Fiɛ mianya sɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ i kato i adɔdɔ ame ɔto ɔba!”
41014063	Ɔluwɛ̃ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔkɛ so awu i sikpã ame sɔ, “Boisito bobie ku itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ i ɔmama kɔrɛ!
41014064	Ɔɣɛ imusuora ɔsegu i Ɣaa iso! Nda minya?” Ne ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtɔrã masia ita sɔ matã wũ ipɔ sɔ ɔ̃akpi.
41014065	Ma mawɛ̃ ɔtsɛ minyatu itua ifere Yesu. Manyi wũ anɔmi fiɛ matsɛ wũ ipɛ, mato maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣɛ ngɔ lopɛ-ɔ!” Ɔ̃ madzuɛ̃se mawɛ̃ to mapɛ wũ sirɔ̃ta.
41014066	Gɔ Petro si i ikpata ame mmɔ ne, iyo ame ɔsande birɔ̃gomi ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele iyo ɔba.
41014067	Gɔ ɔnya Petro to ɔwa ɔtɔ ne, ɔnyɔ wũ totoroo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ wũ asiai Yesu Nasaretse!”
41014068	Ne Petro ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be? Loiɣe itɔ̃me nɛ ato aɣere me ngbe kiniɔ!” Ne ɔta ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kayogodɔ̃ kɔrɛ, kere ne rodza ɔɖi kanya ne.
41014069	Ɔbirɔ̃gomi gɔmɔ ɔledza wũ inya, ne ka ɔto ɔɣere mma nɣɛ i mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔ̃ wũ ma ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe!”
41014070	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔledza isɛ̃ ana. Iifɔ ɔwi kɔra fiɛ mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔtsɛ Petro iɣere sɔ, “Gbagbaã ma ɔwɛ̃ aɖe, alasɔ fɔ wũ abɔrɛ i Galilea karɔ̃ iso!”
41014071	Ne Petro ɔtsɛ ndamu ikã itarĩgu ara iɣɛ sɔ, “Lotarĩgu Ɣaa sɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ me kutsue si lola sila! Loiɣe ngɔ itɔ̃me mito miɣɛ i ngbe!”
41014072	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, rodza ɔɖi kanya ɔkpɛ nyɔare, ne ɔnyigi nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si rodza aaɖi kanya ɔkpɛ nyɔare ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.” Ɔtu ɔbiɛ Petro, ne ɔpɛ kaku ne.
41015001	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ kaya tutuutu ne, ma Yudase masɔrɛdze ɔsarɛgu ma ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa gu mmara matedze gu matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɖuɖu. Gɔ masɛ iti ame i itɔ̃me iso ne, manyi Yesu fiɛ makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu Roma abã ɔkpakpa Pilato.
41015002	Mmɔ i Pilato ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ma Yudase Igara ne?” Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Aĩ, ise lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɣɛ.”
41015003	Ɣaa masɔrɛdze ɔnyi atɔ̃me gbodzoo masia Yesu iso.
41015004	Ne ɔso Pilato ana ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ aito aɣɛ kuiwɛ̃? Kã atsue si anɔ atɔ̃me wa mato maɣɛ i fɔ iso!”
41015005	Ɣɛɛ Yesu iibusi kanya, ne ɔso ibara Pilato ɣaa.
41015006	Iyi siare nɛgbe ɔɖewi ne, Pilato sɛ ɔtɔrã maɖi yorɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ makarɛ ɔtã ma.
41015007	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, mamɔɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Baraba mapia iyo gu mma lota maya ma Romase Igara iso, Gɔ mabara ngbɔ ɔso ne, mamɔɛ̃ ma fiɛ matã ma kukpi ipɔ alasɔ maɖoe maturi.
41015008	Ne iturikuri ɔkarɛ Pilato sɔ ɔnyigi ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔtã ayo marɛdze lɛ kumɛgɔ ame ɔbua ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔwi biara.
41015009	Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mitɔrã sɔ lonyua ma Yudase Igara lotã mi?”
41015010	Pilato ɔkarɛ ma ngbɔ alasɔ ɔɣe sɔ sirerɛ ɔso fiɛ makpakpa ɔmɔɛ̃ Yesu mabɔ wũ.
41015011	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa masɔrɛdze ɔɣɛ mapia maturi sɔ Pilato si ɔnyua Baraba ɔtã ma.
41015012	Pilato ɔɖe iturikuri ika, ne ɔto ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be mibie sɔ lobaragu ngɔ mito mirɔ sɔ ma Yudase Igara?”
41015013	Ne masia kulu sɔ, “Tã mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso!”
41015014	Pilato ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be iɖe ɔso? Iɖe iɣɛrɛ nɛ ɔɣɛrɛ?” Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔsia kulu titiiti mabua mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Tã mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso.”
41015015	Gɔ Pilato to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara ma kuɖɔɛ ɔso ne, ɔnyua Baraba ɔtã ma. Ne ka ɔtã mapɛ Yesu kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔsu wũ ɔtã sɔ makɛlɛgu wũ maapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso ne.
41015016	Makɔ Yesu makɛlɛgu Roma abã ɔkpakpa iyo siare ame fiɛ makpere makpakpɛ̃dze tsɔra mabɔ.
41015017	Masu ɔgo rɛtɛa awu mapia wũ fiɛ masu igba miyu mabara igara ikoto masu matɔ̃medza wũ.
41015018	Ne mato mabara wũ, aɣiãra sɔ, “Ɣii-ɣiiɖuu! Ma Yudase Igara, sɛ ngbã dzoroo!”
41015019	Masu sidziri maɖeɖe wũ iti, fiɛ matua minyatu mafere wũ. Ne mato mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ sɔ mato masɔrɛ wũ ne.
41015020	Ɔwi gɔ maɔbara wũ aɣiãra maro ne, manyuarã ɔgo rɛtɛa awu, fiɛ masu ɔ̃ are mapia wũ. Ne makɔ wũ maruigu sɔ maapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso ne.
41015021	Gɔ masɛ ne, masarɛgu ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Simon gɔ ɔse i ɔ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ ɔto ɔba Yerusalem. Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔya wũ iso sɔ ɔfɔgu Yesu ɔnyigbã ɔsore. Simon ɔse i Sireni, fiɛ ɔ̃ mabi nɖe Aleksandra gu Rufo ne.
41015022	Makɔ Yesu makɛlɛgu kabemi kawɛ̃ ga marɔ sɔ Golgata, gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ ɔturi iti ikui.
41015023	Gɔ mabo mmɔ ne, mabie sɔ si matã wũ ndã bea mɛ malupu kua gɔ mba ɔɖo sɔ ɔnɛ si ɔ̃ibana ibo, ɣɛɛ Yesu iinɛ.
41015024	Ne makpakpɛ̃dze ka mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso ne. Mapɛ sibɔ ala atalebi i ɔ̃ arapia iti si matsue ɔbiara nwa loaɣo wũ, masu maɣɛɣɛ so.
41015025	Mapɛ wũ mamatãra ku kaya iɖɔwũ kaiwɛ̃ tutuutu.
41015026	Matsɛrɛ nnɛ ɔbara masia i kakolo iso, masu mapɛ mamatãra i ɔ̃ sitikpe sɔ, “Ɔ̃ Nɖe Ma Yudase Igara Ne.”
41015027	Mapɛ mayukukpe inyɔ ana mamatãra i Yesu kɔrɛ mmɔ, ɔwɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso, fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana sa i ɔ̃ kubena iso.
41015028	Iba lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Maɖoe wũ ku makpibaradze.”
41015029	Mma ɔɖuɖu loki i mmɔ mafe ɔtidza ati fiɛ matiatia Yesu sɔ, “Yuɛ! Fɔ tutuutu fɔ loɣɛ sɔ aabiɛ bo isɔrɛyo siare nɛgbe aledza ne itsue i akpɛnɛ atɛ kama ne!
41015030	So ba si aɖi so i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame si bonya.”
41015031	Ngbɔ ame i masɔrɛdze gu mmara matedze ana ɔma wũ maɣere so sɔ, “Ɔɖi mawɛ̃, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ito ɔwo so ɔɖi!
41015032	Si fɔ nɖe Israel Igara gu Kristo gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔsɛ mɔmɔ ne, ɖi so i kudziri iso si boafɔ-ɔ boɖe.” Maturi inyɔ ma mapɛ mamatãra mabua wũ iso ana ɔtiatia wũ.
41015033	Kakɔme iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ ame ne, kayi ɔsɛ̃ guduu, ifɔ iɖɔwũ itɛ.
41015034	Iɖɔwũ itɛ̃ nɛgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, “Wũ Ɣaa, wũ Ɣaa, be ɔso anyua me asɛ ngbɔ?”
41015035	Mawɛ̃ ma loya i mmɔ manɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minɔ! Ɔto ɔkpere Eliya.”
41015036	Ma ɔwɛ̃ ɔtere ɔsu ɖɔti pukupukua ɔpia i ndã bea ame, ne ɔɖu ɔdziri ɔsu ɔtã Yesu ne. Ne ɔɣere matsɔra sɔ, “Mitã bonyɔ si Eliya aaba ɔ̃aɖi wũ i kudziri iso!”
41015037	Yesu ɔla kulu teteree ana kere ne ɔma kanya ne.
41015038	Ɔwi gɔmɔ tutuutu ne, ma Yudase isɔrɛyo ame ɔkati kpikpirikpi gɔ loɣɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ gu kasekelekɔ̃ ɔkɛ i ndɛ̃ndɛ̃ ita i kato iba iafere i karɔ̃.
41015039	Gɔ kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa gɔ nɣɛ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔnya kumɛgɔ ɔsu ɔkpi ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe i ngbe.”
41015040	Marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ ana ɔya dzoroo mato manyɔ. Ma mawɛ̃ nɖe Maria Magdalase gu Salome gu Maria gɔ mabi nɖe Yakobo koso gu Yose ne.
41015041	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔwe i Galilea karɔ̃ iso ne, ma losiai wũ mala maɔbuai wũ ne. Marɔ̃go gbodzoo mama ma losiai wũ maba Yerusalem ana ɔya i mmɔ.
41015042	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ku iyi nɛ nɖe iledzaso itã ma Yudase Iwarãyi katɔ̃. Ne gɔ kutsuɛ to kuɣo ne,
41015043	ma Yudase atɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Yosef, Arimatease, ɔpia so ɔle, ɔkɛlɛ Roma abã ɔkpakpa Pilato kɔrɛ. Yosef ɖe ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ masɛ mawarɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ anɔ sia i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iba iso. Gɔ ɔbo Pilato kɔrɛ ne, ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔtã wũ ɔri si ɔsɛ ɔ̃abɛse Yesu kpise ɔsɛ ɔ̃abiara fiɛ Iwarãyi aaɣo.
41015044	Ibara Pilato ɣii gɔ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu ɔkpi mala ngbɔ. Ne ka ɔkpere kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa gɔ loya i mmɔ ɔnya nwa loba pelepele, ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ iɔna ɔpã gɔ Yesu ɔkpi?
41015045	Ne gɔ ɔkpakpa ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi koko ne, Pilato ɔtã Yosef ɔri sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖi wũ ɔbiara.
41015046	Ne Yosef ɔsɛ ɔ̃abɛse Yesu ɔbɔ karɔ̃, ɔmini wũ i ɔkati fudza gɔ ɔɣa ame. Ne ka ɔsu wũ ɔbiara i itawo nɛ makuri masɛ i kube kukpa ame ne. Ɔmɛrɛdza ita siare ɔtɛ̃ iwo kanya.
41015047	Maria Magdalase gu Maria gɔ nɖe Yose ɔnyi ɣɛ i mmɔ manya ngbegɔ ɔbiara wũ.
41016001	Ikpɛnɛ nyɔare kutsuɛ gɔ Iwarãyi ɔɔro ne, Maria Magdalase gu Maria gɔ nɖe Yakobo ɔnyi gu Salome ɔsɛ maaɣa korobo sɔ maasɛ maasɔla Yesu.
41016002	Ne ɔso gɔ kaɖe ɔɖaɛ ku Kɔsiɖa kaya ne, mata sɔ masɛ kabiarakɔ̃.
41016003	-
41016004	Gɔ masɛ i ɔri ne, mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Nna loamɛrɛdza ita ɔɖi i iwo kanya ɔtã bo?” Makarɛ so ngbɔ alasɔ ita siare iɖe. Ɣɛɛ gɔ mabo mmɔ ne, manya sɔ ɔnyiiɔ ɔli ita sɛnɛkɛ̃ra ɔsɛ i kuruɛ.
41016005	Ne ɔso maso mabo i iwo ame, ne manya ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ si i kuɖearɔ̃ iso, ɔpia awu fudza futututu ne. Makpɛ̃ so.
41016006	Ɔporoporoi gɔmɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaanigã. Loɣe sɔ Yesu Nasaretse gɔ mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso mito mibie. Ɔna i ngbe! Ɔ̃ɔta, ɔpia ngbã! Minyɔ ngbegɔ marara wũ!
41016007	Ne ɔso misɛ miaɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze gu Petro ana sɔ, ‘Yesu ɔɔɖe mi katɔ̃ ɔkpa Galilea karɔ̃ iso. Mmɔ mianya wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne.’ ”
41016008	Ibara marɔ̃go magbe ɣii, ne marui i kabiarakɔ̃ mmɔ ku ifɔ̃ gu iti ikpakpa gu ise ne. Gɔ marui ne, maiwo kuwɛ̃ ɔɣere i ɔri iso, alasɔ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma.
41016009	Gɔ Yesu ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ku Kɔsiɖa kaya tutuutu ame ne, ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte Maria Magdalase gɔ ame ɔsa siwarã lalaa ikɔdzɛ ɔɖi ɔnya.
41016010	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere Yesu malaa sɔ, Yesu ɔɔta ɔwi gɔ ame mato mabiɛ mamararã so ala ɔ̃ kukpi ɔso.
41016011	Gɔ Maria ɔɣere ma sɔ Yesu ɔɔta ɔpia ngbã ne ɔnya wũ ne, maifɔ wũ maɖe.
41016012	Ɔwi gɔgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔɖi so ɔte marasuãdze inyɔ ma nsɛ i Yerusalem ɔri. Mainya wũ maɖi ite i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
41016013	Ɣɛɛ gɔ matsue ne, makpese masɛ maaɣere matsɔra. Ɣɛɛ ne, maifɔ ma maɖe.
41016014	Katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, Yesu ɔɖi so ɔte marasuãdze iweo-ɔwɛ̃ i aɖera kaɖekɔ̃. Ɔnyagalagu ma alasɔ mana kafɔkaɖe fiɛ ma atsue ba ɔle aɣede, fiɛ maifɔ mma lonya wũ maɖegu katɔ̃ maɖe sɔ ɔpia ngbã.
41016015	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ kayi ɔɖuɖu ame si miɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea i maturi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃.
41016016	Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ ɔɖe, fiɛ ɔ̃afɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne, ɔ̃ana iɖi. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loifɔ ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã wũ kukpi ipɔ.
41016017	Akparĩ wagbe loasiai mma lofɔ maɖe ne. Maabara awawãra, maasa siwarã lalaa maɖi i wũ iyere ame. Maaɣɛ siɖe ɣɛtɛ agbãagbã dzɛ maiɣe fiɛ maisuã.
41016018	Si mamɔɛ̃ aɣɛ ɣee si manɛ ndu lalaa ne, iibabara ma kuira. Si masia manyɛse nrɔɔ̃ i ati ne, maana isosarɛ.”
41016019	Gɔ Bosate Yesu ɔɖe ma aka wamɔ kama ne, Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato ɔsɛra i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
41016020	Ɔ̃ masiaidze ana ɔki nrɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso maɣɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ne Bosate ɔwe i ma ame, ɔsɛgu ma sɔ maɖi ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea mate iki awawãra agbãagbã wa mabara i ɔ̃ ɔle ame ne.
42001001	Wũ ɔnyii Tiofilo, maturi gbodzoo ɔɔpia so kubɛ kumɛgɔ maawo sɔ si matsɛrɛ ira masegu i ara wa loba i bo ndɛ̃ iso masɛ.
42001002	Matsɛrɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mma lonya Itɔ̃me Bielea karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ɔɣere bo awe, fiɛ mato maya ne isã ana.
42001003	Ne ɔso ne, Bokɔse Tiofilo, gɔ mme wũ losu losia so iso lotsue ara wagbe ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ɔso ne, lobara adzuni sɔ ilɛ sɔ loatsɛrɛ wã kukaakɔ losese-ɔ kumɛgɔ aba.
42001004	Nto lobara ngbɔ ala lobie sɔ aatsue ira biara nɛ mate-ɔ wodoroo.
42001005	Ɔwi gɔ ame i Herodes ɔɖe sigara i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ne, Ɣaa sɔrɛdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ marɔ Zakaria. Ɔbɔrɛ i sɔrɛdze Abia ikuri ame. Zakaria gɔgbe ɔre marɔ Elisabet ne. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔbɔrɛ i masɔrɛdze ɔɣekparɛ ame.
42001006	Ɔrã gu ɔre gɔgbe ɔsɛ ngbã lɛ Ɣaa masɔrɛdze awe i Ɣaa anɔ. Maɖe ɔ̃ mmara ɔɖuɖu iso kukaakɔ.
42001007	Ɣɛɛ ne, maiɣe ɔbi ala Elisabet ɖe ɔlɛma fiɛ ma inyɔɔ ana ɔɔsɛ katɔ̃ i akɔ ame.
42001008	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Zakaria ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔ̃ masɔrɛdze karabara ala ma ikuri iɔɣo sɔ maabara.
42001009	I masɔrɛdze kubarara kanya ne, gɔ mabara kareremi ne, Zakaria iso isia, ne ɔso ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ame sɔ ɔ̃atsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔtã Ɣaa i isɔrɛkasege iso.
42001010	Ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔtsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a mmɔ ne, masumudze tsɔra ɣɛ i inyamɔ mato makparama kayi.
42001011	Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte wũ. Ɔɣɛ i isɔrɛkasege ga iso ɔto ɔtsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
42001012	Gɔ Zakaria ɔnya wũ ne, ɔkpɛ̃ so, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ gbaã.
42001013	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Zakaria, daanigã! Ɣaa ɔɔnɔ fɔ kayi ikparama, ne ɔso fɔ ɔre Elisabet to ɔ̃aɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɔtã-ɔ. Tã wũ iyere sɔ Yohanes.
42001014	Si maɣe wũ ne, ato aana isoɣɔ, alɛlɛ gbaã lɛ kumɛgɔ iaɖe maturi gbodzoo ana isoɣɔ.
42001015	Ɔto ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi siare i Ɣaa anɔ. Ɔdaanɛ̃ ndã kpokporoa kumiwɛ̃ mɛ loamɔɛ̃ wũ ɖuɖuuɖu. Siwarã Bielea to siayi ɔ̃ ame fiɛ maaɣe wũ.
42001016	Ɔ̃ loakpesera Israel maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔ ma Sate Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne.
42001017	Ɔ̃ ɔɖe loaɖe Bosate iba katɔ̃ fiɛ siwarã gu ɔle gɔ lowe i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Eliya ame to iawe i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔto ɔ̃afere mabi gu mase kanya ndu. Ɔto ɔ̃afinikira matsuelese ɔkpesera mma nsɛ mabu iti ame i ibɔlɔlɔ iso. Nnɛgbe loatã Bosate maturi ɔnyɔ tuee matã ɔ̃ iba ne.”
42001018	Mmɔ i Zakaria to ɔkarɛ kpabo gɔgbe sɔ, “Be loatã lofɔ nnɛgbe loɖe? Bo gu wũ iyo ɔnyi ɔɖuɖu somina ɔɔsɛ katɔ̃ i akɔ ame.”
42001019	Ne kpabo to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mme nɖe Gabriel gɔ nsɛ ɔya i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ne. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe lopia me sɔ loɣere-ɔ kanya gagbe ne.
42001020	Atoa sɔ aifɔ nnɛ loɣere-ɔ aɖe ne, ito iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣɛ ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsia ita. Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ aifɔ aɖe ɔso ne, fɔ ɔnyagɛmi iisibata ɔnya gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ nnɛ loɣɛ ɔba i ne ame.”
42001021	Ɔwi gɔ i nnɛgbe ɔɖuɖu to ikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ne, mma nɣɛ masia Zakaria i isɔrɛyo inyamɔ ɔkpɔkpɔtɔ alasɔ maiɣe nnɛ ɔso fiɛ ɔ̃ɔna ɔpã ngbɔ.
42001022	Gɔ ɔba ɔ̃abɔrɛ i iyo ne, ɔ̃isito ɔwo ika ɔɖegu ma. Ne ɔso matsue sɔ ɔnya iɖi ite i isɔrɛyo mmɔ. Gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔwo ika ɔɖe ɔso ne, nrɔɔ̃ ka ɔto ɔɖiɖi si ɔ̃aɣere ma ira.
42001023	Ɔwi gɔ i Zakaria ɔɔro ɔ̃ karabara i isɔrɛyo ne, ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ iyo.
42001024	Ɔwi kurukutu kama ne, Elisabet ɔba ɔ̃ala kayiri, ne ɔso ɔkɔla so i iyo awa aru i kuɖokpo.
42001025	Ne Elisabet ɔɖe ika ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔnyɔ me nnya. Ɔ̃ɔɖi me kunuarɛ i anɔ ɔkɔlɛ me anɔ kato i maturi ndɛ̃.”
42001026	Ɔwi gɔ i Elisabet kayiri ɔɔfɔ awa akuɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔpia ɔ̃ kpabo Gabriel sɔ ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Nasaret i Galilea karɔ̃ iso.
42001027	Ɔsia wũ kanya i ɔbitɛ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Maria kɔrɛ. Ɔbitɛ gɔgbe makarɛ matã Yosef gɔ lobɔrɛ i igara David ɔɣekparɛ ame ne.
42001028	Gɔ kpabo ɔba ɔ̃abo Maria kɔrɛ ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã-ɔ! Bosate piagu-ɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ kusɛkusɛ ana sia-ɔ iso.”
42001029	Kpabo gɔgbe atɔ̃me ɔkpɔkpɔtɔra Maria adzuni ala ɔ̃inɔ kaya gagbe karɔ̃.
42001030	Mmɔ i kpabo to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Maria, daanigã ala Ɣaa nnyainyɔ piagu-ɔ.
42001031	Ato aba aala kayiri aɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ, tã wũ iyere sɔ Yesu.
42001032	Ɔto ɔ̃afɔ iyere gbaã fiɛ maarɔ wũ sɔ Ɣaa Ɔlesate mɔmɔ ɔbi. Bokɔse Ɣaa to ɔ̃asɛra wũ sigara lɛ ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ David awe.
42001033	Ɔto ɔ̃aɖe sigara i Yakob mawa iso ɔwi ɔɖuɖu ame. Fiɛ ɔ̃ sigara iɖe iibafe inya ɖa.”
42001034	Mmɔ i Maria to ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda nwagbe aawo ɔba gɔ loiɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ kuwɛ̃?”
42001035	Mmɔ i kpabo gɔmɔ to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Siwarã Bielea to siayi fɔ ame fiɛ Kato gu Karɔ̃ Baradze ɔle to ɔ̃aba-ɔ iso. Ne ɔso ɔbirɛrɛĩ gɔ aaɣe ne, maarɔ wũ sɔ, Ɔsekelea, Ɣaa Ɔbi Birɛrɛĩ.
42001036	Lobie sɔ loatã-ɔ itsue sɔ ne, fɔ ɔnyiibi gɔ nɖe Elisabet fiɛ ɔɖe ɔlɛma ne, ka ɔto kayiri awa akuɔ atoa sɔ ɔ̃ akɔ ɔɔsɛ katɔ̃.
42001037	Alasɔ kuira iiɖo Ɣaa ibara.”
42001038	Ne Maria ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ! Mme ne, Ɣaa ɔɖabo loɖe. Ɔbara ɔtã me lɛ kumɛgɔ aɣɛ.” Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔrui ne.
42001039	-
42001040	Ayi wamɔ ame ne, Maria ɔledza so ɔpɛ siwa ɔkɛlɛ Yudea karɔ̃ iso i abe ndɛ̃. Ɔkɛlɛ Zakaria iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya Elisabet.
42001041	Gɔ Elisabet ɔnɔ Maria kaya ne, ɔ̃ ɔbi gɔ i kayiri ame ko lotsue ngba, ɔluwɛ̃ Siwarã Bielea ɔyi Elisabet ame ɔɖuɖu.
42001042	Ne ɔto ɔkpagɛ silɔ kato ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Maafere-ɔ kusɛkusɛ i marɔ̃go ndɛ̃ fiɛ fɔ ɔbi gɔ aaɣe ne, mafere wũ kusɛkusɛ!
42001043	Mme nɖe nna fiɛ Bosate ɔnyi aaba ɔ̃aya me?
42001044	Alasɔ ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ lonɔ fɔ kaya ne, ɔbi gɔ mpia me i kayiri ame ko lokpɛ̃ so i isoɣɔ ame.
42001045	Na isoɣɔ gbaã alasɔ afɔ kanya ga i Ɣaa kpabo ɔba ɔ̃aɣere-ɔ aɖe sɔ iaba ɔso.”
42001046	Ne Maria ɔpia ɔnɔ kanya sɔ, “Wũ ɔtu to ɔle Bosate.
42001047	Fiɛ so ɔɣɔ me i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe wũ Ɖidze iso,
42001048	alasɔ ɔnyigi me ɔ̃ ɔɖabo gɔ loire kuira. Ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ne, mawa gu mawa tɛtɛ ɔɖuɖu to maakpere me sɔ ɔturi gɔ ilɛgu.
42001049	Alasɔ Ɔlesate ɔbara ara siare ɔtã me, fiɛ ɔ̃ iyere se sekelee.
42001050	Ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ se itã mawa gu mawa ma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ manigã wũ.
42001051	Ɔɖi ɔ̃ ɔle ɔte fiɛ ɔsamarã mma nsɛ makɔlɛ so kato i ma situ ame.
42001052	Ɔkpasera magarakpakpa fiɛ ɔkɔlɛ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃ kato.
42001053	Ɔsu ara sɛɛ ɔmidza mma i kukã to, ɔkpesera maranase mawɛrɛba.
42001054	Ɔ̃ anɔ sia i itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣere bo mawa ɔsɛ iso, fiɛ ɔ̃ɔba sɔ ɔ̃abuai Israel kaɖe.
42001055	Ɔnyigi ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔsu ɔtã Abraham gu ɔ̃ mawa ikpa ta kayi karokɔ̃.”
42001056	Ne ɔso Maria ka ɔwegu Elisabet awa atɛ ɔɖui fiɛ ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ aɖe.
42001057	Gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ Elisabet aaɣe ɔbi ne, ɔɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ.
42001058	Ɔ̃ magbamikui gu ɔ̃ manyii ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ iwawãra siare nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔtã wũ. Ne ɔso managu wũ isoɣɔ gbaã.
42001059	Iyi nɛ maɖi ɔbi i iyo ne, masɛ maatu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ mabie sɔ si masu ɔ̃ ɔse iyere Zakaria masia wũ.
42001060	Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyi iinɔgu ma karɔ̃. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misia wũ Yohanes.”
42001061	Mawararã ku wũ sɔ, “Mi ɔlɛdze ɔmele masɛ marɔ ngbɔ?”
42001062	Mmɔ maɖiɖi nrɔɔ̃ makarɛ ɔbi ɔse sɔ mme iyere ɔto ɔbie sɔ masia ɔbi.
42001063	Zakaria ɔkarɛ ita nɛ iso masɛ matsɛrɛ ara. Gɔ ɔfɔ ne ne, ɔtsɛrɛ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ iyere nɖe Yohanes.” Ne ɔso ibara ma ɔɖuɖu ɣii.
42001064	Ɔluwɛ̃ Zakaria ɔnyagɛmi ɔkurisi ɔtsɛ ika iɖe ile Ɣaa.
42001065	Ifɔ̃ siare ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ magbamikui itã sɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔki ikã Yudea simagɛ̃ dzɛ i abe iso abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame.
42001066	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ ara wagbe ɔla maɔkarɛ so sɔ, “Mme ɔturi igbã i ɔbi gɔgbe to ɔba ɔ̃aɖe?” Makarɛ so ngbɔ ala ite sekelee sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɔ̃ sia wũ iso.
42001067	Mmɔ i Siwarã Bielea ɔbo i ɔbi ɔse Zakaria ame ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ,
42001068	“Mitã bole Bosate gɔ nɖe Israel Ɣaa alasɔ ɔbuai kaɖe, ɔɖi bo sɔ boana isobuɛ.
42001069	Ɔsu Ɖidze gɔ mba ɔle ɔtã bo gɔ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔɖabo igara David ɔkparɛ ame.
42001070	Ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ kokooko ɔkigu i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze sekelea iso sɔ
42001071	ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i mma nto mabie bo ikpi gu bo matsirise ɔɖuɖu nrɔɔ̃ ame.
42001072	Ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃anyɔ bo nnya lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣere bo mawa ɔsɛ fiɛ ɔ̃anyigi kanya ga ɔnyi ku bo mawa.
42001073	Ɔkã ndamu ɔtã bo ɔwa Abraham teteree sɔ,
42001074	ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i bo matsirise nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔtã bo bobara ɔ̃ karabara sɔ ifɔ̃ iisibakpɛ̃ bo.
42001075	Ɔto ɔ̃asekelera bo fiɛ ɔ̃abara bo bɔlɔlɔ i ɔ̃ anɔ i bo agbanayi ɔɖuɖu ame.
42001076	Fiɛ fɔ, wũ ɔbi ne, maakpere-ɔ sɔ, Ɣaa Ɔlesate kanyaɖidze. Fɔ loaɖe Bosate katɔ̃ aledza ɔri atã ɔ̃ iba ne.
42001077	Ato aaɖi ate maturi sɔ maana iɖi ala mato maana akpi isu itsɛ.
42001078	Bo Ɣaa sɛ ɔɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ fiɛ ɔba nnyainyɔ. Ɔto ɔ̃asese bo Ɖidze gɔ loafiɛ ɔfere bo lɛ kuɣɛ̃.
42001079	Ɔto ɔ̃atã ikpawaĩ nɛgbe ɔba itã maturi ma nsi i idududu ame fiɛ kukpi ifɔ̃ to ma sɔ ɔ̃akɔ bo ɔkigu i isobuɛ ɔri iso.”
42001080	Gɔ ɔbi ɔba ɔ̃are iti ne, ɔwe ɔle i Siwarã Bielea ame. Ɔwe i fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ i maturi na gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔledza so ɔtã sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔ̃ karabara i Israel.
42002001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Roma Igarakpakpa Kaisaro Augusto ɔtã ɔle sɔ matsɛrɛ maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Roma Sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ayere.
42002002	Maturi ayere itsɛrɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛgbe ame ne, abã ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ sɔ Kirenio nto ɔɖe Siria karɔ̃ iso.
42002003	Ne ɔso ɔbiara ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ aɖe sɔ ɔ̃atsɛrɛ iyere.
42002004	Yosef ana ɔbɔrɛ i Nasaret ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Galilea karɔ̃ iso ɔkɛlɛ Betlehem ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ngbegɔ maɣe igara David. Yosef ɔkɛlɛ mmɔ alasɔ David ɔkparɛ ame ɔbɔrɛ.
42002005	Ɔkɔ Maria gɔ makarɛ mata wũ fiɛ ka ɔto kayiri ana ɔsɛgu.
42002006	Ɔwi gɔ mapia i Betlehem mmɔ ne, Maria ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ ka ɔ̃aɣe ɔbi.
42002007	Ɔɣe ɔ̃ ɔbi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nɖe ɔbirɛrɛĩ. Ɔmini wũ i ɔkati ame ɔsu wũ ɔrara i ira nɛ ame masɛ mafere mabɔi aɖera, alasɔ maina kabokɔ̃ i mafɔ kawekɔ̃.
42002008	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ne, masɛrɛkɔdze mawɛ̃ pia mmɔ mato manyɔ masɛrɛ iso ku kasɛ̃.
42002009	Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte ma fiɛ Bosate ifiɛ ɔfere ma ibɔrɛ i kato. Itã sɔ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã,
42002010	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaanigã. Itɔ̃me sɛɛ nɛ loatã maturi ɔɖuɖu isoɣɔ losu lobɔ mi.
42002011	Nɔme ikpɛnɛ nɛgbe iso ne, maɣe Ɖidze gɔ nɖe Bosate Kristo matã mi i igara David ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
42002012	Nnɛ miasu minya wũ miɖi ite nɖe sɔ ne, mito mianya ɔbi ɣɛtɛ gɔ mamini i ɔkati ame fiɛ ɔrɛ i mabɔi ara kaɖekɔ̃.”
42002013	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa makpabo ikuri siare ɔbɔrɛ i kato maba mabuai kpabo gɔmɔ iso matsɛ Ɣaa ile sɔ,
42002014	“Ikpawaĩ nɖe Ɣaa ɔkpɛ i kato dzoroo, isobuɛ itã karɔ̃ iso maturi ɔɖuɖu ma i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ!”
42002015	Gɔ Ɣaa makpabo ɔrui makɛlɛ kato ne, masɛrɛkɔdze ɔɣere so sɔ, “Mitã bokɛlɛ Betlehem boanyɔ nnɛ loba fiɛ Bosate to ɔɖi ɔte bo ngbe.”
42002016	Ne ɔso mapɛ siwa masɛ maanya Maria gu Yosef gu ɔbi ɣɛtɛ gɔ nrɛ i mabɔi aɖera kaɖekɔ̃.
42002017	Gɔ manya wũ ngbɔ ne, maɣɛ ara wa i Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔɣere ma i ɔbi iso.
42002018	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ ara wa i masɛrɛkɔdze ɔɣɛ ne, ibara ma ɣii.
42002019	Ɣɛɛ Maria ɔmɔɛ̃ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔ̃ adzuni ame ɔla ɔ̃ɔbu wã iti ame.
42002020	Masɛrɛkɔdze ɔkpese makɛlɛ mato male Ɣaa makɔlɛ ɔ̃ iyere kato i ira nɛ manya gu nwa manɔ ɔso alasɔ iba ngbɔ tutuutu lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere ma.
42002021	Iyi farafanava gɔ maɖi ɔbi i iyo fiɛ matu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ ne, masia wũ iyere sɔ Yesu lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔɣɛ fiɛ mala ɔ̃ kayiri.
42002022	Gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ Yosef gu Maria aabara so sekelee i kubarara kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ i Mose mmara ɔte ne, makɔ ɔbi ɣɛtɛ ana makɛlɛgu Yerusalem sɔ maasu wũ mapia i Bosate nrɔɔ̃ ame.
42002023	Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa mmara ɔko ame sɔ, “Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɖeakatɔ̃ biara gu bɔi rɛrɛ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ biara ne, ikote sɔ maatɛ wũ masɛ i kuruɛ matã Bosate.”
42002024	Masɛ maafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa alasɔ mmara ɔkarɛ sɔ maasu abɔrɔnuma ɣee kukpaboi kunyɔ mafɛ̃ ara mata wũ.
42002025	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Simeon ɔwe i Yerusalem. Ɔɖe ɔturi sɛɛ gɔ nsɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa fiɛ ɔto ɔnyɔ ɔri ɔtã Israel iɖi. Siwarã Bielea sɛgu wũ fiɛ
42002026	sisia ita sitã wũ sɔ ɔ̃ibakpi gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔnya maɣe Ɣaa Kristo gɔ maɣɛ masɛ kokooko.
42002027	Ne ɔso Siwarã Bielea ɔkɔ Simeon sikɛlɛgu ma Yudase isɔrɛyo. Gɔ maɣese ɔsu Yesu biɛtɛ mabɔ sɔ maba maabara kubarara gɔ i Mose mmara ɔkarɛ sɔ mabara ne,
42002028	Simeon ɔfɔ ɔbi ɔla i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔle Ɣaa sɔ,
42002029	“Kiniɔ ne Bosate, gɔ ɔɔbara nnɛ aɣɛ asɛ atã me ne, ka aawo fɔ ɔɖabo ɔri ɔɖi i isobuɛ ame.
42002030	Mme mɔmɔ ku wũ anɔ ne, loɔnya Ɖidze
42002031	gɔ asese sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖi maturi ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃.
42002032	Ɔ̃ nɖe ikpawaĩ nɛ loaɖi fɔ kuɖɔɛ ite maturi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne. Fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi fɔ ibu ɔte fɔ kaɖe Israel maturi.”
42002033	Ara wa i Simeon ɔɣɛ i ɔbi iso ɔbara Yosef gu Maria ɣii.
42002034	Ne Simeon ɔtã ma kusɛkusɛ ɔɣere ɔbi ɔnyi sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ɔbi gɔgbe iso sɔ, iaki i ɔ̃ iso ne, maturi gbodzoo aarɔ̃, fiɛ iaki i ɔ̃ iso ana ne, gbodzoo ana to maata maya i Israel. Maledza wũ iɖi sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ikparĩ nɛ iso i maturi aaɖe ika mata maya.
42002035	Ɔto ɔ̃aɖi maturi adzuni wɛrɛa ɔbɔ i ɔgbami. Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ibo gu ibɛbɛrɛ to iabo-ɔ i ɔtu ame lɛ ipɛmi matsue-ɔ awe.”
42002036	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Ɣaa kanyaɖidze marɔ wũ sɔ Hana ɔwe i mmɔ. Ɔ̃ ɔse Fanuel ɔbɔrɛ i Aser kalɛ ame. Akɔ akɔdzɛ pɛ ɔsɛ i kurã iyo fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔrã ɔkpi.
42002037	Ɔ̃ɔsɛ sikuɛdze ɔfɔ akɔ fasinafasina-ina. Kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe i ma Yudase isɔrɛyo ɔle Ɣaa ɔnyi kanya ɔkparama kayi ana.
42002038	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔba isɔrɛyo ɔba ɔ̃apɛ Ɣaa siba. Ɔɖe ika i ɔbi gɔgbe iso ɔɣere maturi ma ɔɖuɖu nto manyɔ ɔri sɔ Ɣaa aaɖi Yerusalem.
42002039	Gɔ Yosef gu Maria ɔɔro kubarara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa mmara ɔte ne, makpese makɛlɛ ma aɖe Nasaret i Galilea karɔ̃ iso.
42002040	Ɔbi ɔmɔ ɔre iti fiɛ ɔwe isosarɛ gu iwola ana gbaã gɔ itã sɔ ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ.
42002041	Ikɔ biara ne, Yesu maɣese sɛ masɛ Yerusalem maaɖe iyi nɛ masɛ marɔ sɔ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi.
42002042	Ne ɔso gɔ Yesu ɔfɔ akɔ aweo-anyɔ ne, masɛ Yerusalem lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabara kokooko awe.
42002043	Gɔ maɖe iyi maro fiɛ makpese mato makɛlɛ ma aɖe ne, Yesu ɔkpese ɔwe i Yerusalem gɔ ɔ̃ maɣese iitsue.
42002044	Mabu sɔ ɔpia i maturi ma nsɛ i ɔri ndɛ̃, ne ɔso masɛ ɔri ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ buu fiɛ matsɛ wũ ibie i ma malɛdze gu malaa ndɛ̃.
42002045	Gɔ mainya wũ ɔso ne, makpese makɛlɛ Yerusalem masɛ mapia manyɔnyɔ wũ.
42002046	Ikpɛnɛ tɛare iso ne, masɛ maanya wũ i ma Yudase isɔrɛyo gɔ ɔ̃ gu ma Yudase maratedze mawɛ̃ si. Ɔto ɔkã ma atsue ɔkarɛ ma atɔ̃me ɔnɔ.
42002047	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ ɔ̃ ara karɔ̃ iɖiɖi ne, ibara ma ɣii i ɔ̃ iwola wodoroa nɛ ɔto ɔtã ala atɔ̃me mmuai ɔso.
42002048	Ibara ɔ̃ maɣese lɛ kurɛ gɔ manya wũ ngbɔ. Ne ɔ̃ ɔnyi ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔbi, be ɔso fiɛ abara bo ngbɔ? Bo gu fɔ ɔse ɔɔmararã so bowe bobie-ɔ.”
42002049	Ne Yesu to ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mipia mibie me? Miiɣe sɔ ikote sɔ loawe i wũ ɔse iyo?”
42002050	Ɣɛɛ mainɔ nnɛ ɔɣere ma karɔ̃.
42002051	Ne Yesu ka ɔta ɔsiai ma marui makɛlɛ Nasaret, ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã ma. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyi ne, ɔkɔla ara wagbe i ɔ̃ iti ame.
42002052	Yesu ɔre iti i sosina gu iwola ame, ɔbo maturi gu Ɣaa ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
42003001	Igarakpakpa Kaisaro Tiberio ikɔ weoruva i iyara iso ne, Pontio Pilato loɖe abã ɔkpakpa i Yudea karɔ̃ iso. Galilea karɔ̃ iso ana ne, Herodes loɖe ɔkpakpa fiɛ ɔ̃ kpeama gɔ marɔ Filipo ɔɖe Iturea gu Trakoniti abuiti iso ɔkpakpa. Lisania ana ɔɖe Abilene ibuiti iso.
42003002	Hana gu Kayafa loɖe Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa pelepele. Ikɔ nɛmɔ ame ne, Yohanes gɔ nɖe Zakaria ɔbi ɔfɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ i fafuĩ ame.
42003003	Ne ɔso Yohanes ɔwe ɔki i Yordan sikpokpo gu abuiti ame ɔɖuɖu ɔto ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me sɔ, “Mifiniki mibɔrɛ i mi akpi ame si mifɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara si Ɣaa aasu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.”
42003004	Lɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔko ame sɔ, “Ɔwɛ̃ to ɔla kulu i fafuĩ ame sɔ, ‘Miledza Bosate ɔri misɛ. Mibara ɔ̃ siri tɔrɔrɔ.
42003005	Miyira kugbolomi ɔɖuɖu si mibiɛ abe gu kubemi ɔɖuɖu mibɔ karɔ̃. Mibara siri gɔgɔlɔa ɔɖuɖu tɔrɔrɔ. Si mitã sɔ siri woworea ɔɖuɖu iso aase sɔlɔsɔlɔ.
42003006	Mmɔ i maturi ɔɖuɖu aanya Ɖidze gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsese ne!’ ”
42003007	Maturi gbodzoo ɔba sɔ Yohanes si ɔpie ma ndu ɣɛɛ Yohanes ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ma lo nyanyarĩ lɛ maɣɛ! Nna loɣere mi sɔ miawo ɔtere ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ ɔ̃abɔ i maturi lalaa iso ame?
42003008	Mite i mi nsɛgbai ame sɔ miɔfiniki mibɔrɛ i mi akpi ame. Midaabu sɔ gɔ Abraham mawa miɖe ɔso ne, Ɣaa iibakpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue. Nto loɣere mi sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo mawa ɔbara ɔɖi i ata wa nfere i ngbe ame ɔtã Abraham.
42003009	Minyɔ! Maɔkarã kaɣɛ i adziri iso koko sɔ maatu wã ta siɖu ame. Kudziri biara gɔ loisɛ kuɣɔ̃ abi sɛɛ ne, maaɖaɛ kɔ̃ mapɛyu matsuedza.”
42003010	Mmɔ mato makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be si bobara kiniɔ?”
42003011	Ne Yohanes to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ mba awu aka anyɔ ne, ɔsu awɛ̃ ɔtã ngɔ nna kuawɛ̃. Ngɔ mba araɖea si ɔɣɛ wã ɔtã mma nna.”
42003012	Ma lampofɔdze mawɛ̃ ana ɔba sɔ ɔpie ma ndu. Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, be si bobara?”
42003013	Ne ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaafɔ sikã i maturi kɔrɛ miɖo kumɛgɔ i mmara ɔkarɛ.”
42003014	Makpakpɛ̃dze mawɛ̃ ana ɔba maakarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bo ne, be si bobara?” Ma wũ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã mi kuso si kusi mi. Midaasu ɔle mifɔ kuwɛ̃ sikã i ɔri gɔ loikote iso. Midaaɖaɛ kuwɛ̃ ana kanya.”
42003015	Maturi ɔriinyɔ ɔtsɛ kato ikɔlɛ. Matsɛ ibu sɔ bɛrɛ Yohanes nɖe Kristo gɔ mato manyɔ ɔri.
42003016	Ne ɔso Yohanes ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ, “Ndu losu loto lopie mi, Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsiai me i kama ne, ɔmɔ ɔɖo me fafaafã. Loikote sɔ loabɔdzo lokurisi ɔ̃ ndokota kɔra. Ngɔgbe nto ɔ̃asu Siwarã Bielea gu ɔtɔ ɔpie mi ndu.
42003017	Ɔto ɔ̃ ifɛra nɛ ɔ̃asu ɔfɛ simɔɣo ɔɖi i araɖea ame fiɛ ɔ̃asu kamɔ ɔfere i kawu ame. Ɔto ɔ̃atsuedza simɔɣo gu ɔtɔ gɔ loibanyi ɔnya!”
42003018	I siri agbãagbã iso ne, Yohanes ɔɖiɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me karɔ̃ ɔte maturi ku ɔle sɔ mafinikira ma nsɛgbai.
42003019	Ɣɛɛ Yohanes ɔkidza abã ɔkpakpa Herodes ala Herodia gɔ nɖe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi ɔre fiɛ ɔfɔ ɔyiri iti. Ɔkidza wũ ala ara nyanyarĩa mama wa ana ɔto ɔbara ɔso.
42003020	Nnɛ i Herodes ɔbara i ne kama gɔ inyanyarĩ iɖo nɖe sɔ ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ Yohanes mapia i iyo.
42003021	Gɔ Yohanes ɔɔpie maturi ɔɖuɖu ndu ɔro ne, Yesu ɔ̃ wũ mapie wũ ndu. Gɔ ɔto ɔkparama kayi ne, kato ɔbusi.
42003022	Ne Siwarã Bielea ɔso siba siasɛ wũ iso lɛ ilɔpɔ ne. Manɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe wũ ɔbi gɔ loipia kuɣɛ ne, abo me anɔ gbaã.”
42003023	Yesu ɔfɔ lɛ akɔ sitɛ fiɛ ɔtsɛ ɔ̃ karabara. Maturi ne, ɔbu masɛ mabu sɔ ɔ̃ ɔse nɖe Yosef gɔ ɔse nɖe Eli
42003024	gɔ ɔse nɖe Mattat gɔ ɔse nɖe Levi gɔ ɔse nɖe Melki gɔ ɔse nɖe Yona gɔ ɔse nɖe Yosef
42003025	gɔ ɔse nɖe Matatia gɔ ɔse nɖe Amos gɔ ɔse nɖe Nahum gɔ ɔse nɖe Esli gɔ ɔse nɖe Nagae
42003026	gɔ ɔse nɖe Mahat gɔ ɔse nɖe Matatia gɔ ɔse nɖe Semein gɔ ɔse nɖe Yosef gɔ ɔse nɖe Yuda
42003027	gɔ ɔse nɖe Yohanan gɔ ɔse nɖe Resa gɔ ɔse nɖe Zerubabel gɔ ɔse nɖe Sealtiel gɔ ɔse nɖe Neri
42003028	gɔ ɔse nɖe Melki gɔ ɔse nɖe Adi gɔ ɔse nɖe Kosam gɔ ɔse nɖe Elmadam gɔ ɔse nɖe Er
42003029	gɔ ɔse nɖe Yosua gɔ ɔse nɖe Eliezer gɔ ɔse nɖe Yorim gɔ ɔse nɖe Matat gɔ ɔse nɖe Levi
42003030	gɔ ɔse nɖe Simeon gɔ ɔse nɖe Yuda gɔ ɔse nɖe Yosef gɔ ɔse nɖe Yonam gɔ ɔse nɖe Eliakim
42003031	gɔ ɔse nɖe Melea gɔ ɔse nɖe Mena gɔ ɔse nɖe Matata gɔ ɔse nɖe Natan gɔ ɔse nɖe David
42003032	gɔ ɔse nɖe Isai gɔ ɔse nɖe Obed gɔ ɔse nɖe Boaz gɔ ɔse nɖe Salmon gɔ ɔse nɖe Naheson
42003033	gɔ ɔse nɖe Aminadab gɔ ɔse nɖe Admin gɔ ɔse nɖe Arni gɔ ɔse nɖe Ezron gɔ ɔse nɖe Perez gɔ ɔse nɖe Yuda
42003034	gɔ ɔse nɖe Yakob gɔ ɔse nɖe Isak gɔ ɔse nɖe Abraham gɔ ɔse nɖe Tara gɔ ɔse nɖe Nahor
42003035	gɔ ɔse nɖe Seruk gɔ ɔse nɖe Regu gɔ ɔse nɖe Peleg gɔ ɔse nɖe Eber gɔ ɔse nɖe Sala
42003036	gɔ ɔse nɖe Kainan gɔ ɔse nɖe Arfaksad gɔ ɔse nɖe Sem gɔ ɔse nɖe Noa gɔ ɔse nɖe Lamek
42003037	gɔ ɔse nɖe Metusala gɔ ɔse nɖe Henok gɔ ɔse nɖe Yared gɔ ɔse nɖe Mahalaleel gɔ ɔse nɖe Kainan
42003038	gɔ ɔse nɖe Enok gɔ ɔse nɖe Set gɔ ɔse nɖe Adam gɔ ɔse nɖe Ɣaa.
42004001	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Yordan ɔwore ame ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔyi i ɔ̃ ame, ne si kɔ wũ sikɛlɛgu fafuĩ ame ne.
42004002	Mmɔ i Ɔbosam ɔla wũ ɔnyɔ akpɛnɛ sina buu ne. Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ɔɖuɖu ne, Yesu iiɖe kuira ne ɔso kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ i kawirikɔ̃.
42004003	Ɔbosam ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi ne, ɣere ita nɛgbe sɔ ikpese aɖera.”
42004004	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Iiɖe aɖera ɔnɔwɛ̃ iso i ɔturi aasɛ ngbã.’ ”
42004005	Ne kama ne, Ɔbosam ɔledza wũ ikɔ ikɛlɛgu kakɔi kɔlɛa kawɛ̃. Ɔte wũ kayiiso Sigarakuɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
42004006	Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loasu kayiiso ɔle gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu gu kã karana lotã-ɔ alasɔ mme masu matã fiɛ loawo ɔsu ɔtã ngɔ loɖɔɛ.
42004007	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu to aakpese fɔ are si abɔ iti karɔ̃ atã me.”
42004008	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ ne, ‘Bosate Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ lokote sɔ maapɛ agɛgɛ̃ matã, masɔrɛ.’ ”
42004009	Ne kama ne, Ɔbosam ɔledza Yesu ikɔ ikɛlɛgu Yerusalem ma Yudase isɔrɛyo itititɛ̃ pelepele. Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si Ɣaa ɔbi aɖe ne, nyua so sɛ aawuĩ i karɔ̃.
42004010	Alasɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ ɔ̃ makpabo aaya madzuɛ̃-ɔ kukaakɔ.’
42004011	‘Mamɔɛ̃-ɔ i nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ aibasu fɔ kukpa awuĩ i ita kuiwɛ̃ iso.’ ”
42004012	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Daala Bosate Ɣaa anyɔ.’ ”
42004013	Gɔ Ɔbosam ɔro Yesu ɔla ɔnyɔ ne, ɔrui ɔnyua wũ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ.
42004014	Yesu ɔyi ku Siwarã Bielea ɔle fiɛ ɔkpese ɔba Galilea. Ɔ̃ iyere ɔre i abuiti wamɔ ɔɖuɖu ame.
42004015	Ɔte ara i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ fiɛ ɔbiara ɔle ɔ̃ ara ite.
42004016	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ Nasaret ngbegɔ makararã wũ ita i ɔ̃ sibiɛtɛ ame. Ma Yudase Iwarãyi iso ne, ɔkɛlɛ ma Kasarɛkɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbara. Ne ɔta ɔya sɔ ɔ̃aka Ɔko Sekelea ne.
42004017	Masu Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔko matã wũ. Gɔ ɔbusi ɔko ne, ɔtsɛ ika i ngbegɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ,
42004018	“Siwarã Bielea si me iso alasɔ Ɣaa ɔsɔla me nnɔĩ sɔ loasu ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea lokɛlɛgu mawɛrɛba. Ɔpia me sɔ losɛ loaɣere mayorɛdze sɔ maana iwarã. Mma anɔ lobiɛ ma wũ mato maanya ara. Mma mpia i inyɛwe ame ne, ma wũ maana isobuɛ.
42004019	Si lotã matsue sɔ Ɣaa ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ mare ɔɔɣo.”
42004020	Ne Yesu ɔkarĩ ɔko ɔsu ɔtã ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔrui ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ ne. Maturi ɔɖuɖu ma i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔɖi anɔ mafere wũ iso tuee.
42004021	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔko Sekelea ame ara wa minɔ loka ngbe ne, nɔme kaɖe gagbe iba i ne ame.”
42004022	Ɔ̃ atɔ̃me wa ɔɣɛ gu kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ ɔnyagɛmi to ɔta ɔbara mma nto makã wũ atsue ɣii. Makarɛ sɔ, “Iiɖe Yosef ɔbi ɔɖe ngbe?”
42004023	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loɣe sɔ mito miapɛ me igbã nɛgbe sa sɔ, ‘Wase, sa so fɔ mɔmɔ.’ Fiɛ loɣe sɔ mito miaɣere me ana sɔ, ‘Ara wa bonɔ sɔ ato abara i Kapernaum ne, bara wã i fɔ aɖe ngbe ana.’ ”
42004024	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Lobie sɔ loɣere mi gbaã sɔ ne, Ɣaa kanyaɖidze kuwɛ̃ na kuwarɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ aɖe.
42004025	Gbaã iɖe sɔ makuɛdze gbodzoo ɔwe i Israel karɔ̃ iso ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Eliya ɔwe fiɛ kado iipɛ akɔ atɛ gu awa akuɔ. Kukã ɔbo i karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso.
42004026	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa iipia Eliya sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abuai Israel kuɛdze kuwɛ̃ iɖo kuɛdze gɔ i Zerepta ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Sidon karɔ̃ iso.
42004027	Ana ne, ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa manyɛse gbodzoo ɔwe i Israel ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Elisa ɔwe. Ɣɛɛ ma kuwɛ̃ iina isosarɛ iɖo Naeman gɔ lobɔrɛ i Siria karɔ̃ iso ɔnɔwɛ̃.”
42004028	Gɔ mma mpia i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔnɔ ara wagbe ne, sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã.
42004029	Mata mali Yesu maɖi i ɔmagɛ̃ ame makɛlɛgu kuwaruɛ i kabemi ga iso matsue ɔmagɛ̃ masia kutsueti ku adzuni sɔ maali wũ makpasera si ɔkpi.
42004030	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔki i ma ndɛ̃ ɔfe ɔrui ɔɣɛ ma.
42004031	Nnɛmɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Kapernaum ɔmagɛ̃ ame i Galilea karɔ̃ iso. Mmɔ ɔte maturi ara ku Iwarãyi iso ne.
42004032	Ɔ̃ ara ite ɔbara ma ɔɖuɖu ɣii ala ɔte wã ku ɔle.
42004033	I ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ siwarã lalaa si wũ iso. Ɔsiagu kulu titiiti sɔ,
42004034	“Ao! Be aba abara i bo kɔrɛ ngbe Yesu Nasaretse? Ɔba ɔɔba sɔ aba aawɔra bo? Nɣe ɔturi gɔ aɖe! Fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔturi Sekelea ne!”
42004035	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔsa siwarã dzɛmɔ sɔ, “Lo kutsuɛ! Bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame fe!” Siwarã ɔnyɛdɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe, sipuri wũ siwuĩ i karɔ̃ i ma katɔ̃ fiɛ sibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ire igbɛ kuiwɛ̃.
42004036	Ibara maturi ɔɖuɖu ɣii ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Mme itɔ̃me igbã iɖe i ngbe? Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ba ɔle ɔto ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã lalaa i maturi ame fiɛ sito sibɔrɛ ana.”
42004037	Ne ɔso Yesu iso itɔ̃me ɔkã mmɔ abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame.
42004038	Gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ne, ɔkɛlɛ Simon iyo. Ɔ̃ masɔrɔ̃go rɛ ɔto ɔnyɛ, ɔbe ɔtɔ ne ɔso matã Yesu itsue.
42004039	Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i ngbegɔ ɔrɛ ne, ɔsa ɔnyɛ siwarã ɔɖi i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔsarɛ ɔta ɔwa aɖera ɔtã ma.
42004040	Ito ikɛlɛ iɣɛ̃kɛlɛ ne, maturi ɔkɔ ma manyii ma nto manyɛ sinyɛ agbãagbã mabɔ Yesu. Ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔɔsia ma iso ɔwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔsa ma ɔɖuɖu.
42004041	Siwarã lalaa agbãagbã ana ɔbɔrɛ i maturi ame sito kulu sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi ne!” Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã sɛ̃ ɔ̃itã siɖe ika, alasɔ siɣe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo.
42004042	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔkɛlɛ kawɛrɛkɔ̃, ne ɔso maturi ɔtsɛ wũ inyɔnyɔ. Gɔ manya wũ ne, maibie sɔ ɔkpese ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ.
42004043	Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ikote sɔ loaɣɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe i simagɛ̃ tsɔra ame alasɔ ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia me sɔ lobara ne.”
42004044	Ne ɔso ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ i karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso.
42005001	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɣɛ i Genezaret ɔpo kanya ɔto ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me. Maturi to malili so sɔ maabore mabo wũ manɔ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ.
42005002	Ɔnya sɔ sikolo inyɔ ɣɛ i ɔpo kanya mmɔ gɔ akpɛ maɖidze ɔɔso mabɔrɛ mato mafore ma asabu.
42005003	Ne Yesu ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Simon ɔre ame ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔli ɔ̃asia i ndu iso kɛkɛĩ. Ne ka ɔsɛ i ɔkolo ame ɔte ara ne.
42005004	Gɔ ɔte ma ara ɔro ne, Yesu ɔɣere Simon sɔ, “Miwa ɔkolo mikɛlɛgu ngbegɔ ndu ɔwodoro kɛkɛĩ si minabarã mi asabu miɖi akpɛ.”
42005005	Ne Simon ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Bokɔse, kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu bobara karabara ku anɔ rɛtɛa boiɖi kuira. Ɣɛɛ ne, lɛ kumɛgɔ aɣɛ ɔso ne, loatã boapia asabu.”
42005006	Gɔ mapia asabu ne, mamɔɛ̃ akpɛ asi gɔ ma asabu ɔtsɛ ikɛkɛ.
42005007	Ne ɔso ne, makpere ma malaa i ɔkolo nyɔare ame sɔ maba maabuai ma. Maɖi akpɛ mafere i sikolo sɛ̃ inyɔ ame ayi gbegbeegbe gɔ ikuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ sikolo aatsɛ ndu iwã.
42005008	Gɔ Simon Petro ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, re me kama alasɔ kpibaradze loɖe.”
42005009	Akpɛ gbodzoo wa maɖi ngbe ɔtã sɔ ibara ma ɣii.
42005010	Ngbɔ ame ibara Simon malaa Yakobo gu Yohanes ma nɖe Zebedeo mabi ana ɣii ne. Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere Simon sɔ, “Daanigã. Ita i kiniɔ ne, maturi ka aaɖi atã Ɣaa.”
42005011	Ne kama ne, gɔ makpadzɛ̃ sikolo mabɔ i ɔkpokpo ne, manyua ira biara masɛ marui masiai Yesu.
42005012	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔsɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ ame i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔnyɛ ɔnyɛrɛtɛa pia. Gɔ ɔnya Yesu ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, “Bosate, si aɖɔɛ ne, aawo me ɔsa lose sekelee.”
42005013	Yesu ɔɖi kɔrɔ̃ ɔpɛgu wũ, ne ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ sɔ, “Loɖɔɛ, se sekelee.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔna isosarɛ.
42005014	Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã wũ sɔ, “Daaɣere kuwɛ̃ nnɛ loba. Ɣɛɛ kɛlɛ aasu so te Ɣaa sɔrɛdze si atã ara wa i Mose mmara ɔkarɛ si ite ɔbiara sɔ ɔɔsarɛ.”
42005015	Ɣɛɛ Yesu iso itɔ̃me ɔki ikã i kakɔi biara ibua. Maturi gbodzoo ɔba maakã ɔ̃ ara ite atsue fiɛ ɔsa ma.
42005016	Ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ kawɛrɛkɔ̃ ngbegɔ i kuwɛ̃ na ɔsɛ ɔ̃akparama kayi.
42005017	Iyi iwɛ̃ gɔ Yesu to ɔte ara ne, ma Yudase ikuri nɛ marɔ sɔ ma Farisise gu Mose mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Galilea simagɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu gu Yudea karɔ̃ iso gu Yerusalem maba masi i mmɔ. Ɣaa ɔle gɔ i Yesu to ɔsa ala sinyɛ ana pia i ɔ̃ ame.
42005018	Marɛrɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔsore ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lofɛfɛ̃ ɔrɛ i ɔkala iso mabɔ wũ. Mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maabogu wũ i iyo ame i Yesu katɔ̃.
42005019	Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔsi ɔso ne, maiɣe ɔri gɔ iso maaki. Ne ɔso masore wũ maya isã. Gɔ makpa isã ne, masora wũ ku ɔkala gɔ iso ɔrɛ masɛ i Yesu katɔ̃ i iyo nɛ ame mapia.
42005020	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ma kafɔkaɖe ne, ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ sɔ, “Wũ ɔnyii, losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ!”
42005021	Ne ma Farisise gu mmara matedze ɔbu i ma situ ame sɔ, “Be ɔso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔɣɛ amusuora ngbɔ? Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ loawo ɔturi akpi ɔsu ɔtsɛ wũ!”
42005022	Gɔ Yesu ɔtsue ma adzuni ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mito misusu ara wagbe igbã i mi situ ame?
42005023	Be iɣɛ nse pɔkɔsɔɔ iɖo, ‘Losu fɔ akpi lotsɛ-ɔ’ ɛɛbɛrɛ ‘Ta ya si asɛ’?
42005024	Loaɖi lote mi sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ba ɔle i kayi gagbe iso sɔ loasu akpi lotsɛ.” Ne ɔso ɔfiniki ɔɣere ngɔ lokpi kasɛkasɛ sɔ, “Nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ ta ya si asu fɔ ɔkala si akɛlɛ iyo!”
42005025	Ɔluwɛ̃ i ma ɔɖuɖu anɔmi ame ne, ɔta ɔya ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔkala gɔ iso ɔrɛ ɔrui ɔɣo iyo ɔri ɔto ɔle Ɣaa.
42005026	Ibara maturi ɔɖuɖu ɣii. Kumɛgɔ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ɔso ne, matsɛ Ɣaa ile ikarɛ so sɔ, “Mme awawãra boto bonya i ngbe nɔme?”
42005027	Nnɛmɔ kama gɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ne, ɔnya lampofɔdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Levi gɔ ɔsi i ɔ̃ karabara ame. Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta siai me.”
42005028	Levi ɔta ɔsiai wũ ɔnyua ira biara ɔsɛ.
42005029	Levi ɔtã mawa aɖera ɔtu ɔpɔrɔ̃ siare i ɔ̃ iyo ɔtã Yesu. Maturi gbodzoo gu ma lampofɔdze ana pia i mma ɔkpere ɔbɔ mmɔ ame.
42005030	Ma Farisise gu mmara matedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔtsɛ kawararã ku Yesu masiaidze sɔ, “Be ɔso mito miɖe minɛ ku lampo mafɔdze gu makpibaradze?”
42005031	Ne Yesu to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mma nsarɛ iisɛ mabie kuwabaradze, manyɛse nsɛ mabie.
42005032	Iiɖe maturi ma nse bɔlɔlɔ loba lokpere sɔ mafiniki ɣɛɛ makpibaradze.”
42005033	Maturi mawɛ̃ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ Yohanes masiaidze sɛ manyi kanya makparama kayi, ma Farisise masiaidze ma wũ ngbɔ ame ne, ɣɛɛ fɔ mare ma ne, ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ ko mato?”
42005034	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mifɔ miɖe sɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze malaa aasɛ kukã gɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze pia i ma kɔrɛ? Ooɣo! Iibakote ngbɔ!
42005035	Ɣɛɛ ne, iyi iwɛ̃ to iba gɔ maakɔ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze maruigu i ma kɔrɛ. Mmɔ ne, iisiɖe kuwɛ̃ loaɣere ma sɔ manyi kanya.”
42005036	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔledza ma igbã ipɛ sɔ, “Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔkɛ ɔkati ɣɛtɛ kasɛi ɔta ɔkuere iyoi. Si ɔbara ngbɔ ne, iibakote, ɔ̃ɔkɛ ɔkati ɣɛtɛ siefe.
42005037	Ngbɔ ame maisɛ masu ndã ɣɛtɛ mafere i bɔi ɔko akpo kuere ame ne. Si iba ngbɔ ne, ndã ɣɛtɛ to miafu mitã sɔ akpo kuere aabiɛ itã ndã ɔwiri.
42005038	Ɣɛɛ ndã ɣɛtɛ ne, sikomi akpo ɣɛtɛ ame masɛ mafere me.
42005039	Ngbɔ ame ana si ɔturi ɔɔnɛ ndã kuere ka ɔto ɔrɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃isisɛ ɔbie miɣɛtɛ. Ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mikuere lɛ miɖo miɣɛtɛ!’ ”
42006001	Iwarãyi iwɛ̃ gɔ Yesu sɛ ɔto ɔfe i kakpɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ame gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ne, marasuãdze ɔtsɛ atita ibɛbɛse iɣɛrɛ iwe.
42006002	Mmɔ i ma Farisise mawɛ̃ to makarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito mibara nnɛ i mmara iitã ɔri sɔ maabara ku Iwarãyi?”
42006003	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Miika i Ɔko Sekelea ame nnɛ i David ɔbara ɔwi gɔ i kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ gu ɔ̃ maturi?
42006004	Ɔbo i Ɣaa iyo ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃asu aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa ɔɖe ɔkuti ɔtã ɔ̃ masiaidze ɔɖe gɔ mmara iitã ɔri iɖo Ɣaa masɔrɛdze ɔnɔwɛ̃.”
42006005	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi nɖe Iwarãyi Sate.”
42006006	Iwarãyi mama ne, Yesu ɔsɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate ara. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ kuɖearɔ̃ lokarĩ ɔwe i mmɔ.
