42006007	Ne gɔ mmara matedze gu ma Farisise mawɛ̃ to mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maaɖaɛ Yesu kanya sɔ ɔɣɛrɛ ma mmara ɔso ne, makarã anɔ sɔ maanya si ɔ̃asa sinyɛ i Iwarãyi iso.
42006008	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yesu ɣe ma adzuni ɔso ne, ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ kɔrɔ̃ lokarĩ sɔ ɔta ɔya i ma katɔ̃. Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ ɔta ɔba ɔ̃aya i katɔ̃ ne.
42006009	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be i mmara ɔte? Sɔ ɔturi aabara isɛɛ ɛɛbɛrɛ ilalaa ku Iwarãyi? Ilɛ sɔ aabuai ɔturi ɛɛbɛrɛ aanina ɔ̃ ngbã?”
42006010	Yesu ɔla anɔ i ma ɔɖuɖu iso ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ sɔ, “Nabarã fɔ kɔrɔ̃.” Ɔnabarã kɔ̃, ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kɔrɔ̃ ko lolɛ wũ.
42006011	Sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ɔɖuɖu ne ɔso matsɛ adzuni imɔɛ̃ i nnɛ maabara Yesu iso.
42006012	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ kabemi kawɛ̃ iso ɔsɛ ɔ̃akparama kayi kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu.
42006013	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔsirakanya i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ne ɔɖi ma iweo-inyɔ ɔtã ma iyere sɔ ɔ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze ne.
42006014	Ma nɖe Simon gɔ ɔtã iyere sɔ Petro gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Andrea gu Yakobo gu Yohanes gu Filipo gu Bartolomeo
42006015	gu Mateo gu Toma gu Alfeo ɔbi Yakobo gu Simon gɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ, “Ɔturi gɔ lokpɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kaɖe iti,”
42006016	gu Yakobo ɔbi Yuda gu Yuda Iskariot gɔ lokpese ngɔ loaɖi wũ ɔtã.
42006017	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu gu ɔ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔso i kabemi gamɔ iso maba ne, maba maya i katɛfɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃. Ɔ̃ masiaidze gbodzoo gu maturi ikuri titiiti nɛ lobɔrɛ i Yudea karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso gu Yerusalem gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ mpia i ɔpo kuruɛ Tiro gu Sidon ɔba maasakanya.
42006018	Maba sɔ maanɔ ara wa i Yesu to ɔte fiɛ ɔ̃asa ma sinyɛ agbãagbã dzɛ mato manyɛ. Mma ana i siwarã lalaa to siɖaa ɔba fiɛ ɔsa ma.
42006019	Ɔbiara to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃apɛgu wũ alasɔ ɔle to ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame ɔsa ma ɔɖuɖu.
42006020	Yesu ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ masiaidze i katɔ̃ ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “So si siɣɔ mi mawɛrɛba alasɔ mi ɔkpɛ nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃!
42006021	So si siɣɔ mi ma i kukã to kiniɔ, alasɔ mito miami! So si siɣɔ mi ma nto mibiɛ kiniɔ, alasɔ mito miama!
42006022	So si siɣɔ mi si maturi ɔtsiri mi fiɛ masɛ̃ mi fiɛ mato matia mi, maɣɛ mi iso ara lalaa ala mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iti!
42006023	“Mina isoɣɔ si nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ngbɔ, mitɔ i isoɣɔ ame alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mi kuso siare i kato. Alasɔ ara wagbe igbã i ma mawa ɔbara Ɣaa Kanyamaɖidze ne.
42006024	Ɣɛɛ ndzo miɖe mitã mi maranase alasɔ miɔna mi ɔkpɛ i ngbã mɛgbe ame!
42006025	Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma lomi kiniɔ, alasɔ Kukã to kuakpɛ̃ mi Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma nto mima kiniɔ, alasɔ mito miamararã so mibiɛ nnɔmɛ!
42006026	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma i maturi ɔɖuɖu sɛ male kiniɔ. alasɔ ngbɔ ame i ma mawa ɔla maɔle maladze ma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze maɖe ne.
42006027	“Ɣɛɛ mi ma nto minɔ me ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ miɖɔɛ mi matsirise si mibara isɛɛ mitã ma.
42006028	Mma nsɛ magbarĩ mi ne, mitã ma kusɛkusɛ. Mma ana nto mabara mi ɔtile ne, mikparama kayi i ma iti.
42006029	Si ɔrere ɔpɛ-ɔ ɔrɔ̃ta i kutsueti kuwɛ̃ ne, finikira kunyɔare tã wũ. Si ɔrere ɔmɔɛ̃ fɔ kato awu wa apia ɔbɛ-ɔ iso ne, ɖi nwa apia asɛ karɔ̃ ana tã wũ.
42006030	Ɔturi biara gɔ loakarɛ mi ira ne, mitã wũ. Si ɔrere ɔmɔɛ̃ nnɛ nɖe fɔ ire ɔsu ne, daati wũ kama sɔ aakpese afɔ.
42006031	Kumɛgɔ abie sɔ mabara matã-ɔ ne, fɔ wũ bara ngbɔ tã maturi mama.
42006032	“Si maturi ma nsɛ maɖɔɛ-ɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ asɛ aɖɔɛ ne, be ɔso fiɛ maale-ɔ? Akpi mabaradze ma wũ masɛ maɖɔɛ mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ ma.
42006033	Si maturi ma nsɛ mabara-ɔ isɛɛ ɔnɔwɛ̃ asɛ abara isɛ atã ne, be ɔso maale-ɔ? Akpi mabaradze ma wũ masɛ mabara ngbɔ.
42006034	Si ngɔ loana nnɛ ɔnyɛ i fɔ kɔrɛ ɔtã-ɔ kotoo aanyɛ ira atã ne, be ɔso fiɛ maale-ɔ? Akpi mabaradze ma wũ masɛ manyɛ ara matã mma loawo ma ɔkpesegu ɔtã.
42006035	Ɣɛɛ ne, miɖɔɛ mi matsirise si mibara isɛɛ mitã ma. Minyɛ ara mitã ma ɣɛɛ midaanyɔ ɔri sɔ maakpesegu mabɔ mi kokooko. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, mi kuso to kuasi fiɛ maakpere mi sɔ Ɣaa Kato gu Karɔ̃ baradze mabi. Alasɔ Ɣaa ba kayiribielea ɔtã ta mma nsɛ masu karɔ̃ma mapɛ ala maturi siba gu maturi lalaa.
42006036	Minyɔ maturi nnya lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi ɔse Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ nnya.
42006037	“Midaaɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me si Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me. Daatã maturi ipɔ si Ɣaa iibatã-ɔ ipɔ. Su tsɛ maturi si Ɣaa aasu ɔtsɛ-ɔ.
42006038	Mitã maturi ara si Ɣaa ana atã mi ara. Gbaã ne, kaboũsuai sɛɛ ga loyi pɔpɔɔpɔ, matitidza masɛra kabiɛ kawiri maako ala matã mi. Kaboũsuai ga igbã ako ala ara atã fɔ ɔlaa ne, kã ame igbã maasu mako matã-ɔ ne.”
42006039	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ, “Si nɔbiɛdze to ɔkɔ nɔbiɛdze ne, iwo ame i ma inyɔɔ aakpase mabo.
42006040	Rasuãdze kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ratedze. Ɣɛɛ si ɔro ara ɔsuã ne, ɔ̃ase lɛ ɔ̃ ratedze awe.
42006041	“Nda ato abara fiɛ ato anya iku nɛ mpia i fɔ ɔlaa inɔmi fiɛ aito abara kuira i idzirikpo nɛ mpia fɔ mɔmɔ inɔmi iso?
42006042	Nda aabara fiɛ aaɣere fɔ ɔlaa sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔnyii, tã loɖi-ɔ iku i inɔmi’ ku ɔwi gɔ nnɛ lomɔ iɖo pia i fɔ inɔmi ame? Ladze! Ɖi idzirikpo nɛ mpia-ɔ inɔmi tɔtɔ fiɛ aanya kukaakɔ aɖi fɔ ɔnyii iku i inɔmi.”
42006043	“Kudziri sɛɛ iisɛ kuɣɔ̃ abi nyanyarĩa fiɛ kudziri lalaa ana iibawo abi sɛɛ ɔɣɔ̃.
42006044	Kudziri biara ne, kɔ̃ abi aasu anya kɔ̃ aɖi ite. Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtɔtɔrɛ figi abi i miyu kudziri iso fiɛ maisɛ matɔtɔrɛ adziribi ɖea i itongbã iso.
42006045	Ɔturi sɛɛ ne, ara sɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ ara kakɔlakɔ̃ ga nɖe ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Ɔturi lalaa ɔ̃ wũ ne, ara lalaa ɔsɛ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Alasɔ nnɛ loyi ɔturi ɔtu ame ɔsɛ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kanya ame.
42006046	“Be ɔso fiɛ mito mikpere me sɔ Bosate, Bosate, ɣɛɛ miito mibara ara wa loto loɣere mi iso?
42006047	Ɔturi biara gɔ nsɛ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔto ɔnɔ ara wa nto lote fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara iso ne, loate mi nnɛ i ngɔmɔ ɔre.
42006048	Ɔse lɛ ɔturi gɔ si ɔ̃atsue iyo ne, ɔpia ne i karɔ̃ ame ku ata siare kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔtsue kubereku ɔsia iso. Si ɔwore ɔyi fiɛ ndu ɔbo kabereku gamɔ iso ne, iyo nɛmɔ iibabiɛ alasɔ mapia ne i karɔ̃ ame kukaakɔ.
42006049	Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ wũ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ne iso ne, ɔse lɛ ngɔ lotsue ɔ̃ iyo ɔsia i karɔ̃ kunu iso ɔ̃ipia ne i karɔ̃ ame. Si ɔwore ɔyi fiɛ ndu ɔbo iyo nɛmɔ iso ne, iabiɛ ifu i karɔ̃ pelepele!”
42007001	Gɔ Yesu ɔɔro ma nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔɣere ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Kapernaum.
42007002	Roma kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa ɔwɛ̃ i mmɔ ba ɔɖabo gɔ ɔbua ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ gbaã. Ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔnyɛ gɔ ɔ̃ɔro ɔkpi.
42007003	Gɔ ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔnɔ Yesu iyere ne, ɔpia ma Yudase makpakpa mawɛ̃ sɔ makpere Yesu matã wũ si ɔba ɔ̃asa ɔ̃ ɔɖabo ɔtã wũ.
42007004	Maba maatã wũ iti teteree sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔkote ɔtã sɔ aabuai,
42007005	alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ bo aɖe kaɖe. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ lotsue bo kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔtã bo.”
42007006	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔta ɔsiai ma. Gɔ iɔkuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ ɔ̃abo iyo mmɔ ne, ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔpia ɔ̃ malaa sɔ masɛ maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Tete, loito lobie sɔ loaɖa-ɔ. Loikote sɔ aaba wũ iyo.
42007007	Loikote ana sɔ loaba fɔ katɔ̃. Ne ɔso ɣɛ itɔ̃me sese kere si wũ ɔɖabo si ɔna isosarɛ.
42007008	Mme wũ ɔkpakpa loɖe i makpakpa mama kayirinɔ. Loba makpakpɛ̃dze mama i wũ kayirinɔ. Nsɛ loɣere ngɔ sɔ, ‘Kɛlɛ ngbe’ ɔkɛlɛ, fiɛ nsɛ loɣere ɔmama ana sɔ, ‘Ba ngbe’ ɔba. Nsɛ loɣere wũ ɔɖabo sɔ, ‘Bara lɛ ngbe’ ɔbara.”
42007009	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ibara wũ ɣaa. Mmɔ ɔto ɔfiniki ɔɣere mma nsiai wũ sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ loinya kafɔkaɖe siare gagbe igbã lonya i Israel karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso!”
42007010	Maturi ma lokpese makɛlɛ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gɔgbe iyo mmɔ ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖabo ɔɔsarɛ.
42007011	Nnɛmɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Nain ame gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze gu maturi gbodzoo ma nsiai wũ.
42007012	Gɔ mabo kabenya ne, masarɛgu maturi ma nsore kpise maabiara. Ngɔ lokpi ne, kuɛdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ ɔɣe ɔɖe. Ne ɔso maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔrɛ i kaɖe ame maki malɔ kuɛdze gɔgbe.
42007013	Gɔ Bosate ɔnya ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔ̃ ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri. Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Lo kaku.”
42007014	Yesu ɔbo i maturi ndɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛgu nnɛ iso masore kpise. Gɔ mma nsore ɔtui ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔporoporoi! Mme sɔ ta!”
42007015	Ɔluwɛ̃ kpise ɔkpɛ̃ ɔta ɔsɛ ɔtsɛ ika iɖe. Ne Yesu ɔtara wũ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔnyi ne.
42007016	Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi ɔɖuɖu gbaã ne matsɛ Ɣaa ile iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa kanyaɖidze siare ɔɔba i bo ndɛ̃. Ɣaa ɔɔba sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ mare!”
42007017	Yesu ira nɛ ɔbara ngbe ɔki ikã Yudea karɔ̃ gu abuiti ɔɖuɖu iso.
42007018	Gɔ Yohanes marasuãdze ɔɣere wũ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔkpere ma inyɔ.
42007019	Ɔpia ma Bosate kɔrɛ sɔ masɛ maakarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ngɔ maɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɛɛbɛrɛ bonyɔ ɔmama ɔri?”
42007020	Gɔ maba Yesu kɔrɛ ne, maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ndupiedze Yohanes lopia bo sɔ bo karɛ-ɔ sɔ, ‘Fɔ nɖe ngɔ maɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɛɛbɛrɛ bonyɔ ɔmama ɔri?’ ”
42007021	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Bosate ɔɔsa maturi gbodzoo sinyɛ, ɔsa siwarã lalaa, ɔtã sɔ manɔbiɛdze gbodzoo ana to manya ara.
42007022	Ne ɔɣere mma mapia katɔ̃me sɔ, “Mikpese miaɣere Yohanes ara wa minya gu nwa minɔ. Manɔbiɛdze to manya, mabafã to masɛ, mma nto manyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa iso to isekele, matsuetɛ̃se to manɔ, makpise to mata fiɛ mato maɣere mawɛrɛba ana Itɔ̃me Bielea.
42007023	So aaɣɔ mma i wũ kurabarara iita kuya iso.”
42007024	Gɔ Yohanes marasuãdze ɔɔrui kama ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ ika iɖe i ɔ̃ iso iɣere mma losakanya mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ mibɔrɛ mikɛlɛ Yohanes kɔrɛ i fafuĩ ame ne, be iɖe minyɔ ɔri sɔ mianya? Iyata nɛ i ɔwiri to ɔtidza?
42007025	Be mibɔrɛ misɛ mianyɔ? Ngɔ mpia ɔgo awu? Mma mpia ɔgo awu fiɛ mato maɖe isoɣɔ ne, magara ayo masɛ mawe.
42007026	Mibua miɣere me nnɛ misɛ mianyɔ! Ɣaa kanyaɖidze? Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔɖo Ɣaa kanyaɖidze.
42007027	Alasɔ ɔ̃ iso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loasese kpabo ɔɖe-ɔ katɔ̃, sɔ ɔ̃aledza maturi ɔtã fɔ iba.’ ”
42007028	Yesu ɔledza ma iɣere ana sɔ, “Yohanes ɔɖo ɔturi igbã biara gɔ maɣe i kayi gagbe ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lokoso ɔɖo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɖo wũ.”
42007029	Tɔtɔ ne, maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛ i Yohanes ɔɣɛ titirio ma lampofɔdze ma lobara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ fiɛ mafɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
42007030	Ɣɛɛ ma Farisise gu Mose mmara matedze ɔsɛ̃ ara wa nɖe Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kutã ma fiɛ maibie sɔ ɔpie ma ndu.
42007031	“Kiniɔ ne, mabe loasu nɔme maturi lokateragu? Nda mase?
42007032	Mase lɛ mabiɛtɛ ma nto maɣa kaɣa i kuɣa ame. Mawɛ̃ to maɣere ma malaa sɔ, ‘Boka isoɣɔ aka botã mi, miitɔ! Boɖi sikubiɛnɔ ana botã mi, miibiɛ kaku.’
42007033	Gɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔba ɔ̃ito ɔɖe ara ɔnɛ ndã mɛ loamɔɛ̃ ne, miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Siwarã lalaa mpia i ɔ̃ ame!’
42007034	Mme Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi gɔ loba fiɛ loto loɖe ara lonɛ ndã ne, mi sɔ, ‘Minyɔ ɖeɖei gu tarɛ̃dze gɔgbe! Ma lampofɔdze gu makpibaradze ɔlaa ɔɖe!’
42007035	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iwola sɛ ite so i ɔturi nsɛgbai ame.”
42007036	Ɔ Farisise ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpere Yesu sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖe aɖera i ɔ̃ iyo, ne ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ ɔtsɛ araɖea iɖe ne.
42007037	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ pia i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame gɔ nsi ngbã nyanyarĩa. Gɔ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu to ɔɖe ara i ɔ Farisise gɔmɔ iyo ne, ɔsu nnɔĩ miwɛ̃ mɛ nsɛ mifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ fiɛ me ibui ɔnyɔ sɔlɔsɔlɔ ɔbɔ mmɔ.
42007038	Ɔba ɔ̃aya i Yesu kama ɔto ɔbiɛ nnɔmɛ ɔfere i ɔ̃ ngba iso. Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔsu ɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔnyɛnyɛdɛ̃ Yesu ngba, ɔfiɔfiɔ̃ me fiɛ ka ɔsu nnɔĩ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a mɛmɔ ɔfere wũ i ngba ana.
42007039	Gɔ Farisise gɔ lokpere Yesu ɔnya ira nɛgbe ne, ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ iti ame sɔ, “Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe ne, tee ɔ̃atsue ɔturi gɔ igbã i ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nto ɔpɛpɛgu wũ ngbe ɖe gu ngbã nyanyarĩa mɛ igbã ɔsi!”
42007040	Ne Yesu ɔfɔ kanya ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Simon, lobie sɔ loaɣere-ɔ ira iwɛ̃.” Ne Simon ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, ɣɛ nnɛ aba.”
42007041	Ne Yesu ɔsɛ karɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Maturi inyɔ mawɛ̃ ɔla ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ kuso. Ɔwɛ̃ to wũ lɛ kuwa kuwɛ̃ kuso. Ɔnyɔare to wũ lɛ awa aweo kuso.
42007042	Ma inyɔ magbe kuwɛ̃ iiwo wũ kuso ɔtã. Ne ɔso ɔsu kuso gɔ mato wũ ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ ma. Maturi inyɔ magbe ndɛ̃ ne, nna loaɖɔɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɖo?”
42007043	Ne Simon ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lofɔ loɖe sɔ ngɔ masu kuso siare matsɛ.” Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Aɣɛ kukaakɔ.”
42007044	Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe, ne ɔɣere Simon sɔ, “Ato anya ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe? Gɔ loba fɔ iyo ne, aitã me ndu sɔ lofore ngba. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔsu ɔ̃ nnɔmɛ ɔfore me ngba fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔnukutu me.
42007045	Gɔ loba fɔ iyo ne, aipɔrɛ me apia me isoɣɔ. Ɣɛɛ ita i ɔwi gɔ lobo i fɔ iyo ne, ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe iinyua wũ ngba ɔsɔla.
42007046	Aitã me nnɔĩ sɔ lopia i iti. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔsu nnɔĩ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔfere me ngba ɔɖuɖu.
42007047	Ne ɔso nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ gɔ ɔɖi ɔte me ɔso ne, ɔna ɔ̃ akpi gbodzoo wa ɔbara isu itsɛ. Ɔturi gɔ masu akpi kɛkɛĩ matsɛ ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ana ne, kɛkɛĩ kere kuse.”
42007048	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ sɔ, “Ɔɔna fɔ akpi isu itsɛ.”
42007049	Gɔ mma nsi i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ gu Yesu ɔnɔ ara wa ɔɣɛ ne, makarɛ so sɔ, “Nna ɔɖe ngbe fiɛ ɔto ɔwo maturi akpi ɔsu ɔtsɛ ma?”
42007050	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ sɔ, “Fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔɖi-ɔ ne ɔso kɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame.”
42008001	Ɔwi kama ne, Yesu ɔki i simagɛ̃ gu ngorowase wiriwiria ame ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso. Ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ana siai wũ.
42008002	Marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ ma i Yesu ɔsa sinyɛ agbãagbã gu mma ame ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi ana ɔsiai wũ. Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ nɖe Maria gɔ masɛ marɔ Magdalase, ngɔ ame i Yesu ɔsa siwarã lalaa aka akɔdzɛ ɔɖi.
42008003	Ɔwɛ̃ ana nɖe Yohana gɔ ɔrã marɔ Kusa gɔ nsɛ ɔbara karabara i Igara Herodes atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ lɛ ɔkpakpa awe. Ɔmama ana nɖe Susana gu mamama gbodzoo ma losiai Yesu masu ma karana mabuai wũ gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze.
42008004	Maturi gbodzoo to mabɔrɛ i simagɛ̃ agbãagbã ame maba Yesu kɔrɛ. Gɔ maba maasakanya ne, Yesu ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ,
42008005	“Kpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔraɖui kasakɔ̃. Gɔ ɔto ɔsa ne, ɔwɛ̃ ɔfere i ɔri iso maturi ɔsɛ iso ne kurodzai ɔrɛrɛ kuɖe ne.
42008006	Ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣo i ata iso ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔre kere ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔkpi alasɔ ɔ̃ siɖu iibo karɔ̃.
42008007	Ɔraɖui ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔbo i kuposɛ̃ ndɛ̃, ne ɔso gɔ ɔre ne, kuɣa kufu wũ iso, ne ɔso ɔkpi pelepele.
42008008	Ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣo i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso. Gɔ ɔre ne, ɔɣɔ̃ abi, ɔwɛ̃ abi kulafa kulafa.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ!”
42008009	Yesu marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ ɔɖi igbã nɛgbe karɔ̃ ɔtã ma.
42008010	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ awɛrɛra karɔ̃ ɔte mi. Ɣɛɛ maturi mama ne, agbã ame maanɔ sɔ, ‘si mato manya ne, maibatsue. fiɛ si mato manɔ ne, maibanɔ karɔ̃.’
42008011	“Igbã nɛ lopɛ karɔ̃ ngbe ne. Ɔraɖui gɔ mato masa nɖe Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
42008012	Ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i ɔri kuruɛ se lɛ maturi ma nsɛ manɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ Ɔbosam sɛ ɔba ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ne ɔɖi i ma situ ame. Isɛ itã sɔ maibawo ɔfɔ ɔɖe fiɛ maana iɖi.
42008013	Ngɔ ana loɣo i ita iso ne, ɔse lɛ maturi ma lonɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ mafɔ ne ku isoɣɔ ɔluwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ iibo i ma ame wodoroo. Ne ɔso ma kafɔkaɖe ɔwi se kurukutu gɔ si ita iya iso ɔba ma iso ne, masɛ mafɛ̃.
42008014	Ngɔ ana loɣo i kuposɛ̃ ame ne, ɔse lɛ maturi ma lonɔ itɔ̃me ɣɛɛ kayiiso imararã gu karana gu ngbã iɖe sɛ iɣa ifu ma sɔ maisɛ mawo iti ɔre fiɛ maaɣɔ̃ abi abe.
42008015	Ɔraɖui gɔ loɣo i karɔ̃ sɛɛ iso ɔ̃ wũ ne, ɔse lɛ maturi ma lonɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ imɔɛ̃ ma ɔtu gbaã gu karɔ̃ ibɔso. Maya teteree gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃ maɣɔ̃ abi gbodzoo.
42008016	“Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtsue ɔkaniɛ ɔsu ɔkɔla i kabui ame ɣee ɔsu ɔɣedza i karɛkɔ̃ kayirinɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃atara wũ ɔsia i ira kɔlɛa iso sɔ si ɔ̃asa ɔfere i kakɔi biara sɔ si ɔturi biara ɔbo iyo ne, ɔ̃anya kame sekelee.
42008017	Ira biara nɛ makɔla i kakɔi biara ne, mato maaɖi ne mabɔ i ɔgbami. Ira biara nɛ mafu ara ne, mato maaɖi ne mabɔ ikpawaĩ ame.
42008018	“Midzuɛ̃ so i kumɛgɔ miakã atsue alasɔ ngɔ mba ara ne, maatã wũ mabua, ɣɛɛ ngɔ mba ara kɛkɛĩ ne, kɛkɛĩ gɔ ame ɔbu sɔ ɔba ne, maamɔɛ̃ mafɔ wũ iso.”
42008019	Yesu ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ manyiibi ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ maiwo Yesu ɔnya ala kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔmini wũ ɔso.
42008020	Ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere Yesu sɔ, “Fɔ ɔnyi gu manyiibi ɣɛ i inyamɔ mato mabie-ɔ.”
42008021	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ, “Wũ ɔnyi gu wũ manyiibi nɖe mma nsɛ manɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me fiɛ masɛ mabara i ne iso.”
42008022	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔbo i ɔkolo ame. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã bowara ibu bokɛlɛ ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ isɛ.” Ne ɔso mabo i ɔkolo ame marui.
42008023	Gɔ masia ndu iso kɛkɛĩ kere ne, sirɛ ɔsu Yesu. Ɔluwɛ̃ awɛ ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ teteree gɔ mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ɔkolo ame ngbã ɔwe i imɔrɛ̃ ame ala ndu ɔtsɛ ɔkolo ame ibo.
42008024	Marasuãdze ɔbore mabo wũ maatara wũ sɔ, “Tete! Ɔkpi boto lo!” Mmɔ i Yesu ɔta ɔya ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia ɔwiri gu ndu mɛ nto miɖa so. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ira biara ko lolo kananana.
42008025	Ne ɔto ɔkarɛ marasuãdze sɔ, “Be iɖe ɔso fiɛ mina kafɔkaɖe?” Ɣɛɛ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ibara ma ɣii ne mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Mme ɔturi igbã ɔɖe ngbe? Ɔto ɔɖegu ɔwiri gu ndu ika makã wũ atsue!”
42008026	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔwara ɔpo makɛlɛ Gadara ibuiti ame si abɔrɛ i Galilea isɛ.
42008027	Ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ Yesu ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔkolo ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia ɔsarɛgu wũ. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame fiɛ ɔwi gbodzoo ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe ɔki isɔ̃isɔ̃. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ i ayo ame, ɣɛɛ ɔwi biara ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe i maturi kabiarakɔ̃.
42008028	Gɔ ɔnya Yesu ne, ɔla kulu teteree ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu ngbatɔ̃. Ɔɣere wũ teteree sɔ, “Yesu, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔlesate Ɔbi! Be ato abie abɔrɛgu i wũ kɔrɛ? Loto-ɔ i kukpa daakpadzɛ̃ me kutsue!”
42008029	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ala Yesu ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã dzɛ mpia i ɔ̃ ame sɔ, “Bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame fe!” Ɔwi gbodzoo si siwarã dzɛgbe si ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso ne, si manyi wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba ala ngɔsɔngɔsɔn kɔra ne, ɔsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔfɛfɛ̃ fiɛ sisɛ siɖi wũ ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame.
42008030	Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda marɔ-ɔ?” Ne ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Mme marɔ Isɛguri ne.” Ɔɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ siwarã lalaa dzɛ mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔsi.
42008031	Mmɔ i Siwarã to sitã Yesu iti sɔ ɔdaafuĩdza ma ɔpia i iwo gudua nɛ ame maawe inyɛ.
42008032	Makparako gbodzoo mawɛ̃ ɣɛ i kabemi iso mato maɖe ara. Ne siwarã lalaa to sitã Yesu iti sɔ ɔtã ma mabo i makparako ma mmɔ ame. Ne Yesu ɔtã ma ɔri ne.
42008033	Siwarã dzɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ame sibo i makparako ame, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtere kpitikpitikpiti maso kabemi mabo i itubu ame makpi.
42008034	Gɔ mma nto manyɔ makparako iso ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, matere makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame masɛ maaɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu gu ngorowase ɔɖuɖu.
42008035	Maturi ɔbɔrɛ maba sɔ si maba maanyɔ nnɛ loba. Gɔ mabo Yesu kɔrɛ ne, manya sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ ame i Yesu ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi ka ɔsi i Yesu ngbatɔ̃, ɔpia awu, iti ame ɔɔkpa waĩ. Ne ɔso ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma ɔɖuɖu.
42008036	Mma lonya nnɛ loba ne, maɣere matsɔra kumɛgɔ ibara fiɛ siawarã lalaa ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔsarɛ.
42008037	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, Gadara karɔ̃ gu kã abuiti maturi ɔɣere Yesu sɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ma karɔ̃ iso alasɔ manigã. Ne ɔso Yesu ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔledza irui.
42008038	Mmɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ i Yesu ɔsa ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ, “Tã me losiai-ɔ.” Ɣɛɛ Yesu iinɔgu wũ karɔ̃, ɔɣere wũ sɔ,
42008039	“Kpese kɛlɛ fɔ iyo si asɛ aaɣɛ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔtã-ɔ.” Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ma ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃awe ɔɣɛ ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Yesu ɔbara ɔtã wũ.
42008040	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔwara ɔpo ɔkpese ɔba kama isɛ ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔsarɛgu wũ kukaakɔ alasɔ mato manyɔ wũ ɔri.
42008041	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yairo fiɛ ɔɖe ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ makpakpa ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔtã wũ iti sɔ ɔsiai wũ ɔba ɔ̃ iyo,
42008042	alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ loɔfɔ lɛ akɔ aweo-anyɔ ne, ɔrɛ ɔto ɔnyɛ ɔ̃ɔro ɔkpi. Gɔ Yesu ɔrui ɔsiai wũ ne, maturi ɔmini wũ mato malili so.
42008043	Maturi magbe ndɛ̃ ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i ara to afere akɔ aweo-anyɔ buu ana pia. Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔɔnina ɔ̃ sikã ɔɖuɖu ɔsu ɔbie so kua ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ina isosarɛ.
42008044	Ɔbo i maturi ndɛ̃ ɔbara pɔkɔsɔɔ ɔpɛgu Yesu awu kutsueti i kama isɛ. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ara ko lonyua wũ ɔfere.
42008045	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Nna ɔɖe lopɛgu me?” Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara ɔsɛ̃. Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, nyɔ kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔki malɔ-ɔ!”
42008046	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loɣe sɔ ɔnyiiɔ ɔpɛgu me alasɔ ɔle ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i wũ ame.”
42008047	Gɔ ɔrɔ̃go ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ibawo ɔwɛrɛ ɔso ne, ɔbɔrɛgu ifɔ̃ ɔto ɔti ɔkpakpa ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu katɔ̃ i maturi ɔɖuɖu anɔ. Ɔɣere Yesu nnɛ ɔso ɔpɛgu wũ gu kumɛgɔ ɔna isosarɛ ɔluwɛ̃.
42008048	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi, fɔ kafɔkaɖe losa-ɔ. Kɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame.”
42008049	Gɔ Yesu ɣɛ i mmɔ ɔtogu itɔ̃me nɛgbe iɣɛ ne, mapia ɔturi mabɔrɛgu i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Yairo iyo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔɔkpi ne ɔso kanyua ratedze kutsuɛ ɔɖaa.”
42008050	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ ne, ɔɣere Yairo sɔ, “Daanigã, fɔɖe kere sɔ fɔ ɔbi to ɔ̃asarɛ.”
42008051	Gɔ masɛ maabo Yairo iyo ne, Yesu iitã kuwɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔbo iyo kame iɖo Petro gu Yohanes gu Yakobo gu ɔbirɔ̃gomi maɣese.
42008052	Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɣɛ i mmɔ mato mabiɛgu kulu, ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyua ɔbiɛ, alasɔ ɔbi iikpi, sirɛ kere ɔto ɔrɛ.”
42008053	Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, mama wũ alasɔ maɣe sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi.
42008054	Ne Yesu ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔbirɔ̃gomi kɔrɔ̃, ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Ɔbi, ta ya!”
42008055	Ɔbirɔ̃gomi ko lorɛgɛ̃ ɔta ɔsɛ. Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ mabie irere matã ɔbi si ɔɖe.
42008056	Ira nɛgbe ɔbara ɔ̃ maɣese ɣii, ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ madaaɣere kuwɛ̃ nnɛ loba i mmɔ.
42009001	Yesu ɔkpere ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔsirakanya ne ɔtã ma ɔri gu ɔle sɔ masa siwarã lalaa ɔɖuɖu si masa sinyɛ agbãagbã ana.
42009002	Ɔsese ma sɔ makɛlɛ maaɣɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me si masa manyɛse.
42009003	Si maarui ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaasu kuira mila i irisɛ ame lɛ ɔsɛdziri ɣee akpo ɣee aɖera ɣee sikã. Midaasu awu nyɔare sɔ mianyuarã i ɔri.
42009004	Iyo biara nɛ ame mafɔ mi ne, miwe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miarui i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame.
42009005	Ngbegɔ masɛ̃ maifɔ mi ne, si miarui i mmɔ ne, mikpakpa mi ngba sise mifere lɛ Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loaba ikparĩ.”
42009006	Marasuãdze ɔrui mabo i nsɛkɔ̃ mɛmɔ ame mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea masa maturi sinyɛ i kakɔi biara.
42009007	Gɔ Herodes gɔ nto ɔɖe Galilea karɔ̃ iso ɔnɔ ara wa nto aba ngbe ne, ɔkpɔkpɔtɔ alasɔ maturi mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ Ndupiedze Yohanes loɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã.
42009008	Mawɛ̃ ana to maɣɛ sɔ Eliya ɔɖe loɔledza iba. Fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze kuere ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe loɔkpese ɔba maɣe wũ.
42009009	Ne Herodes to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lotã matu Yohanes iti, ne ɔso nna ɔɖe nto ɔbara ara wa nto lonɔ ngbe?” Ne ɔso Herodes ɔbie ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃anya Yesu.
42009010	Katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔba maaɣere Yesu nwa ɔɖuɖu mabara. Ne ka ɔkɔ ma kerekere marui makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Betsaida ame ne.
42009011	Gɔ maturi ɔnɔ ngbɔ ne, masiai ma kama makɛlɛ mmɔ. Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔfɔ ma ɔɣere ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔsa mma nto manyɛ.
42009012	Iɣɛ̃kɛlɛ ame ne, katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ ɔba maaɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ɖi ma ɔri si makɛlɛ ngorowase mɛ lobore mimatã ngbe si masɛ maabie aɖera gu ngbegɔ maarɛ ala ngbe ɔfe idzoro gu ayo ame.”
42009013	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi mɔmɔ mitã ma irere maɖe.” Ne mato maɣere wũ sɔ, “Araɖea wa ɔɖuɖu boba ngbe nɖe abolo abo aru gu afara anyɔ. Ato abie sɔ bosɛ boaɣa araɖea botã maturi gbodzoo magbe?”
42009014	Marɛrɛ̃ kerekere i ma ndɛ̃ aaɖe lɛ maturi kukpi kuru mmɔ. Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Mitã ma masɛ i akuri ame lɛ siru siru awe.”
42009015	Ne gɔ marasuãdze ɔbara ngbɔ ne,
42009016	Yesu ɔsu abolo abo aru gu afara anyɔ wamɔ, ɔkɔlɛ anɔ kato. Gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti ne, ɔbɛbɛse ɔtã ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ masu maɣɛɣɛ mmamɔ.
42009017	Gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ara mami fiɛ marasuãdze ɔsa nwa lobuburi kanya ne, mana kusɛsɛi kuweo-kunyɔ.
42009018	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ to ɔkparama kayi iyi iwɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔwe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ne ɔto ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna i maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ loɖe?”
42009019	Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mawɛ̃ sɛ maɣɛ sɔ fɔ nɖe Ndupiedze Yohanes, mawɛ̃ ana sɔ fɔ nɖe Eliya, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɛ maɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze kuere ɔwɛ̃ loɔkpese ɔba ngbã.”
42009020	Mmɔ ɔto ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ne mi ɣɛɛ? Nna miɣe sɔ loɖe?” Petro ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Ɣaa Kristo ne.”
42009021	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma teteree sɔ madaaɣere kuwɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe.
42009022	Yesu ɔledza ma iɣere sɔ, “Ikote sɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, awe inyɛ gbodzoo i ma Yudase makpakpa gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze nrɔɔ̃ ame maasɛ̃ me, maɖoe me. Ɣɛɛ ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara me lowe ngbã.”
42009023	Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ, “Si ɔrere ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asiai me ne, ɔsɛ̃ so si ɔsu ɔ̃ inyɛwe ɔnyigbã si ɔ̃awo me ɔsiai.
42009024	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loakpɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ngbã iti ne, ɔto ɔ̃ayura me, ɣɛɛ ngɔ loanyua ɔ̃ ngba ala wũ ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
42009025	Mme kusia i ɔturi ana si kayi iso ɔɖuɖu karana ɔkpese ɔ̃ kare fiɛ ɔ̃ina ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro?
42009026	Si mme gu wũ ara ite to ikpɛ̃ ɔrere kunuarɛ ne, mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, mme wũ ɔto ɔ̃akpɛ̃ me kunuarɛ ku ɔwi gɔ ame loaba i wũ ikpawaĩ gu wũ ɔse Ɣaa ɔle gu ɔ̃ makpabo sekelea ɔɖuɖu ikpawaĩ ame.
42009027	Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ i ngbe iibakpi fiɛ Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ Sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔle ɔte.”
42009028	Lɛ ɖapɛ ɔwɛ̃ kama gɔ Yesu ɔɣere ma ara wagbe ne, ɔkɔ Petro gu Yohanes gu Yakobo maya kube kuwɛ̃ makɛlɛ itititɛ̃ sɔ maakparama kayi.
42009029	Gɔ ɔto ɔkparama kayi ne, ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ko lokpaki kato kafiɛ futututu gɔ ta ɔ̃ ara wa ɔpia to atsue anɔmi.
42009030	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ ma nɖe Mose gu Eliya ɔba maaya i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ mato maɖegu wũ ika.
42009031	Maba i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame fiɛ maɖe ku Yesu ika i ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃abara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ i ɔ̃ kukpi i Yerusalem iso.
42009032	Petro gu ɔ̃ malaa ɔrɛ sirɛ dzoroo, ɣɛɛ gɔ mata ne, manya Yesu i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame gu maturi inyɔ ma nɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ.
42009033	Gɔ maturi inyɔ mamɔ to marui ne, Petro ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Tete, bo ngbe iba ɔbua ilɛ gbaã! Tã bopɛ akpayo atɛ i ngbe. Iwɛ̃ itã-ɔ, iwɛ̃ itã Mose fiɛ iwɛ̃ ana itã Eliya.” Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kɔra iiɣe ara wa ɔɣɛ i ngbe.
42009034	Gɔ ɔɣɛ i mmɔ ɔto ika iɖe ne, idɔdɔ ɔso ifu ma iso ne ɔso ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ marasuãdze gbaã.
42009035	Ne manɔ silɔ i idɔdɔ ame gɔ sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ ibiete gɔ losia ikparĩ ngbe ne, mikã wũ Atsue!”
42009036	Gɔ silɔ dzɛmɔ ɔlo ikaɖe ne, manya sɔ Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ lokuti ɔɣɛ i mmɔ. Marasuãdze ɔma kanya i ara wagbe iso. Maiɣere kuwɛ̃ nnɛ manya ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame.
42009037	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze itɛ mammɔ ɔso mabɔrɛ i kube iso maba. Maturi gbodzoo ɔba maasarɛgu wũ.
42009038	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ i mmɔ to ɔla kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ratedze! Loto-ɔ i kukpa, nyɔ wũ ɔbi! Wũ ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã!
42009039	Siwarã lalaa ɔ to siɖaa wũ gɔ sito sitã sɔ ɔ̃ala kulu teteree, ɔluwɛ̃ sipuri wũ siwuĩ i karɔ̃ iyɔ minyatu ka misɛ wũ i kanya. Si iba ngbɔ ne, isɛ ibua iwe ɔle, ina ɔpã fiɛ isɛ ikpa wũ.
42009040	Lotã fɔ marasuãdze iti sɔ masa siwarã dzɛgbe matã me ɣɛɛ maiwo.”
42009041	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi kiniɔgbe maturi ma kafɔkaɖe lotɛgɛlɛ fiɛ miba atsuele! Ku mme ɔwi loawe i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ loaɣara so lotã mi lotui?” Ne ɔɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ sɔ, “Kɔ fɔ ɔbi bɔ me ngbe.”
42009042	Gɔ ɔbi to ɔba ne, ɔluwɛ̃ siwarã ɔpuri wũ siwuĩ i karɔ̃ ɔleso ɔto. Ne Yesu ɔtɔ̃me ɔpia siwarã lalaa dzɛmɔ ɔsa ɔbi ɔtara wũ ɔta ɔ̃ ɔse ne.
42009043	Ɣaa ɔle siare gɔgbe ɔbara maturi ɔɖuɖu ɣii. Gɔ Yesu Kurabarara togu maturi ibara ɣii ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ,
42009044	“Midaaɣara nnɛ nto loba loaɣere mi! Mato maaɖi mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, matã maturi.”
42009045	Ɣɛɛ mainɔ nnɛ ɔɣere ma karɔ̃. Ɣaa ɔsu ira nɛgbe ɔkɔla ma sɔ mainɔ karɔ̃ fiɛ mato manigã sɔ maakarɛ wũ ana.
42009046	Kakpadzɛ̃ ɔba i marasuãdze ndɛ̃ sɔ ma nna nɖe ngɔ loɖo pelepele.
42009047	Gɔ Yesu ɔtsue ma adzuni ɔso ne, ɔkɔ ɔbiɛtɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aɣedza ma i katɔ̃.
42009048	Ne ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ ɔbiɛtɛ gɔgbe i wũ iyere ame ne, mme iɖe ɔfɔ. Fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ne, ɔfɔ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me. Alasɔ ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ i mi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ lokɔlɛ ɔɖo pelepele ne.”
42009049	Mmɔ i Yohanes to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, bonya ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔsa siwarã lalaa i fɔ iyere ame ɣɛɛ ne, botindza wũ sɔ ɔnyua ala ɔ̃iɖe bo ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃.”
42009050	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Midaatɛ̃ wũ ɔri, alasɔ si ɔturi iita ɔɣɛ mi iso ne, mitsue sɔ ɔɣɛ mi i kama.”
42009051	Gɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aasu Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu kato ɔɔpɛtɛpɛtɛ ne, ɔbara ɔ̃ adzuni sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Yerusalem.
42009052	Ɔpia mawɛ̃ ɔɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ masɛ maaledza ara masɛ i Samaria akorowa awɛ̃ matã ɔ̃ iba.
42009053	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mmɔ maturi ɔtsue sɔ Yerusalem ɔto ɔfe ɔkɛlɛ ɔso ne, maifɔ wũ.
42009054	Gɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze inyɔ ma nɖe Yohanes gu Yakobo ɔnya ne, makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, ato abie sɔ bokpere ɔtɔ si ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba ɔ̃atsuedza ma?”
42009055	Ne Yesu ɔfiniki ɔsɛ̃ ma sɔ, “Miiɣe siwarã dzɛ nto siɖe mi iso! Alasɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iiba sɔ loawɔra maturi ngbã ɣɛɛ ɔba loba sɔ loaɖi me bowũ.”
42009056	Ne ɔ̃ gu marasuãdze ɔrui makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ mama ame ne.
42009057	Gɔ mato makɛlɛ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere Yesu sɔ, “Loasiai-ɔ kakɔi biara ga aakɛlɛ.”
42009058	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mabɔi lalaa ba awo wa ame masɛ mawɛrɛ fiɛ kurodzai ana ba ayo, ɣɛɛ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, na iti kasiakɔ̃.”
42009059	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔmama ana sɔ, “Siai me.” Ɣɛɛ ngɔmɔ ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Bosate, loasiai-ɔ, ɣɛɛ ɖi me ɔri si nsɛ loabiara tete tɔtɔ.”
42009060	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Tã mma nse lɛ makpise si mabiara ma makpise, ɣɛɛ fɔ ne kɛlɛ aaɣɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ itɔ̃me.”
42009061	Ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate lobie sɔ loasiai-ɔ, ɣɛɛ ne, tã me losɛ loamala wũ maturi so tɔtɔ.”
42009062	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ngɔ loisɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara ku ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu iikote ɔtã Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
42010001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Bosate ɔɖi marɛrɛ̃ sikɔdzɛ-inyɔ mama gɔ ɔpia ma inyɔ inyɔ, ɔɣere ma sɔ maɖe wũ katɔ̃ makɛlɛ simagɛ̃ gu ngorowase mɛ ame ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ.
42010002	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔraɖui gɔ maasɔrɛ̃ ɔsi ɣɛɛ marabaradze iisi. Ne ɔso mitã kakpɛkɔ̃ sate iti sɔ ɔsese marabaradze ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame.
42010003	Mikɛlɛ! Nto lopia mi lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃ abi i magidi ndɛ̃.
42010004	Midaasu sikã kawumi ɣee ndokota ɣee akpo mila. Midaatui i ɔri sɔ mito miya kuwɛ̃.
42010005	“Iyo biara nɛ ame miabo ne, miɖe katɔ̃ miɣere ma sɔ, ‘Isobuɛ itã iyo nɛgbe maturi.’
42010006	Si ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ isobuɛ pia i iyo nɛmɔ ame ne, mitã sɔ mi isobuɛ si isiai wũ. Ɣɛɛ si kuwɛ̃ na ngbɔ ne, misu mi isobuɛ kaya miruigu.
42010007	Miwe i iyo biara nɛ ame maafɔ mi. Araɖea igbã biara nɛ maatã mi ne, miɖe si minɛ. Ikote sɔ maatã rabaradze ɔ̃ aɖera. Midaawe mikiki, mibɔrɛ i iyo nɛ ame mikɛlɛ imama ame.
42010008	“Ɔmagɛ̃ biara gɔ ame maafɔ mi ne, miɖe nnɛ masu matã mi.
42010009	Misa manyɛse i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame si miɣere ma sɔ, ‘Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔbore ɔbo mi.’
42010010	Ɣɛɛ si misɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ɔrere ame fiɛ maifɔ mi ne, mirui mikɛlɛ ma itiri si miɣere ma sɔ,
42010011	‘Mi ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔsebu gɔ lota ɔfere bo i ngba kɔra ne, boɔkpakpa bofere mi. Ɣɛɛ minyigi sɔ Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔbore ɔbo mi!’
42010012	Nto losia ita lotã mi sɔ iase pɔkɔsɔɔ itã Sodom ɔmagɛ̃ iɖo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ maturi!
42010013	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi Korazin maturi! Fiɛ ndzo miɖe mitã mi Betsaida maturi! Alasɔ si awawãra wa igbã lobara i mi ame iɖe lobara i Tiro gu Sidon simagɛ̃ ame ne, tee maakpase masɛ i ndɔ̃ ame mapia ara wa loate sɔ maɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i ma akpi ame!
42010014	Ɣaa to ɔ̃anyɔ Tiro gu Sidon simagɛ̃ nnya ɔɖo mi ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi.
42010015	Mi Kapernaum maturi ne, i mi adzuni ame ne, mito mibie sɔ miakɔlɛ so misɛ miabo kato, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ mi karɔ̃ mikɛlɛ ta ikpibiɔ!”
42010016	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loakã mi atsue ne, mme iɖe ɔkã atsue fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loasɛ̃ mi ne, mme iɖe ɔsɛ̃. Ɔbiara gɔ loasɛ̃ me ne, ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ɔsɛ̃.”
42010017	Maturi sikɔdzɛ-inyɔ mamɔ ɔkpese maba ku isoɣɔ maba maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, ta siwarã lalaa to sikã bo atsue i fɔ iyere ame.”
42010018	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Lonya Ɔbosam ɔkpase ɔbɔrɛ i kato lɛ kumɛgɔ i kado sɛ ɔma awe.
42010019	Mikã atsue! Lotã mi ɔle sɔ miawo maɣɛ gu siboitɛtɛ iso ɔnene ɣɛɛ kuira iibabara mi. Miaɖe Tsirise ɔle ɔɖuɖu iso fiɛ kuira iibabara mi.
42010020	So si sidaaɣɔ mi sɔ siwarã lalaa to sikã mi atsue. Ɣɛɛ so si siɣɔ mi sɔ Ɣaa ɔtsɛrɛ mi aɣere ɔpia i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔko ame.”
42010021	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Siwarã Bielea isoɣɔ ɔbo i Yesu ame ɔɖuɖu ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, Kato gu Karɔ̃ Sate, nto lole-ɔ sɔ asu ara wa lowɛrɛ manɔgbadze gu makotsuese ne, aɖi wã ate mabiɛtɛ. Fiɛ gbaã ne, Tete, ngbɔ ikote-ɔ ne.”
42010022	Mmɔ ɔtsɛ ma iɣere sɔ, “Tete ɔsu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame. Kuwɛ̃kuwɛ̃ iiɣe Ɔbi iɖo Ɔse ɔnɔwɛ̃, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ ana iiɣe Ɔse iɖo Ɔbi gu mma i Ɔbi ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ Ɔse ɔte.”
42010023	Ne Yesu ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze i iwɛrɛ ame ɔɣere ma sɔ, “So si siɣɔ mi gbaã sɔ mito minya ara wa mito minya i ngbe!
42010024	Nto loɣere mi sɔ ne, Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo gu magara ana ɔbie teteree sɔ manya ara wa mito minya, ɣɛɛ mainya, ɣee si manɔ ara wa mito minɔ, ɣɛɛ mainɔ.”
42010025	Mmaratedze ɔwɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃ala Yesu ɔnyɔ. Ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, be loabara fiɛ loana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro?”
42010026	Ne Yesu ɔta wũ mmuai ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be i Ɔko Sekelea Ɔɣɛ? Fiɛ nda anɔ itɔ̃me nɛmɔ karɔ̃?”
42010027	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ Bosate Ɣaa ku fɔ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu ku fɔ siwarã ɔɖuɖu ku fɔ ɔle ɔɖuɖu ku fɔ adzuni ɔɖuɖu ana si aɖɔɛ fɔ ɔnyii lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
42010028	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe. Bara ngbɔ ne ato aasɛ ngbã.”
42010029	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mmaratedze gɔgbe to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃atã so ibɛ ɔso ne, ɔledza Yesu i karɛ sɔ, “Nna nɖe wũ ɔnyii?”
42010030	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem isɛ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ Yeriko ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Mayukukpe ɔsɛ maamɔɛ̃ wũ i ɔri iso, mapɛ wũ maɖi wũ igbɛ maɖi ta ɔ̃ iso ara fiɛ manyua wũ masɛ sɔ ka ɔtsɔra ɔkpi.
42010031	Iba sɔ Ɣaa sɔrɛdze ɔwɛ̃ to ɔfe i ɔri gɔmɔ iso. Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔnya ngɔ maɖi igbɛ i ɔri kuruɛ ne, ɔki isɛ isɛ ɔfe.
42010032	Iifɔ ɔwi, ɔ Levise ɔwɛ̃ ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃aki i mmɔ ɔfe. Gɔ ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔki i kuruɛ ɔfe.
42010033	Ɣɛɛ ɔ Samariase ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔfe i ɔri gɔmɔ iso ne, gɔ ɔba ɔ̃anya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔ̃ ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri.
42010034	Ɔbore ɔbo wũ, ɔsu nnɔĩ gu ndã ɔnukutu wũ aɣɛi ame ɔnyi wã kukaakɔ. Ɔputa ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔsia i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ bɔi iso. Ɔkɔ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu mafɔ kafɔkɔ̃ fiɛ ka ɔnyɔ wũ iso.
42010035	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔɖi sikã ɔtã mafɔ kafɔkɔ̃ nyɔisose ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘La ɔɔnyɔ wũ iso. Si loɔkpese loba ne, loatã-ɔ ira biara nɛ aledza inina i ɔ̃ iso.’ ”
42010036	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ mmaratedze gɔgbe sɔ, “I fɔ adzuni kanya ne, maturi itɛ magbe ndɛ̃ ne, nna afɔ aɖe sɔ ɔɖe ɔnyii ɔtã ngɔ lobo i mayukukpe nrɔɔ̃ ame?”
42010037	Ne mmaratedze to ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ngɔ lonyɔ wũ nnya.” Ne Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ wũ kɛlɛ si asɛ aabara ngbɔ.”
42010038	Gɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔrui maɣo ɔri ne, masɛ maabo ɔmagɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame. Mmɔ masɛ maatu ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Marta fiɛ ɔfɔ ma i ɔ̃ iyo ne.
42010039	Marta ba ɔnyiibi gɔ marɔ sɔ Maria. Ɔ̃ ne, ɔkpase ɔsɛ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔto ɔnɔ ɔ̃ ara wa ɔto ɔte.
42010040	Iyo karabara ɔɖuɖu ɔba kaasia i Marta ɔnɔwɛ̃ iso gɔ iɖaa wũ ɔtu. Ne ɔso ɔba ɔ̃aɣere Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, gɔ wũ ɔnyiibi ɔnyua iyo karabara ɔɖuɖu ɔsia me i iso ne, aibaɣere wũ kuira? Ɣere wũ sɔ ɔba ɔ̃abuai me!”
42010041	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “O Marta, ato aɖaa so i ara gbodzoo iso lo!
42010042	Ɣɛɛ ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ pɛ lonya sɔ aabie, fiɛ isɛɛ nɛmɔ i Maria ɔɖi gɔ kuwɛ̃ iisibafɔ wũ ne iso.”
42011001	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔwe i kakɔi kawɛ̃ ɔto ɔkparama kayi. Gɔ ɔro ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze mawɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, te bo kumɛgɔ boakparama kayi lɛ Yohanes ɔte ɔ̃ marasuãdze awe.”
42011002	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mito mikparama kayi ne, miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Bo ɔse, tã sɔ boarɔ fɔ iyere i kuwarɛ ame. Fɔ sigara iɖe si iba i bo ndɛ̃. Tã bobara fɔ kuɖɔɛ i karɔ̃ iso lɛ masɛ mabara i kato.
42011003	Tã bo ikpɛnɛ ame araɖea iyi biara.
42011004	Si asu bo akpi atsɛ bo, alasɔ bo wũ bosɛ bosu botsɛ ɔturi biara gɔ loɣɛrɛ bo. Daatã sɔ boabo i kalakanyɔ ame. Ɣɛɛ ɖi bo borɛgu i akpi ame.’ ”
42011005	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔsɛ ɔ̃ ɔlaa iyo ku kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃atara wũ sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔlaa, nyɛ abolo abo atɛ tã me,
42011006	alasɔ wũ ɔlaa ɔwɛ̃ ɔse i ɔri ɔba ɔ̃abo me kiniɔ, ɣɛɛ lona ku araɖea wa loatã wũ!’
42011007	“Si fɔ ɔlaa gɔmɔ ɔɣere-ɔ sɔ, ‘Daaba aaɖa me! Bo gu wũ mabi ka borɛ fiɛ boɔsɛ̃ akui ana. Loisibawo ɔledza ita iba iatã-ɔ kuira.’
42011008	Si iba ngbɔ ne, be iɖe aabara? Nto loɣere mi sɔ si kulaa kerekere ɔso ne, ɔ̃ibata. Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ aɣɛ atogu wũ iti itã ɔso ne, ɔto ɔ̃ata ɔtã-ɔ ira biara nɛ ato abie.
42011009	“Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ, mikarɛ ara si maatã mi ara, mibie ara si miana, mipɛ kukui kɔrɔ̃ si maasese mi iyo.
42011010	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkarɛ ira ne, ɔsɛ ɔfɔ. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbie ira ne, ɔsɛ ɔna ne, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkpura kukui kɔrɔ̃ ne, masɛ masese matã wũ.
42011011	“Fiɛ mi ma nɖe maɣese ne, mi ɔwɛ̃ aasu aɣɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔbi si ɔkarɛ wũ ikpɛ?
42011012	Ɣee ɔsu ɔboitɛtɛ ɔtã wũ si ɔkarɛ wũ ikɔkɔɣɔ?
42011013	Si mi ma nɖe makpibaradze kɔra ɣe kumɛgɔ miasu ara sɛɛ mitã mi mabi ne, iyɔ mi ɔse gɔ mpia i kato ɣɛɛ? Be ɔso ɔ̃ibasu ɔ̃ Siwarã Bielea ɔtã mma nto makarɛ wũ?”
42011014	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, Yesu to ɔsa siwarã lalaa dzɛ lotã sɔ ɔturi iito ɔwo ika ɔɖe. Ne gɔ siwarã dzɛmɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmumu gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔtsɛ ika iɖe ne ɔso ibara mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɣii.
42011015	Ɣɛɛ ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa igara Beelzebul ɔɖe lotã wũ ɔle gɔ ɔsu ɔto ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi.”
42011016	Mawɛ̃ ana ɔla Yesu manyɔ ne ɔso maɣere wũ sɔ ɔbara iwawãra ɔte sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
42011017	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɣe nnɛ mpia i ma adzuni ame. Ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Karɔ̃ biara ga maturi loɣɛɣɛ so mato makpɛ̃gu so ne, karɔ̃ gamɔ to kaakpese ikpakpi. Ngbɔ ame si iyo irere maturi ɔta maɣɛ so iso mato makpɛ̃gu so ne, iyo nɛmɔ to iasasame.
42011018	Ne ɔso si Ɔbosam sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔta siɣɛ so iso ne, nda i sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛmɔ aawo ɔya? Nto loɣɛ ngbɔ ala mito miɣɛ sɔ nto losa siwarã lalaa i Beelzebul iyere ame.
42011019	Si Beelzebul ɔle iso nto losa sɛ̃ ne, nna ɔle iso i mi masiaidze to masa siwarã lalaa maɖi i maturi ame? Mi mɔmɔ masiaidze to maatã mi ipɔ.
42011020	Ɣɛɛ si Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle ame nto losa siwarã lalaa ne, mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔba ɔ̃abo mi ndɛ̃.
42011021	“Si ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle ɔnyɔme akpadza ɔto ɔdzuɛ̃ ɔ̃ iyo ne, ɔ̃ kuira iibayu.
42011022	Ɣɛɛ si ngɔ mba ɔle ɔɖo wũ ɔba ɔ̃akpɛ̃gu wũ fiɛ ɔɖe wũ iso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɔ ɔ̃ akpakpɛ̃ra wa ɔɖuɖu ɔsu ɔto ɔdzuɛ̃ so ala ɔsu ɔ̃ karana ɔ̃aɣɛɣɛ ɔ̃ malaa.
42011023	“Ngɔ loiɣɛgu me ne, mitsue sɔ ɔta ɔɣɛ me iso gbaã. Ngɔ loito ɔsagu me ara kanya ne, ɔto ɔsamarã ara.
42011024	“Si masa siwarã lalaa maɖi i ɔturi ame ne, sisɛ sikɛlɛ siawe siki sibie kawekɔ̃ i kakorekɔ̃. Si siina kukakɔi ne, sisɛ siɣere so sɔ, ‘Loakpese lokɛlɛ iyo nɛ ame masa me maɖi.’
42011025	Ne ɔso siaba sianya sɔ maɔfiɛ iyo nɛmɔ ame maledza ira biara se kukaakɔ.
42011026	Iyɔ siakpese sikɛlɛ siakɔ siwarã lalaa aka akɔdzɛ mama dzɛ lonyanyarĩ siɖo sɛ̃ sibua so iso. Maabo i ngɔmɔ ame mawe, ne ɔso ɔ̃ kawirikɔ̃ to kaanyanyarĩ kaɖo ɔ̃ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.”
42011027	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔla kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “So aaɣɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loɣe-ɔ gu ngɔ lotã-ɔ inyɛ ameme!”
42011028	Ne Yesu to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mma nto manɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me fiɛ mato mabara i ne iso i so aaɣɔ!”
42011029	Gɔ maturi ma loki malɔ Yesu ɔɔsi mabua ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyɔ kumɛgɔ kiniɔgbe maturi ba ɔtile! Mato mabie awawãra sɔ maanya ɣɛɛ maibanya kuiwɛ̃ iɖo Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Yona ire igbã.
42011030	Kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Yona ɔɖe ikparĩ ɔtã Niniwe maturi ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ana aaɖe ikparĩ ɔta kiniɔgbe maturi ne.
42011031	Atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, Igararɔ̃go gɔ lobɔrɛ i bo karɔ̃ kala isɛ to ɔ̃ata ɔya ɔtã mi kiniɔgbe maturi ipɔ, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔri dzoroo ɔbɔrɛ i kayi iti tsɔra ɔba ɔ̃akã Salomo atɔ̃me wa ame i inɔgba pia atsue. Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ inɔgba loɖo Salomo ire pia i mi ndɛ̃ ngbe.
42011032	Niniwe maturi to maata maya masɔ̃ mi arɔĩ i katɔ̃ ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ i Yona ɔɣere ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, mafiniki i ma ara lalaa wa mato mabara ame. Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ ne, ngɔ loɖo Yona pia i mi ndɛ̃ ngbe!
42011033	“Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtsue ɔkãniɛ ɔsu ɔwɛrɛra ɣee ɔfu ara. Ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔtara ɔsia i ngbegɔ i maturi ma loabo iyo aanya kukaakɔ.
42011034	Ɔturi anɔmi nɖe ɔkaniɛ atã wũ. Si fɔ anɔmi to anya kukaakɔ ne, iyɔ fɔ ame ɔɖuɖu ɔkpa. Ɣɛɛ si fɔ anɔmi iito anya kukaakɔ ne, idududu sɔɔ̃ iɖe i fɔ ame.
42011035	Ne ɔso nyɔ sɔ aibatã ikpawaĩ nɛ mpia i fɔ ame ɔkpese idududu.
42011036	Si ikpawaĩ ɔyi i fɔ ame ɔɖuɖu fiɛ fɔ kukakɔi na i idududu ame ne, tsue sɔ fɔ iso ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpa lɛ kumɛgɔ matsue ɔkaniɛ masia i ira iso fiɛ iyo ɔɖuɖu ame ɔkpa awe.”
42011037	Gɔ Yesu ɔɖe ika ɔro ne, ɔ Farisise ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖe ara i ɔ̃ iyo. Ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i iyo ame sɔ maaɖe ara.
42011038	Ibara ɔ Farisise gɔmɔ ɣii gɔ ɔnya sɔ Yesu iifore nrɔɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i kubarara ɔte kanya fiɛ ɔtsɛ aɖera iɖe.
42011039	Ne ɔso Bosate ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mi ma Farisise ne, misɛ mifore mi aɖerɔi gu akɔi kama ɣɛɛ ne, mi ame ɔyigu ɔtile gu anyanyara ɔɖuɖu ibara.
42011040	Madzimifɔ! Ɣaa gɔ lobara ira kama ne, iiɖe ɔ̃ ame lobara kame ne?
42011041	Misu ira biara nɛ mpia i mi arɔi gu akɔi ame mitã mawɛrɛba si mi ira biara aakpa sekelee i Ɣaa katɔ̃.
42011042	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma Farisise! Misɛ miɖi mi araɖea ika weova ta aposarɛbi, ibura, sikɔma agbãagbã mitã Ɣaa. Ɣɛɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miibaɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso fiɛ miiɖɔɛ Ɣaa ana. Ara wagbe ikote sɔ miasu mibua i nwa mimɔɛ̃ mito iso ne. Ɣɛɛ miibanyua kuiwɛ̃ misɛ.
42011043	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma Farisise! Alasɔ misɛ mibie nsɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa i mi kusarɛkɔ̃. Misɛ mibie sɔ maturi si maya mi ku karɔ̃ ibɔso i kuɣa ame.
42011044	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi, alasɔ mise lɛ akpibiɔ wa maisɛ ikpo fiɛ maturi sɛ maki i wã iso i idaatsue ame.”
42011045	Mmɔ i mmaratedze ɔwɛ̃ i ma ndɛ̃ to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, Si aɣɛ ngbɔ ne, ato atia bo bo wũ.”
42011046	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze ana. Ato wa i maturi iibawo ɔsore ne, wã aɖe misu misorera ma fiɛ miito mibara adzuni sɔ miabuai ma masore wã.
42011047	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi alasɔ mitsue Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma loɔkpi akpibiɔ, ɣɛɛ ne, mi mawa loɖoe ma.
42011048	Fiɛ mi mɔmɔ to mitɔrã misia sɔ ara wa i mi mawa ɔbara ne, apia mi isoɣɔ. Maɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, ne mi wũ miɔtsue ma akpibiɔ ne.
42011049	Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa iwola ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loasese wũ kanyamaɖidze gu makpabo i ma ndɛ̃, maaɖoe mawɛ̃, makpɛ̃gu mawɛ̃.’
42011050	Ne ɔso kiniɔgbe maturi ɔɖuɖu ne, mato maakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma ɔɖuɖu maɔɖoe, ita i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iba iabo kiniɔ.
42011051	Ita i ɔwi gɔ maɖoe Abel isɛ iabo Zakaria gɔ maɖoe i isɔrɛkasege gu ngbegɔ marɔ sɔ kasekelekɔ̃ ndɛ̃. Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ kiniɔgbe maturi kutsue i ma ɔɖuɖu iti!
42011052	“Ndzo miɖe mitã mi mmara matedze! Alasɔ iyo nɛ ame i iwola pia ne, misɛ̃ ne akui misɛ. Mi mɔmɔ ne, misɛ̃ sɔ miito mibo i ne ame. Mma ana nto mabie sɔ maabo ne, mitɛ̃ ma ɔri sɔ madaabo.”
42011053	Gɔ Yesu ɔrui i mmɔ ne, ma Farisise gu mmara matedze ɔnagu wũ sikpã gbaã matsɛ wũ atɔ̃me ikpadzɛ̃ gu i ara agbãagbã iso.
42011054	Mabie ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ inyakpi irere fiɛ maaya i ne iso matã wũ ipɔ.
42012001	Gɔ maturi kukpi kukpi ɔba maasakanya fiɛ mato malili so manene so ne, Yesu ɔtsɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze iɣere sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so i ma Farisise mila ara wa loakpɔkpɔtɔra maturi iso.
42012002	Ira biara nɛ mafu ara ne, mato maabusi ne. Fiɛ ira biara nɛ mabara i iwɛrɛ ame to iare kayi.
42012003	Ne ɔso ibiara nɛ maɣɛ i idududu ame ne, ito iaba i inyamɔ. Awɛrɛra gu ara wa maɣɛ i iyo kame ɔɖuɖu ne, mato maapɛ wã imomo.
42012004	“Wũ malaa, nto loɣere mi sɔ midaanigã mma loaɖoe siturina fiɛ ne kama ne, maisibawo kuira ɔbara.
42012005	Ɔturi gɔ ikote sɔ mianigã ne, loaɖi wũ lote mi. Minigã Ɣaa gɔ si ɔ̃ɔɖoe ɔturi ɔro ne, ɔba ɔle ana sɔ ɔ̃asu wũ ɔpia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame. Loaɣere mi sɔ ɔ̃ lokote sɔ mianigã ne.
42012006	Iiɖe kupɛrɛ kunyɔ masɛ marɔdɛ̃ kunagini kuru? Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa anɔ iisɛ ata i kukawɛ̃ iso.
42012007	Mi ati siwɛrɛ̃ kɔra ne, Ɣaa ɣe sɛ̃ kusime. Ne ɔso ne, midaanigã alasɔ mifɔ kuɣa miɖo kunagini gbodzoo.
42012008	“Loto loɣere mi kukaakɔ sɔ ngɔ loaya i maturi katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ wũ ɔre ɔɖe ne, Mme Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi mme wũ nto loaɣɛ ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ i ɔ̃ iso.
42012009	Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loasɛ̃ me i maturi katɔ̃ ne, Mme Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi mme wũ nto loasɛ̃ wũ i Ɣaa makpabo anɔ.
42012010	Ɔturi biara gɔ loaɣɛ inyakpi i mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ɔtsɛ wũ. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loaɣɛ imusuora i Siwarã Bielea iso ne, Ɣaa iibasu ɔtsɛ wũ.
42012011	“Si makpadzɛ̃ mi makɛlɛgu ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɣee makpakpa ɣee magara katɔ̃ sɔ maaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me ne, midaamararã so sɔ be miasɛ miaɣɛ ɣee nda miaɖi so kanya.
42012012	Alasɔ Siwarã Bielea to siate mi nnɛ miaɣɛ si ɔwi gɔmɔ ɔɔɣo.”
42012013	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃ i mmɔ ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, ɣere wũ ɔnyiibi sɔ ɔtã boɣɛ so bo ɔse ara wa ɔnyua ɔsɛ bo.”
42012014	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Wũ ɔturi, nna lobara me atɔ̃meɣɛdze gu ngɔ loaɣɛ mi ara?”
42012015	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ, “Minyɔ tuee si minyɔ so i kanɔbɛbɛ biara iso, alasɔ ɔturi ngbã mɔmɔ na i ɔ̃ karana ga ɔba ame.”
42012016	Ne Yesu to ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ, “Ranase ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ karɔ̃ lolɛ kukaakɔ ɔso ɔ̃ ɔraɖui ɔbua ɔlɛ gbaã.
42012017	Ne ɔso ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Gɔ nna ngbegɔ loafere wũ ɔraɖui kiniɔ ne, be loabara?
42012018	“ ‘Nnɛ loabara nɖe sɔ, loabiɛbiɛ wũ siwu lotsue siɣɛtɛ dzɛ lomɔ siɖo ndzɛgbe. Iyɔ loana ngbegɔ loafere wũ ɔraɖui ɔɖuɖu.
42012019	Loaɣere so sɔ, “Iti ɔbua ilɛ me. Ɔraɖui gɔ lona to ɔ̃ase akɔ akɔ. Loawarã, loɖe ara, lonɛ ara, lona isoɣɔ.” ’
42012020	“Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Fɔ dzimifɔ! Kasɛ̃ gagbe ame nto loafɔ fɔ ngbã ne. Nna loaɖe ara wa ɔɖuɖu asakanya asɛ so ngbe?’ ”
42012021	Ne Yesu ɔwirigu ma sɔ, “Ngbɔ iase itã ngɔ lotã karana ɔfu so ɣɛɛ ɔna kuira i Ɣaa anɔ ne.”
42012022	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ne ɔso nto loɣere mi sɔ midaamarã so i mi ngbã, nnɛ miaɖe gu nnɛ miapia iso.
42012023	Ngbã ɔfɔ kuɣa miɖo aɖera fiɛ sosina ɔfɔ kuɣa siɖo arapia.
42012024	Minyɔ kukparodza gɔ i ɔwiri ame, kuisɛ kupɛ ɔraɖui, ngbɔ ame kuisɛ kusɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui ana ne. Kuna siwu gu awumi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã kɔ̃ aɖera. Mi ne, mifɔ kuɣa miɖo kukparodza kokooko.
42012025	Mi nna loawo ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔbua i ɔ̃ agbanayi iso iki i imararãso ame?
42012026	Si miibawo kuira ɔbara i ara wiriwiria wagbe iso ne, iyɔ midaamararã so i ara mama iso.
42012027	“Minyɔ kumɛgɔ adziri sɛ alɛ ɔnyɔ si afere aɣɔ̃la. Aisɛ ata ɖɔti ɣee awe ɔkati atã so. Ɣɛɛ loɣere mi sɔ, Igara Salomo kɔra si ɔkɛrɛ so ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔlɛ ɔnyɔ lɛ kudziri gɔ lofere aɣɔ̃la.
42012028	Ɣaa nsɛ ɔkɛrɛ sikua ngbɔ. Sikua dzɛ mpia nɔme kɔrãkaɖe maɔkpɛ̃ sɛ̃ mafere i ɔtɔ ame matsuedza. Si Ɣaa to ɔnyɔ sikua iso ngbɔ ne, ɔ̃ibabara ɔtã mi ma loɖo Sikua? Be ɔso i mi kafɔkaɖe ɔfoforo ngbɔ?
42012029	Ne ɔso midaasu mi ɔtu misia i nnɛ miaɖe ɣee mianɛ iso, midaamararã so i ne iso.
42012030	Alasɔ mma loifɔ Ɣaa maɖe ne, ara wagbe iso masu ma ati masia ne. Mi ɔse ɣe ara wa ɔɖuɖu lonya mi.
42012031	Ɣɛɛ ne, mila miɔbu iti ame i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso si ɔ̃asu ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbua mi.
42012032	“Wũ masiaidze ma loisi, midaanigã. Alasɔ Ɣaa isoɣɔ iɖe sɔ ɔ̃atã mi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
42012033	Misu mi iso ara mirɔdɛ̃ si mibara mi karana karabara i mawɛrɛba iso. Mibie sikã akpo wa loisɛ anina misɛ so i kato. Mmɔ ne, kaase kpoo, kuwɛ̃ iibapɛgu fiɛ kaibaro ana. Alasɔ yukukpe iibawo mmɔ ɔbo fiɛ makorokpɛ ma nsɛ manina ara ana iibawo mmɔ ɔbo.
42012034	Alasɔ ngbegɔ i fɔ karana se ne, mmɔ i fɔ ɔtu ana aawe ne.
42012035	“Miledza so mitã ira biara nɛ loaba si mi sikaniɛ ana si sidaanyi
42012036	lɛ maɖabo ma nto manyɔ ma ɔkɔse gɔ ngba ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aba. Fiɛ si ɔba ɔ̃akpura kukui kɔrɔ̃ ne, maasese wũ ɔluwɛ̃.
42012037	Maɖabo mamɔ aana isoɣɔ si ma ɔkɔse aaba ɔ̃anya ma sɔ manyɔ tuee mato manyɔ ɔ̃ iba ɔri. Nto loɣere mi sɔ, ɔ̃akpasa ɔkati ɔtã masɛ i karɔ̃, ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔtã ma araɖea sɔ maɖe.
42012038	So abua siɣɔ ma si ɔ̃aba ku kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ɣee ɔɖesɛrã ɔba ɔ̃anya sɔ manyɔ ne, sirɛ iisu ma.
42012039	Kiniɔ ne, mitsue sɔ si iyosate ɣe ɔwi gɔ ame i yukukpe aaba ɔ̃ayu wũ ne, ɔ̃ibatã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔbiɛ ɔ̃ iyo ɔbo i kame.
42012040	Ne ɔso mi wũ ne, minyɔ tuee alasɔ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, to loaba loabɔrɛ mi iso ku ɔwi gɔ miito minyɔ ɔri.”
42012041	Mmɔ iɖe i Petro to ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, bo kere ato apɛ igbã nɛgbe ɛɛbɛrɛ maturi ɔɖɔɖu ato?”
42012042	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔɖabo gɔ mba iwola fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso ne, ɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ɔkɔse sɛ ɔsu ɔbara maɖabo tsɔra nyɔisose sɔ ɔ̃atã ma araɖea i ɔwi sɛɛ iso ne.
42012043	Nyɔ, so to siaɣɔ ɔɖabo gɔmɔ gbaã, si ɔ̃ ɔkɔse ɔba ɔ̃anya sɔ ɔto ɔbara ngbɔ!
42012044	Gbaã ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔkɔse gɔmɔ to ɔ̃asu ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔsɛra i ɔ̃ ara ɔɖuɖu kanya.
42012045	Ɣɛɛ si ɔɖabo gɔmɔ ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔkɔse to ɔ̃awe ina ɔpã i ɔri gɔ ɔkpa ame,’ Ne ɔso ɔtsɛ ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ, ɔrɛ̃ ndã, ɔpɛ maɖabo tsɔra, marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go ɔɖuɖu ne,
42012046	ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃abo ku ɔwi gɔ i ɔɖabo iito ɔnyɔ wũ ɔri. Mmɔ ne, ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue i matsuelese ndɛ̃.
42012047	“Ɔɖabo gɔ nɣe ira nɛ i ɔ̃ ɔkɔse sɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔbara ɔtã wũ ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbara ne, ipɛ to iabo wũ gbaã.
42012048	Ɣɛɛ ɔɖabo gɔ loiɣe nnɛ i ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔbie sɔ ɔbara fiɛ ɔbara nnɛ lokote itã ipɛ ne, ɔ̃ ipɛ iibafe isi. Ngɔ matã ara gbodzoo ne, mato maakarɛ ara gbodzoo mabɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ngɔ ana matã ara abua afe isi ne, ngbɔ ame maakarɛ mabɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne.
42012049	“Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ ɔtɔ losu lobɔ kayiiso. Fiɛ wũ kayiri tee ɔtɔ gɔmɔ ɔɔwara.
42012050	Ɣaa itupie iwɛ̃ to iaba me iso fiɛ lona iwarã kuiwɛ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ inyɛwe nɛgbe ɔwi ɔfe ɔro.
42012051	Mibu sɔ isobuɛ iɖe losu lobɔ kayiiso? Ooɣo! Iiɖe isobuɛ losu lobɔ ɣɛɛ iɣɛɣɛ so iɖe.
42012052	Ita i kiniɔ ne, iyo nɛ ame i maturi iru pia ne, mato maata maya so iso. Ma inyɔ to maata maya itɛ iso fiɛ itɛ ana to maata maya i inyɔ iso.
42012053	Ɔse to ɔ̃ata ɔya i ɔ̃ ɔbi birɛrɛĩ iso fiɛ ɔbirɛrɛĩ to ɔ̃ata ɔya ɔ̃ ɔse iso. Mabi manyi to maata maya ma mabi birɔ̃gomi iso fiɛ mabirɔ̃gomi ana to maata maya ma manyi iso. Marã manyi to maata maya ma mabire iso fiɛ mabire ana to maata maya ma marã manyi iso.”
42012054	Yesu ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Si minya sɔ adɔdɔ to abɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ ne, misɛ miɣɛ sɔ kado to ɔ̃apɛ, fiɛ isɛ iba ngbɔ ana.
42012055	Si minya sɔ ɔwiri to ɔkpɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kala isɛ ne, misɛ miɣɛ sɔ awururu ka aba fiɛ isɛ iba ngbɔ.
42012056	Maladze! Misɛ miwo kuɖokpo ɔnyɔ ɔɣɛ kumɛgɔ i kayi aase, ɣɛɛ miito miwo ɔwi gɔ ame mipia ɔnya ɔɖi ite!
42012057	“Be ɔso miibabo i ara ame minyɔ sɔ imele nlɛ gɔ miabara?
42012058	Si fɔ gu ɔturi ɔna atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔkɔ-ɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ne, ki i ɔri biara iso si aledza mi gu wũ inyɔ ndɛ̃ fiɛ miabo atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃asu-ɔ ɔtã matɔ̃meɣɛdze, ma wũ masu-ɔ matã mma nsɛ mamɔɛ̃ maturi mamɔɛ̃-ɔ mapia i iyo.
42012059	Fiɛ lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ ato aawe i iyo karɛkɔ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ atã kuso gɔ ato kapɛrɛ tsɔra aro.”
42013001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mmɔ ɔɣere Yesu kumɛgɔ i Pilato ɔɖoe Galilea maturi mawɛ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ mato mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa.
42013002	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mifɔ miɖe sɔ Galilea maturi mamɔ nɖe makpibaradze maɖo ɔso fiɛ maɖoe ma ngbɔ?
42013003	Ooɣo, iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe! Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ si miinyua ara lalaa ibara ne, mi wũ ngbɔ ame miakpi ne.
42013004	Maturi iweo-farafana ma i Siloa iyo kɔlɛa nɛmɔ ɔbiɛ ifu ɣɛɛ? Mifɔ miɖe sɔ ma nɖe makpibaradze maɖo mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Yerusalem?
42013005	Ooɣo, iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe! Nto loɣere mi sɔ si miifiniki minyua mi akpi ibara ne, ngbɔ ame i mi ɔɖuɖu aakpi ne.”
42013006	Yesu ɔpɛ igbã nɛgbe sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ lopia kuɖedziri i ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame. Ɔsɛ kuɖedziri gɔgbe katɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃abie kɔ̃ abi, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ina kuiwɛ̃.
42013007	Mmɔ ɔɣere ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ kakpɛkɔ̃ iso sɔ, ‘Akɔ atɛ sɔɔ̃ loɔba loabie adziribi i kudziri gɔgbe iso fiɛ loina kuiwɛ̃ ne. Ɖaɛ kɔ̃ alasɔ kuto kunina karɔ̃ ga iso kuɣɛ.’
42013008	“Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ kakpɛkɔ̃ iso ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, ‘Bokɔse, tã botã kɔ̃ ikɔ iwɛ̃ saã bobua bonyɔ. Loakuri kɔ̃ kayirinɔ lofere ara wa loatã karɔ̃ iɖa lonyɔ.
42013009	Si kuɣɔ̃ abi ne, iyɔ ilɛ. Ɣɛɛ si kuiɣɔ̃ abi ne, boawo kɔ̃ ɔɖaɛ ɔpɛyu.’ ”
42013010	Iwarãyi iwɛ̃ iso ne, Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate ara i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃.
42013011	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔwe i mmɔ gɔ siwarã lalaa ɔɔnyɛra wũ akɔ aweo-farafana sɔɔ̃. Siwarã dzɛgbe ɔtã sɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔkɔ, ɔ̃isɛ ɔwo ɔta ɔya tɔrɔrɔ.
42013012	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya wũ ne, ɔkpere wũ ɔɣere sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, ɔɔna isosarɛ!”
42013013	Yesu ɔsu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔsia wũ iso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ko lota ɔya tɔrɔrɔ ɔtsɛ Ɣaa ile.
42013014	Sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔkpakpa gɔ nto ɔnyɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ iso gbaã sɔ Yesu ɔsa nyɛse ku Iwarãyi iso. Ne ɔso ɔɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ, “Boba ayi akuɔ wa boasu bobara bo karabara ne ɔso si irere to mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere fiɛ ɔto ɔbie sɔ masa wũ ne, ɔba i ayi wamɔ ame ne iiɖe Iwarãyi iso!”
42013015	Mmɔ i Bosate to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Mi maladze, manantsuĩ gu mafirimu ma nsɛ mabara mi karabara ne, mi nna loikurisi ma i siwɛ̃ ame sɔ makɛlɛ ndu kanɛkɔ̃?
42013016	Ɣɛɛ ne, Abraham ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ gɔ i Ɔbosam ɔpia ɔnyɛ akɔ aweo farafana ngbe ne, iikote sɔ maasa wũ ku Iwarãyi?”
42013017	Itɔ̃me nɛ i Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbe ɔtã sɔ kunuarɛ ɔkpɛ̃ ɔ̃ matsirise ɣɛɛ maturi tsɔra ɔna isoɣɔ i awawãra wa ɔto ɔbara ɔɖuɖu iso.
42013018	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Miɣe nnɛ maasu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ makateragu? Be iɖe boasu bokateragu iakote?
42013019	Ise lɛ idziribi kosoi iwɛ̃ nɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔsu ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛ i ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame. Gɔ ɔraɖui gɔgbe ɔre ne, ɔmɔ ɔkpese kudziri siare gɔ kurodzai aabara ayo i kɔ̃ akpa ame.”
42013020	Yesu ɔledza ma igbã mama ipɛ iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ sɛ siɣa lɛ ngbe.
42013021	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔsu inyagɛ̃ kua ɔpia i mmɔre mɛ losi ame, ɔkpɔkɔtɔ ɔsakanya gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃.”
42013022	Yesu ɔwe ɔki i simagɛ̃ gu ngorowase ame ɔto ɔte maturi ara ku ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem.
42013023	Mmɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Tete, maturi kɛkɛĩ kere loana iɖi?” Ne Yesu to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ,
42013024	“Pia kubɛ si aki i kayogodɔ̃ mɔmɔrĩa ame. Alasɔ maturi gbodzoo to maabie sɔ maaki i mmɔ mabo ɣɛɛ maibawo ɔbo.
42013025	Ɔwi to ɔba gɔ iyosate to ɔ̃ata ɔmɔɛ̃ kukui ɔsɛ̃. Iyɔ mi ma lokuti miɣɛ i kayoma to miatsɛ kukui ikpukpura iɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete, sese bo iyo!’ “Ɣɛɛ iyosate gɔmɔ to ɔ̃aɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loiɣe mi!’
42013026	“Iyɔ mito miaɣɛ sɔ, ‘Bo gu-ɔ ɔɖe ara bonɛ ara fiɛ ate ara i bo ɔmagɛ̃ ame!’ ”
42013027	“Ɣɛɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza mi iɣere sɔ, ‘Loiɣe ngbegɔ mibɔrɛ! Mirui me i kɔrɛ, mi ara lalaa mabaradze ɔɖuɖu.’
42013028	“Kaku gu inyɛwe aaba si minya Abraham gu Isak gu Yakob gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ɣɛɛ Ɣaa aasa mi sɔ midaabo.
42013029	Maturi to maabɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ gu kɔ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ maba. Maabɔrɛ i kato gu kala isɛ maba maasakanya i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ maɖe ara manɛ ara.
42013030	Maturi mawɛ̃ ma nɖe matsɔra to maakpese maɖeakatɔ̃. Fiɛ maɖeakatɔ̃ mawɛ̃ to maakpese matsɔra.”
42013031	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maba maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bara mala si abɔrɛ ngbe akɛlɛ kakɔi mama ala Igara Herodes to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe-ɔ.”
42013032	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ miaɣere raninadze gɔmɔ sɔ, ‘Nɔme ne, loasa siwarã lalaa loɖi i maturi ame, losa manyɛse isɛ iabo kɔrãkaɖe. Ikpɛnɛ tɛare iso ne, loaro wũ karabara.’
42013033	Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, ita i nɔme isɛ iabo kɔranɔwɛ̃ ne, loaɣo ɔri. Alasɔ iikote sɔ maaɖoe Ɣaa kanyaɖidze i kakɔi mama iɖo Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
42013034	“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Fɔ gɔ maturi nto maɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, fiɛ masɛ mabara mma i Ɣaa ɔpia katɔ̃me i fɔ kɔrɛ ɔtile mapɛ ma ata. Ɔwi gbodzoo ame loɔwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ losɔ̃-ɔ sɔ loafu fɔ maturi lɛ kɔkɔ ɔnyi sɛ ɔwarɛ ɔ̃ abue ɔfu ɔ̃ mabi ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ lodaabara.
42013035	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe atsue. Nto loɣere-ɔ gbaã sɔ ne, aisibanya me gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ miala kulu miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maale ngɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame!’ ”
42014001	Iwarãyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔsɛ ma Farisise ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ iyo gɔ makpere wũ sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖe ara. Mma lowe mmɔ ɔkarã anɔ i ɔ̃ iso totoroo.
42014002	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba loɣe ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
42014003	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ mmara matedze gu ma Farisise mamɔ sɔ, “Bo mmara ne, mitã bo ɔri sɔ bosa ɔnyɛ ku Iwarãyi ɛɛbɛrɛ miitã bo ɔri?”
42014004	Ɣɛɛ maiwo kuira ɔɣɛ. Ne Yesu ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe kɔrɔ̃ ɔsa wũ fiɛ ɔɖi wũ ɔri ne.
42014005	Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ndɛ̃ nna ɔbi ɣee nantsuĩ loakpase ɔbo i ibu ɣee iwo ame ku Iwarãyi fiɛ ɔ̃ibaɖi wũ i Iwarãyi nɛmɔ iso?”
42014006	Ɣɛɛ maiwo wũ itɔ̃me mmuai ɔtã.
42014007	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya kumɛgɔ i mma makpere mabɔ aɖera kaɖekɔ̃ i mmɔ to makpɛ̃ mabie nsɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa ne, ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ,
42014008	“Si ɔturi ɔkpere-ɔ sɔ ba ɔ̃ ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃ ne, daasɛ aasɛ i kasɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa pelepele. Alasɔ iawo ɔba sɔ ɔkpere ɔmama gɔ lokɔlɛ ɔɖo-ɔ ana ɔbɔ i mmɔ.
42014009	Daatã sɔ ngɔ lokpere mi inyɔ ɔɖuɖu aaba ɔ̃aɣere-ɔ sɔ, ‘Tã ngɔgbe si ɔba ɔ̃asɛ i mmɔ.’ Iyɔ ka aba aata aasɛ i katsɔrakɔ̃ gɔ kunuarɛ amɔɛ̃-ɔ.
42014010	Ɣɛɛ si makpere-ɔ makɛlɛgu kakɔi ne, sɛ aasɛ i iyara kosoi iso. Si ngɔ lokpere-ɔ ɔbɔ ɔba ɔ̃anya-ɔ ne, ɔ̃aɣere-ɔ sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔlaa, ta ba sɛ i iyara siare nɛgbe iso.’ Nnɛgbe to iakɔlɛ-ɔ kato i maturi mama ma makpere mabɔ ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
42014011	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ so kato ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ wũ karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔturi biara gɔ lobɔ so karɔ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔlɛ wũ kato.”
42014012	Ne Yesu to ɔfiniki ɔɣere ngɔ lokpere wũ ɔbɔ araɖea kaɖekɔ̃ sɔ, “Si ato akpere maturi sɔ maba maaɖe aɖera i fɔ iyo ne, daakpere fɔ malaa ɣee fɔ manyiibi ɣee fɔ malɛdze ma mba karana. Alasɔ ma wũ mato maakpere-ɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ akpere ma sɔ maba maaɖe ara. Si iba ngbɔ ne, tsue sɔ maɔbara mati-ɔ kuso.
42014013	Ɣɛɛ si ato ana isoɣɔ nɛgbe igbã ne, kpere mawɛrɛba gu mma lofɛfɛ̃ mafu maisɛ mawo ɔsɛ, mma lokpi kasɛkasɛ gu manɔbiɛdze.
42014014	Nnɛgbe loatã Ɣaa ɔfere-ɔ kusɛkusɛ ne. Alasɔ mmamɔ iibawo-ɔ kuso kukuwɛ̃ ɔtã. Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã-ɔ kuso ku iyi nɛ i maturi sekelea aata mabɔrɛ i makpise ame.”
42014015	Gɔ mma nsi mato maɖe ara ɔwɛ̃ ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “So to siaɣɔ mma loaɖe ara i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gbaã!”
42014016	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpere maturi gbodzoo sɔ maba ɔ̃ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃ maba maaɖe ara.
42014017	Ɔwi gɔ maɔwa aɖera maro fiɛ ira biara ɔɔkote ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ maɖabo sɔ masɛ maaɣere mma ɔɖuɖu ɔkpere sɔ ka maba alasɔ ira biara ɔɔkote!
42014018	“Ɣɛɛ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ kafara itu. Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɣere ɔɖabo sɔ, ‘Loɣa karɔ̃ kawɛ̃, ne ɔso losɛ loanyɔ kã gɔ itã sɔ loibawo ɔba.’ ”
42014019	“Ɔmama ana sɔ, ‘Loɣa manantsuĩ iweo ma loakpɛ̃ matã me i wũ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame. Ɔri ka nto loɣo sɔ loanyɔ kumɛgɔ maawo karabara ɔbara ne ɔso loibawo ɔba.’ ”
42014020	“Ɔmama ana sɔ, ‘Kiniɔ ame loyiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ne ɔso loibawo ɔba.’
42014021	“Ɔɖabo ɔkpese ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere ɔ̃ ɔkɔse ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu. Sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔkɔse gbaã ne ɔɣere ɔɖabo sɔ, ‘Pɛ siwa kɛlɛ siri iso gu amamai ɔɖuɖu ame i simagɛ̃ ame si akpere mawɛrɛba gu maturi ma lofɛfɛ̃ mafu gu manɔbiɛdze gu mma lokpi kasɛkasɛ ɔɖuɖu abɔ.’
42014022	“Ɔɖabo ɔsɛ ɔ̃abara ngbɔ, ne ɔkpese ɔba ɔ̃aɣere ɔ̃ ɔkɔse sɔ ɔɔkpere ma ɔbɔ ɣɛɛ ne, kasɛkɔ̃ ɔkuti kase gbodzoo ana.
42014023	Mmɔ i ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔledza wũ iɣere sɔ, ‘Kɛlɛ aaki i sivurã iso gu nsɛkɔ̃ si akpere maturi abɔ sɔ wũ iyo ɔɖuɖu ayi ku maturi.
42014024	Nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ mma ɔɖuɖu lokpere sɔ tee maba wũ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃ ne, ma kuwɛ̃ iibati wũ aɖera ɔnyɔ!’ ”
42014025	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame gɔ maturi gbodzoo siai Yesu ne, ɔfiniki ɔɣere ma sɔ,
42014026	“Ɔbiara gɔ loasiai me ne, ɔ̃ibawo wũ siaidze ɔɖe si ɔ̃iɖɔɛ me ɔɖo ta ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ ɔre gu mabi gu ɔ̃ manyiibi gu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ.
42014027	Ngɔ loisore inyɛwe ɔnyigbã ɔsiai wũ nsɛgbai ne, ɔ̃ibawo wũ rasuãdze ɔɖe.
42014028	“Si ɔrere to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃atsue iyo siare ne, ɔ̃aɖe katɔ̃ ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ ɔbu ara wa ɔɖuɖu lonya gu wã kuɣa ɔnyɔ si ɔba sikã ɔ̃awo ɔtsue ɔro tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃asɛ karɔ̃.
42014029	Si ɔ̃ibara ngbɔ ne, si ɔ̃ɔpia ne i karɔ̃ ame ɔro ne, ɔ̃anyua iyoku ɔɣedza. Mma ɔɖuɖu lonya iyoku nɛgbe to maatsɛ wũ ima iɣɛ sɔ,
42014030	‘Ngɔgbe ɔtsɛ iyo itsue ɣɛɛ ɔ̃iwiri.’
42014031	“Si igara ɔrere to ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃akpɛ̃ kakpã ku makpakpɛ̃dze kukpi kuweo fiɛ ma gu igara gɔ loakpɛ̃ ba makpakpɛ̃dze kukpi sinyɔ ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃abu iti ame ɔnyɔ tɔtɔ si sɔ ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ ɔba aawo ɔ̃ tsirise gɔmɔ ɔkpɛ̃gu.
42014032	Si ɔnya sɔ ɔna ɔle ngbɔ ne, ɔ̃apia ɔ̃ maturi masɛ maasarɛgu igara nyɔare gɔmɔ matã wũ iti sɔ ɔ̃ibawo wũ ɔkpɛ̃gu ne ɔtã mafere kanya ndu tɔtɔ kɔra fiɛ igara gɔmɔ aaba kakpãtɔ̃.”
42014033	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngbɔ ame i mi ndɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ rasuãdze ɔɖe si ɔ̃isɛ̃ so pelepele ne.
42014034	“Mma ba ɔmɛrɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ si me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ɔɔro ne, aisibawo ɔri kuwɛ iso ɔki ɔpia me ɔmɛrɛ̃.
42014035	Miiɖe ira nɛ maasu mapia karɔ̃ iɖa ɣee mafere me i aku kawirikɔ̃. Maasu me masa mawiri. “Ne ɔso mi ma mba atsue si minɔ nnɛ nto loɣɛ!”
42015001	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, ma lampofɔdze gu akpi mama mabaradze ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ sɔ si maba maanɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.
42015002	Ma Farisise gu mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ɔtsɛ wũ iɣɛtɛ iɣereso sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe sɛ ɔfɔ makpibaradze ɔɖegu ma ta aɖera!”
42015003	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ,
42015004	“Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ba masɛrɛ kulafa fiɛ ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔyu ne, be ɔ̃abara? Ɔ̃ibanyua kasiwɛ̃-kaiwɛ̃ ɔɣɛdza i aɖera kaɖekɔ̃ ɔ̃anyɔnyɔ ngɔ loyu gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃anya wũ?
42015005	Fiɛ si ɔnya wũ ne, ɔ̃ana isoɣɔ gbaã ɔputa wũ ɔsia i iloi.
42015006	Ɔsore wũ ɔbɔ iyo ɔba ɔ̃akpere ɔ̃ mala gu magbamikui ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘So ɔɣɔ me gbaã alasɔ lonya wũ sɛrɛ gɔ loyu ne ɔso minagu me isoɣɔ!’
42015007	Nto loɣere mi sɔ ngbɔ ame i isoɣɔ siare aawe i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu i kpibaradze ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ lofiniki i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame ɔso iɖo maturi kasiwɛ̃-kaiwɛ̃ ma loinya ifiniki ne.
42015008	“Si ɔrɔ̃go ba sikãfudza abi aweo fiɛ ɔyura iwɛ̃ ne, be mifɔ miɖe sɔ ɔ̃abara? Ɔ̃atsue ɔkaniɛ ɔfiɛ ɔ̃ iyo ɔɖuɖu ame ɔnyɔnyɔ siyokã ɔɖuɖu ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃anya ne.
42015009	Fiɛ si ɔnya ne ne, ɔto ɔ̃akpere ɔ̃ mala gu magbamikui ɔsirakanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘So ɔɣɔ me gbaã alasɔ lonya wũ sikã ibi nɛ loyu ne ɔso minagu me isoɣɔ.’
42015010	Nto loɣere mi sɔ gbaã ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa makpabo ana aana isoɣɔ i kpibaradze ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ lofiniki ɔso ne.”
42015011	Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe mabirɛrɛĩ inyɔ.
42015012	Kosore ɔba ɔ̃atu ɔ̃ ɔse ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, su wũ kaɖekɔ̃ ga loaɣo me si akpi tã me kiniɔ.’ Ne ɔso ɔ̃ ɔse ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ara ɔtã mabi ma inyɔɔ.
42015013	“Ayi arɛ̃saã kama ne, kosore ɔsu ɔ̃ ara wa loɣo wũ ɔɖuɖu ɔrɔdɛ̃ ɔfɔ sikã ɔpia i ɔkoto ame ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ karɔ̃ dzoroa kawɛ̃ iso ngbegɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ ngbã nyanyarĩa ɔnina ɔ̃ sikã ɔɖuɖu.
42015014	Ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔnina ira biara nɛ ɔba ɔro kama ne, kukã siare kuwɛ̃ ɔbo i karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔɖuɖu iso gɔ itã sɔ kukã ɔkpɛ̃ wũ gbaã.
42015015	Ne ɔso ɔsu so ɔsɛ ɔ̃atã karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃abara karabara igbã biara ga ɔ̃atã wũ. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ ɔsese wũ sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃anyɔ ɔ̃ makparako iso i akorowa awɛ̃.
42015016	Kukã ɔso ne, ɔbie sɔ si ɔna makparako aɖera wa ɔto ɔtã ma ne, tee ɔ̃aɖe fiɛ ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ iitã wũ.
42015017	“Kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔledza ikpese ibo so ame ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔse maɖabo ma nsɛ mabara ɔ̃ karabara kɔra ne, masɛ mana aɖera maɖe mami akuti. Ne mme losi ngbe kukã to kuɖoe me ne!
42015018	Loata lokɛlɛ tete kɔrɛ losɛ loaɣere wũ sɔ, “Tete, lobara ikpi, loɣɛrɛ ɔ gu Ɣaa.
42015019	Loisikote sɔ aakpere me sɔ fɔ ɔbi. Ɣɛɛ su me bara lɛ fɔ maɖabo ma nsɛ mabara fɔ karabara ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃.” ’
42015020	Ne ɔta ɔmala ɔ̃ ara ɔɣo ɔ̃ ɔse kɔrɛ ɔri ne. “Gɔ ɔsɛ dzoroo ne, ɔ̃ ɔse ɔnya wũ ɔɖi ite sɔ ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔɖe nto ɔba. Ɔ̃ ara ɔɖo wũ kayiri ne ɔtere ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔmini wũ ku isoɣɔ ne.
42015021	“Mmɔ i ɔbi gɔgbe ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔse sɔ, ‘Tete, lobara ikpi i Ɣaa gu fɔ iso. Loisikote sɔ aakpere me sɔ fɔ ɔbi.’
42015022	“Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ̃ ɔse ɔkpere ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Mipɛ siwa si miɖi ara sɛɛ mipia wũ. Mipia wũ inyi si misu ndokota sɛɛ ana miba miapia wũ.
42015023	Ne kama ne, misɛ mianyɔ nantsuĩ gɔ loɔbo iɖa miɖoe si boba boaɖe iyi.
42015024	Alasɔ wũ ɔbi gɔgbe ne, bosu wũ sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi ɣɛɛ ɔkpese ɔba ngbã. Ɔyu fiɛ boledza wũ inya ana.’ Ne ɔso matsɛ iyi iɖe.
42015025	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔbi kpakpare ɔ̃ wũ ɔkpa iputu ame. Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔto ɔba fiɛ ɔ̃ɔbore ɔbo iyo ne, ɔtsɛ aka gu katɔ kulu inɔ iyo ame.
42015026	Ne ɔkpere ɔɖabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Be nto ikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ i iyo ame?’
42015027	“Ɔɖabo ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, ‘Fɔ ɔnyiibi loɔkpese ɔba kaa. Ne ɔso i fɔ ɔse ɔtã maɖoe nantsuĩ gɔ mba iɖa alasɔ ɔ̃iɣe sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔnya wũ ɔnyɔa.’
42015028	“Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔbirɛrɛĩ kpakpare gbaã ne ɔso ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔkɛlɛ iyo. Ne ɔ̃ ɔse ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i inyamɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃atã wũ iti sɔ ɔrui ɔba iyo.
42015029	Ɣɛɛ ɔbi ɔfiniki ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ ɔse sɔ, ‘Be ɔso i mme gɔ mme nto lobara-ɔ karabara akɔ gbodzoo nɖe nwagbe lɛ fɔ ɔɖabo fiɛ loibara kuira lota loya-ɔ iso ne, aitã me nane katepuĩ sɔ bo gu wũ malaa si bosu bopia so isoɣɔ?
42015030	Ɣɛɛ gɔ fɔ ɔbi gɔ lonina fɔ karana ɔsɛ̃ ɔ̃asu ɔsiai marɔ̃go ɔbara ara nyanyarĩa ɔkpese ɔba ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, aɖoe bɔi gɔ mba iɖa atã wũ.’
42015031	“Mmɔ i ɔ̃ ɔse to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔbi, fɔ ne, bo gu-ɔ mpia ngbe ɔwi biara fiɛ wũ ira biara ne, fɔ ire iɖe.
42015032	Ɣɛɛ ne, ikote sɔ boaɖe iyi, bona isoɣɔ alasɔ fɔ ɔnyibi gɔgbe ne, bosu sɔ ɔkpi ɣɛɛ ɔkpese ɔba ngbã. Ɔyu fiɛ boledza wũ inya.’ ”
42016001	Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, ranase ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe gɔ ɔba ɔɖabo gɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ara iso. Maba maaɣere ranase gɔgbe sɔ ɔɖabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ara iso to ɔnina wũ sikã.
42016002	Ne ɔso ranase ɔkpere ɔ̃ ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Be iɖe nto lonɔ i fɔ iso ngbe? Wũ ara wa ɔɖuɖu ato anyɔ iso ne, su siko bɔ si boki i ara ame alasɔ aisibawo wũ ara ɔnyɔ iso ita i kiniɔ.’
42016003	“Mmɔ i ɔɖabo gɔgbe to ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔkɔse ka ɔfɔ me karabara iso. Be loala loɔbara? Lona ɔle gɔ loakpɛ̃. Ara iwanyi ana to iakpɛ̃ me kunuarɛ.
42016004	Ɛɣɛɛ̃! Loɣe nnɛ loabara fiɛ si wũ karabara ɔbɔrɛ me i nrɔɔ̃ ame ne, wũ malaa aafɔ me manyɔ me iso i ma ayo.’
42016005	“Ne ɔso ɔkpere mma ɔɖuɖu nto ɔ̃ ɔkɔse kuso ɔwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃. Ɔkarɛ ɔɖeakatɔ̃ sɔ ‘Nda ato wũ ɔkɔse?’
42016006	“Ne ngɔmɔ ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, ‘Nnɔĩ akuku siare kulafa.’ “Ne ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Su fɔ kuso gɔ ato ɔko bɔ. Sɛ i karɔ̃ si atsɛrɛ sɔ akuku siru kere loɔkuti aatã.’
42016007	“Ngbɔ ame ɔkpere ɔmama ana gɔ nto ma kuso sɔ, ‘Fɔ ɣɛɛ? Nda kuso ato?’ “Sose gɔmɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Loto atita sikoto kulafa kuso.’ “Ne ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Su fɔ ɔko gɔ ame botsɛrɛ fɔ kuso bopia bɔ si atsɛrɛ fasinafasina apia.’
42016008	“Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ɔkɔse gɔgbe ɔle ɔ̃ ɔɖabo gɔ nna ɔnukuare ngbe ala ɔ̃ inɔgba i kayu siri dzɛ iso ɔkigu wũ ɔso. Gbaã ne, mma nsi ngbã matã kayi gagbe ara ne, masu ma anɔ masia nnɛ mato mabara iso kɔra maɖo mma nto mabara Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ karabara.”
42016009	Ne Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misu mi kayiiso karana mibuai maturi. Iyɔ si kaba kaaro ne, Ɣaa aafɔ mi ɔpia i ɔ̃ kasɛkɔ̃.
42016010	“Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ara wiriwiria ɔla i ɔnukuare ame ne, maatã wũ ɔri i ara siare ana iso. Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖe ɔnukuare i ara wiriwiria ame ne, ɔ̃ibaɖe ɔnukuare i ara siare ana iso.
42016011	Ne ɔso si miimɔɛ̃ kayiiso karana mila i ɔnukuare ame ne, nda maabara fiɛ mafɔ mi maɖe i siwarã ara wa i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã iso?
42016012	Fiɛ si aiɖe ɔnukuare i ara wa nɖe ɔturi mama are iso ne, nda iabara fiɛ maasu fɔ mɔmɔ are matã-ɔ?
42016013	“Ɔɖabo kuwɛ̃ iibawo makɔse inyɔ ɔsumu. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖɔɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔtsiri ɔwɛ̃. Ɣee ɔ̃awarɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔta ɔya ɔwɛ̃ iso. Miibawo Ɣaa gu karana ɔsɔrɛ.”
42016014	Gɔ ma Farisise ɔnɔ ara wa i Yesu ɔɣɛ ne, mabara wũ aɣiãra alasɔ masɛ maɖɔɛ sikã gbaã.
42016015	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miɖe maturi ma nsɛ mate so lɛ masɛɛ i maturi anɔ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɣe mi situ ɔɖuɖu ame. Alasɔ ara wa lofɔ kuɣa i maturi anɔ ne, anyanyara aɖe i Ɣaa anɔ.
42016016	“Mose mmara ɔko gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara wa matsɛrɛ masɛ ne, abara wã karabara isɛ iabo Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔwi. Ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, minɔ sɔ mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso. Fiɛ ɔbiara to ɔkpɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ana ɔri ɔbo i mmɔ.
42016017	Ɣɛɛ ne, ise pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ kato gu karɔ̃ aawã iɖo sɔ maakpasera mmara kakpoi kosoi tsɔra maɖi.
42016018	“Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara gɔ losɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ ɔyiri ɔmama ne, marɔ̃go rɔdze ɔɖe. Fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loyiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔ masɛ̃ ne, ɔsiai ɔturire.
42016019	“Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ranase ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nsɛ ɔpia ara wa lofɔ kuɣa fiɛ ɔwe i isoɣɔ ame i ɔ̃ ngba ayi ɔɖuɖu ame ɔwe.
42016020	Wɛrɛba ɔwɛ̃ ana gɔ marɔ sɔ Lazaro ɔwe. Aɣɛi ɔkã ɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ masɛ masu wũ maasɛ i ranase gɔmɔ kayogodɔ̃.
42016021	Ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔri sɔ si ranase gɔmɔ to ɔɖe ara ne, kupupui gɔ nsɛ kukpakpase i mmɔ aaɣo wũ ɔɖe. Ta makpɛkpɛ sɛ maba maaɣaɣa ɔ̃ aɣɛi ame.
42016022	“Wɛrɛba gɔgbe ɔba ɔ̃akpi, ne Ɣaa makpabo ɔba maasore wũ makɛlɛgu Abraham kɔrɛ i kato ne. Ranase gɔmɔ ana ɔba ɔ̃akpi ne mabiara wũ ne.
42016023	I makpise aɖe ne, ranase ɔwe i inyɛwe ame. Ne gɔ ɔkɔlɛ anɔ kato ne, ɔnya Abraham i kato gɔ Lazaro si wũ i kɔrɛ.
42016024	Mmɔ ɔto ɔkpere sɔ, ‘Tete Abraham! Nyɔ me nnya si atã Lazaro si ɔsu ɔ̃ irɔi ɔpia i ndu ame ɔba ɔ̃asora ɔɣora me i ɔnyagɛmi iso si ibara me pɔkɔsɔɔ alasɔ nto lona ibo i ɔtɔ gɔgbe ame!’
42016025	“Ɣɛɛ Abraham ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔbi, nyigi sɔ i fɔ ngbã ame ne, afɔ fɔ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu. Fiɛ Lazaro ɔ̃ wũ ne, ara nyanyarĩa kerekere ɔfɔ. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ka ɔto ɔna isoɣɔ fiɛ fɔ wũ ato awe inyɛ.
42016026	Ne kama ana ne, kuwɛ titiiti kuwɛ̃ pia i bo gu-ɔ inyɔ ndɛ̃. Si ɔturi ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃awara ɔba mmɔ ne, ɔ̃ibawo. Ngbɔ ame i kuwɛ̃ iibawo mi kɔrɛ mmɔ ana ɔbɔrɛ ɔba ngbe ne.’
42016027	“Mmɔ i ranase gɔmɔ to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tete Abraham, loto-ɔ i kukpa sɔ pia Lazaro si ɔsɛ wũ ɔse iyo.
42016028	Loba manyiibi rɛrɛ̃ iru ma mpia ngbã. Tã ɔsɛ ɔ̃aka ma teteree sɔ madaaba ngbe ne inyɛwe ɔɣede.’
42016029	“Ne Abraham to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Fɔ manyiibi ba ara wa i Mose gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ. Ikote sɔ maakã ara wamɔ atsue mabara i wã iso!’
42016030	“Mmɔ i ranase to ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete Abraham, maibakã itɔ̃me nɛmɔ atsue. Ɣɛɛ si ɔturi ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma ne, mato maakã wũ atsue mafiniki i ma akpi ibara ame.’
42016031	“Ɣɛɛ Abraham ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Si maibakã Mose gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze itɔ̃me atsue ne, si ɔturi ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ngbe ɔkɛlɛ ma kɔrɛ kɔra ne, maibakã wũ atsue!’ ”
42017001	Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ara wa loatã ɔturi ɔbara ikpi to aaba, ɣɛɛ ne, ndzo miɖe mitã ngɔ iso aaki fiɛ aaba.
42017002	Si masu kukɔtɛ siare manyi masarã wũ i ɔme fiɛ mafuĩdza wũ mapia i ɔpo ame kɔra ne, ialɛ wũ iɖo kutsue gɔ i Ɣaa aakpadzɛ̃ ngɔ loatã mabiɛtɛ magbe ɔbo i ikpi ame.
42017003	Ne ɔso minyɔ so kukaakɔ nnɛ mito mibara. “Si fɔ ɔnyii ɔbara-ɔ ikpi ne, sɛ̃ tã wũ. Si ɔfiniki ne, su tsɛ wũ.
42017004	Si ɔɣɛrɛ-ɔ ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ i ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ ame fiɛ ɔkpese ɔba ɔ̃atã-ɔ iti ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ ɔɖuɖu ne, su tsɛ wũ.”
42017005	Yesu katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, “Bokɔse, tã sɔ bo kafɔkaɖe aamɔ kabua.”
42017006	Ne Bokɔse ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mi kafɔkaɖe ɔmɔ lɛ susuruba ibi ne, miaɣere kudziri gɔgbe sɔ, ‘Rui ngbe kɛlɛ ɔpo ame.’ Fiɛ iaba ngbɔ ana.
42017007	“Mibu nnɛgbe minyɔ. Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ba ɔɖabo gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ ɔtã-ɔ ɣee ɔto ɔnyɔ fɔ mabɔi iso fiɛ ɔse i sia ɔba ɔ̃abo ne, aaɣere wũ sɔ ɔba ɔ̃asɛ i karɔ̃ mala si ɔɖe ɔ̃ araɖea?
42017008	Ooɣo! Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere aaɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ledza so si asɛ̃ ɔkati ndɛ̃ si awa aɖera atã me. Si loɔɖe lonɛ loro ne, fɔ wũ aaɖe anɛ fɔ are.’
42017009	Iinya sɔ aapɛ ɔɖabo siba i ɔ̃ Karabara iti.
42017010	Ngbɔ ame ise itã mi ana ne. Si mibara ira biara nɛ loɣere mi sɔ mibara ne, miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maɖabo kere boɖe fiɛ nnɛ lokote sɔ boabara kere iɖe bobara.’ ”
42017011	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣo Yerusalem ɔri ne, ɔki i Samaria gu Galilea kumɛ iso.
42017012	Ne gɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃abo akorowa awɛ̃ ame ne, marɛrɛ̃ iweo mawɛ̃ ma nto manyɛ ɔnyɛ rɛtɛa ɔba matu wũ. Manyɛse magbe ɔya dzoroo,
42017013	ne mala kulu teteree sɔ, “Tete Yesu, nyɔ bo nnya!”
42017014	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ma ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ maisu so mite Ɣaa Masɔrɛdze si manyɔ mi kukaakɔ.” Gɔ marui mato makɛlɛ ne, manya sɔ maɔna isosarɛ.
42017015	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ɔna isosarɛ ne, ɔpɛ ɔfiniki ɔto ɔle Ɣaa ku silɔ teteree.
42017016	Ɔba ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔpɛ wũ siba. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔ Samariase ɔɖe.
42017017	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Iiɖe mi maturi iweo miɖe losa ɣɛɛ? Kaiwɛ̃ tsɔra ne lɛ maki?
42017018	Nda ibara fiɛ ɔfɔ gɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase ɔnɔwɛ̃ loakpese ɔba ɔ̃apɛ Ɣaa siba?”
42017019	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta ya si akɛlɛ. Fɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔtã-ɔ isosarɛ.”
42017020	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ mabie sɔ maatsue ɔwi gɔ tutuutu i Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi aaba. Ne Yesu to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ɣaa sigara iɖe iibaba i ɔri gɔ iso i maturi aanya.
42017021	Kuwɛ̃ iibaɣɛ sɔ, ‘Minyɔ! Iɔba ngbe!’ ɣee ‘Nyɔ mmɔ.’ Alasɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe ka ipia i mi ndɛ̃.”
42017022	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ɔwi to ɔba gɔ miabie sɔ mianya mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iyi iwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ miibanya!
42017023	Maturi to maaba maaɣere mi sɔ ‘Minyɔ wũ i mmɔ!’ ɣee ‘Minyɔ wũ i ngbe!’ Ɣɛɛ midaasɛ mianyɔnyɔ me i mmɔ!
42017024	Alasɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i kado sɛ ɔma i kato kasɛ kawɛ̃ isɛ iabo kasɛ nyɔa ne, ngbɔ i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi iyi nɛmɔ to iase ne.
42017025	Ɣɛɛ tɔtɔ ne, ikote sɔ loaki i inyɛwe gbodzoo ame kiniɔgbe maturi ɔsɛ̃ me.
42017026	“Ara wa loba ku Noa ɔwi ne, wã ame loaba ku ɔwi gɔ ame i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aaledza iba ne.
42017027	Maturi to maɖe manɛ, marɛrɛ̃ to mayiri marɔ̃go fiɛ mato masu marɔ̃go matã sɔ mayiri gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iyi nɛ i Noa ɔbo i ɔkolo siare gɔmɔ ame. Kado ɔpɛ, siwore ɔyi si fɔ karɔ̃, ndu ɔɖoe maturi ɔɖuɖu.
42017028	“Ito iase lɛ kumɛgɔ i Lot ɔwi ɔse awe. Maturi to ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ mato maɖe kuɣa ana. Mawɛ̃ to mapia ɔraɖui mma to matsue ayo.
42017029	Iyi nɛ i Lot ɔbɔrɛ i Sodom ne, ɔtɔ gu akaĩ wa nsɛ afɔrɛ̃ nyanyarĩ ɔpɛ abɔrɛ i kato afere ɔmagɛ̃ iso, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtsue.
42017030	“Ngbɔ ame iase ku iyi nɛ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, aaba ne.
42017031	Iyi nɛmɔ ne, ngɔ nsia i ɔ̃ isã si ɔdaaso ɔba karɔ̃ sɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃abo iyo kame ɔsu ɔ̃ kuira. Ngbɔ ame ngɔ nɣɛ i sia si ɔdaaɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔsɛ kaa ɔ̃asu kuira ne.
42017032	Minyigi nnɛ lobara Lot ɔre!
42017033	Ɔbiara gɔ loakpɛ̃ sɔ si ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ ngbã ne, ɔto ɔ̃ayura me. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loayura ɔ̃ ngbã to ɔ̃aledza me ina.
42017034	Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ne, maturi inyɔ to maarɛ i ara iso. Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔnyua ɔwɛ̃ ɔrara.
42017035	Marɔ̃go inyɔ to maala maɔkɔtɛ ɔraũ i kukɔtɛ iso Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔ ɔwɛ̃, ɔnyua ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ.
42017036	Marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ to maaya mala maɔbara karabara, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔnyua ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣedza.”
42017037	Ne marasuãdze to makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Bokɔse, lɛ isɛ?” Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngbegɔ i ira kpia se ne, mmɔ i akolomo sɛ asakanya ne.”
42018001	Yesu ɔpɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze igbã si ɔte ma sɔ inya sɔ maakparama kayi ɔwi biara fiɛ nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ ma.
42018002	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Atɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame gɔ loisɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔwarɛ ɔturi ana.
42018003	Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ame ne, kuɛdze ɔwɛ̃ pia gɔ ɔsɛ ɔba atɔ̃meɣɛdze kɔrɛ ɔba ɔ̃atã wũ iti sɔ, ‘Buai me ala wũ matsirise ɔso.’
42018004	“Ifɔ ɔwi gbodzoo gɔ atɔ̃meɣɛdze gɔgbe ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbara kuira i itɔ̃me nɛmɔ iso. Ɣɛɛ kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔɣere so sɔ, ‘Atoa sɔ loito lonigã Ɣaa fiɛ loisɛ lowarɛ ɔturi ne,
42018005	Kumɛgɔ i kuɛdze gɔgbe to ɔɖaa me ɔso ne, loanyɔ sɔ lokpɛ̃ lofɔ wũ i ɔ̃ tsirise nrɔɔ̃ ame. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃amararã me ɔɖoe.’ ”
42018006	Ne Bosate ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minɔ nnɛ i atɔ̃meɣɛdze lalaa gɔgbe to ɔɣɛ.
42018007	Kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe atɔ̃meɣɛdze i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso ne, ɔ̃ibaɖi ɔ̃ maturi ma nsɛ mabiɛ makpere wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme? Ɣaa iibaɣɛ itɔ̃me ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi ma nto mabiɛ makpere wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme?
42018008	Nto loɣere mi gbaã sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛ ma itɔ̃me ɔtã ma ibɛ i ɔwi iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, si Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔba ne, ɔ̃anya maturi ma mba kafɔkaɖe?”
42018009	Yesu ɔpɛ igbã nɛgbe i maturi ma nsɛ mabu so sɔ ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ nlɛ fiɛ masɛ manyɔ maturi tsɔra pupurii iso.
42018010	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, maturi inyɔ mawɛ̃ ɔsɛ Ɣaa isɔrɛyo sɔ maakparama kayi. Ɔwɛ̃ ɖe ɔ Farisise fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɖe lampofɔdze.
42018011	Farisise ɔkpɛ so ɔɣedza i kuruɛ ne ɔkparama kayi ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa nto lopɛ-ɔ siba sɔ lona kanɔbɛbɛ, loisɛ lobara maturi akpi fiɛ loisɛ losiai maturire lɛ maturi mama awe. Nto lopɛ-ɔ siba ana alasɔ loise lɛ lampofɔdze gɔgbe awe.
42018012	Nsɛ lonyi kanya akpɛnɛ anyɔ i ɖapɛ ame fiɛ nsɛ lotã-ɔ wũ ira ɔɖuɖu ika weova.’
42018013	“Ɣɛɛ lampofɔdze ɔ̃ wũ ɔya dzoroo gɔ ɔ̃ibie sɔ ɔ̃akɔlɛ ɔ̃ iti kato kɔra. Ɣɛɛ ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔfu so igbegbe, ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa nyɔ me gɔ nɖe kpibaradze nnya!’ ”
42018014	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ gɔ ma inyɔɔ ɔkpese makɛlɛ ma ayo ne, lampofɔdze ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ ɔɖo ɔ Farisise. Alasɔ ɔturi biara gɔ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ so kato ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ wũ karɔ̃. Fiɛ ɔturi biara gɔ nsɛ ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔlɛ wũ kato.”
42018015	Mawɛ̃ ɔkɔ ma mabi mabɔ Yesu sɔ ɔsia ma kɔrɔ̃ iso. Gɔ Yesu katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔnya nnɛgbe ne, manyagalagu maturi mamɔ.
42018016	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔkpere mabiɛtɛ ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã mabiɛtɛ si maba wũ kɔrɛ ne midaatɛ̃ ma ɔri, alasɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ se sitã ma igbã.
42018017	Gbagbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ awe ne, ɔ̃ibawo sɛ̃ ame ɔkɛlɛ ɖa.”
42018018	Ma Yudase tɔ̃ɖedze ɔwɛ̃ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze bielea, be loabara fiɛ loana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro minya?”
42018019	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ ato akpere me Ɔbielea? Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iiɖe ɔbielea iɖo Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃.
42018020	Aɣe Ɣaa mmara mɛ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Daaɖoe ɔturi, daaɖe asɔrɔ̃, daayu kayu daaɖaɛ fɔ ɔlaa kanya, warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi.’ ”
42018021	Mmɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ita i wũ sibiɛtɛ ame ne, loɔbara i mmara mɛgbe ɔɖuɖu iso.”
42018022	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ikuti-ɔ ira ka iwɛ̃ aabara. Kɛlɛ aasu fɔ ira biara rɔdɛ̃ si asu sikã atsɛ mawɛrɛba, si aana kusia siare i kato. Si ɔɔro ne, kpese ba siai me.”
42018023	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔnɔ nnɛgbe ne, ɔruigu isoma alasɔ ɔba karana gbaã.
42018024	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya kumɛgɔ i so ɔma wũ ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ito iabua iɖa fiɛ ranase aabo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃!
42018025	Gbaã ne, ma mmɔ ibo ba ɔle iɖo kumɛgɔ i kapuipɔngɔ aaki kafe i ɔdzirikaãra iyoi ame.”
42018026	Mma lonɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Iyɔ nna loabua ɔna iɖi?”
42018027	Ne ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ira nɛ i ɔturi iibawo ɔbara ne, Ɣaa aawo ɔbara.”
42018028	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ, iyɔ bo ma lonyua bo ara ɔɖuɖu bosɛ bosiai-ɔ ɣɛɛ?”
42018029	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbagbaã iɖe. Fiɛ lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ ɔturi biara gɔ lonyua ɔ̃ iyo gu ɔ̃ ɔre, ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi rɛrɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi rɔ̃go gu ɔ̃ maɣese, ɣee mabi ɔsɛ ala Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔso ne,
42018030	ɔto ɔ̃ana ara wagbe gbodzoo i ngbã mɛgbe ame gu ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro minya i ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba i katɔ̃ ame ana.”
42018031	Yesu ɔkɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ɔkɛlɛgu kuruɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikã atsue. Boto bokɛlɛ Yerusalem ngbegɔ i ara wa i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ i mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iso ɔɖuɖu aaba i ne ame.
42018032	Mato maaɖi me matã mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ mabara me aɣiãra. Mato maatia me, matua minyatu mafere me iso.
42018033	Mato maapɛ me fiɛ maaɖoe me. Ɣɛɛ akpɛnɛ atɛ kama ne, loata lobɔrɛ i makpise ame.”
42018034	Ɣɛɛ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, marasuãdze iinɔ wã karɔ̃. Atɔ̃me wagbe karɔ̃ inɔ ana ɔwɛrɛ ma. Maiɣe nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣere ma ngbe karɔ̃.
42018035	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ka ɔto ɔbore ɔbo Yeriko ne, nɔbiɛdze ɔwɛ̃ si i ɔri kuruɛ ɔto ɔwanyi ara.
42018036	Gɔ ɔnɔ maturi gbodzoo to mafe ne, ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be nto iba?”
42018037	Ne mato maɣere wũ sɔ, “Yesu Nasaretse nto ɔfe.”
42018038	Mmɔ ɔsia kulu teteree sɔ, “Yesu! Igara David Ɔbi! Nyɔ me nnya!”
42018039	Maturi ma nɖe katɔ̃ ɔnyagalagu wũ sɔ ɔlo kulu. Ɣɛɛ ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ silɔ ɔbua ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Igara David Ɔbi! Nyɔ me nnya soo!”
42018040	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔtui ɔya ne ɔɣɛ sɔ makɔ nɔbiɛdze mabɔ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Gɔ ɔba ɔ̃abo ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, Bosate ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ,
42018041	“Be ato abiɛ sɔ lobara lotã-ɔ.” Nɔbiɛdze ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Tete, lobie sɔ loanya ara.”
42018042	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nya ara! Fɔ kafɔkaɖe losa-ɔ.”
42018043	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔtsɛ ara inya, ɔsiai Yesu ɔto ɔle Ɣaa. Maturi gbodzoo ma lonya nnɛgbe ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔle Ɣaa.
42019001	Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃aki i Yeriko ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔfe.
42019002	Ma lampofɔdze ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Zakeo fiɛ ɔba karana gbaã ɔwe mmɔ.
42019003	Ɔto ɔbie ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃atsue ɔturi gɔ igbã i Yesu ɖe. Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔkurukutu fiɛ maturi ana ɔsi i ɔri ɔso ne, ɔ̃inya wũ.
42019004	Ne ɔso ɔtere ɔɖe ma katɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya ɔsia i kudziri ame sɔ ɔ̃anya Yesu ala ɔɣe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aki i mmɔ.
42019005	Gɔ Yesu ɔbo kudziri kayirinɔ ne, ɔtui ɔya, ɔkɔlɛ anɔ kato ne ɔɣere Zakeo sɔ, “Zakeo, so ba mala, alasɔ fɔ iyo loabo nɔme.”
42019006	Zakeo ɔso mala ɔba karɔ̃ ɔfɔ Yesu ku isoɣɔ.
42019007	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonya nnɛgbe ɔtsɛ Yesu iɣɛtɛ iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃abo i kpibaradze iyo.”
42019008	Mmɔ i Zakeo ɔta ɔya ne ɔɣere Bosate sɔ, “Tete! Nyɔ, loasu wũ karana kasɛ kawɛ̃ lotã mawɛrɛba. Mma ɔɖuɖu loɖe amumu lofɔ nnɛ loikote sɔ loafɔ ne, loakpesera ma ara lotã ma ikpɛ ina.”
42019009	Ne Yesu ana to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nɔme ne, iɖi ɔba i iyo nɛgbe ame. Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔ̃ wũ ne, Abraham ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɖe.
42019010	Fiɛ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ne, loba lonyɔnyɔ mma ɔɖuɖu loyu, loɖi ma.”
42019011	Maturi to makã ara wa i Yesu to ɔɣɛ atsue. Ne ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe alasɔ ka ɔbore ɔbo Yerusalem fiɛ mabu sɔ Ɣaa sigara ɔɖewi to ɔ̃aba kiniɔ.
42019012	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe ɔturi nyaa ɔkɛlɛ karɔ̃ dzoroa kawɛ̃ iso sɔ maamɔɛ̃ wũ sigara. Si maɔro ne, ɔbara ɔ̃ adzuni sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔba.
42019013	Si ɔ̃arui ne, ɔkpere ɔ̃ marabaradze iweo ɔsirakanya. Ɔtã ma ɔbiara sikãrɛtɛa ibi iwɛ̃, ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Misu sikã dzɛgbe miɖe ala kuɣa si bonyɔ kusia gɔ miana si lona.’
42019014	“Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ aɖe maturi ɔtsiri wũ. Ne ɔso mapia ma kpabo sɔ masiai wũ i kama si masɛ maaɣere igarakpakpa sɔ, ‘Boito bobie sɔ ngɔgbe aaɖe bo igara.’
42019015	“Ɣɛɛ gɔ masɛra wũ sigara maro ne, ɔkpese ɔba ɔ̃ aɖe. Ɔpia sɔ marɔ ɔ̃ maɖabo ma ɔtã sikã mabɔ si maba maaɣɛ kusia gɔ maɔna.
42019016	“Ɔɖabo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aya ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, sikã dzɛ atã me ne, loɔna sɛ̃ ikpɛ iweo losia iso.’
42019017	“Ne ɔ̃ ɔkɔse ɔɣere wũ sɔ ‘Ɖafe! Ɔɖabo sɛɛ aɖe. Gɔ awo ara kɛkɛĩ wagbe ɔsu ɔbara karabara ɔso ne, loasu-ɔ losɛra i simagɛ̃ iweo kanya.’
42019018	“Ɔɖabo nyɔare ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, lona sikã dzɛ atã me ikpɛ iru losia iso!’
