42019019	“Ne ɔ̃ ɔkɔse ɔɣere ɔɖabo gɔgbe ɔ̃ wũ sɔ, ‘Fɔ ne, loasu-ɔ losɛra i simagɛ̃ iru kanya!’
42019020	“Ɔɖabo mama ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃aɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete, ɔɔnya fɔ sikã dzɛ atã me i ngbe. Losu sɛ̃ lopɛ ikpo i wũ ɔkati ikpakpai ame.
42019021	Nto lonigã-ɔ alasɔ aba ɔle, asɛ asu ara wa loiɖe fɔ are sɔ fɔ are. Ngbegɔ aikpɛ̃ ana ne, mmɔ asɛ asu fɔ araɖea ne.’
42019022	“Ne ɔ̃ ɔkɔse to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ɔɖabo lalaa aɖe! Fɔ mɔmɔ kanya ame atɔ̃me loasu lotã-ɔ ipɔ! Aɣe sɔ ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle loɖe, fiɛ nsɛ losu nnɛ loiɖe wũ ire lokpesera wũ ire. Nsɛ losu araɖea i ngbegɔ loipɛ ɔraɖui.
42019023	Gɔ aɣe ngbɔ ne, be ɔso fiɛ aisu wũ sikã asɛ aapia i sikã kakolakɔ̃? Mmɔ ne, kumɛkumɛ iɖe ne, loɣe sɔ nto loana sɛ̃ gu kusia lofɔ.’
42019024	“Ne ɔɣere mma nɣɛ i mmɔ sɔ, ‘Mimɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ sikã mifɔ mitã ɔɖabo gɔ lona kusia ikpɛ iweo.’
42019025	“Ɣɛɛ maturi ma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, ɔɖabo gɔmɔ ka ɔba sikã abi aweo koko!’
42019026	“Ne igara gɔmɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, ‘Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ mba ara ne, maatã wũ mabua. Ɔbiara gɔ nna kuira ne, kɛkɛĩ gɔ ame ɔba ne, maamɔɛ̃ mafɔ wũ iso.
42019027	Kiniɔ ne, wũ matsirise ma loito mabie sɔ loɖe sigara ne, mibɔ ma i wũ katɔ̃ miba miaɖoe.’ ”
42019028	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣere ma ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔɖe ma katɔ̃ ɔɣo Yerusalem ɔri.
42019029	Ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔbore ɔbo Betfage gu Betania i Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube kuruɛ ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ marasuãdze inyɔ sɔ maɖe katɔ̃.
42019030	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misɛ kamagɛĩ ga i bo katɔ̃ ngbe ame. Si mibo ne, mito mianya ɔfirimu ibi iwɛ̃ nɛ makɔra maɣedza fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ne iso ɔnya. Mikurisi ne mibɔ me ngbe.
42019031	Si ɔrere ɔkarɛ mi sɔ be ɔso mito mikurisi ne ne, miɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Bokɔse nto ɔbie ne.’ ”
42019032	Gɔ marasuãdze magbe ɔrui maɣo ɔri ne, manya ira biara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔɣere ma awe.
42019033	Ɔwi gɔ mato makurisi bɔi ne, ɔ̃ masate ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito mikurisi wũ?”
42019034	Ne marasuãdze ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Bokɔse nto ɔbie wũ.”
42019035	Makɔ ɔfirimu ibi mabɔ Yesu. Mawarɛ ma sikati masia bɔi kama ne ka mabuai Yesu ɔta ɔsɛ iso ne.
42019036	Gɔ marui ne, mawɛ̃ ɔwarɛ ma sikati masɛ i ɔri sɔ ɔsɛ iso.
42019037	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔɔbore ɔbo Yerusalem ngbegɔ i ɔri ɔtsɛ iso i Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze gbodzoo ɔtsɛ Ɣaa siba ipɛ mato mafa kayiɖu teteree iki ɔ̃ ara siare wa manya ɔso.
42019038	Mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa kusɛkusɛ itã igara gɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame! Isobuɛ si iwe i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu! Ɣaa ɔkpɛ nɖe ikpawaĩ!”
42019039	Ne ma Farisise mawɛ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃ to maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, sɛ̃ fɔ marasuãdze sɔ malo kulu!”
42019040	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ si malo kulu ne, ata to aatsɛ kulu ila.”
42019041	Gɔ Yesu ɔbore ɔbo ɔmagɛ̃ fiɛ ɔnya wũ ɔsese ne, ɔbiɛ nnɔmɛ i ɔ̃ iti.
42019042	Ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lobie sɔ tee gbaã ne, aatsue nɔme nnɛ lokotegu-ɔ fiɛ iatã-ɔ isobuɛ. Ɣɛɛ ipɛ i kiniɔ ne, aito anya aɖi ite!
42019043	Ɔwi to ɔba gɔ fɔ matsirise to maaki malɔ-ɔ i kakɔi biara. Mato maatɛ̃-ɔ mapia masɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ gɔ ɔɖuɖu ame aawo ɔki ɔbɔrɛ.
42019044	Mato maabiɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe maɖoe maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ɔ̃ ame. Maibanyua ita kuiwɛ̃ masɛ i ne kasɛkɔ̃. Alasɔ asɛ̃ sɔ aibatsue ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔba sɔ ɔba ɔɖi-ɔ!”
42019045	Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔtsɛ kuɣa maɖese ma mpia i mmɔ isa iɖi.
42019046	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Wũ iyo ne, maakpere ne sɔ iyo nɛ ame masɛ makparama kayi.’ Ɣɛɛ miɔsu ne mibara mayukukpe kawɛrɛkɔ̃!”
42019047	Iyi biara ne, Yesu ɔte ara i Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ mmɔ. Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kaɖe matɔ̃ɖedze gu mmara matedze ɔbie sɔ maaɖoe wũ.
42019048	Ɣɛɛ maiɣe ɔri gɔ iso maaki alasɔ maturi gbodzoo pia mmɔ fiɛ mato makã wũ atsue totoroo.
42020001	Iyi iwɛ̃ gɔ Yesu pia ɔto ɔte maturi ara i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze gu kaɖe matɔ̃ɖedze ɔba mmɔ.
42020002	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣere bo ngbegɔ ana ɔle gɔ ato abara ala karabara abɔrɛgu. Nna lotã-ɔ ɔle gɔ?”
42020003	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã lokarɛ mi ira iwɛ̃ si mitã me mmuai.
42020004	Yohanes gɔ lopie maturi ndu ne, lɛ ɔna ɔ̃ ɔle ɔbɔrɛgu. Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɛɛbɛrɛ maturi kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ?”
42020005	Ne matsɛ so iwararãgu sɔ, “Be iɖe boaɣɛ? Si boɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔna ɔle ɔbɔrɛgu ne, ɔto ɔ̃akarɛ bo sɔ, ‘Be ɔso fiɛ miifɔ wũ miɖe?’
42020006	Fiɛ si boɣɛ sɔ maturi kɔrɛ ɔfɔ ɔbɔrɛ gu ne, mma loba maasakanya ngbe to maapɛ bo ata alasɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ maɖe sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze i Yohanes ɖe.”
42020007	Ne ɔso ne, matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Boiɣe ngbegɔ ɔna ɔ̃ ɔle ɔbɔrɛgu.”
42020008	Ne Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme wũ loibaɣere mi ngbegɔ lona wũ ɔle lobɔrɛgu fiɛ nto lobara karabara gagbe.”
42020009	Ne Yesu ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ̃ adziribi kakpɛkɔ̃. Gɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ɔri dzoroa ɔwɛ̃ ɔso ne, ɔsu kakpɛkɔ̃ ɔpia i mapaase nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ manyɔ kã iso matã wũ.
42020010	Gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ maasɔrɛ̃ adziribi wamɔ ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ ɔɖabo ɔwɛ̃ sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃afɔ ɔ̃ kaɖekɔ̃ ga loaɣo wũ ɔbɔ i mapaase ma mpia i sia kɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ mapaase mamɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔɖabo gɔgbe mapɛ wũ, masa wũ masese nrɔɔ̃ kunu.
42020011	Ne ɔso ɔpia ɔɖabo mama. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ wũ mapaase mamɔ ɔpɛ wũ, masopara wũ, makpesera wũ masese nrɔɔ̃ kunu.
42020012	Ɔledza ɔɖabo tɛare ipia. Ɔ̃ ne, mapɛ wũ maɖi wũ igbɛ masa wũ maɖi i sia mmɔ.
42020013	“Ne kakpɛkɔ̃ Sate gɔmɔ ɔkarɛ so sɔ, ‘Be loabara? Loasese wũ ɔbi ɖɔɛse. Lofɔ loɖe sɔ mato maawarɛ wũ.’
42020014	“Ɣɛɛ gɔ mapaase ɔnya ɔbi gɔmɔ ne, maɣere so sɔ, ‘Nya kakpɛkɔ̃ Sate mɔmɔ ɔbi nto ɔba ngbe. Mitã boɖoe wũ si ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu aakpese bo are!’
42020015	Ne ɔso mafuĩdza wũ maɖi i ɔkpã ame ne maɖoe wũ ne.” Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be i kakpɛkɔ̃ sate aabara mafɔ magbe?
42020016	Ɔto ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖoe mapaase magbe ɔɖi i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ɔbie maturi mama ɔpia i kã ame.” Gɔ maturi ɔnɔ ngbɔ ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Ooɣo, iibaba ngbɔ!”
42020017	Yesu ɔkarã ma anɔ iso ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ ngbe karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ? ‘Ita nɛ i mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ sɔ iilɛ ne, ne loba iakpese ita nɛ lonya iɖo pelepele ne.’
42020018	Ɔbiara gɔ loatura i ita nɛmɔ iso ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɛfɛ̃ ɖukuɖuku. Fiɛ si ita nɛmɔ ɔkpase iwuĩ ɔrere ne, ito iakɔtɛ wũ ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ.”
42020019	Mmara matedze gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔbie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ Yesu mmɔ alasɔ maɣe sɔ ma iso ɔpɛ igbã nɛmɔ. Ɣɛɛ manigã maturi mamɔ.
42020020	Ne ɔso ne, matsɛ ɔri mama gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maamɔɛ̃ wũ ibie. Mapia maturi i iwɛrɛ ame sɔ mabara so lɛ mma nto manyɔnyɔ ɔnukuare si masɛ maakarɛ Yesu atɔ̃me wa loapia wũ i kulu ame si maawo wũ ɔɖi ɔtã ma Romase abã.
42020021	Ne ɔso kanyamaɖaɛse magbe ɔkɛlɛ Yesu kɔrɛ masɛ maakarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze boɣe sɔ fɔ ne, ɔnukuare ara asɛ ate ɔwi biara. Boɣe sɔ fɔ ara ite ame ne, aisɛ anyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ ɣɛɛ asɛ aɣɛ nnɛ loabo Ɣaa anɔ iiɖe nnɛ i maturi sɛ maɖɔɛ.
42020022	Bobie sɔ ɣere bo si ilɛ sɔ boatã ma Romase Igarakpakpa lampo.”
42020023	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yesu ka ɔɣe ma adzuni nyanyarĩa ɔso ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ,
42020024	“Misu sikãfudza ibi iwɛ̃ mibɔ me. Nna iti gu iyere nsia iso ngbe?”
42020025	Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Igarakpakpa Kaisaro ire iɖe.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Misu nnɛ nɖe Kaisaro ire mitã wũ si misu nnɛ nɖe Ɣaa ire ana mitã Ɣaa.”
42020026	I maturi katɔ̃ mmɔ ne, maiwo wũ ɔmɔɛ̃ i itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ iso. Ati ɔmɔ ma i mmuai mɛ i Yesu ɔtã ma iso fiɛ ibara ma ɣii ana.
42020027	Ma Zadukise ma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ makpise iisibata ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ maba maakarɛ wũ sɔ,
42020028	“Ratedze, Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔpia i mmara ame ɔtã bo sɔ, ‘Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi ɔnyua ɔ̃ ɔre fiɛ maiɣe ɔbi ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ ɔnyiibi si ɔsu kpise ɔre ɔyiri. Mabi ma i ɔ̃ gu kpise ɔre gɔmɔ aaɣe ne, maanyɔ ma lɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi gɔ loɔkpi mabi.’
42020029	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, manyiibi rɛrɛ̃ ikɔdzɛ mawɛ̃ ɔwe. Kpakpare ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go, iina ɔpã kere ɔba ɔ̃akpi ɔɣɛ wũ gɔ maiɣe ɔbi.
42020030	Ɔ̃ ɔkpeama gɔ nsiai wũ ɔyiri kuɛdze gɔmɔ.
42020031	Ɔtɛare ɔ̃ wũ ngbɔ ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ isɛ iabo ɔkɔdzɛva. Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ makã maiɣe ɔbi.
42020032	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃akpi.
42020033	Kiniɔ ne, si makpise ɔba maatã ne, ma ndɛ̃ ɔmele loayiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe gɔ ma ikɔdzɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔyiri wũ manya?”
42020034	Yesu Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go sɛ mayiri so i ngbã mɛgbe ame.
42020035	Ɣɛɛ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go ma ɔɖuɖu ma lokote sɔ maata masɛ ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ne, maisibayiri so i ngbã mɛmɔ ame.
42020036	Maase lɛ Ɣaa makpabo awe gɔ maisibakpi manya. Ka maɖe Ɣaa mabi ala maɔta mabɔrɛ i makpise ame.
42020037	Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔpia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ makpise to maaledza ita iwe ngbã. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔɣɛ i miyu kadzirimi ga nto katsue kɔrɛ ne, ɔkpere Ɣaa sɔ Abraham Ɣaa gu Isak Ɣaa gu Yakob Ɣaa.
42020038	Magbanadze Ɣaa ɔɖe, iiɖe makpise ɔre ɔɖe. Ne ɔso i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, makpise ana ba ngbã.”
42020039	Mmara matedze mawɛ̃ ma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Ratedze, abua atã mmuai gbaã!”
42020040	Ne kama ne, kuwɛ̃ iisiwe ɔtu ɔkarɛ wũ kuira.
42020041	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ Kristo ne, David ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɖe?
42020042	Alasɔ David mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ Sinɔ ɔko ame sɔ, ‘Bosate ɔɣere Wũ Sate sɔ, “Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso
42020043	gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loasu fɔ matsirise lopia i fɔ ngba kayirinɔ?” ’
42020044	Si David to ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔ̃ Sate ne, nda iabara fiɛ Kristo aaɖe David ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ?”
42020045	Ɔwi gɔ i ma ɔɖuɖu ɣɛ mato makã nnɛ i Yesu to ɔɣɛ atsue ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ,
42020046	“Midzuɛ̃ so i mmara matedze iso. Masɛ maɖɔɛ mawe maki ku ma awu siare. Masɛ mabie sɔ maturi si mabɔ so karɔ̃ maya ma i kuɣa ame. Masɛ mabie nsɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ gu sipɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃.
42020047	Masɛ mate so lɛ makuɛdze mabuaidze ɣɛɛ masɔsɔla ma mafɔ ma ara. Masɛ mate so iki i ma kayi ikparama tagbaraa ame. Ne ɔso ma kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ to iasi gbaã!”
42021001	I Isɔrɛyo mmɔ ne, Yesu ɔtara anɔ kato ɔnya kumɛgɔ i maranase to masu ma karatã mapia i ira nɛ ame mato mato ara mapia.
42021002	Ɔnya wɛrɛba kuɛdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔsu kupɛrɛ kunyɔ ɔba ɔ̃apia i kame.
42021003	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nto loɣere mi sɔ kuɛdze gɔgbe ne, ɔtã ara ɔɖo ma ɔɖuɖu.
42021004	Alasɔ matsɔra ne, ma karana ame kere maɖi kɛkɛĩ maba maatã. Ɣɛɛ kuɛdze gɔgbe ne, i ɔ̃ kusa ame nnɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔba ɔ̃aɖe iɖe ɔsu ɔba ɔ̃ato ngbe.”
42021005	Marasuãdze mawɛ̃ to maɖe ika i Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ iso kumɛgɔ ibua ito ilɛ ɔnyɔ, ata wa masu matsue ala gu karatã ga i maturi sɛ matã i mmɔ. Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ,
42021006	“Ira biara nɛ mito minya ngbe ne, ɔwi to ɔba gɔ ku ita iibasia i nɛ ɔlaa iso. Mato maasasamara ira biara mafere i karɔ̃.”
42021007	Mmɔ mato makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, ku mme ɔwi iaba ngbɔ? Fiɛ be loate sɔ ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ ara wagbe aaba?”
42021008	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midzuɛ̃ so sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibasɔsɔla mi. Maturi gbodzoo to maaba i wũ iyere ame sɔ wũ itɔ̃me mato maɣɛ. Mato maaɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe wũ’ fiɛ ‘Ɔwi ɔɔɣo.’ Ɣɛɛ midaasiai ma.
42021009	Midaanigã si minɔ kakpã kulu gu maturi ita iya so iso. Ara wagbe igbã to aaba, ɣɛɛ iite sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔɣo.”
42021010	Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Karɔ̃ to kaakpɛ̃ gu karɔ̃ fiɛ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ aka anyɔ to aakpɛ̃gu so.
42021011	Karɔ̃ to kaati i ngɔi. Kukã siare to kuabo fiɛ sinyɛ agbãagbã ana to siaba. Afɔ̃ra ana to aabɔrɛ i kuɖokpo.
42021012	“Si ara wagbe aaba ne, mato maamɔɛ̃ mi, makpɛ̃gu mi. Mato maakɔ mi makɛlɛgu ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃, maapia mi iyo. Mato maakɔ mi makɛlɛgu magara gu matɔ̃ɖedze katɔ̃ sɔ maaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me ala wũ ɔso.
42021013	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame loaɖe ɔwi sɛɛ gɔ ame miaɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea ne.
42021014	Mibara mi adzuni sɔ miibamararã so kumɛgɔ miaɖi so kanya iso.
42021015	Alasɔ nto loatã mi atɔ̃me gu iwola nɛ kanya i mi matsirise kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔya manya.
42021016	Mi maɣese gu manyiibi gu mi mɔmɔ malɛdze gu mi malaa to maaɖi mi matã. Mato maaɖoe mi mawɛ̃.
42021017	Ɔbiara to ɔ̃atsiri mi ala wũ ɔso.
42021018	Ɣɛɛ nane ɔnidzɔ iibasɛ mi i iso.
42021019	Miya teteree fiɛ miana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
42021020	“Ɔwi gɔ mianya sɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔba maaki malɔ Yerusalem ne, mitsue sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ ɔbiɛwi ɔɔɣo.
42021021	Mma mpia i Yudea si matere makɛlɛ abe iso, mma mpia i ɔmagɛ̃ ame si matere mabɔrɛ. Mma mpia i miya si madaakpese maba ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
42021022	Alasɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ to ɔ̃aɖe kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔwi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea Ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ awe.
42021023	Ɔwi gɔmɔ to ɔ̃awe ɔle ɔtã marɔ̃go ma nto nyiri gu matalɛpo ma nto mabi ɣɛtɛ. Inyɛwe siare to iaba i karɔ̃ gagbe iso. Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ to iaba maturi magbe iso.
42021024	Mato maaɖoe mawɛ̃ ala ipɛmi fiɛ maamɔɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ana makɛlɛgu nrɔ̃ mama iso. Mma loiɖe ma Yudase to maaɖe sigara ku ɔtile i Yerusalem iso isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtɔrã ɔtã ma.
42021025	“Awawãra agbãagbã to aaba i kuɣɛ̃ gu ɔgbaworeti gu awami iso. Kayiiso ɔɖuɖu to kaayu ɔriinyɔ. Ifɔ̃ siare to iamɔɛ̃ maturi ala kumɛgɔ i ɔpo to ɔ̃asia so ara ɔso.
42021026	Maturi to maasɛ̃ kulele ala ifɔ̃ nɛ nto ma gɔ maiɣe nnɛ nto iaba i kayi ɔɖuɖu iso ɔso. Sile dzɛ i kuɖokpo ame ɔɖuɖu to siati teteree i sɛ̃ kusɛkɔ̃.
42021027	Ne kama ne, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi to ɔ̃abɔrɛ i adɔdɔ ame gu ɔ̃ ɔle gu ifiɛ teteree ame.
42021028	Si ara wagbe ɔnya asɔ̃ katɔ̃ ne, miledza so si mitsɛ ɔri inyɔ alasɔ mi iɖi ɔwi ɔɔbore ɔbo.”
42021029	Ne Yesu to ɔpɛ ma igbã iwɛ̃ sɔ, “Mikarã inɔ i kuɖedziri gu adziri agbã mama iso.
42021030	Si minya sɔ ato aɖi aɣata ɣɛtɛ ne, misɛ miɣɛ sɔ kusɛ ɔɔɣo.
42021031	Ngbɔ ame si minya ara wagbe to aba ne, mitsue sɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɔbore sibo.
42021032	“Nto loɣere mi sɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aaba fiɛ mi mawɛ̃ ma nɣɛ ngbe aakpi miro.
42021033	Kato gu karɔ̃ to kaafe, ɣɛɛ wũ atɔ̃me iibafe anya ɖa.
42021034	“Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ miibanina ɔwi i ɔɖegbodzo gu itarɛ̃ iso. Midaasɛ mimararã so i kayiiso ara iti. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, iyi nɛmɔ to iapatu imɔɛ̃ mi lɛ iyebi.
42021035	Ito iapatura kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu.
42021036	“Ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so si mila miɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara sɔ miana ɔle miya teteree mibɔrɛ i inyɛwe nɛmɔ ame sɔ miaya bɔlɔlɔ i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi anɔ.”
42021037	Ayi wamɔ ɔɖuɖu ne, Yesu ɔsu ɔte maturi ara i Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃. Kutsuɛ biara ne, ɔsɛ ɔkɛlɛ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso ɔ̃awe i kasɛ̃ ame.
42021038	Kaya tutuutu biara ne, maturi ɔɖuɖu sɛ mata maba isɔrɛyo maba maakã ɔ̃ ara ite atsue.
42022001	Ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ ma Yudase aaɖe Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iyi nɛ masɛ marɔ ana sɔ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi.
42022002	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze to manigã maturi ɔso ne, matsɛ ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maaɖoe Yesu i iwɛrɛ ame ibie.
42022003	Ɔbosam ɔbo i Yuda gɔ marɔ Iskariot fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖe Yesu marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame.
42022004	Ne ɔso Yuda ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mma nsɛ madzuɛ̃ Ɣaa isɔrɛyo makpakpa kɔrɛ masɛ maasɛ iti ame i ɔri gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi Yesu ɔtã ma.
42022005	Mana isoɣɔ gbaã, ne ɔso maɣɛ sɔ maatã wũ kuso.
42022006	Yuda ɔ̃ wũ ɔnɔ karɔ̃, ne ɔso ɔtsɛ ɔri sɛɛ gɔ iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi Yesu ɔtã ma ibie.
42022007	Iyi ɔba iaɣo nɛ masɛ maɖe Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iyi fiɛ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ame masɛ maɖoe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Sɛrɛ maɖe ana ne.
42022008	Yesu Ɔpia Petro gu Yohanes ɔɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ, “Misɛ mialedza Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera wa boaɖe misɛ.”
42022009	Ne mato makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Lɛ ato abie sɔ boledza bosɛ?”
42022010	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mibo Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nsore ndu ku ibui to ɔ̃asarɛgu mi. Misiai wũ misɛ miabo i iyo nɛ ame ɔ̃abo.
42022011	Miɣere iyo nɛmɔ sate sɔ, ‘Ratedze sɔ bokarɛ-ɔ sɔ, “Mme iyo nse gɔ mme gu wũ marasuãdze aaɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera?” ’
42022012	Ɔto ɔ̃ate mi iwɛ̃ i iyo siare nɛ matsue masia i kato fiɛ maledza ne, masɛ kuta ayara. Miledza ibiara misɛ i mmɔ.”
42022013	Gɔ maɣo ɔri ne, masɛ maanya ira biara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔɣere ma. Ne mawa Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera ne.
42022014	Gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ sɔ maaɖe ara.
42022015	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iɖe wũ kuɖɔɛ kokooko sɔ loaɖegu mi Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo aɖera wagbe fiɛ inyɛwe aatu me.
42022016	Nto loɣere mi sekelee sɔ loisibaɖe aɖera wagbe lonya gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ boanɔ wã karɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
42022017	Ne kama ne, Yesu ɔsu itãkɔi, ɔpɛ Ɣaa Siba. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mifɔ si minɛ mitã so.
42022018	Nto loɣere mi sɔ ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ne, loisibanɛ ndã mɛgbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa sigara iɖe aaba.”
42022019	Ne ka ɔsu boɖoboɖo ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i ɔ̃ iti ne. Ɔbɛse wũ kusɛkusɛ ɔsu ɔtã ma. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ sosina dzɛ losu lotã i mi iti ngbe ne. Mibara ne si misu minyigi me.”
42022020	Ngbɔ ame ɔsu itãkɔi nɛ ame i ndã pia ɔtã ma gɔ maɖe ara maro. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ikɔi nɛgbe nɖe Ɣaa kanya ɣɛtɛ ga ɔto ɔnyigu mi ikparĩ ala wũ ima nɛ loafere i karɔ̃ ala mi ɔso ne.
42022021	Ɣɛɛ ne, mitsue sɔ ngɔ loaɖi me ɔtã wũ matsirise si ɔto ɔɖegu me aɖera i ngbe.
42022022	Mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ne, nto loakpi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔsia ita. Ɣɛɛ ne, ndzo mitã ngɔ loaɖi me ɔtã.”
42022023	Ne matsɛ so ikakarɛ sɔ, ma ndɛ̃ nna loabara ira nɛgbe igbã.
42022024	Kakpadzɛ̃ kawɛ̃ ɔbo i marasuãdze ndɛ̃ mabie sɔ matsue ma ndɛ̃ ngɔ nɖe ɔsiare pelepele.
42022025	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Kayiiso magara ma loiɖe ma Yudase sɛ mate so mapia mma mato maɖe iso fiɛ maba ɔle i ma iso. Magara magbe sɛ mafera so sɔ ma nɖe Maturi Malaa.
42022026	Ɣɛɛ iikote sɔ iase ngbɔ i mi ndɛ̃. Ngɔ nɖe ɔsiare i mi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ ikote sɔ ɔ̃abara so ɔbiɛtɛ si mi tɔ̃ɖedze si ɔsu so ɔbara ɔɖabo.
42022027	Nna nɖe ɔkpakpa? Ngɔ nsi i karɔ̃ ɔto ɔɖe ara ɛɛbɛrɛ ngɔ nto ɔtu wũ ɔpɔrɔ̃? Ikpa sekelee sɔ ngɔ nsi i karɔ̃ ɔto ɔɖe ara loɖo. Ɣɛɛ lopia i mi ndɛ̃ lɛ ngɔ nto ɔsumu mi awe.
42022028	Miɔpia kubɛ misiai me i wũ amɔrɛ̃ ɔwi ɔɖuɖu ame.
42022029	Kumɛgɔ ame i Tete ɔtã me ɔle sɔ loɖe maturi iso ne, ngbɔ ame loatã mi ɔle mi wũ ne.
42022030	Mito miaɖe minɛgu me ara i wũ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ fiɛ miasɛ i sigara ayara iso miɖe sigara i Israel nlɛ aka aweo-anyɔ iso.”
42022031	Ne Yesu to ɔɣere Simon Petro sɔ, “Simon Simon! Kã atsue! Ɣaa ɔtã Ɔbosam ɔri sɔ ɔla mi ɔnyɔ si ɔnyɔ mma nɖe masɛɛ gu mma loilɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i kpɛ̃dze sɛ ɔfuri simɔɣo ɔɖi i kamɔ ame.
42022032	Ɣɛɛ ne, Simon, loɔkparama kayi i fɔ iti sɔ fɔ kafɔkaɖe iibakpase. Si ɔɔkpese aya parataa ne, pia fɔ manyiibi tsɔra ɔle.”
42022033	Ne Petro to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, loɣɛ teteree sɔ si inya ne, maapia bo gu-ɔ i iyo ɣee lokpigu-ɔ.”
42022034	Ne Yesu ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Petro, nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ kasɛ̃ gagbe si kɔkɔ aaɖi kanya ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.”
42022035	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame gɔ lopia mi katɔ̃me fiɛ mme sɔ midaasu sikã kakotoi ɣee akpo ɣee ndokota ne, ira iwɛ̃ ɔnya mi?” Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo kuira iinya bo kuwɛ̃.”
42022036	Mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔbiara gɔ mba sikã kawumi ɣee akpo ne, ɔsu ɔla. Ngɔ nna ipɛmi ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ arapia ɔrɔdɛ̃ si ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣa ipɛmi.
42022037	Fiɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ, Ɔko Sekelea ame itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maaka wũ mapia i maturi lalaa ndɛ̃’ ne, ka iba ngbɔ. Alasɔ ira nɛ matsɛrɛ i wũ iso ne, ikote sɔ iaba i ne ame.”
42022038	Ne marasuãdze to maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, Nyɔ! Nya apɛmi anyɔ ngbe!” Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ka ilɛ.”
42022039	Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔkɛlɛ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbara. Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ana siai wũ.
42022040	Gɔ ɔbo mmɔ ne, Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Mikparama kayi si miibabo i ilainyɔ ame.”
42022041	Ɔrui ɔnyua ma ɔkɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ne ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔkparama kayi ɔɣɛ sɔ,
42022042	“Tete, si aatɔrã ne, ɖi inyɛwe ikɔi nɛgbe bɔrɛgu me iso iiɖe wũ kuɖɔɛ sɔ bara ne fɔ kure.”
42022043	Ne Ɣaa Kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba ɔ̃apia wũ ɔle ne.
42022044	I isomararã siare ame ne, ɔledza kayi ikparama ku anɔ rɛtɛa. Awururu wa nto abɔrɛ wũ iso se lɛ ima nto ifere i karɔ̃.
42022045	Gɔ Yesu ɔta i ngbegɔ ɔto ɔkparama kayi ne, ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze kɔrɛ. Ɔba ɔ̃anya sɔ mato marɛ sirɛ alasɔ isoma ɔmɔɛ̃ ma.
42022046	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito mirɛ sirɛ? Mita si mikparama kayi si miibabo i ilainyɔ ame.”
42022047	Gɔ Yesu ɣɛ ɔtogu ma ika iɖe ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔba maabo ma iso. Yuda gɔ nɖe marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ nɖe ma katɔ̃. Ɔkɛlɛ Yesu kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃amini wũ.
42022048	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔkarɛ Yuda sɔ, “Yuda, iminigu asu ato aɖi me, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi atã?”
42022049	Ɔwi gɔ i marasuãdze ma mpia i mmɔ gu Yesu ɔnya nnɛ nto iba ne, makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, bokpɛ̃gu ma ala bo apɛmi?”
42022050	Ne marasuãdze ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi ipɛmi ɔtu masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele ɔɖabo kuɖearɔ̃ kutsue ɔɖi ne.
42022051	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ, “Midaabara!” Ɔpɛgu ɔɖabo gɔmɔ kutsue kere ne ɔsa wũ ne.
42022052	Ne Yesu to ɔkarɛ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu kasɔrɛkɔ̃ madzuɛ̃se makpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ma loba mamɔɛ̃ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mito kudziriku gu apɛmi lɛ turiɖoese loɖe?
42022053	Lowe i mi kɔrɛ i ma Yudase isɔrɛyo iyi biara ɣɛɛ miimɔɛ̃ me. Ɣaa lotã mi ɔri gɔgbe fiɛ idududu ame ɔle nto ɔɖe mi iso kiniɔ.”
42022054	Mamɔɛ̃ Yesu makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele iyo. Petro ana siai ma i kama kama.
42022055	Mapia ɔtɔ i inyamɔ, ne ɔso Petro ɔ̃ wũ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i ma kɔrɛ.
42022056	Gɔ ɔɖabo rɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔnya Petro si i ɔtɔ katɔ̃ mmɔ ne, ɔnyɔ wũ totoroo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔgbe ɔ̃ wũ Yesu siaidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe.”
42022057	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔsɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, loiɣe wũ kɔra!”
42022058	Ɔwi kurukutu kama ne, ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔnya Petro ɔɖi ite ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ wũ ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ aɖe.” Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛĩ, iiɖe mme loɖe!”
42022059	Si iabara lɛ ɔɖɔwũ kama ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ mama ana gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔledza irɔĩ ikarã teteree sɔ, “Kakpadzɛ̃ kukawɛ̃ na i ne ame sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ana ɔsiai Yesu alasɔ Galilea ɔturi ɔɖe.”
42022060	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Nyɔ me ɔrɛrɛ̃, nnɛ ato aɣɛ ngbe ne, loiɣe kuira i ne iso.” Gɔ ɔɣɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe ne, makɔkɔ ɔɖi kanya.
42022061	Ne Bosate ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ Petro ne. Ɔnyigi nnɛ i Bosate ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si makɔkɔ aaɖi kanya nɔme kasɛ̃ gagbe ne, ato aasɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.”
42022062	Petro ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ inyamɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abiɛ teteree.
42022063	Mma nto madzuɛ̃ Yesu ɔtsɛ wũ aɣiãra ibara ipɛ wũ.
42022064	Masu ira manyi wũ katɔ̃ mapɛ wũ iyɔ maɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɣere bo ngɔ lopɛ-ɔ!”
42022065	Matia wũ i siri agbãagbã ana iso.
42022066	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, kaɖe makpakpa gu Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze ɔsakanya ne makɔ Yesu mabɔ ma katɔ̃ ne.
42022067	Mma losakanya i mmɔ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Ɣere bo si fɔ nɖe Kristo.” Ne ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Si loɣere mi ira irere kɔra ne, miibafɔ miɖe.
42022068	Fiɛ si lokarɛ mi itɔ̃me irere ne, miibatã me mmuai.
42022069	Ɣɛɛ ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ne, Ɣaa, Ɔlesate to ɔ̃atara me, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, ɔsɛra i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso.”
42022070	Ne ma ɔɖuɖu to makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Iyɔ ite sɔ fɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi?” Ne ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ise lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣɛ.”
42022071	Ne maɣɛ sɔ, “Iisinya sɔ kuwɛ̃ aaba ɔ̃aɣere bo kuira i ɔ̃ iso. Bo mɔmɔ ɔɔnɔ ara wa ɔto ɔɣɛ!”
42023001	Ne ma ɔɖuɖu ɔta makɔ Yesu makɛlɛgu Pilato ne.
42023002	Matsɛ wũ kanya iɖaɛ sɔ, “Bomɔɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe gɔ ɔto ɔkã bo aɖe kaɖe ɔyura. Ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ madaatã lampo gɔ i ma Romase igarakpakpa ɔsia. Ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ so sigara ana.”
42023003	Ne Pilato ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ma Yudase igara?” Ne Yesu ɔta wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ise lɛ kumɛgɔ aɣɛ.”
42023004	Ne Pilato ɔɣere masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmamɔ sɔ, “Loinya sɔ ɔɣɛrɛ mmara kumiwɛ̃.”
42023005	Ɣɛɛ ma kanya ɔwe ɔle teteree sɔ, “Ɔ̃ ara wa ɔto ɔte to abɔ ikpɔkpɔtɔ i ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃. Ɔsɛ ne karɔ̃ i Galilea, ne ɔ̃ɔbɔ ne i ngbe ana ne.”
42023006	Ɔwi gɔ i Pilato ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Galilea ɔturi ɔɖe ngbe?”
42023007	Gɔ ɔtsue sɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Galilea ibuiti nɛ iso i Herodes to ɔɖe ne, ɔsu wũ ɔsese Herodes ala ɔba ɔpia i Yerusalem ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame.
42023008	So ɔɣɔ Herodes gbaã gɔ ɔnya Yesu alasɔ ɔ̃ɔnɔ wũ iyere fiɛ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anya wũ kokooko. Ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anya Yesu ɔbara iwawãra iwɛ̃.
42023009	Ne ɔso Herodes ɔkarɛ Yesu atɔ̃me gbodzoo ɣɛɛ Yesu iipia wũ kanya.
42023010	Masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu mmara matedze ɔbɔrɛ maba maɖaɛ nnya masia Yesu iso.
42023011	Herodes gu ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbara Yesu aɣiãra, matia wũ. Ne masu awu sɛɛ awɛ̃ mapia wũ lɛ igara awe fiɛ makpesera wũ masese Pilato ne.
42023012	Iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, Herodes gu Pilato ɔkpese malaa, ɣɛɛ sasaasa ne, maisɛ mafe.
42023013	Pilato ɔkpere masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu matɔ̃ɖedze gu maturi tsɔra ɔsakanya.
42023014	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɔ ngɔgbe mibɔ me sɔ ɔto ɔkɔ maturi ɔyura i ɔri lalaa iso. I mi mɔmɔ anɔmi ame ne, loɔkarɛ wũ atɔ̃me ɣɛɛ loinya kuira nyanyarĩa nɛ iso miɣɛ mito miɖaɛ wũ kanya.
42023015	Herodes ana ɔkpesera wũ ɔsese alasɔ ɔ̃inya kuira lalaa i ɔ̃ iso. Ngɔgbe iibara kuira nɛ loatã sɔ maaɖoe wũ.
42023016	Ne ɔso loatã mapɛ wũ kere lonyua wũ ɔkɛlɛ.”
42023017	Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe biara ame ne, Pilato sɛ ɔnyua yorɛdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔtã ma.
42023018	Ne ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ kulu teteree sɔ, “Ɖoe wũ! Si anyua Baraba atã bo!”
42023019	Baraba gɔgbe ne, mapia wũ i iyo ala kulu gɔ ɔbara i Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ame gu ituriɖoe.
42023020	Gɔ Pilato to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anyua Yesu ɔso ne, ɔledza ma ika iɖegu.
42023021	Ɣɛɛ mala kulu teteree mabua sɔ, “Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso! Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso!”
42023022	Ne Pilato ɔledza ma ikarɛ ɔkpɛ̃ tɛare sɔ, “Mme ikpi ɔbua ɔbara? Loinya nnɛ ɔbara fiɛ ikote sɔ loatã wũ kukpi ipɔ. Loatã mapɛ wũ iyɔ loɔnyua wũ.”
42023023	Ɣɛɛ matogu kulu teteree sɔ, “Ikote sɔ aatã mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso.” Kawirikɔ̃ ne, maɖe iso iki i ma kulu ila ame.
42023024	Ne ɔso Pilato ɔɖaɛ itɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ mato mabie.
42023025	Ɔnyua ngɔ mato mabie ɔtã ma, ngɔ mapia iyo ala ɔ̃ kulu ibara gu ituriɖoe ɔso. Ɔnyua Yesu ana ɔtã ma sɔ masɛ maabara wũ kumɛgɔ maɖɔɛ.
42023026	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ Yesu maruigu. Gɔ masɛ i ɔri mato makɛlɛ ne, manya ɔ Kirenese ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Simon gɔ ɔbɔrɛ i akorowa awɛ̃ ɔto ɔba Yerusalem. Matindza wũ maya wũ iso sɔ ɔfɔ ɔnyigbã gɔ i Yesu sore si ɔsiai wũ i kama.
42023027	Maturi gbodzoo siai Yesu i kama. Marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ pia i ma ndɛ̃ gɔ mato mabiɛ masiai wũ.
42023028	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔfiniki ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Yerusalem marɔ̃go, midaabiɛ me. Ɣɛɛ mibiɛ mitã so gu mi mabi.
42023029	Alasɔ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ maturi aaɣɛ sɔ, ‘Iti lɛ malɛma gu ayiri wa ame i mabi iisɛ gu mma loitã mabi inyɛ mameme!’
42023030	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame i maturi aaɣere abe sɔ, ‘Biɛ fu bo iso!’ Fiɛ maaɣere kubemi sɔ, ‘Kɔla bo!’
42023031	Alasɔ si kudziri yuɛ to kutsue kumɛgɔgbe ne, nda i kukorea aabara?”
42023032	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔmɔɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ ma nɖe maturi lalaa masɛgu sɔ maaɖoe gu Yesu.
42023033	Gɔ masɛ maabo ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ, itikui ne, mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso. Marɛrɛ̃ lalaa mamɔ ana ne, mapɛ ma mamatãra i kudziri iso, ɔwɛ̃ i kuɖearɔ̃ iso ɔnyɔare i kubena iso,
42023034	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, su tsɛ ma alasɔ maiɣe nnɛ mato mabara.” Ne kama ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ɔɣɛ so Yesu arapia gɔ mabara kareremi maro.
42023035	Maturi ɣɛ i mmɔ mato manyɔ fiɛ ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ana to mabara Yesu aɣiãra sɔ, “Ɔɖi maturi mama, ne ɔso si ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsia ikparĩ ne, ɔɖi so si bonyɔ!”
42023036	Makpakpɛ̃dze ma wũ ngbɔ ame mabara Yesu aɣiãra ne. Masu ndã bea mabɔ wũ sɔ ɔnɛ.
42023037	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Si fɔ nɖe ma Yudase igara ne, kpɛ̃ ɖi so!”
42023038	I ɔ̃ sitikpe ne, matsɛrɛ mamatãra sɔ, “Ma Yudase Igara i ngbe ne.”
42023039	Maturi lalaa ma mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso mmɔ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔtia Yesu ɔɣere sɔ, “Iiɖe fɔ nɖe Kristo? Ɖi so si aɖi bo bo wũ!”
42023040	Ne ɔ̃ ɔnyɔare to ɔnyagalagu wũ sɔ, “Aisɛ anigã Ɣaa? Kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ iwɛ̃ saã i makpakpɛ̃dze ɔtã bo gu wũ.
42023041	Bo kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ne, ikotegu bo. Alasɔ nnɛ bobara ne, ne kuso boto bofɔ ne. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃.”
42023042	Ne ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Yesu, nyigi me si abo fɔ sigarakaɖekɔ̃.”
42023043	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gbaã nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ nɔme ne, bo gu-ɔ aasarɛ i Paradiso ame.”
42023044	Ɔwi gɔ ipɛ lɛ iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ ne, kayi ɔbara guduu gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ isɛ iabo lɛ iɖɔwũ itɛ ame.
42023045	Kuɣɛ̃ ɔnyi, Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔkati gɔ nsa i mmɔ ɔkɛ aka anyɔ.
42023046	Ne Yesu ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Tete, fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame losu wũ siwarã lopia.” Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, ɔsɔra.
42023047	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ fiɛ ɔnya nnɛ loba ɔle Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã iɖe sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔturi sɛɛ ɔɖe.”
42023048	Gɔ maturi gbodzoo ma loba maɣɛ mato manyɔ ara ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, masore nrɔɔ̃ i ati makpese makɛlɛ ayo ku isomararã.
42023049	Mma ɔɖuɖu nɣe Yesu gu marɔ̃go ma losiai wũ mabɔrɛ i Galilea ɔya dzoroo manyɔ ara wa lokɛlɛ i katɔ̃.
42023050	-
42023051	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Yosef fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Arimatea i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ɔwe i mmɔ. Ɔturi sɛɛ gɔ masɛ mawarɛ gbaã ɔɖe. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔnyɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe iba ɔri. Atoa sɔ ɔpia i ma Yudase matɔ̃meɣɛdze ndɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃inɔgu ma karɔ̃ i nɛ mabara i ngbe iso.
42023052	Ɔkɛlɛ Pilato kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ ɔri sɔ ɔtã wũ ɔbɛse Yesu kpise.
42023053	Gɔ mabɛse wũ i kudziri iso ne, ɔsu ɔkati fudza ɔmini wũ. Ne ɔsu wũ ɔsɛ ɔ̃apia i itawo nɛ ame maibiara kuwɛ̃ manya ne.
42023054	Iyi nɛmɔ ne, Fiɖa iɖe ne ɔso Iwarãyi ka iba iasɛ karɔ̃.
42023055	Marɔ̃go ma losiai Yesu mabɔrɛ i Galilea ne, masiai Yosef masɛ maanya ngbegɔ ɔbiara Yesu gu kumɛgɔ ɔrara ɔ̃ kpise.
42023056	Makpese makɛlɛ iyo masɛ maakɔtɛ awa wa nsɛ afɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ fiɛ masɛ masu maledza ala makpise masɛ. Iwarãyi iso ne, mawarã lɛ kumɛgɔ i mmara ɔte awe.
42024001	Kɔsiɖa kaya tutuutu ne, marɔ̃go magbe ɔta makɛlɛ maturi kabiarakɔ̃ ku ara wa maaledza wũ ala.
42024002	Gɔ masɔ̃ ne, manya sɔ ita nɛ mali matɛ̃ ikpibiɔ kanya ne, maɔli ne masɛ i kuruɛ.
42024003	Ne ɔso mabo i ikpibiɔ ame, ɣɛɛ mainya Bosate Yesu kpise.
42024004	Nnɛgbe ɔbara ma ɣii. Ne gɔ maɣɛ mato mabu ne iso ne, maturi inyɔ ma awu nto afiɛ atsue anɔmi ɔbɔrɛ maya ma i katɔ̃.
42024005	Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ marɔ̃go gbaã ne ɔso mabɔ ma ati karɔ̃ matã ma. Ne mmamɔ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso mito minyɔnyɔ gbanadze i makpise ndɛ̃?
42024006	Ɔna i ngbe. Ɔ̃ɔta! Minyigi nnɛ ɔɣere mi gɔ ɔpiagu mi i Galilea sɔ,
42024007	‘Mato maaɖi Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi matã maturi lalaa. Mato maapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Fiɛ ayi atɛ kama ne, ɔto ɔ̃aledza ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ndɛ̃.’ ”
42024008	Ne marɔ̃go ɔnyigi atɔ̃me wamɔ ne.
42024009	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i maturi kabiarakɔ̃ mmɔ ne, masɛ maaɣere katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-ɔwɛ̃ gu matsɔra ara wagbe.
42024010	Marɔ̃go magbe nɖe Maria Magdalene gu Yohana gu Maria gɔ nɖe Yakobo ɔnyi. Ma gu marɔ̃go mama ɔsɛ maaɣere katɔ̃memasɛdze ara wagbe.
42024011	Ɣɛɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔbu sɔ ara wa i marɔ̃go to maɣɛ ne, adzimira aɖe. Ne ɔso maifɔ maɖe.
42024012	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔta ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ mmɔ. Gɔ ɔbɔdzo ɔnyɔ ikpibiɔ ame ne, ɔnya ɔkati gɔ mamini kpise. Ɔ̃isinya kuira, ne ɔso ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ iyo ɔto ɔbu nnɛ loba ngbe iti ame.
42024013	Iyi nɛmɔ ame iso ne, Yesu masiaidze inyɔ mawɛ̃ sɛ i ɔri mato makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ kosoi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Emaus. Ita i mmɔ iba Yerusalem aaɖe lɛ agu akɔdzɛ ɔɖui.
42024014	Masɛ mato maɖe ika i ara wa loba iso.
42024015	Gɔ masɛ mato maɖe ika maɣɛ ara wagbe ne, Yesu mɔmɔ ɔba ɔ̃atu ma ɔsiai ma.
42024016	Gɔ manya wũ ne, maiɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖe.
42024017	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be misɛ miɣɛ i ɔri iso?” Matui maya mabara so nnya nnya.
42024018	Ne ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Kleopa ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ fɔ nɖe ɔfɔ i Yerusalem fiɛ aiɣe ara wa loba i ɔwi kurukutu gɔgbe ame?”
42024019	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ara?” Ne mapia kanya sɔ, “Ara wa lobɔrɛ i Yesu Nasaretse iso gɔ nɖe Ɣaa kanyaɖidze iso. Ɔbara awawãra fiɛ ɔte ara ana ku ɔle i Ɣaa gu maturi ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
42024020	Ma Yudase Ɣaa masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu bo matɔ̃ɖedze ɔsu wũ mapia i Roma abã makpakpa nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ matã wũ kukpi ipɔ fiɛ mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso.
42024021	Ɣɛɛ bonyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ loaɖi Israel kaɖe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ. Ne kama ne, nɔme nɖe ikpɛnɛ tɛare gɔ ara wagbe ɔba.
42024022	Bo ikuri ame marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ ɔba maatara bo situ maɣedza gɔ masɛ maturi kabiarakɔ̃ maba ku kaya gagbe.
42024023	Mainya ɔ̃ kpise, ne makpese maba maaɣere bo sɔ Ɣaa makpabo mawɛ̃ ɔɖi so mate ma. Maɣere ma sɔ Yesu pia ngbã.
42024024	Bo ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔsɛ maturi kabiarakɔ̃ masɛ maanya lɛ kumɛgɔ i marɔ̃go ɔɣere bo pɛpɛɛpɛ, ɣɛɛ mainya wũ.”
42024025	Ne mmɔ i Yesu to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miikpa anɔ ɖuɖuuɖu. Mi kafɔkaɖe i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara wa maɣɛ iso se tɛgɛlɛ.
42024026	Miiɣe sɔ ikote sɔ Kristo aaki i inyɛwe nɛgbe igbã ame fiɛ ɔ̃akɛlɛ ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ i ikpawaĩ ame?”
42024027	Ne Yesu ɔɖiɖi ara wa matsɛrɛ i ɔ̃ iso mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ita i Mose gu ara wa i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ karɔ̃ ɔte ma ne.
42024028	Gɔ mabore mabo ɔmagɛ̃ kosoi gɔmɔ ne, Yesu ɔbara lɛ ɔfe ɔto ɔfe awe.
42024029	Ɣɛɛ matɛ̃ wũ ɔri maɣere wũ sɔ, “Kaɖe ɔɔro ɔso ne, tui we i bo kɔrɛ ngbe.” Ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo i ma kɔrɛ.
42024030	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i karɔ̃ sɔ si ɔɖegu ma ara. Gɔ ɔsu boɖoboɖo ne, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba, ne ɔbɛbɛse ɔsu ɔtã ma ne.
42024031	Ɔluwɛ̃ ma anɔ ɔbusi manya wũ maɖi ite, ɣɛɛ ɔyu ma iso.
42024032	Ne maɣere so sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔɖegu bo ika fiɛ ɔɖiɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me karɔ̃ ɔte bo i ɔri iso ne, isoɣɔ siare ɔwe i bo situ ame.”
42024033	Mata ɔluwɛ̃ makpese maɣo Yerusalem ɔri. Masɛ maanya katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-ɔwɛ̃ gɔ masi fiɛ maturi mama ana si i ma kɔrɛ
42024034	mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Bokɔse ɔta gbaã ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame fiɛ ɔɖi so ɔte Simon.”
42024035	Ne maturi inyɔ mamɔ ana ɔɣɛ ara wa manya i ɔri gu kumɛgɔ ɔɖi so ɔte ma gɔ ɔkpɛti boɖoboɖo ɔtã ma ne.
42024036	Gɔ maɣɛ mato maɣɛ nnɛgbe ne, ɔluwɛ̃ Yesu ɔba ɔ̃aya i ma ndɛ̃. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã mi.”
42024037	Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã ne maɣɛ sɔ kpise ɔɖe manya.
42024038	Ɣɛɛ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mikpɔkpɔtɔ mito miwararã so?
42024039	Minyɔ wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba si mipɛgu me minyɔ sɔ mme loɖe. Alasɔ kpise na sosina gu akui lɛ mito minya sɔ loba.”
42024040	Gɔ ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba ɔte ma.
42024041	Isoɣɔ siare ɔso ne, iɖa ma ifɔ iɖe, ibara ma ɣii. Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Araɖea awɛ̃ se i ngbe?”
42024042	Ne masu ikpɛ fɛ̃a matã wũ ne.
42024043	Ɔfɔ ɔwe i ma katɔ̃.
42024044	Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ara wagbe iso lola loɔɖe mi ika gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne. Ira biara nɛ matsɛrɛ i Mose mmara ɔko ame gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze siko ame gu David Sinɔ ɔko ame i wũ iso ne, ikote sɔ iaba ngbɔ.”
42024045	Ne ka ɔbusi ma adzuni ame sɔ maanɔ Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me karɔ̃ ne.
42024046	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ngbɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ Kristo aawe inyɛ ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ku ikpɛnɛ tɛare iso ne.
42024047	I ɔ̃ iyere ame ne, maaɣɛ ifiniki gu kasukatsɛ itɔ̃me i kayi ɔɖuɖu iso ita i Yerusalem.
42024048	Mi loaɖi atɔ̃me wa ɔɖuɖu minɔ gu nwa minya kanya.
42024049	Mme mɔmɔ to loasese mi nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃asese mi. Ɣɛɛ miya misia Ɣaa ɔle i Yerusalem gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃aba mi iso ɔbɔrɛ i kato.”
42024050	Ne ka ɔkɔ ma ɔbɔrɛgu i Yerusalem masɛ maabo Betania kɔrɛ. Ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔfere ma kusɛkusɛ iso.
42024051	Ne gɔ ɔto ɔtã ma kusɛkusɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato.
42024052	Mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ masɔrɛ wũ, ne makpese makɛlɛ Yerusalem ku isoɣɔ siare ne.
42024053	Mala maɔsɛ maɔle Ɣaa i kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ɔwi biara.
43001001	Ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, Itɔ̃me pia. Itɔ̃me gu Ɣaa mpia, fiɛ Ne nɖe Ɣaa.
43001002	Itɔ̃me gu Ɣaa pia fiɛ ira biara ɔsɛ karɔ̃.
43001003	Ɔ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔbara ira biara, fiɛ kuira na nɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ iso iki fiɛ mabara ne.
43001004	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame i ngbã mɔmɔ pia ne. Fiɛ ngbã mɛgbe nsɛ mitã maturi ikpawaĩ ne.
43001005	Ikpawaĩ nɛgbe sɛ ifiɛ ibo i idududu ame, fiɛ idududu iisɛ iwo ikpawaĩ ɔɖe iso.
43001006	Ɣaa ɔpia ɔ̃ ɔɖabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yohanes.
43001007	Ɔba ɔ̃aɖe maturi ika i ikpawaĩ iso, sɔ ma ɔɖuɖu aaki i ɔ̃ iso mafɔ maɖe.
43001008	Iiɖe Yohanes nɖe ikpawaĩ, ɣɛɛ ne, aɖansiɛ kere ɔba ɔ̃aɖe i ikpawaĩ iso.
43001009	Ikpawaĩ mɔmɔ nɛ nsɛ ifiɛ itã ɔbiara to iba kayiiso.
43001010	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ka ipia i kayi ame, fiɛ ɔ̃ iso maki fiɛ mabara kayi, ɣɛɛ kayiiso iiɣe wũ.
43001011	Ɔba ɔ̃ mɔmɔ aɖe maturi kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ aɖe maturi iifɔ wũ.
43001012	Ɣɛɛ mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ wũ fiɛ mafɔ wũ maɖe ne, ɔtã ma ɔle sɔ maakpese Ɣaa mabi.
43001013	Maikpese Ɣaa mabi iki i iɣe ame, ana ne iiɖe ɔrã gu ɔre kere ikpɛ̃ ɔkã fiɛ maɣe ma, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ lobara ma ɔ̃ mabi.
43001014	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔkpese ɔturi awune gɔ loyi ku abualɛra gu ɔnukuare, ɔba ɔ̃awe i bo ndɛ̃. Bonya ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ nɛ ɔfɔ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ lɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã.
43001015	Yohanes ɔɖe ika i ɔ̃ iso. Ɔla kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔgbe nɖe ɔturi gɔ itɔ̃me lola loɔɣere mi sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aba i wũ kama ne ɔɖo me fafaafã ne. Ka ɔpia kokooko fiɛ maɣe me.”
43001016	Kumɛgɔ ɔyi ku abualɛra i ɔ̃ ame ɔso ne, ɔ̃ɔfedza kusɛkusɛ ɔfere i bo ɔbiara iso gɔ kufere bo iso ɔwi biara.
43001017	Ɣaa ɔtã bo mmara ɔkigu i Mose iso, ɣɛɛ ɔtã bo abualɛra gu ɔnukuare iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
43001018	Kuwɛ̃ iinya Ɣaa ɔnya. Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ lokategu Ɣaa fiɛ ɔpia i ɔ̃ Ɔse kɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ loɖi wũ ɔte maturi ne.
43001019	Ma Yudase makpakpa ma i Yerusalem ɔpia masɔrɛdze gu ma Levise sɔ masɛ maakarɛ Yohanes sɔ, “Nna kowũ abua aɖe?”
43001020	Yohanes iikɔla ma kuira, ɣɛɛ ɔɣere ma ɔɖi sekelee sɔ, “Iiɖe mme nɖe Kristo gɔmɔ.”
43001021	Ne makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Iyɔ fɔ nɖe nna? Fɔ nɖe Kanyaɖidze Eliya?” Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Iiɖe mme nɖe wũ.” Maledza wũ ikarɛ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Kanyaɖidze gɔ maɣɛ masɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba?” Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo.”
43001022	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣere bo ngɔ kowũ abua aɖe alasɔ ikote sɔ boasɛ boatã mma lopia bo katɔ̃me mmuai. Fɔ nɖe nna?”
43001023	Yohanes ɔtã ma mmuai lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme nɖe ngɔ nto ɔla kulu i fafuĩ ame ɔɣɛ sɔ, miledza Bosate ɔri misɛ itã ɔ̃ iba.”
43001024	Ne mma i ma Farisise ɔpia katɔ̃me,
43001025	makarɛ Yohanes sɔ, “Si iiɖe fɔ nɖe Kristo, ɣee Eliya, ɣee Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze gɔ boto bonyɔ ɔri ne, be ɔso fiɛ ato apie maturi Ɣaa ndu?”
43001026	Yohanes ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme ne, losu ndu nto lobara mi ala kubarara gɔgbe, ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɣɛ i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ miiɣe.
43001027	Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ loaba i wũ kama ne, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loikote sɔ loabɔdzo loɖi ɔ̃ ndokota.”
43001028	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ i Betania ɔmagɛ̃ i Yordan ɔwore ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ ngbegɔ i Yohanes to ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu.
43001029	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ Yohanes ɔnya Yesu sɛ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ, Ɣaa Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ loafore kayiiso maturi akpi ɔɖi ma iso ne!
43001030	Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ iso loɣere mi sɔ, ‘Ɔwɛ̃ to ɔba i wũ kama gɔ loɖo me, alasɔ ka ɔpia kokooko fiɛ maɣe me.’
43001031	Mme wũ loiɣe wũ loɖegu katɔ̃, ɣɛɛ loba nto lopie maturi Ɣaa ndu si Ɣaa aaɖi wũ ɔte Israel kaɖe.”
43001032	Yohanes ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso ana sɔ, “Lonya Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso lɛ ilɔpɔ sibɔrɛ i Kato siba siasɛ wũ iso.
43001033	Loiɣe wũ loɖegu katɔ̃, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ lopia me sɔ lopie maturi ndu ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Ngɔ iso aanya wũ Siwarã ɔso siba siasia ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ loapie maturi Siwarã Bielea ne.’
43001034	Lonya iba ngbɔ, ne ɔso loto loɣere mi sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi ne.”
43001035	Kaɖesɛ̃a gɔ Yohanes gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze inyɔ ɣɛ
43001036	fiɛ ɔnya Yesu to ɔfe ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ, Ɣaa Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi mmɔ!”
43001037	Marasuãdze inyɔ magbe ɔnɔ nnɛ i Yohanes ɔɣɛ, ne ɔso marui masiai Yesu.
43001038	Gɔ Yesu ɔpɛ ɔfiniki fiɛ ɔnya sɔ masiai wũ ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be mito mibie?” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Rabi,” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe, Ratedze, “Botã-ɔ iti i lɛ isɛ asi?”
43001039	Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miba mianyɔ.” Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ka ito isɛ kutsuɛ iɖɔwũ ina ame, ne ɔso masiai wũ masɛ maawe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ kutsuɛ gɔmɔ ɔɖuɖu.
43001040	Marasuãdze inyɔ ma lonɔ nnɛ i Yohanes ɔɣɛ fiɛ masiai Yesu mmɔ ɔwɛ̃ nɖe Andrea, Simon Petro ɔnyiibi.
43001041	Ira ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ ɔbara nɖe sɔ ɔnyɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Simon. Gɔ ɔnya wũ ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Boɔnya Mesia,” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe Kristo ngɔ masɔla nnɔĩ.
43001042	Andrea ɔkɔ Simon ɔkɛlɛgu Yesu kɔrɛ. Gɔ Yesu ɔnya wũ ne, ɔnyɔ wũ totoroo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe Yohanes ɔbi Simon ne, ɣɛɛ ita i kiniɔ ne, maarɔ-ɔ sɔ Kefas,” ɣee Petro, gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe ita siare.
43001043	Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, Yesu ɔbara adzuni sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Galilea karɔ̃ iso. Gɔ ɔsɛ i ɔri ne, ɔnya ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Filipo, ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Siai me.”
43001044	Filipo ana ne, Betsaida gɔ nɖe Andrea gu Petro mɛrɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ ame iɖe ɔbɔrɛ.
43001045	Ne kama ne, Filipo ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔnya Nataniel, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Boɔnya ngɔ iso i Mose gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ ara masegu i Ɔko Sekelea ame. Ɔ̃ nɖe Yosef ɔbi Yesu gɔ lobɔrɛ i Nasaret ne.”
43001046	Nataniel ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Akuã! Ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ aawo ɔbɔrɛ i Nasaret?” Filipo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ba nyɔ kere!”
43001047	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya Nataniel sɛ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Israelse mɔmɔ gɔ iso i sila kusiwɛ̃ na i ngbe ne!”
43001048	Nataniel ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda abara fiɛ atsue ɔturi gɔ igbã loɖe?” Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Lonya-ɔ i kubo kayirinɔ fiɛ Filipo aakpere-ɔ.”
43001049	Nataniel ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Rabi, Ɣaa Ɔbi aɖe. Fɔ nɖe Israel Igara ne.”
43001050	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Be! Ɔɔfɔ aɖe alasɔ loɣere-ɔ sɔ lonya-ɔ i kubo kayirinɔ? Ato aanya ara wa lomɔ aɖo nwagbe!”
43001051	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbagbaã ne, mito mianya kato ɔbusi minya Ɣaa makpabo to maya maso i mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, iso.”
43002001	Ikpɛnɛ tɛare i nnɛmɔ kama ne, makɔ ɔrɔ̃go i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Kana i Galilea. Yesu ɔnyi ana ɔwe i mmɔ.
43002002	Makpere Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ana makɛlɛgu ɔrɔ̃go kakɔkɔ̃.
43002003	Gɔ ndã mɛ karabara mato mabara ɔro ne, Yesu ɔnyi ɔbore ɔbo wũ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ma ndã ɔɔro ma iso.”
43002004	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔnyi sɔ, “Mmã, iiɖe fɔ itɔ̃me iɖe mmɔ. Wũ ɔwi iiɣo.”
43002005	Ne Yesu ɔnyi ɔɣere maɖabo ma i iyo mmɔ sɔ, “Ibiara nɛ ɔɣere mi sɔ mibara ne, mibara.”
43002006	Gɔ iɖe ma Yudase kurabara sɔ maafofore so ɔso ne, maɣedza ndu ita abuiku akuɔ i inyamɔ i mmɔ. Ibuiku biara sɛ ifɔ kusorebui kuna ɣee kuru.
43002007	Yesu ɔɣere maɖabo sɔ maɖu ndu mafere i abuiku wamɔ ame si miyi, ne mabara ngbɔ ne.
43002008	Ne ka ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mika ndu mikɛlɛgu ɔkpakpa gɔ nto ɔnyɔ araɖea iso.” Ne maka makɛlɛgu wũ ne.
43002009	Gɔ ɔtu ndu mɛ loɔkpese ndã ɔnyɔ, fiɛ ɔ̃iɣe ngbegɔ mise, ɣɛɛ maɖabo ma maɣe ne, ɔtã makpere ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze matã wũ.
43002010	Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔbiara ne, ndã sɛɛ miɖe ɔsɛ ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖi ɔtã maturi manɛ, si ka mato marɛ̃ ne, ne ɔsɛ ɔɖi mibea ɔbɔ ne. Ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, kini ato aɖi ndã sɛɛ abɔ ne!”
43002011	Yesu ɔbara iwawãra ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛgbe i Kana i Galilea karɔ̃ iso. Mmɔ ɔɖi ɔ̃ ɔle ɔte fiɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔfɔ wũ maɖe ne.
43002012	Ne kama ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ manyiibi gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkɛlɛ Kapernaum masɛ maawe i mmɔ ayi kɛkɛĩ.
43002013	Gɔ ma Yudase Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ɔɔro ɔɣo ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem.
43002014	I Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo ame ne, ɔnya maturi to marɔdɛ̃ manantsuĩ, masɛrɛ gu ayo ame alɔpɔ gu mma nto manyuarã sikã si i karɔ̃ mmɔ.
43002015	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔfɛ̃ iporoibi ala awɛĩ ɔsu ɔsa manantsuĩ gu masɛrɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔɖi i Isɔrɛyo ame, ɔturi sikã manyuarãdze sipɔrɔ̃ gu ma sikã ɔfere i karɔ̃.
43002016	Ne ɔɣere mma nto marɔdɛ̃ ayo ame alɔpɔ sɔ, “Mimala mi ara miɖi i ngbe si minyua Tete iyo ɔsu ɔbara kuɣa ame.”
43002017	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnyigi itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, “Wũ kuɖɔɛ gɔ loba lotã fɔ iyo ɔtã wũ anɔmi ɔrɛtɛ.”
43002018	Ne ma Yudase makpakpa ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Mme iwawãra aawo ɔbara asu asia ita sɔ aba ɔle aabara nnɛ abara i ngbe?”
43002019	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Mibiɛ Isɔrɛyo nɛgbe, ɣɛɛ akpɛnɛ atɛ kama ne, loaledza ne itsue!”
43002020	Ne ma Yudase ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ato aɣɛ? Aawo akpɛnɛ atɛ ɔsu ɔledza iyo nɛ masu akɔ sina akuɔ matsue ɔtsue?”
43002021	Ɣɛɛ mainɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ sosina ɔsu ɔto ɔkateragu Isɔrɛyo.
43002022	Ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔnyigi sɔ ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe. Itã mafɔ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ maɖe gu ara wa i Yesu ɔɣere ma.
43002023	Gɔ Yesu ɔwe i Yerusalem ku Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ wũ maɖe ala awawãra wa manya ɔbara ɔso.
43002024	Ɣɛɛ Yesu iibaragu ma mawɛ̃, alasɔ ɔɣe maturi ɔɖuɖu.
43002025	Iinya sɔ kuwɛ̃ aaɣere wũ kumɛgɔ i maturi awune se alasɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɣe ma situ ame.
43003001	Ma Yudase tɔ̃ɖedze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Nikodemo fiɛ ɔpia i ikuri nɛ masɛ marɔ sɔ ma Farisise ɔwe.
43003002	Kasɛ̃ kawɛ̃ ne, ɔba Yesu kɔrɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere wũ sɔ, “Rabi, boɣe sɔ Ratedze aɖe abɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ala ara wa ato abara ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo wã ɔbara si Ɣaa kɔrɔ̃ iisia wũ iso.”
43003003	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gbagbaã nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ si mailedza ɔturi iɣe ne, ɔ̃ibanya Ɣaa sigara iɖe ɔnya.”
43003004	Ne Nikodemo ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda maabara maaledza ɔkpakpa iɣe gɔ ɔ̃isibawo ɔ̃ ɔnyi kayiri ame ɔkpese ɔbo?”
43003005	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gbagbaã nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ, si maiɣe ɔturi makigu i ndu gu Ɣaa Siwarã ame ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ɔbo.
43003006	Maɣese nsɛ maɣe ɔturi i siturina ame, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Siwarã nsɛ siɣe ɔturi i siwarã ame.
43003007	Ne ɔso daatã ibara-ɔ ɣaa sɔ nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ ikote sɔ maaledza mi ɔɖuɖu iɣe.
43003008	Ɔwiri sɛ ɔkpɛ̃ ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ iɖe ɔɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ kulu kere iɖe aanɔ, aibatsue ngbegɔ iɖe ɔbɔrɛ, ɣee ngbegɔ iɖe ɔsɛ. Ngbɔ ame nɖe ɔbiara gɔ maɣe makigu i Siwarã ame ne.”
43003009	Ne Nikodemo ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda i nnɛgbe aabara iaba?”
43003010	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ lɛ ratedzekpakpa i Israel ne, aiɣe nnɛgbe?
43003011	Gbagbaã nto loɣere-ɔ sɔ, ara wa boɣe boto boɣere mi, fiɛ nwa bonya iso boto boɖe mi ika, ɣɛɛ miito mibie sɔ miafɔ nnɛ boto boɣere mi.
43003012	Si aito afɔ me aɖe si loɣere-ɔ kayiiso ngbe ara ne, nda aabara fiɛ aafɔ me aɖe si loɣere-ɔ ara wa mpia i kato?
43003013	Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ kato ɔnya iɖo mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, gɔ lose i kato ɔba karɔ̃.
43003014	“Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Mose ɔsu aɣɛ wa mabara ala ibɔra ɔsa i ɔdziri iso i fafuĩ ame ne, ngbɔ ame iɖe maakɔlɛ mme, Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi, kato ne,
43003015	sɔ mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ me maɖe ne, maana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
43003016	“Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔbua ɔto ɔɖɔɛ kayiiso maturi sɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔtã sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ibawɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
43003017	Alasɔ Ɣaa iipia ɔ̃ Ɔbi sɔ ɔba ɔ̃atã kayiiso maturi ipɔ, ɣɛɛ sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃aɖe ma Ɖidze.
43003018	“Mma lofɔ Ɔbi maɖe ne, Ɣaa iitã ma ipɔ, ɣɛɛ mma loifɔ wũ maɖe ne, maɔɖe ipɔ koko alasɔ maifɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔwɛ̃ saã maɖe.
43003019	Nnɛ ɔso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã maturi ipɔ nɖe sɔ, ikpawaĩ ɔba kayiiso, ɣɛɛ mato maɖɔɛ idududu maɖo ikpawaĩ alasɔ ma kurabarara ɔnyanyarĩ.
43003020	Mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mabara ara lalaa ɔtsiri ikpawaĩ, fiɛ maisɛ mabie sɔ maabore mabo ne alasɔ maito mabie sɔ ma ara lalaa si are kayi.
43003021	Ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara i ɔnukuare ɔri iso, masɛ mabore maba ikpawaĩ kɔrɛ sɔ si iate sɔ mato makã Ɣaa atsue.”
43003022	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkɛlɛ Yudea ibuiti ame. Ɔwegu ma i mmɔ kɛkɛĩ fiɛ ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu i ɔwore ame.
43003023	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yohanes ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu i Aenon gɔ lobore ɔbo Salim alasɔ ndu ɔsi i mmɔ. Maturi to maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔto ɔpie ma Ɣaa ndu.
43003024	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, maimɔɛ̃ Yohanes mapia i iyo.
43003025	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, karawararã ɔbo i Yohanes marasuãdze gu ɔ Yudase ɔwɛ̃ ndɛ̃ i ma Yudase ifoforeso kubarara iso.
43003026	Ne ɔso maba maaɣere Yohanes sɔ, “Ratedze, ato anyigi ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lowegu-ɔ i Yordan kama isɛ fiɛ aɖe ɔ̃ iso aɖansiɛ mmɔ? Kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ ka nto ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɔsore so makpa ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne.”
43003027	Yohanes ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ɔturi iibawe kuira si iiɖe Ɣaa lotã wũ.
43003028	Mi mɔmɔ ɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ loɣere mi sɔ, iiɖe me nɖe Kristo gɔmɔ, ne Ɣaa lopia me sɔ loɖe wũ katɔ̃.
43003029	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔkɔ ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔ̃ mba ɔrɔ̃go ne. Ɔ̃ ɔlaa gɔ nɖe ɔ̃ masaa fiɛ ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔto ɔkã wũ atsue sɛ ɔna isoɣɔ si ɔto ɔnɔ ɔ̃ silɔ. Ngbɔ ame i isoɣɔ ɔɔyi i wũ ame ne.
43003030	Ne ɔso ɔ̃ iyere aakɔlɛ kato, ɣɛɛ wũ ire aaba karɔ̃.
43003031	“Ngɔ lose i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔmɔ ɔɖo ɔbiara. Ngɔ lose i karɔ̃ iso ne, karɔ̃ iso ɔre ɔɖe fiɛ karɔ̃ iso ara iso ɔsɛ ɔɖe ika. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lose i kato ne, ɔɖo ma ɔɖuɖu.
43003032	Ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ ara wa ɔnya gu nwa ɔnɔ, ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔfɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.
43003033	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lofɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔɖe ɔsia ita sɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔnukuarese ɔɖe.
43003034	Ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia katɔ̃me ne, ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me, alasɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔyi i ɔ̃ ame.
43003035	Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi, fiɛ ɔsu ira biara ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔle kayirinɔ.
43003036	“Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɔbi ɔɖe ba ngbã mɛ loibaro, ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ losɛ̃ Ɣaa Ɔbi atsue ikã ne, ɔ̃ibana ngbã, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ sia wũ iso.”
43004001	Ma Farisise ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu to ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu, fiɛ ɔto ɔna marasuãdze ɔɖo Yohanes.
43004002	Atoa sɔ Yesu mɔmɔ iipie kuwɛ̃ Ɣaa ndu, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze nto mabara.
43004003	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔrui i Yudea ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Galilea.
43004004	Ɣɛɛ ne, ipia sɔ ɔ̃aki i Samaria karɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃akɛlɛ.
43004005	Yesu ɔba ɔ̃abo Samaria ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Sikar kabenya. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔbore ɔbo iputu nɛ i ma ɔwa Yakob ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔbi Yosef.
43004006	Yakob itubiɔ nɛ ɔɖi pia i mmɔ. Gɔ Yesu ɔba ɔ̃abo mmɔ lɛ kakɔme iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ ame ne, iɖa wũ ala ɔsɛ ɔso, ne ɔso ɔkpase ɔsɛ i itubiɔ nɛgbe kɔrɛ.
43004007	Samaria ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔba sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖu ndu, ne ɔso Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Tã me ndu lonɛ.”
43004008	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu marasuãdze ɔrui makpa ɔmagɛ̃ ame maaɣa araɖea.
43004009	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Nda ibara fiɛ fɔ ɔ Yudase to akarɛ me Samaria ɔrɔ̃go ndu nɛa?” Ɔkarɛ wũ ngbɔ alasɔ ma Yudase gu ma Samariase iisɛ mafe.
43004010	Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Si ɔɣe aɣe Ɣaa karatã gu ngɔ nto ɔkarɛ-ɔ ndu ne, tee fɔ bowũ fɔ loakarɛ wũ sɔ ɔtã-ɔ ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã.”
43004011	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Tete, gɔ ana nnɛ aaɖu ala ndu, fiɛ itubiɔ ana ɔwodoro ne, lɛ aaka ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã ngbe abɔrɛgu?
43004012	Ɛɛbɛrɛ fɔ loɖo bo Ɔwa Yakob gɔ loɖi itubiɔ nɛgbe ɔtã bo fiɛ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ mabi gu ma mabɔi ɔnɛ ndu mɛgbe?”
43004013	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔnɛ ndu mɛgbe ne, ɔme to ɔ̃aledza wũ ikore.
43004014	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loanɛ ndu mɛ loatã wũ ne, ɔme iisibakore wũ ɔnya. Alasɔ ndu mɛ loatã wũ ɔnɛ to miakpese ndu gɔdɛ̃a mɛ nto mibore mife ɔwi biara i ɔ̃ ame mitã wũ ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.”
43004015	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, tã me ndu mɛgbe lonɛ si ɔme iisibakore me ɔnya sɔ loibakpese loba ngbe sɔ loba loaɖu ndu.”
43004016	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aakpere fɔ ɔrã si miba.”
43004017	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Lona kurã.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Aɣɛ ɔnukuare sɔ ana kurã.
43004018	Gbaã iɖe aɣɛ. Alasɔ ɔɔyiri marɛrɛ̃ iru anya, fiɛ ngɔ iyo asi kiniɔ ana ne, iiɖe fɔ ɔrã ɔɖe.”
43004019	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Tete, lonya sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze aɖe!
43004020	Bo ma Samariase mawa ɔsɔrɛ Ɣaa i kube gɔgbe iso, ɣɛɛ mi ma Yudase sɔ Yerusalem nɖe ngbegɔ boasɔrɛ Ɣaa.”
43004021	Ne Yesu ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, fɔ me ɖe sɔ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ maturi iisibasɔrɛ bo Ɔse Ɣaa i kube gɔgbe iso, ɣee Yerusalem.
43004022	Mi ma Samariase ne, miiɣe ngɔ mito misɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ bo ma Yudase ne, boɣe ngɔ boto bosɔrɛ, alasɔ bo kɔrɛ i Ɣaa iɖi ɔbɔrɛ.
43004023	Ɣɛɛ ɔwi to ɔba fiɛ ɔwi gɔmɔ ɔɔɣo sɔ Ɣaa masɔrɛdze gbaã aasɔrɛ wũ i Ɔ̃ Siwarã gu ɔnukuare ame, alasɔ masɔrɛdze magbe igbã i Ɣaa to ɔbie ne.
43004024	Gɔ Ɣaa ne Siwarã ɔɖe ɔso ne, ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔle gu ɔnukuare ame pɛ i maturi aawo ɔki fiɛ maasɔrɛ wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote.”
43004025	Ne ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Loɣe sɔ Mesia gɔ marɔ sɔ Kristo to ɔ̃aba, fiɛ si ɔba ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖi ira biara ɔɣere bo.”
43004026	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme gɔ mme nto loɖegu-ɔ ika ne, mme nɖe wũ ne.”
43004027	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Yesu marasuãdze ɔba maabo fiɛ ibara ma ɣaa sɔ ɔto ɔɖegu ɔrɔ̃go ika, ɣɛɛ ma kuwɛ̃ iiwo ɔrɔ̃go ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be ato abie?” ɣee makarɛ Bosate sɔ, “Be ɔso ato aɖegu wũ ika?”
43004028	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔnyua ɔ̃ ituɖura ɔsɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere maturi sɔ,
43004029	“Miba mianyɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loɣere me ira biara nɛ loɔbara lonya i wũ ngbã ame! Bɛrɛ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo gɔmɔ?”
43004030	Ne ɔso maturi ɔbɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame makɛlɛ sɔ maanyɔ Yesu.
43004031	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, marasuãdze to mapɛ Yesu nrɔɔ̃ sɔ, “Ratedze, boto-ɔ i kukpa sɔ ba ɖe ara!”
43004032	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loba aɖera wa loaɖe ɣɛɛ miiɣe wã.”
43004033	Ne ɔso marasuãdze ɔtsɛ so ikarɛ sɔ, “Bɛrɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔ wũ aɖera fiɛ boiɣe?”
43004034	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ aɖera nɖe sɔ loabara ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me kuɖɔɛ, lobara karabara ga ɔpia me lowiri.
43004035	Mi nsɛ miɣɛ sɔ, ‘Awa ana loɔkuti fiɛ ɔraɖui aabo kaa,’ ɣɛɛ mme nto loɣere mi sɔ, si minyɔ nkpɛkɔ̃ iso kukaakɔ ne, mianya sɔ kamɔ ɔɔbe kanya irui!
43004036	Ngɔ nto ɔsɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui fiɛ ɔto ɔsa ɔraɖui kanya ɔtã ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã kuso. Ne ɔso ngɔ losa ɔraɖui gu ngɔ losɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui isoɣɔ aaɖe iwɛ̃.
43004037	Ne ɔso itɔ̃me nɛgbe pia i ne ame sɔ, ‘Ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ sɛ ɔsa ɔraɖui fiɛ ɔmama ana sɛ ɔsɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui.’
43004038	Lopia mi sɔ misɛ miasɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui i kakpɛkɔ̃ ga iiɖe mi lokpɛ̃ ame, maturi mama lobara karabara i mmɔ, ɣɛɛ mi loana kã kusia.”
43004039	Ma Samariase gbodzoo i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ɔfɔ Yesu maɖe, alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔɣere me ira biara nɛ loɔbara lonya i wũ ngbã ame.”
43004040	Gɔ mabɔrɛ maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, mapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ kɛkɛĩ, ne ɔso Yesu ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ ayi anyɔ.
43004041	Maturi gbodzoo mama ana ɔfɔ wũ maɖe gɔ manɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.
43004042	Ne maɣere ɔrɔ̃go sɔ, “Kiniɔ ne, bofɔ wũ boɖe, iiɖe nnɛ aɣere bo ɔso, ɣɛɛ bo mɔmɔ ɔɔnɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ boɣe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe kayiiso Ɖidze gbaã.”
43004043	Ayi anyɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ Galilea karɔ̃ iso.
43004044	Atoa sɔ Yesu mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame sɔ, “Ɣaa kanyaɖidze na kuwarɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ aɖe ne,”
43004045	gɔ ɔba ɔ̃abo Galilea ne, mafɔ wũ kukaakɔ, alasɔ gɔ masɛ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe i Yerusalem ne, manya ira biara nɛ ɔbara i iyi kaɖekɔ̃.
43004046	Yesu ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Kana i Galilea ngbegɔ ɔfinikira ndu ɔbara ndã ɔnya. Abã ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ pia i mmɔ gɔ ɔbi birɛrɛĩ nto ɔnyɛ i Kapernaum.
43004047	Gɔ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu ɔbɔrɛ i Yudea ɔba Galilea ne, ɔba ɔ̃apɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔba makɛlɛ Kapernaum si ɔba ɔ̃asa ɔ̃ ɔbi gɔ nto ɔnyɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ɔro ɔkpi.
43004048	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si miinya awawãra gu akparĩ ne, miisɛ mifɔ miɖe.”
43004049	Ɣɛɛ ɔkpakpa gɔmɔ ɔtã Yesu iti sɔ, “Bosate, loto-ɔ i kukpa sɔ ba bokɛlɛ si wũ ɔbi iibakpi.”
43004050	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ ne fɔ ɔbi to ɔ̃awe ngbã.” Ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔfɔ nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣere wũ ɔɖe, ne ɔso ɔrui ɔɣo ma aɖe ɔri.
43004051	Ɔwi gɔ ɔsɛ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ne, ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔba maaɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ɔbi ɔɔsarɛ!”
43004052	Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ mme ɔwi ame iɖe ɔsarɛ. Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Lɛ kakɔme ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ ame ku kɔmakaɖe i kubetɔ ɔta wũ iso.”
43004053	Ne ɔ̃ ɔse ɔnyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame tutuutu iɖe i Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ɔbi to ɔ̃awe ngbã,” ne. Ne ɔso ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Yesu maɖe.
43004054	Nnɛgbe nɖe iwawãra nyɔare nɛ i Yesu ɔbara i Galilea karɔ̃ iso gɔ ɔse i Yudea ɔba.
43005001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, gɔ ma Yudase to maɖe ma iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔsɛ Yerusalem.
43005002	I ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, kayogodɔ̃ kawɛ̃ pia ga masɛ marɔ sɔ Masɛrɛ Kayogodɔ̃. I kã kɔrɛ ne, ibu iwɛ̃ nɛ i kukpakɛ kuru ɔki kulɔ se fiɛ masɛ marɔ ibu nɛgbe sɔ Betesda i ma Yudase siɖe ame.
43005003	Manyɛse gbodzoo rɛ i kukpakɛ gɔgbe kayirinɔ. Ma mawɛ̃ ɖe manɔbiɛdze, mawɛ̃ ɖe mabafã gu mma lokpi kasɛkasɛ.
43005004	(Marɛ i mmɔ alasɔ ipɔlɛipɔlɛ ne, Ɣaa kpabo sɛ ɔba ɔ̃atidza ndu. Nyɛse gɔ loaɖe katɔ̃ ɔbo me ame si matidza ndu sɛ ɔna isosarɛ ɔluwɛ̃.)
43005005	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ rɛ i mmɔ gɔ ɔto ɔnyɛ akɔ sitɛ farafana.
43005006	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya wũ fiɛ ɔtsue sɔ ɔ̃ɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔwi ɔdzoro ne, ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ato abie sɔ aasarɛ?”
43005007	Ne nyɛse to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Tete, lona kuwɛ̃ gɔ loaputa me ɔpia i ndu ame si matidza me, fiɛ si loto lokpɛ̃ sɔ loabo i ibu ame ne, ɔturi mama sɛ ɔɖe me katɔ̃.”
43005008	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si akarĩ fɔ ɔkala si asɛ.”
43005009	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔsarɛ, ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔkala ɔtsɛ isɛ. Iyi nɛ ira nɛgbe ɔba ne, ma Yudase Iwarãyi iɖe.
43005010	Ne ɔso gɔ ma Yudase makpakpa ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe gɔ ɔto ɔ̃ ɔkala ne, maɣere wũ sɔ, “Iwarãyi iɖe nɔme, ne ɔso ita iya i bo mmara iso sɔ aala fɔ ɔkala asɛ.”
43005011	Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ losa me loɣere me sɔ, ‘Su fɔ ɔkala si asɛ.’ ”
43005012	Ne makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nna ɔɖe loɣere-ɔ sɔ bara ngbɔ?”
43005013	Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iiɣe ngɔ i Yesu ɖe, fiɛ maturi ana ɔsi i mmɔ, ne ɔso Yesu ɔma ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃ ɔrui i mmɔ.
43005014	Ne kama ne, Yesu ɔnya wũ i Isɔrɛyo, ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ, kiniɔ gɔ ɔɔsarɛ ne, daasibara ikpi sɔ nnɛ loɖo ngbe aaba iabara-ɔ.”
43005015	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ ɔrui ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma Yudase makpakpa sɔ Yesu ɔɖe losa wũ.
43005016	Ne ɔso matsɛ Yesu kama iti, alasɔ ɔsa ɔturi ku Iwarãyi.
43005017	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ Ɔse to ɔbara karabara ɔwi biara ame, ne ɔso me wũ loto lobara karabara.”
43005018	Nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbe ɔtã ma Yudase makpakpa ɔsia ita sɔ ngbɛsi maɖoe wũ. Manya sɔ iiɖe ma mmara kere miɖe ɔtu, ɣɛɛ ana ne, ɔsu so ɔbara Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ ite sɔ ɔkategu Ɣaa.
43005019	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbagbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ, Ɣaa Ɔbi iibawo kuira ɔbara i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame iɖo nnɛ ɔnya ɔ̃ Ɔse to ɔbara, fiɛ nnɛ i Ɔse to ɔbara ne, ne i Ɔbi sɛ ɔbara ne.
43005020	Alasɔ Ɔse to ɔɖɔɛ Ɔbi ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔte wũ ira biara nɛ ɔto ɔbara. Ɔse to ɔ̃ate ara wa lomɔ aɖo ngbe gɔ ito iabara mi ɣii.
43005021	Kumɛgɔ ame i Ɔse sɛ ɔtara makpise ɔtã ma ngbã ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɔbi ana sɛ ɔtã mma ɔto ɔɖɔɛ ngbã ne.
43005022	Ɔse mɔmɔ iisɛ ɔɣɛgu kuwɛ̃ atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ ɔsu atɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔle ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i Ɔbi nrɔɔ̃ ame.
43005023	Ɔse ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ si maturi ɔɖuɖu aawarɛ Ɔbi lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mawarɛ Ɔse. Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔwarɛ Ɔbi iisɛ ɔwarɛ Ɔse gɔ lopia wũ katɔ̃me.
43005024	“Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ wũ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔfɔ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ɔɖe ba ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro. Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ɔbɔrɛ i kukpi ame ɔbo i ngbã ame.
43005025	Gbaã nto loɣere mi sɔ ɔwi to ɔba fiɛ ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ makpise aanɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi silɔ fiɛ mma lonɔ to maata masɛ ngbã.
43005026	Kumɛgɔ ame i Ɔse ɖe ngbã Sate ne, ngbɔ ame iɖe ɔbara Ɔbi ana sɔ ɔɖe ngbã Sate ne.
43005027	Fiɛ ɔtã wũ ɔle sɔ ɔɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi.
43005028	“Nnɛgbe si idaabara mi ɣaa alasɔ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ makpise ɔɖuɖu to maanɔ ɔ̃ silɔ,
43005029	fiɛ maata mabɔrɛ i ma akpibiɔ ame. Mma lobara ara sɛɛ to maata masɛ ngbã, ɣɛɛ mma lobara ikpi ana to maata matã kutsue ikpadzɛ̃.
43005030	“Loibawo kuira ɔbara i wũ ɔle ame, nsɛ loɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣere me. Ne ɔso wũ atɔ̃me iɣɛ se tɔrɔrɔ, alasɔ loisɛ lobara nnɛ loɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ nnɛ i ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ɔɖɔɛ nsɛ lobara.
43005031	“Si loɖe so aɖansiɛ ne, iyɔ wũ aɖansiɛ iibaɖe ɔnukuare.
43005032	Ɣɛɛ ɔmama pia gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe me aɖansiɛ fiɛ loɣe sɔ nnɛ ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ i wũ iso ne, gbaã iɖe.
43005033	“Mipia mi makpabo Yohanes kɔrɛ i wũ iso, fiɛ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ i ɔnukuare iso.
43005034	Iiɖe sɔ ɔnya ko inya sɔ loana ɔturi awune ɔɖe me aɖansiɛ, ɣɛɛ loto loɣɛ ngbɔ sɔ si miana iɖi.
43005035	Yohanes se lɛ ɔkaniɛ gɔ losa, fiɛ miɖɔɛ ɔwi kurukutu sɔ miawe i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame ku isoɣɔ.
43005036	“Ɣɛɛ loba aɖansiɛ wa mba ɔrɔrã aɖo Yohanes ɔkpɛ. Wã nɖe wũ kurabarara gɔ losɛ lobara ne. Karabara ga i Tete ɔtã me sɔ lobara loro ne, kã nsɛ kaɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ ɔ̃ lopia me katɔ̃me ne.
43005037	Fiɛ Tete gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ana sɛ ɔɖe me aɖansiɛ. Miinɔ ɔ̃ silɔ minɔ fiɛ miinya wũ ana minya.
43005038	Miisɛ mimɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me mipia i mi situ ame, alasɔ miifɔ ngɔ ɔpia katɔ̃me miɖe.
43005039	Misɛ mifafarɛ Ɔko Sekelea ame, alasɔ minyɔ sɔ ne ame miana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro, ɣɛɛ wũ iso matsɛrɛ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu masegu.
43005040	Ɣɛɛ miito mibie sɔ miaba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ miana ngbã mɛmɔ.
43005041	“Loito lobie ɔturi awune ile,
43005042	alasɔ loɣe maturi ma igbã miɖe fiɛ loɣe sɔ miisɛ miɖɔɛ Ɣaa i mi situ ame.
43005043	Loba i wũ Ɔse ɔle ame, ɣɛɛ miifɔ me, si ɔrere ɔba i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame ne, mito miafɔ wũ.
43005044	Misɛ miɖɔɛ sɔ mi malaa si male mi, ɣɛɛ miisɛ mibie sɔ ngɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Ɣaa si ɔle mi. Ne ɔso nda miabara fiɛ miafɔ me miɖe?
43005045	“Midaanyɔ ɔri sɔ me loatã mi ipɔ i Tete kɔrɛ. Mose gɔ ame i mi ɔɖuɖu ɔriinyɔ pia ne, ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loatã mi ipɔ ne.
43005046	Si gbaã iɖe sɔ mifɔ Mose miɖe ne, tee miafɔ me miɖe, alasɔ wũ iso ɔtsɛrɛ ara ɔsegu.
43005047	Ɣɛɛ gɔ miifɔ nnɛ ɔtsɛrɛ miɖe ne, nda miabara fiɛ miafɔ nnɛ loɣere mi miɖe?”
43006001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔwara Galilea itubu nɛ masɛ marɔ ana sɔ Tiberia itubu.
43006002	Maturi gbodzoo siai wũ alasɔ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔsa sinyɛ ɔbara ma ɣii.
43006003	Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔya kabemi kawɛ̃ masɛ maasɛ i kã iso.
43006004	Ma Yudase Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe ana ɔɔbore ibo.
43006005	Gɔ Yesu ɔnyɔ ne, ɔnya maturi gbodzoo to maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, ne ɔso ɔkarɛ Filipo sɔ, “Lɛ boaɣa aɖera wa losi aaɣo mmagbe ɔɖuɖu maɖe?”
43006006	Ɔɣɛ ngbɔ si ɔkere Filipo ɔnyɔ atoa sɔ ka ɔɣe koko nnɛ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃abara.
43006007	Ne Filipo to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Maturi alafa anyɔ ikpɛnɛ kuso kɔra iibawo aɖera ɔɣa aɣo mmagbe ɔɖe nane kɛkɛĩ kɛkɛĩ!”
43006008	Mmɔ ne rasuãdze mama gɔ nɖe Andrea gɔ nɖe Simon Petro ɔnyiibi ɔɣɛ sɔ,
43006009	“Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɔwɛ̃ pia i ngbe gɔ mba abolo kuboi kuru gu kufarai kunyɔ, ɣɛɛ ne, be i nnɛmɔ aabara maturi gbodzoo magbe?”
43006010	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã maturi si masɛ i karɔ̃.” Mmɔ ɔkpa ne ɔso masɛ i sikua iso. Marɛrɛ̃ kerekere aaɖe lɛ kukpi kuru ɔɖui.
43006011	Ne Yesu ɔfɔ aɖera ne, ɔpɛ ɣaa siba i wã iti fiɛ ka ɔsu ɔɣɛɣɛ mma nsi karɔ̃. Ɔfɔ kufarai kuna fiɛ ɔbara ngbɔ ame, ɔbiara ɔɖe ara ɔmi.
43006012	Gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɔɖe mami ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Mimala kupupui ɔɖuɖu ne midaatã kukawɛ̃ si kanina.”
43006013	Ne ɔso masa kupupui gɔ lokpɛkpɛti i abolo kuboi kuru gɔ i maturi ɔɖe ɔɖuɖu kanya ne, kuyi kusɛsɛi kuweo-kunyɔ.
43006014	Gɔ mma mpia i mmɔ ɔnya iwawãra nɛ i Yesu ɔbara ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ne, Kanyaɖidze gɔ sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aba i ngbe ne!”
43006015	Ne gɔ Yesu ɔnya sɔ mato mabie sɔ maaba maamɔɛ̃ wũ sigara i so ɔle ame ne, ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ kube iso ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃.
43006016	Kutsuɛ gɔmɔ ne, ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔrui makɛlɛ itubu kɔrɛ.
43006017	Gɔ maya mabo i ɔkolo ame ne, matsɛ iwa ikɛlɛ Kapernaum isɛ, atoa sɔ kaɖe ɔɔro ne, Yesu iiba ɔ̃abo ma kɔrɛ.
43006018	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, ndu to miɖa so ala ɔwiri to ɔkpɛ̃ teteree.
43006019	Gɔ marasuãdze ɔɔwa ɔkolo masɛ i ndu iso lɛ agu atɛ ito ikɛlɛ ana kere ne, manya Yesu sɛ i ndu iso ɔto ɔba ɔkolo kɔrɛ, ne ɔso ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma!
43006020	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaanigã ne mme loɖe!”
43006021	Ma situ ɔkpase sisɛ, mafɔ wũ mapia i ɔkolo ame kere fiɛ mabo ɔkpokpo ngbegɔ masɛ ne.
43006022	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, maturi gbodzoo ma lowe i itubu ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ isɛ ɔnya sɔ ɔkolo ɔwɛ̃ pɛ lose i mmɔ. Maɣe sɔ Yesu iibo i ɔkolo gɔmɔ ame gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze ne ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ lorui.
43006023	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, sikolo mama dzɛ lose i Tiberia ɔba siabo i ngbegɔ i Bosate ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i aɖera iti ɔsu ɔtã maturi ɔɖe kɔrɛ.
43006024	Ne ɔso gɔ maturi gbodzoo mamɔ ɔnya sɔ Yesu ɣee ɔ̃ marasuãdze na i mmɔ ne, mata mabo i sikolo ame makɛlɛ Kapernaum sɔ maanyɔnyɔ wũ.
43006025	Gɔ manya Yesu i itubu ɔkpokpo gɔmɔ isɛ ne, makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, ku mme ɔwi abo ngbe?”
43006026	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ, miito mibie me alasɔ minɔ wũ awawãra karɔ̃, ɣɛɛ sɔ mina aɖera miɖe mimi ɔso.
43006027	Midaamararã so i aɖera wa loanina iso, ɣɛɛ i nwa loase atã ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro. Aɖera wagbe i Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aatã mi ne, alasɔ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔse ɔɔpɛ wũ kufe.”
43006028	Ne makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda boabara fiɛ boawo nnɛ i Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ ɔbara?”
43006029	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Nnɛ i Ɣaa to ɔbie sɔ mibara nɖe sɔ miafɔ ngɔ ɔpia katɔ̃me miɖe.”
43006030	Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Mme iwawãra aabara ate bo bonya fiɛ boafɔ-ɔ boɖe? Be aawo ɔbara?
43006031	Bo mawa ɔɖe aɖera wa marɔ sɔ mana i fafuĩ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa ɔtã ma aɖera wa lobɔrɛ i kato maɖe.’ ”
43006032	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ, iiɖe Mose ɔɖe lotã mi aɖera wa lobɔrɛ i kato, ɣɛɛ wũ Ɔse nsɛ ɔtã aɖera gbaã wa lobɔrɛ i kato.
43006033	Alasɔ aɖera wa i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã nɖe ngɔ lose i kato ɔba fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã kayiiso maturi ngbã.”
43006034	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, la ɔɔtã bo aɖera wagbe ɔwi biara.”
43006035	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme nɖe ngbã aɖera wamɔ ne. Ngɔ loba wũ kɔrɛ ne, kukã iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya, fiɛ ngɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe ne, ɔme iibakore wũ ɔnya.
43006036	Ɣɛɛ, nto loɣere mi sɔ atoa sɔ miɔnya me ne, miifɔ me miɖe.
43006037	Ɔbiara gɔ i wũ Ɔse ɔsu ɔtã me ne, ɔto ɔ̃aba wũ kɔrɛ, fiɛ loibasɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ gɔ loba wũ kɔrɛ lonya.
43006038	Alasɔ loise i kato loba sɔ loaba loabara wũ kuɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me kuɖɔɛ loabara.
43006039	Fiɛ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me kuɖɔɛ nɖe sɔ loibayura kuwɛ̃ i mma ɔɖuɖu ɔsu ɔtã me ndɛ̃, ɣɛɛ sɔ loatara ma ɔɖuɖu lobɔ ngbã ku iyi tsɔra.
43006040	Alasɔ nnɛ i wũ Ɔse to ɔbie nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ lonya Ɔbi fiɛ ɔfɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro, fiɛ iyi tsɔra ne, loatara wũ ɔsɛ ngbã.”
43006041	Ma Yudase ɔtsɛ siwũti alasɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme nɖe aɖera wa lose i kato.”
43006042	Ne maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, iiɖe Yosef ɔbi Yesu ɔɖe ɣɛɛ? Boɣe ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi, ne ɔso lɛ ise ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ kato ɔse?”
43006043	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyua so ɔwararã.
43006044	Kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ kɔrɛ ɔba si iiɖe Tete gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me loboregu wũ ɔpia me, fiɛ loatara wũ lobɔrɛgu i makpise ame ku iyi tsɔra.
43006045	Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa to ɔ̃ate ma ɔɖuɖu ara.’ Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔkã atsue fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔsuã ara ɔbɔrɛgu i Tete kɔrɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ.
43006046	Nnɛgbe iite sɔ kuwɛ̃ ɔɔnya Tete ɔnya. Ngɔ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ pɛ nɖe ngɔ loɔnya Tete ɔnya.
43006047	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ne, ɔba ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
43006048	Mme nɖe aɖera wa nsɛ atã ngbã.
43006049	Mi mawa ɔɖe aɖera wa marɔ mana i fafuĩ ame, ɣɛɛ makpi.
43006050	Ɣɛɛ aɖera wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i kato ne, aɖe aɖera wa i ɔbiara gɔ loɖe wã iibakpi.
43006051	Mme nɖe aɖera wa mba ngbã fiɛ abɔrɛ i kato ne. Ɔbiara gɔ loaɖe aɖera wagbe ne, ɔto ɔ̃asɛ ngbã sɔ ɔ̃ibakpi. Aɖera wa loatã wũ nɖe wũ sosina dzɛ loasu lotã sɔ kayiiso maturi aana ngbã.”
43006052	Ne ma Yudase ɔtsɛgu so kakpadzɛ̃ i sikpã ame mato makarɛ sɔ, “Nda i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe aasu ɔ̃ siturina ɔtã bo boɖe?”
43006053	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ, si miiwe Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi sina, minɛ ɔ̃ ima ne, ngbã kumiwɛ̃ iibawe i mi ame.
43006054	Ngɔ lowe wũ siturina, fiɛ ɔnɛ wũ ima ba ngbã mɛ nna katui fiɛ loatara wũ lobɔrɛgu i makpise ame ku iyi tsɔra.
43006055	Alasɔ wũ siturina nɖe aɖera mɔmɔ fiɛ wũ ima nɖe ira sɛɛ nɛ maanɛ.
43006056	Ngɔ lowe wũ siturina fiɛ ɔnɛ wũ ima ne, ɔpia i wũ ame fiɛ mme wũ lopia i ɔ̃ ame.
43006057	Kumɛgɔ i Tete gɔ mba ngbã ɔpia me katɔ̃me fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ ame ne loba ngbã ne, ngbɔ ame i ngɔ lowe wũ siturina aawe ngbã ne.
43006058	Nwagbe nɖe aɖera wa lose i kato aba ne, aise lɛ nwa i mi mawa ɔɖe ɣɛɛ makpi. Ɔbiara gɔ loaɖe aɖera wa loto loɣɛ ala ngbe iibakpi ɔnya.”
43006059	Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe gɔ ɔto ɔte ara i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ i Kapernaum.
43006060	Gɔ marasuãdze gbodzoo ɔnɔ ara ite nɛgbe ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Ara wa ɔto ɔte ngbe ba ɔle gbaã! Nna loafɔ wã?”
43006061	Atoa sɔ kuwɛ̃ iiɣere Yesu kuira ne, ɔɣe nnɛ siwũti mato, ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi wũ nnɛgbe ɔta iya mi iso?
43006062	Ne iyɔ nda iabara mi si minya Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kato ngbegɔ ɔwe koko.
43006063	Ɣaa Siwarã nsɛ sitã ngbã, ɔturi ɔle na i kuira ame. Atɔ̃me wa loɣere mi ne, siwarã gu ngbã aɖe.
43006064	Ɣɛɛ mi mawɛ̃ iifɔ me miɖe.” Yesu ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ala ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, ɔɣe mma loifɔ wũ maɖe gu ngɔ loaɖi wũ ɔtã.
43006065	Ne ka ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso loɣere mi sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ kɔrɛ ɔba si iiɖe Tete loɖi wũ ɔri ne.”
43006066	Ita i ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Yesu marasuãdze gbodzoo ɔkpese wũ i kama sɔ maisibasiai wũ.
43006067	Ne Yesu ɔfiniki ɔkarɛ marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ma wũ sɔ, “Mi wũ miakpese me i kama?”
43006068	Simon Petro ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Bosate, nna kɔrɛ boakɛlɛ? Aba atɔ̃me wa nsɛ atã ngbã.
43006069	Fiɛ ana ne, bofɔ boɖe, fiɛ boɣe sɔ fɔ nɖe Ɔsekelea gɔ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ.”
43006070	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iiɖe mi maturi iweo-inyɔ loɖi lotã so? Ɣɛɛ mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɖe Ɔbosam!”
43006071	Yesu ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe i Yuda gɔ nɖe Simon Iskariot ɔbi iso. Alasɔ atoa sɔ ɔɖe maturi iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ nto ɔ̃aɖi wũ ɔtã ne.
43007001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yesu ɔwe ɔki i Galilea, ɔ̃ibie sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔkiki i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ala ma Yudase makpakpa to mabie sɔ maɖoe wũ.
43007002	Ɔwi gɔ ame masɛ maɖe Kukpakɛ Ame Isɛ Iyi ɔɔbore ibo.
43007003	Ne ɔso Yesu manyiibi ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bɔrɛ i ngbe si akɛlɛ Yudea sɔ fɔ marasuãdze aanya ara wa ato abara.
43007004	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔfɔ iyere iisɛ ɔbara ara ɔwɛrɛ. Gɔ ato abara ara wagbe ne, tã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu si matsue-ɔ!”
43007005	Maɣɛ ngbɔ ala nane ɔ̃ manyiibi iifɔ wũ maɖe.
43007006	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ ɔwi iiɣo, mi ne, ɔwi biara lɛ ɔtã mi.
43007007	Kayiiso maturi iibawo mi ɔtsiri, ɣɛɛ matsiri me, alasɔ nsɛ loɖi ma ara nyanyarĩa loɣere ma.
43007008	Mikɛlɛ iyi kaɖekɔ̃ ne mme loito loba alasɔ wũ ɔwi sɛɛ iiɣo.”
43007009	Gɔ ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ne, ka ɔwe i Galilea.
43007010	Gɔ ɔ̃ manyiibi ɔɔkɛlɛ iyi kaɖekɔ̃ kama ne, Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃akɛlɛ i iwɛrɛ ame, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ikɛlɛ kpawee.
43007011	Ma Yudase makpakpa ɔtsɛ wũ inyɔnyɔ, ne mato makarɛ sɔ, “Lɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ pia?”
43007012	Maturi gbodzoo ɔɣɛ siwɔwɔi i Yesu iso. Mawɛ̃ sɔ ɔturi sɛɛ ɔɖe, mawɛ̃ ana sɔ, “Ooɣo! Ɔto ɔkã maturi ɔyura!”
43007013	Ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ iiɣɛ kuira i ɔ̃ iso kpawee alasɔ mato manigã ma Yudase makpakpa.
43007014	Iyi nɛ mato maɖe ndɛ̃ndɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔba ɔ̃abo Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo ame ɔtsɛ ara ite.
43007015	Ibara ma Yudase makpakpa ɣii matsɛ ikarɛ sɔ, “Nda ibara fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɣe ara ngbɔ gɔ ɔ̃ifɔ ikpadzɛ̃ kuiwɛ̃?”
43007016	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ara wa loto lote ne, iiɖe mme mɔmɔ are aɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me are aɖe.
43007017	Ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ to ɔ̃atsue si ara wa loto lote ne, wũ ɔle iso iɖe, ɣee Ɣaa ɔle ame abɔrɛ.
43007018	Ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ika i ɔ̃ ɔle ame sɛ ɔbie iyere ɔtã so, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nto ɔbie iyere ɔtã ngɔ lopia wũ katɔ̃me sɛ ɔɣɛ ɔnukuare fiɛ sila kusiwɛ̃ na i ɔ̃ ame.
43007019	Iiɖe Mose lotã mi mmara? Ɣɛɛ mi kuwɛ̃ iito miɖe mmara iso. Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miaɖoe me?”
43007020	Mmamɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa pia i fɔ ame! Nna nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe-ɔ?”
43007021	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Iwawãra iwɛ̃ saã nɛ lobara ɔbara mi ɣii.
43007022	Mose ɔtã mi mmara sɔ mitu sirɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ iiɖe Mose ɔwi i sirɛrɛ̃ itu ɔsɛ karɔ̃, ka masɛ mabara ne ta mi mawa ɔwi, ne ɔso misɛ mitu mi mabi sirɛrɛ̃ ku Iwarãyi ne.
43007023	Si maawo ɔturi sirɛrɛ̃ ɔtu ku Iwarãyi, ɣɛɛ maitu Mose mmara ne, be ɔso fiɛ mito minagu me sikpã sɔ losa ɔturi ku Iwarãyi?
43007024	Midaanyɔ maturi i katɔ̃ miɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ miɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.”
43007025	Mawɛ̃ i Yerusalem ɔtsɛ ikarɛ sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe i makpakpa to mabie sɔ maɖoe ne?
43007026	Ɣɛɛ minyɔ wũ! Ɔ̃ nɣɛ i ngbe ɔto ɔɖe ika i ɔgbami, ɣɛɛ maito mawo wũ kuira ɔɣere! Ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔfɔ maɔfɔ wũ gbaã sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo?
43007027	Si Kristo ɔba ne, kuwɛ̃ iibatsue ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, boɣe ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ.”
43007028	Gɔ Yesu to ɔte ara i Isɔrɛyo ame ne, ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mibua miɣe me gu ngbegɔ lobɔrɛ? Loiba i mme mɔmɔ ɔle ame. Ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ne, nukuarese ɔɖe, fiɛ miiɣe wũ.
43007029	Ɣɛɛ mme loɣe wũ alasɔ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ lobɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ lopia me katɔ̃me.”
43007030	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, mabie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ wũ, ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ iiwo kɔrɔ̃ ɔɖi ɔsia wũ iso alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔkpiwi iiɣo.
43007031	Ɣɛɛ maturi gbodzoo i ma ndɛ̃ ɔfɔ wũ maɖe mato makarɛ sɔ, “Si Kristo ɔba ne, ɔ̃abara awawãra wa loɖo nwa i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɔbara?”
43007032	Ma Farisise ɔnɔ maturi gbodzoo to maɣɛ siwɔwɔi dzɛgbe i Yesu iso, ne ɔso ma gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔpia madzuɛ̃se sɔ mamɔɛ̃ wũ mabɔ.
43007033	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loto loawe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ, ne kama ne, loakpese lokɛlɛ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me kɔrɛ.
43007034	Mito miabie me, ɣɛɛ miito mianya me, alasɔ miito miaɣo ngbegɔ loawe ɔba.”
43007035	Ne ma Yudase makpakpa ɔkarɛ so sɔ, “Lɛ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃akɛlɛ fiɛ boabie wũ boibanya wũ? Ɔbie ɔto sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ ma Yudase ma mpia i ma Helase simagɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃ate ma Helase ara?
43007036	Itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ ngbe karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ? Ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mito mianyɔnyɔ me, ɣɛɛ miibanya me.’ Ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, ‘Ngbegɔ losɛ ne, miibawo ɔba.’ ”
43007037	Iyi tsɔra nɛ lobua inya iɖo i iyi iɖe ame ne, Yesu ɔta ɔya ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ i ɔme to ɔkore si ɔba wũ kɔrɛ ɔba ɔ̃anɛ ndu.
43007038	Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe fiɛ ɔnɛ ndu mɛgbe ne, lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ne, ‘Ndu mɛ loisɛ misɔ̃ fiɛ misɛ mitã ɔturi ngbã aabore ɔkore mibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame.’ ”
43007039	Yesu ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe i Siwarã dzɛ mma lofɔ wũ maɖe aafɔ iso. Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, gɔ Yesu iita ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔkɛlɛ ikpawaĩ ame ɔso ne, Ɣaa iisu Siwarã Bielea ɔtã marasuãdze.
43007040	Maturi gbodzoo mamɔ mawɛ̃ ma lonɔ nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze ɔɖe.”
43007041	Mamama ana sɔ, “Ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo.” Ɣɛɛ mamama ana sɔ, “Kristo iibabɔrɛ i Galilea.
43007042	Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ Kristo ne, David ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔ̃aɖe fiɛ ɔ̃abɔrɛ i Betlehem ngbegɔ i David ɔse.”
43007043	Ne ɔso iɣɛɣɛso ɔbo i ma ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ ala Yesu ɔso.
43007044	Mawɛ̃ ɔbie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ wũ, ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ iiwo kɔrɔ̃ ɔɖi ɔsia wũ iso.
43007045	Gɔ madzuɛ̃se ɔkpese makɛlɛ ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Farisise ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ miimɔɛ̃ wũ mibɔ?”
43007046	Madzuɛ̃se ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Boinɔ bonɔ kuwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika lɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe!”
43007047	Ne ma Farisise ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mi wũ ne, ɔ̃ɔpia mi iti ndu?
43007048	Miɔnya minya ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃, ɣee ɔ Farisise ɔwɛ̃ ɔfɔ wũ ɔɖe?
43007049	Maturi gbodzoo magbe iiɣe Mose mmara, ne ɔso Ɣaa sigbarĩ siai ma!”
43007050	Nikodemo gɔ nɖe ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ɔsɛ Yesu kɔrɛ ɔnya ɔɣere matsɔra sɔ,
43007051	“Bo mmara iitã bo ɔri sɔ boatã ɔturi ipɔ ku ɔwi gɔ ame boiɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me bonɔ ɔ̃ kanya ame itɔ̃me.”
43007052	Ɣɛɛ matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Fɔ wũ Galilea abɔrɛ? Fafarɛ Ɔko Sekelea ame kukaakɔ ne ato aatsue sɔ Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze kuwɛ̃ iibabɔrɛ i Galilea ɔnya.”
43007053	(Ne ɔso ɔbiara ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ iyo.)
43008001	Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Nnɔĩ Adziri Kube iso.
43008002	Kaɖesɛ̃a kaya tutuutu ne, ɔkpese ɔba Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo. Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ ɔtsɛ ma ara ite.
43008003	Maratedze gu ma Farisise ɔkɔ ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ mamɔɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃ mabɔ maaɣedza i ɔgba ame.
43008004	Maɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ratedze, mamɔɛ̃ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe kɔrɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃.
43008005	I mmara mɛ i Mose ɔtã bo kanya ne, ikote sɔ boapɛ wũ ata boɖoe, ɣɛɛ ne, be ato aɣɛ i ne iso?”
43008006	Makarɛ Yesu itɔ̃me nɛgbe si mala wũ manyɔ si maana itɔ̃me nɛ iso maaya fiɛ maatã wũ ipɔ. Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔkadza ɔto ɔtsɛrɛ ara i karɔ̃ ala ɔ̃ irɔĩ.
43008007	Gɔ maɣɛ matogu Yesu itɔ̃me ikarɛ ne, ɔtara iti kato ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ndɛ̃ ngɔ loibara ikpi ɔnya si ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔpɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ita.”
43008008	Yesu ɔledza ikadza ɔto ɔtsɛrɛ ara i karɔ̃.
43008009	Gɔ manɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, marui ɔwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ita i makpakpa iso iba iakuti Yesu gu ɔrɔ̃go ɔnɔwɛ̃.
43008010	Gɔ Yesu ɔtara so fiɛ ɔnya sɔ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɔrui ne, ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, i ɖe ma? Ma kuwɛ̃ iitã-ɔ ipɔ?”
43008011	Ne Ɔrɔ̃go ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo, Bosate.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Iyɔ mme wũ loitã-ɔ ipɔ. Kɛlɛ, ɣɛɛ daasibara ikpi ana.”
43008012	Nnɛmɔ kama ne, Yesu ɔɖegu mmamɔ ika ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme nɖe kayiiso ikpawaĩ, ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ losiai me iibasɛ i idududu ame ɔnya ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ana ngbã ame ikpawaĩ.”
43008013	Ma Farisise ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ato aɖe aɖansiɛ i fɔ mɔmɔ iso, ne ɔso fɔ aɖansiɛ iiɖe ɔnukuare.”
43008014	Ne Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Si loɖe so aɖansiɛ kɔra ne, wũ aɖansiɛ ɖe ɔnukuare alasɔ loɣe ngbegɔ lose loba gu ngbegɔ losɛ. Mi ne, miiɣe ngbegɔ lose gu ngbegɔ losɛ.
43008015	Mi ne, maturi ara inyɔ kanya misɛ miɣɛ mi atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loisɛ loɣɛgu kuwɛ̃ atɔ̃me.
43008016	Fiɛ si loɣɛ itɔ̃me ana ne, wũ atɔ̃me iɣɛ to iaya, alasɔ iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ mme nsɛ loɣɛ, ɣɛɛ bo gu ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43008017	Matsɛrɛ mapia i mi mmara ɔko ame sɔ si maturi inyɔ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ i ira iso ne, iyɔ ma itɔ̃me ɖe ɔnukuare.
43008018	Mme ne, nsɛ loɖe so aɖansiɛ fiɛ Tete gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ana sɛ ɔɖe me aɖansiɛ.”
43008019	Ne mato makarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Lɛ i fɔ Ɔse pia?” Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Miiɣe me, fiɛ miiɣe Tete ana. Si ɔɣe miɣe me ne, tee miatsue wũ Ɔse ana.”
43008020	Yesu ɔte ara wagbe i Isɔrɛyo ngbegɔ masɛ mato ara masɛ. Kuwɛ̃ iiwo wũ ɔmɔɛ̃ alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔkpiwi iiɣo.
43008021	Yesu ɔledza ma iɣere sɔ, “Loto loarui i mi kɔrɛ, miabie me, ɣɛɛ miakpi i mi akpi ame. Ngbegɔ losɛ ne, miibawo mmɔ ɔba.”
43008022	Ne ma Yudase to makarɛ so sɔ, “Ɔɖoe ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe so ɔso fiɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ ‘Ngbegɔ losɛ ne miibawo ɔba’?”
43008023	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ne, kayiiso ngbe mibɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ mme ne, kato lobɔrɛ. Mi ne, kayiiso maturi miɖe, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loibɔrɛ i kayi gagbe iso.
43008024	Ne ɔso loto loɣere mi sɔ mito miakpi i mi akpi ame ne. Si miifɔ miɖe sɔ mme nɖe ngɔ loɖe ne, miakpi miwe i mi akpi ame.”
43008025	Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe nna?” Ne ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Loɔɣere mi ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ fiɛ ngbɔ ame loto loɣere mi ne.
43008026	Loba atɔ̃me gbodzoo i mi iso wa loasu lotã mi ala ipɔ, ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me ne, nukuarese ɔɖe. Fiɛ nnɛ lonɔ lobɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ imomo loto lopɛ lotã kayiiso.”
43008027	Maitsue sɔ Ɣaa iso i Yesu to ɔɖe ika.
43008028	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ miakɔlɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi kato ne, ɔwi gɔmɔ ame miatsue sɔ Mme nɖe ngɔ Loɖe ne. Ana ne, miatsue sɔ loisɛ lobara kuira i wũ ɔle ame, ɣɛɛ nnɛ i Tete ɔɣere me losɛ loɣɛ.
43008029	Ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me piagu me fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyua me ɔsɛ, alasɔ nsɛ lobara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔwi biara ame.”
43008030	Maturi gbodzoo ma lonɔ ara wa i Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbe, ɔfɔ wũ maɖe.
43008031	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma Yudase ma lofɔ wũ maɖe sɔ, “Si mibara i ara wa lote mi iso ne, iyɔ wũ marasuãdze mɔmɔ miɖe.
43008032	Miatsue ɔnukuare, fiɛ ɔnukuare aatã mi isɛguso.”
43008033	Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Abraham mawa boɖe, fiɛ boiɖe kuwɛ̃ masande. Ne ɔso be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣɛ sɔ boana isɛguso?”
43008034	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, ikpi ɔsande ɔɖe.
43008035	Ɔsande iisɛ ɔwe i iyo ɔwi biara ame, ɣɛɛ iyo ɔbi sɛ ɔwe i iyo ɔwi biara.
43008036	Ne ɔso si Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔtã mi isɛguso ne, miasɛgu so gbaã.
43008037	Loɣe sɔ Abraham mawa miɖe, ɣɛɛ mito mibie sɔ si miɖoe me alasɔ wũ atɔ̃me iimɔɛ̃ mi ɔtu.
43008038	Nnɛ lonya i Tete kɔrɛ loto loɣere mi, fiɛ mi wũ nnɛ minɔ i mi ɔse kɔrɛ mito mibara.”
43008039	Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Abraham mawa boɖe.” Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si Abraham mawa miɖe ne, tee miabara ara lɛ Abraham awe.
43008040	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, mito mibie sɔ miaɖoe me, mme gɔ nto loɣere mi ɔnukuare gɔ lonɔ lobɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ. Abraham iisɛ ngbã ngbɔ.
43008041	Mi ne, ara wa i mi ɔse mɔmɔ ɔbara mito mibara.” Ma Yudase ɔtã Yesu mmuai sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔmagɛ̃ ame mabi boɖe. Ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ boba nɖe Ɣaa!”
43008042	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si biele ne Ɣaa nɖe mi Ɔse ne, tee miaɖɔɛ me alasɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ lobɔrɛ loba i ngbe. Loiba i wũ mɔmɔ ɔle ame, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43008043	Be ɔso fiɛ miito minɔ nnɛ loto lote mi karɔ̃? Gɔ miito mibie sɔ minɔ wũ itɔ̃me ɔso.
43008044	Ɔbosam mabi miɖe, fiɛ mito mibie sɔ miabara ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔse ɔkã. Ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, turiɖoese ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔnukuare alasɔ ɔnukuare na i ɔ̃ ame. Si ɔto ɔla sila ne, ɔtu iisɛ ɔkpa wũ alasɔ ne nɖe ɔ̃ ngbã ne. Ladze ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe maladze ɔɖuɖu ɔse.
43008045	Ɣɛɛ mme ne, ɔnukuare loto loɣere mi, fiɛ ne ɔso miifɔ me miɖe ne.
43008046	Mi nna loawo me ɔɣere sɔ loɖe ipɔ ala lobara ikpi? Si loto loɣere mi ɔnukuare ne, be ɔso miito mifɔ me miɖe?
43008047	Ngɔ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ sɛ ɔkã Ɣaa itɔ̃me atsue. Mi ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe Ɣaa kɔrɛ mibɔrɛ, ne ɔso miito mikã atsue ne.”
43008048	Ne ma Yudase ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si boɣere-ɔ sɔ ɔ Samariase aɖe ne siwarã lalaa pia i fɔ ame ne, bola sila?”
43008049	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa na i wũ ame. Loto lokɔlɛ Tete iyere kato, ɣɛɛ mito mibɔ me karɔ̃.
43008050	Loito lole so, ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ pia gɔ nsɛ ɔle me. Ɔ̃ nɖe atɔ̃meɣɛdze bɔlɔlɔa ne.
43008051	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i wũ ara ite iso iibakpi ɔnya.”
43008052	Ne ma Yudase ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kini bosia ita sɔ gbaã ne, siwarã lalaa pia i fɔ ame ne! Abraham ɔkpi, fiɛ kanyamaɖidze ana ɔkpi. Ɣɛɛ ato aɣere bo sɔ ngɔ lobara i fɔ ara ite iso iibakpi ɔnya.
43008053	Boifɔ nnɛ ato aɣɛ boɖe alasɔ bo ɔwa Abraham ɔkpi, fiɛ kanyamaɖidze ana ɔkpi. Mme ɔturi igbã ato abu so sɔ aɖe?”
43008054	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si ɔle loto so ne, iyɔ ile nɛmɔ iiɖe kuira. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔle me nɖe wũ Ɔse, ngɔ ame mito mikpere sɔ mi Ɣaa.
43008055	Miiɣe wũ, ɣɛɛ mme loɣe wũ. Si loɣɛ sɔ loiɣe wũ ne, loakpese ladze lɛ mi. Ɣɛɛ mme loɣe wũ fiɛ losɛ lokã wũ atsue.
43008056	So ɔɣɔ mi ɔwa Abraham gɔ ɔtsue sɔ loto loaba. Ɔnya ne, fiɛ so ɔɣɔ wũ.”
43008057	Ma Yudase ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gɔ aifɔ akɔ siru ne ɔɣɛ ato sɔ anya Abraham?”
43008058	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ si maaɣe Abraham ne, ka lopia kayi.”
43008059	Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, mamala ata sɔ si mapɛ wũ maɖoe ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔwɛrɛ ɔbɔrɛ i ma ndɛ̃ i Isɔrɛyo ame mmɔ.
43009001	Gɔ Yesu sɛ ɔto ɔfe ne, ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ maɣe nɔbiɛdze.
43009002	Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, nna lobara ikpi ɔso fiɛ maɣe wũ nɔbiɛdze? Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔ̃ maɣese lobara ikpi?”
43009003	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɣee ɔ̃ maɣese lobara ikpi, ɣɛɛ maɣe wũ ngbɔ sɔ si Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ ɔle ɔte iki i ɔ̃ iso.
43009004	Ayi kumɛgɔ bopia i ikpɛnɛ ame ne, ikote sɔ boabara ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me karabara. Kasɛ̃ to kaba gɔ kuwɛ̃ iisibabara karabara.
43009005	Ayi kumɛgɔ lopia i kayiiso ne, mme nɖe kayiiso ɔkaniɛ.”
43009006	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, ɔtua sinyatu ɔfere i karɔ̃ ɔsu ɔbara ibata ɔsu ɔnukutu i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ anɔmi iso.
43009007	Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aapie ndu i Siloa ibu ame.” Siloa karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ ɔpia wũ katɔ̃me. Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔrui ɔsɛ ɔ̃apie ndu i ibu ame ɔtsɛ ara inya, fiɛ ɔkpese ɔba.
43009008	Gɔ ɔ̃ kagbamiku maturi gu mma nsɛ manya ɔwanyi ara ɔnya wũ ne, makarɛ sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe nsɛ ɔsɛ ɔwanyi ara?”
43009009	Mawɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖe, mamama ana sɔ, “Ooɣo, ɔre kere ɔre wũ.” Ne ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme loɖe.”
43009010	Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nda ibara fiɛ fɔ anɔmi ɔbusi?”
43009011	Ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Yesu ɔɖe lobara ibata ɔnukutu me anɔmi fiɛ ɔɣere me sɔ lokɛlɛ loapie ndu i Siloa ibu ame. Ne gɔ lobara ne, lotsɛ ara inya.”
43009012	Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “I lɛ ɔpia?” Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loiɣe.”
43009013	Makɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loɖe nɔbiɛdze ngbe makɛlɛgu ma Farisise kɔrɛ.
43009014	Iyi nɛ i Yesu ɔbara ibata ɔsu ɔsa ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, Iwarãyi iɖe.
43009015	Ma Farisise ɔledza wũ ikarɛ kumɛgɔ iɖe ɔbara fiɛ ɔ̃ anɔmi ɔbusi. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔbara ibata ɔsia me i anɔmi iso fiɛ losɛ loafore katɔ̃ kere ne lotsɛ inya ne.”
