43009016	Ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lobara ira nɛgbe ne, iiɖe Ɣaa kɔrɛ iɖe ɔbɔrɛ ala ɔ̃isɛ ɔwarɛ Iwarãyi mmara.” Ɣɛɛ mamama ana sɔ, “Nda i ngɔ nɖe kpibaradze aawo awawãra wagbe igbã ɔbara?” Ne ɔso iɣɛɣɛso ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃.
43009017	Ma Farisise ɔledza ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ikarɛ sɔ, “Gɔ ɔ̃ losa-ɔ ne, be abu sɔ ɔɖe?” Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze ɔɖe.”
43009018	Ma Yudase makpakpa iifɔ maɖe sɔ ɔ̃ anɔmi ɔbiɛ fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka ɔto ɔnya ara, ne ɔso mapia masɛ maakpere ɔ̃ maɣese mabɔ.
43009019	Ne makarɛ ma sɔ, “Mi ɔbi ɔɖe ngbe? Mi sɔ nɔbiɛdze ɔɖe miɣe wũ, nda ibara fiɛ ka ɔto ɔnya ara?”
43009020	Maɣese ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Boɣe sɔ bo ɔbi ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ anɔmi ɔbiɛ fiɛ boɣe wũ.
43009021	Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ ibara fiɛ ka ɔto ɔnya ara ne, boiɣe, fiɛ boiɣe ngɔ losa wũ ana. Mikarɛ wũ ne ɔ̃ɔkpa anɔ gɔ ɔ̃awo so kanya ɔɖi!”
43009022	Ɔ̃ maɣese ɔtã mmuai ngbɔ alasɔ mato manigã ma Yudase makpakpa ma loɔsɛ iti ame maɣɛ masɛ sɔ ɔrere gɔ loaɣɛ sɔ ɔfɔ Yesu ɔɖe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo ne, maasa wũ maɖi i ma kasarɛkɔ̃.
43009023	Ne ɔso i ɔ̃ maɣese ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mikarɛ wũ ne ɔ̃isiɖe ɔbiɛtɛ ne!”
43009024	Maledza ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ikpere ibɔ ɔkpɛ nyɔare maɣere wũ sɔ, “Kã ndamu tã Ɣaa sɔ aaɣere bo ɔnukuare. Bo boɣe sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ losa-ɔ ne, kpibaradze ɔɖe.”
43009025	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lona isosarɛ ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Kpibaradze ɔɖe o-o, kpibaradze ɔ̃iɖe o-o ne, loiɣe. Ira ka iwɛ̃ loɣe, ne nɖe sɔ, ɔwiɔ ne, anɔmi ɔbiɛ me, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ka loto lonya ara.”
43009026	Ne makpakpa mamɔ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be iɖe ɔbara-ɔ? Nda iɖe ɔbara fiɛ ɔsa-ɔ atsɛ inya?”
43009027	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Loɔɣere mi koko, ɣɛɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miito minɔ. Be ɔso si loledza mi iɣere? Ɛɛbɛrɛ mi wũ ɔbie mito sɔ miakpese ɔ̃ marasuãdze?”
43009028	Ne matia wũ maɣere sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ɔ̃ rasuãdze. Bo ɣɛɛ ne, Mose marasuãdze boɖe.
43009029	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔɖegu Mose ika, ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, boiɣe nane ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ!”
43009030	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Iba ɣaa sɔ miiɣe ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ lobusi me anɔmi ne!
43009031	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔkã makpibaradze atsue, ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mawarɛ wũ fiɛ masɛ mabara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔkã ma atsue.
43009032	Ita i kayiiso karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, boinɔ bonɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ ɔbusi ɔturi gɔ maɣe nɔbiɛdze anɔmi.
43009033	Ne ɔso si iiɖe Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ibawo ira nɛgbe igbã ɔbara.”
43009034	Ne makpakpa mamɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ gɔ maɣe i ikpi ame, makararã-ɔ i ikpi ame ne, fɔ loaba aate bo ara?” Ne masa wũ maɖi i ma ikuri ame ne.
43009035	Yesu ɔnɔ sɔ maɔsa nɔbiɛdze maɖi i ma ikuri ame, ne ɔso gɔ ɔnya wũ ne, ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Afɔ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi aɖe?”
43009036	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Tete, te me ɔnyiiɔ si loafɔ wũ loɖe.”
43009037	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔɔnya wũ koko, ɔ̃ nto ɔɖegu-ɔ ika ne.”
43009038	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, lofɔ loɖe!” Ne ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Yesu katɔ̃ ɔsɔrɛ wũ ne.
43009039	Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loba kayiiso sɔ si loɣɛgu kã atɔ̃me sɔ mma loito manya ara si manya, fiɛ mma nto manya si madaasinya.”
43009040	Gɔ ma Farisise mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mmɔ ɔnɔ nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣɛ ne, makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ato aɣɛ? Bo wũ manɔbiɛdze boɖe?”
43009041	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si manɔbiɛdze miɖe ne, tee miiɖe makpibaradze, ɣɛɛ gɔ mi sɔ mito minya ara ne, ne ɔso miɖe ipɔ ne.”
43010001	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ngɔ loiki i kayogodɔ̃ ɔbo i isɛrɛyo ame, ɣɛɛ ɔya ɔkpã ɔbo i kame ne, yukukpe gu raninadze ɔɖe.
43010002	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔki i kayogodɔ̃ ɔbo i ɔkpã ame ne, ɔ̃ nɖe masɛrɛkɔdze ne.
43010003	Kayogodɔ̃ dzuɛ̃se sɛ ɔsese wũ kukui, masɛrɛ sɛ manɔ ɔ̃ silɔ si ɔto ɔkpere ɔ̃ masɛrɛ ayere fiɛ ɔ̃akɔ ma ɔbɔrɛgu.
43010004	Fiɛ si ɔ̃ɔkɔ ɔ̃ masɛrɛ ɔɖi ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ma katɔ̃ fiɛ ka maasiai wũ, alasɔ maɣe ɔ̃ silɔ.
43010005	Maibasiai ɔturi mama, ɣɛɛ maatere maɣɛ wũ alasɔ maiɣe ɔ̃ silɔ.”
43010006	Yesu ɔpɛ ma igbã nɛgbe, ɣɛɛ mainɔ nnɛ ɔɣere ma karɔ̃.
43010007	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔledza ma iɣere sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ mme nɖe kayogodɔ̃ lotã masɛrɛ.
43010008	Mma ɔɖuɖu loɖe me katɔ̃ maba ne, mayukukpe gu maraninadze maɖe ne ɔso masɛrɛ iikã ma atsue.
43010009	Mme nɖe kayogodɔ̃ fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loki i wũ ame ɔbo i kame ne, ɔ̃ana iɖi. Ɔ̃abo ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ana aɖera kaɖekɔ̃.
43010010	Yukukpe ne, kayu gu ituriɖoe gu ara inina ɔso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔba, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loba sɔ si maturi aana ngbã mɛ loyi.
43010011	“Mme nɖe masɛrɛkɔdze sɛɛ gɔ loabie sɔ ɔ̃akpi ala masɛrɛ iti.
43010012	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ masu sɔ ɔnyɔ masɛrɛ iso fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ mɔmɔ mare maɖe ne, si ɔnya ɔgidi to ɔba ne, ɔsɛ ɔrui ɔtere ɔnyua mabɔi. Ɔgidi aabo i masɛrɛ ndɛ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma, ɔsamarã ma.
43010013	Rabaradze gɔgbe aarui ɔtere alasɔ kuso ɔ̃afɔ, ne ɔso ɔ̃isu kuira i masɛrɛ iso.
43010014	“Mme nɖe masɛrɛkɔdze sɛɛ ne. Loɣe wũ mare, fiɛ ma wũ maɣe me lɛ
43010015	kumɛgɔ ame i Tete ɣe me fiɛ mme wũ loɣe wũ. Losu wũ ngbã lotã i masɛrɛ iti.
43010016	Loba masɛrɛ mama ma loibɔrɛ i ɔkpã gɔgbe ame fiɛ ipia sɔ loakɔ ma lobɔ. Maanɔ wũ silɔ fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu aakpese ikuri iwɛ̃ ku kɔdze ɔwɛ̃.
43010017	“Tete sɛ ɔɖɔɛ me alasɔ losu wũ ngbã lotã fiɛ loakpese lofɔ me ana.
43010018	Kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ ngbã ɔfɔ i wũ kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ mme mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame losu me lotã. Loba ɔle sɔ loasu lotã fiɛ loba ɔle ana sɔ loakpese lofɔ me. Nnɛgbe i Tete ɔpia me sɔ lobara ne.”
43010019	Yesu atɔ̃me wagbe ɔledza iɣɛɣɛso ibɔ i ma Yudase ndɛ̃.
43010020	Gbodzoo i ma ndɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã lalaa pia i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔto ɔlala, ne ɔso midaakã wũ atsue.”
43010021	Ɣɛɛ mamama ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia iibawo ika ɔɖe kumɛgɔgbe! Siwarã lalaa iibawo nɔbiɛdze anɔmi ɔbusi.”
43010022	Ɔyu ɔwi ne, ma Yudase ɔɖe Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo Isekelera iyi i Yerusalem.
43010023	Gɔ Yesu sɛ ɔki i Salomo kakpataku ame i Isɔrɛyo ame ne,
43010024	ma Yudase ɔba maaki malɔ wũ makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ku mme ɔwi aaɣere bo ɔnukuare? Si fɔ nɖe Kristo ne, ɣere bo ɖi.”
43010025	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loɔɣere mi koko, ɣɛɛ miito mifɔ me miɖe. Ara wa loto lobara i wũ Ɔse iyere ame nto aɖe ika i wũ iso.
43010026	Ɣɛɛ miito mifɔ me miɖe, alasɔ iiɖe wũ masɛrɛ miɖe.
43010027	Wũ masɛrɛ sɛ makã me atsue, loɣe ma, fiɛ masɛ masiai me.
43010028	Nsɛ lotã ma ngbã mɛ loibaro fiɛ maibawɔ. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo ma ɔpɛ ɔfɔ i wũ nrɔɔ̃ ame.
43010029	Tete gɔ losu ma ɔtã me ne, ɔmɔ ɔɖo ɔturi biara, ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ iibawo ma ɔpɛ ɔfɔ i ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ame.
43010030	Bo gu Tete ne, mawɛ̃ boɖe.”
43010031	Ne ma Yudase ɔledza ata imala sɔ si mapɛ wũ ne.
43010032	Yesu ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Loɔbara ara sɛɛ gbodzoo wa i Tete ɔpia me sɔ lobara i mi ndɛ̃. Wã ndɛ̃ imele ɔso mito miba miapɛ me ata?”
43010033	Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Boito bobie sɔ boapɛ-ɔ ata ala ara sɛɛ wa abara ɔso, ɣɛɛ imusuora nɛ aɣɛ ɔso! Ɔturi awune kere aɖe, ɣɛɛ asu so ato akateragu Ɣaa!”
43010034	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mi se lɛ Ɣaa.’
43010035	Si Ɣaa ɔkpere mma ɔso i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔba sɔ mase lɛ Ɣaa, fiɛ nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, maibawo ne ɔfinikira ne,
43010036	ɔɣere mito me sɔ mme gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔsese kayiiso ne, loɣɛ imusuora sɔ loɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi loɖe?
43010037	Si loito lobara Tete karabara ne, iyɔ midaafɔ me miɖe.
43010038	Ɣɛɛ si loto lobara Tete karabara ne, si miifɔ me miɖe kɔra ne, mifɔ wũ karabara miɖe. Ne loatã mitsue, fiɛ mianɔ karɔ̃ sɔ Tete pia i wũ ame fiɛ mme wũ lopia i Tete ame ne.”
43010039	Ngbe ana ne, mabie sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ Yesu, ɣɛɛ ɔbɔrɛ ma ndɛ̃ ɔwi.
43010040	Ɔkpese ɔsɛ ɔ̃awara Yordan ɔwore ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ i Yohanes ɔpie maturi Ɣaa ndu ku ɔwi gɔ lofe, ne ka ɔwe i mmɔ ne.
43010041	Maturi gbodzoo ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ maba maaɣɛ sɔ, “Yohanes iibara awawãra, ɣɛɛ ara wa ɔɖuɖu ɔɣɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso ne, gbaã iɖe.”
43010042	Ne ɔso maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ Yesu maɖe i mmɔ.
43011001	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Lazaro fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Betania ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔnyɛ. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe nɖe Maria gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Marta mɛrɛ̃ aɖe ne.
43011002	Maria gɔgbe ɔɖe loba ɔ̃afedza nnɔĩ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔfere i Bosate Yesu ngba fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔnukutu ne. Ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi nɖe Lazaro gɔ nto ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔnyɛ i ngbe ne.
43011003	Lazaro manyiiko ɔpia Yesu ɔturi sɔ, “Bosate, fɔ ɔlaa gɔ abua asɛ aɖɔɛ to ɔnyɛ.”
43011004	Gɔ Yesu ɔnɔ kanya gagbe ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔnyɛ gɔgbe iiɖe ɔkpinyɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔɖe ira nɛ loakɔlɛ Ɣaa iyere kato, fiɛ iaki i ne iso ana ne, maakɔlɛ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔ̃ wũ kato.”
43011005	Yesu ɔbua ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Lazaro gu ɔ̃ manyiiko kukaakɔ.
43011006	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔnɔ Lazaro ɔnyɛ ne, ɔwe i ngbegɔ ɔpia akpɛnɛ anyɔ ɔbua.
43011007	Ne ɔɣere ɔ̃ marasuãdze sɔ, “Mitã bokpese bokɛlɛ Yudea.”
43011008	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ratedze, iifɔ ɔwi gɔ ma Yudase ɔbie sɔ si mapɛ-ɔ ata, ne ato abie sɔ boakpese bokɛlɛ mmɔ ana?”
43011009	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ iɖe mpia i ikpɛnɛ ame. Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ i ikpɛnɛ ikpawaĩ ame ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔtura, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔnya kayiiso gagbe ikpawaĩ.
43011010	Ɣɛɛ si ɔsɛ i kasɛ̃ ame ne, ɔsɛ ɔtura, alasɔ ɔna ikpawaĩ.”
43011011	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ne, ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Bo ɔlaa Lazaro ɔɔrɛ sirɛ, ɣɛɛ losɛ loatara wũ.”
43011012	Ne marasuãdze ɔɣere Bosate sɔ, “Si sirɛ ɔɔsu wũ ne, iyɔ ɔto ɔ̃asarɛ.”
43011013	Ɔɣɛ i Yesu to sɔ Lazaro ɔɔkpi, ɣɛɛ marasuãdze ɔbu sɔ sirɛ gbaã ɔto ɔɣɛ ala.
43011014	Ne ɔso ɔɣere ma ɔɖi sɔ, “Lazaro ɔɔkpi.
43011015	Ɣɛɛ mi ɔso ne, iba me isoɣɔ sɔ lona i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ si miafɔ miɖe. Mitã bokɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.”
43011016	Ne Toma gɔ marɔ sɔ Inyɔɔbi ɔɣere marasuãdze sɔ, “Mitã bosiai Ratedze si bosɛ boakpigu wũ!”
43011017	Gɔ Yesu ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo mmɔ ne, ɔnya sɔ iɔfɔ akpɛnɛ ana gɔ mabiara Lazaro.
43011018	Ita i Yerusalem iba Betania ne, iaɖe agu anyɔ kere,
43011019	ne ɔso ma Yudase gbodzoo ɔba sɔ si maba maatã Maria gu Marta ndzo i ma ɔnyiete kukpi iso.
43011020	Gɔ Marta ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu ka ɔba ne, ɔta ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃asarɛgu wũ, ɣɛɛ Maria ɔwe i iyo ame.
43011021	Mmɔ i Marta to ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, si ɔpia apia ne, tee bo ɔnyiete iikpi!
43011022	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ kɔra ne, loɣe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ira biara nɛ akarɛ wũ.”
43011023	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ ɔnyiete to ɔ̃ata ɔwe ngbã.”
43011024	Ne Marta to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loɣe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃ata ɔwe ngbã ku Iyi Tsɔra nɛ i makpise aata iso.”
43011025	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme nɖe makpise ita gu ngbã ne. Ngɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe to ɔ̃asɛ ngbã atoa sɔ ɔkpi,
43011026	fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsi ngbã fiɛ ɔfɔ me ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ibakpi. Afɔ nnɛgbe aɖe?”
43011027	Ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate. Lofɔ loɖe sɔ fɔ nɖe Kristo, Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ maɣɛ masɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba kayiiso.”
43011028	Gɔ Marta ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akpere ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi Maria ɔɣedza i kuruɛ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ratedze ɔba ɔto ɔkarɛ-ɔ iti.”
43011029	Gɔ Maria ɔnɔ ngbɔ ne, ɔta ɔluwɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃asarɛgu wũ.
43011030	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ɔɖuɖu ne, Yesu iibo ɔmagɛ̃ ame, ɔɣɛ i ngbegɔ i Marta ɔba ɔ̃asarɛgu wũ.
43011031	Ma Yudase ma mpia i iyo mato matã Maria katetere ɔta masiai wũ gɔ manya sɔ ɔpɛ siwa ɔbɔrɛ i iyo. Mabu sɔ siainyɔ ne, ikpibiɔ katɔ̃ ka ɔsɛ ɔ̃abiɛ kaku.
43011032	Ɔwi gɔ Maria ɔbo ngbegɔ i Yesu ɣɛ fiɛ ɔnya wũ ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si ɔpia apia i ngbe ne, tee wũ ɔnyiete iikpi.”
43011033	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya kumɛgɔ i Maria to ɔbiɛ gu kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase ma loba maaya wũ ana to mabiɛ ne, imararã Yesu fiɛ ikpɛ̃ wũ nnya.
43011034	Ne ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Lɛ mibiara wũ?” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Bosate, ba nyɔ.”
43011035	Mmɔ ne, Yesu ɔbiɛ.
43011036	Ne ma Yudase to maɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ kumɛgɔ ɔɖɔɛ wũ!”
43011037	Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gɔ ɔwo nɔbiɛdze anɔmi ɔbusi ne, ɔ̃ibawo ɔtã sɔ Lazaro iibakpi?”
43011038	Yesu ɔtɔrɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ame, ɔsɛ ɔkɛlɛ ikpibiɔ nɛ mpia i ɔkpolo ame fiɛ mali ita masɛ̃ kanya kɔrɛ.
43011039	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mili ita miɖi i ɔkpolo kanya.” Ne Lazaro ɔnyiiko gɔ nɖe Marta ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Ɔfiã ka ɔpia ala iɔfɔ ayi ana gɔ mabiara wũ!”
43011040	Yesu ɔɣere Marta sɔ, “Loiɣere-ɔ sɔ si afɔ me aɖe ne, ato aanya Ɣaa ɔle?”
43011041	Gɔ mali ita maɖi ne, Yesu ɔnyɔ kato ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, nto lopɛ-ɔ siba, sɔ asɛ akã me atsue.
43011042	Loɣe sɔ asɛ akã me atsue ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ mma nɣɛ i ngbe ɔso loto loɣɛ si maafɔ maɖe sɔ fɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.”
43011043	Gɔ ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe ɔro ne, ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Lazaro, ta bɔrɛ ba!”
43011044	Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔturi gɔ lokpi ɔta ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔkati gɔ mamini wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba mini wũ iso, fiɛ ngɔ ana nyi wũ i katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔta ɔbɔrɛ ɔba. Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikurisi wũ ara iso si ɔkɛlɛ.”
43011045	Maturi gbodzoo ma loba maaya Maria ɔnya ara wa i Yesu ɔbara, ne ɔso mafɔ wũ maɖe.
43011046	Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ɔrui makɛlɛ ma Farisise kɔrɛ masɛ maaɣere ma nnɛ i Yesu ɔbara.
43011047	Ne ɔso ma Farisise gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔsarɛgu matɔ̃meɣɛdze makarɛ sɔ, “Be boabara? Minyɔ awawãra gbodzoo wa i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔbara!
43011048	Si botã ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ kumɛgɔgbe ne, maturi ɔɖuɖu to maafɔ wũ maɖe, iyɔ ma Romase abã to maaba maabiɛ bo Isɔrɛyo gu bo karɔ̃!”
43011049	Ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Kayafa fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ku ikɔ nɛmɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mibo ndu miɣede!
43011050	Miiɣe sɔ ilɛ sɔ miatã ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpi i kaɖe iti iɖo sɔ kaɖe ɔɖuɖu aawɔ?”
43011051	Gbaã ne, iiɖe ɔ̃ mɔmɔ adzuni aɖe ɔɣɛ ngbe, ɣɛɛ lɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ku ikɔ nɛmɔ ne, itɔ̃me iɖe ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ Yesu to ɔba ɔ̃akpi i ma Yudase iti.
43011052	Fiɛ iiɖe ma Yudase ɔnɔwɛ̃ kere iti, ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃asa Ɣaa mabi ma ɔɖuɖu loki makã kayiiso kanya.
43011053	Ita i iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, ma Yudase makpakpa ɔsɛ iti ame kumɛgɔ maabara fiɛ maaɖoe Yesu.
43011054	Ne ɔso Yesu iisisɛ ɔsɛ kpawee i Yudea karɔ̃ iso, ɣɛɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Efrayim ame ku ɔ̃ marasuãdze masɛ maawe i mmɔ.
43011055	Ma Yudase Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ɔɔbore ibo, ne ɔso maturi gbodzoo ɔbɔrɛ i abuiti ame maba Yerusalem si maba maasekelera so matã iyi iɖe.
43011056	Gɔ masakanya i Ɣaa Isɔrɛyo ame ne, mala maɔnyɔnyɔ Yesu, ne ɔso mato makarɛ so sɔ, “Nda minya? Ɔ̃ito ɔ̃aba iyi kaɖekɔ̃ lo?”
43011057	Ɣɛɛ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Farisise ɔpia maturi sɔ si ɔrere ɣe ngbegɔ Yesu pia ne, ɔte ma si maakɛlɛ masɛ maamɔɛ̃ wũ.
43012001	Gɔ iɔkuti ayi akuɔ fiɛ maaɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ne, Yesu ɔkɛlɛ Betania i Lazaro gɔ ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame aɖe.
43012002	Mawa kutsuɛ aɖera i mmɔ matã wũ. Marta loɖe ngɔ losia ma aɖera i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iso fiɛ Lazaro ɔ̃ wũ ɔwe i mma losɛ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iti ndɛ̃.
43012003	Maria ɔfedza nnɔĩ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ miwɛ̃ mɛ lofɔ kuɣa gbaã ibui ɔfere Yesu i ngba fiɛ ka ɔsu ɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔnukutu me. Nnɔĩ ɔfiã ɔfɔ iyo ame ɔɖuɖu.
43012004	Ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Yuda Iskariot gɔ loaɖi Yesu ɔtã ɔɣɛ sɔ,
43012005	“Be ɔso fiɛ maibarɔdɛ̃ nnɔĩ mɛgbe sikãfudza abi alafa atɛ masu sikã matã mawɛrɛba?”
43012006	Ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe iiɖe sɔ mawɛrɛba ara nsɛ aɖo wũ kayiri, ɣɛɛ yukukpe ɔɖe ɔso. Ɔ̃ nto sikã kakotoi, ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔyu nnɛ mpia i kame.
43012007	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyua wũ, mitã wũ ɔledza me ɔtã wũ ibiarayi.
43012008	Mawɛrɛba to maawe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loito loawe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi biara.”
43012009	Ma Yudase gbodzoo ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu pia i Betania, ne ɔso masiai wũ kama maba mmɔ. Iiɖe Yesu ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔso fiɛ maba, ɣɛɛ si maba maanya Lazaro gɔ ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ana.
43012010	Ne ɔso masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔsɛ iti ame sɔ maaɖoe Lazaro ɔ̃ wũ,
43012011	alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔso i ma Yudase gbodzoo to makpese ma i kama mafɔ Yesu maɖe.
43012012	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, maturi gbodzoo ma loba Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi kaɖekɔ̃ ɔnɔ sɔ Yesu to ɔba Yerusalem.
43012013	Ne ɔso masu sikɛ mato fiɛ mabɔrɛ sɔ maasarɛgu wũ. Mato mafa kayiɖu sɔ, “Hosiana! Maale ngɔ nto ɔba i Bosate iyere ame! Maale Israel Igara!”
43012014	Yesu ɔna ɔfirimu ɔsi i iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ,
43012015	“Zion Ɔmagɛ̃, daanigã! Ɔɔnya fɔ Igara nto ɔba, ɔsi i ɔfirimu ibi iso!”
43012016	Yesu marasuãdze iinɔ ira nɛgbe karɔ̃ ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔkɛlɛ ikpawaĩ ame ne, manyigi sɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ngbɔ, fiɛ mabara ngbɔ matã wũ ana.
43012017	Mma lowe i Yesu kɔrɛ ku ɔwi gɔ ɔkpere Lazaro ɔbɔrɛgu i ikpibiɔ ame fiɛ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔsɛ maaɣɛ nnɛ loba.
43012018	Nnɛgbe ɔso i maturi gbodzoo mamɔ ɔsarɛgu wũ ne, alasɔ manɔ iwawãra nɛ ɔbara i ngbe.
43012019	Ne ma Farisise to maɣere so sɔ, “Minya sɔ boito bona kayakpa ɖuɖuuɖu? Kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ka masiai wũ!”
43012020	Ma Helase mawɛ̃ pia i mma loba masɔrɛ Ɣaa i iyi kaɖekɔ̃ i Yerusalem ame.
43012021	Maba maaɣere Filipo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Betsaida i Galilea sɔ, “Tete, boto bobie sɔ boanya Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere Andrea fiɛ ma inyɔɔ ka masɛ maaɣere Yesu.
43012023	Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ maapia Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi kuwarɛ siare.
43012024	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ si ititabi iibo i karɔ̃ ame iburi ne, ne ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã kere iɖe mpia, ɣɛɛ si iburi ne, isɛ ipia abi gbodzoo.
43012025	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ngbã ne, ɔto ɔ̃ayura me, ɣɛɛ ngɔ lotsiri ɔ̃ ngbã i kayi gagbe ame ne, ɔkɔla me ɔtã ngbã mɛ loibaro minya.
43012026	Ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asumu me ne, ɔsiai me si wũ maɖabo aawegu me i ngbegɔ lopia. Tete to ɔ̃awarɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔsumu me.
43012027	“Kiniɔ ne, loto lomararã so i wũ ɔtu ame, fiɛ loiɣe nnɛ loaɣɛ. Ɔɣɛ si loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Tete, ɖi me bɔrɛgu i inyɛwe ɔwi gɔgbe ame’? Ooɣo, ala ɔwi gɔgbe ɔso fiɛ loba kayi ne.
43012028	Tete, kɔlɛ fɔ iyere kato!” Ne silɔ ɔɖe ika sibɔrɛgu i kato sɔ, “Loɔkɔlɛ wũ iyere kato koko, fiɛ loto loaledza ibara ana.”
43012029	Maturi gbodzoo ma nɣɛ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔnɔ silɔ, ne ma mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ kado loɖu. Mawɛ̃ ana sɔ, “Ɣaa kpabo loɖegu wũ ika.”
43012030	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iiɖe wũ ɔso fiɛ silɔ ɔɖe ika, ɣɛɛ mi ɔso.
43012031	“Ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ maaɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me, fiɛ maaturi ngɔ nto ɔɖe kayiiso iso iyara.
43012032	Fiɛ si maɔkɔlɛ me kato i kayiiso ne, loaboregu maturi ɔɖuɖu lopia so.”
43012033	Yesu ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe ɔte kukpi gɔ igbã ɔ̃akpi.
43012034	Ne maturi gbodzoo mamɔ to maɣere wũ sɔ, “I bo Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, matsɛrɛ mapia sɔ Kristo iibakpi ɔnya, ne ɔso be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣɛ sɔ maakɔlɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi kato? Nna nɖe Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi gɔgbe?”
43012035	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ɔkaniɛ to ɔ̃awe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ, ne ɔso misɛ i ɔkaniɛ ame si idududu iibafu mi iso. Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔsɛ i idududu ame iisɛ ɔtsue ngbegɔ ɔsɛ.
43012036	Ne ɔso mifɔ ɔkaniɛ miɖe gɔ ɔpia i mi kɔrɛ si miaɖe ikpawaĩ ame maturi.” Gɔ Yesu ɔɣere ma ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔrui ɔsɛ ɔ̃akɔla so.
43012037	Atoa sɔ Yesu ɔbara awawãra wagbe ɔɖuɖu i ma ndɛ̃ ne, maifɔ wũ maɖe.
43012038	Ɣɛɛ iba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ aaba i ne ame sɔ, “Bosate, nna lofɔ bo itɔ̃me nɛ boɣɛ ɔɖe? Fiɛ mabe ndɛ̃ iɖe ɔɖi ɔ̃ ɔle ɔte?”
43012039	Ne ɔso maiwo ɔfɔ ɔɖe alasɔ Yesaya ɔtsɛrɛ ana sɔ,
43012040	“Ɣaa ɔbiɛ ma anɔmi fiɛ ɔtã maba atsue ɔle. Sɔ ma anɔmi iibanya, fiɛ ma adzuni ana iibanɔ ara karɔ̃, ‘Fiɛ maafiniki maba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ loasa ma.’ Ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ne.”
43012041	Yesaya ɔɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ɔnya Yesu ikpawaĩ fiɛ ɔɖe ika i ɔ̃ iso.
43012042	Atoa sɔ ise kumɛgɔgbe ne, ma Yudase makpakpa gbodzoo ɔfɔ Yesu maɖe, ɣɛɛ gɔ mato manigã ma Farisise ɔso ne, maisɛ maɖe ika i ne iso kpawee sɔ maaba maasa ma maɖi i kasarɛkɔ̃.
43012043	Alasɔ masɛ maɖɔɛ maturi ile maɖo Ɣaa ile.
43012044	Yesu ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe ne, iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ iɖe ɔfɔ, ɣɛɛ bo gu ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me iɖe ɔfɔ.
43012045	Ɔbiara gɔ lonya me ana ne, ɔ̃ɔnya ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43012046	Loba kayi ame lɛ ikpawaĩ awe, sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe iisibawe i idududu ame.
43012047	“Si ɔrere ɔnɔ wũ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃ibara i ne iso ne, loibaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me. Loiba loɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ loba lotã kã iɖi.
43012048	Ngɔ losɛ̃ me fiɛ ɔ̃ifɔ wũ itɔ̃me ne, ɔba ngɔ loaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me. Wũ ara wa lote loaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ku iyi tsɔra.
43012049	Alasɔ loiɖe ika i mme mɔmɔ ɔle ame, ɣɛɛ Tete gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me lotã me ɔle sɔ loɖe ika loɣɛ nnɛ loaɣɛ.
43012050	Loɣe sɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me sɛ itã ngbã mɛ nna katui. Ne ɔso nnɛ losɛ loɣɛ ne, ne nɖe nnɛ i Tete ɔɣere me sɔ loɣɛ ne.”
43013001	Iyi nɛ i kaɖe aasɛ̃ fiɛ maaɖe Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ne, Yesu ka ɔɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ i kayi gagbe iso ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ Ɔse kɔrɛ. Ɔɖɔɛ mma nɖe ɔ̃ mare i kayiiso fiɛ ɔɖɔɛ ma ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo ta kawirikɔ̃.
43013002	Kutsuɛ gɔmɔ gɔ Yesu gu ɔ̃ marasuãdze si mato maɖe ara ne, Ɔbosam ɔɔsu adzuni lalaa ɔpia i Yuda gɔ nɖe Simon Iskariot ɔbi ame koko sɔ ɔɖi Yesu ɔtã.
43013003	Yesu ɣe sɔ ɔ̃ Ɔse ɔsu ɔle ɔɖuɖu ɔtã wũ, ɔɣe sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ Ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔto ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ.
43013004	Ne ɔso ɔta i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃, ɔɖi ɔ̃ awu tagbaraa wa ɔpia ɔsɛ, fiɛ ka ɔsu ɔsa ɔkpasa.
43013005	Ne ɔka ndu ɔfere i kapoi ame, ne ɔtsɛ ma ngba ifore, isu ɔsa gɔ ɔkpasa iɖiɖi ma ndu i ngba.
43013006	Gɔ Yesu ɔbo Simon Petro kɔrɛ ne, Petro ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, ɔbie ato sɔ aba aafore me ngba?”
43013007	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kiniɔ ne, ainɔ nnɛ loto lobara karɔ̃, ɣɛɛ ɔwi kama ne, ato aanɔ karɔ̃.”
43013008	Petro ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Ooɣo! Aibafore me ngba anya.” Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si aitã lofore-ɔ ngba ne, tsue sɔ ana kaɖekɔ̃ i wũ ame.”
43013009	Ne Simon Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, si ngbɔ ne, iyɔ daafore me ngba kere, ɣɛɛ fore me nrɔɔ̃ gu iti ana!”
43013010	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ngɔ loɔpie ndu ɔɔsekele koko, ne ɔso ɔ̃isinya itupie iɖo ngba ifore. Mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔsekele, iɖo ɔwɛ̃.”
43013011	Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ka ɔɣe ngɔ loaɖi wũ ɔtã. Ne ɔso ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔsekele iɖo ɔwɛ̃” ne.
43013012	Gɔ Yesu ɔɔfore ma ngba ɔro ne, ɔkpesegu ɔ̃ awu ɔpia, fiɛ ka ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i ɔ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ i ɔpɔrɔ̃ iti. Ne ɔkarɛ ɔ̃ masiaidze sɔ, “Minɔ nnɛ lobara ngbe karɔ̃?
43013013	Misɛ mikpere me sɔ Ratedze gu Bosate, ilɛ ngbɔ, alasɔ ngbɔ loɖe ne.
43013014	Mme gɔ mme nɖe mi Sate gu Ratedze ne, lofore mi ngba. Ne ɔso mi wũ mifore mi malaa ngba.
43013015	Loɔsɛ ikparĩ lotã mi, ne ɔso mi wũ mibara nnɛ lobara lotã mi mitã so.
43013016	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ɔɖabo iisɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ɔkɔse, fiɛ katɔ̃mesɛdze iisɛ ɔɖo ngɔ lopia wũ katɔ̃me.
43013017	Kiniɔ gɔ ka miɣe ɔnukuare gɔgbe ne, so aaɣɔ mi si misu ara wagbe mipia i kurabarara ame.
43013018	“Iiɖe mi ɔɖuɖu ɔso loto loɣɛ nnɛgbe, loɣe mma loɖi. Ɣɛɛ si itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame aaba i ne ame sɔ, ‘Bo gu ngɔ nto bopia kɔrɔ̃ i irɔi ame boɖe ara lota ɔya me iso.’
43013019	“Loto loɣere mi nnɛgbe tɔtɔ fiɛ iaba, sɔ si iba ne, miatsue sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe ngɔ Loɖe.’
43013020	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ ngɔ mme lopia katɔ̃me ne, mme iɖe ɔfɔ. Fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ne, ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me iɖe ɔfɔ.”
43013021	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔmararã so ta ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Ne ɔɣere ma ɔɖi sɔ, “Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔ̃aɖi me ɔtã.”
43013022	Marasuãdze ɔkpɔkpɔtɔ pelepele mato manyɔ so i katɔ̃ sɔ ma nna ɔto.
43013023	Rasuãdze gɔ i Yesu sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔɖo si ɔmatã wũ.
43013024	Ne Simon Petro ɔma wũ anɔmi sɔ, “Karɛ wũ sɔ nna ɔto ɔɣɛ ala.”
43013025	Ne rasuãdze gɔmɔ ɔbore ɔbo Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, nna ɔɖe?”
43013026	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ngɔ loakpɛti aɖera loti kutu losu lotã ne, ɔ̃ ɔɖe ne.” Ne ɔso Yesu ɔkpɛti aɖera, ɔti kutu fiɛ ka ɔsu ɔtã Yuda, Simon Iskariot ɔbi.
43013027	Ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ Yuda ɔfɔ aɖera ne, Satana ɔbo i ɔ̃ ame. Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Pɛ siwa si abara nnɛ ato abie sɔ abara.”
43013028	Mma nsi i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ kuwɛ̃ iinɔ nnɛ i Yesu ɔɣere Yuda karɔ̃.
43013029	Gɔ Yuda kɔrɛ i sikã kakotoi se ɔso ne, marasuãdze mawɛ̃ ɔbu sɔ ɔɣere i Yesu to wũ sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣa ara ɔtã iyi iɖe, ɣee ɔbie irere ɔtã mawɛrɛba.
43013030	Gɔ Yuda ɔfɔ aɖera ne, ɔbɔrɛ i iyo ɔluwɛ̃. Kasɛ̃ ka iɖe.
43013031	Gɔ Yuda ɔbɔrɛ i iyo kama ne, Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Kiniɔ ne, maɔɖi Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi ikpawaĩ mate, fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ iso ne, Ɣaa ikpawaĩ ana ɔɔte sekelee.
43013032	Si makɔlɛ Ɣaa iyere kato iki Ɔbi iso ne, iyɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔlɛ Ɔbi iyere iki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iso ɔluwɛ̃.
43013033	“Wũ mabi, loisibawe i mi kɔrɛ ɔwi ɔdzoro. Mito miabie me, ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣere ma Yudase makpakpa ne, ‘Ngbegɔ losɛ ne, miito miawo mmɔ ɔba.’
43013034	“Kiniɔ ne, mmara ɣɛtɛ loto lotã mi sɔ miɖɔɛ so. Lɛ kumɛgɔ loɖɔɛ mi ne, mi wũ miɖɔɛ so ngbɔ.
43013035	Si mito miɖɔɛ so ne, ɔbiara to ɔ̃atsue sɔ wũ marasuãdze miɖe.”
43013036	Ne Simon Petro ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, i lɛ asɛ?” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ngbegɔ losɛ ne, aito aawo ɔba kiniɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔwi kama ne, ato aaba mmɔ.”
43013037	Petro ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso loibawo-ɔ ɔsiai kiniɔ? Si inya kɔra ne, loakpi i fɔ iti!”
43013038	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Afɔ aɖe sɔ aakpi i wũ iti? Gbaã loto loɣere-ɔ sɔ, si kɔkɔ ɖeakatɔ̃ aaɖi kanya ne, ɔɔsɛ̃ me ikpɛ itɛ sɔ aiɣe me.”
43014001	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaati mikpakpa, mifɔ Ɣaa miɖe si mifɔ me wũ miɖe.
43014002	Kuwekɔ̃ gbodzoo pia i Tete iyo ame, ne ɔso losɛ loaledza kɔ̃ losɛ mi. Si iise ngbɔ ne, loibaɣere mi.
43014003	Si loɔsɛ loaledza kabokɔ̃ losɛ mi ne, loakpese loba loakɔ mi sɔ ngbegɔ lopia ne, mi wũ miawe i mmɔ.
43014004	Miɣe ɔri gɔ iso miaki fiɛ miaba ngbegɔ losɛ.”
43014005	Ne Toma ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate, gɔ boiɣe ngbegɔ asɛ ne, nda boabara fiɛ boatsue ɔri?”
43014006	Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme nɖe ɔri, ɔnukuare gu ngbã. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo Tete kɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ si ɔ̃iki i wũ iso.
43014007	Si ɔɣe miɣe me ne, tee miɣe Tete ɔ̃ wũ. Ɣɛɛ ita i kiniɔ ne, miɔtsue wũ fiɛ miɔnya wũ ana.”
43014008	Mmɔ i Filipo to ɔɣere Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, te bo Tete, si imi bo.”
43014009	Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Filipo, kokooko gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, aiɣe me, ɣɛɛ? Ɔbiara gɔ loɔnya me ne, ɔ̃ɔnya Tete. Be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣɛ sɔ, ‘Te bo Tete’?
43014010	Ɛɛbɛrɛ aifɔ aɖe sɔ Tete pia i wũ ame fiɛ mme wũ lopia i Tete ame? Atɔ̃me wa losɛ loɣere mi ne, iiɖe wũ kɔrɛ abɔrɛ. Tete mɔmɔ gɔ mpia i wũ ame nto ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara.
43014011	Mifɔ me miɖe sɔ lopia i Tete ame fiɛ Tete ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i wũ ame. Si miibawo ne ɔfɔ ɔɖe ne, mifɔ miɖe ala wũ kurabarara ɔso.
43014012	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ me ɔɖe ne, ara wa loto lobara ne, ɔto ɔ̃abara wã, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃abara nwa loɖo ngbɔ ana ala losɛ Tete kɔrɛ.
43014013	Fiɛ loabara ira biara nɛ miakarɛ i wũ iyere ame sɔ Tete iyere aakɔlɛ kato iki i Ɔbi iso.
43014014	Ira biara nɛ miakarɛ me i wũ iyere ame ne, loabara ne.”
43014015	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Si mito miɖɔɛ me ne, mito miabara i wũ mmara iso.
43014016	Nto loakarɛ Tete fiɛ ɔ̃asese mi Buaidze mama gɔ loibarui i mi kɔrɛ ɔnya.
43014017	Ɔ̃ nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ siɖi ɔnukuare i Ɣaa iso site ne. Kayiiso maturi iibawo wũ ɔfɔ alasɔ maibawo wũ ɔnya fiɛ maatsue wũ. Ɣɛɛ mi ne, miɣe wũ alasɔ ɔpiagu mi, fiɛ ɔpia i mi ame.
43014018	“Loibanyua mi losɛ lɛ makpise mabi. Loto loakpese loba mi kɔrɛ.
43014019	Ikuti kɛkɛĩ gɔ kayiiso iisibanya me, ɣɛɛ mi mito mianya me. Gɔ losi ngbã ɔso ne, mi wũ mito miasɛ ngbã.
43014020	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, mito miatsue sɔ lopia i Tete ame, mi wũ mipia i wũ ame, fiɛ mme wũ lopia i mi ame.
43014021	“Ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ wũ mmara ɔto fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe me i iso ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ me ne. Ngɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ me ne, Tete to ɔ̃aɖɔɛ wũ, fiɛ mme wũ loto loaɖɔɛ wũ fiɛ loaɖi so lote wũ.”
43014022	Ne Yuda gɔ loiɖe Iskariot ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, nda ibara fiɛ bo kere aaɖi so ate fiɛ iiɖegu kayiiso maturi?”
43014023	Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Si ɔrere to ɔɖɔɛ me ne, ɔɖe wũ mmara iso. Iyɔ Tete to ɔ̃aɖɔɛ wũ, fiɛ mme gu Tete aaɖi kasɛkɔ̃ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
43014024	Ngɔ loito ɔɖɔɛ me ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ itɔ̃me ɔla. Atɔ̃me wa loɣɛ minɔ ne, iiɖe mme mɔmɔ are aɖe, ɣɛɛ Tete gɔ lopia me katɔ̃me are aɖe.
43014025	“Loɣere mi atɔ̃me wagbe gɔ lokpese lopia i mi kɔrɛ.
43014026	Ɣɛɛ Buaidze gɔ nɖe Siwarã Bielea dzɛ i Tete aasese i wũ iyere ame ne, ɔ̃ nto ɔ̃ate mi ira biara fiɛ ɔ̃anyigira mi ara wa ɔɖuɖu loɣere mi ne.
43014027	“Isobuɛ si iwegu mi. Wũ isobuɛ loto lotã mi. Iiɖe kumɛgɔ i kayiiso sɛ katã isobuɛ loto lotã mi. Midaamararã so, midaanigã ana.
43014028	Minɔ loɣere mi sɔ, ‘Si lorui i mi kɔrɛ ne, loto loakpese loba.’ Si mito miɖɔɛ me ne, miana isoɣɔ sɔ loto lokɛlɛ Tete kɔrɛ, alasɔ ɔmɔ ɔɖo me.
43014029	Kiniɔ ne loɔɣere mi nnɛgbe loɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ si iba ne, miafɔ miɖe.
43014030	Loisibakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ loɖe ika gbodzoo, alasɔ ngɔ nto ɔɖe kayi gagbe iso ka ɔba, ɣɛɛ ɔna ɔle i wũ iso.
43014031	Ɣɛɛ ikote sɔ kayiiso aatsue sɔ nsɛ loɖɔɛ Tete, fiɛ nsɛ lobara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso. “A o-o, mita si borui i ngbe.
43015001	“Mme nɖe kuɖedziri gbaã, fiɛ Tete nɖe adziribi kpɛ̃dze.
43015002	Wũ idzirikpa biara nɛ loisɛ iɣɔ̃ abi ne, ɔsɛ ɔtu ne ɔɖi, fiɛ ibiara nɛ nsɛ iɣɔ̃ abi ne, ɔsɛ ɔyuɛ ne ɔledza sɔ iawo abi gbodzoo ɔɣɔ̃.
43015003	Mi iso ɔɔsekele koko ala ara wa loɔte mi ɔso.
43015004	Miwe i wũ ame si mme wũ lowe i mi ame. Kumɛgɔ ame i idzirikpa iibawo abi ɔɣɔ̃ si iito i kudziri iso ne, ngbɔ ame mi wũ miibawo abi ɔɣɔ̃ si miiwe i wũ ame ne.
43015005	“Mme nɖe kuɖedziri fiɛ mi nɖe akpa. Ngɔ mpia i wũ ame fiɛ mme wũ lopia i ɔ̃ ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɣɔ̃ abi gbodzoo, alasɔ si lona i mi ame ne, miibawo kuira ɔbara.
43015006	Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔwe i wũ ame ne, ɔse lɛ idzirikpa nɛ matu maɖi i kudziri iso fiɛ maafuĩdza masɛ ikore. Akpa wamɔ igbã ne, masɛ masa wã kanya mapia wã ɔtɔ atsue.
43015007	Si miwe i wũ ame fiɛ wũ itɔ̃me ana ɔwe i mi ame ne, iyɔ mito miakarɛ ira biara nɛ miɖɔɛ fiɛ miana ne ana.
43015008	Si miɣɔ̃ abi gbodzoo ne, isɛ ikɔlɛ Tete iyere kato fiɛ isɛ isia ita sɔ wũ marasuãdze miɖe.
43015009	Nsɛ loɖɔɛ mi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Tete sɛ ɔɖɔɛ me, miwe i wũ kuɖɔɛ ame.
43015010	Si mibara i wũ mmara iso ne, miakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ miwe i wũ kuɖɔɛ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ lokã Tete atsue fiɛ lopia i ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ame.
43015011	“Loɔɣere mi ara wagbe sɔ wũ isoɣɔ aawe i mi ame fiɛ mi isoɣɔ aayi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
43015012	Wũ mmara nɖe sɔ, miɖɔɛ so lɛ kumɛgɔ loto loɖɔɛ mi.
43015013	Kuɖɔɛ gɔ loɖo gɔ i ɔturi aawe ɔtã ɔ̃ malaa nɖe sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã i ma iti.
43015014	Wũ malaa miɖe si mibara i nnɛ loɣere mi iso.
43015015	Loisito lokpere mi sɔ maɖabo, alasɔ ɔɖabo iisɛ ɔtsue nnɛ i ma ɔkɔse sɛ ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ ne, ka loto lokpere mi sɔ wũ malaa, alasɔ loɔɣere mi ira biara nɛ lonɔ lobɔrɛgu i Tete kɔrɛ.
43015016	Iiɖe mi loɖi me, ɣɛɛ mme loɖi mi, fiɛ losɛra mi sɔ si miasɛ miaɣɔ̃ abi gbodzoo fiɛ mi abi aase ɔwi biara. Iyɔ Tete aatã mi ira biara nɛ mikarɛ i wũ iyere ame.
43015017	Mmara mɛ loto lotã mi nɖe sɔ, miɖɔɛ so.”
43015018	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Si kayiiso maturi ɔtsiri mi ne, mitsue sɔ maɔɖe katɔ̃ matsiri me koko.
43015019	Si kayiiso maturi miɖe ne, tee maaɖɔɛ mi lɛ ma malaa. Ɣɛɛ kayiiso ame lokpere mi loɖi fiɛ miisiɖe kayiiso maturi, ne ɔso fiɛ matsiri mi ne.
43015020	Minyigi sɔ loɣere mi sɔ, ‘Ɔɖabo iisɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ɔkɔse.’ Si mati me kama ne, mi wũ mato maati mi kama. Si makã wũ ara ite atsue ne, mi wũ mato maakã mi ara ite atsue.
43015021	Ɣɛɛ mato maabara mi ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu alasɔ miɖe wũ mare fiɛ maiɣe ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43015022	Si lodaaba loaɖe ma ika ne, tee maibaɖe ipɔ i ikpi iti. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, masiina kafara itu kuiwɛ̃ i ma akpi iti.
43015023	Ɔbiara gɔ lotsiri me ɔtsiri Tete ana.
43015024	Si iiɖe ɔbara lobara karabara ga igbã i kuwɛ̃ iibara i ma ndɛ̃ ɔnya ne, tee maibaɖe ipɔ i ikpi iti. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, manya ara wa lobara fiɛ matsiri bo gu Tete inyɔ.
43015025	Iba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i ma mmara ɔko ame aaba i ne ame sɔ, ‘Matsiri me siefe.’
43015026	“Loto loasese mi Buaidze gɔ loabɔrɛ i Tete kɔrɛ. Ɔ̃ nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ siɖi ɔnukuare i Ɣaa iso site. Si ɔ̃ɔse i Tete kɔrɛ ɔba ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖe aɖansiɛ i wũ iso ɔtã mi.
43015027	Mi wũ maɖansiɛ miɖe me alasɔ miɔwegu me ita i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
43016001	“Loɔɣere mi ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu si nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ mi i mi kafɔkaɖe ame.
43016002	Mato maasa mi maɖi i ma kusarɛkɔ̃, fiɛ ɔwi to ɔ̃aba gɔ si ɔrere ɔɖoe mi ne, ɔ̃abu sɔ Ɣaa karabara kaɖe ɔto ɔbara.
43016003	Maturi to maabara mi ara wagbe alasɔ maiɣe me, ɣee Tete.
43016004	Ɣɛɛ loto loɣere mi ara wagbe sɔ si ɔwi ɔɣo fiɛ mato mabara wã ne, mianyigi sɔ loɔɣere mi. “Loiɣere mi ara wagbe ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ alasɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ.
43016005	Kiniɔ ne, ka losɛ ngɔ lopia me katɔ̃me kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ mi kuwɛ̃ iito mikarɛ me sɔ lɛ losɛ.
43016006	Ɣɛɛ gɔ loɣere mi ara wagbe ɔso ne, ka mito mimararã so.
43016007	Atoa sɔ ise ngbɔ ne, gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ ilɛ itã mi sɔ loakɛlɛ, alasɔ si loikɛlɛ ne, Buaidze iibawo mi kɔrɛ ɔba. Ɣɛɛ si lokɛlɛ ne, loasu wũ losese mi.
43016008	Si ɔba ne, ɔto ɔ̃aɖi ɔte kayiiso maturi sɔ mayu ɔri i ikpi gu sibɔlɔlɔ gu atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iso.
43016009	Mayu ɔri i ikpi iso alasɔ maifɔ me maɖe.
43016010	Mayu ɔri i sibɔlɔlɔ iso alasɔ loto lokɛlɛ Tete kɔrɛ fiɛ miisibanya me minya.
43016011	Mayu ɔri i atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iso alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔɣɛgu ngɔ nto ɔɖe kayi gagbe iso atɔ̃me ɔtã wũ ipɔ.
43016012	“Loba atɔ̃me gbodzoo loaɣere mi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ato aaɖo mi iti.
43016013	Ɔwi gɔ i Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ siɖi ɔnukuare i Ɣaa iso site ɔɔba ne, sito siate mi ɔnukuare ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa iso. Ɔ̃ibaɖe ika i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame, ɣɛɛ ara wa ɔnɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aɣere mi ara wa nto aaba i katɔ̃.
43016014	Ɔ̃ gɔmɔ loatã makɔlɛ wũ iyere kato ne, alasɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi ara wa ɔfɔ i wũ kɔrɛ ɔte mi.
43016015	Ara wa ɔɖuɖu nɖe Tete are ne, wũ are aɖe, ne ɔso loɣere mi sɔ nnɛ i Siwarã ɔnɔ sibɔrɛgu i wũ kɔrɛ siaɣere mi ne.”
43016016	Ne Yesu ɔsɔgu i katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ikuti kɛkɛĩ ne, miisibanya me, ɣɛɛ ɔwi kurukutu kama ne, mito mianya me ana.”
43016017	Ne ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔkarɛ so sɔ, “Mme itɔ̃me igbã iɖe ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ikuti kɛkɛĩ ne, miisibanya me, ɣɛɛ ɔwi kurukutu kama ne, mito mianya me ana,’ fiɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, ‘Alasɔ losɛ Tete kɔrɛ’?
43016018	Nnɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ ikuti kɛkɛĩ ne boisibanya wũ karɔ̃, ɣɛɛ? Boinɔ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ ngbe karɔ̃.”
43016019	Yesu ɣe sɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze to mabie sɔ makarɛ wũ itɔ̃me, ne ɔso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ ikuti kɛkɛĩ ne miibanya me, ɣɛɛ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ kama ne mito mianya me mito mikakarɛ so ɛɛbɛrɛ?
43016020	Gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ mito miabiɛ misɛ kaku, ɣɛɛ kayiiso maturi to maana isoɣɔ. Mito miamararã so, ɣɛɛ mi isomararã to iakpese isoɣɔ.
43016021	Si ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣewi ɔɣo ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe i isoma ame, alasɔ ɔɣe sɔ ibo ɔnawi ɔɔɣo, ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ɔɣe ɔbi ne, ka ɔsɛ ɔɣara ɔ̃ inyɛwe, alasɔ ɔba isoɣɔ sɔ ɔ̃ɔɣe ɔbi ɔbɔ kayiiso.
43016022	Ngbɔ mito mimararã so kiniɔ ne, ɣɛɛ loto loaledza mi inya, fiɛ so aaɣɔ mi gbaã sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo mi isoɣɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔfɔ.
43016023	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, miisibakarɛ me kuira. Fiɛ gbaã loto loɣere mi sɔ si mikarɛ Tete ira biara ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã mi i wũ iyere ame.
43016024	Ipɛ i kiniɔ ne, miikarɛ kuira i wũ iyere ame. Mikarɛ ara fiɛ miafɔ, sɔ mi isoɣɔ aayi.
43016025	“Losu agbã loɣere mi ara wagbe, ɣɛɛ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ loisibaɖe mi aka i agbã ame. Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, loaɣere mi ara loɖi i Tete iso.
43016026	Iyi nɛmɔ ne, mito miakarɛ ara i wũ iyere ame. Loito loɣɛ sɔ mme loakarɛ Tete ara i mi kanya,
43016027	alasɔ Tete mɔmɔ to ɔɖɔɛ mi. Ɔto ɔɖɔɛ mi alasɔ mito miɖɔɛ me fiɛ mifɔ miɖe sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ lobɔrɛ.
43016028	Gbaã, Tete kɔrɛ lobɔrɛ loba kayiiso, fiɛ loɔbɔrɛ i kayiiso loto lokpese lokɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.”
43016029	Marasuãdze ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɛɣɛɛ̃, kini ato aɖe bo ika aɖi fiɛ iiɖe agbã ame ne.
43016030	Kini botsue sɔ aɣe ira biara ne iinya sɔ kuwɛ̃ aakarɛ-ɔ kuira ne. Iki i nnɛgbe iso ne, boɔfɔ boɖe sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ abɔrɛ.”
43016031	Yesu ɔtã ma mmuai sɔ, “Miɔfɔ miɖe kini?
43016032	Ɔwi to ɔba fiɛ ɔ̃ɔɣo, gɔ mi ɔɖuɖu to miasame miɣɛ me mikɛlɛ mi ayo ikuti wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ loiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ alasɔ Tete piagu me.
43016033	Loɔɣere mi ara wagbe si so aaɣɔ mi i mi mawɛ̃ ibaragu me ame. Kayiiso to kaatã miwe inyɛ, ɣɛɛ mina ɔtu alasɔ loɔɖe kayiiso iso!”
43017001	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ara wagbe ɔro ne, ɔkɔlɛ anɔ ɔnyɔ kato, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Tete, ɔwi ɔɔɣo. Kɔlɛ fɔ Ɔbi iyere kato si fɔ Ɔbi ana aakɔlɛ fɔ ire kato.
43017002	Alasɔ atã wũ ɔle i maturi ɔɖuɖu iso sɔ ɔ̃atã mma ɔɖuɖu asu atã wũ ngbã mɛ nna katui.
43017003	Ngbã mɛ nna katui karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ maatsue sɔ fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Ɣaa gbaã fiɛ maatsue Yesu Kristo gɔ apia katɔ̃me ana.
43017004	Loɔkɔlɛ fɔ iyere kato i karɔ̃ iso, alasɔ loɔro karabara ga apia me sɔ lobara.
43017005	Kiniɔ ne Tete, kɔlɛ wũ iyere kato i fɔ anɔ isɛ iabo ngbegɔ losia ku ɔwi gɔ lowe i fɔ kɔrɛ ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
43017006	“Loɔɖi-ɔ lote mma atã me abɔrɛgu i kayi ame. Fɔ mare maɖe, fiɛ fɔ losu ma atã me. Makã fɔ itɔ̃me atsue,
43017007	fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka maɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ atã me ne, fɔ kɔrɛ ibɔrɛ.
43017008	Loɣere ma katɔ̃me ga apia me, fiɛ mafɔ kã. Maɣe sɔ gbaã ne, fɔ kɔrɛ lobɔrɛ fiɛ mafɔ maɖe sɔ fɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43017009	Loito lokparama kayi lotã kayiiso, ɣɛɛ mma atã me iti loto lokparama kayi, alasɔ fɔ mare maɖe.
43017010	“Mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe wũ mare ne, fɔ mare maɖe. Fiɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe fɔ mare ne, wũ mare maɖe. Ma iso asɛ akɔlɛ wũ iyere kato akigu.
43017011	Kiniɔ ne, ka loba fɔ kɔrɛ, losiina i kayiiso, ɣɛɛ ma mapia i kayiiso. Tete Sekelea, dzuɛ̃ ma i ɔle gɔ mpia i fɔ iyere nɛ atã me ame sɔ maaɖe mawɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i bo gu-ɔ ɖe mawɛ̃.
43017012	Ɔwi gɔ lopia i ma kɔrɛ ne, lodzuɛ̃ ma ala ɔle gɔ mpia i iyere nɛ atã me ame. Lodzuɛ̃ ma sɔ ma kuwɛ̃ iiyu iɖo ngɔ ikote sɔ ɔ̃ayu, sɔ nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame aaba i ne ame.
43017013	“Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ka loba fɔ kɔrɛ. Loɣɛ atɔ̃me wagbe i kayiiso sɔ wũ isoɣɔ aayi ma situ ame pɔpɔɔpɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loba isoɣɔ kiniɔ.
43017014	Loɣere ma fɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ kayiiso ɔtsiri ma alasɔ maiɖe kayiiso mare lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loiɖe kayiiso ɔre.
43017015	“Loito lokarɛ sɔ mɔɛ̃ ma ɖi i kayiiso, ɣɛɛ nnɛ loto lokarɛ nɖe sɔ dzuɛ̃ ma ɖi bɔrɛgu i Tsirise nrɔɔ̃ ame.
43017016	Kumɛgɔ ame loiɖe kayiiso ɔre ne, ngbɔ ame ma wũ maiɖe kayiiso mare ne.
43017017	Bara ma sekelee iki i ɔnukuare ame, fɔ itɔ̃me nɖe ɔnukuare.
43017018	Lopia ma kayiiso maturi kɔrɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ fɔ wũ apia me kayiiso.
43017019	Ma ɔso ne, lobara so sekelee lotã-ɔ sɔ ma wũ ne, maabara so sekelee gbaã matã-ɔ.
43017020	“Iiɖe ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã iti loto lokparama kayi, ɣɛɛ mma ana ɔɖuɖu loafɔ me maɖe iki i ma itɔ̃me iso iti.
43017021	Tete! Tã sɔ ma ɔɖuɖu aaɖe mawɛ̃. Mawe i bo ame lɛ kumɛgɔ apia i wũ ame fiɛ mme wũ lopia i fɔ ame. Maɖe mawɛ̃ si kayiiso maturi aafɔ maɖe sɔ fɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43017022	“Lopia ma kuwarɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ apia me kuwarɛ sɔ si maaɖe mawɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i bo gu-ɔ ɖe mawɛ̃.
43017023	Lopia i ma ame, fiɛ fɔ wũ apia i wũ ame sɔ maaɖe mawɛ̃ pelepele sɔ kayiiso aatsue sɔ fɔ lopia me katɔ̃me fiɛ asɛ aɖɔɛ fɔ mabi lɛ kumɛgɔ asɛ aɖɔɛ me.
43017024	“Tete! Fɔ losu ma atã me fiɛ loto lobie sɔ mawe i ngbegɔ lopia fiɛ maanya wũ ikpawaĩ nɛ atã me. Alasɔ ato aɖɔɛ me fiɛ abara kayiiso.
43017025	“Tete Bɔlɔlɔa! Kayiiso maturi iiɣe-ɔ, ɣɛɛ mme loɣe-ɔ, fiɛ mmagbe ɣe sɔ fɔ lopia me katɔ̃me.
43017026	Loɖi-ɔ lote ma fiɛ loto loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ lobara ngbɔ sɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ aba atã me aawe i ma ame fiɛ mme wũ loawe i ma ame.”
43018001	Gɔ Yesu ɔkparama kayi ɔro ne, ɔruigu ɔ̃ marasuãdze mawara Kidron Kaworenya makɛlɛ nnɔĩ adziri kakpɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ame.
43018002	Yuda gɔ loɖi Yesu ɔtã ana ɣe mmɔ, alasɔ ɔwi gbodzoo ame ne, Yesu sɛ ɔkɔ ɔ̃ marasuãdze masɛ maasarɛ i mmɔ.
43018003	Ne ɔso Yuda ɔkɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ikuri iwɛ̃ gu kasɔrɛkɔ̃ madzuɛ̃se ma i masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Farisise ɔsese kakpɛkɔ̃ gamɔ ame. Mato akpira, kaka sitɔ gu sikaniɛ.
43018004	Yesu ɣe ira biara nɛ loabɔrɛ wũ iso, ne ɔso ɔbɔrɛ ɔya i katɔ̃ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna mito mibie?”
43018005	Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Yesu Nasaretse boto bobie.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme nɖe wũ.” Yuda gɔ loɖi wũ ɔtã ana ɣɛ i ma kɔrɛ mmɔ.
43018006	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme nɖe wũ” ne, masɛ simasima mabɔrɛ marɔ̃.
43018007	Ɔledza ma ikarɛ sɔ, “Nna mito mibie?” Maledza wũ mmuai itã sɔ, “Yesu Nasaretse.”
43018008	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loɔɣere mi koko sɔ mme nɖe wũ ne, ne ɔso si mme mito mibie ne, miɖi mmagbe ɔri si makɛlɛ.”
43018009	Ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe si itɔ̃me nɛ ɔ̃ɔɣere ma ɔɖegu katɔ̃ aaba i ne ame sɔ, “Tete, mma asu atã me ne, loiyura ma kuwɛ̃.”
43018010	Ne Simon Petro gɔ nto ipɛmi ɔɖi ne i ɔyuɛ ame ɔwe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔɖabo kuɖearɔ̃ kutsue ɔtara. Ɔɖabo gɔmɔ marɔ sɔ Malkos ne.
43018011	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Kpesera fɔ ipɛmi pia i ne kawekɔ̃. Iikote sɔ loanɛ inyɛwe ikɔi nɛ i Tete ɔtã me?”
43018012	Ne kama ne, Roma makpakpɛ̃dze gu ma ɔkpakpa gu ma Yudase madzuɛ̃se ɔmɔɛ̃ Yesu, manyi wũ.
43018013	Makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu Hana kɔrɛ. Hana gɔgbe nɖe mase ɔtã Kayafa gɔ nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ku ikɔ nɛmɔ ne.
43018014	Kayafa gɔgbe ame ɔɖe lotã ma Yudase adzuni sɔ ilɛ iɖo sɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ aakpi i kaɖe ɔɖuɖu iti ne.
43018015	Simon Petro gu rasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ ɔsiai Yesu i kama. Gɔ makɛlɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele iyo ne, rasuãdze gɔmɔ ɔ̃ ɔbo i iyo ame, alasɔ ma gu Sɔrɛdzekpakpa ɣe so kukaakɔ.
43018016	Ɣɛɛ Petro ɣɛ i inyamɔ. Rasuãdze gɔmɔ ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ kayogodɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖegu ɔbirɔ̃gomi gɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mmɔ ika fiɛ ɔtã wũ ɔri ɔkɔ Petro ɔbogu i iyo.
43018017	Ɔbirɔ̃gomi gɔ nɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃ mmɔ ɔkarɛ Petro sɔ, “Fɔ wũ iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe rasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ aɖe, ɣɛɛ?” Ne Petro sɔ, “Ooɣo lo, loiɖe ma ɔwɛ̃!”
43018018	Ɔyu pia, ne ɔso maɖabo gu madzuɛ̃se ɔpia ɔtɔ maɣɛ maki malɔ mato mawa. Ne ɔso Petro ɣɛ i ma kɔrɛ ɔto ɔwa ɔtɔ.
43018019	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔkarɛ Yesu atɔ̃me ɔsegu i ɔ̃ marasuãdze gu ɔ̃ ara wa ɔto ɔte iso.
43018020	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɔwi biara lopia loto lote maturi ara i ɔgbami, fiɛ wũ ara ite ɔɖuɖu ana ne, lote wã i kasarɛkɔ̃ gu Isɔrɛyo ame ngbegɔ i ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ɔsakanya, ne ɔso loite kuira i iwɛrɛ ame.
43018021	Be ɔso mme ato akarɛ atɔ̃me? Karɛ mma lonɔ wũ ara wa lote ma. Maɣe nnɛ loɣɛ.”
43018022	Gɔ Yesu ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, dzuɛ̃se ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔpɛ wũ ɔrɔ̃ta i kutsueti ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ato aɖegu ika ngbɔ?”
43018023	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Si loɣɛ nnɛ loilɛ ne, ɣere ɔbiara i ngbe nnɛ loɣɛ fiɛ iilɛ, ɣɛɛ si loiɣɛ kuira nyanyarĩa ne, be ɔso ato apɛ me ɔrɔ̃ta?”
43018024	Ne ɔso Hana ɔkpesegu Yesu gɔ manyi nrɔɔ̃ ɔsese Kayafa gɔ nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele kɔrɛ.
43018025	Gɔ Simon Petro ɣɛ ɔtogu ɔtɔ iwa ne, mma nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ wũ ne, iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe rasuãdze ɔwɛ̃ aɖe, ɣɛɛ?” Ɣɛɛ Petro ɔsɛ̃, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loiɖe ma ɔwɛ̃!”
43018026	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele maɖabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Petro ɔtu kutsue ɔnyii ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nnisɔ lonya-ɔ fɔ wũ i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ku ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe?”
43018027	Ngbe ana ne, Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ooɣo!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kɔkɔ ɔbo.
43018028	Kaya tutuutu ne, makɔ Yesu mabɔrɛgu i Kayafa iyo makɛlɛgu abã ɔkpakpa iyo. Gɔ ma Yudase makpakpa ɔɔsekelera so sɔ maawo Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi aɖera ɔɖe ɔso ne, maibo i iyo ame.
43018029	Ne ɔso Pilato ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ ma kɔrɛ i inyamɔ ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mme ikpi i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔbara?”
43018030	Matã mmuai sɔ, “Si ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃ ne, boibakɔ wũ bobɔ-ɔ.”
43018031	Ne Pilato to ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iyɔ mi mɔmɔ mikɔ wũ mikɛlɛgu miaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me i mi mmara kanya.” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Maitã bo ɔri sɔ boatã ɔturi kukpi ipɔ.”
43018032	Nnɛgbe ɔba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ i Yesu mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsu ɔte kukpi gɔ igbã ɔ̃akpi ɔba i ne ame.
43018033	Pilato ɔkpese ɔbo i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe ma Yudase igara?”
43018034	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ mɔmɔ kɔrɛ i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ ɛɛbɛrɛ manyiiɔ loɖe-ɔ wũ iso ika?”
43018035	Pilato ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɔ Yudase loɖe? Fɔ mɔmɔ maturi gu masɔrɛdze makpakpa lokɔ-ɔ mabɔ me. Be iɖe abara?”
43018036	Ne Yesu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iibɔrɛ i kayi gagbe iso, si ngbe sibɔrɛ ne, tee wũ makpabo aakpɛ̃ mafɔ me mabɔrɛgu i ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame, ɣɛɛ ne, wũ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iibɔrɛ i ngbe!”
43018037	Pilato ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ne iyɔ igara aɖe?” Ne Yesu ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Fɔ nto aɣɛ sɔ igara loɖe. Ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛgbe ɔso fiɛ maɣe me mapia i kayi gagbe ame ne, sɔ loaɣɛ ɔnukuare. Ɔbiara gɔ nɖe ɔnukuare ɔre sɛ ɔkã me atsue.”
43018038	Ne Pilato ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be nɖe ɔnukuare?” Ne Pilato ɔbɔrɛ ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kɔrɛ i inyamɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loinya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ nɛ iso loaya fiɛ loatã wũ kukpi ipɔ lo.
43018039	Ɣɛɛ i mi kubarara kanya ne, nsɛ loɖi yorɛdze ɔwɛ̃ lotã mi ku Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi ɔɖewi biara. Ne ɔso lonyua ma Yudase Igara lotã mi?”
43018040	Mala kulu matã mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo, boibie wũ! Bobie Baraba!” Baraba gɔgbe ne, ɔturi gɔ lota ɔya abã iso ɔɖe.
43019001	Ne ɔso Pilato ɔtã makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ Yesu maruigu masɛ maapɛ wũ nyanyarĩ ku ala iporoibi.
43019002	Masu miyu mabara ala sigaraikoto masu matɔ̃medza wũ fiɛ ka masu ɔgo rɛtɛa ɔkati mafu wũ lɛ igara.
43019003	Mabore mabo wũ mafa kayiɖu sɔ, “Ɣii-ɣiiɖuu! Ma Yudase Igara o-o!” Maɣɛ ngbɔ ne mapɛ wũ sirɔ̃ta.
43019004	Pilato ɔledza ibɔrɛ ikɛlɛ isɛ iaɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Minyɔ, loto lokɔ wũ lobɔ mi si minya sɔ loinyagu wũ ku ikpi nɛ ɔso loatã wũ kukpi ipɔ.”
43019005	Ne ɔso Yesu ɔbɔrɛ ɔba ɔtɔ̃me miyu ikoto fiɛ ka ɔpia ɔgo awu rɛtɛa tagbaraa. Ne Pilato ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyɔ wũ! Ɔturi i ngbe ne!”
43019006	Gɔ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu Isɔrɛyo madzuɛ̃se ɔnya wũ ne, mala kulu sɔ, “Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso! Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso!” Ne Pilato ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɔ wũ mikɛlɛgu miapɛ wũ mimatãra i kudziri iso, ɣɛɛ mme ne, loinya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ nɛ ɔso loatã wũ kukpi ipɔ.”
43019007	Ne maturi to mala kulu maɣɛ sɔ, “Boba mmara mɛ loɣɛ sɔ ikote sɔ ɔ̃akpi, alasɔ ɔto ɔkpere so sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe.”
43019008	Gɔ Pilato ɔnɔ nnɛgbe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ibua.
43019009	Ne ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ iyo ame fiɛ ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “I lɛ abɔrɛ?” Ɣɛɛ Yesu iitã wũ mmuai.
43019010	Pilato ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be, aito apia me kanya? Tsue sɔ loba ɔle gɔ loawo-ɔ ɔnyua ɣee lotã mapɛ-ɔ mamatãra i kudziri iso!”
43019011	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɔle gɔ kɔra aba i wũ iso ne, Ɣaa pɛ lotã-ɔ ɔso. Ne ɔso ngɔ loɖi me ɔtã-ɔ ɔbara ikpi siare ɔɖo-ɔ.”
43019012	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, Pilato ɔbie sɔ si ɔnyua wũ, ɣɛɛ ma Yudase ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Si anyua ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, iyɔ aiɖe Roma Igarakpakpa ɔlaa. Ɔbiara gɔ losɛra so sigara ne, ɔta ɔya i Igarakpakpa iso!”
43019013	Gɔ Pilato ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ɔkɔ Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu inyamɔ. Ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i iyara nɛ iso masɛ masɛ maɣɛ atɔ̃me fiɛ masɛ marɔ ne sɔ Itabɛbɛa iso. I ma Yudase siɖe ame ne, masɛ marɔ mmɔ sɔ Gabata.
43019014	Iyi nɛmɔ nɖe Iledzaso itã Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe ne. Ne Pilato ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nya mi Igara ngbe!”
43019015	Ne mala kulu teteree sɔ, “Kɔ wũ ruigu! Kɔ wũ ruigu! Pɛ wũ matãra i kudziri iso!” Ne Pilato ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Lopɛ mi Igara lomatãra i kudziri iso?” Ne masɔrɛdze makpakpa ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Bona igara kuwɛ̃ iɖo Roma Igarakpakpa Kaisaro!”
43019016	Gɔ maɣɛ ngbɔ ne, Pilato ɔtara Yesu ɔpia ma i nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ masɛ maapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ Yesu maruigu.
43019017	Gɔ matã wũ ɔsore ɔdziri ne, makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu ngbegɔ marɔ Itikui Kabemi. Fiɛ si Hebrise ame ne, masɛ marɔ mmɔ sɔ Golgata.
43019018	Mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso i ngbe. Mapɛ maturi inyɔ mawɛ̃ ana mamatãra i ma adziri iso mabua wũ iso. Ɔwɛ̃ i kuɖearɔ̃ iso, ɔwɛ̃ ana i kubena iso fiɛ Yesu ka ɔpia ma i ndɛ̃.
43019019	Pilato ɔtã matsɛrɛ mamatãra i Yesu sitikpe sɔ, “Yesu Nasaretse, Ma Yudase Igara.”
43019020	Ma Yudase gbodzoo ɔka ira nɛ matsɛrɛ masia i kudziri iso alasɔ ngbegɔ mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso ɔbore imatã Yerusalem. Ana ne, matsɛrɛ i si Hebrise gu si Romase gu si Helase ame.
43019021	Masɔrɛdzekpakpa iitɔrã, maɣere Pilato sɔ, “Daatsɛrɛ sɔ ‘Ma Yudase Igara,’ ɣɛɛ tsɛrɛ sɔ, ‘Ngɔgbe nto ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe ma Yudase Igara ne.’ ”
43019022	Ɣɛɛ Pilato ɔsɛ̃, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Nnɛ loɔtsɛrɛ ne, loɔtsɛrɛ koko.”
43019023	Gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔpɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso maro ne, maɣɛ ɔ̃ arapia aka ana, kpakpɛ̃dze biara ɔfɔ ika iwɛ̃. Awu awɛ̃ ɔkuti wa iiɖe ɔkã makã ɣɛɛ ɔwe mawe wã ita i kato isɛ iabɔrɛ i kala.
43019024	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔɣere so sɔ, “Midaatã bokɛ wã, ɣɛɛ mitã bobara kareremi si bonyɔ sɔ nna aaɣo.” Iba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame aaba i ne ame sɔ, “Masu wũ arapia maɣɛ so. Fiɛ mabara kareremi i wũ awu iso.” Ne ɔso ngbɔ tutuutu i makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbara ne.
43019025	Kudziri gɔ iso mapɛ Yesu mamatãra kɔrɛ ne, marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ ɣɛ. Ma nɖe Yesu ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi gu Klopa ɔre Maria gu Maria Magdalase.
43019026	Gɔ Yesu ɔnya ɔ̃ ɔnyi gu ɔ̃ rasuãdze gɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia kuɣɛ ɣɛ mabore mamatã wũ ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔnyi sɔ, “Mmã, nya fɔ ɔbi!”
43019027	Ne ɔɣere rasuãdze gɔmɔ ana sɔ, “Fɔ wũ, nya fɔ ɔnyi.” Ne ɔso ita i iyi nɛmɔ ne, rasuãdze gɔgbe ɔkɔ Yesu ɔnyi ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃ iyo ɔnyɔ wũ iso.
43019028	Yesu ɣe sɔ ira biara ɔɔba kawirikɔ̃, ɣɛɛ si nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ aaba i ne ame ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔme to ɔkore me.”
43019029	Ituɖura iwɛ̃ se i mmɔ iyi ku ndã bea. Ne ɔso masu ɖɔti pukupukua mapia i me ame maɖu i ɔdziri iso masɔ̃ Yesu i kanya.
43019030	Gɔ ɔfɔ ndã bea mɛmɔ ɔro ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Iɔro kini!” Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ne, ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ kere ne ɔsora ne.
43019031	Iledzaso itã Iwarãyi iyi iso iɖe i ara wagbe ɔba, fiɛ kaɖesɛ̃a ɖe Iwarãyi sekelea itã ma Yudase, ne ɔso maibie sɔ makpise si mamatã i adziri iso ku Iwarãyi. Ne ɔso masɛ maaɣere Pilato sɔ ɔtã ɔri si masɛ maafɛfɛ̃ ma ngba si mabɛse ma i adziri iso.
43019032	Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze ɔba maturi inyɔ ma mapɛ mamatãra i adziri iso ku Yesu kɔrɛ. Mafɛ̃ ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu ɔnyɔare ngba.
43019033	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mabo Yesu iso ne, manya sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi koko ne ɔso maisifɛ̃ ɔ̃ ngba.
43019034	Ɣɛɛ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ ɔsu ɔ̃ ifele ɔtsue Yesu iwãgɛsɛ fiɛ ndu gu ima ɔbɔrɛ.
43019035	Ngɔ lonya sɔ ara wagbe ɔba ɔɖe loɖe wã aɖansiɛ sɔ si fɔ wũ aafɔ aɖe. Ara wa ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe fiɛ ɔɣe sɔ ɔnukuare iɖe ɔɣɛ.
43019036	Iba ngbɔ sɔ nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame aaba i ne ame sɔ, “Maibafɛ̃ ɔ̃ ikui kuiwɛ̃.”
43019037	Matsɛrɛ masɛ i kakɔi mama ana sɔ, “Mato maanyɔ ngɔ matsue ira.”
43019038	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Yosef gɔ lose i Arimatea ɔba ɔ̃akarɛ Pilato sɔ ɔsu Yesu kpise ɔtã wũ. Ɔɖe Yesu rasuãdze ɣɛɛ i iwɛrɛ ame alasɔ ɔto ɔnigã ma Yudase makpakpa ɔso ne. Pilato ɔɖi wũ ɔri, ne ɔso ɔsu kpise ɔruigu.
43019039	Nikodemo gɔ loba Yesu kɔrɛ ku kasɛ̃ ɔnya ana ɔba. Ɔsu awa wa masu korobo gu awa kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a mabara ala fiɛ masɛ masu maledza ala makpise fiɛ wã ɔrɔrã aaɖe lɛ ito iwɛ̃ ɔbɔ.
43019040	Marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ magbe ɔsu awa mapia i ɔkati ame mamini kpise, kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase sɛ mabara fiɛ masɛ mabiara ɔturi.
43019041	I ngbegɔ mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso ne, kakpɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ pia i mmɔ. Ikpibiɔ ɣɛtɛ nɛ ame maibiara ɔturi manya ana se i kã ame.
43019042	Gɔ kaɖesɛ̃a to iaɖe Iwarãyi fiɛ ikpibiɔ nɛmɔ ɔɔbore imatã mmɔ ɔso ne, masu Yesu mabiara i mmɔ.
43020001	Kɔsiɖa kaya tutuutu gɔ kayi iikpa karo ne, Maria Magdalase ɔkɛlɛ ikpibiɔ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔnya sɔ maɔli ita nɛ mali matɛ̃ ikpibiɔ kanya maɖi.
43020002	Ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ Simon Petro gu rasuãdze gɔ i Yesu iisɛ ɔpia kuɣɛ kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma sɔ, “Maɔmɔɛ̃ Bosate maɖi i ikpibiɔ ame fiɛ boiɣe ngbegɔ masu wũ masɛ!”
43020003	Petro gu rasuãdze gɔmɔ ɔta sɔ makɛlɛ ikpibiɔ kɔrɛ.
43020004	Ma inyɔɔ ɔtere ise, ɣɛɛ rasuãdze gɔmɔ ɔtere ɔɖe Petro katɔ̃ ɔbo ikpibiɔ kɔrɛ.
43020005	Ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ ɔnya sikati fudza dzɛmɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ibo i ikpibiɔ ame.
43020006	Gɔ Simon Petro ɔtere ɔba ɔ̃abo ne, ɔfe ɔbo i iwo ame, ɔnya sikati fudza dzɛmɔ gɔ sise.
43020007	Ɔnya ɔkati gɔ masu manyi Yesu iti ana. Ɔ̃isakanyagu ɔkati gɔ masu mamini Yesu kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ makarĩ masɛ i kuruɛ.
43020008	Mmɔ i rasuãdze nyɔare gɔ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔ̃ wũ ɔbo i ikpibiɔ ame. Ɔnya ara wagbe fiɛ ka ɔfɔ ɔɖe.
43020009	Ɣɛɛ ta kiniɔ ne, mainɔ karɔ̃ nnɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ Yesu aata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame.
43020010	Ne marasuãdze ɔkpese makɛlɛ iyo ne.
43020011	Ɣɛɛ Maria Magdalase ɔba ɔɣɛ i ikpibiɔ kɔrɛ ɔto ɔbiɛ. Gɔ ɔtogu kaku ibiɛ ne, ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ ɔnyɔ ikpibiɔ ame ne,
43020012	ɔnya Ɣaa makpabo inyɔ ma mpia ara fudza gɔ masi i ngbegɔ marara Yesu. Ɔwɛ̃ si i sitikpe fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana si i ngbalɔ.
43020013	Ne makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, be ɔso ato abiɛ?” Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyiiɔ ɔsu wũ ɔkɔse maruigu fiɛ loiɣe ngbegɔ masu wũ masɛ.”
43020014	Gɔ ɔpɛ ɔfiniki ne, ɔnya Yesu ɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃iɣe sɔ Yesu ɔɖe.
43020015	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔrɔ̃go, be ɔso ato abiɛ? Nna ato abie?” Ɣɛɛ Maria ɔbu sɔ ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ mmɔ iso ɔɖe, ne ɔso ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bokɔse, loto-ɔ i kukpa, si fɔ losu wũ asɛ i kakɔi karere ne, te me ngbegɔ asɛ wũ si losɛ loasu wũ.”
43020016	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Maria!” Gɔ Maria ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ wũ ne, ɔla kulu i si Hebrise ame sɔ, “Rabuni!” gɔ ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ratedze.
43020017	Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Daasimɔɛ̃ me, alasɔ loikɛlɛ Tete kɔrɛ i kato. Ɣɛɛ ne, kɛlɛ wũ manyiibi kɔrɛ si asɛ aaɣere ma sɔ, loto lokpese lokɛlɛ wũ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ma Ɣaa gu wũ Ɔse gɔ nɖe ma Ɔse kɔrɛ.”
43020018	Ne ɔso Maria Magdalase ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere marasuãdze sɔ ɔnya Bosate fiɛ ka ɔɣere ma ara wa i Yesu ɔɣere wũ.
43020019	Kɔsiɖa gɔmɔ kutsuɛ ne, marasuãdze ɔsakanya. Masɛ̃ iyo mapia so ala mato manigã ma Yudase makpakpa. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Yesu ɔba ɔ̃aya i ma ndɛ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã mi.”
43020020	Gɔ ɔɣere ma ngbɔ ɔro ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ gu iwãgɛsɛ ɔte ma. So ɔɣɔ marasuãdze gbaã alasɔ manya Bosate.
43020021	Ne Yesu ɔledza ma iɣere sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã mi, kumɛgɔ ame i Tete ɔpia me katɔ̃me ne, ngbɔ ame loto lopia mi ne.”
43020022	Ne ɔwarã ɔfere ma iso ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mifɔ Siwarã Bielea.
43020023	Si misu maturi akpi mitsɛ ma ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ɔtsɛ ma, ɣɛɛ si miisu mitsɛ ma ne, Ɣaa iibasu ɔtsɛ ma.”
43020024	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔba ma kɔrɛ ne, marasuãdze iweo-inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Toma fiɛ masɛ marɔ sɔ Inyɔɔbi na i ma ndɛ̃.
43020025	Ne ɔso marasuãdze tsɔra ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bonya Bosate!” Ne Toma ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ lonya aɣɛipã wa i ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃, losu wũ kɔrɔ̃ lopia i apã wamɔ ame gu ɔ̃ iwãgɛsɛ ame ne, loibafɔ loɖe lonya.”
43020026	Ɖapɛ ɔwɛ̃ kama ne, marasuãdze pia i iyo fiɛ Toma ana ɔwe i ma ndɛ̃. Masɛ̃ akui mapia so ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔba ɔ̃aya i ma ndɛ̃. Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Isobuɛ itã mi.”
43020027	Ne ɔɣere Toma sɔ, “Ba su fɔ irɔĩ pia i ngbe. Nyɔ wũ nrɔɔ̃ si asu fɔ kɔrɔ̃ apia i wũ iwãgɛsɛ ame. Nyua ɔwararã si afɔ aɖe!”
43020028	Ne Toma ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Wũ Sate gu wũ Ɣaa!”
43020029	Ne Yesu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔɔfɔ aɖe alasɔ ɔɔnya me? So aaɣɔ mma loisɛ manya fiɛ masɛ mafɔ me maɖe!”
43020030	Yesu ɔbara awawãra gbodzoo i ɔ̃ marasuãdze kɔrɛ wa maitsɛrɛ mapia i ɔko gɔgbe ame.
43020031	Ɣɛɛ matsɛrɛ nwagbe masɛ sɔ si aafɔ aɖe sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo gu Ɣaa Ɔbi, fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ ifɔ iɖe ame ne, aana ngbã.
43021001	Nwagbe kama ne, Yesu ɔledza so iɖi ite ɔ̃ marasuãdze i Tiberia Ɔpo kanya. Kumɛgɔ ɔɖi so ɔte ma i ngbe ne.
43021002	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Yesu marasuãdze mawɛ̃ ɔsikanya. Ma nɖe Simon Petro gu Toma gɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Inyɔɔbi gu Nataniel gɔ lobɔrɛ i Kana i Galilea karɔ̃ iso gu Zebedeo mabi gu marasuãdze inyɔ mama.
43021003	Ne Simon Petro ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Losɛ akpɛ kaɖikɔ̃.” Ne matsɔra ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bo wũ boaba bokɛlɛ.” Ne ɔso ma ɔɖuɖu ɔbo i ɔkolo ame makɛlɛ, ɣɛɛ kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ne, maiɖi ikpɛ kuiwɛ̃.
43021004	Kaya gɔ kuɣɛ̃ ɔsɔ̃ kuto kuba ne, Yesu ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i ɔpo kanya, ɣɛɛ marasuãdze iiɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖe.
43021005	Ne ɔkpere ma ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Maporoporoi, miɔɖi akpɛ awɛ̃?” Matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo!”
43021006	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mipia mi asabu i mi ɔkolo kuɖearɔ̃ iso ne mito miaɖi akpɛ.” Gɔ mapia asabu ne, maiwo ɔkpadzɛ̃ ala akpɛ gbodzoo wa mamɔɛ̃ ɔso.
43021007	Rasuãdze gɔ i Yesu iisɛ ɔpia kuɣɛ ɔɣere Petro sɔ, “Bosate ɔɖe lo!” Gɔ Petro ɔnɔ sɔ Bosate ɔɖe ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ kato awu ɔkpasa alasɔ ɔɖi wã ɔsɛ. Ɔkɔlɛ ɔbo i ndu ame ɔɣa ndu ɔkɛlɛ ɔkpokpo.
43021008	Marasuãdze tsɔra ɔsɛ ɔkolo ame maba mato makpadzɛ̃ asabu wa loyi ku akpɛ. Ma gu ɔkpokpo ndɛ̃ aaɖe lɛ nrɔɔ̃ siru kere.
43021009	Gɔ maso i ɔkpokpo ne, manya sɔ mapia ɔtɔ i mmɔ ikpɛ sia iso, abolo ana se i mmɔ.
43021010	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miɖi akpɛ wa mimɔɛ̃ awɛ̃ mibɔ.”
43021011	Ne Simon Petro ɔya ɔbo i ɔkolo ame ɔkpadzɛ̃ asabu wa loyigu akpɛ siare ɔbɔ ɔkpokpo ne. Akpɛ ɔɖuɖu ɖe kulafa gu siru-atɛ, ɣɛɛ atoa sɔ asi ngbɔ ne, asabu iikɛkɛ.
43021012	Ne kama ne, Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miba miaɖe ara.” Ɣɛɛ ma kuwɛ̃ iiwe ɔtu ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe nna?” alasɔ maɣe sɔ Bosate ɔɖe.
43021013	Ne Yesu ɔbore ɔbo ɔsu abolo ɔtã ma, ne kama ne, ɔsu ikpɛ ana ɔtã ma.
43021014	Nnɛgbe nɖe ɔkpɛ tɛare gɔ i Yesu ɔɖi so ɔte ɔ̃ marasuãdze gɔ ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ne.
43021015	Gɔ maɖe ara maro ne, Yesu ɔkarɛ Simon Petro sɔ, “Simon, Yohanes ɔbi, ato aɖɔɛ me aɖo matsɔra magbe?” Ne Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate, fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe sɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ wũ asɛrɛbi iso.”
43021016	Ɔkpɛ nyɔare ne, Yesu ɔledza wũ ikarɛ sɔ, “Simon, Yona ɔbi, ato aɖɔɛ me?” Ne Petro ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate, fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe sɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ wũ masɛrɛ iso.”
43021017	Ɔkpɛ tɛare ne, Yesu ɔledza Petro ikarɛ sɔ, “Simon, Yona ɔbi, ato aɖɔɛ me?” Iɖaa Petro, alasɔ Yesu ɔledza wũ ikarɛ ɔkpɛ tɛare sɔ ato aɖɔɛ me, ne ɔso ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Bosate! Fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe ira biara, fiɛ aɣe sɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ.” Ne Yesu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ wũ masɛrɛ iso.
43021018	Gbaã loto loɣere-ɔ sɔ ɔwi gɔ aɖe ɔporoporoi ne, asɛ aledza so abɔrɛ asɛ ngbegɔ aɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ si ɔɔbe ne, ato atara fɔ nrɔɔ̃ kato, ɔturi mama ɔnyi-ɔ ɔkati, ɔkɔ-ɔ ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ aito abie sɔ aasɛ.”
43021019	Yesu ɔɣɛ nnɛgbe si ɔsu ɔte kukpi gɔ igbã i Petro aakpi ɔsu ɔkɔlɛ Ɣaa iyere kato. Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ɔro ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Siai me.”
43021020	Ne gɔ Petro ɔfiniki ne, ɔnya rasuãdze gɔ i Yesu iisɛ ɔpia kuɣɛ sɔ ɔɣɛ i mmɔ. Rasuãdze gɔgbe ɔɖe lopiɛtɛ i Yesu iso ku ɔwi gɔ mato maɖe kutsuɛ aɖera ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, nna loaɖi-ɔ ɔtã ne.”
43021021	Ne ɔso gɔ Petro ɔnya wũ ne, ɔkarɛ Yesu sɔ, “Bosate, ne ngɔgbe ɔ̃ ne, nda iase wũ?”
43021022	Ne Yesu ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Si mme sɔ ɔsɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loakpese loba ne, be isu-ɔ i mmɔ? Fɔ ne, siai me.”
43021023	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, iki ikã i marasuãdze ndɛ̃ sɔ rasuãdze gɔmɔ iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ Yesu iiɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ibakpi, ɔɣɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si mme sɔ ɔsɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loakpese loba ne, be isu-ɔ i mmɔ?”
43021024	Rasuãdze gɔgbe ɔɖe loɣɛ ara wagbe fiɛ ɔtsɛrɛ wã ɔsɛ fiɛ boɣe sɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe ne.
43021025	Yesu ɔbara ara gbodzoo gɔ si sɔ matsɛrɛ wã ɔɖuɖu masɛ iwɛ̃ iwɛ̃ ne, lofɔ loɖe sɔ kayiiso ɔɖuɖu iibana siko dzɛmɔ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
44001001	Wũ ɔnyii Tiofilo, i wũ ɔko ɖeakatɔ̃ ame ne, lotsɛrɛ loɣere-ɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Yesu ɔbara gu nwa ɔte,
44001002	ita i ɔwi gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ karabara karɔ̃ isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato. Si ɔ̃akɛlɛ kato ne, Yesu ɔki i Siwarã Bielea ɔle iso ɔte katɔ̃memasɛdze ma ɔɖi ɔtã so ara.
44001003	I ɔ̃ kukpi kama ne, ɔɖi so ɔte ma i siri agbãagbã iso i ayi sina ame sɔ gbaã ne, ɔpia ngbã. Ɔɖe mma lonya wũ ika i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso.
44001004	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ masakanya ne, ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma sɔ, “Midaarui i Yerusalem. Ɣɛɛ miwe misia Siwarã Bielea dzɛ loɣere mi sɔ wũ Ɔse ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mi.
44001005	Yohanes ne, ndu miɖe ɔsu ɔbara Ɣaa itupie kubarara ɔtã maturi. Ɣɛɛ ayi kɛkɛĩ ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu Siwarã Bielea ɔpie mi.”
44001006	Gɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze gu Yesu ɔledza isarɛ ne, makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, kiniɔkiniɔ ato abie sɔ aaledza Israel sigarakaɖekɔ̃ itara?”
44001007	Ne Yesu ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Iinya sɔ miatsue ɔwi ɣee ayi wa i Tete ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ ɔle ame sɔ nnɛmɔ aaba.
44001008	Ɣɛɛ ne, mito miafɔ ɔle ɔwi gɔ i Siwarã Bielea ɔɔba mi iso, miaɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me ita i Yerusalem gu Yudea ɔɖuɖu gu Samaria isɛ iabo kayiiso katsɔrakɔ̃.”
44001009	Gɔ ɔɣere ma ara wagbe ɔro ne, Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato gɔ maɣɛ mato manyɔ wũ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔbo i idɔdɔ ame fiɛ ɔyu ma i anɔ.
44001010	Gɔ maɣɛ mato manyɔ ɔ̃ kuɖokpo ikɛlɛ ne, ɔluwɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ inyɔ mawɛ̃ ma mpia ara fudza ɔɖi so mate ma,
44001011	ne maɣere ma sɔ, “Galilea marɛrɛ̃, be ɔso fiɛ miɣɛ minyɔ kato ngbɔ? Yesu gɔ i Ɣaa ɔfɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔkɛlɛ kato ne, ɔto ɔ̃aledza ikpese iba lɛ kumɛgɔ minya wũ ɔse fiɛ ɔkɛlɛ kato.”
44001012	Ne kama ne, katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔso mabɔrɛ i kube gɔ marɔ sɔ Nnɔĩ adziri Kube iso makɛlɛ Yerusalem. Ita i mmɔ ibo ɔmagɛ̃ ame aaɖe lɛ igu iwɛ̃ kere.
44001013	Gɔ masɛ maabo ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, maya makɛlɛ ma kawekɔ̃ i iyo nɛ matsue masia iso ame. Mma lowe i mmɔ nɖe Petro gu Yohanes gu Yakobo gu Andrea gu Filipo gu Toma gu Bartolomeo gu Mateo gu Yakobo gɔ nɖe Alfeo ɔbi gu Simon gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ ɔtã isɛguso gu Yuda gɔ nɖe Yakobo ɔbi.
44001014	Mmagbe ɔɖuɖu gu marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ gu Yesu ɔnyi Maria gu Yesu makpeama ɔwe adzuni awɛ̃ mala maɔsarɛ maɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara.
44001015	Ayi wamɔ ame ne, mma lofɔ maɖe ɔba maasarɛ, maaɖe lɛ maturi kulafa gu sinyɔ. Ne Petro ɔta ɔya ɔɣere ma sɔ,
44001016	“Wũ manyii, ara wa matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, ikote sɔ iaba i ne ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Siwarã Bielea ɔki i Igara David iso ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ kokooko i Yuda gɔ loɖi Yesu ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ iso.
44001017	Yuda ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖe bo ikuri ame ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Bosate ɔɖi sɔ tee ɔ̃abara katɔ̃memasɛdze karabara.”
44001018	Masu ɔ̃ ikpi sikã dzɛ ɔfɔ maɣa karɔ̃ ga iso ɔsɛ ɔ̃akpi. Gɔ ɔkpase ne, ɔfã ɔbiɛ, ne ɔ̃ ayirira ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ afere i karɔ̃ ne.
44001019	Ɔ̃ kukpi itɔ̃me ɔki ikã i Yerusalem maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ ne. Ngbegɔ ɔkpi masɛ makpere sɔ Hakeldamak i ma siɖe ame gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ima Karɔ̃.
44001020	Ne Petro ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ sɔ, “Matsɛrɛ i David Kuka Ɔko ame sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ iyo si ikpese iyoku, kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasɛ i mmɔ.’ Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, ‘Mitã sɔ ɔturi mama si ɔya i ɔ̃ kanya.’
44001021	Ne ɔso ne, ikote sɔ ɔmama aabo i bo ndɛ̃ lɛ aɖansiɛ ɔtã Bosate Yesu ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame. Iaɖe ngɔ lowe i bo ikuri ame ku ɔwi gɔ ɔɖuɖu i bo gu Yesu sɛ boki,
44001022	ita i ɔwi gɔ i Yohanes ɔpɛ Ɣaa itupie kubarara imomo isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu Yesu ɔkɛlɛgu kato.”
44001023	Ne ɔso maɖi maturi inyɔ ma nɖe Matia gu Yosef gɔ masɛ makpere sɔ Barsaba, ana ne, masɛ makpere wũ sɔ Yusto.
44001024	Ne kama makparama kayi maɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, fɔ nɣe maturi ɔɖuɖu adzuni ame. Ne ɔso te bo ngɔ aɖi i maturi inyɔ magbe ndɛ̃
44001025	sɔ ɔ̃aya i katɔ̃memasɛdze ndɛ̃ ngbegɔ i Yuda ɔnyua fiɛ ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ lokote wũ.”
44001026	Gɔ makidza atalebi sɔ si masu manyɔ sɔ ma nna i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, Matia ɔkpɛ loya, ne ɔso masu wũ mabua i katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-ɔwɛ̃ mamɔ iso.
44002001	Gɔ iyi nɛ masɛ makpere sɔ Pentekoste Iyi ɔɣo ne, mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔsakanya i kakɔi kawɛ̃.
44002002	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, manɔ kulu lɛ ɔwiri nto ɔkpɛ̃ teteree kubɔrɛ i kato. Kulu gɔgbe ɔba kuayi iyo nɛ ame mapia ɔɖuɖu.
44002003	Ira iwɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi ɔɣɛɣɛ so iba iasia i ma ati iso.
44002004	Siwarã Bielea ɔbo i ma ɔɖuɖu ame matsɛ ikaɖe mato male Ɣaa i siɖe agbãagbã ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Siwarã ɔtã ma ɔle.
44002005	Ɔwi gɔgbe ame tutuutu ne, ma Yudase ma nsɛ manigã Ɣaa fiɛ mase i kayiiso abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame ɔba mapia i Yerusalem.
44002006	Gɔ manɔ kulu gɔgbe ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔtere makɛlɛ mmɔ. Gɔ manya sɔ Yesu masiaidze nɣɛ mato maɣɛ abuiti ɔɖuɖu wa ame mabɔrɛ siɖe ne, ibara ma ɣii.
44002007	Ne ɔso ifɔ̃ ɔtidza ma, makpɔkpɔtɔ, ne matsɛ ikarɛ so sɔ, “Mmagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, iiɖe Galilea maturi maɖe?
44002008	Nda ibara fiɛ boto bonɔ maɖe ika i bo abuiti siɖe ame?
44002009	Ma Partise gu ma Mediase gu ma Elamse gu mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Mesopotamia gu Yudea gu Kapadokia gu Ponto gu Asia gu
44002010	Frigia gu Pamfilia gu Egipte gu Libia kasɛ ga lomatã Kirene gu mafɔ ma lobɔrɛ i Roma fiɛ maɖe ma Yudase gu mma lokpese ma Yudase ikuri ame maturi,
44002011	gu ma Kretase gu ma Arabiase. Bo ɔɖuɖu to bonɔ mato mafa Ɣaa kaɣiɖu i bo siɖe ame.”
44002012	Gɔ ibara ma ɣaa fiɛ makpɔkpɔtɔ ne, makarɛ so sɔ, “Mme itɔ̃me igbã iɖe ngbe?”
44002013	Ne mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Ndã miɖe nto mimɔɛ̃ ma. Iiɖe kuira iɖe.”
44002014	Mmɔ i Petro gu maturi iweo-ɔwɛ̃ ɔta maya fiɛ Petro ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ silɔ sɔ, “Mi ma Yudase gu mi ma nsi i Yerusalem ɔɖuɖu, lobie sɔ loaɖi ara wagbe karɔ̃ lote mi. Mikã me atsue kukaakɔ si minɔ.
44002015	Marɛrɛ̃ magbe iito marɛ̃ ndã lɛ kumɛgɔ mibu. Mi mɔmɔ minya sɔ kaya iɖɔwũ kaiwɛ̃ ame kere bopia.
44002016	Ɣɛɛ ne, nnɛ mito minya ngbe nɖe nnɛ i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yoel ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ kokooko.
44002017	Ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ayi tsɔra ame ne, nto loafedza wũ Siwarã lofere i maturi ɔɖuɖu iso. Mi mabibirɛrɛ̃ gu mabi birɔ̃gomi to maaɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me, mi maporoporoi to maanya kaɖikate, mi makpakpa ana to maasɛ̃ arɛ.
44002018	Gbaã ne, i ayi wamɔ ame ne, wũ Siwarã to siaba wũ maɖabo rɔ̃go gu marɛrɛ̃ iso, fiɛ maaɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me.
44002019	Loatã sɔ awawãra wa loabara ɣii aabɔrɛ i kuɖokpo gu karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu. Mito mianya ima gu ɔtɔ gu kuɣɔ gɔ lota lipii.
44002020	Kuɣɛ̃ to kuabara kpinaa. Ɔgbaworeti to ɔ̃arɛtɛ lɛ ima, fiɛ kuɖokpo Ɔlesate iyi siare nɛmɔ aaba.
44002021	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔbiara gɔ loakpere Ɣaa sɔ ɔnyɔ wũ nnya aana ngbã.” ’ ”
44002022	Ne Petro ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Bo aɖe Israel kaɖe, mito minɔ? Yesu Nasaretse nɖe ngɔ i Ɣaa kɔrɔ̃ sia iso fiɛ ɔsɔla wũ nnɔĩ. Ɣaa ɔsia nnɛgbe ita gɔ ɔki i ɔ̃ iso ɔɖi ɔle gu awawãra gu akparĩ ɔte i mi ndɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mɔmɔ miɣe.
44002023	Ɣɛɛ i Ɣaa ɔri iɖi ame gu ɔ̃ itsue iɖegu katɔ̃ ame ne, ɔnyua wũ ɔtã mi. Mi gu matilese ɔɖi wũ miɖoe ku ɔwi gɔ mipɛ wũ mimatãra i kudziri iso.
44002024	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame. Ɔbɔrɛ i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame, alasɔ kukpi iiwo wũ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔpia i kugbagɔrɔĩ ame.
44002025	Igara David ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ, ‘Lonya sɔ Bosate ɣɛ me i kɔrɛ ɔwi biara. Gɔ ɔɣɛ me i kuɖearɔ̃ iso ɔso ne, loibanigã.
44002026	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, wũ ɔtu ɔyi ku isoɣɔ, loasu silɔ lole wũ ɔwi ɖaa. Loawe i ɔriinyɔ ame atoa sɔ wũ sosina to siakpi.
44002027	Alasɔ aibanyua wũ ɔkala atã ikpibiɔ. Ana ne, aibatã fɔ Ɔbi Sekelea sina ɔburi.
44002028	Ate me fɔ ngbã ɔri. Fɔ kɔrɛ iwe isoɣɔ pia i wũ ame gbaã.’
44002029	“Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, nto loɣere mi kukaakɔ sɔ bo ɔwa David ɔkpi. Mabiara wũ. Ɔ̃ ikpibiɔ ana se i bo ndɛ̃ ipɛ i nɔme.
44002030	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe. Ɣaa ɔkarã irɔĩ iso sɔ ɔ̃abara David ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɖe sigara i David sigaraiyara iso.
44002031	Gɔ David ɔnya nnɛ nse i katɔ̃ ɔso ne, ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ Kristo to ɔ̃ata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame. Ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ibanyua wũ ɔtã kukpi fiɛ ɔ̃ibanyua ɔ̃ sina ɔburi i ikpibiɔ ame.’
44002032	Yesu gɔgbe i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔso i bo ɔɖuɖu ɖe itɔ̃me nɛgbe maɖansiɛ ne.
44002033	Kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ Ɔse Ɣaa ɔtã wũ kasɛkɔ̃ kɔlɛa i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso, ɔsu Siwarã Bielea ɔtã wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ fiɛ mito minya, minɔ ana ngbe.
44002034	Iiɖe David lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔkɛlɛ kato. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ, ‘Bosate Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ Sate sɔ, “Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso,
44002035	gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loasu fɔ matsirise lopia i fɔ ngba kayirinɔ.” ’
44002036	Ne ɔso nto lobie sɔ loɣere mi Israel kaɖe ɔɖuɖu sɔ, Ɣaa ɔɖe lobara Yesu gɔ mipɛ mimatãra i kudziri iso sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpese Bosate gu Kristo.”
44002037	Gɔ manɔ Petro atɔ̃me ne, itsue ma situ. Ne ɔso makarɛ wũ gu katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra sɔ, “Bo manyii, be si bobara?”
44002038	Ne Petro ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ikote sɔ mi ɔbiara kɛkɛ aanyua ikpi ɔbara ɔfiniki ɔba Bosate kɔrɛ, ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ Ɣaa asu ɔ̃ akpi ɔtsɛ wũ iyɔ miɔfɔ Siwarã Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
44002039	Nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne, ise itã mi gu mi mabi gu mma lobɔrɛ i kadzorokɔ̃. Mma ɔɖuɖu i Bosate Ɣaa aakpere ɔbɔ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.”
44002040	Petro ɔɣere ma ara gbodzoo, ɔpɛ ma nrɔɔ̃, ɔtã ma kuka sɔ, “Miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ nto iaba i ɔɣekparɛ nyanyarĩa gɔgbe iso.”
44002041	Nɛgbe ɔso ne, maturi gbodzoo i ma ndɛ̃ ɔfɔ Petro itɔ̃me maɖe, ne mapie ma ndu i Yesu iyere ame gɔ maaɖe lɛ maturi kukpi kutɛ. Masu so mabua i mma lofɔ Ɣaa maɖe iso ku iyi nɛmɔ.
44002042	Mana ɔwi matã katɔ̃memasɛdze. Ne ɔso mate ma ara, makparama kayi, maɖe ara masakanya fiɛ masɛ i kanya kawɛ̃ ibara ame ana.
44002043	Kumɛgɔ i katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔbara awawãra gu akparĩ ɔtã maturi ɔsu kuwarɛ matã Ɣaa.
44002044	Mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔla maɔsarɛ ɔwi biara, ana ne, ibiara nɛ i ɔwɛ̃ ba ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ire iɖe.
44002045	Si marɔdɛ̃ ma ira irere ne, masɛ masu sikã maɣɛ so kumɛgɔ inya ɔbiara kanya.
44002046	Mala maɔsɛ Ɣaa iyo iyi biara kɛkɛ, ana ne, mala maɔsarɛ i akuri akuri ame i ma ayo maɔɖe ara i isoɣɔ gu ɔtu sekelea ame.
44002047	Mala maɔpɛ Ɣaa siba maɔle wũ ana, ne ɔso maturi ɔɖuɖu sɛ mawarɛ ma. Iyi biara Bosate ɔla ɔ̃ɔsu mma lona iɖi ɔ̃ɔbua i ma iso.
44003001	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Petro gu Yohanes ɔkɛlɛ Isɔrɛyo ku kakɔme iɖɔwũ itɛ ame, ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase sɛ makparama kayi.
44003002	Gɔ mabo kayogodɔ̃ ga masɛ marɔ Kulɛ Kayogodɔ̃ ne, manya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe bafã ita i ɔwi gɔ maɣe wũ. Ɔ̃ masate sɛ masu wũ masɛ i mmɔ iyi biara sɔ si ɔla ɔ̃ɔwanyi ara i mma nsɛ maki i mmɔ makɛlɛ Isɔrɛyo ame kɔrɛ.
44003003	Gɔ ɔnya Petro gu Yohanes to mafe mabo iyo ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ matã wũ sikã.
44003004	Matui maya manyɔ wũ totoroo, ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ bo!”
44003005	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔmɔ ɔkɔlɛ anɔ ɔto ɔnyɔ ma ku adzuni sɔ mato maba maatã wũ ira iwɛ̃.
44003006	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme lona sikã kusiwɛ̃ loatã-ɔ! Ɣɛɛ ne, loatã-ɔ nnɛ loba! Loɣere-ɔ i Yesu Kristo Nasaretse iyere ame sɔ ta ya si asɛ!”
44003007	Petro ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ kuɖearɔ̃ sɔ ɔta ɔya. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔle ɔbo i ɔ̃ ngba gu akpakpokpo ame!
44003008	Ne ɔkɔlɛ ɔɣo ɔtsɛ isɛ ɔsiai ma ɔbo Isɔrɛyo ame ɔsɛ ɔkiki ɔkɔlɛ ɔɣo ɔle Ɣaa ne.
44003009	Gɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔnya wũ ɔsɛ ɔto ɔle Ɣaa,
44003010	fiɛ matsue sɔ ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔsɛ i Isɔrɛyo Kulɛ Kayogodɔ̃ ɔwanyi ara ne, makpɔkpɔtɔ, ibara ma ɣaa i kumɛgɔ ɔsarɛ iti.
44003011	Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔtere maba ngbegɔ marɔ sɔ Salomo Kakpakɛ i Isɔrɛyo ame. Maba maanya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ losarɛ ɔɖo ɔmatã Petro gu Yohanes iso kpa gɔ ɔ̃ isarɛ ɔbara ma ɣii.
44003012	Gɔ Petro ɔnya maturi ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Israel kaɖe, be ɔso fiɛ nnɛgbe to ibara mi ɣaa? Be ɔso fiɛ mito minyɔ bo lɛ sɔ bo isekele kaɖu ɣee bo ɔle ame iɖe bobara ngɔgbe ɔsarɛ!
44003013	Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Abraham gu Isak gu Yakob gu bo mawa Ɣaa ne, ɔ̃ loɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu kato ne. Misɛ̃ wũ i Pilato katɔ̃ sɔ miiɣe wũ gɔ Pilato ɔbie sɔ si ɔnyua wũ.
44003014	Misɛ̃ ɔturi Sekelea gu Ɔbɔlɔlɔa, ɣɛɛ minɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔnyua turiɖoese i ɔ̃ kanya ɔtã mi.
44003015	Miɖoe ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã maturi ngbã. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔledza wũ itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ame. Bo mɔmɔ bonya wũ ku bo anɔ.
44003016	Iki i Yesu iyere ame fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ miɣe fiɛ mito minya ngbe ɔna isosarɛ. Gɔ ɔfɔ Yesu ɔɖe ɔso ne, Bosate ɔtã wũ isosarɛ nɛ loyi fiɛ mi ɔɖuɖu to minya.
44003017	“Manyii, loɣe sɔ idaatsue lotã mi gu mi makpakpa ɔbara nnɛgbe.
44003018	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔki i kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu iso ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ Kristo to ɔ̃aki i ibo nɛmɔ igbã ame. Ne ɔso fiɛ ɔtã ma atɔ̃me ɔba i ne ame ne.
44003019	Ne ɔso mifiniki misiai Ɣaa si ɔsu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi si isobuɛ aaba ibɔrɛ i Ɔ̃ kɔrɛ,
44003020	iyɔ ɔ̃ɔsese mi Kristo gɔ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔɖi ɔsɛ mi.
44003021	Ipia sɔ Yesu aawe i kato gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ Ɔse aasu ira biara ɔsɛ i ne kasekɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ koko ɔkigu i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze sekelea iso.
44003022	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Mose ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Bosate gɔ nɖe mi Ɣaa to ɔ̃asese mi kanyaɖidze mama ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ndɛ̃ lɛ me. Ne ɔso mikã wũ atsue i ibiara nɛ ɔ̃aɣere mi ame.
44003023	Ɔbiara gɔ loibakã ɔ̃ itɔ̃me atsue ne, Ɣaa aaɖi wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ maturi ndɛ̃ pelepele.’
44003024	“Gbagbaã ne, Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu ita i Samuel iso ne, maɣɛ masɛ koko i ara wa nto aaba ku ayi wagbe ame.
44003025	Mi nɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze mabi, fiɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ lonyi kanya ku mi mawa ɔkigu i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze iso. Ɔɣere Abraham sɔ iaki ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ iso ɔ̃atã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu iwarã gu isobuɛ.
44003026	Ne ɔso gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ ɔɖabo Kristo ne, ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔpia wũ mi kɔrɛ sɔ ɔtã mi kusɛkusɛ si mi ɔbiara aafiniki ɔbɔrɛ i mi akpi ame.”
44004001	Ɔwi gɔ i Petro gu Yohanes ɣɛ mato maɖe maturi ika ne, masɔrɛdze gu isɔrɛyo madzuɛ̃se ɔkpakpa gu ma Zadukise mawɛ̃ ɔba maabo mmɔ.
44004002	Gɔ manɔ sɔ Petro gu Yohanes ɣɛ mato mate ara sɔ mma loɔkpi to maaledza ita lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu ɔta ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ne, sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ ma gbaã.
44004003	Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ ma. Gɔ kaɖe ɔɔro ɔso ne, masu ma mapia i iyo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ kaɖesɛ̃a.
44004004	Ɣɛɛ maturi gbodzoo ma lonɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ɔfɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea maɖe. Mafɔɖedze kusime ɔba iaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ kukpi kuru ɔɖui.
44004005	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze gu kaɖe makpakpa gu mmara matedze ɔsarɛ i Yerusalem.
44004006	Masarɛgu sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele Hana gu Kayafa gu Yohanes gu Aleksandro gu sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele manyii mawɛ̃.
44004007	Ne ka maɖi Petro gu Yohanes mabɔ i ma katɔ̃ makarɛ ma sɔ, “Nna iyere gu ɔle ame iɖe mibara ara wagbe?”
44004008	Mmɔ i Petro gɔ loyi ku Siwarã Bielea ɔle ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Bo matɔ̃ɖedze gu makpakpa,
44004009	si mikarɛ sɔ bokparara kayiribielea ga bobara bafã gɔgbe gu kumɛgɔ bosa wũ ne,
44004010	mitã loɣere mi gu Israel kaɖe ɔɖuɖu ira iwɛ̃. Iki i Yesu Kristo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Nasaret iyere ame, ngɔ mipɛ mimatãra i kudziri iso, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔledza wũ itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ame iyere ame i ngɔgbe ɔna isosarɛ.
44004011	Yesu gɔgbe iso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɖe ika sɔ, ‘Ita nɛ i mi mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ ne, ne lokpese ita nɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖo ata ɔɖuɖu ne.’
44004012	Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã nɖe Ɖidze, alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã iyere gu ɔle sɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu i kayiiso aaki i ɔ̃ iso mana ngbã.”
44004013	Gɔ manya kumɛgɔ i Petro gu Yohanes ɔɖe ika gu ɔtu fiɛ maɣe ana sɔ mma loiɣe ɔko gu mma nna ɖibia kuwɛ̃ i kaɖe ame maɖe ne, ibara ma ɣii. Manya maɖi ite sɔ masiai Yesu.
44004014	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mato manya ngɔ masa ɣɛ i ma katɔ̃ mmɔ ne, maiwo kuira ɔɣɛ.
44004015	Gɔ makɔ ma maɖi i kayaso ame mmɔ ne, makpakpa kerekere ɔsɛ iti ame.
44004016	Mawɛ̃ ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Be iɖe boabara mmagbe? Boibawo ɔsɛ̃ sɔ iiɖe ma lobara iwawãra nɛgbe! Ɔbiara i Yerusalem ɣe, fiɛ maɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe.
44004017	Ɣɛɛ ne, mitã bosɛ̃ botã ma sɔ madaasiɖe ika i ngɔ marɔ Yesu iyere ame ana, si itɔ̃me nɛgbe iisibasamarã.”
44004018	Gɔ maledza ma ikpere ibɔ i ma kasarɛkɔ̃ ne, masɛ̃ matã ma sɔ ita i kiniɔ ne, madaasiɣɛ ɣee mate kuira i Yesu iyere ame.
44004019	Ne Petro gu Yohanes ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Mi mɔmɔ minyɔ ne kukaakɔ. Be loabo Ɣaa anɔ iɖo? Si bokã mi atsue ɣee si bobara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ?
44004020	Nwa bonya gu nwa bonɔ ne, boibawo kanya ɔma i wã iso.”
44004021	Gɔ makpakpa mamɔ ɔkɛkɛ anɔ mapia ma ne, manyua ma. Kumɛgɔ i maturi ɔɖuɖu to male Ɣaa ala ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso ne, mainya kuira nɛ iso maakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
44004022	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lona isosarɛ ɔɔfɔ lɛ akɔ sina gu kama.
44004023	Gɔ manyua Petro gu Yohanes ne, makɛlɛ ma maturi kɔrɛ masɛ maaɣere ma nnɛ i makpakpa ɔɣere ma.
44004024	Mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔsakanya, ne makɔlɛ silɔ kato makparama kayi sɔ, “O Bosate, fɔ gɔ lobara kato gu karɔ̃ gu ɔpo gu ara ɔɖuɖu wa mpia i wã ame.
44004025	Fɔ loki i fɔ Siwarã Bielea ame aɖe ika akigu i bo ɔwa David gɔ nɖe fɔ ɔɖabo iso sɔ, ‘Be ɔso i kayiiso maturi to mata matui, fiɛ nɖebi ana to mabu adzuni siefe?
44004026	Kayiiso magara ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ fiɛ ma matɔ̃ɖedze ɔsa so kanya mata sɔ maakpɛ̃gu Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ Kristo.’
44004027	Gbagbaã iɖe sɔ Herodes gu Pontio Pilato gu Israel kaɖe gu mma loiɖe Israel maturi ɔsa so kanya i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame mata maya i fɔ Ɔɖabo Sekelea Yesu gɔ asɔla nnɔĩ iso.
44004028	Ɣɛɛ i fɔ ɔle gu iwola ame ne, atã ma ɔri sɔ mabara ara wa fɔ aɣɛ asɛ sɔ maabara.
44004029	Kiniɔ ne, O Bosate, nyɔ anɔ wa mato makɛkɛ mapia bo! Tã bo ma nɖe fɔ maɖabo kagbegbe, sɔ boawo fɔ itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ.
44004030	Pɛgu maturi si asa ma abara awawãra gbodzoo i fɔ Ɔɖabo Sekelea Yesu iyere ame.”
44004031	Gɔ makparama kayi maro ne, iyo nɛ ame mapia ɔti, ne Siwarã Bielea ɔba siayi i ma ame ɔɖuɖu matsɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ku kagbegbe ne.
44004032	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ maɖe ɖe mawɛ̃ i ɔbara gu adzuni ame, ma kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔbu ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ. Ɣɛɛ ne, ira biara nɛ i ɔwɛ̃ ba ɖe ma ɔɖuɖu ire.
44004033	Ne ɔso katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔɣɛ Bosate Yesu ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame iso itɔ̃me gu ɔle siare fiɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ siare ɔwegu ma ɔɖuɖu.
44004034	Kuwɛ̃ iiɖe wɛrɛba i ma ndɛ̃ alasɔ mma mba ayo ɣee nrɔ̃ ne, masu ma ara marɔdɛ̃.
44004035	Ne masu sikã dzɛ mana mapia i katɔ̃memasɛdze nrɔɔ̃ ame maɣɛ ɔbiara kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ anyaa ɔsi kanya ne.
44004036	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe mmɔ gɔ marɔ sɔ Yosef ɔbɔrɛ i Levi ɔɣekparɛ ame fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Kipro karɔ̃ iso. Katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔtã wũ iyere sɔ Barnaba gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe Kateteretãse.
44004037	Ɔ̃ wũ ɔsu ɔ̃ karɔ̃ ɔrɔdɛ̃ ɔsu sikã ɔbɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze.
44005001	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ana ɔwe gɔ marɔ sɔ Anania fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔre nɖe Safira. Ma wũ makpɛti ma karɔ̃ marɔdɛ̃.
44005002	I ɔrɔ̃go itsue ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔsu sikã siwɛ̃ ɔkɔla fiɛ ɔsu sikutia ɔba ɔ̃apia i katɔ̃memasɛdze nrɔɔ̃ ame.
44005003	Ne Petro ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Anania, be ɔso fiɛ atã Satana ɔɖe-ɔ iso fiɛ ato ala sila atã Siwarã Bielea? Mikuti karɔ̃ ga mikpɛti mirɔdɛ̃ sikã siwɛ̃ misɛ so.
44005004	Mi mba karɔ̃ ga misu mirɔdɛ̃, fiɛ kuso gɔ matã mi ana ne, mi mba. Be ɔso fiɛ atã sɔ mibara ira nyanyarĩa nɛgbe igbã? Iiɖe maturi awune iɖe mila sila mitã, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa.”
44005005	Gɔ Anania ɔnɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ɔrɔ̃ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ɔkpi! Ifɔ̃ siare ɔmɔɛ̃ mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ nnɛ loba.
44005006	Ne maporoporoi ma mpia i ma ndɛ̃ i mmɔ ɔsu ɔkati mamini wũ, maputa wũ masɛ maabiara ne.
44005007	Lɛ iɖɔwũ itɛ kama ne, ɔ̃ ɔre ɔba ɔ̃ɔbo mmɔ gɔ ɔ̃iɣe nnɛ loba.
44005008	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣere me, karɔ̃ ga i mi gu fɔ ɔrã ɔrɔdɛ̃ ne, sikã dzɛ matã mi ɔɖuɖu i ngbe ne?” Ne ɔrɔ̃go ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Aĩ, sikã ɔɖuɖu mmɔ ne.”
44005009	Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mi gu fɔ ɔrã ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ sɔ miala Siwarã Bielea minyɔ? Nyɔ, maporoporoi ma loputa fɔ ɔrã masɛ maabiara ɔɔba maɣɛ sɔ maaputa-ɔ fɔ wũ makɛlɛgu.”
44005010	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔrɔ̃ ɔfere i karɔ̃ i Petro ngbatɔ̃ ɔkpi kɛrɛrɛ. Gɔ maporoporoi ɔba maanya sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi ɔrɛ ne, maputa wũ makɛlɛgu masɛ maabiara i ɔ̃ ɔrã kɔrɛ.
44005011	Ne ɔso ifɔ̃ siare ɔmɔɛ̃ mafɔɖedze gu mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ ara wa loba.
44005012	Katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔbara awawãra gu akparĩ gbodzoo i maturi ndɛ̃. Mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu sɛ masarɛ i isɔrɛyo ngbegɔ marɔ sɔ Salomo kakpakɛ ame.
44005013	Maturi mama ma loifiniki sɛ manigã ma ibore ibo, ɣɛɛ mala maɔwarɛ ma.
44005014	Ɣɛɛ maturi gbodzoo, marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go, ɔfiniki mafɔ Bosate maɖe maba maabo i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame.
44005015	Maturi ɔsu manyɛse maba maarara i sikala iso i siriruɛ ngbegɔ mafɔ maɖe sɔ si Petro to ɔfe ne, bidɛ ɔ̃ kusɔ aasia i manyɛse iso.
44005016	Masu manyɛse gbodzoo gu mma ɔɖuɖu i siwarã lalaa to siɖaa mabɔrɛgu i simagɛ̃ dzɛ loki silɔ Yerusalem mabɔ ma kɔrɛ fiɛ masa ma ɔɖuɖu.
44005017	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gu ma ikuri nɛ marɔ sɔ ma Zadukise ɔtsɛ sirerɛ ikpɛ̃gu katɔ̃memasɛdze teteree.
44005018	Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze masɛ maapia i iyo ame.
44005019	Ɣɛɛ kasɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔba ɔ̃asese ma kayogodɔ̃ ɔɖi ma.
44005020	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ Isɔrɛyo si misɛ miaɣere maturi ngbã ɣɛtɛ mɛgbe iso ara ɔɖuɖu!”
44005021	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, makɛlɛ isɔrɛyo ame masɛ maatsɛ ara ite lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere ma. Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gu ɔ̃ makpakpa laa gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔsarɛ, ne mapia iyo madzuɛ̃se sɔ masɛ maaɖi katɔ̃memasɛdze i iyo mabɔ.
44005022	Ɣɛɛ gɔ makɛlɛ ne, maisɛ maanya ma! Ne ɔso makpese maba maaɣere ma sɔ,
44005023	“Gɔ bosɛ ne, bonya sɔ kukui ɔsɛ̃ kpakpara, madzuɛ̃se ana ɣɛ i kanya. Ɣɛɛ gɔ bosese ne, mma bomɔɛ̃ bopia mmɔ kuwɛ̃ na i iyo ame!”
44005024	Gɔ isɔrɛyo madzuɛ̃se ɔkpakpa gu sɔrɛdzekpakpa ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, awururu ɔkpɛ̃ ma gbaã, alasɔ maitsue nnɛ iɖe loba.
44005025	Ne ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere ma sɔ, “Mma mimɔɛ̃ mipia iyo ne, maɣɛ i isɔrɛyo mato mate maturi ara.”
44005026	Mmɔ i isɔrɛyo madzuɛ̃se ɔkpakpa gu ɔ̃ maturi ɔta makɛlɛ sɔ maamɔɛ̃ ma mabɔ. Ɣɛɛ gɔ mato manigã sɔ mma losakanya i mmɔ aapɛ ma ata ɔso ne, maimɔɛ̃ ma sikitii.
44005027	Gɔ masɛ maakɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze mabɔ ne, maɖi ma maɣedza i ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze katɔ̃ sɔ masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele si ɔkarɛ ma itɔ̃me. Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ,
44005028	“Boiɣere mi sɔ midaasiɣɛ kuira i Yesu gɔgbe iso? Ɣɛɛ miɔkararã itɔ̃me nɛgbe i Yerusalem ɔɖuɖu. Mibie ana sɔ miatã bo ipɔ i Yesu kukpi iti!”
44005029	Mmɔ i Petro gu katɔ̃memasɛdze mama ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ikote sɔ boakã Ɣaa atsue boɖo maturi awune.
44005030	Yesu gɔ mitã mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso fiɛ ɔkpi ne, bo mawa Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã.
44005031	Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔsia i kakpakpakɔi i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso. Ɔsu wũ ɔbara Ɔkpakpa gu Ɖidze sɔ Israel kaɖe ana ɔri mafiniki i ma situ ame mana akpi isu itsɛ.
44005032	Bo gu Siwarã Bielea dzɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã mma nsɛ makã wũ atsue ne, bo nɖe ara wagbe maɖansiɛ ne.”
44005033	Gɔ manɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã. Ne ɔso masia ita sɔ maaɖoe katɔ̃memasɛdze magbe.
44005034	Ɣɛɛ ma ndɛ̃ ɔ Farisise ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Gamaliel fiɛ ɔɖe Mose mmara tedze ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã ma. Maturi ɔɖuɖu sɛ mawarɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe kukaakɔ. Ɔta ɔya i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ matã maɖi katɔ̃memasɛdze si ma kerekere si masɛ iti ame.
44005035	Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Israel maturi, minyɔ kukaakɔ nnɛ mito mibie sɔ miabaragu mmagbe!
44005036	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Teuda ɔbara so lɛ ngɔ lobua ɔnya. Maturi alafa ana ɔta masiai wũ. Ɣɛɛ gɔ maɖoe wũ ne, ɔ̃ masiaidze ɔsame, ne ɔ̃ ikuri nɛmɔ ɔbiɛ ne.
44005037	Ne kama ɔwi gɔ maka maturi ne, Yuda gɔ lobɔrɛ i Galilea ɔsa maturi mawɛ̃ kanya mata maya i abã iso. Gɔ maɖoe wũ ne, ɔ̃ masiaidze ɔsame.
44005038	Ne ɔso nnɛ nto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, minyua mmagbe. Si ara wa mato mate gu nwa mato mabara ne ma mɔmɔ are aɖe ne, ɔwi kurukutu ame ne wã ɔɖuɖu to atui.
44005039	Ɣɛɛ si Ɣaa kurabarara kuɖe ne, miibawo ma ɔtindza. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, iyi to iba gɔ mianya sɔ Ɣaa mɔmɔ mito mikpɛ̃gu!”
44005040	Ɔ̃ kuka ɔtã mafinikira ma adzuni. Ne ɔso makpere katɔ̃memasɛdze mabɔ ma ndɛ̃, ne mapɛ ma maɣere ma sɔ madaasiɖe ika kuiwɛ̃ i Yesu itɔ̃me iso fiɛ manyua ma ne.
44005041	Gɔ mato makɛlɛ ne, isoɣɔ lala ɔbo i ma ame, alasɔ manya sɔ Ɣaa ɔka ma ɔpia i mma lokote sɔ maana kunuarɛ i Yesu iti.
44005042	Ne kama ne, iyi biara mala maɔte Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo i ma Yudase isɔrɛyo gu maturi ayo.
44006001	Ɔwi gɔ i marasuãdze ɔtsɛ isi ibua ne, kakpadzɛ̃ ɔba i ma Yudase ma nsɛ maɣɛ Griki siɖe gu mma nsɛ maɣɛ si Hebrise ndɛ̃ sɔ si maɣɛ ikpɛnɛ araɖea ne, aito aɣo makuɛdze ma nto maɣɛ Griki siɖe.
44006002	Ne ɔso katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ ɔkpere marasuãdze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu maɣere ma sɔ, “Ikote sɔ boasu bo ɔwi botã Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ ne iiɖe araɖea kutsuɛ.
44006003	Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, manyii, minyɔ mi ndɛ̃ si miɖi marɛrɛ̃ ikɔdzɛ ma anɔ lokpa fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ana pia i ma ame. Mmamɔ boasu boɣedza i karabara gamɔ kanya,
44006004	si bosu bo ɔwi botã kayi ikparama gu Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ.”
44006005	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔkote ma ɔɖuɖu, ne ɔso maɖi Stefano gɔ nɖe ɔturi gɔ mba kafɔkaɖe, fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ana pia i ɔ̃ ame. Maɖi Filipo, Prokoro, Nikanor, Timon, Parmena gu ɔfɔ gɔ lokpese ɔ Yudase gɔ marɔ Nikolao fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Antiokia sɔ mabuai Stefano.
44006006	Maturi ikɔdzɛ magbe maɖi mate katɔ̃memasɛdze ne. Makparama kayi masu ma nrɔɔ̃ masia ma iso itã karabara.
44006007	Maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea gɔ itã sɔ mma lofɔ maɖe ɔba maasi i Yerusalem. Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze gbodzoo ana ɔfiniki masiai kafɔkaɖe gagbe.
44006008	Stefano gɔ loyi ku abualɛra gu ɔle ɔbara awawãra gbodzoo i maturi ndɛ̃.
44006009	Ma Yudase masande ikuri nɛ i ma makɔse ɔnyua fiɛ mabɔrɛ i Kirene gu Aleksandria gu mma lobɔrɛ i Kilikia gu Asia ɔtsɛ atɔ̃me ikpadzɛ̃gu Stefano.
