44006010	Ɣɛɛ kuwɛ̃ i ma ndɛ̃ iiwo ɔya i Stefano kanya, alasɔ Siwarã ɔtã wũ iwola nɛ ɔɖe ala ika.
44006011	Ne ɔso mabara kanya kawɛ̃ ku mawɛ̃ sɔ maaɖaɛ kanya masia wũ iso sɔ, “Bonɔ sɔ Stefano ɔɣɛ ara wa lota aya i Mose gu Ɣaa iso.”
44006012	Kanya iɖaɛ nɛgbe ɔtã sikpã ɔmɔɛ̃ mmara matedze gu ma Yudase makpakpa gu maturi ɔɖuɖu. Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ wũ makɛlɛgu ma atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃.
44006013	Mma makɔ mabɔ sɔ maɖaɛ wũ kanya ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Stefano ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ika ɔta ɔya i Isɔrɛyo Sekelea gu Mose mmara iso ɔwi biara.
44006014	Bonɔ ɔɣɛ ana sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Nasaret fiɛ marɔ wũ Yesu ne, ɔto ɔ̃abiɛ Isɔrɛyo nɛgbe fiɛ ɔ̃afinikira Mose mmara mɛ ɔtã bo.”
44006015	Mma ɔɖuɖu nsi i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔkarã anɔ i Stefano iso, ne manya sɔ ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to ka fiɛ lɛ Ɣaa kpabo kare.
44007001	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔkarɛ Stefano sɔ, “Ara wa mato maɣɛ ne gbaã iɖe?”
44007002	Ne Stefano ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Tete mɛrɛ̃ gu wũ manyii, mikã me atsue. Ɣaa, Isekelesate ɔɖi so ɔte bo ɔwa Abraham i Mesopotamia karɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔta i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ karɔ̃ ga marɔ Haran iso.
44007003	Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Rui i fɔ maturi kɔrɛ gu fɔ karɔ̃ iso si akɛlɛ karɔ̃ ga loate-ɔ iso!’
44007004	Ne ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ karɔ̃ iso, ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Haran gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃ ɔse ɔkpi. Ne Ɣaa ɔkɔ wũ ɔbɔ ngbegɔ misi ngbe nɔme ne.
44007005	Ɣaa iitã Abraham kaɖekɔ̃ kukawɛ̃, nane karɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ngbe. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔɣere wũ ɔɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ karɔ̃ gagbe to kaakpese ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ mabi kare i ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba ame atoa sɔ ɔ̃iɣe ɔbi kuwɛ̃ iba iabo ɔwi gɔmɔ ame.
44007006	Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ mawa ɔɖuɖu to maakpese masande i kafɔrɔ̃ iso, mmamɔ to maabara ma ɔtile gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ akɔ alafa ana aafe.
44007007	Ɔɣere wũ ana sɔ, ‘Loto loakpadzɛ̃ karɔ̃ ga iso maaɖe masande maturi kutsue. Ne kama ne, mato maabɔrɛ i mmɔ maba maafɛ̃ ara matã me i karɔ̃ ga iso bosi ngbe.’
44007008	Ne Ɣaa to ɔsu sirɛrɛ̃ itu ndamu ɔtã Abraham sɔ ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba ame ne, ne loaɖe ikparĩ i ɔ̃ Ɣaa gu Abraham ɔɣekparɛ ndɛ̃ ne. Gɔ Abraham ɔɣe Isak ne, ɔtu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ ku ɔ̃ iyi farafanava. Isak ana ɔɣe Yakob fiɛ Yakob ana ɔɣe nlɛ miweo-minyɔ fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu ana ɔtu sirɛrɛ̃.
44007009	“Yakob mabi ɔbɛbɛ anɔ i ma ɔnyiibi Yosef iso. Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ wũ marɔdɛ̃ matã maturi ma losu wũ makɛlɛgu Egipte karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔwegu wũ,
44007010	fiɛ ɔɖi wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ inyɛwe ɔɖuɖu ame. Ɣaa ɔtã wũ abualɛra gu inɔgba wodoroa, ne ɔso Egipte igara ɔsu wũ ɔbara ɔ̃ karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu gu ɔ̃ iyo nyɔisose.
44007011	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kukã siare kuwɛ̃ ɔba i Egipte gu Kanan karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso gɔ ibɔ inyɛwe i bo mawa iso ala mana araɖea.
44007012	Gɔ Yakob ɔnɔ sɔ araɖea pia i Egipte ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ mabi sɔ masɛ maaɣa araɖea mabɔ ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃.
44007013	Ne gɔ Yakob mabi ɔkpese makɛlɛ mmɔ ɔkpɛ nyɔa sɔ maaɣa araɖea ne, Yosef ɔɖi so ɔte ma, ne ka ɔɖi ma ɔte Igara Farao ne.
44007014	Ne kama ne, Yosef ɔpia ma sɔ masɛ maakɔ ɔ̃ ɔse Yakob gu ɔ̃ manyii ɔɖuɖu mabɔ Egipte gɔ ma ɔɖuɖu aaɖe lɛ maturi sikɔdzɛ-iru.
44007015	Ne ɔso Yakob ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔwe i Egipte mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃ gu bo mawa ɔkpi.
44007016	Masore ma makpesegu masɛ maabiara i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Sikem. Mabiara ma i kabiarakɔ̃ ga i Abraham ɔɣa i Hemor mabi kɔrɛ ala sikãfudza.
44007017	“Ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔwi gɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ ɔɣere Abraham ɔbore ɔbo ne, bo mawa ɔɔsi gbodzoo i Egipte.
44007018	Iba ana sɔ igara ɣɛtɛ gɔ loiɣe Yosef ɔtsɛ iɖe iso i Egipte.
44007019	Farao gɔgbe ɔbara bo mawa ɔtile sɔ si ɔwɔra ma. Ɔtã sɔ masu ma mabi ɣɛtɛ mapɛyu si makpi.
44007020	“Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame maɣe Mose ne. Gɔ ɔ̃ ara ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ ɔso ne, ɔ̃ maɣese ɔsu wũ makɔla i ma iyo manyɔ wũ iso awa atɛ i kuɖokpo.
44007021	Gɔ manya sɔ maisibawo wũ ɔkɔla ne, maɖi wũ masɛ i ɔgbami. Ne Farao ɔbi birɔ̃gomi ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔnya wũ ɔsu ɔba ɔ̃abara ɔ̃ kayiri ame ɔbi ne.
44007022	Ɔla wũ fiɛ mate wũ Egipte maturi kubarara gu ma iwola ɔɖuɖu, ɔwe ɔle i ikaɖe gu kurabara ame.
44007023	“Gɔ Mose ɔfɔ akɔ sina ne, iba wũ iti ame sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ ɔ̃aya ɔ̃ manyii ma Israelse.
44007024	Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo ne, ɔnya ɔ Egiptese sɔ ɔto ɔbara ɔ Israelse amumuɣɔ. Mose ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃afɔ ɔ Israelse, ne ɔɖoe ɔ Egiptese gɔmɔ ne.
44007025	Mose ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ ɔ̃ manyii aanya wũ lɛ ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia sɔ ɔba ɔ̃aɖi ma, ɣɛɛ mainya wũ ngbɔ.
44007026	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ Mose ɔledza ma kɔrɛ isɛ ne, ɔnya gɔ ma Israelse inyɔ to makpɛ̃. Gɔ ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpura ma ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, ‘Wũ maturi, manyiibi miɖe, ne ɔso minyua ɔkpɛ̃.’
44007027	“Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nto ɔbara ɔ̃ ɔnyii ɔtile ɔli Mose ɔkarɛ ana sɔ ‘Nna lobara-ɔ bo isoɖedze gu atɔ̃meɣɛdze?
44007028	Ɛɛbɛrɛ abie sɔ aaɖoe me lɛ kumɛgɔ aɖoe ɔ Egiptese gɔmɔ kɔmakaɖe?’
44007029	Gɔ Mose ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ, ne ɔtere ɔsɛ ɔ̃awɛrɛ i Midian karɔ̃ iso lɛ ɔfɔ ne. Mmɔ ɔɣe ɔ̃ mabi birɛrɛĩ inyɔ ne.
44007030	“Akɔ sina kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔɖi so ɔte wũ i ɔtɔ gɔ nto ɔtsue i kadzirimi kawɛ̃ iso i fafuĩ ame i Sinai kube kɔrɛ.
44007031	Gɔ Mose ɔnya ira nɛgbe ne, ibara wũ ɣii, ne ɔso ɔbore ɔbo sɔ si ɔnyɔ kukaakɔ ɣɛɛ, Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ ɔɣere sɔ,
44007032	‘Mme nɖe fɔ mawa Abraham gu Isak gu Yakob mɛrɛ̃ Ɣaa ne.’ Iti pɛ̃ gu ifɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ Mose, ne ɔso ɔ̃ibie sɔ ɔ̃anyɔ mmɔ isɛ.
44007033	“Ne Bosate to ɔɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Ɖi fɔ ndokota! Alasɔ karɔ̃ ga iso aɣɛ ne, karɔ̃ sekelea kaɖe.
44007034	Gbaã ne, lonya inyɛwe nɛ ame i wũ maturi pia i Egipte karɔ̃ iso. Nto lonɔ kumɛgɔ mato mabiɛ makpere me. Ne ɔso loba sɔ si loba loaɖi ma. Ba, nto lopia-ɔ Egipte.’
44007035	“Mose gɔ masɛ̃ fiɛ makarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Nna loɖi-ɔ bo isoɖedze gu atɔ̃meɣɛdze?’ ne, ɔ̃ ame i Ɣaa ɔpia sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖi ma si ɔkpese Ɖidze gu isoɖedze iki i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ ɔnya i kadzirimi ga nto katsue kɔrɛ ne.
44007036	Ɔɖi ma ɔbɔrɛgu i Egipte fiɛ ɔbara awawãra gbodzoo i Egipte mmɔ gu Ɔpo Rɛtɛa katɔ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ mawe makiki i fafuĩ ame akɔ-sina buu.
44007037	“Mose mɔmɔ ɔɖe loɣere ma Israelse sɔ, ‘Mi Ɣaa to ɔ̃asese mi kanyaɖidze mama lɛ me ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ndɛ̃.’
44007038	Mose nɖe ngɔ losa bo mawa kanya ku ɔwi gɔ ma Israelse pia i fafuĩ ame. Ɔ̃ ame nɖe ngɔ i Ɣaa kpabo ɔɖegu ika i Sinai kube iso ne. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe lowegu bo mawa fiɛ ɔfɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã ɔtã bo ne.
44007039	“Ɣɛɛ bo mawa ɔta maya Mose iso, masɛ̃ wũ, fiɛ i ma situ ame ne, mabie sɔ si makpese makɛlɛ Egipte karɔ̃ iso.
44007040	Ne maɣere Mose ɔnyiibi Aron sɔ, ‘Bara aɣɔ wa loakɔ bo tã bo, alasɔ boiɣe nnɛ lobara Mose gɔ lokɔ bo ɔbɔrɛgu i Egipte.’
44007041	Ne ɔso mabara kuɣɔ gɔ nse lɛ inantsuĩbi, mafɛ̃ ara matã kɔ̃, fiɛ matsɛ iyi iɖe ku isoɣɔ i ara wa mabara ngbe ɔso.
44007042	Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpese ma i kama fiɛ matsɛ kuɣɛ̃ gu ɔgbaworeti gu awami isɔrɛ ne. Nnɛgbe i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Israel kaɖe, iiɖe me misu mabɔi mifɛ̃ ara mitã i akɔ sina wa miwe i fafuĩ ame!
44007043	Bowũ ne, misu Molok kuɣɔ iyo gu Romfa iwãmi wa nɖe aɣɔ wa mipɔ sɔ miasɔrɛ. Ne ɔso nto loatã sɔ maamɔɛ̃ mi sisande makɛlɛgu ta Babilonia kama.’
44007044	“Sikati ikpayo nɛ ame i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖi so ɔte ɔwe i ɔwa mɛrɛ̃ kɔrɛ ku ɔwi gɔ mawe i fafuĩ ame. Mabara ikpayo nɛgbe lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte Mose sɔ abara ne tutuutu.
44007045	Akɔ gbodzoo kama ne, Yosua ɔkɔ bo mase ma losore sikati ikpayo nɛgbe masɛ maakpɛ̃gu mma i Ɣaa ɔsa ɔbɔrɛgu i nrɔ̃ mɛgbe iso. Ikpayo ɔwe i karɔ̃ gagbe iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ibo Igara David ɔwi ame.
44007046	Ɣaa ɔwegu David gbaã, ne ɔso David ɔkarɛ Ɣaa sɔ ɔtã wũ ɔri si ɔtsue iyo ɔtã Yakob Ɣaa.
44007047	Ɣɛɛ ne, Igara Salomo ɔɖe lotsue iyo nɛmɔ.
44007048	Ɣaa kato gu karɔ̃ baradze ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔsɛ i ayo wa i maturi awune ɔtsue ame. Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze iso ɔɣɛ sɔ,
44007049	‘Kuɖokpo nɖe wũ sigaraiyara, fiɛ karɔ̃ nɖe wũ kukpa kasiakɔ̃. Ne ɔso mme iyo igbã miawo ɔtsue ɔtã me, ɛɛbɛrɛ lona kasɛkɔ̃?
44007050	Iiɖe mme lobara ira biara?’ ”
44007051	Ne Stefano ɔɣere ma ana sɔ, “Mi matsuelese! Mitɛ̃ra atsue i Ɣaa itɔ̃me iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mase ɔbara. Ɔwi biara mita miɣɛ i Siwarã Bielea iso.
44007052	Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔmele i mi mawa iibie sɔ maaɖoe? Maɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma loɣɛ masɛ sɔ Ɔsekelea to ɔ̃aba. Ɔsekelea gɔmɔ ana ne, miɖi wũ mitã maɖoe.
44007053	Mi lofɔ Ɣaa mmara mibɔrɛgu i Ɣaa makpabo nrɔɔ̃ ame, ɣɛɛ misɛ̃ me iso ibara.”
44007054	Gɔ manɔ atɔ̃me wa i Stefano ɔɣɛ i ma iso ne, ma situ ɔta siya gbaã, itã makɛrɛ̃ anyɛ i sikpã ame.
44007055	Ɣɛɛ Stefano gɔ ame i Siwarã Bielea ɔyi ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ anɔmi ɔnyɔ kato, ne ɔnya Ɣaa ifiɛ gu Yesu gɔ ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
44007056	Ne ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Minyɔ! Lonya sɔ kuɖokpo ɔbusi, Maturi Awune Ɔbi ɣɛ i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso!”
44007057	Matsɛ sikpabo teteree, matɛ̃ arɔĩ i atsueyoi, matere mamɔɛ̃ wũ.
44007058	Ne gɔ mabore wũ maɖi i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, matsɛ wũ ata ipɛ, mma lola sila masia wũ iso ɔɖi ma awu siare masɛ i ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Saulo ngbatɔ̃.
44007059	Ɔwi gɔ mato mapɛ wũ ata ne, Stefano ɔkparama kayi ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate Yesu, fɔ wũ siwarã!”
44007060	Ne ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Tete, daasu ikpi nɛgbe atã ma kuso!” Gɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ ɔro ne, ɔkpi.
44008001	Ɔwi gɔ mato maɖoe Stefano ne, Saulo lola ɔ̃ɔpia ma ɔle. Ita i iyi nɛmɔ ne, matsɛ mafɔɖedze ma i Yerusalem ikpɛ̃gu teteree. Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtere makɛlɛ Yudea gu Samaria. Ɣɛɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔwe i Yerusalem.
44008002	Mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔba maasu Stefano masɛ maabiara ku kaku gu imararãso siare.
44008003	Saulo ɔsu ɔsia so iso teteree sɔ ɔ̃awɔra mafɔɖedze ikuri. Ɔsɛ ɔbo i ayo ɔmɔɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃apia i iyo.
44008004	Mma losame ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i kakɔi biara ga makɛlɛ.
44008005	Filipo ɔkɛlɛ Samaria ɔmagɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ Kristo iso itɔ̃me i mmɔ.
44008006	Maturi gbodzoo ɔkã wũ atsue ala awawãra gbodzoo wa ɔbara fiɛ manya ɔso.
44008007	Ɔsa siwarã lalaa ɔɖi i maturi gbodzoo ame. Sila kulu fiɛ sibɔrɛ i ma ame. Ɔsa mma lokpi kasɛkasɛ gu mma lofɛfɛ̃ masi i karɔ̃ ana.
44008008	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, isoɣɔ ɔba i Samaria ɔmagɛ̃ ame gbaã!
44008009	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ pia i Samaria gɔ marɔ Simon. Ɔɖe wase fiɛ ɔwi gbodzoo ame ngbe ne, ɔ̃ awa ibara sɛ ibara maturi ɣaa. Ɔbua ɔsɛ ɔkɔlɛ so kato sɔ ɔturi nyaa ɔɖe.
44008010	Samaria marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go gu mabiɛtɛ ɔɖuɖu sɛ mawarɛ wũ ala ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso. Ne ɔso maɖe ika i ɔ̃ iso sɔ, “Ɔ̃ nɖe kuɖokpo ikpa!”
44008011	Kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ awa ibara ɔfɔ ma ati ame ɔso ne, masɛ makã wũ atsue.
44008012	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, mafɔ Filipo Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ ɔɣɛ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gu Yesu Kristo iyere maɖe. Marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go gbodzoo ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara.
44008013	Simon ana ɔfɔ ɔɖe, ne ɔso gɔ ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne, ɔla ɔ̃ɔsiai Filipo ɔsɛ kakɔi biara. Awawãra wa i Filipo to ɔbara ana ɔbara wũ ɣaa.
44008014	Gɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ma mpia i Yerusalem ɔnɔ sɔ ma Samariase ɔfɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, mapia Petro gu Yohanes ma kɔrɛ.
44008015	Gɔ maba maabo ne, makparama kayi ku mafɔɖedze ɣɛtɛ magbe sɔ mafɔ Siwarã Bielea.
44008016	Alasɔ iba iabo ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, maifɔ Siwarã Bielea. Ɣaa itupie kere maɔfɔ i Bosate Yesu iyere ame.
44008017	Petro gu Yohanes ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ masia ma iso, ne mafɔ Siwarã Bielea ne.
44008018	Gɔ Simon ɔnya sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ne nrɔɔ̃ kere masia ma iso fiɛ mafɔ Siwarã Bielea ne, ɔsu sikã si ɔtã katɔ̃memasɛdze
44008019	ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mitã sɔ mme wũ loana ɔle gɔgbe sɔ ɔbiara gɔ iso loasia nrɔɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃afɔ Siwarã Bielea.”
44008020	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mi gu fɔ sikã ɔɖuɖu si miwɔ! Daabu sɔ aawo Ɣaa karatã ɔɣa ku sikã!
44008021	Aito aawo karabara gagbe ame ɔwe, alasɔ fɔ ɔtu ame iikpa i Ɣaa anɔ.
44008022	Finiki i adzuni nyanyarĩa wagbe ame si akparama kayi, siainyɔ Bosate to ɔ̃asu fɔ ikpi ɔtsɛ-ɔ ala fɔ adzuni iilɛ!
44008023	Ala ne, lonya sɔ aba kanɔbɛbɛ, fiɛ ikpi ibara ana ɔyi i fɔ ame.”
44008024	Ne Simon ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Pɛ Bosate nrɔɔ̃ i wũ iti sɔ ara nyanyarĩa wa aɣɛ ngbe kuiwɛ̃ iibabɔrɛ me iso!”
44008025	Gɔ Petro gu Yohanes ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mmɔ maro ne, makpese makɛlɛ Yerusalem gɔ makiki i Samaria simagɛ̃ gbodzoo ame maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea.
44008026	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere Filipo sɔ, “Kɛlɛ ɔri gɔ lobɔrɛ i Yerusalem fiɛ ɔki i fafuĩ ame ɔso ɔkpa Gasa iso!”
44008027	Bielea ɔta ɔkɛlɛ ɔri gɔmɔ iso. Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔtu ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nɖe sikã nyɔisose ɔkpakpa i Etiopia igararɔ̃go gɔ marɔ sɔ Kandake sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem ɔsɛ ɔkparama kayi.
44008028	Gɔ ɔ̃ɔsɛ ɔkpese ɔto ɔkɛlɛ iyo ne, ɔsi i keke gɔ i ipɔngɔ to ikpadzɛ̃ ame ɔto ɔka Ɔko Sekelea gɔ i Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔtsɛrɛ.
44008029	Ne Siwarã Bielea ɔɣere Filipo sɔ, “Sɛ kɛlɛ si abore abo keke!”
44008030	Filipo ɔtara ngbã ɔbore ɔmatã wũ, kere ɔnɔ gɔ ɔkpakpa to ɔka Yesaya ɔko. Ne ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ato anɔ nnɛ ato aka ngbe karɔ̃?”
44008031	Ne ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Nda loabara loanɔ karɔ̃ gɔ kuwɛ̃ na ɔ̃aɖi karɔ̃ ɔtã me?” Ne ɔtã Filipo iti sɔ ɔya ɔba i keke ame ɔba ɔ̃asɛ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne.
44008032	Atɔ̃me wa ɔto ɔka i Ɔko Sekelea ame nɖe sɔ, “Masɛgu wũ lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ gɔ masɛ maaɖoe. Ɔsiai ma lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ gɔ maakparɛ̃ siwɛrɛ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ito ɔbiɛ. Ɔ̃ibusi ɔ̃ kanya ana.
44008033	Mapia wũ kunuarɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ina ngɔ loafɔ wũ kanya. Ɔna ɔɣekparɛ, Alasɔ maɖoe wũ maɖi i kayi gagbe ame?”
44008034	Ne ɔkpakpa gɔmɔ to ɔkarɛ Filipo sɔ, “Yesaya ne, ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iso iɖe ɔɖe ika, ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔturi mama iso iɖe?”
44008035	Filipo ɔsɛ karɔ̃ ɔsu Ɔko Sekelea gɔgbe itɔ̃me ɔɖiɖi Itɔ̃me Bielea karɔ̃ ɔte wũ ise i Yesu iso.
44008036	-
44008037	Gɔ masɛ mato makɛlɛ ne, masɛ maanya itubu gɔ iɣɛ i kakɔi kawɛ̃ i ɔri kuruɛ. Ne ɔkpakpa gɔmɔ to ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Nyɔ ndu. Be ɔso loibawo Ɣaa itupie kubarara ɔfɔ?”
44008038	Ɔtã matindza keke maɣedza, ne ma inyɔɔ ɔso mabo i ndu ame fiɛ Filipo ɔpie wũ ndu ne.
44008039	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i ndu ame ne, Bosate Siwarã ɔsu Filipo siruigu, ne ɔso ɔkpakpa gɔgbe iisinya wũ ana. Ɔ̃ wũ ne, ɔkɛlɛ kaa ku isoɣɔ.
44008040	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Filipo ka ɔnya sɔ ɔɣɛ i Azoto ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Ka ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me i mmɔ gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ mpia i ɔri iso ɔɖuɖu isɛ iabo ta Kaisarea ɔmagɛ̃ ame ana.
44009001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ɔɖuɖu ne, Saulo to ɔnyɔnyɔ Bosate masiaidze gu anɔmi rɛtɛa sɔ ɔ̃aɖoe. Ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele kɔrɛ.
44009002	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ wũ sɔ ɔtã wũ siko dzɛ ɔ̃asu ɔkɛlɛgu ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ i Damasko fiɛ ɔ̃ana ɔle ɔmɔɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go ma ɔɖuɖu nsiai kafɔkaɖe ɣɛtɛ ɔkɛlɛgu Yerusalem.
44009003	Ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔbore ɔbo Damasko ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔfiɛ ibɔrɛ i kato ifere wũ.
44009004	Ɔbɔrɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃, ne ɔnɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Saulo, Saulo, be ɔso fiɛ ato akpɛ̃gu me ngbɔ?”
44009005	Ne Saulo ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Bosate, fɔ nna aɖe?” Silɔ dzɛmɔ ɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme nɖe Yesu gɔ ato akpɛ̃gu teteree ne.
44009006	Kiniɔ ne, kpɛ̃ ta si akɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne mato maaɣere-ɔ nnɛ ikote sɔ aabara.”
44009007	Marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛgu Saulo ɔkpɛ̃ so kpara. Manɔ ikaɖe, ɣɛɛ mainya kuwɛ̃.
44009008	Gɔ Saulo ɔta ɔya fiɛ ɔbusi anɔmi ne, ɔ̃isito ɔnya. Ne ɔso mamɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃ makɔ wũ mabogu i Damasko ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
44009009	Ɔwe i mmɔ akpɛnɛ atɛ gɔ ɔ̃inya, ɔ̃iɖe ara fiɛ ɔ̃inɛ ndu ana.
44009010	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, fɔɖedze ɔwɛ̃ pia i Damasko gɔ marɔ Anania. Bosate ɔɖi so ɔte wũ ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Anania!” Ne ɔtɔrã wũ sɔ, “Bosate, ɔɔnya me!”
44009011	Ne Bosate ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si aki ɔri gɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Tɔrɔrɔ iso si akɛlɛ Yuda iyo si akarɛ ɔ Tarsose gɔ marɔ Saulo iti. Ɔpia i mmɔ ɔto ɔkparama kayi.
44009012	Alasɔ loɔɖi lote wũ sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Anania to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃asia wũ nrɔɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃atsɛ inya.”
44009013	Mmɔ i Anania ɔɖi kanya sɔ, “Bosate, loɔnɔ i kakɔi biara ɔtile gɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔbara mafɔɖedze i Yerusalem!
44009014	Fiɛ lonɔ ana sɔ ɔfɔ ɔle ɔbɔrɛgu i masɔrɛdze makpakpa kɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma mpia i Damasko!”
44009015	Ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si akɛlɛ aabara nnɛ loto loɣere-ɔ. Alasɔ loɖi Saulo lɛ ngɔ loasu wũ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔkɛlɛgu mma loiɖe ma Israelse gu magara katɔ̃ gu Israel kaɖe ɔɖuɖu.
44009016	Nto loate wũ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃awe inyɛ i wũ iti.”
44009017	Ne ɔso Anania ɔta ɔkɛlɛ, gɔ ɔbo iyo fiɛ ɔnya Saulo ne, ɔsu kɔrɔ̃ ɔsia wũ iso, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Wũ ɔnyii Saulo, Bosate Yesu gɔ loɖi so ɔte-ɔ i ɔri iso ne, ɔ̃ lopia me fɔ kɔrɛ sɔ si atsɛ inya si Siwarã Bielea aaba siayi fɔ ame ne.”
44009018	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ibara Saulo lɛ akolo lokpa i ɔ̃ anɔmi iso, ne ɔtsɛ ara inya ne. Ɔta ɔtã mabara wũ Ɣaa itupie kubarara.
44009019	Gɔ ɔɖe aɖera ne, ka ɔna ɔle. Saulo ɔwe i mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Damasko kɔrɛ ayi kɛkɛĩ.
44009020	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ ɔtsɛ ma Yesu iso itɔ̃me iɣere sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe.
44009021	Ibara mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɣii. Ne makarɛ so sɔ, “Iiɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɖe mpia ɔto ɔɖoe Yesu masiaidze i Yerusalem ayi wa lofe ɣɛɛ? Bonɔ ana sɔ mafɔɖedze ɔba ɔmɔɛ̃ i ngbe ɔkɛlɛgu masɔrɛdze makpakpa.”
44009022	Ɣɛɛ Saulo itɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔwe ɔle ibua fiɛ ɔ̃ ara karɔ̃ iɖi ite sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo ɔtã sɔ ma Yudase ma mpia i Damasko mmɔ kuwɛ̃ iiwo kuira ɔɣɛ.
44009023	Ayi gbodzoo kama ne, ma Yudase ɔsɛ iti ame sɔ maaɖoe wũ.
44009024	Ɣɛɛ mayu maɣere Saulo sɔ ngbɔ i mawɛ̃ to mabie sɔ maaɖoe wũ ne. Matsirise magbe ɔdzuɛ̃ kayogodɔ̃ kasɛ̃ gu anɔwã sɔ si maana wũ maɖoe.
44009025	Ɣɛɛ mafɔɖedze ɔsu wũ mapia i kasɛsɛi ga iso mapia ɔwɛ̃ ame fiɛ makigu i iyoi nɛ mpia i ibere ame masora wũ ku kasɛ̃!
44009026	Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo Yerusalem ne, ɔbie sɔ si ɔbo i mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ndɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ ma ɔɖuɖu to manigã wũ. Mabu sɔ ɔsɔsɔla ɔto ma sɔ ɔ̃ɔfiniki.
44009027	Ne Barnaba ɔkɔ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu katɔ̃memasɛdze kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔɣere ma kumɛgɔ i Saulo ɔsarɛgu Bosate gɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ Damasko ne. Ɔɣere ma nnɛ i Bosate ɔɣere wũ gu Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ ɔɣɛ ku katetere i Yesu iyere ame i Damasko.
44009028	Ne ɔso Saulo ka ɔwe i ma ndɛ̃ faa ɔwi ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔɣɛ Bosate itɔ̃me ku kagbegbe i Yerusalem.
44009029	Gɔ ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma nsɛ maɣɛ Griki siɖe gu Saulo ɔtsɛ ikaɖe gu kakpadzɛ̃ ne, mabie sɔ si maɖoe wũ.
44009030	Gɔ mafɔɖedze ɔnɔ sɔ mawɛ̃ to mabie sɔ maɖoe wũ ne, makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu Kaisarea fiɛ ka masese wũ kaa ga nɖe Tarso.
44009031	Ne ɔso mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Yudea gu Galilea gu Samaria karɔ̃ iso ɔna iwarã gɔ kunigã iisiwe. Mana ɔtu gu ɔle gɔ lobɔrɛ i Siwarã Bielea ame gɔ itã masi fiɛ masu kuwarɛ matã Bosate.
44009032	Gɔ Petro pia ɔkiki ɔnyɔ mafɔɖedze i ma simagɛ̃ ame ne, ɔba ɔ̃ɔbo mafɔɖedze ma mpia i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Lida kɔrɛ.
44009033	Ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Ainea gɔ lofɛfɛ̃ ɔrɛ i ɔkala iso akɔ farafana.
44009034	Ne gɔ Petro ɔnya wũ ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ainea, nyɔ! Yesu Kristo ɔɔsa-ɔ! Ta ya, si akarĩ fɔ ɔkala.” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔta ɔya ku isosarɛ.
44009035	Gɔ manya sɔ Ainea ɔɔta ɔsɛ ne, Lida gu Saron maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔsu so matã Bosate.
44009036	I Yopa ne, ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ pia marɔ sɔ Tabita. I Griki siɖe ame ne, marɔ wũ Dorkas gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe Kuɔ. Ɔɖe fɔɖedze gɔ mba kayiribielea fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã mawɛrɛba ara ɔwi biara.
44009037	Ɔba ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ɔnyɛ kere, ne ɔkpi ne. Gɔ mapie wũ ndu maledza wũ ne, masɛ wũ i iyo nɛ matsue masia i kato ame.
44009038	Gɔ manɔ sɔ Petro ɔba ɔpia i Lida fiɛ iidzorogu Yopa ne, mapia maturi inyɔ sɔ masɛ maapɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ si ɔsiai ma kukpakukpa ɔba.
44009039	Ɔ̃ wũ ɔta ɔsiai ma, ne gɔ ɔba ɔ̃ɔbo ne, makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu iyo nɛ masɛ kpise. Makpisemare ɔki malɔ Petro mato mabiɛ mate wũ arapia wa i Dorkas ɔkã ɔtã ma ku ɔwi gɔ ɔsi ngbã.
44009040	Petro ɔɣere ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ mabɔrɛ i iyo ame, ne ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔkparama kayi ne. Ɔpɛ ɔfiniki ɔnyɔ kpise i katɔ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Tabita, ta!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔbusi anɔmi. Gɔ ɔnya Petro ne, ɔta ɔsɛ.
44009041	Petro ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ i kɔrɔ̃ ɔtara ɔɣedza fiɛ ka ɔkpere mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu gu makpisemare sɔ maba, ne ɔtara Dorkas gbanadze ɔpia ma i nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.
44009042	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔki ikã Yopa ɔɖuɖu, ne ɔso maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ Bosate maɖe.
44009043	Ne kama ne, Petro ka ɔwe i Yopa ɔmagɛ̃ ame ayi gbodzoo i Simon ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nsɛ ɔbara mabɔi siko karabara kɔrɛ.
44010001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ i Kaisarea ɔmagɛ̃ ame gɔ marɔ Kornelio. Ɔkpakpa ɔɖe i ma Romase makpakpɛ̃dze ma marɔ sɔ ma Italiase makpakpɛ̃dze ame.
44010002	Ɔɖe ɔturi sɛɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu sɛ manigã Ɣaa. Ɔsɛ ɔtã mawɛrɛba ara fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ kayi ikparama ɔwi biara.
44010003	Iyi iwɛ̃ ito ikɛlɛ iɖɔwũ itɛ ku kakɔme ne, ɔnya iɖi ite. Iɖi ite nɛgbe ame ne, ɔnya sɔ Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Kornelio!”
44010004	Gɔ Kornelio ɔnya wũ ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ gbaã. Ne ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Bosate, be ato abie?” Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ kayiribielea ibara gu fɔ kayi ikparama ɔɔbo Ɣaa kɔrɛ.
44010005	Pia maturi si makɛlɛ Yopa masɛ maakpere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Simon Petro mabɔ.
44010006	Ɔpia i Simon gɔ nsi i ɔpo katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara mabɔi siko karabara kɔrɛ.”
44010007	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo gɔgbe ɔrui ne, Kornelio ɔkpere ɔ̃ iyo maturi inyɔ gu ɔ̃ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ fiɛ ɔɖe ɔturi sɛɛ.
44010008	Ɔɣere ma nnɛ loba, fiɛ ka ɔpia ma sɔ makɛlɛ Yopa.
44010009	Kaɖesɛ̃a gɔ masɛ i ɔri mato makɛlɛ fiɛ maɔbore mabo Yopa ne, Petro ɔya ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ isã sɔ ɔ̃ɔkparama kayi ku kakɔme iɖɔwũ iweo-inyɔ ame.
44010010	Kukã ɔba kuakpɛ̃ wũ teteree, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, kini matsɛ aɖera iwa ne. Ibara wũ kere lɛ sirɛ ame ɔto ɔbo.
44010011	Mmɔ iɖe ɔnya sɔ kuɖokpo ɔbusi, ɔnya ira iwɛ̃ lɛ ɔkati siare gɔ mamɔɛ̃ akpakpai ana mato masora mabɔ karɔ̃.
44010012	Ɔkati gɔgbe ame ne, mabɔi agbãagbã, mma nsɛ mabore i karɔ̃ gu mma nsɛ i ngba iso gu kurodzai ana pia.
44010013	Ɔnɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Petro, ta si aɖoe si aɖe.”
44010014	Ne Petro ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ooɣo! Iibaba ngbɔ! Bosate, loiɖe mabɔi ma i bo ma Yudase iisɛ bopɛgu lonya!”
44010015	Silɔ ɔledza wũ iɣere sɔ, “Ira nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɔsekelera ne, daarɔ ne sɔ iikpa!”
44010016	Ɔnya iɖi ite nɛgbe ikpɛ itɛ buu. Ɔkpɛ tɛa ne, masu ɔkati gɔgbe makɛlɛgu kato.
44010017	Ira nɛ i Petro ɔnya ɔbara wũ ɣii, ne ɔkarɛ so sɔ, “Be i iɖi ite nɛgbe to ite?” Ɔwi gɔmɔ ana ne, mma i Kornelio ɔpia ɔɔba maabo ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Ne gɔ manya iyo nɛ mato mabie ne, maba maaya i kayogodɔ̃.
44010018	Ne makarɛ si mmɔ i Simon Petro si ne.
44010019	Gɔ Petro si ɔto ɔbu iti ame i ɔ̃ iɖi ite iso gu kumɛgɔ ɔ̃abara ɔ̃anɔ karɔ̃ ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Maturi itɛ ɔba mato mabie-ɔ.
44010020	Ta si asɛ aanya ma. Daanigã sɔ aasiai ma akɛlɛ ala me lopia ma.”
44010021	Ne Petro ɔta ɔkɛlɛ ma kɔrɛ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mme nɖe ngɔ mito mibie. Wũ kɔrɛ pɔkɔsɔɔ?”
44010022	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bo wũ boisɛ ku ikpi, Kornelio gɔ nɖe ma Romase makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa lopia bo fɔ kɔrɛ. Ɔturi sɛɛ ɔɖe gɔ nsɛ ɔwarɛ Ɣaa. Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu sɛ maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me gbaã. Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ loɣere wũ sɔ ɔpia si makpere-ɔ si ɔnɔ fɔ kanya ame kutsuɛ.”
44010023	Ne ɔso Petro ɔtã ma mabo i kawekɔ̃, ɔfɔ ma lɛ ɔ̃ mafɔ awe. Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ gu mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Yopa ɔsiai ma makɛlɛ.
44010024	Si maasɛ maabo Kaisarea gu kaɖesɛ̃a ne, Kornelio ɔɔsa ɔ̃ iyo maturi kanya gu ɔ̃ malaa masi masia Petro iba.
44010025	Gɔ Petro ɔbo kayogodɔ̃ ne, Kornelio ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Petro katɔ̃, ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ ɔtã wũ.
44010026	Ne Petro ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta ya! Mme wũ ɔturi loɖe.”
44010027	Gɔ mato maɖe ika ne, Kornelio ɔkɔ wũ ɔbogu i iyo fiɛ ɔnya sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔsakanya.
44010028	Ne Petro ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ bo ma Yudase mmara iitã me ɔri sɔ loawo ngɔ loiɖe bo aɖe ɔturi iyo ɔbo, ɣee losu so lomatãra i ɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte me sɔ lodaanyɔ ɔturi kuwɛ̃ lɛ ɔturi gɔ loikpa.
44010029	Ne ɔso fiɛ gɔ maba maakpere me ne, lota loba ne. Be ɔso fiɛ ato abie me?”
44010030	Ne Kornelio ka ɔpia kanya ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ka iaɖe lɛ ayi ana ngbe gɔ loto lokparama kayi ku kakɔme. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ me i katɔ̃ gɔ ɔpia ara wa nto afiɛ atsue anɔmi!
44010031	Ɔ̃ loɣere me sɔ, ‘Kornelio, fɔ kayiribielea ibara gu fɔ kayi ikparama ɔɖuɖu ɔɔbo Ɣaa kɔrɛ!
44010032	Pia maturi si makɛlɛ Yopa si masɛ maakpere Simon Petro gɔ mpia i Simon gɔ nsɛ ɔbara mabɔi siko karabara i ɔpo kanya kɔrɛ.’
44010033	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne lopia sɔ maba maakpere-ɔ, fiɛ fɔ wũ abara kukaakɔ sɔ aba ne. Ne ɔso bosi bosia-ɔ i Ɣaa anɔ ame sɔ ka ba ɣere bo nnɛ i Bosate ɔtã-ɔ sɔ ɣere bo ne.”
44010034	Ne Petro ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loɔnya sekelee sɔ Bosate iisɛ ɔnyɔ maturi i katɔ̃.
44010035	Ɣɛɛ i karɔ̃ biara iso ne, ngɔ lonya ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã Ɣaa fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔfɔ wũ.
44010036	Lofɔ loɖe sɔ minɔ itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere Israel mabi sɔ, Itɔ̃me Bielea iki Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu Sate ame boaki boana isobuɛ.
44010037	Fiɛ miɣe ara nyaa wa loba i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu wa losɛ karɔ̃ i Galilea karɔ̃ iso ita i ɔwi gɔ i Yohanes ɔpɛ imomo i Ɣaa itupie kubarara iso.
44010038	Minɔ ana kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu Siwarã Bielea ɔsia Yesu gɔ lobɔrɛ i Nasaret ikparĩ fiɛ ɔsu ɔle ana ɔtã wũ. Ɔwe ɔki ɔbara ara sɛɛ fiɛ ɔsa mma ɔɖuɖu i Ɔbosam to ɔkpɛ̃gu, alasɔ Ɣaa sɛgu wũ.
44010039	Ara wa ɔba ɔ̃abara i Israel karɔ̃ iso gu Yerusalem ne, bonya wã ala anɔ. Mmɔ i maɖoe wũ iki ipɛ wũ imatãra i kudziri iso ne.
44010040	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔledza wũ itara ibɔrɛgu i kukpi ame ku iyi tɛare iso, fiɛ ɔtã sɔ maturi ɔnya wũ.
44010041	Iiɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu lonya wũ. Ɣɛɛ bo ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, bo lonya wũ ne. Boɖe fiɛ bonɛgu wũ ana i ɔ̃ ita kama.
44010042	Bo iɖe i Yesu ɔpia sɔ bosɛ boaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe i kakɔi biara, si boɣere ma sɔ, Ɣaa ɔsu Yesu ɔbara makpise gu manyɔdze atɔ̃meɣɛdze.
44010043	Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛrɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ ɔturi biara gɔ loafɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ akpi ɔtsɛ wũ i Yesu iyere ame.”
44010044	Ɔwi gɔ i Petro ɣɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔso sifere mma nsi mato makã wũ atsue ɔɖuɖu iso!
44010045	Ma Yudase fɔɖedze ma losiai Petro masɛ mmɔ ne, nnɛgbe ɔbara ma ɣaa, alasɔ Siwarã Bielea ɔba i mma loiɖe ma Yudase iso.
44010046	Manɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase to maɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã male Ɣaa. Ne Petro ɔkarɛ sɔ,
44010047	“Gɔ maɔfɔ Siwarã Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ bofɔ ne, boibawo ma ɔri ɔtɛ̃ sɔ madaafɔ Ɣaa itupie.”
44010048	Ne ɔso ɔtã sɔ mapie ma ndu i Yesu Kristo iyere ame. Ne kama ne, mapɛ Petro nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔwegu ma ayi kɛkɛĩ.
44011001	Katɔ̃memasɛdze gu mafɔɖedze ma i Yudea ɔnɔ sɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ɔɔfɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
44011002	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Petro ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem ne, ma Yudase fɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔtsɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ikpadzɛ̃gu, mabie sɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ mafiniki si matu sirɛrɛ̃.
44011003	Maɣere wũ sɔ, “Asɛ aabara mawɛ̃ ku mafɔ ma loitu sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ apia kɔrɔ̃ aɖegu ma aɖera i irɔi ame!”
44011004	Ne Petro ɔɖiɖi ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu karɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ,
44011005	“Gɔ lopia i Yopa nto lokparama kayi ne, lɛ sirɛ nto lorɛ ne, lonya kaɖikate. Lonya kato ɔbusi fiɛ ira nɛ nse lɛ ɔkati siare gɔ mamɔɛ̃ akpakpai ana i kato ɔso ɔba i karɔ̃ i wũ kɔrɛ.
44011006	Gɔ lonyɔ ɔ̃ ame ne, lonya ayo ame mabɔi gu mabɔi lalaa, ma nsɛ masɛ i ngba iso, mma nsɛ mabore i karɔ̃ gu kurodzai.
44011007	Lonɔ silɔ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Petro! Ta si aɖoe mawɛ̃ si aɖe.’
44011008	“Ne loɖi kanya sɔ, ‘Bosate, ooɣo! Iibaba ngbɔ! Loiɖe mabɔi ma i bo ma Yudase iisɛ bopɛgu lonya.’
44011009	“Ɣɛɛ silɔ dzɛgbe ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ira nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɔsekelera ne, daaɣɛ sɔ iikpa.’
44011010	Ibara ngbɔ ikpɛ itɛ buu. Ne kama ne, makpesegu ɔkati siare gɔgbe gu mabɔi i kame makɛlɛgu kato.
44011011	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame tutuutu ne, maturi itɛ ma mapia mabɔrɛgu i Kaisarea sɔ maba maakpere me mabɔ ɔɔba maɣɛ i iyo nɛ ame lopia kayogodɔ̃.
44011012	Siwarã Bielea ɔɣere me sɔ lota losiai ma ne lodaanigã. Ne ɔso mafɔɖedze ikuɔ mawɛ̃ magbe ɔta masiai me fiɛ bokɛlɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lopia me ɔturi iyo.
44011013	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔɣere bo sɔ, ‘Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖi so ɔte wũ i ɔ̃ iyo ɔɣere wũ sɔ ɔpia maturi Yopa si masɛ maakpere ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Simon Petro.
44011014	Ɔ̃ loaɣere-ɔ nnɛ i mi gu fɔ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu aabara fiɛ miana iɖi ne.’
44011015	“Ne kama ne, lotsɛ ma Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣere. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔba siayi ma ame lɛ kumɛgɔ siba bo iso ku karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃!
44011016	Mmɔ lonyigi nnɛ i Bosate ɔɣere bo sɔ, ‘Gbagbaã ne, Yohanes ɔsu ndu ɔpie maturi. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu Siwarã Bielea ɔpie mi.’
44011017	Gɔ Ɣaa lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase karatã ga ame ɔsu ɔtã bo ku ɔwi gɔ bofɔ Bosate Yesu Kristo boɖe ne, mme nɖe nna fiɛ loatɛ̃ Ɣaa ɔri?”
44011018	Gɔ manɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, manyua ma kakpadzɛ̃, ne matsɛ Ɣaa ile iɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtã mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔri sɔ maaba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ maana ngbã.”
44011019	Ɔwi gɔ i ara wagbe to aba ne, mafɔɖedze ma lotere inyɛwe nɛ loba ma iso iki i Stefano iɖoe ame ɔsɛ maabo Foinike gu Kipro gu Antiokia ame. Makiki mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɣɛɛ ne, ma Yudase kere mato maɣere.
44011020	Ɣɛɛ mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Kipro gu Kirene ɔkɛlɛ Antiokia sɔ maaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase Bosate Yesu iso itɔ̃me.
44011021	Kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔle piagu ma ɔso ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔfiniki mafɔ Bosate maɖe.
44011022	Gɔ mafɔɖedze ma i Yerusalem ɔnɔ ara wa nto aba i mmɔ ne, mapia Barnaba sɔ ɔkɛlɛ Antiokia.
44011023	Gɔ ɔbo mmɔ fiɛ ɔnya kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ piagu ma ne, so ɔɣɔ wũ gbaã, ne ɔpia ma ɔtɔ ɔbua sɔ mawe i Bosate ame teteree ku ma situ ɔɖuɖu ne.
44011024	Barnaba ɖe ɔturi sɛɛ gɔ mba kafɔkaɖe, fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ɔyi ɔ̃ ame. Iki i ɔ̃ ibuai ame ne, mafɔɖedze ɔba maasi gbodzoo.
44011025	Barnaba ɔkɛlɛ Tarso sɔ ɔ̃abie Saulo.
44011026	Gɔ ɔnya wũ ne, ɔkɔ wũ ɔbɔ Antiokia, fiɛ ma inyɔɔ ɔwe i mmɔ ikɔ iwɛ̃ buu. Mawe i mmɔ mate maturi gbodzoo ara. Antiokia mmɔ iɖe maɖe katɔ̃ makpere mafɔɖedze sɔ Kristo mare ne.
44011027	Ayi wamɔ ame ne, Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Yerusalem maba Antiokia.
44011028	Ma ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Agabo ɔta ɔya i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame ɔɣɛ sɔ kukã siare to kuabo kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Nnɛgbe ɔba ngbɔ ku ɔwi gɔ i Klaudio to ɔɖe sigara.
44011029	Ne ɔso mafɔɖedze ma i Antiokia ɔsia ita sɔ maato ara i ɔbiara ɔle kanya masese manyii ma mpia i Yudea.
44011030	Gɔ masa ara wagbe kanya ne, masu matã Barnaba gu Saulo sɔ masu makɛlɛgu mafɔɖedze makpakpa i Yerusalem.
44012001	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Igara Herodes ɔtsɛ mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ kama iti si ɔbara ma ɔtile.
44012002	Ɔtã maɖoe Yakobo gɔ nɖe Yohanes ɔnyiibi ala ipɛmi.
44012003	Gɔ ɔnya sɔ nnɛ ɔbara ɔwe ma Yudase ɔmɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ Petro ana ku ɔwi gɔ nɖe Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iyi ɔɖewi.
44012004	Masu wũ mapia i iyo nɛ i madzuɛ̃se ina akuri ana wa nsɛ manyuarã so to madzuɛ̃ ame. Herodes adzuni loɖe sɔ ɔ̃aɖi wũ ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi maɣɛgu atɔ̃me i itiri ku iyi nɛ masɛ marɔ sɔ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi iɖe kama.
44012005	Gɔ Petro rɛ i iyo ne, mafɔɖedze ɔkparama kayi i ɔ̃ iti teteree.
44012006	Iyi nɛ kaɖesɛ̃a i Herodes aaɖi Petro ɔtã maɣɛgu atɔ̃me kasɛ̃ ame ne, Petro rɛ i madzuɛ̃se inyɔ ndɛ̃ ɔto ɔrɛ sirɛ. Mapia wũ i kugbagɔrɔĩ kunyɔ ame i madzuɛ̃se inyɔ ndɛ̃, fiɛ madzuɛ̃se mawɛ̃ ana ɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃.
44012007	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i Petro kɔrɛ. Ikpawaĩ ɔfiɛ ibo i iyo ame, ne ɔpɛ Petro iwãgɛsɛ ɔtara sɔ, “Ta ya mala!” Kugbagɔrɔĩ gɔ mpia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ kere lokpase kuse i karɔ̃.
44012008	Kpabo gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyi so kafiami si apia fɔ ndokota!” Petro ɔbara ngbɔ. Ne kpabo ɔledza wũ iɣere sɔ, “Su fɔ awu tagbaraa pia si asiai me!”
44012009	Ne Petro ɔbɔrɛ ɔsiai wũ ne. Ɔwi gɔgbe ame ɔɖuɖu ne, ito ibara wũ lɛ kurɛ ɔto ɔsɛ̃, ɔ̃itsue sɔ gbaã iɖe
44012010	Maki mabɔrɛ i kayogodɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ gu kanyɔare ame gu kɔ̃ madzuɛ̃se ndɛ̃. Gɔ masɛ maabo ibɔra kukui gɔ nɖe kayogɔdɔ̃ siare ga losese kabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne, kã mɔmɔ ɔsese so. Maki mabɔrɛ i mmɔ ana. Gɔ mata masia i ɔri ɔwɛ̃ iso masɛ kɛkɛĩ ne, Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔyu i Petro anɔ.
44012011	Gɔ Petro ɔba ɔ̃atsue nnɛ loba ne, ɔɣere so sɔ, “Gbagbaã ne, Bosate lopia ɔ̃ kpabo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i Herodes nrɔɔ̃ ame gu ara wa i ma Yudase ɔbu sɔ maabara me ame!”
44012012	Gɔ Petro ɔbu nnɛ loba ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Maria gɔ nɖe Yohanes gɔ marɔ ana sɔ Marko ɔnyi iyo. Mmɔ i mafɔɖedze gbodzoo ɔsakanya mato makparama kayi ne.
44012013	Gɔ ɔkpukpura ɔkpã kayogodɔ̃ ga nsɔ̃ ɔri ne, ɔɖabo birɔ̃gomi gɔ marɔ Roda ɔba sɔ ɔba ɔ̃asese.
44012014	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔnɔ Petro silɔ ɔɖi ite ne, isoɣɔ lala ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔso ɔ̃isese iyo. Ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ maturi kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma sɔ Petro ɔɔba ɔɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃.
44012015	Ɣɛɛ maifɔ maɖe. Makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɔlala ato?” Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔtogu isɛ̃ ipia ma sɔ gbaã iɖe ne, maɣere so sɔ, “Siainyɔ ɔ̃ Ɣaa kpabo ɔɖe loɔba ɔɣɛ i mmɔ.”
44012016	Ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ame ne, Petro ɣɛ i mmɔ ɔtogu kukui ikpukpura. Gɔ masɛ maasese kukui fiɛ manya wũ ne, ibara ma ɣii!
44012017	Gɔ ɔlora ma ala kɔrɔ̃ ne, ɔɣere ma ara wa loba gu kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔba ɔ̃aɖi wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i iyo. Ɔɣere ma sɔ maɣere Yakobo gu matsɔra nnɛ loba. Ne kama ne, ɔrui i mmɔ ɔkɛlɛ kakɔi mama.
44012018	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ikpɔkpɔtɔ siare ɔbo i madzuɛ̃se ndɛ̃ alasɔ maiɣe nnɛ lobɔrɛ Petro iso.
44012019	Gɔ Herodes ɔnyɔnyɔ Petro kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔ̃inya wũ ne, ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ madzuɛ̃se mamɔ mabɔ wũ. Gɔ ɔɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me ne, ɔtã sɔ maɖoe ma. Ne kama ne, Herodes ɔrui i Yudea ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea sɔ ɔ̃asɛ i mmɔ kɛkɛĩ.
44012020	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kulu ɔwe i Herodes gu Tiro gu ma Sidonse ndɛ̃. Mapia makpabo mabɔrɛgu i Tiro gu Sidon sɔ masɛ maanya wũ. Gɔ masɛ ne, makarɛ ibuai mabɔrɛgu i Blasto gɔ nɖe Herodes ɔɖabo kɔrɛ sɔ ɔtã Herodes iti ɔtã ma si mafere kanya ndu i ma simagɛ̃ gu Herodes ndɛ̃ alasɔ Herodes karɔ̃ iso i ma aɖera sɛ abɔrɛ.
44012021	Iyi nɛ i Igara Herodes ɔsɛ ma sɔ maba ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ agagã gu ɔ̃ sigara ara fiɛ ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso ɔtsɛ ika iɖe.
44012022	Gɔ ɔɖe ika ɔro ne, maturi ɔla kulu maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa silɔ siɖe ngbe ne iiɖe ɔturi sire siɖe!”
44012023	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔtã Herodes ɔbo ɔnyɛ, alasɔ ɔ̃isu ile ɔtã Ɣaa. Makorogbarɛ ɔwe wũ fiɛ ɔkpi.
44012024	Bosate Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔɣa gbaã, itã sɔ mafɔɖedze ana ɔsi mabua.
44012025	Gɔ Barnaba gu Saulo ɔro ma karabara ga mapia ma ɔbara ne, marui i Yerusalem fiɛ makɔ Yohanes gɔ marɔ ana sɔ Marko maruigu.
44013001	I Antiokia ne, Bosate kanyamaɖidze gu maratedze ɔwe i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame. Ma nɖe Barnaba gu Simon gɔ marɔ Ɔturi Kpinakpina gu Lukio gɔ lobɔrɛ i Kirene gu Manaen gɔ nɖe Igara Herodes sibiɛtɛ ame ɔlaa gu Saulo.
44013002	Gɔ mapia mato manyi kanya male Ɣaa ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Miɖi Barnaba gu Saulo misɛ mitã karabara ga ɔso lokpere ma.”
44013003	Gɔ manyi kanya, makparama kayi i ma iti ne, masia ma nrɔɔ̃ iso, ne maɖi ma ɔri ne.
44013004	Gɔ Siwarã Bielea ɔɖi Barnaba gu Saulo ɔri ne, makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Seleukia. Mmɔ iɖe masɛ maasu ɔkolo mawara makɛlɛ karɔ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ marɔ sɔ Kipro iso ne.
44013005	Gɔ masɛ maabo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Salami ame ne, makɛlɛ ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ masɛ maaɣɛ Bosate itɔ̃me. Marko Yohanes ana siai ma lɛ ma buaidze.
44013006	Nnɛgbe kama ne, mafe makɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Pafo. Mmɔ iɖe masarɛgu ɔ Yudase gɔ marɔ Bar-Yesu. Ɔsɛ ɔpɛ sibɔ fiɛ ɔɖe mila kanyaɖidze.
44013007	Wase gɔgbe gu abã ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Sergio Paulo ne, malaa maɖe. Ɔkpakpa nɔgbadze gɔgbe ɔpia sɔ makpere Barnaba gu Saulo mabɔ si ɔnya ma, alasɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔnɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
44013008	Ɣɛɛ gɔ masɛ ne, wase gɔ masɛ marɔ ana sɔ Elima i Griki siɖe ame ne, ɔkpadzɛ̃gu ma atɔ̃me. Ɔbie sɔ si ɔfinikira ɔkpakpa adzuni i itɔ̃me nɛ i Saulo gu Barnaba ɔba maɣɛ iso.
44013009	Ɣɛɛ Saulo gɔ masɛ marɔ Paulo ana fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ɔyi i ɔ̃ ame ɔnyɔ Elima totoroo
44013010	ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ Satana ɔbi, ayigu mila gu kasɔla fiɛ atsiri ira sɛɛ, mme ɔwi aanyua ita iya i Ɣaa ɔnukuare iso?
44013011	Bosate to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃-ɔ kutsue ɔtã sɔ fɔ anɔmi aabiɛ, aisibanya kuɣɛ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iafɔ ɔwi!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ɔ̃ anɔ ko lobara wũ guduu ɔ̃isito ɔnya ɔtsɛ nrɔɔ̃ ilala ibie maturi sɔ mamɔɛ̃ wũ kɔrɔ̃.
44013012	Gɔ abã ɔkpakpa ɔnya nnɛ loba ne, Bosate Itɔ̃me Bielea ite ɔbara wũ ɣaa, ne ɔso ɔfɔ ɔɖe.
44013013	Paulo gu mma nsiai wũ ɔbo i ɔkolo ame marui i Pafo makɛlɛ Perge ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ mpia i Pamfilia. Mmɔ i Marko Yohanes ɔkpese ma i kama ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem ne.
44013014	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i Perge ne, makɛlɛ Antiokia ɔmagɛ̃ i Pisidia kumɛ iso. Iwarãyi iso ne, makɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ masɛ maasɛ i karɔ̃.
44013015	Ɔwi gɔ maɔka ara mabɔrɛgu i Mose mmara ɔko gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara itsɛrɛ ame maro ne, kasarɛkɔ̃ matɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, si mi ɔrere ba itɔ̃me nɛ loapia bo ɔle ne, ɔba ɔ̃aɣɛ.”
44013016	Ne Paulo ɔta ɔkɔlɛ kɔrɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ma Israelse gu mi mma loiɖe ma Israelse ɔɖuɖu, mi mma nsɛ mawarɛ Ɣaa ne, mikã atsue si minɔ!
44013017	Ɣaa gɔ i ma Israelse sɛ manigã ɔɖi bo mawa fiɛ ɔkɔlɛ ma kato ɔbara ma kaɖe siare ɔwi gɔ maɖe mafɔ i Egipte. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loɖi ma ɔbɔrɛgu i sisande ame i Egipte karɔ̃ iso ku ɔ̃ ɔle.
44013018	Ɔnyɔ ma iso i fafuĩ ame gɔ mawe makiki i akɔ sina ame.
44013019	Gɔ ɔwɔra abuiti akɔdzɛ maturi ma i Kanan ne, ɔsu ma nrɔ̃ ɔtã ma Israelse lɛ ma kaɖekɔ̃ awe.
44013020	Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba lɛ akɔ alafa ana gu siru ame. “Ne kama ne, Ɣaa ɔtã ma atɔ̃memaɣɛdze ma loɖe ma iso isɛ iabo kanyaɖidze Samuel ɔwi.
44013021	Ne matã wũ iti sɔ ɔsɛra igara ɔtã ma. Ɣaa ɔtã ma Kis ɔbi Saulo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Benyamin ɔɣekparɛ ame, fiɛ ɔɖe sigara akɔ sina.
44013022	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ i iyara iso fiɛ ɔsu David ɔsɛra i ɔ̃ kanya. David gɔgbe nɖe ngɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Yese Ɔbi David nɖe ɔturi gɔ ara lomɔɛ̃ me ɔtu, alasɔ ɔto ɔ̃abara wũ kuɖɔɛ.’
44013023	“David gɔgbe ɔɣekparɛ ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi Ɖidze gɔ nɖe Yesu gɔ ɔtã ma Israelse lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkã ndamu ɔtã bo ne.
44013024	Si Yesu aaba ne, Ndupiedze Yohanes ɔba ɔ̃aɣere ɔturi biara i Israel sɔ ɔfiniki ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ akpi ame si ɔsu ɔ̃ anɔ ɔsia i Ɣaa iso si ɔtã mapie wũ ndu.
44013025	Ɔwi gɔ i Yohanes karabara ɔɔbo kawirikɔ̃ ne, ɔkarɛ sɔ, ‘Mibu sɔ mme nɖe Mesia? Ooɣo! Ɔsiai me i kama ɔto ɔba, fiɛ loikote sɔ loasɛ i ɔ̃ ngbatɔ̃ ɖuɖuuɖu.’
44013026	“Manyii, mi ma nɖe Abraham mabi gu mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ɣɛɛ misɛ miwarɛ Ɣaa ne, mikã atsue si minɔ! Iɖi nnɛgbe ne, bo ɔɖuɖu ire iɖe!
44013027	Mma mpia i Yerusalem gu ma makpakpa iitsue sɔ Yesu nɖe Ɖidze gɔ boto bonyɔ ɔri. Mainɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ara wa maɣɛ masɛ fiɛ masɛ maka ku iwarãyi biara iso karɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ gɔ matã wũ kukpi ipɔ ne, matã sɔ kanyamaɖidze atɔ̃me ɔba i ne ame.
44013028	Mainyagu wũ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ nɛ ɔso maatã wũ kukpi ipɔ, ɣɛɛ maɣere Pilato sɔ ɔɖoe wũ.
44013029	Gɔ maɔbara ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ kukpi iso maro ne, mabɛse wũ i kudziri iso masɛ maabiara i ikpibiɔ ame.
44013030	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ ɔpia ngbã.
44013031	Ne kama ne, ma gu mma lobɔrɛ i Galilea makɛlɛ Yerusalem ɔnya wũ ɔwi gbodzoo. Mmamɔ nɖe ɔ̃ maɖansiɛ matã ma Israelse ne.
44013032	“Ɣaa ndamu mɛ ɔkã ɔtã bo mawa ne, me Itɔ̃me Bielea bosu bobɔ mi
44013033	si miatsue sɔ Ɣaa ɔbara i ɔ̃ ndamu iso ɔtã bo. Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔtara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔtã bo lɛ kumɛgɔ i David ɔtsɛrɛ i ɔ̃ kuka nyɔare ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Yesu iso sɔ, ‘Wũ Ɔbi aɖe. fiɛ nɔme lokpese fɔ ɔse.’
44013034	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ ɔ̃ibaburi ɔnya lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ, ‘Loatã-ɔ wũ kusɛkusɛ sekelea ndamu mɛ lokã lotã David.’
44013035	Fiɛ ana ne, ɔɣɛ i David kuka mama ame sɔ, ‘Aibatã sɔ fɔ Ɔturi Sekelea aaburi ɔwe i ikpibiɔ ame.’
44013036	“Iiɖe David itɔ̃me nɛgbe to, alasɔ gɔ ɔ̃ɔsɛ ngbã ɔbara Ɣaa mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔkpi mabiara wũ, fiɛ ɔ̃ sosina ana ɔburi.
44013037	Ɣɛɛ Yesu gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔ̃ sosina iiburi.
44013038	“Manyii, mikã atsue! Iki i Yesu gɔgbe iyere ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.
44013039	Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Yesu ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã wũ ibɛ. Ira nɛ i Mose mmara iiwo ɔbara
44013040	Ne ɔso minyɔ kukaakɔ! Midaatã sɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze atɔ̃me wa maɣɛ masɛ aaba mi iso.
44013041	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mi mma loisɛ miwarɛ wũ itɔ̃me ne, minyɔ kukaakɔ ito iabara mi ɣaa fiɛ miawɔ! Alasɔ loto loabara ira iwɛ̃ i mi ɔwi ame gɔ si minɔ ɣee maɣere mi ne, miibafɔ miɖe.’ ”
44013042	Ɔwi gɔ Paulo gu Barnaba to marui i kasarɛkɔ̃ ne, maturi ɔɣere ma sɔ maledza ikpese iba iaɖe ma ika i ara wagbe iso ku iwarãyi nɛ loaba iso.
44013043	Gɔ masame ne, ma Yudase gbodzoo gu mma lofiniki makpese ma Yudase fiɛ masɛ manigã Ɣaa i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔsiai Paulo gu Barnaba. Maka ma kumɛgɔ maaya teteree i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔsu ɔtã ma ngbe ame.
44013044	Iwarãyi nɛ ka losiai nnɛmɔ ne, ikuti kɛkɛĩ tee kaɖe gamɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔsɛ kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ maanɔ Bosate itɔ̃me.
44013045	Gɔ ma Yudase makpakpa ɔnya maturi kposu ma loba kasarɛkɔ̃ ne, ma anɔmi ɔrɛtɛ ne matsɛ kakpadzɛ̃ ku Paulo mato maɣɛ atsuɛ pɛ̃ i nnɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ iso.
44013046	Ne Paulo gu Barnaba ɔɣere ma ku kagbegbe sɔ, “Mi ma Yudase ikote sɔ boaɣere Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe tɔtɔ. Ɣɛɛ ngbɔ minɔ ne fiɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miito mifɔ ngbã mɛ nna katui itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, bosu ne botã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
44013047	Nnɛgbe nɖe katɔ̃me ga i Ɣaa ɔpia bo sɔ, ‘Loasu-ɔ lobara ɔkaniɛ lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase si aasu iɖi nɛgbe abɔ kayiiso ɔɖuɖu.’ ”
44013048	Gɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔnɔ nnɛ maɣɛ ne, so ɔɣɔ ma male Bosate Itɔ̃me. Mma ɔɖuɖu i Bosate ɔɖi ɔtã ngbã ɔfiniki makpese mafɔɖedze.
44013049	Bosate itɔ̃me ɔki ikã karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ɔɖuɖu.
44013050	Ma Yudase ɔnina ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa gu marɔ̃go mawɛ̃ ma mba kawarɛtɔ̃ fiɛ masɛ manigã Ɣaa adzuni, ne ɔso kulu ɔba i ma gu Paulo mɛrɛ̃ ndɛ̃, masa ma maɖi ta ma ibuiti ame.
44013051	Paulo gu Barnaba ɔkpakpa ma ngba sise mafere i ɔmagɛ̃ ame si ite sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ maturi ɔsɛ̃ ma. Ne kama marui makɛlɛ Ikonion.
44013052	Ɣɛɛ mafɔɖedze ma i Antiokia ne, so ɔɣɔ ma fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ɔyi ma ame gbaã!
44014001	Gɔ mabo Ikonion ana ne, Paulo gu Barnaba ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃. Ne gɔ maɣere ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, ma gbodzoo ɔfɔ maɖe.
44014002	Ma Yudase ma loifɔ Bosate itɔ̃me maɖe ɔsu kakpadzɛ̃ mapia i mma loiɖe ma Yudase gu Paulo gu Barnaba ndɛ̃.
44014003	Ɣɛɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔwe i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame ɔwi kɛkɛĩ. Mawe kafɔkaɖe i Bosate ame fiɛ maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea gu ɔle. Ɣaa ana ɔki i awawãra gbodzoo wa mabara ame ɔsia ita sɔ nnyainyɔ itɔ̃me nɛ mato maɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
44014004	Itã sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ ame maturi ɔɣɛ so aka anyɔ. Mawɛ̃ ɔsiai ma Yudase, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔsiai katɔ̃memasɛdze.
44014005	Gɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase gu ma Yudase gu ma makpakpa ɔta sɔ maabara katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔtile fiɛ maapɛ ma ata ne,
44014006	katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔnɔ, ne matere makɛlɛ Likaonia simagɛ̃ dzɛ nɖe Listra gu Derbe gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ mpia i ndɛ̃ mmɔ ame ne.
44014007	Masɛ maaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mmɔ.
44014008	I Listra ne, manya ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe bafã fiɛ ɔ̃ita ɔsɛ ɔnya gɔ maɣe wũ.
44014009	Ɔsi i mmɔ ɔto ɔkã Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ i Paulo to ɔɣɛ atsue. Gɔ Paulo ɔnyɔ wũ totoroo sɔ ɔba kafɔkaɖe i Yesu ame fiɛ ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ ɔ̃awo isosarɛ ɔna ne,
44014010	ɔla kulu ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta ya i fɔ ngba iso!” Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔkɔlɛ ɔɣo ɔtsɛ isɛ ikiki ne.
44014011	Gɔ mma nɣɛ mato manɔ itɔ̃me ɔnya nnɛ i Paulo ɔbara ne, mala kulu teteree i Likaonia siɖe ame sɔ, “Aɣɔ loso aba i bo ndɛ̃ lɛ maturi!”
44014012	Ne ɔso matã Barnaba iyere sɔ Seus fiɛ makpere Paulo ɔ̃ wũ sɔ Herme, alasɔ ɔ̃ loɖe ika.
44014013	Ne Seus ɔbia gɔ kuɣɔ iyo lobore imatã ɔmagɛ̃ ibere ɔsu manantsuĩ rɛrɛ̃ gu aɣatati aɣɔ̃la ɔbɔ sɔ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ maturi aasu masɔrɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze i ɔmagɛ̃ kayogodɔ̃.
44014014	Gɔ Paulo gu Barnaba ɔnɔ nnɛ mato mabie sɔ mabara ne, makɛkɛ ma awu wa mapia. Matere mabo i maturi ndɛ̃ mato kulu
44014015	sɔ, “Tete mɛrɛ̃, be iɖe mito mibara? Bo wũ maturi awune kere boɖe lɛ mi. Boba mi kɔrɛ ngbe gu Itɔ̃me Bielea. Minyua ara wa nna karɔ̃ ngbe ɔbara si mifiniki misu ile mitã Bosate gɔ mba ngbã. Ɔ̃ lobara kato gu karɔ̃ gu ɔpo gu ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i ɔ̃ ame!
44014016	Kokooko ne, ɔɖi kayi atsue sɔ maturi si mabara nnɛ maɖɔɛ.
44014017	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔtogu ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ iɖi ite wa nto ate sɔ ɔpia gbaã. Ɔsɛ ɔtã kado ɔpɛ i ɔwi iso ɔtã siraɖui gu araɖea gu isoɣɔ ana.”
44014018	Atoa sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔɣɛ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ibua iɖa fiɛ mawo ma ɔtindza sɔ madaasɔrɛ ma.
44014019	Gɔ ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Antiokia gu Ikonion ɔba maafinikira mmagbe adzuni ne, matã sɔ mapɛ Paulo ata mabore wũ maɖi i ɔmagɛ̃ ame gɔ mabu sɔ ɔ̃ɔkpi.
44014020	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔki malɔ wũ ne, ɔledza ita ikpese ikɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ gu Barnaba ɔrui makɛlɛ Derbe.
44014021	Gɔ masɛ maaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Derbe ne, mana mafɔɖedze gbodzoo. Ne ka makpese makɛlɛ Listra gu Ikonion gu Antiokia i Pisidia ne.
44014022	Masɛ maapia mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔle sɔ maya teteree i ma kafɔkaɖe ame. Maɣere ma ana sɔ, “Ikote sɔ boawe anyɛ gbodzoo fiɛ boana Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame bobo.”
44014023	Gɔ Paulo gu Barnaba ɔɖi matɔ̃ɖedze matã mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖuɖu ne, manyi kanya makparama kayi, ne masu ma mapia i Bosate gɔ mafɔ maɖe nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.
44014024	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i Pisidia simagɛ̃ ame ne, makpese makɛlɛ Pamfilia karɔ̃ iso.
44014025	Maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Perge fiɛ mafe makɛlɛ Atalia.
44014026	Gɔ mabɔrɛ i Atalia ne, maki i ndu iso makɛlɛ Antiokia ngbegɔ i matɔ̃ɖedze ɔsu ma mapia i Bosate nrɔɔ̃ ame ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame sɔ ɔnyɔ ma nnya si ɔtã ma maro karabara ga mato maro ngbe.
44014027	Gɔ masɛ maabo Antiokia ne, makpere mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ masakanya fiɛ maɣere ma nnɛ manya i ma irisɛ ame. Maɣere ma nwa i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ma iso gu kumɛgɔ ɔ̃ɔbusi kafɔkaɖe ɔri ɔtã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
44014028	Ne ka mawe i Antiokia gu mafɔɖedze igu ame ne.
44015001	Ɔwi gɔ i Paulo gu Barnaba pia i Antiokia ne, marɛrɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Yudea maba maatsɛ mafɔɖedze ara ite sɔ, “Ikote sɔ ɔbiara aafɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu kubarara lɛ kumɛgɔ i Mose mmara ɔte fiɛ ɔ̃ana iɖi.”
44015002	Ɣɛɛ Paulo gu Barnaba gu mmagbe ɔkpadzɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe kukaakɔ. Ne ɔso maɖi Paulo gu Barnaba gu mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ sɔ makɛlɛ Yerusalem si ma gu katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa ma i mmɔ si manyɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu kubarara atɔ̃me wagbe ame.
44015003	Gɔ mafɔɖedze ɔɖi ma ɔri ne, masɛ maaki i Foinike gu Samaria mato maɣɛ kumɛgɔ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase to mafiniki masiai Bosate. Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔpia mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu isoɣɔ gbaã.
44015004	Gɔ maba maabo Yerusalem ne, katɔ̃memasɛdze gu mafɔɖedze makpakpa gu mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔfɔ ma kukaakɔ. Ne Paulo gu Barnaba ka maɣere ma ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ma iso ne.
44015005	Mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i ma Farisise ikuri ame ɔfɔ kanya maɣɛ sɔ, “Iɖe sɔ manyii ma loiɖe ma Yudase aatu sirɛrɛ̃ si mabara i Mose mmara iso.”
44015006	Ne ɔso makpakpa gu katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔsarɛ lɛ ikuri mabu itɔ̃me nɛgbe iso.
44015007	Gɔ masarɛ mafɛ ara wagbe manyɔ gbidii ne, Petro ɔta ɔya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ndɛ̃ sɔ losɛ loaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe si mafɔ maɖe.
44015008	Ɣaa gɔ nɣe maturi situ ame ne, ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ɔfɔ ma gɔ ɔtã ma Siwarã Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔtã bo.
44015009	Ɔ̃ipia ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ i bo gu ma ndɛ̃, alasɔ ɔfɔ ma i ma kafɔkaɖe iso, fiɛ ɔsu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔtsɛ bo bo are.
44015010	Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miala Ɣaa minyɔ kumɛgɔgbe? Bo gu bo mawa iiwo ato wagbe ɔsore! Be ɔso fiɛ mito misu wã misia i mafɔɖedze magbe iso?
44015011	Ɣɛɛ bofɔ boɖe sɔ bona iɖi iki i Bosate Yesu nnyainyɔ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ma wũ mana iɖi.”
44015012	Ma ɔɖuɖu ka malo makã atsue awawãra siare wa i Banaba gu Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ma iso ɔtã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
44015013	Gɔ maro ɔɣɛ ne, Yakobo ana ɔta ɔya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, mikã atsue si minɔ.
44015014	Simon Petro ɔɔnyigira bo kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖi ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔte mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ ɔɖi mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛgu i ma ndɛ̃ ɔtã so.
44015015	Itɔ̃me nɛ i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ɔɣɛ masɛ ɔkotegu Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ,
44015016	‘Nnɛgbe kama ne, loaledza Igara David ayoku itara. Loaledza ara wa lonina sɔ aakpese alɛ.
44015017	Mmɔ i mma lokuti gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu fiɛ lokpere ma sɔ maaɖe wũ maturi aanyɔnyɔ me ne.
44015018	Ɣaa ɣe ara wagbe fiɛ ɔtã maturi ɔtsue wã ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.’
44015019	“Ne ɔso mme Yakobo nto loɣere mi sɔ, mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ masu so matã Ɣaa ne, midaatã botɛ̃ ma ɔri i kuira ame.
44015020	Ɣɛɛ ne, mitã botsɛrɛ ɔko botã ma sɔ manyua so ɔpukutura iki i aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iɖe gu marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai. Madaaɖe mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ maɖoe si manyua ima iɖe ana.
44015021	Alasɔ ta kokooko ne, ara wa i Mose ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsɛ ne, wã ame masɛ maka matã bo ɔwi biara i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ku Iwarãyi fiɛ masɛ maɣɛ ne ana i simagɛ̃ ame ne.”
44015022	Katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma losakanya ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ maaɖi maturi mawɛ̃ masiaira Paulo gu Barnaba sɔ maakɛlɛ Antiokia. Maturi inyɔ ma maɖi nɖe mafɔɖedze makpakpa Yuda gɔ marɔ ana sɔ Barsaba gu Silas.
44015023	Ɔko gɔ matsɛrɛ matã ma mato ame atɔ̃me nɖe sɔ, Nnɛgbe lobɔrɛ i katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa ma nɖe mi manyii i Yerusalem kɔrɛ ne. Boya manyii ma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ mabɔrɛ i Antiokia gu Siria gu Kilikia.
44015024	Bonɔ sɔ mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i bo ndɛ̃ ngbe maba maatsɛgu mi kakpadzɛ̃ ise i bo ma Yudase sirɛrɛ̃ itu iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, boipia ma sɔ maba maaɣere mi ara wamɔ igbã.
44015025	Gɔ bosɛ iti ame ne, bosese bo ndɛ̃ makpakpa inyɔ sɔ masiai bo manyii ɖɔɛse Banaba gu Paulo maba mi kɔrɛ.
44015026	Masu ma ngbã matsɛ ala Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔso.
44015027	Yuda gu Silas ana to maaledza mi ara wa iso botsɛrɛ mi ɔko ngbe iɣere.
44015028	Alasɔ bo gu Siwarã Bielea kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ boibasu ato siare kuawɛ̃ bosia mi iso, iɖo ara nyaa wagbe sɔ,
44015029	Misɛ̃ ara wa masu masɔrɛ ala aɣɔ iɖe gu ima iɖe gu mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ iɖe. Miɖi so i marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai akpi ame. Si mimɔɛ̃ ara wagbe mila ne, ibua ilɛ. Ɣaa isobuɛ itã mi.
44015030	Ne ɔso mapia marɛrɛ̃ magbe Antiokia. Gɔ mabo ne, makpere mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu masirakanya. Ne masu ɔko gɔ mabɔrɛgu i Yerusalem matã ma ne.
44015031	Mma ɔɖuɖu mpia mmɔ ɔna isoɣɔ gbaã i katetere atɔ̃me wa maka maɖi i ɔko ame iso.
44015032	Gɔ Yuda gu Silas ana ɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔso ne, maka ma ku atɔ̃me gbodzoo mapia katetere gu ɔle.
44015033	Ayi kɛkɛĩ kama ne, mafɔɖedze ɔɖi ma ɔri sɔ makpese makɛlɛ Yerusalem ku isobuɛ.
44015034	Ɣɛɛ Silas ɔkpese ɔwe i mmɔ.
44015035	Paulo gu Barnaba gu mamama ɔkpese mawe i Antiokia mate ara fiɛ maɣɛ Bosate Itɔ̃me.
44015036	Gɔ ayi ɔsia kɛkɛĩ ne, Paulo ɔɣere Barnaba sɔ, “Tã boakiki i bo manyii ma mpia i simagɛ̃ dzɛ ame bowe boɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea bofegu si bonyɔ kumɛgɔ mato mamɔ i Ɣaa ame.”
44015037	Barnaba ɔnɔ karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbie sɔ maakɔ Yohanes gɔ marɔ Marko makɛlɛgu.
44015038	Ɣɛɛ Paulo iitɔrã ɖuɖuuɖu! Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔsiai ma masɛ Pamfilia ne, Marko Yohanes ɔkpese ma i kama, ɔ̃iwe maro karabara.
44015039	Ma inyɔɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ so i Marko Yohanes itɔ̃me iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ itã sɔ masame so iso. Barnaba ɔkɔ Marko maki i ndu iso makɛlɛ Kipro.
44015040	Paulo ɔ̃ wũ ɔkɔ Silas, ne gɔ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔsu ma mapia i Bosate nrɔɔ̃ ame ne, marui.
44015041	Ɔsɛ ɔ̃aki i Siria gu Kilikia ɔto ɔpia mafɔɖedze akuri ɔtɔ.
44016001	Paulo ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ simagɛ̃ dzɛ marɔ sɔ Derbe gu Listra. Mmɔ iɖe ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya fɔɖedze gɔ marɔ Timoteo ne. Ɔ̃ ɔnyi ne, ɔ Yudase ɔɖe fiɛ ɔfɔ Kristo ɔɖe. Ɔ̃ ɔse ɣɛɛ ne, ɔ Grikise ɔɖe.
44016002	Mafɔɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Listra gu Ikonion ne, masɛ mawarɛ Timoteo kukaakɔ.
44016003	Paulo ɔbie gbaã sɔ ɔ̃akɔ wũ ɔbua so iso. Ne ɔso ɔtu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase mmara ɔte, alasɔ ma Yudase ma mpia i ndɛ̃ mɛmɔ ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔse ne, ɔ Grikise ɔɖe.
44016004	Gɔ mata ne, maki i simagɛ̃ dzɛ ɔɖuɖu i mmɔ ame, maɣere ma ara wa i katɔ̃memasɛdze gu makpakpa ma i Yerusalem ɔsia ita sɔ mabara iso.
44016005	Ne ɔso mafɔɖedze ɔɣe masia iyi biara fiɛ mawe ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame mabua.
44016006	Ne kama ne, mafe makɛlɛ Frigia gu Galatia, alasɔ Siwarã Bielea iitã ma ɔri sɔ maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Asia karɔ̃ iso.
44016007	Gɔ masɛ maabo Misia ne, mabie sɔ si mabo Bitinia karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ngbe ana ne, Yesu Siwarã iitã ma ɔri sɔ makɛlɛ mmɔ.
44016008	Ne ɔso maledza ikpese iki i Misia fiɛ masɛ maabo ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Troa.
44016009	Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ne, Paulo ɔnya kaɖikate. Ɔnya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Makedonia gɔ ɔɣɛ ɔto ɔtã wũ iti sɔ, “Wara ba Makedonia ngbe si aba aabuai bo so o-o!”
44016010	Kaɖikate gagbe ɔso ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ne boledza so borui bokɛlɛ Makedonia. Alasɔ bonya sɔ Bosate to ɔbie sɔ ɔpia bo sɔ bosɛ boaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mmɔ.
44016011	Gɔ bobo i ɔkolo ame i Troa ne, bofe bokɛlɛ Samotrake. Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, bosɛ boabo Neapoli.
44016012	Bobɔrɛ i mmɔ bokɛlɛ Filipi gɔ nɖe Makedonia ɔmagɛ̃kpakpa fiɛ ɔɖe ma Romase kasɛkɔ̃ ana. Ne ɔso bowe i mmɔ ayi kɛkɛĩ.
44016013	Iwarãyi iso ne, bobɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame bokɛlɛ ɔwore kuruɛ i ngbegɔ bobu sɔ mmɔ i maturi sɛ masɛ maakparama kayi. Bosɛ i karɔ̃, ne botsɛ marɔ̃go ma loba mmɔ Bosate itɔ̃me iɣere ne.
44016014	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ ɔwe i ma ndɛ̃ gɔ marɔ sɔ Lidia. Ɔsɛ ɔrɔdɛ̃ sikati rɛtɛa fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Tiatira. Ɔɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa gbaã. Gɔ ɔsi ɔto ɔkã nnɛ boto boɣɛ atsue ne, Bosate ɔbusi wũ adzuni sɔ ɔfɔ atɔ̃me wa ɔɖuɖu i Paulo ɔɣɛ ɔɖe.
44016015	Ne gɔ ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne, ɔtã bo iti sɔ, “Si minɔ karɔ̃ sɔ Bosate fɔɖedze loɖe gbaã ne, miba miawe i wũ kɔrɛ.” Ɔkpadzɛ̃gu bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ bonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ boawe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
44016016	Iyi iwɛ̃ gɔ boto bokɛlɛ boakparama kayi ne, bosarɛgu ɔsande bitɛ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ame i siwarã lalaa pia fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ sibɔ. Ɔsɛ ɔbara sikã kukaakɔ ɔtã makɔse.
44016017	Ɔbitɛ gɔgbe ɔsiai bo gu Paulo ɔto kulu sɔ, “Mmagbe ne, Ɣaa gɔ i kuɖokpo marabaradze maɖe fiɛ maba mate mi ɔri gɔ miaki miana ngbã!”
44016018	Nnɛgbe ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ayi gbodzoo. Gɔ iɔɖa Paulo ɔnɔ ne, ɔfiniki ɔɣere siwarã dzɛ mpia i ɔbitɛ gɔgbe ame sɔ, “Losa-ɔ loɖi i Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ bɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame!” Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, siwarã lalaa ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ame!
44016019	Gɔ ɔ̃ makɔse ɔnya sɔ ma karana ɔbieri ɔɔyu ne, mamɔɛ̃ Paulo gu Silas makpadzɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu matɔ̃meɣɛdze kɔrɛ i itiri ndɛ̃.
44016020	Maɖaɛ ma kanya i matɔ̃meɣɛdze kɔrɛ sɔ, “Mmagbe ne, ma Yudase maɖe fiɛ maba mapia manina bo ɔmagɛ̃.
44016021	Mapia mate maturi ara wa lota aya ma Romase kubarara gu mmara iso.”
44016022	Maturi gbodzoo ɔki malɔ Paulo gu Silas, ne matsɛ ma ikpakpadzɛ̃ ne. Matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔkpadzɛ̃ awu maɖi ma iso fiɛ ka matã ɔri sɔ mapɛ ma kama.
44016023	Gɔ mapɛ ma kukaakɔ ne, masu ma masɛ maapia i iyo. Maɣere ngɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mayorɛdze sɔ ɔdzuɛ̃ Paulo gu Silas kukaakɔ.
44016024	Kumɛgɔ maɣere wũ ɔso ne, ɔsu ma ɔpia ta iyo kame pelepele fiɛ ɔpia ma i akpo ame.
44016025	Kasɛ ndɛ̃ gɔ Paulo gu Silas to makparama kayi fiɛ mato maka aka male Ɣaa ne, mma nrɛ i iyo mmɔ to makã ma atsue.
44016026	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, karɔ̃ ɔti teteree, iyo ɔɖuɖu ɔti ta karɔ̃ ame sɔ ne akui ɔɖuɖu ɔsese fiɛ akpo wa ame mapia mma nrɛ i iyo ɔɖuɖu ɔfɛfɛ̃ aɖi ma.
44016027	Gɔ iyo dzuɛ̃se ɔta i sirɛ fiɛ ɔnya sɔ iyo akui ɔɖuɖu ɔsese ase fiɛ ɔbu sɔ mayorɛdze ɔɖuɖu ɔɔtere mabɔrɛ ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ ipɛmi sɔ si ɔɖoe so.
44016028	Gɔ Paulo ɔnya nnɛ ɔbie sɔ si ɔbara so ne, ɔfã ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Daabara! Bo ɔɖuɖu pia i ngbe!”
44016029	Ne ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔkpere sɔ masu ɔkaniɛ mabɔ wũ. I iti pɛ̃ gu ifɔ̃ lalaa nɛ lomɔɛ̃ wũ ame ne, ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Paulo gu Silas katɔ̃.
44016030	Ne gɔ ɔkɔ ma ɔɖi i iyo ame ne, ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Tete mɛrɛ̃, be iɖe loabara fiɛ loana iɖi?”
44016031	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ Bosate Yesu ɖe, si fɔ gu fɔ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu aana iɖi.”
44016032	Masɛ maaɣere ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu Itɔ̃me Bielea.
44016033	Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ame ame ne, ɔwiri ma aɣɛi wa maɖi ma, ne ka ɔtã ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara ne.
44016034	Gɔ ɔkɔ ma ɔpia iyo ame ne, ɔtã ma aɖera maɖe. Isoɣɔ ɔba i ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ame gbaã, alasɔ mafɔ Ɣaa maɖe.
44016035	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ɔmagɛ̃ matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔpia makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ masɛ maaɣere ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mayorɛdze sɔ, “Nyua mafɔ mamɔ si makɛlɛ!”
44016036	Ne dzuɛ̃se gɔgbe ɔɣere Paulo gu Silas sɔ, “Matɔ̃memaɣɛdze sɔ ka lonyua mi si mikɛlɛ. Ne ɔso ka miawo ɔkɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame.”
44016037	Ne Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ, “Mapɛ bo i maturi ndɛ̃ gɔ maiɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me, ana ne, masu bo mapia i iyo ame. Ɣɛɛ ne, ma Romase boɖe! Kiniɔ ka mabie sɔ borui i iwɛrɛ ame? Ooɣo! Ma mɔmɔ si maba maaɖi bo.”
44016038	Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpese masɛ maaɣere matɔ̃meɣɛdze katɔ̃me gagbe. Gɔ manɔ sɔ Paulo gu Silas ne ma Romase maɖe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã!
44016039	Ne ɔso mata makɛlɛ masɛ maapɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ fiɛ makɔ ma maɖi i iyo ame. Ne ka mapɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ sɔ mabɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame ne.
44016040	Paulo gu Silas ɔrui makɛlɛ Lidia iyo. Gɔ manya mafɔɖedze tsɔra ne, mapia ma ɔtɔ mabua fiɛ mabɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
44017001	Gɔ maki i Amfipoli gu Apolonia ne, masɛ maabo Tesalonika ngbegɔ i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ kawɛ̃ pia.
44017002	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Paulo sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbara ne, ɔkɛlɛ kasarɛkɔ̃. Awarãyi atɛ wa losiaidzo ne, ɔte Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me.
44017003	Ɔɖiɖi karɔ̃ ɔte inyɛwe nɛ maɣɛ masɛ koko sɔ Kristo aba ɔ̃anya gu kumɛgɔ ɔ̃aledza ita iwe ngbã. Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Yesu gɔ iso itɔ̃me nto loɣere mi ngbe nɖe Kristo ne.”
44017004	Atɔ̃me wagbe ɔfinikira ma Yudase mawɛ̃, ne ɔso mafɔ maɖe masiai Paulo gu Silas. Ma Grikise gbodzoo mawɛ̃ ma nsɛ manigã Ɣaa gu marɔ̃go ma masɛ mawarɛ gbodzoo ana ɔsu so matã Ɣaa i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
44017005	Ɣɛɛ anɔmi ɔrɛtɛ ma Yudase. Ne ɔso mabie kuturipɛmi masakanya i ɔmagɛ̃ ame sɔ si mapia kulu. Makɔ kulumapiadze magbe masɛ maaki malɔ Yason iyo sɔ mato mabie Paulo gu Silas si mamɔɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu itiri.
44017006	Gɔ maina ma mamɔɛ̃ ɔso ne, mamɔɛ̃ Yason gu mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ makpadzɛ̃ ma makɛlɛgu kasarɛkɔ̃. Mato kulu sɔ, “Marɛrɛ̃ ma nto mapia kulu i kakɔi biara ɔɔba maabo i ngbe ana soo!
44017007	Yason nɖe ngɔ lofɔ ma ɔpia i ɔ̃ iyo. Mmagbe lota maɣɛ i Igarakpakpa Kaisaro mmara iso mato mate sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yesu ka nɖe igara ne!”
44017008	Gɔ mma losakanya gu ɔmagɛ̃ makpakpa ɔnɔ ira nɛgbe ne, situ ɔtsue ma gbaã.
44017009	Ne ɔso matã sɔ Yason gu ɔ̃ maturi ɔtã sikã maɣedza so i kama fiɛ manyua ma.
44017010	Kasɛ̃ gamɔ ame ne, mafɔɖedze ma i Tesalonika ɔsu Paulo gu Silas materegu makɛlɛgu Beroia. Gɔ masɛ maabo mmɔ ne, makɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ maaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea.
44017011	Beroia maturi ɔte sɔ makpa anɔ maɖo Tesalonika maturi. Makã atsue kukaakɔ manɔ nnɛ mato maɣɛ. Iyi biara kɛkɛ ne, mato manyɔnyɔ Ɔko Sekelea ame manyɔ sɔ nnɛ i Paulo to ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
44017012	Ne ɔso ma Yudase gbodzoo ɔfɔ maɖe. Ma Grikise marɔ̃go gu marɛrɛ̃ gbodzoo ma masɛ mawarɛ ana ɔfiniki i ma situ ame.
44017013	Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase ma mpia i Tesalonika ɔnɔ sɔ Paulo pia ɔto ɔɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i Beroia ne, makɛlɛ sɔ maapia ikpɔkpɔtɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
44017014	Mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔta ɔluwɛ̃ makɔ Paulo makɛlɛgu ɔpo katɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ Silas gu Timoteo ɔkpese mawe i Beroia.
44017015	Mma lokɔ Paulo maruigu ɔsiai wũ masɛ maabo Atene. Gɔ makpese mato makɛlɛ ne, Paulo ɔsia ma kanya sɔ masɛ maaɣere Silas gu Timoteo sɔ mapɛ siwa si maba maatu wũ i mmɔ.
44017016	Ɔwi gɔ i Paulo pia i Atene ɔsia Silas gu Timoteo mɛrɛ̃ ne, so ɔma wũ gbaã gɔ ɔnya kumɛgɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔyi ku aɣɔ.
44017017	Ne ɔso ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔte ma Yudase gu mma nsɛ manigã Ɣaa i ma kasarɛkɔ̃. Iyi biara ne, ɔla ɔ̃ɔɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔ̃ɔte mma ɔsɛ ɔnya i itiri gu mma nto mafe i siri iso.
44017018	Ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, mma mpia i Epikuro gu Stoa akuri ame ma nɖe kayiiso manɔgbadze ɔtsɛ kakpadzɛ̃ ku Paulo sɔ, “Be iso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ kutsuɛɣɛdze gɔgbe to ɔɖe ika?” Ne mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ibara lɛ karɔ̃ mama aɣɔ iso itɔ̃me ɔto ɔɣɛ.” Mmamɔ ɔɣɛ ngbɔ, alasɔ manɔ gɔ Paulo to ɔɣɛ ara i Yesu gu makpise ita iso.
44017019	Ne ɔso makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Areopago fiɛ iɖe makpakpa kasarɛkɔ̃ maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bobie sɔ boatsue ara ɣɛtɛ wa ato ate ngbe.
44017020	Ara wa ato aɣɛ to abara bo ɣaa, ne ɔso bobie sɔ bonɔ wã karɔ̃.”
44017021	Atene maturi ɔɖuɖu gu mafɔ ma mpia i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ɔɖuɖu ne, maba kɔrɔ̃ matã ara ɣɛtɛ iɣɛ gu wã inɔ ɔwi biara.
44017022	Gɔ Paulo ɔta ɔya i kasarɛkɔ̃ i ma katɔ̃ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Lonya sɔ mi Atene maturi ne, mipia i kasumu ame gbaã.
44017023	Alasɔ gɔ lopia loki i mi ɔmagɛ̃ ame fiɛ lokarã inɔ ne, lonya itĩ iwɛ̃ nɛ masɛ masɔrɛ fiɛ matsɛrɛ i ne iso sɔ, ‘Ɣaa gɔ boiɣe ɔkpɛ i ngbe ne.’ Ɣaa gɔ miiɣe fiɛ misɛ misɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me iɖe loto lobie sɔ loɣere mi kiniɔ ne.
44017024	“Ɣaa gɔ lobara kayiiso gu ira biara nɛ mpia i kã ame, ɔ̃ nɖe kato gu karɔ̃ Sate ne. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔsɛ i iyo nɛ matsue ala ɔturi nrɔɔ̃ ame.
44017025	Fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔturi loasu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔbara kuira ɔtã wũ lɛ ngɔ i ira ɔnya alasɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ lotã ɔbiara ngbã gu iwarã gu nwa ɔɖuɖu nsɛ anya ma.
44017026	Ɔ̃ lobara maturi ɔɖuɖu iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ ɔtã sɔ maɣa makã kayi ɔɖuɖu iso. Ɔ̃ lotã kaɖe biara kɛkɛ ngbegɔ masi. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ losɛ ɔwi gu agbanayi ɔtã ɔbiara kɛkɛ.
44017027	Ɣaa ɔbara nwagbe ɔtã bo lɛ ɔ̃ maturi sɔ si boanyɔnyɔ wũ bonya wũ atoa sɔ tee ɔ̃idzorogu bo kuwɛ̃ fiɛ.
44017028	Lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ ɔso boba ngbã boto bopɛpɛgu so fiɛ boawe ana.’ Fiɛ mi agbã mapɛdze mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ɔ̃ mabi gu mawa boɖe.’
44017029	“Gɔ Ɣaa mabi boɖe ɔso ne, midaatã bobu sɔ Ɣaa kumiamia se lɛ ara wa bobaragu ala sikãrɛtɛa, ɣee ala sikãfudza, ɣee ita, ɣee ira nɛ mawe.
44017030	Ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iba iabo ɔwi gɔgbe ame ne, Ɣaa iikpadzɛ̃ maturi atsue sɔ be ɔso maiɣe wũ. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔto ɔkpere maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ mafiniki.
44017031	Alasɔ ɔ̃ɔsɛ iyi nɛ iso i ngɔ ɔɖi ɔsɛ aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me i ɔri iso. Fiɛ ɔɖi ngɔ ɔsia ikparĩ ɔsɛ ɔte bo sekelee gɔ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame.”
44017032	Gɔ manɔ Paulo ɔɖe ika i makpise ita iso ne, mawɛ̃ i ma ndɛ̃ ɔtsɛ wũ ima. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Boabie sɔ aaba aaɣere bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe ku iyi mama.”
44017033	Gɔ iba ngbɔ ne, Paulo ɔrui ɔnyua ma.
44017034	Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ɔsiai wũ, mafiniki makpese mafɔɖedze. Ma ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ nɖe Areopago ɔturi gɔ marɔ Dionisio gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ marɔ Damari gu mamama ana.
44018001	Ne kama ne, Paulo ɔrui i Atene ɔkɛlɛ Korinto.
44018002	Mmɔ iɖe ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya ɔ Yudase gɔ marɔ Akwila fiɛ maɣe wũ i Ponto. Ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔre Priskila gɔ lobɔrɛ i Italia ɔba mmɔ iidzoro, alasɔ Roma Igarakpakpa gɔ marɔ Klaudio ɔɣɛ sɔ ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu si mabɔrɛ i Roma. Paulo ɔsɛ ɔ̃atu ma,
44018003	ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ ɔbuai ma ku mabɔi siko ikã karabara alasɔ ɔ̃ wũ karabara gamɔ ɔsuã ne.
44018004	Iwarãyi biara ne, Paulo sɛ ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔ̃afafarɛgu ma Yudase gu ma Grikise ɔɖuɖu Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ si maafiniki.
44018005	Gɔ Silas gu Timoteo ɔse i Makedonia maba ne, Paulo ɔna ɔwi kukaakɔ ɔtã Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ gu ara ite ma Yudase sɔ Yesu nɖe Mesia gbaã.
44018006	Gɔ ma Yudase ɔta maya Paulo iso fiɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i ɔ̃ iso ne, ɔkpakpa so ɔte ma ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si mikpi miwɔ ne, wũ nrɔɔ̃ gu wũ ngba na i ne ame, loɔbara wũ karabara. Ita i kiniɔ ne, ka loakɛlɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ loaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea.”
44018007	Gɔ ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔwe i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase fiɛ marɔ wũ Tito Yusto gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔsi ɔmatã ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
44018008	Kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Krispo gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔfɔ Bosate maɖe, ne mafɔ Ɣaa itupie ne. Itã sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ maɖe ne mafɔ Ɣaa itupie i Korinto mmɔ ne.
44018009	Kasɛ̃ kawɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔɣere Paulo i kurɛ ame sɔ, “Daanigã! Daanyua itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɣɛ.
44018010	Alasɔ lopiagu-ɔ fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibawo-ɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ ɔbara. Maturi gbodzoo pia i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame gɔ maɖe wũ mare.”
44018011	Ne ɔso Paulo ɔwe i mmɔ ikɔ ku awa akuɔ ɔte ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
44018012	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Galio ɔba ɔ̃akpese Roma abã ɔkpakpa i Akaya ibuiti iso ne, ma Yudase ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ makpadzɛ̃ Paulo makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃.
44018013	Maɖaɛ wũ kanya sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe to ɔte maturi Ɣaa kasumu i ɔri gɔ loikotegu bo mmara iso.”
44018014	Gɔ Paulo ɔbie sɔ si ɔɖi so kanya ne, Galio ɔɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Si ira nyanyarĩa irere, ɣee mmara itu iɖe misu mibɔ ne, loana ɔtu lokã mi atsue.
44018015	Ɣɛɛ gɔ kakpadzɛ̃ siefe ga lose i mi atɔ̃me, ayere gu mmara iso iɖe ne, mi mɔmɔ misɛ miaɣɛ. Iiɖe me nɖe mi atɔ̃meɣɛdze i ara wamɔ iso.”
44018016	Ne ɔso ɔsa ma ɔɖi i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃.
44018017	Ne iturikuri nɛgbe ɔsɛ maamɔɛ̃ Sostene gɔ nɖe ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ tɔ̃ɖedze mapɛ wũ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ Galio iipia ma kanya.
44018018	Paulo ɔwe i Korinto ɔmagɛ̃ ame ayi gbodzoo. Ne kama ɔkala mafɔɖedze fiɛ ɔ̃ gu Akwila gu Priskila ɔki i ndu iso makɛlɛ Siria ne. Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃arui ne, Paulo ɔtã sɔ mafiɛ ɔ̃ iti i Kenkrea ala ma Yudase kubarara kuwɛ̃ gɔ ɔbara ɔso.
44018019	Gɔ ɔso i Efeso ne, ɔnyua Priskila gu Akwila ɔsɛ i mmɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ne, ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃aki i ara awɛ̃ ame ku ma.
44018020	Matã wũ iti sɔ ɔwe i ma kɔrɛ ɔbua, ɣɛɛ ɔnya sɔ ɔna ɔwi.
44018021	Ne ɔso gɔ ɔto ɔrui ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Si Ɣaa ɔtɔrã ne, nto loaledza ikpese iba mi kɔrɛ.” Ne ɔkpese ɔbo i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ɔrui i Efeso ne.
44018022	Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo Kaisarea ne, ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya mafɔɖedze. Ne ka ɔfe ɔkɛlɛ Antiokia ne.
44018023	Gɔ ɔwe i mmɔ kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔledza ikɛlɛ isɛ iaki i Galatia gu Frigia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔwe ɔkiki i mafɔɖedze ma nto masarɛ ɔpia ma ɔle.
44018024	Ɔ Yudase ɔwɛ̃ ɔba Efeso gɔ marɔ Apolo, fiɛ maɣe wũ i Aleksandria. Ɔɖe ɔturi gɔ nɣe ɔko kukaakɔ, fiɛ ɔɣe Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me ana.
44018025	Kɔra sɔ maɔte wũ Bosate iso ara fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ Yesu itɔ̃me ikote kukaakɔ ku ɔtɔ ne, Yohanes itupie iso ara kere ɔɣe.
44018026	Gɔ ɔta ɔya ɔto ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ku katetere i ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ fiɛ Priskila gu Akwila ɔnɔ ne, makɔ wũ makɛlɛgu ma iyo masɛ maɖiɖi Bosate itɔ̃me ame mate wũ kukaakɔ mabua.
44018027	Gɔ Apolo ɔsia ita sɔ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Akaia ne, mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Efeso ɔpia wũ ɔle matsɛrɛ ɔko matã wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛgu mafɔɖedze ma i mmɔ sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃abo ne, mafɔ wũ kukaakɔ. Gɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo ne, ɔbuai maturi gbodzoo ma lofɔ maɖe iki i Bosate abualɛra ame.
44018028	Ma Yudase iina kayakpa i atɔ̃me kanya alasɔ ɔsu Ɔko Sekelea ame atɔ̃me wa lote sekelee sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo.
44019001	Ɔwi gɔ i Apolo pia i Korinto ne, Paulo ana ɔki i ngba ɔri ɔfe ɔkɛlɛ Efeso ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃.
44019002	Ɔkarɛ ma sɔ, “Ita i ɔwi gɔ mifɔ miɖe ne, miɔfɔ Siwarã Bielea?” Ne matã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo! Be nɖe Siwarã Bielea? Boinɔ ne iso kuira.”
44019003	Ne ɔledza ma ikarɛ sɔ, “Ne iyɔ be Ɣaa itupie mifɔ?” Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Yohanes itupie itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ iɖe bofɔ.”
44019004	Ne Paulo ka ɔɖiɖi karɔ̃ ɔte ma sɔ, “Yohanes ɔpie maturi ndu sɔ mafiniki mabɔrɛ i ma akpi ame. Ɔɣere ma sɔ ngɔ nsiai wũ ɔto ɔba si mafɔ maɖe. Ngɔmɔ nɖe Yesu ne.”
44019005	Gɔ manɔ ngbɔ ne, matã ɔbara ma Ɣaa itupie kubarara i Bosate Yesu iyere ame.
44019006	Ne gɔ Paulo ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔsia ma iso ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔba siayi ma ame ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ matsɛ siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ, maɣɛ Bosate itɔ̃me ana.
44019007	Maaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ iweo-inyɔ ɔɖui.
44019008	Paulo ɔla ɔ̃ɔsɛ ma Yudase kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔla ɔ̃ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ku ɔle awa atɛ, ɔɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔte ma si ma adzuni si afiniki i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso.
44019009	Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ma loikã Itɔ̃me Bielea atsue ɔta maya Bosate itɔ̃me gu ara tea iso i kaɖe ɔɖuɖu anɔ. Ne ɔso Paulo ɔrui i ma kɔrɛ. Ɔruigu mma lofɔ maɖe makɛlɛ Tirano kasarɛkɔ̃. Mmɔ iɖe ɔla ɔ̃ɔte ma ara iyi biara ne.
44019010	Ɔte ma ara akɔ anyɔ. Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔki ikã Asia abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame, ne ɔso ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ɔnɔ.
44019011	Bosate ɔtã Paulo ɔle siare gɔ ɔsu ɔbara awawãra.
44019012	Ne ɔso si masu ɔ̃ kuɖukui gu awu masɛ maapɛgu manyɛse ne, masɛ masarɛ, isɛ iwo siwarã lalaa ana ɔsa ɔɖi i mma ame sipia.
44019013	Ma Yudase mawase ma mpia maki ɔbu sɔ maawo Bosate Yesu iyere ɔsu ɔsa siwarã lalaa. Masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Losa mi i Yesu gɔ itɔ̃me i Paulo to ɔɣɛ sɔ mibɔrɛ i ngɔgbe ame!”
44019014	Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa gɔ marɔ Skeva mabirɛrɛĩ ikɔdzɛ nto mabara nnɛgbe.
44019015	Ɣɛɛ gɔ masɛ maaɣere siwarã lalaa siwɛ̃ ngbɔ ne, sikarɛ ma sɔ, “Loɣe Yesu, fiɛ loɣe Paulo ana. Ɣɛɛ mi ne, mi nɖe mabe?”
44019016	Ngɔ iso i siwarã lalaa si ɔta ɔbo ma iso ɔpɛ ma! Mafɔ agbɛ fiɛ matere mabɔrɛ iyo isɔ̃isɔ̃ ala ɔkɛkɛ ma awu!
44019017	Ira nɛgbe ɔki ikã Efeso sɔ ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ. Itã sɔ ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ ma gbaã fiɛ masu kuwarɛ matã Bosate Yesu iyere mabua.
44019018	Mma lofiniki fiɛ mafɔ maɖe ɔba maabusi ma akpi maɣɛ i maturi ndɛ̃.
44019019	Ne mma mpia i ma ndɛ̃ maɖe mawase ɔsu ma sisɔbɛ gu siko dzɛ ame matsɛrɛ ma awara mapia mabɔ maatsuedza i maturi ndɛ̃ ne. Siko dzɛ matsuedza mmɔ kuɣa aaɖe lɛ sikãfudza kukpi siru ɔɖui.
44019020	Ne ɔso Bosate itɔ̃me ɔki ikã gu ɔle ifɔ ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔɖuɖu.
44019021	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔtã Paulo ɔsia ita i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃aki i Makedonia gu Akaia fiɛ ɔ̃akɛlɛ Yerusalem. Ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si lobo mmɔ ne, loto loafe lokɛlɛ Roma ana.”
44019022	Ɔpia ɔ̃ mabuaidze inyɔ, Timoteo gu Erasto, sɔ maɖe wũ katɔ̃ makɛlɛ Makedonia. Ne ka ɔkpese ɔwe i Asia kɛkɛĩ ɔbua ne.
44019023	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kulu siare kuwɛ̃ ɔba i mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Efeso iso iki i ma kafɔkaɖe iso.
44019024	Ngɔ losɛ kulu gɔgbe karɔ̃ nɖe Demetrio gɔ nsɛ ɔsu sikãfudza ɔpɔ ala Artemi kuɣɔ iyo wiriwiria. Ara wagbe irɔdɛ̃ sɛ ibɔ ma gu ɔ̃ mabuaidze kusia gbodzoo.
44019025	Iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Demetrio ɔkpere ma gu mma nsɛ mabara karabara ɔsirakanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ manyii, miɣe sɔ bosɛ bona kusia gbaã i bo karabara gagbe ame.
44019026	Mito minɔ, fiɛ mito minya kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ i Paulo to ɔbɔ bo karabara karɔ̃, alasɔ ɔ̃ɔfinikira maturi gbodzoo adzuni sɔ aɣɔra wa boto bobara ɔɖuɖu iikote sɔ maabɔ ati karɔ̃ matã! Ne ɔso i bo karabara ɔɔba karɔ̃ ne! Fiɛ iiɖe Efeso ngbe kere ito iba ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, Asia karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu!
44019027	Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe bo karabara ɔnɔwɛ̃ kere loanina! Gbagbaã ne, bo kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi iyo siare gu ɔ̃ kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu ana to kuayu i Asia gu kayiiso ɔɖuɖu!”
44019028	Gɔ manɔ Demetrio ikaɖe ne, sikpã lalaa ɔmɔɛ̃ ma matsɛ kulu teteree mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Efeso kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi nɖe ɔkpakpa pelepele!”
44019029	Kulu siare gɔgbe ɔki kukã ɔmagɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ame. Ne ɔso masakanya lɛ ikuri fiɛ masɛ maamɔɛ̃ Paulo masiaidze inyɔ ma marɔ Gaio gu Aristarko ma lobɔrɛ i Makedonia makɛlɛgu ɔmagɛ̃ kasarɛkɔ̃.
44019030	Paulo ana ɔbie sɔ si ɔkɛlɛ mmɔ, ɣɛɛ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ iitã wũ ɔri.
44019031	Ta makpakpa ma nto manyɔ ibuiti nɛmɔ iso fiɛ maɖe Paulo malaa ɔpia wũ ɔturi sɔ matã wũ iti ne, ɔdaasɛ mmɔ ɖuɖuuɖu!
44019032	Iyo ame ɔɖuɖu ɔyigu kulu fiɛ mma loba maasakanya ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ire. Ma kasɛ siare kɔra iiɣe nnɛ ɔso fiɛ maba mmɔ.
44019033	Ma Yudase ɔli Aleksandro masɛ maaɣedza i katɔ̃ sɔ ɔɣɛ nnɛ loba. Ne ɔkɔlɛ nrɔɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ malo kulu si ɔɣere ma ira iwɛ̃.
44019034	Gɔ matsue sɔ ɔ Yudase ɔɖe ne, mala kulu teteree lɛ iɖɔwũ inyɔ buu mato maɣɛ sɔ, “Efeso kuɣɔ Rɔ̃gokpakpa Artemi nɖe ɔkpakpa pelepele!”
44019035	Ɔwi kurukutu ame ne, abã ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃ɔwo ma ɔlora sɔ, “Mi Efeso maturi, mi ɔbiara ɣe sɔ Efeso ngbe i kuɣɔkpakpa Artemi iyo pia fiɛ ɔ̃ ita nɛ lokpase ibɔrɛ i kuɖokpo bosɛ bosɔrɛ ana ne, bo ndɛ̃ ise.
44019036	Kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔ̃awo nnɛgbe ɔsɛ̃. Ne ɔso mina ɔtu si sikpã si siɣɔ mi.
44019037	Alasɔ mma mimɔɛ̃ mibɔ ngbe ne, maiyu kayu i kuɣɔ iyo fiɛ mainina kuira i Artemi iyere ana iso.
44019038	Si Demetrio gu ɔ̃ matorese laa ɔnya sɔ maba itɔ̃me irere gu ɔrere ne, boba matɔ̃meɣɛdze. Fiɛ boba ayi wa iso masɛ maɣɛ atɔ̃me ana. Maawo ma akpi ɔɖi ɔte mmagbe iyɔ maɔtã maɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.
44019039	Ɣɛɛ si ira mama pia mito mibie sɔ miaɖi mibɔ ne, misu misɛ i matɔ̃meɣɛdze katɔ̃ si maaɣɛ ne i mmara kanya.
44019040	Boto boamɔrɛ̃ si maɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me i nɔme kulu gɔgbe iso alasɔ bona nnɛ boasu boɖi so kanya.”
44019041	Gɔ ɔɣere ma nnɛgbe ne, ɔtã masame.
44020001	Gɔ kulu gɔmɔ ɔba kualo ne, Paulo ɔkpere mafɔɖedze ɔsirakanya ɔpia ma ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame, ɔmala ma so fiɛ ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Makedonia.
44020002	Gɔ ɔɣo ɔri ne, Paulo ɔki i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame ɔtã ma kuka gbodzoo ɔsu ɔpia ma katetere gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo Akaia.
44020003	Ɔwe i mmɔ awa atɛ. Gɔ ɔto ɔledza so sɔ ɔ̃arui ɔkɛlɛ Siria ne, ɔnya sɔ ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mmɔ to mabie sɔ maaɖoe wũ. Ne ɔso ɔbara adzuni sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔki i Makedonia.
44020004	Gɔ ɔto ɔkɛlɛ ne, mma losiai wũ mawɛ̃ nɖe Sopater gɔ lobɔrɛ i Beroia fiɛ ɔɖe Piro ɔbi gu Aristarko gu Sekundo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Tesalonika gu Gayo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Derbe gu Tihiko gu Trofimo ma lobɔrɛ i Asia abuiti gu Timoteo.
44020005	Mmagbe ɔɖe bo katɔ̃ sɔ masɛ maawe masia bo i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Troa.
44020006	Gɔ Boɖoboɖo Gɔ Loita Iɖe Iyi ɔfe ne, bosu ɔkolo i Filipi. Ayi aru kama ne, bosɛ boatu ma i Troa fiɛ ka bowe i mmɔ ayi akɔdzɛ.
44020007	Ɖapɛ iyi ɖeakatɔ̃ iso ne, bosakanya sɔ boasɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃. Ne kumɛgɔ i Paulo to ɔ̃arui ku kaɖesɛ̃a ɔso ne, ɔɖe ma ika isɛ iabo kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃.
44020008	Matsue sikaniɛ gbodzoo masɛ i iyo nɛ ame mapia i kato.
44020009	Ɔporoporoi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Eutiko fiɛ ɔsi i fesere iso ɔtsɛ sirɛ itua gɔ Paulo to ɔɖe ika. Gɔ ikaɖe to ikarã ne, sirɛ ɔsu wũ. Ɔkpase ɔbɔrɛ i iyo nɛ matsue masia ikpɛ itɛ iso ɔba ɔ̃awuĩ i karɔ̃. Gɔ masɛ maaputa wũ ne, manya sɔ ɔkpi.
44020010	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Paulo ɔso ɔkɛlɛ fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ ɔpia so ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Midaapɛ sikpabo ne ɔpia ngbã!”
44020011	Gɔ Paulo ɔledza iya iba kato mmɔ ne, bosɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃. Ne ka ɔledza ika iɖe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ ɔrui ne.
44020012	Maturi ɔsu ɔporoporoi gɔ mpia ngbã makɛlɛgu iyo fiɛ ɔtu ɔɣɔ ma gbaã.
44020013	Paulo ɔki i ngba ɔri ɔkɛlɛ Aso, ɣɛɛ bo mma nsɛgu wũ sɔ boasɛ wũ ɔri ɔsu ɔkolo boɖe wũ katɔ̃ sɔ boasarɛ i mmɔ fiɛ ka boasu wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ.
44020014	Gɔ ɔba ɔ̃ɔtu bo i Aso ne, ɔbo i ɔkolo ame fiɛ ka bokɛlɛ Mitilene.
44020015	Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bokɛlɛ Kio. Ne kaɖesɛ̃a bokɛlɛ Samo. Iyi tɛare ne, borui bokɛlɛ Mileto.
44020016	Paulo ɔtã sɔ boiki i Efeso, alasɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ɔnina ɔwi gbodzoo i Asia. Ɔsia ita sɔ si ɔ̃awo ne, ɔ̃abo Yerusalem ku Pentekoste iyi iso.
44020017	Gɔ bosɛ boabo Mileto ne, Paulo ɔpia Efeso mafɔɖedze makpakpa ɔturi sɔ maba maanya wũ i mmɔ.
44020018	Gɔ maba ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe kumɛgɔ losɛgu mi ita i iyi nɛ loba Asia karɔ̃ iso iba iabo nɔme gɔgbe.
44020019	Minya sɔ losiai Bosate i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame atoa sɔ lona inyɛwe gu nnɔmɛ iki kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase ɔbie sɔ maaɖoe me ɔso.
44020020	Gbaã ne, loisɛ̃ sɔ loaɣere mi ara wa loɣe i Bosate iso i mi ayo gu ɔgbami. Lobara ngbɔ alasɔ lobie sɔ mitsue ara wa loaɖe mi kusia.
44020021	Kakɔi biara ga losɛ ne, loɣere ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ manyua ara nyanyarĩa ɔbara si mafiniki masiai Ɣaa si mafɔ Bosate Yesu maɖe.
44020022	“Kiniɔ ne, Siwarã ɣɛ me iso sɔ lokɛlɛ Yerusalem atoa sɔ loiɣe nnɛ loabɔrɛ me iso i mmɔ.
44020023	Simagɛ̃ dzɛ ɔɖuɖu ame loɔkiki ne, Siwarã Bielea to sitã me lotsue sɔ iyo irɛ gu inyɛwe se isia me i Yerusalem.
44020024	Wũ ngbã iisu me kuira, nnɛ lonya me iɖo nɖe sɔ loabara karabara ga i Bosate Yesu ɔpia me sɔ lobara. Fiɛ nnɛ ɔpia me sɔ lobara nɖe sɔ loɣere maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ bo nnya.
44020025	Loɔwe lokiki loɣere mi Itɔ̃me i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, loɣe sɔ mi kuwɛ̃ iisibanya me minya.
44020026	Nto loɣere mi nɔme sɔ, loisibatã mi kuwɛ̃ ngbã akɔnta.
44020027	Loɔɣere mi ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa to ɔbie sɔ mitsue.
44020028	Ne ɔso minyɔ so kukaakɔ gu mma ɔɖuɖu i Siwarã Bielea ɔsu sipia i mi nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ mikɔkɔ. Miɖe matɔ̃ɖedze sɔ miakɔkɔ mma i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã mi sɔ mikararã. Midzuɛ̃ ma kukaakɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ima ɔfere i karɔ̃ sɔ si ɔɖi ma.
44020029	Loɣe kukaakɔ sɔ si lorui ne, maturi to maata maya mi iso masamarã mi lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔgidi sɛ ɔkpɛ̃gu masɛrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ ma nnya.
44020030	Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ana to maasu itɔ̃me sɛɛ mapɛyu makɔ maturi gbodzoo maayura iki ma mila ara ite ame.
44020031	Midzuɛ̃ so si minyigi kumɛgɔ lobiɛ i mi iti gu kumɛgɔ lote mi ara kasɛ̃ i kakɔme akɔ atɛ wa lowe i mi kɔrɛ ame.
44020032	“Kiniɔ ne, losu mi nto lopia i Ɣaa nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ ɔdzuɛ̃ mi i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ ibuai maturi si ipia mi kafɔkaɖe ɔle, itã sɔ miaɖe mma loaɖe sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ara gu mma ɔɖi ɔsɛ so.
44020033	Anɔ iirɛtɛ me i kuwɛ̃ sikã ɣee sikati ara iso.
44020034	Mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ wũ nrɔɔ̃ mɛgbe lobara ala karabara fiɛ loɖe ara lokuti losu lonyɔ mma nsiai me iso.
44020035	Lobara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu lote mi kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ boabuai mawɛrɛba fiɛ si lonyigira mi Bosate Yesu itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Kusɛkusɛ pia i ara itã ame iɖo ifɔ.’ ”
44020036	Gɔ Paulo ɔro ikaɖe ne, ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ku ma ɔɖuɖu ɔkparamagu ma kayi.
44020037	Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔpɔrɛ wũ matsɛ kaku ala kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔmala ma so ɔso.
44020038	Nnɛ lotã so ɔkɔ̃ ma kɔra nɖe kumɛgɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ maisibanya wũ manya. Makɔ wũ masɛ maabo ɔkolo katɔ̃.
44021001	Gɔ boro so ɔmala ne, bobo i ɔkolo ame bowara bokɛlɛ Kos. Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bosɛ boabo Roda fiɛ ka bobɔrɛ i mmɔ bokɛlɛ Patara.
44021002	Mmɔ iɖe bosu ɔkolo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔkɛlɛ Foinike ne.
44021003	Gɔ bonya Kipro karɔ̃ bosese ne, boki i kã kala isɛ bofe bokɛlɛ Tiro i Siria ngbegɔ masɛ maaɖi ato wa mpia i ɔkolo ame.
44021004	Gɔ bonya mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ne, bowegu ma akpɛnɛ akɔdzɛ. Siwarã Bielea ɔki i mafɔɖedze magbe iso maka Paulo sɔ ɔdaakɛlɛ Yerusalem.
44021005	Gɔ bo ayi wa boawegu ma ɔɔsɔ̃ fiɛ ka boarui ne, mafɔɖedze gu ma mare gu mabi ɔkɔ bo makɛlɛgu ɔpo katɔ̃, ne bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ bokparama kayi ne.
44021006	Gɔ bo mala ma so boro ne, bobo i ɔkolo ame, ne ma wũ ka makpese makɛlɛ ma ayo ne.
44021007	Gɔ borui i Tiro ne, boba boatui i Ptolemai. Bosɛ boaya mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ fiɛ bowegu ma ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃.
44021008	Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, bota bokɛlɛ Kaisarea, bosɛ boabo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɣɛdze Filipo iyo. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i mabuaidze ikɔdzɛ ma maɖi i Yerusalem ndɛ̃.
44021009	Ɔba mabirɔ̃gomi ina ma loiyiri marã fiɛ maɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze.
44021010	Bowe i mmɔ ayi kɛkɛĩ fiɛ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Agabo ɔbɔrɛ i Yudea ɔba.
44021011	Gɔ ɔba bo kɔrɛ ne, ɔɖi kafiami ga mpia i Paulo ɔsɔ ame ɔnyi so nrɔɔ̃ gu ngba ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Siwarã Bielea sɔ ngbɔ i ma Yudase ma i Yerusalem aanyi ngɔ kafiami kaɖe i ngbe fiɛ maasu wũ mapia i mma loiɖe ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.”
44021012	Gɔ bonɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ne, bo gu mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔtã Paulo iti sɔ ɔdaakɛlɛ Yerusalem.
44021013	Ne ɔɣere bo sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ mito mibiɛ mifɛfɛ̃ me nrɔɔ̃ ngbɔ? Loito lonyɔ ɔri sɔ iyo kere maapia me i Bosate Yesu iti, ɣɛɛ lotɔrã sɔ maɖoe me i Yerusalem ala ɔ̃ ɔso.”
44021014	Gɔ bonya sɔ boibawo ɔ̃ adzuni ɔfinikira ne, bonyua wũ boɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa si ɔbara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.”
44021015	Ayi kurukutu kama ne, bosa bo ara kanya boɣo Yerusalem ɔri.
44021016	Kaisarea mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ana ɔsiai bo. Makɔ bo makɛlɛgu ɔ Kiprose fɔɖedzekpakpa kuere gɔ marɔ Mnason sɔ si bosɛ boasora i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
44021017	Gɔ bobo Yerusalem ne, mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔfɔ bo kukaakɔ.
44021018	Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, Paulo ɔkɔ bo bosɛ boanya Yakobo gu Yerusalem mafɔɖedze makpakpa ɔɖuɖu.
44021019	Gɔ boya so boro ne, Paulo ɔɣere ma ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔkigu i ɔ̃ iso i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃.
44021020	Mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ atɔ̃me wagbe ɔle Ɣaa, maɣere Paulo sɔ, “Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, aɣe ma Yudase kukpi gbodzoo ma lofɔ maɖe fiɛ makpese mamɔɛ̃ Mose mmara mato teteree.
44021021	Manyiiɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ ato ate ma Yudase ma mpia i abuiti sɔ madaasiai Mose mmara gu bo mawa kubarara, fiɛ aɣɛ ana sɔ madaatu ma mabi sirɛrɛ̃.
44021022	Be boabara kiniɔ? Alasɔ mato maanɔ kokooko sɔ aba.”
44021023	Ne matã wũ adzuni sɔ, “Boba marɛrɛ̃ ina mawɛ̃ i bo ɔmagɛ̃ ame i ngbe gɔ makã ndamu.
44021024	Kɔ ma si mikɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo si misɛ miasekelera so, si abuai ma ku ati ikparɛ̃ kuso. Ne loatã maturi ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ sila siɖe mala maisia-ɔ iso ku ɔwi gɔ ame amɔɛ̃ Mose mmara ato kukaakɔ ne.
44021025	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, botsɛrɛ ɔko botã mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ mafiniki makpese mafɔɖedze sɔ manyua ara wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ ɔɖe, manyua ima ɔɖe, si madaaɖe mabɔi ma manyɛdɛ̃ simɔ maɖoe, ana ne, manyua marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go kasɛ ga loikote.”
44021026	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Paulo ɔkɔ marɛrɛ̃ mamɔ makɛlɛ masɛ maabara so ati ikparɛ̃ kubarara. Ne kama ɔkɛlɛ ma Yudase isɔrɛyo sɔ maatã masɔrɛdze itsue ayi wa iso i ma ati ikparɛ̃ aaba fiɛ maasu ma karatã mabɔ maasu makpakpa so.
44021027	Gɔ iɔkuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ maaro ayi akɔdzɛ wamɔ ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ma lobɔrɛ i Asia abuiti ɔba maanya Paulo i Isɔrɛyo. Masa maturi gbodzoo kanya, ne mamɔɛ̃ wũ ne.
44021028	Matsɛ kulu i mmɔ sɔ, “Israel marɛrɛ̃, mibuai bo soo! Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe pia ɔki ɔɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ara nyanyarĩa i bo kaɖe gu Mose mmara gu bo Isɔrɛyo iso. Ana ne, ɔkɔ ma Grikise ɔba ɔ̃ɔbogu i kakɔi sekelea gagbe!”
44021029	Maɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, manya sɔ Paulo gu Trofimo gɔ nɖe ɔ Efesose sɛ i Yerusalem. Ne ɔso mabu sɔ ɔkɔ wũ ɔbogu i Isɔrɛyo ame.
44021030	Kulu gɔgbe ɔtara ɔmagɛ̃ kuɣedza, ne ɔso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔtere masɛ maasakanya i Isɔrɛyo. Makpadzɛ̃ Paulo maɖi i Isɔrɛyo masɛ̃ akui ɔɖuɖu ɔluwɛ̃.
44021031	Ɔwi gɔ mabie sɔ si maɖoe wũ ne, ma Romase makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔnɔ sɔ ma Yerusalemse ɔɖuɖu to mabara kulu.
44021032	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ɔkɔ makpakpɛ̃dze gu makpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa mawɛ̃ makɛlɛ ngbegɔ mato mabara kulu. Gɔ kulu mabaradze ɔnya makpakpɛ̃dze gu ma tɔ̃ɖedze ne, manyua Paulo ɔpɛ.
44021033	Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔmɔɛ̃ Paulo ɔtã mapia wũ kugbagɔrɔĩ kunyɔ. Ne ka ɔkarɛ sɔ si ɔtsue ɔturi gɔ igbã ɔɖe gu nnɛ ɔbara ne.
44021034	Mmagbe ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ ire. Ne gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze iito ɔnɔ itɔ̃me suɖea kuiwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛgu i ma kɔrɛ ala kulu ɔso ne, ɔtã masu Paulo maapia i makpakpɛ̃dze iyo ame.
44021035	Gɔ mabo kayogodɔ̃ ne, ipia sɔ makpakpɛ̃dze aaputa Paulo, alasɔ maturi situ to sitsue ala ɔ̃ ɔso.
44021036	Mma nsiai ma i kama to mala kulu teteree sɔ, “Miɖoe wũ! Miɖoe wũ!”
44021037	Ɔwi gɔ mabie sɔ si masu wũ mapia i iyo ame ne, Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze sɔ, “Lobie sɔ loɖegu-ɔ ika kɛkɛĩ.” Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Nene ato anɔ Griki siɖe?
44021038	Iiɖe fɔ nɖe ɔ Egiptese gɔ lokɔ maturiɖoese kukpi kuna ma lota maya i abã iso ɔwi gɔ lofe ngbe fiɛ matere makɛlɛ fafuĩ ame?”
44021039	Ne Paulo ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ooɣo, ɔ Yudase loɖe. Maɣe me i Tarso i Kilikia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ne, iiɖe ɔmagɛ̃ kosoi ɔɖe kɔra. Ne ɔso lotã-ɔ iti tã loɖe ma ika.”
44021040	Tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ Paulo si ɔɖe ma ika. Ne Paulo ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i sitĩ iso i kayogodɔ̃ ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ kato sɔ maturi si malo. Gɔ malo kananana ne, ɔɖe ma ika i si Yudase ame sɔ,
44022001	“Tete mɛrɛ̃ gu wũ manyii ma losakanya, misɛ o-o! Mitã loɖi so kanya si mi ɔɖuɖu si minɔ.”
44022002	Gɔ manɔ sɔ si Yudase ame ɔto ɔɖe ika ne, maledza ma kulu ibɔ karɔ̃. Ne Paulo ɔɣere ma sɔ,
44022003	“Ɔ Yudase loɖe. Maɣe me i Tarso i Kilikia karɔ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, Yerusalem ngbe iɖe losɛ suku. Gamaliel kayirinɔ losuã ara fiɛ mate me bo mawa mmara, ma kubarara gu ma akisi ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ. Losu wũ ɔtu lotã Ɣaa lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi ɔɖuɖu to mibara i ngbe kiniɔ.
44022004	Ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, lotsɛ ikpɛ̃gu mma nsiai kafɔkaɖe Ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe, lobie sɔ maɖoe ma, ne ɔso lomɔɛ̃ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go lopia i iyo.
44022005	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gu kasarɛkɔ̃ makpakpa aawo nnɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ɔtsue, alasɔ ɔwi gɔ loto lokɛlɛ Damasko ne, matã me ɔko sɔ lokɛlɛgu ma Yudase ma i mmɔ si lomɔɛ̃ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i mmɔ, lonyi ma lobɔ Yerusalem si makpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
