44022006	“Gɔ loto lokɛlɛ fiɛ iɔkuti kɛkɛĩ loabo Damasko fiɛ iaɖe lɛ kakɔme ndɛ̃ ne, ɔluwɛ̃ ifiɛ siare iwɛ̃ ɔfiɛ ibɔrɛ i kato ifere me iso!
44022007	Lobɔrɛ lofere i karɔ̃, ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be ɔso fiɛ ato akpɛ̃gu me ngbɔ?’
44022008	“Ne lokarɛ sɔ, ‘Bosate, fɔ nna aɖe?’ “Ne ɔtã me mmuai sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Yesu Nasaretse gɔ ato akpɛ̃gu ne.’
44022009	Mma nsɛgu me ɔnya ifiɛ nɛgbe, ɣɛɛ mainɔ silɔ dzɛ loɖegu me ika.
44022010	“Ne lokarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, be iɖe si lobara?’ “Ne ɔledza me iɣere sɔ, ‘Ta, si akɛlɛ Damasko. Mmɔ loate-ɔ karabara ga ɔso lokpere-ɔ ne.’
44022011	Ifiɛ siare nɛgbe ɔbiɛ me anɔmi, ne ɔso mma nsiai me ka lomɔɛ̃ me i kɔrɔ̃ fiɛ bosɛ boabo Damasko.
44022012	“Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ pia gɔ marɔ Anania. Ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã Ɣaa, fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ bo mmara ana ɔto teteree. Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ma mpia i mmɔ sɛ mawarɛ wũ kukaakɔ.
44022013	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Wũ ɔturi Saulo, busi anɔmi!’ Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, wũ anɔmi ɔkpa sekelee lonya wũ!
44022014	Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Bo mawa Ɣaa loɖi-ɔ sɔ si aatsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ, aanya ɔ̃ Ɔbi Sekelea fiɛ aanɔ ɔ̃ kanya ame itɔ̃me.
44022015	Fɔ loasɛ aaɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ara wa anya gu nwa anɔ ɔɖuɖu.
44022016	Kiniɔ ne, kuira iisikuti. Ta si afɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara si akparama kayi i ɔ̃ iyere ame fiɛ aafɔ fɔ akpi isu itsɛ.’
44022017	“Ne kama ne, lokpese lokɛlɛ Yerusalem. Gɔ lopia i isɔrɛyo loto lokparama kayi fiɛ ibara me lɛ sirɛ nto sisu me, ne lonya kaɖikate kawɛ̃.
44022018	Mmɔ i Bosate ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Pɛ siwa si arui i Yerusalem, alasɔ ngbe maturi iibakã-ɔ atsue manɔ wũ itɔ̃me nɛ aaɣɛ.’
44022019	“Ɣɛɛ loɣere wũ sɔ, ‘Bosate, ma ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ me lola loɔmɔɛ̃ mma lofɔ-ɔ maɖe sɔ boapɛ ma, bopia ma i iyo i kasarɛkɔ̃ biara.
44022020	Ɔwi gɔ mato maɖoe fɔ ɔɖabo Stefano ne, lopia kɔrɔ̃ i ne ame, fiɛ loya lodzuɛ̃ mma nto mapɛ wũ ata maɖoe awu.’
44022021	“Ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Ta kɛlɛ kadzorokɔ̃ ngbegɔ loapia-ɔ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ!’ ”
44022022	Ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, maturi magbe ɔlo maɣɛ kananana mato makã Paulo atsue. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me tsɔra nɛgbe ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ kulu teteree sɔ, “Aã! Miyura wũ mala! Miɖi wũ i karɔ̃ iso pelepele!”
44022023	Mato kulu teteree ne matsɛ ma awu ikɛkɛ, mato masa ɔsebu ana mapia i ɔwiri ame i sikpã ame.
44022024	Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere ma sɔ masu wũ mapia i iyo ame si mapɛ wũ fiɛ ɔ̃aɣere ma nnɛ ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase to mala kulu i ɔ̃ iti ngbɔ.
44022025	Ɔwi gɔ matsɛ wũ inyi ne, Paulo ɔkarɛ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ sɔ, “Ɔri pia sɔ mapɛ ɔ Romase gɔ maiɣɛgu atɔ̃me matã ipɔ?”
44022026	Ne ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔkɛlɛ ma tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be ato abie sɔ abara i ngbe? Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ne, ɔ Romase ɔɖe lo!”
44022027	Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkɛlɛ Paulo kɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃akarɛ wũ sɔ, “Biele ne ɔ Romase aɖe?” Ne Paulo ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Ɔ Romase gɔdɛĩ loɖe!”
44022028	Ne tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Mme wũ ne, ɔ Romase loɖe. Me ɣɛɛ ne, kuso lotã titiiti fiɛ lokpese ɔ Romase!” Ne Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Me ne, wũ maɣese ɔɖuɖu ne, ma Romase maɖe.”
44022029	Ɔluwɛ̃ gɔ mma ikote sɔ maakarɛ wũ atɔ̃me ɔnɔ sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔkɛlɛ simasima. Gɔ ma tɔ̃ɖedze ɔtsue sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ wũ gbaã, alasɔ ɔ̃ lotã ɔri fiɛ mapia wũ kugbagɔrɔĩ.
44022030	Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ɔtsue nnɛ loba ɔso fiɛ mato maɖaɛ Paulo kanya. Ne ɔso gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne ɔkpere ma Yudase masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma atɔ̃memaɣɛdze ɔɖuɖu maba maasakanya. Ɔtã sɔ maɖi Paulo mabɔ i ma katɔ̃ si mabo i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ame.
44023001	Gɔ Paulo ɔrara anɔ ɔnyɔ ma Yudase matɔ̃meɣɛdze ma loba maasɛ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ mmɔ kukaakɔ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Wũ manyii, wũ ɔtu iitã me ipɔ i Ɣaa anɔmi ame iba iabo nɔme ikpɛnɛ nɛgbe iso.”
44023002	Gɔ Anania gɔ nɖe ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele i ma ndɛ̃ ɔnɔ Paulo ikaɖe ne, ɔɣere mma nɣɛ i Paulo kɔrɛ sɔ mapɛ wũ ɔrɔ̃ta i kanya.
44023003	Ne Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ɣaa si ɔpɛ-ɔ ɔrɔ̃ta fɔ wũ! Ibere nɛ makua futututu aɖe! Mme atɔ̃meɣɛdze igbã aɖe? Mmara mɛ iso asi sɔ ato aɣɛgu me atɔ̃me ne, me ame iso iɖe ato ata aya gɔ ato aɣɛ sɔ mapɛ me ne!”
44023004	Ne mma nɣɛ i Paulo kɔrɛ i mmɔ to makarɛ wũ sɔ, “Ɣaa sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ato atia?”
44023005	Ne Paulo ɔtã mmuai sɔ, “Manyii, loiɣe sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele, tee loiɖegu wũ ika ngbɔ. Alasɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, ‘Midaaɣɛ ira nyanyarĩa i mi tɔ̃ɖedze iso.’ ”
44023006	Gɔ Paulo ɔnya ɔɖi ite sɔ mma loba maasakanya ne, ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i ikuri nɛ marɔ ma Zadukise, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɖe ma Farisise ne, ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Wũ manyii, ɔ Farisise loɖe, fiɛ ma Farisise ana loɣe me! Mato maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ makpise to maaledza ita!”
44023007	Gɔ ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, kakpadzɛ̃ ɔbo i aturikuri wagbe ndɛ̃, maɣɛ so aka anyɔ.
44023008	Alasɔ ma Zadukise sɛ maɣɛ sɔ makpise iisibata gu Ɣaa makpabo na gu siwarã agbãagbã ana na. Ɣɛɛ ma Farisise ɔfɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu maɖe.
44023009	Kulu siare ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃. Mmara matedze ma nɖe ma Farisise ɔya Paulo i kama sɔ gbaã iɖe. Matsɛ iɣɛ ku silɔ kpagɛa sɔ, “Boinya kuira nyanyarĩa i ɔ̃ iso! Siainyɔ Siwarã sirere ɣee Ɣaa kpabo loba ɔ̃ɔɖegu wũ ika!”
44023010	Kakpadzɛ̃ gagbe ɔkɔlɛ kato kabua. Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔmɔɛ̃ Paulo matsɛ wũ ikpakpadzɛ̃. Ne gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔnigã sɔ mato maakpadzɛ̃ wũ matutu ne, ɔɣere ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze sɔ masɛ maafɔ wũ mabɔ maapia i iyo ame.
44023011	Iyi nɛmɔ kasɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔba ɔ̃aya i Paulo kɔrɛ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Paulo, na ɔtu! Kumɛgɔ ame aɣɛ wũ iso itɔ̃me ngbe i Yerusalem ne, ngbɔ ame aaɣɛ i Roma ana ne.”
44023012	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔkã ndamu sɔ maibaɖe ɣee manɛ kuira si maiɖoe Paulo!
44023013	Mma lobara adzuni wagbe aaɖe lɛ marɛrɛ̃ sina gu kama.
44023014	Makɛlɛ masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma matɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ masɛ maaɣere ma sɔ, “Bokã ndamu sɔ boibaɖe ɣee bonɛ kuira si boiɖoe Paulo.
44023015	Ne ɔso mi gu atɔ̃memaɣɛdze si miɣere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa sɔ ɔledza Paulo ikɔ ibɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ ngbe. Mibara lɛ mito mibie sɔ mikarɛ wũ atɔ̃me mibua. Si maɔɖi wũ mato mabɔ ne, iyɔ boɔɖoe wũ i ɔri.”
44023016	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Paulo ɔnyiiko ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɔnɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ ngbegɔ mapia Paulo iyo ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere wũ.
44023017	Ne Paulo ɔkpere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɣɛ i mmɔ ɔpia iyo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɔ ɔporoporoi gɔgbe kɛlɛgu mi tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ. Ɔba itɔ̃me nyaa iwɛ̃ ɔ̃aɣere wũ.”
44023018	Ne ɔso kpakpɛ̃dze ɔkɔ ɔbi ɔkɛlɛgu ma tɔ̃ɖedze kɔrɛ. Ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Paulo gɔ mapia i iyo ngbe loɣere me sɔ lokɔ ɔbi gɔgbe lobɔ fɔ kɔrɛ si ɔba ɔ̃aɣere-ɔ itɔ̃me nyaa iwɛ̃.”
44023019	Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔporoporoi gɔgbe i kɔrɔ̃, ne ɔkɔ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kuruɛ ɔkarɛ wũ sɔ, “Be iɖe ato abie sɔ aaɣere me?”
44023020	Ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔbara kanya kawɛ̃ ku ma makpakpa sɔ maaba matã-ɔ iti sɔ miɖi Paulo mibɔ kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ kɔrãkaɖe ku adzuni sɔ maakarɛ wũ atɔ̃me awɛ̃.
44023021	Daakã ma atsue, alasɔ ma mawɛ̃ ma loaɖe lɛ maturi sina wɛrɛ i ɔri iso masia wũ. Mmagbe ɔkã ndamu sɔ maaɖoe Paulo fiɛ maaɖe ara ɣee maanɛ ndu. Ne ɔso ne, mato mabie fɔ ibuai. Maɔsɛ mawɛrɛ koko i ɔri iso, alasɔ mafɔ maɖe sɔ ato aatɔrã atã ma.”
44023022	Makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe ɔsɛ̃ ɔtã wũ sɔ, “Daatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ aakpese ɔnɔ itɔ̃me nɛ aba aaɣere me i ngbe ɖuɖuuɖu!” Ne ka ɔɖi wũ ɔri ne.
44023023	Ne makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze ɔkpere ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze makpakpa inyɔ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Mibie makpakpɛ̃dze alafa anyɔ ma loakɛlɛ Kaisarea nɔme kasɛ̃ lɛ iɖɔwũ kaiwɛ̃ ame. Ibua ne mibie mma loala afele maturi alafa anyɔ gu mma loasɛ i apɔngɔ iso ma wũ ma sikɔdzɛ.
44023024	Mitã Paulo apɔngɔ si ɔ̃asɛ iso si mikɔ wũ pɔkɔsɔɔ mikɛlɛgu abã ɔkpakpa Felike kɔrɛ.”
44023025	Ne ɔtsɛrɛ ɔko gɔ nse i karɔ̃ ngbe ɔtã abã ɔkpakpa sɔ,
44023026	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Klaudio Lisia kɔrɛ losu losese-ɔ, wũ Sate Felike, loya-ɔ.
44023027	Ma Yudase ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe sɔ si maɖoe fiɛ lotã makpakpɛ̃dze ɔfɔ wũ, alasɔ lonɔ sɔ ɔ Romase ɔɖe.
44023028	Lokɔ wũ lokɛlɛgu ma kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ si bonɔ nnɛ iɖe ɔbara.
44023029	Lonya sɔ ara wa mato maɣɛ ɔse i ma Yudase mmara ara iso gɔ iiɖe iɣɛrɛ nɛ loatã sɔ mapia wũ iyo ɣee maɖoe wũ iɖe.
44023030	Gɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere me sɔ mato mabara adzuni i ɔ̃ iso sɔ maaɖoe wũ ne, lonyɔ sɔ loasu wũ lobɔ fɔ kɔrɛ si akpere ɔ̃ gu mma lona itɔ̃me sɔ masu ma itɔ̃me mabɔ fɔ kɔrɛ.
44023031	Ne ɔso kasɛ̃ gamɔ ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbara nnɛ maɣere ma tutuutu, makɔ Paulo masɛ maabo Antipatri.
44023032	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ma losɛ ngba ɔkpese makɛlɛ ma kawekɔ̃, ne matã mma nsi i apɔngɔ iso ɔkɔ Paulo makɛlɛgu Kaisarea ne.
44023033	Gɔ masɛ maabo ne, masu Paulo gu ɔko gɔ matã ma matã abã ɔkpakpa.
44023034	Ɔwi gɔ ɔto ɔka ɔko ne, ɔkarɛ Paulo ngbegɔ ɔbɔrɛ. Gɔ ɔtsue sɔ Paulo ɔbɔrɛ i Kilikia ne,
44023035	ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Loabo i fɔ itɔ̃me ame kukaakɔ si fɔ kanya maɖaɛdze ɔɔba.” Ne ka ɔtã ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze ma mpia i mmɔ ɔsu Paulo mapia i iyo nɛ i Herodes ɔtsue ame si madzuɛ̃ wũ ne.
44024001	Ayi aru kama ne, Sɔrɛdzekpakpa Anania gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze gu atɔ̃me kanyaɖidze gɔ marɔ Tertulo ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea. Makɛlɛ Felike kɔrɛ sɔ maaɖi Paulo aɣɛrɛ ɔɖuɖu mate.
44024002	Gɔ makpere Paulo ne, Tertulo ɔtsɛ ma kanya iɖi sɔ, “Ɔbea, ɔwi dzoroo nɖe ngɔgbe gɔ bopia i isobuɛ ame ala fɔ iwola nɛ asu aɖegu bo katɔ̃ ɔso. Boɔnya akpaki sɛɛ gbodzoo wa ana loɔba i bo karɔ̃ ame.
44024003	Kakɔi biara ne, ara wagbe sɛ abo bo anɔ, nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ bo ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu sɛ bopɛ-ɔ siba ne.
44024004	Loito lobie sɔ lonina-ɔ ɔwi ɔso ne, lotã-ɔ iti sɔ kã bo atsue si anɔ bo atɔ̃me wa boto boba bɔaɣɛ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso.
44024005	“Bonya ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe sɔ kulu piadze ɔɖe fiɛ ɔpia ɔki ɔwi biara ɔfinikira ma Yudase adzuni i kakɔi biara i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Ana ne, ɔɖe ikuri nɛ marɔ ma Nasaretse tɔ̃ɖedze.
44024006	Ɔbie sɔ si ɔpia ma Yudase isɔrɛyo anyini fiɛ bomɔɛ̃ wũ.
44024007	Ɣɛɛ makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze Lisia ɔba ɔ̃afɔ wũ ɔɖi i bo nrɔɔ̃ ame ku ɔle. Ne kama ne, ɔɣere bo sɔ boba boaɣɛ itɔ̃me i fɔ katɔ̃.
44024008	Ne ɔso fɔ mɔmɔ karɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe si anɔ si sila boto bola.”
44024009	Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ɔtɔrã masia sɔ nwa ɔɖuɖu i Tertulo ɔɣɛ pia i ne ame.
44024010	Gɔ abã ɔkpakpa gɔmɔ ɔkpa Paulo kɔrɔ̃ sɔ ka ɔɖe ika ne, Paulo ɔsɛ karɔ̃ sɔ, “Tete, loɣe sɔ ka asɛ aɣɛ ma Yudase atɔ̃me i akɔ gbodzoo wagbe ame. Ne ɔso iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ loaɖi so kanya i fɔ katɔ̃.
44024011	Lɛ kumɛgɔ aatsue ne, iɖe lɛ akpɛnɛ aweo-anyɔ i ngbe gɔ loba Yerusalem sɔ si loba loasɔrɛ Ɣaa i Isɔrɛyo.
44024012	Kuwɛ̃ iinya me sɔ loto lobaragu kuwɛ̃ kakpadzɛ̃ ɣee kulu i isɔrɛyo ame ɣee ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ kukawɛ̃ ɣee ɔmagɛ̃ ame kukakɔi.
44024013	Mmagbe kuwɛ̃ iibawo irɔĩ ɔkarã i kuira iso sɔ maɣe sɔ atɔ̃me wa mato maɣɛ ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe.
44024014	Ɣɛɛ ne, nnɛ lonɔgu ma karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ loto losɔsrɛ bo mawa Ɣaa i Ɔri gɔ ma mato marɔ ikuri nɛ lota iɣɛ ma iso. Lofɔ Mose mmara ɔɖuɖu loɖe gu ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze siko ame.
44024015	Wũ anɔ sia i Ɣaa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ma wũ ma are sia sɔ maturi sɛɛ gu malalaa ɔɖuɖu to maaledza ita mabɔrɛ i makpise ame.
44024016	Ne ɔso losɛ lopia kubɛ sɔ wũ adzuni ame aakpa sekelee i Ɣaa gu maturi katɔ̃ ɔwi ɖaa ne.
44024017	“Akɔ gbodzoo i ngbe gɔ lona i Yerusalem ne. Losɛ kere sɔ loasu karatã lokɛlɛgu mawɛrɛba fiɛ ka loafɛ̃ ara lotã Ɣaa.
44024018	Ɔwi gɔ lokpakpa so loro ne, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ ɔba maanya me i isɔrɛyo mmɔ. Iiɖe bo gu kulu mabaradze kumawɛ̃ nsɛ, fiɛ loibara kulu ana.
44024019	Ma Yudase ma lobɔrɛ i Asia karɔ̃ iso ikote sɔ maaba fɔ kɔrɛ fiɛ si bo gu ma ba atɔ̃me arere i bo ndɛ̃ ne, iyɔ maɔɣɛ.
44024020	Fiɛ si abie ne, aawo tã mma nsi i ngbe ɔɣɛ ira lalaa nɛ manɔ i wũ iso ku ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase matɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɣɛgu me atɔ̃me.
44024021	Itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ saã lokɔlɛ silɔ kato loɣɛ i kasarɛkɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ mato maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me sɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ makpise to maaledza ita. Ne ɔso fiɛ mito miɣɛgu me atɔ̃me ne?”
44024022	Mmɔ i Felike gɔ nɣe kafɔkaɖe ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe kukaakɔ ɔɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Miya tɔtɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ame i makpakpɛ̃dze tɔ̃ɖedze Lisia aaba fiɛ loaɖaɛ mi itɔ̃me nɛgbe.”
44024023	Ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa sɔ masu Paulo mapia i iyo si madzuɛ̃ wũ ɣɛɛ mala wũ kukaakɔ si matã ɔ̃ malaa ɔri mala maɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ, maɔbara ɔ̃ ara nyaa matã wũ.
44024024	Ayi kɛkɛĩ kama ne, Felike gu ɔ̃ ɔre Drusila gɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase ɔba, ne matã sɔ maɖi Paulo mabɔ fiɛ ɔɣere ma itɔ̃me i Yesu Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso ne.
44024025	Gɔ ɔsɛ karɔ̃ ɔtsɛ ara karɔ̃ iɖi i ngbã sekelea isɛ gu iɖesoiso gu Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛgu nɛ loaba i kayiiso karokɔ̃ ne, ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ Felike gbaã, ne ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ta si akɛlɛ. Si loɔna kɔrɔ̃ kukaakɔ ne, loatã makpere-ɔ matã me.”
44024026	Gɔ ɔla ɔ̃ɔnyɔ ɔri sɔ Paulo to ɔ̃abie ira ɔtã wũ ɔso ne, kɛkɛ ɔ̃ɔpia wũ ɔturi sɔ ɔba si maɖe ika.
44024027	Akɔ anyɔ kama ne, maɖi Felike, ne masu Porkio Festo masɛra i ɔ̃ kanya ne. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Felike to ɔbie sɔ ma Yudase si maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔso ne, ɔnyua Paulo ɔpia i iyo.
44025001	Gɔ Festo ɔba ɔ̃ɔbo ibuiti nɛ iso ɔto ɔba ɔ̃aɖe ikpɛnɛ tɛare ne, ɔrui i Kaisarea ɔkɛlɛ Yerusalem.
44025002	Mmɔ i masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere wũ Paulo iso itɔ̃me, matã wũ iti sɔ,
44025003	ɔbualɛ ma si ɔɖi Paulo ɔbɔ i Yerusalem. Ma adzuni loɖe sɔ maawɛrɛ i ɔri iso maɖoe wũ.
44025004	Ɣɛɛ Festo ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Yorɛdze Paulo pia i Kaisarea, fiɛ mme wũ loto loakɛlɛ mmɔ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
44025005	Ne ɔso mitã sɔ mi matɔ̃ɖedze si masiai me maba maɖi ɔ̃ aɣɛrɛ mate.”
44025006	Lɛ akpɛnɛ farafana ito ikɛlɛ aweo ame ne, Festo ɔkpese ɔkɛlɛ Kaisarea. Iyi nɛ ɔbo mmɔ kaɖesɛ̃a ne, ɔsɛ i Paulo itɔ̃me iso.
44025007	Gɔ Paulo ɔba atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ ne, ma Yudase ma lobɔrɛ i Yerusalem ɔba maaki malɔ wũ matsɛ nnya siare gbodzoo iɖaɛ isia wũ iso i ara wa ma mɔmɔ maɣe sɔ ana i ne ame.
44025008	Paulo ɔɖi so kanya ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Loiɣɛrɛ ma Yudase mmara ɣee ma isɔrɛyo ɣee Igarakpakpa mmara iso.”
44025009	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Festo to ɔbie sɔ ma Yudase si maɖɔɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔso ne, ɔkarɛ Paulo sɔ, “Abie sɔ aakɛlɛ Yerusalem si losɛ loaɣɛgu-ɔ atɔ̃me i mmɔ?”
44025010	Paulo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ooɣo! Loɣɛ i karɔ̃ gagbe ɔɖuɖu igara mɔmɔ atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃, ngbegɔ ikote sɔ maaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me. Fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe sɔ loiɣɛrɛ ma Yudase.
44025011	Si lobara nnɛ lokote sɔ maaɖoe me ne, lotɔrã sɔ maɖoe me! Ɣɛɛ si loiɣɛrɛ ne, idaaba sɔ fɔ ɣee kuwɛ̃ aasu me ɔtã mmagbe. Ne ɔso nto lobie sɔ loasu wũ itɔ̃me lokɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa katɔ̃!”
44025012	Ne kama gɔ Festo ɔsɛ iti ame gu makpakpa ne, ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Gɔ fɔ sɔ aasu fɔ itɔ̃me akɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa katɔ̃ ɔso ne, ɔ̃ katɔ̃ aakɛlɛ.”
44025013	Ayi arɛ̃saã kama ne, Igara Agripa gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiiko gɔ marɔ Bernike ɔba Festo kɔrɛ i Kaisarea sɔ si maba maya wũ.
44025014	Mawe i mmɔ ayi gbodzoo, ne ɔso Festo ɔsu Paulo itɔ̃me ɔɣere igara gɔgbe sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ pia i iyo ngbe gɔ Felike ɔnyua wũ ɔsɛ.
44025015	Gɔ losɛ Yerusalem ne, masɔrɛdze makpakpa gu ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ɔɣere me ara i ɔ̃ iso, maɣere me sɔ lotã wũ kukpi ipɔ.
44025016	“Loɖi karɔ̃ lote ma ɔluwɛ̃ sɔ ma Romase mmara iitã ɔri sɔ maatã ɔturi ipɔ fiɛ maaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me. Ikote sɔ maatã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ gu mma lona atɔ̃me aasarɛ maɖi so kanya tɔtɔ.
44025017	Ne ɔwi gɔ maba ngbe, i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔso ne, loinina ɔwi ɖuɖuuɖu. Iyi nɛmɔ ame kaɖesɛ̃a ne, losɛ i atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ iyara iso lotã sɔ maɖi ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe mabɔ me.
44025018	Ɣɛɛ ne, atɔ̃me wa maɣɛ masegu i ɔ̃ iso ne, iiɖe nwa lonyɔ ɔri lotã.
44025019	Ara wa iso maɖaɛ wũ kanya nɖe ma kafɔkaɖe iso gu ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Yesu gɔ lokpi, fiɛ Paulo to ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia ngbã iso!
44025020	Lokpɔkpɔtɔ alasɔ loiɣe kumɛgɔ loaɖaɛ itɔ̃me. Ne ɔso lokarɛ Paulo si ɔ̃atɔrã bokɛlɛ Yerusalem si boasɛ boafafarɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ame i mmɔ.
44025021	Ɣɛɛ Paulo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔkɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ. Ne ɔso lotã sɔ masu wũ mapia i iyo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ loasese wũ Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ.”
44025022	Ne Igara Agripa ɔɣere Festo sɔ, “Lobie sɔ mme mɔmɔ loanɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.” Ne Festo ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Ato anɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me kɔrãkaɖe!”
44025023	Ne gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ ne, Igara Agripa gu Bernike ɔpia ma agarara, fiɛ maba atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ mmɔ. Makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gu kaɖe makpakpa ɔsiai ma kama. Ne Festo ɔtã maɖi Paulo mabɔ ne.
44025024	Ne Festo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Igara Agripa gu mi ma losakanya ngbe, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe nɖe ngɔ i ma Yudase ma i Yerusalem gu mma i Kaisarea ngbe ɔɖuɖu to mabie sɔ maɖoe ne.
44025025	Ɣɛɛ i wũ adzuni kanya ne, ɔ̃ibara kuira nɛ lokote itã sɔ maaɖoe wũ, ɣɛɛ gɔ sɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me si ikɛlɛ Igarakpakpa kɔrɛ ɔso ne, lonyɔ sɔ loasese wũ.
44025026	Ɣɛɛ lona kuira pɔtĩ nɛ loatsɛrɛ losese Igarakpakpa i ɔ̃ iso. Ne ɔso fiɛ loɖi wũ lobɔ mi ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ titirio fɔ Igara Agripa sɔ iaki itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame irere ne, loana nnɛ loatsɛrɛ.
44025027	Alasɔ ne, iikote sɔ loasu yorɛdze losese Igarakpakpa atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ gɔ loitsɛrɛ ɔ̃ aɣɛrɛ losese igara.”
44026001	Ne Agripa ɔɣere Paulo sɔ, “Ɔri ka ɔpia, ɖi so kanya.” Paulo ɔkɔlɛ kɔrɔ̃ kato ɔɖi so kanya ɔɣɛ sɔ,
44026002	“Bo Igara Agripa, iti lɛ me sɔ loaɖi so kanya nɔme i fɔ katɔ̃ i ara wa iso i ma Yudase to maɖaɛ me kanya.
44026003	Alasɔ loɣe sɔ fɔ ne, aɣe ma Yudase mmara gu kubarara ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ. Ne ɔso ne, lotã-ɔ iti, na ɔtu si akã me atsue.
44026004	“Ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu ɣe kumɛgɔ lomɔɛ̃ so lola kukaakɔ ita i wũ sibiɛtɛ ame i bo aɖe gu Yerusalem ana.
44026005	Ngbɔ ame si maaɖe so ɔnukuare ne, maɣe sɔ ɔ Farisise gɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso tutuutu loɖe.
44026006	Ara wa ɔso fiɛ mato maɖaɛ me kanya ngbe nɖe wũ ɔriinyɔ sɔ Ɣaa to ɔba ɔ̃abara ara wa ɔɣere bo mawa ɔsɛ.
44026007	Israel nlɛ miweo-minyɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔsu ma ɔle ɔɖuɖu i kasɛ̃ i kakɔme masumu Ɣaa sɔ si mawe ɔriinyɔ nɛ loba ngbe. Bo Igara Sɛɛ, nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase to maɖaɛ me kanya ne.
44026008	Be ɔso fiɛ ito iɖa mi karɔ̃ inɔ sɔ miafɔ miɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara makpise?
44026009	“Losu losia so iso sɔ loabara ira biara sɔ loatindza Yesu Nasaretse masiaidze karabara.
44026010	Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔtã me ɔle lomɔɛ̃ maturi sekelea gbodzoo lopia i iyo i Yerusalem. Mma ana maɖoe ne, iɖe me isoɣɔ.
44026011	Lota loya ma iso, lokpɛ̃gu ma lobara ma ɔtile ala sikpã dzɛ loba i ma iso ɔso ne, lokɛlɛ abuiti gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ lodzoro ame. Lotã sɔ mabara ma ara boa i ma Yudase kusarɛkɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu. Lobie sɔ ma mɔmɔ si mawa kanya maɣɛ amusuora i Yesu iso.
44026012	“Adzuni wagbe igbã ɔso fiɛ lota sɔ losɛ Damasko gu ɔle gu ɔri gɔ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i masɔrɛdze makpakpa kɔrɛ ne.
44026013	Igara Sɛɛ, gɔ losɛ i ɔri lɛ kakɔme ndɛ̃ ne, lonya ifiɛ teteree ɔbɔrɛ i kato nɛ loɖo kuɣɛ̃, ɔfiɛ ifere bo gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ.
44026014	Gɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ borɔ̃ ne, lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ loɖe ika i ma Yudase siɖe ame siɣɛ sɔ, ‘Saulo, Saulo, be ɔso fiɛ ato akpɛ̃gu me ngbɔ? Si atura i siyu iso ne, ato aare igbɛ.’
44026015	“Ne lokarɛ wũ sɔ, ‘Tete, fɔ nna aɖe?’ “Ne silɔ dzɛmɔ to sitã me mmuai sɔ, ‘Mme nɖe Yesu gɔ ato akpɛ̃gu ngbɔ ne.
44026016	Ɣɛɛ ne, ta ya! Alasɔ loɖi so lote-ɔ si loasu-ɔ lobara wũ rabaradze. Ato aaɣere kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ara wa anya i ngbe gu nwa loaɖi lote-ɔ.
44026017	Ngbegɔ loapia-ɔ ne, loadzuɛ̃-ɔ i mi aɖe maturi ndɛ̃ gu mafɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame.
44026018	Loatã sɔ aasɛ aabusi ma anɔ sɔ maabɔrɛ i Ɔbosam ɔle gu idududu ame fiɛ maaba Ɣaa ɔle gu ikpawaĩ ame. Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ma akpi ɔtsɛ ma fiɛ ɔ̃abara ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ masɛdze gu mma ɔsekelera alasɔ mafɔ me maɖe ɔso.’
44026019	“Ne ɔso ne, Igara Agripa, loisɛ̃ kaɖikate ga lonya lobɔrɛgu i kato!
44026020	Lotsɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣere ma Damaskose gu ma Yerusalemse gu ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ mafiniki i ma siri nyanyarĩa iso si masu so matã Ɣaa si mabara ara sɛɛ wa loate sɔ maɔfiniki gbaã.
44026021	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ma Yudase ɔmɔɛ̃ me i ma isɔrɛyo gɔ loto loɣɛ atɔ̃me wagbe ne. Mabie sɔ si maɖoe me fiɛ.
44026022	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i ma nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ne ɔso lokpese lopia ngbã sɔ loaɖiɖi ara wagbe ame lote mi makpakpa gu maturi ɔɖuɖu ne. Nnɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gu Mose ɔɖuɖu ɔɣɛ sɔ ito iaba ne.
44026023	Sɔ Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔre gɔ ɔsia ikparĩ aaba ɔ̃awe inyɛ. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe loaɖe ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ loata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame, fiɛ ɔ̃asu ikpawaĩ ɔbɔ ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu.”
44026024	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Festo ɔla kulu ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Paulo ka alala! Fɔ ɔko isuã kaɖu ɔɔnina-ɔ iti ame!”
44026025	Paulo ɔ̃ta wũ mmuai sɔ, “Tete Festo, loito lolala. Wũ adzuni ɔnyɔ waĩ. Gbagbaã nto loɣɛ.
44026026	Gbaã ne, Igara Agripa ɣe atɔ̃me wa loto loɣɛ ngbe ne ɔso loawo wã ɔɣɛ ku kagbegbe. Lofɔ loɖe sɔ ara wagbe kuiwɛ̃ iiwɛrɛ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
44026027	Igara Agripa, afɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze magbe aɖe? Loɣe sɔ afɔ ma aɖe.”
44026028	Ne Agripa ɔkarɛ Paulo sɔ, “Abu sɔ akpesera me Kristo ɔre i ɔwi kurukutu gɔgbe ame?”
44026029	Ne Paulo to ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Kiniɔkiniɔ ɣee ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba iɖe o-o ne, nto lokparama kayi sɔ mi ma mpia i ngbe ɔɖuɖu aase lɛ kumɛgɔ lose iɖo kugbagɔrɔĩ gɔ lopia ngbe!”
44026030	Ne Igara Agripa gu Festo gu Bernike gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ɔta ne.
44026031	Gɔ maɔbɔrɛ i mmɔ ne, maɖe ika i Paulo atɔ̃me wagbe iso maɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iibara kuira nɛ loatã sɔ maaɖoe wũ ɣee mapia wũ iyo.”
44026032	Ne Igara Agripa to ɔɣere Festo sɔ, “Tee boawo wũ ɔnyua si iiɖe sɔ ɔ̃ɔsu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔkɛlɛgu Kaisaro katɔ̃.”
44027001	Ɔwi gɔ masɛ sɔ boakɛlɛ Italia ne, masu Paulo gu mayorɛdze mama mapia i makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Yulio nrɔɔ̃ ame. Ɔɖe ɔkpakpa i igarakpakpa makpakpɛ̃dze ikuri ame.
44027002	Bosu ɔkolo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Adramitio fiɛ ɔsɛ Asia ibuiti. Bo gu ɔ Makedoniase gɔ marɔ Aristarko fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ i Tesalonika losɛ i ɔkolo gɔgbe ame.
44027003	Kaɖesɛ̃a ne, boɔbore bobo Sidon ɔpo kanya. Yulio ɔbara Paulo kayiribielea ɔtã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔkɛlɛ ɔmagɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃anya ɔ̃ malaa si mabie ɔ̃ ara wa ɔ̃asu ɔsɛ ala ɔri matã wũ.
44027004	Ne gɔ boledza ita i mmɔ ne, ɔwiri gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kanya ne, boki i Kipro ngbalɔ isɛ si boibabo i ɔ̃ ame.
44027005	Gɔ bofe mmɔ ne, bosɛ boaki i Kilikia gu Pamfilia ɔpo kanya bobore bomatã ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Mira i Likia ibuiti ame.
44027006	Kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa gɔ nsɛgu bo ɔnya ɔkolo gɔ lobɔrɛ i Aleksandria fiɛ ɔsɛ Italia karɔ̃ iso. Ɔsu bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔkolo gɔgbe ame.
44027007	Kumɛgɔ i ɔwiri to ɔkpɛ̃ ɔso ne, ifɔ ayi gbodzoo fiɛ bobore bobo Knido ɔmagɛ̃. Ɔwiri teteree gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ i mmɔ ɔso ne, boisɛ tɔrɔrɔ. Gɔ bobo Salmone ne, bolɔ boki i Kreta kuruɛ gɔ itã karɔ̃ ɔfɔ ɔwiri ɔle.
44027008	Ɔle ame bosɛ i ndu kuruɛ kuruɛ bosɛ boabo kakɔi ga marɔ “Sikolo Katuikɔ̃ Sɛɛ” gɔ loidzorogu ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Lasea.
44027009	Bonina ɔwi gbodzoo ne ɔso ma Yudase Kanya ɔnyiwi ɔɔfe. Ndu iso irisɛ ku ɔwi gɔgbe ame ba ɔle ibua, ne ɔso Paulo ɔtã ma adzuni sɔ,
44027010	“Tete mɛrɛ̃, lonya sɔ bo irisɛ ita i kiniɔ to iawe ɔle ibua, alasɔ ɔkolo gɔgbe to ɔ̃abo i kukpakpi ame fiɛ boto boayura ato gu maturi ana.”
44027011	Ɣɛɛ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔkpakpa ɔfɔ ɔkolo kãse gu ɔkolo sate adzuni ɔɖo nnɛ i Paulo ɔɣɛ.
44027012	Gɔ ɔkolo katuikɔ̃ gamɔ iilɛ katã sɔ maaya idzoro ala ɔyu ɔwi ka ɔba ɔso ne, marisɛdze ɔsia ita sɔ maarui makɛlɛ Foinike. Mmɔ ne, mato maawo ɔwe ku ɔyu ɔwi, alasɔ Foinike ɖe ɔmagɛ̃ i Kreta karɔ̃ iso gɔ mba sikolo kayakɔ̃ i kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ isɛ ga loatɛ̃ ɔwiri ɔri.
44027013	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔwiri sɛɛ ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ ibɔrɛ i kala isɛ gɔ lote lɛ ɔwi sɛɛ ɔɖe sɔ maasɛ ɔri. Ne ɔso maledza so marui maki i Kreta karɔ̃ kuruɛ.
44027014	Ɣɛɛ ɔluwɛ̃ ne, awɛ teteree ɔtsɛ ikpɛ̃ abɔrɛ i karɔ̃ iso asarɛgu bo gɔ bobɔrɛ i Kreta boro kere.
44027015	Awɛ ɔsarɛgu ɔkolo gɔ boisibawo wũ ɔfinikira ɔsɔ̃ karɔ̃ iso. Ne ɔso manyua wũ sɔ ɔwiri si ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ ɔkɛlɛgu.
44027016	Kama ne, bosɛ boabo i karɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ kawɛ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ ga marɔ Kauda kama. Ɔle ame fiɛ bowo ɔkolo kosoi gɔ bosɛgu ɔnyi ɔmatãra i ɔsiare gɔ ame bopia iso.
44027017	Gɔ manyi wũ maro ne, masu siwɛ̃ manyi ɔsiare ana. Gɔ ifɔ̃ to ma sɔ ɔwiri aasu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu iba wodoroa iso i Libia ɔpo kanya ɔso ne, masora sikati dzɛ nsɛ simɔɛ̃ ɔwiri i ɔkolo kato ɔɖuɖu. Ne ɔso ɔwiri ne, ɔsɛ kere ka ɔsɛgu ɔkolo i ndu iso.
44027018	Gɔ kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ fiɛ ɔwiri iito ɔnyua ɔkpɛ̃ ne, matsɛ ato wa i ɔkolo sore iɖi iwiri i ndu ame.
44027019	Iyi tɛare iso ne, matsɛ ɔkolo mɔmɔ ana ara iɖi ipɛyu.
44027020	Awɛ wagbe ɔkpɛ̃ ayi gbodzoo sɔ boinya kuɣɛ̃ ɣee awãmi. Boyu ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu!
44027021	Gɔ maɔsɛ ayi gbodzoo fiɛ maina kɔrɔ̃ maɖe ara ne, Paulo ɔta ɔya i ma katɔ̃ ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, si ɔkã mikã me atsue ne, tee boirui i Kreta fiɛ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu aba aabɔrɛ bo iso.
44027022	Lobie sɔ loaɣere mi sɔ mina ɔtu ne mi kuwɛ̃ iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ ɔkolo ne, ɔto ɔ̃awã ndu!
44027023	Kɔma kasɛ̃ ame ne, Ɣaa gɔ ɔre loɖe, fiɛ ɔ̃ nto losumu kpabo ɔba ɔ̃ɔya i wũ kɔrɛ.
44027024	Ɔɣere me sɔ, ‘Paulo, daanigã. Ato aaya i Kaisaro katɔ̃ asu fɔ itɔ̃me asɛ wũ i katɔ̃. Ɣaa ɔɔsu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ɔkolo ame ngbã ɔpia-ɔ i nrɔɔ̃ ame, mi kuwɛ̃ iibakpi.’
44027025	Ne ɔso ne, wũ maturi, mina ɔtu. Lofɔ Ɣaa loɖe sɔ ira biara nɛ ɔɣere me sɛ iba i ne ame.
44027026	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔwiri to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ bo ɔkɛlɛgu ɔ̃amɔrɛ̃dza i karɔ̃ kawɛ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ ɔkpokpo.”
44027027	Ɔwiri siare gɔgbe ɔfuri bo ɔsɛgu ɔkpesegu i Adria ɔpo iso ayi aweo ana. Iyi weo-naare kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ ne, bo ɔkolo ame marabaradze ɔbu sɔ maɔbore mamatã karɔ̃ kawɛ̃.
44027028	Ne gɔ masusu ndu iwodoro manyɔ ne, manya sɔ miwodoro lɛ ngba kulafa gu sinyɔ ɔɖui. Gɔ makɛlɛ katɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ ana ne, maledza isusu manya sɔ ka miɖe ngba kasiwɛ̃.
44027029	Gɔ ifɔ̃ to ma sɔ ɔwiri to ɔ̃asore ɔkolo ɔsɛ ɔ̃awuĩ i ata siare arere iso ɔso ne, makpakpasera abɔra ana wa lobua aba ɔrɔrã fiɛ manyi wã siwɛ̃ mamatãra i ɔkolo iso mapia i ndu karɔ̃ sɔ si matindza ɔkolo maɣedza. Mawe i ɔriinyɔ ame teteree sɔ kaɖe si kasɛ̃ mala.
44027030	Gɔ ɔkolo ame marabaradze ɔbie sɔ maatere maɣɛ bo ɔso ne, mabara lɛ abɔra wa nsɛ amɔɛ̃ ɔkolo ala maakpasera mapia i ndu ame i ɔkolo katɔ̃.
44027031	Ɣɛɛ ne, Paulo ɔɣere makpakpɛ̃dze gu tɔ̃ɖedze sɔ, “Si mmagbe iiwe i ɔkolo ame ne, mito miawɔ.”
44027032	Ne ɔso makpakpɛ̃dze ɔtu ɔkolo kosoi gɔgbe siwɛ̃ dzɛ lomɔɛ̃ wũ manyua wũ mapia i ndu ame.
44027033	Ɔwi gɔ i kaɖe to kaba kaasɛ̃ ne, Paulo ɔtã ma ɔɖuɖu iti sɔ maɖe ara. Ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Ayi aweo-ana i ngbe gɔ bopia i itikpi nɛgbe ame fiɛ aɖera iipɛgu mi kuwɛ̃ kanya ne.
44027034	Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɖe ara si miana ɔle fiɛ miibakpi. Alasɔ nane ɔnidzɔ iibasɛ i kuwɛ̃ iso.”
44027035	Ne gɔ Paulo ɔsu ɔ̃ aɖera ne, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃, ne ɔkpɛti ɔɖe ne.
44027036	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔna ɔtu, ne matsɛ ara iɖe ne.
44027037	Mma mpia i ɔkolo ame aaɖe lɛ maturi alafa anyɔ gu sikɔdzɛ-ikuɔ.
44027038	Ɔwi gɔ maro aɖera ɔɖe ne, maledza aɖera sikoto tsɔra dzɛ mpia i ɔkolo ame iɖi ifere i ndu ame si mabara ɔkolo foforofo.
44027039	Ɔwi gɔ i kaɖe ɔsɛ̃ waĩ ne, mainya ɔpo kanya ga iɖe maɖi ite. Ɣɛɛ manya kamabokɔ̃ kawɛ̃ i ɔkpokpo gɔ mabu sɔ mawo ɔbo. Ne ɔso mabie sɔ si maawo ne, maasu ɔkolo mabogu i ɔpo ɔkpokpo mmɔ.
44027040	Ne ɔso matu siwɛ̃ dzɛ lomɔɛ̃ abɔra wa manyi mamatãra i ɔkolo iso, fiɛ ka makurisi ɔdziri gɔ masɛ madzuɛ̃ ala ɔkolo makɛlɛgu ngbegɔ masɛ. Makɔlɛ ɔkolo sikati kato sɔ ɔwiri si ɔbo ɔkpadzɛ̃ ma ɔkɛlɛgu.
44027041	Gɔ mato makɛlɛ katɔ̃ ne, ɔkolo katɔ̃ ɔsɛ iamɔrɛ̃ i iwarĩ ame sɔ ɔ̃isito ɔwo ɔsɛ. Ɔwiri gu ndu ɔba miabo wũ iso mibiɛbiɛ wũ buruburuburu.
44027042	Gɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ɔbu sɔ mayorɛdze to maatere ma iso ɔso ne, mabie sɔ maaɖoe ma.
44027043	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ma tɔ̃ɖedze ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃afɔ Paulo ngbã ɔso ne, ɔ̃itɔrãgu ma. Ne ɔso ɔtã silɔ sɔ mma loawo ndu ɔɣa ɔbɔrɛ si makɔlɛ mabo i ndu ame si maɣa makɛlɛ ɔkpokpo.
44027044	Mma ɔɖuɖu lokuti ana ne, mabie kukolo gu ara wa iso maasɛ mabo ɔkpokpo. Iki nnɛgbe ɔso ne, bo ɔɖuɖu ɔwo ɔkpokpo ɔbo sɔ kuwɛ̃ iikpi.
44028001	Gɔ boso i ɔkpokpo ne, botsue sɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ marɔ sɔ Malta ne.
44028002	Karɔ̃ gamɔ iso maturi ɔnyɔ bo nnya mafɔ bo kukaakɔ. Ɔyu pia fiɛ kado ana to ɔpɛ, ne ɔso mapia ɔtɔ i ɔpo kanya sɔ si boawa.
44028003	Gɔ Paulo ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbodza kudzirikpai sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃asu ɔpia i ɔtɔ ame ne, aɣɛ lalaa ɔbɔrɛ amini wũ kɔrɔ̃ ala ɔtɔwiri ɔso.
44028004	Gɔ karɔ̃ gamɔ iso maturi ɔnya ne, maɣɛ sɔ, “Turiɖoese ɔɖe ngbe gbaã! Atoa sɔ ɔtere ndu iwã ne, Ɣaa iibatã wũ ɔsɛ ngbã.”
44028005	Ɣɛɛ Paulo ɔkpa aɣɛ ɔsisi so i kɔrɔ̃ ɔpia i ɔtɔ ame, aibara wũ kuira.
44028006	Karɔ̃ gamɔ maturi ɔbu sɔ Paulo aaɣe ɣee ɔ̃abɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃ ɔkpi. Ɣɛɛ gɔ ifɔ ɔwi fiɛ kuira iibara wũ ne, mafinikira ma adzuni sɔ kuɣɔ bowũ ɔɖe.
44028007	Nkpɛkɔ̃ miwɛ̃ pia i ngbegɔ boba boaso gɔ miɖe karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔkpakpa gɔ marɔ Publio mire. Ɔkpakpa gɔgbe ɔfɔ bo ku isoɣɔ, ɔnyɔ bo iso akpɛnɛ atɛ ɔɖuɖu.
44028008	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Publio ɔse to ɔnyɛ. Ɔ̃ iso ɔbe ɔtɔ fiɛ ɔto ɔfedza kayiri ana. Gɔ Paulo ɔkɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔkparama kayi ɔtã wũ ɔsu nrɔɔ̃ ɔsia wũ iso ne, ɔsarɛ ɔluwɛ̃.
44028009	Gɔ manɔ ɔ̃ isosarɛ nɛgbe ne, manyɛse ma mpia i karɔ̃ gamɔ ɔɖuɖu iso ɔba Paulo kɔrɛ, ne ɔsa ma ne.
44028010	Ara wagbe ɔso ne, matã bo karatã gbodzoo fiɛ gɔ ɔwi ɔɣo sɔ boarui i mmɔ ne, masu ara wa ɔɖuɖu boala i ɔri matã bo.
44028011	Bowe i mmɔ awa atɛ fiɛ borui. Bo irui ame ne, bosɛ i ɔkolo gɔ marɔ sɔ Inyɔ Aɣɔ gɔ lobɔrɛ i Aleksandria fiɛ ɔya i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso ku ɔyu ɔwi.
44028012	Gɔ bota i mmɔ ne, ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ bosɛ boatui nɖe Sirakusa. Bowe i mmɔ ana ayi atɛ.
44028013	Gɔ borui i mmɔ ne, bosɛ boabo Regio. Ne kaɖesɛ̃a ne, ɔwiri sɛɛ ɔfuri ɔbɔrɛ i bo kama gɔ lobuai bo fiɛ ɔsu bo ɔsɛ ɔ̃ɔbo Puteoli ku iyi nyɔare iso.
44028014	Mmɔ iɖe bosɛ boanya mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ fiɛ matã iti sɔ bowe i ma kɔrɛ ayi akɔdzɛ ne. Gɔ bota i ngbe kama ne, bosɛ boabo Roma.
44028015	Gɔ manyii ma mpia i Roma ana ɔnɔ sɔ bosɛ i ɔri boto boba ne, ma mawɛ̃ ɔba masarɛgu bo i Apia Kuɣa ame. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔba maatu bo i ngbegɔ marɔ Mafɔ Kubokɔ̃ Kutɛ. Gɔ Paulo ɔnya ma ne, ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba fiɛ ɔna katere ana ɔbua.
44028016	Gɔ bosɛ boabo Roma ne, maɖi Paulo ɔri sɔ ɔsɛgu so i ngbegɔ ɔɖɔɛ. Matã sɔ kpakpɛ̃dze ɔwɛ̃ si ɔla ɔ̃ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ.
44028017	Ayi atɛ kama ne, Paulo ɔkpere ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmɔ ɔsirakanya. Gɔ masarɛ ne, ɔɣere ma sɔ, “Manyii, mamɔɛ̃ me i Yerusalem masu matã ma Romase abã sɔ maɣɛgu me atɔ̃me atoa sɔ loiɣɛrɛ bo maturi ɣee bo mawa kubarara kukuwɛ̃.
44028018	Ma Romase ɔɣɛgu me atɔ̃me fiɛ mabie sɔ si manyua me. Alasɔ mainya nnɛ iso maaya fiɛ maaɖoe me lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma Yudase matɔ̃ɖedze ma lomɔɛ̃ me ɔbie.
44028019	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ma Yudase ɔta maya ne iso ɔso ne, itã sɔ loɣere ma sɔ loasu wũ itɔ̃me lokɛlɛgu Igarakpakpa Kaisaro katɔ̃. Iiɖe sɔ lobie sɔ loaɖaɛ wũ aɖe maturi kanya.
44028020	Nnɛgbe ɔso lokpere mi si botsue so loɖegu mi ika ne. Ngɔ i Israel kaɖe to manyɔ ɔri ne, ɔ̃ ɔso fiɛ mapia me kugbagɔrɔĩ mito minya me ngbɔ ne.”
44028021	Ne maɣere wũ sɔ, “Bo ne, boinɔ kuira i fɔ iso. Boifɔ ɔko kuwɛ̃ ɣee kanya nyanyarĩa i fɔ iso ibɔrɛ i manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Yudea kɔrɛ.
44028022	Ɣɛɛ bobie sɔ boanɔ ira bosegu i fɔ kafɔkaɖe iso. Alasɔ gbaã ne, maito maɣɛ ira sɛɛ i ikuri nɛgbe iso i kukakɔi.”
44028023	Gɔ masɛ iyi ne, maturi gbodzoo ɔba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Mmɔ ka ɔɣere ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me. Ɔkɔ ma adzuni ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ i Mose gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ ara masɛ i Yesu iso. Ɔɖe ma ika ita i kaya isɛ iabo kutsuɛ.
44028024	Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ɔfɔ wũ maɖe, ɣɛɛ ma mawɛ̃ ana iifɔ wũ maɖe.
44028025	Kakpadzɛ̃ ɔbo i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ matsɛ irui gɔ Paulo ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me tsɔra wagbe sɔ, “Gbagbaã iɖe i Siwarã Bielea ɔki i Yesaya iso siɣere bo mawa sɔ,
44028026	‘Kɛlɛ aaɣere ma Yudase sɔ, “Mianɔ ɣɛɛ miibanɔ karɔ̃, mito mianya ɣɛɛ miibanya miɖi ite.”
44028027	Alasɔ mmagbe situ ɔsɛ̃, fiɛ ma atsue ana ba ɔle, fiɛ mama anɔmi ana. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, tee ma anɔmi aanya ara, fiɛ ma atsue ana aanɔ, fiɛ ma situ ana aanɔ ara karɔ̃ iyɔ maɔfiniki maba wũ kɔrɛ fiɛ mme, Ɣaa, loasa ma.’ ”
44028028	-
44028029	Ne Paulo ɔtsɔra ma ɔɣere sɔ, “Mitsue sɔ, itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔɖi ala maturi ne, maɔsu ne makɛlɛgu mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Ma ne, mato maafɔ ne!”
44028030	Paulo ɔwe i mmɔ akɔ anyɔ i iyo nɛ ɔfɔ ɔto ɔtã kuso ame ɔla ɔ̃ɔfɔ maturi ma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maba ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
44028031	Ɔɣere ma Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me ku katetere, ɔte ma ara i Yesu Kristo iso, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iitɛ̃ wũ ɔri.
45001001	Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo ɔsande gu katɔ̃mesɛdze gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi sɔ lopɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ne, mme lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe ne.
45001002	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ i Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze iso ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔte ne, matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame.
45001003	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔse i Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo iso. Maɣe wũ lɛ ɔturi awune awe i David ɔɣekparɛ ame.
45001004	Iki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi wũ ɔte maturi ku ɔle gɔ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame.
45001005	Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ iso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo nnya ɔsu bo ɔbara katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔtã Kristo sɔ boatã abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi afɔ wũ maɖe, matsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.
45001006	Mi wũ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi mi ɔbua i mma nɖe Yesu Kristo mare iso.
45001007	Nnɛgbe ɔso nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Roma alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ mi fiɛ ɔkpere mi sɔ miakpese ɔ̃ mare. Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
45001008	Lobie sɔ loaki i Yesu Kristo iso lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba i mi ɔɖuɖu kanya alasɔ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔnɔ kumɛgɔ mifɔ Kristo miɖe.
45001009	Ɣaa gɔ karabara nto lobara ku wũ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu iki ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ne, ɔɣe sɔ loisɛ loɣara mi ku ɔwi kuwɛ̃ si loto lokparama kayi. Ɣaa ɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ nnɛ loto loɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
45001010	Ɔwi biara nto lokparama kayi ne, nsɛ lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ si iɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔtã me ɔri sɔ loaba loanya mi.
45001011	Anɔ ɔrɛtɛ me gbaã sɔ loaba loanya mi fiɛ loabuai mi i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ame sɔ miana ɔle i siwarã ame.
45001012	Nto lobie teteree sɔ loapia mi ɔle i mi kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ mi wũ miapia me ɔle iyɔ bo aka wã anyɔɔ aaɖe ibuai botã so.
45001013	Wũ manyii, miɣe sɔ loɔbara adzuni ɔwi gbodzoo ame sɔ si loba mi kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ ara awɛ̃ ɔtɛ̃ me ɔri. Lobie sɔ loabuai maturi i mi ndɛ̃ makpese Kristo mare lɛ kumɛgɔ loɔbara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃.
45001014	Karabara gagbe nɖe kuso gɔ loto maturi ɔɖuɖu, mma anɔ lobusi gu mapoamese, manɔgbadze gu madzimifɔ ne.
45001015	Nnɛgbe ɔso i wũ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ gbaã sɔ loaɣere mi ma mpia i Roma ana Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ne.
45001016	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe iisɛ ikpɛ̃ me kunuarɛ alasɔ ne nɖe Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nsɛ ɔtã ɔturi biara gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ɔna ngbã ne. Ma Yudase tɔtɔ gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana.
45001017	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe sɛ iɖi ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ ite. Ɔri sɛɛ gɔgbe ɔɖe ika ɔsegu i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me iso ita i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃. Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ to ɔ̃asɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame.”
45001018	Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ sikpã kayi ɔbɔrɛgu i kato i ara wa lota aɣɛ wũ iso gu ɔtile ara wa nto atɛ̃ maturi ɔri sɔ maibatsue Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe.
45001019	Sikpã to wũ alasɔ maturi ɔɔnya Ɣaa kurabarara gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔbara sekelee. Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɖi ɔte ma kukaakɔ.
45001020	Alasɔ ita i ɔwi gɔ ɔbara kayi ne, ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ nna katui gu ɔ̃ Ɣaa iɖe ɔɔɖi so ite i ara wa ɔɖuɖu ɔbara ɔpia i kayiiso ame. Ne ɔso ɔturi awune iisibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃ifɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe.
45001021	Alasɔ atoa sɔ maturi ɣe Ɣaa ne, maisɛ mata wũ kuwarɛ gɔ lokotegu wũ lɛ Ɣaa, fiɛ maisɛ mapɛ wũ siba ana. Ɣɛɛ masɛ makɔlɛ so kato i ma adzuni ame mabara adzimira, idududu si ma iso.
45001022	Masɛ manyɔ so sɔ makpa anɔ ɣɛɛ makpesera so madzimifɔ.
45001023	Masɛ̃ sɔ maibasumu Ɣaa gɔ mpia ngbã ɔwi biara, mapia male ara mama wa loakpi. Masu ara lɛ maturi, ɣee kurodzai, ɣee mabɔi, ɣee ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ i karɔ̃ lɛ maɣɛ masu makpesera aɣɔ matã so.
45001024	Ne ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã sɔ mabara ɔnɔle ara wa loatã sɔ maapukutura so. Masɛ mabara anuarɛra i ma ndɛ̃.
45001025	Manyuarã Ɣaa Itɔ̃me Bielea ku sila ire fiɛ mato masɔrɛ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ikote sɔ mafɛ̃ ara matã alasɔ ɔ̃ i ile gu ibu ɔkote itã ɔwi ɖaa. Si iba ngbɔ!
45001026	Ara wagbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua maturi ɔtã sɔ mabara ara wa loakpɛ̃ ma kunuarɛ. Itã sɔ ma marɔ̃go to marɛgu so lɛ marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go awe.
45001027	Ngbɔ ame ana i marɛrɛ̃ ana ɔnyua marɔ̃go masɛ mato mabara anuarɛra marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa lɛ ɔrã gu ɔre awe ne. Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loba ma iso ɔkotegu ma ngbã nyanyarĩa.
45001028	Gɔ masɛ̃ sɔ maibasuã ara wa maɣe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã ɔtile ɔbo i ma adzuni ame. Masɛ mabara ara wa loikote sɔ maabara.
45001029	Ɔtile ara wa masɛ mabara ɔɔfɔ ma ima. Wã awɛ̃ nɖe, wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, silalaa, ma anɔ sɛ arɛtɛ i maturi ara iso, ituriɖoe, kulu, mila gu manyii ndɛ̃ inina. Masɛ matsiri maturi, maɣɛ maturi iso ara.
45001030	Masɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara nyanyarĩa. Maɖe maturi ma loisɛ maɖɔɛ Ɣaa. Masɛ matia ma manyii, maɖi ma malaa matã, makɔlɛ so kato, manyɔnyɔ siri ɣɛtɛ dzɛ iso maaki maabara ara nyanyarĩa. Maisɛ mawarɛ ma maɣese.
45001031	Maɖe maturi ma loiɣe ikpaki i isɛɛ gu ilalaa ndɛ̃. Maisɛ mamɔɛ̃ ma mɔmɔ itɔ̃me nɛ maɣɛ mala. Kuira iisɛ iɖo ma kayiri, fiɛ maisɛ manyɔ ɔturi nnya.
45001032	Maɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtã bo mmara sɔ mma nsi ngbã mɛgbe igbã ne, ɔto ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue, ɣɛɛ ne, maɣɛ teteree i ara nyanyarĩa wagbe ame. Iiɖe sɔ nnɛgbe kere, ɣɛɛ masɛ mawarɛ mma nsɛ mabara wã ana.
45002001	Ne ɔso fɔ gɔ fɔ nto aɣɛgu ɔturi atɔ̃me fiɛ ato atã wũ ipɔ ne, aisibawo so kanya ɔɖi. I ɔri biara gɔ iso atã fɔ ɔlaa ipɔ ne, tsue sɔ fɔ mɔmɔ fɔ wũ aɖe ipɔ. Alasɔ ara wa ɔto ɔbara ne, wã ame igbã tutuutu fɔ̃ wũ ato abara ne.
45002002	Bo ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã mba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe atɔ̃me.
45002003	Si fɔ lɛ ɔturi awune gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara wagbe igbã to atã maturi mama ipɔ ne, afɔ aɖe sɔ aawo Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛgu ɔtere?
45002004	Ɛɛbɛrɛ afɔ aɖe sɔ siefe kere iɖe i Ɣaa to ɔnyɔ bo nnya fiɛ ɔɣɔra so ɔtã bo? Mitsue sɔ Ɣaa to ɔbara bo kayiribielea gagbe alasɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abuai bo sɔ boafiniki i bo situ ame.
45002005	Gɔ mi atsue ba ɔle fiɛ misɛ̃ sɔ miibafiniki i situ ame ɔso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue gbaã ku iyi nɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me i ɔ̃ ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
45002006	Fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso i ɔ̃ kurabarara gɔ ɔbara iso.
45002007	Mma lopia kubɛ i ara sɛɛ ibara ame fiɛ masiai ikpawaĩ i ngbã mɛgbe ame ne, ngbã mɛ nto miba ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
45002008	Ɣɛɛ maturi ma nsɛ mabie ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ ire fiɛ masɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe fiɛ masiai ngbã nyanyarĩa ne, Ɣaa sikpã to siaba ma iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue gbaã.
45002009	Mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mabara ara lalaa ne, mato maana inyɛwe fiɛ maibana iwarã kuiwɛ̃. Ma Yudase loaɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ fiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase asiai.
45002010	Ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara sɛɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma kuwarɛ, ɔtara ma anɔ kato ku isobuɛ. Ma Yudase loaɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ ara wagbe iyɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔsiai.
45002011	Alasɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ i atɔ̃me iɣɛ ame.
45002012	Mma ɔɖuɖu lobara ikpi fiɛ maiɣe Mose mmara ne, mato maawɔ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iibasu mmara ɔɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me. Mma mpia i Mose mmara kayirinɔ ne, si mabara ikpi ne, mmara mɛmɔ iso i Ɣaa aaɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me.
45002013	Alasɔ iiɖe mma nto manɔ nnɛ i mmara to miɣɛ nɖe maturi sɛɛ i Ɣaa anɔ. Ɣɛɛ mma nto mabara i nnɛ miɣɛ iso nɖe maturi sɛɛ.
45002014	Gbaã ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, maiɣe Mose mmara. Ɣɛɛ si i ma situ ame matsue ara wa mite ne, iyɔ ma kurabarara ɔɔte sɔ maba mmara i ma situ ame atoa sɔ mainɔ mmara mɛgbe iso itɔ̃me manɔ.
45002015	Nnɛgbe to ite sɔ Ɣaa ɔsu ara wa mpia i Mose mmara ame ɔpia i ma situ ame. Fiɛ ma situ ana ɔte ma sɔ gbaã ne, ngbɔ iɖe alasɔ ma kaɣere sɛ katã ma ipɔ si mabara ikpi fiɛ kasɛ katã ma ibɛ si mabara isɛɛ ana.
45002016	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔte sɔ iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã Yesu Kristo ɔɣɛgu maturi atɔ̃me i ara wa mabara mawɛrɛ i ma adzuni ɔɖuɖu ame iso.
45002017	Fiɛ fɔ gɔ fɔ nsɛ aɣɛ sɔ ɔ Yudase aɖe ne, asu so asia i Mose mmara iso fiɛ asɛ akɔlɛ so kato sɔ Ɣaa ɔre aɖe.
45002018	Asɛ aɣɛ ana sɔ aɣe ara wa loabo Ɣaa anɔ, aɣe ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa alasɔ asuã ara sɛɛ i ara wa matsɛrɛ masɛ ame.
45002019	Afɔ so aɖe sɔ aɖe manɔbiɛdze kɔdze fiɛ aɖe ɔkaniɛ atã mma mpia i idududu ame.
45002020	Asɛ aɣɛ sɔ asɛ aka madzimifɔ fiɛ asɛ ate mabiɛtɛ ara. Afɔ aɖe gbaã sɔ Ɣaa mmara ame ne, fɔ inɔgba ɔyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
45002021	Ɣɛɛ fɔ gɔ fɔ nsɛ ate maturi mama ara ne, aisɛ ate so ara wamɔ? Asɛ aɣere maturi Ɣaa Itɔ̃me sɔ madaayu kayu, ɣɛɛ fɔ mɔmɔ ato ayu kayu?
45002022	Asɛ aɣere maturi sɔ madaabara asɔrɔ̃ra ɣɛɛ fɔ asɛ aɖe asɔrɔ̃? Asɛ ata aya i aɣɔ kasumu iso gbaã, ɣɛɛ asɛ ayu ara i aɣɔ ayo?
45002023	Asɛ akɔlɛ so kato sɔ aɣe Ɣaa mmara, ɣɛɛ ato apia Ɣaa kunuarɛ alasɔ aisɛ abara i ɔ̃ mmara iso.
45002024	I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, “Mi ma Yudase nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa ɔso ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɛ marɔ Ɣaa iyere lalaa.”
45002025	Si asɛ abara i mmara iso ne, iyɔ fɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu ɖe ira nɛ mba kusia. Ɣɛɛ si aisɛ abara i me iso ne, iyɔ fɔ sirɛrɛ̃ itu na karɔ̃.
45002026	Si ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase fiɛ ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ɔbara i mmara iso ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ wũ lɛ ngɔ lotu sirɛrɛ̃.
45002027	Ngɔ lobara i mmara iso ɣɛɛ ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã-ɔ ipɔ sɔ fɔ gɔ matã mmara fiɛ atu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, aibara i me iso.
45002028	Iiɖe siturina iso boanya ɔ Yudase mɔmɔ. Sirɛrɛ̃ itu mɔmɔ ne, iiɖe sosina ame karabara ga i maturi aanyɔ kere iɖe.
45002029	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔte i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame sɔ ɔɔsu ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔtã Ɣaa. Iiɖe siturina dzɛ matu i mmara kanya iɖe lonya, ɣɛɛ nnɛ mabara i Ɣaa Siwarã ame. Iiɖe kuwɛ̃ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ ɔturi iyere kato ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔbara.
45003001	Si ise ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mme kusia i ɔ Yudase gɔ lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ba ɔɖo mma loiɖe ma Yudase?
45003002	I siri gbodzoo iso ne, kusia titiiti pia alasɔ ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ kaɖikate sekelea ga matsɛrɛ masɛ ɔpia.
45003003	Ɣɛɛ si iba sɔ ma mawɛ̃ iifɔ maɖe ne, iatã sɔ Ɣaa iibabara i ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso?
45003004	Ooɣo! Si ɔturi biara ɖe ladze kɔra ne, tsue sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso. Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ira biara ɔte sɔ fɔ kanya ame atɔ̃me ne, atɔ̃me gbaã aɖe. Fiɛ aaɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu ibɛ si maɣɛgu-ɔ atɔ̃me.”
45003005	Si bo nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa sɛ miɖi mite sɔ Ɣaa ɔkpɛ ɔya ne, boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa ɔbara ikpi si ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue? Kuɣɛme ne, ilɛ si boɣɛ ngbɔ?
45003006	Ooɣo! Si Ɣaa iise bɔlɔlɔ ne, be iso ɔ̃aya fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me?
45003007	Maturi mawɛ̃ sɛ makarɛ sɔ, “Si wũ sila ila sɛ iɖi Ɣaa ɔnukuare ite sekelee itã sɔ maale wũ ne, be ɔso fiɛ mato makpere me kpibaradze?”
45003008	Si ise ngbɔ ne, be ɔso boibakɛlɛ i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi sɔ si isɛɛ aabɔrɛ i ne ame? Mawɛ̃ to mala sila sɔ ngbɔ boto bote ne. Loito lote ngbɔ ne ɔso mma nto maɣɛ ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma ipɔ.
45003009	Kiniɔ ne, be boaɣɛ i bo ma Yudase iso? Boba kayakpa sɛɛ boɖo mma loiɖe ma Yudase? Ooɣo! Alasɔ loɔɖi lote koko sɔ ikpi ɔɖe ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu iso.
45003010	Alasɔ ngbɔ matsɛrɛ i ngɔi miwɛ̃ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iise bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ. Ooɣo, kuwɛ̃ na!
45003011	Ɔturi kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔto ɔnya ira sɛɛ ɔɖi ite. Kuwɛ̃ ana na gɔ ɔto ɔnyɔnyɔ Ɣaa ɔri.”
45003012	Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔkora kama matã Ɣaa fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɣɛrɛ. Kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔto ɔbara isɛɛ, kuwɛ̃ kere!”
45003013	Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ma nnya se lɛ ikpibiɔ nɛ lowarɛ ise. Ma sinyagɛmi ɔta siɣɛ ala mila ɔso. Fiɛ maɣɛ kabiɛtɛ pia ma i kanya.”
45003014	Maɣɛ ana sɔ, “Sigbarĩ dzɛ loaɖoe maturi ɔyi ma i kanya.”
45003015	Matsɛrɛ i kakɔi mama sɔ, “Ma ngba sɛ mita malamala i ituriɖoe iso.
45003016	Situ ibiɛ gu inyɛwe masɛ manyua masɛ i kakɔi biara.
45003017	Maiɣe kuira i isobuɛ ngbã iso.”
45003018	Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ma nsɛgbai ana ɔte sɔ mana Ɣaa kunigã.”
45003019	Kiniɔ ne, boɣe sɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu maɣɛ masɛ i Mose mmara ɔko ame ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi ma mpia i mmara kayirinɔ sɔ kayiiso ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibaɖe Ɣaa ibɛ. Alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me.
45003020	Ne ɔso ne, mmara isiai iibabara kuwɛ̃ bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa katɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ ne, misɛ mitã maturi ɔtsue sɔ makpibaradze maɖe.
45003021	Ɣɛɛ ɔri gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ɔ̃ iso i maturi aki fiɛ maase bɔlɔlɔ ne, iiɖe mmara iso ibara. Mmara mɔmɔ gu kanyamaɖidze ɔɖi ara wagbe mate sekelee.
45003022	Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã maturi ɔse bɔlɔlɔ si mafɔ Kristo maɖe. Fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia ikpaki i ma ndɛ̃.
45003023	Maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔbara ikpi. Ne ɔso maikote sɔ maabore mabo ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ.
45003024	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔki i Kristo Yesu iso ɔtã kuso i bo iti. Ɔbara bo sɔ boase bɔlɔlɔ ala ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso.
45003025	Ɣaa ɔsu Yesu ɔtã ala bo ikpi iti. Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ɔso ne, maturi ɔna kasukatsɛ si mafɔ Kristo maɖe. Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe ɔte bo sɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ara ɔɖuɖu i sibɔlɔlɔ ɔri iso. Ɔna ɔtu ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame gɔ ɔ̃ikpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue gɔ bobara ikpi.
45003026	Ɔbara ngbɔ si ɔsu ɔte, sɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ira biara i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Yesu maɖe bɔlɔlɔ.
45003027	Be iso boawo ɔya ɔtui kɔrɔ̃ i kagbegbe sɔ ne bobara fiɛ bona iɖi? Kuira na! Alasɔ ɔturi iisɛ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i mmara iso ibara ame ɣɛɛ kafɔkaɖe ame.
45003028	Alasɔ boɣe kukaakɔ sɔ kafɔkaɖe kotoo ame i ɔturi aase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ fiɛ iiɖe mmara iso ibara ame.
45003029	Ɛɛbɛrɛ Ɣaa ne, ma Yudase kere ɔre ɔɖe? Mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne, iiɖe ma Ɣaa ɔɖe? Aĩ, ma wũ ma ɔre ɔɖe.
45003030	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔɖe ɔso ne, ɔ̃ gɔ ame loabara ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki kafɔkaɖe ame ne, ɔ̃ ame loabara mma loiɖe ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki kafɔkaɖe ame ame ne.
45003031	Nnɛgbe karɔ̃ ɣɛɛ? Ito ite sɔ boɔnyua mmara bosɛ i kuruɛ sɔ kafɔkaɖe si ka fɔ me kanya? Ooɣo! Ɣɛɛ ara wa i mmara ɔte boledza isɛra.
45004001	Be nɖe nnɛ boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ bo ɔwa tɛtɛ Abraham ɔnya i Itɔ̃me nɛgbe iso?
45004002	Si sɔ kurabarara iso iki fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnya Abraham sɔ ɔbɔlɔlɔ ne, iyɔ ɔba nnɛ iso ɔ̃aya ɔ̃aɖe ndamu. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ibawo ndamu ɔɖe i Ɣaa anɔ alasɔ iiɖe ɔ̃ kurabarara kuɖe ɔnyɔ.
45004003	Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
45004004	Ngɔ lobara karabara iisɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuso lɛ ira tsɛa, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuso lɛ ira nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ karabara kusia.
45004005	Ɣɛɛ mma losu so masia i kafɔkaɖe iso fiɛ iiɖe ma kurabarara iso, mafɔ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ɔturi bɔlɔlɔ maɖe ne, ma i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ mase bɔlɔlɔ ne.
45004006	Igara David ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔturi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iiɖe ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso ne, ɔ̃awe isoɣɔ gbaã. David ɔɣɛ sɔ,
45004007	“So aaɣɔ mma ikpi i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtsɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ibakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
45004008	So aɣɔ ngɔ ikpi i Bosate ɔkpa ara ɔfu.”
45004009	Isoɣɔ nɛ iso Itɔ̃me i David to ɔɣɛ ngbe ne, mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ire kere iɖe? Ooɣo! Mma ɔɖuɖu loitu sirɛrɛ̃ ana ire iɖe alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
45004010	Mme ɔwi iɖe i Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ? Ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃itu sirɛrɛ̃ ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃ɔtu? Iiɖe ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃ɔtu sirɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atu.
45004011	Sirɛrɛ̃ itu kubarara gɔ i Abraham ɔbara ne, ikparĩ kere iɖe nɛ lote sɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ. Alasɔ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe lotã sɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃atu sirɛrɛ̃. Iki kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔkpese mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔse. Ɣaa ɔki i Abraham iso ɔfɔ ma ɔɖuɖu sɔ mase bɔlɔlɔ atoa sɔ maitu sirɛrɛ̃.
45004012	Abraham ɖe ɔse ɔtã mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ ana. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe gɔ matu sirɛrɛ̃ ɔso, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ ngbã i kafɔkaɖe ame lɛ ma ɔse Abraham awe tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃atu sirɛrɛ̃.
45004013	Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham gu ɔ̃ mawa tɛtɛ sɔ maaɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ara. Iiɖe kumɛgɔ i Abraham gu ɔ̃ mawa ɔsiai Mmara kama ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu mɛgbe. Ɣɛɛ ɔkã ndamu mɛgbe alasɔ ɔfɔ Abraham sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔso.
45004014	Si kayiiso ara iɖe ndamu mɛ i Ɣaa ɔkã ne mma lobara i mmara iso mire kere miɖe ne, iyɔ kafɔkaɖe ɖe siefe. Fiɛ iyɔ Ɣaa ndamu na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
45004015	Alasɔ mmara sɛ miɖi Ɣaa sikpã mite bo, fiɛ si mina ne, me ita iya iso ana iisɛ iwe.
45004016	Ne ɔso ndamu mɛgbe ne, kafɔkaɖe kama miɣɛ. Alasɔ iiɖe mma i Ɣaa ɔtã mmara ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Abraham mawa. Ɣɛɛ mma losiai ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe kama ana. Alasɔ Abraham nɖe mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔse.
45004017	Alasɔ ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loɔsu-ɔ lobara abuiti gbodzoo ɔse.” Ne ɔso ndamu mɛgbe ɔya i Ɣaa anɔ. Ɣaa gɔ i Abraham ɔfɔ ɔɖe ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔtara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã ame, ɔkpere ara wa nna i kayi koko ɔbɔ kayi ne.
45004018	Ɔwi gɔ i ɔriinyɔ na kɔra ne, Abraham ɔya i kafɔkaɖe ame teteree. Ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃akpese abuiti gbodzoo ɔse lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Fɔ ɔɣekparɛ to ɔ̃asi gbodzoo lɛ awãmi.”
45004019	Abraham ɔɔfɔ lɛ akɔ kulafa, ɣɛɛ ne, nrɔɔ̃ ifɛfɛ̃ wũ i kafɔkaɖe ame atoa sɔ ɔnya sɔ ka ɔɣɛ i ikpibiɔ ɔkpokpo fiɛ Sara ana ɔɔfe ɔbi ɔɣewi.
45004020	Ara wagbe iifɛfɛ̃ wũ nrɔɔ̃ i kafɔkaɖe ame ɣɛɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ Ɣaa ndamu ɔla teteree fiɛ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ana ɔwe ɔle kabua ɔsu ile ɔtã Ɣaa.
45004021	Ɔtsue sekelee sɔ Ɣaa ba ɔle gɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
45004022	Iki i kafɔkaɖe gagbe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
45004023	Fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã iso matsɛrɛ ara wagbe masɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔnya wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
45004024	Ɣɛɛ ise i bo ma ana i Ɣaa aanya sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ iki i kumɛgɔ bofɔ wũ boɖe sɔ ɔtara Bosate Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔso.
45004025	Ɣaa ɔtã maɖi Kristo matã ala bo ikpi ɔso. Fiɛ ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ si ɔ̃abara bo bose bɔlɔlɔ.
45005001	Kiniɔ gɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara bo bɔlɔlɔ iki i bo kafɔkaɖe iso ne, isobuɛ ka ipia i bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso.
45005002	Gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe ɔso ne, itã sɔ bona Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ame bopia kiniɔ. So ɔɣɔ bo gbaã alasɔ boba ɔriinyɔ sɔ boasɛgu Kristo i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛ lokpa waĩ ame.
45005003	Fiɛ ana ne, so sɛ siɣɔ bo si bopia i imɔrɛ̃ ame alasɔ boɣe sɔ imɔrɛ̃ nɛgbe igbã sɛ itã boya teteree.
45005004	Fiɛ bo iya teteree ne, isɛ itã sɔ boana iwola sɛɛ nɛ loatã sɔ boana ɔriinyɔ.
45005005	Fiɛ ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe iibatã sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ bo. Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ Siwarã Bielea dzɛ ɔfedza ɔfere bo iso ɔtã sɔ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔyi bo situ ame ɔɖuɖu.
45005006	Ɔwi gɔ bona ibarara ne, Kristo ɔba ɔ̃akpi i makpibaradze iti. Iba ngbɔ ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ame.
45005007	Isɛ iwe ɔle sɔ ɔturi aakpi i ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ kanya. Ɣɛɛ iawo ɔɖe sɔ ɔrere aana ɔtu sɔ ɔ̃akpi i ɔturi sɛɛ iti.
45005008	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte bo kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ bo. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i bo akpi ame ne, ɔtã sɔ Kristo ɔkpi i bo iti.
45005009	Si iki i ɔ̃ kukpi iso fiɛ ɔbara bo maturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ ne, iyɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa sikpã siare ame ana!
45005010	Si Ɣaa ɔfere bo gu wũ kanya ndu iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kukpi iso ku ɔwi gɔ boɖe ɔ̃ matsirise ne, kiniɔ gɔ i bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃anyɔ bo nnya gbodzoo sɔ boana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro iki i Kristo iso.
45005011	Fiɛ iiɖe nnɛgbe kere, ɣɛɛ so ɔɣɔ bo gbaã alasɔ Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso ɔfere bo gu wũ kanya ndu.
45005012	Ikpi ɔki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso iba i kayiiso fiɛ ikpi nɛmɔ lobɔ kukpi ne. Fiɛ kukpi pia kutã ɔturi biara alasɔ ɔbiara ɔbara ikpi.
45005013	Ikpi ka ipia i kayiiso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã bo Mose mmara. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i mmara na ne, Ɣaa ɔkpa anɔ ɔfu i maturi akpi iso.
45005014	Ita i Adam ɔwi isɛ iabo Mose ɔwi ne, kukpi ɔɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu iso. Mma loibara atsuele ikpi nɛ igbã i Adam ɔbara ana ɔkpi. Fiɛ Adam gɔgbe ɣɛ ɔtã ɔturi gɔ nto ɔ̃aba.
45005015	Ɣɛɛ ne, ma inyɔɔ iiɖe mawɛ̃. Alasɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ɔbɔ iiɖe ira nɛ i Adam ikpi ɔbara igbã. Adam ɖe ɔturi gɔ ikpi ibara lotã maturi gbodzoo ɔkpi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã iɖi nnyainyɔ gbodzoo nɛ loaki i Yesu iso ikɔ maturi gbodzoo ibɔ ala ɔ̃ kayiribielea ɔso.
45005016	Lobie sɔ loɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ iise lɛ ikpi nɛ i ɔturi ɔbara. Alasɔ ikpi nɛmɔ ɔbɔ ipɔ. Ɣɛɛ akpi gbodzoo wamɔ kama ne, Yesu nnyainyɔ ɔbara maturi ɔkpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa.
45005017	Iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ kukpi ɔɖe maturi iso ala ɔ̃ ikpi ɔso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lobɔrɛ i Yesu Kristo kukpi ame ɔmɔ iɣede. Mma ɔɖuɖu lona Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, ɔbara ma bɔlɔlɔ sɔ maabo i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame maɖegu wũ sigara iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Kristo iso.
45005018	Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ikpi ibara ɔso i maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe ipɔ ne, ngbɔ ame iki i ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ ibara iso ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu ibɛ ne.
45005019	Kumɛgɔ ame iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ atsuele ɔso fiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔkpese makpibaradze ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa aaki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ lokã Ɣaa atsue iso ɔtã sɔ maturi gbodzoo aakpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa ne.
45005020	Gɔ mmara ɔba ne, itã sɔ maturi ɔnya ma akpi gbodzoo maɖi ite. Fiɛ si bonya bo akpi gbodzoo wa bobara ne, ne boanya Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔsu ɔtã bo ana boɖi ite ne.
45005021	Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ i ikpi ɔtã kukpi ɔɖe maturi iso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ aatã sɔ boakpese maturi bɔlɔlɔa fiɛ boabo i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ iki i bosate Yesu Kristo iso ne.
45006001	Ne ɔso be boaɣɛ? Boakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi sɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ si isi ibua?
45006002	Ooɣo! Gɔ boɔkpi ɔso ne, ikpi siina ɔle i bo iso! Ne ɔso be ɔso fiɛ boala boɔbara ikpi?
45006003	Ɔwi gɔ mabara bo Ɣaa itupie iki i Yesu Kristo ame ne, miitsue sɔ Ɣaa itupie ɔbara bo gu Kristo mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ana ame?
45006004	Iki i itupie nɛmɔ ame ne, ite sɔ bo wũ boɔkpi fiɛ mabiara bo gu wũ. Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔle iso ɔtara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ si bo wũ boata boba boasɛgu wũ i ngbã ɣɛtɛ ame.
45006005	Fiɛ gɔ bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ boabaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ita ame ana.
45006006	Boɣe sɔ bo ngbã kuere ne, mapɛ me ku Kristo mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ne ɔso nsɛgbai mɛ nsɛ miɖɔɛ ikpi ibara iisibana ɔle i bo siturina iso sɔ boabara ikpi alasɔ boisiɖe ikpi masande.
45006007	Alasɔ si ɔturi ɔɔkpi ne, ikpi siina ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.
45006008	Ne ɔso si bo gu Kristo ɔkpi ne, bofɔ boɖe sɔ boasɛgu wũ ngbã.
45006009	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame fiɛ ɔ̃isibakpi ala kukpi siina ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.
45006010	Kristo kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ne, ɔkpi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ sɔ si ikpi iisibaɖe wũ iso. Ngbã mɛ ka ɔsi kiniɔ ne, ɔsi ɔtã Ɣaa.
45006011	Ngbɔ ame ikote sɔ mi wũ mianyɔ so sɔ miɔkpi ne ɔso ikpi iisibaɖe mi iso ne. Ngbã mɛ misi kiniɔ ne, miasɛ mitã Ɣaa i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame.
45006012	Midaatã sɔ ikpi aaɖe mi sosina dzɛ nto siakpi ngbe iso sɔ mianyua so mitã ara wa nsɛ awe sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃.
45006013	Midaatã ɔri sɔ ikpi aaɖe mi sosina iso i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso sɔ miabara ara lalaa. Ɣɛɛ misu so mitã Ɣaa lɛ mma ɔ̃ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔbɔ ngbã ame. Minyua so i ɔri biara iso mitã wũ lɛ karabara abarara wa nse sekelee fiɛ ɔ̃asu ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara.
45006014	Ikpi siina ɔle i mi iso alasɔ mina i mmara kayirinɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa nnyainyɔ kayirinɔ mipia.
45006015	Be ka boaɣɛ? Sɔ bosiina i mmara kayirinɔ ne Ɣaa nnyainyɔ kayirinɔ bopia ɔso ne, boakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ bobara ikpi? Ooɣo!
45006016	Miiɣe gbaã sɔ si anɔ so karɔ̃ sɔ aasu so apia i ɔturi kayirinɔ ala ɔɔbara ɔ̃ karabara ne, iyɔ ɔkpesera so ngɔmɔ ɔsande? Ne ɔso midaakpesera so makpibaradze nɛ loakɔ ɔturi ikɛlɛgu kukpi ame. Misu so mikpesera ara sɛɛ mabaradze nɛ loakɔ ɔturi ikɛlɛgu ibɔlɔlɔ karabara ame.
45006017	Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba alasɔ ɔwi ɔwɛ̃ ame ne, miɖe makpibaradze. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, miɔsu mi situ ɔɖuɖu mifɔ itɔ̃me nɛ lote mi miɖe.
45006018	Miɔbɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ miɔsu so mitã sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara.
45006019	Lobie sɔ loɣere mi i ɔturi kuɣɛme si mianɔ karɔ̃ pɔkɔsɔɔ sɔ ne, ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, minyua so pelepele mitã ikpi ibara nɛ lopukutura mi. Kiniɔ ne, ngbɔ ame si misu so mitã pelepele i ara bɔlɔlɔa ibara nɛ loabara mi sekelee itã ara sɛɛ ibara ne.
45006020	Ɔwi gɔ miɖe makpibaradze ne, sibɔlɔlɔ iiɖe mi iso.
45006021	Mme kusia mina i ara wa mila miɔbara wa nto akpɛ̃ mi kunuarɛ kiniɔ ame? Ara wamɔ ɔɖuɖu kusia nɖe kukpi ne.
45006022	Kiniɔ ne, miɔbɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame, ne ɔso miɔna iwarã. Misu so mibara Ɣaa masande. Alasɔ kusia gɔ miana miɖi si misu so mitã wũ pelepele fiɛ mibara so sekelee nɖe ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro minya.
45006023	Alasɔ ikpi kusia nɖe kukpi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, iatã bo ngbã mɛ loibaro minya iki Kristo Yesu gɔ nɖe Bokɔse iso.
45007001	Gbaã ne, manyii, mianɔ ara wa nto loɣɛ ngbe karɔ̃ alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe mmara iso ara. Mmara ba ɔle i ɔturi iso ayi kumɛgɔ ɔsi ngbã.
45007002	Nto losu nnɛgbe lote sɔ, ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nsi i kurã iyo ne, kuyiri mmara ɔnyi wũ mimatã i ɔrã iso ayi kumɛgɔ i ɔrɛrɛ̃ si ngbã. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi ne, iyɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ siina i mmara kayirinɔ.
45007003	Ne ɔso si ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔsɛ ɔ̃ayiri ɔrɛrɛ̃ mama ku ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔra si ngbã ne, maakpere wũ sɔ rãrɔdze ɔɖe. Ɣɛɛ si ɔ̃ ɔrã ɔɔkpi ne, iyɔ ɔsiina i mmara kayirinɔ. Ka ɔba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ayiri kurã mama gɔ ɔ̃isiɖe rãrɔdze.
45007004	Wũ manyii, ngbɔ ame ise mi ana ne. Alasɔ i mmara kanya ne, ite sɔ mikpi ku ɔwi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi. Ne ɔso mikpesera so mma i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ bo nsɛgbai ka miaɖe ira sɛɛ mitã Ɣaa.
45007005	Ɔwi gɔ bosɛ ngbã i siturina kanya ne, ikpi ɔwe ɔle i bo ame. Mmara ɔtara ara wagbe miɣedza sɔ bo siturina ɔrakolo ɔtã bobara akpi wa loakɔ bo akɛlɛgu kukpi ame.
45007006	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, gɔ boɔkpi bobɔrɛ i ara wa lonyi bo mmɔ ame ne, mmara siina ɔle i bo iso. Alasɔ boisisɛ bobara kuira i ɔri kuere iso, ɣɛɛ ɔri ɣɛtɛ gɔ iso i Ɣaa Siwarã pia boto bobara karabara.
45007007	Si ise ngbɔ ne, boaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa mmara nɖe ikpi? Ooɣo! Gbaã ne, mmara iso iki fiɛ botsue ara wa nɖe ikpi. Si mmara si midaaɣɛ sɔ, “Daatã fɔ anɔ si arɛtɛ-ɔ i ɔturi ira iso” ne, tee loibatsue nnɛ nɖe kanɔbɛbɛ.
45007008	Ɣɛɛ ne, ikpi ɔba iana ɔri iki mmara iso itã sɔ kanɔbɛbɛ agbãagbã ɔna ɔle i wũ ame. Si mmara na ne, ikpi na ɔle.
45007009	Mme wũ losɛ ngbã mɛgbe igbã ɔwi gɔ lofe gɔ loiɣe mmara. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ lotsue mmara fiɛ miitã me ɔri sɔ loabara ara gbodzoo ne, ikpi ibara ana ɔta iya i wũ ame.
45007010	Ne ɔso mmara mɛ loatã me ngbã fiɛ ne, mibɔ me kukpi bowũ.
45007011	Ikpi ɔna ɔri iki i mmara iso isɔsɔla me iɖoe.
45007012	Ne ɔso mmara mɔmɔ se sekelee, ara wa mite ana se sekelee, ise bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ ilɛ ana.
45007013	Ne iyɔ ɔte ito sɔ ira nɛ nsɛ ibɔ ira sɛɛ ɔbɔ me kukpi? Ooɣo! Iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ikpi losu ira sɛɛ ikpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ me. Iba ngbɔ si ite kumɛgɔ i ikpi ɔnyanyarĩ. Fiɛ iki i mmara iso ne, ikpi ɔɔɖi ne nsɛgbai mɔmɔ ite.
45007014	Boɣe sɔ mmara ne, Siwarã ame ira iɖe. Ɣɛɛ mme ne, sosina ame ɔturi loɖe fiɛ ikpi ɔɖe me iso.
45007015	Loisɛ lonɔ ara wa nsɛ lobara karɔ̃. Alasɔ ara wa nsɛ lobie sɔ loabara ne, iiɖe wã aɖe nsɛ lobara. Ɣɛɛ ara wa loisɛ loɖɔɛ ne, wã nsɛ lobara ne.
45007016	Fiɛ si ara wa loisɛ loɖɔɛ nsɛ lobara ne, iɔte sɔ lonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ mmara lɛ.
45007017	Ne ɔso ne, iɔte sɔ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ me nsɛ lobara ara wamɔ ɣɛɛ ikpi nɛ mpia i wũ ame nsɛ ibara.
45007018	Loɣe sɔ i wũ ame ne, ira sɛɛ kuiwɛ̃ na ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe ɔturi awune. Alasɔ losɛ lobie gbaã sɔ tee loabara isɛɛ fiɛ, ɣɛɛ loisɛ lowo ɔbara.
45007019	Alasɔ isɛɛ nɛ loto lobie sɔ loabara ne, iiɖe ne nsɛ lobara. Ɣɛɛ ikpi nɛ loito lobie sɔ lobara ne, ne iɖe losɛ lobara ne.
45007020	Ne ɔso si loto lobara ara wa loito lobie ne, iyɔ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ me nto lobara. Ɣɛɛ ne, ikpi nɛ mpia i wũ ame iɖe.
45007021	Ne ɔso lonya ira ɔ nɛgbe loɖi ite i wũ ame sɔ, si loto lobie sɔ lobara isɛɛ ne, ikpi ɔmatã me iso teteree.
45007022	Gbaã iɖe sɔ i wũ ɔtu ame tee ne, Ɣaa mmara sɛ mitã me isoɣɔ gbaã.
45007023	Ɣɛɛ lonya sɔ ara mama wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i wũ ame sɛ akpɛ̃gu ara wa i wũ adzuni ɔte me sɔ alɛ fiɛ. Ne ɔso atã sɔ ikpi ɔnyi me lɛ yorɛdze awe.
45007024	Wũ ara ba nnya gbaã. Nna loaɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kuere gɔ nto me ikɔ isɛgu kukpi ame?
45007025	Lopɛ Ɣaa siba alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso ɔɖi me! Kiniɔ ne, i wũ adzuni ame ne, loɖe Ɣaa mmara iso baradze. Ɣɛɛ i wũ sosina kurabarara kanya ne, loɖe kpibaradze.
45008001	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ipɔ kuiwɛ̃ siina itã mma lobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu i ma kasɛ ame.
45008002	Alasɔ iki i Kristo Yesu iso ne, mmara mɛ nsɛ miki i Ɣaa Siwarã ame mitã maturi ngbã ɔtã sɔ loɔbɔrɛ i mmara mɛ loakɔ mɛ misɛgu ikpi ame.
45008003	Alasɔ ira nɛ i Ɣaa mmara mɛ ɔsu ɔtã Mose fiɛ boiwo ɔbara ana maturi iiwo me ɔɖe iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔbara ne. Ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi lɛ ɔturi gɔ mba sosina dzɛ ikpi ɔkpɛ̃gu. Ɔba ɔ̃atã kuso i bo iti, ɔtã ikpi ipɔ ɔle gɔ iba i bo iso ɔnina.
45008004	Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe ɔtã bo ma nsi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖɔɛ, iiɖe kumɛgɔ i siturina sɛ siɖɔɛ awe. Ɔbara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ mmara ɔte awe.
45008005	Mma nsɛ masɛ i ma sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kanya ne, ma adzuni sia i ara wa i ma sosina sɛ siɖɔɛ iso. Ɣɛɛ mma nsi iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso ne, ma adzuni sia i ara wa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ si ɖɔɛ iso.
45008006	Ɔturi gɔ adzuni nsia i sosina ara iso ne, kukpi ɔsɛ ɔna. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ adzuni nsia i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ne, ɔsɛ ɔna ngbã gu isobuɛ.
45008007	Ngɔ adzuni nsia i sosina ara kere iso ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe alasɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔkã Ɣaa mmara atsue. Fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔ̃ibawo me iso ɔbara ana kuiyikuiyi.
45008008	Mma nsɛ mabara ma sosina kuɖɔɛ ne, maibawo Ɣaa anɔ ɔbo.
45008009	Si Ɣaa Siwarã ɔyi i mi ame ne, miibasɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi sosina nsɛgbai ɔte kanya, ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖɔɛ. Fiɛ si Kristo Siwarã na i ɔrere ame ne, ɔ̃iɖe Kristo ɔre.
45008010	Kiniɔ gɔ i Kristo pia i mi ame ne, mi siturina to siakpi ala ikpi ɔso. Ɣɛɛ mi Siwarã to siawe ngbã alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara mi bɔlɔlɔ.
45008011	Fiɛ si Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ lotara Yesu sibɔrɛgu i makpise ame pia i mi ame ne, ɔ̃ gɔ lotara Kristo Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame to ɔ̃atã mi siturina dzɛ loakpi ngbã iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ mpia i mi ame ɔso.
45008012	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, boito sosina kuso sɔ boasɛ bobara sosina kuɖɔɛ.
45008013	Si misiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ nyanyarĩa kama ne, mito miakpi. Ɣɛɛ si miki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso miɖoe mi sosina ngbã kuere lalaa ne, mito miana ngbã.
45008014	Alasɔ mma i Ɣaa Siwarã to sikɔ ne, ma nɖe Ɣaa mabi ne.
45008015	Ɣaa iitã mi Siwarã dzɛ loatã sɔ miakpese masande mila miɔnigã. Ɣɛɛ ndzɛ loatã mikpese ɔ̃ mabi. Iki i Siwarã dzɛmɔ iso ne, bosɛ bokpere Ɣaa sɔ, “Abba” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Tete.
45008016	Ɣaa Siwarã gu bo siwarã ɔbara mawɛ̃ mato mate sɔ Ɣaa mabi boɖe.
45008017	Gɔ ɔ̃ mabi boɖe ɔso ne, bo loaɖe ɔ̃ ara ana. Bo gu Kristo loatoto boɖe Ɣaa ara. Fiɛ boafiɛ ana lɛ ɔ̃ si bowe inyɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔwe inyɛ.
45008018	I wũ itsue kanya ne, inyɛwe nɛ boba kiniɔ ne, iibawo ɔkategu Ɣaa ikpawaĩ gu isoɣɔ nɛ boana.
45008019	Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu to kunyɔ ɔri totoroo kutã ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ mabi ɔte.
45008020	Ɣaa kurabarara gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbo i inyɛwe ame gɔ iiɖe kɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ɔso. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ lotã ɔri sɔ iba ngbɔ si ɔ̃atã ma ɔriinyɔ sɔ,
45008021	ɔto ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ara wamɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔɖi i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame fiɛ aana iwarã afiɛ lɛ ɔ̃ mabi awe.
45008022	Boɣe sɔ ipɛ i kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu to kutɔrɛ̃ lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kuɣe.
45008023	Fiɛ iiɖe ara wamɔ kere, ta bo ma i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã ana to botɔrɛ̃ i bo ame bosu bo ɔriinyɔ bosia sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã bo ikpi iti kuso sɔ si boana iwarã lɛ ɔ̃ mabi.
45008024	Gɔ boba ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe ɔso ne, boba iɖi. Ɣɛɛ ɔriinyɔ nɛ boto bonya ala anɔ ne, iisiɖe ɔriinyɔ. Alasɔ ɔturi iisisɛ ɔnyɔ ira nɛ ɔto ɔnya ɔri.
45008025	Ɣɛɛ si bo anɔ sia i ara wa i bo anɔ iito anya iso ne, iyɔ boana ɔtu bonyɔ ɔri sɔ isɛ i ɔri.
45008026	I ɔri gɔgbe ame iso i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibuai bo alasɔ bona ɔle fiɛ boiɣe kumɛgɔ boakparama kayi bokigu. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ Siwarã mɔmɔ sɛ si tɔrɛ̃ i bo ati kumɛgɔ ikote fiɛ boibawo ɔɖi ɔte.
45008027	Ɣaa gɔ nɣe maturi situ ame ne, ɔɣe ira nɛ mpia i Ɣaa Siwarã adzuni ame ana. Alasɔ Siwarã sɛ sitã Ɣaa iti i bo iti lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖɔɛ.
45008028	Boɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, ilɛ itã maturi ma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ fiɛ ɔkpere ma sɔ mabara ɔ̃ karabara.
45008029	Fiɛ mma i Ɣaa ɣe ɔsɛ ne, ɔsia ma ikparĩ nɛ loatã sɔ maare ɔ̃ Ɔbi sɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi aaɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃ i manyiibi gbodzoo ndɛ̃.
45008030	Ne ɔso mma i Ɣaa ɔsia ikparĩ ne, ma iɖe ɔkpere ne. Mma ɔkpere ne, ɔbara ma bɔlɔlɔ. Fiɛ mma ɔbara bɔlɔlɔ ne, ma ati ɔtara kato ne.
45008031	Nwagbe ɔso ne, be iɖe boaɣɛ? Si Ɣaa ɣɛ bo i kama ne, nna loawo bo ɔkpɛ̃gu?
45008032	Si Ɣaa iisɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔtã i bo iti ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔ̃ibasu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔtã bo i kayiribielea ame ala ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔso?
45008033	Nna loawo Ɣaa maturi kanya ɔɖaɛ? Ɣaa mɔmɔ nɖe ma kanyaɖidze fiɛ ɔ̃inyagu ma ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
45008034	Nna ɔɖe loawo ma ipɔ ɔtã? Kristo Yesu nɖe ngɔ lokpi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔledza wũ itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ame, ɔpia ngbã fiɛ ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso ɔto ɔpɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ i bo iti.
45008035	Nna ɔɖe loawo bo gu Kristo kuɖɔɛ gɔ mpia bo i ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ? Inyɛwe, ɛɛbɛrɛ ibo inɔ, ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔnyɛ, ɛɛbɛrɛ ita iya iso, kukã ɛɛbɛrɛ isɔ̃ isɛ, ɛɛbɛrɛ itikpi, ɛɛbɛrɛ kukpi iki i ipɛmi iso?
45008036	Ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Fɔ ɔso ne, bopia i kukpi ifɔ̃ ame iyi biara. Masɛ mabara bo lɛ masɛrɛ ma masɛgu kaɖoekɔ̃.”
45008037	I nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ame ne, boɖo mma loɖe iso iki i Kristo gɔ loɖɔɛ bo ɔso.
45008038	-
45008039	Alasɔ ikpa me sekelee sɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ mpia i bo gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ iki i Kristo Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate iso ne, kuira iibawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ. Kukpi o-o, ngbã o-o, Ɣaa makpabo o-o, siwarã lalaa o-o, ɔwi nyanyarĩa gɔ loaba o-o, ɔle ɔrere i kato o-o, karɔ̃ o-o ne, kuira na nɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara sɔ iawo bo ndɛ̃ ɔɖaɛ.
45009001	Ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe Kristo ɔre ne, ɔnukuare loto loɣɛ, fiɛ loito lola sila. Siwarã Bielea ana to siɖe wũ ɔtu iso fiɛ loibala sila.
45009002	Lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ isoma pia i wũ ɔtu ame gbaã.
45009003	Alasɔ loto lobie sɔ loabuai wũ aɖe maturi. Si Ɣaa aanɔ karɔ̃ ne, ɔbɛse me i Kristo iso ɔfinikira wũ iɖi ɔtã wũ maturi si mme lowɔ pelepele.
45009004	Alasɔ Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi maɖe. Ɔsu ma ɔbara ɔ̃ mabi, fiɛ ɔɖi ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔte ma. Ma iɖe ɔnyigu kanya fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ mmara ana ɔtã. Ma iɖe i Ɣaa ɔte kumɛgɔ maafɛ̃ ara matã wũ fiɛ ma iɖe ɔtã ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ ana.
45009005	Ma mawa nɖe Israel makpakpa ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi fiɛ ma ɔɣekparɛ ame i Kristo gɔ loba kayiiso lɛ ɔturi awe ɔbɔrɛ. Boale Ɣaa gɔ nto ɔɖe ara ɔɖuɖu iso ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ dzoroo. Si iba ngbɔ.
45009006	Iise lɛ sɔ Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne, ɔ̃ibara i kã iso. Alasɔ iiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu nɖe maturi ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi lɛ ɔ̃ mare.
45009007	Ite sɔ iiɖe Abraham mawa ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa mabi. Ɣaa ɔɣere Abraham sɔ, “Isak iso loaka-ɔ mawa.”
45009008	Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ iiɖe Abraham mabi ɔɖuɖu ma ɔɣe nɖe Ɣaa mabi. Ɣɛɛ mabi ma maɣe iki i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ame ne, ma ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ lɛ Abraham mabi mɔmɔ ne.
45009009	Itɔ̃me nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i kaɣɛkasɛ ame nɖe sɔ, “Loakpese loba ku ikɔlɛaba ɔwi gɔgbe ame fiɛ Sara aaɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ.”
45009010	Fiɛ iiɖe nnɛgbe kere. Ɣɛɛ Rebeka ɔɣe inyɔmabi gɔ maɖe mabirɛrɛĩ mabɔrɛ i ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe bo ɔwa Isak ame.
45009011	-
45009012	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ba ɔri gɔ iso ɔsɛ ɔki ɔsɛ ɔɖi maturi. Fiɛ kumɛgɔ iba i ne ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ira ɔsɛ fiɛ maɣe inyɔmabi magbe kɔra fiɛ maatsue isɛɛ gu ikpi. Ɔri gɔ iso ɔki ɔɖi ma iiki ma karabara kukawɛ̃ iso. Alasɔ ɔɣere Rebeka sɔ, “Ɔbi kpakpare to ɔ̃akpese kosore ɔɖabo.”
45009013	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Yakob loɖi, fiɛ Esau losɛ̃.”
45009014	Iyɔ be boaɣɛ i nnɛgbe iso iyɔ? Boaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa iibara ara i ɔri iso? Ooɣo! Iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe.
45009015	Ala ɔɣere Mose sɔ, “Ngɔ loanyɔ nnya ne, loanyɔ wũ nnya. Fiɛ ngɔ ara loaɖo me kayiri ne, ɔ̃ ara aaɖo me kayiri.”
45009016	Ne ɔso Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ne, iiɖe ɔturi karabara ɣee ɔ̃ kubɛ iso isɛ iki ɣɛɛ ise i Ɣaa mɔmɔ nnyainyɔ iso.
45009017	I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere igara Farao sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso losɛra-ɔ sigara sɔ si loaɖi wũ ɔle lote maturi i fɔ iso fiɛ maale wũ iyere teteree i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne.”
45009018	Ne ɔso Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ngɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ nnya fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔgbã atsue ana i mma mba atsuele iso.
45009019	Mi ɔwɛ̃ to ɔ̃akarɛ me sɔ, “Si ise ngbɔ ne, lɛ ise ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa aakpese ɔtã ɔturi ipɔ? Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔta ɔya i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ iso.”
45009020	Fɔ nɖe nna fiɛ aaɖegu Ɣaa ika ngbɔ? Ibui sɛ ikarɛ pɔse gɔ lopɔ ne sɔ, “Be ɔso fiɛ apɔ me ngbɔ?”
45009021	Ne kama ne, pɔse ba ɔri ɔ̃asu sipɔse ɔbara ira biara nɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɔ̃awo abui anyɔ ɔpɔ ɔɖi i sise siwɛ̃ saã ame sɔ maasu ibui iwɛ̃ mabara ndu nɛa ire itsɔra ana masu mabara irubui.
45009022	Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔbara ne. Ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ sikpã ɔte sɔ maatsue ɔ̃ ɔle. Ɣɛɛ ɔɣara so ɔtã mma mpia i ɔ̃ sikpã kayirinɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃awɔra ma aaɣo.
45009023	Ngbɔ ame ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖi ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ wa mpia i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu isoɣɔ siare ame ɔte mma ɔ̃anyɔ nnya ne. Fiɛ bo nɖe mma ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã sɔ boaba boafiɛ.
45009024	Ne ɔso ɔɖi bo iiɖe ma Yudase kere, ɣɛɛ ta mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne.
45009025	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i kanyaɖidze Hosea ɔko ame sɔ, “Mma loiɖe wũ maturi ne, loakpere ma wũ mare. Fiɛ mma loiɖe wũ maɖɔɛse ne, loakpere ma sɔ wũ maɖɔɛse.
45009026	Ngbegɔ ame loɣɛ sɔ, Miiɖe wũ mare ne, mmɔ ame i maturi aakpere ma sɔ Ɣaa gɔ nna karokɔ̃ mabi ne.”
45009027	Ɣaa Kanyaɖidze Yesaya ɔ̃ wũ ɔɣere ma Yudase ku sikpabo teteree sɔ, “Si ma Yudase ɔsi lɛ ɔpo ame iwarĩ kɔra ne, ma ndɛ̃ irɛ̃saã kere loana iɖi.
45009028	Alasɔ Bosate to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me mala ɔro.”
45009029	Ito iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesaya ɔɣɛ ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ, “Si Bosate Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate iikuti bo mabi gu mawa kɛkɛĩ ne, boto boawɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Sodom gu Gomora Simagɛ̃ ɔwɔ awe!”
45009030	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, be boaɣɛ? Mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maito makpɛ̃ sɔ maase bɔlɔlɔ ne, maba maakpese maturi ma nse bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ gɔ mafɔ wũ maɖe ɔso.
45009031	Ɣɛɛ ma Yudase ma nsiai mmara iso ibara kama teteree sɔ maase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ ne, maiwo ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
45009032	Be ɔso fiɛ maiwo? Alasɔ maiki i kafɔkaɖe iso sɔ kaabara ma bɔlɔlɔ ɣɛɛ maki i ma kurabarara iso.
45009033	Alasɔ matura i Kristo gɔ nse lɛ ita siare nɛ nse i ma ɔri iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Minyɔ! Losɛ ita iwɛ̃ i Sion nɛ loatã maturi ɔtura. Maatura i ne iso marɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya ɖa.”
45010001	Wũ manyii, iɖe kuɖɔɛ gɔ lobɔrɛ i wũ ɔtu ame gu wũ kayi ikparama sɔ ma Yudase aana iɖi.
45010002	Loawo ma kanya ɔɣɛ sɔ ma anɔ ɔrɛtɛ̃ i Ɣaa kasumu iso gbaã. Ɣɛɛ ma anɔ irɛtɛ isia i ɔri gɔ lokote iso.
45010003	Alasɔ maiɣe ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔki ɔbara ɔturi bɔlɔlɔ i ɔ̃ anɔ. Ɣɛɛ ma mɔmɔ masɛ mabie ma ɔri matã so. Alasɔ maito mabie sɔ maabɔ so karɔ̃ matã Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃ate ma ɔri gɔ iso maaki fiɛ maase bɔlɔlɔ.
45010004	Alasɔ Kristo nɖe Mose mmara ɔɖuɖu kawirikɔ̃. Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Kristo ɔɖe ne, ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ.
45010005	Mose ɔtsɛrɛ i ɔturi biara gɔ loase bɔlɔlɔ iki i mmara iso sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loabara i mmara mɛgbe iso ne, mmara aatã wũ ngbã.”
45010006	Ɣɛɛ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ i ngɔ loase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ iki i kafɔkaɖe iso sɔ, “Daakarɛ so sɔ, ‘Nna loakɛlɛ kato?’ ” Ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, nna loaya ɔkɛlɛ kato ɔ̃akɔ Kristo ɔbɔ?
45010007	“Daakarɛ so sɔ, ‘Nna loakɛlɛ karɔ̃ ame?’ ” Ne karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ nna loakɛlɛ makpise aɖe ɔ̃atara Kristo ɔbɔ?
45010008	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ ɔte nɖe sɔ, “Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ɔbore imatã- ɔ, ipia i fɔ kanya gu fɔ ɔtu ame.” Fiɛ ne nɖe kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me nɛ imomo boto bopɛ ne.
45010009	Si abusi fɔ kanya aɣɛ sɔ Yesu nɖe Bosate fiɛ afɔ aɖe i fɔ ɔtu ame sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã-ɔ ngbã.
45010010	Alasɔ fɔ ɔtu ame iɖe aafɔ aɖe fiɛ aase bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ, ɣɛɛ fɔ kanya aasu abusi fɔ kafɔkaɖe ate fiɛ aana iɖi.
45010011	Alasɔ ngbɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya.”
45010012	Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃. Bosate nɖe bo ɔɖuɖu ɔse fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ masiai wũ isɛɛ.
45010013	Lɛ kumɛgɔ ipia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loakpere Bosate iyere aana iɖi.”
45010014	Fiɛ ngɔ maifɔ maɖe ne, nda maabara fiɛ maakarɛ wũ ira? Fiɛ ngɔ iso Itɔ̃me maiɣere ma manya ne, nda maabara maafɔ wũ maɖe? Fiɛ si kuwɛ̃ iipɛ imomo ɔtã ma i ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, nda maanɔ maɣɛ?
45010015	Fiɛ si maipia ma katɔ̃me sɔ maɣɛ ne, nda maaɣɛ ne maɣɛ? Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Mma nsɛgu itɔ̃me sɛɛ ngba to milɛ ɔnyɔ ala ma itɔ̃me ba ɔmɛrɛ̃.”
45010016	Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe. Alasɔ Yesaya ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate, mabe lofɔ bo itɔ̃me maɖe?”
45010017	Ne ɔso ne, kafɔkaɖe sɛ kaya i itɔ̃me nɛ anɔ iso. Fiɛ itɔ̃me inɔ ɔse i Kristo itɔ̃me iɣɛ iso.
45010018	Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ lobie sɔ loakarɛ nɖe sɔ, ma Yudase ne, ɔnɔ mainɔ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me? Manɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Manɔ ma kulu i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ ma Itɔ̃me ɔki ikã kayiiso.”
45010019	Lobie sɔ loaledza ikarɛ sɔ mainɔ karɔ̃? Mose mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔtsɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me kanya iɖi fiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, Ɣaa sɔ, “Loatã sɔ mi anɔ aarɛtɛ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase iso. Fiɛ loasu mma anɔ loibusi lopia mi sikpã.”
45010020	Fiɛ Yesaya ana ɔwe ɔtu ɔɣere ma sekelee sɔ Ɣaa sɔ, “Maturi ma loinyɔnyɔ me ne, ma lonya me ne, Fiɛ loɖi so lote mma loikarɛ wũ iti.”
45010021	Ɣɛɛ ma Yudase iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lowarɛ wũ nrɔɔ̃ losɔ̃ ma ikpɛnɛ ɔɖuɖu sɔ si lofɔ ma. Ɣɛɛ maɖi me atsue, alasɔ maɖe maturi ma mba atsuele fiɛ mata maɣɛ me iso.”
45011001	Lobie sɔ lokarɛ kiniɔ sɔ, Ɣaa ne, ɔsɛ̃ ɔsɛ̃ ɔ̃ maturi? Ooɣo. Alasɔ mme wũ ne, ɔ Yudase gɔ nɖe Abraham ɔwa fiɛ lobɔrɛ i Benyamin ɔɣekparɛ ame loɖe.
45011002	Ɣaa iisɛ̃ ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɣe ɔsɛ koko. Miɣe ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ɔwi gɔ i kanyaɖidze Eliya ɔtã Ɣaa iti i ma Yudase iso ɔɣɛ sɔ,
45011003	“Bosate, maɔɖoe fɔ kanyamaɖidze mabiɛbiɛ fɔ isɔrɛkusege ɔɖuɖu. Wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ me loɔkuti fiɛ mato mabie sɔ maaɖoe me!” Ne be i Ɣaa ɔɣere Eliya?
45011004	Ɔtã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Lokɔla maturi kukpi kukɔdzɛ lotã so gɔ maipɛ igɛgɛ̃ matã Baal kuɣɔ.”
45011005	Ngbɔ ame ise kiniɔ ne. Maturi kɛkɛĩ to maakuti gɔ Ɣaa aaɖi ma ɔsɛ i kuruɛ ɔtã so iki i ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso.
45011006	Ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ iso ɔki ɔɖi ma gɔ iiɖe ma kurabarara kukuwɛ̃ ɔso. Alasɔ si Ɣaa ɔɖi maturi ala ma kurabarara kanya ne, iyɔ ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ iiɖe igbaãre.
45011007	Gbaã ne, ira nɛ iso i ma Yudase ɔriinyɔ sia teteree ne, maina ne. Ɣɛɛ mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, ma lona ne. Fiɛ matsɔra ana ɔwe atsuele.
45011008	Ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa ɔnyua ma ɔtã sidzimi ɔmini ma situ gu adzuni ɔɖuɖu. iba iabo nɔme ne, maito makã atsue fiɛ maito manya fiɛ maatsue.”
45011009	Ne ɔso i igara David ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa si ɔtã sɔ ma ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃ si ikpese ma kagbaraĩ ga loapɛ ma. Si ma isɛɛ si ikɔ ma ipia i itikpi ame.
45011010	Ɔtã sɔ ma anɔ abiɛ sɔ maibanya kuira maɖi ite, si ɔtã sɔ ma inyɛwe aakpese ma ato masore ɔwi biara ame.”
45011011	Lokarɛ ana sɔ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase ɔtura fiɛ marɔ̃ ne, marɔ̃ mayu pelepele sɔ maisibaledza ita? Ooɣo! Ɣɛɛ iki i ma iɣɛrɛ ɔso ne, iɖi ɔba itã mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ ɔ̃atã anɔ ɔrɛtɛ ma Yudase.
45011012	Ma Yudase ikpi ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ kayi ɔɖuɖu ɔna kusɛkusɛ. Si ikpi aatã kusɛkusɛ gɔgbe igbã ɔba kayiiso ne, iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i ma Yudase tsɔra aaba maakpese Ɣaa mare pelepele ne, ɔ̃ kusɛkusɛ to kuabua kusi gbaã!
45011013	Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, loto loɣere mi sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ loɖe mi katɔ̃mesɛdze ne, loana isoɣɔ kukaakɔ i wũ karabara iso.
45011014	Nto lonyɔ sɔ iaki nnɛgbe iso ne, wũ maturi anɔ arɛtɛ fiɛ ma mawɛ̃ ana ngbã.
45011015	Alasɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ma atsue ne, Ɣaa ɔfere ma gu kayiiso maturi kanya ndu. Ne ɔso be loaba ku ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaledza ma ifɔ? Ito iase lɛ kumɛgɔ i kpise ata ɔwe ngbã.
45011016	Alasɔ si boɖoboɖo kasɛi kawɛ̃ ga makpɛti mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa ɔsekele ne, iyɔ boɖoboɖo tsɔra ana ɔsekele. Fiɛ si kudziri siɖu ɔsekele ne, iyɔ kudziri gɔmɔ akpa ana ɔsekele.
45011017	Si mabɛse akutu kudziri ikpa iwɛ̃ i kɔ̃ iso fiɛ matu mi lɛ ipo ame kudziri ikpa kosoi manyi mamatãra sɔ si mianɛ akutu kudziri gɔmɔ ndu ne, mitsue sɔ akutu kudziri gɔmɔ siɖu ndu mito minɛ.
45011018	Ne ɔso midaakɔlɛ so kato mipia idzirikpa nɛ mabɛse i mmɔ. Alasɔ si mibara ngbɔ ne, mitsue sɔ iiɖe mi lomɔɛ̃ siɖu mito. Ɣɛɛ siɖu siɖe lomɔɛ̃ mi sito.
45011019	Miawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Adzirikpa wamɔ ɔbɛse sɔ si boamatã i ma kanya.”
45011020	Ise ngbɔ, ɣɛɛ mitsue sɔ ma idaafɔ iɖe lotã mabɛse. Mina kamatakɔ̃ ala mi kafɔkaɖe ɔso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛmɔ si idaatã sɔ miakɔlɛ so kato ɣɛɛ minigã bowũ.
45011021	Alasɔ si Ɣaa iimɔɛ̃ ma Yudase ma nɖe adzirikpa mɔmɔ ɔla fiɛ ɔbɛse ma ne, mibu sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aya ɔnyɔ mi kere?
45011022	Nnɛgbe ɔte bo Ɣaa kayiribielea gu kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me ba ɔle. Ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me ba ɔle i maturi ma lorɔ̃ kɔrɛ, fiɛ iɖe kayiribielea itã mi si miya i mi kafɔkaɖe gagbe iso teteree ɔwi ɔɖuɖu. Si miibara ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɛse mi ɔɖi i kudziri gɔmɔ iso.
45011023	Si ma Yudase ana ɔnyua ma idaafɔ iɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ma ana ɔba ɔ̃amatãra i kudziri gɔmɔ iso. Alasɔ Ɣaa ba ɔle sɔ ɔ̃akpesera idzirikpa ɔmatãra i kudziri iso imatã.
45011024	Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, mise lɛ ipo ame kudziri gɔ matu maba maamatãra i akutu kudziri iso. Ma Yudase ɣɛɛ ne, mase lɛ akutu kudziri gɔ mapia, ne ɔso ise pɔkɔsɔɔ itã Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃akpesegu kɔ̃ ikpa ɔmatãra i kɔ̃ iso.
45011025	Manyii, ara wɛrɛa wa lowɛrɛ ta makuere ɔwi fiɛ loito lobie sɔ miwe i idaatsue ame pelepele fiɛ miaba miatsɛ so kato ikɔlɛ nto loɣere mi ngbe. Ne nɖe sɔ, ma Yudase mawɛ̃ atsuele gɔ mabara ne, iibase ngbɔ ɔwi biara. Ɣɛɛ atsuele gɔmɔ to ɔ̃atui ku ɔwi gɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔɔsa mma ɔɖuɖu loiɖe ma Yudase kanya fiɛ maɔyi mma ɖoɖooɖo ɔto ɔbie.
45011026	Ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu to maana iɖi lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɖidze to ɔ̃abɔrɛ i Sion fiɛ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖi ɔtile ɔbɔrɛgu i Yakob mawa ame.
45011027	Loamɔɛ̃ kanya ga lonyi gu ma lola ku ɔwi gɔ loaɖi ma lobɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame.”
45011028	Ma Yudase ɖe Ɣaa matsirise alasɔ maifɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea maɖe. Ne ɔso ne, mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔna kayakpa. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ma ɔso ne, ɔto ɔɖɔɛ ma gu ma mawa kuerekuere.
45011029	Alasɔ si ɔɖi ɔturi ɔrere ɣee ɔbara wũ abualɛra arere ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔfinikira ɔ̃ adzuni i ngɔmɔ iso.
45011030	Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, kumɛgɔ miɣɛrɛ Ɣaa ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ mi nnya i ma Yudase atsuele ɔso ne,
45011031	ngbɔ ame ɔ̃anyɔ ma Yudase ma wũ nnya i ma atsuele ame ne.
45011032	Ɣaa ɔpia maturi ɔɖuɖu iyo ala ma atsuele ɔso sɔ si ɔ̃anyɔ ma ɔɖuɖu nnya.
45011033	Ɣaa ɔmɔ gbaã fiɛ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Gbaã ne, ɔ̃ inɔgba ame ɔwodoro kukaakɔ. Kuwɛ̃ iibatsue ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ɔkigu karɔ̃. Fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibanɔ siri dzɛ iso ɔsɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ ara ɔkigu.
45011034	Ngbɔ ame i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nna nɣe Bosate iti ame ɔwi gɔ lofe? Fiɛ nna nɣe ɔ̃ adzuni?”
45011035	“Nna lotã Ɣaa ira ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ Ɣaa to wũ kuso?”
45011036	Ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa are aɖe. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iso aki aba fiɛ ɔ̃ are aɖe. Mitã bokɔlɛ ɔ̃ iyere ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
45012001	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara bo kayiribielea ɔso ne, loto mi i kukpa sɔ misu so mitã Ɣaa lɛ ara wa masu masɔrɛ wũ, wa losekele fiɛ abo wũ anɔ i mi ngbã isɛ ame. Nnɛmɔ nɖe mi siwarã ame karabara ne.
45012002	Midaasɛ ngbã sɔ miabara mawɛ̃ ku kayiiso kurabarara. Ɣɛɛ mitã sɔ Ɣaa afinikira mi adzuni ɔɖuɖu si mikpese maturi ɣɛtɛ. Ne loatã sɔ mianya ara wa nsɛ apia Ɣaa isoɣɔ gu nwa miabara fiɛ miabo wũ anɔ fiɛ ayi pɔpɔɔpɔ ne.
45012003	Iki i karabara ga ɔtã me i ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔso ne, nto loɣere mi ɔɖuɖu sɔ midaakɔlɛ so kato miɖo kumɛgɔ mise. Ɣɛɛ ne, i mi adzuni ame ne mite sɔ mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã ɔbiara kɛkɛ si miasu so mikoteragu kafɔkaɖe ga miba kanya.
45012004	Kumɛgɔ i bo kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃ gɔ mba ngɔi gbodzoo mɛ loisɛ mibara karabara kawɛ̃ saã ne,
45012005	ngbɔ ame boɖe maturi gbodzoo i Kristo ame ɣɛɛ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔgɔgɔda so lɛ sosina siwɛ̃ dzɛ mma ngɔi gbodzoo ne.
45012006	Ne ɔso ne, mitã bosu Siwarã ame karatã agbãagbã wa i Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame ɔsu ɔtã bo bobara ala karabara. Si ɔturi karatã nɖe sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛ ne ku kafɔkaɖe ga ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔta wũ.
45012007	Si fɔ karatã nɖe maturi kasumu ne, pia kubɛ si asumu. Si ara ite ne, te ku fɔ iso ɔle ɔɖuɖu.
45012008	Si katetere ipia maturi ne, pia katetere. Si ara itã maturi ne, bara ne ku kayiri ɣɔa. Si maturi ikɔkɔ ne, su fɔ iwola ɔɖuɖu kɔ ma. Si nnyainyɔ ne, nyɔ nnya ku fɔ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu.
45012009	Miɖi mi kuɖɔɛ karabara mite maturi. Misɛ̃ ikpi si mimɔɛ̃ isɛɛ ibara mila.
45012010	Miɖɔɛ so ku ɔtu ɣɔa lɛ manyii fɔɖedze awe. Warɛ fɔ ɔlaa ɖo so.
45012011	Midaawe ndã ɣɛɛ mitã Siwarã Bielea si siyi mi ame pɔpɔɔpɔ i ɔ̃ karabara iso.
45012012	So si siɣɔ mi i mi ɔriinyɔ ame. Miya teteree i inyɛwe biara ame si mikparama kayi ɔwi biara iso.
45012013	Miɣɛ mi iso ara mitã Ɣaa maturi ma nna kuira, si miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mafɔ.
45012014	Mma nto makpɛ̃gu mi ne, mitã ma kusɛkusɛ. Mitã ma kusɛkusɛ, midaagbarĩ ma.
45012015	Mina isoɣɔ ku mma nto mana isoɣɔ si mibiɛ ku mma nto mabiɛ.
45012016	Minɔgu mi manyii ara karɔ̃. Midaakɔlɛ so kato, mibɔ so karɔ̃ misakanya ku mma loire kuira i maturi anɔ. Daanyɔ so sɔ alɛ aɖo matsɔra.
45012017	Midaabara ikpi miti kuso. Mibara ara wa loakɔlɛ mi anɔ kato i maturi ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃.
45012018	Si iabɔrɛ i mi kɔrɛ ne, miwe i isobuɛ ame ku maturi ɔɖuɖu.
45012019	Manyii, midaasu kuwɛ̃ ikpi mitã wũ kuso ɣɛɛ mitã Ɣaa ɔri si ɔɖi ɔ̃ sikpã ɔte i ngɔmɔ iso, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea me sɔ, “Mme nɖe ngɔ loakarɛ mi iti, mme nɖe ngɔ loati kuso.”
45012020	Ɣɛɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, maɣere bo sɔ, “Si kukã to fɔ tsirise ne, tã wũ araɖea si ɔɖe. Si ɔme to ɔkore wũ ne, tã wũ ndu ɔnɛ. Alasɔ si abara ngbɔ ne, ato asia inyɛdu ɔtɔ i ɔ̃ iti iso.”
45012021	Midaatã ikpi si iɖe mi iso, ɣɛɛ misu isɛ miɖe ikpi iso.
45013001	Ikote sɔ ɔturi biara aasu kuwarɛ ɔtã karɔ̃ iso matɔ̃ɖedze. Alasɔ matɔ̃ɖedze ma mpia kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ losɛra ma.
45013002	Si ɔrere ɔta ɔya ma iso ne, Ɣaa ira nɛ ɔsɛ iso iɖe ɔta ɔya. Fiɛ mma loabara ngbɔ ne, mato mabie atɔ̃me iɣɛgu matã so.
45013003	Maturi ma nsɛ mabara isɛɛ ne, maibanigã matɔ̃ɖedze, ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara lalaa loanigã. Si mito mibie sɔ miibanigã tɔ̃ɖedze ne, mibara ara wa loatã sɔ ɔ̃ale mi.
45013004	Alasɔ Ɣaa rabaradze ɔɖe sɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ loalɛ itã- ɔ. Ɣɛɛ si abara ikpi ne, iyɔ ikote sɔ aanigã wũ. Alasɔ iiɖe siefe kere iɖe matã wũ ɔle. Ɣaa ɔɖabo ɔɖe. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbiara ɔbara ara i ɔri gɔ lokote iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ matsuelese kutsue.
45013005	Ne ɔso mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã matɔ̃ɖedze. Iiɖe Ɣaa sikpã dzɛ loaba mi iso ɔso ɣɛɛ mi mɔmɔ kaɣere ɔso.
45013006	Nnɛgbe ana ɔso fiɛ misɛ mitã lampo mitã matɔ̃ɖedze alasɔ Ɣaa karabara mato mabara ne. Masu ma ɔwi ɔɖuɖu matã maturi ikɔkɔ.
45013007	Ne ɔso ne, mitã ɔbiara ɔ̃ kuso gɔ mito wũ. Si kaɖe toto masia ne, mitã, si lampo ɔɖe ana ne, ɔ̃ wũ mitã. Ngɔ lokote ɔtã iwarɛ ne, miwarɛ wũ. Ngɔ ile lokotegu ana ne, ɔ̃ wũ mile wũ.
45013008	Si mito ɔrere kuso ne, midaasɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã. Tã kɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ro. Ɣɛɛ kuso gɔ si mila mi malaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ kuso. Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ mba kuɖɔɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔlaa ne, ite sɔ ɔto ɔkã Ɣaa mmara atsue.
