45013009	Mmara mɛ matã bo sɔ, “Daabara asɔrɔ̃ra, daaɖoe ɔturi, daayu kayu, fɔ anɔ si adaarɛtɛ i ɔturi kuira iso,” ku mmara mama mɛ lobua i mmɛgbe iso ne, me ɔɖuɖu itera nɛ lobua me iso kere nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
45013010	Kuɖɔɛ iisɛ kubara kɔ̃ ɔlaa ikpi. Ne ɔso kuɖɔɛ nɖe ira nɛ iso matsue mmara ɔɖuɖu masia.
45013011	Mirɛgɛ̃! Si misɛ i ɔri gɔgbe iso alasɔ miɣe ɔwi gɔ ame bopia. Ɔwi gɔ ame i Ɣaa aaɖi bo ɔɔbore ɔmatã ɔɖo ɔwi gɔ ame boɖe katɔ̃ bofɔ Kristo boɖe.
45013012	Kasɛ̃ ɔɔfe karo, ɔɖesɛrã ɔɔɣo. Ne ɔso minyua idududu ame ara ɔbara, si minyi so akpadza lɛ mma mpia i ikpawaĩ ame.
45013013	Mimɔɛ̃ so mila kukaakɔ lɛ mma nsɛ i ikpawaĩ ame. Iiɖe ɔɖegbodzo, itarɛ̃ gu asɔrɔ̃ra gu amumuɣɔ gu iɣɛɣɛ so gu anɔ ikɛkɛ ame.
45013014	Ɣɛɛ misu Yesu Kristo mipia lɛ awu si mimɔɛ̃ adzuni miɖi i sosina ɔrakolo gu ara wa nna kusia iso.
45014001	Miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mi malaa ma loire siɖu i kafɔkaɖe ame. Midaawararãgu ma i ara wa i mi gu ma adzuni iibara awɛ̃ iso.
45014002	Ɔturi ɔmɔi kafɔkaɖe ɔtã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ira biara. Ɣɛɛ ɔmama gɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ngbɔ ne, araɖea wa ame maipia sina kere ɔsɛ ɔɖe.
45014003	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara ne, ɔdaanyɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyii gɔ nsɛ ɔrɛrɛ ara ala ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔso sɔ ɔ̃iyi. Ngɔ nsɛ ɔrɛrɛ ara ana si ɔdaanyɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara pupurii, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔfɔ wũ ɔ̃ wũ.
45014004	Nna lotã-ɔ ɔri sɔ aɣɛgu ɔturi mama ɔɖabo atɔ̃me? Ɔ̃ Ɣaa mɔmɔ loawo nyɔ si ɔɣɛ ɔtã wũ teteree ɣee ɔ̃iɣɛ. Fiɛ ɔɖabo gɔmɔ to ɔ̃aya alasɔ Bosate to ɔ̃awo tã sɔ ɔ̃aya teteree.
45014005	Ɔturi ɔmɔi sɛ ɔwarɛ iyi iwɛ̃ sɔ isekele iɖo imama. Ɔmɔi ana sɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔkote. Ira nɛ lonya iɖo nɖe sɔ ɔbiara aafɔ ɔɖe kukaakɔ i nnɛ ɔto ɔbara iso.
45014006	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔwarɛ iyi iwɛ̃ ne, Bosate ɔto ɔwarɛ ne ɔtã. Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe ira biara ana ne, Bosate ɔsɛ ɔwarɛ alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba i wã iti. Ngɔ loisɛ ɔɖe ara awɛ̃ ana ne, ɔsɛ̃ ara wagbe si ɔsu ɔwarɛ Bosate. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔsɛ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba.
45014007	Bo kuwɛ̃ iisi ngbã ɔtã so. Fiɛ bo kuwɛ̃ ana iibakpi ɔtã so.
45014008	Si bosi ngba ne, bosi botã Bosate. Si bokpi ana ne, bokpi botã Bosate. Ne ɔso ngbã bosi o-o, ɔkpi bokpi o-o ne, Bosate mare boɖe.
45014009	Nnɛgbe ana ɔso fiɛ Kristo ɔkpi fiɛ ɔledza ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame ɔpia ngbã sɔ si ɔ̃akpese Ɔkɔse i makpise gu magbanadze ɔɖuɖu iso ne.
45014010	Be ɔso fiɛ ato atã fɔ ɔnyii ipɔ? Ɣee be ɔso fiɛ ato awɔdza fɔ ɔnyii irɔĩ sɔ ɔ̃iyi? Bo ɔɖuɖu to boaya i Ɣaa sigaraiyara katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me.
45014011	Alasɔ matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Bosate sɔ, ‘Ayi kumɛgɔ losi ngbã ne, nto loɣere mi sɔ, ɔbiara to ɔ̃apɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔtã me Fiɛ ɔbiara to ɔ̃akɔlɛ wũ iyere kato sɔ me nɖe Ɣaa.’ ”
45014012	Ne ɔso ne, bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔ̃atã ɔ̃ ngbã iso akɔnta i Ɣaa kɔrɛ.
45014013	Ne ɔso mitã bonyua so atɔ̃me ɔɣɛgu. Si bonyɔ kumɛgɔ boabara mawɛ̃ sɔ boibaɖe ɔri itɛ̃ra botã kuwɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe sɔ ɔ̃atura ɔbo i ikpi ame.
45014014	Gɔ lopia i Bosate Yesu ame ɔso ne, loɣe kukaakɔ i wũ ɔtu ame sɔ araɖea kuawɛ̃ i wã mɔmɔ ame iipukutu. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔnya sɔ irere ɔpukutu ne, nnɛmɔ loapukutura wũ ne.
45014015	Si aɣe sɔ nnɛ ato aɖe to iɖaa fɔ ɔnyii ne, iyɔ iiɖe kuɖɔɛ ato aɖi ate wũ. Daatã sɔ nnɛ ato aɖe aanina fɔ ɔnyii kafɔkaɖe alasɔ Kristo ɔkpi i ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ iti.
45014016	Midaatã sɔ maturi aɖe ika i ira nɛ i mi minyɔ sɔ ilɛ i Ɣaa maturi ndɛ̃ iso.
45014017	Alasɔ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ne, iiɖe ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ ɔɖe. Ɣɛɛ sibɔlɔlɔ gu isobuɛ gu isoɣɔ i Siwarã Bielea ame iɖe.
45014018	Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara Kristo karabara i ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔbo Ɣaa gu maturi anɔ fiɛ masɛ wawarɛ wũ ne.
45014019	Ne ɔso mitã bonyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ boabara ara wa loabɔ isobuɛ fiɛ aabuai bopia so ɔle.
45014020	Midaanina Ɣaa karabara ala araɖea ɔso. Araɖea biara iso ɔkpa, ɣɛɛ ne, iilɛ si nnɛ aaɖe aatã sɔ ɔturi aatura ɔbɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃ ɔbo i ikpi ame.
45014021	Si aito aɖe sina ɣee anɛ ndã mɔɛ̃a ɣee abara kuira nɛ loatã sɔ fɔ ɔnyii aarɔ̃ ɔbo i ikpi ame ne, ibua ilɛ.
45014022	Ne ɔso ara wa afɔ aɖe i nwagbe iso ne, tã awe i mi gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃. So to siaɣɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara wa i ɔ̃ kaɣere iisɛ katã wũ ipɔ.
45014023	Ɣɛɛ si ɔturi to ɔɖe ira fiɛ ɔ̃ kaɣere ɔta kaɣɛ i ne iso ne, ɔ̃ɔtã so ipɔ koko alasɔ, ɔ̃ikã ɔ̃ kaɣere atsue i kafɔkaɖe ame. Ira biara nɛ i ɔturi iibara i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, iɖe wũ ikpi.
45015001	Bo ma loɔmɔ i kafɔkaɖe ame koko ne, ikote sɔ boana ɔtu botã mma kafɔkaɖe loimɔ fiɛ mana ɔle bobuai ma. Iikote sɔ boabara ara wa loaɣɔ bo ɔnɔwɛ̃ so.
45015002	Ikote sɔ bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara aabara ira nɛ loaɣɔ ɔ̃ ɔlaa so sɔ iatã sɔ ɔ̃are iti i Siwarã ame.
45015003	Alasɔ nane Kristo kɔra ne, iiɖe nnɛ loaɣɔ wũ so iɖe ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ matsɛrɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ, “Sitia dzɛ i maturi ɔtia-ɔ ne, sɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔba i wũ iso.”
45015004	Ara wa ɔɖuɖu matsɛrɛ masɛ ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ si iate bo ara sɔ si boya teteree, si ila iɔpia bo ɔle sɔ bo anɔ aasia i nnɛ boto bonyɔ ɔri iso.
45015005	Nto lokarɛ Ɣaa sɔ ɔbuai bo sɔ boawo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe biara kanya sɔ boabara nnɛ i Bosate Kristo Yesu sɛ ɔɖɔɛ iso.
45015006	Iyɔ mi ɔɖuɖu situ gu kanya aaɖe kawɛ̃ sɔ miasu ile mitã Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse.
45015007	Ne ɔso miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ mi manyii lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔwarɛ ɔ̃ mire ɔfɔ mi ala ne loatã Ɣaa kuwarɛ ne.
45015008	Lobie sɔ loɣere mi sekelee sɔ Kristo ɔba ɔ̃akpese ma Yudase ɔɖabo sɔ si ɔ̃aɖi kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣere ma Yudase mawa tɛtɛ ɔte sɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso.
45015009	Ɣaa Itɔ̃me nɛgbe aatã sɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana aale Ɣaa i ɔ̃ nnyainyɔ ɔso. Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso loale-ɔ i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne. Loasu kafɔkaɖe sinɔ lole fɔ iyere.”
45015010	Fiɛ maledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase, minagu Ɣaa maturi isoɣɔ.”
45015011	Maledza iɣɛ ana sɔ, “Mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔɖuɖu si mile Bosate. Si mi abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi si miɖi sinɔ dzɛ loale wũ.”
45015012	Yesaya ana ɔledza itsɛrɛ sɔ, “Yese ɔdziriɖu to ɔ̃atata. Fiɛ ɔ̃ loaɖe ngɔ loata ɔya ɔɖe sigara i abuiti ɔɖuɖu maturi iso ne. Mma loiɖe ma Yudase to maawe ɔriinyɔ i ɔ̃ ame.”
45015013	Lokarɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo ɔriinyɔ sɔ ɔtã sɔ so aaɣɔ mi ta kame ame ɔɖuɖu si ɔtã mi isobuɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ misu so mitã wũ kanya sɔ, Siwarã Bielea ɔle si sitã sɔ miawe i ɔriinyɔ ame ɔwi biara.
45015014	Manyii, mme mɔmɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ miyi ku ara sɛɛ ibara pɔpɔɔpɔ. Miɣe ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne ɔso mite so.
45015015	I ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, loɣara so lotsɛrɛ ara wagbe sɔ si lonyigira mi ara wa iki i Ɣaa abualɛra ame lobara.
45015016	Alasɔ ɔbara me sɔ lokpese Kristo rabaradze lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Lobara kasumu karabara ga nɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me iɣɛ itã mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ loakɔ ma loba loakpesera Ɣaa ara fɛ̃a wa i Siwarã Bielea ɔbara sekelee i Ɣaa anɔ.
45015017	Loawo ndamu ɔɖe i ara wa i Yesu Kristo ɔbara ɔkigu i wũ karabara ga loto lobara lotã Ɣaa ɔso.
45015018	Loibaɖe ndamu i kuira mama kuiwɛ̃ iso iɖo nnɛ i Kristo ɔbara ɔkigu i wũ iso. Ɔtã sɔ lokɔ mma loiɖe ma Yudase lobɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ sɔ si maaɖe Ɣaa mare iki ara wa loɣere ma fiɛ lobara ana ɔso.
45015019	Nnɛgbe ɔba i ne ame iki i awawãra wa manya gu Ɣaa ɔle karabara ga ɔtã lobara ɔso. Ne ɔso ita i Yerusalem isɛ iabɔrɛ i Iliriko ndɛ̃ mmɔ ɔɖuɖu ne, loɣɛ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe.
45015020	Ta kokooko ne, anɔ ɔrɛtɛ me sɔ loaɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me i ngbegɔ maiɣe Kristo. Alasɔ loibie sɔ loatsue ibere losia i kuwɛ̃ kabereku ga ɔpia i karɔ̃ ame ɔsɛ iso.
45015021	Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Mma maiɣere ɔ̃ iso Itɔ̃me ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, mato maatsue wũ. Fiɛ mma loinɔ kuira ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, ma loanɔ karɔ̃ ne.”
45015022	Karabara gagbe lotɛ̃ra me ɔri ɔso fiɛ loiwo mi kɔrɛ ɔba ne.
45015023	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ loɔro karabara ga i ibuiti nɛgbe ame fiɛ akɔ gbodzoo nɖe nwagbe gɔ loto lobie sɔ loaba loanya mi ɔso ne,
45015024	lobara adzuni sɔ loaki i mi kɔrɛ si loto lofe Spania. Lobie sɔ loaki i mi kɔrɛ lowarã kɛkɛĩ bopia so ɔle fiɛ ka miaɖi me ɔri.
45015025	Ɣɛɛ tɔtɔ ne, losɛ Yerusalem losu karatã lokɛlɛgu Ɣaa maturi i mmɔ.
45015026	Alasɔ mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Makedonia gu Akaia ne, imɔɛ̃ ma ɔtu sɔ maato sikã matã mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba ma mpia i Yerusalem.
45015027	Iba ma ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ maabara ngbɔ. Fiɛ mato ma kuso gbaã! Alasɔ si mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɔna kaɖekɔ̃ i ma Yudase siwarã ame ara sɛɛ ame ne, mitsue sɔ ma wũ ne, ikote sɔ maabuai ma Yudase ku ma karana.
45015028	Ne ɔso si losu ara wa mato ngbe lokɛlɛgu ma lokpese ne, loto loaki i mi kɔrɛ lokɛlɛ Spania.
45015029	Loɣe sɔ si loto loba mi kɔrɛ ne, loto loasɛgu Kristo kusɛkusɛ ɔɖuɖu lobɔ mi.
45015030	Manyii, loto mi i kukpa i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame gu Siwarã Bielea kuɖɔɛ ame sɔ mibuai me i kakpã ga kanya loɣɛ sɔ loana ɔle iki i mi kayi ikparama ame.
45015031	Mikarɛ Ɣaa mitã me sɔ ɔ̃aɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i ma Yudase ma losɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ wũ karabara i Yerusalem aabo Ɣaa maturi anɔ.
45015032	Fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔbie ne, loaba loabo i mi ndɛ̃ ku isoɣɔ fiɛ loawarã i mmɔ.
45015033	Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔwegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
45016001	Loɖi bo ɔnyiiko Foibe lote mi. Ɔɖe buaidze i Kenkrea mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
45016002	Loto mi i kukpa sɔ miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ wũ i Bosate iyere ame i ɔri gɔ lokote Ɣaa maturi iso. Mitã wũ ibuai biara nɛ ɔ̃abie ɔbɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ alasɔ ɔbuai maturi gbodzoo gu me ana.
45016003	Loya Priska gu Akwila ma nɖe wũ marabaradze laa i Kristo Yesu ame.
45016004	Mayagu me teteree sɔ maakpi i wũ iti kɔra. Iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me nto lopɛ ma siba ɣɛɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu.
45016005	Loya mafɔɖedze ma nsɛ masarɛ i ma iyo mmɔ ana. Miya wũ ɔlaa Epaineto gɔ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔfiniki ɔfɔ Kristo i Asia karɔ̃ iso.
45016006	Loya Maria gɔ lobara karabara teteree i mi ndɛ̃.
45016007	Loya Androniko gu Yunia ma nɖe wũ aɖe maturi ma bo gu ma inyɔ lowe i iyo. Maturi ma lofɔ iyere maɖe i katɔ̃memasɛdze ndɛ̃. Maɖe me katɔ̃ i Kristo ifɔ ame.
45016008	Loya Amplia gɔ nɖe wũ ɖɔɛse i Bosate iyere ame.
45016009	Loya Urbana gɔ nɖe bo rabaradze laa i Kristo ame. Loya wũ ɔlaa Staki.
45016010	Loya Apele gɔ makere manyɔ fiɛ ɔya i Kristo ame. Loya Aristobulo iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu.
45016011	Loya Herodian, wũ aɖe ɔturi. Loya Narkiso iyo maturi ma losu so matã Bosate.
45016012	Ya Trifaina gu Trifosa, marɔ̃go rabaradze i Bosate ame. Loya wũ ɔlaa ɖɔɛse Persi gɔ nɖe ɔrɔ̃go mama gɔ nto ɔbara karabara teteree i Bosate ame.
45016013	Loya Rufo gɔ lofɔ iyere i Bosate ame gu ɔ̃ ɔnyi gɔ lomɔɛ̃ me lɛ ɔ̃ ɔbi awe.
45016014	Loya Asinkrito gu Flegon gu Herme gu Patroba gu Herma gu ma manyii fɔɖedze ma mpiagu ma.
45016015	Loya Fologo gu Yulia gu Nerea gu ɔ̃ ɔnyiiko gu Olimpa gu Ɣaa maturi ma mpiagu ma.
45016016	Miya so ku kɔrɔ̃ ipia i kuɖɔɛ gu isekele ame. Kristo mafɔɖedze akuri wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i Kreta sɔ maya mi o-o.
45016017	Manyii, lobie sɔ loka mi kukaakɔ sɔ minyɔ so i mma loasu iɣɛɣɛso mapia i maturi ndɛ̃ iso. Masu ara wa lota aɣɛ i nwa bote mi iso mato matɛ̃ mi ɔri. Mibɛse so i ma iso.
45016018	Alasɔ mmamɔ igbã ne, iiɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo karabara mato mabara. Ɣɛɛ ma mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ mato mabara. Maba ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ gu kasɔla ga maasu makpɔkpɔtɔra mma loiɣe kuira adzuni.
45016019	Ɔturi biara ɔnɔ kumɛgɔ mikã Itɔ̃me Bielea atsue, ne ɔso so ɔɣɔ me gbaã i mi iso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loto lobie lotã mi nɖe sɔ mi anɔ aabusi i isɛɛ ibara iso, ɣɛɛ ikpi iso ne, miaɖe mma loiɣe kuira.
45016020	Ɣaa gɔ nɖe isobuɛ tãse si ɔkɔtɛ Tsirise ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ si ɔtã sɔ miaɖe wũ iso i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
45016021	Timoteo gɔ nɖe wũ rabaradze laa ɔya mi. Ngbɔ ame ana i Lukio gu Yason gu Sosipatro ma nɖe wũ maturi ɔya mi ne.
45016022	Mme Tertio gɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã Paulo ana loya mi i Bosate iyere ame.
45016023	Gaio gɔ lofɔ bo kukaakɔ ngbe gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ masarɛ i ɔ̃ iyo ɔya mi. Erasto gɔ nɖe ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe sikãladze gu bo ɔnyii Kwarto sɔ maya mi.
45016024	Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
45016025	Kiniɔ ne, mitã bole Ɣaa. Ɔto ɔ̃awo mi ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla teteree iki i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ lobɔrɛ i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso. Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔse i ara wɛrɛa wa i Ɣaa to ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ngbegɔ awe akɔ gbodzoo wa lofe ame.
45016026	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, maɔɖi wã mabɔ ɔgbami itã maturi ɔɖuɖu karɔ̃ inɔ, ara wa i kanyamaɖidze ɔtsɛrɛ masɛ. Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔwi ɖaa kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ maaɣɛ Itɔ̃me nɛgbe i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame fiɛ maafɔ maɖe mabara i ne iso.
45016027	Ɣaa gɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ inɔgba loyi ne, ikote sɔ boale wũ ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔwi ɔɖuɖu i Kristo Yesu iyere ame. Si iba ngbɔ.
46001001	Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame loɖe Yesu Kristo Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu bo ɔnyiibi Sostene lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe.
46001002	Boto botsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã Korinto mafɔɖedze ma iki i Yesu Kristo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi ma ɔsɛ ɔtã so. Ɔkpere ma sɔ maaɖe ɔ̃ maturi Sekelea lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkpere mma ɔɖuɖu ana nsɛ makpere Bosate Yesu Kristo. Ɔ̃ nɖe bo gu ma ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse ne.
46001003	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
46001004	Nsɛ lopɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara i mi iti ala nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔtã mi iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
46001005	Gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔso ne, miɔsɛ katɔ̃ i ira biara ame, ta ikaɖe ɔɖuɖu gu inɔgba ɔɖuɖu ame.
46001006	Kristo iso itɔ̃me ana ɔɔre siɖu i mi ame kukaakɔ.
46001007	Ne ɔso ne, siwarã ame karatã kukawɛ̃ iibo mi kusa gɔ misi misia Ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃atã Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔledza iba.
46001008	Ɔto ɔ̃adzuɛ̃ mi gɔ mimɔɛ̃ mi kafɔkaɖe mito sekelee isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃. Ɔto ɔ̃atã sɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me ne, ɔ̃atã mi ibɛ.
46001009	Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mibara mawɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Bosate Yesu Kristo ne, ɔɖe ngɔ iso miawo iti ɔsia.
46001010	I ɔle gɔ i Bokɔse Yesu Kristo ɔtã me kanya ne, loto mi i kukpa teteree sɔ lɛ manyii awe ne, minɔgu so ara karɔ̃ sɔ iɣɛɣɛso kuiwɛ̃ iibawe i mi ndɛ̃. Minyɔ sɔ mi kanya aaɖe kawɛ̃ i ara wa misɛ mibu gu nwa misɛ misia ita iso.
46001011	Wũ manyii, bo manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Kloe iyo ame ɔɣere me sɔ kakpadzɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃.
46001012	Nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ, mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme ne, Paulo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Apolo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Petro kama losiai.” Fiɛ mamama ana sɔ, “Mme, Kristo losiai.”
46001013	Lokarɛ mi ne, Kristo ne, ɔɣɛ maɣɛɣɛ wũ? Ɛɛbɛrɛ Paulo ɔɖe lokpi i kudziri iso i mi iti? Mapie mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ Ɣaa ndu i Paulo iyere ame? Ooɣo!
46001014	Lopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ loibara Ɣaa itupie kubarara lotã mi kuwɛ̃ iɖo Krispo gu Gaio ɔnɔwɛ̃.
46001015	Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ wũ iyere ame ɔfɔ Ɣaa itupie.
46001016	Loɔnyigi sɔ Stefana gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ana ne, lotã ma Ɣaa itupie. Ne kama ne, loisito lonyigi kuwɛ̃ gɔ lobara ana.
46001017	Kristo iipia me sɔ loba loabara maturi Ɣaa itupie kubarara. Ɣɛɛ ɔpia me sɔ losɛ loaɣere kayiiso maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea. Loisɛ loɣɛ ne ku kayiiso inɔgba, alasɔ loito lobie sɔ ɔle gɔ mpia i Kristo kukpi gɔ ɔkpi i kudziri iso aayu kɔ̃ ɔle kukpese kukpi gɔ nna kusia.
46001018	Mma nsɛgbai lote sɔ maɔkpi i Siwarã ame ne, Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso itɔ̃me ɖe idzimira itã ma. Ɣɛɛ bo ma lona iɖi i Ɣaa ame ne, itɔ̃me nɛmɔ ɖe ɔle itã bo.
46001019	I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loanina manɔgbadze inɔgba. Fiɛ loatã sɔ makotsuese inɔgba aakpese siefe.”
46001020	Iyɔ lɛ i kayi gagbe manɔgbadze pia? Lɛ i makotsuese pia? Fiɛ mma nsɛ makpadzɛ̃ atɔ̃me ne, lɛ mapia ma wũ? Ɣaa ɔɔte sɔ kayiiso gagbe inɔgba ne, sidzimi siɖe.
46001021	Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ iwola nɛgbe iso ɔbara maturi ngbɔ sɔ maibaki i kayiiso inɔgba iso matsue wũ. Ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ fiɛ ire sidzimi itɔ̃me i mawɛ̃ kɔrɛ i ngbe ne, ne iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔtã mma lofɔ maɖe ngbã ne.
46001022	Ma Yudase to mabie iwawãra sɔ manya fiɛ ma Helase ana to mabie kayiiso inɔgba sɔ matsue.
46001023	Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Kristo gɔ mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ. Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔta iya ma Yudase iso fiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase ana ne, ire ma sidzimi itɔ̃me.
46001024	Ɣɛɛ ne, mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔtã so i ma Yudase gu ma Helase ndɛ̃ ne, Kristo iso itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ ɖe Ɣaa ɔle gu iwola itã ma.
46001025	Alasɔ nnɛ i maturi sɛ manyɔ sɔ iɖe Ɣaa sidzimi ne, iɖo ma inɔgba, fiɛ nnɛ nɖe Ɣaa ɔle idaawe ne, iba ɔle iɖo maturi ɔle.
46001026	Manyii, si Ɣaa aaɖi mi ne, minyigi kumɛgɔ mise i maturi anɔ. Mi gbodzoo iiɖe mma mba ɔle ɣee manɔgbadze fiɛ miibɔrɛ i siɣekparɛ dzɛ masɛ mawarɛ ame ana.
46001027	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi mma loire kuira i kayiiso maturi anɔ sɔ si ɔ̃asu ɔpia kayi gagbe manɔgbadze kunuarɛ. Ɔɖi mma nna ɔle i kayiiso ara inyɔ kanya sɔ si ɔsu ɔpia kayi gagbe maturi ma mba ɔle kunuarɛ.
46001028	Ɣaa ɔɖi mma loire kuira i maturi anɔ i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso, fiɛ mana kuwarɛ kukuwɛ̃ sɔ si ɔsu ɔsopara mma nsɛ mabu so sɔ maba kuwarɛ.
46001029	Nnɛgbe loate sɔ ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo so kato ɔkɔlɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ne.
46001030	Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ miɔbara mawɛ̃ ku Yesu Kristo. Ɔ̃ nɖe bo iwola nɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã bo. Iki i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ. Boɔkpese Ɣaa maturi sekelea fiɛ ɔ̃ɔtã bo akpi iti kuso.
46001031	Ne ɔso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ loaɖe ndamu ne, ɔɖe ndamu i nnɛ i Bosate ɔbara iso ne.”
46002001	Manyii, ɔwi gɔ loba loaɣere mi Ɣaa itɔ̃me wɛrɛa ne, iiɖe ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ gu kayiiso inɔgba ame loba loaɣere mi.
46002002	Ɔwi gɔ lowe i mi kɔrɛ ne, loiɖe mi ika i kuira iso iɖo Yesu Kristo iso gu ɔ̃ kukpi i kudziri iso.
46002003	Ɔturi gɔ nna ɔle gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã ɔti ɔkpakpa loɖe ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame.
46002004	Minya i wũ ara ite ame ɔɖuɖu sɔ loiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me siare loɖe. Ɣɛɛ wũ itɔ̃me ɔte sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle pia gbaã.
46002005	Ne ɔso loibabie sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe si kasia i maturi inɔgba iso ɣɛɛ ne, kasia i Ɣaa ɔle iso.
46002006	Ɣɛɛ mma loɔmɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ame ne, losɛ loɣere ma Ɣaa itɔ̃me i inɔgba kɔlɛa ame, iiɖe kayi gagbe inɔgba gu atakere ma ɔle maɔfɔ ma iso itɔ̃me nto loɣɛ.
46002007	Iwola nɛ loto loɣɛ ala ngbe ne, Ɣaa ɔfu ne ara, ɔkɔla ne i ɔ̃ ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔsia ne ita kokooko ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ ne iso ɔ̃aki fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi bo.
46002008	Kayi gagbe atakere kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iwola nɛgbe. Alasɔ si maɣe ne ne, tee maibapɛ Bosate mamatãra i kudziri iso.
46002009	Ɣɛɛ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ara wa i kuwɛ̃ iinya, ɣee kutsue iinɔ gu nnɛ i kuwɛ̃ iibu ɔnya ne, ne i Ɣaa ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ne.”
46002010	Ɣɛɛ bo ɔso i Ɣaa ɔɖi awɛrɛra wagbe ɔbɔ i ɔgbami iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã iso. Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sinyɔnyɔ ira biara sitsue fiɛ siɣe ta Ɣaa ara wɛrɛa.
46002011	Kumɛgɔ i ɔturi siwarã dzɛ mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɣe ira biara i ɔ̃ iso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa Siwarã ɣe ira biara i Ɣaa iso ne.
46002012	Bo ne, iiɖe siwarã dzɛ nto siɖe kayi gagbe iso mpia i bo ame. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã bonɔ bo karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã bo karɔ̃ mpia i bo ame.
46002013	Ne ɔso ne, iiɖe kayi gagbe iwola nɛ bosuã bobɔrɛgu i maturi kɔrɛ ara boto bote mi. Ɣɛɛ bosɛ boɖi Siwarã ame ara karɔ̃ bote mi ma ame i Siwarã pia.
46002014	Ɔbiara gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã iito siɖe iso ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa Siwarã karatã gagbe ɔfɔ. Ɔ̃ibanɔ kã karɔ̃ ana alasɔ kare adzimira i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Ngɔ ame i Ɣaa Siwarã pia to ɔ̃anɔ ara wagbe karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ana wã kusia.
46002015	Ngɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso ne, ɔsɛ ɔnya isɛɛ gu ilalaa ɔɖi ite. Ɣɛɛ maturi iisɛ manya wũ maɖi ite.
46002016	Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nna nɣe Bosate iti ame? Fiɛ nna loate wũ ara?” Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Kristo adzuni mpia i bo ame.
46003001	Manyii, i ɔnukuare ame ne, loiwo mi ika ɔɖe lɛ mma i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso. Ɣɛɛ loɖe mi ika lɛ kayiiso maturi awe. Loɖe mi ika lɛ mabiɛtɛ i Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame.
46003002	Wũ ara wa lote mi ne, ase ɖɔbɔrɔɔ lɛ inyɛdu mɛ i ɔbiɛtɛ sɛ ɔmeme, iiɖe makpakpa aɖera. Alasɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, miimɔ mitã makpakpa aɖera fiɛ ipɛ i kiniɔ ana ne, miito miwo makpakpa aɖera ɔɖe.
46003003	Misi ngbã lɛ mma adzuni ɔɖuɖu nsia i kayi gagbe ara iso. Si mito mikpɛ̃gu so sirerɛ fiɛ mito milɔgu so ne, ne kerekere ɔɔte sɔ sosina ara kere misi mitã, fiɛ mikotegu kayi gagbe maturi.
46003004	Si mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Mme, Paulo kama losiai.” Ɔmama ana sɔ, “Mme, Apolo kama losiai” ne, iyɔ mito mibara ara lɛ mma i kayiiso adzuni kere nto aɖe ma iso.
46003005	Fiɛ nwagbe ɔɖuɖu kama ne, nna nɖe Apolo fiɛ nna nɖe Paulo? Ɣaa marabaradze kere boɖe. Bo iso kere miki mifɔ miɖe fiɛ bo ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ sɔ ɔbara.
46003006	Mme losɛ karabara karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mapɛ ɔraɖui fiɛ Apolo ka ɔfere ɔraɖui ndu. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖe lotã sɔ ɔraɖui ɔre iti.
46003007	Ne ɔso ne, iiɖe ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui, ɣee ngɔ lofere ndu lonya, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ lotã sɔ ɔre iti lonya ɔɖo.
46003008	Ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui gu ngɔ lofere wũ ndu ame. Ɣaa loatã ma ɔɖuɖu kuso i ma karabara kanya.
46003009	Malaa boɖe i Ɣaa karabara ame fiɛ mi nɖe Ɣaa kakpɛkɔ̃. Ɣaa iyo ana miɖe.
46003010	Ɣaa ɔle gɔ ɔtã me kanya ne, nto lobara karabara lɛ yotsuese sɛɛ awe. Lopia iyo i karɔ̃ ame gu ata. Ɔmama ɔ̃ wũ ɔba ɔ̃atsue ɔsia iso. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara si ɔnyɔ kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃atsue ɔsia iso.
46003011	Alasɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe lɛ ita nɛ mapia ala iyo i karɔ̃ ame fiɛ ɔturi biara aatsue ɔsia iso. Kuwɛ̃ iisibawo ita mama ɔpia i karɔ̃ ame.
46003012	Si ɔrere ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa ɣee sifudza ɣee ata wa lofɔ kuɣa ɣee sidziri ɣee katĩ ɔtsue iyo nɛmɔ ne,
46003013	ɔbiara karabara ga ɔbara to kaabɔrɛ kayi. Kristo iyi siare nɛmɔ loaɖi ɔbiara karabara ite. Iyi nɛmɔ ne, ɔtɔ loaɖi ɔbiara karabara ɔte. Ɔtɔ maasu makere ɔbiara karabara manyɔ si kasɛɛ kaɖe.
46003014	Si sɔ nnɛ i ɔturi ɔsu ɔtsue iyo ɔwo ɔtɔ gɔgbe ame ɔki ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ iitsue ne, ɔ̃afɔ kuso gɔ lokote.
46003015	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ara wa ɔtsue ala iyo ɔtsue i ɔtɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ibana kuso kukuwɛ̃ ɔfɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ to ɔ̃ana iɖi lɛ ngɔ lotere ɔbɔrɛ i ɔtɔ ame.
46003016	Mitsue sɔ mi mɔmɔ nɖe Ɣaa isɔrɛyo fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i mi ame.
46003017	Ɣaa isɔrɛyo se sekelee fiɛ mi nɖe isɔrɛyo nɛmɔ. Si ɔrere ɔnina ne ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra ɔnyiiɔ gɔmɔ ɔ̃ wũ.
46003018	Mi ndɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasɔsɔla so. Si mi ɔrere ɔbu so sɔ ɔɖe kayi gagbe iso nɔgbadze ne, ɔbara so lɛ dzimifɔ i maturi anɔ si ɔ̃akpese nɔgbadze bielea i Ɣaa anɔ.
46003019	Alasɔ ara wa i kayiiso maturi sɛ manyɔ sɔ aɖe iwola ne, wã nɖe adzimira i Ɣaa anɔ ne. Matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Manɔgbadze inɔgba i Ɣaa sɛ ɔsu ɔmɔɛ̃ ma i iyebi ame.”
46003020	Maledza itsɛrɛ ana sɔ, “Ɣaa ɣe sɔ manɔgbadze adzuni ne, siefe kere aɖe.”
46003021	Ne ɔso kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaakɔlɛ so kato i ara wa i maturi aawo ɔbara iso. Alasɔ ira biara se itã mi isɛɛ.
46003022	Paulo ɣee Apolo ɣee Petro ɣee kayi gagbe ɣee kukpi gu ngbã, kiniɔ ɣee ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba i katɔ̃ ne, wã ɔɖuɖu ɖe mi are.
46003023	Kristo mare miɖe, fiɛ Kristo ɔ̃ wũ Ɣaa ɔre ɔɖe.
46004001	Mila miɔnyɔ bo lɛ Kristo marabaradze ma nto manyɔ Ɣaa atɔ̃me wɛrɛa iso.
46004002	Nnɛ i ɔkɔse sɛ ɔbie ɔbɔrɛgu i marabaradze magbe igbã kɔrɛ nɖe sɔ maabara ma karabara i ɔnukuare ame.
46004003	Kiniɔ ne, iito iɖa me si mi ɣee ɔrere aaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me. Mme mɔmɔ kɔra loisɛ loɣɛgu so atɔ̃me.
46004004	Wũ kaɣere iisɛ katã me ipɔ i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe ne nto ite sɔ loisɛ lobara ikpi alasɔ Bokɔse loaɣɛgu me atɔ̃me.
46004005	Ne ɔso ne, kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaaɣɛgu ɔ̃ ɔlaa atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔwi aaɣo. Ɔwi gɔ i Bosate ɔɔba ne, ɔ̃ loaɣɛgu ɔbiara atɔ̃me ku iyi tsɔra ne. Ɔ̃ nto ɔ̃aba ɔ̃aɖi awɛrɛra ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔ ɔgbami fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi ta nwa mpia i maturi adzuni ame ɔte. Mmɔ i Ɣaa aale ɔbiara gɔ lokote ɔtã ile ne.
46004006	Manyii, si mianɔ ara karɔ̃ ɔso fiɛ losu mme gu Apolo lotã mi ikparĩ. Misuã nnɛ itɔ̃me nɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ ngbe to ite sɔ, “Mibara ara i ɔri iso.” Ne ɔso midaanyɔ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔkɔlɛ ɔɖo ɔ̃ ɔlaa.
46004007	Nna lobara-ɔ fiɛ afɔ kuɣa aɖo fɔ ɔlaa? Ara wa ɔɖuɖu aba ne, Ɣaa losu ɔtã-ɔ. Si ngbɔ iɖe ne, be ɔso fiɛ ato akɔlɛ so kato lɛ iiɖe Ɣaa lotã-ɔ.
46004008	Ka miba ira biara nɛ mito mibie? Miɔkpese maranase miro? Miɔkpese magara ku ɔwi gɔ ame bo boikpese magara? Aĩ, wũ kayiri tee magara ka miɖe fiɛ bo wũ boaɖegu mi sigara.
46004009	Ibara me lɛ bo katɔ̃memasɛdze ne, kasɛkɔ̃ tsɔra i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã bo. Bo nɖe mma matã ipɔ gu ira nɛ i maturi aanyɔ botã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maaɖoe bo i kaɖe ɔɖuɖu gu Ɣaa makpabo anɔ.
46004010	Kristo ɔso ne, boɖe madzimifɔ. Ɣɛɛ mi ne, miɖe manɔgbadze. Boɔkpese maturi ɣɔa ma nna ɔle, ɣɛɛ mi ne, miba ɔle. Boire kuira i maturi anɔ, ɣɛɛ mi ne, masɛ mawarɛ mi.
46004011	Ta kiniɔ ne, kukã gu ɔme to ɔkore bo, bopia aradzɛ, maturi to mapɛ bo fiɛ bona kawekɔ̃ kukawɛ̃.
46004012	Bosu bo mɔmɔ arɔĩ boto bobara karabara bonyɔ so iso. Si magbarĩ bo ne, boɔtã kusɛkusɛ. Si mato mati bo kama i amumuɣɔ ɔri iso ne, bosɛ bopia so katetere.
46004013	Si maturi ɔtia bo ne, atɔ̃me wa loaɣɔra situ bosɛ boɣere ma. Boɔkpese kayiiso aku kawirikɔ̃ gu ara wa loisilɛ ipɛ i kiniɔ.
46004014	Iiɖe kunuarɛ nto lopia mi i ara wa nto lotsɛrɛ mi ngbe iso, ɣɛɛ ɔka loto mi lɛ wũ mabi ɖɔɛse awe.
46004015	Si miba nane maturi gbodzoo lɛ mi maratedze i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã kere ɔɖe mi. Alasɔ i mi ngbã mɛ ame miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ne, loɔkpese mi ɔse ala mme losu Itɔ̃me Bielea lobɔ mi.
46004016	Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ misuã wũ nsɛgbai.
46004017	Nnɛgbe ɔso nto loapia Timoteo gɔ nɖe wũ ɔbi ɖɔɛse fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara Bosate Karabara i ɔnukuare ame ne. Ɔto ɔ̃anyigira mi Kristo ame ngbã mɛ losi fiɛ me nsɛ lote mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu i kakɔi biara ne.
46004018	Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to makɔlɛ so kato alasɔ mabu sɔ loibaba mi kɔrɛ mmɔ lonya.
46004019	Si Bokɔse ɔbie ne, nto loaba loanya mi i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Nto loabie sɔ loanya ɔle gɔ mmamɔ ba gu atɔ̃me wa mato maɣɛ.
46004020	Alasɔ Ɣaa sigara iɖe na i akaɖe kunu ame, ɣɛɛ ipia i ɔle ame.
46004021	Be mito mibie? Loba mi kɔrɛ ku kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɛɛbɛrɛ loba ku kuɖɔɛ gu isobuɛ ame?
46005001	Maturi to maɣɛ sɔ mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to mabara asɔrɔ̃ra wa lofe inyanyarĩ sɔ nane mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze iibabara wã igbã. Maɣere me sɔ ɔwɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔrɛgu ɔ̃ ɔse ɔre.
46005002	Be iti mito mite so? Ikote sɔ miabiɛ. Fiɛ ngɔ lobara ira nɛgbe igbã ne, ipia sɔ miaɖi wũ mibɔrɛgu i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
46005003	Atoa sɔ lodzorogu mi fiɛ boito bonya so anɔ ne, lopia i mi kɔrɛ i siwarã ame. Gɔ lopia i mi ndɛ̃ ɔso ne, loɔtã ngɔ lobara ikpi nɛgbe igbã ipɔ i
46005004	Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔle ame. Si misakanya ne, mitsue sɔ lopia i mi ndɛ̃ i Siwarã ame fiɛ Bosate ɔle ana pia i mi ndɛ̃.
46005005	Ikote sɔ miaɖi ngɔgbe mitã Ɔbosam ɔwɔra ɔ̃ sosina ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ siwarã aana iɖi ku iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu aaba ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me.
46005006	Iikote sɔ miate so ɖuɖuuɖu. Miiɣe sɔ inyagɛ̃ kua kɛkɛĩ gɔ mapia i mmɔre ame aatã mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃?
46005007	Ne ɔso miɖi inyagɛ̃ kua biara gɔ nɖe ikpi i mi ndɛ̃. Gbaã ne, mmɔre mɛ loinyagɛ̃ miɖe alasɔ maɔɖoe Kristo gɔ nɖe bo Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi Sɛrɛ.
46005008	Ne ɔso ne, midaatã sɔ boaɖe bo Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi boɖoboɖo kuere gɔ ame i ikpi gu ɔtile kurabara pia. Ɣɛɛ mitã boɖe mmɔre mɛ loinyagɛ̃ i ara bɔlɔlɔa ibara gu ɔnukuare iɣɛ ame bowũ.
46005009	I ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ mi ame ne, loɣere mi sɔ midaasakanya ku mma nsɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃.
46005010	Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze loto. Ma ne, masɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃, ma anɔ sɛ abe arɛtɛ i maturi sikã iso, masɛ masu akpira mayu maturi, masɔrɛ aɣɔ ana. Si miɣɛ sɔ miabɛse so i ma iso pelepele ne, ikote sɔ miabɔrɛ i kayi gagbe ame!
46005011	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ nto lotsɛrɛ loɣere mi nɖe ngɔ nɖe ɔnyii fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɔbɛbɛ anɔ, ɔsɔrɛ aɣɔ ɣee ɔrɔ maturi ayere lalaa, ɔrɛ̃ ndã, ɔyu kayu ne, mibɛse so i ɔ̃ iso. Midaaɖegu wũ nane aɖera.
46005012	-
46005013	Mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ne, ma atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iiɖe wũ karabara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso atɔ̃me. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe mafɔɖedze boaɣɛgu atɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Misa ɔturi lalaa miɖi i mi ndɛ̃.”
46006001	Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔna itɔ̃me gu ɔ̃ ɔlaa fɔɖedze ne, iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ne ɔkɛlɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze sɔ maɣɛ ne matã wũ. Ɣɛɛ miɣɛ ne i mi kerekere ndɛ̃.
46006002	Miiɣe sɔ mafɔɖedze loaɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me? Si mi loaɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me ne, be ɔso fiɛ miibawo kutɔ̃mei kpɔlɔkɔi gɔ mpia i mi ndɛ̃ ɔɣɛ?
46006003	Miiɣe sɔ bo mafɔɖedze loaɣɛgu kato makpabo atɔ̃me? Ne ɔso ikote sɔ boawo atɔ̃me wiriwiria wa i ngbã ame ngbe ɔɣɛ.
46006004	Si itɔ̃me ɔba i mi ndɛ̃ ne, be ɔso fiɛ miibasu mikɛlɛgu mma bosɛ bowarɛ i bo ndɛ̃ sɔ maɣɛ matã bo fiɛ boasu bokɛlɛgu kayiiso maturi sɔ maɣɛ ne?
46006005	Nto loɣere mi nnɛgbe sɔ kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ mi. Alasɔ bidɛ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ saã pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔɖe nɔgbadze ɔ̃awo mi ndɛ̃ atɔ̃me ɔɣɛ.
46006006	Ɣɛɛ ɔnyii fɔɖedze to ɔkɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyii fɔɖedze ɔkɛlɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze sɔ maɣɛ ma atɔ̃me.
46006007	Sɔ mito mikɔ so mikɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃ kerekere ɔɔte sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe ɔkuti. Be ɔso fiɛ miibatã sɔ maaɣɛrɛ mi? Be ɔso fiɛ miibatã sɔ maaɖe mi amumu?
46006008	Ɣɛɛ mito miɣɛrɛ so, miɖe so amumu.
46006009	-
46006010	Miiɣe sɔ maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wa loikote iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃? Midaatã masɔsɔla mi! Mma nsɛ mabara ara lalaa, maɣɔsɔrɛdze, mma nsɛ maɖe asɔrɔ̃ marɔ̃go ma nsɛ marɛgu ma malaa ɣee marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛ marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa, mayukukpe ɣee mma anɔ nsɛ abe i maturi ara iso, mma nsɛ marɛ̃ ndã, mma nsɛ matia maturi ɣee mma nsɛ mayu maturi I inɔgba ame iibana kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃.
46006011	Ngbɔ i mawɛ̃ ɔse ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔɖi mi i mi akpi ame ɔpie mi ndu ɔbara mi sekelee ɔtã Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iyere ame. Iki i ɔ̃ gu Ɣaa Siwarã ɔso ne, mi gu Ɣaa ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ.
46006012	Mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to miɣɛ sɔ, “Loba ɔri loabara ira biara.” Gbaã iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ira biara iilɛgu-ɔ. Loawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loba ɔri loabara ira biara.” Ɣɛɛ iikote sɔ loatã kuira ɔɖe me iso.
46006013	Ɔmama ana aaɣɛ sɔ, “Aɖera ɔso mabara iyiri fiɛ iyiri ɔso maɖi aɖera.” Gbaã iɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔwi to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃afe. Iikote sɔ boasu bo sosina bobara asɔrɔ̃ra. Ɣɛɛ boasu bobara Ɣaa karabara fiɛ Ɣaa aatã sosina ira biara nɛ lonya sɛ̃.
46006014	Kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔtara Bosate ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃atara bo ana ku ɔ̃ ɔle gɔmɔ.
46006015	Miiɣe sɔ mi sosina ne, Kristo sosina kakpakpai miɖe? Fiɛ iikote sɔ miasu Kristo sosina kakpai kukawɛ̃ mimatãra i ngɔ losu asɔrɔ̃ra ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara.
46006016	Miiɣe ana sɔ si ɔturi ɔrɛgu ngɔmɔ igbã ne, ma gu wũ ɔɔkpese sosina siwɛ̃? Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃.”
46006017	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ losu so ɔmatãra i Bosate iso ne, ɔ̃ɔbaragu wũ ɔwɛ̃ i Siwarã ame.
46006018	Miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i asɔrɔ̃ra ame. Ikpi igbã biara nɛ ɔturi sɛ ɔbara ne, iisɛ ibo i ɔ̃ sosina ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ sosina mɔmɔ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔbara ikpi nɛmɔ.
46006019	Miiɣe sɔ mi siturina nɖe isɔrɛyo itã Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ ɔsu ɔtã mi sɔ siwe i mi ame? Iisiɖe mi mba so.
46006020	Ɣaa ɔtã kuso siare i mi iti. Ne ɔso misu mi siturina mibara ara wa loale Ɣaa.
46007001	I ɔko gɔ mitsɛrɛ me atɔ̃me iso ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi sɔ si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔrere pia gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔbara isɛɛ.
46007002	Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ i asɔrɔ̃ra ɔɣede ɔso ne, ikote sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara si ɔwe ɔ̃ ɔre. Ɔrɔ̃go biara ana si ɔwe ɔ̃ ɔrã.
46007003	Iikote sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aasɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔre sirɛ. Ngbɔ ame iikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go ana aasɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã sirɛ ne. Mabara matã so kumɛgɔ iakote ma ɔbiara.
46007004	Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go siturina iiɖe ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sire. Ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔrã ana sire siɖe. Ngbɔ ame i ɔrɛrɛ̃ siturina ana iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sire ne. Ɔ̃ ɔre ana ba ɔle i sɛ̃ iso.
46007005	Midaasɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã so sirɛ iɖo ɔwi gɔ miɖi misɛ sɔ miakparama kayi. Fiɛ si ayi wa misɛ sɔ miakparama kayi mmɔ ɔɔro ne, mikpese misɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ misi. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, Ɔbosam iibana ɔri i mi iso ɔla mi ɔnyɔ gɔ miisɛ miwo ɔɖe so iso.
46007006	Nnɛgbe iso ne, iiɖe mmara miɖe loto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ ɔka loto mi.
46007007	Gbaã ne, tee ibua ilɛ si mi ɔbiara se lɛ me. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbiara ku nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ. Ɔwɛ̃ ba karatã kawɛ̃, ɔmama ba kamama.
46007008	Mma loiyiri marã gu mare gu makuɛdze ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi sɔ ialɛgu mi iɖo si miiyiri marã gu mare fiɛ mise lɛ kumɛgɔ lose.
46007009	Ɣɛɛ si miibawo so ɔɖe iso ne, miyiri marã gu marɔ̃go si minyua ɔtsue ala mi ɔrakolo ɔso.
46007010	Marã gu mare ne, mmara mɛ loto lotã ma ne, iiɖe wũ mɔmɔ mire miɖe, ɣɛɛ Bosate mire miɖe. Iikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aasɛ̃ kurã.
46007011	Ɣɛɛ si ɔsɛ̃ kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɣee ɔkpese ɔ̃abara mawɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔrã. Ngbɔ ame i ɔrɛrɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre ne.
46007012	Ara tsɔra wagbe ne, mme ka nto loɣere mi, iiɖe Bosate mmara miɖe. Si fɔɖedze rɛrɛ̃ yiri ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go ɔnɔ karɔ̃ sɔ ɔ̃asɛ i kurã iyo ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ si ɔdaasɛ̃ wũ.
46007013	Ngbɔ ame si ɔrɔ̃go fɔɖedze yiri ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iibie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ̃ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, ɔrɔ̃go si ɔdaasɛ̃ wũ.
46007014	Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loifɔ ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asekelera wũ iki i ɔ̃ ɔre gɔ nɖe fɔɖedze iso. Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loifɔ ɔɖe sekelee ala ɔ̃ ɔrã gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe ɔso ne. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, ma mabi iito maase sekelee. Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara mabi Sekelee.
46007015	Ɣɛɛ si ngɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃asɛ̃ fɔɖedze ne, ɔ̃awo ɔrui faa. I ɔri gɔgbe igbã iso ne, ɔrɔ̃go fɔɖedze ɣee ɔrɛrɛ̃ fɔɖedze ba ɔri ɔ̃abara nnɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɣaa ɔkpere bo sɔ bowe i isobuɛ ame.
46007016	Fɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ fɔ nɖe fɔɖedze ne, iawo ɔki i fɔ iso sɔ aaɖi fɔ ɔrã gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze. Ngbɔ ame i fɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ana ne, iawo ɔɖe sɔ fɔ iso iaki i fɔ ɔre aana iɖi.
46007017	Nnɛ nsɛ lote i mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara si ɔsɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔsɛ fiɛ si ɔse lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
46007018	Si ɔɔtu sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ne, fɔ ne ngbɔ. Si aitu sirɛrɛ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ana ne, daaɣɛ sɔ aatu sirɛrɛ̃.
46007019	Alasɔ si atu sirɛrɛ̃ ɣee aitu ne, nnɛmɔ iito kuira. Ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ amɔɛ̃ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere bo ato nɖe nnɛ lonya iɖo.
46007020	Ne ɔso mi ɔbiara si ɔse kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
46007021	Si ɔsande aɖe atã ɔturi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ne, idaaɖa-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔri pia sɔ aawo isɛguso ɔfɔ ne, bara ne karabara.
46007022	Si ɔsande aɖe fiɛ Bosate ɔkpere-ɔ ne, ka aɖe ngɔ mba iwarã i Ɣaa ame. Ngɔ ana nsigu so fiɛ Bosate ɔkpere wũ ne, ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ɔkpese Bosate ɔsande.
46007023	Kuso siare i Ɣaa ɔtã i mi iti ne ɔso midaakpesera so maturi masande.
46007024	Manyii, mi ɔbiara si ɔse kumɛgɔ ɔse fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ.
46007025	I nnɛ mi karɛ i mma loiyiri marã gu mare iso ne, loifɔ mmara kumiwɛ̃ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ. Ɣɛɛ i Bosate nnyainyɔ nɛ nsia me iso ne, wũ adzuni ngbe ne fiɛ miawo wã ɔsiai.
46007026	Wũ adzuni kanya ne, kumɛgɔ i kayi to kawe ɔle ne, lofɔ loɖe sɔ ilɛ sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ aasɛ sɔ ɔ̃iyiri ɔrɔ̃go.
46007027	Si ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, daaɣɛ sɔ ato asɛ̃ wũ. Si aiyiri ana ne, daaɣɛ sɔ aabie ɔrɔ̃go ayiri.
46007028	Ɣɛɛ si ayiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, aibara ikpi. Si ɔbitɛ gɔ loiyiri kurã ɔsɛ ɔ̃ayiri kurã ne, ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ lobie sɔ loɖi mi i inyɛwe nɛ mpia i kuyiri ame.
46007029	Nnɛ nto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ɔwi gɔ boba iisisi. Ita i kiniɔ ne, mi ma nyiri marɔ̃go si misɛ lɛ mma loiyiri awe.
46007030	Mma nto mabiɛ ana si masɛ lɛ mma i kuira iito. Mma nto mama ne, masɛ lɛ mma loito mana isoɣɔ. Mma nto maɣa ara ne, mabara lɛ ara wa maɣa iiɖe ma mɔmɔ are.
46007031	Mma nto mabie kayi gagbe karana ɔɖuɖu sɔ kakpese ma kare si madaasu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i karana iso. Alasɔ kayi gagbe karana iibase ɖaa i ɔwi gɔ nto ɔba ame.
46007032	Loito lobie sɔ mimararã so i kuira iso. Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loiyiri ɔrɔ̃go sɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i Bosate karabara iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abo wũ anɔ.
46007033	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nyiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔ̃ adzuni sɛ asia i kayiiso ara iso. Ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara nnɛ loaɣɔ ɔ̃ ɔre kayiri.
46007034	Ne ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔwe i ara ka anyɔ ndɛ̃. Ngbɔ ame i ɔbitɛ gɔ loiyiri kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i Ɣaa karabara iso, ɔ̃ siwarã gu sosina ɔɖuɖu. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nyiri kurã ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ adzuni ɔsia i kayiiso ara iso, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abo ɔ̃ ɔrã anɔ.
46007035	Lobie sɔ loabuai mi ɔso nto loɣɛ ara wagbe. Loito lobie sɔ lonyi mi ku mmara kumiwɛ̃. Misɛ ngbã i ɔri tɔrɔrɔa iso si miawo so ɔsu ɔtã Ɣaa pelepele ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu.
46007036	Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔrere ɔɔkarɛ ɔrɔ̃go fiɛ ɔnya sɔ ɔ̃ibawo ɔɖe so iso lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔbu ne, mayiri so faa. Maibara ikpi.
46007037	Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ i kuira iito iɖaa fiɛ ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔ̃awo ɔɖe so iso ne, ɔ̃awo ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔyiri ɔrɔ̃go. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ana ɔbara isɛɛ.
46007038	Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ loyiri ɔrɔ̃go ne, ɔbara isɛɛ. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ loiyiri ɔrɔ̃go ɔbara isɛɛ ɔɖo.
46007039	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nyiri kurã ne, ɔna ɔri ɔyiri kurã mama ku ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔrã kuere si ngbã. Si ɔ̃ ɔrã gɔmɔ ɔkpi ne, ɔ̃awo kurã mama ɔyiri si ɔbie. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ ɔ̃ayiri si ɔɖe fɔɖedze.
46007040	Ɣɛɛ i wũ adzuni kanya ne, si ɔsɛ ɔ̃isiyiri kurã ne, ngbã aawe wũ ɔmɛrɛ̃ miɖo. Wũ adzuni aɖe ngbe, ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i wũ ame mme wũ.
46008001	Kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ loɣere mi ira i araɖea wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iso. Boɣe sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ba iwola, fiɛ boɣe ana sɔ iwola sɛ itã ɔturi ɔkɔlɛ so kato. Ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ ne, ɔle kusɛ kupia ɔturi.
46008002	Ɔbiara gɔ lobu sɔ ɔɣe ara ne, ɔtsue sɔ ɔ̃itsue ɔro pelepele.
46008003	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa ne, Ɣaa ɣe wũ.
46008004	Nnɛ loto loɣere mi i araɖea wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ iɖe iso ne, boɣe sɔ aɣɔ kuawɛ̃ na i kayiiso fiɛ boɣe ana sɔ maɣaa kumawɛ̃ ana na, Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔɖe mpia.
46008005	Ɣɛɛ sɔ maturi sɛ maɣɛ sɔ aɣɔ gu masate pia i kato ɣee karɔ̃ ngbe fiɛ aɣɔ wagbe ɔsi gbodzoo ana ne,
46008006	bo boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã mpia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɔse gɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔ̃ bosi ngbã botã. Sate ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ mpia nɖe Yesu Kristo gɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔbara ara ɔɖuɖu fiɛ ɔ̃ iso iki bosi ngbã.
46008007	Iiɖe ɔbiara nɣe ɔnukuare gɔgbe. Ara wa i maturi ɔɖi masɛ mato masɔrɛ ne, si maɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ wã ne, masɛ mabu sɔ aɣɔ aɖera aɖe. Ma kaɣere ga nna ɔle sɛ katã ma ipɔ sɔ maɔpukutura so i aɖera wa maɖe ɔso.
46008008	Iiɖe aɖera loatã sɔ bo gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃ aanina. Fiɛ iito kuira si boiɖe ara wamɔ. Ngbɔ ame boibana kuira si boɖe ara wamɔ ana ne.
46008009	Ɣɛɛ minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ mi isɛguso nɛ ame mipia iibakɔ ngɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ipia i ikpi ame.
46008010	Bu nyɔ sɔ si ngɔ kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ɔnya fɔ gɔ fɔ mba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame to aɖe ara i kuɣɔ iyo ne, nda iabara wũ? Ɔ̃abu sɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃awo aɖera ɔsɛ aaɖe i kuɣɔ iyo ame mmɔ faa.
46008011	Ne ɔso ne, fɔ ɔnyii gɔ iti i Kristo ɔkpi fiɛ ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe na ɔle to ɔ̃ayu ala nnɛ abara i fɔ iwola iti.
46008012	I ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, ato aɣɛrɛ Kristo sɔ atã manyii fɔɖedze ma kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle to maana imararãso i ma situ ame.
46008013	Ne ɔso si wũ aɖera atã wũ ɔnyii ɔbara ikpi ne, loibaɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ lonya sɔ iibatã wũ ɔnyii ɔbo i ikpi ame.
46009001	Iiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsigu so loɖe ɣɛɛ? Iiɖe Bosate Yesu Katɔ̃mesɛdze nɖe? Loinya Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate? Fiɛ iiɖe mi nɖe wũ karabara ga lobara lotã Bosate kusia ɖeakatɔ̃?
46009002	Si mawɛ̃ iibafɔ me lɛ Bosate Katɔ̃mesɛdze awe ne, mi mifɔ me ngbɔ. Mi mɔmɔ nɖe ikparĩ nɛ loate sɔ Bosate Katɔ̃mesɛdze loɖe.
46009003	Si maturi to mabie sɔ maakpadzɛ̃gu me atɔ̃me ne, nnɛgbe loaɖi so ala kanya ne.
46009004	I bo karabara kanya ne, boba ɔri sɔ maatã bo ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ.
46009005	Bo wũ boba ɔri sɔ boakɔ bo mare fɔɖedze bosɛgu lɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra gu Bosate manyiibi gu Petro awe.
46009006	Ɛɛbɛrɛ mme gu Barnaba ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã loabara karabara bonyɔ so iso?
46009007	Kpakpɛ̃dze biara ana sɛ ɔfɔ kuso ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ karabara ame. Fiɛ Kpɛ̃dze biara ana ba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame araɖea. Mabɔi kɔdze biara ana ba ɔri sɔ ɔ̃anɛ ɔ̃ mabɔi inyɛdu.
46009008	Iiɖe ara wa i maturi to maɣɛ ɔso kere nto loɣɛ ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ ngbɔ i mmara ɔte ne.
46009009	Boka i Mose ɔko ame sɔ, “Bɔi gɔ nsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ ɔtã-ɔ ne, daanyi wũ kanya.” Ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe mabɔi iso i Ɣaa to ɔɖe ika.
46009010	Bo iso i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛmɔ. Ngbɔ ame i kpɛ̃dze gɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ ɔraɖui gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔsɔrɛ̃ ɔbɔ kaa ne, ma inyɔɔ sɛ manyɔ ɔri sɔ maana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔraɖui gɔmɔ ame.
46009011	Bopɛ siwarã ame ɔraɖui i mi ame. Ne ɔso si mitã bo sosina ame ara ne, iinina kuira.
46009012	Si maturi mama to mana kusia gɔgbe igbã i mi iso ne, iikote sɔ bo wũ boana ngɔ losi kuɖo? Ɣɛɛ sɔ boba ɔri gɔgbe ne, boisu bobara kuira. Bosu ira biara bosia so iso sɔ boibasu kuira botɛ̃ra Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔri kukakɔi.
46009013	Miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ mma nsɛ mabara karabara i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ne, mmɔ masɛ mafɔ ma araɖea mabɔrɛgu. Fiɛ mma nsɛ mafɛ̃ ara matã Ɣaa i isɔrɛkasege iso ne, mmɔ masɛ mafɔ ma aɖera mabɔrɛgu.
46009014	Ngbɔ ame kere i Bosate ɔtã sɔ mma nsɛ mapɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ne, itɔ̃me nɛmɔ iɣɛ ame maaɖe ara maɖi.
46009015	Atoa sɔ loba ɔri gɔgbe ne, loibara ɔ̃ karabara. Loito lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe sɔ si lowanyi mi nnɛ nɖe wũ ɔkpɛ. Si lokpi kɔra ne, ilɛ me iɖo sɔ ɔturi aanyɔ ira nɛ iso loawo ndamu ɔɖe pupurii.
46009016	Nna ɔri loakɔlɛ so kato i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ iso. Ndzo miɖe mitã me si losɛ̃ sɔ loito loɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me!
46009017	Si lobara wũ karabara ku ɔtu ɣɔa ne, iyɔ loanyɔ ɔri lotã kuso ifɔ. Ɣɛɛ ne, loto lobara kã ala Bosate lopia me sɔ lobara fiɛ Ɣaa loɣedza me i kã kanya.
46009018	Mme kuso loafɔ iyɔ? Wũ kuso nɖe sɔ loaɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛmɔ kere. Fiɛ loibara ɔle gɔ loba karabara lotã wũ kusia.
46009019	Ɔturi gɔ nsigu so loɖe fiɛ lona i kuwɛ̃ kayirinɔ. Ɣɛɛ lobara so ɔbiara ɔɖabo sɔ loawo maturi gbodzoo ɔkɔ ɔbɔ Bosate kɔrɛ.
46009020	Ɔwi gɔ loto lobara karabara i ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne, losɛ ngbã lɛ ɔ Yudase awe sɔ loawo ma ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate. Ɣɛɛ sɔ lona i Mose mmara kayirinɔ ne, losɛ lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso sɔ si loawo ma ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔbɔ Bosate kɔrɛ.
46009021	Ngbɔ ame lobara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne. Loisɛ lobara i ma Yudase mmara iso sɔ si loawo ma ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate. Nnɛgbe iite sɔ lota loɣɛ i Ɣaa mmara iso. Alasɔ gbaã ne, Kristo mmara iso nto loɖe.
46009022	Si lopia i mma kafɔkaɖe nna ɔle ndɛ̃ ne, losɛ lobara so lɛ ma awe sɔ loawo ma ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔbɔ Bosate. Ne ɔso nsɛ lokpesera so ira biara lotã maturi ɔɖuɖu i ɔri biara iso sɔ si loawo mawɛ̃ ɔɖi ɔtã Bosate.
46009023	Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔso lobara nwagbe ɔɖuɖu sɔ loana isoɣɔ nɛ mpia i karabara ame.
46009024	Miɣe sekelee sɔ si mato matere ise ne, maturi gbodzoo nsɛ matere, ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã pɛ nsɛ ɔɖe iso. Ne ɔso mitere ise sɔ miaɖe iso mifɔ ikoto.
46009025	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔtere ise ne, ɔsɛ ɔfɔ ikpadzɛ̃ sɔ si ɔ̃aɖe iso. Ikoto nɛ masɛ fɔ ne, iisɛ ise dzoroo fiɛ isɛ inina. Ɣɛɛ bo ne, boaledza so botã ikoto nɛ loisɛ inina inya.
46009026	Nnɛgbe ɔso nsɛ lotere tɔrɔrɔ sɔ loaɖaɛ iwɛĩ ne. Ne ɔso ana lose lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ imami ɣɛɛ loisɛ lopɛ akama i ɔwiri ame ne.
46009027	Nsɛ lotã wũ sosina ɔfɔ akama gbodzoo sɔ loabɔsɛ̃ karɔ̃. Alasɔ si loɣere maturi Itɔ̃me Bielea fiɛ mafiniki ne, loito lobie sɔ maaɣere me i kawirikɔ̃ sɔ loikote.
46010001	Wũ manyii, lobie sɔ mianyigi ara wa loba i bo mawa ma losiai Mose iso. Idɔdɔ ɔsɛgu ma, ikɔ ma ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maki i Ɔpo Rɛtɛa ndɛ̃ mafe.
46010002	Ɣaa ɔsu idɔdɔ gu Ɔpo Rɛtɛa ɔbara Ɣaa itupie kubarara ɔtã ma lɛ Mose masiaidze awe.
46010003	Ma ɔɖuɖu ɔɖe Siwarã ame araɖea awɛ̃ saã.
46010004	Fiɛ manɛ Siwarã ame ndu miwɛ̃ saã mɛmɔ. Manɛ ndu mɛ lobɔrɛ i Siwarã ame ita nɛ losiai ma ame. Ita nɛmɔ nɖe Kristo mɔmɔ ne.
46010005	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame kɔra ne, so iiɣɔ Ɣaa i ma mawɛ̃ iso ala ma nsɛgbai ɔso. Ne ɔso ne, makpi i fafuĩ ame.
46010006	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ɖe ara isuã si ite bo sɔ ara wa nsɛ abɔ ikpi si adaakpɛ̃ bo ɔkã lɛ ma awe,
46010007	ɣee bosu so botã aɣɔsɔrɛra lɛ ma awe. Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Maturi ɔba maasakanya sɔ mato mapia so isoɣɔ, ɣɛɛ ma isoɣɔ ɔba iakpese itarɛ̃ gu asɔrɔ̃ iɖe katɔ.”
46010008	Iikote sɔ boaɖe asɔrɔ̃ kumɛgɔ mabara fiɛ i iyi iwɛ̃ saã iso ne, maturi kukpi sinyɔ itɛ ɔkpi.
46010009	Midaatã bola Bosate bonyɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mabara fiɛ maɣɛ ɔɖoɖo ma makpi.
46010010	Fiɛ midaatã bota boya Ɣaa iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i ma mawɛ̃ ɔbara fiɛ Ɣaa Kpabo gɔ nto kukpi ɔle ɔwɔra ma.
46010011	Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ma iso si iaɖe ara isuã itã maturi. Matsɛrɛ wã masɛ ana sɔ si boasu boka so alasɔ kayiiso kawirikɔ̃ ɔwi ame bopia kiniɔ.
46010012	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbu sɔ ɔɣɛ teteree ne, ɔnyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ ɔ̃ibabɔrɛ ɔrɔ̃.
46010013	Ilainyɔ igbã biara nɛ loɔba mi iso ne, nɛ ame kere nsɛ iba i ɔturi biara iso ne. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso sɔ ɔ̃ibatã ilainyɔ ɔwe ɔle iɖo fɔ kafɔkaɖe. Fiɛ ana ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã-ɔ ɔle sɔ aawo ɔya teteree fiɛ ɔ̃ate-ɔ ɔri gɔ iso aaki fiɛ aabɔrɛ i ne ame.
46010014	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i iɣɔsɔrɛ ame.
46010015	Nto loka mi lɛ manɔgbadze awe, ne ɔso mi mɔmɔ mikere ara wa nto loɣere mi minyɔ.
46010016	Ikɔi nɛ bosɛ bosɛ ala ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba i ne iti ne, si bonɛ ara i ne ame ne, iɣɛ itã Bosate ima. Fiɛ boɖoboɖo gɔ bosɛ boɖe i ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ ana ne, ɔɣɛ ɔtã Bosate sosina.
46010017	Atoa sɔ bosi gbodzoo ne, gɔ boɖoboɖo ikuri iwɛ̃ i bo ɔɖuɖu sɛ boɖe ɔso ne sosina siwɛ̃ ka boɖe.
46010018	Mibu Israel mabi minyɔ. Mma nsɛ maɖe ara wa masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa ne, maɔbara mawɛ̃ ku Ɣaa i ma isɔrɛ ame.
46010019	Be ɔso nto loɣɛ ngbɔ? Ɔɣɛ loto sɔ aɣɔ wa mapɔ ɣee ara wa masu masɔrɛ wã ne, ira iwɛ̃ iɖe?
46010020	Ooɣo! Nnɛ loto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ara wa masɛ masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ ne, siwarã lalaa siɖe masu wã matã, iiɖe Ɣaa. Fiɛ loito lobie sɔ miɖe kulaa ku siwarã lalaa kusiwɛ̃.
46010021	Iilɛ sɔ mianɛ mibɔrɛgu i Bosate ikɔi ame miledza inɛ ibɔrɛgu i siwarã lalaa ana ikɔi ame. Iikote sɔ miaɖe ara i Bosate ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ i isɔrɛyo misɛ mialedza araɖea iɖe i siwarã lalaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ana.
46010022	Ɛɛbɛrɛ ɔbie boto sɔ Bosate si ɔna sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ sirerɛ? Bofɔ boɖe sɔ boba ɔle boɖo wũ?
46010023	Bosɛ boɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔri pia sɔ boabara ira biara.” Gbaã iɖe. Ɣɛɛ iiɖe ira biara nlɛ. Ɔri pia sɔ boabara ira biara, ɣɛɛ iiɖe ira biara nɖe kusia itã bo.
46010024	Fɔɖedze kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabie ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, ɣɛɛ ɔbie nnɛ loakote ɔ̃ malaa.
46010025	Aba ɔri aaɣa sina igbã biara dzɛ mato marɔdɛ̃ aɖe. Ɣɛɛ iikote sɔ ala ɔkarɛ sɔ sina sekelea siɖe ɛɛbɛrɛ kuɣɔ masu masɔrɛ.
46010026	Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Kayi gu kã ara ɔɖuɖu wa mpia i kã ame ne, Bosate mba.”
46010027	Si ngɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze ɔkpere-ɔ sɔ ba ɖegu wũ ara fiɛ atɔrã sɔ aasɛ ne, ibiara nɛ ɔtã-ɔ sɔ ɖe ne, ɖe ɣɛɛ daakarɛ anɔ sɔ isekele ɛɛbɛrɛ iisekele.
46010028	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔɣere-ɔ sɔ kuɣɔ masu aɖera wamɔ masɔrɛ ala ne, daaɖe. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, kaɣere to kaaɖaa ngɔmɔ.
46010029	Iiɖe fɔ gɔ fɔ loɖe ara wamɔ i kaɣere aɖaa. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lonya-ɔ fiɛ ɔɣere-ɔ i kaɣere aɖaa. Ɔrere aawo ɔkarɛ sɔ, “Si loba ɔri loabara irere ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔturi mama kaɣere ɔso ne, loanyua ɔbara?
46010030	Si lopɛ Ɣaa siba i araɖea wa ɔtã me iti ne, be ɔso fiɛ ɔmama aabu sɔ loɣɛrɛ wũ i wã iti gɔ loɔpɛ Ɣaa siba?”
46010031	Ɣɛɛ i bo ɔɖe gu ɔnɛ ame ne, ikote sɔ boabara wã ɔɖuɖu botã Ɣaa iyere kato ikɔlɛ.
46010032	Midaabara kuira nɛ loatɛ̃ ma Yudase ɣee mma loiɖe ma Yudase ɣee mafɔɖedze Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔri.
46010033	Mibara lɛ kumɛgɔ nsɛ lobara wũ ira biara fiɛ loisɛ lota loya kuwɛ̃ iso. Loisɛ lobie wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, ɣɛɛ nnɛ loabara fiɛ iaɖe isɛɛ itã ɔbiara iɖi.
46011001	Misore wũ nsɛgbai lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ nto losore Kristo nsɛgbai.
46011002	Nsɛ lole mi alasɔ misɛ minyigi me ɔwi biara ame fiɛ misɛ minyigi ara wa lote mi. Mito mibara i wã iso ɔwi biara.
46011003	Ɣɛɛ loto lobie sɔ minɔ karɔ̃ kukaakɔ sɔ ne, Kristo nɖe ɔturi biara iti. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ nɖe ɔ̃ ɔre iti fiɛ Ɣaa nɖe Kristo iti.
46011004	Ne ɔso ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nsɛ ɔkparama kayi ɣee ɔpɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me imomo i Ɣaa iyo fiɛ ɔsu ira ɔfu so iti ne, ɔto ɔpia Kristo kunuarɛ.
46011005	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ ana nsɛ ɔkparama kayi ɣee ɔpɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me imomo i Ɣaa iyo fiɛ ɔ̃inyi ɖuku iti ne, ɔto ɔpia ɔ̃ ɔrã kunuarɛ. Ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ɔ̃ gu ngɔ lokparɛ̃ ɔ̃ iti ndɛ̃.
46011006	Si ɔrɔ̃go ɔrere sɔ ɔ̃ibanyi ɖuku iti ne, iyɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔkpariɛ̃. Fiɛ si iti ikparɛ̃ sɛ ibɔ ɔrɔ̃go anɔ karɔ̃ ne, iyɔ ɔnyi ɖuku iti.
46011007	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɣɛɛ ne, iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu kuira ɔfu iti ala Ɣaa ɔbara wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa kuwarɛ ɔte ne. Fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go ana sɛ ɔɖi ɔrɛrɛ̃ kuwarɛ ɔte.
46011008	Alasɔ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, iiɖe ɔrɔ̃go i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔbara ɔrɔ̃go ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ame.
46011009	Iiɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔbara ɔrɛrɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔrɔ̃go.
46011010	Kato makpabo ɔso ne, ikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aasu ɖuku ɔnyi iti si ɔte sɔ ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔrã kayirinɔ.
46011011	Atoa sɔ ise ngbɔ ne, mafɔɖedze ma nɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo kasɛ iise ngbɔ. Ɔrɔ̃go iisigu so fiɛ ɔrɛrɛ̃ ana iisigu so.
46011012	Alasɔ kumɛgɔ mabara ɔrɔ̃go maɖi i ɔrɛrɛ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i ɔrɔ̃go ana sɛ ɔɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ ne, ɣɛɛ ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ abɔrɛ.
46011013	Mi mɔmɔ minyɔ si ikote sɔ ɔrɔ̃go aaya ɔkparama kayi sɔ ɔ̃ifu so ara iti?
46011014	Ngbã mɔmɔ kɔra ɔte bo sɔ iilɛ sɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ iti aafe iyi. Si ɔrɛrɛ̃ iti ɔyi kpitii ne, ka isɛ ikpɛ̃ wũ kunuarɛ.
46011015	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɔ̃go iti ɔyi ne, iɖe kuwarɛ itã wũ. Alasɔ Ɣaa lotã wũ siwɛrɛ̃ tagbaraa sɔ ɔsu ɔfu iti.
46011016	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere to ɔbie sɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, nnɛ kotoo loaɣere wũ nɖe sɔ, kuira siina gɔ loaɣɛ iɖo nnɛgbe fiɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ana iisitɔrã i kuira mama iso.
46011017	I ara wa nto loba loate ngbe ame ne, loibawo mi ɔle. Alasɔ si miba miasarɛ sɔ mito misɔrɛ Ɣaa ne, ara sɛɛ wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i mi isarɛ ame iisi lɛ ara lalaa.
46011018	Iɖeakatɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, lonɔ sɔ si misakanya lɛ mafɔɖedze ne, miɣɛɣɛ so i akuri ame. Lofɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe loɖe.
46011019	Ina ɣaa sɔ kakpadzɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ si iate ikpaki nɛ mpia i mma nɖe mafɔɖedze gbaã gu mma loiɖe ndɛ̃.
46011020	Si misakanya ne, iiɖe Bosate ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ aɖera misɛ miɖe.
46011021	Alasɔ si miba miasakanya ne, miisɛ miya misia so fiɛ misɛ mitsɛ aɖera iɖe. Ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ i kukã to mawɛ̃ ne, mawɛ̃ ka marɛ̃ ndã.
46011022	Mina ayo ngbegɔ miaɖe ara minɛ ndã? Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miapia Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ikuri kunuarɛ mikuti misopara mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba? Be si nɣere mi? Loibawo mi ɔle i nnɛgbe ame. Ooɣo!
46011023	Alasɔ nnɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ nto lote mi ngbe. Kasɛ̃ ga ame maɖi Bosate Yesu matã ne, ɔsu boɖoboɖo.
46011024	Gɔ ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba ne, ɔbɛse boɖoboɖo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Wũ siturina dzɛ losu losɔrɛ Ɣaa lotã mi ngbe ne. Mifɔ miɖe si misu minyigi me.”
46011025	Ngbɔ ame gɔ maɖe ara maro ne, ɔsu ikɔi, ne ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ikɔi nɛgbe nɖe nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔto ɔnyigu mi kanya ɣɛtɛ ga wũ ima nɖe ikparĩ ne. Ɔwi biara gɔ mianɛ ne, misu minyigi me ala.”
46011026	Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ ɔwi biara gɔ miaɖe ɣee mianɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe ame ne, mito mikama Bosate kukpi gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza iba.
46011027	Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe Bosate aɖera wagbe ɣee ɔnɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe ame i ɔri gɔ loikote iso ne, ɔɖe ipɔ ala ɔ̃iwarɛ Bosate siturina gu ɔ̃ ima.
46011028	Ne ɔso ɔbiara si ɔbo so ame kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe boɖoboɖo gɔgbe fiɛ ɔ̃anɛ i Bosate ikɔi nɛgbe ame.
46011029	Alasɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔwarɛ Bosate Siturina fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖe boɖoboɖo gɔgbe ɣee ɔnɛ i ikɔi nɛgbe kanya ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe, ɔnɛ atɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔtã so.
46011030	Ne lotã sɔ gbodzoo i mi ndɛ̃ to manyɛ, somina na ma ɔle, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔɔkpi ne.
46011031	Si bobo so ame kukaakɔ bokpa so ne, Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me.
46011032	Ɣɛɛ si Bosate ɔɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo kutsue ne, iyɔ Ɣaa iibawɔra bo gu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze.
46011033	Ne ɔso ne manyii, si misakanya sɔ mito miba miaɖe Bosate aɖera ne, miya misia so.
46011034	Si kukã to ɔrere ne, ɔɖe ara i ɔ̃ iyo sɔ Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me lɛ ikuri awe. Si loɔba ne, loaka mi i ara tsɔra iso.
46012001	Kiniɔ ne wũ manyii, i ɔko gɔ mitsɛrɛ me i Ɣaa Siwarã karatã iso ne, loito lobie sɔ kuira aawɛrɛ mi.
46012002	Miɣe sɔ ɔwi gɔ miɖe maɣɔsɔrɛdze ne, mitã ara wa nna ngbã ɔɖe mi iso fiɛ abara karabara i mi iso.
46012003	Ne ɔso lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ ɔbiara gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɖe iso iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Sigbarĩ si siba i Yesu iso.” Ngbɔ ame ana i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Yesu nɖe Bosate,” si Siwarã Bielea iito siɖe wũ iso ne.
46012004	Siwarã karatã gbodzoo pia, ɣɛɛ Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã siɖe lotã kã.
46012005	Bosɛ bobara Ɣaa karabara i siri agbãagbã iso, ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔwɛ̃ saã karabara boto bobara.
46012006	Karabara agbãagbã ana pia, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔmɔ ame nsɛ ɔtã ɔle fiɛ maabara kã ne.
46012007	Karatã biara ga i ɔrere ba ne, Ɣaa Siwarã lotã wũ sɔ ɔsu ɔbara karabara ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu kusia.
46012008	Ɣaa Siwarã ɔtã ɔwɛ̃ iwola nɛ loatã sɔ ɔ̃awo maturi ika ɔɖe. Ɔmama ana ne, Siwarã ɔtã wũ inɔgba nɛ ɔ̃aɖe ala maturi ika fiɛ maanɔ karɔ̃.
46012009	Ɔmama ana ba kafɔkaɖe siare iki i Siwarã dzɛmɔ ame ame. Fiɛ ɔmama ne, Siwarã dzɛmɔ ame ɔtã wũ sinyɛ isa karatã.
46012010	Siwarã sɛ sitã ɔwɛ̃ ɔle sɔ ɔ̃abara awawãra, ɔmama ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ, ɔmama ana ne, Siwarã agbãagbã itsue iɖi ite. Fiɛ ɔmama ɔ̃ wũ ne, siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ. Ɔmama ana ne, siɖe agbãagbã karɔ̃ iɖi.
46012011	Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã dzɛmɔ karabara kaɖe. Sisɛ siɣɛ maturi karatã lɛ kumɛgɔ sibie.
46012012	Kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃ ɣɛɛ ngɔi agbãagbã pia i kɔ̃ iso. Ngbɔ ame i Kristo ɖe ɔwɛ̃ ne, ɣɛɛ ɔba ngɔi agbãagbã.
46012013	Maki i Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã ame mabara bo kuturidziri kuwɛ̃. Ɔ Yudase aɖe o-o, aiɖe ɔ Yudase o-o, ɔsande aɖe o-o, asigu so o-o, bo ɔɖuɖu Ɣaa itupie kubarara kuwɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame i Siwarã ɔtã bo ne. Siwarã siwɛ̃ saã dzɛmɔ ame ndu masu matã bo bonɛ ne.
46012014	Kuturidziri ne, kuiɖe ira iwɛ̃ kere. Ɣɛɛ ara agbãagbã losakanya abara kuturidziri.
46012015	Si kukpa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gɔ iiɖe kɔrɔ̃ loɖe ɔso ne, loiɖe kuturidziri kakpai ne, iyɔ kukpa iisibua i kuturidziri iso?”
46012016	Fiɛ si kutsue ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gɔ iiɖe me nɖe inɔmi ɔso ne, loisibua i kuturidziri iso” ne, iite sɔ kutsue iisimatã i kuturidziri iso?
46012017	Si kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ne inɔmi kuɖe ne, nda kuabara fiɛ kuanɔ ara? Si kutsue ana kere ana kuɖe ne, nda kuabara fiɛ kuasu ara ɔfiã?
46012018	Ɣɛɛ si bokarã inɔ ne, boanya sɔ Ɣaa ɔsu sosina ira biara ɔmatãra i ngbegɔ ɔɖɔɛ sɔ iwe.
46012019	Si kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ kere iɖe ne, nda iase?
46012020	Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ boɔnya ne, ɔturi iso ara ɔsi, ɣɛɛ kuturidziri ɖe kuwɛ̃.
46012021	Ne ɔso inɔmi iibawo kɔrɔ̃ ɔɣere sɔ, “Loito lobie-ɔ i wũ kuira ame.” Iti ana iibawo kukpa ɔɣere sɔ, “Ainya me i kuira ame.”
46012022	Kuturidziri ngɔi mɛ lonyɔ ɣɛkpɛtɛ miɖo ne, si mina boibawo kuira ɔbara.
46012023	Ngɔi mɛ boisɛ bowarɛ ne, me kɔra bosɛ bodzuɛ̃ kukaakɔ boɖo ne. Fiɛ ngɔi mɛ loikote sɔ boaɖi bosɔ̃ i ɔgbami ne, bosɛ bokɔla me kukaakɔ.
46012024	Boisɛ bobara ngbɔ botã ngɔi mɛ nto milɛ ɔnyɔ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔfinikira nrɔɔ̃ i kuturidziri iso sɔ bosɛ bowarɛ ngɔi mɛ nna ɔle boɖo.
46012025	Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ si iɣɛɣɛso iibawe i kuturidziri ame, ɣɛɛ kakɔi biara aawarɛ kã ɔlaa.
46012026	Fiɛ si kuturidziri kakɔi kawɛ̃ to kanya ibo ne, sosina ɔɖuɖu sɛ sinya ibo. Ngbɔ ame si male kakɔi kawɛ̃ ne, ngɔi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu sɛ mina isoɣɔ.
46012027	Ne ɔso mi ɔɖuɖu mamatã i Kristo kuturidziri iso fiɛ boɖe ɔ̃ sosina ngɔi iwɛ̃ iwɛ̃.
46012028	I mafɔɖedze ikuri ame ne, Ɣaa ɔsu bo ɔɖuɖu ɔsia i ngbegɔ lokote bo. Ma ɖeakatɔ̃ nɖe katɔ̃memasɛdze, manyɔa nɖe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, matɛare nɖe maratedze, iyɔ mma nsɛ mabara awawãra fiɛ mma mba sinyɛ isa ɔle, iyɔ mabuaidze, iyɔ matɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nsɛ maɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ana.
46012029	Iiɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu nɖe katɔ̃memasɛdze ɣee kanyamaɖidze ɣee maratedze. Ngbɔ ame iiɖe ɔbiara mba ɔle gɔ ɔ̃asu ɔbara ala awawãra ne.
46012030	Iiɖe ɔbiara mba ɔle gɔ masɛ masu masa sinyɛ ɣee maɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ɣee maɖi ara wa maɣɛ karɔ̃.
46012031	Ne ɔso misu mi situ misia i karatã ga lokɔlɛ kato kaɖo iso. Kiniɔ ne, loate mi nnɛ lonya iɖo wã ɔɖuɖu.
46013001	Si loawo siɖe agbãagbã wa i maturi gu Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu sɛ maɣɛ ɔɣɛ fiɛ loisɛ loɖɔɛ maturi ne, wũ kutsuɛ iɣɛ ɔɖuɖu ne, siefe kere iɖe lɛ ipoodzɛ mato masa.
46013002	Si loawo Ɣaa kanya ɔɖi fiɛ loanɔ awɛrɛra karɔ̃, loba inɔgba ɔɖuɖu fiɛ loba kafɔkaɖe ga loawo abe ɔrui fiɛ lona kuɖɔɛ ne, loiɖe kuira.
46013003	Si losu wũ karana ɔɖuɖu lotã mawɛrɛba fiɛ lotã matsuedza me ɣɛɛ lona kuɖɔɛ lotã maturi ne, loiɖe kuira.
46013004	Kuɖɔɛ sɛ kuɣara so, kuba kayiribielea. Kuisɛ kubɛbɛ anɔ, kuisɛ kukɔlɛ so kato, kuisɛ kuɖe ndamu.
46013005	Kuɖɔɛ na atsuele, kuisɛ kubie kɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, kuisɛ kuna sikpã malamala. Kuɖɔɛ iisɛ kumɔɛ̃ akpi kupia i ɔtu ame dzoroo.
46013006	Kuisɛ kuna isoɣɔ i ikpi iso. Ɣɛɛ so sɛ siɣɔ kɔ̃ i isɛɛ iso.
46013007	Kuɖɔɛ sɛ kufɔ ira biara pɔkɔsɔɔ, nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ kɔ̃ i ɔriinyɔ gu kafɔkaɖe ame, kuɖɔɛ ba ɔdzini.
46013008	Kuɖɔɛ na kawirikɔ̃. Ɣaa kanya iɖi to iafe, siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ to iafe, fiɛ inɔgba ana ɔwi to ɔ̃afe.
46013009	Alasɔ inɔgba gu kanya iɖi karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã bo ne, iiro ɔyi.
46013010	Ɔwi gɔ i nnɛ loyi iro aaba ne, iyɔ nnɛ loiro ɔyi ɔwi to ɔ̃afe.
46013011	Ɔwi gɔ loɖe ɔbiɛtɛ ne, loɖe ika lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ awe, lobu iti ame lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ fiɛ wũ ara karɔ̃ inɔ ana ɔse lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ loɔmɔ ne, loɔnyua sibiɛtɛ ɔwi ara losɛ ala ana me kusia.
46013012	Ara wa boto bonyɔ kiniɔ ne, boto bonya furufuru lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ ame boto bonyɔ. Kama kama ne, boto boanya ara anɔ ku anɔ. Ara wa loɣe kiniɔ ne, aiyi pelepele ɣɛɛ kama kama ne, nto loatsue wã kukaakɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa ɣe me kukaakɔ.
46013013	Ne ɔso ne, ara ka atɛ aɖe mpia. Wã nɖe kafɔkaɖe, ɔriinyɔ gu kuɖɔɛ. Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lomɔ iɖo i wã ɔɖuɖu ame nɖe kuɖɔɛ.
46014001	Ne ɔso kuɖɔɛ si kuɖe nnɛ miatere misiai miɖo, ɣɛɛ mibie siwarã ame karatã mama ana titirio Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya iɖi.
46014002	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã ne, iiɖe maturi ɔto ɔɖegu ika ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔto. Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔnɔ karɔ̃, ɣɛɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ara wɛrɛa iki i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame.
46014003	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔtã maturi ne, ɔsɛ ɔbuai ma sɔ maamɔ, ɔpia ma ɔle gu kaɣɔra.
46014004	Ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ siɖe dzɛ i kuwɛ̃ iito ɔnɔ karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ kere nto ɔbuai so. Ɣɛɛ ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔsɛ ɔbuai mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔɖuɖu.
46014005	Ito me ɔkã sɔ mi ɔɖuɖu aawo siɖe agbãagbã ɔɣɛ. Ɣɛɛ si miawo Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔɖi ɔtã maturi ne, iawe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ ibua. Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya ɔtã maturi ne, ɔba kusia ɔɖo ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã, ɣɛɛ si ɔrere pia gɔ ɔ̃awo ara wa ɔto ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ɔɖi ne, iyɔ mafɔɖedze ikuri to iana katɔ̃ isɛ.
46014006	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, si loba mi kɔrɛ fiɛ nto loɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã dzɛ miito minɔ karɔ̃ ne, mme kusia miana miɖi i ne ame? Ɣɛɛ si loba ku Ɣaa iɖi ite irere ɣee inɔgba irere ɣee Ɣaa itɔ̃me irere ɣee ara ite irere ne, iaɖe mi kusia.
46014007	Ngbɔ ame ise i kadadã gu ɔsango gɔ ame ngbã na ɣɛɛ si mafɛ̃ ne, isɛ iɖi silɔ. Si silɔ agbãagbã iibɔrɛ kukaakɔ ne, nda maabara maatsue kuka gɔ ɔturi to ɔfɛ̃?
46014008	Si ngɔ lofɛ̃ kadadã iifɛ̃ kukaakɔ ɔte nnɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ ne, nda i maturi aaledza so matã kakpã?
46014009	Ngbɔ ame ise i ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ ara i siɖe agbãagbã ame fiɛ maturi iito manɔ nnɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ne. Ɔwiri ame kere ɔto ɔɖe ika ɔpia.
46014010	Siɖe agbã gbodzoo pia i kayiiso fiɛ ku siɖe na dzɛ nna karɔ̃.
46014011	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere iito ɔnɔ siɖe dzɛ nto loɣɛ ne, iyɔ loɖe ɔfɔ i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖe ɔfɔ i wũ kɔrɛ.
46014012	Gɔ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ mi mito mibie siwarã ame karatã ne, mitã sɔ mi anɔ aarɛtɛ i karatã ga loamɔra mafɔɖedze ikuri iso.
46014013	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã si ɔtã Ɣaa iti sɔ atã wũ siɖe karɔ̃ iɖi si ɔ̃awo nnɛ ɔɣɛ karɔ̃ ɔɖi.
46014014	Alasɔ si nto lokparama kayi i siɖe dzɛ loito lonɔ ame ne, wũ siwarã siɖe nto sikparama kayi ɣɛɛ iiɖe wũ adzuni.
46014015	Ne ɔso be loabara? Loakparama kayi gu wũ siwarã, ɣɛɛ loakparamagu wũ adzuni fiɛ loaka kuka ana ku wũ siwarã gu wũ adzuni.
46014016	Fiɛ si aɣɛ apɛ Ɣaa siba i fɔ siwarã ame kerekere ne, nda i fɔ ɔlaa gɔ nɣɛ i fɔ kɔrɛ aabara fiɛ ɔ̃anɔ nnɛ ato aɣɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atɔrã ɔsia sɔ iba ngbɔ gɔ ɔ̃inɔ nnɛ aɣɛ karɔ̃?
46014017	Iawo ɔɖe sɔ tee abua apɛ Ɣaa siba, ɣɛɛ maturi tsɔra iina kusia i fɔ kayi ikparama ame.
46014018	Nto lopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ nsɛ loɣɛ siɖe agbãagbã loɖo mi ɔɖuɖu.
46014019	Ɣɛɛ i kasarɛkɔ̃ ne, loabie sɔ loaɣɛ atɔ̃me aru wa loasu lote maturi ara iɖo sɔ loaɣɛ atɔ̃me gbodzoo wa nna karɔ̃ i siɖe agbãagbã ame i maturi kɔrɛ.
46014020	Wũ manyii midaabara so mabiɛtɛ i mi adzuni ame. Miɖe mabiɛtɛ i akpi ibara ame ɣɛɛ i mi adzuni ame ne, miɖe mma loɔkpa anɔ.
46014021	I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Bosate ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loaɖegu wũ maturi ika i sifɔɖe ame gu iki i mafɔ iso. Ɣɛɛ nnɛmɔ kɔra iibatã makã me atsue.”
46014022	Ne ɔso siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ ne, ikparĩ iɖe itã mma loifɔ maɖe. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ ne, mafɔɖedze karabara kaɖe, iiɖe mma loifɔ maɖe.
46014023	Ne ɔso si mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔba maasakanya fiɛ ɔbiara ɔtsɛ siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ fiɛ mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze pia i mi ndɛ̃ ne, maibaɣɛ sɔ mito milala?
46014024	Ɣɛɛ si mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara to miɖi Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya fiɛ ɔturi fefea gɔ loiɖe fɔɖedze ɔba mi ndɛ̃ ne, ɔto ɔ̃ana ɔnɔ itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ ibara karabara i ɔ̃ iso. Ɔ̃asu itɔ̃me nɛ ɔnɔ ɔɣɛgu so atɔ̃me sɔ kpibaradze ɔɖe.
46014025	Ara wɛrɛa wa mpia i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame to aabɔrɛ aba ɔgbami itã sɔ ɔ̃abɔ sɔ karɔ̃ ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ ɔle Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã, Ɣaa pia i mi ndɛ̃!”
46014026	Wũ manyii, nnɛ lobie sɔ loaɣɛ lobua i mi isarɛ iso nɖe sɔ, si miba miasakanya sɔ miakparama kayi ne, ɔmɔi ba kuka, ɔmama ara ite, ɔmama ba iɖi ite. Ɔmɔi ana aaɣɛ itɔ̃me i siɖe agbãagbã ame, fiɛ ɔmama ana ba siɖe agbã mama karɔ̃ iɖi sɔ ɔ̃aɖi nnɛ maɣɛ karɔ̃. Minyɔ sɔ ira biara nɛ miabara ne, iatã mafɔɖedze ikuri aamɔ ibua.
46014027	Si ɔrere ba itɔ̃me i siɖe agbãagbã ame ne, ma inyɔ ɣee itɛ kere si ma nɣɛ isia isia. Ɣɛɛ ɔmama si ɔɖi nnɛ maɣɛ karɔ̃.
46014028	Ɣɛɛ si kuwɛ̃ na gɔ ɔ̃aɖi nnɛ mato maɣɛ karɔ̃ ne, iyɔ ma ɔbiara si ɔlo i kasarɛkɔ̃ si ɔɖegu Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ ika.
46014029	Maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ma lofɔ silɔ mabɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ kere si ma nɣɛ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣere ma. Ma tsɔra si marɛrɛ ne ame kukaakɔ manyɔ.
46014030	Si mma nsi i kasarɛkɔ̃ mmɔ ɔrere ɔfɔ silɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ngɔ nto ɔɖe ika si ɔlo tɔtɔ si ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔri.
46014031	Ɔri pia sɔ mi ɔɖuɖu aaɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ miɣɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ si ɔbiara aawo ira ɔsuã fiɛ miapia so ɔle.
46014032	Ɔle gɔ masɛ maɣɛ ala Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔpia i ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ame sɔ ɔ̃awo ɔɖe so iso.
46014033	Alasɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie sɔ bobara ira biara i ɔri iso gu isobuɛ ame. Lɛ kumɛgɔ ise i mafɔɖedze ikuri biara ame ne,
46014034	marɔ̃go si malo i mi kasarɛkɔ̃ sɔ maibaɖe ika. Mana ɔri sɔ maaɖe ika, ɣɛɛ mabɔ so karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa mmara ɔte awe.
46014035	Si mato mabie sɔ maakarɛ irere manɔ ne, makarɛ ma marã si maɔbo iyo. Alasɔ iba kunuarɛ sɔ ɔrɔ̃go ata ɔya ɔɖe ika i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃.
46014036	Mi kɔrɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔgɔdɛ̃? Ɛɛbɛrɛ mi kɔrɛ pɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɔbo?
46014037	Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔbu sɔ Ɣaa kanyaɖidze ɔɖe ɣee Siwarã Bielea pia i ɔ̃ ame ne, ɔ̃atsue sɔ nnɛ nto lote ne, ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ ise ne.
46014038	Si ɔrere ɔsɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, mi wũ misɛ̃ ɔnyiiɔ.
46014039	Ne ɔso wũ manyii, misu mi anɔ ɔɖuɖu misia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya iɖi iso, ɣɛɛ midaanyua siɖe agbãagbã iɣɛ.
46014040	Mibara ira biara i ɔri iso i isekele ame.
46015001	Wũ manyii, kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ minyigi Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loɣere mi fiɛ mifɔ ne, fiɛ miɣɛ teteree i ne ame.
46015002	Si mimɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loɣere mi mila teteree ne, miana ngbã, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mi kafɔkaɖe na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
46015003	Nnɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ losu nto lotã mi. Nnɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖo pelepele nɖe sɔ, Kristo ɔkpi i bo akpi iti lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔte.
46015004	Mabiara wũ, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ i akpɛnɛ atɛ kama i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kanya.
46015005	Ɔɖi so ɔte Petro gu katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ.
46015006	Ne kama ne, ɔɖi so ɔte ɔ̃ masiaidze ma loɖo maturi alafa aru ana. Ma gbodzoo si ngbã ipɛ i nɔme ɣɛɛ ma mawɛ̃ ɔɔkpi koko.
46015007	Ne kama ne, ɔɖi so ɔte Yakobo gu katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu.
46015008	Katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, ɔɖi so ɔte me gɔ maɣe kamakama.
46015009	Alasɔ mme nɖe ɔtsɔra i katɔ̃memasɛdze ndɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ loikote sɔ maarɔ me sɔ katɔ̃mesɛdze alasɔ loti mafɔɖedze kama lobara ma kako.
46015010	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ɔso fiɛ loɖe nnɛ loɖe kiniɔ. Ɔ̃ kayiribielea ana iiɖe siefe, alasɔ loɔbara karabara teteree loɖo katɔ̃memasɛdze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ ɔle ame lobara, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i wũ ame ɔɖe.
46015011	Ne ɔso mme loɣere mi irere o-o, ma loɣere mi o-o ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛmɔ kere boto boɣɛ fiɛ ne mifɔ miɖe ne.
46015012	Kiniɔ ne, gɔ bo itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ nɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃ ne, be ɔso i mi ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa iisibatara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã?
46015013	Si gbaã iɖe ne, ite sɔ Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃.
46015014	Fiɛ si Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ ne, iyɔ bona kuira nɛ boapɛ imomo fiɛ mi kafɔkaɖe ana ɖe siefe.
46015015	Nnɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo kɔra nɖe sɔ ne, ite sɔ boto bola sila bosia Ɣaa iso sɔ ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃. Fiɛ si gbaã i makpise iibata ne, iyɔ ɔ̃itara Kristo ɔ̃ wũ.
46015016	Ne ɔso si makpise iibata ne, iyɔ mitsue sɔ Ɣaa iitara Kristo ana ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃.
46015017	Fiɛ si Ɣaa iitara Kristo ɔɖi i makpise ndɛ̃ gbaã ne, iyɔ mi kafɔkaɖe na kusia kukuwɛ̃, fiɛ mikpese mipia i mi akpi ame.
46015018	Ne karɔ̃ ana nɖe sɔ, Kristo mafɔɖedze ma loɔkpi ana ɔwɔ.
46015019	Si ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔnɔwɛ̃ boba ɔriinyɔ i Kristo ame ne, iyɔ bo nɖe mma mba nnya boɖo pelepele i kayiiso.
46015020	Ɣɛɛ gbagbaã iɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔtara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃. Ne nɖe bo ayaikama sɔ mma ɔɖuɖu lokpi ne, mato maaledza ita.
46015021	Alasɔ kumɛgɔ ame iki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso i kukpi ɔba i maturi ndɛ̃ ne, ngbɔ ame ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ndɛ̃ ana aaki i ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ iso iba ne.
46015022	Kumɛgɔ ame i kukpi ɔba maturi ɔɖuɖu iso alasɔ boɖe Adam mawa ɔso ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa to ɔ̃aledza maturi ɔɖuɖu itara ibɔrɛgu i makpise ndɛ̃ iki Kristo iso ne.
46015023	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara ɔbiara i ɔwi gɔ lokote iso. Kristo loɖe katɔ̃ iyɔ ne kama mma lofɔ wũ maɖe ata ku ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza ikpese iba.
46015024	Ne kama ne, kawirikɔ̃ to kaaba, Kristo to ɔ̃awɔra atakere, maturi kanya mayadze, sile gu siwarã ame sile dzɛ nto siɖe iso ɔɖuɖu. Ɔto ɔ̃asu sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔpia i ɔ̃ Ɔse Ɣaa nrɔɔ̃ ame.
46015025	Alasɔ Kristo to ɔ̃aɖe iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ matsirise ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i Kristo ngba kayirinɔ.
46015026	Tsirise tsɔra gɔ ɔ̃awɔra nɖe kukpi.
46015027	Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔ̃ ngba kayirinɔ.” Fiɛ ikpa sekelee sɔ ara ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa gɔ losu wã ɔpia Kristo kayirinɔ ne, Ɔ̃ibua i wã iso.
46015028	Fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔɔsu ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i Kristo kayirinɔ ɔro ne, Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi ana to ɔ̃asu so ɔpia i Ɣaa kayirinɔ sɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã aaɖe ara ɔɖuɖu iso.
46015029	Kiniɔ ne, mma lofɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i mma loɔkpi koko iti ne, be loabɔrɛ i ne ame itã ma? Si gbaã iɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ i mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ makpise ita kuiwɛ̃ na ne, be ɔso i mmamɔ to mafɔ Ɣaa itupie kubarara i mma loɔkpi koko iti?
46015030	Ana ne bo ɣɛɛ? Be ɔso fiɛ bo ngbã aawe i imɔrɛ̃ ame ɔwi biara?
46015031	Wũ manyii, kukpi to kugbere me kasɛ̃ i kakɔme! Wũ kato ikɔlɛso i mi iti sɔ miabara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ɔso nto loɖi nnɛgbe loɣɛ.
46015032	Si maturi kuɣɛme kere ɔso fiɛ lokpɛ̃gu maturi ma nse lɛ mabɔi lalaa i Efeso ne, mme kusia lona loɖi i ne ame? Fiɛ si maturi iisibata mabɔrɛ i makpise ame gbaã ne, iyɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mapɛ igbã sɔ ne, “Mitã boɖe si bonɛ, alasɔ kɔrãkaɖe boto boakpi,” ɖe ɔnukuare.
46015033	Midaassɔsɔla so. Kulaa nyanyarĩa sɛ kunina ɔturi sɛɛ.
46015034	Mikpese miba mi ame si minyua mi akpi siri misɛ si mibara ara i ɔri iso. Nto loɣere mi sekelee si kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ mi sɔ mi mawɛ̃ iiɣe Ɣaa.
46015035	Ɔwɛ̃ aakarɛ sɔ, “Nda i makpise aabara fiɛ maaledza ita? Siturina simele igbã maawe?”
46015036	Iikpa mi! Si mipia ɔraɖui i karɔ̃ ame ne, iisɛ ire si iiɖe katɔ̃ iburi.
46015037	Fiɛ ɔraɖui gɔ apia i karɔ̃ ame ne, ibi kere iɖe lɛ itita ɣee idziribi irere. Ɣɛɛ si ire ne, isɛ ikpaki ibɔrɛ i kumɛgɔ ise fiɛ apia ne i karɔ̃ ame.
46015038	Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã idziribi nɛgbe kumiamia gɔ ɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔraɖui biara kumiamia gɔ lokotegu wũ.
46015039	Ara wa ɔɖuɖu mba ngbã sosina iikote. Maturi awune sosina pia, ngbɔ ame nɖe mabɔi, kurodzai gu ndu ame kufarai sire ne, ira biara ku ne sire.
46015040	Ara wa i kuɖokpo ame pia fiɛ karɔ̃ iso are ana pia. Kato ara kulɛ ɔkpaki ibɔrɛ i karɔ̃ ara iso.
46015041	Kuɣɛ̃ ba kɔ̃ ifiɛ, fiɛ ɔgbaworeti ana ba ɔ̃ ifiɛ. Awãmi ifiɛ ana ɔkpaki. I awãmi kerekere ndɛ̃ ne, ibiara ba kumɛgɔ isɛ ifiɛ.
46015042	Ngbɔ ame kere iase ku kawirikɔ̃ gɔ Ɣaa aatara makpise mawe ngbã ne. Ɔwi gɔ mabiara ma ne, siturina dzɛ nsɛ siburi siɖe mawe, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ka maata ne, maisibakpi.
46015043	Ɔwi gɔ mabiara wũ ne, ɔnyɔ nyanyarĩ, ɖɔbɔrɔɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ame ɔ̃ata ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame ne, ɔ̃are situri fiɛ ɔ̃awe ɔle ana.
46015044	Ɔwi gɔ mabiara wũ ne, kayiiso siturina dzɛ loakpi siɖe. Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ ka ɔ̃ata ne, siwarã ame sosina ɔ̃atagu ala. Si kayiiso siturina pia ne, iyɔ siwarã ame sire ana pia.
46015045	Alasɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, ipia sɔ, “Ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nɖe Adam ne, Ɣaa ɔbara wũ gbanadze.” Ɣɛɛ Adam tsɔra gɔgbe ne, ɔ̃ nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã ngbã ne.
46015046	Iiɖe Siwarã ame ɔre kere loɖe katɔ̃, ɣɛɛ sosina ame ɔre fiɛ kini i siwarã ame ɔre ɔsiai.
46015047	Adam ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, sise mapɔ wũ ala. Ɣɛɛ Adam tsɔra ne, Kato ɔbɔrɛ.
46015048	Mma nɖe kayiiso maturi ne, mase lɛ ngɔ mapɔ maɖi i sise ame. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe kato mare ne, mase lɛ ngɔ lobɔrɛ i kato.
46015049	Ne ɔso kumɛgɔ ame bopia siturina lɛ ngɔ mapɔ maɖi i sise ame ne, ngbɔ ame boapia ngɔ lobɔrɛ i kato kumiamia ne.
46015050	Wũ manyii nnɛ nto loɣɛ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, siturina gu ima iibawo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame ɔbo. Ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ne, iibawo ɔse sɔ iisibakpi inya.
46015051	-
46015052	Minɔ iwɛrɛra nɛgbe. Bo ɔɖuɖu iibakpi. Ɣɛɛ i kadadã tsɔra ire ame ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia. Ɔ̃abara ne fiɛ aama inɔmi abusi. Alasɔ si kadadã ɔbɛ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atara makpise sɔ maisibaledza ikpi manya fiɛ ɔ̃afinikira bo kumiamia.
46015053	Alasɔ ira nɛ nsɛ inina ne, maafinikira ne makpesera nnɛ loisɛ inina. Ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ana ne, maafinikira ne nnɛ loisibakpi.
46015054	Ne ɔso si iɔba sɔ mafinikira ira nɛ nsɛ ikpi ikpese nnɛ loisɛ ikpi ne, iyɔ Ɔko Sekelea ame itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ sɔ, “Maɔwɔra kukpi, iɖe iso ɔɔba!” aaba i ne ame.
46015055	Matsɛrɛ ana sɔ. “Kukpi, fɔ iɖe iso ɣɛɛ? Fiɛ ɔle gɔ asɛ ata bo ala ɣɛɛ?”
46015056	Kukpi sɛ kuna kɔ̃ ɔle kuɖoe bo iki ikpi iso. Ikpi nɛ wũ ne, ne ɔle ɔbɔrɛ i mmara ame.
46015057	Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ lotã bo iɖe iso iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo ame.
46015058	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii ma loipia kuɣɛ, miya teteree sɔ miibarɔ̃. Mimɔɛ̃ Bosate karabara mila kukaakɔ alasɔ miɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ miabara mitã Bosate ne, iibaɖe siefe.
46016001	Kiniɔ ne, i nnɛ mitsɛrɛ mikarɛ me i karatã ga miasu mibuai mafɔɖedze akuri i Yudea iso ne, mibara nnɛ loɣere mafɔɖedze ma i Galatia sɔ mabara.
46016002	Kɔsiɖa biara ne, ɔbiara si ɔɖi ira ɔsɛ i ɔ̃ karabara kanya sɔ si loba ne, ara ito kuiwɛ̃ iisibawe.
46016003	Si loba ne, loatsɛrɛ ɔko lotã mma i mi mɔmɔ miɖi sɔ masu mi karatã makɛlɛgu Yerusalem.
46016004	Si inya sɔ mme wũ losiai ma ne, iyɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ka boakɛlɛ.
46016005	Nto loaki i Makedonia fiɛ loabo mi kɔrɛ alasɔ loɣɛ sɔ loaki i mmɔ tɔtɔ.
46016006	Ito ibara me sɔ nto loaɖe ayi arɛ̃saã i mi kɔrɛ mmɔ. Siainyɔ ɔyu ɔwi ɔɖuɖu ne, nto loawe i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ ka miaɖi me ɔri loakɛlɛ ngbegɔ loakɛlɛ.
46016007	Loito lobie sɔ loatere ise lorui i mi kɔrɛ ɣɛɛ loawe isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i Bosate aatã me.
46016008	Loawe i Efeso ngbe isɛ iabo Pentekoste iyi iso.
46016009	Ɔri siare ɔbusi ngbe ɔtã karabara ga lofɔ kuɣa gbaã atoa sɔ matsirise gbodzoo ɔta maɣɛ me iso.
46016010	Si Timoteo ɔba mi kɔrɛ ne, mifɔ wũ kukaakɔ alasɔ Bosate karabara kaɖe ɔto ɔbara lɛ kumɛgɔ nto lobara awe.
46016011	Midaanyɔ wũ lɛ ɔbiɛtɛ ɣɛɛ mibuai wũ sɔ ɔ̃ irisɛ aasɛ katɔ̃ i isobuɛ ame sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃atu me alasɔ nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ ma gu bo manyii tsɔra aaba.
46016012	I bo ɔnyii Apolo itɔ̃me iso ne, loɔɣere wũ ɔwi gbodzoo sɔ ɔ̃ gu mafɔɖedze mama si maba maanyɔ mi ɣɛɛ ɔ̃itɔrã sɔ ɔ̃aba kiniɔ. Si ɔna ɔri ɔwi mama ɣɛɛ ne, ɔto ɔ̃aba.
46016013	Midzuɛ̃ so si miya teteree i kafɔkaɖe ame. Mina ɔtu si miwe ɔle.
46016014	Mibara mi karabara ɔɖuɖu i kuɖɔɛ ame.
46016015	Miɣe Stefana gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi. Ma nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma lofiniki i Akaia ibuti ame. Masu so matã Ɣaa maturi ibuai. Wũ manyii, loto mi i kukpa
46016016	sɔ minyɔ mmagbe igbã nsɛgbai gu mama ma lobuai mapia kube i karabara ame si mitã sɔ ma igbã loakɔkɔ mi.
46016017	So ɔɣɔ me sɔ Stefana gu Fotunato gu Akaiko ɔba maabo alasɔ ise me lɛ mi loɔnya.
46016018	Matã sɔ so ɔɣɔ me gbaã ɔle ɣɛtɛ ɔba me lɛ kumɛgɔ iba-ɔ iso. Lɛ sɔ boasia maturi magbe igbã ikparĩ bowarɛ ma.
46016019	Mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Asia karɔ̃ iso ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi o-o! Akwila gu Priskila gu ikuri nɛ nsɛ isarɛ i ma iyo sɔ maya mi kukaakɔ i Bosate iyere ame.
46016020	Manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia ngbe ɔya mi o-o! Miya so i kuɖɔɛ ame lɛ manyii awe.
46016021	Mme mɔmɔ kɔrɔ̃ losu lotsɛrɛ sɔ, “Mme Paulo mme nto loya mi o-o!”
46016022	Ɔturi biara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ Bosate ne, sigbarĩ si siba i ɔnyiiɔ iso. O Bosate, ba!
46016023	Bosate Yesu nnyainyɔ si iwegu mi.
46016024	Wũ kuɖɔɛ si kuwegu mi i Yesu Kristo iyere ame. Si iba ngbɔ.
47001001	Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame loɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu wũ ɔnyii Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Korinto gu mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa mare i Akaia karɔ̃ iso mmɔ.
47001002	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
47001003	Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba, nnyainyɔ Ɔse gɔ kɔrɛ i bo ibuai ɔɖuɖu sɛ ibɔrɛ.
47001004	Ɔsɛ ɔpia bo kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri i inyɛwe biara ame sɔ bo wũ boawo bo malaa ma mpia i inyɛwe biara ame ɔbuai. Ibuai nɛ igbã bofɔ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ne ame igbã boasu bobuai maturi ne.
47001005	Kumɛgɔ ame boba kaɖekɔ̃ i Kristo inyɛwe gbodzoo ame ne, ngbɔ ame iki i ɔ̃ ame bosɛ bona Ɣaa ibuai siare ana ne.
47001006	Si mabara bo ɔtile ne, mabara ngbɔ sɔ si Ɣaa aabuai mi, ɔfɔ mi ɔpia ngbã. Si mabuai bo ne, mabara ngbɔ sɔ si Ɣaa aabuai mi sɔ miawo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ bosɛ boya teteree i inyɛwe nɛmɔ igbã kanya.
47001007	Boba ɔriinyɔ nɛ loibati inya i mi ame alasɔ boɣe sɔ kumɛgɔ ame miwe inyɛ lɛ bo ne, ngbɔ ame ana i Ɣaa aabuai mi lɛ ɔbuai bo ne.
47001008	Wũ manyii, bobie sɔ bonyigira mi inyɛwe nɛ bona i Asia karɔ̃ iso. Mabara bo amumuɣɔ sɔ ɔle ɔro bo iso fiɛ boyu ɔriinyɔ sɔ boakpese bowe ngbã kɔra.
47001009	Ibara bo lɛ kukpi ipɔ maɔtã bo! Ɣɛɛ iba ngbɔ sɔ si boasu bo ɔriinyɔ bosia i Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtara makpise ɔbɔ ngbã iso ne, iiɖe bo mɔmɔ iso.
47001010	Ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ɔgba ame fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ana. Gbaã ne, boto bonyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖi bo ana,
47001011	ala miɣɛgu bo i kayi ikparama ame. Iyɔ maturi gbodzoo aapɛ Ɣaa siba i bo iti sɔ ɔnyɔ bo nnya ɔkã kayi ikparama gbodzoo atsue.
47001012	Nnɛ ɔso bosɛ boɖe ndamu nɖe sɔ, bo situ iisɛ sitã bo ipɔ alasɔ bomɔɛ̃ so bola i maturi ɔɖuɖu gu titirio mi ndɛ̃. Iiɖe maturi inɔgba ame i nnɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔnyɔ bo nnya sɔ boabusi bo situ boɣere mi ɔnukuare.
47001013	-
47001014	Ara wa miawo ɔka ɔnɔ karɔ̃ kere aɖe botsɛrɛ botã mi. Atoa sɔ kiniɔ ne miinɔ bo karɔ̃ miro. Nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ miaba mianɔ bo karɔ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu aaledza iba fiɛ miaɖe ndamu i bo iso lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ boaɖe i mi iso.
47001015	-
47001016	Gɔ loɣe nnɛgbe kukaakɔ ɔso ne, lobara adzuni sɔ si loto lofe Makedonia ne, tee loaki i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ si loɔkpese ana ne, loaledza mmɔ iki sɔ miaɖi me ɔri fiɛ loakɛlɛ Yudea. Si iba ngbɔ ne iyɔ miana isoɣɔ ikpɛ inyɔ.
47001017	Gɔ lobara adzuni wamɔ fiɛ lofinikira wã ne, iite sɔ nto lokpɔkpɔtɔra mi i wũ adzuni ifinikira malamala ame sɔ loɣɛ aĩ lokpese loɣɛ sɔ ooɣo lɛ kayiiso maturi awe.
47001018	Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iso gbaã ne, ngbɔ ame i nnɛ botsɛrɛ botã mi iiɖe aĩ gu ooɣo ne.
47001019	Ɣaa ɔbi Yesu Kristo gɔ iso itɔ̃me i mme gu Silvano gu Timoteo ɔɣere mi ne, ɔ̃iɖe aĩ gu ooɣo ɔturi ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ aĩ ɔwi biara ɔɖe.
47001020	Alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe aĩ ɔtã Ɣaa itɔ̃me biara nɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i bo iso. Ne ɔso fiɛ iki Yesu Kristo iso ne, bosɛ boɣɛ sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ,” itã Ɣaa iyere kato ikɔlɛ.
47001021	Ɣaa ɔtã sɔ bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu ɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loɖi bo ɔsɛ ise sɔ boabara ɔ̃ karabara.
47001022	Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losɛ bo ikpo sɔ ɔ̃ mare boɖe gɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã Bielea ɔpia i bo ame. Siwarã dzɛgbe nɖe ayaikama itã ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ne.
47001023	Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ nto loɖɔɛ mi fiɛ nnya kere lonyɔ mi ɔso loiba Korinto.
47001024	Boito bobie sɔ nnɛ bofɔ boɖe ne, boasɛ̃ bopia mi, ɣɛɛ boto bobaragu mi karabara sɔ miana isoɣɔ alasɔ mi kafɔkaɖe ɣɛ teteree koko.
47002001	Ne ɔso lobara adzuni sɔ loito loba mi kɔrɛ loba loapia mi isoma ne.
47002002	Alasɔ si lopia mi isoma ne, nna loakpese ɔpia me isoɣɔ? Kuwɛ̃ siina iɖo mi ma ame lobiɛ situ.
47002003	Ne ɔso lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔmɔ losese mi ne. Ala loibie sɔ loaba loapia mma ame lopia me isoɣɔ isoma. Alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ si loba isoɣɔ ne, iyɔ mi wũ miba isoɣɔ.
47002004	Gbaã ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ losese mi ne, lotsɛrɛ wũ ku iɖaa gbodzoo gu ɔtu gɔ mba ɔrɔrã gu nnɔmɛ gbodzoo. Iiɖe wũ adzuni loɖe sɔ loapia mi isoma, ɣɛɛ si lote mi kumɛgɔ loto loɖɔɛ mi.
47002005	Ne ɔso si ɔrere ikpi ibara ɔpia mi isoma ne, iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ iɖe ɔpia isoma, ɣɛɛ boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia mi ɔɖuɖu isoma. Loito lobie sɔ miafe wũ inyagalagu.
47002006	Ka ilɛ sɔ mi kasɛ siare ɔɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue koko.
47002007	Kiniɔ ne, ka misu mitsɛ wũ si mipia wũ katetere sɔ ɔ̃ibabo i imararãso ame itã ɔkpese kama pelepele.
47002008	Loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɖi mite wũ sɔ mito miɖɔɛ wũ ipɛ i kiniɔ.
47002009	Ne ɔso lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko sɔ si lodzuĩ kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree gu si mito mibie sɔ miabara i ara wa lote mi iso.
47002010	Si misu ɔrere ikpi mitsɛ wũ ne, iyɔ mme wũ losu lotsɛ wũ. Fiɛ si irere pia kɔra gɔ loasu lotsɛ ne, loasu lotsɛ i Kristo katɔ̃ ala mi ɔso.
47002011	Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ boatɛ̃ Tsirise ɔri sɔ ɔ̃ibana ɔri kuwɛ̃ i bo iso alasɔ boɣe ɔ̃ siri lalaa.
47002012	Ɔwi gɔ loba sɔ loaɣɛ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea i Troa ne, lonya sɔ Bosate ɔbusi ɔri sɔ loabara ɔ̃ karabara i mmɔ.
47002013	Ɣɛɛ wũ ɔtu iitã me iwarã kuiwɛ̃ alasɔ loinya wũ ɔnyii Tito i mmɔ. Ne ɔso lomala ma so lorui lokɛlɛ Makedonia.
47002014	Ɣɛɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ iki i kumɛgɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔkɔ bo ɔwi biara sɔ boasiai Kristo lɛ ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔmɔɛ̃ i kakpã ame. Fiɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔki i bo iso ɔɖi Kristo ɔte kayiiso ɔɖuɖu lɛ kumɛgɔ ira sɛ ifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ i kakɔi biara.
47002015	Bose lɛ kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ i Kristo ɔtsuedza ɔtã Ɣaa fiɛ bo ifɔrɛ̃ sɛ iki i maturi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃, mma lona iɖi gu mma nto mawɔ.
47002016	Mma lona iɖi ne, iɖe ifɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã. Ɣɛɛ mma nto mawɔ ndɛ̃ ne, iɖe ifɔrɛ̃ nyanyarĩa nɛ nsɛgu kukpi. Nna lokote sɔ ɔ̃awo karabara gagbe ɔbara?
47002017	Boise lɛ maturi gbodzoo ma nsɛ maki masu Ɣaa Itɔ̃me maɖe ala kuɣa. Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa lopia bo katɔ̃me ɔso ne, boto boɣɛ Itɔ̃me i ɔnukuare ame lɛ Kristo maɖabo.
47003001	Nnɛgbe ɔte sɔ boto bole so? Boise lɛ mawɛ̃ ma nto mabie kakosɛi ga loaɖi ma kate mi ɣee nga boafɔ i mi kɔrɛ bote maturi mama.
47003002	Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ nɖe bo ɔko gɔ boba, ɔko gɔ matsɛrɛ masia i bo situ iso sɔ ɔbiara aatsue ɔnya ɔka.
47003003	Ite sekelee sɔ Kristo mɔmɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe ɔsese ɔkigu i bo iso. Iiɖe ɔturi kɔrɔ̃ matsɛrɛ ala ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã Siwarã masu matsɛrɛ ala. Iiɖe ita ana iso iɖe matsɛrɛ masia ɣɛɛ maturi situ iso matsɛrɛ masia.
47003004	Boto boɣɛ ngbɔ ala katetere ga boba i Ɣaa ame iki i Kristo iso.
47003005	Bona kuira nɛ iso boaya fiɛ boaɣɛ sɔ ne ɔso bosɛ bowo karabara gagbe ɔbara. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kɔrɛ i bo ɔle sɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
47003006	Ɔ̃ lotã bo ira biara nɛ lonya bo sɔ si boaɖe ndamu ɣɛtɛ maɖabo. Maitsɛrɛ ndamu ɣɛtɛ mɛgbe masɛ, ɣɛɛ Siwarã ame ipia. Ndamu mɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ ne, misɛ miɖoe ɔturi, ɣɛɛ Siwarã sɛ sitã ngbã.
47003007	Ɔwi gɔ i Mose ɔfɔ Ɣaa mmara ɔbɔ ne, mmɛ matsɛrɛ masia i ita iso fiɛ misɛ mitã bo kukpi ipɔ ne, ɔ̃ ifiɛ ɔtã sɔ Israel mabi iiwo wũ katɔ̃ ɔnyɔ. Atoa sɔ ifiɛ nɛmɔ sɛ iyu si iɔfɔ ɔwi. Si mmara mɛ nsɛ mitã kukpi ipɔ sɛgu ifiɛ siare nɛmɔ igbã ne,
47003008	nda i Siwarã ame kurabarara gɔ lomɔ kuɖo pelepele aafiɛ!
47003009	Fiɛ si mmara kuere mɛ nsɛ mitã ɔturi kukpi ipɔ to mifiɛ ngbɔ ne, iyɔ Itɔ̃me sɛɛ nɛ nsɛ ibara bo bɔlɔlɔ to iafiɛ teteree iɖo.
47003010	Boto boɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ ikpawaĩ siare nɛ ame bopia nɔme ɔmɔ iɖo ikuere nɛ lowe kokooko.
47003011	Fiɛ si ira nɛ ɔwi nsɛ ɔfe ɔfiɛ ngbɔ ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, iyɔ ira ɣɛtɛ nɛ ɔwi loisɛ ɔfe aafiɛ iɖo kokooko.
47003012	Ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe boba ɔso fiɛ kagbegbe iisɛ kati bo ne.
47003013	Bo boise lɛ Mose gɔ nsɛ ɔsu ɔkati ɔfu so katɔ̃ sɔ Israel mabi si madaanya sɔ Ɣaa ifiɛ nɛ mpia wũ i katɔ̃ to iro.
47003014	Gbaã iɖe sɔ ma adzuni ame iibusi alasɔ ipɛ i nɔme ne, ɔkati gɔmɔ fu ma i adzuni iso si mato maka ndamu kuere ɔko gɔmɔ. Ngɔ lobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ɔnɔwɛ̃ adzuni iso i ɔkati aabɛ.
47003015	Gbaã ipɛ i nɔme si mato maka Mose mmara ɔko ne, ɔkati fu i ma adzuni iso sɔ maisɛ manɔ nnɛ mato maka karɔ̃.
47003016	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔfiniki ɔbɔrɛ i ɔ̃ akpi ame ɔfɔ Kristo lɛ Bosate awe ne, ɔkati gɔmɔ sɛ ɔbɛ i ɔ̃ adzuni iso.
47003017	Kiniɔ ne, Bosate gɔ boto bokpere ngbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã, fiɛ ngbegɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã pia ne, maturi ba iwarã.
47003018	Bo ma ɔɖuɖu i kuira iifu i adzuni iso ne, bosɛ boɖi Bosate ikpawaĩ bote kukaakɔ. Fiɛ Bosate gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã ngbe ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔfinikira bo nsɛgbai sɔ boare wũ bofiɛ teteree bobua ne.
47004001	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo nnya fiɛ ɔsu karabara gagbe ɔpia bo i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔso ne, nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ bo.
47004002	Ɣɛɛ boɔɖi atsue i awɛrɛra gu anuarɛra iso, ana ne, boisɛ bosɔsɔla maturi fiɛ boisɛ bofinikira Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɣɛɛ bosɛ boɖe ɔnukuare fiɛ si maturi iibawe adzuni nyanyarĩa i bo iso ne, bosɛ bote nsɛgbai sɛɛ i ma anɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ boate i Ɣaa anɔ.
47004003	Si Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boto boɣɛ ɖe iwɛrɛra ne, iɖe iwɛrɛra itã mma nto mawɔ.
47004004	Mma loifɔ maɖe ne, Ɔbosam ɔbiɛ ma anɔmi. Ɔbara ma ngbɔ si maibanya ikpawaĩ nɛ lobɔrɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ito ifiɛ ifere ma iso sɔ nnɛ boto boɣɛ i Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa kumiamia iso ne, maanɔ karɔ̃.
47004005	Boisɛ bowe boki boɣɛ bo mɔmɔ iso itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo iso itɔ̃me boɣere mi sɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Bosate. Bo ne, mi maɖabo boɖe ala Yesu ɔso.
47004006	Ɣaa gɔ loɣɛ ku kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ, “Ikpawaĩ si iba i idududu ame” ne, ɔ̃ ame lotã ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ɔfiɛ ibo i bo situ ame ne. Nnɛgbe lotã bonya Ɣaa ikpawaĩ nɛ mpia i Kristo katɔ̃ boɖi ite ne.
47004007	Ɣɛɛ bo ma ame i Siwarã ame karana gagbe pia ne, bose lɛ abui wa mapɔ kere. Ne loatã ɔbiara ɔnya sɔ ɔle siare gɔgbe ne, iiɖe bo mɔmɔ ame ɔbɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔbɔrɛ.
47004008	Inyɛwe ɔmini bo ito i kakɔi biara, ɣɛɛ ɔle iiro bo. Masɛ makpɔkpɔtɔra bo, ɣɛɛ nrɔɔ̃ iisɛ mifɛ̃ bo.
