47004009	Matsirise siai bo sɔ maaɖoe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iiɖi bo atsue. Mamɔɛ̃ bo mawuĩ i karɔ̃ sɔ si maɖoe bo, ɣɛɛ boikpi.
47004010	Ɔwi biara ne, boba inyɛwe nɛ lore Yesu kukpi sɔ ɔ̃ ngbã aate so i bo ame.
47004011	Gbaã, i bo ngbã mɛ bosi ɔɖuɖu ame ne, bosi i kukpi ifɔ̃ ame ala Yesu ɔso. Ne ɔso Yesu ngbã ana sɛ miɖi mite i bo siturina ame sɔ maturi aanya maɖi ite.
47004012	Ne ɔso kukpi to kuɖaa bo ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ mi mito mina ngbã.
47004013	Matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Lofɔ Ɣaa loɖe, ne ɔso loto loɣɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ne.” Siwarã dzɛ ame lotã maturi ɔfɔ maɖe ne, sɛ̃ ame mpia i bo ame ɔso boto boɣɛ itɔ̃me ne.
47004014	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃atara bo gu mi ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔsu ɔbɔ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
47004015	Mi isɛɛ ɔso i ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔba ngbɔ. Fiɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa abualɛra togu maturi ikɔ ibɔ Kristo kɔrɛ ne, ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa iyere aafɔ kuwarɛ nɛ.
47004016	Adzuni wagbe ɔso boisɛ bofɛ̃ ne. Atoa sɔ bo siturina to sikpi pɔkɔsɔɔ pɔkɔsɔɔ ne, bo siwarã to sina ngbã ɣɛtɛ ɔwi biara.
47004017	Inyɛ kɛkɛĩ nɛ boto bowe kiniɔ iito iawe ɔwi biara. Ito iledza bo itã kuwarɛ siare gɔ maatã bo fiɛ maibawo kuira ɔsu ɔkoteragu.
47004018	Ne ɔso boisu bo anɔ bosia i ara wa boto bonya iso, ɣɛɛ nwa boito bonya. Ara wa bosɛ bonya ne, aisɛ ase ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ nwa boisɛ bonya ne, asɛ ase ɔwi biara gɔ ana kawirikɔ̃.
47005001	Si bo siturina dzɛ nɖe iyo nɛ ame bosi i ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔbiɛ ne, boba iyo nɛ mba ɔle i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Iyo nɛ iiɖe nrɔɔ̃ masu matsue ala fiɛ iase ɔwi biara.
47005002	Ɔwi gɔ ame bopia i siturina dzɛgbe ame ne, bosɛ bowarã bokuti. Boto bonyɔ ɔri teteree iyi nɛ boasɛ boasu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ siturina.
47005003	Si bokɛlɛ siturina dzɛmɔ ame ne, boisibasɛ isɔ̃.
47005004	Alasɔ gɔ bokpese bopia i kayiiso ikpayo nɛgbe ame ne, boto botɔrɛ̃, bomararã so. Iiɖe gɔ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boabɔrɛ i siturina dzɛgbe ame ɔso, ɣɛɛ gɔ boto bobie sɔ masu kato siturina dzɛ loisɛ sikpi mapia bo sɔ ira nɛ loisɛ ikpi aaba iasu nnɛ nsɛ ikpi imɛ pelepele.
47005005	Ɣaa ɔɖe loledza bo ɔsɛ ɔtã ikpaki nɛgbe igbã fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã bo lɛ ita isiara itã ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ bo.
47005006	Ne ɔso boba ɔtu ne. Boɣe sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ bopia i sosina ame ne, boito bonya Bosate ku anɔ.
47005007	Kafɔkaɖe gagbe bosu bosi ala ngbã ne, iiɖe ara wa boto bonya ala anɔ kare kaɖe.
47005008	Boba katetere fiɛ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boabɔrɛ i siturina ame bokɛlɛ boawegu Bosate.
47005009	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ boto bobie boɖo nɖe sɔ, ngbe bopia o-o, kato bopia o-o ne, boabo Bosate anɔ.
47005010	Alasɔ bo ɔɖuɖu to boaya i Kristo anɔ ɔɣɛgu bo atɔ̃me fiɛ ɔbiara aafɔ ɔ̃ kuso gɔ lokategu ɔ̃ kurabarara. Isɛɛ o-o, ilalaa o-o ne, ɔbiara to ɔ̃afɔ nnɛ lokategu ɔ̃ ngbã mɛ igbã ɔsɛ.
47005011	Gɔ boɣe kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ boanigã Bosate ɔso ne, bosɛ bopɛ maturi nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ma wũ manigã wũ. Ɣaa ɣe bo kukaakɔ fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ mi wũ miɣe bo nsɛgbai sekelee.
47005012	Iiɖe ɔle boto bole so ana bote mi, ɣɛɛ boto botã mi ɔri gɔgbe sɔ miasu bo miɖe ala ndamu. Boto bobara ngbɔ sɔ si miatsue nnɛ miaɣere mma nto masu ɔturi kumiamia makɔlɛ so kato fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ nsɛgbai.
47005013	Si bore mma nto malala gbaã ne, Ɣaa ɔso ise bo ngbɔ. Ɣɛɛ si boito bolala ne, iɖe kusia itã mi.
47005014	Kristo kuɖɔɛ nto kuɖe bo iso. Kiniɔ gɔ boɣe sɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ lokpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti ɔso ne, ite sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpi.
47005015	Kristo ɔkpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti, ne ɔso mma nsi ngbã ne, maisibasɛ ngbã matã so. Ɣɛɛ maasɛ ngbã matã wũ, alasɔ ma iti ɔkpi fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔ magbanadze ndɛ̃.
47005016	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, boisɛ boɣɛgu kuwɛ̃ atɔ̃me i kayiiso ara inyɔ kanya. Si ɔwi gɔ lofe kɔra fiɛ boɣɛgu Kristo atɔ̃me ngbɔ ne, boisisɛ bobara ngbɔ kiniɔ.
47005017	Ne ɔso si ɔturi ɔsu so ɔmatãra i Kristo iso ne, ɔ̃ɔkpese ɔturi ɣɛtɛ. Ɔ̃ ngbã kuere ɔɔfe, miɣɛtɛ ka ɔsi.
47005018	Ɣaa ɔɖe lobara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu. Ɔfere bo gu wũ inyɔ kanya ndu iki i Kristo iso. Ɔ̃ ame losu kanya ndu ifere kubarara ɔtã bo sɔ boakɔ maturi mama bobɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne.
47005019	Bo imomo nɛ boto bopɛ nɖe sɔ, Ɣaa ɔki i Kristo iso ɔto ɔledza ma gu maturi ɔɖuɖu inyɔ ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃ɔkpa atsue ɔfu ma akpi ɔɖuɖu iso fiɛ ɔsu itɔ̃me nɛ loaledza ma gu maturi ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃ ɔtã bo.
47005020	Bo nɖe mma nɣɛ i Kristo kanya, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔki i bo iso ɔto ɔka mi. Ne ɔso boɣɛ i Kristo kanya lɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ nto ɔtã mi iti sɔ mitã mafere mi gu wũ inyɔ kanya ndu.
47005021	Kristo iibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ bo iti ne, Ɣaa ɔtã wũ ɔsore bo akpi. Iatã sɔ si bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ne, boaɖe maturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ.
47006001	Lɛ mma nto mabaragu Ɣaa karabara ne, boto mi i kukpa sɔ midaafɔ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ siefe.
47006002	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ lokote sɔ loanyɔ mi nnya ne, lokã mi atsue. Fiɛ gɔ iyi ɔɣo sɔ loaɖi mi ne, lobuai mi.” Mikã atsue! Kiniɔ nɖe ɔwi gɔ lokote sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ mi nnya ne. Nɔme nɖe iyi nɛ ɔ̃aɖi mi ne.
47006003	Boito bobie sɔ kuwɛ̃ aanya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i bo karabara iso. Ne ɔso boisɛ bobara kuira nɛ loatɛ̃ maturi Ɣaa kɔrɛ iba ɔri ne.
47006004	Ɣɛɛ i ira biara nɛ bosɛ bobara ame ne, bosɛ boɖi bote sɔ Ɣaa marabaradze boɖe. Ne ɔso boya teteree i amɔrɛ̃ gu inyɛwe gu kama iti ame ne.
47006005	Mapɛ bo, mapia bo i iyo, mapiɛ bo fiɛ matã bo karabara maɖodza. Boina sirɛ borɛ fiɛ kukã ana ɔkpɛ̃ bo.
47006006	Ɣɛɛ iki i isekele gu inɔgba gu iɣaraso gu kayiribielea ame ne, boɔɖi bote sɔ Ɣaa marabaradze boɖe. Ibua i nwagbe iso ne, Siwarã Bielea gu bo kuɖɔɛ bielea gu
47006007	bo ɔnukuare itɔ̃me iɣɛ gu Ɣaa ɔle sɛ ɔbuai bo. Bo nsɛgbai sɛɛ nɖe bo kakpã akpɛ̃ra wa bosɛ bodzuɛ̃ so ala.
47006008	Mawɛ̃ sɛ mawarɛ bo fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɛ masopara bo, mawɛ̃ sɛ male bo fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana sɛ marɔ bo iyere lalaa, mawɛ̃ ana sɛ manyɔ bo lɛ maladze awe, ɣɛɛ ɔnukuare boto boɣɛ.
47006009	Maturi sɛ mabara lɛ maiɣe bo, ɣɛɛ maɣe bo i kakɔi biara, masɛ manyɔ bo lɛ boɔkpi ɣɛɛ lɛ miɣe ne, boba ngbã. Mapɛ bo, ɣɛɛ maiɖoe bo.
47006010	Atoa sɔ bopia i isoma ame ne, so ɔɣɔ bo ɔwi biara, bonyɔ lɛ mawɛrɛba, ɣɛɛ bosɛ botã maturi ɔkpese maranase. Bose lɛ mma nna kuira ɣɛɛ boba ira biara.
47006011	Manyii ma Korintose, boɣere mi ɔnukuare ta bo situ ame fiɛ bowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ bofɔ mi ana.
47006012	Iiɖe bo loɖi mi nrɔɔ̃ ne mi mɔmɔ nto mikora kama mitã bo lo!
47006013	Nto loɖe mi ika lɛ wũ mabi awe. Kumɛgɔ bowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ bosɔ̃ mi ne, mi wũ miwarɛ mi mire mitã bo ngbɔ.
47006014	Minyɔ sɔ mi gu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze iibabara mawɛ̃ i kuira ame alasɔ iibawo ɔkate. Ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa iibawo mawɛ̃ ɔɖe ɖa. Ikpawaĩ gu idududu iibawo kakɔi kawɛ̃ ɔwe ɔnya.
47006015	Kristo gu Ɔbosam iibawo ara karɔ̃ ɔnɔgu so. Ngbɔ ame i fɔɖedze gu ngɔ loifɔ ɔɖe iibawo mawɛ̃ ɔbara ne.
47006016	Aɣɔ gu Ɣaa iyo na kuira maabara masiaidzo. Alasɔ bo nɖe Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã isɔrɛyo. Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loawe i ma ndɛ̃, losɛ i ma ame, loɖe ma Ɣaa fiɛ ma wũ maɖe wũ maturi.”
47006017	Ne ɔso i Bosate ɔɣere ɔ̃ maturi sɔ, “Mibɔrɛ i ma ndɛ̃, Si mibɛse so mibɔrɛgu i iɣɔsɔrɛ iso. Midaapɛpɛgu ma anyanyara iyɔ loafɔ mi.
47006018	Fiɛ loakpese mi Ɔse Mi wũ mikpese me mabi birɛrɛĩ gu mabirɔ̃gomi. Ngbɔ i Ɣaa Ɔlesate to ɔɣɛ ne.”
47007001	Gɔ maɣɛ ara wagbe masɛ i bo iso ɔso ne manyii, mitã bosekelera so boɖi i ira biara nɛ loapukutura bo sosina gu siwarã si bose sekelee i Ɣaa kuwarɛ gu kunigã ame.
47007002	Nto lobie sɔ miwarɛ mi nrɔɔ̃ mifɔ bo alasɔ boiɣɛrɛ mi kuwɛ̃ fiɛ boikpadzɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ bokigu i ɔri nyanyarĩa iso, ana ne, boiɖe kuwɛ̃ amumu.
47007003	Loito loɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ si lotã mi ipɔ. Alasɔ loɔɣɛ lofegu sɔ mifɔ bo kuɣa gbaã fiɛ kukpi ame o-o, ngbã ame o-o ne, mawɛ̃ boɖe.
47007004	Lofɔ mi loɖe fiɛ nsɛ lopa so ala mi ɔso. I bo inyɛwe ɔɖuɖu ame ne, loba katetere fiɛ so ɔɣɔ me ala mi ɔso.
47007005	Gɔ boba boabo Makedonia ne, boina iwarã kuiwɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ amɔrɛ̃ ɔki alɔ bo i kakɔi biara gu kalɔ gɔ itã sɔ ifɔ̃ ɔwe i bo ame.
47007006	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔpia mma lofɛfɛ̃ ɔtɔ ɔpia bo kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri iki i Tito iba ame.
47007007	Iiɖe Tito iba ɔnɔwɛ̃ lopia bo isoɣɔ ɣɛɛ ɔɣere bo kumɛgɔ mitã wũ katetere. Ɔɣere bo kumɛgɔ ito mi ɔkã sɔ mianya me, kumɛgɔ mito mimararã so i mi ikpi iti fiɛ miledza so sɔ miafɔ me kanya ne, itã so ɔɣɔ me gbaã.
47007008	Si wũ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ mi ɔtã mi isoma ne, iiɖaa me. Ibo me so gɔ lonya sɔ iɖaa mi ɔwi kurukutu.
47007009	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, so ɔɔɣɔ me, iiɖe sɔ lopia mi isoma ɔso, ɣɛɛ sɔ mi isoma ɔtã mifiniki ɔso. Ɣaa ɔsu mi isoma ɔfinikira mi ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ ne ɔso iɖe mi kusia.
47007010	Alasɔ si ɔturi ɔmararã so i Ɣaa ɔri iso ne, isɛ ibɔ ifiniki nɛ loatã wũ ngbã fiɛ iibaɖaa wũ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔmararã so i kayiiso ara iso ne, kukpi ɔ̃ana.
47007011	Minyɔ karabara ga i Ɣaa ɔsu isoma nɛgbe ɔbara. Itã miɖo anɔ mibua. Itã sɔ mito mibie sɔ miase sekelee. Itã sɔ miisɛ minagu ara lalaa isoɣɔ. Itã ifɔ̃ pia i mi ame i ikpi iso. Itã mito minyɔ ara ɔri teteree. Itã misɛ mipia kubɛ, fiɛ itã sɔ misɛ mibie sɔ miakpadzɛ̃ kpibaradze kutsue. I ira biara ame ne, mite sɔ miisɛ mibara mawɛ̃ ku ira lalaa.
47007012	Ne ɔso atoa sɔ lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔmɔ ne, iiɖe ngɔ lobara iɣɛrɛ ɣee ngɔ maɣɛrɛ ɔso lotsɛrɛ. Ɣɛɛ lotsɛrɛ sɔ si loɖi lote mi sekelee i Ɣaa katɔ̃ kumɛgɔ misɛ mipia kubɛ i bo iti.
47007013	Nnɛgbe lotã bo katetere ne. Ibua i katetere ga bona iso ne, so ɔɣɔ bo i isoɣɔ nɛ i Tito ɔna i kumɛgɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔkpase ɔsɛ ɔso.
47007014	Losu mi loɖe ndamu lotã wũ fiɛ miipia me kunuarɛ ana. Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i itɔ̃me biara nɛ loɣere mi ɖe ɔnukuare ne, ndamu mɛ loɖe i mi iso lotã Tito ana iiɖe sila
47007015	Si ɔnyigi mi ɔɖuɖu atsue ikã, mi kuwarɛ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ misu mifɔ wũ ne, mi ara sɛ amɔɛ̃ wũ ɔtu teteree abua.
47007016	So ɔɣɔ me gbaã alasɔ losu iti losia i mi iso i ira biara ame.
47008001	Manyii, bobie sɔ mitsue ara wa i Ɣaa abualɛra ɔpia Makedonia mafɔɖedze ɔle fiɛ mabara.
47008002	Mawe i ilainyɔ gu inyɛwe teteree ame. Atoa sɔ mapia i kusa siare ame ne, maɖi kayiri matã ara ku isoɣɔ.
47008003	Loawo ita ɔsia ɔtã mi sɔ matã ara kumɛgɔ maawo. Loawo ɔɣɛ sɔ matã ara maɖodza kumɛgɔ i ma ɔle se kanya. I ma mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame ne,
47008004	matã bo iti teteree sɔ botã ma ɔri si ma wũ maɖi ma kayiribielea mate iki i karatã ame itã mafɔɖedze ma i Yudea.
47008005	Boinyɔ ɔri botã nnɛ mabara ngbe kɔra. Maɖe katɔ̃ masu so matã Bosate, ne kama iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame ne, masu so matã bo bo wũ.
47008006	Nnɛgbe ɔso Tito gɔ losɛ karatã karabara gagbe karɔ̃ koko i mi ndɛ̃ ne, bopia wũ ɔtɔ sɔ ɔkɛlɛgu kã i katɔ̃ si ɔwiri.
47008007	Miɔsɛ katɔ̃ i ira biara ame. Mi kafɔkaɖe gu ikaɖe gu inɔgba ɔɔyi, misɛ mipia kubɛ i ira biara ame fiɛ mito miɖɔɛ bo ana. Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, minyɔ sɔ miasɛ katɔ̃ i abualɛra wagbe ibara ame ana.
47008008	Iiɖe mmara miɖe nto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ maturi mama kubɛ ipia nto losɛ mi i katɔ̃ lonyɔ sɔ nda i mi kuɖɔɛ ɔsi.
47008009	Miɣe Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra. Ranase ɔɖe fiɛ, ɣɛɛ mi ɔso ne, ɔkpese wɛrɛba sɔ miaki i ɔ̃ siwɛrɛba ame mikpese maranase.
47008010	Wũ adzuni nɖe sɔ, karabara ga misɛ karɔ̃ ku igɔgɔwi ne, ialɛ sɔ miawiri kã. Mi nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ ma lotã ara fiɛ mi kɔra loɖe katɔ̃ mibara adzuni wamɔ.
47008011	Kiniɔ ne, ikote sɔ miawiri karabara ga karɔ̃ misɛ. Ɔtɔ gɔ ame misu misɛ karabara karɔ̃ ne, misu ɔ̃ ame miwiri kã ala ara wa miba kiniɔ.
47008012	Alasɔ si iɖe mi kuɖɔɛ sɔ miatã ara ne, Ɣaa aafɔ nnɛ mitã, iiɖe nnɛ miina.
47008013	-
47008014	Iiɖe ɔbie loto sɔ si lopia mi ato lobua gɔ nto lobɛrɛkɛ mawɛ̃ are. Ɣɛɛ si ato iibaɖo kuwɛ̃ ne, mibuai ma kiniɔ gɔ miba, iyɔ ɔwi gɔ mi wũ miabo i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, ma wũ maɔbuai mi, iyɔ ira biara ɔɔkote.
47008015	Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko sekelea ame sɔ, “Ngɔ losa ara gbodzoo kanya iife ina fiɛ ngɔ lona kɛkɛĩ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ iife ikoso.”
47008016	Siba boapɛ Ɣaa sɔ ɔtã Tito ɔpia so kubɛ sɔ ɔ̃abuai mi lɛ bo ame.
47008017	Gɔ boɣere wũ sɔ ɔba mi kɔrɛ si ɔ̃abuai mi ne, ɔtɔrã ala iɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ koko sɔ ɔ̃aba.
47008018	Boto bopia ma gu bo ɔnyii ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖuɖu sɛ male ala kumɛgɔ ɔsɛ ɔpia kubɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame.
47008019	Ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖi wũ sɔ ɔsiai bo i abualɛra karabara gagbe ibara ame. Karabara gagbe ne, ɔbara boto bobara sɔ si boɖi Bosate ile gu bo kuɖɔɛ gɔ boba sɔ boabuai bote.
47008020	Boto bodzuɛ̃ so sɔ boibatã kuwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika i kumɛgɔ bobara karatã ga i maturi ɔɖi kayiri matã iso.
47008021	Bo adzuni nɖe sɔ boabara nnɛ nlɛ i maturi gu i Bosate ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
47008022	Ne ɔso boto bopia bo ɔnyii gɔgbe bosiaira ma ne. Boɔkere wũ bonyɔ i siri agbãagbã iso fiɛ bonya sɔ ɔsɛ ɔpia kubɛ gbaã. Ibua i ne iso ne, ɔbua ɔfɔ mi ɔɖe gbaã ne ɔso ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abuai mi ne.
47008023	I Tito wũ burise kasɛ ne, marabaradze laa boɖe i mi ndɛ̃. Manyii tsɔra ne, mafɔɖedze akuri kanya maba fiɛ masɛ mawarɛ Kristo.
47008024	Miɖi mi kuɖɔɛ mite ma si mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ iiɖe ndamu siefe boto boɖe i mi iso.
47009001	Gbaã ne, iinya sɔ loatsɛrɛ mi ɔko i karatã ga boɣɛ sɔ boatã mafɔɖedze wɛrɛba ma i Yudea iso.
47009002	Loɣe sɔ mito mibie sɔ miabuai fiɛ loɔɖe ndamu i mi iso lotã Makedonia maturi sɔ, “Ta igɔgɔwi ne, manyii ma i Akaya ɔɔledza so sɔ maabuai.” Mi kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔpia manyii tsɔra ɔtɔ.
47009003	Kiniɔ ne, nto lopia manyii magbe mi kɔrɛ si maanya sɔ bo ndamu mɛ boɖe i mi iso i ara wagbe ame iiɖe siefe. Lɛ kumɛgɔ bosɛ boɣere ma sɔ miɔledza so ne, loabie sɔ miledza so fiɛ maaba.
47009004	Ɣɛɛ si Makedonia maturi ɔsiai me maba maanya sɔ miiledza so ne, kunuarɛ to kuakpɛ̃ bo fiɛ mi kunuarɛ nto kuasi kuɖo alasɔ mato maabu sɔ bofe mi ifɔ iɖe kaɖu.
47009005	Ne ɔso inya sɔ loapia manyii magbe loɖegu katɔ̃ si mabuai mi mibie ara wa miɣɛ sɔ miatã misɛ. Si mibie karatã misɛ fiɛ boba ne, iate sɔ ɔɖɔɛ miɖɔɛ sɔ miatã ara ɔso fiɛ mitã ne iiɖe ɔɣiɛ ɔso mitã.
47009006	Mitã ikpa mi sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ ɔraɖui garagara ne, ara kɛkɛĩ kere ɔ̃ana. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopɛ ɔraɖui gbodzoo ne, ɔto ɔ̃afɛ̃ ara gbodzoo.
47009007	Ne ɔso mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara kɛkɛ si ɔtã nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ. Iiɖe ɔɣiɛ ɣee kaboso ame, alasɔ Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã ara ku isoɣɔ.
47009008	Fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo mi ira biara ɔtã sɔ miana ara miɖo nwa ɔɖuɖu lonya mi sɔ ɔwi biara ne, miawo ɔbuai i karabara sɛɛ biara ame.
47009009	Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔsɛ ɔkurisi ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ ame ɔtã mawɛrɛba, fiɛ ɔ̃ kayiribielea na kawirikɔ̃.”
47009010	Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã kpɛ̃dze ɔraɖui pɛa gu araɖea ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã mi ɔɖui gɔ miapɛ fiɛ ɔ̃atã ɔlɛ kukaakɔ sɔ miafɛ̃ ara gbodzoo ala kumɛgɔ mitã ara ku ɔtu ɔso.
47009011	Ɔto ɔ̃atã miɖe maranase siare sɔ miawo ara ɔtã ɔwi biara ame sɔ maturi aapɛ Ɣaa siba i mi karatã ga mafɔ mabɔrɛgu i bo kɔrɛ ɔso.
47009012	Alasɔ karabara ga mibara ngbe ne, iiɖe mafɔɖedze ɔnɔwɛ̃ inyaa kaɖaɛ, ɣɛɛ itã maturi gbodzoo ɔpɛ Ɣaa siba
47009013	Si mipia kubɛ mitã ibuai nɛgbe ne, maturi to maale Ɣaa sɔ mifɔ Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea, mikã atsue fiɛ mito ara mitã ma gu maturi mama.
47009014	Mato maasu situ ɣɔa makparama kayi i mi iti ala abualɛra siare wa i Ɣaa ɔtã mi ɔso.
47009015	Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa siba i karatã ga karɔ̃ boibawo ɔnɔ fiɛ ɔsu ɔtã bo iti.
47010001	Mme Paulo mɔmɔ losu Kristo karɔ̃ ibɔso gu ɔtu ɣɔa nto loka mi. Mme gɔ misɛ miɣɛ sɔ si lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɖe ɔturi ɣɔa, ɣɛɛ si loɔrui i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɔkpese ɔturi gɔ mba ɔle.
47010002	Loto mi i kukpa sɔ midaatã lowe ɔle i mi iso si loba alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ loawo ɔle ɔwe i mma nto maɣɛ sɔ sosina ame adzuni kanya boto bobara ara.
47010003	Gbaã iɖe sɔ kayi ame bopia ɣɛɛ boisɛ bokpɛ̃ ku ala kayiiso adzuni.
47010004	Alasɔ bo akpakpɛ̃ra iiɖe kayiiso are, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa akpakpɛ̃ra wa mba ɔle fiɛ asɛ awo tsirise kuwɛrɛkɔ̃ gɔ mba ɔle ɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ aɖe.
47010005	Wã ame bosɛ bosu bonina mila kakpadzɛ̃ biara ana ne. Bosɛ bobiɛ ɔri atɛ̃ra wa ɔɖuɖu lota aɣɛ i Ɣaa itsue iso. Bosɛ bomɔɛ̃ adzuni ɔɖuɖu sisande sɔ aakã Kristo atsue.
47010006	Fiɛ si mi Kristo atsue ikã ɔɔyi ne, ka boto boawo atsue idaakã biara kutsue ɔkpadzɛ̃.
47010007	Mito minyɔ ara i siturina kanya. Mawɛ̃ pia i mmɔ gɔ masɛ mabu sɔ Kristo mare maɖe? Mitã mabu so ngbɔ alasɔ bo wũ Kristo mare boɖe lɛ ma ame.
47010008	Si loɔfe ndamu iɖe iɖo kumɛgɔ ikote i ɔle gɔ i Bosate ɔtã bo sɔ bosu bokararã mi iso fiɛ iiɖe sɔ bowɔra mi iso ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ me.
47010009	Loito lobie sɔ ite lɛ ifɔ̃ nto lopia mi i wũ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ ame.
47010010	Alasɔ mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ sɔ, “Paulo siko ba ɔrɔrã sitidza maturi, ɣɛɛ si ɔpia i bo kɔrɛ ne, ɔturi ɣɔa ɔɖe fiɛ ɔ̃ atɔ̃me ana na karɔ̃.”
47010011	Lobie sɔ mmamɔ si matsue sɔ ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i siko dzɛ bosɛ botsɛrɛ mi gu nnɛ bosɛ bobara si bopia i mi ndɛ̃ ame.
47010012	Iito bo ɔkã sɔ boasu so bokateragu mma nto makɔlɛ so kato sɔ mafe inya. Ma mɔmɔ losɛ akparĩ wa masu mato makere so ala, fiɛ si ma mɔmɔ akparĩ masu mato makere so ala ne, iyɔ iikpa ma.
47010013	Bo ne, boibaɖe ndamu bofe kumɛ, ɣɛɛ boatui i ngbegɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɛ ɔtã bo fiɛ karabara ga bobara i mi ndɛ̃ ana pia i ne ame.
47010014	Bo nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma losu Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea bobɔ mi. Ne ɔso si boto boɖe ndamu i mi iso ne, boiwara kumɛ alasɔ bobara karabara boba boabo i mi ndɛ̃.
47010015	Ne ɔso boisɛ boɖe ndamu miwara mibo i maturi mama karabara ame. Ɣɛɛ, i ne kanya ne, bo ɔriinyɔ nɖe sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe aamɔ fiɛ bo karabara i mi ndɛ̃ ana aamɔ kabua lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie.
47010016	Iyɔ boawo Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔɣɛ ɔfe mi bokɛlɛ nrɔ̃ mama iso gɔ iisibanya sɔ boaɖe ndamu i maturi mama karabara ga maɔbara iso.
47010017	Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Si ɔrere aaɖe ndamu ne, ɔɖe ndamu i Bosate iso.”
47010018	Alasɔ iiɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛ ɔkɔlɛ so kato nɖe ngɔ lokote, ɣɛɛ ngɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔkɔlɛ kato.
47011001	Mikafara, nto lobie sɔ loabara idzimira iwɛ̃, ne ɔso mifɔ mitã me.
47011002	Nto lokpɛ̃ sirerɛ i mi iti lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpɛ̃. Mise me lɛ ɔbitɛ gɔ loɔkarɛ lotã Kristo mɔmɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ayiri
47011003	Ɣɛɛ nto lonigã sɔ kumɛgɔ ame i aɣɛ ɔsu inɔgba asɔsɔla Eva fiɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, mi wũ mawɛ̃ to maakpɔkpɔtɔra mi adzuni sɔ miisibaɖe ɔnukuare misumu Kristo i ɔtu sekelea ame.
47011004	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ɔto ɔɣɛ Yesu mama itɔ̃me nɛ boiba boaɣere mi ne, misɛ mifɔ wũ mala. Ngbɔ ame misɛ mifɔ siwarã gu itɔ̃me nɛ loiɖe Ɣaa Siwarã gu ɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ iibɔrɛ i bo kɔrɛ miɖe ne.
47011005	Loifɔ loɖe sɔ mi katɔ̃memasɛdze kɔlɛa mamɔ lɛ maɖo me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso.
47011006	Atoa sɔ ɔnyagɛmi iisɛ ɔta me kukaakɔ ne, loɣe ara gbodzoo. Gbaã ne, botã nnɛgbe ame ɔkpa mi i ɔri biara iso.
47011007	Loifɔ mi kuso kukuwɛ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ loba loaɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɣɛɛ lobɔ so karɔ̃ sɔ si maakɔlɛ mi kato, nnɛgbe ana ne ikpi lobara?
47011008	Ɔwi gɔ nto loɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i mi ndɛ̃ ne, mafɔɖedze mama karatã karabara lobara i mi iso, gɔ maawo ɔɣɛ sɔ loyu ma losu lobuai mi.
47011009	Ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ ara ɔnya me ne, loiɖaa mi kutsuɛ, ɣɛɛ manyii ma lobɔrɛ i Makedonia maba lotã me wũ ara nyaa. Ne ɔso loikpese kuwɛ̃ ato fiɛ loibabara ana.
47011010	Ayi kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔnukuare pia i wũ ame ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo me ɔri ɔtɛ̃ sɔ lodaaɖe nnɛgbe ndamu i Akaya awo ame.
47011011	Be ɔso? Sɔ loito loɖɔɛ mi ɔso? Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ nto loɖɔɛ mi.
47011012	Loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ sɔ loibafɔ kuira lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ. Iyɔ loibatã mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔri kuwɛ̃ sɔ maakɔlɛ so kato sɔ mato mabara karabara lɛ kumɛgɔ ame boto bobara.
47011013	Mmagbe ne, mila katɔ̃memasɛdze gu mila marabaradze maɖe. Mabara so lɛ Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze maɖe ɣɛɛ maiɖe.
47011014	Ɣɛɛ ina ɣaa alasɔ Ɔbosam kɔra sɛ ɔsɔsɔla maturi sɔ Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nsɛ ɔfiɛ ɔɖe.
47011015	Ne ɔso ina ɣaa sɔ ɔ̃ masiaidze to mate so lɛ sibɔlɔlɔ maɖabo maɖe. Ma kawirikɔ̃ to kaakategu ma kurabarara.
47011016	Lobie sɔ loledza mi iɣere sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaabu sɔ iikpa me. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔbu ngbɔ ne, mifɔ me lɛ ngɔ iikpa si mme wũ loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ loɖe ndamu kɛkɛĩ.
47011017	Gbaã ne, nnɛ nto loɣɛ i ngbe ne, iiɖe Bosate lotã me ɔri sɔ loɣɛ ngbɔ, ɣɛɛ nto loɖe ika lɛ kumɛgɔ i ngɔ iikpa sɛ ɔna katetere ɔɖe ndamu.
47011018	Ɣɛɛ gɔ kayiiso ara i maturi gbodzoo sɛ masu maɖe ala ndamu ɔso ne, mme wũ loasu wã loɖe ala ndamu.
47011019	Gɔ mi mɔmɔ ɖe manɔgbadze kaɖu ɔso ne, misɛ mina ɔtu mikã mma iikpa atsue.
47011020	Fiɛ si ɔrere ɔsu mi ɔbara masande, ɣee ɔbara mi ira boa, ɣee ɔɖe mi amumu, ɣee ɔ̃iwarɛ mi ɣee ɔpɛ mi ɔrɔ̃ta i katɔ̃ ne, misɛ miɣara so mitã wũ.
47011021	Iɖe me kunuarɛ sɔ lotɔrã losia sɔ mafɔ̃dze boɖe ɔso boibara ara wagbe. Ɣɛɛ ira biara nɛ i ɔrere aasu ɔɖe ala ndamu ne, mme wũ loawo ɔsu ɔɖe. Mme wũ ka loɖe ika lɛ ngɔ iikpa.
47011022	Si ma sɔ ma Hebrise maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe. Si ma sɔ ma Israelse maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe, fiɛ si ma sɔ Abraham mawa maɖe ne, mme wũ ɔ̃ loɖe.
47011023	Wũ ikaɖe to iare ngɔ nto ɔlala. Ma sɔ Kristo maɖabo maɖe? Loɖe Kristo ɔɖabo sɛɛ loɖo ma fiɛ loɔbara karabara loɖo ma ɔɖuɖu. Loɔrɛ i iyo loɖo ma, maɔpɛ me teteree maɖo ma fiɛ loɔbore lobo kukpi ɔwi gbodzoo.
47011024	Ikpɛ iru buu i ma Yudase ɔɔpɛ me ala iporoibi ikpɛ sitɛ-kaiwɛ̃.
47011025	Fiɛ ikpɛ itɛ i ma Romase ɔɔpɛ me ala ma kudzirii. Mapɛ me ata ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃. Ɔkolo ɔɔbiɛgu me i ndu iso ikpɛ itɛ. Fiɛ loɔwe i ndu ame kasɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ku ikpɛnɛ iwɛ̃ buu.
47011026	I wũ irisɛ gbodzoo ame ne, loɔbo i amɔrɛ̃ agbãagbã ame. Siwore ɔɔyi simɔɛ̃ me ikpɛ sirɛ̃sirɛ̃, loɔbo i mayukukpe nrɔɔ̃ ame. Loɔbo i imɔrɛ̃ ame i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame. Loɔbo i imɔrɛ̃ ame i simagɛ̃ ame, fafuĩ ame, ɔpo iso gu mila manyii nrɔɔ̃ ame.
47011027	Loɔpia kubɛ lobara karabara teteree, losɛ kasɛ̃ sirɛ idaarɛ ayi gbodzoo, losɛ kukã, ɔme ɔkore me, fiɛ loina nnɛ loaɖe. Ɔyu ɔkpɛ̃ me, lona kabokɔ̃ fiɛ lona nnɛ loapia ana.
47011028	Ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, wũ ɔtu ɔta ɔɣɛ so iso ala mafɔɖedze akuri atɔ̃me sia me iso.
47011029	Si ɔrere sɔ ɔ̃ɔfɛ̃ ne, me loɔfɛ̃ loɖo, fiɛ si makɔ ɔrere mapia i ikpi ame ne, isɛ ibiɛ me ɔtu.
47011030	Si inya sɔ loaɖe ndamu ne, ara wa ame nna ɔle loasu loɖe ala ndamu.
47011031	Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Ɔse fiɛ ɔ̃ boale ɔwi biara ne, ɔɣe sɔ nwa ɔɖuɖu nto loɣɛ ngbe ne, loito lola sila.
47011032	Ɔwi gɔ lowe i Damasko ne, abã ɔkpakpa gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i Igara Areta kayirinɔ ɔtã madzuɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ sɔ si mamɔɛ̃ me.
47011033	Ɣɛɛ masu me mapia i isɛsɛ ame makigu i ibere iyoi ame lotere wũ iso.
47012001	Atoa sɔ kusia kukuwɛ̃ na i ndamu iɖe ame ne, ikote sɔ loaɖe ndamu. Kiniɔ ne, loakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ loɣɛ iɖi ite gu ara wɛrɛa wa i Bosate ɔɖi ɔte me iso.
47012002	Loɣe Kristo ɔre ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Bosate ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu kuɖokpo tɛare i akɔ aweo-ana wa lofe ame. Sosina ame ɔwe o-o siwarã ame ɔwe o-o ne, loibawo ɔtsue, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ ɔɣe.
47012003	Mme sɔ loɣe ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ masu makɛlɛgu kato. Ɣɛɛ lɛ nto loɣɛ ne, loiɣe si sosina ame iɖe ɔkɛlɛ, ɣee siwarã ame iɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ ɔɣe.
47012004	I Paradiso mmɔ ne, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe ɔnɔ ara wa maitã ɔri sɔ maɣɛ gu nwã karɔ̃ ɔ̃ibawo ɔɖi.
47012005	Ne ɔso loaɖe ndamu i ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔgbe iso, ɣɛɛ iiɖe mme mɔmɔ iso. Si loaɖe ndamu ne, ara wa lote sɔ lona ɔle kuwɛ̃ iso loaɖe.
47012006	Fiɛ si mme sɔ loaɖe ndamu kɔra ne, loibaɖe ngɔ loikpa anɔ, alasɔ loibaɣɛ ara wa loiɖe ɔnukuare. Ɣɛɛ loibaɖe ndamu fiɛ maturi aaba maabu sɔ loɖe ɔturi siare loɖo kumɛgɔ ikote i wũ ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame.
47012007	Ne ɔso si loibaɖe ndamu i awawãra gbodzoo wa lonɔ ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔsu ɔnyɛ gɔ nsɛ ɔbo lɛ siyu ɔpia i wũ ame. Ɔnyɛ gɔgbe se lɛ Ɔbosam kpabo sɔ ɔpɛ me si loibakɔlɛ so kato.
47012008	Ikpɛ itɛ lokparama kayi loɣere Ɣaa sɔ ɔɖi ɔnyɛ gɔgbe i wũ ame.
47012009	Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Wũ abualɛra nɖe nnɛ lonya-ɔ, alasɔ wũ ɔle sɛ ɔte i fɔ ɔle idaawe ame ɔbua.” Ne ɔso so aaɣɔ me fiɛ loawo ndamu ɔɖe i wũ ɔle idaawe iti si Kristo ɔle aawe i wũ ame.
47012010	Ne ɔso si lona ɔle fiɛ mato matia me, ɣee nto lowe inyɛ, ɣee mato mati me kama, ɣee ara to awe me ɔle ne, ɔtu sɛ ɔɣɔ me ala Kristo ɔso, alasɔ si lona wũ iso ɔle ne, ne nsɛ lona Kristo ame ɔle ne.
47012011	Nto lobara ara lɛ ngɔ iikpa, ɣɛɛ mi lotã nto lobara ngbɔ alasɔ mi ikote sɔ miale me fiɛ. Katɔ̃memasɛdze kɔlɛa mamɔ iilɛ maɖo me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso atoa sɔ loiɖe kuira.
47012012	Awawãra siare gu akparĩ gu ɔle karabara ga lobara i mi ndɛ̃ ku ɔtu ɣɔa kerekere ɔɔte sɔ katɔ̃mesɛdze mɔmɔ loɖe.
47012013	Ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ pia gɔ lobara lotã mafɔɖedze mama fiɛ loitã mi? Ɛɛbɛrɛ sɔ loikpese ato i mi iso ɔso? Misu iɣɛrɛ nɛmɔ mitsɛ me.
47012014	Ɔkpɛ tɛare nto lobie sɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ne, ɣɛɛ loito lobie mi ibuai kuiwɛ̃. Mi mɔmɔ nto lobie ne iiɖe mi sikã alasɔ iiɖe mabi nsɛ mabie karana mafu ma maɣese ɣɛɛ maɣese nsɛ mabie masɛ mabi.
47012015	Iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ loabara wũ karana ɔɖuɖu gu ɔle karabara i mi iso. Be ɔso miibaɖɔɛ me si mme nto loɖɔɛ mi wodoroo ngbɔ?
47012016	Mianɔgu me karɔ̃ sɔ loikpese mi ato. Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ aaɣɛ sɔ inɔgba losu nto losɔsɔla mi.
47012017	Loki i mma lopia mi ɔwɛ̃ iso loɖe mi amumu?
47012018	Lopɛ Tito nrɔɔ̃ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ fiɛ loɖi fɔɖedze ɔwɛ̃ ana losiaira wũ. Tito ɔba ɔ̃aɖe mi amumu? Iiɖe adzuni awɛ̃ aɖe bo, fiɛ iiɖe ɔbara ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe bo?
47012019	Ɔbu mito sɔ ɔwi gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu ame ne kanya boto boɖi so? Ooɣo! Boto boɖe mi ika lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo aabie sɔ boɖe mi ika i Ɣaa katɔ̃. Fiɛ ira biara nɛ boabara ne, bo manyii, bosɛ bobara si bosu bobuai mi
47012020	Nto lonigã sɔ kumɛgɔ lonyɔ ɔri sɔ mise ne, loibaba loanya mi ngbɔ. Fiɛ mi wũ kumɛgɔ minyɔ ɔri sɔ lose ne, miibanya me ngbɔ. Nto lonigã sɔ loaba loatu kalɔ, kanɔbɛbɛ, sikpã, wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, maturi iyere inina, maturi iso ara iɣɛ, kato ikɔlɛso gu iɣɛɣɛso i mi ndɛ̃.
47012021	Nto lonigã ana sɔ ɔwi gɔ loaledza mi kɔrɛ iba ne, wũ Ɣaa to ɔ̃abɔ me karɔ̃ i mi katɔ̃ sɔ loabiɛ i mma lobara akpi wa nɖe asɔrɔ̃ra, anyanyara mafegu fiɛ maifiniki iti.
47013001	Ɔkpɛ tɛare nto loba mi kɔrɛ ne. Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ne, “Itɔ̃me biara nɛ maaɣɛ i ɔturi iso ne, ikote sɔ maɖansiɛ aaɖe maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ma nto maɣɛ itɔ̃me iwɛ̃ fiɛ miatã ɔnyiiɔ ipɔ.”
47013002	Gɔ loba mi kɔrɛ ɔkpɛ nyɔare ne, losɛ̃ lotã mma lobara ikpi mafegu fiɛ loka ɔbiara ana. Kiniɔ gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ ne, loto loledza ma ika sɔ manyua alasɔ si lokpese loba ne, loto loakpadzɛ̃ ma ɔɖuɖu kutsue.
47013003	Mito miana ita isiara ɔɖuɖu nɛ mito mibie sɔ Kristo sɛ ɔki i wũ iso ɔɖe mi ika. Ɔ̃iɖe ɔturi gɔ nna ɔle alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔle to ɔbara karabara teteree i mi ndɛ̃.
47013004	Ɔwi gɔ mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso ne, ɔse nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔtara wũ ɔbɔ ngbã ku ɔle. Bo ma lobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ne, bose nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔle ɔrɛgɛ̃ra bo, ne ɔso bo wũ boawo nnɛ ikote sɔ boabara i mi ndɛ̃ ɔbara.
47013005	Mikere so minyɔ sɔ mikpese miɣɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame ana. Mikpa so kukaakɔ. Miinya sɔ Kristo Yesu pia i mi ame? Si ɔna miina kayakpa ne, iyɔ ɔna i mi ame.
47013006	Ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ mito mianya sɔ boba kayakpa kukaakɔ.
47013007	Boto Ɣaa i kukpa sɔ ɔbuai mi sɔ miibabara iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃. Iiɖe sɔ si ite maturi sɔ bo ne, boba kayakpa, ɣɛɛ si miabara isɛɛ, atoa sɔ ite lɛ boɔnɔ isɛɛ ibara.
47013008	Alasɔ boibawo kuira ɔbara ɔta ɔya i ɔnukuare iso, ɣɛɛ boabara nnɛ loapuãra wũ bowũ.
47013009	So sɛ siɣɔ bo si bose nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ fiɛ mi miba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame, ne ɔso bosɛ bokparama kayi sɔ mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mimɔ miyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
47013010	Nnɛgbe ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ sɔ si loba ne, wũ kɔrɔ̃ iibafe ɔrɔrã iwe i mi iso iki i ɔle gɔ i Bosate ɔtã me ala ɔ̃ karabara ɔso ne. Ɔtã me ɔle gɔgbe sɔ losu lobuai mi ne iiɖe sɔ losu lowɔra mi ala.
47013011	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, wũ manyii, miwe kukaakɔ, si miyi pɔpɔɔpɔ. Mibara i wũ kuka iso, mi adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃ si miwe i isobuɛ ame. Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi awune fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔwegu mi.
47013012	Miya mi malaa i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame.
47013013	Mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu sɔ maya mi o-o.
47013014	Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra, Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ gu Siwarã Bielea sinyii ibara si iwegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
48001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ nɖe katɔ̃mesɛdze kɔrɛ. Iiɖe ɔturi awune loɖi me, fiɛ iiɖe ɔturi iso iki fiɛ lokpese katɔ̃mesɛdze, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo gu bo Ɔse Ɣaa gɔ lotara Yesu ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame lokpere me.
48001002	Bo gu manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe to boya mi Ɣaa mafɔɖedze akuri wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i Galatia abuiti ame.
48001003	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra gu isobuɛ si iwegu mi.
48001004	Iki i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse kuɖɔɛ ame ne, Yesu Kristo ɔsu so ɔtã i bo akpi iti sɔ si ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i nɔme kayi nyanyarĩa gagbe ame.
48001005	Boale Ɣaa ita i nɔme ka ikpa! Si iba ngbɔ.
48001006	Ito ibara me ɣii sɔ iifɔ ɔwi ɖuɖuuɖu ne, ka mifiniki i Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi ala ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔso i kama mifɔ itɔ̃me bielea mama miɖe.
48001007	Gbaã ne, itɔ̃me bielea mama kuiwɛ̃ siina, ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ to mabie sɔ makpɔkpɔtɔra mi si mafinikira Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea.
48001008	Ɣɛɛ si bo, ɣee kpabo gɔ lobɔrɛ i kato ɔɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea mama nɛ loikotegu nnɛ boɣere mi ne, Ɣaa si ɔwɔra wũ pelepele.
48001009	Lɛ kumɛgɔ boɔɣɛ bofe ne, loto loledza iɣɛ sɔ, si ɔrere ɔba ɔ̃aɣere mi itɔ̃me mama nɛ loiɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mifɔ ne, Ɣaa si ɔwɔra ɔnyiiɔ.
48001010	Itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ ne, ɔɣɛ loto sɔ si loabo maturi anɔ ɛɛbɛrɛ Ɣaa? Maturi loto lobie sɔ loabo anɔ? Si maturi loto lobie sɔ loabo anɔ ne, iyɔ loiɖe Kristo ɔɖabo.
48001011	Manyii, loto lobie sɔ mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ne, iiɖe ɔturi awune kɔrɛ ibɔrɛ.
48001012	Iiɖe ɔturi awune kɔrɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu, fiɛ iiɖe kuwɛ̃ ɔɖe lote me, ɣɛɛ Yesu Kristo mɔmɔ loɖi ɔte me.
48001013	Miɣe kumɛgɔ losɛ ngbã lɛ ɔ Yudase gɔdɛĩ. Minɔ kumɛgɔ loti Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ikuri kama ku anɔmi rɛtɛa fiɛ lokpɛ̃ sɔ si lowɔra ne.
48001014	Wũ anɔ ɔrɛtɛ i ɔwa mɛrɛ̃ kubarara iso kukaakɔ sɔ losɛ katɔ̃ loɖo wũ isɛlaa gbodzoo i kubarara itsue ame.
48001015	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi me ɔsɛ ta wũ ɔnyi kayiri ame fiɛ ɔɖe me bualɛ ɔkpere me.
48001016	Ɔbara me kayiribielea ɔɖi ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔte me sɔ si lopɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃. Gɔ ɔkpere me ne, loikarɛ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔte me nnɛ loabara.
48001017	Fiɛ loikɛlɛ Yerusalem sɔ loanya mma loɔɖe me katɔ̃ lɛ katɔ̃memasɛdze awe, ɣɛɛ lokɛlɛ Arabia ɔluwɛ̃ fiɛ ne kama ne, lokpese loba loafe Damasko.
48001018	Akɔ atɛ kama fiɛ losɛ Yerusalem sɔ loanya Petro, fiɛ ka lowegu wũ ayi aweo-aru.
48001019	Ɣɛɛ loinya katɔ̃mesɛdze kuwɛ̃ iɖo Yakobo gɔ nɖe Bosate ɔnyiibi.
48001020	Ɣaa ɣe sɔ nnɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe ne iiɖe sila siɖe.
48001021	Ne kama ne, losɛ Siria gu Kilikia abuiti ame.
48001022	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Kristo mafɔɖedze ma mpia i Yudea iinya me manya.
48001023	Ɔnɔ kere maɔnɔ i maturi kanya sɔ, “Ngɔ lola ɔ̃ɔti bo kama ku ɔwiɔ ne, ka ɔɣɛ kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me nɛ ame sɔ bodaaɣɛ!”
48001024	Ne ɔso male Ɣaa ala wũ ɔso.
48002001	Akɔ aweo-ana kama ne, bo gu Barnaba ɔkpese bokɛlɛ Yerusalem fiɛ lokɔ Tito ana losɛgu.
48002002	Ɣaa loɖi ɔte me ɔso fiɛ lokɛlɛ. Gɔ losɛ loabo ne, losarɛgu mma lonya sɔ ma nɖe makpakpa i ma ndɛ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ fiɛ loɖi Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase lote ma. Lobara ngbɔ sɔ karabara ga loɔbara lofegu gu nga loto lobara kiniɔ iibakpese siefe.
48002003	Atoa sɔ Tito gɔ lokɔ losɛgu iiɖe ɔ Yudase ne, kuwɛ̃ iiɣiɛ wũ sɔ ɔtu sirɛrɛ̃.
48002004	Ɣɛɛ maladze mawɛ̃ ma mpia i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame to mayu bo manyɔ sɔ isɛguso nɛ boba i Kristo ame ne, maamɔɛ̃ ne mafɔ, makpesera bo masande matã ma Yudase kubarara.
48002005	Gɔ ɔbie boto sɔ ɔnukuare ɔɖuɖu gɔ mpia i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame si ɔse ɔtã mi ɔso ne, boitɔrãgu ma ɖuɖuuɖu.
48002006	Mma lobu so sɔ makpakpa maɖe ne, maitã me adzuni ɣɛtɛ kuawɛ̃. Si maturi nyaa maɖe kɔra ne, iiɖe ne lonya me, alasɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃.
48002007	Ɣɛɛ manya maɖi ite sɔ Ɣaa karabara ga ɔtã me nɖe sɔ loaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase Itɔ̃me Bielea lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia Petro ana sɔ ɔɣere ma Yudase.
48002008	Alasɔ Ɣaa gɔ loki i Petro iso ɔbara karabara i ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne, ɔ̃ ame loki i wũ iso ɔbara karabara i mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃ ne.
48002009	Yakobo gu Petro gu Yohanes mɛrɛ̃ ma i maturi sɛ manyɔ lɛ mafɔɖedze makpakpa ne, mafɔ bo nrɔɔ̃ minyɔ gɔ manya sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra piagu me gbaã. Masia ita sɔ bokɛlɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase kɔrɛ boaɣere ma Itɔ̃me Bielea si ma wũ makɛlɛ ma Yudase kɔrɛ maaɣere ma.
48002010	Nnɛ kere makarɛ mabɔrɛgu i bo kɔrɛ nɖe sɔ, bonyigi mawɛrɛba ma mpia i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ mme wũ ne, ngbɔ ame tutuutu nsɛ lobie sɔ loabara ne.
48002011	Gɔ Petro ɔba Antiokia ne, lonyagalagu wũ i maturi ndɛ̃ alasɔ ɔbara nnɛ loikote.
48002012	Alasɔ si mawɛ̃ aabɔrɛ i Yakobo kɔrɛ maba ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ara gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase. Ɣɛɛ gɔ mmagbe ɔba maabo ne, ɔbɛse so ɔɖi sɔ ɔ̃isito ɔɖe aɖera ku mma loiɖe ma Yudase alasɔ ɔto ɔnigã mma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ inya sɔ maatu sirɛrɛ̃.
48002013	Mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ma nɖe ma Yudase ɔbuai ma i mila ara wagbe ame gɔ itã sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ta Barnaba mapia i ne ame.
48002014	Ɣɛɛ gɔ lonya sɔ nnɛ mabara iikotegu nnɛ mpia i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ne, loɣere Petro i ma ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ sɔ, “Si fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe ɔ Yudase ɔsɛ ngbã lɛ ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase ne, be ɔso fiɛ ato aɣiɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase sɔ masɛ ngbã lɛ ma Yudase?”
48002015	I ɔnukuare ame ne, ma Yudase boɖe ta siɖu ame, boiɖe mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maɖe makpibaradze.
48002016	Ɣɛɛ ne, boɣe sɔ iiɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i mmara iso nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa, ɣɛɛ ngɔ lofɔ Kristo Yesu ɔɖe. Ne ɔso bo wũ bofɔ boɖe sɔ Ɣaa aafɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe ɔso, iiɖe kumɛgɔ bobara i mmara iso ɔso. Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iibaɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa i Ɣaa anɔ iki i mmara ibara iso ame.
48002017	Ne ɔso si boto bopia kubɛ sɔ mafɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo fiɛ kama iba iate sɔ bosɛ bobara ikpi ne, ite sɔ Kristo ɔtɔrã ɔsia i ikpi ibara iso? Ooɣo!
48002018	Si lokpese loto lobara ira nɛ losɛ̃ sɔ iilɛ ne, iyɔ mme mɔmɔ loɔte so sɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔbara i mmara iso loɖe.
48002019	I mmara kasɛ ne, loɔkpi lotã me sɔ si loasɛ ngbã lotã Ɣaa.
48002020	Bo gu Kristo ɔɖe mapɛ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, iisiɖe mme mɔmɔ ka nsi ngbã, ɣɛɛ Kristo nsi ngbã i wũ ame. Ngbã mɛ losi kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ loɖɔɛ me fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã i wũ iti kafɔkaɖe ame losi me.
48002021	Loito lokora kama lotã Ɣaa abualɛra. Alasɔ si mmara iso ibara ame i Ɣaa sɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ ne, iyɔ Kristo kukpi ɖe siefe.
48003001	Mi ma Galatiase, miikpa anɔ! Nna ɔɖe lokpɔkpɔtɔra mi adzuni ngbɔ? Loɣere mi kumɛgɔ tutuutu mapɛ Yesu mamatãra i kudziri iso.
48003002	Lobie sɔ lonɔ ira iwɛ̃ karɔ̃ i mi kɔrɛ. Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ mifɔ ne, nda ibara fiɛ mifɔ? Mmara iso mibara ɛɛbɛrɛ gɔ mifɔ itɔ̃me bielea miɖe ɔso?
48003003	Be ɔso mibo ndu ngbɔ? Mifɔ miɖe sɔ mi mɔmɔ miawo nnɛ karɔ̃ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔsɛ ɔbara?
48003004	Inyɛwe nɛ ɔɖuɖu ame miki ne, siefe iɖe? Ooɣo! Iibaɖe siefe.
48003005	Kumɛgɔ mibara i mmara iso ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔtã mi ɔto ɔbara awawãra i mi ndɛ̃, ɛɛbɛrɛ kumɛgɔ minɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me fiɛ mifɔ ne miɖe ɔso?
48003006	Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.”
48003007	Ne ɔso ikote sɔ miatsue sɔ mma mba kafɔkaɖe nɖe Abraham mabi.
48003008	Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ isɛ sɔ, Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara mma loiɖe ma Yudase bɔlɔlɔ iki i kafɔkaɖe ga maba ɔso. Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔɣere Abraham Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe kokooko sɔ, “Loatã kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu kusɛkusɛ iki i fɔ iso” ne.
48003009	Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, mma ɔɖuɖu lofɔ maɖe ne, maafere ma kusɛkusɛ lɛ Abraham awe.
48003010	Ɣɛɛ mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmara kayirinɔ ne, sigbarĩ sia ma iso, alasɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔbara i ara wa ɔɖuɖu matsɛrɛ mapia i mmara ɔko ame ne, sigbarĩ aasiai wũ.”
48003011	Iɔte sekelee kiniɔ sɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnyɔ kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ ɔbara i mmara iso ɔso, alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔturi gɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ i Ɣaa anɔ aasɛ ngbã iki i kafɔkaɖe ame.”
48003012	Ɣɛɛ mmara gu kafɔkaɖe iiɖe ira ka iwɛ̃ alasɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ loabara i ara wagbe iso aasɛ ngbã ala wã ɔso.”
48003013	Gɔ Kristo ɔkpese ngɔ iso i sigbarĩ sia i bo kanya ɔso ne, ɔ̃ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i mmara sigbarĩ kayirinɔ alasɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ lokpi i kudziri iso ne, Ɣaa sigbarĩ sia wũ iso.”
48003014	Ne ɔso iki i Kristo iso ne, maafere kayiiso ɔɖuɖu kusɛkusɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mafere Abraham kusɛkusɛ iso fiɛ boasu kafɔkaɖe bofɔ Siwarã dzɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo.
48003015	Manyii, lobie sɔ loasu ngbã ame ara awɛ̃ lote mi ikparĩ. Si ɔturi ɔbara ɔko ɔsɛ i kumɛgɔ maaɣɛ ɔ̃ ara makigu si sɔ ɔkpi fiɛ ɔ̃ɔpia kɔrɔ̃ i ɔko ame ɔro ne, kuwɛ̃ iisibawo ɔpɛ ɔfinikira, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iisibawo kuira ɔsu ɔbua.
48003016	Kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, Abraham gu ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔɣere. Ɣaa iiɣɛ sɔ, Abraham gu ɔ̃ mabi. Si ngbɔ ɔɣɛ ne, tee iate sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔto, ɣɛɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mi gu fɔ ɔbi” gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe Kristo ne.
48003017	Nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔnyi kanya gu Abraham gu ɔ̃ ɔbi ɔsia kã ita akɔ alafa ana gu sitɛ fiɛ mmara ɔba. Ne ɔso mmara mɛgbe iibawo kanya ga i Ɣaa ɔnyigu ma ɔtindza ɣee mibara sɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iibaba i ne ame.
48003018	Si Ɣaa karatã gagbe ne mmara ame kabɔrɛ ne, tee iisiɖe kaɣɛkasɛ. Ɣɛɛ ne, ira iɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham.
48003019	Ne ɔso kiniɔ ne, be ɔso i mmara se? Ɣaa ɔtã mmara sɔ si ɔturi aatsue nnɛ nɖe iɣɛrɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ maaɣe Abraham ɔɣekparɛ Ɔbi gɔ iso maɣɛ itɔ̃me masɛ. Ɣaa makpabo maɖe lokigu mmara i Mose iso matã maturi.
48003020	Kpuradze iisɛ ɔwe ɔtã ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ saã, ne ɔso gɔ Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ mpia ne, kpuradze iinya.
48003021	Mmara ne iyɔ ɔta mita miɣɛ i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ iso? Ooɣo! Si mmara ne ɔle miba miatã ɔturi ɔsɛ ngbã ne, tee ɔturi aabara i mmara iso ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.
48003022	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɔko Sekelea ɔɖi ɔte sɔ ikpi ɔnyi kayi ɔɖuɖu ito. Iba ngbɔ si Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ga loki i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso aakpese mma lofɔ Yesu Kristo maɖe karatã.
48003023	Si kafɔkaɖe gagbe aaba ne, mmara ɔbara bo ɔɖuɖu mayorɛdze gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi Kristo kafɔkaɖe kayi.
48003024	Ne ɔso mmara ɔnyɔ bo iso gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ bofɔ Kristo sɔ si Ɣaa aatã bo ibɛ ala bo kafɔkaɖe ɔso.
48003025	Fiɛ kiniɔ gɔ kafɔkaɖe ɔɔba ɔso ne, iisiɖe mmara nto minyɔ bo iso.
48003026	Iki i Kristo Yesu kafɔkaɖe ɔso ne, mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpese Ɣaa mabi.
48003027	Mi ma ɔɖuɖu mapie Ɣaa ndu fiɛ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo ne, miɔpia Kristo lɛ awu awe.
48003028	Alasɔ ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ siina i ɔ Yudase gu ngɔ loiɖe ɔ Yudase ndɛ̃, ɔsande gu ngɔ nsigu so ndɛ̃, ɔrɛrɛ̃ gu ɔrɔ̃go ndɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkpese mawɛ̃ fiɛ mipia i sinyii ame ku Kristo.
48003029	Si miɖe Kristo mare ne, iyɔ Abraham mawa miɖe, fiɛ miaɖe ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã wũ.
48004001	Nnɛ loto loɣere mi nɖe sɔ, ayi kumɛgɔ i ngɔ nɖe biarase ɖe ɔbiɛtɛ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma gu maɖabo inyɔ ndɛ̃ atoa sɔ ɔ̃ mba ira biara fiɛ.
48004002	Alasɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ biarase ɔmɔ ne, ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ ɔse ara sɛ mawe i makararãse kayirinɔ isɛ iabo ɔwi gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔse ɔsɛ sɔ maasu ara wamɔ mapia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
48004003	Ngbɔ ame i bo wũ ne, bowe i kayiiso sile dzɛ lowe kayirinɔ lɛ masande awe fiɛ bomɔ i siwarã ame.
48004004	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɛ ɔɣo ne, ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔ i ɔrɔ̃go ɔɣe, fiɛ ɔwe i mmara kayirinɔ.
48004005	Ɔ̃ i Ɣaa ɔpia sɔ ɔba ɔ̃atã kuso i mma mpia i mmara kayirinɔ iti si ɔfɔ bo ɔbara Ɣaa mabi ne.
48004006	Gɔ Ɣaa mabi miɖe ɔso ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sikparama kayi ku kuɖɔɛ siɣɛ sɔ, “Ao, Tete ɖɔɛse!” ɔpia i bo situ ame.
48004007	Ne ɔso ne, aisiɖe ɔsande, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔbi, fiɛ aafɔ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ lɛ biarase awe.
48004008	Ɔwi gɔ lofe fiɛ miiɣe Ɣaa ne, miɖe masande mitã sile dzɛ loiɖe Ɣaa.
48004009	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ gɔ miɔba miatsue Ɣaa, ɣee loaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa ka ɔɣe mi ne, be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miakpese mikɛlɛ siwarã nyanyarĩa fiɛ sina ɔle kɔrɛ sɔ miakpese sɛ̃ masande? Be ɔso mito mibie sɔ miakpese sɛ̃ masande ana?
48004010	Mikpese mito mitɛ ayi gu awa gu ɔwi gu akɔ minyɔ.
48004011	Ito me ifɔ̃ sɔ wũ ɔwi kere lonina i mi iso.
48004012	Wũ manyii, mise lɛ kumɛgɔ lose. Mme wũ ngbɔ ame kere lose lɛ mi ne, fiɛ loɣe sɔ miiɣɛrɛ me i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso.
48004013	Mianyigi sɔ ɔnyɛ ame loba mi kɔrɛ ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ fiɛ loɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea.
48004014	Atoa sɔ wũ ɔnyɛ ɔɖaa mi ne, mifɔ me fiɛ miwarɛ me. Ana ne, mifɔ me lɛ Ɣaa kpabo, ɣee lɛ Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ!
48004015	Iɖe isoɣɔ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ mina ku me? Lofɔ loɖe sɔ si ɔwo miawo kɔra ne, tee miɖi mi anɔmi mitã me.
48004016	Sɔ loɣere mi ɔnukuare ɔso ne, loɔkpese mi tsirise?
48004017	Mma nto mate sɔ mi ara ba ma ɔmɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔsɔsɔla kere mato mi. Mana kasusu sɛɛ i mi iso. Ɔbie kere mato sɔ si mabɛse mi mabɔrɛgu i wũ iso si mipɛ mimatã ma.
48004018	Ilɛ sɔ anɔ aarɛtɛ mi i ira sɛɛ ibara ame fiɛ ngbɔ ikote sɔ iase ɔwi biara ne, iiɖe ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ kere.
48004019	Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lonya ibo i mi iti lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nto ɔkpɛ̃ kuɣe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Kristo kumiamia aate so i mi ame.
48004020	Wũ kayiri tee mi kɔrɛ lopia kiniɔ si loafinikira wũ silɔ lote kumɛgɔ mise mitã me. Loto lomararã so i mi iso gbaã.
48004021	Mi ma nto mibie sɔ mmara iso miabara ne, mitã me itɔ̃me nɛgbe mmuai. Miinɔ nnɛ i mmara ɔɣɛ?
48004022	Matsɛrɛ masɛ sɔ, mabi birɛrɛĩ inyɔ i Abraham ɔwe. Ɔwɛ̃ ɖe ɔsanderɔ̃go ɔbi fiɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɖe ɔsɛre ɔbi.
48004023	Ɔbi gɔ i ɔsanderɔ̃go ɔɣe ne, maɣe wũ kere lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔturi sɛ ɔɣe ɔbi, ɣɛɛ ngɔ i ɔsɛre ɔɣe ne, maɣe wũ iki i Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ ame.
48004024	Ara wagbe to ate ara nyaa awɛ̃. Marɔ̃go inyɔ magbe ɣɛ matã ndamu aka anyɔ. Ngɔ mabi maɣe i sisande ame nɖe Hagar fiɛ ɔɣɛ ɔtã ndamu mɛ makã i Sinai Kube iso.
48004025	Hagar ɔkategu Sinai kube gɔ mpia i Arabia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nse kiniɔ ne, alasɔ ɔ̃ gu maturi ma mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔɖuɖu ɔkpese maɖe masande.
48004026	Ɣɛɛ Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ mpia i kato ne, ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ loiɖe ɔsande ɔɖe, fiɛ ɔ̃ nɖe bo ɔnyi ne.
48004027	Alasɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “So si siɣɔ-ɔ fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe ɔlɛma, fɔ ngɔ fɔ loiɣe ɔbi anya ne, na isoɣɔ, si ala isoɣɔ kulu. Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i ɔ̃ ɔrã ɔɖi atsue ne, ɔ̃ mabi to maasi maɖo ngɔ ɔrã pia i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ɔwi biara.”
48004028	Kiniɔ ne wũ manyii, kaɣɛkasɛ mabi miɖe lɛ Isak awe.
48004029	Lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame gɔ ɔbi gɔ maɣe i ɔrã gu ɔre kuɖɔɛ kanya ɔti ɔbi gɔ maɣe i Siwarã ɔle kama ne, ngbɔ ame ise kiniɔ ana ne.
48004030	Ɣɛɛ ne, be i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ? Matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Sa ɔsanderɔ̃go gu ɔ̃ ɔbi, alasɔ ɔsandebi gu ɔsɛrebi iibaɣɛ so ara maɖe.”
48004031	Ne ɔso ne manyii, iiɖe ɔsanderɔ̃go loɣe bo, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛre mabi boɖe.
48005001	Isɛguso i Kristo to ɔbie sɔ bona ɔso fiɛ ɔɖi bo, ne ɔso mitã boya teteree i bo isɛguso ame. Midaatã kuwɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃akpesera mi masande ana.
48005002	Mikã atsue, mme Paulo to loɣere mi sɔ, si mitã matu mi sirɛrɛ̃ ne, iyɔ Kristo iiɖe kusia kukuwɛ̃ ɔtã mi.
48005003	Fiɛ nto lobie sɔ ikpa mi ɔbiara sekelee sɔ, si ɔrere ɔtã matu wũ sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃abara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso.
48005004	Mi mma nto mibie sɔ manyɔ mi sɔ mise bɔlɔlɔ alasɔ mibara i mmara iso ne, mitsue sɔ miɔbɛse so i Kristo iso fiɛ miɔkora kama mitã Ɣaa sɔ ɔdaasinyɔ mi nnya.
48005005	Ɣɛɛ bo ne, gɔ bofɔ Siwarã Bielea boɖe ɔso ne, boɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ boto bonyɔ ɔri sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ bo sɔ bose bɔlɔlɔ.
48005006	Si bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ne, iito kuira si matu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ ɣee maitu-ɔ. Nnɛ lonya kere nɖe sɔ boasu kafɔkaɖe boɖɔɛ bo manyii.
48005007	Mila miɔpia kubɛ gbaã ku ɔwiɔ, ɣɛɛ ne, nna kowũ ɔɖe lotɛ̃ mi ɔri sɔ midaakã nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare atsue?
48005008	Iiɖe Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi ɔɖe lofinikira mi adzuni kumɛgɔgbe.
48005009	Lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Inyagɛ̃ kua kɛkɛĩ kere iɖe nsɛ itã mmɔre ɔɖuɖu ɔnyagɛ̃.”
48005010	Loba kafɔkaɖe sɔ Bosate iibatã mifɔ kuwɛ̃ adzuni iɖo wũ are. Ɣɛɛ ɔnyiiɔ gɔ nto ɔfinikira mi adzuni ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue.
48005011	Ɣɛɛ wũ manyii, si lokpese loto lote ara loɣɛ sɔ matu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, be ɔso fiɛ makpese mato mati me kama? Si ngbɔ loto lote ne, iyɔ wũ Ɣaa itɔ̃me iɣɛ i Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso iibata iya kuwɛ̃ iso.
48005012	Mma nto makpɔkpɔtɔra mi kumɛgɔgbe ne, magɔ̃ so kere si iro!
48005013	Manyii, ɔɖi i Ɣaa ɔɖi mi sɔ miasɛgu so, ɣɛɛ midaasu mi isɛguso mibara ikpi. Ɣɛɛ mitã bosu bo isɛguso bobuai so iso i kuɖɔɛ ame.
48005014	Mmara ɔɖuɖu ɔdziri nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
48005015	Nto loɣere mi sɔ si mito mikpɛkpɛti so mibara so ara boa lɛ mabɔi lalaa ne, mitsue sɔ mito miawɔra so.
48005016	Mitã Ɣaa Siwarã si site mi kumɛgɔ miasɛ ngbã, iyɔ miibabara ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi sosina ɔkã.
48005017	Alasɔ ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã ne, ata aɣɛ i nwa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibie iso. Fiɛ ara wa i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛ sibie ne, wã wũ ata aɣɛ i nwa i sosina sɛ sibie iso. Ara ka anyɔ wagbe ɔta aɣɛ so iso sɔ si midaabara nnɛ mito mibie.
48005018	Si Ɣaa Siwarã nsɛgu mi ne, iyɔ misiina i mmara kayirinɔ.
48005019	Ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã ne, ate so sekelee. Wã nɖe asɔrɔ̃ iɖe, anyanyara, asopara,
48005020	aɣɔ kasumu gu kabuɛ ikpɛ̃, ituritsiri, kalɔ ilɔ, sirerɛ, sikpã ina, fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ ibie, maturi gu akuri ndɛ̃ iɣɛɣɛ,
48005021	kanɔbɛbɛ, ndã irɛ̃, isoɣɔ lala ina, gu ara mama wagbe igbã. Nto loɣere mi lɛ kumɛgɔ loɔɣere mi lofegu sɔ, mma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe igbã ne, maibasɛ Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ manya.
48005022	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Siwarã ne, ara wa nsɛ abɔrɛ i sɛ̃ kɔrɛ nɖe kuɖɔɛ, isoɣɔ, isobuɛ, ɔtu ɣɔa, kayiribielea, ara sɛɛ ibara, ara ibara i ɔri iso,
48005023	karɔ̃ ibɔso gu iɖesoiso. Mmara kumiwɛ̃ iita miɣɛ i ara wagbe kuiwɛ̃ iso.
48005024	Mma nɖe Kristo Yesu mare ne, maɔpɛ ma iso sina mamatãra i kudziri iso gu sɛ̃ ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sɛ̃ ɔkã ɔɖuɖu.
48005025	Ɣaa Siwarã lotã bo ngbã, ne ɔso mitã bosɛ ngbã i sɛ̃ kuɖɔɛ ame.
48005026	Midaatã bokɔlɛ so kato, ɣee bopia so sikpã, ɣee bokpɛ̃gu so sirerɛ.
48006001	Wũ manyii, si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔbara ikpi ne, mi ma i Ɣaa Siwarã sɛgu si miɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ mika wũ sɔ ɔ̃akpese ɔya i kafɔkaɖe ame. Ɣɛɛ ne, nyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ fɔ wũ ne, maibala-ɔ manyɔ.
48006002	Si mibuai so i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, iyɔ mito mibara i Kristo mmara iso.
48006003	Si ɔrere ɔbu sɔ ɔɖe ira ku ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃iɖe kuira ne, ɔsɔsɔla kere ɔto so.
48006004	Ɔbiara si ɔkere ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kurabarara ɔnyɔ. Si ɔbara ngbɔ ne, ɔto ɔ̃anya si kulɛ fiɛ ɔ̃anya nnɛ iso ɔ̃aya ɔ̃aɖe ndamu. Iikote sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔkateragu ɔmama kure.
48006005	Alasɔ ɔbiara to ɔ̃asore ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ato.
48006006	Ngɔ nto ɔsuã kafɔkaɖe ara ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃atã ngɔ nto ɔte wũ ara ɔna kusia i ɔ̃ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ame.
48006007	Midaasɔsɔla so. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo Ɣaa sɔsɔla. Nnɛ i ɔturi ɔpɛ i kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ne, ne ɔ̃abɛse ne.
48006008	Ngɔ lopɛ ara i sosina ɔkã kanya ne, kukpi nɖe nnɛ ɔ̃abɛse ɔɖi i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ ngɔ lopɛ ara i Siwarã ɔkã kanya ne, ngbã mɛ nna katui nɖe nnɛ ɔ̃abɛse ɔbɔrɛgu i Siwarã ame.
48006009	Midaatã ira sɛɛ ibara si itɔrɛ bo, alasɔ si iitɔrɛ bo ne, boto boana ne kusia i ɔwi gɔ lokote iso.
48006010	Ne ɔso gɔ bokpese boba ɔri ne, mitã bobara isɛɛ botã ɔbiara titirio mma nɖe bo manyii Kristo mafɔɖedze.
48006011	Mi mɔmɔ minyɔ atɔ̃me siare wa lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ala wũ kɔrɔ̃!
48006012	Mma nto maɣiɛ mi sɔ ikote sɔ miatu sirɛrɛ̃ ne, ɔte kere mato so fiɛ mato makɔlɛ so kato ala sosina ame ara ɔso. Nnɛ ɔso mato mabara ngbɔ nɖe sɔ, maito mabie sɔ mati ma kama i Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso.
48006013	Alasɔ mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ kɔra ne, maito mabara i mmara iso, ɣɛɛ mato mabie sɔ mitu sirɛrɛ̃ si maaɖe ndamu sɔ ma lotã mitu.
48006014	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa si ɔbuai me sɔ loibaɖe ndamu i kuira iso iɖo Bosate Yesu Kristo kukpi i kudziri iso ame. Iki i ɔ̃ kukpi i kudziri iso ame ne, loɔkpi lotã kayiiso fiɛ kayiiso ana iisiɖe me kuira.
48006015	Matu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ o-o, maitu-ɔ sirɛrɛ̃ o-o ne, iiɖe ne lonya, ɣɛɛ nnɛ lonya iɖo nɖe sɔ aɖe ɔturi ɣɛtɛ.
48006016	Ɣaa si ɔnyɔ mma nsɛ masɛ i ɔri gɔgbe iso nnya si ɔtã ma isobuɛ. Ɔbara ngbɔ ɔtã Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ana.
48006017	Ita i kiniɔ kama ne, kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasiɖaa me, alasɔ aɣɛipã wa nsia me iso ɔɔte sɔ Yesu ɔsande loɖe.
48006018	Wũ manyii, Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu! Si iba ngbɔ.
49001001	Mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ɔso loɖe Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze ɔɖe nto ɔtsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma masekelera i Efeso fiɛ mito mibara ara i ɔri iso i Kristo ame.
49001002	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
49001003	Boto bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba sɔ ɔtã bo siwarã ame kusɛkusɛ biara gɔ lobɔrɛ i kato iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo ame.
49001004	Alasɔ iki i Kristo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi bo ɔsɛ, fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso sɔ boase sekelee, ikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibawe bo iso i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
49001005	Gɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo ɔso ne, ɔ̃ɔsia ita koko sɔ iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Yesu Kristo ame ne, boakpese ɔ̃ mabi. Nnɛgbe nɖe Ɣaa adzuni koko ne.
49001006	Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ boale Ɣaa ne, alasɔ iba ɣaa sɔ ɔnyɔ bo nnya, ala ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse ɔso.
49001007	Alasɔ iki i Kristo kukpi iso ne, bona iɖi gɔ ite sɔ boɔna akpi isu itsɛ. Ɣaa abualɛra ɔmɔ kere!
49001008	Ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔba ɔtã bo ɔwodoro fiɛ i ɔ̃ iwola gu inɔgba ɔɖuɖu ame ne,
49001009	Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ. Ɔɖi ɔ̃ ara wɛrɛa ɔte bo. Nwa ɔsia ita ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwiri ɔkigu i Kristo iso.
49001010	Nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwiri si ɔwi ɔɔɣo nɖe sɔ, ɔ̃akpere ɔ̃ kurabara ɔɖuɖu ɔsirakanya, ara wa mpia i kuɖokpo gu nwa mpia i karɔ̃ iso, sɔ wã ɔɖuɖu aawe i Kristo kayirinɔ.
49001011	Ɣaa ɔtã ira biara ɔba i ne ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔbie tutuutu. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ loɖi bo ɔsɛ sɔ boabara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo,
49001012	sɔ bo ma nɖe maɖeakatɔ̃ i Kristo ɔriinyɔ ame kokooko aasɛ ngbã bole ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ.
49001013	Ne ɔso mi wũ mikpese Ɣaa maturi gɔ minɔ itɔ̃me gbaã, Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ lobɔ mi iɖi. Mifɔ Kristo miɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔsu Siwarã Bielea dzɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ɔsia mi ikparĩ nɛ loate sɔ ɔ̃ mare miɖe.
49001014	Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛgbe nɖe ita isiara sɔ boto boafɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ɔ̃ maturi ne. Ana ne, isɛ isia ita itã bo sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mma nɖe ɔ̃ mare iwarã pelepele. Mitã bole ɔ̃ iyere!
49001015	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, ita i ɔwi gɔ lonɔ mi kafɔkaɖe i Bosate Yesu ame gu mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ne,
49001016	loinyua Ɣaa siba ɔpɛ i mi iti fiɛ losɛ lokparama kayi i mi iti ɔwi biara.
49001017	Nsɛ lokarɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse, ngɔ nɖe ikpawaĩ ɔɖuɖu Sate sɔ ɔtã mi siwarã dzɛ loatã mitsue ara, fiɛ siaɖi Ɣaa site mi mitsue wũ kukaakɔ.
49001018	Nsɛ lokarɛ wũ sɔ ɔbusi mi anɔ sɔ mianya nnɛ ɔso fiɛ ɔkpere mi ɔbɔ sɔ mianyɔ ne ɔri. Ɔbie sɔ si miatsue kumɛgɔ i nnɛ ɔledza ɔsɛ mma masekelera ɔfɔ kuɣa.
49001019	Ɔbie ana sɔ botsue kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i bo ma lofɔ wũ boɖe ame ɔmɔ. Ɔle gɔ nto ɔbara karabara i bo ame teteree ngbe ne, ɔ̃ nɖe
49001020	ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtara ala Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛra i ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato ne.
49001021	Kristo to ɔɖe sigara i sile dzɛ ɔɖuɖu nto siɖe iso i kato, ɔle gɔ i maturi ba i ara iso, sile agbãagbã dzɛ mpia gu sigarakuɖekɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso. Ɔ̃ iyere ɔɖe ayere wa ɔɖuɖu mpia kayi kiniɔ gu kayi ga nto kaaba iso.
49001022	Ɣaa ɔsu ira biara ɔpia i Kristo ngba kayirinɔ fiɛ ɔsu wũ ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri lɛ Sate gɔ mba ɔle i ira biara iso.
49001023	Mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛgbe nɖe Kristo siturina dzɛ lotã sɔ ɔyi fiɛ ɔpia i ira biara ame ne.
49002001	Ɔwiɔ ne, mikpi i siwarã ame ala mi atsuele gu akpi ɔso.
49002002	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, misiai kayiiso ɔri lalaa gu Tsirise gɔ nto ɔɖe siwarã lalaa ɔɖuɖu iso i ɔwiri ame fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe matsuelese ɔɖuɖu ana iso kiniɔ.
49002003	Gbaã ne, bo ɔɖuɖu ɔse lɛ ma, fiɛ bosɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i bo siturina sɛ siɖɔɛ fiɛ isɛ ipia bo adzuni ana isoɣɔ. Nsɛgbai mɛgbe igbã bosɛ ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnagu bo sikpã lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔnagu kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu sikpã ne.
49002004	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa nnyainyɔ nɛ ɔba ɔtã bo na katui fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ana ɔmɔ gbaã.
49002005	Atoa sɔ bo akpi ɔso ne boɔkpi ne, ɔtã bota bobɔrɛ i makpise ame ku Kristo. Ɣaa abualɛra kere ɔso boba ngbã.
49002006	Gɔ bobara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtara bo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame sɔ boaɖegu wũ sigara i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ i kato.
49002007	Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe si ɔsu ɔte ta mma maiɣe mabɔ kayi sɔ kuira na gɔ ikategu ɔ̃ abualɛra gu kayiribielea ga ɔba ɔtã bo ala Kristo Yesu ɔso.
49002008	Abualɛra ɔso kere ɔfɔ mi iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne iiɖe isɛɛ kuiwɛ̃ nɛ mibara ɔso, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa karatã kaɖe.
49002009	Iiɖe kuwɛ̃ kubɛ ipia ame ibɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔɖe ndamu.
49002010	Ɣaa ɔbara bo ala ɔ̃ arɔĩ, fiɛ iki i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame ne, ɔ̃ɔbara bo ɔtã ara sɛɛ ibara nɛ ɔ̃ɔledza bo ɔsɛ ɔtã koko.
49002011	Minyigi sɔ mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase ne, ɔwiɔ ne, ma Yudase ma matu sirɛrɛ̃ sɛ matia mi sɔ mma maitu sirɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ sirɛrɛ̃ itu nɛgbe ne, sosina ame kubarara kere kuɖe, fiɛ ɔturi kere lobara ala arɔĩ.
49002012	Minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ lofe ne, mibua midzorogu Kristo. Mafɔ miɖe, fiɛ miiɖe Ɣaa maturi. Mina kayakpa kukawɛ̃ i kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi ame. Miwe i ngbã ame gɔ miiwe ɔriinyɔ, ɣee Ɣaa.
49002013	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, iki i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Yesu Kristo ame ne, maɔboregu mi ma lodzoro mabɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ iki i Kristo ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ame.
49002014	Alasɔ Kristo mɔmɔ ɔbɔ bo isobuɛ gɔ ɔbara ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase mawɛ̃. Iki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ sosina isu itã ame ne, ɔɖi itsiri nɛ lowe i ma ndɛ̃ lɛ ibere.
49002015	Ɔɖi ma Yudase mmara gu kubarara sɔ iki i ɔ̃ ngbã mɛ ɔsɛ i sosina ame ne, ɔsa ma aka wã anyɔɔ kanya. Ɔkpesera ma ɔturi ɣɛtɛ sɔ maabaragu wũ mawɛ̃ fiɛ isobuɛ aaba.
49002016	Iki i kukpi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi i kudziri iso ame ne, ɔwɔra itsiri nɛ lowe i ma ndɛ̃, fiɛ iki i kukpi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ɔfere ma gu Ɣaa kanya ndu.
49002017	Ne ɔso ɔba ɔ̃aɣere maturi ɔɖuɖu isobuɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɔɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ madzorogu Ɣaa gu ma Yudase ma lobore mabo wũ.
49002018	Kristo iso iki fiɛ bo ɔɖuɖu, ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase aawo bo Ɔse kɔrɛ ɔba i Ɣaa Siwarã siwɛ̃ ame.
49002019	Ne ɔso miisiɖe mafɔ ɣee marisɛdze, ɣɛɛ mi gu Ɣaa maturi ɔɔkpese Ɣaa ɔmagɛ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi.
49002020	Mise lɛ ibere nɛ matsue masia i Katɔ̃memasɛdze gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze iso fiɛ Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ nɖe ita nɛ lonya iɖo.
49002021	Ɔ̃ lomɔɛ̃ kubereku ɔɖuɖu ɔsa fiɛ ikpese iyo iwɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔtsue iyo ikpese Ɣaa isɔrɛyo sekelea.
49002022	Gɔ mibaragu Kristo mawɛ̃ ɔso ne, mato matsue mi gu matsɔra ɔɖuɖu makpesera iyo nɛ ame i Ɣaa aasɛ iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame.
49003001	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ mme Paulo gɔ nɖe yorɛdze ala Kristo Yesu ɔso i mi ma loiɖe ma Yudase iti ne, nsɛ lokparama kayi lotã Ɣaa.
49003002	Gbaã ne, lofɔ loɖe sɔ miɔnɔ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya fiɛ ɔtã me karabara gagbe i mi iti.
49003003	Lɛ kumɛgɔ lotsɛrɛ lotã mi kurukutu ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ nnɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara ɔwɛrɛ ɔte me.
49003004	Si mika ɔko gɔgbe ne, mito miatsue kumɛgɔ lonɔ Kristo ara wɛrɛa karɔ̃.
49003005	Kokooko ne, Ɣaa iiɖi ara wɛrɛa wagbe ɔte maturi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔki i ɔ̃ Siwarã iso ɔɖi ɔte ɔ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze sekelea gu ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze.
49003006	Iwɛrɛra nɛgbe nɖe sɔ, iki i Itɔ̃me Bielea ame ne, mma loiɖe ma Yudase gu ma Yudase ka maatoto maɖe ɔ̃ ara. Maɔkpese sosina siwɛ̃ iso ara, fiɛ ka maba kaɖekɔ̃ i kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔtã ɔkigu i Kristo Yesu ame.
49003007	Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ ɔle ame ɔɖe me bualɛ gɔ ɔsu me ɔbara Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔɖabo.
49003008	Atoa sɔ mme nɖe kosore i Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne, ɔɖe me bualɛ sɔ losu ɔ̃ karana gbodzoo ga mpia i Kristo ame lopɛ imomo lotã mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
49003009	Ɔpia me sɔ lotã maturi ɔɖuɖu si matsue Ɣaa gɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu adzuni wɛrɛa wa ɔbara ɔsɛ ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
49003010	Fiɛ iaki i mafɔɖedze iso ne, Ɣaa aaɖi ɔ̃ iwola siare i siri gbodzoo iso ɔte mma nto maɖe iso gu mma nɖe sile sate ma nto maɖe iso i kuɖokpo ame.
49003011	Nnɛgbe nɖe nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara kokooko fiɛ iibafe inya ne. Kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔtã iba i ne ame iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso.
49003012	Gɔ bofɔ Kristo boɖe fiɛ bobaragu wũ mawɛ̃ ɔso ne, ka boba katetere sɔ boabore bobo Ɣaa gɔ boisibanigã.
49003013	Ne ɔso loto mi i kukpa sɔ inyɛ nɛ loto lowe i mi kanya si idaafɛfɛ̃ra mi nrɔɔ̃ alasɔ isaruɛ kerekere iakpadzɛ̃ ibɔ mi.
49003014	Nnɛgbe ɔso loto lopɛ Tete nrɔɔ̃ ne,
49003015	ngɔ kɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu gɔ i kato gu karɔ̃ ɔfɔ iyere kubɔrɛgu.
49003016	Loto lokparama kayi sɔ Ɣaa si ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ mpia i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ siare ame ɔpia ta mi kame ame.
49003017	Ana ne, mi kafɔkaɖe si katã sɔ Kristo aana kasɛ i mi situ ame, si mi kuɖɔɛ si kure siɖu sɔ miaya teteree.
49003018	Fiɛ miawe ɔle sɔ mi gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu aanɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Kristo ba ɔtã mi karɔ̃. Kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔbɛ, kukarã, kukɔlɛ, fiɛ kuwodoroo.
49003019	Ibua i ne iso ne, Ɣaa si ɔtã mitsue Kristo kuɖɔɛ gɔ karɔ̃ i maturi iibawo ɔnɔ sɔ Ɣaa kumiamia aayi i mi ame pɔpɔɔpɔ.
49003020	Ɣaa nɖe ngɔ ɔle nto ɔbara karabara i bo ame. Ɔsɛ ɔwo ira biara ɔbara ɔtã bo ɔɖo kumɛgɔ bokarɛ ɣee bobu.
49003021	Ile nɖe ɔ̃ gɔmɔ ɔkpɛ i mafɔɖedze ikuri gu Kristo Yesu ame ɔwi biara ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ. Si iba ngbɔ.
49004001	Ne ɔso gɔ lorɛ i iyo ala Bosate karabara ɔso ne, loto mi i kukpa sɔ mi nsɛgbai si mikotegu ngbã mɛ ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi.
49004002	Mibɔ so karɔ̃ si miɖe maturi ɣɔa ana ne, mina ɔtu. Misu kuɖɔɛ mitã so i kumɛgɔ miafɔ mi malaa.
49004003	Gɔ Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɔbara mi mawɛ̃ ne, miki i ɔri biara iso sɔ miasɛgu so i isobuɛ ame.
49004004	Sosina siwɛ̃ gu Siwarã siwɛ̃ pɛ siɖe mpia, ngbɔ ame i ira ka iwɛ̃ pɛ i Ɣaa ɔkpere bo sɔ boanyɔ ɔri botã ne.
49004005	Sate ɔwɛ̃ gu kafɔkaɖe kawɛ̃ saã boba fiɛ Ɣaa itupie iwɛ̃ saã bofɔ.
49004006	Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa gu Ɔse ɔwɛ̃ saã i maturi awune ɔɖuɖu ba ne. Ɔ̃ loɖe ira biara iso fiɛ ɔto ɔbara karabara ɔkigu i ira biara ame, ɔpia i ira biara ame ana.
49004007	Fiɛ Kristo ɔki i ɔ̃ kayiribielea iso ɔtã bo ɔbiara karatã.
49004008	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔwi gɔ ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kato ne, ɔkɔ maturi gbodzoo ma iti ɔkpɛ̃ ɔfɔ ɔkɛlɛgu fiɛ ɔtã maturi karatã.”
49004009	Ne ɔso gɔ maɣɛ sɔ ɔya ɔkɛlɛ kato ne, ite sekelee sɔ ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔso ɔkɛlɛ ta karɔ̃ ame ana.
49004010	Ne ɔso ngɔ loso ɔba karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃ ame loya ɔkɛlɛ ta kato pelepele fiɛ ɔyi i kayiiso ira biara ame ne.
49004011	Ɔ̃ ɔɖe lotã maturi karatã ne. Ɔbara mawɛ̃ katɔ̃memasɛdze, mawɛ̃ kanyamaɖidze fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana mma nsɛ mawe maki maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Ɔbara mamama mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze gu maratedze.
49004012	Ɔtã ma karabara gagbe sɔ iaki ma iso ne, maaledza mafɔɖedze matã Ɣaa karabara matã Kristo masiaidze katɔ̃ isɛ.
49004013	Ɣaa ɔbara nnɛgbe sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu aaba boakpese mawɛ̃ i nnɛ bofɔ boɖe ame fiɛ boatsue Ɣaa Ɔbi pelepele. Boamɔ bokpese lɛ Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia aawe i bo ame.
49004014	Sɔ boisibaɖe mabiɛtɛ ma i ara ite ɣɛtɛ biara aafuri lɛ ɔwiri ɔsɛgu ɔkpesegu. Boibaɖe mma maaki i inɔgba ɔri masɔsɔla makɛlɛgu ikpi ame.
49004015	Ɣɛɛ i kuɖɔɛ ame ne, boaɖe ɔnukuare maɣɛse sɔ boamɔ i Kristo gɔ nɖe bo ɔɖuɖu iti ame.
49004016	Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu ita i akui, ibo i sitɔbɛ ame i ɔturi ame ɔsakanya. Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ kuturidziri ngɔi ɔɖuɖu sɛ mibara karabara pɛpɛɛpɛ sɔ bo ɔɖuɖu aamɔ i kuɖɔɛ ame.
49004017	Ne ɔso i Bosate iyere ame ne, loto loka mi sɔ midaasɛ ngbã lɛ mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ ma adzuni ɔnyanyarĩ,
49004018	ma adzuni ame se guduu. Mana kaɖekɔ̃ kukawɛ̃ i ngbã mɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã ame, maɖe matsuelese gu mma loisɛ mabɔ so karɔ̃.
49004019	Maisisɛ makpɛ̃ kunuarɛ i abarara pɛ̃ ibara iso, ne ɔso masɛ makɛkɛ anɔ mabara ara nyanyarĩa biara igbã.
49004020	Mi ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ara wagbe misuã mibɔrɛgu i Kristo kɔrɛ!
49004021	Mme ne, losu sɔ miɔnɔ Yesu iso itɔ̃me, fiɛ ɔ̃ marasuãdze ɔɔte mi nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare i ɔ̃ iso.
49004022	Ne ɔso minyua mi nsɛgbai kuere mɛ lowe i mi ame nnɛ lotã misɛ ngbã nyanyarĩa mifegu misɛ. Mila miɔbara ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã fiɛ asɛ akɔ ɔturi akɛlɛgu kasɔla ame.
49004023	Mifinikira mi adzuni gu nsɛgbai mibara ira ɣɛtɛ.
49004024	Misu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mɛ mba Ɣaa kumiamia fiɛ mise bɔlɔlɔ gu sekelee mipia lɛ awu awe.
49004025	Ne ɔso minyua mila ɔla, si ɔbiara si ɔɣere ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔnukuare alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ne, Kristo kuturidziri iso ara miɖe.
49004026	Midaatã mi sikpã ina si itã mibara ikpi, fiɛ midaatã kuɣɛ̃ si kubo iyo i mi sikpã ina ame.
49004027	Midaatã Tsirise ɔri.
49004028	Mma lola maɔyu kayu si manyua si masu ma nrɔɔ̃ mabara karabara sɔ maana aɖera maɖe makuti matã mawɛrɛba.
49004029	Midaatã atsuɛ pɛ̃ wa loibakɔ ɔturi asɛgu katɔ̃ si abɔrɛ i mi kanya ame, ɣɛɛ si miaɖe ika ne, ara wa loakɔ maturi asɛgu katɔ̃ fiɛ aabuai ma si abɔrɛ mi i kanya.
49004030	Midaabara ara wa loabo Ɣaa Siwarã so alasɔ sɛ̃ i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔsɛ mi ikpo sɔ ɔ̃afɔ mi ku iyi tsɔra iso ne.
49004031	Miɖi kaɖo gu sikpã gu itsiri ɔɖuɖu i mi ndɛ̃. Ana ne, minyua kulu gu iweweso gu adzuni nyanyarĩa biara ibu i mi malaa iso.
49004032	I nwagbe kanya ne, mi manyii ara si aɖo mi kayiri si mibara kayiribielea mitã so. Misu mi manyii akpi mitsɛ ma lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔsu mi are ɔtsɛ mi iki i Kristo iso.
49005001	Gɔ Ɣaa mabi ɖɔɛse miɖe ɔso ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miare wũ.
49005002	Miɖi kuɖɔɛ mite i mi nsɛgbai ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ i bo iti, lɛ ira kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a nɛ mafɛ̃ matã Ɣaa fiɛ ibo wũ anɔ.
49005003	Gɔ Ɣaa mabi miɖe ɔso ne, iikote sɔ maakpese maɣɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ to ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣee ɔɖe nɔlese, ɣee ɔto ɔbɛbɛ anɔ.
49005004	Ana ne, iikote sɔ miaɣɛ situri pɛ̃ ara, ɣee ɔnɔle, ɣee atsuɛ pɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mipɛ Ɣaa siba.
49005005	Mitsue kukaakɔ sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣee ɔɖe nɔlese, ɣee ɔba kanɔbɛbɛ igbã biara nɛ lokotegu iɣɔsɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ibakɛlɛ Kristo gu Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔnya.
49005006	Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsu sidzimi itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ ɔsɔsɔla mi alasɔ ara wamɔ igbã nsɛ atã Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔba mma mba atsuele iso ne.
49005007	Ne ɔso midaabaragu ma mawɛ̃.
49005008	Alasɔ ɔwiɔ ne, miwe i idududu ame, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ikpawaĩ ame ka mipia mito miɖegu Bosate kulaa. Ne ɔso misɛ ngbã lɛ ikpawaĩ ame maturi.
49005009	Alasɔ kusia gɔ i ngbã sɛɛ isɛ sɛ mikpadzɛ̃ mibɔ nɖe ara sɛɛ ibara, ara ibara i ɔri iso, gu ɔnukuare iɣɛ.
49005010	Ara wa loabo Bosate anɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miasuã wã ibara.
49005011	Midaabara mawɛ̃ ku ara wa i maturi sɛ mabara i idududu ame alasɔ ana kusia kukuwɛ̃, ɣɛɛ miɖi wã mite.
49005012	Alasɔ iba kunuarɛ sɔ maaɣɛ ara wa masɛ mabara i iwɛrɛ ame kɔra.
49005013	Fiɛ ira biara nɛ i ikpawaĩ ɔɖi ite ne, isɛ ite sekelee manya.
49005014	Alasɔ ira biara nɛ maɖi mate sekelee ne, isɛ ikpese ikpawaĩ, ne ɔso fiɛ maɣɛ sɔ, “Fɔ gɔ fɔ nto arɛ sirɛ ne, ta i sirɛ si ata abɔrɛ i makpise ame, fiɛ Kristo ikpawaĩ aafiɛ ifere-ɔ.”
49005015	Ne ɔso minyɔ so kukaakɔ kumɛgɔ miasɛ ngbã. Midaasɛ lɛ mma loikpa anɔ, ɣɛɛ lɛ manɔgbadze awe.
49005016	Ɔri biara gɔ mina ne, mibara ɔ̃ karabara, alasɔ ɔwi nyanyarĩa ame bopia.
49005017	Midaaɖe mma loikpa anɔ, ɣɛɛ midzuĩ minyɔ sɔ be i Bosate to ɔbie sɔ mibara.
49005018	Midaanɛ ndã mirɛ̃, ala isɛ itã ɔturi ɔbara ara wa loilɛ, ɣɛɛ mitã Siwarã Bielea si siyi i mi ame.
49005019	Misu Ɔko Sekelea ame aka mipia so katetere, si misu aka sekelea igbã biara mile Bosate i mi situ ame.
49005020	Ɔwi biara ne, mila miɔpɛ bo Ɔse Ɣaa siba i ira biara iti iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame.
49005021	Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã so ala kuwarɛ gɔ miba mitã Kristo ɔso.
49005022	Marɔ̃go si mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma marã lɛ kumɛgɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã Bosate awe.
49005023	Alasɔ ɔrɛrɛ̃ nɖe iti i ɔ̃ ɔre iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɖe iti gu Ɖidze ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuturidziri.
49005024	Ne ɔso lɛ kumɛgɔ i mafɔɖedze ikuri ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ matã Kristo ne, ɔrɔ̃go biara si ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã i ira biara ame.
49005025	Marɛrɛ̃, mi wũ miɖɔɛ mi mare lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ikuri fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã i ne iti.
49005026	Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ si ɔsu ɔsekelera mafɔɖedze ikuri gɔ ɔ̃ɔpie ne ndu ala ɔ̃ itɔ̃me.
49005027	Ɔ̃ibie sɔ inyini, ɣee iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ aawe i mafɔɖedze ikuri iso. Ɔbie sɔ maakɛrɛ ne i isekele ame sɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibawe ne iso fiɛ ɔ̃abɔ ne i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
49005028	Ikote sɔ marɛrɛ̃ aaɖɔɛ ma mare lɛ kumɛgɔ mato maɖɔɛ ma sosina. Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara gɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔre ne, ɔto ɔɖɔɛ so.
49005029	Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ sosina, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ sɛ̃ iso kukaakɔ, ɔtã sɛ̃ aɖera, ɔnyɔ sɛ̃ iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo sɛ ɔbara ɔtã mafɔɖedze ikuri.
49005030	Ala ɔ̃ kuturidziri iso ara boɖe.
49005031	Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Nnɛgbe ɔso i ɔrɛrɛ̃ aarui i ɔ̃ ɔse gu ɔnyi kɔrɛ ɔpɛ ɔmatã i ɔ̃ ɔre iso fiɛ ma inyɔɔ aakpese sosina siwɛ̃ ne.”
49005032	Itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ mpia i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame ɔwodoro, ɣɛɛ mme lonya sɔ Kristo gu ɔ̃ mafɔɖedze iso iɖe ɔɖe ika.
49005033	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loto loɣɛ nɖe sɔ, ikote sɔ mi ɔbiara aaɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔre lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ so fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go biara ana si ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔsu kuwarɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ ɔrã.
49006001	Mabi, gɔ Bosate mare miɖe ɔso ne, mikã mi maɣese atsue ala ngbɔ ikote sɔ miabara ne.
49006002	Mmara ɖeakatɔ̃ mɛ iso i kaɣɛkasɛ ɔbua nɖe sɔ, “Warɛ fɔ ɔse gu fɔ ɔnyi.
49006003	Si ialɛgu-ɔ fiɛ aasɛ ngbã dzoroo i kayi gagbe iso.”
49006004	Mabi mase, midaapia mi mabi sikpã, ɣɛɛ minyɔ ma iso kukaakɔ si mikpadzɛ̃ ma sɔ maawo so ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla mabara i mmara iso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔte awe.
49006005	Maɖabo, mikã mi karɔ̃ iso makɔse atsue i kunigã ku iti ikpakpa ame. Mibara ngbɔ ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu lɛ Kristo mito mibara mitã.
49006006	Iiɖe si mapia kotoo miabara isɛɛ sɔ si maɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ ku mi ɔle ɔɖuɖu ne, mibara nnɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ lɛ Kristo maɖabo awe.
49006007	Lɛ maɖabo ne, mibara mi karabara ku isoɣɔ lɛ Bosate karabara mito mibara ne iiɖe ɔturi kare.
49006008	Minyigi sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso i karabara sɛɛ ga ɔbara ɔso, ɔɖabo aɖe o-o, iiɖe ɔɖabo aɖe o-o.
49006009	Makɔse, mi wũ mila mi maɖabo kukaakɔ si minyua ma ifɔ̃ ɔpia. Mitsue sɔ ngɔ nɖe mi gu ma ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse pia i kato, fiɛ ɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me.
49006010	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, mawe ɔle i Bosate gu ɔ̃ ɔle siare ame.
49006011	Misu akpakpɛ̃ra wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔtã mi mipia sɔ miawo ɔta ɔya i Tsirise kasusu nyanyarĩa iso.
49006012	Alasɔ iiɖe maturi awune boto bokpɛ̃gu, ɣɛɛ siwarã ame sile, siwarã ame mma nto maɖe iso, mma nto maɖe iso i idududu kayi ame gu ara lalaa ibara siwarã dzɛ nto sibara karabara i kato boto bokpɛ̃gu.
49006013	Ne ɔso misu Ɣaa akpakpɛ̃ra ɔɖuɖu mipia sɔ si iyikpi nɛmɔ ɔtu mi ne, miawo ɔya teteree mikpɛ̃ kakpã misɛ miabo kawirikɔ̃ sɔ ɔle iibaro mi iso.
49006014	Ne ɔso miya teteree si misu ɔnukuare minyi so sisɔ, misu ara sɛɛ ibara mifu so agbegbe lɛ ibɔra nɛ masɛ masu mafu igbegbe sɔ mirɛ̃ iibaɣo kpakpɛ̃dze awe.
49006015	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ nsɛ ibɔ isobuɛ si iɖe mi kakpã ikpɛ̃ ndokota mɛ miapia i iledzaso ame.
49006016	Isu ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, mimɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe ga nɖe lɛ nnɛ nsɛ ifɔ akpira mila. Ne nɖe nnɛ miasu minidza Tsirise mirɛ̃ mɛ nto mitsue lɛ ɔtɔ ne.
49006017	Misu iɖi mitɔ̃me lɛ ibɔra ikoto si misu Ɣaa itɔ̃me mila lɛ siwarã ame itekpe.
49006018	Mitã Siwarã si sikɔ mi mila miɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara si mikarɛ Ɣaa ibuai. Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, minyɔ sɔ nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ mi, ɣɛɛ mikparama kayi ɔwi biara i Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu iti.
49006019	Mme wũ mikparama kayi i wũ iti sɔ Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔpia me i kanya loɣɛ ku katetere loɖi awɛrɛra wa mpia i ne ame lote.
49006020	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ɔso loɖe katɔ̃mesɛdze atoa sɔ lorɛ i iyo ne. Mikparama kayi i wũ iti sɔ loawo ne ɔɣɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote.
49006021	-
49006022	Loto lopia bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse gɔ nɖe ɔɖabo sɛɛ i Bosate karabara ame fiɛ marɔ wũ Tihiko. Ɔto ɔ̃aɣere mi nnɛ loto lobara gu kumɛgɔ ise me i ngbe fiɛ ka ɔ̃apia mi ɔle ana.
49006023	Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu isobuɛ gu kuɖɔɛ ku kafɔkaɖe.
49006024	Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maɖɔɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo ku kuɖɔɛ gɔ loibaro.
50001001	Mme Paulo gu Timoteo ma nɖe Kristo Yesu maɖabo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe. Botsɛrɛ boto botã mi matɔ̃ɖedze, mabuaidze gu mi ma ɔɖuɖu maɔsekelera fiɛ mipia i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame i Filipi fiɛ miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.
50001002	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
50001003	Ɔwi biara i mi ara ɔbo me iti ame ne, losɛ lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba i mi iti.
50001004	Fiɛ ɔwi biara loto lokparama kayi i mi ɔɖuɖu iti ne, losɛ lobara ku isoɣɔ,
50001005	ala kumɛgɔ mibuai me i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame ita i iyi ɖeakatɔ̃ ipɛ i nɔme.
50001006	Ne ɔso lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa gɔ losɛ karabara sɛɛ gagbe karɔ̃ i mi ame ne, ɔto ɔ̃abara kã ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃ ku iyi nɛ i Kristo Yesu aaba iso.
50001007	Mi ara pia me i adzuni ame ɔwi biara. Ikote sɔ iase ngbɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu bualɛ sɔ miawegu me inyɛ atoa sɔ lorɛ i iyo. Ibua i ne iso ne, miyagu me ku ɔwi gɔ loto lokpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iti sɔ iaya teteree.
50001008	Ɣaa nɖe me aɖansiɛ sɔ gbaã loto ɣere mi sɔ wũ kuɖɔɛ gɔ loba lotã mi ne, kuse lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo Yesu mɔmɔ to ɔɖɔɛ mi.
50001009	Loto lokparama kayi sɔ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba si kusi kubua, mitsue ɔnukuare mibua, ana ne, si miawo ikpaki ɔpia i ikpi gu isɛɛ ndɛ̃ sekelee.
50001010	Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ miawo nnɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔɖi, sɔ iyi nɛ i Kristo aaba ne, ɔ̃anya sɔ mise sekelee fiɛ ɔ̃ibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso ne.
50001011	Mi nsɛgbai si miyi ku ara sɛɛ ibara. Yesu Kristo pɛ loawo ɔtã mabara ngbɔ sɔ iaki i ne iso ne, maasu kato ikɔlɛ gu ile matã Ɣaa.
50001012	Wũ manyii, loto lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ nnɛ lobɔrɛ me iso ne, ibua itã Itɔ̃me Bielea katɔ̃ isɛ.
50001013	Alasɔ iki i ne iso ne, makpakpɛ̃dze ɔɖuɖu ma nto madzuɛ̃ igara iyo gu maturi ɔɖuɖu i ngbe ɔɔtsue sɔ Kristo ɔɖabo loɖe ɔso lorɛ i iyo.
50001014	Fiɛ wũ iyo irɛ ana ɔɔtã manyii gbodzoo katetere i Bosate ame. Ka mato mawo Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ ku ɔtu gɔ maisito manigã.
50001015	I ɔnukuare ame ne, mawɛ̃ to maɣɛ Kristo itɔ̃me ala sirerɛ gu kakpadzɛ̃ ɔso, ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ana to maɣɛ itɔ̃me ku adzuni sɛɛ.
50001016	Mma nto maɣɛ itɔ̃me ku adzuni sɛɛ ne, kuɖɔɛ ɔso mato maɣɛ ne, alasɔ maɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔpia me sɔ lokpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iti.
50001017	Mma nto maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea i adzuni lalaa ɔso ne, ma kuɖɔɛ mato mabara alasɔ mabu sɔ maawo itikpi ɔbie ɔtã me iki i ma itɔ̃me iɣɛ ame gɔ lorɛ i iyo.
50001018	Ɣɛɛ kumɛkumɛ ise o-o ne, iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ alasɔ adzuni sɛɛ ame iɖe o-o, adzuni lalaa ame iɖe o-o ne, Kristo iso itɔ̃me mato maɣɛ.
50001019	Iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ alasɔ loɣe sɔ iki i mi kayi ikparama i wũ iti gu ibuai nɛ lobɔrɛ i Yesu Kristo Siwarã kɔrɛ ɔso ne, mato maaɖi me i iyo.
50001020	Nnɛ nto me ɔkã kiniɔ teteree fiɛ iɖe wũ ɔriinyɔ ana nɖe sɔ, loibasɛ̃ wũ karabara lonya, ɣɛɛ i ɔwi biara ame, titirio kiniɔ ne, loawe katetere gbodzoo sɔ loasu wũ iso sina ɔɖuɖu lopia Kristo kuwarɛ si lopia ngbã ɣee ɔkpi lokpi.
50001021	Alasɔ i wũ kasɛ ne, Kristo losi ngbã lotã, ɣɛɛ si lokpi kɔra ne, iaɖe kusia gbodzoo itã me.
50001022	Si lokpese losi ngbã ne, loabara karabara ga loabɔ kusia gbodzoo. Ɣɛɛ imele si loɖi i kukpi gu ngbã inyɔ ndɛ̃? Loiɣe!
50001023	Lopia i ara ka anyɔ ndɛ̃. Ito me ɔkã sɔ loabɔrɛ i ngbã mɛgbe ame losɛ loawegu Kristo, fiɛ ne nlɛ iɖo ne.
50001024	Ɣɛɛ mi ɔso ne, ilɛ iɖo sɔ lopia ngbã.
50001025	Gɔ lofɔ nnɛgbe loɖe ɔso ne, loɣe sɔ loasɛ ngbã lobara karabara ga loto lobaragu mi ɔɖuɖu sɔ iatã mi katɔ̃ isɛ gu isoɣɔ i kafɔkaɖe ame.
50001026	Ne ɔso si lokpese lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, miba ɔri biara sɔ miaɖe ndamu i wũ iso i mi ngbã ame i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame.
50001027	Nnɛ lonya iɖo kiniɔ nɖe sɔ mi ngbã aakotegu nnɛ i Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea to ite sɔ si lowo mi kɔrɛ ɔba o-o, loiwo ɔba o-o ne, loanɔ sɔ miɣɛ teteree i siwarã ame ku adzuni awɛ̃. Ana ne, sɔ iakpɛ̃ mi ɔkã sɔ miawe kanya kawɛ̃ i mi ikpɛ̃ i Itɔ̃me Bielea kafɔkaɖe iti.
50001028	Midaanigã mi matsirise, ɣɛɛ miya teteree ɔwi biara ame. Nnɛgbe loate ma sɔ mato maawɔ, ɣɛɛ mi mito miana ngbã, alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛ ɔtã miɖe iso.
50001029	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔtã mi ɔri sɔ miibasumu Kristo iki i kafɔkaɖe ame kere, ɣɛɛ sɔ miawe inyɛ i ɔ̃ iti ana.
50001030	Kiniɔ ne, ka mibuai me i kakpã ame. Kakpã ga minya sɔ loto lokpɛ̃ ku ɔwiɔ ne, lɛ kumɛgɔ mito minɔ ne, kã ame lotogu ikpɛ̃ ne.
50002001	Mi ngbã mɛ miba i Kristo ame sɛ mitã mi ɔle, fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ana sɛ kutã mi katetere. Mibara mawɛ̃ ku Siwarã Bielea fiɛ miba kayiribielea gu nnyainyɔ mitã mi malaa.
50002002	Ne ɔso si wũ isoɣɔ aayi ne, mitã mi adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃, miwe kuɖɔɛ kuwɛ̃ mitã so, si mibara mawɛ̃ i mi siwarã gu kurabarara ame.
50002003	Midaabara kuira i fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ ibie itã so, ɣee kato ikɔlɛ so ame, ɣɛɛ ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã so si miwarɛ mi malaa miɖo so.
50002004	Mibie mi malaa isɛɛ ne iiɖe mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ ire kere.
50002005	Mi nsɛgbai si miɖe mmɛ i Kristo ɔwe.
50002006	Atoa sɔ ɔba Ɣaa kumiamia ne, ɔ̃isu so ɔle ɔte sɔ ma gu Ɣaa inyɔ ɔkate.
50002007	Ɣɛɛ i nnɛmɔ kanya ne, ɔbara so ngɔ loiɖe kuira, ɔkpesera so ɔɖabo. Ɔkpesera so ɔturi awune ɔba maɣe wũ.
50002008	Ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ lɛ ɔturi awe ɔkã atsue isɛ iabo ta kukpi ame, kunuarɛ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi i kudziri iso.
50002009	Ne ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔkɔlɛ wũ kato ɔɖo ira biara, ɔtã wũ iyere nɛ lokɔlɛ iɖo ayere ɔɖuɖu.
50002010	Ne ɔso si makpere Yesu iyere ne, mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato gu karɔ̃ gu kayi ga mpia i karɔ̃ kayirinɔ ɔɖuɖu aapɛ agɛgɛ̃.
50002011	Fiɛ maaɣɛ sɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe Sate itã Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔse kato ikɔlɛ.
50002012	Ne ɔso ne wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, lɛ kumɛgɔ misɛ mikã me atsue ɔwi biara gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, inya kiniɔ iɖo gɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ sɔ miakã me atsue. Mikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ si mibara mi iɖi karabara i kunigã gu iti ikpakpa ame.
50002013	Alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔbara karabara i mi ndɛ̃ ɔwi biara sɔ miawo nnɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔtsue, mibara i ne iso.
50002014	I ira biara nɛ miabara ame ne, midaakpadzɛ̃ so, ɣee mita miya so iso.
50002015	Si mibara ngbɔ ne, miaɖe Ɣaa mabi ma nse bɔlɔlɔ, mayi i ira biara ame fiɛ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na ma i iso atoa sɔ mapia i kayi nyanyarĩa ga loyi ku makpibaradze ame. Mifiɛ i ma ndɛ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i awãmi sɛ afiɛ i kuɖokpo ame.
50002016	Mimɔɛ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã mila teteree sɔ iyi nɛ i Kristo aaba ne, loawo ndamu ɔɖe sɔ loitere ise, ɣee lobara karabara siefe.
50002017	Mi kafɔkaɖe i Bosate ame gu mi karabara se lɛ ara wa mafɛ̃ matã wũ, fiɛ wũ ima maasu mafere i ara fɛ̃a iso. Si iba ngbɔ kɔra ne, iawe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ fiɛ loanagu mi isoɣɔ.
50002018	Ngbɔ ame si mi wũ minagu me isoɣɔ si milɛlɛgu me ne.
50002019	Si Bosate Yesu ɔbie ne, loto loapia Timoteo mi kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame sɔ nnɛ ɔ̃anya i mi kɔrɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɣere me aapia me katetere.
50002020	I ɔnukuare ame ne, losiina kuwɛ̃ gɔ i mi ara to aɖo kayiri lɛ ɔ̃ awe.
50002021	Alasɔ matsɔra ɔɖuɖu ne, ma ara nyaa matere masiai maɖo gɔ iisiɖe Yesu Kristo are.
50002022	Ɣɛɛ Timoteo ne, mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ miawo wũ ɔfɔ ɔɖe alasɔ ɔ̃ɔyagu me lɛ ɔbi gu ɔse i Itɔ̃me Bielea karabara ibara ame.
50002023	Ne ɔso loto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ si loɔnya kumɛgɔ i wũ atɔ̃me aakɛlɛ ne, loto loapia wũ mi kɔrɛ.
50002024	Lofɔ loɖe i Bosate iyere ame sɔ mme mɔmɔ to loaba mi kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
50002025	Lonya sɔ inya sɔ loapia bo ɔnyii Epafrodito mi kɔrɛ. Ɔbaragu me karabara fiɛ ɔyagu me lɛ kpakpɛ̃dze awe. Ɔbara karabara ana lɛ mi katɔ̃mesɛdze gɔ mipia sɔ ɔbuai me.
50002026	Ito wũ ɔkã teteree sɔ ɔ̃anya mi alasɔ iɖaa wũ sɔ minɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyɛ.
50002027	Gbaã iɖe sɔ ɔnyɛ ɔro ɔkpi, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ nnya, fiɛ iiɖe ɔ̃ kere i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ nnya, ɣɛɛ mme wũ, alasɔ ɔɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i isoma siare nɛ tee loaba me iso ame.
50002028	Ne ɔso ito me ɔkã teteree sɔ loasese wũ mi kɔrɛ sɔ so aaɣɔ mi si minya wũ fiɛ mme wũ wũ nnya ka miaro.
50002029	Mifɔ wũ ku isoɣɔ lɛ ɔnyii i Bosate kafɔkaɖe ame si miwarɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nse lɛ ɔ̃ igbã.
50002030	Alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã fiɛ ɔro ɔkpi ala Kristo karabara ɔso sɔ si ɔtã me ibuai nɛ i mi mɔmɔ iiwo me ɔtã.
50003001	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, wũ manyii, so si siɣɔ mi sɔ miɖe mawɛ̃ ku Bosate. Iitɔrɛ me sɔ loaledza ara wagbe itsɛrɛ itã mi, alasɔ ne loatã sɔ itikpi kuiwɛ̃ iibabɔrɛ mi iso ne.
50003002	Minyɔ so i maturi lalaa, mma nsɛ mabara ara lɛ makpɛkpɛ mmɔ iso. Mma nsɛ maɣɛ sɔ ngbɛsi matu sirɛrɛ̃ ne.
50003003	Bo nɖe mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ i ɔnukuare ame, alasɔ boto bosɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame fiɛ boba isoɣɔ i ngbã mɛ bosi i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu ame. Boisɛ bosiai sosina ame kurabarara kukuwɛ̃.
50003004	Mme ne, loawo ndamu ɔɖe i sosina kurabarara ame loɖo ɔbiara gɔ lobu sɔ ɔba ɔri gɔmɔ, fiɛ loba ara gbodzoo wa iso loaya.
50003005	Mme ne, wũ iyi farafanava iso matu me sirɛrɛ̃, Israelse mɔmɔ loɣe me, lobɔrɛ i Benyamin kakpa ame fiɛ loɖe ɔ Hebrise gɔdɛĩ. I Mose mmara iso ibara ame ne, ɔ Farisise loɖe.
50003006	Lowe ɔmɛrɛ̃ i mmara iso iɖe ame sɔ lota loya i mafɔɖedze ikuri iso. Si mmara maasu manya sibɔlɔlɔ ne, tee maibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i wũ iso.
50003007	Ɣɛɛ ara wa ɔɖuɖu lola loɔnyɔ sɔ aɖe me kusia ngbe ne, aisire me kuira nɔme ala Kristo ɔso.
50003008	Fiɛ iiɖe nwagbe kere, ɣɛɛ ne, kuira iisifɔ me kuɣa iɖo sɔ loatsue Kristo Yesu lɛ Bosate. Ne ɔso fiɛ losɛ lobu wũ ira biara lɛ aku wa maasu maawiri sɔ Kristo aapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃ ne.
50003009	Fiɛ lobie sɔ bo gu wũ aabara mawɛ̃ pelepele. Losiina sibɔlɔlɔ kusiwɛ̃ dzɛ lofɔ lobɔrɛgu i mmara iso ibara ame. Kiniɔ ne, sibɔlɔlɔ dzɛ loba ne, lofɔ sɛ̃ lokigu i Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame, sibɔlɔlɔ dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, kafɔkaɖe iso siki.
50003010	Nnɛ pɛ ka loto lobie kiniɔ nɖe sɔ loatsue Kristo, ɔle gɔ lotara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame, sɔ loawegu wũ inyɛwe fiɛ loabaragu mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame.
50003011	Fiɛ lobie sɔ loawe ɔriinyɔ sɔ mme wũ Ɣaa aatara me ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame losɛ ngbã.
50003012	Wũ kɔrɔ̃ iipɛgu nnɛ loto lonyɔ ɔri, fiɛ loiyi ana. Ɣɛɛ ne, loto lokpɛ̃ teteree sɔ iapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃, alasɔ Kristo Yesu ɔɔsu me ɔbara ɔ̃ ɔre.
50003013	Wũ manyii, loito loɣɛ sɔ nnɛgbe ɔɔpɛgu me kɔrɔ̃ koko, ira ka iwɛ̃ pɛ iso i wũ adzuni ka asia. Ne nɖe sɔ, loaɣara ira biara nɛ loɔfe, losu wũ ɔle ɔɖuɖu losia i nnɛ nse me i katɔ̃ iso.
50003014	Ne ɔso lotere ise teteree sɔ loaɖe iso lofɔ kuso gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkpere me ɔtã iki i Kristo Yesu iso i ngbã mɛ loaba i kato ame ne.
50003015	Mitã adzuni wagbe si awe i bo ma ɔɖuɖu loɔmɔ i Siwarã ame, ɣɛɛ si mi ɔrere ba adzuni mama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔte wũ.
50003016	Nda awe i nnɛmɔ aase o-o ne, mitã bokɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ i Siwarã siri dzɛ iso bosɛ.
50003017	Wũ manyii mikɛlɛ i katɔ̃ misore me si mikarã inɔ i mma nsi ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ bosɛ bote mi iso.
50003018	Loɔɣere mi lonya, fiɛ loto loledza iɣɛ ku nnɔmɛ sɔ, maturi gbodzoo si ngbã mɛ nto mite sɔ matsiri kukpi gɔ i Kristo ɔkpi i kudziri iso.
50003019	I kawirikɔ̃ ne, mmagbe to maabo i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame alasɔ ma Ɣaa nɖe ma iyiri. Ara wa ikote sɔ aakpɛ̃ ma kunuarɛ ne, wã iso masɛ mana isoɣɔ fiɛ kayi gagbe iso ara pɛ iso i ma adzuni sia.
50003020	Bo ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ mare boɖe, fiɛ bosi bosia bo Ɖidze gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo sɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ i kato ɔba.
50003021	Ɔto ɔ̃afinikira bo siturina dzɛ nna ɔle ngbe ɔbara lɛ ɔ̃ sire dzɛ nto sifiɛ iki i ɔle gɔ ɔsɛ ɔsu ɔkpadzɛ̃ ara ɔɖuɖu ɔpia i ɔ̃ kayirinɔ ame.
50004001	Ne ɔso wũ manyii ma losɛ loɖɔɛ, mi ma nsɛ mipia me isoɣɔ fiɛ mi nɖe wũ kuso, mi iti ame loto lobu ɔwi biara. Miya teteree i Bosate ame.
50004002	Loto Ewodia gu Sinteke i kukpa sɔ manɔgu so ara karɔ̃ lɛ manyiibi i Bosate ame.
50004003	Fiɛ fɔ ngɔ fɔ nɖe wũ rabaradze laa ana ne, buai marɔ̃go inyɔ magbe, alasɔ maɔbuai me gbaã i Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame ku Klemens gu wũ marabaradze laa ɔɖuɖu ma ayere loibawo ɔrɔ, ɣɛɛ ma ayere pia i Ɣaa magbanadze ɔko ame.
50004004	So si siɣɔ mi ɔwi biara i mi mawɛ̃ ibaragu Bosate ame, loto loledza iɣɛ sɔ, so si siɣɔ mi!
50004005	Miwe ɔtu ɣɔa mitã maturi ɔɖuɖu alasɔ Bosate iba ɔɔbore ibo.
50004006	Midaaya so iso i kuira ame, ɣɛɛ si mito mikparama kayi ne, miɣere Ɣaa ara wa ɔɖuɖu mito mibie si mipɛ wũ siba i wã iti.
50004007	Iyɔ Ɣaa isobuɛ nɛ karɔ̃ i maturi iibawo ɔnɔ aadzuɛ̃ mi situ gu adzuni ɔɖuɖu gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Kawirikɔ̃ ne wũ manyii, mitã mi adzuni si ayi ku ara wa nɖe asɛɛ, nwa lokote atã ile, nwa nɖe ɔnukuare, nwa lokote atã kuwarɛ, nwa loya, nwa iso i kuira iinina, ara wa nsɛ alɛ ɔnyɔ gu nwa lokote sɔ ɔturi aabara.
50004009	Misore wũ nsɛgbai i ara wa misuã gu nwa mifɔ mibɔrɛgu i wũ kɔrɛ, wũ ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame. Iyɔ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ aawegu mi.
50004010	So ɔɣɔ me gbaã i Bosate ame sɔ i ɔwi dzoroo kama ne, lofɔ karatã lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ. Atoa sɔ iiɖe ɔsɛ̃ misɛ̃ sɔ miito mibuai me ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, miina ɔri sɔ miasese me karatã.
50004011	Loito loɣɛ nnɛgbe si ite sɔ minyua me misɛ, alasɔ loɔsuã kumɛgɔ i ira biara nɛ loba aabo me anɔ.
50004012	Loɣe nnɛ nɖe kusa fiɛ loɣe nnɛ nɖe karana. I wã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, loɔsuã kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ ɔturi aase si kukã pia ɣee araɖea pia, si kusa pia, ɣee karana pia.
50004013	Ɔle gɔ i Kristo ɔtã me ɔso ne, loawo ira biara kanya ɔya.
50004014	Ɣɛɛ ibua ilɛ sɔ mibuai me i wũ amɔrɛ̃ ame.
50004015	Mi ma Filipise ɣe kukaakɔ sɔ karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ɔwi gɔ lobɔrɛ i Makedonia fiɛ losɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea imomo ipɛ karɔ̃ ne, mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ losese me karatã fiɛ mifɔ wũ kusɛkusɛ.
50004016	Gɔ lowe i Tesalonika ne, mila miɔsese me karatã ɔwi ku ɔwi.
50004017	Iiɖe karatã loto lobie lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kusia gɔ miana i kato iki i karatã iso ɔso.
50004018	Miɔtã me kuso kɔra miɖodza. Karatã ga misese me mikigu i Epafrodito iso ɔba kaapɛgu me kɔrɔ̃, ne ɔso kuira iisinya me. Mi karatã gagbe to kafɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ lɛ ara wa mafɛ̃ matã Ɣaa fiɛ abo wũ anɔ, apia wũ isoɣɔ.
50004019	Ne ɔso Ɣaa gɔ loto losɔrɛ aatã mi mi ara nyaa ɔɖuɖu wa loanya mi iki i Kristo Yesu karana gu ikpawaĩ ame.
50004020	Mitã bole bo Ɔse Ɣaa ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ. Si iba ngbɔ.
50004021	Loya Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Kristo Yesu mare. Manyii ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe ɔya mi o-o!
50004022	Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i ngbe ɔya mi, titirio mma mpia i Roma Igarakpakpa iyo ame.
50004023	Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
51001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame loba loakpese Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu Sostene kɔrɛ.
51001002	Boto botsɛrɛ botã bo manyii ma nɖe Ɣaa maturi fiɛ maɖe manukuarese fiɛ ana ne, maɖe Kristo mare i Kolose. Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɔse si ɔtã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
51001003	Bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba ɔwi biara si boto bokparama kayi i mi iti
51001004	Alasɔ bonɔ sɔ mifɔ Kristo Yesu miɖe fiɛ misɛ miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ana kukaakɔ.
51001005	Maledza nnɛ mito minyɔ ɔri masɛ mi i kato. Minɔ ɔriinyɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe koko ku ɔwi gɔ maɣere mi ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ nɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea.
51001006	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe togu imɔ, iɣɔ̃ abi i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu lɛ kumɛgɔ ito isɛ katɔ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ ita i ɔwi gɔ minɔ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ mi nnya fiɛ minɔ ne karɔ̃ kukaakɔ.
51001007	Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Epafra nɖe ngɔ lote mi ara wagbe. Ɔɖe bo rabaradze laa gɔ lobara Kristo karabara i ɔnukuare ame i bo kanya.
51001008	Ɔ̃ loba ɔ̃aɣere bo kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔsu sipia i mi ame ne.
