51001009	Ne ɔso ita i iyi nɛ bonɔ mi iso itɔ̃me ne, bosɛ bokparama kayi ɔwi biara i mi iti. Bosɛ botã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔtã mitsue ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ, ɔtã mi iwola ɔɖuɖu gu ara karɔ̃ inɔ nɛ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ Siwarã ame.
51001010	Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ miawo ngbã mɛ loabo Bosate anɔ ɔsɛ fiɛ miabara nnɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ne. Iyɔ i mi ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, ara sɛɛ kotoo ka miabara fiɛ miatsue Ɣaa ana mibua.
51001011	Loto Ɣaa i kukpa sɔ ɔtã mi ɔle ɔɖuɖu gɔ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔle siare ame sɔ miawo ɔya teteree i ira biara kanya ku iɣaraso gu isoɣɔ ame.
51001012	Mipɛ bo Ɔse siba, ngɔ lobara mi sɔ mikote sɔ miana kaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔsɛ ɔ̃ maturi i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame.
51001013	Ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɔbosam ɔle gɔ nɖe idududu ame ɔbɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ame.
51001014	Ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔgbe ame bona iɖi fiɛ bona akpi kasukatsɛ.
51001015	Kristo nɖe Ɣaa gɔ boisɛ bonya kumiamia. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ nto ɔɖe Ɣaa kurabarara ɔɖuɖu iso.
51001016	Alasɔ ɔ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔki fiɛ ɔbara ira biara i kato gu karɔ̃, nwa masɛ manya gu nwa maisɛ manya, siwarã ame sile, makɔse gu mma nto maɖe iso. Ɣaa ɔbara ara ɔɖuɖu ɔkigu i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃ iɖe ɔbara wã ɔtã.
51001017	Kristo ka ɔpia fiɛ Ɣaa ɔbara ira biara, fiɛ ɔ̃ iso iki fiɛ ibiara se i ne ɔri iso.
51001018	Ɔ̃ nɖe mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ kuturidziri iti. Ɔ̃ ame i mafɔɖedze ngbã ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔ̃ nɖe Ɔbirɛrɛĩ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame sɔ ɔ̃afɔ kasɛkɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ i ira biara ame.
51001019	Alasɔ Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kuɖe sɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ame maanya ɔ̃ kumiamia ɔɖuɖu makigu.
51001020	Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ne, Ɣaa ɔfere kanya ndu ku kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iso ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɔkpesera ara wa mpia i kato gu karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ sɔ isobuɛ ka ipia i ɔ̃ gu ma ndɛ̃.
51001021	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mikora kama mitã Ɣaa fiɛ miɖe ɔ̃ matsirise ala mi ara lalaa wa misɛ misusu gu nwa misɛ mibara ɔso.
51001022	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ iki i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kukpi ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔboregu mi ɔbɔ so i kɔrɛ, ɔbara mi sekelee, miyi sɔ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na mi iso i ɔ̃ katɔ̃.
51001023	Ikote sɔ miamɔɛ̃ nnɛ mifɔ miɖe mila. Miya teteree si mire siɖu. Mi adzuni si asia i ɔriinyɔ nɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔsu ibɔ mi iso, ala Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe imomo mapɛ matã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ mme Paulo ana ne, loɔba loakpese ne ɔɖabo.
51001024	Kiniɔ ne, iba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ sɔ lowe inyɛ i mi iti. Loto lowe inyɛ i wũ siturina ame sɔ si losu lowiri inyɛwe nɛ i Kristo ɔsɛ me i mafɔɖedze ikuri kanya.
51001025	Ɣaa lobara me sɔ loaɖe mafɔɖedze ɔɖabo si loapɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me imomo fiɛ miatsue ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
51001026	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɖe itɔ̃me nɛ lowɛrɛ ta maturi ɔwi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔɖi ɔte mma lofɔ wũ maɖe.
51001027	Ɣaa ɔɖɔɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ lofɔ kuɣa ngbe fiɛ iba kuwarɛ ɔtã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛgbe nɖe sɔ, Kristo gɔ mpia i mi ame ne, ɔ̃ nɖe ɔriinyɔ ikpawaĩ siare nɛ nse isia mi ne.
51001028	Ne ɔso boto boɣere ɔbiara Kristo iso itɔ̃me ne. Ku iwola biara nɛ boba ne, bosɛ boka ma, bote ma ara sɔ si boakɔ ma bobɔ Ɣaa anɔ lɛ maturi ma loɔmɔ fiɛ maɖe mawɛ̃ ku Kristo.
51001029	Si loawo nnɛgbe ɔbara ɔso ne, losɛ lokpɛ̃, losu ɔle siare gɔ ɔɖuɖu i Kristo ɔtã me fiɛ ɔto ɔbara karabara i wũ ame.
51002001	Nto lobie sɔ mitsue kumɛgɔ loɔkpɛ̃ teteree i mi gu mma mpia i Laodikea gu matsɔra ma ɔɖuɖu loinya me manya kɔra iti.
51002002	Nto loɣɛ nnɛgbe si maana katetere fiɛ maabara mawɛ̃ gu ma malaa i kuɖɔɛ ame. Inyaare ne, si ma ara karɔ̃ inɔ aayi fiɛ maatsue Ɣaa ira wɛrɛa nɛ nɖe Kristo. Karana siare gbaã kaɖe ngbe.
51002003	Kristo ame i Ɣaa ɔsu karana siare ɔɖuɖu ga nɖe inɔgba gu iwola ngbe ɔkɔla.
51002004	Nto loɣere mi sɔ midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsu ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ ɔkpadzɛ̃gu mi atɔ̃me ɔsɔsɔla mi.
51002005	Atoa sɔ lona i mi kɔrɛ i siturina ame ne, lopia i mi kɔrɛ i siwarã ame, fiɛ so ɔɣɔ me sɔ loto lonya kumɛgɔ i mi kanya ɖe kawɛ̃, fiɛ miɣɛ teteree i mi Kristo kafɔkaɖe ame.
51002006	Gɔ miɔfɔ Kristo Yesu lɛ mi Sate ne, mibaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i mi kasɛ ame.
51002007	Mire siɖu i ɔ̃ ame si mitsue mi ngbã misia i ɔ̃ iso. Mi kafɔkaɖe ana si kamɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ mate mi si miyi ku siba ipɛ.
51002008	Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibakpesera mi masande iki i kayiiso inɔgba gu kasɔla siefe ga matsue masia i maturi akisi iso, ɣee siwarã dzɛ nto siɖe kayiiso iso ame. Maitsue ara wagbe masia i Kristo iso.
51002009	Alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛgbai gu ɔ̃ kumiamia ɔɖuɖu pia i Kristo ame ku ɔwi gɔ ɔsi ngbã i sosina ame.
51002010	Gɔ mibara mawɛ̃ ku ɔ̃ gɔ nɖe iti ɔtã siwarã ame sile gu mma nto maɖe iso ɔso ne, mi wũ mi ngbã ɔɔyi.
51002011	I Kristo ame ne mise lɛ mma matu sirɛrɛ̃, fiɛ iiɖe kɔrɔ̃ masu matu, ɣɛɛ mi akpi wa manukutu maɖi mi iso nɖe sirɛrɛ̃ dzɛ matu mi i Kristo ame.
51002012	Gɔ mifɔ Ɣaa itupie ne, mabiara mi ku Kristo, ne ɔso ne, ɔtara mi gu wũ ana alasɔ mifɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotara wũ ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔle miɖe.
51002013	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, mikpi i siwarã ame, alasɔ miɖe makpibaradze fiɛ miɖe mma loiɖe ma Yudase, ana ne, miiwe Ɣaa mmara. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɔtara mi ɔbɔ ngbã ame iki i Kristo iso fiɛ ɔ̃ɔsu bo akpi ɖuɖu ɔtsɛ bo.
51002014	Ɣaa ɔnukutu ira biara nɛ matsɛrɛ fiɛ ita iɣɛ i bo iso atã bo ipɔ i mmara kanya pelepele gɔ ɔpɛ wã ɔmatãra i kudziri iso.
51002015	I kudziri iso mmɔ ne, Kristo ɔfɔ siwarã lalaa gu mma nto maɖe iso i siwarã ame ɔle iso fiɛ ɔpia ma kunuarɛ i ɔgbami. Ɔsu isoɣɔ gu ɔpe itu ɔkɔ ma lɛ mma mamɔɛ̃ i kakpã ame.
51002016	Ne ɔso midaasitã kuwɛ̃ si ɔtã mi mmara i nnɛ miaɖe, ɣee mianɛ, ayi sekelea, ɣee Ɔgbaworeti Ɣɛtɛ Iyi iɖe, ɣee Iwarãyi iso.
51002017	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ara wa loaba i katɔ̃ ɔkala kere aɖe, Kristo mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ loba.
51002018	Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi sɔ miabɔ so karɔ̃ i mila ame, ɣee misɔrɛ Ɣaa makpabo. Mmamɔ igbã sɛ makɔlɛ so kato maɣɛ sɔ inya sɔ maanya ara i siwarã ame, ɣɛɛ mila miɖe, alasɔ maturi adzuni kere aɖe mmɔ. Si mikã mmamɔ igbã atsue ne, mi kɔrɔ̃ iibapɛgu nnɛ mito minyɔ ɔri.
51002019	Mmagbe iisimatã i Kristo gɔ nɖe iti iso. Ɣɛɛ ne, iti iso i akui gu sitɔbɛ ɔɖuɖu sɛ mana aɖera wa loamɔdza ma mabɔrɛgu lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie.
51002020	Gɔ miɔkpigu Kristo ɔso ne, misiina i kayiiso siwarã ɔle kayirinɔ. Ne ɔso midaatã matã mi akisi lɛ mikpese mipia i kayiiso ɔle kayirinɔ.
51002021	Be ɔso makpese mato maɣere mi sɔ daabara nnɛgbe, daati nnɛgbe anyɔ, ɣee daapɛgu nnɛgbe?
51002022	Akisi wagbe ɔɖuɖu pia i ara wa karabara bosɛ bobara aro iso. Maturi akisi gu ara ite kere iɖe.
51002023	I sosina ame ne, ite lɛ si ɔturi ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔte ɔ̃ sosina ɔtile, ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi akisi ɔto teteree ne, inɔgba siare pia i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ ara wagbe ibara iisɛ ibuai ɔturi ɔbɔrɛ i ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ wũ ɔkã ame.
51003001	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔtara mi gu Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔso ne, mibie ara wa i kato, ngbegɔ i Kristo ɔkpase ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
51003002	Mi adzuni si asia i kato ara iso ne iiɖe kayiiso ara iso,
51003003	alasɔ miɔkpi, fiɛ mi ngbã wɛrɛgu Kristo i Ɣaa ame.
51003004	Mi ngbã mɔmɔ pia i Kristo ame, ne ɔso ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃abɔrɛ kayi ne, mi wũ miabɔrɛgu wũ i ikpawaĩ siare ame.
51003005	Ne ɔso miɖoe sosina ame ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã lɛ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe, anyanyara ibara, ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ sosina ɔkã, sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ isiai gu kanɔbɛbɛ ga lokategu aɣɔ isɔrɛ.
51003006	Alasɔ ara wagbe ɔso i Ɣaa sikpã aaba i mma loisɛ makã wũ atsue iso ne.
51003007	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ngbã mɛgbe igbã misɛ mi wũ ne.
51003008	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ka minyua ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔbara. Wã nɖe sikpã, sikpã lalaa, ituritsiri, fiɛ iikote sɔ sitia, ɣee itsuɛ pɛ̃ kuiwɛ̃ aabɔrɛ mi i kanya.
51003009	Midaasisɔsɔla mi malaa alasɔ miɔnyua mi ngbã gu nsɛgbai kuere misɛ.
51003010	Kiniɔ ne, miɔsu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mipia. Ɣaa to ɔkpesera nsɛgbai mɛgbe miɣɛtɛ ɔwi biara sɔ miare wũ fiɛ miatsue wũ kukaakɔ ana.
51003011	I mmɔ kasɛ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ma Yudase gu mma loiɖe ma Yudase ndɛ̃, mma lotu sirɛrɛ̃ gu mma loitu sirɛrɛ̃, mafɔ, ngɔ anɔ loibusi, ɔsande gu ngɔ loiɖe ɔsande ndɛ̃. Mawɛ̃ ka maɖe i Kristo ame fiɛ Kristo pia i ma ɔɖuɖu ame.
51003012	Mi ne, Ɣaa maturi sekelea ma ɔto ɔɖɔɛ fiɛ ɔɖi ma ɔsɛ so miɖe. Ne ɔso misu nsɛgbai ɣɛtɛ mɛ loakotegu mi mipia. Me nɖe ibo inyagu ɔturi, kayiribielea, karɔ̃ibɔso, imɔɛ̃so ila gu iɣaraso.
51003013	Minɔgu so ara karɔ̃, fiɛ si ɔrere ɔɣɛrɛ mi ne, misu mitsɛ wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate ɔsu mi akpi ɔtsɛ mi.
51003014	Isu ibua i nwagbe ɔɖuɖu iso ne, misu kuɖɔɛ gɔ nsɛ kunyi ira biara kusakanya kukaakɔ mibua iso.
51003015	Kristo isobuɛ si iɖe iso i mi situ ame, alasɔ ne ɔso makpere mi mabɔ lɛ mafɔɖedze ikuri ne. Miɖe mma nsɛ mapɛ siba.
51003016	Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea si ina kasɛ i mi situ ame kukaakɔ. Mite so ara si mika so ku iwola wodoroa. Misu sinɔ, mafɔɖedze aka gu siwarã ame aka mipɛ ala Ɣaa siba i mi situ ame.
51003017	Ira biara nɛ miabara ɣee miaɣɛ ne, mibara ne i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame si mipɛ Bo Ɔse Ɣaa siba mikigu i ɔ̃ iso.
51003018	Mi marɔ̃go ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi marã, alasɔ ngbɔ lokote itã Bosate mafɔɖedze ne.
51003019	Mi marɛrɛ̃ mi wũ ne, miɖɔɛ mi mare si miɣara so mitã ma.
51003020	Mabi, mikã mi maɣese atsue i ira biara ame ala ne nsɛ iɣɔ Bosate so ne.
51003021	Mabi mase, mi wũ midaapia mi mabi sikpã sɔ nrɔɔ̃ afɛfɛ̃ ma.
51003022	Mi maɖabo ana ne, mikã mi karɔ̃ iso makɔse atsue i ira biara ame. Iiɖe si mapia i mi kɔrɛ kere sɔ si maɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ mibara mi karabara i ɔnukuare ame lɛ mma nto mawarɛ Bosate.
51003023	Karabara biara ga mito mibara ne, mibara kã ku mi situ ɔɖuɖu. Mibara kã lɛ Bosate mito mibara mitã ne iiɖe maturi.
51003024	Minyigi sɔ mito miafɔ kaɖekɔ̃ lɛ mi kuso, alasɔ Bosate Kristo mɔmɔ mito mibara karabara mitã.
51003025	Ara nyanyarĩa mabaradze ma wũ mato maafɔ ma kuso alasɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ɔbiara kuso gɔ ɔ̃ibanyɔ kuwɛ̃ i katɔ̃.
51004001	Mi ma nɖe makɔse ana ne, mila mi maɖabo kukaakɔ si minyigi sɔ mi wũ miba Ɔkɔse i kato.
51004002	Mila miɔkparama kayi ɔwi biara, fiɛ si mito mikparama kayi ne, mi adzuni ame si anyɔ tuee, mila miɔpɛ Ɣaa siba.
51004003	Ana ne, mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti sɔ Ɣaa aatã bo ɔri sɔ boaɣɛ Kristo itɔ̃me nɛ lowɛrɛ ku ɔwiɔ ala ne iti lorɛ i iyo ne.
51004004	Mikparama kayi sɔ loawo Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ɔɣɛ ikpa waĩ lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ loabara.
51004005	Misɛgu mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze i inɔgba ame si mibara ɔri biara gɔ miana karabara kukaakɔ.
51004006	Miɖe ika ku kuwarɛ ɔwi biara ame sɔ ialɛ ɔnɔ si mitsue kumɛgɔ miatã ɔturi biara itɔ̃me mmuai.
51004007	Tihiko gɔ nɖe bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse fiɛ ɔɖe ɔɖabo nukuarese gu bo ɔlaa i Bosate karabara ame to ɔ̃aɣere mi ira biara nɛ nto me i ngbe.
51004008	Ne ɔso fiɛ loto lopia wũ mi kɔrɛ si ɔ̃apia mi ɔtɔ, ɔɣere mi nnɛ nto bo i ngbe ne.
51004009	Ma gu bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Onesimo gɔ bofɔ boɖe fiɛ ɔɖe mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ to maba maaɣere mi ara wa ɔɖuɖu nto akɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ngbe.
51004010	Aristarko gɔ i bo gu wũ nrɛ i iyo ɔya mi. Ngbɔ ame ana i Marko gɔ nɖe Barnaba ɔnyiibi ana ɔya mi ne. Maɔɣere mi koko nnɛ si mibara mitã wũ, ne ɔso si ɔba ne, miwarɛ nrɔɔ̃ si mifɔ wũ.
51004011	Yosua gɔ masɛ marɔ sɔ Yusto ana ɔya mi o-o. Marɛrɛ̃ itɛ magbe pɛ nɖe ma Yudase fɔɖedze ma nɣɛgu me i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ karabara ame fiɛ mabua maɖe ibuai siare matã me.
51004012	Epafra gɔ nɖe mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ fiɛ ɔɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu ɔɖabo ana ɔya mi. Ɔsɛ ɔkparama kayi teteree ɔwi biara i mi iti sɔ Ɣaa aatã miya teteree, miɖe mma loɔkpa anɔ, mitsue nnɛ ɔso fiɛ mifɔ Ɣaa miɖe, fiɛ miakã wũ atsue pelepele ana.
51004013	Mme mɔmɔ loawo aɖansiɛ ɔɖe i ɔ̃ iso i karabara teterea ga ɔto ɔbara ɔtã mi gu Laodikea gu Hierapoli maturi.
51004014	Bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Luka gɔ nɖe kuabaradze gu Dema sɔ maya mi o-o!
51004015	Boya bo manyii ma mpia i Laodikea. Boya bo ɔnyiiko Minfa gu mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ nsɛ masarɛ i ɔ̃ iyo.
51004016	Si mika ɔko gɔgbe miro ne, misu wũ misese mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ mpia i Laodikea sɔ ma wũ maaka. Ngbɔ ame ma wũ si masu ma ɔre gɔ mafɔ masese mi si mika ne.
51004017	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, miɣere Arkipo sɔ ɔbara Bosate kasumu karabara ga ɔsu ɔpia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔwiri kukaakɔ.
51004018	Kaya tsɔra gagbe ne, mme Paulo mɔmɔ losu wũ kɔrɔ̃ lotsɛrɛ. Minyigi sɔ lokpese lorɛ i iyo. Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi.
52001001	Mme Paulo gu Silvano gu Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe boto botã mi ma nɖe bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo mare i Tesalonika. Bokparama kayi sɔ Bosate abualɛra gu isobuɛ si awegu mi.
52001002	Ɔwi biara ne, bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba i mi ɔɖuɖu iti, fiɛ ɔwi biara ana si boto bokparama kayi ne, bosɛ bonyigi mi.
52001003	Boisɛ boɣara sɔ boaɣere bo Ɔse Ɣaa kumɛgɔ mito mibara mi kafɔkaɖe karabara. Bosɛ boɣɛ ana kumɛgɔ mibua misɛ mibuai maturi i kuɖɔɛ ame fiɛ misu mi ɔriinyɔ mipia i Bosate Yesu Kristo ame teteree.
52001004	Manyii, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ mi gbaã fiɛ ɔɖi mi lɛ ɔ̃ mare.
52001005	Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boba boaɣere mi ne, iiɖe itɔ̃me kunu kere iɖe. Ɣɛɛ iba ku ɔle gu Siwarã Bielea gu ita isiara gbodzoo. Minya kumɛgɔ bomɔɛ̃ so bola i mi ndɛ̃, fiɛ mi isɛɛ ɔso bobara ngbɔ.
52001006	Gbaã ne, misore bo gu Bosate nsɛgbai. Atoa sɔ miwe inyɛ gbodzoo ne, mifɔ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ku isoɣɔ nɛ i Siwarã Bielea ɔtã mi.
52001007	Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ mikpese ikparĩ mitã mafɔɖedze ma ɔɖuɖu mpia i Makedonia gu Akaia.
52001008	Iiɖe Bosate itɔ̃me ɔnɔwɛ̃ lobɔrɛ i mi kɔrɛ ikɛlɛ Makedonia gu Akaia, ɣɛɛ mi Ɣaa kafɔkaɖe ana ɔɔkɛlɛ kakɔi biara gɔ iisiɖe bo loaɣɛ kuira alasɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔnɔ.
52001009	Ma mɔmɔ to maɣɛ kumɛgɔ mifɔ bo ku ɔwi gɔ boba mi kɔrɛ gu kumɛgɔ minyua mi aɣɔ isɔrɛ fiɛ misu so mitã Ɣaa gbaã gɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ mba ngbã.
52001010	Fiɛ mito minyɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi gɔ ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame ɔri mibɔrɛgu i kuɖokpo. Yesu gɔgbe lofɔ bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ i Ɣaa to ɔsu ɔbɔ makpibaradze iso ame ne.
52002001	Manyii, mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ bo mi kɔrɛ iba ne, iiɖe siefe.
52002002	Miɣe kumɛgɔ boɖe ɔɣiã, mapia bo kunuarɛ i Filipi fiɛ boba boabo mi kɔrɛ i Tesalonika mmɔ. Atoa sɔ maɖaa bo ngbe ana teteree ne, Bosate ɔpia bo ɔle sɔ bowo mi ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔɣere.
52002003	Bo kuka gɔ boto botã mi ne, iiɖe kasɔla ɣee adzuni nyanyarĩa, ɣee sɔ si bokɔ mi bopia i iɣɛrɛ ame ɔso.
52002004	Ɣɛɛ ne, bosɛ boɣɛ itɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ bobara. Alasɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔnya sɔ bokote sɔ boaɣɛ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Boisɛ bobie sɔ boabo maturi anɔ, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔko ɔbiara ɔtu ɔnyɔ.
52002005	Miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ iiɖe sinyamɛrɛ bosu bobɔ mi. Boiɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea i kanɔbɛbɛ ame sɔ si boana kusia kukuwɛ̃ i mi kɔrɛ. Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɣɛ bo i kama i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame.
52002006	Boibie mi ɣee kumawɛ̃ ile. Atoa sɔ boba ɔri lɛ Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze sɔ boasu bo anyaa bokpesera mi ato ne,
52002007	bomɔɛ̃ so bola lɛ ɔtalɛpo gɔ nɣe ɔ̃ mabi inyaa.
52002008	Gɔ boto boɖɔɛ mi ku kayiri ɣɔa ɔso ne, bobie sɔ mi wũ mianɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea. Iiɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me kere ɣɛɛ ne, bosu bo ngbã ana botã i mi iti alasɔ mifɔ bo kuɣa gbaã.
52002009	Manyii, minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ fiɛ boto boɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, bonyɛdɛ̃ awururu kasɛ̃ i kakɔme bobara karabara sɔ si boibakpese ato bosia mi kuwɛ̃ iso.
52002010	Mi mɔmɔ gu Ɣaa ɖe bo aɖansiɛ i kumɛgɔ bola so sekelee i mi mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃. Bobara ara sɛɛ, fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iinya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i bo iso i mi ndɛ̃.
52002011	Miɣe ana sɔ bomɔɛ̃ mi ɔbiara lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔse sɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ mabi ɔla.
52002012	Bopia mi ɔtɔ, botã mi katetere fiɛ bopia mi kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri sɔ misɛ ngbã mɛ loabo Bosate anɔ. Ɔ̃ mɔmɔ lokpere mi sɔ miana iɖi fiɛ miakɛlɛ ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ gu ikpawaĩ ame.
52002013	Ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛ ana ɔso bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba nɖe sɔ ɔwi gɔ boɣere mi Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, miifɔ ne lɛ itsuɛwo. Ɣɛɛ mifɔ ne lɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iɖe gbaã, ne ɔso ibɔ ikpaki siare ana i mi mafɔɖedze ngbã ame.
52002014	Manyii, ara wa lobɔrɛ mi iso i ngbe ne, wã ame igbã lobɔrɛ Ɣaa maturi iso i Yudea karɔ̃ iso ne. Inyɛwe nɛ mina i mi maturi nrɔɔ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i mma mpia i Yudea karɔ̃ iso fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ɔwe inyɛ i ma Yudase nrɔɔ̃ ame ne.
52002015	Ma Yudase ɔɖoe Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze fiɛ matã sɔ maɖoe Bosate Yesu ana. Ma ame loti bo kama sɔ si maɖoe bo ne. Ma kurabarara ɔta kuya Ɣaa iso fiɛ maɖe ifɔ̃ra nɛ nto itɛ̃ maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔri.
52002016	Matɛ̃ bo ɔri sɔ bodaaɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase itɔ̃me nɛ loatã mana ngbã mɛ loibaro. Ma ara nyanyarĩa ibara ɔɔkɔlɛ isɛ iabo ngbegɔ i Ɣaa kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ɔɔba ma iso kiniɔ.
52002017	Manyii, ito ibo bo so sɔ iɔfɔ ayi gɔ boinya mi anɔ ku anɔ. Ɣɛɛ mipia i bo situ ame. Ito bo ɔkã sɔ boanya mi fiɛ boto bokpɛ̃ i ɔri biara iso.
52002018	Bobie sɔ boaba boanya mi. Mme Paulo ne, lokpɛ̃ i siri agbãagbã iso sɔ si loba ɣɛɛ Tsirise ɔtɛ̃ ɔri.
52002019	Mi nɖe bo ɔriinyɔ, bo isoɣɔ gu sigaraikoto alasɔ mi ɔso boakɔlɛ sirɔgɔgɔ̃ si Bosate Yesu ɔledza iba.
52002020	Gbaã ne, mi nɖe bo isoɣɔ gu nnɛ maakɛrɛ bo ala.
52003001	Gɔ mi inya ɔbua ito bo ɔkã ɔso ne, bonɔ karɔ̃ sɔ boawe i Atene bo ɔnɔwɛ̃.
52003002	Boto bopia Timoteo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃apia mi ɔle si ɔbuai mi i mi kafɔkaɖe ame. Ɔɖe bo ɔnyii gɔ nsɛ ɔbuai bo i Ɣaa karabara gu Kristo Itɔ̃me Bielea iɣɛ ame.
52003003	Boito bobie sɔ kama iti nɛgbe aatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ aakpese kama. Mi mɔmɔ miɣe koko sɔ kama iti nɛgbe ne, Ɣaa ɔɔsia ne ita ɔtã bo ɔɖuɖu.
52003004	Mianyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, boka mi i ne iso boɖegu katɔ̃ sɔ ito iaba. Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, iɔba ngbɔ ana.
52003005	Ara wagbe ɔso lopia Timoteo sɔ ɔba ɔ̃anyɔ si mikpese mimɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe mito ne. Wũ ifɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Ɔbosam to ɔ̃aba ɔ̃ala mi ɔnyɔ ɔtã bo karabara ɔkpese siefe.
52003006	Ɣɛɛ Timoteo ɔba ɔ̃ɔɣere bo ku isoɣɔ sɔ mi kafɔkaɖe gu mi ituriɖɔɛ iikpaki. Ɣɛɛ ne, mito minyigi bo gbaã fiɛ mito mibie sɔ mianya bo lɛ kumɛgɔ bo wũ ito bo ɔkã sɔ boanya mi.
52003007	Nwagbe ɔso ne, manyii, atoa sɔ boto bowe inyɛ fiɛ ara ɔnyi bo ato ne, mi kafɔkaɖe sɛ kapia bo isoɣɔ, kaɣɔra bo situ.
52003008	Ngbã ɣɛtɛ ɔbo i bo ame gɔ bonɔ kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree i Bosate kafɔkaɖe ame.
52003009	Boibawo Ɣaa siba ɔpɛ i mi iti siyi ala isoɣɔ nɛ mipia bo i ɔ̃ anɔ ɔso.
52003010	Boto botã Bosate iti kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ ɔtã sɔ boaledza isarɛ sɔ ara wa lokuti fiɛ mi kafɔkaɖe aayi ne, boasu botã mi.
52003011	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa mɔmɔ gu Bosate Yesu si mabusi ɔri matã bo sɔ boaba mi kɔrɛ.
52003012	Bosate si ɔtã sɔ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã so gu maturi mama ɔɖuɖu si kusi kubua lɛ kumɛgɔ boɖɔɛ mi.
52003013	Nnɛgbe loatã bo ɔse Ɣaa ɔpia mi ɔle ɔɖi mi ɔbɔrɛgu i akpi ɔɖuɖu ame ɔbara mi sekelee i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu aaledza kayi gagbe iso iba ku ɔ̃ mare ne.
52004001	Manyii, wũ ira tsɔra nɛ loatã mi iti nɖe sɔ ne, misɛ ngbã mɛ loabo Ɣaa anɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ bote mi. Mito mipia kubɛ i awɛ̃ ame ɣɛɛ bobie sɔ boapia mi ɔtɔ i Bosate Yesu iyere ame sɔ mibara ngbɔ mibua.
52004002	Alasɔ miɣe ara wa bote mi i Bosate Yesu ɔle ame.
52004003	Ɣaa to ɔbie sɔ mibara so Sekelee si miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i marɛrɛ̃ gu marɔ̃go isiai akpi ɔɖuɖu ame.
52004004	Ɔrɛrɛ̃ biara si ɔtsue kumɛgɔ ɔ̃asɛgu ɔ̃ ɔre i isekele gu kuwarɛ ame.
52004005	Midaasiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ kama lɛ kumɛgɔ i mma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa sɛ mabara.
52004006	Ne ɔso ne, kuwɛ̃ anɔ si adaarɛtɛ i ɔ̃ ɔnyii ɔre iso sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛrɛ wũ. Boɣere mi fiɛ boka mi i ne iso teteree sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mma nto mabara ara wagbe kutsue gbaã.
52004007	Ɣaa iikpere bo sɔ boɖe asɔrɔ̃ maɖedze, ɣɛɛ sɔ boɖe maturi sekelea.
52004008	Ne ɔso si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere iikã kuka gɔgbe atsue ne, iiɖe maturi iso ɔta ɔya, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã mi Siwarã Bielea iso iɖe ɔta ɔya.
52004009	I kumɛgɔ miaɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze iso ne, iikote sɔ loakpese lotsɛrɛ kuira i ne iso, alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔte mi kumɛgɔ miaɖɔɛ so koko.
52004010	Gbaã iɖe sɔ mito miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ma mpia i Makedonia karɔ̃ ɔɖuɖu iso, ɣɛɛ boto mi i kukpa sɔ mibara ngbɔ mibua!
52004011	Misɛ ngbã i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame, si ɔbiara si ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ karabara iso. Ɔbiara si ɔsu ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ɔbara karabara fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe ara lɛ kumɛgɔ boɣere mi.
52004012	Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ mma loifiniki aawarɛ mi fiɛ mi kuwɛ̃ ana iibapiɛtɛ i maturi iso ne.
52004013	Manyii, bobie sɔ mitsue ara wa loaba i maturi ma loɔkpi koko iso sɔ miibamararã so lɛ mma nna ɔriinyɔ.
52004014	Bofɔ boɖe sɔ Yesu ɔkpi fiɛ ɔledza ita ɔpia ngbã. Ne ɔso bofɔ boɖe sɔ mafɔɖedze ma loɔkpi fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ne, mato maakpese maba ku Yesu.
52004015	Nnɛ i Bosate mɔmɔ ɔte ne, ne iso boɣɛ boto boɣere mi sɔ, bo ma lokuti bopia ngbã fiɛ Bosate aaledza iba ne, boibaɖe mma loɔkpi katɔ̃ i kato ikɛlɛ ame.
52004016	Boto boanɔ Bosate iba kulu siare gu Ɣaa kpabokpakpa silɔ, fiɛ Ɣaa kadadã aare. Iyɔ Bosate mɔmɔ aaso ɔbɔrɛ i kuɖokpo. Mma lofɔ Kristo maɖe fiɛ makpi ne, ma loaɖe katɔ̃ mata maba ngbã ne.
52004017	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akɔ bo ma lokuti bopia ngbã ɔkɛlɛgu bosɛ boatu mma loɔta fiɛ boasɛ boasarɛgu Bosate i kuɖokpo. Ngbɔ boawegu Bosate ɔwi ɖaa ne.
52004018	Ne ɔso misu atɔ̃me wagbe mipia so kɔrɔ̃ i kayiri.
52005001	Manyii, iisinya sɔ loatsɛrɛ mi ɔko i ɔwi ɣee ayi ara wa loaba iso.
52005002	Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ miɣe sɔ Bosate ibayi to iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i yukukpe sɛ ɔba ku kasɛ̃ ndɛ̃ awe.
52005003	Ɔwi gɔ ame i maturi to maɣɛ sɔ ira biara sɛ kukaakɔ ne, ɔwi gɔmɔ i ibo gu ibɛbɛrɛ nɛ igbã mainya manya aaba ma iso ne. Iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i kuɣe iɖoɖo sɛ kupɛ yirise iso fiɛ maibawo ɔtere i ne kanya.
52005004	Ɣɛɛ manyii, mi ne, mina i idududu ame sɔ iyi nɛmɔ aapatura mi lɛ yukukpe awe.
52005005	Alasɔ mi ɔɖuɖu ne, ikpawaĩ ame mipia. Boiɖe mma mpia i kasɛ̃ ɣee idududu ame.
52005006	Ne ɔso midaatã sɔ sirɛ aasu mi lɛ mma loiɣe Bosate. Ɣɛɛ mitã bomɔɛ̃ so bola si bonyɔ tuee kukaakɔ.
52005007	Alasɔ mma nsɛ marɛ sirɛ ne, kasɛ̃ iɖe masɛ marɛ fiɛ mma nsɛ marɛ̃ ndã ne, kasɛ̃ masɛ marɛ̃ me.
52005008	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ikpawaĩ ame maturi boɖe ɔso ne, mitã bonyɔ tuee. Mitã bosu kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ibɔra awu bofu so igbegbe si botɔ̃me bo iɖi ɔriinyɔ ibɔra ikoto.
52005009	Alasɔ Ɣaa iiɖi bo ɔtã ɔ̃ sikpã dzɛ nto siba. Ɣɛɛ sɔ boaki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso bona iɖi.
52005010	Yesu ɔkpi i bo iti, ne ɔso ngbã bosi o-o ɔkpi bokpi o-o fiɛ ɔba ne, boawe i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
52005011	Ne ɔso mipia so ɔtɔ si mibuai so lɛ kumɛgɔ mito mibara kiniɔ.
52005012	Manyii, boto mi i kukpa sɔ misu kuwarɛ mitã mi matɔ̃ɖedze ma nto mapia kubɛ mate mi Kristo masiaidze ngbã isɛ ara.
52005013	Miwarɛ ma kukaakɔ si miɖɔɛ ma ala karabara ga mato mabara ɔso. Misɛgu so i isobuɛ ame.
52005014	Ana ne, manyii, boto bobie sɔ mibie itɔ̃me miɣere madãdze. Mitã mafɔ̃dze katetere. Mibuai mma lonya ibuai si mina ɔtu mitã ɔturi biara.
52005015	Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibasu ikpi ɔtã ikpi kuso, ɣɛɛ ɔwi biara ame ne, mibara ara sɛɛ mitã so gu maturi ɔɖuɖu.
52005016	Mitã sɔ so aaɣɔ mi i ɔwi biara ame.
52005017	Mikparama kayi ɔwi biara ame.
52005018	Misu siba ipɛ mitã Bosate i ira biara ame, alasɔ ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔbie ɔbɔrɛgu i mi ma nsiai Yesu Kristo kɔrɛ ne.
52005019	Midaatɛ̃ Ɣaa siwarã ɔle ɔri i mi ndɛ̃.
52005020	Midaanyɔ Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze atɔ̃me pupurii.
52005021	Ɣɛɛ mifafarɛ ira biara ame si minyɔ nwa nɖe asɛɛ si mimɔɛ̃ wã mila.
52005022	Miɖi so mibɔrɛgu i ira lalaa biara ame.
52005023	Botã Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã bo isobuɛ iti sɔ ɔbara mi sekelee i ɔri biara iso. Ɔdzuɛ̃ mi siwarã gu adzuni gu sosina ɔɖuɖu sɔ maibanya ikpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaledza iba.
52005024	Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mikpese ɔ̃ mare aabuai mi ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃. Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɣɛ iso ɔɖe.
52005025	Manyii, mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti.
52005026	Miya so ku kayiri ɣɔa.
52005027	Nto loɣere mi lɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo kanyayase sɔ mika ɔko gɔgbe mitã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu.
52005028	Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi.
53001001	Mme Paulo gu Silvano gu Timoteo nto botsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe botã mi ma nɖe Bo ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo mare i Tesalonika.
53001002	Bo ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi isobuɛ gu abualɛra.
53001003	Manyii, ipia sɔ boapɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara ala mi ɔso. Ikote ngbɔ alasɔ mi kafɔkaɖe to kamɔ fiɛ mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã so ana to kumɔ.
53001004	Nnɛgbe ɔso boto borɔ mi iyere sɛɛ i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne. Bosɛ boɖe mi ndamu botã mafɔɖedze ala kumɛgɔ miɣɛ teteree fiɛ miba ɔle i kafɔkaɖe ame atoa sɔ mato makpɛ̃gu mi fiɛ mito miwe inyɛ.
53001005	Nwagbe ɔɖuɖu to ite sɔ Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɖaɛ ɣɛ tɔrɔrɔ, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃atã mi kasɛkɔ̃ i ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔso mito miwe inyɛ.
53001006	Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri sɛɛ iso fiɛ ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ mma nto makpɛ̃gu mi ɔɖuɖu kutsue.
53001007	Ɔto ɔ̃atã sɔ bo gu mi ɔɖuɖu ma lowe inyɛ aana iwarã. Ɣaa to ɔ̃abara ara wagbe ku ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu gu Ɣaa makpabo aaɖusi mabɔrɛ i kuɖokpo i ɔle gu ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi ame.
53001008	Maturi ma loisɛ mawarɛ Ɣaa fiɛ maifɔ Bosate Yesu Itɔ̃me Bielea ne, ɔ̃akpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue.
53001009	Bosate to ɔ̃asa ma ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ anɔ fiɛ maibanya ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu ɔle. Ɔ̃awɔra ma gu ma nsɛgbai.
53001010	Ara wagbe to aaba ku iyi siare nɛ iso i Yesu aaledza iba. Iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, ɔ̃ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu to maasiai wũ mala maɔfa kayiɖu. Mi wũ mito miawe i ma ndɛ̃ alasɔ mifɔ ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ boɣere mi miɖe.
53001011	Nnɛgbe ɔso boto bokparama kayi i mi iti ɔwi biara ame ne. Botã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔtã mi nsɛgbai si mikotegu nnɛ ɔso makpere mi. Ɔbuai mi, ɔsu ɔ̃ siwarã ɔpia mi ɔle sɔ adzuni sɛɛ wa miba sɔ miabara kafɔkaɖe karabara ne, iaba ngbɔ.
53001012	Boto bokarɛ ara wagbe botã mi sɔ si iakɔlɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere kato ala mi ɔso. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi ayere kato ala Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo nnyainyɔ ɔso.
53002001	Manyii, bobie sɔ boɣere mi sekelee i Bosate Yesu Kristo iledza iba gu bo ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ikɛlɛ iso.
53002002	Si minɔ sɔ Bosate ibayi nɛmɔ ɔɔba ne, boito bobie sɔ mikpɔkpɔtɔ ɣee minigã ala ɔko ɣee kanya iɖi ɣee itɔ̃me ɔ nɛ sɔ bo loɣɛ iso.
53002003	Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi i ɔri kuwɛ̃ iso alasɔ Bosate Iyi iibaba gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i maturi gbodzoo aasɛ̃ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔturi lalaa gɔ i Ɣaa aaɖi ɔte sɔ ɔ̃awɔra aaba tɔtɔ.
53002004	Ɔto ɔ̃ata ɔya ira biara nɛ masɛ masɔrɛ gu Ɣaa iso i ɔri biara iso. Ɔto ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔbara so sɔ ɔ̃ ka nɖe Ɣaa.
53002005	Minyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ lopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, loɣere mi ara wagbe.
53002006	Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔle ɔwɛ̃ nto ɔtɛ̃ ara wagbe ɔri ku kiniɔ fiɛ mi mɔmɔ miɣe ɔle gɔ ɔɖe. Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔte i ɔwi sɛɛ iso.
53002007	Ara nyanyarĩa wa mato mabara mawɛrɛ ɔɔsɛ karɔ̃ koko. Ara wa loaba ne, aibaba gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɔɖi ngɔ lotɛ̃ ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔri.
53002008	Ne kama ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɖi ɔturi lalaa gɔmɔ ɔte. Iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu aaba ne, Ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ kanya ame ɔwiri gu ɔ̃ ifiɛ ɔtsuedza wũ, ɔwɔra wũ pelepele.
53002009	Ɔbosam to ɔ̃atã ɔturi lalaa gɔgbe ɔle ɔsu ɔbara mila akparĩ gu awawãra agbãagbã.
53002010	Ɔturi lalaa gɔgbe to ɔ̃asu kasɔla igbã biara ɔsɔsɔla mma loawɔ. Mato maawɔ alasɔ maifɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ loatã ma ngbã maɖe.
53002011	Ne ɔso Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu kasɔla siwarã ɔtã ma sɔ maafɔ sila maɖe.
53002012	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã ma ɔɖuɖu ipɔ alasɔ maifɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me maɖe, ɣɛɛ mawe isoɣɔ i akpi ibara ame.
53002013	Ɣɛɛ ne, manyii, bosɛ bopɛ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara ala mi ɔso. Boɣe sɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ mi gbaã alasɔ ɔɖi mi ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ sɔ miana ngbã. Ɔsu Siwarã Bielea ɔsekelera mi alasɔ mifɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea miɖe ɔso.
53002014	Iki i bo Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe iɣɛ ame ne, Ɣaa ɔkpere mi sɔ miaba miana iyere lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo ba iyere.
53002015	Ne ɔso ne, manyii, miya parataa si mimɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wa bote mi i bo ɔko gɔ botsɛrɛ gu ara wa boɣere mi mila teteree.
53002016	Bosate Yesu Kristo gu bo Ɣaa gɔ loɖɔɛ bo i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame si ɔtã bo katetere ga loisɛ kafɛ̃ gu ɔriinyɔ teteree,
53002017	si ɔtã mi ɔle, ɔpia mi ɔtɔ i mi ikaɖe gu kurabarara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ame.
53003001	Si loawiri ne, manyii, minyigi sɔ miala miɔkparama kayi i bo iti sɔ Bosate itɔ̃me aaki ikã kakɔi biara ifɔ kuwarɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mifɔ ne awe.
53003002	Mitã Bosate iti i bo iti sɔ ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i matilese gu makpibaradze nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ iiɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu lofɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me maɖe.
53003003	Bosate gɔ nɖe nukuarese si ɔpia mi ɔle, ɔdzuɛ̃ mi sɔ Tsirise iibawo mi ɔɖe iso.
53003004	Bosate ɔso boba ɔriinyɔ i mi ame sɔ mito miabara ara wa bote mi fiɛ boɣe sɔ miakɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mibara mibua.
53003005	Bosate mɔmɔ si ɔbusi mi situ sɔ miaɖɔɛ Ɣaa, miya teteree i kanya kawɛ̃ ame ku Kristo.
53003006	Manyii, boka mi i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ mibɛse so miɖi i mafɔɖedze dãdze ma loisɛ i bo ara ite kanya iso.
53003007	Mi mɔmɔ miɣe kukaakɔ sɔ ikote sɔ miabara karabara lɛ kumɛgɔ bobara ku ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ, boibara ndã.
53003008	Boisu bo ato bosia i mi kuwɛ̃ iso, ɣɛɛ bobara karabara kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ bo inyɔ iso iibakpese mi ato.
53003009	Boba ɔri sɔ boasu bo ato bosia mi iso fiɛ. Ɣɛɛ gɔ bobie sɔ miasuã kumɛgɔ miasɛgu so, mibara karabara ne, boibara ngbɔ.
53003010	Mianyigi sɔ ɔwi gɔ bopia i mi kɔrɛ ne, boɣere mi sɔ ngɔ loibabara karabara ne, ɔdaaɖe ara.
53003011	Boto boɣere mi ara wagbe alasɔ bonɔ sɔ madãdze mawɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ maɣɛ ma manyii iso atɔ̃me.
53003012	Bobie sɔ ikpa maturi magbe sekelee i Bosate Yesu Kristo iyere ame sɔ masɛ ngbã sɛɛ si masu ma nrɔɔ̃ mabara karabara si maana aɖera maɖe.
53003013	Ɣɛɛ mi ne, manyii midaatã nrɔɔ̃ si mifɛ̃ mi i ira sɛɛ ibara ame.
53003014	Si ɔrere iibasiai atɔ̃me wa boɣere mi i ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, misia wũ ikparĩ si mibɛse so i ɔ̃ iso si kunuarɛ si kukpɛ̃ wũ.
53003015	Midaatsiri wũ, ɣɛɛ mitã wũ kuka lɛ mi ɔnyii awe.
53003016	Bosate mɔmɔ gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ si ɔtã mi isobuɛ i mi ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame i ɔri biara iso si ɔwegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
53003017	Mme Paulo mɔmɔ mme nto losia atɔ̃me tsɔra wagbe ikparĩ ala wũ kɔrɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ losɛ lobara i wũ siko ɔɖuɖu dzɛ losɛ lotsɛrɛ ame.
53003018	Bosate Yesu Kristo si ɔmɔɛ̃ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame.
54001001	Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo Katɔ̃mesɛdze iki i bo Ɖidze Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gɔ iba boto bonyɔ ɔri lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe.
54001002	Nto losu lotã-ɔ Timoteo. Aɣe sɔ ɔbi aɖe me i kafɔkaɖe ame. Lokarɛ bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu sɔ matã-ɔ abualɛra, fɔ ara si aɖo ma kayiri si matã-ɔ isobuɛ ana.
54001003	Kiniɔ ne, lobie sɔ aakpese awe i Efeso lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣere-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ loto lokɛlɛ Makedonia. Aɣe sɔ mawɛ̃ pia i mmɔ gɔ mato mate ara wa loakpɔkpɔtɔra bo ara ite i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso. Lobie sɔ sɛ̃ tã ma sɔ manyua ara wamɔ ite.
54001004	Ɣere ma sɔ manyua akuerera wa nna karɔ̃ gu siɣekparɛ ifafarɛ. Ara wagbe igbã sɛ abɔ kakpadzɛ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃. Iiɖe Ɣaa adzuni iso mato mate ara. Adzuni wa nɖe kafɔkaɖe are lokote sɔ boatsue.
54001005	Nnɛ ɔso fiɛ loto losu karabara gagbe lopia i fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame nɖe sɔ, boarɛgɛ̃ra kuɖɔɛ gɔ lobɔrɛ i kaɣere sekelea gu kayiribielea ame. Bo Kristo kafɔkaɖe ana aaɖe kagbaãre.
54001006	Maturi mawɛ̃ ɔɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i ara wagbe iso, ne ɔso maɔyu ɔri sɛɛ, masu so mapia i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ame.
54001007	Mabie sɔ maakpese Mose mmara matedze ɣɛɛ ne, ma mɔmɔ iinɔ ara wamɔ karɔ̃. Masɛ maɖe ika teteree i ara wa mainɔ karɔ̃ iso.
54001008	Bo ɔɖuɖu ɣe sɔ Mose mmara lɛ, si boabara i me iso iyi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
54001009	Ikote sɔ boatsue ana sɔ iiɖe maturi sɛɛ ɔso matã mmara, ɣɛɛ matsuelese ma losɛ̃ Ɣaa mmara gu ara lalaa mabaradze ma ngbã loyi ku ara nyanyarĩa ibara. Maɖe maturi ma loisiai kafɔkaɖe kukawɛ̃ fiɛ maɖe ma maɣese gu maturi mama maɖoese ana.
54001010	Maturi ma nɖe manɔlese gu marɛrɛ̃ ma nsɛ marɛgu ma marɛrɛ̃ laa. Maturi ma nsɛ mayu maturi marɔdɛ̃ gu maladze gu mma nsɛ makã ndamu siefe. Mma ɔɖuɖu loisɛ masiai ara ite sɛɛ ne, ma ɔso matã mmara ne.
54001011	Itɔ̃me Bielea sekelea nɛ iɣɛ i Ɣaa gɔ maale ɔsu ɔpia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame i ara ite nɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ.
54001012	Lopɛ Bosate Yesu Kristo siba i ɔle gɔ ɔtã me sɔ loabara ɔ̃ karabara ɔso. Nto lopɛ wũ siba sɔ ɔnya me ɔturi gɔ lokote fiɛ ɔkpere me sɔ lobara kasumu karabara gagbe.
54001013	Atoa sɔ lokpɛ̃gu wũ, lotia wũ, fiɛ loɣɛ anyakpi i ɔ̃ iso ku ɔwi gɔ lofe fiɛ loaba loafiniki ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya alasɔ ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, loifɔ wũ loɖe fiɛ loiɣe nnɛ loto lobara.
54001014	Ɣɛɛ Bosate ɔfedza abualɛra gbodzoo ɔfere me iso fiɛ ɔtã me kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ, ara wa nɖe bo are si bobara mawɛ̃ ku Yesu Kristo.
54001015	Itɔ̃me nɛ nto loɣɛ ngbe ne, gbaã iɖe fiɛ ikote sɔ ɔturi biara aafɔ ne ɔɖe sɔ Yesu Kristo nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ loba kayi gagbe ame sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃aɖi maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi wa mato mabara ame. Makpibaradze magbe ame ne, mme nɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃.
54001016	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnyɔ me nnya sɔ iaki i mme gɔ mme lonyanyarĩ loɖo ma ɔɖuɖu iso ne, Kristo Yesu aaɖi ɔ̃ iɣaraso ɔte maturi manya kumɛgɔ ɔsu kuɖɔɛ ɔtã makpibaradze ma lofɔ wũ maɖe sɔ ɔ̃atã ma ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro.
54001017	Ne ɔso ne, mitã sɔ boasu ile botã bo Igara gɔ i kato, ngɔ boito bonya ku bo anɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe Ɣaa. Boala boɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ gɔ loibakpi ɔnya iyere kato ɖaa. Si iba ngbɔ.
54001018	Wũ ɔbi Timoteo, karabara ga lotã-ɔ ngbe ne, ise i ara wa i kanyamaɖidze ɔɣɛ masegu i fɔ iso ɔso. Mɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wagbe la si aaɖe iso i Bosate kakpã gagbe ame.
54001019	Mɔɛ̃ fɔ kafɔkaɖe gu fɔ kaɣere la kukaakɔ alasɔ mawɛ̃ ma loikã ma situ atsue ne, mayu ngbã ɔri.
54001020	Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ nɖe Himeneo gu Aleksandro ne. Losu ma lotã Tsirise sɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue si maasuã sɔ maibala maɔɣɛ atsuɛ pɛ̃ i Ɣaa iso.
54002001	Ira ɖeakatɔ̃ nɛ lobie sɔ aabara nɖe sɔ, la ɔɔtã Ɣaa iti si ala ɔɔkparama kayi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti. La ɔɔsu mi gu ma ɔɖuɖu ara nyaa ɔɔbɔ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
54002002	La ɔɔkparama kayi ɔɔtã magara gu mma ɔɖuɖu nto maɖe maturi iso sɔ boawe i isobuɛ gu isoɣɔ ame ɔwi biara sɔ boasumu Ɣaa i kuwarɛ ame i ɔri biara iso.
54002003	Kayi ikparama nɛgbe igbã nsɛ ibo bo Ɖidze Ɣaa anɔ ne.
54002004	Alasɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃afɔ ɔbiara ɔbɔ ngbã fiɛ maatsue nnɛ nɖe ɔnukuare.
54002005	Gbaã ne, Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe mpia. Kpuradze ɔwɛ̃ saã ana mpia gɔ ɔ̃ nɖe ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ marɔ Kristo Yesu. Ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔledza bo gu Ɣaa inyɔ ndɛ̃ ne.
54002006	Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losu so ɔtã i kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu iti ne. Yesu ɔbara nnɛgbe si ɔte sɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖi kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔɣo.
54002007	Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa ɔbara me ratedze gu katɔ̃mesɛdze ne. Gbaã iɖe, fiɛ iiɖe sila sɔ ɔɖi me sɔ loaɖe Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu ratedze gɔ loaɖi kafɔkaɖe ara karɔ̃ ɔte mma loiɖe ma Yudase.
54002008	I mafɔɖedze kasarɛkɔ̃ biara ne, lobie sɔ marɛrɛ̃ si makparama kayi ku situ sekelea sɔ si Ɣaa ɔnya ma nrɔɔ̃ sekelea ne, ɔ̃atsue sɔ maɔɖi so mabɔrɛgu i ara lalaa ame fiɛ sikpã gu kakpadzɛ̃ na i ma ndɛ̃.
54002009	Lobie ana sɔ marɔ̃go aanyɔ ma arapia iso sɔ aibatsue anɔ, nnɛgbe loate sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ ne. Iilɛ sɔ maanyi akpofa siare, makɛrɛ so gu sikãrɛtɛa ara agbãagbã wa lofɔ kuɣa gɔ loate kato ikɔlɛso.
54002010	Ɣɛɛ ne, ma sibara sɛɛ si siɖi site sɔ maɖe marɔ̃go ma nsiai Bosate.
54002011	Ɔrɔ̃go biara si ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ si ɔsuã ara i karɔ̃ ibɔso ɔɖuɖu ame.
54002012	Loitã ma ɔri sɔ mate marɛrɛ̃ ara, ɣee maɖe marɛrɛ̃ iso. Ɣɛɛ mama kanya si masɛ.
54002013	Alasɔ Adam i Ɣaa ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔbara fiɛ ɔbara Eva.
54002014	Fiɛ iiɖe Adam i Tsirise ɔsɔsɔla, ɣɛɛ ɔrɔ̃go ɔsɔsɔla fiɛ ɔtã sɔ ɔbara ikpi.
54002015	Ɣɛɛ si ɔrɔ̃go ɔya teteree i ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ame ku kuɖɔɛ fiɛ ɔbara so sekelee ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ne, ɔ̃aki i ɔ̃ kuɣe ame pɔkɔsɔɔ.
54003001	Gbaã iɖe sɔ si ɔturi to ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃akpese mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, ɔto ɔbie karabara sɛɛ.
54003002	Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ atsuɛ na iso, fiɛ ɔɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ yiridze, ɔ̃ anɔ ɔkpa, ɔsɛ ɔɖe so iso, fiɛ maturi sɛ mawarɛ wũ. Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔfɔ mafɔ fiɛ ɔɖe ratedze sɛɛ.
54003003	Ɔ̃ibaɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɛ ndã ɔrɛ̃, ɔ̃ibaɖe kulu baradze. Ɣɛɛ ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi ɣɔa, ngɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ atɔ̃me ikpadzɛ̃ fiɛ ɔna sikã kanɔbɛbɛ.
54003004	Ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nto ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ iyo iso kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ mabi sɛ makã itɔ̃me atsue i ɔri biara iso.
54003005	Si ɔturi gɔ loibawo ɔ̃ mɔmɔ iyo maturi iso ɔnyɔ ne, nda ɔ̃abara fiɛ ɔ̃awo Ɣaa mafɔɖedze ɔkɔkɔ?
54003006	Iikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe fɔɖedze ɣɛtɛ sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato fiɛ iaki i ne iso sɔ ɔ̃aba ɔ̃akpase lɛ kumɛgɔ i Tsirise ɔkpase awe.
54003007	Ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ mba iyere sɛɛ i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ana katɔ̃ sɔ maibaɣɛ ara nyanyarĩa i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ ɔ̃abo i Tsirise iyebi ame.
54003008	Mafɔɖedze kasarɛkɔ̃ mabuaidze ne, ma wũ ikote sɔ maaɖe maturi ma mba ngbã sɛɛ fiɛ maibaɖe sinyagɛmi inyɔ maturi, maaɖe mma loisɛ manɛ ndã marɛ̃ fiɛ ma anɔ iisɛ abe i sikã iso.
54003009	Ikote sɔ maamɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mafɔ ngbe teteree ku situ dzɛ loibatã ma ipɔ.
54003010	Ipia sɔ aala ma ngbã anyɔ fiɛ si ainya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i ma iso fiɛ aatã sɔ maakpese mafɔɖedze mabuaidze.
54003011	Ma mare ana ne, ikote sɔ maaɖe marɔ̃go ma nsi ngbã sɛɛ fiɛ maisɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara. Maaɖe marɔ̃go ma loisɛ marɛ̃ ndã fiɛ masɛ mabara ira biara kukaakɔ.
54003012	Nyɔ sɔ mabuaidze magbe ɔbiara yiri ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃, ɔto ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ mabi gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu iso kukaakɔ.
54003013	Mabuaidze ma lomɔɛ̃ ma karabara kukaakɔ ne, ma mɔmɔ ba kayakpa fiɛ masɛ mawo kafɔkaɖe gu Yesu Kristo iso itɔ̃me ɔɣɛ ku ɔle.
54003014	Atoa sɔ nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã-ɔ ne, nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ loaba fɔ kɔrɛ i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
54003015	Ɣɛɛ nto lotsɛrɛ sɔ si logbikama ne, aatsue kumɛgɔ ikote sɔ ɔturi aasɛ ngbã i Ɣaa iyo nɛ nɖe Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃. Mafɔɖedze magbe nɣɛ i ɔnukuare kama ne.
54003016	Ɣaa itɔ̃me wɛrɛa nɛ maɖi mate ne, iba kuɣa gbaã fiɛ ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iibawo ne ɔsɛ̃. Ne nɖe sɔ, “Bosate ɔba lɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi. Ɣaa Siwarã ɔkɔlɛ wũ lɛ ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa. Ɣaa makpabo ɔnya wũ. Maturi ɔɣɛ ɔ̃ iso itɔ̃me i abuiti ɔɖuɖu ame. Maturi gbodzoo ɔfɔ wũ maɖe i kayiiso. Fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔkɛlɛgu kato i ikpawaĩ ame.”
54004001	Ɣaa Siwarã ɔɖi siɣere bo sekelee sɔ i ayi tsɔra ame ne, maturi mawɛ̃ to maabɔrɛ i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me mɔmɔ ame masiai kasɔla siwarã gu mma loasu so matã Ɔbosam ara ite.
54004002	Maturi magbe sɛ mate mila, alasɔ ma kaɣere ɔɔkpi lɛ ibɔra mapia i ɔtɔ masu mamatãra kã iso.
54004003	Masɛ mate sɔ iikote sɔ maturi ayiri marɔ̃go. Masɛ masɛ̃ aɖera agbã awɛ̃ ana. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa loɖi araɖea ɔɖuɖu sɔ mma lofɔ wũ maɖe gbaã fiɛ masiai ɔ̃ itɔ̃me si maaɖe ku siba ipɛ.
54004004	Ira biara nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɖi ne, ilɛ. Ne ɔso iikote sɔ maturi aasɛ̃ aɖera kuawɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ maafɔ ira biara ku siba.
54004005	Alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me gu bo siba ipɛ ɔsekelera iraɖea biara.
54004006	Si ate mafɔɖedze ara wagbe ne, ato aaɖe Yesu Kristo rabaradze sɛɛ gɔ nto ɔkararã so i kafɔkaɖe gu ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ kama asiai ame.
54004007	Ne ɔso rera so kama i mawa anatika wa loikote sɔ maaɖe kɔrɛ si akpadzɛ̃ so atã ngbã sekelea isɛ.
54004008	Sosina ame ɔle lɛ kakaaka ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me ifafarɛ sɔ aabara i ne iso ba kusia i ɔri biara iso. Alasɔ ito iatã-ɔ kusia i ngbã mɛgbe gu mmɛ nto miba ame.
54004009	Nnɛgbe nɖe itɔ̃me gbaã nɛ lokote sɔ ɔturi biara aafɔ ɔɖe ne.
54004010	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ boto bokpɛ̃, boɣɛ i karabara iso teteree ne. Alasɔ bo ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu sia i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã fiɛ ɔɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu Ɖidze iso titirio mma lofɔ wũ maɖe.
54004011	Karã ara wagbe irɔĩ tã ma si ate wã.
54004012	Daatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔnyɔ-ɔ itititɛ̃ alasɔ abara ɔbiɛtɛ ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɖe ikparĩ tã mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu i fɔ ikaɖe gu nsɛgbai gu fɔ maturi kuɖɔɛ gu kafɔkaɖe ame gu fɔ ngbã sekelea isɛ ame.
54004013	Ya teteree si ala ɔɔka Ɣaa itɔ̃me ɔɣere mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. La ɔɔɖiɖi wã karɔ̃ ɔɔte ma gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ ame loaba.
54004014	Ɣaa siawarã ame karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔpia i fɔ ame iki ɔ̃ kanya maɖidze nnɛ maɣɛ gu mafɔɖedze makpakpa ma losia-ɔ nrɔɔ̃ iso ne, daanyua kã karabara.
54004015	Bara ara wagbe si asu so atã wã pelepele sɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu aanya fɔ ngbã katɔ̃ isɛ.
54004016	Mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ gu fɔ ara wa ato ate si aya i karabara iso teteree. Alasɔ si abara ngbɔ ne, ato aaɖi so gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makã fɔ itɔ̃me atsue abɔrɛgu i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ame.
54005001	Daafafã ɔrɛrɛ̃ gɔ nɖe-ɔ ɔkpakpa. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɖi ara karɔ̃ te wũ ku ɔtu ɣɔa lɛ fɔ ɔse awe. La maporoporoi lɛ fɔ manyiibi awe.
54005002	La marɔ̃go ma nɖe-ɔ sikpakpa lɛ fɔ ɔnyi mɛrɛ̃ awe si ala mabitɛ ana lɛ fɔ manyiiko i isekele ɔɖuɖu ame.
54005003	Makuɛdze ma nna buaidze ne, la ma kukaakɔ ku kuwarɛ.
54005004	Ɣɛɛ si kuɛdze ɔrere ba mabi ɣee mawa ne, mabi mamɔ si masuã kumɛgɔ maanyɔ ma ayo maturi iso fiɛ maala ma maɣese lɛ mafɔɖedze karabara awe. Maɖi ma maɣese kulɛ ala nnɛgbe nsɛ ibo Ɣaa anɔ ne.
54005005	Kuɛdze gɔ nna buaidze ne, ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu ɔsia i Ɣaa iso fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkpere wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme sɔ ɔbuai wũ.
54005006	Ɣɛɛ kuɛdze gɔ nsi sɔ ɔto ɔɖe ngbã ne, ɔna ngbã i Ɣaa anɔmi ame atoa sɔ ɔsi ngbã.
54005007	Karã ara wagbe irɔĩ tã ma sɔ maasɛ ngbã mɛ i maturi iibaɖi ma iɣɛrɛ.
54005008	Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ iyo maturi iso kukaakɔ ne, mitsue sɔ ɔ̃isiai kafɔkaɖe fiɛ ɔnyanyarĩ kɔra ɔɖo ngɔ loifiniki.
54005009	Daasu kuɛdze gɔ loifɔ akɔ sikuɔ iyere abua i mafɔɖedze makuɛdze ikuri ame. Kuɛdze gɔ loabo ikuri nɛmɔ ame ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loyiri kurã kuwɛ̃ pɛ.
54005010	Ikote sɔ maturi aarɔ wũ iyere sɛɛ ala ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔrɔ̃go gɔ lokpadzɛ̃ ɔ̃ mabi kukaakɔ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔfɔ mafɔ, ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ mafɔɖedze anyaa iso kukaakɔ. Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ maturi ma mpia i inyɛwe ame nnya fiɛ ɔsi ɔ̃ ngbã ɔɖuɖu ɔtã ara sɛɛ ibara.
54005011	Makuɛdze biɛtɛ ne, daasu ma ayere abua i makuɛdze ikuri iso. Alasɔ si kurã iyo isɛ ɔmɛrɛ̃ ɔtsɛ ma ɔkã ikpɛ̃ ne, mato maakpese i Kristo kama sɔ maayiri arã.
54005012	Nnɛgbe to iatã maɖe ipɔ ala matu ndamu mɛ makã matã Ɣaa.
54005013	Ne kama ne, masɛ manina ɔwi mawe maki i maturi ayo maɣɛ kutsuɛ kpɔlɔkɔi. Nnɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo ɔɖuɖu nɖe sɔ ne, masɛ maɣɛ maturi iso ara, mma nsɛ mapia kulu i maturi ndɛ̃, maɖe aka wa loikote.
54005014	Ne ɔso loabie sɔ makuɛdze biɛtɛ si mayiri arã, maɣe mabi si manyɔ ma ayo iso bowũ. Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ maibabara ara wa loikote sɔ bo matsirise iibana ɔri masopara bo.
54005015	Nto loɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ makuɛdze mawɛ̃ ɔɔfiniki masiai Ɔbosam kama koko.
54005016	Si fɔɖedze rɔ̃go ɔrere ba makuɛdze iyo ne, ɔnyɔ ma iso sɔ makuɛdze mamɔ ato iibasia i Ɣaa mafɔɖedze iso. Ɔtã sɔ mafɔɖedze tsɔra si manyɔ makuɛdze ma nna buaidze iso.
54005017	Mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze ma nsɛ makɔkɔ maturi kukaakɔ ne, ikote sɔ maafɔ kuwarɛ gu kuso gɔ lokɔlɛ kato. Titiriu mma nto mate ara fiɛ mato maɣɛ Itɔ̃me Bielea ana.
54005018	Alasɔ maɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Daanyi bɔi gɔ nto ɔbuai-ɔ i fɔ ɔkpɛ̃ ame kanya.” Ana ne, “Ikote sɔ rabaradze biara aafɔ ɔ̃ kuso.”
54005019	Si ɔrere ɔba ɔ̃aɣɛ ira i tɔ̃ɖedze iso ne, daafɔ aɖe si iiɖe maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ loba.
54005020	Mma nto mabara ara lalaa ne, ɖi te ma i mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu katɔ̃ iyɔ matsɔra ka mato maanigã.
54005021	Nto loɣere-ɔ i Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gu Ɣaa makpabo sekelea katɔ̃ sɔ bara ara wagbe iso kukaakɔ sɔ aibanyɔ kuwɛ̃ i katɔ̃ akarã mawɛ̃ ana anɔmi.
54005022	Daatata so i nrɔɔ̃ isia maturi iso itã Ɣaa karabara. Daapia kɔrɔ̃ i maturi mama ara lalaa ibara ame bowũ ne, la so sekelee.
54005023	Fɔ kayiri ɔnyɛ ɔso ne, daala ɔɔnɛ ndu kunu. Lɛ sɔ aala ɔɔnɛ ndã kɛkɛĩ lɛ kua awe.
54005024	Maturi mawɛ̃ akpi wa masɛ mabara iisɛ awɛrɛ fiɛ isɛ ite sɔ maakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue. Ɣɛɛ mawɛ̃ ana ne, kama kama fiɛ ma akpi aabɔrɛ i ɔgbami.
54005025	Ngbɔ ame i ara sɛɛ wa i maturi sɛ mabara ana iisɛ awɛrɛ ne. Si aibɔrɛ i ɔgbami kiniɔ maturi ɔnya ne, ɔwi i katɔ̃ ame ne, ato aate manya.
54006001	Ɣere mafɔɖedze ma nɖe masande ɔɖuɖu sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma makɔse i karabara biara ame sɔ maturi iibaɖe ika nyanyarĩa i Ɣaa gu bo kafɔkaɖe ara ite iso.
54006002	Mafɔɖedze ma nɖe masande fiɛ ma makɔse ana ɖe mafɔɖedze ne, madaasu ma sinyii ibara mata maya ma makɔse iso. Ɣɛɛ ikote sɔ maabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma mabuai ma mabua. Alasɔ mma mato mabuai ne, ma wũ mafɔɖedze maɖe. Fiɛ ma gu ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ maturi ma ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ gbaã. Te ara wagbe si apia ma ɔtɔ sɔ mabara wã.
54006003	Ɔturi biara gɔ nsɛ ɔte ara wa loikotegu Bosate Yesu Kristo atɔ̃me ɣee kafɔkaɖe are ne,
54006004	kato kere ɔto ɔkɔlɛ so. Ɔ̃iɣe kuira fiɛ kakpadzɛ̃ siefe ɔɔkpese wũ ɔnyɛ. Ɔba sirerɛ ikpɛ̃, kalɔ, maturi sitia gu adzuni nyanyarĩa ibu i maturi iso.
54006005	Masɛ makpadzɛ̃ atɔ̃me ɔwi biara. Maturi magbe kaɣere ɔkpi fiɛ ɔnukuare ɔɔyu ma iso. Mabu sɔ masiai kafɔkaɖe ɔri iso si maana karana.
54006006	Gbaã iɖe sɔ kusia gbodzoo pia i Ɣaa kasumu ame itã bo si ara wa boba sɛ abo bo anɔ.
54006007	Alasɔ gɔ maɣe bo ne, boito kuira bobɔ kayiiso. Fiɛ ikpa sekelee ana sɔ si boarui ne, boibasu kuira bokɛlɛgu.
54006008	Ne ɔso mitã bo arapia gu aɖera wa boba si abo bo anɔ.
54006009	Ɣɛɛ mma anɔ nsɛ arɛtɛ i karana iso ne, masɛ makpase mabo i Ɔbosam ayebi ame. Masɛ mabo i adzimira ibara ame. Ara lalaa sɛ abɔrɛ ma iso fiɛ asɛ anina ma ngbã makpi mawɔ pelepele.
54006010	Alasɔ sikã kuɖɔɛ ame i ara lalaa agbãagbã sɛ abɔrɛ. Sikã kuɖɔɛ gɔgbe ɔso i maturi mawɛ̃ ɔɔyu ma kafɔkaɖe ɔri sɛɛ fiɛ ma ngbã ɔɖuɖu ɔbo i inyɛwe ame ne.
54006011	Gɔ aɖe Ɣaa ɔturi ɔso ne, ɖi so bɔrɛgu i ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ame si asiai isekele, Ɣaa kunigã gu kafɔkaɖe kama. Siai Bosate i kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ame. Na ɔtu si ala maturi ɔɖuɖu kukaakɔ.
54006012	Kpɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe kakpã teteree si ana ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro. Ngbã mɛgbe ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔkpere-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ abusi fɔ kafɔkaɖe ame i mafɔɖedze mama katɔ̃ ne.
54006013	I Ɣaa Kato gu karɔ̃ Baradze gu Yesu Kristo katɔ̃, ngɔ lobusi ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔte i Pontio Pilato katɔ̃ nto lotã-ɔ mmara mɛgbe.
54006014	Loɣere-ɔ sɔ mɔɛ̃ mmara mɛgbe la kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo-ɔ iɣɛrɛ ɔɖi gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaledza iba.
54006015	Ɣaa gɔ lokote sɔ maale fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe ira biara iso, ɔ̃ nɖe magara ɔɖuɖu igara gu makɔse ɔɖuɖu ɔkɔse to ɔ̃atã Yesu ɔledza iba i ɔwi gɔ lokate wũ iso.
54006016	Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsi ngbã ɔ̃isɛ ɔkpi ɔnya. Ɔto ɔfiɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo wũ ɔnyɔ ku anɔ. Kuwɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ iinya wũ ɔnya fiɛ kuwɛ̃ ana iibawo wũ ɔnyɔ. Ile gu ɔle ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔ̃ ɔre ɔɖe ɔwi biara. Si iba ngbɔ.
54006017	Ɣere mma mba kayiiso karana sɔ madaakɔlɛ so kato masu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i ara wa loibawo ma ɔɖi iso. Ɣɛɛ masu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i Ɣaa iso. Ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ira biara ku kayiribielea sɔ boana isoɣɔ.
54006018	Ɣere ma sɔ mala maɔbara isɛɛ sɔ maakpese maranase i ara sɛɛ ibara ame. Mala maɔtã mawɛrɛba ara ku ma situ faa.
54006019	Si mabara ngbɔ ne, mato maana karana ga loisɛ kanina fiɛ kase katã ma ɔwi biara, ana ne, mato maana ngbã sɛɛ mɛmɔ.
54006020	Timoteo, nyɔ sɔ aadzuɛ̃ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã-ɔ kukaakɔ. Sɛ̃ akaɖe wa nna karɔ̃ fiɛ aite Ɣaa kunigã si arera so kama i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ga i mawɛ̃ ɔsu masɔsɔla maturi lɛ inɔgba atɔ̃me iɖe.
54006021	Ɣɛɛ gɔ mawɛ̃ ɔbu sɔ maɣe ara wagbe ɔso ne, maɔyu kafɔkaɖe ɔri. Lokarɛ sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi.
55001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Kristo Yesu Katɔ̃mesɛdze iki i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame. Ɔpia me sɔ lopɛ ngbã mɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo i bo mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo Yesu imomo.
55001002	Wũ ɔbi ɖɔɛse Timoteo, Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu-ɔ si fɔ ara si aɖo ma kayiri ana si matã-ɔ isobuɛ.
55001003	Nto lopɛ Ɣaa gɔ losɛ losumu lɛ kumɛgɔ i wũ mawa ɔbara siba. Fiɛ nsɛ lobara ngbɔ i ɔtu gɔ lokpa ame. Ana ne, nsɛ lopɛ wũ siba kasɛ̃ i kakɔme i fɔ iti si loto lokparama kayi.
55001004	Losɛ lonyigi fɔ nnɔmɛ mɛ abiɛ gɔ boto bosame fiɛ loto lobie gbaã sɔ loaledza-ɔ inya si wũ isoɣɔ ayi.
55001005	Nto lonyigi fɔ kafɔkaɖe teteree ga aba. Nga igbã lowe i fɔ ɔwarɔ̃go Lois gu fɔ ɔnyi Eunike mɛrɛ̃ ame fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ fɔ̃ wũ aba kã.
55001006	Adzuni wagbe ɔso fiɛ loto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko sɔ si amɔɛ̃ karatã ga i Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ ku ɔwi gɔ losia-ɔ nrɔɔ̃ iso lokparama kayi ala teteree ne.
55001007	Alasɔ Ɣaa iisu ifɔ̃ siwarã ɔtã bo. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔtã bo siwarã dzɛ loatã bona ɔle gu kuɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ boamɔɛ̃ so bola ana.
55001008	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, daatã sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃-ɔ sɔ aaya i Ɣaa itɔ̃me kama, ɣee sɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃-ɔ i wũ iso lɛ ngɔ nrɛ iyo ala Kristo ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, fɔ wũ ya i fɔ inyɛwe kanya teteree si aɖi Bosate Itɔ̃me Bielea ate. Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ ɔle sɔ aawo nnɛgbe ɔbara.
55001009	Bosate ɔɖe lotã bo ngbã fiɛ ɔkpere bo sɔ bokpese ɔ̃ maturi. Iiɖe bo ara sɛɛ wa bobara ɔso. Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ adzuni gu ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔba ɔtã bo ɔso. Fiɛ iki i Yesu Kristo iso fiɛ bona abualɛra wagbe fiɛ mabara kayiiso.
55001010	Kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɖi nnyainyɔ nɛgbe ɔte bo sekelee i Ɖidze Yesu Kristo iba ame. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe loɖe kukpi ɔle iso. Fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne, ɔɖi ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ɔte.
55001011	Ɣaa ɔsu me ɔbara ɔ̃ isãyase gu katɔ̃mesɛdze gu Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe ratedze.
55001012	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ loto lowe inyɛ ne. Ɣɛɛ kunuarɛ iito me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe kukaakɔ fiɛ loɣe ngɔ iso i wũ ɔriinyɔ sia. Loɣe ana sɔ ɔto ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ira nɛ losu lopia i ɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔla kukaakɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ iabo iyi tsɔra nɛmɔ iso.
55001013	Mɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me bielea ɔɖuɖu wa lote-ɔ la kukaakɔ lɛ fɔ ɔsɛdziri si abara wã iso. Ya teteree i kafɔkaɖe gu kuɖɔɛ ame, ara wa nɖe bo are si bobara kanya kawɛ̃ ku Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ɔle gɔ mpia i bo ame iso ne, mɔɛ̃ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu wa i Bosate ɔsu ɔpia i fɔ nrɔɔ̃ ame la kukaakɔ.
55001015	Aɣe sɔ Asia mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu ɔrui manyua me fiɛ Figelo gu Hermagene ana ɔnyua me masɛ.
55001016	Lokarɛ sɔ Ɣaa aanyɔ Onesiforo gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi nnya alasɔ ɔ̃ikpɛ̃ kunuarɛ i wũ iso lɛ yorɛdze, ɣɛɛ ne, ɔwegu me ɔbuai me kukaakɔ.
55001017	Ɔwi gɔ ɔba Roma ne, ɔnyɔnyɔ me gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔba ɔ̃anya me.
55001018	Lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔnyɔ wũ nnya ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi iso. Fɔ mɔmɔ aɣe siri agbãagbã wa iso ɔbuai me i Efeso.
55002001	Fɔ ne, wũ ɔbi, we ɔle i bo kanya kawɛ̃ ibara ku Kristo i ɔ̃ abualɛra wa ɔtã bo ame.
55002002	Ara wa anɔ sɔ lote i maturi gbodzoo katɔ̃ ne, wã si asu apia i maturi ma lofɔ maɖe nrɔɔ̃ ame sɔ ma wũ maasu mate maturi mama ana ne.
55002003	Ya teteree i inyɛwe kanya lɛ kpakpɛ̃dze sɛɛ gɔ nɣɛ ɔtã Yesu Kristo.
55002004	Kpakpɛ̃dze gɔ nɣɛ i ɔ̃ karabara iso gbaã ne, ɔsɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃ kurabarara aapia ɔ̃ tɔ̃ɖedze isoɣɔ. Ne ɔso ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia mma loiɖe makpakpɛ̃dze atɔ̃me kanya.
55002005	Ngbɔ ame i iseterese gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃aɖe iso ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃abara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso kukaakɔ.
55002006	Kpɛ̃dze gɔ nsɛ ɔbara karabara ku kubɛ i ɔ̃ kakpɛkɔ̃ ame ne, ɔ̃ nsɛ ɔɖe ɔturi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ loaɖe aɖera ɖeakatɔ̃ ne.
55002007	Ara wa nto loɣere-ɔ ngbe ɔɖuɖu ne, dzuĩ wã nyɔ alasɔ loɣe sɔ Bosate to ɔ̃atã-ɔ karɔ̃ inɔ i wã ɔɖuɖu ame.
55002008	Nyigi Yesu Kristo gɔ lobɔrɛ i David ɔɣekparɛ ame, ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔtara ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔte.
55002009	Nto lowe inyɛ ala Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ loto loɣɛ ɔso. Fiɛ mapia me kugbagɔrɔĩ lɛ ɔturi lalaa awe. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me na i kugbagɔrɔĩ ame.
55002010	Nnɛgbe ɔso lofɔ ira biara lome ala Ɣaa maturi ma ɔɖi ɔso sɔ si maana iɖi nɛ i Kristo Yesu iso ɔnɔwɛ̃ maaki fiɛ maana gu isoɣɔ nɛ loyi i ngbã ɔɖuɖu ame.
55002011	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne, gbaã iɖe sɔ, “Si bobaragu Bosate mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne, boata bosɛgu wũ ngbã.
55002012	Si bowo ɔya teteree i inyɛwe biara ame ne, boaɖegu wũ sigara. Fiɛ si bosɛ̃ wũ ne, Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔ̃asɛ̃ bo.
55002013	Si bosɛ̃ wũ i bo kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Ɔ̃ ɔ̃ibawo ɔkpese i ɔ̃ atɔ̃me kama. Alasɔ ɔ̃ibawo so ɔsɛ̃ ɔnya.”
55002014	La ɔɔnyigira fɔ maturi ara wagbe si aka ma kukaakɔ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ sɔ maibapia kakpadzɛ̃. Alasɔ isuɖea kuiwɛ̃ na i ne ame. Ɣɛɛ iatã sɔ mma loanɔ ara wagbe kafɔkaɖe aakpase.
55002015	Mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ i ɔri biara iso sɔ aabo Ɣaa anɔ. Bara fɔ karabara sɔ kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ ɖe ngɔ loate Ɣaa itɔ̃me kukaakɔ.
55002016	Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i atsuɛ pɛ̃ gu ara wa nna karɔ̃ iɣɛ ame. Alasɔ maturi ma nsɛ mabara ara wagbe igbã ne, isɛ iɖi ma adzuni ibɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ikɛlɛgu dzoroo.
55002017	Ara wagbe igbã ite se lɛ imaɣɛi nɛ nto ifɔrɛ̃. Maturi inyɔ ma nto mate wã nɖe Himeneo gu Fileto.
55002018	Maɔfiniki mabɔrɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea kɔrɛ mapia makpɔkpɔtɔra mafɔɖedze mawɛ̃ adzuni sɔ bo iledza ita ibɔrɛ i kukpi ame iwegu Ɣaa ɔba iafe koko.
55002019	Ɣɛɛ ne, Ɣaa iyo ita nɛ iso matsue ne masia ne, kuira iibawo ne ɔtidza. Ita nɛgbe iso matsɛrɛ atɔ̃me wagbe masia sɔ, “Bosate ɣe mma nɖe ɔ̃ mare” fiɛ “Ngɔ nto ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔsiai Bosate ne, ɔfiniki ɔnyua akpi ɔbara.”
55002020	I ranase iyo ne, arɔi agbãagbã se. Awɛ̃ mabara ala sikãrɛtɛa fiɛ awɛ̃ ana sikãfudza. Mapɔ awɛ̃ ala sise fiɛ awɛ̃ ana ne, kudziri mawe ala. Arɔi wagbe ne, masɛ mabara awɛ̃ karabara ku ayi iɖe ame. Fiɛ awɛ̃ ana ne, masɛ mabara wã karabara iyi biara.
55002021	Ne ɔso si ɔturi ɔɖi so ɔbɔrɛgu i anyanyara ame fiɛ ɔsekelera so ne, ɔfɔ kuɣa ɔtã Bosate. Ne ɔso maawo wũ ɔsu ɔbara karabara sɛɛ biara.
55002022	Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i ara lalaa wa nsɛ awe maporoporoi ɔmɛrɛ̃ ame. Bara ira biara i ɔri iso si asɛ ngbã lɛ fɔɖedze. Ɖɔɛ maturi si asɛgu ma i isobuɛ ame. Siai ara wagbe gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makpere Bosate ku ɔtu sekelea.
55002023	Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i kakpadzɛ̃ ga nna karɔ̃ ame, alasɔ ara wamɔ igbã sɛ abɔ kulu.
55002024	Iikote sɔ fɔ lɛ Bosate ɔɖabo ne, aala ɔɔlɔ kalɔ. Ɣɛɛ ipia sɔ aala ɔɔbara ara sɛɛ gu kayiribielea ɔɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu fiɛ aaɖe ratedze sɛɛ gu ɔturi ɣɔa.
55002025	Mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mata maya Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne, la ɔɔɖi ara karɔ̃ ɔɔte ma ku ɔtu ɣɔa siainyɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã sɔ maafiniki maba maatsue ɔnukuare.
55002026	Ne ɔso ma adzuni to aabusi sɔ maabɔrɛ i Satana gɔ lobara ma ɔ̃ ara lalaa mabaradze iyebi ame.
55003001	Tsue sɔ, i ayi tsɔra ame ne, ɔtile to ɔ̃atã sɔ kayi to kaawe ɔle kukaakɔ.
55003002	Maturi to maaɖɔɛ ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã ɔkpɛ, maɖɔɛ sikã. Mala maɔɖe ndamu maɔkɔlɛ so kato. Maaɖe maturi ma loaɣere maturi atsuɛ pɛ̃ gu mma loibawarɛ maɣese. Maaɖe mma loibapɛ siba gu manyanyase.
55003003	Mato maaɖe mma i ɔturi mama ara iisɛ aɖo kayiri gu mma loisɛ manyɔ nnya. Maaɖe mma loala mila masia maturi iso fiɛ maaɖe mma loisɛ maɖe so iso. Mato maaɖe maturi ma mba silalaa. Maaɖe mma loisɛ maɖɔɛ ira sɛɛ.
55003004	Mato maaɖe maturi ma loaɖi ma malaa matã. Mma loabara ira maro fiɛ maabu iti ame, gu maturi ma loabu sɔ ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe manɔgbadze gu mma loaɖɔɛ kayiiso isoɣɔ maɖo Ɣaa.
55003005	Maturi magbe sɛ mate so lɛ mafɔɖedze, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ Ɣaa ɔle sɔ ɔdaaɖe ma iso. Ɖi so bɔrɛgu i maturi magbe igbã kɔrɛ.
55003006	Alasɔ mmagbe igbã ne, masɛ mawɛrɛ mabo i maturi ayo mafinikira marɔ̃go ma loisɛ mawo so iso ɔɖe adzuni ala ma akpi ɔɔɖo ma iti gɔ masiai sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ agbãagbã ɔso.
55003007	Marɔ̃go magbe to masuã ara ɔwi ɖaa, ɣɛɛ maito matsue ɔnukuare.
55003008	Kumɛgɔ i Yane gu Yambre ɔta maya Mose iso kokooko ne, ngbɔ ame i mila maratedze magbe to maata maya Itɔ̃me Bielea iso ne. Maɖe maturi ma i ara lalaa ɔyi ma adzuni ɔɖuɖu ame fiɛ maɔyu kafɔkaɖe ɔri mɔmɔ.
55003009	Ɣɛɛ ne, maibaɖe iso, alasɔ ma ara lalaa to aabɔrɛ i ɔgbami gɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu to maanya maturi ma igbã maɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ ibɔrɛ Yane gu Yambre iso.
55003010	Fɔ ne, ɔɔnya wũ ara ite fiɛ aɣe wũ nsɛgbai gu wũ adzuni gu wũ kafɔkaɖe gu wũ ikpɛ̃gu wũ kuturiɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ loya teteree.
55003011	Aɣe kumɛgɔ masiai me maɖaa me fiɛ lowe inyɛ. Aɣe nnɛ loba me iso i Antiokia gu Ikonion gu Listra. Bu kama iti nɛ ame loki lofe. Ɣɛɛ i wã ɔɖuɖu ame ne, Bosate ɔɖi me.
55003012	Gbaã iɖe sɔ, mma ɔɖuɖu loasɛ ngbã sɛɛ i Kristo ame ne, mato maate ma ɔɣiã makpɛ̃gu ma.
55003013	Ɣɛɛ mila maratedze gu maturi lalaa ne, ma inina to iakɛlɛ katɔ̃. Mato maasɔsɔla maturi, ɣɛɛ ma wũ ɔsɔsɔla ma to ma.
55003014	Fɔ ne, lobie sɔ aaya teteree i ara wa asuã fiɛ afɔ aɖe ana iso. Alasɔ aɣe mma kɔrɛ asuã wã abɔrɛgu.
55003015	Gɔ ita i fɔ sibiɛtɛ ame ne, aɣe ɔko sekelea ame atɔ̃me wa loatã sɔ aakpa anɔ, iatã ana iɖi iki i Kristo Yesu kafɔkaɖe ame.
55003016	Ɣaa Siwarã lotã mma ɔɖuɖu lotsɛrɛ Ɔko Sekelea iwola fiɛ matsɛrɛ. Ara wa matsɛrɛ lɛ atã ɔturi ara ite, kuka, aɣɛrɛ iledza gu ikararã itã ngbã sɛɛ isɛ.
55003017	Matsɛrɛ sɔ si ɔbiara gɔ losu so ɔtã Ɣaa aayi fiɛ ialedza wũ itã karabara sɛɛ biara ibara.
55004001	Loɣɛ i Ɣaa gu Kristo Yesu gɔ loaledza iba iaɣɛgu magbanadze gu makpise atɔ̃me kanya. Ngɔ loaledza iba iaɖe sigara nto loka-ɔ teteree sɔ,
55004002	kɔrɔ̃ pia o-o, kɔrɔ̃ na o-o ne, daama Itɔ̃me Bielea kanya. Ka maturi si asɛ̃ ma, pia ma ɔtɔ si aɖiɖi ara karɔ̃ ate ma ku ɔtu ɣɔa.
55004003	Alasɔ ɔwi to ɔba gɔ maturi iibamɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea mala, ɣɛɛ mato maabara nnɛ maɖɔɛ fiɛ maabie maratedze matã so, mma loaɣere ma ara wa maabie sɔ manɔ i ma ɔrakolo kanya.
55004004	Mato maafiniki i Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛgbe kama masiai anatika.
55004005	Fɔ ɣɛɛ ne, mɔɛ̃ so la kukaakɔ i ɔri biara iso si awe ɔle i inyɛwe biara ame. Bara Itɔ̃me Bielea ɣɛdze karabara. Si abara mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze karabara kukaakɔ.
55004006	Alasɔ mme ne, ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ wũ ngbã aaro lɛ nnɛ masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa. Wũ ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ loabɔrɛ i kayi gagbe ame.
55004007	Loɔkpɛ̃ ikpɛ̃ sɛɛ fiɛ loɔro wũ karabara lɛ iseterese sɛɛ awe. Lomɔɛ̃ wũ kafɔkaɖe i Kristo ame lola isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.
55004008	Ita i kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔledza sigaraikoto sekelea ɔsɛ me. Ikoto nɛ i Bosate gɔ nɖe atɔ̃meɣɛdze i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso aatã me ku iyi tsɔra nɛmɔ. Fiɛ iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me loafɔ ne, ɣɛɛ bo gu mma ɔɖuɖu ana losu ma ɔriinyɔ masia i Bosate iledza iba iso.
55004009	Ki i ɔri biara iso si aba aanya me mala.
55004010	Alasɔ Dema ɔɔrui i wũ kɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃asiai kayiiso ara i Tesalonika. Kreske ɔrui ɔkɛlɛ Galatia fiɛ Tito ɔ̃ wũ ɔkɛlɛ Dalmatia.
55004011	Luka ɔnɔwɛ̃ loɔkuti i wũ kɔrɛ. Ne ɔso kɔ Marko bɔ alasɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖe me bualɛ gbaã.
55004012	Losese Tihiko Efeso.
55004013	Si ato aba ne, su wũ ɔyu awu tagbaraa wa lonyua losɛ i Karpo kɔrɛ i Troa bɔ me. Su wũ siko gu titirio ndzɛ nɖe mabɔi siko sire kukosɛi ana.
55004014	Aleksandro gɔ nɖe ratoredze ɔbara me ara boa gbaã. Bosate mɔmɔ to ɔ̃atã wũ ara wa ɔbara kuso.
55004015	Ne ɔso fɔ̃ wũ dzuɛ̃ so i ɔ̃ iso alasɔ ɔta ɔɣɛ i bo ara wa boto bote iso gbaã.
55004016	Ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ maɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me ne, kuwɛ̃ iiba ɔ̃ayagu me, ma ɔɖuɖu ɔnyua me masɛ. Ɣɛɛ lotã Ɣaa iti sɔ ɔdaakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue i ne iti.
55004017	Ɣɛɛ ne, Bosate ɔya me i kɔrɛ ɔpia me ɔle fiɛ lowo Bosate itɔ̃me ɔɣere mma loiɖe ma Yudase i mmɔ. Bosate ɔɖi mɛ ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ame.
55004018	Bosate to ɔ̃aɖi me ɔbɔrɛgu i itikpi biara ame fiɛ ɔ̃asɛgu me i isobuɛ ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loabo Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ i kato. Ile bosu botã Ɣaa ita i kiniɔ ikɛlɛ kawirikɔ̃. Si iba ngbɔ.
55004019	Loya Priska gu Akwila gu Onesiforo iyo maturi ɔɖuɖu.
55004020	Erasto pia i Korinto, ana ne, Trofimo to ɔnyɛ, ne ɔso lonyua wũ losɛ i Mileto.
55004021	Pia kubɛ sɔ aaba aabo wũ kɔrɛ ngbe fiɛ ɔyu ɔwi aaɣo. Eubulo gu Pude gu Lino gu Klaudia gu manyii fɔɖedze tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi o-o!
55004022	Bosate si ɔwegu fɔ siwarã si ɔ̃ abualɛra si awegu mi.
56001001	Mme Paulo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa rabaradze gu Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze ne, mme nto lo tsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe ne. Ɣaa ɔɖi me fiɛ ɔpia me sɔ lobuai ɔ̃ maturi ma ɔɖi sɔ ma kafɔkaɖe aamɔ si lote ma ɔri sɛɛ gɔ mpia i bo Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame.
56001002	Itɔ̃me nɛgbe sɛ itã ɔriinyɔ nɛ mpia i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro iso. Ɣaa gɔ loisɛ ɔla sila mɔmɔ ɔsia bo itɔ̃me nɛgbe ita fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso.
56001003	Ɔɖi ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro itɔ̃me ɔte bo i ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ loto loɣɛ ngbe ame i ɔwi gɔ lokote wũ iso. Nnɛgbe ɔsu ɔpia i wũ nrɔɔ̃ ame fiɛ nto loɣere maturi ne. Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɖidze lopia me sɔ loɣɛ ne.
56001004	Wũ ɖɔɛse Tito, nto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe alasɔ ɔbi bielea aɖe me i kafɔkaɖe ga ame bopia ame. Lokarɛ Ɣaa gu Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe bo Ɖidze sɔ ɔmɔɛ̃-ɔ ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame si ɔtã-ɔ isobuɛ.
56001005	Lotã-ɔ sɔ we i Kreta si aledza ara wa lokuti sɔ maaledza asɛ. I ɔmagɛ̃ biara ame ne, sɛra matɔ̃ɖedze ma loaya i mafɔɖedze kanya lɛ kumɛgɔ loɣere-ɔ sɔ bara awe.
56001006	Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze ne, iikote sɔ katɔ̃mei kukawɛ̃ aamɔɛ̃ wũ kala. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ nɖe ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ yiridze. Ɔ̃ mabi ana aaɖe mma lomɔɛ̃ kafɔkaɖe kukaakɔ fiɛ maiɖe matsuelese, masɛ mawarɛ ma maɣese.
56001007	Mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Ɣaa karabara iso ne, iikote sɔ itɔ̃me kuiwɛ̃ aagɔda wũ, ɣee ɔkɔlɛ so kato, ɣee ɔna sikpã malamala. Iikote sɔ ɔ̃aɖe tarɛ̃dze, ɔ̃ibaɖe kulu baradze ɣee ngɔ anɔ nsɛ abe i sikã iso.
56001008	Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ loafɔ mafɔ fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ira sɛɛ ibara fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖe so iso. Ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi gɔ mba ngbã sɛɛ, ɔsekele fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla kukaakɔ.
56001009	Ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔto teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ i kafɔkaɖe ɔri ɔte. Mmɔ ɔ̃awo maturi mama ɔtɔ ɔpia i kafɔkaɖe itɔ̃me ame fiɛ ɔ̃aɖi mma lota maɣɛ i Itɔ̃me Bielea iso iɣɛrɛ ɔte ne.
56001010	Nto loɣɛ ngbɔ alasɔ matsuelese gu atsuɛ pɛ̃ maɣɛdze gu maladze mawɛ̃ pia maɖaa maturi. Mma nto mabara ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu nɖe ma Yudase ma lofiniki.
56001011	Tɛ̃ra ma ɔri i ara wagbe ite iso, alasɔ ara wamɔ sɛ apia kafɔkaɖe ikpɔkpɔtɔ i ayo ame. Maratedze ma nto mate ara nyanyarĩa ngbe ne, kusia mato mabie ɔso fiɛ mato mate ara wagbe.
56001012	Ma Kretase mɔmɔ ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nɖe kanyaɖidze ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ma Kretase ne, mila maladze gu mabɔi lalaa, gu maɖeɖei gu madãdze ana maɖe.”
56001013	Ira nɛ i kanyaɖidze gɔgbe ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe. Ne ɔso sɛ̃ tã ma sɔ manyua nsɛgbai mɛmɔ si mafɔ kafɔkaɖe sɛɛ gagbe.
56001014	Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ maanyua ma Yudase anatika gu mma loɔkpese ɔnukuare i kama mato mate mila ara atsue ɔkã ne.
56001015	Ira biara se sekelee itã maturi ma losekele. Ɣɛɛ mma nɖe maturi lalaa fiɛ maifɔ maɖe ne, kuira iiɖe ira sekelea, alasɔ ma adzuni ame ɔyigu ara lalaa fiɛ maisɛ manya ira sɛɛ gu ilalaa maɖi ite.
56001016	Ma mɔmɔ sɛ maɣɛ sɔ mafɔ Ɣaa maɖe, ɣɛɛ ma kurabarara iite ngbɔ. Maɖe maturi ma lopukutura so gu matsuelese ma loikote matã kuwarɛ kukuwɛ̃.
56002001	Ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, te ara wa nsia i kafɔkaɖe sɛɛ ɔri iso.
56002002	Te marɛrɛ̃kpakpa sɔ mamɔɛ̃ so mala, mabara adzuni karabara si maɖe so iso. Mamɔɛ̃ ma kafɔkaɖe mala, maɖɔɛ so si maya teteree i ira biara ame.
56002003	Ngbɔ ame i marɔ̃gokpakpa ana ne, te ma sɔ masɛ ngbã mɛ loate sɔ mase sekelee. Madaaɖe mma loala maɔsɛ maturi karɔ̃. Madaaɖe matarɛ̃dze. Ɣɛɛ mate maturi ara sɛɛ.
56002004	Mate marɔ̃go biɛtɛ ma nsi i arã ayo kumɛgɔ maaɖɔɛ ma marã gu ma mabi. Ana ne, sɔ
56002005	maɖe mma loamɔɛ̃ so mala si mabara so sekelee. Mate ma sɔ maɖe mma loabara ma ayo karabara, mawe kayiribielea, mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma marã. Nnɛgbe loatã sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ara lalaa ɔɣɛ i Ɣaa Itɔ̃me iso ne.
56002006	I ɔri gɔmɔ ame iso ne, pia maporoporoi ɔle sɔ mamɔɛ̃ so mala kukaakɔ.
56002007	Ara ɔɖuɖu ame ne, fɔ mɔmɔ ikote sɔ aaɖe ɔturi gɔ nsɛgbai i maturi mama anyɔ masuã ara mabɔrɛgu. Ya teteree i ara ite ame kukaakɔ.
56002008	Pia kusɛ̃ i fɔ ikaɖe ame sɔ maturi awɛrɛ-ɔ fiɛ maibana iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ i fɔ iso iyɔ kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ fɔ matsirise ala maina kuira nɛ maaɣɛ i bo iso.
56002009	Maɖabo si mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã ma makɔse si ma kurabarara si kupia ma makɔse isoɣɔ i ira biara ame. Madaakpadzɛ̃gu ma atɔ̃me.
56002010	Madaayu ma ana, ɣɛɛ mate ma sɔ maturi sɛɛ gu mma iso maawo iti ɔsia maɖe. Nnɛgbe aatã sɔ maturi aanya sɔ bo ara ite i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe bo Ɖidze iso ne, ara sɛɛ aɖe.
56002011	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ abualɛra ɔte bo sɔ iaki i wã iso ne, kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ana iɖi.
56002012	Abualɛra wagbe to ate bo sɔ boabɔrɛ i ngbã nyanyarĩa isɛ ame, bokpese kayiiso ara isiai kama. Boamɔɛ̃ so bola kukaakɔ, bosɛ ngbã sɛɛ, bobara ara sɛɛ i kayi gagbe ame.
56002013	Ngbɔ boase fiɛ boawe i ɔriinyɔ ame itã Iyi siare nɛ iso i bo Ɣaa gu Ɖidze siare Yesu Kristo aaba ne.
56002014	Ɔsu so ɔtã i bo iti sɔ si ɔ̃aɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i ikpi biara ame bokpese maturi sekelea ma nɖe ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ mare itã ara sɛɛ ibara.
56002015	Te ara wagbe ku ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã-ɔ si apia maturi ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ makã-ɔ atsue ɔle si alɔgu mma loisɛ i ɔri iso ana. Daatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔnyɔ-ɔ pupurii.
56003001	Nyigira fɔ maturi sɔ mabɔ so karɔ̃ matã matɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nto maɖe ma iso si makã ma atsue mabara isɛɛ ɔwi biara.
56003002	Ɣere ma sɔ madaarɔ kuwɛ̃ iyere lalaa. Ɣɛɛ mabara sinyii si masɛ i isobuɛ ame. Mawarɛ maturi i ɔri biara iso.
56003003	Alasɔ bo wũ bowe i adzimira wamɔ gu atsuele gu ɔri iyu, ku ɔwi gɔ lofe. Boɖe masande botã sosina ɔrakolo gu isoɣɔ lala ina agbãagbã ame. Bonina ɔwi i ɔtile ara iso gu kanɔbɛbɛ ame. Botsiri maturi fiɛ maturi ana ɔtsiri bo.
56003004	Ɣɛɛ ɔwi gɔ i bo Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɖidze ɔɖi ɔ̃ abualɛra gu kuɖɔɛ ɔte bo ne,
56003005	ɔfɔ bo. Iiɖe bo ara sɛɛ ibara ɔso, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ abualɛra wa ɔtã bo sɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔba bo iso ɔso. Siwarã dzɛ lotã maledza bo iɣe fiɛ sitã bo ngbã ɣɛtɛ, sifore bo bokpese sekelee.
56003006	Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ Siwarã gbodzoo ɔtã bo gu sɛ̃ ɔle gɔ lobɔrɛ i bo Ɖidze Yesu Kristo iso.
56003007	Iki i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame ne, bo gu wũ ndɛ̃ ka ilɛ sɔ boɔna ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro, nnɛ iso i bo ɔriinyɔ sia.
56003008	Itɔ̃me gbaã iɖe mmɔ, fiɛ lobie sɔ aapia ne ɔrɔrã. Mma lofɔ Ɣaa maɖe si masu ma ɔwi matã ara sɛɛ wa mba kusia itã maturi ɔɖuɖu ibara.
56003009	Daabo i kakpadzɛ̃ ame kukuwɛ̃. Daanina ɔwi i siɣekparɛ ikaka gu maturi iɣɛɣɛ gu kalɔ ilɔ gu Mose mmara iso ibara ame. Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu na kusia kukuwɛ̃.
56003010	Mma nsɛ mapia ikpɔkpɔtɔ i mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ ne, ka ma ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɣee ikpɛ inyɔ ne kama ne, ɖi ma arɔĩ.
56003011	Mmamɔ igbã ne, akpi ɔɔɖe ma iso fiɛ maɔtã so ipɔ ana koko.
56003012	Si lopia-ɔ Artema ɣee Tihiko ne, pia kubɛ si aba wũ kɔrɛ i Nikopoli alasɔ mmɔ lobara adzuni sɔ loawe ku ɔyu ɔwi ne.
56003013	Pia kubɛ si aɖi atɔ̃meɣɛdze Zena gu Apolo ɔri. Si abie ara wa loanya ma atã ma.
56003014	Ikote sɔ mafɔɖedze asuã kumɛgɔ maasu ma ɔwi ɔɖuɖu mabara ara wa mba kusia. Mala maɔbuai maturi mama. Ana ne, madaabara ndã.
56003015	Manyii ma mpia i wũ kɔrɛ ngbe ɔɖuɖu ɔya mi. Fɔ wũ si aya mafɔɖedze tsɔra atã bo. Ɣaa si ɔmɔɛ̃ mi ɔɖuɖu ɔla i ɔ̃ abualɛra ame.
57001001	Mme Paulo gɔ nrɛ i iyo ala Bosate Kristo Yesu itɔ̃me iɣɛ ɔso gu bo ɔnyii Timoteo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe bosese-ɔ, bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Filemon.
57001002	Boya bo ɔnyiiko Apia gu bo kpakpɛ̃dze laa Arkipo gu mafɔɖedze ikuri ma nsɛ masarɛ i fɔ iyo.
57001003	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo si matã mi abualɛra gu isobuɛ.
57001004	Bo ɔnyii Filemon, ɔwi biara loto lokparama kayi ne, losɛ lonyigi-ɔ, fiɛ losɛ lopɛ wũ Ɣaa siba ɔwi biara i fɔ iti.
57001005	Nsɛ lobara ngbɔ alasɔ lonɔ kumɛgɔ afɔ Bosate Yesu aɖe fiɛ asɛ aɖɔɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Ɣaa maturi.
57001006	Nto lokparama kayi sɔ bo kanya isa lɛ mafɔɖedze awe aawe ɔle ibua sɔ boanɔ ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu wa mpia i mawɛ̃ ibaragu Kristo ame karɔ̃.
57001007	Wũ ɔnyii, loto lona isoɣɔ fiɛ wũ ɔtu ana ɔkpase ɔsɛ alasɔ fɔ kuɖɔɛ ɔɔpia Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔle.
57001008	I nnɛgbe ɔso ne, loba ɔle lɛ fɔ ɔɖeatɔ̃ i Kristo ame loaɣere-ɔ sɔ bara nnɛ lokote.
57001009	Ɣɛɛ gɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ ɔso ne, iti loto lotã-ɔ. Mme Paulo mɔmɔ gɔ nɖe Bosate Kristo Yesu katɔ̃mesɛdze fiɛ lorɛ i iyo ala ɔ̃ iti ne,
57001010	loto-ɔ i kukpa i wũ ɔbi Onesimo iti alasɔ loɔkpese ɔ̃ ɔse i Kristo ame gɔ lorɛ i iyo ngbe.
57001011	Atoa sɔ ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ɔna kusia kukuwɛ̃ ɔtã-ɔ ne, kiniɔ ne, ka ɔba kusia ɔtã bo gu-ɔ, alasɔ gbaã ɔ̃ iyere karɔ̃ nɖe Kusia.
57001012	Lokpesera wũ loto losese-ɔ, ɣɛɛ wũ ɔtu ana siai wũ.
57001013	Tee loabie sɔ ɔkpese ɔwe i wũ kɔrɛ i ngbegɔ lorɛ i iyo ala Itɔ̃me Bielea ɔso si ɔbuai me i fɔ kanya.
57001014	Ɣɛɛ ne, loibabie sɔ loɣiɛ-ɔ sɔ buai me, ɣɛɛ loabie sɔ aabuai me ku fɔ ɔtu faa. Ne ɔso loibabara kuira si ainɔ karɔ̃.
57001015	Siainyɔ nnɛ ɔso i Onesimo ɔrui i fɔ kɔrɛ ɔwi kurukutu nɖe sɔ si ɔ̃akpese ɔba ɔ̃awe i fɔ kɔrɛ pelepele.
57001016	Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃isiɖe ɔsande kere ɔtã-ɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔnyiibi ɖɔɛse gɔ loipia kuɣɛ ka ɔɖe! Lofɔ loɖe sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aɖe ɔturi bielea ɔtã-ɔ lɛ ɔsande gu ɔnyii i Bosate ame ana.
57001017	Ne ɔso si afɔ me lɛ fɔ rabaradze laa ne, fɔ wũ lɛ kumɛgɔ aafɔ me.
57001018	Si ɔɣɛrɛ-ɔ ɣee ɔto-ɔ kuso kurere ne, su kɔ̃ pia i wũ iyere ame.
57001019	Mme Paulo mme losu wũ kɔrɔ̃ loto lotsɛrɛ losese-ɔ sɔ, loto loatã-ɔ kuso gɔmɔ. Loito lobie sɔ loanyigira-ɔ sɔ fɔ mɔmɔ ne, ato me fɔ ngbã kuso i Kristo ame.
57001020	Ne ɔso wũ ɔnyii, bara me kayiribielea gagbe ala Bosate iti si apia me isoɣɔ lɛ ɔnyii fɔɖedze awe i Kristo ame.
57001021	Loto lotsɛrɛ-ɔ ɔko gɔgbe ku kafɔkaɖe sɔ ato aakã me atsue fiɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ ato aabara aɖo nnɛ loto lokarɛ lobɔrɛgu i fɔ kɔrɛ.
57001022	Ana ne, lobie sɔ bie iyo sɛ me alasɔ lofɔ loɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃akã mi ɔɖuɖu atsue ɔnyua me ɔtã mi.
57001023	Epafra, gɔ bo gu wũ nrɛ i iyo ala Kristo Yesu ɔso sɔ ɔya-ɔ.
57001024	Marko, Aristarko, Dema gu Luka ma nɖe wũ mabuaidze ana ɔya-ɔ o-o.
57001025	Bosate Yesu Kristo abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu.
58001001	I ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɖe bo mawa ika gbodzoo i siri agbãagbã iso ɔkigu i kanyamaɖidze iso.
58001002	Ɣɛɛ i ayi tsɔra wagbe ame ne, ɔ̃ɔɖe bo ika ɔkigu i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso. Ɔ̃ iso i Ɣaa ɔki fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso fiɛ ɔ̃ iɖe ɔɖi sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ ara ku kawirikɔ̃ ne.
58001003	Ɔbi gɔgbe nsɛ ɔɖi ɔ̃ Ɔse ikpawaĩ ɔte fiɛ ɔɖe ɔ̃ ɔse kumiamia tutuutu ne. Ɔmɔɛ̃ kayi ɔto ala ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ mba ɔle. Gɔ ɔfɔ kasukatsɛ ɔtã maturi awune akpi ɔro ne, ɔkpase ɔsɛ i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato.
58001004	Ɣaa ɔkɔlɛ Ɔbi kato ɔɖo Ɣaa makpabo lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ iyere nɛ lomɔ iɖo Ɣaa makpabo ire.
58001005	Alasɔ Ɣaa iiɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ ku ɔwi gɔ lofe sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi aɖe. Nɔme ne, loɔkpese fɔ Ɔse.” Fiɛ ɔ̃iɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ ana sɔ, “Loaɖe fɔ Ɔse, fiɛ aɖe wũ Ɔbi.”
58001006	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Ɣaa to ɔba ɔ̃apia ɔ̃ Ɔbi biete ɔwɛ̃ saã kayi gagbe iso ne, ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu si masɔrɛ wũ.”
58001007	I makpabo iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Losu wũ makpabo lobara lɛ ɔwiri fiɛ wũ maɖabo magbe ne, lobara ma lɛ ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi.”
58001008	Ɣɛɛ i Ɔbi iso ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa, fɔ sigara ɔɖewi iibafe ɔnya. Fiɛ asɛ aɖe fɔ maturi iso i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
58001009	Asɛ aɖɔɛ ira nɛ nse bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ atsiri nwa loiya tɔrɔrɔ. Ne ɔso i fɔ Ɣaa ɔsɛra-ɔ sigara, ɔtã-ɔ kuwarɛ isoɣɔ nɛ lomɔ iɖo fɔ malaa ire ne.”
58001010	Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ana i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso sɔ, “Bosate, i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, fɔ lobara karɔ̃ fiɛ fɔ arɔĩ asu abara ala kuɖokpo.
58001011	Ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aawɔ, ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, apia ɔwi biara, ara wagbe to aaburi lɛ arapia.
58001012	Ato aakarĩ wã lɛ akatisɛ fiɛ aafinikira wã lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mafinikira arapia. Ɣɛɛ fɔ ne, ngbɔ ame aase ɔwi biara ne. Fɔ akɔ na kawirikɔ̃.”
58001013	Ɣaa iiɣere ɔ̃ kpabo kuwɛ̃ sɔ, “Sɛ i wũ kuɖearɔ̃ iso ngbe gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loatã atara ngba asia i fɔ matsirise iso.”
58001014	Iyɔ be i makpabo ɖe? Ma nɖe Siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sisɔrɛ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔpia ma sɔ masɛ maabuai mma loana iɖi ne.
58002001	Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ boamɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare ara wa ɔɖuɖu mate bo bola teteree sɔ boibayu ɔri ne.
58002002	Alasɔ si mmara mɛ i Ɣaa makpabo ɔfɔ mabɔ bo mawa ɖe migbaãre fiɛ si ɔrere ɔta ɔya me iso masɛ makpadzɛ̃ wũ kutsue gɔ lokate ne,
58002003	nda boabara fiɛ boatere i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛ loaba bo iso si bosɛ̃ iɖi siare nɛgbe? Bosate Yesu mɔmɔ ɔɖe loɖe katɔ̃ ɔpɛ iɖi nɛgbe imomo fiɛ mma lonɔ ne fiɛ boawo ma ɔfɔ ɔɖe ɔba maaɣere bo.
58002004	Ɣaa ɔsu akparĩ gu awawãra agbãagbã gu Siwarã Bielea karatã ga ɔɣɛ ɔtã maturi i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ kanya ɔsia iɖi siare nɛgbe ita.
58002005	Ɣaa iisu kayi ɣɛtɛ ga iso itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ ngbe ɔpia i makpabo kayirinɔ.
58002006	Ɣɛɛ Ɔko Sekelea ame kakɔi kawɛ̃ ne, matsɛrɛ sɔ, “Be i ɔturi awune ɖe ɔso fiɛ fɔ anɔ sia wũ iso? Be kowũ i ɔturi awune ɖe ɔso ato adzuɛ̃ wũ ngbɔ?
58002007	Abɔ wũ karɔ̃ kɛkɛĩ i ɔwi kurukutua ame aɖo Ɣaa makpabo. Asu ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ atɔmedza wũ lɛ sigaraikoto.
58002008	Fiɛ asu ira biara apia wũ i kayirinɔ.” Si Ɣaa ɔsu ira biara ɔpia i ɔ̃ kayirinɔ ne, iyɔ kuira na nɛ iso ɔna ɔle. Ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, boito bonya sɔ ira biara pia i ɔturi kayirinɔ.
58002009	Ɣɛɛ bonya Yesu gɔ i ɔwi kurukutu ame ne, Ɣaa ɔbɔ wũ karɔ̃ ɔɖo makpabo, sɔ iki i Ɣaa nnyainyɔ ame ne, ɔkpi i maturi ɔɖuɖu iti. Bonya sɔ iki i ɔ̃ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtɔmedza wũ ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ sigaraikoto.
58002010	Ikote sɔ Ɣaa gɔ lobara ira biara fiɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ wã ɔɖuɖu ɔto ɔtã sɔ Kristo ɔyi iki i ɔ̃ inyɛwe ame sɔ ɔ̃akɔ maturi gbodzoo ma nɖe Ɣaa mabi ɔbɔ sɔ maana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame.
58002011	Ɔsekelera maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame, fiɛ ma gu mma ɔsekelera ne, Ɔse ɔwɛ̃ ɔɖe ma. Ne ɔso iito ikpɛ̃ Yesu kunuarɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpere ma sɔ ɔ̃ manyiibi ne.
58002012	Ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ, “Loaɣere wũ manyii nnɛ abara. Fiɛ loale-ɔ i ma kasarɛkɔ̃.”
58002013	Ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Loasu wũ anɔ losia i Ɣaa iso.” Fiɛ ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔɔnya me gu mabi ma i wũ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã me.”
58002014	Gɔ mma ɔto ɔkpere sɔ mabi ɖe sosina gu ima ɔso ne, Yesu ɔ̃ wũ ɔkpesera so lɛ ma ɔwɛ̃ awe i siturina ame. Ɔbara ngbɔ sɔ iaki ɔ̃ kukpi ame ne, ɔ̃awɔra Ɔbosam gɔ mba kukpi ɔle.
58002015	Iki i nnɛgbe ame ne, ɔkurisi mma ɔɖuɖu nɖe masande matã ifɔ̃ i ma agbanayi ɔɖuɖu ame gɔ mato manigã kukpi ɔso.
58002016	Ite sekelee sɔ iiɖe Ɣaa makpabo maɖe ɔsɛ ɔbuai, Ɣɛɛ Abraham mawa maɖe ɔsɛ ɔbuai
58002017	I ɔri biara iso ne, ɔkpese lɛ ɔ̃ manyiibi awe fiɛ ɔwo sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele nnyanyɔdze gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso i Ɣaa karabara ame ɔɖe. Ngɔ losu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔtã Ɣaa sɔ maturi ɔɖuɖu aana ma akpi isu itsɛ.
58002018	Ne ɔso si ɔrere to ɔki i kalakanyɔ ame ne, ɔ̃awo wũ ɔbuai alasɔ ɔ̃ wũ mala wũ manyɔ fiɛ ɔwe inyɛ.
58003001	Ne ɔso wũ manyii sekelea ma mba kaɖekɔ̃ i Ɣaa ikpere ame, minyɔ Yesu gɔ nɖe bo kafɔkaɖe ga itɔ̃me bosɛ boɣɛ Katɔ̃mesɛdze gu sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele.
58003002	Ɔbara ara i ɔri iso ɔtã Ɣaa gɔ lokpere wũ sɔ ɔbara ɔ̃ karabara, lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i Mose ɔbara i ɔri iso i ɔ̃ karabara ame i Ɣaa iyo.
58003003	Ngɔ lotsue iyo sɛ ɔwe kuwarɛ ɔɖo iyo nɛ ɔtsue. Ngbɔ ame i Yesu ba kuwarɛ gɔ lomɔ kuɖo Mose kure ne.
58003004	Iyo biara ba ngɔ lotsue ne, ɣɛɛ gbaã ne, Ɣaa nɖe ngɔ lotsue ira biara.
58003005	Mose ɔbara ira biara i ɔri iso i Ɣaa iyo lɛ ɔɖabo awe, fiɛ ɔɖe ika i ara wa i Ɣaa aaɣɛ i ɔwi gɔ i katɔ̃ iso.
58003006	Ɣɛɛ Kristo to ɔbara ira biara i ɔri iso lɛ Ɔbi gɔ mba ɔle i Ɣaa iyo iso. Bo nɖe ɔ̃ iyo si bomɔɛ̃ bo katetere gu kafɔkaɖe i nnɛ boto bonyɔ ɔri bola teteree.
58003007	Ne ɔso lɛ kumɛgɔ i Siwarã Bielea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne,
58003008	midaabara atsuele lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mawa ɔbara ku ɔwi gɔ mata maya Ɣaa iso, mala wũ manyɔ i fafuĩ ame.
58003009	Mmɔ mala me manyɔ ne atoa sɔ manya ara wa lobara i akɔ sina ame.
58003010	Ne ɔso lonagu ɔwi gɔmɔ maturi sikpã fiɛ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Maɖe maturi ma iso aibawo iti ɔsu ɔsia. Fiɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibakã wũ mmara atsue.’
58003011	Lonagu ma sikpã lokã ndamu sɔ, ‘Maibabo i karɔ̃ ga iso tee loatã ma iwarã manya!’ ”
58003012	Wũ manyii fɔɖedze, minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ kuwɛ̃ i mi ndɛ̃ iibawe ɔtu gɔ lonyanyarĩ fiɛ ɔna kafɔkaɖe sɔ ɔ̃afiniki i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã kama.
58003013	Ɣɛɛ si ikpi iibasɔsɔla mi kuwɛ̃ itã mikpese matsuelese ne, mibuai so ayi kumɛgɔ miɣe sɔ iyi biara ne Nɔme iɖe.
58003014	Boba kaɖekɔ̃ ku Kristo si bomɔɛ̃ bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ boba ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ bola teteree isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.
58003015	Ngbɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne, midaabara atsuele lɛ kumɛgɔ i mi mawa ɔbara gɔ mata maya Ɣaa iso.”
58003016	Mabe nɖe mma lonɔ Ɣaa silɔ fiɛ mata maya wũ iso? Mma ɔɖuɖu i Mose ɔkɔ ɔbɔrɛgu i Egipte karɔ̃ iso maɖe.
58003017	Mabe i Ɣaa ɔnagu sikpã akɔ sina? Mma lobara ikpi, fiɛ makpi i fafuĩ ame.
58003018	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu teteree sɔ maibabo i karɔ̃ ga ame ɔ̃atã ma iwarã manya ne, mabe maɖe ɔto? Mma loikã wũ atsue ɔto.
58003019	Ite sekelee sɔ nnɛ ɔso maibo i karɔ̃ gamɔ iso nɖe sɔ maifɔ Ɣaa maɖe.
58004001	Ne ɔso gɔ ɔri ɔkpese ɔpia sɔ maturi aakɛlɛ iwarã nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ame ne, mitã bodzuɛ̃ so. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, mi mawɛ̃ iito maakate matã iwarã nɛmɔ ame ikɛlɛ.
58004002	Alasɔ bo wũ ne, maɣere bo itɔ̃me lɛ kumɛgɔ maɣere mmamɔ ana. Manɔ itɔ̃me, ɣɛɛ maina kusia kukuwɛ̃ alasɔ maifɔ ne maɖe.
58004003	Bo ma lofɔ boɖe ne, bo mba iwarã nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ne. Lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Lokã ndamu i sikpã ame sɔ, ‘Ma kukpa iibane karɔ̃ ga iso maana wũ iwarã manya!’ ” Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ngbɔ atoa sɔ ɔ̃ɔro ɔ̃ mɔmɔ karabara ku ɔwi gɔ ɔbara kayiiso.
58004004	Alasɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, matsɛrɛ i kakɔi kawɛ̃ sɔ, “Iyi kɔdzɛva iso ne, Ɣaa ɔwarã fiɛ ɔ̃isibara karabara kukawɛ̃.”
58004005	Ɔledza iɣɛ i itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame sɔ, “Ma kukpa iibane karɔ̃ ga iso tee maana wũ iwarã manya!”
58004006	Atoa sɔ mma loɖe katɔ̃ mafɔ Itɔ̃me Bielea iiwo iwarã ame ɔbo alasɔ maikã Ɣaa atsue ne, ɔri ɔkpese ɔpia ɔtã maturi mawɛ̃ sɔ maabo iwarã nɛmɔ ame.
58004007	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsɛ iyi mama nɛ ɔto ɔrɔ sɔ Nɔme fiɛ ɔɖe ika ɔkigu i David gɔ maɣe kamakama iso sɔ, “Nɔme si minɔ Ɣaa silɔ ne, midaabara atsuele.”
58004008	Alasɔ si Yosua lowo ma ɔkɔ ɔbogu iwarã ame ne, tee Ɣaa iisibaɖe ika i iyi mama iso.
58004009	Ne ɔso iwarãyi iwɛ̃ ɔkpese ise gɔ Ɣaa maturi aawarã i ne iso.
58004010	Alasɔ mma loabo i Ɣaa iwarã ame ne, mato maawarã lɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ wũ ɔwarã i ɔ̃ karabara ame.
58004011	Ne ɔso mitã sɔ bo wũ boakpɛ̃ sɔ boabo iwarã nɛmɔ ame sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibakpase i kafɔkaɖe ame ala atsuele ɔso lɛ mma loibo.
58004012	Alasɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ba ngbã, ito ibara karabara, iba ɔbe iɖo ibe inyɔ ipɛmi biara. Isɛ ibo i ɔturi ame dzoroo iɣɛ sosina gu siwarã ndɛ̃, iɣɛ akui kusakɔ̃ gu akui ame iɖa ndɛ̃. Isɛ ifafarɛ ɔturi adzuni gu ɔ̃ ɔtu ame ara wa ɔto ɔbu ame pelepele.
58004013	Ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara ne, kuiwɛ̃ iiwɛrɛ wũ. Ira biara se pefee i ɔ̃ katɔ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i bo ɔɖuɖu aatã akɔnta.
58004014	Gɔ boba sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele siare gɔ lokɛlɛ kato i Ɣaa iyotɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi Yesu ɔso ne, mitã bomɔɛ̃ bo kafɔkaɖe ga itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ bola teteree.
58004015	Alasɔ ɔ̃iɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ i bo ara iibaɖo kayiri. Ɣɛɛ ne, ngɔ mala manyɔ i ɔri biara iso lɛ bo ame ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃ ɔɖe boba.
58004016	Ne ɔso mitã bosu katetere bobore bobo Ɣaa i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso ngbegɔ ɔ̃anyɔ bo nnya fiɛ boana abualɛra sɔ inyaa iyi ne, Ɣaa aanyɔ bo nnya.
58005001	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa biara kɛkɛ ne, ɔ̃ manyii ndɛ̃ masɛ maɖi wũ mabɔrɛgu sɔ ɔsɔrɛ Ɣaa i ma kanya, ana ne, ɔsɛ ɔsu ma karatã gu ara fɛ̃a ɔtã Ɣaa i ma akpi iti.
58005002	Gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ba aɣɛrɛ i siri agbãagbã iso ɔso ne, ɔsɛ ɔna ɔtu ɔtã mma loiɣe nnɛ maabara gu mma nto mayu ɔri.
58005003	Fiɛ gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ba akpi ɔso ne, iiɖe maturi iti ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔsɛ ɔfɛ̃ ara, ɣɛɛ ku ɔ̃ mɔmɔ akpi iti.
58005004	Kuwɛ̃ iisɛ ɔɖi so, ɔkɔlɛ so ɔkpesera sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele. Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nsɛ ɔɖi ɔturi lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔɖi Aaron.
58005005	Ngbɔ ame i Kristo iikɔlɛ so kato ɔkpesera so sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ne. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Fɔ nɖe wũ Ɔbi. Nɔme ne, loɔkpese fɔ Ɔse.”
58005006	Ɔɣɛ ana i kakɔi mama sɔ, “Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa lɛ Melkisedek awe.”
58005007	Ɔwi gɔ i Yesu ɔwe i karɔ̃ iso ngbe ne, ɔkparama kayi ɔkarɛ ara ku kulu gu sikpabo teteree gu nnɔmɛ ɔtã Ɣaa gɔ loawo wũ ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i kukpi ame. Gɔ ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔsu so ɔtã ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔnɔ wũ.
58005008	Atoa sɔ Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe ne, iki i ɔ̃ inyɛwe ame ne, ɔsuã sɔ ɔ̃akã Ɣaa atsue.
58005009	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɔbara wũ ɔkote i ɔri biara iso ɔro ne, ɔba ɔ̃akpese ngɔ iso i mma nto makã Ɣaa atsue aaki maana iɖi.
58005010	Fiɛ Ɣaa ɔɔsia ita ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele lɛ Melkisedek awe.
58005011	Atɔ̃me gbodzoo pia tee boaɣere mi i ara wagbe iso, ɣɛɛ wã iɣɛ ba ɔle alasɔ miito minɔ ara karɔ̃ malamala.
58005012	Gbaã ne, ikote sɔ tee ka miakpese maratedze, ɣɛɛ ne, mikpese miɣiã ɔturi mama gɔ loate mi ara ɖeakatɔ̃ i Ɣaa ara ame. Gɔ tee ka miaɖe aɖera wa mba ɔle ne, mikpese mitogu inyɛ imɛmɛ.
58005013	Ɔbiara gɔ lokpese ɔto ɔmeme inyɛ ne, ɔbiɛtɛ gɔ nna iwola i isɛɛ gu ikpi ndɛ̃ ɔɖe.
58005014	Aɖera wa mba ɔle ne, makpakpa aɖera aɖe, mma iki i ma ara isuã ɔso ne, ka maba iwola i isɛɛ gu ikpi ndɛ̃.
58006001	Ne ɔso mitã bokɛlɛ katɔ̃ si bonyua sibiɛtɛ ɔwi ara wa bosuã i Kristo ame bosɛ. Mitã sɔ boabɔrɛ i karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ara ite i kumɛgɔ boafiniki i ara wa nna kusia kama gu kumɛgɔ boafɔ Ɣaa boɖe iso.
58006002	Mitã bonyua karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ara ite i Ɣaa itupie gu nrɔɔ̃ isia maturi iso gu makpise ita gu kawirikɔ̃ atɔ̃me iɣɛgu iso.
58006003	Ne ɔso mitã bokɛlɛ katɔ̃, fiɛ si Ɣaa ɔtɔrã ne ngbɔ boabara ne.
58006004	Mma loɔwe i kafɔkaɖe ame manya fiɛ makpese kama ne, nda maabara fiɛ maakpese mafiniki? Maɔti Ɣaa karatã manyɔ fiɛ Siwarã Bielea ana ɔɔwe i ma ame sinya.
58006005	Iki i ma ara inya ame ne, maɣe sɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me lɛ, fiɛ maɔti kayi ga nto kaba ɔle manyɔ,
58006006	si makpese i ma kafɔkaɖe kama ne, maisibawo ɔfiniki ɔsiai Ɣaa alasɔ mato maledza Ɣaa Ɔbi ipɛ imatãra i kudziri iso, mapia wũ kunuarɛ i maturi ndɛ̃.
58006007	Si kado ɔpɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ fiɛ kanɛ ndu, katã aɖera ɔlɛ atã mma ɔso makpɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã karɔ̃ gamɔ kusɛkusɛ.
58006008	Ɣɛɛ si karɔ̃ gamɔ ne miyu gu atongbã lore i kã iso ne, kana kusia kukuwɛ̃. Kabore kabo sigbarĩ fiɛ katsɔrakɔ̃ ne, mato maapia kã ɔtɔ.
58006009	Manyii, atoa sɔ boɖe ika kumɛgɔgbe ne, mi ɣɛɛ ne, bofɔ mi boɖe sɔ miɣe ara sɛɛ iki i kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa aafɔ mi iso.
58006010	Alasɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔɖe gɔ ɔ̃ibaɣara mi karabara sɛɛ, mi kuɖɔɛ gɔ miɖi mite wũ gu ibuai nɛ mitã mafɔɖedze fiɛ mitogu itã ipɛ i kiniɔ.
58006011	Ɣɛɛ boto bobie teteree sɔ mi ɔbiara aapia kubɛ ngbɔ mila miɔnyɔ ɔri ku ɔtu ɔɖuɖu isɛ iabo kawirikɔ̃.
58006012	Ne ɔso midaaɖe madãdze, ɣɛɛ boto bobie sɔ miasore mma losu kafɔkaɖe gu iɣaraso mifɔ kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
58006013	Ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã Abraham ne, ɔtarĩgu so alasɔ kuwɛ̃ na gɔ lomɔ ɔɖo wũ fiɛ ɔ̃atarĩgu.
58006014	Ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Gbaã ne, loatã-ɔ kusɛkusɛ, lotã fɔ mawa ɔsi gbodzoo.”
58006015	Ne ɔso gɔ Abraham ɔɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla ne, nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔpɛgu wũ kɔrɔ̃.
58006016	Maturi sɛ matarĩgu ara wa lomɔ aɖo ma mɔmɔ si mato mabie sɔ masia ita i nnɛ mato maɣɛ iso sɔ gbaã iɖe ne kakpadzɛ̃ kukawɛ̃ na iso.
58006017	Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔtarĩgu ira ɔsu ɔsia ita i nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃abara iso ne. Alasɔ ɔbie sɔ ikpa mma loafɔ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ sɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iisɛ ifiniki.
58006018	Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔbara ara ka anyɔ wa loibafiniki, wã nɖe kaɣɛkasɛ gu ndamu mɛ ɔkã fiɛ wã aka wã anyɔ wagbe iibawo sila ɔɖe. Nwagbe ɔso i bo mma lotere botarĩgu wũ na ifɔ̃ ɖuɖuuɖu ne, alasɔ boto bonyɔ ara wa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ ɔri.
58006019	Ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe lomɔɛ̃ bo ngbã ito lɛ kumɛgɔ i siɖu sɛ simɔɛ̃ kudziri sila i karɔ̃ ame. Isɛ ikɔ bo ikigu i ɔkati gɔ masa i isɔrɛyo ame ikɛlɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ kasekelekɔ̃ ga mpia i kame ame.
58006020	Mmɔ i Yesu ɔbo i bo kanya lɛ ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ne. Fiɛ ɔ̃ loba ɔ̃akpese sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele lɛ Melkisedek gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ ne.
58007001	Melkisedek gɔgbe loɖe Salem igara gu Ɣaa gɔ i Kuɖokpo Sɔrɛdze ne. Ɔsarɛgu Abraham ku ɔwi gɔ i Abraham ɔse i kakpã ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɖoe magara fiɛ ɔtã wũ kusɛkusɛ.
58007002	Mmɔ i Abraham ɔsu ira biara nɛ ɔna ika weova ɔtã wũ. Iɖeakatɔ̃ ne, Melkisedek karɔ̃ nɖe igara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso. Inyɔare ne, Salem Igara karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ Isobuɛ Igara.
