58007003	Maiɖe ika i ɔ̃ ɔse ɣee ɔ̃ ɔnyi iso fiɛ maiɣɛ kuira ana i ɔ̃ ɔɣekparɛ iso. Maiɣɛ kuira i ɔwi gɔ maɣe wũ ɣee ɔwi gɔ ɔkpi iso. Nnɛgbe ɔso ɔre Ɣaa Ɔbi fiɛ ɔɖe Sɔrɛdze gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ ne.
58007004	Minyɔ kumɛgɔ i Melkisedek gɔgbe ɖe ɔturi nyaa! Abraham gɔ nɖe bo ɔwakpakpa ɔtã wũ ara ɔɖuɖu wa ɔna i kakpã ame ika weova.
58007005	Levi mawa ma nɖe masɔrɛdze ne, mmara ɔtã ma ɔri sɔ mafɔ ara ika weova i ma manyii Israel mabi ɔɖuɖu kɔrɛ atoa sɔ ma wũ ne, Abraham mawa maɖe.
58007006	Ɣɛɛ Melkisedek gɔ loibɔrɛ i Levi ɔɣekparɛ ame ne, ɔfɔ ara ika weova i Abraham kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔtã ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã kaɣɛkasɛ kusɛkusɛ.
58007007	Kakpadzɛ̃ kukawɛ̃ na sɔ ngɔ lokɔlɛ ɔɖo nsɛ ɔtã ngɔ mpia wũ i kayirinɔ kusɛkusɛ.
58007008	I masɔrɛdze kasɛ ne, ɔturi awune gɔ nsɛ ɔkpi nsɛ ɔfɔ ara ika weova, ɣɛɛ i Melkisedek kasɛ ne, ɔturi gɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia ngbã ɔɖe lofɔ ara ika weova.
58007009	Ne ɔso boawo ɔɣɛ sɔ gɔ Abraham ɔtã Melkisedek ara ika weova ne, ta Levi mawa ma nsɛ mafɔ ara ika weova ma wũ matã.
58007010	Alasɔ maiɣe Levi ku ɔwi gɔmɔ ame, ɣɛɛ kuɣɛme ne, ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔwa ima ame.
58007011	Levi mabi sɔrɛdze iɖe ame i mmara ɔki miba mitã Israel kaɖe. Ne ɔso si kuira iinina i Levi mabi masɔrɛdze iɖe nɛgbe iso ne, be ɔso inya sɔ sɔrɛdze mama gɔ nse lɛ Melkisedek awe aaba i Aaron mawa kanya?
58007012	Alasɔ si mafinikira masɔrɛdze ne, iyɔ ikate sɔ maafinikira mmara.
58007013	Bosate gɔ iso maɣɛ ara wagbe ne, kalɛ mama ame iɖe ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibɔrɛ i kalɛ gamɔ ame ɔɖe sɔrɛdze ɔnya.
58007014	Boɣe kukaakɔ sɔ Yuda kalɛ ame maɣe wũ mapia, fiɛ Mose iiɣɛ kuira i kalɛ gagbe masɔrɛdze iɖe iso.
58007015	Itɔ̃me ame ɔɔkpa ibua gɔ sɔrɛdze mama gɔ nse lɛ Melkisedek ɔɔba.
58007016	Iiɖe ɔ̃ ɔɣekparɛ ɣee mmara iso manyɔ fiɛ mabara wũ sɔrɛdze, ɣɛɛ iki i ɔle gɔ mpia i ngbã mɛ loisɛ miro ame.
58007017	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa lɛ Melkisedek awe.”
58007018	Makpa mmara kuere masɛ i kuruɛ alasɔ mina ɔle gu kusia kukuwɛ̃,
58007019	fiɛ miibara kuira iyi. Kiniɔ ne, boto bonyɔ ira nɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔri, nnɛ loaboregu bo ibo Ɣaa.
58007020	Ana ne, ndamu ɔbua i sɔrɛdze ɣɛtɛ gɔgbe iso. Kokowi ne, Ɣaa iikã ndamu i masɔrɛdze kuere iso.
58007021	Ɣɛɛ Yesu ɔkpese sɔrɛdze gɔ Ɣaa ɔkã ndamu ɔtã wũ sɔ, “Bosate ɔkã ndamu teteree fiɛ ɔ̃ibafinikira me sɔ, ‘Aaɖe sɔrɛdze ɔwi ɖaa.’ ”
58007022	Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ Yesu ɔkpese ayaikama ɔtã ndamu mɛ nlɛ miɖo kokooko.
58007023	Masɔrɛdze kuere ɔsi gbodzoo alasɔ masɛ makpi maɣɛ karabara.
58007024	Ɣɛɛ gɔ Yesu iibakpi ɔnya ɔso ne, ɔ̃aɖe sɔrɛdze ɖaa.
58007025	Ɔsɛ ɔwo mma loki i ɔ̃ iso maba Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔfɔ pelepele alasɔ ɔsi ngbã ɔwi biara fiɛ ɔto ɔtã Ɣaa iti ɔtã ma.
58007026	Ne ɔso Yesu nɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ igbã lonya bo. Ɔsekele fiɛ ɔna ikpi kuiwɛ̃, ɔna iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃, matɛ wũ mabɔrɛgu i makpibaradze ame, fiɛ makɔlɛ wũ kato maɖo kuɖokpo.
58007027	Ɔ̃ise lɛ ma sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele tsɔra alasɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔfɛ̃ ara i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ akpi iti iyi biara tɔtɔ fiɛ ɔ̃afɛ̃ ara i maturi tsɔra akpi iti. Nnɛgbe ɔbara ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya gɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ.
58007028	Mose mmara sɛ mibara ɔturi awune gɔ mba aɣɛrɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ndamu mɛ ɔkã i Mose mmara kama ɔbara Ɣaa Ɔbi sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔ loibakpi ɔnya fiɛ mibara wũ ɔyi pɛpɛɛpɛ.
58008001	Itɔ̃me nɛ boto boɣɛ ɔdziri kere nɖe sɔ, boba Sɔrɛdzekpakpa gɔgbe. Ɔsi i Ɔlesate sigaraiyara kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato.
58008002	Sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele gɔgbe sɛ ɔbara ɔ̃ kasumu karabara i kasekelekɔ̃ ga nɖe sikati ikpayo mɔmɔ ame. Bosate mɔmɔ lopɛ ikpayo nɛgbe ne iiɖe maturi.
58008003	Masɛ masɛra sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele biara sɔ ɔ̃asu karatã gu ara fɛ̃a, ɔtã Ɣaa. Ne ɔso ikote sɔ sɔrɛdze gɔgbe ana ne, ɔ̃awe nnɛ ɔ̃asu ɔtã Ɣaa.
58008004	Si karɔ̃ iso ngbe iɖe ɔpia ne, ɔ̃ibana ɔri ɔbara sɔrɛdze karabara, alasɔ masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ masu karatã mabɔ i mmara kanya pia koko.
58008005	Masɔrɛdze karabara ga masɛ mabara ne, kare nga mpia i kato i ɔri ɔwɛ̃ iso fiɛ iɖe ira nɛ mato masore. Alasɔ gɔ Mose to ɔba ɔ̃apɛ sikati ikpayo ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Nyɔ sɔ aabara ira biara i kumɛgɔ maɖi mate-ɔ i kube iso pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
58008006	Ɣɛɛ masɔrɛdze karabara ga i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔpia Yesu nrɔɔ̃ ame lɛ kaɖo kakuere kokooko lɛ kumɛgɔ ame i ndamu ɣɛtɛ mɛ ɔkã i Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ maturi ndɛ̃ lɛ miɖo mikuere alasɔ matsue kã masia i kaɣɛkasɛ ga nlɛ kaɖo iso.
58008007	Si kuira iinina i ndamu ɖeakatɔ̃ iso ne, tee iisibanya sɔ maakã minyɔare.
58008008	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔnya iɣɛrɛ i ɔ̃ maturi iso gɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate sɔ, ɔwi to ɔba gɔ loanyi kanya ɣɛtɛ ku Israel kaɖe gu Yuda kaɖe.
58008009	Fiɛ kaibase lɛ kanya inyi ɖeakatɔ̃ ga lonyigu ma mawa ku ɔwi gɔ lomɔɛ̃ ma i kɔrɔ̃ lokɔ ma lobɔrɛgu i Egipte karɔ̃ iso. Gɔ maibara i kanya ga lonyigu ma iso ɔso ne, mme wũ loikpa ma.
58008010	Bosate ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ kanya ɣɛtɛ ga loanyigu Israel kaɖe i ngbe ne, ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, Loasu wũ mmara lopia i ma adzuni ame fiɛ loatsɛrɛ me losia i ma situ iso. loaɖe ma Ɣaa fiɛ ma wũ maaɖe wũ maturi.
58008011	Kuwɛ̃ iisibate ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɣee ɔte ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi sɔ ɔtsue Ɣaa. Alasɔ ma ɔɖuɖu to maatsue me ita i ɔbiɛtɛ kosoi tsɔra isɛ iabo makpakpa pelepele iso.
58008012	Loanyɔ ma nnya losu ma akpi lotsɛ ma fiɛ loisibanyigi wã lonya.”
58008013	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe ika i kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ iso ne, ite sɔ kaɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔkpese kakuere, fiɛ ira biara nɛ nsɛ ikuere ne, isɛ inina iwɔ pelepele.
58009001	Ndamu kuere ɔwi ne, Ɣaa isɔrɛ mmara ɔwe, fiɛ kasɔrɛkɔ̃ ana ɔwe.
58009002	Mapɛ sikati ikpayo fiɛ maɣɛ ne ame aka anyɔ ala ɔkati. Masɛ makpere kaɖeakatɔkɔ̃ sɔ Kasekelekɔ̃. Ngbe masɛ sikaniɛdziri gu ɔpɔrɔ̃ gu isɔrɛ aɖera ne.
58009003	I ɔkati gɔ loɣɛ ikpayo kama ne, iyo nɛ mpia i kame masɛ marɔ sɔ Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃.
58009004	Mmɔ i sikãrɛtɛa isɔrɛkasege ga iso masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gu Ndamu aɖaka wa mafere sikãrɛtɛa iso se ne. Sikãrɛtɛa irɔi nɛ ame i Ɣaa aɖera wa marɔ sɔ mana pia i aɖaka wagbe ame. Ana ne, Aaron ɔsɛdziri gɔ lofere aɣɔ̃la gu ata wa iso matsɛrɛ Ɣaa mmara masia pia i aɖaka wagbe ame.
58009005	Aɖaka wagbe itititɛ̃ ne, mabara ma Kerubi ma nto maɖi Ɣaa ikpawaĩ mate masia. Mawarɛ ma abue mafu ngbegɔ i maturi sɛ mana nnyainyɔ. Iiɖe ɔwi gɔgbe ame boafafarɛ ara wamɔ ame pelepele.
58009006	Kumɛgɔgbe masɛ ara wagbe i mmɔ ne. Masɔrɛdze sɛ mabo i ikpayo nɛ i katɔ̃ ame maabara ma isɔrɛ karabara iyi biara.
58009007	Ɣɛɛ iyo nɛ i kame ame ne, sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele ɔnɔwɛ̃ pɛ nsɛ ɔbo i mmɔ fiɛ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔsɛ ɔbo mmɔ i ikɔ ame. Si ɔ̃abo i mmɔ ne, inya sɔ ɔ̃asu ima ɔla, nnɛ ɔ̃asu ɔsɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔ̃ gu maturi mama ma lobara aɣɛrɛ i idaatsue ame iti.
58009008	Siwarã Bielea ɔte sekelee sikigu i ara wagbe ame sɔ ayi kumɛgɔ i sikati ikpayo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔnya iɣɛ ne, ɔri iibusi sɔ kuwɛ̃ aabo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃.
58009009	Nnɛgbe nto ite ara i kiniɔ ɔwi gɔgbe iso ne. Atoa sɔ masɛ matã karatã gagbe, masɔrɛ Ɣaa i ɔri gɔgbe iso ne, maisɛ mawo maturi situ ɔbara sɔ siase bɔlɔlɔ.
58009010	Alasɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu ne, ɔɖe gu ɔne gu kubarara agbãagbã wa loasekelera siturina iso kere aɖe. Masɛ kubarara gɔgbe ɔɖuɖu matã maturi awune gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ maaba maaledza ira biara aaɣo.
58009011	Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔɔba lɛ sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele awe ɔtã ara sɛɛ wa loɔba. Ɔɖe sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele i ikpayo nɛ lofɔ kuɣa fiɛ ikote iɖo iɖeakatɔ̃ ame. Ikpayo nɛgbe ne, iiɖe ɔturi lopɛ, gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ iiɖe karɔ̃ iso ngbe ire iɖe.
58009012	Kristo ɔbo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya. Iiɖe kutepuĩ ɣee manantsuĩ ima iɖe ɔsu ɔkɛlɛgu, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ire iɖe! Ne ɔso ɔtã sɔ Ɣaa aafɔ bo ɔwi ɔɖuɖu.
58009013	Si kutepuĩ gu manantsuĩ ima gu inantsuĩbi nɛ matsuedza ndɔ̃ masɛ masu mawɛwɛ̃ i makpibaradze iso masekelera ma fiɛ ma iso aakpa ne,
58009014	iyɔ Kristo gɔ loki i Ɣaa Siwarã iso ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔtã Ɣaa fiɛ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ na iso ɣɛɛ? Nda iabara fiɛ ɔ̃ ima iibawo bo kaɣere ɔfore ɔɖi i kurabara gɔ nna kusia kukuwɛ̃ ame sɔ boawo Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔsumu ɔbua?
58009015	Nwagbe ɔso ne, Kristo nɖe ngɔ losu kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ ɔfere bo gu Ɣaa kanya ndu sɔ mma i Ɣaa ɔkpere aafɔ kusɛkusɛ gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ fiɛ kuna katui. Nnɛgbe ɔba ngbɔ alasɔ ɔturi lokpi fiɛ ɔki i ɔ̃ kukpi ame ɔɖi aɣɛrɛ wa lowe i kanya inyi kuere ame.
58009016	Si ɔturi iikpi ne, maisɛ mabara ɔ̃ ɔko gɔ ɔbara ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ karana iɣɛ karabara.
58009017	Ayi kumɛgɔ i ngɔ lobara ɔko ɔtã ɔ̃ ara iɣɛ si ngbã ne, maibawo ɔko gɔmɔ karabara ɔbara.
58009018	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ ima iɖe masu masia kanya inyi kuere kɔra ita ne.
58009019	Gɔ Mose ɔɔpɛ mmara ɔɖuɖu imomo ɔtã maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔro ne, ɔsu manantsuĩ ima gu kutepuĩ nɛ masakanya ku ndu gu sɛrɛ siwɛrɛ̃ rɛtɛa gu iɣatati iwɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ima ɔfere i mmara ɔko gu maturi ɔɖuɖu iso.
58009020	Ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ima nɛgbe losia ita i kanya inyi nɛ i Ɣaa ɔnyi sɔ mibara i kã iso ne.”
58009021	Ngbɔ ame i Mose ɔwɛwɛ̃ ima ɔfere i ikpayo sekelea gu ne ame ara ɔɖuɖu wa masɛ masu masɔrɛ Ɣaa iso ne.
58009022	I ɔnukuare ame i mmara kanya ne, ima masɛ masu masekelera ala ira biara fiɛ akpi isu itsɛ iisɛ iba si ima iifere i karɔ̃.
58009023	Ne ɔso masɛ mabara kubarara gɔgbe masu masekelera ara wa lore kato are. Ɣɛɛ kato kasumu ara ne, ara wa nlɛ aɖo masɛ masu masekelera wã.
58009024	Alasɔ Kristo Kasekelekɔ̃ ga ɔbo ne, iiɖe nga masu nrɔɔ̃ matsue ala fiɛ kare kato kare kaɖe. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔkɛlɛ Ɣaa iyotɛ̃ ngbegɔ ɔsi i Ɣaa anɔ i bo kanya.
58009025	Ma Yudase sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele sɛ ɔkɛlɛ iyo nɛ losekele iɖo ame ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ i ikɔ biara ame ku mabɔi ima. Ɣɛɛ Kristo iisɛ ɔ̃asu so ɔsɔrɛ ikpɛ gbodzoo.
58009026	Si ise ngbɔ ne, iyɔ inya sɔ Kristo aasu so ɔsɔrɛ ikpɛ gbodzoo ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɖi wũ ɔte ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã ku kayi kawirikɔ̃ gagbe sɔ iaki i ɔ̃ isu so isɔrɛ ame ne, ɔ̃aɖi ikpi biara.
58009027	Ipia sɔ ɔbiara aakpi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã, ne kama ne, Ɣaa aaɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me.
58009028	Ne ɔso Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ne, ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã sɔ ɔ̃aɖi maturi gbodzoo. Ɔto ɔ̃aledza ikpese iba, iisiɖe akpi isu itsɛ ɔso, ɣɛɛ ɔba ɔ̃aɖi mma nsi masia wũ.
58010001	Ma Yudase mmara ne, ara wa nto aba i katɔ̃ kere ɔkala miɖe. Iiɖe ara sɛɛ wa nto aba mɔmɔ miɖe alasɔ miibawo ɔturi ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i ikpi ame iki i ara wa masɛ mafɛ̃ ikɔ biara ame.
58010002	Si gbaã ne mma nto masumu Ɣaa to mana isekele ibɔrɛ i ma akpi ame ne, tee ma kaɣere iiba kɛlɛ i katɔ̃ kala kaɔɖaa ma, iyɔ tee ara ifɛ̃ itã Ɣaa ana ka iatui.
58010003	Ɣɛɛ ikɔ biara ara wa masɛ mafɛ̃ sɛ anyigira maturi ma akpi.
58010004	Alasɔ manantsuĩ gu kutepuĩ ima iibawo akpi ɔfore ɔɖi ma iso.
58010005	Ne ɔso fiɛ si Kristo aaba kayi gagbe iso ne, ɔɣere Ɣaa sɔ, “Iiɖe ara fɛ̃a gu karatã nsɛ katã-ɔ isoɣɔ. Ɣɛɛ siturina aledza asɛ me.
58010006	Ara wa maafɛ̃ matã-ɔ gu karatã ga i maturi sɛ mabara itã ma akpi kasukatsɛ iisɛ ipia-ɔ isoɣɔ.
58010007	Mmɔ loɣɛ sɔ, ‘Nya me, loɔba lobara fɔ kuɖɔɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ masɛ i wũ iso i Ɔko Sekelea ame.’ ”
58010008	Ɔɖe katɔ̃ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Karatã ga masu mabɔ-ɔ gu ara wa mafɛ̃ matã-ɔ i akpi isu itsɛ iti iisɛ apia-ɔ isoɣɔ.” Ɔɣɛ ngbɔ atoa sɔ ara ifɛ̃ nɛgbe ɔɖuɖu ne, masɛ mabara wã i mmara kanya.
58010009	Fiɛ ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Nya me, loɔba lobara fɔ kuɖɔɛ.” Iki ne iso ne, Ɣaa ɔkpa ara ifɛ̃ kubarara ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔsɛ i kuruɛ fiɛ ɔsu Kristo ɔkpɛ ɔsɛ i ne kanya ne.
58010010	Gɔ Yesu Kristo ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔbie sɔ ɔbara ɔso ne, ɔsekelera bo ɔɖi i bo akpi ame ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya.
58010011	Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze sɛ mabara ma isɔrɛ kubarara kuwɛ̃ saã gɔmɔ iyi biara, ɣɛɛ ma ara ifɛ̃ iisɛ iwo akpi ɔɖi ɔbɔrɛgu i maturi iso.
58010012	Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔba ɔ̃abara kaɣɔra ga loyi i akpi iti itã ɔwi biara, gɔ ɔro ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
58010013	Fiɛ ita i ɔwi gɔmɔ ne, ɔsi ɔsia ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa aasu ɔ̃ matsirise ɔpia i ɔ̃ ngba kayirinɔ.
58010014	Alasɔ iki i ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃ɔbara mma akpi maɔsu matsɛ sɔ mayi ɔwi ɔɖuɖu.
58010015	Siwarã Bielea ana ɔɣere bo sɔ Bosate ɔɣɛ sɔ,
58010016	“Kanya ɣɛtɛ ga i mme Ɣaa loanyigu ma i ɔwi gɔ loaba ame ne, loasu wũ mmara lopia i ma situ ame. Fiɛ loatsɛrɛ losia i ma adzuni ame.”
58010017	Fiɛ ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Loisibanyigi ma akpi gu ma aɣɛrɛ.”
58010018	Si Ɣaa ɔɔsu ara wagbe ɔtsɛ ne, iisinya sɔ maabara akpi kasukatsɛ kubarara.
58010019	Ne ɔso ne, wũ manyii, ka boba ɔri sɔ boabo i Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ iki i Kristo ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ ame.
58010020	Ala ɔsu ɔ̃ siturina dzɛ nɖe lɛ ɔkati gɔ loɣɛ ikpayo ame ɔɖi ngbã ɔri ɣɛtɛ ɔtã bo.
58010021	Ne ɔso gɔ boba sɔrɛdzekpakpa pelepele siare i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ɔso ne,
58010022	mitã bobore bobo Ɣaa ku ɔtu gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ ɔnukuare, kafɔkaɖe ga nɣɛ i ngba iso teteree gu ɔtu gɔ kaɣere nyanyarĩa maɔfore gu sosina dzɛ mapie ndu sekelee.
58010023	Mitã boya teteree i bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ itɔ̃me boto boɣɛ ame, alasɔ ngɔ lotã bo kaɣɛkasɛ ne, ɔnukuarese ɔɖe.
58010024	Mitã bo malaa ara si aɖo bo kayiri si bopia ma ɔle i kuɖɔɛ ame i ara sɛɛ ibara ame.
58010025	Midaatã bosɛ̃ bo kasarɛkɔ̃ isɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i mawɛ̃ sɛ mabara. Ɣɛɛ mitã bopia so katetere bobua gɔ boɣe sɔ Bosate ɔbawi ɔɔpɛtɛpɛtɛ.
58010026	Alasɔ si ka boɣe ɔnukuare boro fiɛ bokpese boto bobara ikpi ne, ara ifɛ̃ kuiwɛ̃ siina i akpi iti.
58010027	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ loɔkuti nɖe sɔ boawe i ifɔ̃ ame bosia atɔ̃me iɣɛgu gu itɔkpe siare nɛ loatsuedza mma lota maɣɛ Ɣaa iso.
58010028	Ɔbiara gɔ lota ɔya Mose mmara iso ne, maisɛ manyɔ wũ nnya, masɛ maɖoe wũ si maɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me fiɛ maturi inyɔ ɣee itɛ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɔ ɔbara ira lalaa.
58010029	Be maabara mma lonyɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi pupurii, fiɛ mainyɔ ɔ̃ ima nɛ nɖe Ɣaa kanya inyi nɛ losekelera ma ibɔrɛgu i akpi ame lɛ ira nɛ lofɔ kuɣa? Masɛ masopara nnyainyɔ Siwarã ana. Makote matã kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ siare nɛ lobua imɔ.
58010030	Alasɔ boɣe ngɔ loɣɛ sɔ, “Loakpadzɛ̃ mma lobara ikpi kutsue fiɛ loabara ma loti kuso.” Ɔɣɛ ana sɔ, “Bosate to ɔ̃aɣɛgu ɔ̃ maturi atɔ̃me.”
58010031	Ifɔ̃ra iɖe sɔ ɔturi aabo i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã sikpã ame.
58010032	Midaaɣara inyɛwe gbodzoo nɛ ɔɖuɖu ame miki ku ɔwi gɔ mitsue Ɣaa kere.
58010033	Ɔwi ɔmɔi ne, matia mi i maturi ndɛ̃ fiɛ mimɔrɛ̃ ana. Ɔwi ɔmɔi ana ne, masɛ maka mi mabua i mma mato mabara ɔtile iso.
58010034	Miwe kayiribielea i mayorɛdze iso fiɛ atoa sɔ mafɔ mi mi karana iso ne, minyua mitã ma miikpɛ̃gu ma. Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ ɣe sɔ karana ga nlɛ kaɖo ngamɔ fiɛ kaibanina se katã mi.
58010035	Ne ɔso midaatã nrɔɔ̃ si mifɛ̃ mi gɔ miɣe sɔ kuso siare se kusia mi.
58010036	Ikote sɔ miana ɔtu sɔ miawo Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ɔbara fiɛ miafɔ nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ.
58010037	Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ikuti kɛkɛĩ fiɛ ngɔ loaba aaba, ɔ̃isibanina ɔwi.
58010038	Ngɔ nse bɔlɔlɔ to ɔ̃asɛ i kafɔkaɖe ame. Ɣɛɛ si ɔkpese kama ne, So iibaɣɔ me i ɔ̃ iso.”
58010039	Bo ɣɛɛ ne, bona i mma nsɛ makpese kama fiɛ masɛ mawɔ ndɛ̃, ɣɛɛ mma lofɔ maɖe fiɛ masi ngbã ndɛ̃ bopia.
58011001	Kafɔkaɖe nɖe anɔ isu isia i ira nɛ ato anyɔ ɔri iso teteree, fiɛ aasu fɔ ɔtu asia i ira nɛ aito anya, ɣɛɛ aɣe sɔ ipia iso.
58011002	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i makuere ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ.
58011003	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame bofɔ boɖe sɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔ̃ itɔ̃me iɖe ɔsu ɔbara kayi. Ne ɔso ɔsu nnɛ boisɛ bonya ala anɔ ɔbara nnɛ bosɛ bonya.
58011004	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Abel ɔfɛ̃ ara sɛɛ wa lobo Ɣaa anɔ aɖo Kain are. Iki i ne iso ne, Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa. I kafɔkaɖe ame ne, atoa sɔ Abel ɔɔkpi ne, ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe togu bo ika iɖe iki i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame.
58011005	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Ɣaa ɔsu Enok nyɔa ɔkɛlɛgu kato sɔ ɔ̃ikpi. Maisinya wũ ala Ɣaa ɔsu wũ ɔruigu. Si ɔ̃akɛlɛ kato ne, maɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso sɔ ɔbo Ɣaa anɔ.
58011006	Si ɔturi na kafɔkaɖe ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa anɔ ɔbo alasɔ si aaba Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ikote sɔ aafɔ aɖe sɔ ɔpia, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔnyɔ wũ dzinitii sɛ ɔnya wũ.
58011007	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Noa ɔkã Ɣaa atsue gɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ nnɛ i ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iinya ɔnya to iaba. Ɔwe aɖaka ɔkolo gɔ ame i ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ iyo maturi ɔna iɖi. Iki i nnɛgbe ame ne, ɔtã kayiiso maturi ipɔ fiɛ ɔfɔ kaɖekɔ̃ ga nse katã maturi sekelea ma lofɔ maɖe.
58011008	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Abraham ɔkã atsue gɔ Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ karɔ̃ ga ɔ̃atã wũ lɛ ɔ̃ kaɖekɔ̃ iso. Ɔkã Ɣaa atsue atoa sɔ ɔ̃iɣe ngbegɔ sɔ ɔkɛlɛ.
58011009	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔwe i karɔ̃ ga i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔtã wũ iso lɛ ɔfɔ awe. Ɔsɛ i akpayo ame lɛ Isak gu Yakob ɔsɛ i akpayo ame atoa sɔ karɔ̃ ga iso masi ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔtã ma.
58011010	Abraham ɔbara ngbɔ alasɔ ɔto ɔnyɔ ɔri ɔtã ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ i Ɣaa mɔmɔ loɖaɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ kubereku gɔ mapia i karɔ̃ ame ba ɔle.
58011011	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, atoa sɔ Sara ɔɔbe ɔfe ɔbi iɣe ne, ɔna ɔle ɔla kayiri alasɔ ɔfɔ Ɣaa gɔ lokã ndamu ɔtã wũ sɔ ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara i nnɛ ɔɣɛ iso.
58011012	Ne ɔso iki i Abraham ɔnɔwɛ̃ gɔ loɔbe iso ne, ɔɣekparɛ gɔ losi ɔgɔdɛ̃. Masi lɛ awami i kuɖokpo ɣee ɔpo ame iwarĩ nɛ maibawo ɔka.
58011013	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i magbe ɔɖuɖu ɔsɛ ngbã gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ makpi, maifɔ ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã ma. Manya wã dzoroo fiɛ matofora wã. Matɔrã masia sɔ mafɔ gu marisɛdze maɖe i kayi gagbe ame.
58011014	Fiɛ maturi ma nto maɣɛ ara wagbe ne, maɔte sekelee sɔ ma mɔmɔ karɔ̃ mato mabie.
58011015	Si karɔ̃ ga iso i Ɣaa ɔkpere ma ɔruigu mato mabie ne, tee maba ɔri sɔ maakpese makɛlɛ mmɔ.
58011016	Ɣɛɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ne, mato mabie ma mɔmɔ aɖe karɔ̃ ga nlɛ kaɖo nga iso mase. Karɔ̃ ga mato mabie nɖe Kato. Ne ɔso iisɛ ikpɛ̃ Ɣaa kunuarɛ sɔ ɔ̃ɔɖe mmagbe Ɣaa, alasɔ ɔto ɔledza ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ nlɛ ɔɖo ɔsɛ ma.
58011017	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, Abraham ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔbi Isak ɔtã gɔ Ɣaa ɔla wũ ɔnyɔ. Atoa sɔ ɔbi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã wũ ɔɖe ne, ɔtɔrã sɔ ɔ̃asu ɔ̃ ɔbi birɛrɛĩ ɔwɛ̃ saã ɔfɛ̃ ara ɔtã Ɣaa.
58011018	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔɔɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame ɔɖegu katɔ̃ i Isak iso sɔ, “Isak mabi ame maaka-ɔ mawa.”
58011019	Abraham ɔfɔ ɔɖe sɔ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awo Isak ɔtara ɔɖi i makpise kɔra ame, fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔfɔ wũ lɛ ngɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame.
58011020	Iki kafɔkaɖe ame i Isak ɔtã Yakob gu Esau kusɛkusɛ i nnɛ maaba maakpese iso.
58011021	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, gɔ Yakob ɔɔro ɔkpi ne, ɔtã Yosef mabi birɛrɛĩ kusɛkusɛ. Ɔpiɛtɛ i ɔ̃ ɔsɛdziri iso ɔbɔ iti karɔ̃ ɔle Ɣaa.
58011022	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, gɔ Yosef ɔkpiwi ɔɔɣo ne, ɔɖe ika ɔɣere Israel mabi i ma irui i Egipte iso fiɛ ɔɣere ma kumɛgɔ maabiara wũ ana.
58011023	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Mose maɣese ɔkɔla wũ awa atɛ i kuɖokpo ku ɔwi gɔ maɣe wũ. Manya sɔ ɔbi ɔre situri fiɛ mainigã Egipte igarakpakpa mmara mɛ ɔtã.
58011024	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame gɔ Mose ɔmɔ ne, ɔsɛ̃ sɔ madaarɔ wũ sɔ Egipte igarakpakpa ɔbirɔ̃gomi ɔbi.
58011025	Ɔtɔrã sɔ ɔ̃awe inyɛ ku Ɣaa maturi ɔɖo sɔ ɔ̃anagu makpibaradze isoɣɔ ɔwi kurukutu.
58011026	Mose ɔnyɔ sɔ kunuarɛ gɔ maapia wũ i Kristo iti ɔfɔ kuɣa kuɖo karana ga mpia i Egipte alasɔ ɔnyɔ kuso gɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃afɔ ɔsese.
58011027	Kafɔkaɖe ame ɔrui i Egipte fiɛ ɔ̃inigã igara sikpã alasɔ ɔfɔ Ɣaa gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnya ɔɖe teteree lɛ ɔnya ɔto wũ awe.
58011028	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Mose ɔsɛ Kukpi Ɔtakuwara Bo Iyi. Ɔtã Israel mabi ɔsu ima manukutu i ma ayo akui iso sɔ Kukpi Kpabo gɔ loawɔra Egipte abiete si ɔdaabara ma ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
58011029	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i Israel mabi ɔsɛ mawara Ɔpo Rɛtɛa lɛ karɔ̃ korea iso masɛ, ɣɛɛ gɔ Egipte maturi ma ntere masiai ma ɔbo i ɔpo ame ne, mawã ndu makpi.
58011030	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i ibere nɛ matsue maki malɔ Yeriko ɔbiɛ gɔ Israel mabi ɔsɛ maki malɔ ne akpɛnɛ akɔdzɛ.
58011031	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ maiɖoe Rahab gɔ nɖe asɔrɔ̃ɖedze ku ɔwi gɔ maɖoe mma loifɔ Ɣaa maɖe alasɔ ɔfɔ marɛrɛ̃ ma losɛ maala karɔ̃ manyɔ kukaakɔ.
58011032	Be loakpese loɣɛ ana? Alasɔ ɔwi na gɔ loaɖe ika i Gideon gu Barak gu Samson gu Yefta gu David gu Samuel gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze iso.
58011033	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame i mmagbe mawɛ̃ ɔkpɛ̃gu sigarakuɖekɔ̃ kuwɛ̃ maɖe ma iso, ma mawɛ̃ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso, mawɛ̃ ɔfɔ ara wa maɣɛ masɛ matã ma, fiɛ mawɛ̃ ana ɔsɛ̃ ma dzata nnya.
58011034	Iki i kafɔkaɖe ame ne, mawɛ̃ ɔnidza itɔkpe nɛ nto itsue ku ɔle, kã ame lotã sɔ maiɖoe mawɛ̃ i kakpã ame ne. Kafɔkaɖe lotã mawɛ̃ ma nse nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ ɔkpese mma mba ɔle fiɛ katã mawɛ̃ ana ɔbara kagbegbe i kakpã ame. Kã ame losamarã makpakpɛ̃dze mama ne.
58011035	Kafɔkaɖe lotã matara marɔ̃go ma manyii lokpi matã ma. Mawɛ̃ ana ɔtɔrã sɔ maawe inyɛ makpi ne maibasɛ̃ Ɣaa, si maata mabɔrɛ i makpise ame masɛ ngbã mɛ nlɛ miɖo mmɛgbe.
58011036	Mabara mawɛ̃ aɣiãra, mapɛ mawɛ̃, mapia mawɛ̃ kugbagɔrɔĩ fiɛ marara ma iyo.
58011037	Mapɛ mawɛ̃ ata, fiɛ makɛ mawɛ̃ ana ala saa. Maɖoe mawɛ̃ ala ipɛmi, mawɛ̃ ɔkpese mawɛrɛba ma lowe i imɔrɛ̃ ame fiɛ mawe i masɛrɛrerɔ̃ gu kutepuĩ siko ame, maturi ɔte ma ɔɣiã.
58011038	Ma sibiele ɔso ne, maina kasɛkɔ̃ i kayiiso maturi ndɛ̃, ne ɔso mawe maki i fafuĩ ame gu abe iso gu sikpolo gu awo ame i karɔ̃ ame.
58011039	Atoa sɔ mmagbe ɔɖuɖu kafɔkaɖe ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɛɛ i ma iso ne, maifɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ i ma iso.
58011040	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔledza ira sɛɛ iwɛ̃ nɛ nlɛ iɖo ɔsɛ bo, ne ɔso si boiba boabua i ma iso ne, ɔ̃ibabara ma mayi pɔpɔɔpɔ.
58012001	Ne ɔso gɔ boba maturi gbodzoo magbe fiɛ maki malɔ bo lɛ idɔdɔ mato mapia bo ɔle ɔso ne, mitã boɖi ɔri itɛ̃ra biara titirio ikpi nɛ nsɛ iɖaa bo iɖo sɔ boawo anɔ ɔkarã ɔtere ise nɛ nse bo i katɔ̃ ku ɔdzini.
58012002	Mitã bo anɔ si asia i Yesu iso ala ɔ̃ losɛ bo kafɔkaɖe ɔri karɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ ame lowiri ne. Ɔya teteree i kunuarɛ kukpi gɔ ɔkpi ame gɔ mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso ala ɔɣe isoɣɔ nɛ nse wũ i katɔ̃ fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka ɔsi i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso.
58012003	Nrɔɔ̃ iibafɛ̃ mi si misu mi adzuni misia i Yesu iso. Ngɔ i atoa sɔ makpibaradze ɔtia ne, iiɖaa wũ.
58012004	Atoa sɔ mito mikpɛ̃gu ikpi kɔra ne, iibo ngbegɔ ianya sɔ miafere mi ima i karɔ̃.
58012005	Miɔɣara katetere ipia itɔ̃me nɛ ame makpere bo sɔ Ɣaa mabi? Ne nɖe sɔ, “Wũ ɔbi, daanyɔ Ɣaa ikpadzɛ̃ pupurii. Fiɛ si ɔnyagalagu-ɔ ne, nrɔɔ̃ si midaafɛfɛ̃-ɔ.
58012006	Alasɔ ngɔ i Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ ne, ɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ i ɔri iso ne. Fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ ɔfɔ lɛ ɔ̃ ɔbi awe ne, ɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ kutsue ne.”
58012007	Si mato makpadzɛ̃ mi ne, mina ɔtu alasɔ Ɣaa ne, ɔkpadzɛ̃ ɔto mi lɛ mabi awe. Bɛrɛ mme ɔbi mpia sɔ ɔ̃ ɔse iisɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ?
58012008	Si makpadzɛ̃ ɔbiara ɣɛɛ mi maikpadzɛ̃ mi ne, ite sɔ ɔmagɛ̃ ame mabi miɖe ne miiɖe mabi mɔmɔ.
58012009	Ne kama ana ne, boba maɣese i kayiiso ma nsɛ mate bo ara, ɣɛɛ bosɛ bowarɛ ma. Iyɔ boibabɔ so karɔ̃ botã ngɔ nɖe bo siwarã ame Ɔse fiɛ boasɛ ngbã?
58012010	Bo mase sɛ makpadzɛ̃ bo ɔwi kurukutu gɔ lokote ma ame. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ bo sɔ si ialɛgu bo fiɛ boase sekelee lɛ ɔ̃.
58012011	Ɔnukuare iɖe sɔ si ato akpadzɛ̃ ɔturi kiniɔ ne, iisɛ iwe wũ ɔmɛrɛ̃, ɣɛɛ isɛ ibo wũ. Ɣɛɛ kama ne, ikpadzɛ̃ nɛgbe sɛ itã sɔ ɔ̃abara ara sɛɛ, ɔsɛ ngbã i isobuɛ ame.
58012012	Ne ɔso mi nrɔɔ̃ mɛ loɔfɛfɛ̃ gu agɛgɛ̃ wa lobara nyɔkɔ̃tɔɔ̃ ne, mipia wã ɔle.
58012013	Mikpɛ̃ siri ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ mitã so si mabafã sinyɛ iibanyagɛ̃ ma, ɣɛɛ maana isosarɛ.
58012014	Mikpɛ̃ sɔ isobuɛ aawe i mi gu ɔbiara ndɛ̃. Mipia kubɛ sɔ miase sekelee alasɔ ngɔ loisekele iibanya Bosate.
58012015	Minyɔ sɔ ɔbiara aana Ɣaa abualɛra. Inyaare ana ne, minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ kaɖo kukawɛ̃ iibawe i mi ame nɛ loapukutura maturi gbodzoo.
58012016	Mi kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaakpese asɔrɔ̃ɖedze ɣee ngɔ nɖe tsuelese lɛ Esau awe. Ɔsu ɔ̃ siɣekpakpa ɔɣa aɖera iɖe iwɛ̃ saã.
58012017	Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, kama ne, ɔbie teteree sɔ matã wũ kusɛkusɛ lɛ ɔbikpakpa fiɛ ɔbiɛ kaku teteree, ɣɛɛ maitã wũ kusɛkusɛ alasɔ nnɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔbara ne, ɔ̃isibawo ɔfinikira.
58012018	Alasɔ iiɖe Sinai kube gɔ i ɔturi aawo ɔpɛgu ɔnyɔ kɔrɛ iɖe miba. Kayi ɔsɛ̃ kpirikpirikpiri ibara guduu, awɛ to akpɛ̃ fiɛ ɔtɔ to ɔtsue.
58012019	Kadadã to kakparɛ̃ fiɛ silɔ dzɛ nto siɖe ika ana to sibɔrɛ. Mma lonɔ ara wagbe ɔtã iti sɔ maisito mabie sɔ manɔ kuira mabua.
58012020	Alasɔ maibawo mmara mɛ matã ma iso ɔɖe sɔ, “Si bidɛ bɔi lopɛgu kube ne, maapɛ wũ ata maɖoe.”
58012021	Ara wa manya ɔkpɛ̃ ma ifɔ̃ itã sɔ Mose ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ifɔ̃ to me nto loti lokpakpa!”
58012022	Ɣɛɛ mi ne, Zion kube kɔrɛ iɖe miba. Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ɔmagɛ̃, Yerusalem gɔ nɖe kato ɔre gu Ɣaa makpabo ma losakanya fiɛ maibawo ma ɔka kɔrɛ mipia.
58012023	Mi ne, miba Ɣaa mabi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma ayere matsɛrɛ mapia i kato mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ losarɛ kɔrɛ. Mipia i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃meɣɛdze gu maturi sɛɛ ma siwarã maɔfere sekelee anɔmi ame.
58012024	Mmɔ ne, Yesu gɔ nɖe kanya inyi ɣɛtɛ kpuradze ana pia. Ana ne, ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ fiɛ ito iɣɛ ara sɛɛ iɖo Abel ire pia i mmɔ.
58012025	Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ miibasɛ̃ ngɔ nto ɔka mi. Ala si maiwo ɔtere i ngɔ loka ma i karɔ̃ iso ngbe kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ kanya ne, nda boabara fiɛ boatere i ngɔ nto ɔka bo ɔbɔrɛgu i kato kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ kanya?
58012026	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, ɔ̃ silɔ ɔtidza kayiiso, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔkã ndamu sɔ, “Nto loba loaledza karɔ̃ itidza ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana, kiniɔ ne, iisiɖe kayiiso kere loatidza, ɣɛɛ ta kuɖokpo.”
58012027	Sɔ “Loaledza itidza ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ ana” ɔte sɔ ara wa loawɔ loati, Ɣaa to ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ wã ɔɖi ikuti nwa loiti gɔ ɔtidza kayi.
58012028	Ne ɔso mitã bopɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ boba sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga loibati. Mitã bosu kuwarɛ gu kunigã bosɔrɛ wũ si boabo wũ anɔ.
58012029	Alasɔ bo Ɣaa ne, ɔtɔ gɔ nsɛ ɔtsuedza ara pelepele ɔɖe.
58013001	Mitã sinyii kuɖɔɛ si kuyi mi ame ɔwi biara lɛ mafɔɖedze.
58013002	Midaasɛ̃ mafɔ ifɔ ala iki i ne iso ne, maturi ɔfɔ Ɣaa makpabo lɛ mafɔ gɔ ma mɔmɔ iiɣe.
58013003	Minyigi mma nrɛ i iyo lɛ mi wũ ne, mayorɛdze miɖe gu mma mato mate ɔɣĩa lɛ mi gu ma ne, siturina siwɛ̃ siɖe mi.
58013004	Mipia kuwarɛ i kuyiri iso si mma nyiri so si maɖe ɔnukuare matã so ala Ɣaa to ɔ̃aɣɛgu masɔrɔ̃ɖedze gu mma nsɛ mafe ma marã ɣee ma mare kama atɔ̃me.
58013005	Miɖi sikã kanɔbɛbɛ biara i mi ngbã ame si nnɛ miba si ibo mi anɔ alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loibanyua-ɔ losɛ, ɣee loɖi-ɔ atsue kuiyikuiyi.”
58013006	Ne ɔso boawo ɔɣɛ ku katetere sɔ, “Bosate nɖe wũ buaidze, ne ɔso loibanigã. Be i ɔturi awune aawo me ɔbara?”
58013007	Minyigi mi matɔ̃ɖedze ma loba maaɖe katɔ̃ maɣere mi Ɣaa itɔ̃me si minyɔ kumɛgɔ masɛ ngbã. Minyɔ ma Ɣaa kafɔkaɖe si misore ma.
58013008	Yesu Kristo iisɛ ɔfiniki. Ɔ̃ gɔ ame lowe ku kɔmakaɖe ne, ɔ̃ ame mpia nɔme fiɛ ɔ̃awe ɔwi biara ne.
58013009	Midaatã ara ite agbãagbã wa nna karɔ̃ si akɔ mi ayura. Ɣaa pɛ nsɛ ɔbualɛ bo ɔtã bo siwarã ame ɔle, ne iiɖe araɖea itsiri mmara mɛ loibabuai bo fiɛ miisɛ mibuai mma nsɛ mabara i mɛ iso.
58013010	Boba isɔrɛkasege ga iso boawo aɖera ɔɖe, ɣɛɛ ma Yudase masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ mabara karabara i ma kasɔrɛkɔ̃ na ɔri sɔ maaɖe kã iso ara.
58013011	Ma Yudase masɔrɛdze ɔkpakpa pelepele sɛ ɔsu bɔi ima ɔkɛlɛgu Kasekelekɔ̃ ame Kasekelekɔ̃ lɛ nnɛ mato masu masɔrɛ i maturi akpi iti awe, ɣɛɛ masɛ matsuedza bɔi mɔmɔ i kabenya.
58013012	Ngbɔ ame i Yesu ɔɖe ɔɣiã i kabenya si ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ima ɔsekelera maturi ɔbɔrɛgu i ma akpi ame ne.
58013013	Ne ɔso bo wũ mitã bokɛlɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i kabenya si mapia bo kunuarɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ mapia wũ kunuarɛ faa.
58013014	Alasɔ bona ɔmagɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ i kayi gagbe iso gɔ ɔ̃ase ɔtã bo ɔwi biara, ɣɛɛ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nto ɔba boto bobie.
58013015	Ne ɔso mitã boki i Yesu iso bosu ile nɛ nse lɛ ara ifɛ̃ bola boɔtã Ɣaa ɔwi biara. Ne nɖe nnɛ nsɛ ibɔrɛ i mma lofɔ ɔ̃ iyere maɖe kanya ame ne.
58013016	Midaaɣara ara sɛɛ ibara gu ara itã maturi alasɔ nnɛgbe nɖe lɛ ara ifɛ̃ nɛ nsɛ ibo Ɣaa anɔ ne.
58013017	Mikã mi matɔ̃ɖedze atsue si mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã ma, ala ma nto madzuɛ̃ mi fiɛ maatã Ɣaa mi ngbã iso akɔnta ne. Mitã sɔ maabara nnɛgbe ku isoɣɔ ne iiɖe ku ɔtu gɔ mba ɔrɔrã ala nnɛmɔ iibabuai mi.
58013018	Mila miɔkparama kayi i bo iti alasɔ boɣe sɔ bo situ ame ɔkpa fiɛ boto bobie sɔ boabara ira biara ku kuwarɛ
58013019	Nto lokarɛ lobɔrɛgu i mi kɔrɛ sɔ mikparama kayi teteree sɔ Ɣaa aatã loledza mi kɔrɛ iba mala.
58013020	Ɣaa gɔ nsɛ ɔtã isobuɛ, ngɔ lotara Bosate Yesu gɔ nɖe Masɛrɛkɔdze Siare ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame, iki i ɔ̃ ima kanya inyi nɛ nna katui ame,
58013021	si ɔsu ara sɛɛ ɔɖuɖu ɔtã mi kere sɔ miawo ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔbara. Ɔki i Yesu Kristo iso ɔbara nnɛ loabo wũ anɔ i bo ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ile ita i kiniɔ ikpa daaro daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
58013022	Manyii, loto mi i kukpa sɔ miɣara so si mikã atsue atoa sɔ ɔko gɔ lotsɛrɛ losese mi iikarã.
58013023	Nto lotã mi itsue sɔ maɔɖi bo ɔnyii Timoteo i iyo. Si ɔwula wũ kɔrɛ ɔba ne, iyɔ bo gu wũ loaba mi kɔrɛ.
58013024	Loya mi matɔ̃ɖedze gu mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. Mma ɔɖuɖu lobɔrɛ Italia maba sɔ maya mi.
58013025	Ɣaa abualɛra si awegu mi ɔɖuɖu. Si iba ngbɔ.
59001001	Mme Yakobo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa gu Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔɖabo lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã Ɣaa maturi ma lobiɛ makã kayiiso ɔɖuɖu. Loya mi ɔɖuɖu.
59001002	Manyii, si amɔrɛ̃ agbãagbã ɔtu mi ne, mina isoɣɔ gbaã.
59001003	Alasɔ miɣe sɔ si mala mi kafɔkaɖe manyɔ fiɛ miya ne, miaki i ne ame mire siɖu teteree.
59001004	Mitã mi iya teteree si ite i mi kurabarara ame sɔ miaɖe mma loyi i ira biara ame fiɛ kuira iisinya ma.
59001005	Si iwola ɔnya mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ne, ɔkarɛ Ɣaa gɔ loatã wũ, alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖi kayiri ɔtã mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makarɛ wũ ara gɔ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnyɔ kama.
59001006	Ɣɛɛ si ɔto ɔkarɛ Ɣaa ira ne, iwararã kuiwɛ̃ si idaawe i ɔ̃ ame, ɔfɔ ɔɖe. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔwararã Ɣaa ne, ɔse lɛ ɔpo gɔ nto ɔpɛ ɔfe ɔkpese.
59001007	-
59001008	Ngɔ adzuni nsɛ afiniki malamala, fiɛ ɔ̃iɣɛ teteree i ɔ̃ kurabarara ame si ɔdaanyɔ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃afɔ kuira ɔbɔrɛgu i Bosate kɔrɛ.
59001009	Si Ɣaa ɔtara ɔnyii gɔ nɖe wɛrɛba iti kato ne, ɔna isoɣɔ.
59001010	Ngbɔ ame si Ɣaa ɔbɔ fɔɖedze gɔ nɖe ranase karɔ̃ ne, ɔna isoɣɔ. Alasɔ maranase ne, ɔse mase lɛ sikua aɣɔ̃la wa loakpa ayu.
59001011	Si kuɣɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ fiɛ kaɖe ɔɔbe ne, kusɛ kuɖe sikua siɣɔ, iyɔ aɣɔ̃la ɔɔkpa gɔ aisisɛ alɛ ɔnyɔ. Ngbɔ ame i ranase sɛ ɔtere ɔfe ɔkpese gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔkpi kere ɔ̃akpi ne.
59001012	Kusɛkusɛ kutã ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ so ɔla i kalakanyɔ ame alasɔ si ɔki ne ame ɔbɔrɛ ne, Ɣaa aasu ngbã daaro kaɣɛkasɛ ga i Bosate ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ɔtã wũ lɛ iɖeiso kuso.
59001013	Si kalakanyɔ gamɔ igbã ɔba ɔturi iso ne, ɔdaaɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ kabɔrɛ, alasɔ maibawo Ɣaa ɔla ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbara ikpi fiɛ Ɣaa mɔmɔ ana iisɛ ɔla ɔturi ɔnyɔ sɔ ɔbara ikpi.
59001014	Ɣɛɛ ne, sosina ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ɔturi ɔkã nsɛ akpadzɛ̃ wũ apia i kalakanyɔ ame.
59001015	Ara ɔkã ikpɛ̃ sɛ imɔ ikpese ikpi, fiɛ si ikpi ɔɔmɔ iro ne, isɛ ikpese kukpi.
59001016	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi.
59001017	Ara sɛɛ gu karatã sɛɛ ga lokate ɔɖuɖu ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ kabɔrɛ. Kabɔrɛ i ikpawaĩ ɔɖuɖu baradze gɔ nɖe Ɔse kɔrɛ. Ɔ̃isɛ ɔfiniki fiɛ idududu na i ɔ̃ ame.
59001018	Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ kuɖɔɛ ame ɔtã bo ngbã iki i ɔnukuare itɔ̃me ame sɔ boana kasɛkɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ i ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu ame.
59001019	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, minyɔ sɔ mi ɔbiara aaɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔpɛ siwa i ara inɔ ame, ɣɛɛ miɖe mma nsɛ maɣara so i ikaɖe gu sikpã ina ame.
59001020	Alasɔ sikpã iisɛ sitã ɔturi ɔbara nnɛ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔbie sɔ ɔbara.
59001021	Ne ɔso miɖi inyanyara gu ngbã nyanyarĩa igbã biara i mi ame. Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Ɣaa sɔ miawo ɔ̃ itɔ̃me nɛ ɔpɛ i mi ame fiɛ iawo mi ngbã ɔtã ɔfɔ.
59001022	Mibara i Itɔ̃me Bielea iso. Midaaɖe mma nsɛ makã itɔ̃me atsue kere mila miɔsɔsɔla so.
59001023	Alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ itɔ̃me fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ne iso ne, ɔse lɛ ngɔ lonyɔ so katɔ̃ i aɣɔɣɔɛ ame kere.
59001024	Si ɔ̃afiniki ɔrui ne, ɔ̃ɔɣara kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ se.
59001025	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔkarã inɔ i Ɣaa mmara mɛ loyi fiɛ misɛ mikurisi ɔturi ɔna isobuɛ, ɔbara i me iso ana fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔnɔ ala atsue kere ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔfere wũ kusɛkusɛ i ira biara nɛ ɔ̃abara ame. Ɔ̃ise lɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ itɔ̃me kere.
59001026	Si ɔrere to ɔbu sɔ ɔɖe Ɣaa fɔɖedze fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔpia ɔnyagɛmi i irɛkpo ne, ɔto ɔsɔsɔla so fiɛ ɔ̃ kasumu ana ɖe siefe.
59001027	Kasumu ga lokote fiɛ iɣɛrɛ na i kã iso i Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔse anɔ nɖe sɔ, boabuai makpise mabi, gu makpise mare i ma amɔrɛ̃ ame, ana ne, bobore so boɖi i ira biara nɛ loapukutura ɔturi i kayi gagbe iso kɔrɛ.
59002001	Wũ manyii, lɛ mma lofɔ Bosate Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe ikpawaĩ Sate maɖe ne, midaanyɔ maturi i katɔ̃ i mi kurabarara ame.
59002002	Mitã bosu sɔ ɔwɛ̃ ɔfu so ɔkati gɔ lofɔ kuɣa, ɔpia sikãrɛtɛa isukpɛ ɔba mi kasarɛkɔ̃, fiɛ ɔmama ana ɔfu so ɔkati kɛkɛa ɔba.
59002003	Si mitã ngɔ loledza so kukaakɔ kuwarɛ miɣere wũ sɔ, “Ba sɛ i iyara sɛɛ nɛgbe iso,” fiɛ miɣere wɛrɛba sɔ, “Ya i mmɔ, ɣee ba sɛ i wũ ngbatɔ̃ i karɔ̃ ngbe” ne,
59002004	ite sɔ mito mipia ikpaki i mi ndɛ̃, miɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri gɔ loilɛ iso.
59002005	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, mikã atsue si minɔ. Ɣaa ɔɖi kayi gagbe mawɛrɛba sɔ maaɖe mafɔɖedze siare gu mma ɔ̃asu sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mma nsɛ maɖɔɛ wũ ɔtã.
59002006	Ɣɛɛ misɛ minyɔ mawɛrɛba pupurii! Iiɖe maranase maɖe nsɛ mabara mi kako, makpadzɛ̃ mi makɛlɛgu atɔ̃mekaɣɛkɔ̃?
59002007	Ma ame maɖe nsɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i iyere sɛɛ nɛ masu matã mi gɔ mikpese Kristo mare iso ne.
59002008	Si mibara i Ɣaa sigarakaɖekɔ̃ mmara iso pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ mapia i Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, iyɔ mibara nnɛ lokote. Nnɛ matsɛrɛ masɛ nɖe sɔ, “Ɖɔɛ fɔ ɔlaa lɛ kumɛgɔ ato aɖɔɛ so.”
59002009	Ɣɛɛ si mito mipia ikpaki i maturi ndɛ̃ i ma arapia kanya ne, mito mibara ikpi, fiɛ mmara ɔɔtã mi ipɔ sɔ mita miya me iso.
59002010	Ɔbiara gɔ lobara i mmara ɔɖuɖu iso fiɛ ɔta ɔya miwɛ̃ iso ne, ɔta ɔya i me ɔɖuɖu iso.
59002011	Alasɔ Ɣaa gɔ lotã mmara sɔ, “Daaɖe asɔrɔ̃” ne, ɔ̃ ame loɣɛ sɔ, “Daaɖoe ɔturi” ne. Ne ɔso si aiɖe asɔrɔ̃, ɣɛɛ aɖoe ɔturi ne, atu mmara.
59002012	Ne ɔso mitã sɔ mi akaɖe gu mi kurabarara si kute sɔ mmara mɛ loatã isɛguso miɖe i Ɣaa aasu ɔɣɛgu mi ala atɔ̃me.
59002013	Alasɔ ngɔ loisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya ne, atɔ̃me ɔɣɛwi ne, Ɣaa iibanyɔ wũ nnya ɔ̃ wũ. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa iibatã ngɔ nsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya ipɔ.
59002014	Wũ manyii, si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔba kafɔkaɖe, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ kurabarara iisɛ kute ne, mme kusia ɔba? Ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe aawo wũ ngbã ɔtã?
59002015	Mitã bosu sɔ ɔnyii ɔrɛrɛ̃ ɣee ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i arapia ɔɔkpi iso, ana ne, ɔna nnɛ ɔ̃aɖe.
59002016	Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Kɛlɛ i isobuɛ ame, ɔyu si ɔdaakpɛ̃-ɔ, ɖe ara si ami,” fiɛ ɔ̃itã wũ nnɛ lonya itã wũ ne, mme ibuai iɖe ɔtã wũ?
59002017	Ne ɔso si ɔrere ba kafɔkaɖe fiɛ kurabarara iibua iso ne, kafɔkaɖe kpia kere kaɖe wũ.
59002018	Ɣɛɛ ɔwɛ̃ aawo ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔturi ɔwɛ̃ ba kafɔkaɖe fiɛ ɔmama ana ba kurabarara.” Mmuai mɛ loatã ngɔmɔ nɖe sɔ, “Te me fɔ kafɔkaɖe ga nna kurabarara sɛɛ si mme wũ lote-ɔ wũ kare iki i kurabarara sɛɛ ame.”
59002019	Afɔ aɖe sɔ Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã pɛ mpia. Ibua ilɛ, gbaã iɖe ana! Ta siwarã lalaa ɔfɔ siɖe ngbɔ, fiɛ sisɛ siti sikpakpa ku ifɔ̃.
59002020	Itɔ aɖe! Ɔbie ato sɔ loɣere-ɔ sɔ kafɔkaɖe ga nna kurabarara sɛɛ na kusia?
59002021	Be ɔso i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ bo ɔwa Abraham sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa? Ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔso. Alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔbi Isak ɔkɛlɛgu sɔ ɔ̃asu wũ ɔfɛ̃ ara ɔtã Ɣaa.
59002022	Miinya ngbɔ? Ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe gu ɔ̃ kurabarara losɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ kurabarara lotã ɔ̃ kafɔkaɖe ɔkote.
59002023	Ne ɔso nnɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ ɔba i ne ame sɔ, “Abraham ɔfɔ Ɣaa ɔɖe, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ.” Ne ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere wũ sɔ ɔ̃ ɔlaa ɔɖe ne.
59002024	Miɔnya kiniɔ sɔ Ɣaa iisɛ ɔnya ɔturi kafɔkaɖe kere ɔnyɔ wũ sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ si ɔ̃ kurabarara iibua iso.
59002025	Ngbɔ ame ana i Ɣaa ɔnyɔ Rahab gɔ nɖe asɔrɔ̃ɖedze sɔ ɔse bɔlɔlɔ iki i ɔ̃ kurabarara iso ne. Nnɛ i Rahab ɔbara nɖe sɔ, gɔ ɔfɔ Israel mabi ma loba maala karɔ̃ manyɔ ne, ɔbuai ma sɔ maki i ɔri mama matere.
59002026	Ne ɔso iɔte sekelee sɔ kumɛgɔ ame i ɔturi ɖe kpise si siwarã na i ɔ̃ ame ne, ngbɔ ame i kafɔkaɖe ɖe ira kpia si kurabarara iibua iso ne.
59003001	Wũ manyii, midaatã sɔ mi ndɛ̃ maturi gbodzoo akpesera so maratedze. Lɛ kumɛgɔ miɣe ne, bo maratedze atɔ̃me iɣɛgu to iawe ɔle iɖo marasuãdze ɔkpɛ.
59003002	Bo ɔɖuɖu sɛ boɣɛrɛ. Ɣɛɛ si ɔrere pia fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔɣɛrɛ i ɔ̃ ikaɖe ame ne, iyɔ ɔɖe ngɔ loyi fiɛ ɔ̃awo so iso ɔɖe pelepele.
59003003	Bosɛ bosu ɔwɛ̃ bopia i ipɔngɔ kanya botã ne ibara bo kuɖɔɛ. Ana ne, bosɛ bowo ipɔngɔ ɔfinikira isɛ ngbegɔ boɖɔɛ.
59003004	Minyɔ ndu iso iyebi ana, atoa sɔ imɔ pawũ fiɛ ɔwiri siare nsɛ ɔsɛgu ne ne, ibɔra kɛkɛĩ kere iɖe i iyebikãdze sɛ ɔsu ɔfinikira iyebi ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ ɔto ɔbie sɔ iki.
59003005	Ngbɔ ame i ɔnyagɛmi se ne. Atoa sɔ ɔse kɛkɛĩ ne, ɔsɛ ɔɖe ndamu i ara siare iso. Nyɔ kumɛgɔ i ipo ɔmɔ, ɣɛɛ katɔmɛrɛmɛrɛĩ kɛkɛĩ kere nsɛ katsuedza ne.
59003006	Ɔnyagɛmi se lɛ ɔtɔ. Kayi ga i ara lalaa ibara ɔyi i ɔnyagɛmi ɖe i bo siturina ame. Ɔsɛ ɔɣɛra kuturidziri ɔɖuɖu, ɔtsuedza ɔturi ngbã, fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ne, Ɔbosam itɔkpe nsɛ itsue i ɔ̃ ame.
59003007	Bosɛ bowo mabɔi lalaa gu kurodzai ɔɣedza, mabɔi ma nsɛ mabore i karɔ̃ gu ndu ame mabɔi ɔɖuɖu, fiɛ i ɔnukuare ame ne, ɔturi sɛ ɔɣedza mabɔi magbe ɔɖuɖu.
59003008	Ɣɛɛ ɔnyagɛmi ɖe ira nɛ i ɔturi kuwɛ̃ iiwo ɔbara sɔ ɔ̃akã wũ atsue. Ɔnyanyarĩ, ikpi ibara iisɛ iɖa wũ, fiɛ kabiɛtɛ ga nsɛ kaɖoe maturi ɔyi i ɔ̃ ame.
59003009	Bosɛ bosu wũ bole bo Ɔse Ɣaa fiɛ bosɛ bosu wũ bogbarĩ maturi mama ma i Ɣaa ɔbara i ɔ̃ kumiamia ame.
59003010	Kanya kawɛ̃ ga ame nto kale Ɣaa ame nto ka gbarĩ maturi ne. Wũ manyii iikote sɔ iase ngbɔ!
59003011	Ndu mɛ mba ɔmɛrɛ̃ gu mmɛ mba mma iibawo itubu iwɛ̃ ame ɔwe.
59003012	Wũ manyii, kubo aawo abɛrɛ ɔɣɔ̃ ɣee kaɣakpei ɔɣɔ̃ aboi? Ngbɔ ame i mma ndu gu ndu mmɛ mba ɔmɛrɛ̃ iibawo itubu iwɛ̃ ame ɔwe ne.
59003013	Ɔwɛ̃ pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ ɔɖe nɔgbadze gu ngɔ nsɛ ɔnɔ ara karɔ̃? Ngɔmɔ si ɔsu ngbã sɛɛ mɛ ɔsi i karɔ̃ ibɔso gu iwola ame ɔte.
59003014	Ɣɛɛ si mito mikpɛ̃ sirerɛ i mi situ ame, miba kaɖo fiɛ misɛ mibie mi ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ ne, midaabara ikpi i ɔnukuare iso miɖe ndamu i mi iwola iso.
59003015	Iwola nɛmɔ igbã ne, iiɖe kato ibɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kayiiso ire nɛ loiɖe Siwarã Bielea ire fiɛ ibɔrɛ i Ɔbosam kɔrɛ iɖe.
59003016	Alasɔ ngbegɔ i kanɔbɛbɛ pia fiɛ maturi sɛ mabie ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ ɔkpɛ ne, iweweso gu ara nyanyarĩa igbã biara ana sɛ iwe i mmɔ.
59003017	Ɣɛɛ iwola nɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, iɖeakatɔ̃, ikpa, isɛ ibie isobuɛ, isɛ imɔɛ̃so ila, isɛ inɔgu maturi ara karɔ̃, iyi ku nnyainyɔ, ara sɛɛ sɛ abɔrɛ i ne ame, iisɛ ipia ikpaki i maturi ndɛ̃ fiɛ sila ana na i ne ame.
59003018	Mma nsɛ makpura fiɛ masɛ makpadzɛ̃ isobuɛ mabɔ sɛ mapɛ ɔraɖui gɔ abi nɖe sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara.
59004001	Amami gu kalɔ ga mpia i mi ndɛ̃ ne, lɛ abɔrɛ? Mi sosina ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã nsɛgu wã.
59004002	Mito mibie ara wa lonya mi, ɣɛɛ miito mina, ne ɔso misɛ miɖoe maturi. Misɛ mibɛbɛ anɔ sɔ miafɔ ara i ɔturi kɔrɛ, gɔ miina mifɔ ɔso ne, misɛ milɔ kalɔ mikpɛ̃gu so. Miisɛ mina nnɛ mito mibie, alasɔ miisɛ mikarɛ Ɣaa.
59004003	Fiɛ si mikarɛ Ɣaa ana ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔtã mi alasɔ miisɛ mikarɛ ala adzuni sɛɛ. Misɛ mikarɛ ara sɔ si miasu nwa miafɔ mibara ala mi kuɖɔɛ.
59004004	Mma nsɛ mafe Ɣaa kama miɖe! Miiɣe sɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖegu kayiiso kulaa ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe? Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ losu kayiiso ara ɔbara ɔ̃ ɔlaa ne, Ɣaa tsirise ɔɖe.
59004005	Mibu sɔ ɔtsɛrɛ kere matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɣaa sɛ ɔkpɛ̃ sirerɛ teteree i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ ɔsu ɔpia bo ame kanya.”
59004006	Ɣɛɛ ɔle gɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã kɔra ɔsi ɔɖo. Ne ɔso i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa iisɛ ɔtɔrãgu mma nsɛ makɔlɛ so kato, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃ nnya.”
59004007	Ne ɔso mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Ɣaa, mita miya Ɔbosam iso si ɔ̃are mi kama.
59004008	Mibore mibo Ɣaa si ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃abore ɔbo mi. Makpibaradze, mifore nrɔɔ̃! Mi ma nsɛ mifinikira adzuni malamala, mi sekelera mi situ.!
59004009	Minya ibo, mimararã so si mibiɛ kaku. Mitã mi sima si sikpese kaku, si isoɣɔ si ikpese ɔtu ibiɛra!
59004010	Mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã Bosate si ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi kato.
59004011	Manyii, midaakidza mi malaa malamala. Ngɔ loɣɛ ira nɛ loikote i ɔ̃ ɔnyii fɔɖedze iso, ɣee ɔɣɛgu ɔ̃ ɔnyii atɔ̃me ne, ɔɣɛ nnɛ loikote i mmara iso, fiɛ ɔɣɛgu mmara atɔ̃me. Fiɛ si mmara aɣɛgu atɔ̃me ne, iyɔ aito abara i mmara iso, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nto ɔɣɛgu mmara atɔ̃me aɖe.
59004012	Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔsi mmara gu atɔ̃meɣɛdze. Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ loawo ɔturi ngbã ɔtã, fiɛ ɔ̃awo wũ ɔwɔra ana. Fɔ nɖe nna fiɛ ato aɣɛgu fɔ ɔlaa atɔ̃me?
59004013	Milo si minɔ, mi mma nsɛ miɣɛ sɔ, “Nɔme, ɣee kɔrãkaɖe loasɛ ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔgbe ɣee ngɔmɔ, boawe i mmɔ ikɔ iwɛ̃ boɖe kuɣa bona kusia.”
59004014	Ɣɛɛ nto loɣere mi sɔ miiɣe nnɛ loabɔrɛ mi iso ku kɔrãkaɖe. Ɔse kere mise lɛ kuɣɔ gɔ losakɛ kiniɔ ɣɛɛ ito ibara kere kuɔyu.
59004015	Nnɛ ikote sɔ miaɣɛ nɖe sɔ, “Si Bosate ɔtã bo ngbã fiɛ boikpi ne, boabara nnɛ gu nnɛ.”
59004016	Ɣɛɛ misɛ mikɔlɛ so kato, miɖe ndamu gɔ iilɛ.
59004017	Ne ɔso ngɔ loisɛ ɔbara isɛɛ nɛ ɔɣe sɔ ɔ̃abara ne, ikpi iɖe itã wũ.
59005001	Kiniɔ ne, mi mma nɖe maranase si mikã me atsue. Mibiɛ si miwana so ala ira boa nɛ loaba mi iso ɔso.
59005002	Mi karana ɔɔɣɛ fiɛ kukorokpɛbubui ana ɔɔɖe mi arapia.
59005003	Mi sikãrɛtɛa gu sifudza ɔɔpɛ matɔ fiɛ matɔ ma i sikã ɔpɛ ngbe to iaɖe aɖansiɛ i mi iso, ibɛbɛ mi lɛ ɔtɔ ku atɔ̃me iɣɛyi. Mito misa karana kanya mifu ku ayi tsɔra wagbe ame.
59005004	Mi marabaradze ma misɛ̃ sɔ miito mitã aso ne, minɔ ma kaku. Mma losa ɔraɖui kanya matã mi sitɔrɛ̃ ɔɔbo Bosate gɔ nɖe Kpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa i kutsue.
59005005	Miɖe ngbã i kayi gagbe ame, misu ara wa lofɔ kuɣa miminidza so ɔwi biara, miɖe ara mina iɖa mitã mi iɖoeyi.
59005006	Mma loiɣɛrɛ mi ne, miɔtã ma kukpi ipɔ, miɖoe ma ato sɔ maita maya mi iso.
59005007	Ne ɔso wũ manyii, miɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ Bosate aaba. Minyɔ kpɛ̃dze! Si ɔto ɔnyɔ kamɔ ga ɔ̃apɛ ne, ɔsɛ ɔɣara so ɔtã Butu gu Sala makado sɔ mapɛ si kalɛ.
59005008	Ne ɔso mi wũ miɣara so ngbɔ si mina ɔtu alasɔ Bosate ɔbawi ɔɔro ɔɣo.
59005009	Midaanyagalagu so si Ɣaa iibaɣɛgu mi atɔ̃me. Atɔ̃meɣɛdze ɔɔro ɔba.
59005010	Wũ manyii, minyigi kanyamaɖidze ma loɖe ika i Bosate iyere ame. Misu ma ngbã lɛ ikparĩ awe i kumɛgɔ maɣara so i ma inyɛwe ame.
59005011	Bosɛ bonyɔ mma lona ɔtu i inyɛwe ame sɔ kusɛkusɛ sia ma iso. Minɔ kumɛgɔ i Hiob ɔna ɔtu i inyɛwe ame, fiɛ minɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔtã wũ i kawirikɔ̃. Ɔturi ara sɛ aɖo Bosate kayiri, fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi nnya.
59005012	Inyaare ne wũ manyii, midaala miɔtarĩgu ara. Midaatarĩgu kato, ɣee karɔ̃, ɣee kuira mama, ɣɛɛ mitã mi aĩ si iɖe aĩ, si mi ooɣo si iɖe ooɣo, iyɔ Ɣaa sikpã iibaba mi iso.
59005013	Si mi ɔrere pia i imɔrɛ̃ ame ne, ɔkparama kayi, fiɛ si mi ɔrere to ɔna isoɣɔ ana ne, ɔka aka ɔle Ɣaa.
59005014	Si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere to ɔnyɛ ne, ɔpia si makpere mafɔɖedze matɔ̃ɖedze si makparama kayi i ɔ̃ iti, masɔla wũ nnɔĩ i Bosate iyere ame.
59005015	Kayi ga makparama i kafɔkaɖe ame to kaasa ngɔ nto ɔnyɛ, Bosate ɔtara wũ ɔɣedza. Fiɛ si ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɣaa aasu ɔtsɛ wũ.
59005016	Ne ɔso mibusi mi akpi miɣere so si mikparama kayi i mi malaa ati si miana isosarɛ. Ɔle siare pia i ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa kayi ikparama ame.
59005017	Eliya ɔ̃ wũ ɔturi kere ɔɖe lɛ bo. Ɔkparama kayi teteree sɔ Ɣaa si ɔdaatã kado si ɔpɛ, fiɛ gbaã ne, akɔ atɛ awa akuɔ ne, kado iifere i karɔ̃.
59005018	Kama ne, ɔkparama kayi fiɛ kado ka ɔpɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iso ɔraɖui ɔlɛ.
59005019	Wũ manyii, si mi ndɛ̃ ɔrere ɔyu ɔri, ɔre ɔnukuare kama fiɛ mi ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkpesera wũ ɔbɔ ne,
59005020	minyigi sɔ ɔbiara gɔ lofinikira kpibaradze ɔbɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ɔto ɔ̃atã kpibaradze gɔmɔ ɔna ngbã gu akpi gbodzoo ana kasukatsɛ.
60001001	Mme Petro gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo katɔ̃mesɛdze lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔtã so fiɛ masasame mapia lɛ mafɔ i Ponto gu Galatia gu Kapadokia gu Asia gu Bitinia nrɔ̃ iso.
60001002	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa mɔmɔ loɖi mi i ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ kanya fiɛ ɔtã sɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔbara mi sekelee itã atsue ikã Yesu Kristo itɔ̃me. Ɔ̃ ima ana ɔsekelera mi. Bosate si ɔbualɛ mi si ɔtã mi isobuɛ si isi ibua.
60001003	Mitã bopɛ Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo Ɔse siba! Ɔnyɔ bo nnya gbaã gɔ ɔtã bo ngbã ɣɛtɛ iki i Yesu Kristo ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame. Nnɛgbe ɔtã bo ɔriinyɔ nɛ mba ngbã.
60001004	Ne ɔso bo anɔ sia i ara wa i Ɣaa ɔledza ɔsɛ ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi iso. Ɔledza wã ɔsɛ i kato ngbegɔ aibaburi, ɣee anina, ɣee akpi anɔmi.
60001005	Mi ma lofɔ miɖe fiɛ Ɣaa ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle ɔledza mi ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mi ngbã ɣɛtɛ ku ɔwi tsɔra ame ɔkpɛ nɖe ara wa ɔledza ɔsɛ ngbe.
60001006	So si siɣɔ mi i nnɛgbe iti atoa sɔ mito miki i inyɛwe gu kalakanyɔ agbãagbã ame i ɔwi kurukutua gɔgbe ame.
60001007	Ara wagbe to aaba mi iso si ite sɔ kafɔkaɖe bielea miba. Sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nsɛ sinina kɔra ne, masɛ mafore sɛ̃ i ɔtɔ ame, ne ɔso mi kafɔkaɖe ga lofɔ kuɣa kaɖo sikãrɛtɛa ana ne, inya sɔ maakere kã manyɔ sɔ kaaya. Si kaya ne, mito miafɔ ile, ikpawaĩ gu kuwarɛ ku iyi nɛ i Bosate Yesu Kristo aaba.
60001008	Atoa sɔ miinya wũ ne, mito miɖɔɛ wũ, mifɔ wũ miɖe atoa sɔ miito minya wũ kiniɔ ana. Ne ɔso miba isoɣɔ nɛ nna katui.
60001009	Mi kafɔkaɖe ɔso ne, Ɣaa ɔɔtã mi ngbã daaro daaro.
60001010	Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ma lopɛ bo iɖi nnyainyɔ nɛgbe imomo ɔnyɔnyɔ ara wagbe ame totoroo, fiɛ maɣɛ ara masɛ i karatã ga i Ɣaa aasu ɔtã mi ngbe iso.
60001011	Maki i ɔri igbã biara iso sɔ si matsue ɔwi gɔ iso gu kumɛgɔ i ara wagbe aaba. Ɔwi gɔgbe ame i Kristo Siwarã ɔki i ma iso sitã maɣɛ ara masɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo aawe inyɛ fiɛ ne kama, ɔ̃ana ikpawaĩ siare.
60001012	Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte kanyamaɖidze mamɔ sɔ iiɖe ma mɔmɔ karabara mato mabara ne, mi mato mabara matã. Maɖe ika i ara wa i Itɔ̃me Bielea maɣɛdze to maɣere mi kiniɔ iki i Siwarã Bielea dzɛ i Ɣaa ɔsese ɔbɔrɛgu i kato ɔle iso. Ikpɛ̃ ta Ɣaa makpabo ɔkã sɔ maatsue ira i ara wagbe iso.
60001013	Ne ɔso miledza so mitã karabara. Midzuɛ̃ so si misu mi ɔriinyɔ ɔɖuɖu misia i kusɛkusɛ gɔ i Ɣaa aatã mi ku ɔwi gɔ i Yesu Kristo aaledza iba iso.
60001014	Lɛ mabi ma nsɛ makã Ɣaa atsue ne, minyua ara wa lola ɔɔkpɛ̃ mi ɔkã ku ɔwi gɔ miiɖe mafɔɖedze ɔbara.
60001015	Ɣɛɛ ne, mise sekelee i mi kurabarara ɔɖuɖu ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa gɔ lokpere mi se sekelee.
60001016	I Ɔko Sekelea ame ne, Ɣaa ɔɣere ɔ̃ maturi sɔ, “Mise sekelee alasɔ lose sekelee.”
60001017	Misɛ mikpere Ɣaa gɔ loisɛ ɔnyɔ ɔturi i katɔ̃ i atɔ̃me iɣɛ ame sɔ, “Bo Ɔse” si mito mikparama kayi. Ne ɔso misu mi ngbã ayi tsɔra i kayiiso ngbe mipia Ɣaa kuwarɛ.
60001018	Miɣe sɔ iiɖe sikãfudza, ɣee sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nsɛ sinina siɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã mi iti kuso fiɛ ɔɖi mi ɔbɔrɛgu i ngbã mɛ i mi mawa ɔsɛ fiɛ mina kusia kukuwɛ̃ ame.
60001019	Ɣɛɛ Kristo ima nɛ lofɔ kuɣa iɖe. Ɔ̃ nse lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ ibi nɛ lokote fiɛ ina iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ ana ne.
60001020	Ɣaa ɔɔsia Kristo ikparĩ ɔsɛ fiɛ ɔbara kayiiso, ɣɛɛ ɔɖi wũ ɔte ku ayi tsɔra wagbe ame i mi iti.
60001021	Iki i Kristo iso ne, miɔfɔ Ɣaa miɖe. Ɔ̃ lotara Kristo ɔbɔrɛgu i makpise ame fiɛ ɔtã wũ kuwarɛ kasɛkɔ̃. Ne ɔso mi kafɔkaɖe gu anɔ ka asia i Ɣaa iso.
60001022	Kiniɔ gɔ miɔkã ɔnukuare atsue fiɛ miɔki i ɔ̃ ame misekelera so mito miɖɔɛ mi mafɔɖedze laa ne, miɖɔɛ mi manyii ta situ ame.
60001023	Alasɔ iki i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ ina katui ame ne, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɣese gɔ loisɛ ɔkpi ɔɔledza mi iɣe.
60001024	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Maturi ɔɖuɖu se lɛ sikua fiɛ ma kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu se lɛ aɣɔ̃la. Sikua sɛ siɣɔ, fiɛ aɣɔ̃la ana sɛ akpa.
60001025	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me pia ɔwi biara.” Itɔ̃me nɛgbe nɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mapɛ imomo maɣere mi ne.
60002001	Ne ɔso minyua ikpi igbã biara ɔbara. Mila gu adzuni nyanyarĩa ite maturi, sirerɛ ikpɛ̃ gu sitia si sidaawe i mi ndɛ̃.
60002002	Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mailupu kuira si ikpɛ̃ mi ɔkã teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ i inyɛdu sɛ ikpɛ̃ mabi ɣɛtɛ ɔkã si miamɔ i mi iɖi ame.
60002003	Alasɔ mi mɔmɔ ɔɔti Bosate kayiribielea minyɔ sɔ ilɛ.
60002004	Ne ɔso mibore mibo Bosate gɔ nɖe ita nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ iire kuira i mayotsuedze anɔ, ɣɛɛ ne i Ɣaa ɔɖi, fiɛ ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ne, ne lofɔ kuɣa iɖo.
60002005	Misu so mitã lɛ ata wa mba ngbã si Ɣaa si ɔsu mi ɔtsue Siwarã ame isɔrɛyo nɛ ame miaɖe masɔrɛdze ma nse sekelee. Misu siwarã ame ara wa lokote misɔrɛ Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
60002006	Alasɔ Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Loɖi ita nɛ mba kuɣa, fiɛ losu ne lobara Sion ɔyokã ame ita. Ɔbiara gɔ loafɔ wũ ɔɖe ne, kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ wũ kunya.”
60002007	Ita nɛgbe ɔfɔ kuɣa gbaã i mi ma lofɔ miɖe kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ mma loifɔ maɖe ne, matsue sɔ, “Ita nɛ i mayotsuedze ɔsɛ̃ ne, ne loba iakpese ita nyaa iɖo pelepele ne.”
60002008	Ɔko Sekelea kakɔi kawɛ̃ ana ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ita nɛgbe loatã maturi ɔtura, fiɛ iatã marɔ̃.” Mato maatura alasɔ maifɔ Ɣaa itɔ̃me maɖe, fiɛ ngbɔ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ i ma iso ne.
60002009	Ɣɛɛ mi ne, maturi ma i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔsɛ miɖe, masɔrɛdze ma nsɛ male Igara, kaɖe ga nse sekelee, Ɣaa mɔmɔ maturi ma ɔɖi ɔsɛ sɔ maapɛ ɔ̃ awawãra imomo miɖe. Mma i Ɣaa ɔkpere ɔbɔrɛgu i idududu ame ɔbɔ ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ siare ame.
60002010	Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, miiɖe Ɣaa maturi, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ maturi ka miɖe. Ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, Ɣaa iinyɔ mi nnya, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔnyɔ mi nnya.
60002011	Manyii ɖɔɛse, lɛ mma nɖe mafɔ gu marisɛdze i kayi gagbe ame ne, nto loka mi sɔ midaabara i sosina ara lalaa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ mi ɔkã fiɛ ata aɣɛ i mi ɔkala iso.
60002012	Mi nsɛgbai i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze ndɛ̃ si mise sekelee sɔ atoa sɔ masɛ maɣɛ sɔ mito mibara ara lalaa ne, maanya mi ara sɛɛ wa mito mibara sɔ maasu ile matã Ɣaa ku ɔ̃ iyi nɛ ɔ̃aledza iba iso.
60002013	Bosate gɔ boto bosɔrɛ ɔso ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mma ɔɖuɖu nto maɖe mi iso gu Roma Igarakpakpa ana.
60002014	Mibɔ so karɔ̃ ana mitã makpakpa ma i Igarakpakpa sɛ ɔpia sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ara lalaa mabaradze kutsue si male mma nto mabara ara sɛɛ.
60002015	Alasɔ Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ nɖe sɔ miabara isɛɛ sɔ mma loikpa anɔ sidzimi aate. Iyɔ maibaɣɛ inyakpi kuiwɛ̃ i mi iso.
60002016	Misɛ ngbã lɛ mma nsigu so, ɣɛɛ midaasu mi isɛguso mibara ara lalaa. Misɛ lɛ mma nɖe Ɣaa masande.
60002017	Miwarɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu si miɖɔɛ mafɔɖedze ɔɖuɖu. Minigã Ɣaa, si miwarɛ Igarakpakpa ana.
60002018	Mi ma nɖe maɖabo ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi makɔse si miwarɛ ma. Iiɖe makɔse ma nsɛ maɖɔɛ mi fiɛ masɛ manyɔ mi nnya kere, ɣɛɛ ta mma nɖe matilese ana.
60002019	Si ɔturi to ɔwe inyɛ nɛ loikote alasɔ ɔto ɔbara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ne, Ɣaa sɛ ɔtã wũ kusɛkusɛ.
60002020	Si mibara ara lalaa fiɛ mina ɔtu miya mapɛ mi ne, mme ile mpia i ne ame? Ɣɛɛ si mina ɔtu miwe inyɛ i isɛɛ ibara ame ne, Ɣaa aanagu mi isoɣɔ.
60002021	Nnɛgbe ɔso i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ɔbɔ ne, alasɔ Kristo ɔ̃ wũ ɔwe inyɛ i mi iti ɔnyua ikparĩ ɔsɛ sɔ miasiai ɔ̃ ngbama.
60002022	“Ɔ̃ibara ikpi kuiwɛ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ila sila ɔnya ana.”
60002023	Gɔ matia wũ ne, ɔ̃itia ɔti kuso, mma lote wũ ɔɣiã ne, ɔ̃igbarĩ ma, ɣɛɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔsia i Ɣaa iso, ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.
60002024	Kristo mɔmɔ lofɔ bo akpi ɔsore ku ɔwi gɔ mapɛ wũ mamatãra i kudziri iso. Ɔbara nnɛgbe sɔ si boabɔrɛ i ikpi nrɔɔ̃ ame, ɣɛɛ boasɛ ngbã botã isɛɛ ibara, fiɛ iki i ɔ̃ aɣɛi wa ɔfɔ ame ne, miɔna isosarɛ.
60002025	Ɔwiɔ ne, mise lɛ masɛrɛrerɔ̃ ma loyu ɔri, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa ɔɔkpesera mi ɔbɔ Masɛrɛkɔdze gu ngɔ nto ɔdzuɛ̃ mi kɔrɛ.
60003001	Mi marãyiridze mi wũ ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã mi marã sɔ si ma ɔrere iiɖe fɔɖedze ne, mi nsɛgbai aatã sɔ maafiniki bidɛ miiwa kanya miɣɛ kuira.
60003002	Alasɔ mato maanya mi karɔ̃ ibɔso gu mi ngbã sekelea.
60003003	Iiɖe mi siwɛrɛ̃ ibara gu sikãrɛtɛa ara ipia gu arapia wa lofɔ kuɣa ipia loaɖi mi kulɛ ite.
60003004	Ɣɛɛ ne, mi kulɛ si kute so i mi kame ame, ɔtu ɣɔa gu karɔ̃ ibɔso nɛ nɖe kulɛ gɔ loisɛ kuro fiɛ kufɔ kuɣa ta Ɣaa anɔ ana.
60003005	Marɔ̃go sekelea ma losu ma situ masia i Ɣaa iso ku koko ɔwi ne, ngbɔ makɛrɛ so iki i karɔ̃ ibɔ so itã ma marã ame ne.
60003006	Ngbɔ i Sara ɔbɔ so karɔ̃ ɔtã Abraham fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkpere wũ sɔ, “Wũ iyo Ɔse.” Sara mabi birɔ̃gomi ka miɖe mi wũ si mibara ara sɛɛ fiɛ kuira iisɛ ipia mi ifɔ̃.
60003007	Mi marɔ̃goyiridze ana ne, mitsue sɔ mi mare na ɔle makategu mi. Misɛgu ma i kuwarɛ ame alasɔ mi gu ma i Ɣaa aatã ngbã karatã. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃akã mi atsue si mikparama kayi.
60003008	Kawirikɔ̃ ne, mitã mi ɔɖuɖu adzuni si aɖe awɛ̃, mi manyii ara si aɖo mi kayiri, miɖɔɛ so lɛ manyiibi awe, mibara kayiribielea mitã so si mibɔ so karɔ̃.
60003009	Midaabara ikpi miti kuso, si magbarĩ mi ana ne, midaagbarĩ miti kuso, ɣɛɛ i wã kanya ne, mitã kusɛkusɛ ala gɔ Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ne, kusɛkusɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã mi.
60003010	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i Ɔko Sekelea ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃anya ngbã ɔmɛrɛ̃ fiɛ ɔto ɔbie sɔ so si siɣɔ wũ ne, ɔnyua maturi ara lalaa iɣɛ si ɔnyua mila ana.
60003011	Ɔnyua ikpi ɔbara si ɔbara isɛɛ. Ɔbie isobuɛ ku ɔ̃ ɔtu ɔɖuɖu.
60003012	Alasɔ Ɣaa anɔ sia i maturi ma nsɛ mabara sibɔlɔlɔ ara iso, fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔkã ma atsue si makparama kayi. Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa sɛ ɔkarã makpibaradze anɔ.”
60003013	Nna loabara mi ira boa si anɔ ɔrɛtɛ mi i isɛɛ ibara iso?
60003014	Ɣɛɛ si miwe inyɛ ala isɛɛ ibara ɔso ne, mitã so si siɣɔ mi. Midaanigã kuwɛ̃, fiɛ midaamararã so ana.
60003015	Ɣɛɛ i nnɛgbe kanya ne, misu kuwarɛ ɔɖuɖu mitã Kristo lɛ Bosate i mi situ ame. Miledza so ɔwi biara sɔ miawo ɔbiara gɔ loakarɛ mi itɔ̃me irere i ɔriinyɔ nɛ miba iso mmuai ɔtã.
60003016	Ɣɛɛ mibara ne ku karɔ̃ ibɔso gu kuwarɛ. Mitã sɔ mi kaɣere ame aakpa sɔ mma nto matia mi sɔ misiai Kristo ne, kunuarɛ aakpɛ̃ ma i anyakpi wa mato maɣɛ iso.
60003017	Alasɔ ilɛ sɔ aawe inyɛ i isɛɛ ibara ame si ngbɔ nɖe Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ iɖo sɔ aawe inyɛ lɛ kpibaradze.
60003018	Alasɔ Kristo ɔkpi i makpibaradze iti ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã i ɔwi ɔɖuɖu kanya. Atoa sɔ ɔɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ne, ɔkpi i makpibaradze iti sɔ iaki i ne iso ne, ɔ̃awo bo ɔkɔ ɔbɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ. Maɖoe wũ i siturina ame, ɣɛɛ iki i Ɣaa Siwarã ame ne, ɔta ɔpia ngbã.
60003019	I Siwarã ame ne, ɔsɛ ɔ̃aɣere siwarã dzɛ mapia iyo i ikpibiɔ ame Ɣaa itɔ̃me.
60003020	Ma nɖe mma loikã Ɣaa kuka atsue ku ɔwi gɔ i Noa to ɔwe aɖaka ne. Ɣaa ɔna ɔtu ɔtã ma. Maturi irɛ̃saã pɛ ma nɖe ma farafana lona iɖi i ndu mɛ loyi minina kayi mmɔ ame.
60003021	Ndu mɛgbe se lɛ Ɣaa itupie nɛ loɔfɔ mi ipia i ngbã ame kiniɔ. Iiɖe ndu mɛ loafore anyini iɖi maturi iso miɖe, ɣɛɛ iɖe ndamu ikã itã Ɣaa i kaɣere ga lokpa ame. Ɣaa itupie lofɔ mi itã ngbã iki i Yesu Kristo ita ibɔrɛ i makpise ame iso.
60003022	Kristo ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɛ i Ɣaa kuɖearɔ̃ iso i kato, fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe Ɣaa makpabo, mma nto maɖe iso gu sile dzɛ mpia i kato ɔɖuɖu iso.
60004001	Ne ɔso gɔ Kristo ɔwe inyɛ lɛ ɔturi awe ɔso ne, miledza mi adzuni ame misɛ lɛ ɔ̃, alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔwe inyɛ lɛ ɔturi iisisɛ ɔbara ikpi.
60004002	Ne ɔso ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ne, misɛ ngbã i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kanya ne iiɖe ɔturi ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ wũ ɔkã kanya.
60004003	Miɔnina ɔwi gbodzoo ku ɔwi gɔ lofe mibara ara wa i maɣɔsɔrɛdze sɛ maɖɔɛ ibara. Wã awɛ̃ nɖe kulaa nyanyarĩa iɖe, ɔrakolo, itarɛ̃, ɔɖegbodzo, ɔnɔle, gu ira lalaa biara lɛ aɣɔ isɔrɛ.
60004004	Gɔ miisisɛ misiai ma i ara lalaa kaɖukaɖu wamɔ ibara ame ne, isɛ ibara ma ɣii ne ɔso masɛ matia mi ne.
60004005	Ɣɛɛ mato maaɖi so kanya i Ɣaa gɔ loɔledza so ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛgu maturi nyɔa gu makpise katɔ̃.
60004006	Nnɛgbe ɔso i Kristo ɔɣere makpise ana Itɔ̃me Bielea sɔ atoa sɔ Ɣaa ɔɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me i maturi kasɛ lɛ ɔturi biara ne, i siwarã kasɛ ne, maasɛ ngbã lɛ Ɣaa awe.
60004007	Ara ɔɖuɖu kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔro ɔɣo, ne ɔso minyɔ so si mimɔɛ̃ so mila kukaakɔ sɔ miawo kayi ɔkparama.
60004008	Ɣɛɛ nnɛ lonya iɖo i wã ɔɖuɖu ame nɖe sɔ miaɖɔɛ so kukaakɔ alasɔ kuɖɔɛ sɛ kusu akpi gbodzoo wa i ɔturi ɔbara kutsɛ.
60004009	Si mi malaa ɔbo mi lɛ mafɔ ne, mifɔ ma, ɣɛɛ midaaɣɛ kusakuso.
60004010	Mi ndɛ̃ ɔbiara ɔfɔ karatã ɔbɔrɛgu i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, ne ɔso lɛ maturi sɛɛ ma nto manyɔ Ɣaa karatã agbãagbã iso matã wũ ne, mibara karatã gagbe karabara kukaakɔ sɔ kaaɖe kusia katã mi ɔɖuɖu.
60004011	Si mi ɔrere to ɔɣɛ Ɣaa itɔ̃me ne, ɔɣɛ ne lɛ ngɔ i Ɣaa ɔpia silɔ i kanya sɔ ɔɣere maturi. Ngɔ nto ɔbuai maturi si ɔbuai ma ku ɔle ɔɖuɖu gɔ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ sɔ i ara ɔɖuɖu ame ne, maale Ɣaa iki i Yesu Kristo iso. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe kuwarɛ gu ɔle ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
60004012	Manyii ɖɔɛse, idaabara mi ɣii i inyɛwe siare nɛ ame mito miki lɛ ira nɛ loiba inya iɖe nto iba mi iso.
60004013	Ɣɛɛ i ne kanya ne, mina isoɣɔ sɔ mito miwe inyɛ lɛ Kristo awe sɔ ɔwi gɔ ɔ̃aledza iba i ɔ̃ ɔle ame ne, so aaɣɔ mi kukaakɔ.
60004014	Si mato matia mi sɔ miɖe Kristo masiaidze ne, mina isoɣɔ alasɔ ikpawaĩ Siwarã dzɛ nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã sia mi iso.
60004015	Ɣɛɛ mi ndɛ̃ kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaawe inyɛ lɛ turiɖoese, ɣee yukukpe, ɣee ɔturi lalaa, ɣee ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ maturi iso ara awe.
60004016	Ɣɛɛ si mito miwe inyɛ alasɔ miɖe Kristo mare ne, kunuarɛ si kudaakpɛ̃ mi, ɣɛɛ mipɛ Ɣaa siba sɔ Kristo iyere sia mi iso.
60004017	Ɣaa atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ɔɔɣo, fiɛ Ɔ̃ maturi iso iasɛ karɔ̃. Fiɛ si isɛ karɔ̃ i bo iso ne, nda iawirigu mma loifɔ Ɔ̃ Itɔ̃me Bielea maɖe?
60004018	Lɛ kumɛgɔ matsɛrɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Si iba ɔle fiɛ Ɣaa aafɔ maturi bɔlɔlɔa ne, nda iase mma loiɣe Ɣaa gu makpibaradze?”
60004019	Ne ɔso mma nto mawe inyɛ i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ kanya si makɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ mabara isɛɛ. Masu so mapia i ma baradze nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso.
60005001	Mme lɛ mafɔɖedze tɔ̃ɖedze gɔ lonya Kristo inyɛwe ku anɔ, fiɛ loto loana kaɖekɔ̃ i ikpawaĩ nɛ loaba ame ne, loto matɔ̃ɖedze ma mpia i mi ndɛ̃ i kukpa.
60005002	Mimɔɛ̃ Ɣaa maturi ma ɔsu ɔpia mi i nrɔɔ̃ ame mila ku mi situ lɛ kumɛgɔ i masɛrɛkɔdze sɛ ɔnyɔ masɛrɛ iso. Ngbɔ i Ɣaa to ɔbie ne iiɖe ku ɔɣiɛ. Midaabara mi karabara ala sosina ame kuso gɔ miafɔ kere ɔso, ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ gɔ miba mitã karabara ɔso.
60005003	Midaaɖe sigara i Ɣaa maturi ma mpia i mi kayirinɔ iso, ɣɛɛ miɖe ikparĩ sɛɛ mitã ma.
60005004	Iyɔ ɔwi gɔ i Masɛrɛkɔdzekpakpa aaba ne, mito miafɔ sigaraikoto nɛ loafiɛ ɔwi biara.
60005005	Mi makoso ana ne, mibɔ so karɔ̃ mitã makpakpa. Mi ɔɖuɖu si misu karɔ̃ ibɔso mipia lɛ arapia si mibuai so ala maɣɛ i Ɔko Sekelea ame sɔ, “Ɣaa sɛ ɔkarã mma lokɔlɛ so kato anɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔnyɔ mma lobɔ so karɔ̃ nnya.”
60005006	Ne ɔso misu so mipia i Ɣaa kɔrɔ̃ teterea kayirinɔ i karɔ̃ ibɔso ame si ɔ̃akɔlɛ mi kato i ɔ̃ ɔwi sɛɛ iso.
60005007	Misu mi ara wa ɔɖuɖu nto aɖaa mi mipia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔ̃ anɔ sia i mi iso ɔwi biara.
60005008	Midzuɛ̃ so si minyɔ waĩ! Alasɔ mi tsirise Ɔbosam pia ɔki lɛ dzata ɔfafã ɔbie ngɔ ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ ɔwe.
60005009	Miya teteree i mi kafɔkaɖe ame si misɛ̃ wũ alasɔ miɣe sɔ mi malaa fɔɖedze i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu to mawe inyɛ ngbɔ.
60005010	Ɣɛɛ si miwe inyɛ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ kere ne, Ɣaa gɔ nɖe nnyainyɔ Ɔse gɔ lokpere mi sɔ mi gu Kristo aana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ nɛ nna katui ame si ɔbara mi sekelee, ɔtã miya teteree, ɔtã mi ɔle, mire siɖu.
60005011	Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ɔle gɔ loibaro ɔnya. Si iba ngbɔ.
60005012	Silvano gɔ losɛ lowarɛ lɛ fɔɖedze gɔ nɣɛ teteree lobuai me lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe. Lobie sɔ lopia mi ɔle iki i nnɛ lonya ku wũ anɔ sɔ Ɣaa abualɛra bielea aɖe ngbe, ne ɔso miya i wã ame teteree.
60005013	Mi manyii fɔɖedze ikuri nɛ i Ɣaa ɔɖi i Babilonia karɔ̃ iso gu wũ ɔbi Marko sɔ maya mi o-o.
60005014	Miya so ku mafɔɖedze ikuri ame kuɖɔɛ. Isobuɛ si iwegu mi ma ɔɖuɖu nɖe Kristo mare.
61001001	Mme Simon Petro gɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo ɔɖabo gu katɔ̃mesɛdze lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mma ɔɖuɖu iki i Ɣaa gu bo Ɖidze Yesu Kristo sibɔlɔlɔ ame ne, maba kafɔkaɖe ga lofɔ kuɣa lɛ bo kare.
61001002	Ɣaa si ɔtã sɔ mi abualɛra gu mi isobuɛ si isi ibua gɔ mito mitsue wũ gu Yesu gɔ nɖe Bosate.
61001003	Ɣaa ɔki i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame ɔsu ara wa ɔɖuɖu lonya bo i ngbã mɛgbe ame ɔtã bo sɔ boasɛ ngbã mɛ lokote lɛ mafɔɖedze. Ɔbara ngbɔ alasɔ boɣe ɔ̃ gɔ lokpere bo sɔ boba boana kaɖekɔ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ gu ɔ̃ isɛɛ ibara ame.
61001004	Fiɛ iki i ara wagbe iso ne, ɔtã bo karatã ga ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ fiɛ kafɔ kuɣa sɔ boaki i kã iso ne, boana ɔ̃ kumiamia boabɔrɛ i ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ kayiiso maturi ɔkã fiɛ iawɔra ma ame.
61001005	Nnɛgbe ɔso ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miasu isɛɛ ibara mibua i mi kafɔkaɖe iso, misu inɔgba mibua i mi isɛɛ ibara iso.
61001006	Si misu iɖesoiso mibua i mi inɔgba iso, misu kanɔnyi mibua i iɖesoiso iso, si misu Ɣaa kunigã mibua i kanɔnyi iso.
61001007	Misu mafɔɖedze kuɖɔɛ mibua i Ɣaa kunigã iso si ka misu kuɖɔɛ mibua i mi mafɔɖedze kuɖɔɛ iso.
61001008	Alasɔ si miba ara wagbe fiɛ asi gbodzoo i mi ame ne, iatã sɔ mi kurabarara ame aakpa, mito miaɣe misia i Bosate Yesu Kristo itsue ame.
61001009	Mma nna ara wagbe ne, maisɛ manya dzoroo, fiɛ maɔɣara kɔra sɔ Ɣaa ɔɔfore ma akpi wa mabara mafegu ɔɖi ma iso.
61001010	Ne ɔso manyii, mipia kubɛ teteree iɖo ɔwiɔ misu misia mi ikpere nɛ i Ɣaa ɔkpere mi ita. Alasɔ si mibara ngbɔ ne, miibakpese kama minya i kafɔkaɖe ame minya.
61001011	Si mibara ngbɔ ne, mito miana ɔri mibo i Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo sigarakaɖekɔ̃ dzɛ nna katui ame.
61001012	Atoa sɔ ka miɣe ara wagbe koko fiɛ miɔre siɖu i mi kafɔkaɖe ga mifɔ ame ana ne, ikote sɔ loanyigira mi ɔwi biara.
61001013	Lonyɔ sɔ ikote sɔ loala loɔnyigira mi ara wagbe ayi kumɛgɔ losi ngbã.
61001014	Loɣe sɔ iisibadzoro fiɛ loaɖi sosina dzɛ nsɛ sikpi ngbe losɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bosate Yesu Kristo ɔɣere me ɔɖi.
61001015	Nnɛgbe ɔso fiɛ loto lobie sɔ loanyɔ sɔ i wũ kukpi kama ne, miala miɔnyigi ara wagbe ɔwi biara.
61001016	Itɔ̃me nɛ boɣere mi i Bosate Yesu Kristo iledza iba ku ɔle iso ne, iiɖe inatika nɛ i ɔturi ɔɖe i inɔgba ame iɖe boɖi ne bobɔrɛgu. Bo mɔmɔ lonya ɔ̃ kuwarɛ gu ɔ̃ ɔle ku anɔ fiɛ boɣere mi.
61001017	Bopia i mmɔ ku iyi nɛmɔ fiɛ Bo Ɔse Ɣaa ɔsu kuwarɛ gu ifiɛ ɔtã wũ. Silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Ɔlesate kɔrɛ sitã wũ sɔ, “Wũ Ɔbi ɖɔɛse i ngbe ne, ɔ̃ ara ɔbo me anɔ.”
61001018	Bo mɔmɔ lonɔ silɔ dzɛgbe ɔbɔrɛ i kato ku ɔwi gɔ bopia i Yesu kɔrɛ i kube sekelea iso.
61001019	Nnɛgbe ɔso bofɔ kanyamaɖidze kaɣɛkasɛ boɖe teteree ne. Mipia kubɛ si mimɔɛ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ gamɔ mila lɛ ɔkaniɛ gɔ nto ɔfiɛ i idududu ame gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔɖesɛrã aaɣo fiɛ ɔɖesɛrã iwãmi aafiɛ i mi situ ame.
61001020	Ira nɛ lonya iɖo fiɛ ikote sɔ miatsue nɖe sɔ, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔta i ɔ̃ ɔle iso ɔɖi kaɣɛkasɛ ga matsɛrɛ masɛ karɔ̃.
61001021	Alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iiɣɛ Ɣaa kaɣɛkasɛ i ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle ame ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me ɔsɛ ɔnya, ɣɛɛ Siwarã Bielea lotã maturi ɔle fiɛ maɣɛ nnɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ masɛ.
61002001	Lɛ kumɛgɔ i mila kanyamaɖidze ɔwe ku ɔwi gɔ lofe ame ne, ngbɔ ame i mila maratedze ana to maabɔrɛ i mi ndɛ̃ ne. Mato maabɔ mila ara ite wa loawɔra maturi, masɛ̃ ta Bosate gɔ loɖi ma gɔ iaki i ne iso ne, maawɔra so mala.
61002002	Maturi gbodzoo to maasiai ma ara nyanyarĩa ibara itã sɔ ne ɔso ne, maturi aaɣɛ anyakpi i Kristo kafɔkaɖe iso.
61002003	Gɔ maɖe mma nsɛ makɛkɛ anɔ ɔso ne, mato maasu mila atɔ̃me mana kusia i mi iso. Ɣaa ɔɔtã ma ipɔ ɔsɛ koko, fiɛ ɔ̃ɔledza so ɔtã ma iwɔra.
61002004	Ɣaa iinyɔ ɔ̃ makpabo ma lobara ikpi nnya, ɣɛɛ ɔnyi ma ɔfuĩdza ɔpia i itɔkpe nɛ loisɛ inyi ame, i iwo gudua ame ɔsɛ ɔtã iyi nɛ ɔ̃aɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me.
61002005	Ngbɔ ame i Ɣaa iinyɔ mma losɛ ngbã ku Noa ɔwi fiɛ maisɛ manigã wũ nnya ne. Ɔtã ndu ɔyi miwɔra ma. Noa gɔ lopɛ sibɔlɔlɔ imomo gu maturi ikɔdzɛ mama pɛ lona iɖi.
61002006	Fiɛ Sodom gu Gomora simagɛ̃ ana ne, Ɣaa ɔtã ma ipɔ gɔ ɔwɔra ma ku ala ɔtɔ si ɔsu ɔte mma loasɛ ngbã fiɛ maibasu kunigã matã Ɣaa.
61002007	Ɣaa ɔɖi Lot gɔ nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa fiɛ ara nyanyarĩa wa i mamɔ to mabara ɔbiɛ wũ ɔtu.
61002008	Ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa gɔgbe ɔsɛ i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ iyi biara ne, ɔla ɔ̃ɔnɔ fiɛ ɔla ɔ̃ɔnya ma ara lalaa ibara nɛ nsɛ ibiɛ wũ ɔtu.
61002009	Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɣe kumɛgɔ ɔ̃aɖi maturi bɔlɔlɔa i ma amɔrɛ̃ ame fiɛ ɔ̃amɔɛ̃ malalaa ɔpia i kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ame ɔsɛ ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛyi.
61002010	Titirio mma nsɛ makã ara wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ma sosina ɔkã fiɛ maisɛ mawarɛ Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔɖe ma iso. Mila maratedze magbe ba ɔtu maisɛ manigã si mato matia ta sile sekelea dzɛ mpia i kato.
61002011	Ɣɛɛ ta Ɣaa makpabo ma mba ɔle fiɛ makɔlɛ maɖo mila maratedze magbe ne, maisɛ maya i Ɣaa katɔ̃ matia sile sekelea dzɛgbe.
61002012	Ɣɛɛ maturi magbe sɛ mabara ara lɛ ipo ame mabɔi ma loiɣe ara fiɛ maawo ma ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔɖoe. Masɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i ara wa mainɔ karɔ̃ iso fiɛ Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra ma lɛ ipo ame mabɔi awe.
61002013	Ɣaa to ɔ̃atã mawe inyɛ i ɔɣiã gɔ mate maturi kanya. Kunuarɛ iisɛ kukpɛ̃ ma sɔ maabara ara wa loawe ma sosina ɔmɛrɛ̃ ku anɔwã. Masɛ mabara anuarɛra gu anyanyara. Masɛ maɖegu mi kulaa i ayi iɖe ame, ɣɛɛ ɔsɔsɔla mato so.
61002014	Asɔrɔ̃ iɖe iisɛ itɔrɛ ma, fiɛ ikpi ibara ana iisɛ imi ma. Masɛ masɔsɔla mma loire siɖu i kafɔkaɖe ame fiɛ maɔsɛ katɔ̃ i kanɔbɛbɛ ame, ne ɔso Ɣaa sigbarĩ sia ma iso.
61002015	Maɔyu ɔri alasɔ masɛ̃ ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso iki. Masiai Ɣaa kanyaɖidze Balam gɔ nɖe Boer ɔbi fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ kuso gɔ ɔ̃afɔ i ikpi ibara ame.
61002016	Ɣaa ɔnyagalagu wũ i ɔ̃ ikpi iti gɔ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔfirimu ɔɖegu wũ ika ku siturilɔ ɔtindza wũ i ɔ̃ alalara wa ɔto ɔbara ɔso.
61002017	Mmagbe se lɛ siwore dzɛ losɔ̃ ɣee adɔdɔ wa i ɔwiri teregu ɔkigu. Ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔledza kakɔi ɔsɛ ma i iwo gudua ame.
61002018	Masɛ makɔlɛ so kato maɣɛ atsuɛ pɛ̃ fiɛ masɛ masu ma sosina ɔrakolo makpadzɛ̃ mma nto mafiniki mabɔrɛ i ikpi ame mapia i kasɔla ame.
61002019	Masɛ masɔsɔla maturi sɔ maatã ma iɖi ku ɔwi gɔ ame i ma mɔmɔ ɖe masande matã ikpi. Ira biara nɛ nto iɖe ɔturi iso ne, ɔ̃ɔkpese ne ɔsande.
61002020	Si maturi ɔki Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo itsue ame matere mabɔrɛ i kayiiso ara wa nsɛ apukutura ma kɔrɛ, fiɛ kama ara wamɔ ɔkpese aba aamɔɛ̃ ma aɖe ma iso ne, ma ngbã kawirikɔ̃ sɛ inyanyarĩ iɖo karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.
61002021	Si madaatsue kuira i sibɔlɔlɔ ara ibara iso kɔra ne, tee ilɛ ma iɖo sɔ maatsue ngbã ɔri maledza ikpese i mmara mɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã kama.
61002022	Nnɛ loba ma iso ɔte sekelee sɔ igbã nɛgbe ɖe ɔnukuare sɔ, “Kpɛkpɛ ɔkpese ɔkpa ɔ̃aɖe ɔ̃ kura,” fiɛ “Kparako gɔ mapie ndu ɔɔkpese ɔkpa ɔ̃apie iba.”
61003001	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, ɔko nyɔare loto lotsɛrɛ mi i ngbe ne, fiɛ i sɛ̃ inyɔɔ ame ne, lorɛgɛ̃ra mi adzuni i ara sɛɛ ibara iso.
61003002	Lobie sɔ minyigi ara wa i kanyamaɖidze sekelea ɔɣɛ masɛ koko gu Bosate gu Ɖidze mmara mɛ i mi katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔsu matã mi.
61003003	Iɖeakatɔ̃ ne, lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ i ɔwi tsɔra gɔgbe ame ne, maturi ma i ma sosina ara nto aɖe ma iso fiɛ masɛ mabara maturi aɣiãra to maaba.
61003004	Mato maakarɛ mi sɔ, “Ne ngɔ loɣɛ sɔ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba ɣɛɛ? Alasɔ ita i ɔwi gɔ ɔwa mɛrɛ̃ ɔkpi iba iabo nɔme ne, ira biara to ikɛlɛ lɛ kumɛgɔ ise ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃.”
61003005	Masɛ̃ sɔ maito mafɔ maɖe sɔ ta kokooko ne, Ɣaa ɔɣɛ itɔ̃me fiɛ kato gu karɔ̃ ɔgɔdɛ̃. Karɔ̃ ne, ɔbara kã ɔbɔrɛgu i ndu ame fiɛ ndu iso kaɣɛ.
61003006	Fiɛ ndu ame iɖe i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔwɔra ala kayi kuere ne.
61003007	Ɣaa itɔ̃me ame iɖe lomɔɛ̃ kato gu karɔ̃ ito ipɛ i kiniɔ fiɛ ɔledza wã ɔsɛ ɔtã itsuedza ne. Ɔledza wã ɔsɛ ɔtã atɔ̃me iɣɛyi nɛ ɔ̃awɔra mma loisɛ manigã wũ.
61003008	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, loito lobie sɔ miɣara ira ka iwɛ̃! I Bosate anɔ ne, ikpaki kuiwɛ̃ na i ikpɛnɛ gu akɔ kakpi ndɛ̃. I ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, wã anyɔɔ ne, ira ka iwɛ̃ kere iɖe.
61003009	I mawɛ̃ kasusu kanya ne, Ɣaa iito ɔpɛ siwa i nnɛ ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ iso, ɣɛɛ ne, iiɖe ngbɔ iɖe. Ɣɛɛ ne, ɔto ɔɣara so pɔkɔsɔɔ ɔtã mi alasɔ ɔ̃ito ɔbie sɔ kuwɛ̃ si ɔwɔ, ɣɛɛ sɔ ɔbiara si ɔfiniki ɔna iɖi.
61003010	Ɣɛɛ Bosate iyi nɛmɔ to iaba lɛ kumɛgɔ i yukukpe sɛ ɔba. Iyi nɛmɔ iso ne, kuɖokpo to kuayu ku kulu teteree, fiɛ ara wa mpia i kato to aatsue anina, karɔ̃ ku ira biara nɛ mpia i kã iso to iayu.
61003011	Gɔ ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu to aawɔ lɛ ngbe ɔso ne, mme maturi igbã ikote sɔ miaɖe? Ikote sɔ miasɛ ngbã sekelea minigã Ɣaa.
61003012	Gɔ misi misia Bosate iyi nɛmɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miatã ne iba mala. Iyi nɛ i kato aatsue fiɛ kato ara ɔɖuɖu aawɛnɛkɛ̃ ala ɔtɔwiri ɔso.
61003013	Ɣɛɛ bosi bosia nnɛ i Ɣaa ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ gɔ ne nɖe Kato ɣɛtɛ gu Karɔ̃ ɣɛtɛ ngbegɔ i sibɔlɔlɔ aawe.
61003014	Ne ɔso wũ manyii, gɔ misi misia iyi nɛmɔ ne, mipia kubɛ sɔ miase sekelee i Ɣaa anɔ miwe i isobuɛ ame gu wũ.
61003015	Misu Bosate iɣaraso lɛ ɔri gɔ ɔtã mi sɔ miana iɖi. Itɔ̃me nɛgbe ame i bo ɔnyii ɖɔɛse Paulo ɔtsɛrɛ ɔsese mi i inɔgba nɛ i Ɣaa ɔtã wũ kanya ne.
61003016	Nnɛgbe iɖe ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ siko ɔɖuɖu ame i itɔ̃me nɛgbe iso ne. Ara awɛ̃ pia i ɔ̃ siko ame gɔ aba ɔle ku karɔ̃ inɔ. Wã i maturi mawɛ̃ ma loikpa anɔ fiɛ maiɣɛ teteree to maɖi karɔ̃ i mila ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ame masɛ mafinikira Ɣaa atɔ̃me mama. Nnɛgbe nto iawɔra ma ne.
61003017	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ maɖɔɛse ne, ka miɣe ara wagbe koko, ne ɔso midzuɛ̃ so sɔ mma loisɛ mabara i mmara iso kurabarara iibapuri mi kuwuĩ i karɔ̃.
61003018	Bosate gu Ɖidze Yesu Kristo si ɔbualɛ mi sɔ miatsue wũ gbodzoo mibua. Ɔ̃ ɔkpɛ nɖe ile ita i kiniɔ ito ikɛlɛ ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ.
62001001	Boto botsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ mba ngbã fiɛ ipia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ iso. Bonɔ ne, bonya ne ku anɔ, fiɛ bopɛgu ne ana.
62001002	Gɔ Ɣaa ɔɖi ngɔ nɖe itɔ̃me nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã kayi ne, bonya wũ fiɛ boɖe ɔ̃ iso ika. Bopɛ imomo i ngbã mɛ nna katui iso botã mi. Ɣaa bo Ɔse ɔɖi wũ ɔte bo fiɛ ɔpia i Ɣaa kɔrɛ.
62001003	Nnɛ bonya fiɛ bonɔ ne, ne boto boɣere mi ne, sɔ mi wũ miabua i bo iso fiɛ boabara sinyii ku Bo Ɔse gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Boto botsɛrɛ nnɛgbe botã mi si bo isoɣɔ aayi.
62001005	Itɔ̃me nɛ bonɔ bobɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ Ɔbi kɔrɛ nɖe nnɛ boto bopɛ imomo sɔ, Ɣaa nɖe ikpawaĩ, fiɛ idududu kuiwɛ̃ na i ɔ̃ ame ɖuɖuuɖu.
62001006	Ne ɔso si boɣɛ sɔ boto boɖegu wũ kulaa, ɣɛɛ bosi ngbã i idududu ame ne, iyɔ boto bosɔsɔla so i ikaɖe gu kurabarara ame.
62001007	Ɣɛɛ si bosi ngbã i ikpawaĩ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i ikpawaĩ ame ne, iyɔ boto boɖegu so kulaa fiɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu ima sɛ ifore bo iɖi i ikpi biara ame.
62001008	Si boɣɛ sɔ ikpi kuiwɛ̃ na i bo iso ne, boto bosɔsɔla so, iyɔ ɔnukuare kuwɛ̃ na i bo ame.
62001009	Ɣɛɛ si bobusi bo akpi boɣere Ɣaa ne, ɔɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ kaɣɛkasɛ ɔla fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ, ɔ̃asu bo akpi ɔɖuɖu ɔtsɛ bo fiɛ ɔ̃afore bo ɔɖi i bo ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔɖuɖu bobara ɔɖi bo iso.
62001010	Si bosɛ̃ sɔ boibara ikpi ne, boto bosu Ɣaa bobara ladze iyɔ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me na i bo ame.
62002001	Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi sɔ si miibabara ikpi, ɣɛɛ si ɔrere ɔbara ikpi ne, boba ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã Ɣaa iti i bo kanya gɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa.
62002002	Fiɛ Kristo mɔmɔ nɖe ngɔ iso bosɛ bona bo akpi kasukatsɛ, fiɛ iiɖe bo are kere, ɣɛɛ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu.
62002003	Si boto bobara i Ɣaa mmara iso ne, iyɔ ite sekelee sɔ boɣe wũ.
62002004	Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔɣe wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔbara i ɔ̃ mmara iso ne, ladze i ɔnyiiɔ ɖe, fiɛ ɔnukuare na i ɔ̃ ame.
62002005	Ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɔla ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ gɔ ɔba ɔtã Ɣaa ɔyi gbaã. Nnɛ boabara fiɛ boatsue sɔ bopia i ɔ̃ ame ngbe ne.
62002006	Ɔbiara gɔ loaɣɛ sɔ ɔpia i Ɣaa ame ne, ikote sɔ ɔ̃asɛ ngbã lɛ kumɛgɔ i Yesu Kristo ɔsɛ.
62002007	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, nnɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, iiɖe mmara ɣɛtɛ miɖe, ɣɛɛ mikuere mɛ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ miɖe. Mmara kuere mɛgbe nɖe itɔ̃me nɛ miɔnɔ koko ne.
62002008	Ɣɛɛ gbaã ne, mmara mɛ loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi ngbe ne, miɣɛtɛ miɖe, fiɛ ɔnukuare gɔ mpia i me ame sɛ ɔte so i Kristo gu bo ame ɔɖuɖu. Alasɔ idududu kato ife iro fiɛ ikpawaĩ mɔmɔ ka ito ifiɛ koko.
62002009	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔpia i ikpawaĩ ame fiɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔkpese ɔpia i idududu ame ipɛ i kiniɔ.
62002010	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ikpawaĩ ame ɔsɛ, fiɛ kuira na gɔ iatã ɔbo i ikpi ame.
62002011	Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ lotsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔpia i idududu ame. Idududu ame iɖe ɔsɛ, ne ɔso ɔ̃isɛ ɔtsue ngbegɔ ɔsɛ ala idududu ɔbiɛ wũ anɔmi.
62002012	Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, nto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔsu mi akpi ɔtsɛ i Kristo iti.
62002013	Mase, nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Kristo gɔ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi maporoporoi alasɔ miɔɖe Tsirise iso.
62002014	Wũ mabi, nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Bo Ɔse. Mase, loto lotsɛrɛ losese mi alasɔ miɣe Kristo gɔ mpia ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Maporoporoi nto lotsɛrɛ losese mi, alasɔ miba ɔle, ana ne, Ɣaa itɔ̃me pia i mi ame fiɛ miɔɖe Tsirise iso.
62002015	Midaaɖɔɛ kayiiso ɣee ira biara nɛ nɖe kayiiso ire alasɔ si mito miɖɔɛ kayiiso ne, iyɔ miito miɖɔɛ Bo Ɔse.
62002016	Alasɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i kayiiso, ara nyanyarĩa wa i maturi ɔtere masiai, nwa i maturi sɛ manyɔ fiɛ asɛ akpɛ̃ ma ɔkã gu nwa iso i maturi sɛ makɔlɛ so kato ɔɖuɖu iibɔrɛ i Bo Ɔse kɔrɛ, ɣɛɛ kayiiso abɔrɛ.
62002017	Kayiiso gu kã ara wa ɔɖuɖu nsɛ akpɛ̃ maturi ɔkã ɔwi ka ɔto ɔfe, ɣɛɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ to ɔ̃asɛ ngbã daaro daaro.
62002018	Wũ mabi, kayiiso kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔro ɔɣo! Miɣe sɔ Kristo ɔ̃ Tsirise to ɔ̃aba, fiɛ kiniɔ ne, Kristo matsirise gbodzoo ɔɔba gɔ ito ite sɔ kawirikɔ̃ ɔɔbore kabo.
62002019	Gbaã ne, iiɖe bo ndɛ̃ maturi maɖe, ne ɔso fiɛ mabɔrɛ i bo ame ne. Si bo ndɛ̃ maturi maɖe gbaã ne, tee makpese mapia i bo ndɛ̃. Ɣɛɛ mabɔrɛ i bo ndɛ̃ si ite sekelee sɔ ma kuwɛ̃ iiɖe bo ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃.
62002020	Ɣɛɛ Kristo ɔfedza Siwarã Bielea ɔfere mi iso, ne ɔso mi ɔɖuɖu ɣe ɔnukuare.
62002021	Iiɖe gɔ miiɣe ɔnukuare ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko gɔgbe, ɣɛɛ ala kumɛgɔ miɣe ɔnukuare fiɛ miɣe sekelee sɔ sila kusiwɛ̃ iiɖe Itɔ̃me Bielea.
62002022	Nna kowũ nɖe ladze? Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ iiɖe Yesu nɖe Kristo gɔ Ɣaa ɔsɔla nnɔĩ. Ɔ̃ gɔmɔ nɖe Kristo ɔ̃ tsirise ne. Ɔ̃ ɔɖe losɛ̃ Ɔbi gu Ɔse ɔɖuɖu ne.
62002023	Ɔbiara gɔ losɛ̃ Ɔbi ne, ɔsɛ̃ Ɣaa ana, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɔbi ne, ɔfɔ Ɔse ana.
62002024	Minyɔ kukaakɔ sɔ nnɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ aawe i mi ame. Si mibara ngbɔ ne, iyɔ mito miawe i sinyii ame ku Ɔse gu Ɔbi inyɔ.
62002025	Kristo ne, ngbã mɛ nna katui miɖe ɔɣɛ ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃atã bo.
62002026	Mma nto mabie sɔ maakɔ mi mayura ɔso fiɛ loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losese mi.
62002027	Ɣɛɛ mi ne, Kristo Siwarã dzɛ mifɔ mibɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ pia i mi ame. Ne ɔso miibabie kuwɛ̃ sɔ ɔte mi ara ala kumɛgɔ ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛgbe to site mi ira biara i ɔnukuare ame fiɛ iiɖe sila Siwarã siɖe ɔso. Mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ i sɛ̃ ara ite ame miwe i ɔ̃ ame.
62002028	Wũ mabi ɖɔɛse, mikɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ miwe i ɔ̃ ame sɔ si ɔwi gɔ ɔɖusi ɔbɔrɛ ne, boawo ɔya i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ ku katetere fiɛ kunuarɛ iibakpɛ̃ bo.
62002029	Si miɣe sɔ Kristo ɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ne, ikote sɔ miatsue sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara sibɔlɔlɔ ara ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe lɛ Kristo.
62003001	Minyɔ kuɖɔɛ wodoroa gɔ igbã i Bo Ɔse ba ɔtã bo! Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo kaɖu sɔ ɔsɛ ɔkpere bo sɔ ɔ̃ mabi, fiɛ gbaã ne, ɔ̃ mabi boɖe. Nnɛ ɔso i kayiiso iiɣe bo nɖe sɔ kaiɣe Ɣaa.
62003002	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, kiniɔ ne, Ɣaa mabi boɖe, fiɛ nnɛ tutuutu boaba boakpese ne, iite kukaakɔ, ɣɛɛ boɣe sɔ si Kristo ɔba ne, boto boase lɛ ɔ̃, fiɛ kumɛgɔ ɔse ne, ngbɔ boanya wũ ne.
62003003	Ɔbiara gɔ mba ɔriinyɔ nɛgbe i Kristo iso sɛ ɔbara so sekelee lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo se sekelee.
62003004	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɣaa mmara iso iɖe ɔta ɔya, alasɔ ikpi nɖe Ɣaa mmara iso idaabara.
62003005	Miɣe sɔ Kristo ne, ɔba sɔ si ɔba ɔ̃asu kayiiso akpi ɔkɛlɛgu, fiɛ ɔ̃ mɔmɔ na ikpi kuiwɛ̃.
62003006	Ɔbiara gɔ mpia i kulaa ame ku Kristo iisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔna isoɣɔ i ikpi ibara ame ne, ɔ̃inya Kristo fiɛ ɔ̃atsue wũ ɖuɖuuɖu.
62003007	Midaatã kuwɛ̃ si ɔsɔsɔla mi, wũ mabi ɖɔɛse! Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ ne, ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɔɖe lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo se bɔlɔlɔ.
62003008	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ikpi ne, Ɔbosam ɔre ɔɖe alasɔ Ɔbosam ne, ikpi ɔsɛ ɔbara ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃. Nnɛgbe tutuutu ɔso i Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔba ne, sɔ si ɔnina Ɔbosam kurabarara.
62003009	Ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi iisɛ ɔna isoɣɔ i ikpi ibara ame, alasɔ Ɣaa nsɛgbai pia i ɔ̃ ame. Ɔ̃isisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi ala Ɣaa nɖe ɔ̃ ɔse.
62003010	Ikpaki siare nɛ mpia i Ɣaa mabi gu Ɔbosam mabi ndɛ̃ nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔbara isɛɛ, fiɛ ɔ̃isɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ɔ̃iɖe Ɣaa ɔbi.
62003011	Itɔ̃me nɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, mitã boɖɔɛ so.
62003012	Iikote sɔ boase lɛ Kain gɔ nɖe Tsirise ɔbi fiɛ ɔɖoe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi. Be ɔso ɔɖoe ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi? Ɔɖoe wũ alasɔ ɔ̃ ɔnyiibi ɖe ɔturi bɔlɔlɔa ɣɛɛ ɔ̃ ɔɖe ɔturi lalaa.
62003013	Ne ɔso wũ manyii, idaabara mi ɣaa si kayiiso maturi ɔtsiri mi.
62003014	Boɣe sɔ boɔbɔrɛ i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame bobo i ngbã ame, boɣe ngbɔ alasɔ bosɛ boɖɔɛ bo manyii. Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii pia i kukpi nrɔɔ̃ ame kokooko.
62003015	Ɔbiara gɔ lotsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, turiɖoese ɔɖe, fiɛ miɣe sɔ turiɖoese na ngbã mɛ nna katui i ɔ̃ ame.
62003016	Kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔsu ɔ̃ ngbã ɔtã i bo iti lote bo nnɛ kowũ nɖe kuɖɔɛ. Ne ɔso ikote sɔ bo wũ boasu bo ngbã bosɔrɛ i bo manyii ngbã iti.
62003017	Si ranase ɔnya sɔ ira ɔnya ɔ̃ ɔnyii, ɣɛɛ iibɔrɛ i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ ɔ̃abuai wũ ne, nda ɔ̃abara fiɛ ɔ̃aɣɛ sɔ ɔto ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa?
62003018	Wũ mabi, midaatã boɖɔɛ so ala kanya kunu, ɣɛɛ bo kuɖɔɛ si kuɖe kuɖɔɛ mɔmɔ gɔ loate so i kurabarara ame.
62003019	Iki i nnɛgbe ame bonya sɔ ɔnukuare mabi boɖe, fiɛ boawe katetere i Ɣaa anɔ ne.
62003020	Si bo ɔtu ɔtã bo ipɔ ne, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa ɔmɔ ɔɖo bo ɔtu fiɛ ɔɣe ira biara.
62003021	Ne ɔso wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, si bo ɔtu iitã bo ipɔ ne, boba katetere i Ɣaa anɔ.
62003022	Fiɛ ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ bobɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ ne, bosɛ bofɔ, alasɔ boto bobara i ɔ̃ mmara iso fiɛ bobara ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ.
62003023	Mmara mɛ ɔtã bo nɖe sɔ bofɔ ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo boɖe si boɖɔɛ bo manyii lɛ kumɛgɔ i Kristo ɔɣere bo ɔfegu.
62003024	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔbara i Ɣaa mmara iso pia i Ɣaa ame fiɛ Ɣaa ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i ɔ̃ ame. Iki i ɔ̃ Siwarã dzɛ ɔtã bo ame ne, boɣe sɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame.
62004001	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, midaafɔ ɔbiara gɔ loɣɛ sɔ Ɣaa Siwarã pia i ɔ̃ ame miɖe, ɣɛɛ mifafarɛ minyɔ sɔ Siwarã dzɛmɔ ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ sibɔrɛ, alasɔ mila kanyamaɖidze gbodzoo ka mapia i kakɔi biara.
62004002	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ Kristo Yesu ɔba kayiiso lɛ ɔturi awune ne, ɔba Siwarã dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ. Ɔri gɔgbe iso miaki fiɛ miatsue ngɔ mba Siwarã dzɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne.
62004003	Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loaɣɛ sɔ Yesu iiba kayi lɛ ɔturi awune awe ne, siwarã dzɛmɔ iibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ, Kristo ɔ̃ tsirise sire siɖe. Minɔ sɔ siwarã dzɛmɔ to siaba kayiiso fiɛ kiniɔ ne, ka sipia i ngbe koko.
62004004	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ mabi ɖɔɛse ne, Ɣaa kɔrɛ mibɔrɛ fiɛ miɔɖe mila kanyamaɖidze mamɔ iso. Alasɔ Ɣaa Siwarã dzɛ mpia i mi ame ɔmɔ siba ɔle siɖo ndzɛ mpia i kayiiso maturi ame.
62004005	Kayiiso maturi maɖe, fiɛ masɛ maɖe ika i kayiiso ara iso, ne ɔso kayiiso maturi sɛ makã ma itɔ̃me atsue.
62004006	Ɣɛɛ bo ne, Ɣaa mare boɖe. Ɔbiara gɔ nɣe Ɣaa sɛ ɔkã bo itɔ̃me atsue, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loibɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ne, ɔ̃isɛ ɔkã bo itɔ̃me atsue. Nnɛgbe boasu bonya ɔnukuare Siwarã gu mila sire boɖi ite ne.
62004007	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, mitã boɖɔɛ so alasɔ Ɣaa kɔrɛ i kuɖɔɛ ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe fiɛ ɔɣe Ɣaa.
62004008	Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi iiɣe Ɣaa, alasɔ Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ.
62004009	Ɔri gɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔte bo nɖe sɔ, ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi Ɔwɛ̃ saã kayi ame sɔ iaki i ɔ̃ iso ne, boana ngbã mɛ nna katui.
62004010	Mitã loɣere mi nnɛ nɖe kuɖɔɛ. Iiɖe kumɛgɔ boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ, ɣɛɛ kumɛgɔ i ɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ Ɔbi ɔsese bo sɔ ɔ̃aɖe ngɔ iso iaki fiɛ boana akpi kasukatsɛ ne, ne nɖe kuɖɔɛ ne.
62004011	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, si ngbɔ i Ɣaa to ɔɖɔɛ bo ne, iyɔ ikote sɔ boaɖɔɛ so.
62004012	Kuwɛ̃ iinya Ɣaa ɔnya. Si boto boɖɔɛ so ne, iyɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame fiɛ ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ ɔyi i bo ame.
62004013	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa pia i bo ame fiɛ bo wũ bopia i ɔ̃ ame alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ Siwarã ɔpia i bo ame.
62004014	Boɔnya, fiɛ boɔsu ne bopɛ imomo boɣere maturi sɔ, Bo Ɔse ɔpia ɔ̃ Ɔbi sɔ ɔba ɔ̃akpese Ɖidze ɔtã maturi i kayi ame.
62004015	Ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ Yesu ne Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe ne, Ɣaa pia i ɔ̃ ame, fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔpia i Ɣaa ame.
62004016	Bo mɔmɔ ɣe, fiɛ bofɔ kuɖɔɛ gɔ i Ɣaa ba ɔtã bo boɖe. Ɣaa nɖe kuɖɔɛ, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ maturi ne, ɔpia i Ɣaa ame fiɛ Ɣaa ana pia i ɔ̃ ame.
62004017	Nnɛgbe ɔso ikote sɔ kuɖɔɛ aayi i bo ame sɔ atɔ̃me iɣɛyi ne, boawe katetere, alasɔ bo ngbã i kayi ame ɔkotegu Kristo mire.
62004018	Ifɔ̃ kuiwɛ̃ na i kuɖɔɛ ame, ɣɛɛ kuɖɔɛ gɔ loyi sɛ kusa ifɔ̃ kurera kama. Ne ɔso ngɔ nsɛ ɔnigã ne, ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ iiyi, alasɔ ifɔ̃ sɛgu kutsue ikpadzɛ̃.
62004019	Bosɛ boɖɔɛ Ɣaa alasɔ ɔ̃ loɖe katɔ̃ ɔɖɔɛ bo.
62004020	Si ɔrere ɔɣɛ sɔ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa, ɣɛɛ ɔtsiri ɔ̃ ɔnyii ne, ladze i ɔnyiiɔ ɖe. Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ loito ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii gɔ ɔto ɔnya ala anɔ ne, ɔ̃ibawo Ɣaa gɔ ɔ̃ito ɔnya ɔɖɔɛ.
62004021	Ne ɔso mmara mɛ i Kristo ɔtã bo nɖe sɔ, ɔbiara gɔ nto ɔɖɔɛ Ɣaa si ɔɖɔɛ ɔ̃ ɔnyii ana.
62005001	Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ ɔɖe sɔ Yesu nɖe Kristo gɔ i Ɣaa ɔsɔla nnɔĩ ne, Ɣaa ɔbi ɔɖe, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ nsɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔse sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔbi ana.
62005002	Ne ɔso si boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa fiɛ boto bobara i ɔ̃ mmara iso ne, iyɔ boɣe sɔ boto boɖɔɛ Ɣaa mabi ana.
62005003	Si bobara i Ɣaa mmara iso ne, ite sɔ boto boɖɔɛ wũ, fiɛ ɔ̃ mmara iso ibara na ɔle.
62005004	Alasɔ ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi sɛ ɔɖe kayi iso. Nnɛ bosu boɖe ala kayi iso nɖe bo kafɔkaɖe.
62005005	Ngɔ pɛ loawo kayiiso ɔɖe nɖe ngɔ lofɔ ɔɖe sɔ Yesu nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi.
62005006	Yesu Kristo nɖe ngɔ loba fiɛ bonya wũ boɖi ite iki i ɔ̃ Ɣaa itupie kubarara gu ɔ̃ ima nɛ ɔfere i karɔ̃ iki i ɔ̃ kukpi ame. Ɔ̃iba ku ndu kere, ɣɛɛ ndu gu ima, fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã mɔmɔ ɔɖe aɖansiɛ sɔ gbaã iɖe alasɔ nnɛ i Siwarã ɔɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
62005007	Maɖansiɛ itɛ maɖe mpia.
62005008	Ma nɖe Siwarã, ima gu ndu, fiɛ ma itɛ ɔɖuɖu aɖansiɛ ɖe awɛ̃.
62005009	Bosɛ bofɔ maturi aɖansiɛ boɖe, ɣɛɛ Ɣaa aɖansiɛ ba ɔrɔrã aɖo, fiɛ ɔsia itɔ̃me nɛgbe ita i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso.
62005010	Ne ɔso ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔɖe ne, ɔfɔ aɖansiɛ wagbe ɔpia i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ aɖansiɛ ɔɖe to ɔsia Ɣaa sila alasɔ ɔ̃ifɔ aɖansiɛ wa i Ɣaa ɔɖe i ɔ̃ Ɔbi iso ɔɖe.
62005011	Aɖansiɛ nɖe sɔ, Ɣaa ɔsu ngbã mɛ nna katui ɔtã bo, fiɛ ɔ̃ Ɔbi ame i ngbã mɛgbe pia.
62005012	Ɔbiara gɔ lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ne, ɔba ngbã mɛgbe, fiɛ ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ Ɔbi ne, ɔna ngbã.
62005013	Loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe lotã mi ma lofɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi miɖe si mitsue sɔ miba ngbã mɛ nna katui.
62005014	Nnɛ ɔso bosu bo iti bosia i Ɣaa iso nɖe sɔ ira biara nɛ boakarɛ i ɔ̃ kuɖɔɛ kanya ne, ɔsɛ ɔkã bo atsue.
62005015	Si boɣe sɔ ɔsɛ ɔkã bo atsue i ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ wũ ame ne, iyɔ boɣe sɔ ira biara nɛ bosɛ bokarɛ ne, bosɛ bofɔ ne i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ.
62005016	Si mi ɔrere ɔnya mi ɔnyii fɔɖedze to ɔbara ikpi nɛ loibakpadzɛ̃ wũ ikɛlɛgu kukpi ame ne, mikparama kayi i ɔ̃ iti si Ɣaa aatã wũ ngbã. Ngɔ lobara ikpi nɛ loibakpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ itɔ̃me iɖe ngbe. Ɣɛɛ ikpi iwɛ̃ igbã pia gɔ iakpadzɛ̃ kukpi ibɔ, iiɖe ne igbã loto loɣɛ sɔ mikparama kayi.
62005017	Ira biara nɛ loikote ne, ikpi iɖe, ɣɛɛ akpi awɛ̃ pia wa loibakɔ ɔturi akɛlɛgu kukpi ame.
62005018	Boɣe sɔ ɔbiara gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔbi iisɛ ɔkɛlɛ i katɔ̃ ɔbara ikpi, alasɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi sɛ ɔdzuɛ̃ wũ fiɛ Tsirise iibawo wũ ira boa kuiwɛ̃ ɔbara.
62005019	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa mare boɖe atoa sɔ kayiiso ɔɖuɖu pia i Tsirise ɔle kayirinɔ.
62005020	Boɣe sɔ Ɣaa Ɔbi ɔba kayiiso fiɛ ɔtã bonɔ ara karɔ̃ botsue Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɔnukuarese. Fiɛ ɔ̃ gɔ nɖe ɔnukuarese gu ɔ̃ Ɔbi Yesu Kristo ame bosi ngbã. Gbaã ne, Ɣaa nɖe nukuarese fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔtã bo ngbã mɛ nna katui.
62005021	Ne ɔso wũ mabi mirera so kama i iɣɔsɔrɛ kɔrɛ.
63001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme gɔ mme nɖe mafɔɖedze ɔkpakpa kɔrɛ nto losese ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɖɔɛse gu ɔ̃ mabi ma nto loɖɔɛ i ɔnukuare ame. Iiɖe wũ ɔnɔwɛ̃ me nsɛ loɖɔɛ mi, ɣɛɛ mma ɔɖuɖu nɣe ɔnukuare.
63001002	Alasɔ ɔnukuare pia i bo ame fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃awe ɔwi biara.
