63001003	Bo Ɔse Ɣaa gu Yesu Kristo gɔ nɖe Ɣaa Ɔbi si matã bo ma nto boɖɔɛ manyii i ɔnukuare ame abualɛra gu nnyainyɔ gu isobuɛ.
63001004	So ɔɣɔ me gbaã gɔ lonya sɔ fɔ mabi mawɛ̃ si ngbã i ɔnukuare ame lɛ kumɛgɔ i Bo Ɔse ɔte bo.
63001005	Ne ɔso loto lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losese mi Bokɔnyi ɖɔɛse sɔ mitã boɖɔɛ so. Iiɖe mmara ɣɛtɛ loto lotã mi, ɣɛɛ mmɛ bofɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ miɖe.
63001006	Kuɖɔɛ gɔ itɔ̃me boto boɣere mi nɖe sɔ boabara Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ. Mmara mɛ minɔ ta karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ nɖe sɔ, mi ɔɖuɖu si misɛgu so i kuɖɔɛ ame.
63001007	Maturisɔsɔladze gbodzoo ka mapia i kayi ame. Mato mate sɔ Yesu Kristo iiba kayi lɛ ɔturi awune awe. Maturisɔsɔladze nɖe mmagbe igbã fiɛ maɖe Kristo matsirise.
63001008	Minyɔ so kukaakɔ sɔ nnɛ iti mito mikpɛ̃ iibayu, ɣɛɛ miafɔ mi kuso ɔɖuɖu pɔpɔɔpɔ.
63001009	Ɔbiara gɔ loisɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ Kristo ara ite ɔla fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔte ara mama ne, ɔna i Ɣaa ame. Ɣɛɛ ɔbiara gɔ lomɔɛ̃ wã ɔto ne, Ɔse gu Ɔbi ɔɖuɖu pia i ɔ̃ ame.
63001010	Si ɔrere ɔba mi kɔrɛ fiɛ iiɖe Kristo ara ite iɖe ɔsu ɔbɔ ne, midaafɔ ɔnyiiɔ, midaatofora wũ kɔra.
63001011	Alasɔ ngɔ lowarɛ nrɔɔ̃ ɔfɔ ngɔmɔ ne, ɔbaragu wũ mawɛ̃ i ɔ̃ ikpi ame.
63001012	Atoa sɔ ara gbodzoo pia gɔ lobie sɔ loatsɛrɛ losese mi ne, loito lobie sɔ loatsɛrɛ wã i ɔko ame. Ɣɛɛ i ne kanya ne, nto lonyɔ ɔri sɔ mme mɔmɔ loaba mi kɔrɛ loba loanya mi ku anɔ fiɛ ka loaɣere mi fiɛ bo isoɣɔ aayi.
63001013	Fɔ ɔnyiibi rɔ̃go gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔturi mabi sɔ maya-ɔ kukaakɔ.
64001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme mafɔɖedze ɔkpakpa kɔrɛ nto losese-ɔ, Gayo wũ ɔnyii gɔ lobua nsɛ loɖɔɛ.
64001002	Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, nsɛ lokparama kayi ɔwi biara sɔ kayi si kalɛgu-ɔ, si awe i isosarɛ ame lɛ kumɛgɔ ilɛgu ta fɔ ɔkala.
64001003	So ɔɣɔ me gbaã gɔ manyii fɔɖedze mawɛ̃ ɔba maaɣere me sɔ akpese amɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare ato teteree lɛ kumɛgɔ amɔɛ̃ ala kokooko.
64001004	Gɔ lonɔ sɔ wũ mabi si ngbã i ɔnukuare ame ne, so ɔɣɔ me gbaã.
64001005	Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, asɛ abara nnɛ lokote i kumɛgɔ asɛ afɔ manyii fɔɖedze titirio mafɔ.
64001006	Maɔba maaɣere mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ mpia i ngbe kumɛgɔ asɛ aɖɔɛ ma. Loto-ɔ i kukpa sɔ kɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ si abuai ma kumɛgɔ lokote i Ɣaa karabara ame sɔ maakɛlɛgu ma irisɛ i katɔ̃.
64001007	Alasɔ Ɣaa iyere ame iɖe maɣo ɔri fiɛ maifɔ kuira mabɔrɛgu i mma loiɖe mafɔɖedze kɔrɛ.
64001008	Ne ɔso ikote sɔ bo ma nɖe Kristo mare aabuai mmagbe si iate sɔ mawɛ̃ boɖe i ɔnukuare karabara ame.
64001009	Lotsɛrɛ ɔko kurukutua ɔwɛ̃ losese mafɔɖedze ikuri, ɣɛɛ Diotrefo gɔ losu so ɔbara ma tɔ̃ɖedze iiwarɛ me ɔpia i kuira ame.
64001010	Si loba loabo ne, loaɣere mi ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔɖuɖu ɔto ɔɣɛ i bo iso, gu mila mɛ ɔsɛ ɔla. Fiɛ iiɖe ne kere, ɣɛɛ si manyii fɔɖedze ɔba ne, ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃isibafɔ ma. Nnɛ lobua inyanyarĩ iɖo nɖe sɔ, ɔ̃isɛ ɔtã manyii mama ɔri sɔ mafɔ mafɔ, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ ɔsa mma lobie sɔ maafɔ ma ɔɖi i mafɔɖedze ikuri ame.
64001011	Wũ ɔnyii ɖɔɛse, daasuã ira lalaa ibara, ɣɛɛ suã isɛɛ ibara, alasɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ ne, Ɣaa ɔre ɔɖe fiɛ ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara lalaa ne, ɔ̃iɣe Ɣaa.
64001012	Ɔbiara to ɔɖe ika sɛɛ i Demetrio iso, fiɛ ɔ̃ nsɛgbai sɛɛ mɔmɔ ana kɔra to miɣɛ ara sɛɛ i ɔ̃ iso. Bo wũ boto boɖe aɖansiɛ sɛɛ i ɔ̃ iso fiɛ miɣe sɔ nnɛ boto boɣɛ ne, gbaã iɖe.
64001013	Atoa sɔ ara gbodzoo pia loabie sɔ loɣere-ɔ ne, loibaɣere-ɔ iki i ɔko ame.
64001014	Ɣɛɛ lofɔ loɖe sɔ iibadzoro ne, boto boasarɛ anɔ ku anɔ fiɛ boaɖe ika.
64001015	Isobuɛ si iwegu-ɔ. Fɔ malaa ɔɖuɖu sɔ maya-ɔ o-o. Mme wũ loya bo malaa ɔɖuɖu i mmɔ kukaakɔ.
65001001	Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i mme Yuda kɔrɛ, ngɔ nɖe Yesu Kristo rabaradze fiɛ loɖe Yakobo ɔnyiibi. Nto lotsɛrɛ lotã mma i bo Ɔse Ɣaa ɔkpere fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ kukaakɔ, ɔto ɔdzuɛ̃ ma ɔsɛ ɔtã Yesu Kristo.
65001002	Ɣaa nnyainyɔ gu ɔ̃ isobuɛ gu kuɖɔɛ gɔ ɔba ɔtã mi si kusi kubua.
65001003	Wũ manyii ɖɔɛse, tee lobie sɔ si lotsɛrɛ mi ɔko i kumɛgɔ i Ɣaa ɔfɔ bo ɔɖuɖu ɔpia ngbã iso, ɣɛɛ ne, iba ianya sɔ loatsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe losu lopia mi ɔle sɔ mikpɛ̃ i kafɔkaɖe iti. Kafɔkaɖe ara ite wa i Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtã ɔ̃ maturi ɔkpɛ ɔwɛ̃ saã.
65001004	Alasɔ mawɛ̃ ma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa ɔɔɖu mabo i bo ndɛ̃ i iwɛrɛ ame. Mmagbe ɔɔfinikira Itɔ̃me nɛ bofɔ i Ɣaa abualɛra iso makpesera ira mama si ikategu ma nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa. Masɛ̃ bo Igarakpakpa ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe Bosate Yesu Kristo. Gbaã ne, Ɣaa mɔmɔ ɔɔɣɛ ɔsɛ koko sɔ ɔ̃atã mmagbe ipɔ.
65001005	Atoa sɔ miɣe ara wagbe ɔɖuɖu koko ne, lobie sɔ loanyigira mi sɔ Ɣaa gɔ mɔmɔ loɖi Israel kaɖe ɔbɔrɛgu i sisande ame i Egipte karɔ̃ iso ne, ɔwɔra mma loifɔ wũ maɖe i ɔwi kama.
65001006	Minyigi sɔ Ɣaa makpabo ma loibara ɔle gɔ matã ma karabara kukaakɔ fiɛ marui i ma kayakɔ̃ ne, ɔpia ma kugbagɔrɔĩ ɔsɛ ta ɔwi gɔmɔ fiɛ ɔsu ma ɔpia i idududu kpirikpirikpiri ame sɔ maawe i mmɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu ma atɔ̃me ɔtã ma ipɔ ku Iyi Tsɔra Siare nɛmɔ.
65001007	Ngbɔ ame si minyigi Sodom gu Gomora gu simagɛ̃ dzɛ loki silɔ ma ne. Sɛ̃ maturi ɔsɛ ngbã nyanyarĩa maɖe asɔrɔ̃ lalaa gɔ ta ma marɛrɛ̃ to marɛgu so, ne ɔso Ɣaa ɔsu ɔtɔ gɔ loisɛ ɔnyi ɔtsuedza ma sɔ maaɖe ikparĩ matã maturi ɔɖuɖu.
65001008	Ngbɔ ame i mmagbe sɛ masɛ̃ arɛ mabara ara nyanyarĩa i ma mɔmɔ siturina iso ne. Maisɛ makã Ɣaa ɔle gɔ nto ɔɖe ma iso atsue fiɛ masɛ maɣɛ anyakpi i mma nto maɖe ma iso iso.
65001009	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa Kpabokpakpa Mikael kɔra iibara ngbɔ. Ɔwi gɔ mato mawararã so i Mose kpise iso sɔ nna loasu wũ ne, Mikael iiɣɛ kuira nyanyarĩa i Ɔbosam iso iɖo sɔ ɔɣere wũ sɔ, “Bosate si ɔnyagalagu-ɔ!”
65001010	Ɣɛɛ mmagbe sɛ matiatia, magbarĩ ara wa karɔ̃ mainɔ fiɛ ara wa maɣe ta ma karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ ipo ame mabɔi ɣee kurodzai iiɣe kuira ne, wã ame loaɖoe ma ne.
65001011	Ndzo miɖe mitã ma! Masɛ Kain nsɛgbai. Kusia gɔ maana ɔso ne, mabɛbɛ anɔ fiɛ mabara iɣɛrɛ lɛ Balam awe. Mata maya maturi iso lɛ Kora awe fiɛ maawɔ ngbɔ ame.
65001012	Si misakanya i kuɖɔɛ ame mito misɛ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katɔ̃ ne, mmagbe anuarɛra sɛ akpese inyini isia mi iso. Ma ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã isoɣɔ pɛ masɛ mabie. Mase lɛ adɔdɔ wa i ɔwiri sore ɔkigu fiɛ kado na i wã ame, ɣee adziri wa loisɛ aɣɔ̃ abi nane kusɛ ɔwi. Adziri wa maɔrui ta siɖu ame fiɛ ɔɔkpi.
65001013	Makategu ɔpo ame ndu mɛ nto mipɛ fiɛ ma anuarɛra se lɛ ɔpo ndu mɛ nto mifu sirarã. Maɖe awami wa loiɣɛ kayakɔ̃ kawɛ̃, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔɔledza kasɛkɔ̃ ɔtã ma i idududu kpirikpirikpiri ame ɔwi daaro.
65001014	Mmagbe iso iɖe i Enok gɔ nɖe Adam ɔɣekparɛ kɔdzɛva ɔbi ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate gu ɔ̃ makpabo kukpi kukpi to maba.
65001015	Fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aɣɛgu maturi ɔɖuɖu atɔ̃me. Ɔ̃aɣɛgu mma ɔɖuɖu loisɛ manigã Ɣaa atɔ̃me i ara lalaa wa ɔɖuɖu mabara iti. Ibua i nwagbe iso ne, maaɣɛgu makpibaradze ma loisɛ manigã Ɣaa atɔ̃me i anyakpi wa ɔɖuɖu maɣɛ i ɔ̃ iso iti.”
65001016	Maɖe maturi ma nsɛ maɖe aka i ɔme ame, maɖi maturi matã. Masɛ mabara i ma ara nyanyarĩa wa nsɛ akpɛ̃ ma ɔkã iso. Masɛ maɖe ndamu fiɛ masɛ masu ɔnyamɛrɛ̃ masɔsɔla maturi si maana nnɛ mato mabie.
65001017	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ manyii ɖɔɛse ne, minyigi ara wa i Bosate Yesu Kristo katɔ̃memasɛdze ɔɣere mi koko.
65001018	Maɣere mi sɔ, “I ayi tsɔra ame ne, maturi to maaba fiɛ maabara mi aɣiãra, mabara ara wa nto ma ɔkã gɔ maibanigã Ɣaa.”
65001019	Ma nɖe mma nsɛ manina maturi gu maturi inyɔ ndɛ̃ ne, ma adzuni sia i kayiiso ara ɔnɔwɛ̃ iso, fiɛ Ɣaa Siwarã na i ma ame.
65001020	Ɣɛɛ mi wũ maɖɔɛse ne, mitã mi kafɔkaɖe ga nɖe ira sekelea si kamɔ kabua si mikparama kayi i Siwarã Bielea ɔle ame.
65001021	Mikɔla so i Ɣaa kuɖɔɛ ame si mila miɔnyɔ ɔri sɔ Bosate Yesu Kristo aanyɔ mi nnya ɔtã mi ngbã mɛ nna katui.
65001022	Ma ndɛ̃ mawɛ̃ ma nto mawararã ne, minyɔ ma nnya.
65001023	Mma nto mabo i ɔtɔ ame ne, mipɛ ma mifɔ mipia i ngbã ame. Minyɔ mawɛ̃ nnya, ɣɛɛ minigã ma nsɛgbai nyanyarĩa mɛ loawo mi ɔpukutura.
65001024	Ɣaa gɔ loawo mi ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔla sɔ miibarɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃akɔ mi mila miɔna isoɣɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ miasɛ miabo ɔ̃ ikpawaĩ ame si ɔbara mi sɔ iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ iibawe mi iso.
65001025	Ɣaa ɔwɛ̃ saã gɔ nɖe bo Fɔdze iki i Bosate Yesu Kristo iso boasu kuwarɛ botã, bokɔlɛ wũ kato. Ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ loaɖe bo iso, ɔwe ɔle i bo iso, ɔwi biara ita i kiniɔ ikpa ɔwi daaro. Si iba ngbɔ!
66001001	Ɔko gɔgbe nɖe ara wa i Ɣaa ɔɖi ɔte ɔ̃ maɖabo iki i Yesu Kristo iso sɔ aaba i ɔwi kurukutua ame ne. Kristo ɔɖe loɖi wã kayi ɔte ɔ̃ ɔɖabo Yohanes iki i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ ɔpia iso.
66001002	Mme Yohanes lotsɛrɛ ara wa lonya fiɛ loto loɖe aɖansiɛ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me nɛ ɔɖi ɔte iki i Yesu Kristo iso.
66001003	So aaɣɔ ngɔ nsɛ ɔka ɔko gɔgbe ame atɔ̃me gu mma nsɛ makã ara wa maɣɛ masɛ ngbe atsue fiɛ masɛ mabara i wã iso alasɔ ɔwi gɔ ame aaba ɔɔpɛtɛpɛtɛ.
66001004	Mme Yohanes lotsɛrɛ ɔko gɔgbe nto lotã mi mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ wa mpia i Asia karɔ̃ iso. Abualɛra gu isobuɛ nɛ lobɔrɛ i Ɣaa gɔ mpia kiniɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ɔwe ɔnya, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba gu ɔ̃ Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ wa mpia i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara katɔ̃,
66001005	gu ɔ̃ ɔbi Yesu Kristo gɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso si awegu mi. Ɔ̃ nɖe ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lota ɔbɔrɛ i makpise ame fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe kayiiso magara iso. Ɔsɛ ɔɖɔɛ bo fiɛ iki i kumɛgɔ ɔsu so ɔsɔrɛ i bo iti ne, ɔ̃ɔɖi bo ɔbɔrɛgu i bo akpi ame.
66001006	Ɔ̃ɔbara bo masɔrɛdze kaɖe sɔ boasɔrɛ Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ Ɔse. Yesu Kristo ɔkpɛ nɖe ifiɛ gu ɔle ita i kiniɔ ikpa ɔwi daaro! Si iba ngbɔ.
66001007	Minyɔ! Ɔto ɔba i adɔdɔ iso! Ɔturi biara to ɔ̃anya wũ gu mma ɔɖuɖu lobara wũ kako. Kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu to maabiɛ nnɔmɛ i ɔ̃ iti. Si iba ngbɔ.
66001008	Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate nto ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Mme nɖe Karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu Kawirikɔ̃. Mme mpia kiniɔ fiɛ loɔwe lonya fiɛ loto loaledza iba.”
66001009	Mme, mi ɔnyii Yohanes gɔ mi gu wũ losiai Yesu fiɛ bosɛ boɣara so i inyɛwe ame ala ɔ̃ sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔso, mme nto loɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe. Mamɔɛ̃ me masɛ maasɛ i karɔ̃ ga i ndu ɔki milɔ fiɛ marɔ kã sɔ Patmos iso alasɔ loto loɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me gu ɔnukuare gɔ i Yesu ɔɖi ɔte iso.
66001010	I iyi nɛ i bo mafɔɖedze sɛ bosarɛ bole Bosate iso ne, Siwarã Bielea ɔbo i wũ ame fiɛ lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ nto sire teteree lɛ kadadã i wũ kama.
66001011	Siɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ ara wa anya sɛ si asu ɔko asese mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ wa mpia i Efeso, Smirna, Pergamo, Tiatira, Sardis, Filadelfia gu Laodikea.”
66001012	Gɔ lofiniki sɔ si lonyɔ ngɔ nto ɔɖegu me ika ne, lonya sikãrɛtɛa sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ.
66001013	I sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ ndɛ̃ ne, lonya ɔturi lɛ ɔturi awune ɔbi gɔ ɔɣɛ. Ɔpia awu tagbaraa wa lobo wũ ta ngbatɔ̃ fiɛ ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa kafiami ɔtɔ so i igbegbe.
66001014	Ɔ̃ iti gu siwɛrɛ̃ ɔɖuɖu ɔfudza futututu lɛ sɛrɛrerɔ̃ siwɛrɛ̃, ɣee lɛ sno fiɛ ɔ̃ anɔmi se lɛ ɔtɔ gɔ nto ɔtsue awe.
66001015	Ɔ̃ ngba to mifiɛ lɛ ibɔra rɛtɛa mapia i ɔtɔ ame fiɛ ɔ̃ silɔ ana se lɛ ndu mɛ nto mikpase i ata iso teteree.
66001016	Ɔto awami akɔdzɛ i kuɖearɔ̃ ame, ibe inyɔ ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe ɔbɔrɛ wũ i kanya ame fiɛ ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to kafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃ ku kakɔme.
66001017	Gɔ lonya wũ ne, lobɔrɛ lofere i ɔ̃ ngbatɔ̃ lɛ kpise, ɣɛɛ ɔsu ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ ɔsia me iso ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daanigã! Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra.
66001018	Mme nsi ngbã! Loɔkpi lonya, ɣɛɛ ne, ka losi ngbã mɛ nna katui. Kukpi gu ikpibiɔ sibɔi pia me i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
66001019	Kiniɔ ne, tsɛrɛ ara wa anya, nwa mpia kiniɔ gu nwa nto aaba i ɔwi kama sɛ.
66001020	Iwɛrɛra nɛ i awami akɔdzɛ gu sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ to ite nɖe sɔ awami akɔdzɛ nɖe Ɣaa makpabo ma nto manyɔ mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ iso fiɛ sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ dzɛmɔ nɖe mafɔɖedze akuri akɔdzɛ.”
66002001	“Tsɛrɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe tã Efeso mafɔɖedze ikuri kpabo sɔ, Mme Yesu gɔ lomɔɛ̃ awami akɔdzɛ ɔto i kuɖearɔ̃, fiɛ ɔsɛ i sikãrɛtɛa sikaniɛdziri ikɔdzɛ ndɛ̃ itɔ̃me i ngbe ne.
66002002	Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Loɣe fɔ kubɛ gu kumɛgɔ asɛ ana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame. Loɣe sɔ aisɛ anagu ara lalaa mabaradze isoɣɔ. Mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ katɔ̃memasɛdze maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe ne, ɔɔkere ma anyɔ fiɛ atsue sɔ maladze maɖe.
66002003	Loɣe kumɛgɔ aɣara so ana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame ala wũ iyere ɔso fiɛ iiɖa-ɔ.
66002004	Ɣɛɛ iɣɛrɛ nɛ lonya i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, aisito aɖɔɛ me lɛ ɔwi gɔ lofe ame.
66002005	Ne ɔso nyɔ fɔ kayakɔ̃ ngbegɔ akpase abɔrɛ si afiniki abara ara wa ala ɔɔbara ku ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃. Si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, loto loaba loamɔɛ̃ fɔ ɔkaniɛdziri loɖi i ɔ̃ kayakɔ̃.
66002006	Ɣɛɛ ira ka iwɛ̃ nɛ mba me ɔmɛrɛ̃ i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, aisɛ aɖɔɛ ma Nikolaise kurabarara lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loisɛ loɖɔɛ kɔ̃.
66002007	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loatã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃aɖe idziribi nɛ nsɛ itã ngbã fiɛ ipia i Ɣaa Paradiso ame.”
66002008	Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sese kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Smirna mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ, Mme Yesu gɔ nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, ngɔ loɔkpi ɔnya fiɛ ɔta ne, mme nto loɣɛ itɔ̃me nɛgbe ne.
66002009	Loɣe fɔ inyɛwe gu fɔ siwɛrɛba, ɣɛɛ ranase aɖe fiɛ. Loɣe kumɛgɔ i mma nsɛ makpere so sɔ ma Yudase maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe to manina-ɔ iyere. Ɔbosam masiaidze maɖe ne iiɖe Ɣaa masiai.
66002010	Midaanigã inyɛwe kuiwɛ̃ nɛ loaba mi iso. Minyɔ! Ɔbosam to ɔ̃ala mi mawɛ̃ ɔnyɔ ɔtã mamɔɛ̃ mi mapia i iyo fiɛ maabara mi ɔtile ayi aweo. Miya teteree i wũ iyere ame si inya kɔra sɔ miakpi fiɛ loatã mi ngbã mɛ nna katui lɛ mi kuso.
66002011	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, kukpi nyɔare iibana ɔle i ɔ̃ iso.”
66002012	Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sese kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Pergamo mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ, Mme Yesu gɔ mba ibe inyɔ ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe itɔ̃me nɛ loɣɛ i ngbe ne.
66002013	Loɣe sɔ ngbegɔ misi nɖe Ɔbosam sigarakaɖekɔ̃, ɣɛɛ mimɔɛ̃ wũ iyere mito teteree. Mi kafɔkaɖe i wũ ame ana iiti nane ɔwi gɔ ame maɖoe wũ ɔɖabo bielea Antipa gɔ nsɛ ɔɣɛ wũ itɔ̃me i ngbegɔ i Ɔbosam si i mmɔ.
66002014	Ɣɛɛ aɣɛrɛ awɛ̃ wa lonya i mi iso nɖe sɔ, mawɛ̃ ma nsɛ masiai Balam ara ite pia i mi ndɛ̃. Balam gɔgbe ɔɖe lote Balak kumɛgɔ ɔ̃abara fiɛ Israel mabi aaɣɛrɛ fiɛ maaɖe ara wa masu masɔrɛ aɣɔ makuti maɖe asɔrɔ̃ ne.
66002015	Ngbɔ ame i maturi pia i mi ndɛ̃ gɔ masiai ma Nikolaise ara ite ne.
66002016	Mifiniki mibɔrɛ i mi ikpi ame, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, loto loaba mi kɔrɛ mala loba loakpɛ̃gu mmamɔ ala wũ kanya ame itɔ̃me nɛ nse lɛ ipɛmi awe.
66002017	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri. Ngɔ loɖe ikpi iso ne, loatã wũ mana gɔ i Ɣaa ɔkɔla ɔɖe fiɛ loatã wũ ita fudza nɛ iso matsɛrɛ iyere ɣɛtɛ nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iɖo ngɔ matã ɔnɔwɛ̃ loatsue ne.”
66002018	“Tsɛrɛ tã kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ Tiatira mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ, Ɔko gɔgbe ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa Ɔbi gɔ anɔmi nse lɛ itɔkpe fiɛ ɔ̃ ngba to mifiɛ lɛ ibɔra rɛtɛa kɔrɛ.
66002019	Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Loɣe fɔ kuɖɔɛ gu kumɛgɔ asɛ abara ara i ɔri iso gu fɔ karabara gu fɔ iɣaraso. Loɣe sɔ ato apia kubɛ kiniɔ aɖo ɔwiɔ.
66002020	Ɣɛɛ iɣɛrɛ nɛ lonya i fɔ iso nɖe sɔ, atã ɔrɔ̃go Isabel gɔ nsɛ ɔkpere so sɔ Ɣaa kpabo ɔri. Iki i ɔ̃ ara ite ame ne, ɔtã sɔ wũ maɖabo to maɖe asɔrɔ̃ fiɛ mato maɖe aɖera wa masu masɔrɛ ala aɣɔ.
66002021	Lotã wũ ɔwi sɔ ɔfiniki, ɣɛɛ ɔsɛ̃ sɔ ɔ̃ibanyua asɔrɔ̃ iɖe.
66002022	Ne ɔso loto loapɛ wũ lorara i ɔnyɛkala iso fiɛ ma gu mma loɖe asɔrɔ̃ aawe inyɛ teteree. Loto loabara ma ngbɔ si maifiniki mabɔrɛ i ɔtile ara wa mato mabaragu wũ ame.
66002023	Loto loaɖoe ɔ̃ masiaidze ana si mafɔɖedze akuri ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ, mme nsɛ lonyɔnyɔ ɔturi biara iti gu ɔtu ame pelepele fiɛ loatã ɔbiara kuso i nnɛ ɔbara kanya.
66002024	Ɣɛɛ mi matsɔra i Tiatira ma loifɔ Isabel ara ite wa mato marɔ sɔ Ɔbosam ara ite nɛ lobua iwodoro ne, lobie sɔ mitsue sɔ loisibasia mi ato mama iso.
66002025	Ɣɛɛ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ loaba ne, mɔɛ̃ nnɛ aba la teteree.
66002026	Ngɔ lomɔɛ̃ wũ karabara ɔla ɔsɛ ɔ̃abo kawirikɔ̃ fiɛ ɔɖe iso ne, loatã wũ ɔle i kayiiso nɖebi iso.
66002027	‘Ɔ̃aɖe ma iso ala ibɔradziri fiɛ ɔ̃abiɛbiɛ ma wɔsɔwɔsɔ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabiɛ ibui.’ Loto loatã wũ ɔle lɛ kumɛgɔ i wũ Ɔse ɔtã me.
66002028	Loatã mafiɛ lɛ kaya iwãmi.
66002029	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
66003001	“Tsɛrɛ sese mafɔɖedze ikuri nɛ i Sardis kpabo sɔ, Ngɔ mba Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ gu awami akɔdzɛ sɔ, Loɣe fɔ karabara ga abara. Loɣe sɔ afɔ iyere sɔ apia ngbã, ɣɛɛ ne, ɔɔkpi.
66003002	Rɛgɛ̃ si apia nnɛ lokuti fiɛ iakpi ɔle. Alasɔ lonya sɔ fɔ karabara iikote i wũ Ɣaa katɔ̃.
66003003	Ne ɔso nyigi ara wa mate-ɔ gu nwa anɔ. Mɔɛ̃ wã la si afiniki. Nyɔ tuee, alasɔ aibatsue ɔwi gɔ loaba lobɔrɛ-ɔ iso lɛ yukukpe awe
66003004	Ɣɛɛ maturi irɛ̃saã ɔkuti mapia i Sardis gɔ maiɣɛra ma awu. Mato maapia ma awu fudza masiai me alasɔ ma lokote ne.
66003005	Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃apia wũ awu fudza ngbɔ fiɛ loibanukutu ɔ̃ iyere loɖi i magbanadze ɔko ame. Loaɖi wũ kanya i wũ Ɔse gu ɔ̃ makpabo katɔ̃ sɔ wũ ɔlaa ɔɖe.
66003006	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
66003007	“Tsɛrɛ sese Filadelfia kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ mafɔɖedze ikuri iso sɔ, Ngɔ nɖe Ɔturi Sekelea gu Ɔnukuarese fiɛ David ɔbɔi pia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame, ngɔ si ɔsese kukui ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsɛ̃, fiɛ si ɔsɛ̃ ana ne, kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsese ne, ɔ̃ nto ɔɣɛ sɔ,
66003008	Loɣe fɔ karabara ga abara. Nyɔ! Losɛ-ɔ kayogodɔ̃ ga losese kase i fɔ katɔ̃ ga i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔsɛ̃. Alasɔ atoa sɔ ɔle kɛkɛĩ kere aba ne, amɔɛ̃ wũ itɔ̃me ato fiɛ aisɛ̃ me ana.
66003009	Minyɔ, mawɛ̃ pia gɔ maɖe Ɔbosam ikuri ame maturi. Mmagbe sɛ maɣɛ sɔ ma Yudase maɖe, ɣɛɛ maiɖe ma Yudase, maladze maɖe. Nyɔ, mato maaba maapɛ agɛgɛ̃ i fɔ ngbatɔ̃ fiɛ ma ɔɖuɖu aatsue sɔ loto loɖɔɛ-ɔ.
66003010	Gɔ amɔɛ̃ wũ itɔ̃me ala fiɛ ana ɔtu i fɔ inyɛwe ɔɖuɖu ame ɔso ne, mme wũ loaɖi-ɔ i kalakanyɔ ga mba ɔle fiɛ kaaba i kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu iso ame.
66003011	Loto loba i ɔwi kurukutu ame. Ne ɔso mɔɛ̃ nnɛ aba la teteree sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibafɔ-ɔ fɔ sigaraikoto iso.
66003012	Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loasu wũ lobara ikpa i wũ Ɣaa kasɔrɛkɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃isibabɔrɛ i mmɔ ɔnya. Loatsɛrɛ wũ Ɣaa iyere gu wũ Ɣaa ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ nɖe Yerusalem ɣɛtɛ gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ ɔ̃ kɔrɛ i kato iyere losia wũ iso, fiɛ loatsɛrɛ mme mɔmɔ iyere ɣɛtɛ ana losia wũ iso.
66003013	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
66003014	“Tsɛrɛ ɔko tã Laodikea mafɔɖedze ikuri kpabo sɔ, Ngɔ nsɛ ɔtã ira biara ɔba i ne ame fiɛ ɔsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso gu aɖansiɛ nukuarese, ngɔ iso i Ɣaa ɔki ɔbara ɔ̃ kurabarara ɔɖuɖu itɔ̃me i ngbe ne.
66003015	Loɣe fɔ kurabarara. Ana ɔtɔ, fiɛ aiɣɔ ana. Ɔbie lobie sɔ aawe ɔtɔ ɣee aaɣɔ.
66003016	Ɣɛɛ gɔ ase kpiɛkpiɛ fiɛ ana ɔtɔ, aiɣɔ ana ɔso ne, loatua-ɔ loɖi i wũ kanya ame!
66003017	Asɛ aɣɛ sɔ ranase aɖe, aba ara fiɛ kuira iinya-ɔ. Ɣɛɛ aiɣe sɔ wɛrɛba gu ngɔ ara mba nnya gu ngɔ mpia i kusa ame gu nɔbiɛdze gu ngɔ nsɛ isɔ̃ aɖe.
66003018	Ne ɔso loto loka-ɔ sɔ ba ɣa sikãrɛtɛa sɛɛ dzɛ mawɛnɛkɛ̃ra i ɔtɔ ame i wũ kɔrɛ si aakpese ranase. Ɣa ɔkati fudza nyɔmɛ si aibasɛ isɔ̃ kunuarɛ ɔkpɛ̃-ɔ. Si aɣa anɔmi kua ana pia fɔ anɔmi si aanya ara.
66003019	Mma loto loɖɔɛ ne, ma losɛ lonyagalagu fiɛ ma losɛ lokpadzɛ̃ kutsue ne. Ne ɔso pia kubɛ si afiniki.
66003020	Nyɔ! Loɣɛ i kayogodɔ̃ loto lokpukpura kukui kɔrɔ̃. Si ɔrere ɔnɔ me silɔ fiɛ ɔsese me ne, loabo i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ. Loaɖegu wũ aɖera, ɔ̃ wũ ɔɖegu me aɖera.
66003021	Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, loatã ɔsɛgu me i wũ sigaraiyara iso lɛ kumɛgɔ mme wũ loɖe iso fiɛ losi i wũ Ɔse kɔrɛ i ɔ̃ sigaraiyara iso.
66003022	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ nnɛ i Ɣaa Siwarã to siɣere mafɔɖedze akuri.”
66004001	Nwagbe kama ne, lonya kayogodɔ̃ ga losese kase i kato. Ne silɔ dzɛ loɖe katɔ̃ siɖegu me ika fiɛ sire lɛ kadadã ɔkpere me siɣere sɔ, “Ya ba i kato ngbe si loɖi ara wa loaba i nwagbe kama lote-ɔ.”
66004002	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, Ɣaa Siwarã ɔbo i wũ ame lonya sigaraiyara i kato nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si.
66004003	Ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso to ɔfiɛ lɛ yaspa gu sardis ata wa lofɔ kuɣa fiɛ ɔbebei gɔ nto ɔfiɛ teteree lɛ emerald ita ɔki ilɔ sigaraiyara.
66004004	Sigaraayara sinyɔ-ana mama ana ɔki alɔ sigaraiyara nɛgbe fiɛ makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ma mpia awu fudza fiɛ matɔ̃me sikãrɛtɛa sigaraikoto si i sigaraiyara wagbe iso.
66004005	Kado imama gu kado iɖu gu silɔ agbãagbã to abɔrɛ i sigaraiyara ame. Sikaniɛ aka akɔdzɛ ɔmɔɛ̃ sito i sigaraiyara katɔ̃. Nwagbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ ne.
66004006	I sigaraiyara katɔ̃ ne, ira iwɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ ɔpo nɛ masu aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame lobua akpa mabara ala se, fiɛ ne ame ɔkpa waĩ. Ara ana awɛ̃ wa mba ngbã fiɛ anɔmi ɔyi wã iso katɔ̃ gu kama ɔki alɔ sigaraiyara kakɔi biara.
66004007	Ara wa mba ngbã ngbe iɖeakatɔ̃ se lɛ dzata, inyɔare se lɛ nantsuĩrɛrɛ̃, itɛare katɔ̃ se lɛ ɔturi kare fiɛ inaare se lɛ finikpo gɔ nto ɔfɛrɛrɛ awe.
66004008	Ara ana wa mba ngbã ngbe ɔɖuɖu ba abue akuɔ akuɔ, fiɛ wã iso kakɔi biara ɔyi ku anɔmi. Kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ne, ato kuka gɔ aisɛ alo sɔ, “Isekele, isekele, isekele nɖe Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate ngɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya, fiɛ ɔsi ngbã, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba.”
66004009	Ɔwi biara ne, ara wa mba ngbã ngbe to asu ile gu kato ikɔlɛ gu siba ipɛ atã ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso fiɛ ɔ̃ibakpi ɔnya.
66004010	Si ato abara ngbɔ ne, makpakpa sinyɔ-ina mamɔ sɛ makɔlɛ mafu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ masɔrɛ ɔ̃ gɔ nsi ngbã ɔwi biara. Masɛ maɖi ma sigaraikoto masɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ maka kuka male wũ maɣɛ sɔ,
66004011	“Bosate gu Ɣaa! Isekele, kuwarɛ gu ɔle ɔkotegu-ɔ. Alasɔ fɔ lobara ara ɔɖuɖu, abara wã fiɛ atã apia ngbã i fɔ kuɖɔɛ kanya.”
66005001	Nwagbe kama ne, lonya ɔko ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso ɔmɔɛ̃ ɔto i kuɖearɔ̃. Matsɛrɛ ara masia i katɔ̃ gu kama ɔɖuɖu, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ wũ ala atsuebi akɔdzɛ sɔ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔbusi.
66005002	Lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ mba ɔle to ɔya isã teteree sɔ, “Nna lokate sɔ ɔ̃aɖi atsuebi fiɛ ɔ̃abusi ɔko gɔgbe?”
66005003	Ɣɛɛ mainya kuwɛ̃ i kato, ɣee karɔ̃ iso, ɣee karɔ̃ ame gɔ loawo ɔko ɔbusi ɣee ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ame.
66005004	Lobiɛ kaku gbaã alasɔ kuwɛ̃ iikate sɔ ɔ̃abusi ɔko, ɣee ɔnyɔ ɔ̃ ame.
66005005	Mmɔ i makpakpa mamɔ ɔwɛ̃ to ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabiɛ! Nyɔ! Dzata gɔ lobɔrɛ i Yuda kalɛ ame fiɛ ɔɖe David ɔwa tɛtɛ ɔɔɖe iso fiɛ ɔkate sɔ ɔ̃aɖi atsuebi akɔdzɛ wa masu masɛ̃ ala ɔko fiɛ ɔ̃abusi wũ.”
66005006	Lonya gɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi iwɛ̃ ɣɛ i sigaraiyara ndɛ̃ndɛ̃ fiɛ ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ gu makpakpa ɔki malɔ ne. Ibara lɛ ɔɖoe maɔɖoe Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi manya. Iba asa akɔdzɛ gu anɔmi akɔdzɛ. Anɔmi akɔdzɛ wagbe nɖe Ɣaa Siwarã aka akɔdzɛ dzɛ ɔsese kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne.
66005007	Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔsɛ ikɛlɛ isɛ iafɔ ɔko i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso kuɖearɔ̃ ame.
66005008	Gɔ ifɔ ɔko ne, ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ gu makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ɔkɔlɛ mafu i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃. Sisango gu sikãrɛtɛa arɔi pia i ma ɔbiara nrɔɔ̃ ame. Kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ nɖe Ɣaa maturi kayi ikparama ɔyi sikãrɛtɛa arɔi wagbe pɔpɔɔpɔ.
66005009	Maka kuka ɣɛtɛ kuwɛ̃ sɔ, “Fɔ lokate sɔ aafɔ ɔko gɔgbe fiɛ aaɖi ɔ̃ atsuebi gbaã Alasɔ fɔ maɖoe, fiɛ iki i fɔ ima nɛ asu asɔrɛ ame ne, afɔ maturi aɣa atã Ɣaa. Afɔ maturi abɔrɛgu i ɔkparɛ biara, kaɖe biara, siɖe biara, gu maturi agbãagbã ndɛ̃.
66005010	Asu ma abara masɔrɛdze kaɖe sɔ maasɔrɛ bo Ɣaa, fiɛ maaɖe sigara i kayiiso.”
66005011	Si loledza inyɔ kere ne, lonɔ Ɣaa makpabo kukpikukpi ma i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔka ɣɛ maki malɔ sigaraiyara, ara wa mba ngbã aka ana gu makpakpa sinyɔ-ina, to maɖi silɔ.
66005012	I kuka teteree ame sɔ, “Fɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ maɖoe ne, fɔ lokate sɔ aafɔ ɔle, karana, inɔgba, iwobara, kuwarɛ, ile gu katoikɔlɛ.”
66005013	Ne lonɔ ara wa ɔɖuɖu i Ɣaa ɔbara, nwa mpia i kato gu karɔ̃, karɔ̃ ame, ɔpo ame gu ara wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i wã ame to aɣɛ sɔ, “Ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔkpɛ nɖe ile, kuwarɛ, ikpawaĩ gu ɔle kayi daaro.”
66005014	Ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ!” Ɔluwɛ̃ makpakpa ɔkɔlɛ mafu katɔ̃ i karɔ̃ masɔrɛ Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ ibi.
66006001	Lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi atsuebi akɔdzɛ wamɔ iɖeakatɔ̃. Ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã aka ana wamɔ iwɛ̃ ɔɖe ika lɛ kado loɖu iɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
66006002	Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ fudza iwɛ̃ ɣɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso to kuta fiɛ masu sigaraikoto iwɛ̃ matã wũ. Ɔbɔrɛ lɛ ngɔ loɔɖe iso awe, fiɛ ɔbɔrɛ sɔ ɔ̃aɖe iso.
66006003	Ne kama ne, Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi nyɔare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã inyɔare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
66006004	Ipɔngɔ mama nɛ lorɛtɛ pɛɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ. Ɣaa ɔtã ngɔ nsi i ne iso ɔle sɔ ɔmɔɛ̃ isobuɛ ɔɖi i kayiiso sɔ maturi aaɖoe so. Ne Ɣaa ka ɔsu ipɛmi siare iwɛ̃ ɔtã wũ ne.
66006005	Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi tɛare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã itɛare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!” Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ kpinakpina iwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ iya. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso to ikerera.
66006006	Lonɔ nnɛ lore silɔ ɔbɔrɛ i ara wa mba ngbã aka ana ndɛ̃ siɣɛ sɔ, “Kakpã igaku si ifɔ ikpɛnɛ kuso si arĩ agaku atɛ si afɔ ikpɛnɛ kuso, ɣɛɛ daanina nnɔĩ gu ndã!”
66006007	Nnɛgbe kama ne, Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi naare, ne lonɔ ara wa mba ngbã inaare ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!”
66006008	Lonyɔ ne, ipɔngɔ nɛ iso nse lɛ ndɔ̃ ɔbɔrɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso iyere nɖe kukpi fiɛ ikpibiɔ siai wũ i kama. Ɣaa ɔtã ma ɔle i kayiiso maturi ma ɔɖuɖu mpia si maɣɛ ma aka ana ika iwɛ̃ iso sɔ masu kakpã, kukã, sinyɛ lalaa gu mabɔi lalaa maɖoe maturi.
66006009	Gɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi ruva ne, lonya mma maɖoe alasɔ mato maɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ɔso gu mma loɖe aɖansiɛ i ɔ̃ iso sikala i Isɔrɛkasege kayirinɔ.
66006010	Mmagbe sikala ɔla kulu teteree sɔ, “Bosate gɔ nto ɔɖe iso, sekelese gu nukuarese, ku mme ɔwi kowũ aaɣɛgu mma loɖoe bo i kayiiso atɔ̃me fiɛ aakarɛ bo iti?”
66006011	Masu awu fudza tagbaraa matã ma ɔbiara. Ne maɣere ma sɔ maɣara so kɛkɛĩ si masu ma manyii gu ma maɖabo laa ma maaɖoe sikala mabua i ma sire iso sɔ maayi mma ɖoɖooɖo lokote sɔ maaɖoe lɛ ma.
66006012	Ne kama ne, lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi kuɔva. Karɔ̃ ɔti teteree, kuɣɛ̃ ɔbara kpinakpina lɛ aɣɔgɛrɛĩ, fiɛ ɔgbaworeti ɔkpese lɛ ima.
66006013	Awãmi ɔkpase afere i karɔ̃ lɛ kumɛgɔ i adziribi yuɛ sɛ akpa si awɛ ɔkpɛ̃.
66006014	Kuɖokpo ɔkarĩ lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ makarĩ ɔko fiɛ marui abe gu kubemi gɔ ɔɖuɖu i ndu ɔki milɔ i kɔ̃ kuwekɔ̃.
66006015	Kayiiso magara, mma nto maɖe iso, makpakpɛ̃dze makpakpa, maranase, sile masate gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu, masande gu mma loiɖe masande ɔkɔla so i sikpolo ame gu atawo wa mpia i abe ndɛ̃ ame.
66006016	Maɣere abe gu ata siare sɔ, “Mibiɛ mifu bo iso si boawɛrɛ i ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sikpã kanya.
66006017	Alasɔ ma sikpã iyi lalaa ɔɔba fiɛ kuwɛ̃ iibawo ne kanya ɔya!”
66007001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya Ɣaa makpabo ina ma nɣɛ i kayiiso akpakpai ana iso. Matɛ̃ ɔri sɔ ɔwiri kuwɛ̃ si ɔdaasikpɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i akpakpai ana wagbe iso i karɔ̃ iso o-o, ɔpo iso o-o, ɣee nane kudziri kukuwɛ̃ ame.
66007002	Loledza Ɣaa kpabo mama inya gɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃ isɛ fiɛ ɔto Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã ikparĩ isiara. Ɣaa kpabo gɔgbe ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere Ɣaa makpabo ina ma maɖi ɔri sɔ maate karɔ̃ gu ɔpo inyɛwe,
66007003	maɣɛ sɔ, “Midaabara karɔ̃ ɣee ɔpo, ɣee adziri kuira boa gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ bosu ikparĩ isiara bosia bo Ɣaa maɖabo ikparĩ i atɔngbo tɔtɔ.”
66007004	Ne marɔ maturi ma matã Ɣaa ikparĩ ala Ɣaa ikparĩ isiara i Israel nlɛ miweo-minyɔ ame lonɔ ne. Ma nɖe maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina.
66007005	Maturi kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Yuda kalɛ ame. Ma kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Ruben kalɛ ame. Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Gad kalɛ ame.
66007006	Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Aser kalɛ ame. Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ i Naftali kalɛ ame, fiɛ kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Manase kalɛ ame.
66007007	Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Simeon kalɛ ame. Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Levi kalɛ ame. Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Isak kalɛ ame.
66007008	Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Zebulon kalɛ ame. Kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Yosef kalɛ ame. Fiɛ kukpi kuweo-kunyɔ ɔbɔrɛ i Benyamin kalɛ ame.
66007009	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya iturikuri siare nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iibawo ɔka fiɛ mabɔrɛ i maturi agbãagbã ɔɖuɖu ndɛ̃. Mabɔrɛ i kalɛ biara gu kaɖe biara gu siɖe biara dzɛ masɛ maɣɛ ame. Maya i sigaraiyara gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃. Ma ɔɖuɖu pia awu fudza tagbaraa fiɛ mato sikɛ.
66007010	Mato mala kulu teteree maɣɛ sɔ, “Bo Ɣaa gɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nsɛ matã maturi ngbã.”
66007011	Ɣaa makpabo ɔɖuɖu ɣɛ maki malɔ sigaraiyara gu makpakpa gu ara ka ana wa mba ngbã, mapɛ agɛgɛ̃ mafu katɔ̃ i karɔ̃ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ masɔrɛ Ɣaa
66007012	maɣɛ sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ! ile gu ikpawaĩ, gu iwola gu siba, gu kuwarɛ gu ɔle gu kato ikɔlɛ nɖe bo Ɣaa ɔkpɛ, ita i kiniɔ gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ kayi daaro daaro! Si iba ngbɔ.”
66007013	Makpakpa mamɔ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ ɔkarɛ me sɔ, “Mabe maɖe mpia awu fudza tagbaraa fiɛ lɛ mabɔrɛ?”
66007014	Ne lotã wũ mmuai sɔ, “Bosate, loiɣe, fɔ nɣe.” Mmɔ ɔto ɔɣere me sɔ, “Mmagbe nɖe mma loki i inyɛwe siare ame mabɔrɛ ne. Mafore ma awu i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ima ame afudza futututu.
66007015	Ne ɔso ne, maɣɛ i Ɣaa sigaraiyara katɔ̃ mato masɔrɛ wũ kasɛ̃ i kakɔme i ɔ̃ isɔrɛyo. Fiɛ ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso aawe i ma ndɛ̃ ɔdzuɛ̃ ma.
66007016	Ɔtukã ɣee kukã iisibakpɛ̃ ma kunya. Fiɛ kuɣɛ̃ ana iisibabɛbɛ ma kunya.
66007017	Alasɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ mpia i sigaraiyara ndɛ̃ nɖe makɔdze. Ɔto ɔ̃akɔ ma ɔkɛlɛgu ngbegɔ i ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã ɔgɔdɛ̃, fiɛ Ɣaa aanukutu ma nnɔmɛ ɔɖuɖu i katɔ̃.”
66008001	Ɔwi gɔ i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔɖi itsuebi kɔdzɛva ne, kato ɔlo kananana lɛ ɔɖɔwũ ɔfã.
66008002	Ne lonya Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔtã ma kudadã kukɔdzɛ mato ne.
66008003	Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ nto sikãrɛtɛa irɔi nɛ ame masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ɔba ɔ̃aya i isɔrɛkasege kɔrɛ. Masu kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gbodzoo matã wũ sɔ ɔsu ɔbua i Ɣaa maturi ɔɖuɖu kayi ikparama iso si ɔtsuedza i sikãrɛtɛa isɔrɛkasege ga nɣɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃ iso.
66008004	Kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a gɔ mapia ɔtɔ ɔbɔrɛ kuɣɔ isakanya ku Ɣaa maturi kayi ikparama i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ nrɔɔ̃ ame kukɛlɛ kato.
66008005	Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo ɔɖi ɔtɔ i isɔrɛkasege iso ɔpia i irɔi nɛ ame masɛ matsuedza kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a ame ɔfuĩdza ɔsɛ i karɔ̃ iso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔɖu teteree, silɔ agbãagbã ɔre, kado ɔmama, fiɛ karɔ̃ ɔti.
66008006	Ne Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto kudadã ɔledza so matã kudadã ifɛ̃ ne.
66008007	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, atumagɛrɛĩ gu ɔtɔ gɔ losakanya ku ima ɔpɛ ifere i karɔ̃ iso. Si maɣɛ karɔ̃ aka atɛ ne, ika iwɛ̃ ɔtsue. Si maɣɛ adziri wa nɣɛ i karɔ̃ iso aka atɛ ne ika iwɛ̃ gu sikua yuɛ ɔɖuɖu dzɛmɔ ana ɔtsue pelepele.
66008008	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, masu ira iwɛ̃ nɛ nse lɛ kube siare gɔ nto kutsue mafuĩdza mapia i ɔpo ame.
66008009	Si maɣɛ ɔpo aka atɛ ne, ika iwɛ̃ ɔkpese ima, ira biara nɛ mpia i ɔpo ame fiɛ iba ngbã ika tɛare ɔkpi fiɛ sikolo siare dzɛ ɔɖuɖu nsia i ɔpo iso ana ika tɛare ɔnina.
66008010	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo tɛare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, iwãmi siare nɛ nto ifiɛ lɛ kaka ga matsue ɔkpase ibɔrɛ i kato ibo i siwore gu atubu ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare ame.
66008011	Iwami nɛgbe iyere nɖe kudziri gɔ mba ɔɖo. Siwore ika tɛare ame ndu ɔbara ɔɖoɖo fiɛ kabiɛtɛ ana ɔbo i me ame gɔ itã sɔ maturi gbodzoo ɔkpi.
66008012	Ne Ɣaa kpabo naare ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, ira ɔ ɔwuĩ kuɣɛ̃ ika tɛare gu ɔgbaworeti ika tɛare gu awami ika tɛare ɔnyua ifiɛ. Nnɛgbe ɔtã sɔ ikpɛnɛ ika tɛare gu kasɛ̃ ika tɛare iisina ikpawaĩ.
66008013	Nwagbe kama ne, lonya finikpo ɔwɛ̃ to ɔfɛrɛrɛ i kato dzoroo fiɛ lonɔ ɔto ɔɣɛ teteree sɔ, “Ndzo, ndzo, ndzo miɖe mitã mi ma nsi i kayiiso, alasɔ kudadã tsɔra gɔ i Ɣaa makpabo itɛ ma lokuti aafɛ̃ ɔnyanyarĩ kuɖo.”
66009001	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo ruva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, lonya iwãmi iwɛ̃ ɔkpase ibɔrɛ i kato iba iawuĩ i karɔ̃. Ɣaa ɔsu iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro sibɔi ɔpia i iwãmi nrɔɔ̃ ame.
66009002	Gɔ ɔbusi iwo nɛgbe kanya ne, kuɣɔ lipii ɔtsɛ isakɛ ibɔrɛ lɛ ikpo siare ame kuto kubɔrɛ. Kuɣɔ ɔku kuɣɛ̃ ifiɛ ala kumɛgɔ kusi ɔso.
66009003	Kugbadzedzei ɔso kubɔrɛ i kuɣɔ ame kuba karɔ̃ iso, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔtã kɔ̃ kabiɛtɛ ga mba ɔle lɛ siboitɛtɛ ɔre.
66009004	Ɔɣere kɔ̃ sɔ kudaabara sikua, karɔ̃, aɣatati ɣee adziri kuira, ɣɛɛ kubara mma ɔɖuɖu nna Ɣaa ikparĩ i itɔngbo ɔtile.
66009005	Ɣaa ɔtã kɔ̃ ɔri sɔ kute maturi ɔɣiã awa aru, ɣɛɛ kudaaɖoe ma. Si kuta ɔturi ne, isɛ ibo lɛ ɔboitɛtɛ ibo awe.
66009006	I awa aru wagbe ame ne, maturi to maabie kukpi sɔ maakpi, ɣɛɛ maibana, kukpi to kuakpɛ̃ ma ɔkã, ɣɛɛ kuatere kuɣɛ ma.
66009007	Kugbadzedzei kumiamia se lɛ apɔngɔ wa manyi akpadza matã kakpã. Ira ɔ sia kɔ̃ ati lɛ sikãrɛtɛa sigaraikoto fiɛ kɔ̃ katɔ̃ se lɛ maturi kure.
66009008	Kɔ̃ iti siwɛrɛ̃ ɔkarã lɛ ɔrɔ̃go sire fiɛ kɔ̃ anyɛ se lɛ dzata are.
66009009	Kɔ̃ agbegbe akolo se lɛ ibɔra nɛ masɛ mafu igbegbe i kakpã ame. Kɔ̃ abue ipɛ to ire lɛ ibɔra makeke gu apɔngɔ gbodzoo wa nto akɛlɛ kakpã ame.
66009010	Kugbadzedzei gɔgbe sikã gu ara wa kusɛ kuta ala maturi se lɛ siboitɛtɛ sire fiɛ kɔ̃ sikã ame i nnɛ kuasu kute ala maturi ɔɣiã awa aru pia.
66009011	Kuba igara gɔ nɖe kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro iso. Ɔ̃ iyere nɖe Abadon i si Hebrise ame fiɛ masɛ makpere wũ sɔ Apolion i si Helase ame gɔ karɔ̃ nɖe sɔ raninadze ne.
66009012	Inyɛwe ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe, nyɔ, ikuti wã anyɔ mama wa nsɛ i kama.
66009013	Gɔ Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i asa ana wa nɣɛ i sikã isɔrɛkasege ga nɣɛ i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ame.
66009014	Silɔ ɔɣere Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva gɔ nto kadadã sɔ, “Kurisi Ɣaa makpabo ina ma manyi masɛ i Frat ɔwore katɔ̃!”
66009015	Ne ɔso makurisi Ɣaa makpabo mamɔ. Maledza ma fiɛ ma wũ maledza so matã ɔɖɔwũ, iyi, kuwa gu ikɔ sɔ si maaɖoe kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare.
66009016	Lonɔ sɔ makpakpɛ̃dze ma nsi i apɔngɔ iso kukame nɖe kukpi kuweo aka kukpi kuweo aka anyɔ.
66009017	Kumɛgɔ lonya apɔngɔ gu mma nsi wã iso i kaɖikate ame ngbe ne. Mapia abɔra i agbegbe, awɛ̃ ɔrɛtɛ lɛ ɔtɔ gɔ lowara, awɛ̃ ana se lɛ kuɖokpo gɔ lokpa, fiɛ awɛ̃ ana se lɛ iyata nɛ lorɛtɛ. Apɔngɔ ati se lɛ madzata fiɛ ɔtɔ gu kuɣɔ gu atɔgɛrɛĩ to abɔrɛ wã i kanya ame.
66009018	Masu ara ka atɛ wa maasu mate ala ɔturi ɔɣiã, wa nɖe ɔtɔ, kuɣɔ gu atɔgɛrɛĩ wa nto ɔbɔrɛ i apɔngɔ kanya ame maɖoe ala kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ika tɛare
66009019	Apɔngɔ ɔle pia i wã kanya ame gu wã sikã ame. Wã sikã se lɛ aɣɛ fiɛ aba iti. Sikã dzɛgbe asɛ asu ate ala maturi ɔɣiã ne.
66009020	Mma ɔɖuɖu lokuti fiɛ maikpi i inyɛwe nɛgbe ame ne, masɛ̃, maifiniki manyua ma ara wa masu ma arɔĩ mabara ɔsɔrɛ. Mainyua siwarã lalaa, sikãrɛtɛa gu sikãfudza, ibɔra rɛtɛa gu ara wa mawe ala kudziri wa loisɛ anya ara, ɣee anɔ ara, ɣee asɛ isɔrɛ.
66009021	Maifiniki manyua ma ituriɖoe, sibɔ ipɛ, asɔrɔ̃ iɖe gu kayu.
66010001	Ne kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ mba ɔle ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i kato. Ɔɣɛ i adɔdɔ ndɛ̃ fiɛ ɔbebei ɔki ɔlɔ ɔ̃ iti. Ɔ̃ katɔ̃ to kafiɛ lɛ kuɣɛ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ ngba se lɛ ɔtɔ akpa.
66010002	Ɔmɔɛ̃ kakoi kawɛ̃ ga mabusi ɔto i kɔrɔ̃. Ɔsu ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃kpa ɔɣedza i ɔpo iso fiɛ kubenakpa ana ɣɛ i karɔ̃ iso.
66010003	Ne ɔfã teteree lɛ dzata nto ɔfafã. Gɔ ɔfã ne, kado iɖu ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ silɔ ɔre.
66010004	Gɔ kado iɖu ikpɛ ikɔdzɛ silɔ ɔre ne, lobie sɔ si lotsɛrɛ ara wa lonɔ losɛ, ɣɛ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔɖe me ika sibɔrɛgu i kato sɔ, “Sɛ̃ ara wa i kado iɖu aka akɔdzɛ ɔɣɛ sɛ ne daatsɛrɛ wã asɛ.”
66010005	Kere ne, Ɣaa kpabo gɔ lonya ɔɣɛ i ɔpo gu karɔ̃ iso ɔkɔlɛ ɔ̃ kuɖearɔ̃ kato.
66010006	Ɔkã ndamu i Ɣaa gɔ nna kawirikɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ lobara kato gu kã ara ɔɖuɖu, karɔ̃ gu kã iso ara ɔɖuɖu, ɔpo gu ɔ̃ ame ara ɔɖuɖu iyere ame ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔwi inina kuiwɛ̃ iisibawe.
66010007	Si Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã ne, iyɔ Ɣaa adzuni wɛrɛa wa imomo i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ma nɖe ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔpɛ aaba i ne ame.”
66010008	Ne kama ne, silɔ dzɛ lonɔ lobɔrɛgu i kato ɔledza me ika iɖegu sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aafɔ kakoi ga mabusi fiɛ kapia i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ nɣɛ i karɔ̃ gu ɔpo iso nrɔɔ̃ ame.”
66010009	Ne ɔso lokɛlɛ Ɣaa kpabo kɔrɛ loɣere wũ sɔ ɔsu kakoi ɔtã me. Ɔɣere me sɔ, “Fɔ si awe. Ito iawe ɔɖo i fɔ kayiri ame, ɣɛɛ i fɔ kanya ame ne, iawe ɔmɛrɛ̃ lɛ maɣendu.”
66010010	Lofɔ kakoi i ɔ̃ kɔrɛ lowe. I wũ kanya ame ne, iwe me ɔmɛrɛ̃ lɛ maɣendu, ɣɛɛ gɔ lome ne, iwe ɔɖo i wũ kayiri ame.
66010011	Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ikate sɔ aapɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me imomo atã nɖebi gbodzoo, maturi agbãagbã, siɖe agbãagbã, gu magara gbodzoo.”
66011001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, masu ɔdziri gɔ nse lɛ ngɔ masɛ masusu ala ara matã me ne Ɣaa ɔɣere me sɔ, “Kɛlɛ aasusu wũ isɔrɛyo gu isɔrɛkasege si aka mma nto masɔrɛ me i isɔrɛyo ame.
66011002	Ɣɛɛ daasusu isɔrɛyo katɔ̃, alasɔ masu mmɔ matã mma loiɖe ma Yudase fiɛ maatutui sikpatɔrɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea iso awa sina-inyɔ.
66011003	Loatã wũ maɖansiɛ inyɔ ɔle maɣɛ wũ Itɔ̃me i ayi kakpi gu alafa anyɔ gu sikuɔ ame mapia ara kpinakpina.”
66011004	Maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe nɖe nnɔĩsidziri inyɔ gu sikaniɛdziri inyɔ dzɛ nɣɛ i karɔ̃ Sate anɔmi ame ne.
66011005	Si ɔrere ɔbie sɔ ɔ̃abara ma ira boa ne, ɔtɔ sɛ ɔbɔrɛ i ma kanya ame ɔwɔra matsirise. Ngɔ loabie sɔ ɔ̃abara ma ira boa ne, ngbɔ maaɖoe wũ ne.
66011006	Maba ɔle sɔ gɔ mato maɣɛ Ɣaa Itɔ̃me ne, maasɛ̃ kuɖokpo sɔ kado iibapɛ. Maba ɔle ana sɔ maafinikira ndu mikpese ima fiɛ maakpadzɛ̃ inyɛwe biara igbã mabɔ i kayiiso ɔwi biara gɔ maɖɔɛ.
66011007	Si maɔɣɛ ma itɔ̃me maro ne, iyɔ bɔi lalaa gɔ lobɔrɛ i iwo gudua nɛ lowodoro ame to ɔ̃akpɛ̃gu ma ɔɖe ma iso fiɛ ɔ̃aɖoe ma.
66011008	Mato maanyua ma makpise masɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ iyere i igbã ame nɖe Sodom gu Egipte siri iso. Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe ame iɖe mapɛ ma Ɔkɔse mamatãra i kudziri iso ne.
66011009	I ayi atɛ ku ɔfã ame ne, maturi to maabɔrɛ i kaɖe biara, kalɛ biara, siɖe biara gu maturi igbã biara ndɛ̃ maba maanyɔ ma makpise fiɛ maibatã ɔri sɔ mabiara ma.
66011010	Kayiiso maturi to maana isoɣɔ i maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe kukpi iso. Mato maalɛlɛ, masese so ara alasɔ Ɣaa maɖansiɛ magbe ɔkpadzɛ̃ inyɛwe gbodzoo mabɔ kayiiso maturi iso.
66011011	I ayi atɛ ku ɔfã wamɔ kama ne, siwarã dzɛ nsɛ sitã ngbã ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ siba siabo i ma ame fiɛ mata maya! Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ mma ɔɖuɖu lonya gbaã.
66011012	Ne kama ne, maɖansiɛ inyɔ magbe ɔnɔ silɔ teteree siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kato siɣere ma sɔ, “Miba i kato ngbe!” Ne ɔso i ma matsirise anɔmi ame ne, mabo i idɔdɔ iwɛ̃ ame makɛlɛ kato.
66011013	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame tutuutu ne, kayi ɔti teteree gɔ itã ɔmagɛ̃ kusɛ kuweo ame iwɛ̃ ɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ. Maturi kukpi kukɔdzɛ ɔkpi i karɔ̃ iti nɛmɔ ame. Ifɔ̃ ɔmɔɛ̃ maturi tsɔra ne ɔso male Ɣaa gɔ mpia i kato.
66011014	Inyɛwe nɛ mba ifɔ̃ nyɔare ɔɔfe, nyɔ itɛare to iba kiniɔkiniɔ.
66011015	Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfɛ̃ ɔ̃ kadadã. Silɔ agbãagbã ɔre teteree i kato sɔ, “Kayi gagbe sigarakaɖekɔ̃ ɔɔkpese Bo Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ Kristo ɔkpɛ, fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe sigara ita i kiniɔ ikpa kayi daaro.”
66011016	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, makpakpa sinyɔ-ina ma nsi i ma sigaraiyara iso i Ɣaa katɔ̃ ɔta makɔlɛ mafu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ male Ɣaa.
66011017	Maɣɛ sɔ, “Bosate Ɣaa ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate gɔ mpia fiɛ ɔ̃ɔwe ɔnya, boto bopɛ-ɔ siba, alasɔ asu fɔ ɔle siare ato aɖe kayi iso.
66011018	Sikpã ɔkpɛ̃ mma loiɖe ma Yudase, fiɛ fɔ sikpã ɔwi ɔɔɣo. Ɔwi ɔɔɣo gɔ aaɣɛgu makpise atɔ̃me, fiɛ aakpadzɛ̃ ma kutsue. Ɔwi ɔɔɣo ana gɔ aatã fɔ kanyamaɖidze, ma losɔrɛ-ɔ, fɔ maturi gu mma nsɛ manigã fɔ iyere ɔɖuɖu kuso, maturi nyaa gu mma nna i kuira ame, fiɛ aawɔra mma nto manina kayiiso.”
66011019	Ɣaa isɔrɛyo nɛ i kato ɔsese fiɛ lonya kanya inyi aɖaka i isɔrɛyo ame. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔma silɔ agbãagbã ɔre, kado ɔɖu, karɔ̃ ɔti, fiɛ atumagɛrɛĩ ɔpɛ teteree!
66012001	Iwawãra siare iwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kuɖokpo. Ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ losu kuɣɛ̃ ɔpia lɛ awu ɔbɔrɛ. Ɔgbaworeti pia wũ i ngbatata fiɛ sigaraikoto nɛ masu awami aweo-anyɔ mabara sia wũ iti.
66012002	Ɔto kayiri fiɛ kuɣe to kuɖoɖo wũ. Kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔnya ibo kaɖu ɔso ne, ɔto ɔla kulu teteree.
66012003	Iwawãra mama ana ɔledza ibɔrɛ i kato gɔ nɖe la siare rɛtɛa ɔwɛ̃. Ɔba ati akɔdzɛ, ɔre asa aweo fiɛ ɔtɔ̃me sigaraikoto akɔdzɛ.
66012004	Ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔkã ɔfiɛ awami wa ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato si maɣɛ wã aka atɛ ika iwɛ̃ ɔba ɔ̃afere i karɔ̃. Ne ɔso la ɔba ɔ̃aya i ɔrɔ̃go gɔ i kuɣe to kuɖoɖo katɔ̃ sɔ si ɔnya ɔɣe ɔbi ne, si ɔ̃asu ɔbi ɔme.
66012005	Ɔrɔ̃go ɔba ɔ̃aɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ. Ɔ̃ nɖe ngɔ loasu ibɔradziri ɔɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu iso ne. Mapɛ ɔbi mafɔ ɔluwɛ̃ makɛlɛgu Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ sigaraiyara katɔ̃.
66012006	Ne ɔrɔ̃go ɔtere ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ i Ɣaa ɔledza kasɛkɔ̃ ɔsɛ wũ sɔ maanyɔ wũ iso ayi kakpi gu alafa anyɔ gu sikuɔ ne.
66012007	Ɔwi gɔmɔ ame ne, kakpã ɔpɛ i kato. Mikael gu ɔ̃ makpabo laa ɔrɔ aɣɛ kakpã, fiɛ aɣɛ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo ma wũ masarɛgu ma i kakpã ame.
66012008	Maɖe aɣɛ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo iso fiɛ maisina kasɛkɔ̃ i kato.
66012009	Ne ɔso masu aɣɛ siare mafuĩdza masese karɔ̃ iso. Wã nɖe aɣɛ kuere wa lofɔ iyere sɔ Ɔbosam gu Satana gɔ losɔsɔla kayiiso ɔɖuɖu ne. Ɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ maɖabo mafuĩdza masese kayiiso ne.
66012010	Ne lonɔ silɔ ɔre teteree i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Kini i bo Ɣaa iɖi gu ɔ̃ ɔle gu sigara ɔɖewi ɔɣo ne. Fiɛ ɔ̃ Kristo ɔle ana ɔɔba. Alasɔ maɔsu ngɔ nsɛ ɔɖaɛ bo manyii kanya kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ɔtã Ɣaa mafuĩdza mabɔrɛgu i kato.
66012011	Maɖe wũ iso iki i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ima iso gu Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ mapɛ imomo ame. Alasɔ matɔrã kere sɔ maakpi fiɛ ma ngbã iisu ma kuira.
66012012	Ne ɔso so si siɣɔ kato gu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i mmɔ. Ɣɛɛ ndzo miɖe mitã karɔ̃ gu ɔpo! Alasɔ Ɔbosam ɔso ɔba mi kɔrɛ fiɛ sikpã to wũ gbaã, alasɔ ɔɣe sɔ ɔ̃ ɔwi iisisi.”
66012013	Gɔ la ɔnya sɔ maɔfuĩdza wũ mabɔ karɔ̃ iso ne, ɔti ɔrɔ̃go gɔ loɣe ɔbirɛrɛĩ kama.
66012014	Ɣɛɛ Ɣaa ɔsu finikpo siare abue anyɔ ɔtã ɔrɔ̃go sɔ ɔfɛrɛrɛ ɔɣɛ la ɔkɛlɛ fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ maledza masɛ wũ fiɛ maakararã wũ akɔ atɛ gu awa akuɔ sɔ la iisibawo wũ kutsuɛ ɔɖaa.
66012015	Ne la ɔra ndu mɛ losi lɛ ɔwore siare sɔ si misore ɔrɔ̃go ne,
66012016	ɣɛɛ karɔ̃ ɔfɔgu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ kawarɛ kanya kanɛ ndu mɛ ɔɖuɖu i la ɔra.
66012017	Sikpã lalaa ɔmɔɛ̃ la i ɔrɔ̃go iso, ne ɔso ɔkɛlɛ sɔ ɔ̃akpɛ̃gu ɔ̃ mabi gu mawa ma lokuti. Ma nɖe mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ mabara i Ɣaa mmara iso fiɛ mamɔɛ̃ ɔnukuare itɔ̃me nɛ maɖi mate ma i Yesu iso mato i ɔnukuare ame ne.
66012018	Ne la ɔsɛ ɔ̃aya i ɔpo kanya ne.
66013001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya bɔi lalaa ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔto ɔbɔrɛ i ɔpo ame. Ɔba asa aweo, fiɛ ɔba ati akɔdzɛ. Ana ne, isa biara tɔ̃me sigaraikoto fiɛ matsɛrɛ mmusuo iyere masia i ɔ̃ ati iso.
66013002	Bɔi gɔ lonya se lɛ ɔgidi. Ɔ̃ ngba se lɛ iketeke mire fiɛ ɔ̃ kanya se lɛ dzata kare. La ɔsu ɔ̃ mɔmɔ ɔle gu ɔ̃ sigaraiyara gu ɔle siare gɔ ɔto ɔɖe iso ala ɔtã bɔi lalaa gɔgbe.
66013003	Bɔi iti iwɛ̃ ɔbara lɛ maɔɖoe ne manya, ɣɛɛ igbɛ siare nɛmɔ ɔɔkpi. Ne ɔso ɔ̃ ara ɔbara kayiiso maturi ɣii gɔ itã sɔ masiai wũ.
66013004	Maturi ɔsɔrɛ la alasɔ ɔsu ɔ̃ ɔle gɔ ɔba ɔtã bɔi gɔgbe. Masɔrɛ bɔi ana maɣɛ sɔ, “Nna nse lɛ bɔi gɔgbe? Nna loawo wũ ɔkpɛ̃gu?”
66013005	Matã bɔi ɔle sɔ ɔ̃akɔlɛ so kato ɔɣɛ amusuora gbodzoo fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe iso awa sina-inyɔ.
66013006	Ɔbusi kanya ɔɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gu ɔ̃ iyere gu ɔ̃ kasɛkɔ̃ gu mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kato iso.
66013007	Matã wũ ɔri ana sɔ ɔkpɛ̃gu Ɣaa maturi si ɔɖe ma iso. Matã wũ ɔle ana i kalɛ biara, kaɖe biara, siɖe biara gu maturi igbã biara iso.
66013008	Mma ɔɖuɖu mpia i kayiiso fiɛ ma ayere na i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɛ maɖoe ngbã ɔko ame ita i kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ to maasɔrɛ bɔi.
66013009	Ngɔ mba atsue si ɔnɔ!
66013010	Si ɔrere ɔkate sɔ maamɔɛ̃ wũ sisande ne, maamɔɛ̃ wũ sisande. Si ɔrere ɔkate ɔtã iɖoe ala ipɛmi ne, ipɛmi maaɖoe wũ ala. Maɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ Ɣaa maturi aawe ɔdzini i ma inyɛwe ame ku kafɔkaɖe.
66013011	Ne kama ne, lonya bɔi lalaa mama gɔ losakɛ ɔbɔrɛ i karɔ̃ ame. Ɔba asa anyɔ i iti lɛ kakpalasai fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe ika lɛ la awe.
66013012	Ɔbara ɔle gɔ ɔɖuɖu i bɔi lalaa ɖeakatɔ̃ ba karabara i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔɣiɛ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu sɔ masɔrɛ bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ lofɔ igbɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ iɣɛi ɔɔkpi.
66013013	Bɔi nyɔare gɔgbe ɔbara awawãra siare. Ɔtã ɔtɔ ɔkpase ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba karɔ̃ i maturi ɔɖuɖu anɔ.
66013014	Fiɛ ɔki i ɔ̃ awawãra ibara ame ɔsɔsɔla kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu i bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔmɔ katɔ̃. Bɔi gɔgbe ɔɣere mma mpia i kayiiso sɔ mapɔ bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ gɔ maɖi igbɛ ala ipɛmi fiɛ ɔpia ngbã kumiamia itĩ si masu mapia wũ kuwarɛ.
66013015	Matã bɔi lalaa nyɔare gɔgbe ɔle sɔ ɔwarã siwarã ɔpia i bɔi ɖeakatɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ nɛ mapɔ ame sɔ iawo ika ɔɖe, ana ne, iatã maɖoe mma losɛ̃ sɔ maito masɔrɛ ne.
66013016	Bɔi gɔgbe ɔɣiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu, masiare gu ma nna i kuira ame, maranase gu mawɛrɛba, masande gu mma loiɖe masande sɔ mafɔ ikparĩ i ma kuɖearɔ̃ ɣee ma itɔngbo.
66013017	Ɔbiara gɔ loifɔ bɔi ikparĩ nɛ nɖe ɔ̃ iyere ne, ɣee ara kukame gɔ nɣɛ kutã ɔ̃ iyere ne, maitã wũ ɔri sɔ ɔ̃arɔdɛ̃ ara, ɣee ɔ̃aɣa kuira.
66013018	Iwola itɔ̃me iɖe i ngbe! Ɔbiara gɔ ikpa aanɔ ara kukame gɔ nɣɛ kutã bɔi gɔgbe karɔ̃, alasɔ ɔturi iyere iɣɛ itã. Kukame nɖe 666.
66014001	Ne kama ne, lonya Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi gɔ iɣɛ i Zion kube iso. Maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina ma atɔngbo iso matsɛrɛ ɔ̃ iyere gu ɔ̃ Ɔse iyere masia ɣɛ wũ i kɔrɛ.
66014002	Lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ dzɛ nto sire lɛ ndu nto mikpase i ata iso, ɣee kado nto ɔɖu teteree i kato. Silɔ dzɛ lonɔ ɔre lɛ maturi sisango ifɛ̃ silɔ ana.
66014003	Mato maka kuka ɣɛtɛ i sigaraiyara gu ara wa mba ngbã aka ana gu makpakpa katɔ̃. Kuwɛ̃ iibawo kuka gɔmɔ ɔsuã iɖo maturi kukpi kulafa sina-ina ma iti ɔtã kuso i kayiiso ɔnɔwɛ̃.
66014004	Ma nɖe marɛrɛ̃ ma loirɛgu ɔrɔ̃go manya lɛ marɔ̃go ma loirɛgu ɔrɛrɛ̃ manya. Ma nɖe mma nsɛ masiai Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi makɛlɛ kakɔi biara ga ɔsɛ ne. Ma iti iɖe ɔtã kuso i maturi awune ndɛ̃ fiɛ ma nɖe maturi ɖeakatɔ̃ ma masu matã Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ne.
66014005	Maila sila manya, fiɛ mainya iɣɛrɛ kuiwɛ̃ ana i ma iso.
66014006	Lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama ana gɔ nto ɔfɛrɛrɛ i kato gu karɔ̃ ndɛ̃. Itɔ̃me Bielea nɛ nna kawirikɔ̃ pia wũ i nrɔɔ̃ ame ɔ̃apɛ ne imomo ɔtã kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu, maturi agbãagbã, kalɛ biara, siɖe biara gu kaɖe biara.
66014007	Ɣaa kpabo ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minigã Ɣaa si misu kuwarɛ mitã wũ, alasɔ ɔwi ɔɔɣo sɔ ɔ̃aɣɛgu kayiiso maturi atɔ̃me. Misɔrɛ ɔ̃ gɔ lobara kato gu karɔ̃, ɔpo gu siwore dzɛ nto sibore sife ɔɖuɖu!”
66014008	Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare siai ɔɖeakatɔ̃ ɔto ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔbiɛ o-o! Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔɔbiɛ o-o! Ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lomidza nɖebi ɔɖuɖu ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ndã fiɛ ɔkpadzɛ̃ Ɣaa sikpã ɔbɔ ma iso ɔɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ!”
66014009	Ɣaa kpabo tɛare gɔ nsiai ngɔmɔ ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Si ɔrere ɔsɔrɛ bɔi lalaa ɣee ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ, ɣee ɔfɔ ɔ̃ ikparĩ i itɔngbo, ɣee karɔtɔ̃ ne,
66014010	ɔ̃anɛ Ɣaa sikpã siare gu kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ ndã mɛ mailupu ndu fiɛ mafere me i ibui ame miyi. Ɣaa aasu ɔtɔ gu atumagɛrɛĩ mabara ngɔmɔ kako i ɔ̃ makpabo sekelea gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃.
66014011	Kuɣɔ gɔ loabɔrɛ i ikpo nɛ ame ɔ̃ate ma kako iibanyi kunya! Mma losɔrɛ bɔi lalaa gu ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ gu mma lofɔ ɔ̃ iyere ikparĩ iibana iwarã manya kasɛ̃ i kakɔme.
66014012	“Maɣɛ nnɛgbe sɔ si mma nɖe Ɣaa maturi fiɛ mamɔɛ̃ Ɣaa itɔ̃me mato fiɛ mafɔ Yesu maɖe ana aana ɔtu i inyɛwe ame.”
66014013	Ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ nnɛgbe Ita i kiniɔ ne, so aaɣɔ mma mpia i Bosate ame fiɛ makpi.” Ne Ɣaa Siwarã ɔfɔ kanya sɔ, “Gbaã ne, maatã ma kusɛkusɛ fiɛ maana iwarã i ma inyɛwe ame, alasɔ ma kurabarara to kuasiai ma.”
66014014	Ne kama ne, lonya idɔdɔ fudza iwɛ̃ nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si lɛ Ɔturi Awune Ɔbi awe. Ɔtɔ̃me sikãrɛtɛa ikoto fiɛ ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe pia wũ i kɔrɔ̃ ame.
66014015	Ɣaa kpabo mama ɔbɔrɛ i Isɔrɛyo ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere ngɔ nsi i idɔdɔ iso sɔ, “Ɔraɖui ɔsɔrɛ̃wi ɔɔɣo! Nabarã ɔnyɔĩ si asɔrɛ̃ ɔraɖui alasɔ kayiiso maturi ɔɖuɖu ɔɔkote matã isɔrɛ̃.”
66014016	Ne ɔso ngɔ nsi i idɔdɔ iso ɔnabarã ɔ̃ ɔnyɔĩ ɔsese kayiiso ɔsɔrɛ̃ kã ɔraɖui.
66014017	Lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛyo nɛ i kato ame. Ɔ̃ wũ ɔto ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe i kɔrɔ̃.
66014018	Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ mba ɔle i ɔtɔ iso ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛkasege ame. Ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣere kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔĩ gɔ mba ɔbe i kɔrɔ̃ sɔ, “Adziribi wa loɣɔ̃ ɔɔbe! Nabarã fɔ ɔnyɔĩ si asɔrɛ̃ adziribi wa i kayiiso ndã kawakɔ̃ ame.”
66014019	Ne ɔso Ɣaa kpabo ɔnabarã ɔ̃ ɔnyɔĩ ɔsese i kayiiso ɔɖaɛ wain abi wa mpia i karɔ̃ iso. Ɔbodza wã ɔfere i nnɛ ame masɛ makã wain ame gɔ nnɛgbe nɣɛ i Ɣaa sikpã siare kanya.
66014020	Mabio adziribi i kabenya fiɛ ima to ibore ibɔrɛ i nnɛ ame masɛ makã adziribi. Iwodoro lɛ ngba miru fiɛ ibore agu alafa anyɔ.
66015001	Nwagbe kama ne, lonya iwawãra mama i kato nɛ mba ɣii gbaã. Ne nɖe Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nrɔɔ̃ ame i inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ pia ne. Inyɛwe akɔdzɛ wagbe nɖe atsɔra wa loaɖi Ɣaa sikpã tsɔra ate ne.
66015002	Lonya ɔpo gɔ nse lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame lorɛtɛ lɛ ɔtɔ. Mma loɖe bɔi lalaa gu ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ gu ɔ̃ iyere ara kukame iso ɣɛ i aɣɔɣɔɛ katɔ̃ fiɛ Ɣaa ɔpia ma sisango i nrɔɔ̃ ame.
66015003	Maka Mose gɔ nɖe Ɣaa ɔɖabo gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi kuka sɔ, “Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe ɔle ɔɖuɖu Sate, fɔ kurabarara ɔmɔ fiɛ kuse ɣaa gbaã. Fɔ gɔ fɔ nɖe kayiiso ɔɖuɖu igara, fɔ siri se bɔlɔlɔ fiɛ aɖe ɔnukuarese.
66015004	Nna mpia fiɛ ɔ̃ibanigã-ɔ Bosate? Fiɛ nna loibapia fɔ iyere kuwarɛ? Alasɔ fɔ ɔnɔwɛ̃ fɔ nse sekelee fiɛ maturi ɔɖuɖu aabɔ ma ati karɔ̃ matã-ɔ. Alasɔ maɔnya fɔ sibɔlɔlɔ kurabarara.”
66015005	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya isɔrɛyo nɛ mpia i kato gu Ɣaa sikati ikpayo nɛ ame ɔsɛ ɔsɛ ɔsese ise.
66015006	Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ ɔbɔrɛ i isɔrɛyo. Mapia awu fudza wa nse sekelee fiɛ ato afiɛ gelegelegele. Masu sikãrɛtɛa kufiami matɔ so i agbegbe.
66015007	Ne ara wa mba ngbã aka ana iwɛ̃ ɔsu sikãrɛtɛa arɔi akɔdzɛ wa ame i Ɣaa gɔ mba ngbã fiɛ ɔpia ɔwi biara sikpã pia ɔtã Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ magbe ne.
66015008	Kuɣɔ gɔ nto kubɔrɛ i Ɣaa ikpawaĩ gu ɔ̃ ɔle ame ɔyi Ɣaa isɔrɛyo kpitii. Kuwɛ̃ iiwo isɔrɛyo ame ɔbo gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ wa i Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ mamɔ ɔbɔ ɔfe aro.
66016001	Ne lonɔ silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre teteree si bɔrɛ i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ame si to siɣere Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ mamɔ sɔ, “Mikɛlɛ miafedza nnɛ mpia i Ɣaa sikpã arɔi ame mifere i kayiiso!”
66016002	Ne ɔso Ɣaa kpabo ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔsɛ ɔ̃afedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i kayiiso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, adzalebi aɣɛi wa nsɛ afɔrɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ afere i mma iso i bɔi lalaa ikparĩ sia gu mma losɔrɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ.
66016003	Ɣaa kpabo nyɔare ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i ɔpo ame. Ndu mɛ mpia i ɔpo ame ɔkpese lɛ kpise ima, ne ɔso ara wa ɔɖuɖu mba ngbã i ɔpo ame ɔkpi.
66016004	Ɣaa kpabo tɛare ɔfedza ɔ̃ irɔi ɔfere i siwore gu atubu ame, ne sɛ̃ ndu ɔkpese ima ne.
66016005	Ne lonɔ kpabo gɔ nto ɔnyɔ ndu iso ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Fɔ gɔ fɔ mpia fiɛ ɔɔwe anya fiɛ aɖe ngɔ losekele. Aɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri sɛɛ iso lo!
66016006	Mmagbe ɔɖoe fɔ maturi gu fɔ kanyamaɖidze. Ne ɔso atã ma ima sɔ manɛ ne. Kutsue ikpadzɛ̃ nɛgbe ɔkategu ma!”
66016007	Ne lonɔ isɔrɛkasege to kaɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, Bosate Ɣaa, Ɔlesate, asɛ aɣɛ ɔnukuare fiɛ asɛ aɖaɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso.”
66016008	Ɣaa kpabo naare ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i kuɣɛ̃ iso itã kutsuedza maturi ala kɔ̃ ɔtɔwiri.
66016009	Kuɣɛ̃ ɔbɛbɛ maturi teteree sɔ maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gɔ mba ɔle i inyɛwe nɛgbe iso, ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibafiniki masu kuwarɛ matã wũ.
66016010	Ɣaa kpabo ruva ɔfedza ɔ̃ irɔi ɔfere i bɔi sigaraiyara iso. Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, idududu ɔba i bɔi sigarakaɖekɔ̃. Maturi to mawe kanya ala ibo nɛ mato manya ɔso.
66016011	Maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa gɔ mpia i kato iso ala adzalebi aɣɛi wa nsia ma iso gu ibo nɛ mato manya ɔso. Ɣɛɛ masɛ̃ sɔ maibafiniki i ma kurabarara nyanyarĩa kama.
66016012	Ɣaa kpabo kuɔva ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i Frat ɔwore siare ame gɔ itã sɔ ɔsɔ̃ ɔkpese kakorekɔ̃ gu ɔri ɔtã magara ma lobɔrɛ i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃.
66016013	Lonya siwarã lalaa aka atɛ wa nse lɛ akɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i la, bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze kanya ame.
66016014	Siwarã aka atɛ dzɛgbe nɖe siwarã lalaa dzɛ nsɛ sibara awawãra ne. Siwarã dzɛgbe loabɔrɛ sikɛlɛ kayiiso magara ɔɖuɖu kɔrɛ sɔ siasa ma kanya sitã Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate Iyi siare nɛmɔ kakpã.
66016015	“Nyɔ! Loto loba lɛ yukukpe. So aaɣɔ ngɔ lonyɔ tuee fiɛ ɔledza ɔ̃ awu ɔsɛ sɔ ɔ̃ibasɛ isɔ̃ i maturi ndɛ̃ kunuarɛ ɔkpɛ̃ wũ.”
66016016	Ne ɔso siwarã lalaa dzɛgbe gu magara ɔba maasikanya i ngbegɔ masɛ marɔ i si Hebrise ame sɔ Armagedon.
66016017	Ɣaa kpabo kɔdzɛva ɔfedza nnɛ mpia i ɔ̃ irɔi ame ɔfere i ɔwiri ame. Ne silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre sibɔrɛ i sigaraiyara iso i Ɣaa isɔrɛyo ame sɔ, “Iɔro o-o!”
66016018	Ɔluwɛ̃ ne, kado ɔtsɛ imama, silɔ agbãagbã to sire teteree kado to ɔɖu teteree fiɛ karɔ̃ ɔtsɛ iti ku ifɔ̃. Ita i ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa ɔbara ɔturi ne, karɔ̃ iiti ngbɔ kanya, nnɛgbe nɖe karɔ̃ iti nɛ lonyanyarĩ iɖo ne.
66016019	Ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔbɛse aka atɛ, fiɛ nɖebi simagɛ̃ siare ana ɔbiɛbiɛ. Ɣaa ɔnyigi Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔ lofɔ iyere, ne ɔso ɔsu ɔ̃ sikpã ndã ikɔi nɛ ɔto ɔtã wũ ɔnɛ ɔtara karɔ̃.
66016020	Nrɔ̃ mɛ ɔɖuɖu i ndu ɔki milɔ ɔyu pelepele fiɛ kube kukuwɛ̃ ana iisiwe maanya.
66016021	Atumagɛrɛĩ wa lomɔ lɛ mma ɔkoto ɔba aapɛ. Awuĩwuĩ maturi gbaã ne ɔso maɣɛ amusuora i Ɣaa iso. Inyɛwe nɛgbe ɔnyanyarĩ gbaã.
66017001	Mmɔ i Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto arɔi akɔdzɛ ɔwɛ̃ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ba nyɔ kumɛgɔ maakpadzɛ̃ asɔrɔ̃ɖedze siare gɔ nsi i ndu gbodzoo iso kutsue.
66017002	Kayiiso magara ɔɖegu asɔrɔ̃ɖedze gɔ lofɔ iyere ngbe asɔrɔ̃, fiɛ ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ɔmɔɛ̃ kayiiso maturi lɛ ndã.”
66017003	Kpabo gɔgbe ɔkɔ me i siwarã ame ɔkɛlɛgu fafuĩ ame ngbegɔ i maturi na. Lonya ɔrɔ̃go ɔwɛ̃ gɔ nsi i bɔi lalaa rɛtɛa ɔwɛ̃ iso. Mmusuo ayere gbodzoo sia i bɔi iso, fiɛ ɔba ati akɔdzɛ gu asa aweo.
66017004	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe pia awu kpinakpina gu arɛtɛa, fiɛ ɔkɛrɛ so ala sikãrɛtɛa ara, anyi wa lofɔ kuɣa gu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa. Ɔto sikãrɛtɛa itunɛra nɛ loyigu anyanyara gu ara nyanyarĩa wa ɔna ɔbɔrɛgu i ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ame.
66017005	Matsɛrɛ iyere nɛ karɔ̃ lowɛrɛ masia i ɔ̃ itɔngbo sɔ, Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere, Masɔrɔ̃ɖedze ɔnyi, kayiiso anyanyara ɔnyi.
66017006	Lonya sɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔgbe ɔɔnɛ Ɣaa maturi gu mma maɖoe ala ma Yesu kafɔkaɖe ɔso ima ɔto ɔrɛ̃ lɛ ndã. Gɔ lonya wũ ne, ibara me ɣaa gbaã.
66017007	Ne Ɣaa kpabo to ɔkarɛ me sɔ, “Nda ɔso ito ibara-ɔ ɣaa? Loaɣere-ɔ iwɛrɛra i bɔi gɔ mba ati akɔdzɛ gu asa aweo gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ nsi wũ iso iso.
66017008	Bɔi gɔ anya ne, ɔ̃ɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya, ɣɛɛ kiniɔ ne, ɔ̃ɔkpi. Ɔto ɔ̃abɔrɛ i iwo gudua nɛ lobua iwodoro ame ɔba fiɛ maawɔra wũ. Mma nsi ngbã i kayiiso fiɛ ma ayere na i magbanadze ɔko ame ta kayi karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ ne, ito iabara ma ɣii si manya bɔi, alasɔ ɔɖe ngɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya fiɛ ɔkpi, fiɛ ɔto ɔ̃aledza iba ana.
66017009	“Ngɔ mba iwola gu ara karɔ̃ inɔ pɛ loanɔ nnɛgbe karɔ̃. Ati akɔdzɛ ɖe kubemi kukɔdzɛ gɔ iso i ɔrɔ̃go si,
66017010	ana ne, alɛisi magara maɖe gɔ ma ndɛ̃ iru sigara ɔɖewi ɔɔfe koko. Ɔwɛ̃ to ɔɖe iso kiniɔ, fiɛ ɔtsɔra ɔwi iiɣo. Si ɔ̃ ɔwi ɔɣo ne, ɔwi kurukutu kere ɔ̃aɖe sigara.
66017011	Bɔi lalaa gɔ loɔsɛ ngbã ɔnya fiɛ ɔsiina kiniɔ nɖe igara farafanava, ɣɛɛ ɔɖe magara ikɔdzɛ ndɛ̃ ɔwɛ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa to ɔ̃awɔra.
66017012	“Asa aweo wa anya ne, magara iweo ma sigara ɔɖewi loiɣo maɖe, ɣɛɛ maana ɔle ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ sɔ maɖegu bɔi lalaa sigara.
66017013	Adzuni awɛ̃ saã aɖe magara iweo magbe ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maasu ma kayakpa gu ɔle matã bɔi lalaa.
66017014	Mato maakpɛ̃gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi, ɣɛɛ ito iaɖe ma iso, alasɔ ɔ̃ nɖe Makɔse ɔɖuɖu Ɔkɔse, gu magara ɔɖuɖu igara. Ɔ̃ masiaidze ma Ɣaa ɔkpere, ɔtɛ ma ɔsɛ fiɛ masiai wũ i ɔnukuare ame to maawegu wũ.”
66017015	Ɣaa kpabo ɔledza me iɣere sɔ, “Ndu mɛ anya asɔrɔ̃ɖedze si iso nɖe nɖebi, maturi akuri, maturi agbã, gu siɖeɣɛa agbãagbã.
66017016	Asa aweo wa anya gu bɔi to maatsiri asɔrɔ̃ɖedze. Mato maafɔ wũ ira biara iso ɔsɛ isɔ̃. Maawe ɔ̃ sina matsuedza wũ.
66017017	Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔsu nnɛgbe ɔpia i ma situ ame sɔ mabara ngbɔ si adzuni wa ɔbara ɔsɛ iso iki i mawɛ̃ ibara ame sɔ maasu ma ɔle gɔ mato maɖe iso ala matã bɔi lalaa gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ ɔwi gɔ i Ɣaa itɔ̃me aaba i ne ame.
66017018	Ɔrɔ̃go gɔ anya ne, ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lofɔ iyere fiɛ ɔto ɔɖe kayiiso magara iso ɔɖe.”
66018001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo mama gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba. Ɔba ɔle gbaã fiɛ ɔ̃ ifiɛ to iɣo karɔ̃.
66018002	Ne ɔla kulu teteree ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ɔ̃ɔbiɛ o-o! Babilonia gɔ lofɔ iyere ɔɔbiɛbiɛ wɔsɔwɔsɔ! Ɔ̃ɔkpese siwarã lalaa gu siwarã dzɛ loisekele, kurodzai gɔ loisekele gu ngɔ maiɖe kawekɔ̃.
66018003	Alasɔ nɖebi ɔɖuɖu ɔnɛ ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ndã. Kayiiso magara ɔɖegu wũ asɔrɔ̃, fiɛ kayiiso kuɣamaɖese ana ɔkpese maranase iki i ngbã nyanyarĩa isɛgu wũ ame.”
66018004	Ne lonɔ silɔ mama to siɖe ika sibɔrɛgu i kato sɔ, “Wũ maturi, mibɔrɛ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame, si iiɖe ngbɔ ne, mi wũ miaba miabara akpi wa igbã ɔbara. Fiɛ Ɣaa aasu inyɛwe ɔkpadzɛ̃ mi kutsue lɛ kumɛgɔ ɔkpadzɛ̃ wũ!
66018005	Alasɔ maɔfu ɔ̃ akpi ikpe akɔlɛ asɛ aabo ta kato, fiɛ Ɣaa ɔnyigi ara lalaa wa i ɔ̃ maturi ɔbara.
66018006	Mibara wũ miti kuso! Nwa ɔbara mi ne, mibara wũ miti kuso ikpɛ inyɔ. Ikɔi nɛ ame ɔka ɔtile ndã ɔtã mi ne, mika ne ame ikpɛ inyɔ mitã wũ ɔnɛ!
66018007	Mitã ɔwe inyɛ, si ɔmararã so lɛ kumɛgɔ ikote i ɔ̃ ikɛrɛso gu inyɔso kaɖukaɖu kanya. Alasɔ ɔrɔ̃go gɔmɔ to ɔɣɛ i ɔ̃ ɔtu ame sɔ, ‘Marɔ̃go igara loɖe i ngbe. Loiɖe kpise ɔre fiɛ loibamararã so lonya!’
66018008	Ne ɔso iyi iwɛ̃ saã i inyɛwe aaba wũ iso, kukpi, imararãso gu kukã. Fiɛ ɔtɔ aatsuedza wũ, alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nto ɔɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ne, Ɔlesate ɔɖe.
66018009	“Si kayiiso magara ma loɖegu wũ asɔrɔ̃ ɔnya kumɛgɔ ɔto ɔtsue ɔbɔrɛ kuɣɔ ne, mato maapɛ sikpabo mabiɛgu wũ kaku.
66018010	Ɔ̃ inyɛwe to iakpɛ̃ kayiiso magara mamɔ ifɔ̃, ne ɔso mato maaya dzoroo mala maɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo lo! Fɔ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ lofɔ iyere! Babilonia gɔ mba ɔle! Ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã kere makpadzɛ̃-ɔ kutsue kumɛgɔgbe!’
66018011	“Kuɣamaɖese siare ma mpia i kayiiso ana ɔbiɛ kaku mamararã so alasɔ kuwɛ̃ siina gɔ loaɣa ma ara.
66018012	Ara wa mato marɔdɛ̃ nɖe sikãrɛtɛa, sikãfudza, ata wa lofɔ kuɣa, anyi, sikati fudza, siɖɔbɔrɔa, ɔgo rɛtɛa gu ɔkati kpinakpina, adziri agbãagbã wa nsɛ ɔfɔrɛ̃ kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃, ara wa mabara ala sisogbɛ̃, ara wa ɔɖuɖu mabara ala ibɔra nɛ masɛ mabara ala ayiwa, ibɔra mɔmɔ gu adziri wa lofɔ kuɣa gbaã gu ata wa nto alɛ ɔnyɔ.
66018013	Ara mama ana nɖe adzirikolo kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a wa masɛ marɔ sɔ sinamɔn, kutu awara, kua kɔrɔ̃kɔrɔ̃a, ɔlufui, korobo, ndã, nnɔĩ mɛ masɛ maɖe, ɔraũ gɔ lobe ɖɛkpɛrɛɛ, kakpã, ayo ame mabɔi gu manantsuĩ, apɔngɔ, makeke ma i apɔngɔ sɛ akpadzɛ̃, masande, gu ta maturi ma maasu masɔrɛ ala ma aɣɔ.
66018014	“Kuɣamaɖese ɔɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ara sɛɛ wa i fɔ ɔkala sɛ ɔɖɔɛ ɔɔre-ɔ nrɔɔ̃. Fɔ karana ɔɖuɖu gu fɔ kulɛ ana ɔɔyu gɔ aisibanya wã anya.’
66018015	Mma lokpese maranase iki i kuɣa gɔgbe iɖe ame ɣɛ dzoroo alasɔ mato manigã inyɛ nɛ ɔto ɔwe. Mabiɛ kaku ku sikpabo, mamararã so, maɣɛ sɔ,
66018016	‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo lo! Ɔmagɛ̃ siare, fɔ gɔ manyɔmɛdza ɔkati fudza gu ɔrɛtɛa gu ɔgo kpinakpina, fiɛ asu sikãrɛtɛa ara gu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa gu anyi akɛrɛ so.
66018017	Karana gagbe ɔɖuɖu ɔwɔ i ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã ame!’ “Sikolo siare makãdze gu sɛ̃ makpakpa, sirimasɛdze, gu maturi tsɔra ɔɖuɖu ma nsɛ masɛ i sikolo ame maɖe kuɣa ɔya dzoroo,
66018018	mabiɛ kaku ku sikpabo gɔ manya kumɛgɔ i ɔmagɛ̃ to ɔtsue fiɛ kuɣɔ to kubɔrɛ maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Mme ɔmagɛ̃ lokategu ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔgbe?’
66018019	Mabodza ɔsebu mafere so iti ame mabiɛ kaku mamararã so maɣɛ sɔ, ‘Ndzo lo! Ndzo buɛ buɛ boatã-ɔ, fɔ ɔmagɛ̃ siare. Ngbegɔ i mma mba sikolo siare sɛ mana ma karana mabɔrɛgu. Ɔɖɔwũ ɔwɛ̃ saã ne, ɔɔkpese ikpakpi!
66018020	So si siɣɔ mi ma mpia i kato. Mi Ɣaa maturi, katɔ̃memasɛdze gu Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze, so si siɣɔ mi sɔ makpadzɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ gɔgbe kutsue ngbɔ! Alasɔ Ɣaa ɔɔɣɛgu wũ atɔ̃me ɔtã wũ ipɔ i ara wa ɔbara mi iti.’ ”
66018021	Ne lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ mba ɔle ɔputa ita siare ɔfuĩdza ɔpia i ɔpo ame ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ngbɔ i Ɣaa aafuĩdza Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ siare ɔwuĩ i karɔ̃ sɔ maisibanya wũ manya ne.
66018022	Sisango gu aruei gu kudadã gu kuka makadze silɔ iisibare i fɔ ame inya. Mma nsɛ mabara kusɛ̃ iisibawe i fɔ ame. Ngbɔ ame ana maisibanɔ kukɔtɛ silɔ ana i fɔ ame ne.
66018023	Sikaniɛ iisibasa i fɔ ame, fiɛ ɔrɔ̃go kɔdze silɔ iisibare i fɔ ame sinya. Mma nsɛ maɣa-ɔ ara nɖe kayiiso maturi ma mba ɔle fiɛ asu fɔ sibɔ ipɛ asɔsɔla nɖebi ɔɖuɖu.
66018024	Babilonia ɔmagɛ̃ ame manya Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze gu ɔ̃ maturi ima. Fiɛ iiɖe ma ɔkpɛ kere, ɣɛɛ manya mma ɔɖuɖu maɖoe i kayiiso ima i mmɔ.”
66019001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonɔ silɔ dzɛ lore maturi gbodzoo sire i kato sito siɣɛ sɔ, “Aleluya! Iɖi gu ifiɛ gu ɔle nɖe Bo Ɣaa ɔkpɛ.
66019002	Alasɔ ɔsɛ ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri iso fiɛ ɔ̃ itɔ̃me ɖe ɔnukuare. Ɔtã asɔrɔ̃ɖedze siare gɔ lonina kayiiso ku ɔ̃ asɔrɔ̃ iɖe ipɔ. Ɣaa ɔkarɛ so iti alasɔ asɔrɔ̃ɖedze gɔgbe loɖoe Ɣaa maturi ne.”
66019003	Maledza kulu ila iɣɛ sɔ, “Aleluya! Ɔmagɛ̃ siare gɔmɔ kuɣɔ aala kuɔkɛlɛ kato ɔwi biara.”
66019004	Makpakpa sinyɔ ina gu ara ana wa mba ngbã ɔpɛ agɛgɛ̃ matã Ɣaa gɔ nsi sigaraiyara iso maɣɛ sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ! Aleluya!”
66019005	Ne silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔre sibɔrɛ i sigaraiyara kɔrɛ sɔ, “Mile bo Ɣaa, mi ma nɖe ɔ̃ maɖabo ɔɖuɖu, maturi nyaa gu mma loinya, gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ manigã wũ.”
66019006	Ne kama ne, silɔ siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ dzɛ lore maturi gbodzoo sire ɣee ndu gbodzoo mɛ nto mikpase i ata iso, ɣee kado iɖu teteree sɔ, “Aleluya! Alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa gɔ nɖe Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate to ɔɖe sigara.
66019007	Mitã bona isoɣɔ, so si siɣɔ bo, si bokɔlɛ ɔ̃ iyere kato. Alasɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go ikɔyi ɔɔɣo fiɛ ɔ̃ ɔre ɔɔledza so ɔsɛ.
66019008	Ɣaa ɔsu awu fudza wa nto afiɛ ɔtã ɔrɔ̃go sɔ ɔpia.” Awu fudza wagbe nɣɛ atã Ɣaa maturi kurabarara sɛɛ ne.
66019009	Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sɛ sɔ, so aaɣɔ mma makpere sɔ maba Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go ikɔ ɔpɔrɔ̃ katukɔ̃.” Ɔledza iɣɛ sɔ, “Ɣaa kanya ame atɔ̃me tutuutu i ngbe ne.”
66019010	Lopɛ agɛgɛ̃ sɔ si loto iti i karɔ̃ lotã wũ, ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabara ngbɔ! Maɖabo kere i bo gu-ɔ gu manyii ma nto maɖe aɖansiɛ i Yesu iso ɖe. Pɛ agɛgɛ̃ tã Ɣaa ɔnɔwɛ̃!” Alasɔ aɖansiɛ wa mato maɖe i Yesu iso lopia Ɣaa kanyamaɖidze ɔle.
66019011	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya kato ɔbusi fiɛ lonya ipɔngɔ fudza iwɛ̃ ɣɛ. Ngɔ nsi i ne iso iyere nɖe Ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara i ɔri iso gu Ɔnukuare. Ɔsɛ ɔkpɛ̃ kakpã, ɔɣɛ atɔ̃me i ɔri bɔlɔlɔa iso.
66019012	Ɔ̃ anɔmi se lɛ ɔtɔ sinyagɛmi fiɛ ɔtɔ̃me sigaraikoto gbodzoo. Matsɛrɛ iyere iwɛ̃ masia wũ iso nɛ i kuwɛ̃ iiɣe iɖo ɔ̃ ɔnɔwɛ̃ saã.
66019013	Ɔpia awu wa mawarã mapia i ima ame fiɛ ɔ̃ iyere nɖe Ɣaa Itɔ̃me.
66019014	Kato makpakpɛ̃dze pia ɔkati ɖɔbɔrɔa fudza sekelea fiɛ masi i apɔngɔ fudza iso masiai wũ i kama.
66019015	Kakpã ipɛmi nɛ mba ɔbe pia wũ i kanya nɛ ɔ̃asu ɔwɔra nɖebi. Ɔ̃aɖe ma iso ku ibɔra ɔtsiamidziri fiɛ ɔ̃abiobio ara ku Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate sikpã lɛ kumɛgɔ masɛ mabio adziribi i itawo ame.
66019016	Iyere nɛ matsɛrɛ masia i ɔ̃ awu tagbaraa iso gu ɔ̃ ikpabɔ iso nɖe sɔ, MAGARA AME IGARA GU MAKƆSE AME ƆKƆSE.
66019017	Ne kama ne, lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ gɔ ɔɣɛ i kuɣɛ̃ iso. Ɔla kulu teteree ɔkpere kurodzai gɔ ɔɖuɖu nsɛ kufɛrɛrɛ i ɔwiri ame ɔɣere kɔ̃ sɔ, “Miba o-o! Miba miasakanya si miɖe Ɣaa kutsuɛ aɖera siare.
66019018	Miba miaɖe magara, makpakpɛ̃dzekpakpa, makpakpɛ̃dze, apɔngɔ, gu mma nsɛ masɛ i apɔngɔ iso mina. Ɔbiara igbã sina pia, mma loiɖe masande, masande, maturi nyaa, gu ta mawɛrɛba sire.”
66019019	Ne lonya sɔ bɔi lalaa gu kayiiso magara gu ma makpakpɛ̃dze ɔrɔ ngɔ nsi i ipɔngɔ iso gu ɔ̃ makpakpɛ̃dze kakpã ne.
66019020	Mamɔɛ̃ bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze gɔ lobara awawãra i bɔi ɔle ame. Awawãra wamɔ ɔsu ɔsɔsɔla mma iso i bɔi ikparĩ sia gu mma losɔrɛ ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ ne. Masu bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe nɛ nto itsue ame manyɔa.
66019021	Matsɔra ne, ngɔ nsi i ipɔngɔ iso ɔɖoe ma ala ipɛmi nɛ lobɔrɛ i ɔ̃ kanya ame fiɛ kurodzai ɔba kuaɖe ma sina kumɛgɔ kuawo ne.
66020001	Ne lonya Ɣaa kpabo ɔwɛ̃ ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba ɔto iwo gudua wodoroa sibɔi gu kunyiborei siare i kɔrɔ̃.
66020002	Ɔmɔɛ̃ aɣɛ wa nɖe aɣɛ kuere wa mpia ta kokowi fiɛ masɛ makpere wã sɔ Ɔbosam gu Satana. Ɣaa kpabo ɔnyi wũ ɔsɛ akɔ kakpi.
66020003	Ɔfuĩdza aɣɛ ɔpia i iwo gudua wodoroa ame, ɔsɛ̃ ne kanya kpa, fiɛ ka ɔsu itsuebi ɔsɛ̃ iwo kanya sɔ si ɔ̃isibana ɔri ɔkɔ nɖebi ɔyura gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ akɔ kakpi kama. Ne kama ne, maaɖi wũ ɔwi kɛkɛĩ kere.
66020004	Ne kama ne, lonya maturi mawɛ̃ si i sigaraiyara iso fiɛ matã ma ɔle sɔ maɣɛ atɔ̃me. Ma nɖe mma maɖoe alasɔ maɖe aɖansiɛ i Yesu gu Ɣaa itɔ̃me iso sikala ne. Mmagbe iibɔ ma ati karɔ̃ matã bɔi lalaa, ɣee ɔ̃ kumiamia itĩ, fiɛ maifɔ ɔ̃ ikparĩ i itɔngbo ɣee kɔrɔ̃ iso. Mata masɛ ngbã fiɛ maɖegu Yesu sigara akɔ kakpi.
66020005	Makpise ita ɖeakatɔ̃ i ngbe ne. Makpise tsɔra iita gbɔgbɔɔgbɔ akɔ kakpi ɔfe.
66020006	So aaɣɔ makpise ɖeakatɔ̃ ma loata fiɛ maase sekelee. Kukpi nyɔare iisibawe ɔle i ma iso. Maaɖe Ɣaa gu Kristo masɔrɛdze fiɛ maaɖegu wũ sigara akɔ kakpi.
66020007	Si akɔ kakpi ɔɔfe ne, mato maaɖi Ɔbosam i iwo gudua wodoroa ame.
66020008	Ɔ̃abɔrɛ ɔsɛ ɔ̃asɔsɔla kayiiso akpakpai aka ana maturi ɔɖuɖu ma nɖe Gog gu Magog. Ɔto ɔ̃asa ma kanya ɔtã kakpã fiɛ mato maasi lɛ ɔpo ame iwarĩ.
66020009	Masɛ maki i kayiiso ɔɖuɖu fiɛ maba maaki malɔ Ɣaa maturi gu ɔmagɛ̃ gɔ i Ɣaa sɛ ɔɖɔɛ. Ɣɛɛ ɔtɔ ɔbɔrɛ i kato ɔba ɔ̃atsuedza ma pelepele.
66020010	Masu Ɔbosam gɔ losɔsɔla ma mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare nɛ atɔgɛrɛĩ lowara ame. Ngbe masu bɔi lalaa gu mila kanyaɖidze mafuĩdza mapia mafegu ne. Maate ma ɔɣiã i ngbe kasɛ̃ i kakɔme ɔwi daaro.
66020011	Ne lonya Sigarayara fudza siare iwɛ̃ nɛ iso i ɔwɛ̃ si ne. Kato gu karɔ̃ ɔyu i ɔ̃ katɔ̃ fiɛ maisina kawekɔ̃.
66020012	Lonya makpise, maturi nyaa gu mma loinya gɔ maɣɛ i sigaraiyara katɔ̃. Mabusi siko, fiɛ maledza ɔko mama ibusi, ɔ̃ nɖe ngbã ɔko ne. Masu ara wa matsɛrɛ mapia i siko ame maɣɛgu makpise atɔ̃me i ma kurabarara kanya.
66020013	Ɔpo ɔɖi makpise ma mpia i ɔ̃ ame ɔtã fiɛ kukpi gu ikpibiɔ ana ɔɖi makpise ma mpia i ma ame matã fiɛ Ɣaa ɣɛgu ɔbiara atɔ̃me i ara wa ɔbara kanya.
66020014	Ne kama ne, masu kukpi gu ikpibiɔ mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare ame. Itɔkpe siare nɛgbe nɖe kukpi nyɔare ne.
66020015	Ɔbiara gɔ iyere mainya matsɛrɛ i ngbã ɔko ame ne, masu wũ mafuĩdza mapia i itɔkpe siare ame.
66021001	Nnɛgbe kama ne, lonya kato ɣɛtɛ gu karɔ̃ ɣɛtɛ alasɔ kato ɖeakatɔ̃ gu karɔ̃ ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe, fiɛ ɔpo ana siina.
66021002	Ne lonya Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ ɣɛtɛ sekelea ɔso ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ ɔto ɔba. Makɛrɛ wũ lɛ ɔrɔ̃go gɔ makɛrɛ matã kurã iyiri.
66021003	Ne lonɔ silɔ siare siwɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i sigaraiyara kɔrɛ siɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ! Ɣaa kasɛkɔ̃ ka kapia i maturi ndɛ̃. Ɔ̃awe i ma ndɛ̃ fiɛ maaɖe ɔ̃ kaɖe. Ɣaa mɔmɔ aawe i ma kɔrɛ fiɛ ɔ̃aɖe ma Ɣaa.
66021004	Ɔto ɔ̃anukutu ma nnɔmɛ biara i katɔ̃, fiɛ kukpi iisibawe. Ngbɔ ame i imararãso, kaku gu ibo iisibawe alasɔ ara wa lowe ku ɔkpɛ ɖeakatɔ̃ ɔɔfe.”
66021005	Ne ngɔ nsi i sigaraiyara iso ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Minyɔ! Loɔkpesera ira biara iɣɛtɛ.” Ne ɔledza iɣɛ ana sɔ, “Tsɛrɛ sɛ ne atɔ̃me biele wa maafɔ maɖe aɖe.”
66021006	Ne ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ira biara ɔɔkote kini. Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu kawirikɔ̃. Ngɔ i ɔme to ɔkore ne, loatã wũ ndu mɛ nsɛ mitã ngbã fiɛ migɔdɛ̃ i itubu nɛ loisɛ isɔ̃ ame gɔ ɔ̃ibatã kuso.
66021007	Ngɔ loɖe iso ne, kuso gɔ loatã wũ ngbe ne. Ana ne, loaɖe ɔ̃ Ɣaa fiɛ ɔ̃ wũ ɔ̃aɖe me ɔbi.
66021008	Ɣɛɛ mafɔ̃dze, mma loifɔ maɖe, anyanyara mabaradze, maturiɖoese, asɔrɔ̃maɖedze, sibɔ mapɛdze, maɣɔsɔrɛdze, gu maladze ɔɖuɖu ne, maafɔ ma kuso i itɔkpe siare nɛ atɔgɛrɛĩ lowara ame. Nnɛgbe nɖe kukpi nyɔare ne.”
66021009	Nnɛmɔ kama ne, Ɣaa makpabo ikɔdzɛ ma nto arɔi akɔdzɛ wa loyi ku inyɛwe aka akɔdzɛ tsɔra ɔwɛ̃ ɔba wũ kɔrɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ba si lote-ɔ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ɔrɔ̃go gɔ ɔto ɔba ɔ̃akɔ.”
66021010	Ɣaa siwarã ɔbo i wũ ame fiɛ Ɣaa kpabo ɔkɔ me ɔkɛlɛgu kube kɔlɛa kuwɛ̃ iso. Ɔte me Yerusalem ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea gɔ loso ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa kɔrɛ i kato ɔto ɔba.
66021011	Ɔto ɔsa ku Ɣaa ifiɛ fiɛ ɔ̃ ifiɛ se lɛ ata wa lofɔ kuɣa. Ɔse lɛ yaspa ita awe fiɛ ɔ̃ ame ɔkpa lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ awe.
66021012	Ibere nɛ loki ilɔ wũ ɔkɔlɛ fiɛ ibɛ ana. Kuyogodɔ̃ kuweo-kunyɔ pia i ibere nɛgbe ame. Ɣaa makpabo iweo-inyɔ ɣɛ i kuyogodɔ̃ fiɛ matsɛrɛ Israel kalɛ kawɛ̃ iyere masia i kayogodɔ̃ biara iso.
66021013	Kuyogodɔ̃ kutɛ pia i kuɣɛ̃kabɔrɛkɔ̃, kutɛ pia i kato isɛ, kutɛ pia i kala isɛ fiɛ kutɛ pia i kuɣɛ̃ iyo kabokɔ̃ isɛ.
66021014	Ata aweo-anyɔ masu mapia ala ɔmagɛ̃ abere i karɔ̃ ame fiɛ matsɛrɛ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi katɔ̃memasɛdze iweo-inyɔ ayere masia i wã iso.
66021015	Ɣaa kpabo gɔ loɖegu me ika ɔmɔɛ̃ sikãrɛtɛa ɔdziri gɔ maasu masusu ala ɔmagɛ̃, ɔ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ gu ɔ̃ kubereku ɔto i kɔrɔ̃.
66021016	Ɔmagɛ̃ ba abesɛ aka ana, fiɛ ɔ̃ kukarãme gu ɔ̃ kubɛme ɔɖuɖu ɔkote. Ɣaa kpabo gɔgbe ɔsu ɔ̃ sikãrɛtɛa ɔdziri ɔsusu ala ɔmagɛ̃, ne ɔnya sɔ kasɛ kawɛ̃ ɔkarã maili kakpi gu alafa aru. Ɔmagɛ̃ kukarãme, kubɛme gu ku kɔlɛme ɔkate.
66021017	Ɣaa kpabo ɔsusu ibere ana fiɛ ɔnya sɔ ibɛ mita sikuɔ i ɔdziri gɔ ɔto ɔsusu ala ara kanya.
66021018	Yaspa ata masu matsue ala abere fiɛ sikãrɛtɛa dzɛ nlɛ siɖo sito sifiɛ lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ masu matsue ala ɔmagɛ̃.
66021019	Masu ata wa lofɔ kuɣa agbãagbã mapia ala ɔmagɛ̃ abere i karɔ̃ ame. Ita ɖeakatɔ̃ marɔ sɔ yaspa, inyɔare nɖe safir. Itɛare nɖe halkedon, fiɛ inaare nɖe smaragdo.
66021020	Iruvare nɖe sardonik, ikuɔvare nɖe sardis. Ikɔdzɛvare nɖe krisolit, fiɛ farafanavare nɖe beril. Kaiwɛ̃vare nɖe topas. Iweovare nɖe krisopras. Iweowɛ̃vare nɖe yiakint, fiɛ iweonyɔare nɖe ametist.
66021021	Ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ kuweo-kunyɔ ɔɖuɖu ne, anyi aweo-anyɔ wa lofɔ kuɣa mabaragu ala. Kayogodɔ̃ biara ne, inyi siare iwɛ̃ mabaragu ala. Ɔmagɛ̃ ɔri siare ne, sikãrɛtɛa sɛɛ mabaragu ala fiɛ si asɛ ne, ato anya so i ɔ̃ ame.
66021022	Loinya Isɔrɛyo kuiwɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ ame alasɔ Ɣaa Ɔle Ɔɖuɖu Sate gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɖe Isɔrɛyo.
66021023	Kuɣɛ̃ ɣee ɔgbaworeti iinya i ɔmagɛ̃ ame, alasɔ Ɣaa ikpawaĩ sɛ ifiɛ ifere wũ iso fiɛ Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi nɖe ɔ̃ ɔkaniɛ.
66021024	Ɔmagɛ̃ ikpawaĩ ame i kayiiso nɖebi aasɛ fiɛ kayiiso magara aasu ma karana mabɔ ɔ̃ ame.
66021025	Maibasɛ̃ ɔmagɛ̃ kuyogodɔ̃ ku anɔwã fiɛ kaɖe iibaro i ɔ̃ ame kanya.
66021026	Nɖebi to maasu ma agagã gu karana mabɔ ɔ̃ ame.
66021027	Ɣɛɛ ira nɛ loisekele kuiwɛ̃ iibabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame. Maladze gu mma nsɛ mabara anuarɛra iibawe i ɔ̃ ame. Mma ayere matsɛrɛ mapia i Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi ngbã ɔko ame pɛ loawe i ɔ̃ ame.
66022001	Ne kama ne, Ɣaa kpabo gɔmɔ ɔte me ɔwore gɔ ame ndu nsɛ mitã ngbã. Ndu ɔrɛ kpɛnɛnɛnɛ lɛ aɣɔɣɔɛ wa ame losekele gbaã. Ɔwore gɔgbe ɔgɔdɛ̃ ɔbɔrɛ i Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sigaraiyara ame.
66022002	Ɔbore ɔki i ɔmagɛ̃ ɔri siare ndɛ̃. Kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã ɣɛ i ɔwore sikpokpo inyɔɔ iso fiɛ kusɛ kuɣɔ̃ i kuwa biara iso i ikɔ ame. Kɔ̃ aɣata ɖe kua gɔ nsɛ kusa sinyɛ itã nɖebi.
66022003	Maisibanya imusuora kuiwɛ̃ i ɔmagɛ̃ gɔmɔ ame. Ɣaa gu Sɛrɛrerɔ̃ Ibi sigaraiyara aawe i mmɔ fiɛ ɔ̃ maɖabo aasɔrɛ wũ.
66022004	Mato maanya wũ katɔ̃ fiɛ ɔ̃ iyere to iasia ma i atɔngbo.
66022005	Kaɖe iisibaro i mmɔ, fiɛ ɔkaniɛ ɣee kuɣɛ̃ ana iisibanya ma alasɔ Bosate Ɣaa loaɖe ma ikpawaĩ fiɛ maaɖe sigara kayi daaro daaro.
66022006	Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Ɔnukuare atɔ̃me wa maawo ɔfɔ ɔɖe aɖe i ngbe. Bosate Ɣaa gɔ losu ɔ̃ Siwarã ɔpia i ɔ̃ kanyamaɖidze ame lopia ɔ̃ kpabo sɔ ɔɖi ara wa loaba i ɔwi kurukutu ame ɔte ɔ̃ ɔɖabo.”
66022007	“Minyɔ! Nto loba i ɔwi kurukutu ame. So aaɣɔ mma lomɔɛ̃ atɔ̃me wa matsɛrɛ i ɔko gɔgbe ame mato.”
66022008	Mme Yohanes nɖe ngɔ lonɔ ara wagbe fiɛ lonya wã ana. Gɔ lonɔ ara wagbe fiɛ lonya wã ne, lopɛ agɛgɛ̃ i Ɣaa kpabo gɔ loɖi wã ɔte me ngbatɔ̃ si losɔrɛ wũ.
66022009	Ɣɛɛ ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daabara ngbɔ! Fɔ gu fɔ manyii ma nɖe kanyamaɖidze gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ makã ɔko gɔgbe ame ɔtɔ̃me atsue ɔɖabo laa loɖe. Sɔrɛ Ɣaa!”
66022010	Ne Ɣaa kpabo ɔɣere me sɔ, “Daakɔla atɔ̃me wa matsɛrɛ mapia i ɔko gɔgbe ame alasɔ ato aaba i ne ame i ɔwi kurukutu ame.
66022011	Ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara ara nyanyarĩa si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ si ɔbara, ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara anyanyara si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃, ngɔ nsɛ ɔbara isɛɛ si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔbara, fiɛ ngɔ nse sekelee ana si ɔkɛlɛgu i katɔ̃ ɔse sekelee.”
66022012	Yesu sɔ, “Minyɔ! Nto loba kiniɔkiniɔ! Losɛgu wũ kuso loto lobɔ, fiɛ loatã ɔbiara kuso i ɔ̃ kurabarara kanya.
66022013	Mme nɖe Ɔɖeakatɔ̃ gu Ɔtsɔra, Karɔ̃kasɛkɔ̃ gu Kawirikɔ̃.
66022014	“So aaɣɔ mma lofore ma awu tagbaraa, sɔ Ɣaa aatã ma ɔri maɖe kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã abi, fiɛ maaki i kayogodɔ̃ ame mabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame.
66022015	Ɣɛɛ mma nsɛ mabara ara lɛ makpɛkpɛ gu mma nsɛ mapɛ sibɔ gu masɔrɔ̃ɖedze gu maturiɖoese gu maɣɔsɔrɛdze, gu mma ɔɖuɖu nsɛ maɖɔɛ mila fiɛ masɛ mala mila ne, maibabo i ɔmagɛ̃ ame, maawe i ɔmagɛ̃ ibere kama.
66022016	“Mme Yesu, mme lopia wũ kpabo sɔ ɔɖe ara wagbe aɖansiɛ ɔtã mi si mafɔɖedze akuri aanɔ. Mme nɖe David Ɔɖu gu ɔ̃ ɔwa tɛtɛ, fiɛ mme nɖe ɔɖesɛrã iwãmi nɛ nsɛ ifiɛ ne.”
66022017	Ɣaa Siwarã gu ɔrɔ̃go gɔ mato makɔ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!” Ngɔ nto ɔnɔ ana si ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Ba!” Ngɔ i ɔme to ɔkore si ɔba ɔ̃afɔ ndu mɛ loatã ngbã ɔnɛ kuso idaatã.
66022018	Nto loka mma ɔɖuɖu lonɔ atɔ̃me wa mapɛ imomo i ɔko gɔgbe ame sɔ, si ɔrere ɔsu irere ɔbua i wã iso ne, Ɣaa to ɔ̃asu inyɛwe nɛ matsɛrɛ mapia i ɔko gɔgbe ame ɔbua i ɔ̃ inyɛwe iso.
66022019	Ngbɔ ame si ɔrere ɔɖi irere ɔbɔrɛgu i atɔ̃me wa mapɛ imomo i ɔko gɔgbe ame ne, Ɣaa iibatã ɔ̃ kɔrɔ̃ ɔpɛgu ara sɛɛ wa matsɛrɛ, ɔ̃ibana kaɖekɔ̃ i kudziri gɔ nsɛ kutã ngbã gu ɔmagɛ̃ sekelea gɔ i kato ame.
66022020	Yesu gɔ loɖe ara wagbe aɖansiɛ ɔɣɛ sɔ, “Aĩ, nto loba kiniɔkiniɔ!” Ne lotɔrã sɔ, “Si iba ngbɔ, Bosate Yesu, ba!”
66022021	Bosate Yesu Kristo si ɔbualɛ mi ɔbiara.
